verses:
svacchaṃ caṃdrāvadātaṃ karikaramakarakṣobhasaṃjātaphenaṃ |
brahmodbhūtiprasaktairvrataniyamaparaiḥ sevitaṃ vipramukhyaiḥ |
kārālaṃkṛtena tribhuvanaguruṇā brahmaṇā dṛṣṭipūtaṃ |
saṃbhogābhogaramyaṃ jalamaśubhaharaṃ pauṣkaraṃ vaḥ punātu || 1 ||

sūtamekāṃtamāsīnaṃ vyāsaśiṣyaṃ mahāmatiḥ |
lomaharṣaṇanāmā vā ugraśravasamāha tat || 2 ||

ṛṣīṇāmāśramāṃstāta gatvā dharmānsamāsataḥ |
pṛcchatāṃ vistarādbrūhi yanmattaḥ śrutavānasi || 3 ||

vedavyāsānmayā putra purāṇānyakhilāni ca |
tavākhyātāni prāptāni munibhyo vada vistarāt || 4 ||

prayāge munivaryaiśca yathāpṛṣṭaḥ svayaṃ prabhuḥ |
pṛṣṭena cānuśiṣṭāste munayo dharmakāṃkṣiṇaḥ || 5 ||

deśaṃ puṇyamabhīpsaṃto vibhunā ca hitaiṣiṇā |
sunābhaṃ divyarūpaṃ ca satyagaṃ śubhavikramaṃ || 6 ||

anaupamyamidaṃ cakraṃ vartamānamataṃdritāḥ |
pṛṣṭato yātaniyamātpadaṃ prāpsyatha yaddhitam || 7 ||

gacchato dharmacakrasya yatra nemirviśīryate |
puṇyaḥ sa deśo maṃtavya ityuvāca svayaṃ prabhuḥ || 8 ||

uktvā caivamṛṣīnsarvānadṛśyatvamagātpunaḥ |
gaṃgāvartasamāhāro nemiryatra vyaśīryata || 9 ||

ījire dīrghasatreṇa ṛṣayo naimiṣe tadā |
tatra gatvā tu tānbrūhi pṛcchato dharmasaṃśayān || 10 ||

ugraśravāstato gatvā jñānavinmunipuṃgavān |
abhigamyopasaṃgṛhya namaskṛtvā kṛtāṃjaliḥ || 11 ||

toṣayāmāsa medhāvī praṇipātena tānṛṣīn |
te cāpi satriṇaḥ prītāḥ sasadasyā mahātmane || 12 ||

tasmai sametya pūjāṃ ca yathāvatpratipedire |
ṛṣaya ūcuḥ |
kutastvamāgataḥ sūta kasmāddeśādihāgataḥ || 13 ||

kāraṇaṃ cāgame brūhi vṛṃdārakasamadyute |
sūta uvāca |
pitrāhaṃ tu samādiṣṭo vyāsaśiṣyeṇa dhīmatā || 14 ||

śuśrūṣasva munīngatvā yatte pṛcchaṃti tadvada |
vadaṃtu bhagavaṃto māṃ kathayāmi kathāṃ tu yāṃ || 15 ||

purāṇaṃ cetihāsaṃ vā dharmānatha pṛthagvidhān |
tāṃ giraṃ madhurāṃ tasya śuśruvurṛṣisattamāḥ || 16 ||

atha teṣāṃ purāṇasya śuśrūṣā samapadyata |
dṛṣṭvā tamativiśvastaṃ vidvāṃsaṃ laumaharṣaṇiṃ || 17 ||

tasminsatre kulapatissarvaśāstrāviśāradaḥ |
śaunako nāma medhāvī vijñānāraṇyake guruḥ || 18 ||

itthaṃ tadbhāvamālaṃbya dharmāñchuśrūṣurāha tam |
tvayā sūta mahābuddhe bhagavānbrahmavittamaḥ || 19 ||

itihāsapurāṇārthaṃ vyāsaḥ samyagupāsitaḥ |
dudohithamatiṃ tasya tvaṃ purāṇāśrayāṃ śubhāṃ || 20 ||

amīṣāṃ vipramukhyānāṃ purāṇaṃ prati samprati |
śuśrūṣā'ste mahābuddhe tachrāvayitumarhasi || 21 ||

sarve hīme mahātmāno nānāgotrāḥ samāgatāḥ |
svānsvānaṃśānpurāṇoktāñchṛṇvantu brahmavādinaḥ || 22 ||

saṃpūrṇe dīrghasatresmiṃstāṃstvaṃ śrāvaya vai munīn |
pādmaṃ purāṇaṃ sarveṣāṃ kathayasva mahāmate || 23 ||

kathaṃ padmaṃ samudbhūtaṃ brahma tatra kathaṃ nvabhūt |
prodbhūtena kathaṃ sṛṣṭiḥ kṛtā tāṃ tu tathā vada || 24 ||

evaṃ pṛṣṭastatastāṃstu pratyuvāca śubhāṃ giram |
sūkṣmaṃ ca nyāyasaṃyuktaṃ prābravīdraumaharṣaṇiḥ || 25 ||

prītosmyanugṛhītosmi bhavadbhiriha codanāt |
purāṇārthaṃ purāṇajñaiḥ sarvadharmaparāyaṇaiḥ || 26 ||

yathāśrutaṃ suvikhyātaṃ tatsarvaṃ kathayāmi vaḥ |
dharma eṣa tu sūtasya sadbhirdṛṣṭaḥ sanātanaḥ || 27 ||

devatānāmṛṣīṇāṃ ca rājñāṃ cāmitatejasām |
vaṃśānāṃ dhāraṇaṃ kāryaṃ stutīnāṃ ca mahātmanām || 28 ||

itihāsapurāṇeṣu dṛṣṭā ye brahmavādinaḥ |
na hi vedeṣvadhīkāraḥ kaścitsūtasya dṛśyate || 29 ||

vainyasya hi pṛthoryajñe varttamāne mahātmanaḥ |
māgadhaścaiva sūtaśca tamastautāṃ nareśvaram || 30 ||

tuṣṭenātha tayorddatto varo rājñā mahātmanā |
sūtāya sūtaviṣayo magadho māgadhāya ca || 31 ||

tatra sūtyāṃ samutpannaḥ sūto nāmeha jāyate |
aindre satre pravṛtte tu grahayukte bṛhaspatau || 32 ||

tameveṃdraṃ bārhaspatye tatra sūto vyajāyata |
śiṣyahastena yatpṛktamabhibhūtaṃ gurorhaviḥ || 33 ||

adharottaradhāreṇa jajñe tadvarṇasaṃkaram |
yetra kṣatrātsamabhavanbrāhmaṇyāścaiva yonitaḥ || 34 ||

pūrveṇaiva tu sādharmyādvaidharmāste prakīrtitāḥ |
madhyamo hyeṣa sūtasya dharmaḥ kṣetropajīvinaḥ || 35 ||

purāṇeṣvadhikāro me vihito brāhmaṇairiha |
dṛṣṭvā dharmamahaṃ pṛṣṭo bhavadbhirbrahmavādibhiḥ || 36 ||

tasmātsamyagbhuvi brūyāṃ purāṇamṛṣipūjitam |
pitṝṇāṃ mānasī kanyā vāsavaṃ samapadyata || 37 ||

apadhyātā ca pitṛbhirmatsyagarbhe babhūva sā |
araṇīva hutāśasya nimittaṃ puṇyajanmanaḥ || 38 ||

tasyāṃ babhūva pūtātmā maharṣistu parāśarāt |
tasmai bhagavate kṛtvā namaḥ satyāya vedhase || 39 ||

puruṣāya purāṇāya brahmavākyānuvartine |
mānavacchadmarūpāya viṣṇave śaṃsitātmane || 40 ||

jātamātraṃ ca yaṃ veda upatasthe sasaṃgrahaḥ |
matimaṃthānamāvidhya yenāsau śrutisāgarāt || 41 ||

prakāśo janito loke mahābhārata caṃdramāḥ |
bhārataṃ bhānumānviṣṇuryadi na syuramī trayaḥ || 42 ||

tato'jñānatamoṃdhasya kāvasthā jagato bhavet |
kṛṣṇadvaipāyanaṃ vyāsaṃ viddhi nārāyaṇaṃ prabhum || 43 ||

ko hyanyaḥ puṃḍarīkākṣānmahābhāratakṛdbhavet |
tasmādahamupāśrauṣaṃ purāṇaṃ brahmavādinaḥ || 44 ||

sarvajñātsarvalokeṣu pūjitāddīptatejasaḥ |
purāṇaṃ sarvaśāstrāṇāṃ prathamaṃ brahmaṇā smṛtam || 45 ||

uttamaṃ sarvalokānāṃ sarvajñānopapādakam |
trivargasādhanaṃ puṇyaṃ śatakoṭipravistaram || 46 ||

niḥśeṣeṣu ca lokeṣu vājirūpeṇa keśavaḥ |
brahmaṇastu samādeśādvedānāhṛtavānasau || 47 ||

aṃgāni caturo vedānpurāṇanyāyavistaram |
asureṇākhilaṃ śāstramapahṛtyātmasātkṛtam || 48 ||

matsyarūpeṇājahāra kalpādāvudakārṇave |
aśeṣametadavadadudakāṃtargato vibhuḥ || 49 ||

śrutvā jagāda ca munīnprativedāṃścaturmukhaḥ |
pravṛttissarvaśāstrāṇāṃ purāṇasyābhavattadā || 50 ||

kālenāgrahaṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā purāṇasya tadā vibhuḥ |
vyāsarūpastadā brahmā saṃgrahārthaṃ yuge yuge || 51 ||

caturlakṣapramāṇena dvāpare dvāpare jagau |
tadāṣṭādaśadhā kṛtvā bhūlokesminprakāśitaṃ || 52 ||

adyāpi devalokeṣu śatakoṭipravistaram |
tadevātra caturlakṣaṃ saṃkṣepeṇa niveśitam || 53 ||

pravakṣyāmi mahāpuṇyaṃ purāṇaṃ pādmasañjñitam |
sahasraṃ pañcapañcāśatpaṃcakhaṇḍaissamanvitam || 54 ||

tatrādau sṛṣṭikhaṇḍaṃ syādbhūmikhaṇḍaṃ tataḥ param |
svargakhaṇḍaṃ tataḥ paścāttataḥ pātālakhaṇḍakam || 55 ||

pañcamaṃ ca tataḥ khyātamuttaraṃ khaṇḍamuttamam |
etadeva mahāpadmamudbhūtaṃ yanmayaṃ jagat || 56 ||

tadvṛttāntāśrayaṃ yasmātpādmamityucyate tataḥ |
etatpurāṇamamalaṃ viṣṇumāhātmyanirmalam || 57 ||

devadevo hariryadvai brahmaṇe proktavānpurā |
brahmaṇābhihitaṃ pūrvaṃ yāvanmātraṃ marīcaye || 58 ||

etadeva ca vai brahmā pādmaṃ loke jagāda vai |
sarvabhūtāśrayaṃ tacca pādmamityucyate budhaiḥ || 59 ||

pādmaṃ tatpaṃcapaṃcāśatsahasrāṇīha paṭhyate |
paṃcabhiḥ parvabhiḥ proktaṃ saṃkṣepādvyāsakāritāt || 60 ||

pauṣkaraṃ prathamaṃ parva yatrotpannaḥ svayaṃ virāṭ |
dvitīyaṃ tīrthaparva syātsarvagrahagaṇāśrayam || 61 ||

tṛtīyaparvagrahaṇā rājāno bhūridakṣiṇāḥ |
vaṃśānucaritaṃ caiva caturthe parikīrtitam || 62 ||

paṃcame mokṣatatvaṃ ca sarvatatvaṃ nigadyate |
pauṣkare navadhā sṛṣṭiḥ sarveṣāṃ brahmakāritā || 63 ||

devatānāṃ munīnāṃ ca pitṛsargastathāparaḥ |
dvitīye parvatāścaiva dvīpāḥ sapta sasāgarāḥ || 64 ||

tṛtīye rudrasargastu dakṣaśāpastathaiva ca |
caturthe saṃbhavo rājñāṃ sarvavaṃśānukīrttanam || 65 ||

antyepavargasaṃsthānaṃ mokṣaśāstrānukīrttanam |
sarvametatpurāṇe'smitkathayiṣyāmi vo dvijāḥ || 66 ||
idaṃ pavitraṃ yaśaso nidhānamidaṃ pitṝṇāmativallabhaṃ syāt idaṃ ca devasya sukhāya nityamidaṃ mahāpātakabhicca puṃsām || 67 ||

sūta uvāca |
namasye sarvalokānāṃ viśvasya jagataḥ patim |
ya imaṃ kurute bhāvaṃ sṛṣṭirūpaṃ pradhānavit || 1 ||

lokakṛllokatatvajño yogamāsthāya yogavit |
asṛjatsarvabhūtāni sthāvarāṇi carāṇi ca || 2 ||

tamajaṃ viśvakarmāṇaṃ citpatiṃ lokasākṣiṇam |
purāṇākhyānajijñāsurvrajāmi śaraṇaṃ vibhum || 3 ||

brahmaviṣṇugirīśebhyo namaskṛtvā samāhitaḥ |
iṃdrāya lokapālebhyaḥ savitre ca samādhinā || 4 ||

munīnāṃ ca variṣṭhāya vasiṣṭhāya mahātmane |
tadvaktrebhātatapase jātūkarṇyāya cākṣuṣe || 5 ||

tasmai bhagavate natvā vedavyāsāya vedhase |
puruṣāya purāṇāya bhṛguvākyānuvartine || 6 ||

tasmādahamupāśrauṣaṃ purāṇaṃ brahmavādinaḥ |
sarvajñātsarvalokeṣu pūjitāddīptatejasaḥ || 7 ||

avyaktaṃ kāraṇaṃ yattannityaṃ sadasadātmakam |
mahadādiviśeṣāṃtaṃ sṛjatīti viniścayaḥ || 8 ||

aṇḍe hiraṇmaye pūrvaṃ brahmaṇaḥ sūtiruttamā |
aṃḍasyāvaraṇaṃ cādbhirapāmapi ca tejasā || 9 ||

vāyunā tasya vāyoḥ khāttadbhūtādita āvṛtam |
bhūtādirmahatā cāpi avyaktenāvṛto mahān || 10 ||

prādurbhāvaśca lokānāmaṃḍa evopavarṇitaḥ |
nadīnāṃ parvatānāṃ ca prādurbhāvonuvarṇyate || 11 ||

manvaṃtarāṇāṃ saṃkṣepātkalpānāṃ copavarṇanam |
brahmavṛkṣalaya brahmaprajāsargopavarṇanam || 12 ||

kalpānāṃ saṃcaraścaiva jagataḥ sthāpanaṃ tathā |
śayanaṃ ca harerapsu pṛthivyuddharaṇaṃ punaḥ || 13 ||

daśadhā janmasaṃcāro bhṛguśāpena keśave |
sanniveśo yugādīnāṃ sarvāśramavibhājanam || 14 ||

svargasthānavibhāgaśca martyānāṃ svargacāriṇāṃ |
paśūnāṃ pakṣiṇāṃ caiva saṃbhavaḥ parikīrttitaḥ || 15 ||

tathā nirvacanaṃ kalpaṃ svādhyāyasya parigrahaḥ |
pratisargāḥ punaḥ proktā brahmaṇo buddhipūrvakāḥ || 16 ||

trayonye'buddhipūrvāste tathā lokānakalpayat |
brahmaṇo vadanebhyaśca bhṛgvādīnāṃ samudbhavaḥ || 17 ||

kalpayoraṃtaraṃ proktaṃ pratisaṃdhiśca sargayoḥ |
bhṛgvādīnāmṛṣīṇāṃ ca prajāsargopavarṇanam || 18 ||

vasiṣṭhasya ca brahmarṣerbrahmattvaṃ parikīrttitam |
svāyaṃbhuvasya ca manostataścāpyanukīrtanam || 19 ||

ukto nābhervisargaśca rajasaśca mahātmanaḥ |
dvīpānāṃ ca samudrāṇāṃ parvatānāṃ ca kīrtanam || 20 ||

dvīpabhedasamudrāṇāmantarbhāvaśca saptasu |
kīrtyante yojanāgreṇa ye ca tatra nivāsinaḥ || 21 ||

tadīyāni ca varṣāṇi nadībhiḥ parvataiḥ saha |
jaṃbūdvīpādayo dvīpāḥ samudraiḥ saptabhirvṛtāḥ || 22 ||

aṃḍasyāṃtastvimelokāḥ saptadvīpā ca medinī |
sūryācaṃdramasoścāro grahāṇāṃ jyotiṣāṃ tathā || 23 ||

kīrtyate dhruvasāmarthyātprajānāṃ ca śubhāśubham |
brahmaṇā nirmitaḥ sauraḥ syaṃdanorthavaśātsvayam || 24 ||

kalpito bhagavāṃstena prasarpati divākaraḥ |
sūryādīnāṃ syaṃdanānāṃ dhruvādeva pravarttanaṃ || 25 ||

kalpitaḥ śiṃśumāraśca yasya pucche dhruvaḥ sthitaḥ |
saṃbhavāṃte ca saṃhāraḥ saṃhārāṃte ca saṃbhavaḥ || 26 ||

devatānāmṛṣīṇāṃ ca manoḥ pitṛgaṇasya ca |
na śakyaṃ vistarādvaktumityuktaṃ ca samāsataḥ || 27 ||

atītānāgatānāṃ vai samaṃ svāyaṃbhuvena tu |
manvaṃtareṣu devānāṃ prajeśānāṃ ca kīrtanam || 28 ||

naimittikaḥ prākṛtikastathaivātyaṃtikaḥ smṛtaḥ |
trividhaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ kalpitaḥ pratisaṃcaraḥ || 29 ||

anāvṛṣṭirbhāskarācca ghoraḥ saṃvarttakānalaḥ |
meghāścaikārṇavā ye tu tathā rātrirmahātmanaḥ || 30 ||

saṃdhyālakṣaṇamuddiṣṭaṃ tathā brāhmaṃ viśeṣataḥ |
bhūtānāṃ cāpi lokānāṃ saptānāmanuvarṇanam || 31 ||

saṃkīrtyaṃ te mayā cātra pāpānāṃ rauravādayaḥ |
sarveṣāmeva satvānāṃ pariṇāmavinirṇayaḥ || 32 ||

brahmaṇaḥ pratisargaśca sarvasaṃhāravarṇanam |
kalpekalpe ca bhūtānāṃ mahatāmapi saṃkṣayaḥ || 33 ||

susaṃkhyāya ca buddhvā vai brahmaṇaścāpyanityatām |
daurātmyaṃ caiva bhogānāṃ saṃsārasya ca kaṣṭatām || 34 ||

durllabhatvaṃ ca mokṣasya vairāgyāddoṣadarśanam |
vyaktāvyaktaṃ parityajya satvaṃ brahmaṇi saṃsthitam || 35 ||

nānātva darśanātsusthastatastadabhivarttate |
tatastāpatrayātīto virūpākhyo niraṃjanaḥ || 36 ||

ānaṃdaṃ brahmaṇaḥ prāpto na bibheti kutaścana |
iti kṛtya samuddeśaḥ pramāṇasyopavarṇitaḥ || 37 ||

kīrtyaṃte jagato yatra sargapralayavikriyāḥ |
pravṛttiścāpi bhūtānāṃ nivṛttīnāṃ phalāni ca || 38 ||

prādurbhāvo vasiṣṭhasya śakterjanma tathaiva ca |
saudāsānnigrahastasya viśvāmitrakṛtena ca || 39 ||

parāśarasya cotpattiradṛśyantyāṃ yathā vibhoḥ |
jajñe pitṝṇāṃ kanyāyāṃ vyāsaścāpi yathā muniḥ || 40 ||

śukasya ca yathā janma putrasya saha dhīmataḥ |
parāśarasya vidveṣo viśvāmitrakṛto yathā || 41 ||

vasiṣṭhasaṃbhṛtaścāgnirviśvāmitrajighāṃsayā |
saṃdhānahetorvibhunā jīrṇaḥ kaṇvena dhīmatā || 42 ||

devena viprā viprāṇāṃ viśvāmitrahitaiṣiṇā |
ekaṃ vedaṃ catuḥpādaṃ caturdhā punarīśvaraḥ || 43 ||

yathā bibheda bhagavān vyāsaḥ sarveṣvanugrahāt |
tasya śiṣyapraśiṣyaiśca śākhābhedāḥ punaḥ kṛtāḥ || 44 ||

prayāge munivaryaiśca yathā pṛṣṭaḥ svayaṃ prabhuḥ |
kṛṣṇena cānuśiṣṭāste munayo dharmakāṃkṣiṇaḥ || 45 ||

etatsarvaṃ yathātatvamākhyātaṃ dvijasattamāḥ |
munīnāṃ dharmanityānāṃ lokataṃtramanuttamam || 46 ||

brahmaṇā yatpurā proktaṃ pulastyāya mahātmane |
pulastyenātha bhīṣmāya gaṃgādvāre prabhāṣitam || 47 ||

dhanyaṃ yaśasyamāyuṣyaṃ sarvvapāpapraṇāśanam |
kīrtanaṃ śravaṇaṃ cāsya dhāraṇaṃ ca viśeṣataḥ || 48 ||

sūtenānukrameṇedaṃ purāṇaṃ saṃprakāśitam |
brāhmaṇeṣu purā yacca brahmaṇoktaṃ savistaram || 49 ||

pādamasya vidansamyagyodhīyīta jiteṃdriyaḥ |
tenādhītaṃ purāṇaṃ syātsarvaṃ nāstyatra saṃśayaḥ || 50 ||

yo vidyāccaturo vedānsāṃgopaniṣado dvijaḥ |
purāṇaṃ ca vijānāti yaḥ sa tasmādvicakṣaṇaḥ || 51 ||

itihāsapurāṇābhyāṃ vedaṃ samupabṛṃhayet |
bibhetyalpaśrutādvedo māmayaṃ pratariṣyati || 52 ||

adhītya caikamadhyāyaṃ svayaṃ proktaṃ svayaṃbhuvā |
āpadaḥ prāpya mucyeta yatheṣṭāṃ prāpnuyādgatim || 53 ||

purā paraṃparāṃ vakti purāṇaṃ tena vai smṛtam |
niruktimasya yo veda sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate || 54 ||

ṛṣayohyabruvansūtaṃ kathaṃ bhīṣmeṇa saṅgataḥ |
brahmaṇo mānasaḥ putraḥ pulastyo bhagavānṛṣiḥ || 55 ||

durlabhaṃ darśanaṃ yasya naraiḥ pāpasamanvitaiḥ |
atyāścaryamidaṃ sūta kṣatriyeṇa kathaṃ muniḥ || 56 ||

ārādhito bṛhadbhūtastanno vada mahāmate |
kīdṛśaṃ vā tapastena ko vānyo niyamaḥ kṛtaḥ || 57 ||

yena tuṣṭo munirbrāhmastathā tena prabhāṣitaḥ |
parvaṃ vāpyatha parvārdhaṃ samagraṃ vā prabhāṣitam || 58 ||

yasminsthāne yathādṛṣṭaḥ pulastyo bhagavānṛṣiḥ |
tanno vada mahābhāga kalyāḥ sma śravaṇe vayam || 59 ||

sūta uvāca |
yatra gaṃgā mahābhāgā sādhūnāṃ hitakāriṇī |
vibhidya parvataṃ vegānniḥsṛtā lokapāvanī || 60 ||

gaṃgādvāre mahātīrthe bhīṣmaḥ pitṛparāyaṇaḥ |
śuśrūṣuḥ suciraṃ kālaṃ mahatāṃ niyame sthitaḥ || 61 ||

yāvadvarṣaśataṃ sāgraṃ parameṇa samādhinā |
dhyāyamānaḥ paraṃ brahma trikālaṃ snānamācarat || 62 ||

pitṝndevāṃstarpayataḥ svādhyāyena mahātmanaḥ |
ātmānaṃ karṣataścāsya tuṣṭo devaḥ pitāmahaḥ || 63 ||

uvāca tanayaṃ brahmā pulastyamṛṣisattamam |
sa tvaṃ devavrataṃ bhīṣmaṃ vīraṃ kurukulodbhavam || 64 ||

tapasaḥ saṃnivarttasva kāraṇaṃ cāsya kīrttaya |
pitṝnbhaktyā mahābhāgo dhyāyamānassamāsthitaḥ || 65 ||

yo hyasya manasaḥ kāmastaṃ saṃpādayamāciram |
pitāmahavacaḥ śrutvā pulastyo munisattamaḥ || 66 ||

gaṃgādvāramathāgatya bhīṣmaṃ vacanamabravīt |
varaṃ varaya bhadraṃ te yatte manasi varttate || 67 ||

tuṣṭaste tapasā vīra sākṣāddevaḥ pitāmahaḥ |
brahmaṇā preṣitastehaṃ varāndāsyāmi kāṃkṣitān || 68 ||

bhīṣmopi tadvacaḥ śrutvā manaḥśrotrasukhāvaham |
unmīlya nayane dṛṣṭvā pulastyaṃ purataḥ sthitam || 69 ||

aṣṭāṃgapraṇipātena natvā taṃ munisattamam |
uvāca praṇato bhūtvā sarvāṃgāliṃgitāvaniḥ || 70 ||

adya me saphalaṃ janma dinaṃ cedaṃ suśobhanam |
bhavataścaraṇau dṛṣṭau jagadvaṃdyau mayā tviha || 71 ||

tapasaśca phalaṃ prāptaṃ yaddṛṣṭobhagavānmayā |
varaprado viśeṣeṇa saṃprāptaśca nadītaṭe || 72 ||

iyaṃ brasī mayā klaptā āsyatāṃ sukhadā kṛtā |
arghyapātre tu pālāśe dūrvākṣatasumaiḥ kuśaiḥ || 73 ||

sarṣapaiśca dadhikṣaudrairyavaiśca payasā saha |
aṣṭāṃgo hyeṣa nirddiṣṭo hyargho hi munibhiḥ purā || 74 ||

śrutvaitadvacanaṃ tasya bhīṣmasyāmitatejasaḥ |
upaviṣṭo brahmasutaḥ pulastyo bhagavānṛṣiḥ || 75 ||

viṣṭaraṃ sahapādyena arghapātraṃ mudānvitaḥ |
jujoṣa bhagavānprītaḥ sadācāreṇa tena tu || 76 ||

pulastya uvāca |
satyavāndānaśīlosi satyasaṃdhirnareśvaraḥ |
hrīmānmaitraḥ kṣamāśīlo vikrāṃtaḥ śatruśāsane || 77 ||

dharmajñastvaṃ kṛtajñastvaṃ dayāvānpriyabhāṣitā |
mānyamānayitā vijño brahmaṇyaḥ sādhuvatsalaḥ || 78 ||

tuṣṭastehaṃ sadā vatsa praṇipātaparasya vai |
prabrūhi tvaṃ mahābhāga kathanaṃ te vadāmyaham || 79 ||

bhīṣma uvāca |
bhagavanbhagavānbrahmā kasminkāle sthito vibhuḥ |
sṛṣṭiṃ cakāra vai pūrvaṃ devādīnāṃ vadasva me || 80 ||

sthitiṃ vā bhagavānviṣṇuḥ kathaṃ rudrastu nirmitaḥ |
kathaṃ vā ṛṣayo devāssṛṣṭāstena mahātmanā || 81 ||

kathaṃ pṛthvī kathaṃ vyoma kathaṃ ceme tu sāgarāḥ |
kathaṃ dvīpāḥ parvatāśca grāmāraṇyapurāṇi ca || 82 ||

munīnprajāpatīṃścaiva saptarṣīnpravarānapi |
varṇānvāyuṃ purāsthānaṃ gaṃdharvānyakṣarākṣasān || 83 ||

tīrthāni sarito vātha sūryādīngrahatārakān |
yathā sasarja bhagavāṃstathā me tvaṃ vadasva ha || 84 ||

pulastya uvāca |
paraḥ parāṇāṃ paramaḥ paramātmā pitāmahaḥ |
rūpavarṇādirahito viśeṣaṇa vivarjitaḥ || 85 ||

apakṣayavināśābhyāṃ pariṇāmarddhijanmabhiḥ |
guṇairvivarjitaḥ sarvaiḥ sa bhātīti hi kevalam || 86 ||

sarvatrāsau samaścāpi vasannanupamo mataḥ |
bhāvayanbrahmarūpeṇa vidvadbhiḥ paripaṭhyate || 87 ||

taṃ guhyaṃ paramaṃ nityamajamakṣayamavyayam |
tathā puruṣarūpeṇa kālarūpeṇa saṃsthitam || 88 ||

taṃ natvāhaṃ pravakṣyāmi yathā sṛṣṭiṃ cakāra ha |
pūrvaṃ tu padmaśayanādutthāya jagataḥprabhuḥ || 89 ||

guṇavyaṃjanasaṃbhūtaḥ sargakāle narādhipa |
sātviko rājasaścaiva tāmasaśca tridhā mahān || 90 ||

pradhānatatvena samaṃ tathā bījādibhirvṛtaḥ |
vaikārikastaijasaśca bhūtādiścaiva tāmasaḥ || 91 ||

trividhoyamahaṃkāro mahattattvādajāyata |
bhūteṃdriyāṇāṃ paṃcānāṃ tathā karmendriyaiḥ saha || 92 ||

pṛthivyāpastathātejo vāyurākāśameva ca |
ekaikaśaḥ svarūpeṇa kathayāmi yathottaram || 93 ||

śabdamātramathākāśaṃ bhūtādiḥ khaṃ samāvṛṇot |
athākāśaṃ vikurvāṇaṃ sparśamātraṃ sasarja ha || 94 ||

balavāneṣa vai vāyustasya sparśo guṇo mataḥ |
ākāśaṃ śabdamātraṃ tu sparśamātraṃ samāvṛṇot || 95 ||

tato vāyurvikurvāṇo rūpamātraṃ sasarja ha |
jyotīrūpantu tadvāyustadrūpaguṇamucyate || 96 ||

sparśarūpastu vai vāyū rūpamātraṃ samāvṛṇot |
jyotiścāpi vikurvāṇaṃ rasamātraṃ sasarja ha || 97 ||

saṃbhavaṃti tatoṃbhāṃsi rūpamātraṃ samāvṛṇot |
vikurvāṇāni cāṃbhāṃsi gaṃdhamātraṃ sasarjire || 98 ||

saṃghāto jāyate tasmāttasya gaṃdho mato guṇaḥ |
taijasānīndriyāṇyāhurdevā vaikārikā daśa || 99 ||

ekādaśammanaścātra devā vaikārikāḥ smṛtāḥ |
tvakcakṣurnāsikā jihvā śrotramatra ca paṃcamam || 100 ||

eteṣāṃ tu mataṃ kṛtyaṃ śabdādi grahaṇaṃ punaḥ |
vākpāṇipādapāyūni copasthaṃ tatra pañcamam || 101 ||

visargaśilpagatyuktirguṇā eṣāṃ viparyayāt |
ākāśa vāyu tejāṃsi salilaṃ pṛthivī tathā || 102 ||

śabdādibhirguṇairvīra yuktānītyuttarottaraiḥ |
śāṃtā ghorāśca mūḍhāśca viśeṣāstena te smṛtāḥ || 103 ||

nānāvīryāḥ pṛthagbhūtāstataste saṃhatiṃ vinā |
nāśaknuvanprajāḥ sraṣṭumasamāgamya kṛtsnaśaḥ || 104 ||

sametyānyonyasaṃyogātparasparasamāśrayāt |
ekasaṃghātalakṣāśca saṃprāpyaikyamaśeṣataḥ || 105 ||

puruṣādhiṣṭhitatvācca vyaktānugrahaṇe tathā |
mahadādayo viśeṣāṃtā hyaṃḍamutpādayaṃti vai || 106 ||

tatkrameṇa vivṛttaṃ tu jalabudbudavatsamam |
tatrāvyaktasvarūposau vyaktarūpī janārdanaḥ || 107 ||

brahmābrahmasvarūpeṇa svayameva vyavasthitaḥ |
merurulbamabhūttasya jarāyuśca mahīdharāḥ || 108 ||

garbhodakaṃ samudrāśca tasyāsaṃśca mahātmanaḥ |
tatra dvīpāssamudrāśca sajyotirlokasaṃgrahaḥ || 109 ||

tasminnaṃḍe'bhavanvīra sadevāsuramānuṣāḥ |
vāri vahnyanilākāśairvṛtairbhūtādinā bahiḥ || 110 ||

vṛtaṃ daśaguṇairaṃḍaṃ bhūtādirmahatā tathā |
avyaktenāvṛto rājaṃstaiḥ sarvaiḥ sahito mahān || 111 ||

ebhirāvaraṇaiḥ sarvaiḥ sarvabhūtaiśca saṃyutam |
nārikelaphalaṃ yadvadbījaṃ bāhyadalairiva || 112 ||

brahmā svayaṃ ca jagato visṛṣṭau saṃpravarttate |
sṛṣṭiṃ ca pātyanuyugaṃ yāvatkalpavikalpanā || 113 ||

sa saṃjñāṃ yāti bhagavāneka eva janārdanaḥ |
satvabhugguṇavāndevo hyaprameya parākramaḥ || 114 ||

tamodrekaṃ ca kalpāṃte rūpaṃ raudraṃ karoti ca |
rājeṃdrākhilabhūtāni bhakṣayatyatibhīṣaṇaḥ || 115 ||

bhakṣayitvā ca bhūtāni jagatyekārṇavīkṛte |
nāgaparyaṃkaśayane śete sarvasvarūpadhṛk || 116 ||

prabuddhaśca punaḥ sṛṣṭiṃ prakaroti ca rūpadhṛk |
sṛṣṭisthityaṃtakaraṇādbrahmaviṣṇuśivātmakaḥ || 117 ||

sraṣṭā sṛjati cātmānaṃ viṣṇuḥ pālyaṃ ca pāti ca |
upasaṃhriyate cāpi saṃharttā ca svayaṃ prabhuḥ || 118 ||

pṛthivyāpastathā tejo vāyurākāśameva ca |
sa eva sarvabhūteśo viśvarūpo yatovyayaḥ || 119 ||

sargādikaṃ tatosyaiva bhūtasthamupakārakam |
sa eva sṛjyaḥ sa ca sargakarttā sa eva pālyaṃ pratipālyate yataḥ |
brahmādyavasthābhiraśeṣamūrttirbrahmā variṣṭho varado vareṇyaḥ || 120 ||

bhīṣma uvāca |
nirguṇasyāprameyasya śuddhasyātha mahātmanaḥ |
kathaṃ sargādikarttṛtvaṃ brahmaṇo hyupapadyate || 1 ||

pulastya uvāca |
śaktayaḥ sarvabhāvānāmaciṃtyā jñānagocarāḥ |
yattato brahmaṇastāstusargādyā bhāvaśaktayaḥ || 2 ||

utpannaḥ procyate vidvānnitya evopacārataḥ |
nijena tasya mānena āyurvarṣaśataṃ smṛtam || 3 ||

tatparākhyaṃ parārddhaṃ ca tadarddhaṃ parikīrttitam |
kāṣṭhā paṃcadaśākhyā tā nimeṣā nṛpasattama || 4 ||

kāṣṭhā striṃśatkalā triṃśatkalā mauhūrttiko vidhiḥ |
tāvatsaṃkhyairahorātraṃ muhūrttairmānuṣaṃ smṛtam || 5 ||

ahorātrāṇi tāvaṃti māsaḥ pakṣadvayātmakaḥ |
taiṣṣaḍbhirayanaṃ varṣamayane dakṣiṇottare || 6 ||

ayanaṃ dakṣiṇaṃ rātrirdevānāmuttaraṃ dinam |
divyairvarṣasahasraistu kṛtatretādisaṃjñitam || 7 ||

caturyugaṃ dvādaśabhistadvibhāgaṃ nibodha me |
catvāri trīṇidve caikaṃ kṛtādiṣu yathākramam || 8 ||

divyābdānāṃ sahasrāṇi yugeṣvāhuḥ purāvidaḥ |
tatpramāṇaiḥ śataiḥ saṃdhyā pūrvā tatrābhidhīyate || 9 ||

saṃdhyāṃśakaśca tattulyo yugasyānaṃtaro hi yaḥ |
saṃdhyāsaṃdhyāṃśayoraṃtaḥ kālo yo nṛpasattama || 10 ||

yugākhyaḥ sa tu vijñeyaḥ kṛtatretādisaṃjñitaḥ |
kṛtaṃ tretā dvāparaṃ ca kaliścaiva caturyugam || 11 ||

procyate tatsahasraṃ tu brahmaṇo divasaṃ nṛpa |
brahmaṇo divase rājanmanavaśca caturdaśa || 12 ||

bhavaṃti parimāṇaṃ ca teṣāṃ kālakṛtaṃ śṛṇu |
saptarṣayaḥ surāḥ śakro manustatsūnavo nṛpa || 13 ||

ekakāle hi sṛjyaṃte saṃhriyaṃte ca pūrvavat |
cataryugānāṃ saṃkhyātā sādhikā hyekasaptatiḥ || 14 ||

manvaṃtaraṃ manoḥ kālaḥ surādīnāṃ ca pārthiva |
aṣṭau śatasahasrāṇi divyayā saṃkhyayā smṛtaḥ || 15 ||

dvipaṃcāśattathānyāni sahasrāṇyadhikāni ca |
triṃśatkoṭyastu saṃpūrṇāḥ saṃkhyātāḥ saṃkhyayā nṛpa || 16 ||

saptaṣaṣṭistathānyāni niyutāni mahāmate |
viṃśatiśca sahasrāṇi kāloyamadhikaṃ vinā || 17 ||

manvaṃtarasya saṃkhyeyaṃ mānuṣairiha vatsaraiḥ |
caturddaśaguṇo hyeṣa kālo brāhmamahaḥ smṛtam || 18 ||

brāhmo naimittiko nāma tasyāṃte pratisaṃcaraḥ |
tadāhi dahyate sarvaṃ trailokyaṃ bhūrbhuvādikam || 19 ||

janaṃ prayāṃti tāpārttā maharlokanivāsinaḥ |
ekārṇave tu trailokye brahmā brahmavidāṃ varaḥ || 20 ||

bhogiśayyāgataḥ śete trailokyagrāsabṛṃhitaḥ |
janasthairyogibhirddevaściṃtyamāno jagadvibhuḥ || 21 ||

tatpramāṇāṃ hi tāṃ rātriṃ tadaṃte sṛjate punaḥ |
evaṃ tu brahmaṇo varṣamevaṃ varṣaśataṃ ca tat || 22 ||

śataṃ hi tasya varṣāṇāṃ paramāyurmahātmanaḥ |
ekamasya vyatītaṃ tu parārdhaṃ brahmaṇonagha || 23 ||

tasyāntebhūnmahākalpaḥ pādma ityabhiviśrutaḥ |
dvitīyasya parārdhasya vartamānasya vai nṛpa || 24 ||

vārāha iti kalpoyaṃ prathamaḥ parikalpitaḥ |
brahmā nārāyaṇākhyosau kalpādau bhagavānyathā || 25 ||

sasarja sarvabhūtāni tadācakṣva mahāmune |
pulastya uvāca |
prajāḥ sasarja bhagavānanādissarvasaṃbhavaḥ || 26 ||

atītakalpāvasāne niśāsuptotthitaḥ prabhuḥ |
satvodriktastathā brahmā śūnyaṃ lokamavaikṣata || 27 ||

toyāntassa mahīṃ jñātvā nimagnāṃ vārisaṃplave |
praviciṃtya taduddhāraṃ kartukāmaḥ prajāpatiḥ || 28 ||

viṣṇurūpaṃ tadā jñātvā pṛthvīṃ voḍhuṃ svatejasā |
matsyakūrmādikāṃ cānyāṃ vārāhīṃ tanumāviśat || 29 ||

vedayajñamayaṃ rūpamāśritya jagataḥ sthitau |
sthitaḥ sthirātmā sarvātmā paramātmā prajāpatiḥ || 30 ||

praviveśe tadā toyaṃ toyādhāre dharādharaḥ |
nirīkṣya taṃ tadā devī pātālatalamāgatam || 31 ||

tuṣṭāva praṇatā bhūtvā bhaktinamrā vasuṃdharā |
pṛthivyuvāca |
namaste sarvabhūtāya namaste paramātmane || 32 ||

māmuddharāsmādadya tvaṃ tvattohaṃ pūrvamutthitā |
paramātmannamastestu puruṣātmannamostu te || 33 ||

pradhānavyaktarūpāya kālabhūtāya te namaḥ |
tvaṃ karttāsarvabhūtānāṃ tvaṃ pātā tvaṃ vināśakṛt || 34 ||

sargādau yaḥ parobrahmā viṣṇurudrātmarūpadhṛk |
bhakṣayitvā ca sakalaṃ jagatyekārṇavīkṛte || 35 ||

śeṣe tvameva govinda cintyamāno manīṣibhiḥ |
bhavato yatparaṃ rūpaṃ tanna jānāti kaścana || 36 ||

avatāreṣu yadrūpaṃ tadarcanti divaukasaḥ |
tvāmārādhya paraṃ brahma yātā muktiṃ mumukṣavaḥ || 37 ||

vāsudevamanārādhya ko hi mokṣamavāpsyati |
yadrūpaṃ manasā grāhyaṃ yadgrāhyaṃ cakṣurādibhiḥ || 38 ||

buddhyā ca yatparichedyaṃ tadrūpamakhilaṃ tava |
tvanmayyahaṃ tvadādhārātvatsṛṣṭā tvāmupāśritā || 39 ||

mādhavīmiti lokoyamabhidhatte tato hi mām |
evaṃ saṃstūyamānastu pṛthivyā pṛthivīdharaḥ || 40 ||

sāmasvaradhvaniḥ śrīmānjagarja parighargharam |
tataḥ samutkṣipya dharāṃ svadaṃṣṭrayā mahāvarāhaḥ sphuṭapadmalocanaḥ |
rasātalādutpalapatrasannibhaḥ samutthito nīla ivācalo mahān || 41 ||

uttiṣṭhatā tena mukhānilāhataṃ tadāplavāṃbho janaloka saṃśrayān |
sanaṃdanādīnapakalmaṣānmunīṃścakāra bhūyopi pavitratāspadam || 42 ||

prayāṃti toyāni khurāgravikṣate rasātale'dhakṛtaśabdasaṃtatiḥ |
balāhakānāṃ ca tati stutasya śvāsānilāstā paritaḥ prayāti || 43 ||

uttiṣṭhatastasya jalārdrakukṣermahāvarāhasya mahīṃ vidārya |
vidhūnvato vedamayaṃ śarīraṃ romāṃtarasthā munayo juṣaṃti || 44 ||

janeśvarāṇāṃ parameśa keśava prabhurgadā śaṃkhadarāsicakradhṛk |
prabhūti nāśa sthiti heturīśvarastvameva nānyatparamaṃ ca yatpadam || 45 ||

pādeṣu vedāstava yūpadaṃṣṭrā daṃteṣu yajñāḥ śrutayaśca vaktre |
hutāśa jihvosi tanūruhāṇi darbhāḥ prabho yajñapumāṃstvameva || 46 ||

dyāvāpṛthivyoratulaprabhāva yadaṃtaraṃ tadvapuṣā tavaiva |
vyāptaṃ jagadvāpi samastametaddhitāya viśvasya vibho bhavatvam || 47 ||
paramātmā tvamevaiko nānyosti jagataḥ pate || 48 ||

tavaiṣa mahimā yena vyāptametaccarācaraṃ |
jñānasvarūpamakhilaṃ jagadetadabuddhayaḥ || 49 ||

arthasvarūpaṃ paśyaṃto bhrāmyaṃte tamasaḥ plave |
ye tu jñānavidaśśuddhacetasaste'khilaṃ jagat || 50 ||

jñānātmakaṃ prapaśyaṃti tvadrūpaṃ parameśvara |
prasīda sarvabhūtātmanbhavāya jagatastvimām || 51 ||

uddharorvīmameyātmannimagnāmabjalocana |
satvodriktosi bhagavangoviṃda pṛthivīmimām || 52 ||

samuddhara bhavāyeśa kuru sarvajagaddhitaṃ |
evaṃ saṃstūyamānaśca paramātmā mahīdharaḥ || 53 ||

ujjahāra kṣitiṃ kṣipraṃ nyastavānsa mahārṇave |
tasyopari jalaughesya mahatī naurivasthitā || 54 ||

tataḥ kṣitiṃ samāṃ kṛtvā pṛthivyāmacinodgirīn |
yathāvibhāgaṃ bhagavānanādiḥ puruṣottamaḥ || 55 ||

bhūvibhāgaṃ tataḥ kṛtvā saptadvīpānyathātathaṃ |
bhūtādyāṃścaturolokānpūrvavatsamakalpayat || 56 ||

brahmaṇe viṣṇunā pūrvametadeva pradarśitaṃ |
tuṣṭena devadevena tvaṃ devaḥ puruṣottamaḥ || 57 ||

tvayā mayā jagaccedaṃ dhāryaṃ pālyaṃ ca yatnataḥ |
yeṣāṃ tvasuramukhyānāṃ varo datto mayādhunā || 58 ||

devānāṃ hitakāmena haṃtavyāste tvayā vibho |
ahaṃ sṛṣṭiṃ kariṣyāmi sā ca pālyā tvayā vibho || 59 ||

evamukto gato viṣṇurdevādīnasṛjadvibhuḥ |
abuddhipūrvakastasya prādurbhūtastamomayaḥ || 60 ||

tamo moho mahāmohastāmisro hyandhasaṃjñakaḥ |
paṃcadhāvasthitaḥ sargo dhyāyatastu mahātmanaḥ || 61 ||

bahiraṃtaścāprakāśaḥ saṃvṛtātmā nagātmakaḥ |
mukhyānāgāyataścoktā mukhyasargastatastvayaṃ || 62 ||

taṃ dṛṣṭvā sādhakaṃ sargamamanyadaparaṃ prabhuḥ |
tasyābhidhyāyatassargastiryaksrotobhyavartata || 63 ||

yasmāttiryakpravṛttiḥ syāttiryaksrotastataḥ smṛtaḥ |
paśvādayaste vikhyātāstamaḥ prāyā hyavedinaḥ || 64 ||

utpathagrāhiṇaścaiva te jñāne jñānamāninaḥ |
ahaṃkṛtāstvahaṃmānā aṣṭāviṃśadvidhātmakāḥ |
aṃtaḥprakāśāste sarva āvṛtāste parasparam || 65 ||

tamapyasādhakaṃ matvā dhyāyatonyastatobhavat |
ūrddhvasrotastṛtīyastu sātvikordhvamavartata || 66 ||

te sukhaprītibahulā bahiraṃtaranāvṛtāḥ |
prakāśā bahiraṃtaśca ūrddhvasrotāstataḥ smṛtāḥ || 67 ||

tuṣṭātmanastṛtīyastu devasargastu saṃsmṛtaḥ |
tasminsarge bhavatprītirniṣpanne brahmaṇastadā || 68 ||

tatonyaṃ sa tadā dadhyau sādhakaṃ sargamuttamam |
asādhakāṃstutānjñātvā mukhyasargādisaṃbhavān || 69 ||

tathābhidhyāyatastasya satyābhidhyāyinastataḥ |
prādurbhūtastadāvyaktādarvāksrotastu sādhakaḥ || 70 ||

yasmādarvākpravartaṃte tato'vāksrotasastu te |
te ca prakāśabahulāstamodriktā rajodhikāḥ || 71 ||

tasmātte duḥkhabahulā bhūyobhūyaśca kāriṇaḥ |
prakāśā bahiraṃtaśca manuṣyāḥ sādhakāśca te || 72 ||

paṃcamonugrahaḥ sargaḥ sa caturddhā vyavasthitaḥ |
viparyayeṇa siddhyā ca śaktyā tuṣṭyā tathaiva ca || 73 ||

vivṛttaṃ varttamānaṃ ca te na jānaṃti vai punaḥ |
bhūtādikānāṃ bhūtānāṃ ṣaṣṭhaḥ sargaḥ sa ucyate || 74 ||

te parigrāhiṇaḥ sarve savibhāgatarāstu te |
codanā jāpyaśīlāśca jñeyā bhūtādikāstu te || 75 ||

ityete kathitāḥ sargāḥ ṣaḍatra nṛpasattama |
prathamo mahatassargo dvitīyo brahmaṇastu yaḥ || 76 ||

tanmātrāṇāṃ dvitīyastu bhūtasargohi sa smṛtaḥ |
vaikārikastṛtīyastu sargaścaiṃdriyakaḥ smṛtaḥ || 77 ||

ityeṣa prākṛtaḥ sargaḥ saṃbhūto buddhipūrvakaḥ |
mukhyasargaścaturthastu mukhyā vai sthāvarāḥ smṛtāḥ || 78 ||

tiryaksrotaśca yaḥ proktastiryagyonyassa ucyate |
tatordhvasrotasāṃ ṣaṣṭho devasargastu sa smṛtaḥ || 79 ||

tatorvāksrotasāṃ sargaḥ saptamaḥ sa tu mānuṣaḥ |
aṣṭamonugrahaḥ sargaḥ sātvikastāmasastu saḥ || 80 ||

paṃcaite vaikṛtāḥ sargāḥ prākṛtāstu trayaḥ smṛtāḥ |
prākṛto vaikṛtaścaiva kaumāro navamaḥ smṛtaḥ || 81 ||

ete tava samākhyātā navasargāḥ prajāpateḥ |
prākṛtā vaikṛtāścaiva jagato mūlahetavaḥ || 82 ||

sṛjato jagadīśasya kimanyacchrotumarhasi |
bhīṣma uvāca |
saṃkṣepātkathitāḥ sargā devādīnāṃ gurostathā || 83 ||

vistarācchrotumicchāmi tvatto munivarottama |
pulastya uvāca |
karmabhirbhāvitāḥ sarvekuśalākuśalaistu te || 84 ||

khyātyā tayā hyanirmuktāḥ saṃhāre hyupasaṃhṛtāḥ |
sthāvarāntāssurādyāstu prajā rājaṃścaturvidhāḥ || 85 ||

brahmaṇaḥ kurvataḥ sṛṣṭiṃ jajñire mānasāḥ smṛtāḥ |
tato devāsurapitṝnmānuṣāṃstu catuṣṭayaṃ || 86 ||

sisṛkṣuraṃbhāṃsyetāni svamātmānamayūyujat |
muktātmanastato jātā durātmānaḥ prajāpateḥ || 87 ||

sisṛkṣorjaghanātpūrvaṃ jajñire tvasurāstataḥ |
tatyāja tāṃ tato duṣṭāntamomātrātmikāṃ tanuṃ || 88 ||

sā tu tyaktā tanustena rājeṃdrābhūdvibhāvarī |
sisṛkṣuranyadehasthaḥ prītimāpustataḥ surāḥ || 89 ||

satvodriktāḥ samudbhūtā mukhato brahmaṇo nṛpa |
tyaktā sāpi tanustena satvaprāyamabhūddinaṃ || 90 ||

tato hi balino rātrāvasurā devatādi vā |
satvamātrātmikāṃ caiva tatonyāṃ jagṛhe tanum || 91 ||

pitṛvanmanyamānasya pitarastasya jajñire |
utsasarja pitṝnkṛtvā tatastāmapi sa prabhuḥ || 92 ||

sā cotsṛṣṭā bhavatsaṃdhyā dinanaktāṃtarā sthitiḥ |
rajomātrātmikāmanyāṃ jagṛhe sa tanuṃ tataḥ || 93 ||

rajomātrotkaṭā jātā manuṣyāḥ kurusattama |
tāmapyāśu sa tatyāja tanumādyāṃ prajāpatiḥ || 94 ||

jyotsnā samabhavaccāpi prāksaṃdhyā yābhidhīyate |
jyotsnāgame tu balino manuṣyāḥ pitarastathā || 95 ||

rājeṃdra saṃdhyāsamaye tasmātte prabhavaṃti vai |
jyotsnā rātryahanī sandhyā catvāryetāni vai vibhoḥ || 96 ||

brahmaṇastu śarīrāṇi triguṇopāśrayāṇi ca |
rajomātrātmikāmeva tatonyāṃ jagṛhe tanuṃ || 97 ||

tataḥ kṣudbrahmaṇojātā jajñe kopastayā kṛtaḥ |
kṣutkṣāmo hyaṃdhakāre tu sosṛjadbhagavāṃstataḥ || 98 ||

virūpā attukāmāste samadhāvaṃta taṃ prabhum |
rakṣatāmeṣa yairuktaṃ rākṣasāste tatobhavan || 99 ||

ūcuḥ khādāma ityanye ye te yakṣāstu tebhavan |
atibhītasya tāndṛṣṭvā keśāḥ śīryanti vedhasaḥ || 100 ||

hīnāśca śiraso bhūyaḥ samārohaṃti te śiraḥ |
sarpaṇāttebhavansarpā hīnatvādahayaḥ smṛtāḥ || 101 ||

tataḥ kruddhena vai sraṣṭrā krodhātmāno vinirmitāḥ |
varṇena kapiśenogrā bhūtāste piśitāśinaḥ || 102 ||

dhayato gāṃ samudbhūtā gaṃdharvāstasya tatkṣaṇāt |
pibaṃto jajñire vācaṃ gaṃdharvāstena te'bhavan || 103 ||

etāni sṛṣṭvā bhagavānbrahmā tacchakticoditaḥ |
tataḥ svacchaṃdato'nyāni vayāṃsi vayaso'sṛjat || 104 ||

avayo vakṣasaścakre mukhatojāṃśca sṛṣṭavān |
sṛṣṭavānudarādgāśca mahiṣāṃśca prajāpatiḥ || 105 ||

padbhyāṃ cāśvānsa mātaṃgānrāsabhāngavayānmṛgān |
uṣṭrānaśvatarāṃścaiva nyaṃkūnanyāśca jātayaḥ || 106 ||

oṣadhyaḥ phalamūlinyo romabhyastasya jajñire |
tretāyugamukhe brahmā kalpasyādau nṛpottama || 107 ||

sṛṣṭvā paśvoṣadhīssamyakyuyoja sa tadādhvare |
gāmajaṃ mahiṣammeṣamaśvāśvataragardabhān || 108 ||

etāngrāmyapaśūnāhurāraṇyāṃśca nibodhame |
śvāpado dvikhuro hastī vānaraḥ pañcamaḥ khagaḥ || 109 ||

uṣṭrakāḥ paśavaṣṣaṣṭhāssaptamāstu sarīsṛpāḥ |
gāyatraṃ ca ṛcaścaiva trivṛtsomaṃ rathantaram || 110 ||

agniṣṭomaṃ ca yajñānāṃ nirmame prathamānmukhāt |
yajūṃṣi traiṣṭubhaṃ chandaḥ stomaṃ pañcadaśaṃ tathā || 111 ||

bṛhatsāma tathokthaṃ ca dakṣiṇādasṛjanmukhāt |
sāmāni jagatīcchandaḥ stomaṃ saptadaśaṃ tathā || 112 ||

vairūpamatirātraṃ ca paścimādasṛjanmukhāt |
ekaviṃśamatharvāṇamaptoryāmāṇameva ca || 113 ||

ānuṣṭubhaṃ savairājamuttarādasṛjanmukhāt |
uccāvacāni bhūtāni gātrebhyastasya jajñire || 114 ||

surāsurapitṝnsṛṣṭvā manuṣyāṃśca prajāpatiḥ |
tataḥ punaḥ sasarjāsau sa kalpādau pitāmahaḥ || 115 ||

yakṣānpiśācāngaṃdharvāṃstathaivāpsarasāṃ gaṇān |
siddhakinnararakṣāṃsi siṃhānpakṣimṛgoragān || 116 ||

avyayaṃ ca vyayaṃ caiva yadidaṃ sthāṇujaṃgamam |
tatsasarja tadā brahmā bhagavānādikṛdvibhuḥ || 117 ||

teṣāṃ ye yāni karmāṇi prāksṛṣṭyāṃ pratipedire |
tānyeva pratipadyaṃte sṛjyamānāḥ punaḥ punaḥ || 118 ||

hiṃsrāhiṃsre mṛdukrūre dharmādharmāvṛtānṛte |
tadbhāvitāḥ prapadyaṃte tasmāttattasya rocate || 119 ||

iṃdriyārtheṣu bhūteṣu śarīreṣu ca sa prabhuḥ |
nānāttvaṃ viniyogaṃ ca dhātaiva vyasṛjatsvayaṃ || 120 ||

nāmarūpaṃ ca bhūtānāṃ kṛtyānāṃ ca prapaṃcanam |
vedaśabdebhya evādau devādīnāṃ cakāra saḥ || 121 ||

ṛṣīṇāṃ nāmadheyāni yathā vede śrutāni vai |
yathāniyogaṃ yogyāni anyeṣāmapi sokarot || 122 ||

yathartāvṛtuliṃgāni nānārūpāṇi paryaye |
dṛśyaṃte tānitānyeva tathā bhāvā yugādiṣu || 123 ||

karotyevaṃvidhāṃ sṛṣṭiṃ kalpādau sa punaḥpunaḥ |
sisṛkṣuśśaktiyuktosau sṛjya śaktipracoditaḥ || 124 ||

bhīṣma uvāca |
arvāksrotāstu kathito bhavatā yastu mānuṣaḥ |
brahmanvistarato brūhi brahmā tamasṛjadyathā || 125 ||

yathā savarṇānasṛjadguṇāṃśca sa mahāmune |
yacca teṣāṃ smṛtaṃ karma viprādīnāṃ taducyatām || 126 ||

pulastya uvāca |
satvābhidhyāyinaḥ pūrvaṃ sisṛkṣorbrahmaṇaḥ prajāḥ |
ajāyaṃta kuruśreṣṭha satvodriktā mukhātprajāḥ || 127 ||

vakṣaso rajasodriktāstathānyā brahmaṇobhavan |
rajasastamasaścaiva samudriktāstathorutaḥ || 128 ||

padbhyāmanyāḥ prajā brahmā sasarja kurusattama |
tamaḥpradhānāstāḥ sarvāścāturvarṇyamidaṃ tataḥ || 129 ||

brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyā vaiśyāḥ śūdrāśca nṛpasattama |
pādoruvakṣasthalato mukhataśca samudgatāḥ || 130 ||

yajñaniṣpattaye sarvametadbrahmā cakāra ha |
cāturvarṇyaṃ mahārāja yajñasādhanamuttamam || 131 ||

yajñenāpyāyitā devā vṛṣṭyutsargeṇa mānavāḥ |
āpyāyaṃte dharmayajñā yataḥ kalyāṇahetavaḥ || 132 ||

niṣpadyaṃte naraiste tu sukarmanirataiḥ sadā |
viruddhācaraṇāpetaiḥ sadbhiḥ sanmārgagāmibhiḥ || 133 ||

svargāpavargaṃ mānuṣyātprāpnuvaṃti narā nṛpa |
yaccābhirucitaṃ sthānaṃ tadyāṃti manujā vibho || 134 ||

prajāstā brahmaṇā sṛṣṭāścāturvarṇyavyavasthitau |
samyakśuddhāḥ samācārā caraṇā nṛpasattama || 135 ||

yathecchāvāsaniratāḥ sarvabādhāvivarjitāḥ |
śuddhāṃtaḥkaraṇāḥ śuddhā dharmānuṣṭhānanirmalāḥ || 136 ||

śuddhe ca tāsāṃ manasi śuddhāṃtaḥsaṃsthite harau |
śuddhajñānaṃ prapaśyaṃti brahmākhyaṃ yena tatpadaṃ || 137 ||

tataḥ kālātmako yosau viriṃcā vā sa ucyate |
saṃsārapātamatyarthaṃ ghoramalpālpasāravat || 138 ||

adharmabījabhūtaṃ tattamolobhasamudgatam |
prajāsu tāsu rājeṃdra rāgādikramasādhanam || 139 ||

tataḥ sā sahajāsiddhisteṣāṃ nātīva jāyate |
rājanvaśyādayaścānyāḥ siddhayoṣṭau bhavaṃti yāḥ || 140 ||

tāsu kṣīṇāsvaśeṣāsu varddhamāne ca pātake |
dvaṃdvābhibhavaduḥkhārtāstā bhavaṃti tataḥ prajāḥ || 141 ||

tato durgāṇi tāścakrurvārkṣaṃ pārvatamaudakam |
dhānvanaṃ ca tathā durgaṃ puraṃ khārvaṭakādi yat || 142 ||

gṛhāṇi ca yathānyāyaṃ teṣu cakruḥ purādiṣu |
śītatāpādibādhānāṃ praśamāya mahāmate || 143 ||

pratihāramimaṃ kṛtvā śītādestāḥ prajāḥ punaḥ |
vārtopāyaṃ tataścakrurhastasiddhiṃ ca karmajām || 144 ||

vrīhayaśca yavāścaiva godhūmā aṇavastilāḥ |
priyaṃgukovidārāśca koradūṣāḥ sacīnakāḥ || 145 ||

māṣā mudgā masūrāśca niṣpāvāḥ sakulatthakāḥ |
aḍhakāścaṇakāścaiva śaṇāssaptadaśa smṛtāḥ || 146 ||

ityetā oṣadhīnāṃ tu grāmyāṇāṃ jātayo nṛpa |
oṣadhyo yajñiyāścaiva grāmyāvanyāścaturdaśa || 147 ||

vrīhayaḥ sayavā māṣā godhūmā aṇavastilāḥ |
priyaṃgusaptamā hyetā aṣṭamāstu kulutthakāḥ || 148 ||

śyāmākastvatha nīvāro vartulassa gavedhukaḥ |
atha veṇuyavāḥ proktāstadvanmarkaṭakā nṛpa || 149 ||

grāmyā vanyāḥ smṛtā hyetā oṣadhyaśca caturdaśa |
yajñaniṣpattaye tadvattathāsāṃ heturuttamaḥ || 150 ||

etāśca sahayajñena prajānāṃ kāraṇaṃ param |
parāparavidaḥ prājñāstato yajñānvitanvate || 151 ||

ahanyahanyanuṣṭhānaṃ yajñānāṃ pārthivottama |
upakārakaraṃ puṃsāṃ kriyamāṇaṃ phalārthinām || 152 ||

yeṣāṃ cakālasṛṣṭosau papābiṃdurmahāmate |
maryādāṃ sthāpayāmāsa yathāsthānaṃ yathāguṇam || 153 ||

varṇānāmāśramāṇāṃ ca dharmāndharmabhṛtāṃvara |
lokāṃśca sarvavarṇānāṃ samyagdharmānupālinām || 154 ||

prājāpatyaṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ smṛtaṃ sthānaṃ tu pārthiva |
sthānamaiṃdraṃ kṣatriyāṇāṃ saṅgrāmeṣvanivartinām || 155 ||

vaiśyānāmmārutaṃ sthānaṃ svadharmamanuvartinām |
gāndharvaṃ śūdrajātīnāṃ paricaryā suvartinām || 156 ||

aṣṭāśītisahasrāṇāṃ yatīnāmūrddhvaretasām |
smṛtaṃ teṣāṃ tu yatsthānaṃ tadeva guruvāsinām || 157 ||

saptarṣīṇāṃ ca yatsthānaṃ smṛtaṃ tadvai vanaukasām |
prājāpatyaṃ gṛhasthānāṃ nyāsināṃ brāhmasaṃjñitam || 158 ||

yogināmamṛtaṃ sthānaṃ brahmaṇaḥ paramaṃ padaṃ |
ekāṃtinaḥ sadodyuktā dhyāyino yogino hi ye || 159 ||

teṣāṃ tatparamaṃ sthānaṃ yattatpaśyaṃti sūrayaḥ |
gatāgatāni varttaṃte caṃdrādityādayo grahāḥ || 160 ||

adyāpi na nivartaṃte nārāyaṇaparāyaṇāḥ |
tāmisramaṃdhatāmisraṃ mahāraurava rauravam || 161 ||

asipatravanaṃ ghoraṃ kālasūtramavīcimat |
viniṃdakānāṃ vedasya yajñavyāghātakāriṇām || 162 ||

sthānametatsamākhyātaṃ svadharmatyāginaśca ye |
tatobhidhyāyatastasya jajñire mānasāḥ prajāḥ || 163 ||

taccharīrasamutpannaiḥ kāyasthaiḥ karaṇaiḥ saha |
kṣetrajñāḥ samavarttaṃta gātrebhyastasya dhīmataḥ || 164 ||

te sarve samavartaṃta ye mayā prāgudāhṛtāḥ |
devādyāḥ sthāvarāṃ tāśca traiguṇyaviṣayesthitāḥ || 165 ||

evaṃ bhūtāni sṛṣṭāni sthāvarāṇi carāṇi ca |
yadāsya tāḥ prajāḥ sarvānavyavarddhaṃtadhīmataḥ || 166 ||

athānyānmānasānputrānsadṛśānātmano'sṛjat |
bhṛguṃ māṃ pulahaṃ caiva kratumaṃgirasaṃ tathā || 167 ||

marīciṃ dakṣamatriṃ cavasiṣṭhaṃcaivamānasān |
navabrahmāṇa ityetepurāṇe niścayaṃ gatāḥ || 168 ||

sanaṃdanādayo ye ca pūrvaṃ sṛṣṭāstu vedhasā |
na te lokeṣvasajjaṃta nirapekṣāḥ prajāsute || 169 ||

sarve hyāgatavijñānā vītarāgā vimatsarāḥ |
teṣvevaṃ nirapekṣeṣu lokasṛṣṭau mahātmanaḥ || 170 ||

brahmaṇobhūnmahānkrodhastrailokyadahana kṣamaḥ |
tasya krodhātsamudbhūtaṃ jvālāmālāvadīpitam || 171 ||

brahmaṇastu tadā jyotistrailokyamakhilaṃ dahat |
bhrakuṭī kuṭilāttasya lalāṭātkrodhadīpitāt || 172 ||

samutpannastadā rudro madhyāhnārkasamaprabhaḥ |
arddhanārīnaravapuḥ pracaṇḍoti śarīravān || 173 ||

vibhajātmānamityuktvā taṃ brahmāṃtardadheḥ tataḥ |
tathoktosau dvidhā strītvaṃ puruṣatvaṃ tathākarot || 174 ||

bibheda puruṣatvaṃ ca daśadhā caikadhā ca saḥ |
saumyāsaumyaistathā rūpaiḥ śāṃtaiḥ strītvaṃ ca sa prabhuḥ || 175 ||

bibheda bahudhā caiva svarūpairasitaiḥ sitaiḥ |
tato brahmā svayaṃbhūtaṃ pūrvaṃ svāyaṃbhuvaṃ prabhum || 176 ||

ātmānameva kṛtavānprajāpatye manuṃ nṛpa |
śatarūpāṃ ca tāṃ nārīṃ taponirddhūtakalmaṣām || 177 ||

svāyaṃbhuvo manurnāma patnītve jagṛhe prabhuḥ |
tasmācca puruṣāddevī śatarūpā vyajāyata || 178 ||

priyavratottātanapāda prasūtyākūti saṃjñitam |
dadau prasūtiṃ dakṣāya ākūtiṃ rucaye purā || 179 ||

prajāpatiḥ sa jagrāha tayorjajñe sa dakṣiṇaḥ |
putro yajño mahābhāga daṃpatyormithunaṃ tataḥ || 180 ||

yajñasya dakṣiṇāyāṃ tu putrā dvādaśa jajñire |
yāmā iti samākhyātā devāḥ svāyaṃbhuve manau || 181 ||

prasūtyāṃ ca tathā dakṣaścatasro viṃśatiṃ tathā |
sasarja kanyāstāsāṃ tu samyaṅnāmāni me śṛṇu || 182 ||

śraddhā lakṣsīrdhṛtiḥ puṣṭistuṣṭirmedhā kriyā tathā |
buddhirlajjāvapuḥ śāṃtirṛddhiḥ kīrtistrayodaśī || 183 ||

patnyarthaṃ pratijagrāha dharmo dākṣāyiṇīḥ prabhuḥ |
tābhyaḥ śiṣṭā yavīyasya ekādaśa sulocanāḥ || 184 ||

khyātiḥ satyatha saṃbhūtiḥ smṛtiḥ prītiḥ kṣamā tathā |
sannatiścānasūyā ca ūrjjā svāhā svadhā tathā || 185 ||

bhṛgurbhavo marīciśca tathā caivāṃgirā muniḥ |
ahaṃ ca pulahaścaiva kraturmunivarastathā || 186 ||

atrirvasiṣṭho vahniśca pitaraśca yathākramam |
khyātyādyā jagṛhuḥ kanyā munayo rājasattama || 187 ||

śraddhā kāmaṃ balaṃ lakṣmīrniyamaṃ dhṛtirātmajam |
saṃtoṣaṃ ca tathā tuṣṭirlobhaṃ puṣṭirasūyata || 188 ||

medhā śrutaṃ kriyā daṇḍaṃ nayaṃ vinayamave ca |
bodhaṃ buddhistathā lajjā vinayaṃ vapurātmajam || 189 ||

vyavasāyaṃ prajajñe vai kṣemaṃ śāntirasūyata |
sukhamṛddhiryaśaḥ kīrtirityete dharmasūnavaḥ || 190 ||

kāmānnaṃdī sutaṃ harṣaṃ dharmapautramasūyata |
hiṃsā bhāryātvadharmasya tasya jajñe tadānṛtaṃ || 191 ||

kanyā ca nikṛtistābhyāṃ bhayaṃ naraka eva ca |
māyā ca vedanā caiva mithunaṃ dvaṃdvameva ca || 192 ||

tayorjajñetha vai māyā mṛtyuṃ bhūtāpahāriṇam |
vedanāyāstataścāpi duḥkhaṃ jajñetha rauravāt || 193 ||

mṛtyorvyādhijarāśoka tṛṣṇākrodhāśca jajñire |
duḥkhottarāḥ smṛtā hyete sarve cādharmalakṣaṇāḥ || 194 ||

naiṣāṃ bhāryāsti putro vā te sarve hyūrddhvaretasaḥ |
raudrāṇyetāni rūpāṇi brahmaṇo nṛvarātmaja || 195 ||

nityaṃ pralayahetutvaṃ jagatosya prayāṃti vai |
rudrasargaṃ pravakṣyāmi yathā brahmā cakāra hā || 196 ||

kalpādāvātmanastulyaṃ sutaṃ pradhyāyatastataḥ |
prādurāsītprabhoraṃke kumāro nīlalohitaḥ || 197 ||

rudanvai susvaraṃ sotha dravaṃśca nṛpasattama |
kiṃ rodiṣīti taṃ devo rudaṃtaṃ pratyuvāca ha || 198 ||

nāmadhehīti taṃ sotha pratyuvāca prajāpatim |
rodanādrudranāmāsi mā rodīrdhairyamāvaha || 199 ||

evamuktaḥ punassotha saptakṛtvo ruroda ha |
tatonyāni dadau tasmai saptanāmāni vai prabhuḥ || 200 ||

mūrttīnāṃ caivamaṣṭānāṃ sthānānyaṣṭau cakāra ha |
bhavaṃ śarvamatheśānaṃ tathā paśupatiṃ nṛpa || 201 ||

bhīmamugraṃ mahādevamuvāca sa pitāmahaḥ |
sūryo jalaṃ mahī vahnirvāyurākāśameva ca || 202 ||

dīkṣito brāhmaṇaḥ soma ityete tanavaḥ kamāt |
evaṃ prakāro rudrosau satīṃ bhāryāmaviṃdata || 203 ||

dakṣakopācca tatyāja sā satī svaṃ kalevaram |
himavadduhitā sābhūnmenāyāṃ nṛpasattama || 204 ||

upayeme punaścaiva yācitvā bhagavānbhavaḥ |
dākṣī dhātṛvidhātārau bhṛgoḥ khyātirasūyata || 205 ||
śriyaṃ ca devadevasya patnī nārāyaṇasya yā || 206 ||

bhīṣma uvāca |
kṣīrābdhau tu tathā lakṣmīḥ kilotpannā mayā śrutā |
khyātyāṃ bhṛgoḥ samutpannā etadāha kathaṃ bhavān || 1 ||

kathaṃ ca dakṣaduhitā dehaṃ tyaktavatī śubhā |
menāyāṃ garbhasaṃbhūtimumāyā janma eva ca || 2 ||

kimarthaṃ devadevena patnī haimavatī kṛtā |
virodhaṃ cātha dakṣeṇa bhagavāṃstu bravītu me || 3 ||

pulastya uvāca |
idaṃ ca śṛṇu bhūpāla yatpṛṣṭohamiha tvayā |
śrīsaṃbaṃdho mayāpyeṣa śruta āsītpitāmahāt || 4 ||

atriputrastu durvāsāḥ paribhrāmyanmahīmimām |
vidyādharīkaremālāṃ dṛṣṭvā saugandhikīṃ śubhām || 5 ||

yācayāmāsa me dehi jaṭājūṭe karomyaham |
iti vidyādharī tena pṛṣṭā sā ṛṣiṇā tathā || 6 ||

dadau tasmai mudāyuktā tāṃ mālāṃ sa tadā nṛpa |
gṛhītvā suciraṃ kālaṃ śiromālāṃ babaṃdha ha || 7 ||

unmatta pretavadvipraḥ śobhamānobravīdidam |
iyaṃ vidyādharī kanyā pīnonnata payodharā || 8 ||

śobhālaṃkārasaubhāgyairyuktā dṛṣṭā tato manaḥ |
kṣobhamāyāti me cādya nāhaṃ kāme vicakṣaṇaḥ || 9 ||

vrajāmi tāvadanyatra saubhāgyaṃ svaṃ pradarśayan |
evamuktvā sa rājeṃdra paribabhrāma medinīm || 10 ||

airāvataṃ samārūḍhaṃ rājānaṃ tridivaukasām |
trailokyādhipatiṃ śakraṃ bhrājamānaṃ śacīpatim || 11 ||

tāmātmaśiraso mālāṃ bhramadunmattaṣaṭpadām |
ādāyāmararājāya cikṣeponmattavanmuniḥ || 12 ||

gṛhītvā devarājena mālā sā gajamūrddhani |
muktā rarāja sā mālā kailāse jāhnavī yathā || 13 ||

madāṃdhakāritākṣosau gaṃdhāghrāṇena vāraṇaḥ |
kareṇādāya cikṣepa tāṃ mālāṃ pṛthivītale || 14 ||

tataścukrodha bhagavāndurvāsā munipuṃgavaḥ |
rājeṃdradevarājānaṃ kruddhaścedamuvāca ha || 15 ||

aiśvaryamadaduṣṭātmannatistabdhosi vāsava |
śriyodhāmasrajaṃ yasmānmaddattānnābhinaṃdasi || 16 ||

trailokyaśrīrato mūḍha vināśamupayāsyati |
maddattā bhavatā mālā kṣiptā yasmānmahītale || 17 ||

tasmātpraṇaṣṭalakṣmīkaṃ trailokyaṃ te bhaviṣyati |
yasya saṃjātakopasya bhayameti carācaram || 18 ||

taṃ māṃ tvamatigarveṇa devarājāvamanyase |
maheṃdro vāraṇaskaṃdhādavatīrya tvarānvitaḥ || 19 ||

prasādayāmāsa muniṃ durvāsasamakalmaṣam |
prasādyamānaḥ sa tadā praṇipātapuraḥsaram || 20 ||

nāhaṃ kṣamiṣye bahunā kimuktena śatakrato |
ityuktvā prayayau vipro devarājopi taṃ punaḥ || 21 ||

āruhyairāvataṃ nāgaṃ prayayāvamarāvatīm |
tataḥ prabhṛti niḥśrīkaṃ saśakraṃ bhuvanatrayam || 22 ||

na yajñāḥ saṃpravartaṃte na tapasyaṃti tāpasāḥ |
na ca dānāni dīyaṃte naṣṭaprāyamabhūjjagat || 23 ||

evamatyaṃtaniḥśrīke trailokye sattvavarjite |
devānpratibalodyogaṃ cakrurdaiteyadānavāḥ || 24 ||

vijitāstridaśā daityairiṃdrādyāḥ śaraṇaṃ yayuḥ |
pitāmahaṃ mahābhāgaṃ hutāśanapurogamāḥ || 25 ||

yathāvatkathite devairbrahmā prāha tathā surān |
kṣīrodasyottaraṃ kūlaṃ jagāma sahitaḥ suraiḥ || 26 ||

gatvā jagāda bhagavānvāsudevaṃ pitāmahaḥ |
uttiṣṭha viṣṇo śīghraṃ tvaṃ devatānāṃ hitaṃ kuru || 27 ||

tvayā vinā dānavaistu jitāḥ sarve punaḥpunaḥ |
ityuktaḥ puṃḍarīkākṣaḥ puruṣaḥ puruṣottamaḥ || 28 ||

apūrvarūpasaṃsthānāndṛṣṭvā devānuvāca ha |
tejaso bhavatāṃ devāḥ kariṣyāmyupabṛṃhaṇam || 29 ||

vadāmyahaṃ yatkriyatāṃ bhavadbhistadidaṃ surāḥ |
ānīya sahitā daityaiḥ kṣīrābdhau sakalauṣadhīḥ || 30 ||

maṃthānaṃ maṃdaraṃ kṛtvā netraṃ kṛtvā ca vāsukim |
mathyatāmamṛtaṃ devāḥ sahāye mayyavasthite || 31 ||

sāmapūrvaṃ ca daiteyāṃstatra sambhāṣya karmaṇi |
samānaphalabhoktāro yūṃya cātra bhaviṣyatha || 32 ||

mathyamāne ca tatrābdhau yatsamutpadyate'mṛtam |
tatpānādbalino yūyamamarāḥ saṃbhaviṣyatha || 33 ||

tathaivāhaṃ kariṣyāmi yathā tridaśavidviṣaḥ |
na prāpsyaṃtyamṛtaṃ devāḥ kevalaṃ kleśabhāginaḥ || 34 ||

ityuktā devadevena sarva eva tataḥ surāḥ |
saṃdhānamasuraiḥ kṛtvā yatnavaṃto'mṛtebhavan || 35 ||

sarvauṣadhīḥ samānīya devadaiteyadānavāḥ |
kṣiptvā kṣīrābdhipayasi śaradabhrāmalatviṣi || 36 ||

maṃthānaṃ maṃdaraṃ kṛtvā netraṃ kṛtvā ca vāsukim |
tato mathitumārabdhā rājeṃdra tarasāmṛtam || 37 ||

vibudhāḥ sahitāḥ sarve yataḥ pucchaṃ tataḥ sthitāḥ |
viṣṇunā vāsukerddaityāḥ pūrvakāye niveśitāḥ || 38 ||

te tasya prāṇavātena vahninā ca hatattviṣaḥ |
nistejaso'surāḥ sarve babhūvuramaradyute || 39 ||

tenaiva mukhaniḥśvāsavāyunātha balāhakaiḥ |
pucchapradeśe varṣadbhistadā cāppayitāḥ surāḥ || 40 ||

kṣīrodamadhye bhagavānbrahmā brahmavidāṃ varaḥ |
mahādevo mahātejā viṣṇupṛṣṭhanivāsinau || 41 ||

bāhubhyāṃ maṃdaraṃ gṛhya padmavatsa paraṃtapaḥ |
śṛṃkhale ca tadā kṛtvā gṛhītvā maṃdarācalam || 42 ||

devānāṃ dānavānāṃ ca balamadhye vyavasthitaḥ |
kṣīrodamadhye bhagavānkūrmarūpī svayaṃ hariḥ || 43 ||

anyena tejasā devānupabṛṃhitavānhariḥ |
mathyamāne tatastasminkṣīrābdhau devadānavaiḥ || 44 ||

havirdhānyabhavatpūrvaṃ surabhiḥ surapūjitā |
jagmurmudaṃ tadā devā dānavāśca mahāmate || 45 ||

vyākṣiptacetasaḥ sarve babhūvustimitekṣaṇāḥ |
kimetaditi siddhānāṃ divi ciṃtayatāṃ tadā || 46 ||

babhūva vāruṇī devī madāghūrṇitalocanā |
kṛtāvarttā tatastasmātpraskhalaṃtī pade pade || 47 ||

ekavastrā muktakeśī raktāṃtastabdhalocanā |
ahaṃ balapradā devī māṃ vā gṛhṇantu dānavāḥ || 48 ||

aśuciṃ vāruṇīṃ matvā tyaktavaṃtastadā surāḥ |
jagṛhustāṃ tadā daityā grahaṇāntesurābhavat || 49 ||

maṃthane pārijātobhūddeva śrīnaṃdano drumaḥ |
rūpaudāryyaguṇopetāstataścāpsarasāṃ gaṇāḥ || 50 ||

ṣaṣṭikoṭyastadā jātāssāmānyā deva dānavaiḥ |
sarvāstāḥ kṛtapūrvāstu sāmānyāḥ puṇyakarmaṇā || 51 ||

tataḥ śītāṃśurabhavaddevānāṃ prītidāyakaḥ |
yayāce śaṃkaro devo jaṭābhūṣaṇakṛnmama || 52 ||

bhaviṣyati na saṃdeho gṛhītoyaṃ mayā śaśī |
anumene ca taṃ brahmā bhūṣaṇāya harasya tu || 53 ||

tato viṣaṃ samutpannaṃ kālakūṭaṃ bhayāvahaṃ |
tena caivārditāssarve dānavāḥ saha daivataiḥ || 54 ||

mahādevena tatpītaṃ viṣaṃ gṛhya yadṛcchayā |
tasya pānānnīlakaṃṭhastadā jāto maheśvaraḥ || 55 ||

pītāvaśeṣaṃ nāgāstu kṣīrābdhestu samutthitam |
tato dhanvaṃtarirjātaḥ śvetāṃbaradharaḥ svayam || 56 ||

bibhratkamaṃḍaluṃ pūrṇamamṛtasya samutthitaḥ |
tataḥ svasthamanaskāste vaidyarājasya darśanāt || 57 ||

tataścāśvaḥ samutpanno nāgaścairāvatastathā |
tata sphuratkāṃtīmativikāsi kamalesthitā || 58 ||

śrīrddevī payasastasmādutthitā dhṛtapaṃkajā |
tāṃ tuṣṭavurmudāyuktāḥ śrīsūktena maharṣayaḥ || 59 ||

viśvāvasumukhāstasyā gaṃdharvāḥ purato jaguḥ |
ghṛtācīpramukhāstatra nanṛtuścāpsarogaṇāḥ || 60 ||

gaṃgādyāḥ saritastoyaiḥ snānārthamupatasthire |
diggajā hemapātrasthamādāya vimalaṃ jalam || 61 ||

snāpayāṃcakrire devīṃ sarvalokamaheśvarīm |
kṣīrodastu svayaṃ tasyai mālāmamlānapaṃkajām || 62 ||

dadau vibhūṣaṇānyaṃge viśvakarmā cakāra ha |
divyamālyāṃbaradharāṃ snātāṃ bhūṣaṇabhūṣitām || 63 ||

iṃdrādyāścāmaragaṇā vidyādharamahoragāḥ |
dānavāśca mahādaityā rākṣasāḥ saha guhyakaiḥ || 64 ||

kanyāmabhilaṣanti sma tato brahmā uvāca ha |
vāsudeva tvamevaināṃ mayā dattāṃ gṛhāṇa vai || 65 ||

devāśca dānavāścaiva pratiṣiddhā mayā tviha |
tuṣṭohaṃ bhavatastāvadalaulyeneha karmaṇā || 66 ||

sā tu śrīrbrahmaṇā proktā devi gachasva keśavaṃ |
mayā dattaṃ patiṃ prāpya modasva śāśvatīḥ samāḥ || 67 ||

paśyatāṃ sarvadevānāṃ gatā vakṣasthalaṃ hareḥ |
tato vakṣasthalaṃ prāpya devaṃ vacanamabravīt || 68 ||

nāhaṃ tyājyā sadā deva sadaivādeśakāriṇī |
vakṣasthale nivatsyāmi sarvasya jagataḥ priya || 69 ||

tatovalokitā devā viṣṇuvakṣasthalasthayā |
lakṣmyā rājeṃdra sahasā parāṃ nirvṛtimāgatāḥ || 70 ||

udvegaṃ ca paraṃ jagmurddaityā viṣṇuparāṅmukhāḥ |
tyaktāstu dānavā lakṣmyā vipracittipurogamāḥ || 71 ||

tataste jagṛhurdaityā dhanvaṃtarikarasthitam |
amṛtaṃ tanmahāvīryyā daityāḥ pāpasamanvitāḥ || 72 ||

māyayā lobhayitvā tu viṣṇuḥ strīrūpasaṃśrayaḥ |
āgatya dānavānprāha dīyatāṃ me kamaṃḍaluḥ || 73 ||

yuṣmākaṃ vaśagā bhūtvā sthāsyāmi bhavatāṃ gṛhe |
tāṃ dṛṣṭvā rūpasaṃpannāṃ nārīṃ trailokyasuṃdarīm || 74 ||

prārthayānāssuvapuṣaṃ lobhopahatacetasaḥ |
dattvāmṛtaṃ tadā tasyai tatopaśyanta tegrataḥ || 75 ||

dānavebhyastadādāya devebhyaḥ pradademṛtaṃ |
tataḥ papuḥ suragaṇāḥ śakrādyāstattadāmṛtam || 76 ||

udyatāyudhanistriṃśā daityāstāṃste samabhyayuḥ |
pītemṛte ca balibhirjitā daityacamūstataḥ || 77 ||

vadhyamānā diśo bhejuḥ pātālaṃ viviśuśca te |
tato devā mudāyuktāḥ śaṃkhacakragadādharam || 78 ||

praṇipatya yathāpūrvaṃ prayayuste triviṣṭapam |
tataḥprabhṛti te bhīṣma strīlolā dānavābhavan || 79 ||

apadhyātāstu kṛṣṇena gatāste tu rasātalam |
tataḥ sūryaḥ prasannābhaḥ prayayau svena vartmanā || 80 ||

jajvāla bhagavāṃścoccaiścārudīptirhutāśanaḥ |
dharme ca sarvabhūtānāṃ tadā matirajāyata || 81 ||

śriyāyuktaṃ ca trailokyaṃ viṣṇunā pratipālitaṃ |
devāstu te tadā proktā brahmaṇā lokadhāriṇā || 82 ||

bhavatāṃ rakṣaṇārthāya mayā viṣṇurniyojitaḥ |
umāpatiśca deveśo yogakṣemaṃ kariṣyataḥ || 83 ||

upāsyamānau satataṃ yuṣmatkṣemakarau yataḥ |
tataḥ kṣemyau sadā caitau bhaviṣyete varapradau || 84 ||

evamuktvā tu bhagavānjagāma gatimātmanaḥ |
adarśanaṃ gate deve sarvalokapitāmahe || 85 ||

devalokaṃ gate śakre svaṃ lokaṃ hariśaṃkarau |
prāptau tu tatkṣaṇāddevau sthānaṃ kailāsameva ca || 86 ||

tatastu devarājena pālitaṃ bhuvanatrayam |
evaṃ lakṣmīrmahābhāgā utpannā kṣīrasāgarāt || 87 ||

punaḥ khyātyāṃ samutpannā bhṛgoreṣā sanātanī |
śriyā saha samutpannā bhṛguṇā ca maharṣiṇā || 88 ||

svanāmnā nagarī caiva kṛtā pūrvaṃ sarittaṭe |
narmadāyāṃ mahārāja brahmaṇā cānumoditā || 89 ||

lakṣmīḥ puraṃ svapitre svaṃ saha kuñcikayā'pya ca |
āgatā devalokaṃ sā'yācatāgatya vai punaḥ || 90 ||

lobhānna dattaṃ tu puraṃ prārthayānā yadā punaḥ |
bhṛgoḥ sakāśānnāvāpa tadā caivāha keśavam || 91 ||

paribhūtā tu pitrāhaṃ gṛhītaṃ nagaraṃ mama |
tasya hastāttvamākṣipya puraṃ taccānaya svayam || 92 ||

taṃ gatvā puṃḍarīkākṣo devaścakragadādharaḥ |
bhṛguṃ sānunayaṃ prāha kanyāyai puramarpaya || 93 ||

kuñcikātālike cobhe dīyetāṃ ca prasādataḥ |
bhṛgustaṃ kupitaḥ prāha nārpayiṣyāmyahaṃ puram || 94 ||

na lakṣmyāstatpuraṃ deva mayā cedaṃ svayaṃ kṛtam |
bhagavannaiva dāsyāmi tyajākṣepaṃ tu keśava || 95 ||

taṃ prāha devo bhūyopi lakṣmyāstatpuramarpaya |
sarvathā tu tvayā tyājyaṃ vacanānme mahāmune || 96 ||

tataḥ kopasamāviṣṭo bhṛgurapyāha keśavam |
pakṣapātena māṃ sādho bhāryāyā bādhasedhunā || 97 ||

nṛloke daśajanmāni lapsyase madhusūdana |
bhāryāyāste viyogena duḥkhānyanubhaviṣyasi || 98 ||

evaṃ śāpaṃ dadau tasmai bhṛguḥ paramakopanaḥ |
viṣṇunā ca punastasya dattaḥ śāpo mahātmanā || 99 ||

na cāpatyakṛtāṃ prītiṃ prāpsyase munipuṃgava |
śāpaṃ dattvā ṛṣestasya brahmalokaṃ jagāma ha || 100 ||

padmajanmānamāhedaṃ dṛṣṭvā devastu keśavaḥ |
bhagavaṃstava putrosau bhṛguḥ paramakopanaḥ || 101 ||

niṣkāraṇaṃ ca tenāhaṃ śapto janmāni mānuṣe |
lapsyase daśadhā tvaṃ hi tato duḥkhānyanekaśaḥ || 102 ||

bhāryāviyogajā pīḍā balapauruṣanāśinī |
tyatkvā cāhamimaṃ lokaṃ śayiṣye ca mahodadhau || 103 ||

devakāryeṣu sarveṣu punaścāvāhanaṃ kriyāḥ |
tathā bruvaṃtaṃ taṃ devaṃ brahmā lokagurustadā || 104 ||

prasādanārthaṃ viṣṇostu stutimetāṃ cakāra ha |
tvayā sṛṣṭaṃ jagadidaṃ padmaṃ nābhau viniḥsṛtam |
tatra cāhaṃ samutpannastava vaśyaśca keśava || 105 ||

tvaṃ trātā sarvalokānāṃ sraṣṭā tvaṃ jagataḥ prabho |
trailokyaṃ na tvayā tyājyameṣa eva varo mama || 106 ||

daśajanmamanuṣyeṣu lokānāṃ hitakāmyayā |
svayaṃ karttā na te śaktaḥ śāpadānāya kopi vā || 107 ||

koyaṃ bhṛguḥ kathaṃ tena śakyaṃ śaptuṃ janārdana |
mānayasva sadā viprānbrāhmaṇāste tanussvayam || 108 ||

yoganidrāmupāsva tvaṃ kṣīrābdhau svapi hīśvara |
kāryakāle punastvāṃ tu bodhayiṣyāmi mādhava || 109 ||

bhagavanneṣa tāvattu tvacchaktyā copabṛṃhitaḥ |
sarvakāryakaraḥ śakrastavaivāṃśena śatruhā || 110 ||

trailokyaṃ pālayanneva tvadājñāṃ sa kariṣyati |
evaṃ stutastadā viṣṇurbrahmāṇamidamuktavān || 111 ||

sarvametatkariṣyāmi yanmāṃ jñāpayase prabho |
adarśanaṃ gato devo brahmā taṃ nābhijajñivān || 112 ||

gate deve tadā viṣṇau brahmā lokapitāmahaḥ |
bhūyaścakāra vai sṛṣṭiṃ lokānāṃ prabhavaḥ prabhuḥ || 113 ||

taṃ dṛṣṭvā nāradaḥ prāha vākyaṃ vākyavidāṃ varaḥ |
sahasraśīrṣā puruṣaḥ sahasrākṣaḥ sahasrapāt |
sarvavyāpī bhuvaḥ sparśādadhyatiṣṭhaddaśāṃgulam || 114 ||

yadbhūtaṃ yacca vai bhāvyaṃ sarvameva bhavānyataḥ |
tato viśvamidaṃ tāta tvatto bhūtaṃ bhaviṣyati || 115 ||

tvatto yajñaḥ sarvahutaḥ pṛṣadājyaṃ paśurdvidhā |
ṛcastvattotha sāmāni tvatta evābhijajñire || 116 ||

tvatto yajñāstvajāyaṃta tvatto śvāścaiva daṃtinaḥ |
gāvastvattaḥ samudbhūtāḥ tvatto jātāvayomṛgāḥ || 117 ||

tvanmukhādbrāhmaṇā jātāstvattaḥ kṣatramajāyata |
vaiśyāstavorujāḥ śūdrāstava padbhyāṃ samudgatāḥ || 118 ||

akṣṇoḥ sūryonilaḥ śrotrāccaṃdramā manasastava |
prāṇoṃtaḥ suṣirājjāto mukhādagnirajāyata || 119 ||

nābhito gaganaṃ dyauśca śirasaḥ samavarttata |
diśaḥ śrotrātkṣitiḥ padbhyāṃ tvattaḥ sarvamabhūdidam || 120 ||

nyagrodhaḥ sumahānalpe yathā bīje vyavasthitaḥ |
sasarjja viśvamakhilaṃ bījabhūte tathā tvayi || 121 ||

bījāṃkurasamudbhūto nyagrodhaḥ samupasthitaḥ |
vistāraṃ ca yathā yāti tvattaḥ sṛṣṭau tathā jagat || 122 ||

yathā hi kadalī nānyā tvakpatrebhyo'bhidṛśyate |
evaṃ viśvamidaṃ nānyattvatsthamīśvara dṛśyate || 123 ||

hlādinī tvayi śaktissā tvayyekā sahabhāvinī |
hlādatāpakarīmiśrā tvayi no guṇavarjite || 124 ||

pṛthagbhūtaikabhūtāya sarvabhūtāya te namaḥ |
vyaktaṃ pradhānaṃ puruṣo virāṭsamrāṭtathā bhavān || 125 ||

sarvasminsarvabhūtastvaṃ sarvaḥ sarvasvarūpadhṛk |
sarvaṃ tvattaḥ samudbhūtaṃ namaḥ sarvātmane tataḥ || 126 ||

sarvātmakosi sarveśa sarvabhūtasthito yataḥ |
kathayāmi tataḥ kiṃ te sarvaṃ vetsi hṛdisthitaṃ || 127 ||

yo me manoratho deva saphalaḥ sa tvayā kṛtaḥ |
taptaṃ sutaptaṃ saphalaṃ yaddṛṣṭosi jagatpate || 128 ||

brahmovāca |
tapasastatphalaṃ putra yaddṛṣṭohaṃ tvayādhunā |
maddarśanaṃ hi viphalaṃ nāradeha na jāyate || 129 ||

varaṃ varaya tasmāttvaṃ yathābhimatamātmanaḥ |
sarvaṃ saṃpadyate tāta mayi dṛṣṭipathaṃ gate || 130 ||

nārada uvāca |
bhagavansarvabhūteśa sarvasyāste bhavānhṛdi |
kimajñātaṃ tava svāminmanasā yanmayepsitam || 131 ||

kṛtā tvayā yathā sṛṣṭirmayā dṛṣṭā tathā vibho |
tena me kautukaṃ jātaṃ dṛṣṭvā devarṣidānavān || 132 ||

pulastya uvāca |
nāradasya pitā tuṣṭo brahmā devo divaspatiḥ |
nāradāya varaṃ prādādṛṣīṇāmuttamo bhavān || 133 ||

bhavitā matprasādena kalikelikathāpriyaḥ |
gatiśca te'pratihatā divi bhūmau rasātale || 134 ||

yajñopavītasūtreṇa yogapaṭṭāvalaṃbikā |
chatrikā ca tathā vīṇā alaṃkārāya tenagha || 135 ||

viṣṇoḥ samīpe rudrasya tathā śakrasya nārada |
dvīpeṣu pārthivānāṃ tu sadā prītiṃ ca lapsyase || 136 ||

varṇānāṃ tu bhavānśāstāvarodattomayātava |
tiṣṭha putra yathākāmaṃ sevyamānaḥ surairddivi || 137 ||

bhīṣma uvāca |
kathaṃ satī dakṣasutā dehaṃ tyaktavatī śubhā |
dakṣayajñastu rudreṇa vidhvastaḥ kena hetunā || 1 ||

etanme kautukaṃ brahmankathaṃ devo maheśvaraḥ |
jagāmātha krodhavaśaṃ tripurārirmahāyaśāḥ || 2 ||

pulastya uvāca |
gaṃgādvāre purā bhīṣma dakṣo yajñamathārabhat |
tatra devāsuragaṇāḥ pitarotha maharṣayaḥ || 3 ||

samājagmurmudāyuktāḥ sarve devāḥ savāsavāḥ |
nāgā yakṣāḥ suparṇāśca vīrudoṣadhayastathā || 4 ||

kaśyapo bhagavānatriḥ pulastyaḥ pulahaḥ kratuḥ |
pracetasoṃgirāścaiva vasiṣṭhaśca mahātapāḥ || 5 ||

tatra vedīṃ samāṃ kṛtvā cāturhotraṃ nyaveśayat |
hotā vasiṣṭhastatrāsīdaṃgirādhvaryusattamaḥ || 6 ||

bṛhaspatirathodgātā brahmā vai nāradastathā |
yajñakarmapravṛttau tu hūyamāneṣu cāgniṣu || 7 ||

āgatā vasavaḥ sarva ādityā dvādaśaiva tu |
aśvinau marutaścaiva manavaśca caturdaśa || 8 ||

evaṃ yajñe pravṛtte tu hūyamāneṣu cāgniṣu |
vibhūtiṃ tāṃ parāṃ tatra bhakṣyabhojyakṛtāṃ śubhām || 9 ||

ālokya sarvato bhūmiṃ samaṃtāddaśayojanam |
mahāvedī kṛtā tatra sarvaistatra samanvitaiḥ || 10 ||

sarvāndevānśakramukhyānyajñe dṛṣṭvā satī śubhā |
tadāsānunayaṃ vākyaṃ prajāpatimabhāṣata || 11 ||

satyuvāca |
airāvataṃ samārūḍho devarājaḥ śatakratuḥ |
patnyā śacyā sahāyātaḥ kṛtāvāsaḥ śatakratuḥ || 12 ||

pāpānāṃ yo yamayitā dharmeṇādharmiṇāṃ prabhuḥ |
patnyā dhūmorṇayā sārddhamihāyātaḥ sa dṛśyate || 13 ||

yādasāṃ ca patirddevo varuṇo lokabhāvanaḥ |
gauryyā patnyā sahāyātaḥ pracetā maṃḍape tviha || 14 ||

sarvayakṣādhipo devaḥ putro viśravaso muneḥ |
patnyā tviha samāyātaḥ saha devyā dhanādhipaḥ || 15 ||

mukhaṃ yaḥ sarvadevānāṃ jaṃtūnāmudare sthitaḥ |
vedā yadarthamutpannāssoyaṃ yajñamupāgataḥ || 16 ||

niṛtī rākṣasendro'sau dikpatitve niyojitaḥ |
sa ca tvihāgatastāta patnyā sārddhaṃ kratāviha || 17 ||

āyuḥprado jagatyasminbrahmaṇā nirmitaḥ purā |
prāṇopānovyānaudānassamānāhvayastathā || 18 ||

ekonapaṃcāśatkena gaṇena parivāritaḥ |
yajñe prajāpatiścāsau vāyurdevaḥsamāgataḥ || 19 ||

dvādaśātmā grahādhyakṣaḥcakṣuṣī jagatastviha |
pāti vai bhuvanaṃ sarvaṃ devānāṃ yaḥ parāyaṇaḥ || 20 ||

āyuṣaśca vanānāṃ ca divasānāṃ patirhi yaḥ |
saṃjñā patirihāyāto bhāskaro lokapāvanaḥ || 21 ||

atrivaṃśasamudbhūto dvijarājo mahāyaśāḥ |
nayanānaṃdajanano lokanātho dharātale || 22 ||

oṣadhīnāṃ patiścāpi vīrudhāmapi sarvaśaḥ |
uḍunāthaḥ sapatnīka ihāyātaḥ śaśī tava || 23 ||

vasavoṣṭau samāyātā aśvinau ca samāgatau |
vṛkṣo vanaspatiścāpi gandharvāpsarasāṃ gaṇāḥ || 24 ||

vidyādharā bhūtasaṃghā vetālā yakṣarākṣasāḥ |
piśācāścograkarmāṇastathānye jīvahārakāḥ || 25 ||

nadyo nadāḥ samudrāśca dvīpāśca saha parvataiḥ |
grāmyāraṇyāśca paśavo yadiṅgaṃ yacca neṅgati || 26 ||

kaśyapo bhagavānatrirvasiṣṭhaścāparaiḥ saha |
pulastyaḥ pulahaścaiva sanakādyā maharṣayaḥ || 27 ||

puṇyā rājarṣayaścaiva pṛthivyāṃ ye ca pārthivāḥ |
varṇāścāśramiṇaścaiva sarve ye karmakāriṇaḥ || 28 ||

kimatra bahunoktena brāhmī sṛṣṭirihāgatā |
bhaginyo bhāgineyāśca bhaginīpatayastvime || 29 ||

svabhāryāsahitāḥ sarve saputrāssaha bāṃdhavāḥ |
tvayā samarcitāḥ sarve dānamānaparigrahaiḥ || 30 ||

āmaṃtraṇā maṃtritānāṃ sarveṣāṃ mānanā kṛtā |
eka evātra bhagavānpatirme na samāgataḥ || 31 ||

vinā tena tvidaṃ sarvaṃ śūnyavatpratibhāti me |
manye cāhaṃ tu bhavatā patirme na nimaṃtritaḥ || 32 ||

vismṛtaste bhavennūnaṃ sarvaṃ śaṃsatu me bhavān |
pulasya uvāca |
tasyāstaduktaṃ vacanaṃ śrutvā dakṣaḥ prajāpatiḥ || 33 ||

patisneha samāyuktāṃ prāṇebhyopi garīyasīm |
aṃkamāropya tāṃ bālāṃ sādhvīṃ patiparāyaṇām || 34 ||

pativratāṃ mahābhāgāṃ patipriyahitaiṣiṇīm |
prāha gaṃbhīrabhāvena śṛṇu vatse yathātatham || 35 ||

yenādya kāraṇeneha patiste na nimaṃtritaḥ |
kapālapātradhṛkcarmī bhasmāvṛta tanustathā || 36 ||

śūlī muṇḍī ca nagnaśca śmaśāne ramate sadā |
vibhūtyāṅgāni sarvāṇi parimārṣṭi ca nityaśaḥ || 37 ||

vyāghracarmaparīdhāno hasticarmaparicchadaḥ |
kapālamālaṃ śirasi khaṭvāgaṃ ca kare sthitaṃ || 38 ||

kaṭyāṃ vai gonasaṃ badhvā liṃge'sthnāṃ valayaṃ tathā |
pannagānāṃ tu rājānamupavītaṃ ca vāsukim || 39 ||

kṛtvā bhramati cānena rūpeṇa satataṃ kṣitau |
nagnā gaṇāḥ piśācāśca bhūtasaṃghā hyanekaśaḥ || 40 ||

trinetraśca triśūlī ca gītanṛtyaratassadā |
kutsitāni tathānyāni sadā te kurute patiḥ || 41 ||

trapākaro bhavenmahyaṃ devānāṃ saṃnidhiḥ kathaṃ |
kīdṛkca vasanaṃ tasya ketanaṃ prati nārhati || 42 ||

etairdoṣairmayā vatse lokānāṃ caiva lajjayā |
nāhvānaṃ tu kṛtaṃ tasya kāraṇena mayā sute || 43 ||

yajñasyāsya samāptau tu pūjāṃ kṛtvā tvayā saha |
ānīya tava bharttāraṃ tvayā saha trilocanam || 44 ||

trailokyasyādhikāṃ pūjāṃ kariṣyāmi ca satkṛtaiḥ |
etatte sarvamākhyātaṃ trapāyāḥ kāraṇaṃ mahat || 45 ||

nātra manyustvayā kāryaḥ sarvaḥ svaṃ bhāgamarhati |
anyajanmani yairyādṛkkṛtaṃ karma śubhāśubham || 46 ||

iha janmani te tādṛkputrike bhuṃjate phalam |
paritāpaṃ mā kṛthāstvaṃ phalaṃ bhuṃkṣva purākṛtam || 47 ||

śriyaṃ paragatāṃ dṛṣṭvā rūpasaubhāgyaśobhanām |
rūpaṃ ca kāṃtisaubhāgyaṃ ramyāṇyābharaṇāni ca || 48 ||

kulemahativaijanmavapuścātīvasuṃdaram |
pūrvabhāgyaistu labhyaṃte narairetāni suvrate || 49 ||

mātmānaṃ pariniṃdethāmāca bhāgyāni suvrate |
phalaṃ caivaṃ vidhikṛtaṃ dātuṃ kasya tu kaḥ kṣamaḥ || 50 ||

nāsti vai balavānkaścinnamūḍho na ca paṃḍitaḥ |
pāṃḍityaṃ ca balaṃ caiva jāyate pūrvakarmaṇaḥ || 51 ||

ete devā divaṃ prāptāḥ śobhamānāḥ sthitāściram |
puṇyena tapasā caiva kṣetreṣuvividheṣuca || 52 ||

yadebhirārjitaṃ puṇyaṃ tasyaite phalabhāginaḥ |
evamuktā tataḥ sā tu satī bhīṣmaruṣānvitā || 53 ||

viniṃdamānā pitaraṃ krodhenāruṇitekṣaṇā |
evametadyathā tāta tvayā coktaṃ mamāgrataḥ || 54 ||

sarvo janaḥ puṇyabhāgī puṇyena labhate śriyaṃ |
puṇyena labhate janma puṇye bhogāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ || 55 ||

tadayaṃ jagatāmīśaḥ sarveṣāmuttamottamaḥ |
sthānānyetāni sarveṣāṃ dattānyetena dhīmatā || 56 ||

ye guṇāstasya devasya vaktuṃ jihvāpi vedhasaḥ |
na śaktā khyāpane tasya devasya parameṣṭhinaḥ || 57 ||

bhasmāsthi ca kapālāni śmaśāne vasatistathā |
gonasādyāśca ye sarpāḥ sarve te bhūṣaṇīkṛtāḥ || 58 ||

bhūtapretagaṇāstasya piśācā guhyakāstathā |
eṣa dhātā vidhātā ca eṣa pālayitā diśaḥ || 59 ||

prasādena ca rudrasya prāptasvargaḥ puraṃdaraḥ |
yadi rudresti devatvaṃ yadi sarvagataḥ śivaḥ || 60 ||

satyena tena te yajñaṃ vidhvaṃsayatu śaṃkaraḥ |
yadyasti me tapaḥ kiṃcitkaściddharmothavā kṛtaḥ || 61 ||

phalena tasya dharmasya yajñaste nāśamarhati |
priyāhaṃ yadi devasya yadi māṃ tārayiṣyati || 62 ||

tena satyena te garvaḥ samāptimabhigacchatu |
ityuktvā yogamāsthāya svadehasthena tejasā || 63 ||

nirdadāha tadātmānaṃ sadevāsurapannagaiḥ |
kiṃkimetaditi prokte gaṃdharvagaṇaguhyakaiḥ || 64 ||

gaṃgākūle tadā mukto deho vai kruddhayā tayā |
saunakaṃ nāma tattīrthaṃ gaṃgāyāḥ paścime taṭe || 65 ||

śrutvā rudrastu tadvārttāṃ patnyānāśa suduḥkhitaḥ |
haṃtuṃ yajñaṃ dhīrabhavatdevānāmiha paśyatām || 66 ||

gaṇakoṭiḥ samādiṣṭā grahā vaināyakāstathā |
bhūtapretapiśācāśca dakṣayajña vināśane || 67 ||

tairgatvā vibudhāssarve yajñe nirjitya nāśitāḥ |
hate yajñe tadā dakṣo nirutsāho nirudyamaḥ || 68 ||

upagamyābravīttrasto devadevaṃ pinākinam |
na jñātosi mayā deva devānāṃ prabhurīśvaraḥ || 69 ||

tvamasya jagatodhīśaḥ surāssarve tvayā jitāḥ |
kṛpāṃ kuru maheśāna gaṇānsarvānnivarttaya || 70 ||

gaṇairnānāvidhairghorairnānābhūṣaṇabhūṣitaiḥ |
nānāvadanadaṃtauṣṭhairnānā praharaṇodyataiḥ || 71 ||

nānā nāgeṃdrasaṃdaṣṭa jaṭābhāropaśobhitaiḥ |
sudṛḍhoddhata darpāḍhyairghorairghoranighātibhiḥ || 72 ||

kāmarūpairakāṃtaiśca sarvakāmasamanvitaiḥ |
anivāryabalaiścograiryogibhiryogagāmibhiḥ || 73 ||

vyālolakesarajaṭairdaṃṣṭrotkaṭahasanmukhaiḥ |
karīṃdrakaraṭāṭopa pāṭavaiḥ siṃhadehibhiḥ || 74 ||

kecitparamadāghrāṇa ghūrṇaddīpasamaprabhaiḥ |
vicitracitravasanairddhīradhīravāradibhiḥ || 75 ||

mṛgavyāghrasiṃharutaistarakṣvajinadhāribhiḥ |
bhujaṃgahāravalayakṛtayajñopavītakaiḥ || 76 ||

śūlāsipaṭṭiśadharaiḥ paraśuprāsahastakaiḥ |
vajrakrakacakodaṃḍakāladaṃḍāstrapāṇibhiḥ || 77 ||

gaṇeśvaraiḥ sudurddharṣairvṛtaḥ sūryo grahairiva |
devadevamahādeva naṣṭo yajño divaṃ gataḥ || 78 ||

mṛgarūpadharo bhūtvā bhayabhītastu śaṃkara |
namaḥ śaṅkhābhadevāya sagaṇāya sanaṃdine || 79 ||

vṛṣāsanāya somāya kratukālāṃtakāya ca |
namo dikcarmavastrāya namaste tīvratejase || 80 ||

brahmaṇe brahmadehāya brahmaṇyāyāmitāya ca |
girīśāya sureśāya īśānāya namonamaḥ || 81 ||

rudrāya prativajrāya śivāya krathanāya ca |
surāsurādhipataye yatīnāṃ pataye namaḥ || 82 ||

dhūmrogrāya virūpāya yajvane ghorarūpiṇe |
virūpākṣāśubhākṣāya sahasrākṣāya vai namaḥ || 83 ||

muṃḍāya caṃḍamuṇḍāya varakhaṭvāṅgadhāriṇe |
kavyarūpāya havyāya sarvasaṃhāriṇe namaḥ || 84 ||

bhaktānukaṃpinetyarthaṃ rudrajāpyastutāya ca |
virūpāya surūpāya rūpāṇāṃ śatakāriṇe || 85 ||

paṃcāsyāya śubhāsyāya caṃdrāsyāya namo namaḥ |
varadāya varārhāya kūrmāya ca mṛgāya ca || 86 ||

līlālakaśikhaṃḍāya kamaṃḍaludharāya ca |
viśvanāmnetha viśvāya viśveśāya namonamaḥ || 87 ||

trinetratrāṇamasmākaṃ tripuraghnavidhīyatāṃ |
vāṅmanaḥ kāyabhāvaistu prapannasya maheśvara || 88 ||

evaṃ stutastadā devo dakṣeṇāpannadehinā |
divyenānena stotreṇa bhṛśamārādhitastadā || 89 ||

samagraṃ te yajñaphalaṃ mayā dattaṃ prajāpate |
sarvakāmaprasirddhythaṃphalaṃprāpsyasyanuttamam || 90 ||

evamukto bhagavatā praṇamyātha sureśvaram |
jagāma svaniketaṃ tu gaṇānāmeva paśyatām || 91 ||

patnyāḥ śokena vai devo gaṃgādvāre tadāsthitaḥ |
tāṃ satīṃ ciṃtayānastu kva nu sāmepriyāgatā || 92 ||

tasya śokābhibhūtasya nārado bhavasaṃnnidhau |
sā te satī yā deveśa bhāryā prāṇasamāmṛtā || 93 ||

himavadduhitā sā ca menāgarbhasamudbhavā |
jagrāha dehamanyaṃ sā vedavedārthavedinī || 94 ||

śrutvā devastadā dhyānamavatīrṇāmapaśyata |
kṛtakṛtyamathātmānaṃ kṛtvā devastadāsthitaḥ || 95 ||

saṃprāptayauvanā devī punareva vivāhitā |
evaṃ hi kathitaṃ bhīṣma yathā yajño hataḥ purā || 96 ||
iti śrīpādmapurāṇe prathame sṛṣṭikhaṇḍe dakṣayajñavidhvaṃsonāma pañcamo'dhyāyaḥ || 5 ||

bhīṣma uvāca |
devānāṃ dānavānāṃ ca gaṃdharvoragarakṣasām |
utpattiṃ vistareṇemāṃ guro brūhi yathāvidhi || 1 ||

pulastya uvāca |
saṃkalpāddarśanātsparśātpūrveṣāṃ sṛṣṭirucyate |
dakṣātprācetasādūrdhvaṃ sṛṣṭirmaithunasaṃbhavā || 2 ||

yathā sasarja caivāsau tathaiva śṛṇu kaurava |
yadā tu sṛjatastasya devarṣigaṇapannagān || 3 ||

na vṛddhimagamallokastadā maithunayogataḥ |
dakṣaḥ putrasahasrāṇi tadāsiknyāmajījanat || 4 ||

tāṃstu dṛṣṭvā mahābhāgānsisṛkṣūnvividhāḥ prajāḥ |
nāradaḥ prāha haryaśvāndakṣaputrānsamāgatān || 5 ||

bhuvaḥ pramāṇaṃ sarvaṃ tu jñātvorddhamadha eva vā |
tataḥ sṛṣṭiṃ viśeṣeṇa kurudhvamṛṣisattamāḥ || 6 ||

te tu tadvacanaṃ śrutvā prayātāḥ sarvatodiśam |
adyāpi na nivarttaṃte samudrādiva siṃdhavaḥ || 7 ||

haryaśveṣu praṇaṣṭeṣu punardakṣaḥ prajāpatiḥ |
vīriṇyāmeva putrāṇāṃ sahasramasṛjatprabhuḥ || 8 ||

śabalāśvā nāma te ca sametāḥ sṛṣṭikarmaṇi |
nāradonugatānprāha punastānpūrvavanmuniḥ || 9 ||

bhuvaḥ pramāṇaṃ sarvaṃ tu jñātvā bhrātṝnatho punaḥ |
āgatya ca punaḥ sṛṣṭiṃ kariṣyatha viśeṣataḥ || 10 ||

tepi tenaiva mārgeṇa jagmurbhrātranugāstadā |
tataḥ prabhṛti na bhrātuḥ kanīyānmārgamicchati || 11 ||

anveṣṭā duḥkhamāpnoti tena tatparivarjayet |
tatasteṣvapi naṣṭeṣu ṣaṣṭiṃ kanyāḥ prajāpatiḥ || 12 ||

vīriṇyāṃ janayāmāsa dakṣaḥ prācetasastadā |
prādātsa daśa dharmāya kaśyapāya trayodaśa || 13 ||

viṃśatisapta somāya catasroriṣṭanemine |
dve caiva bhṛguputrāya dve kṛśāśvāya dhīmate || 14 ||

dve caivāṃgirase prādāttāsāṃ nāmāni vistarāt |
śṛṇu tvaṃ devamātṝṇāṃ prajāvistāramāditaḥ || 15 ||

aruṃdhatī vasurjāmirlambā bhānurmarutvatī |
saṃkalpā ca muhūrtā ca sādhyā viśvā ca bhāminī || 16 ||

dharmapatnyaḥ samākhyātāstāsāṃ putrānnibodha me |
viśvedevāstu viśvāyāḥ sādhyā sādhyānajījanat || 17 ||

marutvatyāṃ marutvaṃto vasostu vasavastathā |
bhānostu bhānavo jātā mūhūrttāyā muhūrtajāḥ || 18 ||

laṃbāyāṃ ghoṣanāmāno nāgavīthī tu jāmijā |
pṛthivītalasaṃbhūtamaruṃdhatyāmajāyata || 19 ||

saṃkalpāyāstu saṃkalpā vasu sṛṣṭiṃ nidhāraya |
jyotiṣmataṃśca ye devā vyāpakāḥ sarvatodiśam || 20 ||

vasavaste samākhyātāsteṣāṃ nāmāni me śṛṇu |
āpo dhruvaśca somaśca dharaścaivānilonalaḥ || 21 ||

pratyūṣaśca prabhāsaśca vasavoṣṭau prakīrtitāḥ |
āpasya putrāścatvāraḥ śrāṃto vaitaṇḍa eva ca || 22 ||

api śāṃto munirvabhruryajñarakṣādhikāriṇaḥ |
dhruvasya kālaḥ putrastu varcāḥ somādajāyata || 23 ||

draviṇo havyavāhaśca dhara putrāvimau smṛtau |
kalpāṃtasthastataḥ prāṇo ramaṇaḥ śiśiropi ca || 24 ||

manoharo dhavaścātha śivo vātha hareḥ sutāḥ |
śivo manojavaṃ putramavijñātagatipradam || 25 ||

avāpa cānalaḥ putrānagniprāyaguṇāṃstataḥ |
tatra śākho viśākhaśca nigameṣu svayaṃbhuvaḥ || 26 ||

apatyaṃ kṛttikānāṃ ca kārtikeyastataḥ smṛtaḥ |
pratyūṣasya ṛbhuḥ putro munirnāmātha devalaḥ || 27 ||

viśvakarmā prabhāsasya putraḥ śilpī prajāpatiḥ |
prāsādabhavanodyāna pratimā bhūṣaṇādiṣu || 28 ||

taṭākārāmakūpeṣu tridaśānāṃ ca varddhakiḥ |
ajaikapādahirbudhnyo virūpākṣotha raivataḥ || 29 ||

haraśca bahurūpaśca tryaṃbakaśca sureśvaraḥ |
sāvittraśca jayaṃtaśca pinākī cāparājitaḥ || 30 ||

ete rudrāssamākhyātā ekādaśa gaṇeśvarāḥ |
eteṣāṃ mānasānāṃ tu triśūlavaradhāriṇām || 31 ||

koṭyaścaturaśītistu tatputrāścākṣayā matāḥ |
dikṣu sarvāsu ye rakṣāṃ prakurvanti gaṇeśvarāḥ || 32 ||

ete vai putrapautrāśca surabhīgarbhasaṃbhavāḥ |
kaśyapasya pravakṣyāmi putrapautrādi patniṣu || 33 ||

aditirditirdanuścaiva ariṣṭā surasā tathā |
surabhirvinatā caiva tāmrā krodhavaśā irā || 34 ||

kadrū khasā munistadvattāsu putrānnibodha me |
tuṣitā nāma ye devāścākṣuṣasyāṃtare manoḥ || 35 ||

vaivasvateṃtare caiva ādityā dvādaśa smṛtāḥ |
indro dhātā bhagastvaṣṭā mittro'tha varuṇo'ryamā || 36 ||

vivasvānsavitā pūṣā aṃśumānviṣṇureva ca |
ete sahasrakiraṇā ādityā dādvaśa smṛtāḥ || 37 ||

mārīcātkaśyapājjātāḥ puttrāste'ditinaṃdanāḥ |
kṛśāśvasya ṛṣeḥ putrā devapraharaṇāḥ smṛtāḥ || 38 ||

ete devagaṇāstāta pratimanvaṃtareṣu ca |
utpadyaṃte vilīyaṃte kalpekalpe tathaiva ca || 39 ||

ditiḥ putradvayaṃ lebhe kaśyapāditi naḥ śrutam |
hiraṇyakaśipuṃ caiva hiraṇyākṣaṃ tathaiva ca || 40 ||

hiraṇyakaśipostadvajjātaṃ putracatuṣṭayam |
prahlādaścānuhlādaśca saṃhlādohlāda eva ca || 41 ||

prahlādaputrā āyuṣmānśibirbāṣkalireva ca |
virocanaścaturthastu sa baliṃ putramāptavān || 42 ||

baleḥ putraśataṃ tvāsīdbāṇajyeṣṭhaṃ tato nṛpa |
dhṛtarāṣṭrastathāsūryyo vivasvānaṃśutāpanaḥ || 43 ||

nikumbhanāmā gurvakṣaḥ kukṣirbhaumotha bhīṣaṇaḥ |
evamanye tu bahavo bāṇojyeṣṭho guṇādhikaḥ || 44 ||

bāṇassahasrabāhustu sarvāstraguṇasaṃyutaḥ |
tapasā toṣito yasya pure vasati śūladhṛt || 45 ||

mahākālatvamagamatsārthyaṃ yasya pinākinaḥ |
hiraṇyākṣasya putrobhūdaṃdhako nāmanāmataḥ || 46 ||

bhūtasaṃtāpanaścaiva mahānāgastathaiva ca |
etebhyaḥ putrapautrāṇāṃ koṭayaḥ saptasaptatiḥ || 47 ||

mahābalā mahākāyā nānārūpā mahaujasaḥ |
danuḥ putraśataṃ lebhe kaśyapādvaradarpitam || 48 ||

vipracittiḥ pradhānobhūdeṣāṃ madhye mahābalaḥ |
dviraṣṭamūrddhā śakunistathā śaṃkuśirodharaḥ || 49 ||

ayomukhaḥ śaṃbaraśca kapilo vāmanastathā |
marīcirmāgadhaścaiva harirgajaśirāstathā || 50 ||

nidrādharaśca ketuśca ketuvīryaḥ śatakratuḥ |
indramitragrahaścaiva vajranābhastathaiva ca || 51 ||

ekavastro mahābāhurvajrākṣastārakastathā |
asilomā pulomā ca vikurvāṇo mahāsuraḥ || 52 ||

svarbhānurvṛṣaparvā ca evamādyā danossutāḥ |
svarbhānoḥ suprabhā kanyā śacī caiva pulomajā || 53 ||

upadānavī mayasyāsīttathā maṃdodarī kuhūḥ |
śarmiṣṭhā suṃdarī caiva caṃḍā ca vṛṣaparvaṇaḥ || 54 ||

pulomā kālakā caiva vaiśvanarasute ubhe |
bahvapatyo mahāsatvo mārīcasya parigrahaḥ || 55 ||

tayoḥ ṣaṣṭisahasrāṇi dānavānāṃ purābhavan |
paulomānkālakhaṃjāṃśca mārīcojanayatpurā || 56 ||

avadhyā ye narāṇāṃ vai hiraṇyapuravāsinaḥ |
caturmukhāllabdhavarā ye hatā vijayena tu || 57 ||

vipracittiḥ siṃhikāyāṃ nava putrānajījanat |
hiraṇyakaśiporyevai bhāgineyāstrayodaśa || 58 ||

kaṃsaḥ śaṃkhaśca rājendra nalo vātāpireva ca |
ilvalo namuciścaiva khasṛmaścāṃjanastathā || 59 ||

narakaḥ kālanābhaśca paramāṇustathaiva ca |
kalpavīryaśca vikhyāto danuvaṃśavivarddhanaḥ || 60 ||

saṃhlādasya tu daityasya nivātakavacāḥ kule |
avadhyāḥ sarvadevānāṃ gaṃdharvoragarākṣasām || 61 ||

ye hatā balamāśritya arjunena raṇājire |
ṣaṭkanyā janayāmāsa tāmrā mārīcavīryataḥ || 62 ||

śukīṃ śyenīṃ ca bhāsīṃ ca sugṛdhrīṃ gṛdhrikāṃ śucim |
śukī śukānulūkāṃśca janayāmāsa dharmataḥ || 63 ||

śyenī śyenāṃśca bhāsī ca kurarānapyajījanat |
gṛdhrī gṛdhrānsugṛdhrī ca pārāvatavihaṃgamān || 64 ||

haṃsa sārasa kāraṃḍa plavānśucirajījanat |
ete tāmrāsutāḥ proktā vinatāyā niśāmaya || 65 ||

garuḍaḥ patagaśreṣṭho'ruṇaśceśaḥ patatriṇām |
saudāminī tathā kanyā yeyaṃ nabhasi viśrutā || 66 ||

saṃpātiśca jaṭāyuśca aruṇasya sutāvubhau |
saṃpātiputro babhruśca śīghragaścātiviśrutaḥ || 67 ||

jaṭāyoḥ karṇikāraśca śatagāmī ca viśrutau |
teṣāmasaṃkhyamabhavatpakṣiṇāṃ putrapautrakam || 68 ||

surasāyāṃ sahasraṃ tu sarpāṇāmabhavatpurā |
sahasraśirasāṃ kadrūḥ sahasraṃ prāpa suvratā || 69 ||

pradhānāsteṣu vikhyātā ṣṣaḍviṃśatirarindama |
śeṣavāsukikarkoṭa śaṃkhairāvatakaṃbalāḥ || 70 ||

dhanaṃjaya mahānīla padmāśvatara takṣakāḥ |
elāpatra mahāpadma dhṛtarāṣṭra balāhakāḥ || 71 ||

śaṃkhapāla mahāśaṃkha puṣpadaṃṣṭraṃ śubhānanāḥ |
śaṃkharomā ca nahuṣo ramaṇaḥ paṇinastathā || 72 ||

kapilo durmukhaścāpi pataṃjalimukhāstathā |
eṣāmanaṃtamabhavatsarveṣāṃ putrapautrakam || 73 ||

prāyaśo yatpurādagdhaṃ janamejayamaṃdire |
rakṣogaṇaṃ krodhavaśā sunāmānamajījanat || 74 ||

daṃṣṭriṇāṃ niyutaṃ teṣāṃ bhīmasenādagātkṣayam |
daṃṣṭri gomāyu kākādīnmahiṣīrgovarāṅganāḥ || 75 ||

surabhirjanayāmāsa kaśyapātttritayaṃ purā |
munirmunīnāṃ ca gaṇaṃ gaṇamapsarasāṃ tathā || 76 ||

tathā kinnaragaṃdharvānariṣṭā janayadbahūn |
tṛṇavṛkṣalatā gulmamirā sarvamajījanatat || 77 ||

khasā tu yakṣarakṣāṃsi janayāmāsa koṭiśaḥ |
ete kaśyapadāyādāḥ śataśotha sahasraśaḥ || 78 ||

eṣa manvaṃtare bhīṣma sargaḥ svārociṣe smṛtaḥ |
tatastvekonapaṃcāśanmarutaḥ kaśyapādditiḥ |
janayāmāsa dharmajña sarvānamaravallabhān || 79 ||

bhīṣma uvāca |
diteḥ putrāḥ kathaṃ jātā maruto devavallabhāḥ |
devairjagmuśca sāpatnaiḥ kasmātsakhyamanuttamam || 1 ||

pulastya uvāca |
purā daivāsure yuddhe hateṣu hariṇā suraiḥ |
putrapautreṣu śokārtā gatā bhūlokamuttamam || 2 ||

puṣkareṣu mahātīrthe sarasvatyāstaṭe śubhe |
bhartturārādhanaparā tapa ugraṃ cacāra ha || 3 ||

ditirvai daityamātā tu ṛṣikāryeṇa suvratā |
phalāhārā tapastepe kṛcchracāṃdrāyaṇādibhiḥ || 4 ||

yāvadvarṣaśataṃ sāgraṃ jarāśokasamākulā |
tataḥ sā tapasā taptā vasiṣṭhādīnapṛcchata || 5 ||

kathayaṃtu bhavaṃto me putraśokavināśanam |
vrataṃ saubhāgyaphaladamihaloke paratra ca || 6 ||

ūcurvasiṣṭhapramukhā jyeṣṭhasya pūrṇimāvratam |
yasya prasādādabhavatsutaśokavivarjitā || 7 ||

bhīṣma uvāca |
śrotumicchāmyahaṃ brahmanjyeṣṭhasya pūrṇimāvratam |
sutānekonapaṃcāśadyena lebhe punarditiḥ || 8 ||

pulastya uvāca |
yadvasiṣṭhādibhiḥ pūrvaṃ dityai saṃkathitaṃ vratam |
vistareṇa tadevedaṃ matsakāśānniśāmaya || 9 ||

jyeṣṭhe māsi site pakṣe paurṇamāsyāṃ yatavratā |
sthāpayedavraṇaṃ kuṃbhaṃ sitataṇḍulapūritam || 10 ||

nānāphalayutaṃ tadvadikṣudaṃḍasamanvitam |
sitavastrayugacchannaṃsitacaṃdanacarcitam || 11 ||

nānābhakṣyasamopetaṃ sahiraṇyaṃ tu śaktitaḥ |
tāmrapātraṃ guḍopetaṃ tasyopari niveśayet || 12 ||

tasmādupari brahmāṇaṃ sauvarṇaṃ padmakoṭare |
kuryātśarkarayopetāṃ sāvitrīṃ tasya vāmataḥ || 13 ||

gaṃdhaṃdhūpaṃ tayordadyādgītaṃ vādyaṃ ca kārayet |
tadabhāve kathaṃ kuryādyathā padme pitāmahaḥ || 14 ||

brahmāhvayāṃ ca pratimāṃ kṛtvā guḍamayīṃ śubhām |
śuklapuṣpākṣatatilairarcayetpadmasaṃbhavam || 15 ||

brāhmāya pādau saṃpūjya jaṃghe saubhāgyadāya ca |
viriṃcāyoruyugmaṃ ca manmathāyeti vai kaṭim || 16 ||

svacchodarāyetyudaramataṃdrāyetyuro vidheḥ |
mukhaṃ padmamukhāyeti bāhū vai vedapāṇaye || 17 ||

namaḥ sarvātmane maulimarccayeccāpi paṃkajam |
tataḥ prabhāte tatkuṃbhaṃ brāhmaṇāya nivedayet || 18 ||

brāhmaṇaṃ bhojayedbhaktyā svayaṃ tu lavaṇaṃ vinā |
bhaktyā pradakṣiṇaṃ dadyādimaṃ maṃtramudīrayet || 19 ||

prīyatāmatra bhagavānsarvalokapitāmahaḥ |
hṛdaye sarvalokānāṃ yastvānaṃdobhidhīyate || 20 ||

anena vidhinā sarvaṃ māsimāsi samācaret |
upavāsī paurṇamāsyāmarcayedbrāhmamavyayam || 21 ||

phalamekaṃ ca saṃprāśya śarvaryāṃ bhūtale svapet |
tatastrayodaśe māsi ghṛtadhenusamanvitām || 22 ||

śayyāṃ dadyādviriṃcāya sarvopaskarasaṃyutām |
brahmāṇaṃ kāṃcanaṃ kṛtvā sāvitrīṃ rajataistathā || 23 ||

padmātmakaḥ sṛṣṭikarttā sāvitrīmupalabhyatu |
vastrairdvijaṃ sapatnīkaṃ pūjya bhaktyā vibhūṣaṇaiḥ || 24 ||

śaktyā gavādikaṃ dadyātprīyatāmityudīrayet |
homaṃ śuklaistilaiḥ kuryādbrahmanāmāni kīrtayet || 25 ||

gavyena sarpiṣā tadvatpāyasena ca dharmavit |
viprebhyotha dhanaṃ dadyātpuṣpamālāṃ ca śaktitaḥ || 26 ||

yaḥ kuryādvidhinānena paurṇamāsyāṃ striyopi vā |
sarvapāpavinirmuktaḥ prāpnoti brahmasātmyatām || 27 ||

ihaloke varānputrānsaubhāgyaṃ dhruvamaśnute |
yo brahmā sa smṛto viṣṇurānaṃdātmā maheśvaraḥ || 28 ||

sukhārthī kāmarūpeṇa smareddevaṃ pitāmaham |
evaṃ śrutvā cakārāsau ditiḥ sarvamaśeṣataḥ || 29 ||

kaśyapo vratamāhātmyādāgatya parayā mudā |
cakāra karkaśāṃ bhūyo rūpalāvaṇyasaṃyutām || 30 ||

varairāchaṃdayāmāsa sā tu vavre varaṃvaram |
putraṃ śakravadhārthāya samarthaṃ ca mahaujasam || 31 ||

varayāmi mahātmānaṃ sarvāmaraniṣūdanam |
uvāca kaśyapo vākyamiṃdrahaṃtāramūrjitam || 32 ||

pradāsyāmyahametena kintvetatkriyatāṃ śubhe |
āpastaṃbīṃ tu kṛtveṣṭiṃ putrīyāmadya sustani || 33 ||

vidhāsyāmi tato garbhaṃ spṛṣṭvāhaṃ te stanau śubhe |
bhaviṣyati śubho garbho devi śakraniṣūdanaḥ || 34 ||

āpastaṃbīṃ tataścakre putreṣṭiṃ draviṇādhikām |
iṃdraśatrobhavasveti juhāva ca havistvaran || 35 ||

devāśca mumurhurdaityā vimukhāścaiva dānavāḥ |
dityāṃ garbhamathādhatta kaśyapaḥ prāha tāṃ punaḥ || 36 ||

mukhaṃ te caṃdrapratimaṃ stanau bilvaphalopamau |
adharau vidrumākārau varṇaścātīva śobhanaḥ || 37 ||

tvāṃ dṛṣṭvāhaṃ viśālākṣi vismarāmi svikāṃ tanum |
tadevaṃ garbhaḥ suśroṇi hastenoptastanau tava || 38 ||

tvayā yatne vidhātavyo hyasmingarbhe varānane |
saṃvatsaraśataṃ tvekamasminneva tapovane || 39 ||

saṃdhyāyāṃ naiva bhoktavyaṃ garbhiṇyā varavarṇini |
na sthātavyaṃ na gaṃtavyaṃ vṛkṣamūleṣu sarvadā || 40 ||

nopaskareṣu niviśenmusalolūkhalādiṣu |
jalaṃ ca nāvagāheta śūnyāgāraṃ ca varjayet || 41 ||

valmīkeṣu na tiṣṭheta na codvignamanā bhavet |
na nakhena likhedbhūmau nāṃgāre na ca bhasmani || 42 ||

na śayāluḥ sadā tiṣṭhedvyāyāmaṃ ca vivarjayet |
na tuṣāṃgārabhasmāsthi kapāleṣu samāviśet || 43 ||

varjayetkalahaṃ loke gātrābhyaṃgaṃ tathaiva ca |
na muktakeśī tiṣṭheta nāśuciḥ syātkathaṃcana || 44 ||

na śayītottaraśirāḥ na caivādhaḥ śirāḥ kvacit |
na vastrahīnā nodvignā na cārdracaraṇā satī || 45 ||

nāmaṃgalyāṃ vadedvācaṃ na ca hāsyādhikābhavet |
kuryācca gurubhirnityaṃ pūjāṃ māṃgalyatatparā || 46 ||

sarvauṣadhībhiḥ sṛṣṭena vāriṇā snānamācaret |
tiṣṭhetprasannavadanā bhartṛpriyahite ratā |
na garhayecca bhartā raṃsarvāvasthamapi kvacit || 48 ||

kṛśāhaṃ durbalā caiva vārddhakyaṃ mama cāgatam |
stanau me calitau sthānānmukhaṃ ca valibhaṃguram || 49 ||

evaṃvidhā tvayā cāhaṃ kṛteti na vadetkvacit |
svastyastute gamiṣyāmi tathetyuktastayā punaḥ || 50 ||

paśyatāṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ tatraivāṃtaradhīyata |
tataḥ sā bhartṛvācoktavidhinā samatiṣṭhata || 51 ||

atha jñātvā tatheṃdropi diteḥ pārśvamupāgataḥ |
vihāya devasadanaṃ tāṃ śuśrūṣuravasthitaḥ || 52 ||

diteśchidrāṃtaraprepsurabhavatpākaśāsanaḥ |
viparītoṃtaravyagraḥ prasannavadato bahiḥ || 53 ||

ajānanniva tattkāryamātmanaśśubhamācaran |
tato varṣaśatāṃte sā nyūne tu divasaistribhiḥ || 54 ||

mene kṛtārthamātmānaṃ prītyā vismitamānasā |
akṛtvā pādayoḥ śaucaṃ śayānā muktamūrdhajā || 55 ||

nidrābharasamākrāṃtā divā paraśirāḥ kvacit |
tatastadaṃtaraṃ labdhvā praviśyāṃtaḥ śacīpatiḥ || 56 ||

vajreṇa saptadhā cakre taṃ garbhaṃ tridaśādhipaḥ |
tataḥ sapta ca te jātāḥ kumārāḥ sūryavarcasaḥ || 57 ||

rudaṃtaḥ sapta te bālā niṣiddhā dānavāriṇā |
bhūyopi rudamānāṃstānekaikānsaptadhā hariḥ || 58 ||

ciccheda vajrahasto vai punaḥ stūdarasaṃsthitān |
evamekonapaṃcāśadbhūtvā terurudurbhṛśam || 59 ||

iṃdro nivārayāmāsa mā rudadhvaṃ punaḥpunaḥ |
tataḥ sa ciṃtayāmāsa vitarkamiti vṛtrahā || 60 ||

karmaṇaḥ kasya māhātmyātpunaḥ saṃjīvitāstvamī |
viditvā puṇyayogena paurṇamāsīphalaṃ tvidam || 61 ||

nūnametatpariṇatamathavā brahmapūjanāt |
vajreṇābhihatāḥ saṃto na vināśamupāyayuḥ || 62 ||

ekopyanekatāmāpa yasmādudaragopanam |
avadhyā nūnamete vai tasmāddevā bhavaṃtviti || 63 ||

yasmānmā ruda ityuktā rudaṃto garbhasaṃbhavāḥ |
maruto nāma te nāmnā bhavaṃtu sukhabhāginaḥ || 64 ||

tataḥ prasādya deveśaḥ kṣamasveti ditiṃ punaḥ |
arthaśāstraṃ samāsthāya mayaitadduṣkṛtaṃ kṛtam || 65 ||

kṛtvā marudgaṇaṃ devaiḥ samānamamarādhipaḥ |
ditiṃ vimānamāropya sasutāmagamaddivam || 66 ||

yajñabhāgabhujaḥ sarve marutaste tatobhavan |
na jagmuraikyamasurairataste suravallabhāḥ || 67 ||

bhīṣma uvāca |
ādisargastvayā brahmankathito vistareṇa me |
pratisargaśca yo yeṣāmadhipāṃstānvadasva me || 68 ||

pulastya uvāca |
yadābhiṣiktaḥ sakalepi rājye pṛthurddharitryāmadhipo babhūva |
tathauṣadhīnāmadhipaṃ cakāra yajñavratānāṃ tapasāṃ ca somam || 69 ||

nakṣatratārādvijavṛkṣagulmalatāvitānasya ca rukmagarbham |
apāmadhīśaṃ varuṇaṃ dhanānāṃ rājñāṃ prabhuṃ vaiśravaṇaṃ ca tadvat || 70 ||

viṣṇuṃ ravīṇāmadhipaṃ vasūnāmagniṃ ca lokādhipatiṃ cakāra |
prajāpatīnāmadhipaṃ ca dakṣaṃ cakāra śakraṃ marutāmadhīśam || 71 ||

daityādhipānāmatha dānavānāṃ prahlādamīśaṃ ca yamaṃ pitṝṇām |
piśācarakṣaḥpaśubhūtayakṣavetālarājaṃ hyatha śūlapāṇim || 72 ||

prāleyaśailaṃ ca patiṃ girīṇāmīśaṃ samudraṃ saritāmadhīśam |
gaṃdharvavidyādharakinnarāṇāmīśaṃ punaścitrarathaṃ cakāra || 73 ||

nāgādhipaṃ vāsukimugravīryaṃ sarpādhipaṃ takṣakamādideśa |
digvāraṇānāmadhipaṃ cakāra gajeṃdramairāvaṇanāmadheyam || 74 ||

suparṇamīśaṃ patatāmathārvatāṃ rājānamuccaiḥśravasaṃ cakāra |
siṃhaṃ mṛgāṇāṃ vṛṣabhaṃ gavāṃ ca plakṣaṃ punaḥ sarvavanaspatīnām || 75 ||
