pitāmahaḥ pūrvamathābhyaṣiṃcadetānpunaḥ sarvadiśādhināthān |
pūrveśa dikpālamathābhyaṣiṃcannāmnā suvarmāṇamarātiketuṃ || 76 ||

tatodhipaṃ dakṣiṇataścakāra sarveśvaraṃ śaṃkhapadābhidhānam |
saketumaṃtaṃ digadhīśamīśaṃ cakāra paścādbhuvanāṃḍagarbhaḥ || 77 ||

hiraṇyaromāṇamudagdigīśaṃ prajāpatiṃ meghasutaṃ cakāra |
adyāpi kurvaṃti diśāmadhīśāḥ sadā vahaṃtastu bhuvobhirakṣām || 78 ||

caturbhiretaiḥ pṛthunāmadheyo nṛpobhiṣiktaḥ prathamaḥ pṛthivyām |
gateṃtare cākṣuṣanāmadheye vaivasvataṃ cakrurimaṃ pṛthivyāṃ || 79 ||

gateṃtare cākṣuṣanāmadheye vaivasvatākhye ca punaḥ pravṛtte |
prajāpatiḥ sosya carācarasya babhūva sūryānvayajaḥ sacihnaḥ || 80 ||

pulastya uvāca |
manvaṃtarāṇi sarvāṇi manūnāṃ caritāni yat |
pramāṇaṃ caiva kalpasya tatsṛṣṭiṃ ca samāsataḥ || 81 ||

ekacittaḥ prasannātmā śṛṇu kauravanaṃdana |
yāmā nāma purā devā āsansvāyaṃbhuvāṃtare || 82 ||

saptaiva ṛṣayaḥ pūrvaṃ ye marīcyādayaḥ smṛtāḥ |
āgnīdhraścāgnibāhuśca vibhuḥ savana eva ca || 83 ||

jyotiṣmāndyutimānbhavyo medhā medhātithirvasuḥ |
svāyaṃbhuvasyāsya manordaśaite vaṃśavarddhanāḥ || 84 ||

pratisargamamī kṛtvā jagmuste paramaṃ padam |
evaṃ svāyaṃbhuvaṃ proktaṃ svārociṣamataḥ param || 85 ||

svārociṣasya tanayāścatvāro devavarcasaḥ |
nabhonabhasya prabhṛtirbhāvanaḥ kīrtivarddhanaḥ || 86 ||

dattogniścyavanastaṃbhaḥ prāṇaḥ kaśyapa eva ca |
arvā bṛhaspatiścaiva sapta saptarṣayobhavan || 87 ||

tadā devāśca tuṣitāḥ smṛtā svārociṣeṃtare |
havīṃdrasuḥkṛto mūrtirāpo jyotirathaḥ smṛtaḥ || 88 ||

vasiṣṭhasya sutāḥ sapta ye prajāpatayastadā |
dvitīyametatkathitaṃ manvaṃtaramataḥ paraṃ || 89 ||

anyaccaiva pravakṣyāmi tathā manvaṃtaraṃ śubhaṃ |
manurnāmauttamistatra daśa putrānajījanat || 90 ||

iṣaūrjastanūjaśca śuciḥ śukrastathaiva ca |
madhuśca mādhavaścaiva nabhasyotha nabhastathā || 91 ||

sahaḥ sahasya eteṣāmuttamaḥ kīrtivarddhanaḥ |
bhānavastatra devāḥ syurūrjāḥ saptarṣayaḥ smṛtāḥ || 92 ||

kaukabhiṇḍiḥ kutuṇḍaśca dālbhyaḥ śaṃkhaḥ pravāhitaḥ |
mitiśca saṃmitiścaiva saptaite yogavarddhanāḥ || 93 ||

manvaṃtaraṃ caturthaṃ tu tāmasaṃ nāma viśrutaṃ |
kapiḥ pṛthustathaivāgnirakapiḥ kavireva ca || 94 ||

tathaiva janyadhāmānau munayaḥ sapta nāmataḥ |
sādhyā devagaṇā ye ca kathitāstāmaseṃtare || 95 ||

akalmaṣastapodhanvī tapomūlastapodhanaḥ |
taporāśistapasyaśca sutapasyaḥ paraṃtapaḥ || 96 ||

tāmasasya sutāḥ sarve daśavaṃśavivarddhanāḥ |
paṃcamasya manostadvadraivatasyāṃtaraṃ śṛṇu || 97 ||

devabāhuḥ subāhuśca parjyanyaḥ samayomuniḥ |
hiraṇyaromā saptāśvaḥ saptaite ṛṣayaḥ smṛtāḥ || 98 ||

devāśca bhūtarajasastathā prakṛtayaḥ smṛtāḥ |
avaśastatvadarśī ca vītimānhavyapaḥ kapiḥ || 99 ||

mukto nirutsukaḥ satvo nirmohotha prakāśakaḥ |
dharmavīryabalopetā daśaite revatātmajāḥ || 100 ||

bhṛguḥ sudhāmā virajaḥ sahiṣṇurnāradastathā |
vivasvānkṛtināmā ca sapta saptarṣayopare || 101 ||

cākṣuṣasyāṃtare devā lekhānāmapariśrutāḥ |
vibhavotha pṛthakcānu kīrtitāstridivaukasaḥ || 102 ||

cākṣuṣasyāṃtare prāpte devānāṃ paṃcamo janaḥ |
ruruprabhṛtayastadvaccākṣuṣasya sutā daśa || 103 ||

proktāḥ svāyaṃbhuve vaṃśe ye mayā pūrvameva te |
antaraṃ cākṣuṣaṃ caiva mayā te parikīrtitaṃ || 104 ||

saptamaṃ ca pravakṣyāmi yadvaivasvatamucyate |
atriścaiva vasiṣṭhaśca kaśyapo gautamastathā || 105 ||

bhāradvājastathā yogī viśvāmitraḥ pratāpavān |
jamadagniśca saptaite sāṃprataṃ te maharṣayaḥ || 106 ||

kṛtvā dharmavyavasthānaṃ prayānti paramaṃ padaṃ |
sāvarṇyasya pravakṣyāmi manorbhāvi tathāṃtaraṃ || 107 ||

aśvatthāmā śaradvāṃśca kauśiko gālavastathā |
śatānaṃdaḥ kāśyapaśca rāmaśca ṛṣaya smṛtāḥ || 108 ||

dhṛtirvarīyānyavasuḥ suvarṇo dhṛtireva ca |
variṣṇuvīryaḥ sumatirvasuśśukraśca vīryavān || 109 ||

bhaviṣyasyārkasāvarṇermanoḥ putrāḥ prakīrtitāḥ |
raucyādayastathānyepi manavaḥ saṃprakīrtitāḥ || 110 ||

ruceḥ prajāpateḥ putro raucyo nāma bhaviṣyati |
manurbhūtisutastadvadbhautyo nāma bhaviṣyati || 111 ||

tatastu merusāvarṇirbrahmasunurmanuḥ smṛtaḥ |
ṛbhuśca ṝtudhāmā ca viṣvakseno manustathā || 112 ||

atītānāgatāścaiva manavaḥ parikīrtitāḥ |
varṣāṇāṃ yugasāhasramebhirvyāptaṃ narādhipa || 113 ||

svesventare sarvamidaṃ samutpādya carācaraṃ |
kalpakṣaye nivṛtte tu mucyaṃte brahmaṇā saha || 114 ||

amīyugasahasrānte vinaśyanti punaḥpunaḥ |
brahmādyā viṣṇusāyujyaṃ tato yāsyaṃti vai nṛpa || 115 ||

bhīṣma uvāca |
bahubhirddharaṇī bhuktā bhūpālaiḥ śrūyate purā |
pārthivāḥ pṛthivīyogātpṛthivī kasya yogataḥ || 1 ||

kimarthaṃ ca kṛtā saṃjñā bhūmessā pāribhāṣikī |
gauritīyaṃ ca saṃjñā vā bhuvaḥ kasmādbravīhi me || 2 ||

pulastya uvāca |
purā kṛtayugasyāsīdaṃgo nāma prajāpatiḥ |
mṛtyostu duhitā tena pariṇītātidurmukhī || 3 ||

sunīthā nāma tasyāstu veno nāma sutaḥ purā |
adharmanirataḥ kāmī balavānvasudhādhipaḥ || 4 ||

lokasyādharmakṛccāpi parabhāryāpahārakaḥ |
atha tasya prasidyarthaṃ jagadarthaṃ maharṣibhiḥ || 5 ||

anunītopi na dadāvaśuddhātmā'bhayaṃ tataḥ |
śāpena mārayitvainamarājakabhayārditāḥ || 6 ||

mamaṃthurbrāhmaṇāstasya balāddehamakalmaṣāḥ |
tatkāyānmathyamānāttu janitā mlecchajātayaḥ || 7 ||

śarīre māturaṃśena kṛṣṇāṃjanasamaprabhāḥ |
pituraṃśasya saṃgena dhārmiko dharmakārakaḥ || 8 ||

utpanno dakṣiṇāddhastātsadhanuḥ saśaro gadī |
divyatejomayaḥ putrassaratnakavacāṃgadaḥ || 9 ||

pṛthurevābhavannāmnā sa ca viṣṇurajāyata |
sa viprairabhiṣiktaḥ saṃstapaḥ kṛtvā suduṣkaraṃ || 10 ||

viṣṇorvareṇa sarvasya prabhutvamagamatprabhuḥ |
niḥsvādhyāyavaṣaṭkāraṃ nirddharmaṃ vīkṣya bhūtalaṃ || 11 ||

veddhumevodyataḥ kopācchareṇāmitavikramaḥ |
tato gorūpamāsthāya bhūḥ palāyitumudyatā || 12 ||

pṛṣṭhe tvanvagamattasyāḥ pṛthuḥ seṣuśarāsanaḥ |
tataḥ sthitvaikadeśe tu kiṃ karomīti cābravīt || 13 ||

pṛthurapyavadadvākyamīpsitaṃ dehi suvrate |
sarvasya jagataḥ śīghraṃ sthāvarasya carasya ca || 14 ||

tatheti cābravīdbhūmirdudoha sa narādhipaḥ |
svake pāṇau pṛthurvatsaṃ kṛtvā svāyaṃbhuvaṃ manuṃ || 15 ||

tadannamabhavaddugdhaṃ prajā jīvaṃti yena tu |
tatastu ṛṣibhirdugdhā vatsaḥ somastadābhavat || 16 ||

dogdhā vācaspatirabhūtpātraṃ vedastapo rasaḥ |
devaiśca vasudhā dugdhā maruddogdhā tadābhavat || 17 ||

indro vatsaḥ samabhavatkṣīramūrjjasvalaṃ balaṃ |
devānāṃ kāṃcanaṃ pātraṃ pitṛṇāṃ rājataṃ tathā || 18 ||

aṃtakaścābhavaddogdhā yamo vatsaḥ svadhā rasaḥ |
bilaṃ ca pātraṃ nāgānāṃ takṣako vatsakobhavat || 19 ||

viṣaṃ kṣīraṃ tato dogdhā dhṛtarāṣṭrobhavatpunaḥ |
asurairapi dugdheyaṃ āyase śatrupīḍanam || 20 ||

pātre māyāmabhūdvatsaḥprālhādistuvirocanaḥ |
dogdhā trimūrddhā tatrāsīnmāyā yena pravartitā || 21 ||

yakṣaiśca vasudhā dugdhā purāṃtarddhānamīpsubhiḥ |
kṛtvā viśvāvasuṃ vatsaṃ maṇimaṃtaṃ mahīpate || 22 ||

pretarakṣogaṇairdugdhā vasā rudhiramulbaṇaṃ |
raupyanābhobhavaddogdhā sumālī vatsa eva ca || 23 ||

gaṃdharvaiśca punardugdhā vasudhā sāpsarogaṇaiḥ |
vatsaṃ citrarathaṃ kṛtvā gaṃdhānpadmadale tathā || 24 ||

dogdhāvasurucirnāmātharvavedasya pāragaḥ |
giribhirvasudhā dugdhā ratnāni vividhāni ca || 25 ||

auṣadhāni ca divyāni dogdhā merurmahīdharaḥ |
vatsobhūddhimavāṃstatra pātraṃ śailamayaṃ punaḥ || 26 ||

vṛkṣaiśca vasudhā dugdhā kṣīraṃ chinnaprarohaṇaṃ |
pālāśapātre dogdhā tu sālaḥ puṣpavanākulaḥ || 27 ||

plakṣobhavattato vatsaḥ sarvavṛkṣavanādhipaḥ |
evamanyaiśca vasudhā tathā dugdhā yathecchataḥ || 28 ||

āyurddhanāni saukhyaṃ ca pṛthau rājyaṃ praśāsati |
na dāridryaṃ tathā rogī nādhanonacapāpakṛt || 29 ||

nopasargā na cāghātaḥ pṛthau rājyaṃ praśāsati |
nityaṃpramuditālokā duḥkhaśokavivarjitāḥ || 30 ||

dhanuḥ koṭyā ca śaileṃdrānutsārya sa mahābalaḥ |
bhūmaṃḍalaṃ samaṃ cakre lokānāṃ hitakāmyayā || 31 ||

na puragrāmadurgāṇi na cāyudhadharā narāḥ |
mriyaṃte yatra duḥkhaṃ ca nārthaśāstrasya cādaraḥ || 32 ||

dharmaikatānāḥ puruṣāḥ pṛthau rājyaṃ praśāsati |
kathitāni ca pātrāṇi yatkṣīraṃ ca yathā tava || 33 ||

yeṣāṃ yena rucistatra tebhyo dattaṃ vijānatā |
yajñaśrīdeṣu sarveṣu mayā tubhyaṃ niveditaṃ || 34 ||

duhitṛtvaṃ gatā yasmātpṛthoḥ pṛthvī mahāmate |
tasyānusārayogācca pṛthivī viśrutā budhaiḥ || 35 ||

bhīṣma uvāca |
ādityavaṃśamakhilaṃ vada brahmanyathākramaṃ |
somavaṃśaṃ ca tattvajña yathāvadvaktumarhasi || 36 ||

pulastya uvāca |
vivasvānkaśyapātpūrvamadityāmabhavatpurā |
tasya patnītrayaṃ tadvatsaṃjñā rājñī prabhā tathā || 37 ||

raivatasya sutā rājñī revataṃ suṣuve sutaṃ |
prabhā prabhātaṃ suṣuve tvāṣṭraṃ saṃjñā tathā manuṃ || 38 ||

yamaśca yamunā caiva yamalau ca babhūvatuḥ |
tatastejomayaṃ rūpamasahaṃtī vivasvataḥ || 39 ||

nārīmutpādayāmāsa svaśarīrādaniṃditāṃ |
tvāṣṭrī svarūparūpeṇa nāmnā chāyeti bhāminī || 40 ||

kiṃkaromīti purataḥ saṃsthitāṃ tāmabhāṣata |
chāye tvaṃ bhaja bhartāraṃ madīyaṃ taṃ varānane || 41 ||

apatyāni madīyāni mātṛsnehena pālaya |
tathetyuktvā ca sā devamagātkāmāya suvratā || 42 ||

kāmayāmāsa devopi saṃjñeyamiti cādarāt |
janayāmāsa sāvarṇiṃ manuṃ manusvarūpiṇam || 43 ||

savarṇatvācca sāvarṇermanorvaivasvatasya tu |
tataḥ sutāṃ ca tapatīṃ tvāṣṭrīṃ caiva krameṇa tu || 44 ||

chāyāyāṃ janayāmāsa saṃjñeyamiti bhāskaraḥ |
chāyā svaputre tvadhikaṃ snehaṃ cakre manau tadā || 45 ||

na cakṣame manuḥ pūrvastadyamaḥ krodhamūrchitaḥ |
saṃtarjayāmāsa tadā pādamutkṣipya dakṣiṇaṃ || 46 ||

śaśāpa ca yamaṃ chāyā bhavatu krimisaṃyutaḥ |
pādoyameko bhavitā pūyaśoṇitavisravaḥ || 47 ||

nivedayāmāsa pituryamaḥ śāpena dharṣitaḥ |
niḥkāraṇamahaṃ śapto mātrā deva sakopayā || 48 ||

bālabhāvānmayā kiṃcidudyataścaraṇaḥ sakṛt |
manunā vāryamāṇāpi mama śāpamadādvibho || 49 ||

prāyo na mātā sāsmākamasamā snehato yataḥ |
devopyāha yamaṃ bhūyaḥ kiṃ karomi mahāmate || 50 ||

saukhyātkasya na duḥkhaṃ syādathavā karmasaṃtatiḥ |
anivāryā bhavasyāpi kā kathānyeṣu jaṃtuṣu || 51 ||

kṛkavākustava pade sa krimiṃ bhakṣayiṣyati |
khaṃjaṃ ca ruciraṃ caiva pādametadbhaviṣyati || 52 ||

evamuktaḥ samāśvastastapastīvraṃ cakāra ha |
vairāgyātpuṣkare tīrthe phalaphenānilāśanaḥ || 53 ||

pitāmahaṃ samārādhya yāvadvarṣāyutaṃ punaḥ |
tapaḥprabhāvāddeveśaḥ saṃtuṣṭaḥ padmasaṃbhavaḥ || 54 ||

vavre sa lokapālatvaṃ pitṛlokaṃ tathākṣayaṃ |
dharmādharmātmakasyāsya jagatastu parīkṣaṇam || 55 ||

evaṃ sa lokapālatvamagamatpadmasaṃbhavāt |
pitṝṇāmādhipatyaṃ ca dharmādharmasya cānagha || 56 ||

vivasvānatha tajjñātvā saṃjñāyāḥ karmaceṣṭitaṃ |
tvaṣṭuḥ samīpamagamadācacakṣe saroṣavān || 57 ||

tamuvāca tatastvaṣṭā sāṃtvapūrvamidaṃ vacaḥ |
tavāsahaṃtī bhagavaṃstejastīvraṃ tamonuda || 58 ||

baḍavārūpamāsthāya matsakāśamihāgatā |
nivāritā mayā sā ca tvadbhayena divaspate || 59 ||

yasmādavijñātamanā matsakāśamihāgatā |
tasmānmadīyaṃ bhavanaṃ praveṣṭuṃ na tavārhati || 60 ||

evamuktā jagāmāśu marudeśamaniṃditā |
baḍavārūpamāsthāya bhūtale saṃpratiṣṭhitā || 61 ||

tasmātprasādaṃ kuru me yadyanugrahabhāgaham |
apaneṣyāmi te tejaḥ kṛtvā yaṃtre divākaram || 62 ||

rūpaṃ tava kariṣyāmi lokānaṃdakaraṃ prabho |
tathetyuktaḥ sa raviṇā bhrame kṛtvā divākaraṃ || 63 ||

pṛthakcakāra tejaśca cakraṃ viṣṇoḥ prakalpayat |
triśūlaṃ cāpi rudrasya vajramiṃdrasya cāparaṃ || 64 ||

daityadānavasaṃhartṛ sahasrakiraṇātmakaṃ |
rūpaṃ cāpratimaṃ cakre tvaṣṭā padbhyāmṛte mahat || 65 ||

na śaśāka ca taddraṣṭuṃ pādarūpaṃ raveḥ punaḥ |
adyāpi ca tataḥ pādau na kaścitkārayetkvacit || 66 ||

yaḥ karoti sa pāpiṣṭho gatimāpnoti niṃditāṃ |
kuṣṭharogamavāpnoti lokesminduḥkhasaṃjñitaṃ || 67 ||

tasmānna dharmakāmārthī citreṣvāyataneṣu ca |
na kvacitkārayetpādau devadevasya dhīmataḥ || 68 ||

tataḥ sa bhagavāngatvā bhūrlokamamarādhipaḥ |
kāmayāmāsa kāmārto mukha eva divākaraḥ || 69 ||

aśvarūpeṇa mahatā tejasā ca samanvitaḥ |
saṃjñā ca manasā kṣobhamagamadbhayavihvalā || 70 ||

nāsāpuṭābhyāmutsṛṣṭaṃ paroyamiti śaṃkayā |
tasyātha retaso jātāvaśvināviti naḥ śrutam || 71 ||

dasrau śrutitvātsaṃjātau nāsatyau nāsikāgrataḥ |
jñātvā cirācca taṃ devaṃ saṃtoṣamagamatparaṃ || 72 ||

vimānenāgamatsvarge patnyā saha mudānvitaḥ |
sāvarṇyopi manurmerāvadyāpi tapate tapaḥ || 73 ||

śanistapobalāccāpi grahāṇāṃ samatāṃ gataḥ |
yamunā tapatī caiva punarnadyau babhūvatuḥ || 74 ||

viṣṭhirghorātmikā tadvatkālatvena vyavasthitā |
manorvaivasvatasyāpi daśa putrā mahābalāḥ || 75 ||

ilastu prathamasteṣāṃ putreṣṭyā samakalpi yaḥ |
ikṣvākuḥ kuśanābhaśca ariṣṭo dhṛṣṭa eva ca || 76 ||

nariṣyaṃtaḥ karūṣaśca śaryātiśca mahābalaḥ |
pṛṣadhraścātha nābhāgaḥ sarve te divyamānuṣāḥ || 77 ||

abhiṣicya manuḥ pūrvamilaṃ putraṃ sa dhārmikam |
jagāma tapase bhūyaḥ puṣkaraṃ sa tapovanaṃ || 78 ||

athājagāma sidhyarthaṃ tasya brahmā varapradaḥ |
varaṃ varaya bhadraṃ te mānaveya yathepsitaṃ || 79 ||

uvāca sa tadā devaṃ padmākṣaṃ padmajaṃ vibhuṃ |
vaṃśe me dharmasaṃyuktāḥ pṛthivyāṃ sarvapārthivāḥ || 80 ||

bhaveyurīśvarāḥ svāminprasādāttava kaṃjaja |
tathetyuktvā tu deveśastatraivāṃtaradhīyata || 81 ||

tatoyodhyāṃ samāgatya samatiṣṭhadyathā purā |
athaikadā rathārūḍha ilo nija suto manoḥ || 82 ||

nirjagāmārthasidhyarthaminaprāyāṃ mahīmimāṃ |
bhramandvīpāni sarvāṇi kṣmābhṛtaḥ saṃprasādhayan || 83 ||

jagāmopavanaṃ śaṃbhorathākṛṣṭaḥ pratāpavān |
kalpadrumalatākīrṇaṃ nāmnā śaravaṇaṃ mahat || 84 ||

ramate yatra deveśaḥ somaḥ somārddhaśekharaḥ |
umayā samayastatra purā śaravaṇe kṛtaḥ || 85 ||

puṃnāmasaṃjñaṃ yatkiṃcidāgamiṣyati no vanaṃ |
strītvameṣyati tatsarvaṃ daśayojanamaṃḍale || 86 ||

ajñātasamayo rājā ilaḥ śaravaṇaṃ gataḥ |
strītvaṃ jagāma sahasā baḍavāśvo'bhavatkṣaṇāt || 87 ||

puruṣatve kṛtaṃ sarvaṃ strīkāye vismṛtaṃ tataḥ |
ileti sābhavannārī pīnonnataghanastanī || 88 ||

unnataśroṇijaghanā padmapatrāyatekṣaṇā |
pūrṇenduvadanā tanvī vilāsinyasitekṣaṇā || 89 ||

pīnonnatāyatabhujā nīlakuṃcitamūrddhajā |
tanulomā suvadanā mṛdugadgadabhāṣiṇī || 90 ||

śyāmāgaureṇa varṇena tanutāmranakhāṃkurā |
kārmukabhrūyugopetā haṃsāvaraṇagāminī || 91 ||

bhramamāṇā vane tasminciṃtayāmāsa bhāminī |
ko me pitā vā bhrātā vā ko me trātā bhavediha || 92 ||

kasya bhartturahaṃ dattā kiyadvarṣāsmi bhūtale |
ciṃtayaṃtī ca dadṛśe somaputreṇa sāṅganā || 93 ||

ilārūpa samākṣipta manasā varavarṇinī |
budhastadāptaye yatnamakarotkāmapīḍitaḥ || 94 ||

viśiṣṭākāravānmuṃḍī sa kamaṃḍalupustakaḥ |
veṇudaṃḍakṛtāveśaḥ pavitraka khanitrakaḥ || 95 ||

dvijarūpaḥ śikhī brahma nigadankarṇakuṃḍalī |
vaṭubhiścārthibhiryuktaḥ samitpuṣpakuśodakaiḥ || 96 ||

kālenviṣyāṃ tatastasminnājuhāva sa tāmilām |
bahirvanasyāṃtaritaḥ kila pādapamaṃḍape || 97 ||

sasaṃbhramamakasmācca sopālaṃbhamivābhavat |
tyaktvāgnihotraśuśrūṣāṃ kva gatā maṃdirānmama || 98 ||

iyaṃ vihāravelā te atikrāmati sāṃpratam |
ehyehi pṛthusuśroṇi saṃbhrāṃtā kena hetunā || 99 ||

iyaṃ sāyaṃtanī velā vihārasyeha varttate |
kṛtvopalepanaṃ puṣpairalaṃkuru gṛhaṃ mama || 100 ||

sābravīdvismṛtāhaṃ ca sarvameva tapodhana |
ātmānaṃ tvāṃ ca bharttāraṃ kulaṃ ca vada menagha || 101 ||

budhaḥ provāca tāṃ tanvīmilā tvaṃ varavarṇinī |
ahaṃ ca kāmuko nāma bahuvidyo budhaḥ smṛtaḥ || 102 ||

tejasvinaḥ kule jātaḥ pitā me brāhmaṇādhipaḥ |
iti sā tasyavacanātpraviṣṭā budhamaṃdiram || 103 ||

ratnastaṃbhasamākīrṇaṃ divyamāyāvinirmitam |
ilā kṛtārthamātmānaṃ mene tadbhavane sthitā || 104 ||

aho vṛttamahorūpamaho dhanamahokulam |
mama cāsya ca bhartturvā aho lāvaṇyamuttamam || 105 ||

reme ca sā tena samamatikālamilā vane |
sarvabhogamaye gehe yatheṃdrabhavane tathā || 106 ||

athānviṣyaṃto rājānaṃ bhrātarastasya mānavāḥ |
ikṣvākupramukhā jagmustadā śaravaṇāṃtikam || 107 ||

tataste dadṛśuḥ sarve vaḍavāmagrataḥ sthitām |
ratnaparyaṃtakiraṇadīpyamānāmanuttamām || 108 ||

saṃprāpya pratyabhijñānātsarve vismayamāgatāḥ |
ayaṃ caṃdraprabho nāma vājī tasya mahātmanaḥ || 109 ||

agamadvaḍavārūpamuttamaṃ kena hetunā |
tatastu maitrāvaruṇiṃ papracchuḥ svapurohitam || 110 ||

kimetadityabhūccitraṃ vada yogavidāṃ vara |
vasiṣṭhopyabravītsarvaṃ dṛṣṭvā taṃ dhyānacakṣuṣā || 111 ||

samayaḥ śaṃbhudayitā kṛtaḥ śaravaṇe purā |
yaḥ pumānpraviśeccātra sa nārītvamavāpsyati || 112 ||

ayamaśvopi nārītvamagādrājñā sahaiva tu |
ilaḥ puruṣatāmeti yathāsau dhanadopamaḥ || 113 ||

tathaiva yatnaḥ karttavya ārādhya ca pinākinam |
tataste mānavā jagmuryatra devo maheśvaraḥ || 114 ||

tuṣṭavurvividhaiḥ stotraiḥ pārvatīparameśvarau |
tāvūcaturalaṃ caiṣa samayaḥ kiṃ nu sāṃprataṃ || 115 ||

ikṣvākoraśvamedhena yatphalaṃ syāttadāvayoḥ |
datvā kiṃpuruṣo vīraḥ sa bhaviṣyatyasaṃśayam || 116 ||

tathetyuktvā tu te sarve jagmurvaivasvatātmajāḥ |
iṣṭvāśvamedhena tata ilā kiṃpuruṣobhavat || 117 ||

māsamekaṃ pumānvīraḥ strītvaṃ māsamabhūtpunaḥ |
budhasya bhavane tiṣṭhannilo garbhadharobhavat || 118 ||

ajījanatputramekamanekaguṇasaṃyutam |
budha utpādya taṃ pūruṃ sa svargamagamatpunaḥ || 119 ||

ilasya nāmnā tadvarṣamilāvṛtamabhūttadā |
somārkavaṃśajo rājā ilobhūdvaṃśavarddhanaḥ || 120 ||

evaṃ purūravāḥ pūrorabhavadvaṃśavarddhanaḥ |
ikṣvākurarkavaṃśasya tathaivokto nareśvaraḥ || 121 ||

ilaḥ kiṃpuruṣatve ca sudyumna iti cocyate |
punaḥ putratrayamabhūtsudyumnasyāparājitam || 122 ||

utkalotha gayastadvaddharitāśvaśca vīryavān |
utkalasyotkalā nāma gayasya tu gayāpurī || 123 ||

haritāśvasya digyāmyā saṃjñātā kurubhiḥ saha |
pratiṣṭhānebhiṣicyātha sa purūravasaṃ sutam || 124 ||

jagāmelāvṛtaṃ bhoktuṃ divyaṃ varṣaṃ phalāśanaḥ |
ikṣvākurjyeṣṭhadāyādo madhyadeśamavāptavān || 125 ||

nariṣyaṃtasya putrobhūcchuko nāma mahābalaḥ |
nābhāgādaṃbarīṣastu dhṛṣṭasya tu sutatrayam || 126 ||

dhṛṣṭaketuḥ svadharmātho raṇadhṛṣṭaśca vīryavān |
ānarto nāma śaryāteḥ sukanyā caiva dārikā || 127 ||

ānartasyābhavatputro rocamānaḥ pratāpavān |
ānarto nāma deśobhūnnagarī ca kuśasthalī || 128 ||

rocamānasya revobhūdrevādraivata eva ca |
kakudmī cāparaṃ nāma jyeṣṭhaḥ putraśatasya ca || 129 ||

revatī tasya sā kanyā bhāryā rāmasya viśrutā |
karūṣāccaiva kārūṣā bahavaḥ prathitā bhuvi || 130 ||

pṛṣadhro govadhācchūdro guruśāpādajāyata |
ikṣvākuputrā nāmnātha vikukṣi nimidaṃḍakāḥ || 131 ||

śreṣṭhāḥ putraśatasyāsanpaṃcāśaccātha tatsutāḥ |
meroruttarataste tu jātāḥ pārthivasattamāḥ || 132 ||

catvāriṃśattathāṣṭānye śatamadhye ca yebhavan |
merordakṣiṇataścaiva rājānaste prakīrtitāḥ || 133 ||

jyeṣṭhātkakutsthanāmābhūtsutastasya suyodhanaḥ |
tasya putraḥ pṛthṛrnāma viśvastasya pṛthoḥ sutaḥ || 134 ||

ārdrastasya ca putrobhūdyuvanāśvastatobhavat |
yuvanāśvasya putrobhūcchāvasto nāma vīryavān || 135 ||

nirmitā yena śāvastī hyaṃgadeśe narādhipa |
śāvastādbṛhadaśvo bhūtkuvalāśvastatobhavat || 136 ||

dhuṃdhumāratvamagamaddhuṃdhuṃ hatvā'suraṃ purā |
tasya putrāstrayo jātā dṛḍhāśvo ghṛṇireva ca || 137 ||

kapilāśvaśca vikhyāto dhauṃdhumāriḥ pratāpavān |
dṛḍhāśvasya pramodastu haryaśvastasya cātmajaḥ || 138 ||

haryaśvasya nikuṃbhobhūtsaṃhatāśvastatobhavat |
akṛtāśvo raṇāśvaśca saṃhatāśva sutāvubhau || 139 ||

yuvanāśvo raṇāśvasya māṃdhātā ca tatobhavat |
māṃdhātuḥ purukutsobhūddharmasetuśca pārthivaḥ || 140 ||

mucukundaśca vikhyātaśśakramitraḥ pratāpavān |
purukutsasya putrobhūddussaho narmadāpatiḥ || 141 ||

saṃbhūtistasya putrobhūttridhanvā ca tatobhavat |
tridhanvanaḥ suto jātastrayyāruṇa iti smṛtaḥ || 142 ||

tasya satyavrato nāma tasmātsatyarathaḥ smṛtaḥ |
tasya putro hariścandro hariścaṃdrācca rohitaḥ || 143 ||

rohatācca vṛko jāto vṛkādbāhurajāyata |
sagarastasya putrobhūdrājā paramadhārmikaḥ || 144 ||

dve bhārye sagarasyāpi prabhā bhānumatī tathā |
tābhyāmārādhitaḥ pūrvamaurvāgniḥ putrakāmyayā || 145 ||

aurvastuṣṭastayoḥ prādādyatheṣṭaṃ varamuttamam |
ekā ṣaṣṭisahasrāṇi sutamekaṃ tathāparā || 146 ||

agṛhṇādvaṃśakartāraṃ prabhā'gṛhṇādbahūnsutān |
ekaṃ bhānumatī putramagṛhṇādasamaṃjasaṃ || 147 ||

tataḥ ṣaṣṭisahasrāṇi suṣuve yādavī prabhā |
khanaṃtaḥ pṛthivīṃ dagdhā viṣṇunā ye 'śvamārgaṇe || 148 ||

asamaṃjastu tanayo hyaṃśumānnāma viśrutaḥ |
tasya putro dilīpastu dilīpāttu bhagīrathaḥ || 149 ||

yena bhāgīrathī gaṅgā tapaḥ kṛtvāvatāritā |
bhagīrathasya tanayo nābhāga iti viśrutaḥ || 150 ||

nābhāgasyāṃbarīṣobhūtsiṃdhudvīpastatobhavat |
tasyāyutāyuḥ putrobhūdṛtuparṇastatobhavat || 151 ||

tasya kalmāṣapādastu sarvakarmā tataḥ smṛtaḥ |
tasyānaraṇyaḥ putrobhūnnighnastasya sutobhavat || 152 ||

nighnaputrāvubhau jātāvanamitra raghūttamau |
anamitro vanamagādarināśakṛte nṛpa || 153 ||

raghorabhūddilīpastu dilīpāccāpyajastathā |
dīrghabāhurajājjātaḥ prajāpālastatobhavat || 154 ||

tato daśaratho jātastasya putracatuṣṭayaṃ |
nārāyaṇātmakāḥ sarve rāmastasyāgrajobhavat || 155 ||

rāvaṇāṃtakarastadvadraghūṇāṃ vaṃśavarddhanaḥ |
vālmīkiryasya caritaṃ cakre bhārgavasattamaḥ || 156 ||

tasya putraḥ kuśo nāma ikṣvākukulavarddhanaḥ |
atithistu kuśājjāto niṣadhastasya cātmajaḥ || 157 ||

nalastu niṣadhājjāto nabhāstasmādajāyata |
nabhasaḥ puṃḍarīkobhūtkṣemadhanvā tataḥ param || 158 ||

tasyaputrobhavadvīro devānīkaḥ pratāpavān |
ahīnagustasya sutaḥ sahasrāśvastataḥ paraḥ || 159 ||

tataścaṃdrāvalokastu tārāpīḍastatobhavat |
tasyātmajaścandragiriścaṃdrastasya sutobhavat || 160 ||

śrutāyurabhavattasmādbhārate yo nipātitaḥ |
nalau dvāveva vikhyātau vaṃśe yasya viśeṣataḥ || 161 ||

vīrasenasutastadvannaiṣadhaśca narādhipaḥ |
ete vivasvato vaṃśe rājāno bhūridakṣiṇāḥ || 162 ||
ikṣvākuvaṃśaprabhavāḥ prādhānyena prakīrtitāḥ || 163 ||

bhīṣma uvāca |
bhagavanśrotumicchāmi pitṝṇāṃ vaṃśamuttamam |
raveśca śrāddhadevasya somasya ca viśeṣataḥ || 1 ||

pulastya uvāca |
haṃta te kathayiṣyāmi pitṝṇāṃ vaṃśamuttamam |
svarge pitṛgaṇāḥ sapta trayasteṣāmamūrtayaḥ || 2 ||

mūrtimaṃtotha catvāraḥ sarveṣāmamitaujasāṃ |
amūrttayaḥ pitṛgaṇā vairājasya prajāpateḥ || 3 ||

yajanti yāndevagaṇā vairājā iti viśrutāḥ |
ye vai te yogavibhraṣṭāḥ prāpurlokānsanātanān || 4 ||

punarbrahmadināṃte tu jāyaṃte brahmavādinaḥ |
saṃprāpya tāṃ smṛtiṃ bhūyo yogaṃ sāṃkhyamanuttamam || 5 ||

siddhiṃ prayāṃti yogena punarāvṛttidurllabhām |
yogināmeva deyāni tasmācchāddhāni dātṛbhiḥ || 6 ||

eteṣāṃ mānasī kanyā patnī himavato matā |
mainākastasya dāyādaḥ kraucastasya sutobhavat || 7 ||

krauṃcadvīpaḥ smṛto yena caturtho dhṛtasaṃyutaḥ |
menā tu suṣave tisraḥ kanyā yogavatīstataḥ || 8 ||

umaikaparṇā parṇā ca tīvravrataparāyaṇāḥ |
rudrasyaikā bhṛgoścaikā jaigīṣavyasya cāparā || 9 ||

dattā himavatā bālāḥ sarvalokatapodhikāḥ |
pitṝṇāṃ lokasaṃgītaṃ kathayāmi śṛṇuṣva tat || 10 ||

lokāḥ somapathā nāma yatra mārīcanaṃdanāḥ |
varttaṃte yena pitaro yāndevā bhāvayantyalam || 11 ||

agniṣvāttā iti khyātā yajvāno yatra saṃsthitāḥ |
acchodā nāma teṣāṃ tu kanyābhūdvaravarṇinī || 12 ||

acchodaṃ ca sarastatra pitṛbhirnirmitaṃ purā |
acchodātha tapaścakre divyaṃ varṣasahasrakam || 13 ||

ājagmuḥ pitarastuṣṭā dāsyantaḥ kila te varam |
divyarūpadharāḥ sarve divyamālyānulepanāḥ || 14 ||

sarve pradhānā balinaḥ kusumāyudhasannibhāḥ |
tanmadhyemāvasuṃ nāma pitaraṃ vīkṣya sāṃganā || 15 ||

vavre varārthinī saṃgaṃ kusumāyudhapīḍitā |
yogādbhraṣṭā tu sā tena vyabhicāreṇa bhāminī || 16 ||

dharānna spṛśate pūrvaṃ prayātātha bhuvastale |
tathaivāmāvasuryoyamicchāṃ cakre na tāṃ prati || 17 ||

dhairyeṇa tasya sā loke amāvāsyeti viśrutā |
pitṝṇāṃ vallabhā yasmāddattasyākṣayakārikā || 18 ||

acchodādhomukhī dīnā lajjitā tapasaḥ kṣayāt |
sā pitṝnprārthayāmāsa punarātmasamṛddhaye || 19 ||

vilajjamānā pitṛbhiridamuktā tapasvinī |
bhaviṣyamatha cālokya devakāryaṃ ca te tadā || 20 ||

idamūcurmahābhāgāḥ prasāda śubhayāgirā |
divi divyaśarīreṇa yatkiṃcitkriyate budhaiḥ || 21 ||

tenaiva tatkarmaphalaṃ bhujyate varavarṇinī |
sadyaḥ phalaṃti karmāṇi devatve pretyamānuṣe || 22 ||

tasmāttvaṃ sukṛtaṃ kṛtvā prāpsyase pretya yatphalam |
aṣṭāviṃśe bhavitrī tvaṃ dvāpare matsyayonijā || 23 ||

vyatikramātpitṝṇāṃ tu kaṣṭaṃ kulamavāpsyasi |
tasmādrājño vasoḥ kanyā tvamavaśyaṃ bhaviṣyasi || 24 ||

kanyātve devalokāṃstānpunaḥ prāpsyasi durllabhān |
parāśarasya vīryeṇa putramekamavāpsyasi || 25 ||

dvīpe tu badarīprāye bādarāyaṇamapyuta |
sa vedamekaṃ bahudhā vibhajiṣyati te sutaḥ || 26 ||

pauravasyātmajau dvau tu samudrāṃśasya śaṃtanoḥ |
vicitravīryastanayastathā citrāṃgado nṛpaḥ || 27 ||

imāvutpādya tanayau kṣetrajau tasya dhīmataḥ |
prauṣṭhapadyaṣṭakābhūyaḥ pitṛloke bhaviṣyasi || 28 ||

nāmnā satyavatī loke pitṛloke tathāṣṭakā |
āyurārogyadā nityaṃ sarvakāmaphalapradā || 29 ||

bhaviṣyasi pare loke nadī tvaṃ ca gamiṣyasi |
puṇyatoyā saricchreṣṭhā lokeṣvacchodanāmikā || 30 ||

ityuktā sā gaṇaistaistu tatraivāṃtaradhīyata |
sāpyāpacāritraphalaṃ mayā yaduditaṃ purā || 31 ||

vibhrājo nāma ye cānye divi saṃti suvarcasaḥ |
lokā barhiṣado yatra pitaraḥ saṃti suvratāḥ || 32 ||

yatra barhiṣi yuktāni vimānāni sahasraśaḥ |
saṃkalpapādapā yatra tiṣṭhaṃti phaladāyinaḥ || 33 ||

yadabhyudayaśālāsu modaṃte śrāddhadāyinaḥ |
ye dānavāsuragaṇā gaṃdharvāpsarasāṃ gaṇāḥ || 34 ||

yakṣarakṣogaṇāste ca yajaṃti divi devatāḥ |
pulastyaputrāḥ śataśastapoyogabalānvitāḥ || 35 ||

mahātmāno mahābhāgā bhaktānāmabhayaṃkarāḥ |
eteṣāṃ pīvarī kanyā mānasī divi viśrutā || 36 ||

yoginī yogamātā ca tapaścakre sudāruṇaṃ |
prasanno bhagavāṃstasyā varaṃ vavre tu sā tataḥ || 37 ||

yogavaṃtaṃ surūpaṃ ca bhartāraṃ vijiteṃdriyam |
dehi deva prasannastvaṃ yadi te vadatāṃ vara || 38 ||

uvāca devo bhavitā vyāsaputro yadā śukaḥ |
bhavitrī tasya bhāryā tvaṃ yogācāryasya suvratā || 39 ||

bhaviṣyati ca te kanyā kṛttīnāmātha yoginī |
pāṃcālapataye deyā sātvatāya tu sā tadā || 40 ||

jananī brahmadattasya yogasiddhāṃtagā smṛtā |
kṛṣṇa gauraśca śaṃbhuśca bhaviṣyaṃti ca te sutāḥ || 41 ||

sarvakāmasamṛddheṣu vimāneṣvapi pāvanāḥ |
kiṃ punaḥ śrāddhadā viprā bhaktimaṃtaḥ kriyānvitāḥ || 42 ||

gaurnāma kanyā yeṣāṃ tu mānasī divi rājate |
sukanyā dayitā patnī sādhyānāṃ kīrtivarddhinī || 43 ||

marīcigarbhanāmāno loke mārtaṃḍamaṃḍale |
pitaro yatra tiṣṭhaṃti haviṣmaṃtoṃgiraḥ sutāḥ || 44 ||

tīrthaśrāddhapradā yāṃti yatra kṣatriyasattamāḥ |
rājñāṃ tu pitaraste vai svargabhogaphalapradāḥ || 45 ||

eteṣāṃ mānasī kanyā yaśodā nāma viśrutā |
patnī yāṃśumataḥ śreṣṭhā snuṣā paṃcajanasya ca || 46 ||

jananyatha dilīpasya bhagīrathapitāmahī |
lokāḥ kāmadughā nāma kāmabhogaphalapradāḥ || 47 ||

susvadhā nāma pitaro yatra tiṣṭhanti te sutāḥ |
ājyapā nāma lokeṣu kardamasya prajāpateḥ || 48 ||

pulahāgrajadāyādā vaiśyāstānbhāvayaṃti ha |
yatra śrāddhakṛtaḥ sarve paśyaṃti yugapadgatāḥ || 49 ||

mātṛbhrātṛpitṛsvasṝḥ sakhisaṃbaṃdhibāṃdhavān |
apijanmāyutairdṛṣṭānanubhūtānsahasraśaḥ || 50 ||

eteṣāṃ mānasī kanyā virajā nāma viśrutā |
sā patnī nahuṣasyāsīdyayāterjananī tathā || 51 ||

eṣāṣṭakābhavatpaścādbrahmalokagatā satī |
traya ete gaṇāḥ proktāścaturthaṃ tu vadāmyaham || 52 ||

lokāḥ sumanaso nāma brahmalokoparisthitāḥ |
somapā nāma pitaro yatra tiṣṭhaṃti śāśvataṃ || 53 ||

dharmamūrtidharāḥ sarve parato brahmaṇaḥ smṛtāḥ |
utpannāḥ pralayāṃte tu brahmatvaṃ prāpya yoginaḥ || 54 ||

kṛtvā sṛṣṭyādikaṃ sarve mānase sāṃprataṃ sthitāḥ |
narmadā nāma teṣāṃ tu kanyā toyavahā sarit || 55 ||

bhūtāni punatī yā tu paścimodadhigāminī |
tebhyaḥ sarvatra manujāḥ prajāsarge ca nirmitam || 56 ||

jñātvā śrāddhāni kurvaṃti dharmabhāvena sarvadā |
sarvadā tebhya evāsya prasādādyogasaṃtatiḥ || 57 ||

pitṝṇāmādisarge tu śrāddhamevaṃ vinirmitam |
sarveṣāṃ rājataṃ pātramathavā rājatānvitam || 58 ||

dattaṃ svadhāṃ purodhāya pitṝnprīṇāti sarvadā |
āgnīdhrasomapābhyāṃ tu kāryamāpyāyanaṃ budhaiḥ || 59 ||

agnyabhāve tu viprasya pāṇau vātha jalepi vā |
ajākarṇeśvakarṇe vā goṣṭhe vātha śivāṃtike || 60 ||

pitṝṇāmamalaṃ sthānaṃ dakṣiṇādikpraśasyate |
prācīnāvītamudakaṃ tilasaṃtyāgameva ca || 61 ||

khaḍgiganāmāmiṣaṃ caivamannaṃ śyāmākaśālayaḥ |
yavanīvāramudgekṣu śuklapuṣpa phalāni ca || 62 ||

vallabhāni praśastāni pitṝṇāmiha sarvadā |
darbhā māṣaṣṣaṣṭikānnaṃ gokṣīraṃ madhusarpiṣī || 63 ||

śastrāṇi ca pravakṣyāmi śrāddhe varjyāni yāni ca |
masūra śaṇa niṣpāvā rājamāṣāḥ kulutthakāḥ || 64 ||

padma bilvārkāduttūra pāribhadrāṭarūṣakāḥ |
na deyāḥ pitṛkāryeṣu payaścājāvikaṃ tathā || 65 ||

kodravodāravaraṭakapitthaṃ madhukātasī |
etānyapi na deyāni pitṝbhyaḥ śriyamicchatā || 66 ||

pitṛnprīṇāti yo bhaktyā te punaḥ prīṇayaṃti taṃ |
yacchaṃti pitaraḥ puṣṭiṃ svāṃgārogyaṃ prajāphalam || 67 ||

devakāryādapi punaḥ pitṛkāryaṃ viśiṣyate |
devatābhyaḥ pitṝṇāṃ tu pūrvamāpyāyanaṃ smṛtam || 68 ||

śīghraprasādāstvakrodhā nissaṃgāḥ sthira sauhṛdāḥ |
śāṃtātmānaḥ śaucaparāḥ satataṃ priyavādinaḥ || 69 ||

bhaktānuraktāḥ sukhadāḥ pitaraḥ parvadevatāḥ |
haviṣmatāmādhipatye śrāddhadevaḥ smṛto raviḥ || 70 ||

etaddhi sarvamākhyātaṃ pitṛvaṃśānukīrttanam |
puṇyaṃ pavitramārogyaṃ kīrttanīyaṃ nṛbhiḥ sadā || 71 ||

bhīṣma uvāca |
śrutvaitadakhilaṃ bhūyaḥ parābhaktirupasthitā |
śrāddhakālaṃ vidhiṃ caiva śrāddhameva tathaiva ca || 72 ||

śrāddheṣu bhojanīyā ye śrāddhavarjyā dvijātayaḥ |
kasminvāsarabhāge tu pitṛbhyaḥ śrāddhamārabhet || 73 ||

annaṃ dattaṃ kathaṃ yāti śrāddhe vai brahmavittama |
vidhinā kena karttavyaṃ kathaṃ prīṇāti tānpitṝn || 74 ||

pulastya uvāca |
kuryādaharahaḥ śrāddhamannādyenodakena ca |
payomūlaphalairvāpi pitṛbhyaḥ prītimāvahan || 75 ||

nityaṃ naimittikaṃ kāmyaṃ trividhaṃ śrāddhamucyate |
nityaṃ tāvatpravakṣyāmi arghyāvāhanavarjitam || 76 ||

adaivataṃ vijānīyātpārvaṇaṃ parva susmṛtam |
pārvaṇaṃ trividhaṃ proktaṃ śṛṇu yatnānmahīpate || 77 ||

pārvaṇeya niyojyāstu tānśṛṇuṣva narādhipa |
paṃcāgniḥ snātakaścaiva trisauparṇaḥ ṣaḍaṃgavit || 78 ||

śrotriyaḥ śrotriyasuto vidhivākyaviśāradaḥ |
sarvajño vedavānmaṃtrī jñānavaṃśakulānvitaḥ || 79 ||

triṇāciketastrimadhuḥ śruteṣvanyeṣu saṃsthitaḥ |
purāṇavettā brahmajñaḥ svādhyāyī japatatparaḥ || 80 ||

brahmabhaktaḥ pitṛparaḥ sūryabhaktotha vaiṣṇavaḥ |
brāhmaṇo yoganiṣṭhātmā vijitātmā suśīlavān || 81 ||

ete toṣyāḥ prayatnena varjanīyānimānśṛṇu |
patitastatsutaḥ klībaḥ piśuno vyaṃgarogitaḥ || 82 ||

sarve te śrāddhakāle tu tyājyā vai dharmadarśibhiḥ |
pūrvedyuraparedyurvā vinītāṃśca nimaṃtrayet || 83 ||

nimaṃtritāṃśca pitara upatiṣṭhaṃti tāndvijān |
vāyubhūtāni gacchaṃti tathāsīnānupāsate || 84 ||

dakṣiṇaṃ jānucālabhya vāmaṃ pātyanimaṃtrayet |
akrodhanaiḥ śaucaparaiḥ susnātairbrahmavādibhiḥ || 85 ||

bhavitavyaṃ bhavadbhistu mayā ca śrāddhakarmaṇi |
pitṛyajñaṃ vinirvartya tarpaṇākhyaṃ tu yognimān || 86 ||

piṃḍānvāhāryakaṃ kuryācchrāddhamiṃdukṣaye tathā |
gomayenānulipte tu dakṣiṇāplavanasthale || 87 ||

śrāddhaṃ samārabhedbhaktyā goṣṭhe vā jalasannidhau |
agnimānnirvapetpitryaṃ caruṃ vā saktumuṣṭibhiḥ || 88 ||

pitṛbhyo nirvapāmīti sarvaṃ dakṣiṇato nyaset |
abhighārya tataḥ kuryānnirvāpatrayamagrataḥ || 89 ||

te vitastyāyatāḥ kāryāścaturaṅgulavistṛtāḥ |
darvītrayaṃ ca kurvīta khādiraṃ rajatānvitam || 90 ||

ratnimātraṃ pariślakṣṇaṃ hastākārāgramuttamam |
udapātrāṇi kāṃsyasya mekṣaṇaṃ ca samitkuśam || 91 ||

tilapātrāṇi sadvāso gaṃdhadhūpānulepanam |
āharedapasavyaṃ ca sarvaṃ dakṣiṇataḥ śanaiḥ || 92 ||

evamāsādya tatsarvaṃ bhavanasyottareṃtare |
gomayenānuliptāyāṃ gomūtreṇa ca maṃḍalam || 93 ||

sākṣatābhiḥ sapuṣpābhiradbhiḥ savyāpasavyavat |
viprāṇāṃ kṣālayetpādāvabhivaṃdya punaḥpunaḥ || 94 ||

āsaneṣūpaviṣṭeṣu darbhavatsu vidhānataḥ |
upaspṛṣṭodakānviprānupaveśyānumaṃtrayet || 95 ||

dvau daive pitṛkṛtye trīnekaikaṃ cobhayatra vā |
bhojayedīśvaropīha na kuryādvistaraṃ budhaḥ || 96 ||

daivapūrvaṃ nivedyātha viprānarghādinā budhaiḥ |
agnau kuryādanujñāto viprairvipro yathāvidhi || 97 ||

svagṛhyoktena vidhinā kāle kṛtvā samaṃtataḥ |
agnīṣomamayābhyāṃ tu kuryādāpyāyanaṃ budhaḥ || 98 ||

dakṣiṇāgnau praṇītena sa evāgnirdvijottamaḥ |
yajñopavītānnirvartya tataḥ paryukṣaṇādikam || 99 ||

prācīnāvītinā kāryametatsarvaṃ vijānatā |
labdhvā tasmādviśeṣeṇa piṃḍānkurvīta codakaṃ || 100 ||

dadyādudakapātraistu salilaṃ savyapāṇinā |
dadyātsarvaṃ prayatnena damayukto vimatsaraḥ || 101 ||

vidhāya rekhāṃ yatnena nirvapedavanejanaṃ |
dakṣiṇābhimukhaḥ kuryāttato darbhānnidhāya vai || 102 ||

nidhāya piṃḍamekaikaṃ sarvaṃ darbhoparikramāt |
nirvapedatha darbheṣu nāmagotrānukīrtanaiḥ || 103 ||

teṣu darbheṣu taṃ hastaṃ vimṛjyāllepabhāgināṃ |
tathaiva ca japaṃ kuryātpunaḥ pratyavanejanam || 104 ||

jalayuktaṃ namaskṛtya gaṃdhadhūpārcanādibhiḥ |
evamāvāhya tatsarvaṃ vedamaṃtrairyathoditaiḥ || 105 ||

ekāgnarekaevādbhirnirvapeddarvikāṃ tathā |
tataḥ kṛtvā naro dadyātpitṛbhyastu kuśānbudhaḥ || 106 ||

tataḥ piṃḍādikaṃ kuryādāvāhanavisarjanam |
tato gṛhītvā piṃḍebhyo mātrāḥ sarvāḥ krameṇa tu || 107 ||

tāneva viprānprathamamāśayitvā ca mānavaḥ |
varṇayanbhojayedannamiṣṭaṃ pūrtaṃ ca sarvadā || 108 ||

varjayetkrodhaparatāṃ smarannārāyaṇaṃ harim |
tṛptānjñātvā punaḥ kuryādvikiraṃ sārvavarṇikaṃ || 109 ||

vidhṛtya sodakaṃ tvannaṃ satilaṃ prakṣipedbhuvi |
ācāṃteṣu punardadyājjalaṃ puṣpākṣatodakam || 110 ||

svadhāvācanakaṃ sarvaṃ piṃḍopari samācaret |
devādyaṃtaṃ prakurvīta śrāddhanāśonyathā bhavet || 111 ||

visṛjya viprānpraṇatasteṣāṃ kṛtvā pradakṣiṇam |
dakṣiṇāṃdiśamākāṃkṣanpitṝnuddiśya mānavaḥ || 112 ||

dātāro nobhivarddhaṃtāṃ vedāḥ santatireva ca |
śraddhā ca no mā vyagamadbahudeyaṃ ca nostviti || 113 ||

annaṃ ca no bahubhavedatithīṃśca labhemahi |
yācitāraśca naḥ saṃtu mā ca yāciṣma kaṃcana || 114 ||

etadagnimataḥ proktamanvāhāryaṃ tu pārvaṇaṃ |
yatheṃdusaṃkṣaye tadvadanyatrāpi nigadyate || 115 ||

piṃḍāṃstu gojaviprebhyo dadyādagnau jalepi vā |
vaprāṃte vātha vikiredāpobhiratha vāpayet || 116 ||

patnīṃ tu madhyamaṃ piṃḍaṃ prāśayedvinayānvitām |
ādhatta pitaro garbhaṃ putrasaṃtānavarddhanaṃ || 117 ||

tāvannirvāpaṇaṃ tiṣṭhedyāvadviprā visarjitāḥ |
vaiśvadevaṃ tataḥ kuryānnivṛttaḥ pitṛkarmaṇaḥ || 118 ||

iṣṭaiḥ saha tataḥ śāṃto bhuṃjīta pitṛsevitam |
punarbhojanamadhvānaṃ yānamāyāsamaithunam || 119 ||

śrāddhakṛcchrāddhabhugyo vā sarvametadvivarjayet |
svādhyāyaṃ kalahaṃ caiva divāsvapnaṃ ca sarvadā || 120 ||

anena vidhinā śrāddhaṃ trivargasyeha nirvapet |
kanyā kuṃbha vṛṣastherke kṛṣṇapakṣeṣu sarvadā || 121 ||

yatrayatra pradātavyaṃ sapiṃḍīkaraṇātmakam |
tatrānena vidhānena deyamagnimatā sadā || 122 ||

ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi brahmaṇā yadudīritam |
śrāddhaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ nāma bhuktimuktiphalapradam || 123 ||

ayane viṣuve caiva amāvasyārkasaṃkrame |
amāvasyāṣṭakā kṛṣṇapakṣa paṃcadaśīṣu ca || 124 ||

ārdrā maghā rohiṇīṣu dravyabrāhmaṇasaṃgame |
gajacchāyāvyatīpāte viṣṭivaidhṛtivāsare || 125 ||

vaiśākhasya tṛtīyāyāṃ navamīkārtikasya ca |
paṃcadaśī tu māghasya nabhasye ca trayodaśī || 126 ||

yugādayaḥ smṛtā hyetāḥ pitṝpakṣopakārikāḥ |
tathā manvaṃtarādau ca deyaṃ śrāddhaṃ vijānatā || 127 ||

aśvayuṅnavamī caiva dvādaśī kārtike tathā |
tṛtīyā caitramāsasya tathā bhādrapadasya ca || 128 ||

phālgunasya tvamāvāsyā pauṣasyaikādaśī tathā |
āṣāḍhasyāpi daśamī māghamāsasya saptamī || 129 ||

śrāvaṇe cāṣṭamī kṛṣṇā tathāṣāḍhī ca pūrṇimā |
kārtikī phālgunī caivā jyeṣṭhe paṃcadaśī sitā || 130 ||

manvaṃtarādayastvetā dattasyākṣayakārikāḥ |
pānīyamapyatra tilairvimiśraṃ dadyātpitṛbhyaḥ prayato manuṣyaḥ || 131 ||

śrāddhaṃ kṛtaṃ tena samāssahasraṃ rahasyametatpitaro vadaṃti |
vaiśākhyāmupavāseṣu tathotsavamahālaye || 132 ||

tīrthāyatanagoṣṭheṣu dvīpodyānagṛheṣu ca |
vivikteṣūpalipteṣu śrāddhaṃ deyaṃ vijānatā || 133 ||

viprānpūrveparecāhni vinītātmāni maṃtrayet |
śīlavṛttaguṇopetānvayorūpasamanvitān || 134 ||

dvau daive pitṛkṛtye trīnekaikamubhayatra vā |
bhojayetsusamṛddhopi na prakurvīta vistaram || 135 ||

viśvedevānyavaiḥ puṣpairabhyarcyāsanapūrvakaṃ |
pūrayetpātrayugmaṃ tu sthāpyaṃ darbhapavitrake || 136 ||

śannodevītyapaḥ kuryādyavosīti yavānapi |
gaṃdhapuṣpaistu saṃpūjya viśvāndevānpratinyaset || 137 ||

viśvedevāsa ityābhyāmāvāhya vikiredyavān |
yavosi dhānyarājastvaṃ vāruṇo madhumiśritaḥ || 138 ||

nirṇudaḥ sarvapāpānāṃ pavitra ṛṣisaṃstutaḥ |
gaṃdhapuṣpairalaṃkṛtya yā divyetyarghamutsṛjet || 39 ||

abhyarcya gaṃdhādyutsṛjya pitṛyajñaṃ samārabhet |
darbhāsanādi kṛtvādau trīṇi pātrāṇi cārcayet || 140 ||

sapavitrāṇi kṛtvādau śannodevītyapaḥ kṣipet |
tilosīti tilānkuryādgandhapuṣpādikaṃ punaḥ || 141 ||

pātraṃ vanaspatimayaṃ tathā parṇamayaṃ punaḥ |
rājataṃ vā prakurvīta tathā sāgarasaṃbhavam || 142 ||

sauvarṇaṃ rājataṃ tāmraṃ pitṝṇāṃ pātramucyate |
rajatasya kathā vāpi darśanaṃ dānameva ca || 143 ||

rājatairbhājanaireṣāṃ pitṝṇāṃ rajatānvitaiḥ |
vāryapi śraddhayā dattamakṣayāyopakalpate || 144 ||

adyāpi pitṛpātreṣu pitṝṇāṃ rājatānvitam |
śivanetrodbhavaṃ yasmāduttamaṃ pitṛvallabham || 145 ||

evaṃ pātrāṇi saṃkalpya yathālābhaṃ vimatsaraḥ |
yā divyeti piturnāma gotre darbhānkare nyaset || 146 ||

pitṝnāvāhayiṣyāmi tathetyuktaḥ sa taiḥ punaḥ |
uśaṃtastvā tathāyantu ṛgmyāmāvāhayetpitṝn || 147 ||

yā divyetyarghyamutsṛjya dadyādgaṃdhādikaṃ tataḥ |
vastrottaraṃ darbhapūrvaṃ datvā saṃśrayamāditaḥ || 148 ||

pitṛpātre nidhāyātha nyubjamuttarato nyaset |
pitṛbhyaḥ sthānamasīti nidhāya pariveṣayet || 149 ||

tatrāpi pūrvataḥ kuryādagnikāryaṃ vimatsaraḥ |
ubhābhyāmapi hastābhyāmāhṛtya pariveṣayet || 150 ||

uśantastveti taṃ darbhaṃ pāṇibhaktaṃ viśeṣataḥ |
guṇānvitaiśca śākādyairnānābhakṣyaistathaiva ca || 151 ||

annaṃ ca sadadhikṣīraṃ goghṛtaṃ śarkarānvitaṃ |
māsaṃ prīṇāti vai sarvānpitṝnityāha padmajaḥ || 152 ||

dvau māsau matsyamāṃsena trīnmāsānhāriṇena tu |
aurabhreṇātha caturaḥ śākunenātha paṃca vai || 153 ||

vārāhasya tu māṃsena ṣaṇmāsaṃ tṛptiruttamā |
saptalohasya māṃsena tathāṣṭāvājakena tu || 154 ||

pṛṣatasya tu māṃsena tṛptirmāsānnavaiva tu |
daśamāsāṃśca tṛpyaṃte varāhamahiṣāmiṣaiḥ || 155 ||

śaśakūrmayostu māṃsena māsānekādaśaiva tu |
saṃvatsaraṃ tu gavyena payasā pāyasena vā || 156 ||

saukareṇa tu tṛpyaṃte māsānpaṃcadaśaiva tu |
vārdhrīṇasasya māṃsena tṛptirdvādaśavārṣikī || 157 ||

kālaśākena cānaṃtyaṃ khaḍgamāṃsena caiva hi |
yatkiṃcinmadhunā miśraṃ gokṣīraṃ dadhipāyasam || 158 ||

dattamakṣayamityāhuḥ pitaraḥ pūrvadevatāḥ |
svādhyāyaṃ śrāvayetpitryaṃ purāṇānyakhilāni ca || 159 ||

brahmaviṣṇvarkarudrāṇāṃ stavāni vividhāni ca |
iṃdreśasomasūktāni pāvamānīśca śaktitaḥ || 160 ||

bṛhadrathaṃtaraṃ tatra jyeṣṭhasāmātha rauravaṃ |
tathaiva śāṃtikādhyāyaṃ madhubrāhmaṇameva ca || 161 ||

maṇḍalabrāhmaṇaṃ tadvatprītikāri ca yatpunaḥ |
viprāṇāmātmanaścāpi tatsarvaṃ samudīrayet || 162 ||

bhāratādhyayanaṃ kāryaṃ pitṝṇāṃ paramapriyaṃ |
bhuktavatsu ca vipreṣu bhojyatoyādikaṃ nṛpa || 163 ||

sārvavarṇikamannādyamānayetsāvadhāraṇaṃ |
samutsṛjedbhuktavatāmagrato vikirānbhuvi || 164 ||

agnidagdhāśca ye jīvā yepyadagdhāḥ kule mama |
bhūmau dattena tṛpyaṃtu tṛptā yāṃtu parāṃ gatiṃ || 165 ||

yeṣāṃ na mātā na pitā na baṃdhurna cāpi mitraṃ na tathānnamasti |
tattṝptayennaṃ bhuvi dattametatpayātu yogāya yato yataste || 166 ||

asaṃskṛtapramītānāṃ tyāgināṃ kulabhāgināṃ |
uchiṣṭabhāgadheyānāṃ darbheṣu vikirāsanaṃ || 167 ||

tṛptānjñātvodakaṃ dadyātsakṛdvikiraṇe tathā |
vipraliptamahīpṛṣṭe gośakṛnmūtravāriṇā || 168 ||

nidhāya darbhānvidhivaddakṣiṇāgrānprayatnataḥ |
sarvavarṇavidhānena piṃḍāṃśca pitṛyajñavat || 169 ||

avanejanapūrvaṃ tu nāmagotraṃ tu mānavaḥ |
uktvā puṣpādikaṃ datvā kṛtvā pratyavanejanaṃ || 170 ||

jñātvāpasavyaṃ savyena pāṇinā triḥ pradakṣiṇaṃ |
pitṛvanmātṛkaṃ kāryaṃ vidhivaddarbhapāṇinā || 171 ||

dīpaprajvālanaṃ tadvatkuryātpuṣpārcanaṃ budhaḥ |
tathā cāṃteṣu cācamya dadyāccāpaḥ sakṛtsakṛt || 172 ||

tathā puṣpākṣatānpaścādakṣayyodakameva ca |
satilaṃ nāmagotreṇa dadyācchaktyā ca dakṣiṇām || 173 ||

gobhūhiraṇyavāsāṃsi bhavyāni śayanāni ca |
dadyādyadiṣṭaṃ viprāṇāmātmanaḥ pitureva ca || 174 ||

vittaśāṭhyena rahitaḥ pitṛbhyaḥ prītimāvahet |
tataḥ svadhāvācanakaṃ viśvedeveṣu codakaṃ || 175 ||

datvāśīḥ pratigṛhṇīyāddvijebhyopi yathā budhaḥ |
aghorāḥ pitaraḥ saṃtu saṃtvityuktaḥ punardvijaiḥ || 176 ||

gotraṃ tathā varddhatāṃ tu tathetyuktaśca taiḥ punaḥ |
svastivācanakaṃ kuryātpiṃḍānuddhṛtya bhaktitaḥ || 177 ||

uccheṣaṇaṃ tu tattiṣṭhedyāvadvipravisarjanam |
tato gṛhabaliṃ kuryāditi dharmo vyavasthitaḥ || 178 ||

uccheṣaṇaṃ bhūmigatamajihmasyāśaṭhasya ca |
dāsavargasya tatpiṃḍaṃ bhāgadheyaṃ pracakṣate || 179 ||

pitṛbhirnirmitaṃ pūrvametadāpyāyanaṃ sadā |
avratānāmaputrāṇāṃ strīṇāmapi narādhipa || 180 ||

tataḥ sthānāgrataḥ sthitvā pratigṛhyāṃbupātrikāṃ |
vājevājeti ca japankuśāgreṇa visarjayet || 181 ||

bahiḥ pradakṣiṇaṃ kuryātpadānyaṣṭāvanuvrajet |
baṃdhuvargeṇa sahitaḥ putrabhāryāsamanvitaḥ || 182 ||

nivṛtya praṇipatyātha prayujyāgniṃ sa maṃtravit |
vaiśvadevaṃ prakurvīta naityikaṃ balimeva ca || 183 ||

tatastu vaiśvadevāṃte sabhṛtyasutabāṃdhavaḥ |
bhuṃjītātithisaṃyuktaḥ sarvaṃ pitṛniṣevitaṃ || 184 ||

etaccānupanītopi kuryātsarveṣu parvasu |
śrāddhaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ nāma sarvakāmaphalapradam |
bhāryāvirahitopyetatpravāsasthopi bhaktimān || 185 ||

śūdropyamaṃtrakaṃ kuryādanena vidhinā nṛpa |
tṛtīyamābhyudayikaṃ vṛddhiśrāddhaṃ vidhīyate || 186 ||

utsavānaṃdasaṃskāre yajñodvāhādimaṃgale |
mātaraḥ prathamaṃ pūjyāḥ pitarastadanaṃtaraṃ || 187 ||

tato mātāmahā rājanviśvedavāstathaiva ca |
pradakṣiṇopacāreṇa dadhyakṣataphalodakaiḥ || 188 ||

prāṅmukho nirvapetpiṃṇḍānpūrvāṃścaiva purātanān |
saṃpannamityabhyudaye dadyādarghaṃ dvayordvayoḥ || 189 ||

yugmā dvijātayaḥ pūjyā vastrākalpāṃbarādibhiḥ |
tilakāryaṃ yavaiḥ kāryaṃ tacca sarvānupūrvakaṃ || 190 ||

maṃgalyāni ca sarvāṇi vācayeddvijapuṃgavān |
evaṃ śūdropi sāmānyaṃ vṛddhiśrāddhaṃ ca sarvadā || 191 ||

namaskāreṇa maṃtreṇa kuryāddānāni vai budhaḥ |
dānaṃ pradhānaṃ śūdrasya ityāha bhagavānprabhuḥ |
dānena sarvakāmāptistasya saṃjāyate yataḥ || 192 ||

pulastya uvāca |
ekoddiṣṭaṃ tato vakṣye yaduktaṃ brahmaṇā purā |
mṛte putrairyathākāryamāśaucaṃ ca pituryadi || 1 ||

daśāhaṃ śāvamāśaucaṃ brāhmaṇasya vidhīyate |
kṣatriyeṣu daśa dve ca pakṣaṃ vaiśyeṣu caiva hi || 2 ||

śūdreṣu māsamāśaucaṃ sapiṃḍeṣu vidhīyate |
naiśamācūḍamāśaucaṃ trirātraṃ parataḥ smṛtam || 3 ||

jananepyevameva syātsarvavarṇeṣu sarvadā |
asthisaṃcayanādūrdhvamaṅgasparśo vidhīyate || 4 ||

pretāya piṃḍadānaṃ tu dvādaśāhaṃ samācaret |
pātheyaṃ tasya tatproktaṃ yataḥ prītikaraṃ mahat || 5 ||

yasmātpretapuraṃ preto dvādaśāhena nīyate |
gṛhe putrakalatraṃ ca dvādaśāhaṃ prapaśyati || 6 ||

tasmānnidheyamākāśe daśarātraṃ payastathā |
sarvadāhopaśāṃtyarthamadhvaśramavināśanam || 7 ||

tatastvekādaśāhepi dvijānekādaśaiva tu |
gotrādisūtakāṃte ca bhojayenmanujo dvijān || 8 ||

dvitīyehni punastadvadekoddiṣṭaṃ samācaret |
nāvāhanāgnaukaraṇaṃ daivahīnaṃ vidhānataḥ || 9 ||

ekaṃ pavitramekorgha ekaḥ piṃḍo vidhīyate |
upatiṣṭhatāmiti vadeddeyaṃ paścāttilodakaṃ || 10 ||

svāsti brūyādviprakare visarge cābhiramyatām |
śeṣaṃ pūrvavadatrāpi kāryaṃ vedavido viduḥ || 11 ||

anena vidhinā sarvamanumāsaṃ samācaret |
sūtakāṃte dvitīyehni śayyāṃ dadyādvilakṣaṇām || 12 ||

kāṃcanaṃ puruṣaṃ tadvatphalavastrasamanvitam |
prapūjya dvijadāṃpatyaṃ nānābharaṇabhūṣitam || 13 ||

upaveśya tu śayyāyāṃ madhuparkaṃ tato dadet |
rajatasya tu pātreṇa dadhidugdhasamanvitam || 14 ||

asthilālāṭikaṃ gṛhya sūkṣmaṃ kṛtvā vimiśrayet |
pāyayedidvajadāṃpatyaṃ pitṛbhaktyā samanvitaḥ || 15 ||

eṣa eva vidhirdṛṣṭaḥ pārvatīyairdvijotamaiḥ |
tena duṣṭā tu sā śayyā na grāhyā dvijasattamaiḥ || 16 ||

gṛhītāyāṃ tu tasyāṃ hi punaḥ saṃskāramarhati |
vede caiva purāṇe ca śayyā sarvatra garhitā || 17 ||

grahītārastu jāyante sarve narakagāminaḥ |
grathitāṃ vasujālena śayyāṃ dāṃpatyasevitām || 18 ||

ye spṛśaṃti na jānaṃtaḥ sarve narakagāminaḥ |
navaśrāddhena bhoktavyaṃ bhuktvā cāṃdrāyaṇaṃ caret || 19 ||

pitṛbhaktyā tu putrāṇāṃ kāryameva sadā bhavet |
vṛṣotsargaṃ ca kurvīta deyā ca kapilā śubhā || 20 ||

udakuṃbhaśca dātavyo bhakṣyabhojyaphalānvitaḥ |
yāvadabdaṃ naraśreṣṭha satilodakapūrvakam || 21 ||

tataḥ saṃvatsare pūrṇe sapiṃḍīkaraṇaṃ bhavet |
sapiṃḍīkaraṇādūrddhvaṃ pretaḥ pārvaṇabhugyataḥ || 22 ||

vṛddhipūrveṣu kāryeṣu gṛhasthasya bhavettataḥ |
sapiṃḍīkaraṇaṃ śrāddhaṃ devapūrvaṃ niyojayet || 23 ||

pitṝnāvāhayettatra pṛthakpretaṃ vinirdiśet |
gaṃdhodakatilairyuktaṃ kuryātpātracatuṣṭayam || 24 ||

arghyārthaṃ pitṛpātreṣu pretapātraṃ prasecayet |
tadvatsaṃkalpya caturaḥ piṃḍānpitṛparastadā || 25 ||

ye samānā iti dvābhyāmannaṃ tu vibhajettridhā |
anena vidhinā cārghyaṃ pūrvameva pradāpayet || 26 ||

tataḥ pitṛtvamāpannassa caturthastadā tvanu |
agniṣvāttādi madhye tu prāpnotyamṛtamuttamam || 27 ||

sapiṇḍīkaraṇādūrdhvaṃ pṛthaktasmai na dīyate |
pitṛṣveva ca dātavyaṃ tatpiṃḍaṃ yeṣu saṃsthitam || 28 ||

tataḥ prabhṛti saṃkrāntāvuparāgādi parvasu |
tripiṃḍamācarecchrāddhamekoddiṣṭaṃ mṛtehani || 29 ||

ekoddiṣṭaṃ parityajya mṛtāhe yaḥ samācaret |
sa daivaṃ pitṛhā sa syāttathā bhrātṛvināśakaḥ || 30 ||

mṛtāhe pārvaṇaṃ kurvannadho yāti sa mānavaḥ |
saṃpṛkte svargatī bhāve pretamokṣo yato bhavet || 31 ||

āmaśrāddhaṃ tadā kuryādvidhijñaḥ śrāddhadastataḥ |
tenāgnaukaraṇaṃ kuryātpiṃḍāṃstenaiva nirvapet || 32 ||

tribhiḥ sapiṃḍīkaraṇaṃ māsaikye tritaye tathā |
yadā prāpsyati kālena tadā mucyeta baṃdhanāt || 33 ||

muktopi lepabhāgitvaṃ prāpnoti kuśamārjanāt |
lepabhājaścaturthādyāstrayaḥ syuḥ piṃḍabhāginaḥ || 34 ||

piṇḍadaḥ saptamasteṣāṃ sapiṃḍāḥ saptapūruṣāḥ |
bhīṣma uvāca |
kathaṃ havyāni deyāni kavyāni ca janairiha || 35 ||

gṛhṇaṃti pitṛloke vā prāyaḥ ke kairnigadyate |
yadi martye dvijo bhuṃkte hūyate yadi vānale || 36 ||

śubhāśubhātmakāḥ pretāstadannaṃ bhuṃjate katham |
pulastya uvāca |
vasusvarūpāḥ pitaro rudrāścaiva pitāmahāḥ || 37 ||

prapitāmahāstathādityā ityeṣā vaidikī śrutiḥ |
nāmagotraṃ pitṝṇāṃ tu prāpakaṃ havyakavyayoḥ || 38 ||

śrāddhasya mantratastatvamupalabhyeta bhaktitaḥ |
agniṣvāttādayasteṣāmādhipatye vyavasthitāḥ || 39 ||

nāmagotrāstadā deśā bhavaṃtyudbhavatāmapi |
prāṇinaḥ prīṇayatyetadarhaṇaṃ samupāgataṃ || 40 ||

divyo yadi pitā mātā guruḥ karmānuyogataḥ |
tasyānnamamṛtaṃ bhūtvā divyattvepyanugacchati || 41 ||

daityatve bhogarūpeṇa paśutvepi tṛṇaṃ bhavet |
śrāddhānnaṃ vāyurūpeṇa nāgatvepyupatiṣṭhati || 42 ||

pānaṃ bhavati yakṣatve rākṣasatve tathāmiṣaṃ |
dānavatve tathā pānaṃ pretatve rudhirodakam || 43 ||

manuṣyatvennapānādi nānābhogavatāṃ bhavet |
ratiśaktistriyaḥ kānte'nyeṣāṃ bhojanaśaktitā || 44 ||

dānaśaktiḥ sa vibhavā rūpamārogyameva ca |
śrāddhapuṣpamidaṃ proktaṃ phalaṃ brahmasamāgamaḥ || 45 ||

āyuḥ putrāndhanaṃ vidyāṃ svargaṃ mokṣaṃ sukhāni ca |
prayacchanti tathā rājyaṃ prītāḥ pitṛgaṇā nṛpa || 46 ||

śrūyate ca purā mokṣaṃ prāptāḥ kauśikasūnavaḥ |
paṃcabhirjanmasaṃbaṃdhaiḥ prāptā brahmaparaṃ padam || 47 ||

bhīṣma uvāca |
kathaṃ kauśikadāyādāḥ prāptā yogamanuttamam |
paṃcabhirjanmasaṃbandhaiḥ kathaṃ karmakṣayo bhavet || 48 ||

pulastya uvāca |
kauśiko nāma dharmātmā kurukṣetre mahānṛṣiḥ |
nāmataḥ karmatastasya putrāṇāṃ tannibodha me || 49 ||

svasṛpaḥ krodhano hiṃsraḥ piśunaḥ kavireva ca |
vāgduṣṭaḥ pitṛvartī ca gargaśiṣyāstadābhavan || 50 ||

pitaryuparate teṣāmabhūddurbhikṣamulbaṇaṃ |
anāvṛṣṭiśca mahatī sarvalokabhayaṃkarī || 51 ||

gargādeśādvane dogdhrīṃ rakṣaṃti ca tapodhanāḥ |
khādāmaḥ kapilāmetāṃ vayaṃ kṣutpīḍitā bhṛśaṃ || 52 ||

iti ciṃtayatāṃ pāpaṃ laghuḥ prāha tadānujaḥ |
yadyavaśyamiyaṃ vadhyā śrāddharūpeṇa yojyatāṃ || 53 ||

śrāddhe niyojyamānāyāṃ pāpaṃ naśyati no dhruvaṃ |
evaṃ kurvityanujñātaḥ pitṛvartī tadānujaiḥ || 54 ||

cakre samāhitaḥ śrāddhamupayujyātha tāṃ punaḥ |
dvau daive bhrātaro kṛtvā pitrye trīṃścāparānkramāt || 55 ||

tathaikamatithiṃ kṛtvā śrāddhadaḥ svayameva tu |
cakāra maṃtravacchrāddhaṃ smaranpitṛparāyaṇaḥ || 56 ||

tadā gatvā viśaṃkāste gurave ca nyavedayan |
vyāghreṇa nihatā dhenurvatsoyaṃ pratigṛhyatāṃ || 57 ||

evaṃ sā bhakṣitā dhenuḥ saptabhistaistapodhanaiḥ |
vaidikaṃ balamāśritya krūre karmaṇi nirbhayāḥ || 58 ||

tataḥ kāle praṇaṣṭāste vyādhā daśa purebhavan |
jātismaratvaṃ prāptāste pitṛbhāvena bhāvitāḥ || 59 ||

tatra vijñāya vairāgyaṃ prāṇānutsṛjya dharmataḥ |
lokairavīkṣyamāṇāste tīrthāṃtenaśanena tu || 60 ||

saṃjātā mṛgarūpāste sapta kālaṃjare girau |
prāptavijñānayogāste tatyajustāṃ nijāṃ tanum || 61 ||

mamruḥ prapatanenātha jātavairāgyamānasāḥ |
mānase cakravrākāste saṃjātāḥ saptayoginaḥ || 62 ||

nāmataḥ karmataḥ sarve sumanāḥ kusumovasuḥ |
cittadarśī sudarśī ca jñātā jñānasya pāragaḥ || 63 ||

jyeṣṭhānuraktāḥ śreṣṭhāste saptaite yogapāvanāḥ |
yogabhraṣṭāstrayasteṣāṃ babhūvuścalacetasaḥ || 64 ||

dṛṣṭvā vibhrājamānaṃ tamaṇuhaṃ strībhiranvitam |
krīḍaṃtaṃ vividhairbhogairmahābalaparākramam || 65 ||

pañcālānvayasaṃbhūtaṃ prabhūtabalavāhanam |
rājyakāmobhavattvekasteṣāṃ madhye jalaukasām || 66 ||

pitṛvartī ca yo vipraḥ śrāddhakṛtpitṛvatsalaḥ |
aparau maṃtriṇau dṛṣṭvā prabhūtabalavāhanau || 67 ||

maṃtritve cakratuścecchāmasminmartyau dvijottamau |
vibhrājaputrastvekobhūdbrahmadatta iti smṛtaḥ || 68 ||

maṃtriputrau tathā caiva puṃḍarīkasubālakau |
brahmadattobhiṣiktastu kāṃpilye nagarottame || 69 ||

paṃcālarājo vikrāṃtaḥ śrāddhakṛtpitṛvatsalaḥ |
yogavitsarvajaṃtūnāṃ cittavettābhavattadā || 70 ||

tasya rājñobhavadbhāryā sudevasyātmajā tadā |
sannatirnāma vikhyātā kapilāyābhavatpurā || 71 ||

pitṛkārye niyuktatvādabhavadbrahmavādinī |
tayā cakāra sahitaḥ sa rājyaṃ rājanaṃdanaḥ || 72 ||

kadācidgataudyānaṃ tayā saha sa pārthivaḥ |
dadarśa kīṭamithunamanaṃgakalahānvitam || 73 ||

pipīlikāmadhovaktrāṃ purataḥ kīṭakāmukaḥ |
paṃcabāṇābhitaptāṃgaḥ sagadgadamuvāca ha || 74 ||

na tvayā sadṛśī loke kāminī vidyate kvacit |
madhye kṣīṇātijaghanā bṛhadvaktrātigāminī || 75 ||

suvarṇavarṇasadṛśī sadvaktrā cāruhāsinī |
ālakṣyate ca vadanaṃ guḍaśarkaravatsalaṃ || 76 ||

bhokṣyase mayi bhukte tvaṃ snāsi snāte tathā mayi |
proṣite mayi dīnā tvaṃ kruddhe ca bhayacaṃcalā || 77 ||

kimarthaṃ vada kalyāṇi sadādhovadanāsthitā |
sā tamāha jvalatkopā kimālapasi re śaṭha || 78 ||

tvayā modakacūrṇaṃ tu māṃ vihāyāpi bhakṣitam |
prādāstvaṃ tadatikramya māmanyasyai samanmathaḥ || 79 ||

pipīlaka uvāca |
tvatsādṛśyānmayā dattamanyasyai varavarṇini |
tadekamaparādhaṃ me kṣaṃtumarhasi bhāmini || 80 ||

naivaṃ punaḥ kariṣyāmi tyaja kopaṃ ca sustani |
spṛśāmi pādau satyena praṇatasya prasīda me || 81 ||

ruṣṭāyāṃ tvayi suśroṇi mṛtyurme purato bhavet |
tuṣṭāyāṃ tvayi vāmoru pūrṇāḥ sarvamanorathāḥ || 82 ||

pūrṇacaṃdropamaṃ vaktraṃ svādemṛtarasopamam |
nirbharaṃ piba suśroṇi kāmāsaktasya me sadā || 83 ||

etanmatvā śubhe kāryā sarvadā tu kṛpā mayi |
iti sā vacanaṃ śrutvā prasannā cābhavattataḥ || 84 ||

ātmānamarpayāmāsa mohanāya pipīlikā |
brahmadattopi tatsarvaṃ jñātvā sasmayamāhasat || 85 ||

sarvasatvarutajñānī prabhāvātpūrvakarmaṇaḥ |
bhīṣma uvāca |
kathaṃ sarvarutajñobhūdbrahmadatto narādhipaḥ || 86 ||

taccāpi cābhavatkutra cakravākacatuṣṭayaṃ |
tanme kathaya sarvajña kule kasya ca suvratam || 87 ||

pulastya uvāca |
tasminneva pure jātāścakravākā atho nṛpa || 88 ||

vṛddhadvijasya dāyādā viprā jātismarā budhāḥ |
dhṛtimāṃstattvadarśī ca vidyāvarṇastapodhikaḥ || 89 ||

nāmataḥ karmataścaiva sudaridrasya te sutāḥ |
tapase buddhirabhavatteṣāṃ vai dvijajanmanāṃ || 90 ||

yāsyāmaḥ paramāṃ siddhimūcuste dvijasattamāḥ |
tatteṣāṃ vacanaṃ śrutvā sudaridro mahātapāḥ || 91 ||

uvāca dīnayā vācā kimetaditi putrakāḥ |
adharma eṣa vaḥ putrā pitā tānityuvāca ha || 92 ||

vṛddhaṃ pitaramutsṛjya daridraṃ vanavāsinam |
kva nu dharmotra bhavitā māṃ tyaktvā gatimeva ca || 93 ||

ūcuste kalpitā vṛttistava tāta vacaśśṛṇu |
vratametatpurā rājñaḥ sa te dāsyati puṣkalaṃ || 94 ||

dhanaṃ grāma sahasrāṇi prabhāte paṭhatastava |
kurukṣetre tu ye viprā vyādhā daśapure tu ye || 95 ||

kālaṃjare mṛgā bhūtāścakravākāstu mānase |
ityuktvā pitaraṃ jagmuste vanaṃ tapase punaḥ || 96 ||

vṛddhopi sa dvijo rājanjagāma svārthasiddhaye |
aṇuho nāma vaibhrājaḥ pañcālādhipatiḥ purā || 97 ||

putrārthī devadeveśaṃ padmayoniṃ pitāmaham |
ārādhayāmāsa vibhuṃ tīvravrataparāyaṇaḥ || 98 ||

tataḥ kālena mahatā tuṣṭastasya pitāmahaḥ |
varaṃ varaya bhadraṃ te hṛdayebhīpsitaṃ nṛpa || 99 ||

aṇuha uvāca |
putraṃ me dehi deveśa mahābalaparākramam |
pāragaṃ sarvavidyānāṃ dhārmikaṃ yogināṃ varam || 100 ||

sarvasatvarutajñaṃ me dehi yoginamātmajam |
evamastviti viśvātmā tamāha parameśvaraḥ || 101 ||

paśyatāṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ tatraivāṃtaradhīyata |
tataḥ sa tasya putrobhūdbrahmadattaḥ pratāpavān || 102 ||

sarvasatvānukaṃpī ca sarvasatvabalādhikaḥ |
sarvasatvarutajñaśca sarvasatveśvareśvaraḥ || 103 ||

atha satvena yogātmā sa pipīlakamāgataḥ |
yatra tatkīṭamithunaṃ ramamāṇamavasthitam || 104 ||

tataḥ sā sannatirdṛṣṭvā prahasaṃtaṃ suvismitaṃ |
kimapyāśaṃkamānā sā tamapṛcchannareśvaram || 105 ||

sannatiruvāca |
akasmādatihāsoyaṃ kimarthamabhavannṛpa |
hāsyahetuṃ na jānāmi yadakāle kṛtaṃ tvayā || 106 ||

avadadrājaputrosau taṃ pipīlikabhāṣitam |
rāgavadvirasotpannametaddhāsyaṃ varānane || 107 ||

na cānyatkāraṇaṃ kiṃciddhāsyahetuḥ śucismite |
na sāmanyatataṃ devī prāhālīkamidaṃ tava || 108 ||

ahameveha hasitā na jīviṣye tvayādhunā |
kathaṃ pipīlikālāpaṃ martyo vetti surādṛte || 109 ||

tasmāttvayāhamevādya hasitā kimataḥ param |
tato niruttaro rājā jijñāsustadvaco hareḥ || 110 ||

āsthāya niyamaṃ tasthau saptarātramakalmaṣaḥ |
svapnānte prāha taṃ brahmā prabhāte paryaṭanpuram || 111 ||

vṛddhadvijottamādvākyaṃ sarvaṃ jñāsyati te priyā |
ityuktvāṃtardadhe brahmā prabhāte ca nṛpaḥ purāt || 112 ||

nirgacchanmantrisahitaḥ sabhāryo vṛddhamagrataḥ |
gadaṃtaṃ vipramāyāṃtaṃ vṛddhaṃ ca sa dadarśa ha || 113 ||

brāhmaṇa uvāca |
ye vipramukhyāḥ kurujāṃgaleṣu dāśāstathā dāśapure mṛgāśca |
kālaṃjare sapta ca cakravākā ye mānase tetra vasaṃti siddhāḥ || 114 ||

ityākarṇya vacastasya sa papāta śucānvitaḥ |
jātismaratvamagamattau ca maṃtrivarātmajau || 115 ||

kāmaśāstrapraṇetā tu bābhravyaḥ sa tu bālakaḥ |
paṃcāla iti lokeṣu viśrutaḥ sarvaśāstravit || 116 ||

puṃḍarīkopi dharmātmā vedaśāstrapravartakaḥ |
bhūtvā jātismarau śokātpatitāvagratastathā || 117 ||

hā vayaṃ karmavibhraṣṭāḥ kāmataḥ karmabaṃdhanāt |
evaṃ vilapya bahuśastrayaste yogapāragāḥ || 118 ||

vismayācchrāddhamāhāmyamabhinaṃdya punaḥ punaḥ |
sa tu tasmai dhanaṃ dattvā prabhūtagrāmasaṃyutam || 119 ||

visṛjya brāhmaṇaṃ taṃ ca vṛddhaṃ dhanamadānvitam |
ātmīyaṃ nṛpatiḥ putraṃ nṛpalakṣaṇasaṃyutam || 120 ||

viṣvaksenābhidhānaṃ ca rājārājyebhyaṣecayat |
mānase salile sarve tataste yogināṃ varāḥ || 121 ||

brahmadattādayastasminpitṛbhaktā vimatsarāḥ |
sannatiścābhavaddhṛṣṭā mayaiva tava darśitam || 122 ||

rājanyogaphalaṃ sarvaṃ yadetadabhilakṣyate |
tatheti prāha rājāpi purastādabhinaṃdayan || 123 ||
tvatprasādādidaṃ sarvaṃ mayaivaṃ prāpyate phalam || 124 ||

tataste yogamāsthāya sarva eva vanaukasaḥ |
brahmaraṃdhreṇa paramaṃ padamāpustapobalāt || 125 ||

evamāyurdhanaṃ vidyāṃ svargamokṣasukhāni ca |
prayacchaṃti sutaṃ rājyaṃ nṛṇāṃ tuṣṭāḥ pitāmahāḥ || 126 ||

idaṃ ca pitṛmāhātmyaṃ brahmadattasya vai nṛpa |
dvijebhyaḥ śrāvayedvidvānśṛṇoti paṭhatepi vā |
kalpakoṭiśataṃ sāgraṃ brahmaloke mahīyate || 127 ||
iti śrīpādmapurāṇe prathame sṛṣṭikhaṃḍe pitṛmāhātmyakathanaṃnāma daśamo'dhyāyaḥ || 10 ||

bhīṣma uvāca |
kasminvāsarabhāge tu śrāddhī śrāddhaṃ samācaret |
tīrtheṣu keṣu vai śrāddhaṃ kṛtaṃ bahuphalaṃ dvija || 1 ||

pulastya uvāca |
tīrthaṃ tu puṣkaraṃ nāma yattu śreṣṭhatamaṃ smṛtam |
sarveṣāṃ dvijamukhyānāṃ manorathamiva sthitam || 2 ||

tatra dattaṃ hutaṃ japtamanantaṃ bhavati dhruvam |
pitṝṇāṃ vallabhaṃ nityamṛṣīṇāṃ paramaṃ matam || 3 ||

naṃdātha lalitā tadvattīrthaṃ māyāpurī śubhā |
tathā mitrapadaṃ rājaṃstataḥ kedāramuttamam || 4 ||

gaṃgāsāgaramityāhuḥ sarvatīrthamayaṃ śubham |
tīrthaṃ brahmasarastadvacchatadrusalilaṃ śubham || 5 ||

tīrthaṃ tu naimiṣaṃ nāma sarvatīrthaphalapradam |
gaṃgodbhedastu gomatyāṃ yatrodbhūtaḥ sanātanaḥ || 6 ||

tathā yajñavarāhastu devadevaśca śūladhṛk |
yatra tatkāṃcanaṃ dānamaṣṭādaśabhujo haraḥ || 7 ||

nemistu dharmacakrasya śīrṇā yatrābhavatpurā |
tadetannaimiśāraṇyaṃ sarvatīrthaniṣevitam || 8 ||

devadevasya tatrāpi varāhasya ca darśanam |
yaḥ prayāti sa pūtātmā nārāyaṇapuraṃ vrajet || 9 ||

kokāmukhaṃ paraṃ tīrthamindramārgopi lakṣyate |
athāpi pitṛtīrthaṃ tu brahmaṇovyaktajanmanaḥ || 10 ||

puṣkarāraṇyasaṃsthosau yatra devaḥ pitāmahaḥ |
viriṃcidarśanaṃ śreṣṭhamapavargaphalapradam || 11 ||

kṛtaṃ nāma mahāpuṇyaṃ sarvapāpaniṣūdanam |
yatrādyo nārasiṃhastu svayameva janārdanaḥ || 12 ||

tīrthamikṣumatīnāma pitṝṇāṃ ca śubhāvahā |
tuṣyanti pitaro nityaṃ gaṃgāyamunasaṃgame || 13 ||

kurukṣetraṃ mahāpuṇyaṃ yatra mārgopi lakṣyate |
adyāpi pitṛtīrthaṃ tu sarvakāmaphalapradam || 14 ||

nīlakaṇṭhamiti khyātaṃ pitṛtīrthaṃ narādhipa |
tathā bhadrasaraḥ puṇyaṃ saro mānasameva ca || 15 ||

maṃdākinī tathā'cchodā vipāśā ca sarasvatī |
sarvamitrapadaṃ tadvadvaidyanāthaṃ mahāphalam || 16 ||

kṣiprā nadī tathā puṇyā tathā kālañjaraṃ śubham |
tīrthodbhedaṃ harodbhedaṃ garbhabhedaṃ mahālayam || 17 ||

bhadreśvaraṃ viṣṇupadaṃ narmadā dvārameva ca |
gayāpiṃḍapradānena samānyāhurmaharṣayaḥ || 18 ||

etāni pitṛtīrthāni sarvapāpaharāṇi ca |
smaraṇādapi lokānāṃ kimu śrāddhapradāyinām || 19 ||

oṃkāraṃ pitṛtīrthaṃ tu kāverīkapilodakam |
saṃbhedaścaṇḍavegāyāṃ tathaivāmarakaṃṭakam || 20 ||

kurukṣetrāccadviguṇaṃ tasminsnānādikaṃ bhavet |
śuklatīrthaṃ tu vikhyātaṃ tīrthaṃ someśvaraṃ param || 21 ||

sarvavyādhiharaṃpuṇyaṃphalaṃkoṭiguṇādhikam |
śrāddhedānetathāhomesvādhyāyecāpisannidhau || 22 ||

kāyāvārohaṇaṃ nāma devadevasya śūlinaḥ |
avatāraṃ rocamānaṃ brāhmaṇāvasathe śubhe || 23 ||

jātaṃ tatsumahāpuṇyaṃ tathā carmaṇvatī nadī |
śūlatāpī payoṣṇī ca payoṣṇīsaṃgamastathā || 24 ||

mahauṣadhī cāraṇā ca nāgatīrthapravarttinī |
mahāveṇā nadī puṇyā mahāśālastathaiva ca || 25 ||

gomatī varuṇā tadvattīrthaṃ hautāśanaṃ param |
bhairavaṃ bhṛgutuṃgaṃ ca gaurītīrthamanuttamam || 26 ||

tīrthaṃ vaināyakaṃ nāma vastreśvaramanuttamam |
tathā pāpaharaṃ nāma puṇyā vetravatī nadī || 27 ||

mahārudraṃ mahāliṃgaṃ daśārṇā ca mahānadī |
śatarudrā śatāhvā ca tathā pitṛpadaṃ puram || 28 ||

aṃgāravāhikā tadvannadau dvau śoṇaghargharau |
kālikā ca nadī puṇyā pitarā ca nadī śubhā || 29 ||

etāni pitṛtīrthāni śasyaṃte snānadānayoḥ |
śrāddhameteṣu yaddattaṃ tadanaṃtaphalaṃ smṛtam || 30 ||

śatāvaṭā nadī jvālā śaradvī ca nadī tathā |
dvārakā kṛṣṇatīrthaṃ ca tathā hyudaksarasvatī || 31 ||

nadī mālavatī nāma tathā ca girikarṇikā |
dhūtapāpaṃ tathā tīrthaṃ samudre dakṣiṇe tathā || 32 ||

gokarṇo gajakarṇaśca tathā cakranadī śubhā |
śrīśailaṃ śākatīrthaṃ ca nārasiṃhamataḥ param || 33 ||

maheṃdraṃ ca tathā puṇyā puṇyā cāpi mahānadī |
eteṣvapi sadā śrāddhamanaṃtaphaladaṃ smṛtam || 34 ||

darśanādapi puṇyāni sadyaḥ pāpaharāṇi vai |
tuṃgabhadrā nadī puṇyā tathā cakrarathīti ca || 35 ||

bhīmeśvaraṃ kṛṣṇaveṇā kāverī cāṃjanā nadī |
nadī godāvarī puṇyā trisaṃdhyā pūrṇamuttamam || 36 ||

tīrthaṃ traiyaṃbakaṃ nāma sarvatīrthanamaskṛtam |
yatrāste bhagavānbhīmaḥ svayameva trilocanaḥ || 37 ||

śrāddhameteṣu sarveṣu dattaṃ koṭiguṇaṃ bhavet |
smaraṇādapi pāpāni vrajaṃti śatadhā nṛpa || 38 ||

śrīparṇā ca nadī puṇyā vyāsatīrthamanuttamam |
tathā matsyanadī kārā śivadhārā tathaiva ca || 39 ||

bhavatīrthaṃ ca vikhyātaṃ puṇyatīrthaṃ ca śāśvatam |
puṇyaṃ rāmeśvaraṃ tadvadveṇāpuramalaṃpuram || 40 ||

aṃgārakaṃ ca vikhyātamātmadarśamalaṃbuṣam |
vatsavrāteśvaraṃ tadvattathāgokāmukhaṃ param || 41 ||

govarddhanaṃ hariścaṃdraṃ puraścandraṃ pṛthūdakam |
sahasrākṣaṃ hiraṇyākṣaṃ tathā ca kadalīnadī || 42 ||

nāmadheyāni ca tathā tathā saumitrisaṃgatam |
iṃdranīlaṃ mahānādaṃ tathā ca priyamelakam || 43 ||

etānyapi sadā śrāddhe praśastānyadhikāni ca |
eteṣu sarvadevānāṃ sāṃnidhyaṃ paṭhyate yataḥ || 44 ||

dānameteṣu sarveṣu bhavetkoṭiśatādhikam |
bāhudā ca nadī puṇyā tathā siddhavaṭaṃ śubham || 45 ||

tīrthaṃ pāśupataṃ caiva nadī paryaṭikā tathā |
śrāddhameteṣu sarveṣu dattaṃ koṭiśatottaram || 46 ||

tathaiva paṃcatīrthaṃ ca yatra godāvarī nadī |
yutā liṃgasahasreṇa savyetara jalāvahā || 47 ||

jāmadagnyasya tattīrthaṃ modāyatanamuttamam |
pratīkasya bhayātsiddhā yatra godāvarī nadī || 48 ||

tīrthaṃ taddhavyakavyānāmapsarogaṇasaṃyutam |
śrāddhāgni dānakāryaṃ ca tatra koṭiśatādhikam || 49 ||

tathā sahasraliṃgaṃ ca rāghaveśvaramuttamam |
sendrakālā nadī puṇyā tatra śakro gataḥ purā || 50 ||

nihatya namuciṃ mitraṃ tapasā svargamāptavān |
tatra dattaṃ naraiḥ śrāddhamanaṃtaphaladaṃ bhavet || 51 ||

puṣkaraṃ nāma vai tīrthaṃ śālagrāmaṃ tathaiva ca |
śoṇapātaśca vikhyāto yatra vaiśvānarāśayaḥ || 52 ||

tīrthaṃ sārasvataṃ caiva svāmitīrthaṃ tathaiva ca |
malaṃdarā nadī puṇyā kauśikī caṃdrakā tathā || 53 ||

vidarbhā cātha vegā ca payoṣṇī prāṅmukhā parā |
kāverī cottarāṃgā ca tathā jālaṃdharo giriḥ || 54 ||

eteṣu śrāddhatīrtheṣu śrāddhamānaṃtyamaśnute |
lohadaṃḍaṃ tathā tīrthaṃ citrakūṭastathaiva ca || 55 ||

divyaṃ sarvatra gaṃgāyāstathā nadyāstaṭaṃ śubham |
kubjāmrakaṃ tathā tīrthamurvaśīpulinaṃ tathā || 56 ||

saṃsāramocanaṃ tīrthaṃ tathaiva ṛṇamocanam |
eteṣu pitṛtīrtheṣu śrāddhamānaṃtyamaśnute || 57 ||

aṭṭahāsaṃ tathā tīrthaṃ gautameśvarameva ca |
tathā vasiṣṭhatīrthaṃ ca bhārataṃ ca tataḥ param || 58 ||

brahmāvartaṃ kuśāvartaṃ haṃsatīrthaṃ tathaiva ca |
piṃḍārakaṃ ca vikhyātaṃ śaṃkhoddhāraṃ tathaiva ca || 59 ||

bhāṃḍeśvaraṃ bilvakaṃ ca nīlaparvatameva ca |
tathā ca badarītīrthaṃ sarvatīrtheśvareśvaram || 60 ||

vasudhārāhvayaṃ tīrthaṃ rāmatīrthaṃ tathaiva ca |
jayaṃtī vijayā caiva śuklatīrthaṃ tathaiva ca || 61 ||

eṣu śrāddhapradātāraḥ prayāṃti paramaṃ padam |
tīrthaṃ mātṛgṛhaṃ nāma karavīrapuraṃ tathā || 62 ||

saptagodāvarīnāma sarvatīrtheśvareśvaram |
tatra śrāddhaṃ pradātavyamanaṃtaphalamīpsubhiḥ || 63 ||

kīkaṭeṣu gayā puṇyā puṇyaṃ rājagṛhaṃ vanam |
cyavanasyāśramaṃ puṇyaṃ nadī puṇyā punaḥpunā || 64 ||

viṣayārādhanaṃ puṇyaṃ nadī yā tu punaḥpunā |
yatra gāthā vicarati brahmaṇā parikīrtitā || 65 ||

eṣṭavyā bahavaḥ putrā yadyekopi gayāṃ vrajet |
yajeta vāśvamedhena nīlaṃ vā vṛṣamutsṛjet || 66 ||

eṣā gāthā vicarati tīrtheṣvāyataneṣu ca |
sarve manuṣyā rājeṃdra kīrttayaṃtaḥ samāgatāḥ || 67 ||

kimasmākaṃ kule kaścidgayāṃ yāsyati yaḥ sutaḥ |
prīṇayiṣyati tāngatvā saptapūrvāṃstathāparān || 68 ||

mātāmahānāmapyevaṃ śrutireṣā ciraṃtanī |
gaṃgāyāmasthinicayaṃ gatvā kṣepsyati yaḥ sutaḥ || 69 ||

tilaiḥ saptāṣṭabhirvāpi dāsyate ca jalāṃjalim |
araṇyatritaye vāpi piṃḍadānaṃ kariṣyati || 70 ||

prathamaṃ puṣkarāraṇye naimiṣe tadanaṃtaraṃ |
dharmāraṇyaṃ punaḥ prāpya śrāddhaṃ bhaktyā pradāsyati || 71 ||

gayāyāṃ dharmapṛṣṭhe vā sarasi brahmaṇastathā |
gayāśīrṣavaṭe caiva pitṝṇāṃ dattamakṣayam || 72 ||

vrajankṛtvā nivāpaṃ yastvadhvānaṃ parisarpati |
narakasthānpitṝnsopi svargaṃ nayati satvaraṃ || 73 ||

kule tasya na rājeṃdra preto bhavati kaścana |
pretatvaṃ mokṣabhāvaṃ ca piṃḍadānācca gacchati || 74 ||

eko munistāmrakarāgrahasto hyāmreṣu mūle salilaṃ dadāti |
āmrāśca siktāḥ pitaraśca tṛptā ekā kriyā dvyarthakarī prasiddhā || 75 ||

gayāyāṃ piṇḍadānasya nānyaddānaṃ viśiṣyate |
ekena piṃḍadānena tṛptāste mokṣagāminaḥ || 76 ||

dhānyapradānaṃ pravaraṃ vadaṃti vasupradānaṃ ca tathāmunīṃdrāḥ |
gayā sutīrtheṣu naraiḥ pradattaṃ taddharmahetuṃ pravaraṃ vadaṃti || 77 ||

sarvātmanā surucinā mahācala mahānadī |
ye tu paśyaṃti tāṃ gatvā mānase dakṣiṇottare || 78 ||

praṇamya dvijamukhyebhyaḥ prāptaṃ tairjanmanaḥ phalaṃ |
yadyadicchati vai martyastattadāpnotyasaṃśayam || 79 ||

eṣa tūddeśataḥ proktastīrthānāṃ sagraho mayā |
vāgīśopi na śaknoti vistarātkimu mānuṣaḥ || 80 ||

satyaṃ tīrthaṃ dayā tīrthaṃ tīrthamindriyanigrahaḥ |
varṇāśramāṇāṃ gehepi tīrthaṃ śama udāhṛtam || 81 ||

yeṣu tīrtheṣu yacchrāddhaṃ tatkoṭiguṇamiṣyate |
gayāyāṃ yattu vai śrāddhaṃ tacchrāddhamapavargadam || 82 ||

yasmāttasmātprayatnena tīrthe śrāddhaṃ vidhīyate |
prātaḥkālo muhūrtāṃstrīnsaṃgavastāvadeva tu || 83 ||

madhyāhnastrimuhūrtaḥ syādaparāhṇastataḥ param |
sāyāhnastrimuhūrtaḥ syācchrāddhaṃ tatra na kārayet || 84 ||

rākṣasī nāma sā velā garhitā sarvakarmasu |
ahno muhūrtā vyākhyātā daśapaṃca ca sarvadā || 85 ||

tatrāṣṭamo muhūrto yaḥ sa kālaḥ kutapaḥ smṛtaḥ |
madhyāhnātsarvadā yasmānmaṃdī bhavati bhāskaraḥ || 86 ||

tasmādanaṃtaphaladastatrāraṃbho viśiṣyate |
khaḍgapātraṃ ca kutapastathā naipālakaṃbalam || 87 ||

rukmaṃ darbhāstilā gāvo dauhitraścāṣṭamaḥ smṛtaḥ |
pāpaṃ kutsitamityāhustasya tattāpakāriṇaḥ || 88 ||

aṣṭāvete yatastasmātkutapā iti viśrutāḥ |
ūrdhvaṃ muhurttātkutapānmahūrttaṃ ca catuṣṭayam || 89 ||

muhūrttapaṃcakaṃ caiva svadhāvācanamiṣyate |
viṣṇudehasamudbhūtāḥ kuśāḥ kṛṣṇatilāstathā || 90 ||

śrāddhasya lakṣaṇaṃ kālamiti prāhurmanīṣiṇaḥ |
tilodakāṃjalirdeyo jalāṃte tīrthavāsibhiḥ || 91 ||

sadarbhahastenaikena gṛhe śrāddhaṃ gamiṣyati |
puṇyaṃ pavitramāyuṣyaṃ sarvapāpavināśanam || 92 ||

brahmaṇā caiva kathitaṃ tīrthaśrāddhānukīrtanam |
śṛṇoti yaḥ paṭhedvāpi śrīmānsaṃjāyate naraḥ || 93 ||

śrāddhakāle ca vaktavyaṃ tathā tīrthanivāsibhiḥ |
sarvapāpopaśāṃntyarthamalakṣmīnāśanaṃ mataṃ || 94 ||

idaṃ pavitraṃ yaśaso nidhānamidaṃ mahāpātakanāśanaṃ ca |
brahmārkarudrairabhipūjitaṃ ca śrāddhasya māhātmyamuśaṃti tajjñāḥ || 95 ||

bhīṣma uvāca |
somavaṃśaḥ kathaṃ jātaḥ kathayātra viśārada |
tadvaṃśe keturājāno babhūvuḥ kīrtivarddhanāḥ || 1 ||

pulastya uvāca |
ādiṣṭo brahmaṇā pūrvamatriḥ sargavidhau purā |
anaṃtaraṃ nāma tapaḥ sṛṣṭyarthaṃ taptavānvibhuḥ || 2 ||

yadānaṃdakaraṃ brahma bhagavankleśanāśanaṃ |
brahmarudrendrasūryāṇāmabhyaṃtaramatīṃdriyaṃ || 3 ||

śāntiṃ kṛtvātmamanasā tadatriḥ saṃyame sthitaḥ |
māhātmyaṃ tapaso vāpi paramānaṃdakārakaṃ || 4 ||

yasmādvaṃśapatiḥ sārddhaṃ samaye tadadhiṣṭhitaḥ |
taṃ dṛṣṭvācaṣṭa somena tasmātsomobhavadvibhuḥ || 5 ||

atha susrāva netrābhyāṃ jalaṃ tatrātrisaṃbhavam |
dyotayadviśvamakhilaṃ jyotsnayā sacarācaram || 6 ||

taddiśo jagṛhustatra strīrūpeṇāsahṛcchayāḥ |
garbho bhūtvodare tāsāṃ sthitaḥ sopyatrisaṃbhavaḥ || 7 ||

āśāśca mumucurgarbhamaśaktā dhāraṇe tataḥ |
samādāyātha taṃ garbhamekīkṛtya caturmukhaḥ || 8 ||

yuvānamakarodbrahmā sarvāyudhadharaṃ naram |
syaṃdanetha sahastena vedaśaktimaye prabhuḥ || 9 ||

āropya lokamanayadātmīyaṃ sa pitāmahaḥ |
tato brahmarṣibhiḥ proktaṃ hyasmatsvāmībhavatvayam || 10 ||

ṛṣibhirdevagaṃdharvairapsarobhistathaiva ca |
stūyamānasya tasyābhūdadhikaṃ mahadaṃtaram || 11 ||

tejovitānādabhavadbhuvi divyauṣadhīgaṇaḥ |
taddīptiradhikā tasmādrātrau bhavati sarvadā || 12 ||

tenauṣadhīśaḥ somobhūddvijeṣvapi hi gaṇyate |
vedadhāmā rasaścāyaṃ yadidaṃ maṃḍalaṃ śubham || 13 ||

kṣīyate varddhate caiva śukle kṛṣṇe ca sarvadā |
viṃśatiṃ ca tathā sapta dakṣaḥ prācetaso dadau || 14 ||

rūpalāvaṇyasaṃyuktāstasmai kanyāḥ suvarcasaḥ |
tataḥ śaktisahasrāṇāṃ sahasrāṇi daśaiva tu || 15 ||

tapaścakāra śītāṃśurviṣṇudhyānaikatatparaḥ |
tatastuṣṭaśca bhagavāṃstasmai nārāyaṇo hariḥ || 16 ||

varaṃ vṛṇīṣva covāca paramātmā janārdanaḥ |
tato vavre varaṃ somaḥ śakraloke yajāmyaham || 17 ||

pratyakṣameva bhoktāro bhavaṃtu mama maṃdire |
rājasūye suragaṇā brahmādyā ye caturvidhāḥ || 18 ||

rakṣapālaḥ surosmākamāstāṃ śūladharo haraḥ |
tathetyuktaḥ samājahre rājasūyaṃ tu viṣṇunā || 19 ||

hotātrirbhṛguradhvaryurudgātā ca caturmukhaḥ |
brahmatvamagamattasya upadraṣṭā hariḥ svayam || 20 ||

sadasyāḥ sarvadevāstu rājasūyavidhiḥ smṛtaḥ |
vasavodhvaryavastadvadviśvedevāstathaiva ca || 21 ||

trailokyaṃ dakṣiṇā tena ṛtvigbhyaḥ pratipāditā |
somaḥ prāpyāthaduṣprāpyamaiśvaryaṃ sṛṣṭisatkṛtaṃ || 22 ||

saptalokaikanāthatvaṃ prāptassvatapasā tadā |
kadācidudyānagatāmapaśyadanekapuṣpābharaṇopaśobhām || 23 ||

bṛhannitaṃbastanabhārakhedāṃ puṣpāvabhaṃgepyatidurbalāṃgīṃ |
bhāryāṃ ca tāṃ devaguroranaṃgabāṇābhirāmāyata cārunetrāṃ || 24 ||

tārāṃ sa tārādhipatiḥ smarārtaḥ keśeṣu jagrāha viviktabhūmau |
sāpi smarārtā sahate na reme tadrūpakāṃtyāhṛtamānasaiva || 25 ||

ciraṃ vihṛtyātha jagāma tārāṃ vidhurgṛhītvā svagṛhaṃ tatopi |
na tṛptirāsītsvagṛhepi tasya tārānuraktasya sukhāgameṣu || 26 ||

bṛhaspatistadvirahāgnidagdhastaddhyānaniṣṭhaikamanā babhūva |
śaśāka śāpaṃ na ca dātumasmai na maṃtraśastrāgniviṣairanekaiḥ || 27 ||

tasyāpakartuṃ vividhairupāyairnaivābhicārairapi vāgadhīśaḥ |
sa yācayāmāsa tatastu devaṃ somaṃ svabhāryārthamanaṃgataptaḥ || 28 ||

sa yācyamānopi dadau na bhāryāṃ bṛhaspateḥ kāmavaśena mohitaḥ |
maheśvareṇātha caturmukhena sādhyairmarudbhiḥ saha lokapālaiḥ || 29 ||

dadau yadā tāṃ na kathaṃcidiṃdustadā śivaḥ krodhaparo babhūva |
yo vāmadevaprathitaḥ pṛthivyāmanekarudrārcitapādapadmaḥ || 30 ||

tataḥ saśiṣyo giriśaḥ pinākī bṛhaspateḥ snehavaśānubaddhaḥ |
dhanurgṛhītvājagavaṃ purārirjagāma bhūteśvarasiddhajuṣṭaḥ || 31 ||

yuddhāya somena viśeṣadīptastṛtīyanetrānalabhīmavaktraḥ |
sahaiva jagmuśca gaṇeśvarāṇāṃ viṃśādhikā ṣaṣṭirathogramūrtiḥ || 32 ||

yakṣeśvarāṇāṃ sagaṇairanekairyutonvagātsyaṃdanasaṃsthitānāṃ |
vetālayakṣoragakinnarāṇāṃ padmena caikena tathārbudānām || 33 ||

lakṣaistribhirdvā daśabhī rathānāṃ somopyagāttatra vivṛddhamanyuḥ |
śanaiścarāṃgārakavṛddhatejā nakṣatradaityāsurasainyayuktaḥ || 34 ||

jagmurbhayaṃ sapta tathaiva lokā dharāvanadvīpasamudragarbhāḥ |
sasomamevābhyagamatpinākī gṛhītadīptāstraviśālavahniḥ || 35 ||

athābhavadbhīṣaṇa bhīma soma sainyadvayasyātha mahāhavosau |
aśeṣasatvakṣayakṛtpravṛddhastīkṣṇapradhāno jvalanaikarūpaḥ || 36 ||

śastrairathānyonyamaśeṣasainyaṃ dvayorjagāmakṣayamugratīkṣṇaiḥ |
pataṃti śastrāṇi tathojvalāni svarbhūmipātālamalaṃ dahaṃti || 37 ||

rudraḥ krodhādbrahmaśiro mumoca somopi somāstramamoghavīryaṃ |
tayornipātena samudrabhūmyorathāṃtarikṣasya ca bhītirāsīt || 38 ||

tadā suyuddhaṃ jagatāṃ kṣayāya pravṛddhamālokya pitāmahopi |
tataḥ praviśyātha kathaṃcideva nivārayāmāsa suraiḥ sahaiva || 39 ||

akāraṇaṃ kiṃ kṣayakṛjjanānāṃ soma tvayāpīdamakāryakāryaṃ |
yasmātparastrīharaṇāya soma tvayā kṛtaṃ yuddhamatīva bhīmam || 40 ||

pāpagrahastvaṃ bhavitā janeṣu pāposyalaṃ vahnimukhāśināṃ tvaṃ |
bhāryāmimāmarpaya vākpatestvaṃ pramāṇayanneva madīya vācam || 41 ||

tatheti covāca himāṃśumālī yuddhādapākrāmadataḥ praśāṃtaḥ |
bṛhaspatistāmatha gṛhya tārāṃ hṛṣṭo jagāma svagṛhaṃ ca rudraḥ || 42 ||

pulastya uvāca |
tataḥ saṃvatsarasyāṃte dvādaśādityasannibhaḥ |
divyapītāmbaradharo divyābharaṇabhūṣitaḥ || 43 ||

tārodaraviniṣkrāntaḥ kumārassūryasannibhaḥ |
sarvārthaśāstravidvidvānhastiśāstrapravarttakaḥ || 44 ||

nāmayadrājaputroyaṃ viśruto rājavaidyakaḥ |
rājñaḥ somasya putratvādrājaputro budhaḥ smṛtaḥ || 45 ||

janānāṃ tu sa tejāṃsi sarvāṇyevākṣipadbalī |
brahmādyāstatra cājagmurdevā devarṣibhiḥ saha || 46 ||

bṛhaspatigṛhe sarve jātakarmotsave tadā |
papracchuste surāstārāṃ kena jātaḥ kumārakaḥ || 47 ||

tataḥ sā lajjitā teṣāṃ na kiṃcidavadattadā |
punaḥ punastadā pṛṣṭā lajjayaṃtī varāṃganā || 48 ||

somasyeti cirādāha tato gṛhṇādvidhuḥ sutaṃ |
budha ityakaronnāma prādādrājyaṃ ca bhūtale || 49 ||

abhiṣekaṃ tataḥ kṛtvā pradānamakarodvibhuḥ |
grahamadhyaṃ pradāyātha brahmā brahmarṣibhiryutaḥ || 50 ||

paśyatāṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ tatraivāṃtaradhīyata |
ilodare ca dharmiṣṭhaṃ budhaḥ putramajījanat || 51 ||

aśvamedhaśataṃsāgramakarodyassvatejasā |
purūravā iti khyātaḥ sarvalokanamaskṛtaḥ || 52 ||

himavacchikhare ramye samārādhya pitāmahaṃ |
lokaiśvaryamagādrājansaptadvīpapatistadā || 53 ||

keśiprabhṛtayo daityāstadbhṛtyatvaṃ samāgatāḥ |
urvaśī yasya patnītvamagamadrūpamohitā || 54 ||

saptadvīpāvasumatī saśailavanakānanā |
dharmeṇa pālitā tena sarvalokahitaiṣiṇā || 55 ||

cāmaragrahaṇākīrtiḥ svayaṃ caivāṃgavāhikā |
brahmaprasādāddeveṃdro dadāvarddhāsanaṃ tadā || 56 ||

dharmārthakāmāndharmeṇa samavetobhyapālayat |
dharmārthakāmāstaṃ draṣṭumājagmuḥ kautukānvitāḥ || 57 ||

jijñāsavastaccaritaṃ kathaṃ paśyati naḥ samam |
bhaktyā cakre tatasteṣāmarghyapādyādikaṃ tataḥ || 58 ||

āsanatrayamānīya divyaṃ kanakabhūṣaṇam |
niveśyāthākarotpūjāmīṣaddharmedhikāṃ punaḥ || 59 ||

jagmatustau ca kāmārthāvatikopaṃ nṛpaṃ prati |
arthaḥ śāpamadāttasmai lobhāttvaṃ nāśameṣyasi || 60 ||

kāmopyāha tavonmādo bhavitā gaṃdhamādane |
kumāravanamāśritya viyogāccorvaśībhavāt || 61 ||

dharmopyāha cirāyustvaṃ dhārmikaśca bhaviṣyasi |
saṃtatistava rājeṃdra yāvadācaṃdratārakam || 62 ||

śataśo vṛddhimāyāti na nāśaṃ bhuvi yāsyati |
ṣaṣṭiṃ varṣāṇi conmāda ūrvaśīkāmasaṃbhavaḥ || 63 ||

acirādeva bhāryāpi vaśameṣyati cāpsarāḥ |
ityuktvāṃtardadhuḥ sarve rājā rājyaṃ tadānvabhūt || 64 ||

ahanyahani deveṃdraṃ draṣṭuṃ yāti purūravāḥ |
kadācidāruhya rathaṃ dakṣiṇāṃbaracāriṇā || 65 ||

sārdhaṃ śakreṇa so'paśyannīyamānāmathāṃbare |
keśinā dānaveṃdreṇa citralekhāmathorvaśīm || 66 ||

taṃ vinirjitya samare vividhāyudhapātanaiḥ |
purā śakropi samare yena vajrī vinirjitaḥ || 67 ||

mitratvamagamattena prādādiṃdrāya corvaśīṃ |
tataḥprabhṛti mitratvamagamatpākaśāsanaḥ || 68 ||

sarvaloketiśayitaṃ purūravasameva tam |
prāha vajrī tu saṃtuṣṭo nīyatāmiyameva ca || 69 ||

sā purūravasaḥ prītyai cāgāyaccaritaṃ mahat |
lakṣmīsvayaṃvaraṃnāma bharatena pravartitam || 70 ||

menakāṃ corvaśīṃ raṃbhāṃ nṛtyadhvamiti cādiśat |
nanarta salayaṃ tatra lakṣmīrūpeṇa corvaśī || 71 ||

sā purūravasaṃ dṛṣṭvā nṛtyaṃtī kāmapīḍitā |
vismṛtābhinayaṃ sarvaṃ yatpurātanacoditam || 72 ||

śaśāpa bharataḥ krodhādviyogāttasya bhūtale |
paṃcapaṃcāśadabdāni latābhūtā bhaviṣyasi || 73 ||

tatastamurvaśī gatvā bharttāramakarocciraṃ |
śāpānubhavanāṃte ca urvaśī budhasūnunā || 74 ||

ajījanatsutānaṣṭau nāmatastānnibodha me |
āyurdṛḍhāyurvaśyāyurbalāyurdhṛtimānvasuḥ || 75 ||

divyajāyuḥ śatāyuśca sarve divyabalaujasaḥ |
āyuṣo nahuṣaḥ putro vṛddhaśarmā tathaiva ca || 76 ||

rajirdaṃḍo viśākhaśca vīrāḥ paṃcamahārathāḥ |
rajeḥ putraśataṃ jajñe rājeyā iti viśrutaṃ || 77 ||

rajirārādhayāmāsa nārāyaṇamakalmaṣaṃ |
tapasā toṣito viṣṇurvaraṃ prādānmahīpateḥ || 78 ||

devāsuramanuṣyāṇāmabhūtsa vijayī tadā |
atha devāsuraṃ yuddhamabhūdvarṣaśatatrayam || 79 ||

prahlādaśakrayorbhīmaṃ na kaścidvijayī tayoḥ |
tato devāsuraiḥ pṛṣṭaḥ pṛthagdevaścaturmukhaḥ || 80 ||

anayorvijayī kaḥ syādrajiryatreti sobravīt |
jayāya prārthito rājā sahāyastvaṃ bhavasva naḥ || 81 ||

daityaiḥ prāha yadi svāmī vo bhavāmi tatastvalam |
nāsuraiḥ pratipannaṃ tatpratipannaṃ suraistadā || 82 ||

svāmī bhava tvamasmākaṃ balanāśaya vidviṣaḥ |
tato vināśitāḥ sarve ye vadhyā vajrapāṇinaḥ || 83 ||

putratvamagamattuṣṭastasyeṃdraḥ karmaṇā tataḥ |
dattveṃdrāya purā rājyaṃ jagāma tapase rajiḥ || 84 ||

rajiputraistadāchinnaṃ balādiṃdrasya vaiyadā |
yajñabhāgaśca rājyaṃ ca tapobalaguṇānvitaiḥ || 85 ||

rājyabhraṣṭastataḥ śakro rajiputranipīḍitaḥ |
prāha vācaspatiṃ dīnaḥ pīḍito'smi rajeḥ sutaiḥ || 86 ||

na yajñabhāgo rājyaṃ me pīḍitasya bṛhaspate |
rājyalābhāya me yatnaṃ vidhatsva dhiṣaṇādhipa || 87 ||

tato bṛhaspatiḥ śakramakarodbaladarpitam |
grahaśāṃtividhānena pauṣṭikena ca karmaṇā || 88 ||

gatvātha mohayāmāsa rajiputrānbṛhaspatiḥ |
jinadharmaṃ samāsthāya vedabāhyaṃ sa dharmavit || 89 ||

vedatrayīparibhraṣṭāṃścakāra dhiṣaṇādhipaḥ |
vedabāhyānparijñāya hetuvādasamanvitān || 90 ||

jaghāna śakro vajreṇa sarvāndharmabahiṣkṛtān |
nahuṣasya pravakṣyāmi putrānsaptaiva dhārmikān || 91 ||

yatiryayātiśśaryātiruttaraḥ para eva ca |
ayatirviyatiścaiva saptaite vaṃśavarddhanāḥ || 92 ||

yatiḥ kumārabhāvepi yogī vaikhānasobhavat |
yayātirakarodrājyaṃ dharmaikaśaraṇaḥ sadā || 93 ||

śarmiṣṭhā tasya bhāryābhūdduhitā vṛṣaparvaṇaḥ |
bhārgavasyātmajā caiva devayānī ca suvratā || 94 ||

yayāteḥ paṃcadāyādāstānpravakṣyāmi nāmataḥ |
devayānī yaduṃ putraṃ turvasuṃ cāpyajījanat || 95 ||

tathā druhyamaṇaṃ pūruṃ śarmiṣṭhājanayatsutān |
yaduḥ pūrūśca bharataste vai vaṃśavivarddhanāḥ || 96 ||

pūrorvaṃśaṃ pravakṣyāmi yatra jātosi pārthiva |
yadostu yādavā jātā yatra tau balakeśavau || 97 ||

bhārāvatāraṇārthāya pāṃḍavānāṃ hitāya ca |
yadoḥ putrā babhūvuśca paṃca devasutopamāḥ || 98 ||

sahasrajittathā jyeṣṭhaḥ kroṣṭā nīloñjiko raghuḥ |
sahasrajito dāyādaḥ śatajinnāma pārthivaḥ || 99 ||

śatajitaśca dāyādāstrayaḥ paramadhārmikāḥ |
haihayaśca hayaścaiva tathā tālahayaśca yaḥ || 100 ||

haihayasya tu dāyādo dharmanetraḥ pratiśrutaḥ |
dharmanetrasya kuṃtistu saṃhatastasya cātmajaḥ || 101 ||

saṃhatasya tu dāyādo mahiṣmānnāma pārthivaḥ |
āsīnmahiṣmataḥ putro bhadrasenaḥ pratāpavān || 102 ||

vārāṇasyāmabhūdrājā kathitaḥ pūrvameva hi |
bhadrasenasya putrastu durdamo nāma dhārmikaḥ || 103 ||

durdamasya suto bhīmo dhanako nāma vīryavān |
dhanakasya sutā hyāsancatvāro lokaviśrutāḥ || 104 ||

kṛtāgniḥ kṛtavīryaśca kṛtadharmā tathaiva ca |
kṛtaujāśca caturthobhūtkṛtavīryācca sorjunaḥ || 105 ||

jāto bāhusahasreṇa saptadvīpeśvaro nṛpaḥ |
varṣāyutaṃ tapastepe duścaraṃ pṛthivīpatiḥ || 106 ||

dattamārādhayāmāsa kārttavīryotrisaṃbhavam |
tasmai datto varānprādāccaturaḥ puruṣottamaḥ || 107 ||

pūrvaṃ bāhusahasraṃ tu sa vavre rājasattamaḥ |
adharmaṃ dhyāyamānasya bhītiścāpi nivāraṇam || 108 ||

yuddhena pṛthivīṃ jitvā dharmeṇāvāpya vai balam |
saṃgrāme vartamānasya vadhaścaivādhikādbhavet || 109 ||

eteneyaṃ vasumatī saptadvīpā sapattanā |
saptodadhi parikṣiptā kṣātreṇa vidhinā jitā || 110 ||

jajñe bāhusahasraṃ ca icchatastasya dhīmataḥ |
sarve yajñā mahābāhostasyāsanbhūridakṣiṇāḥ || 111 ||

sarve kāṃcanayūpāste sarve kāṃcanavedikāḥ |
sarve devaiśca saṃprāptā vimānasthairalaṃkṛtaiḥ || 112 ||

gaṃdharvairapsarobhiśca nityamevāpi sevitāḥ |
yasya yajñe jagau gāthā gaṃdhaṃrvo nāradastathā || 113 ||

kārttavīryasya rājarṣermahimānaṃ nirīkṣya saḥ |
na nūnaṃ kārttavīryasya gatiṃ yāsyaṃti pārthivāḥ || 14 ||

yajñairdānaistapobhiśca vikrameṇa śrutena ca |
saptadvīpānanucaranvegena pavanopamaḥ || 115 ||

paṃcāśītisahasrāṇi varṣāṇāṃ ca narādhipaḥ |
saptadvīpapṛthivyāśca cakravartī babhūva ha || 116 ||

sa eva paśupālobhūtkṣetrapālaḥ sa eva hi |
sa eva vṛṣṭyā parjanyo yogitvādarjunobhavat || 117 ||

yosau bāhusahasreṇa jyāghātakaṭhinatvacā |
bhāti raśmisahasreṇa śāradeneva bhāskaraḥ || 118 ||

eṣa nāma manuṣyeṣu māhiṣmatyāṃ mahādyutiḥ |
eṣa vegaṃ samudrasya prāvṛṭkāle bhajeta vai || 119 ||

krīḍate svasukhā ye vipratisroto mahīpatiḥ |
lalanāḥ krīḍatā tena pratibaddhormimālinī || 120 ||

ūrmibhrukuṭimālā sā śaṃkitābhyeti narmadā |
eṣa eva manorvaṃśe tvavagāhenmahārṇavam || 121 ||

kareṇoddhṛtya vegaṃ tu kāminīprīṇanena tu |
tasya bāhusahasreṇa kṣobhyamāṇe mahodadhau || 122 ||

bhavaṃti līnā niśceṣṭāḥ pātālasthā mahāsurāḥ |
tadūrukṣobhacakitā amṛtotpādaśaṃkitāḥ || 123 ||

natā niścalamūrddhāno bhavaṃti ca mahoragāḥ |
eṣa dhanvī ca cikṣepa rāvaṇaṃ prati sāyakān || 124 ||

eṣa dhanvī dhanurgṛhya utsiktaṃ paṃcabhiḥ śaraiḥ |
laṃkeśaṃ mohayitvā tu sabalaṃ rāvaṇaṃ balāt || 125 ||

nirjitya baddhvā tvānīya māhiṣmatyāmbabaṃdha tam |
tato gatohaṃ tasyāgre arjunaṃ saṃprasādayan || 126 ||

mumoca rājanpautraṃ me sakhyaṃ kṛtvā ca pārthivaḥ |
tasya bāhusahasrasya babhūva jyātalasvanaḥ || 127 ||

yugāṃtāgneḥ pravṛttasya yathā jyātalaniḥsvanaḥ |
aho balaṃ vidhervīryaṃ bhārgavaḥ sa yadācchinat || 128 ||

mṛdhe sahasraṃ bāhūnāṃ hematālavanaṃ yathā |
yaṃ vasiṣṭhastu saṃkruddho hyarjunaṃ śaptavānvibhuḥ || 129 ||

yasmādvanaṃ pradagdhaṃ te viśrutaṃ mama haihaya |
tasmātte duṣkṛtaṃ karma kṛtamanyo haniṣyati || 130 ||

chitvā bāhusahasraṃ te pramathya tarasā balī |
tapasvī brāhmaṇastvāṃ vai vadhiṣyati sa bhārgavaḥ || 131 ||

tasya rāmotha haṃtāsīnmuniśāpena dhīmataḥ |
tasya putraśataṃ tvāsītpaṃca tatra mahārathāḥ || 132 ||

kṛtāstrā balinaḥ śūrā dharmātmāno mahābala |
śūrasenaśca śūraśca dhṛṣṭo vai kṛṣṇa eva ca || 133 ||

jayaddhvajaḥ sa vai kartā avantiśca rasāpatiḥ |
jayadhvajasya putrastu tālajaṃgho mahābalaḥ || 134 ||

tasya putrāśśatānyeva tālajaṃghā iti smṛtāḥ |
teṣāṃ paṃcakulānyāsanhaihayānāṃ mahātmanām || 135 ||

vītihotrāśca saṃjātā bhojāścāvaṃtayastathā |
tuṃḍakerāśca vikrāṃtāstālajaṃghāḥ prakīrtitāḥ || 136 ||

vītihotrasutaścāpi anaṃto nāma vīryavān |
durjayastasya putrastu babhūvāmitrakarṣaṇaḥ || 137 ||

sadbhāvena mahārājaḥ prajādharmeṇa pālayan |
kārtavīryārjuno nāma rājā bāhusahasradhṛt || 138 ||

yena sāgaraparyaṃtā dhanuṣā nirjitā mahī |
yastasyakīrtayennāma kalyamutthāya mānavaḥ || 139 ||

na tasya vittanāśaḥ syānnaṣṭaṃ ca labhate punaḥ |
kārtavīryasya yo janma kathayediha dhīmataḥ |
yathā yaṣṭā yathā dātā svargaloke mahīyate || 140 ||

pulastya uvāca |
kroṣṭoḥ śṛṇu tvaṃ rājeṃdra vaṃśamuttamapūruṣam |
yasyānvavāye saṃbhūto viṣṇurvṛṣṇikulodvahaḥ || 1 ||

kroṣṭorevābhavatputro vṛjinīvānmahāyaśāḥ |
tasya putrobhavatsvātiḥ kuśaṃkustatsutobhavat || 2 ||

kuśaṃkorabhavatputro nāmnā citrarathosya tu |
śaśabiṃduriti khyātaścakravartī babhūva ha || 3 ||

atrānuvaṃśaślokoyaṃ gītastasya purābhavat |
śaśabiṃdostu putrāṇāṃ śatānāmabhavacchatam || 4 ||

dhīmatāṃ cārurūpāṇāṃ bhūridraviṇatejasām |
teṣāṃ śatapradhānānāṃ pṛthusāhvā mahābalāḥ || 5 ||

pṛthuśravāḥ pṛthuyaśāḥ pṛthutejāḥ pṛthūdbhavaḥ |
pṛthukīrtiḥ pṛthumato rājānaḥ śaśabiṃdavaḥ || 6 ||

śaṃsaṃti ca purāṇajñāḥ pṛthuśravasamuttamam |
tataścāsyābhavanputrāḥ uśanā śatrutāpanaḥ || 7 ||

putraścośanasastasya śineyurnāmasattamaḥ |
āsītśineyoḥ putro yaḥ sa rukmakavaco mataḥ || 8 ||

nihatya rukmakavaco yuddhe yuddhaviśāradaḥ |
dhanvino vividhairbāṇairavāpya pṛthivīmimām || 9 ||

aśvamedhe 'dadādrājā brāhmaṇebhyaśca dakṣiṇāṃ |
jajñe tu rukmakavacātparāvṛtparavīrahā || 10 ||

tatputrā jajñire paṃca mahāvīryaparākramāḥ |
rukmeṣuḥ pṛthurukmaśca jyāmaghaḥ parigho hariḥ || 11 ||

parighaṃ ca hariṃ caiva videhe sthāpayatpitā |
rukmeṣurabhavadrājā pṛthurukmastathāśrayaḥ || 12 ||

tābhyāṃ pravrājito rājyājjyāmaghovasadāśrame |
praśāṃtaścāśramasthastu brāhmaṇena vibodhitaḥ || 13 ||

jagāma dhanurādāya deśamanyaṃ dhvajī rathī |
narmadātaṭa ekākī kevalaṃ vṛttikarśitaḥ || 14 ||

ṛkṣavaṃtaṃ giriṃ gatvā muktamanyairupāviśat |
jyāmaghasyābhavadbhāryā śaibyā pariṇatā satī || 15 ||

aputropyabhavadrājā bhāryāmanyāmaciṃtayan |
tasyāsīdvijayo yuddhe tatra kanyāmavāpya saḥ || 16 ||

bhāryāmuvāca saṃtrāsātsnuṣeyaṃ te śucismite |
evamuktvābravīdenaṃ kasya keyaṃ snuṣeti vai || 17 ||

rājovāca |
yaste janiṣyate putrastasya bhāryā bhaviṣyati |
tasyāḥ sā tapasogreṇa kanyāyāḥ saṃprasūyata || 18 ||

putraṃ vidarbhaṃ subhagaṃ śaibyā pariṇatā satī |
rājaputryāṃ tu vidvāṃsau snuṣāyāṃ krathakauśikau || 19 ||

lomapādaṃ tṛtīyaṃ tu putraṃ paramadhārmikam |
paścādvidarbho janayacchūraṃ raṇaviśāradam || 20 ||

lomapādātmajo babhrurdhṛtistasya tu cātmajaḥ |
kauśikasyātmajaścedistasmāccaidyanṛpāḥ smṛtāḥ || 21 ||

kratho vidarbhaputro yaḥ kuṃtistasyātmajobhavat |
kuṃterdhṛṣṭastato jajñe dhṛṣṭātsṛṣṭaḥ pratāpavān || 22 ||

sṛṣṭasya putro dharmātmā nivṛttiḥ paravīrahā |
nivṛttiputro dāśārho nāmnā sa tu vidūrathaḥ || 23 ||

dāśārhaputro bhīmastu bhīmājjīmūta ucyate |
