jīmūtaputro vikṛtistasyabhīmarathaḥ sutaḥ || 24 ||

atha bhīmarathasyāpi putro navarathaḥ kila |
tasya cāsīddaśarathaḥ śakunistasya cātmajaḥ || 25 ||

tasmātkaraṃbhastasmācca devarāto babhūva ha |
devakṣatrobhavadrājā devarātānmahāyaśāḥ || 26 ||

devagarbhasamo jajñe devakṣatrasya naṃdanaḥ |
madhurnāmamahātejā madhoḥ kuruvaśaḥ smṛtaḥ || 27 ||

āsītkuruvaśātputraḥ puruhotraḥ pratāpavān |
aṃśurjajñetha vaidarbhyāṃ dravaṃtyāṃ puruhotrataḥ || 28 ||

vetrakī tvabhavadbhāryā aṃśostasyāṃ vyajāyata |
sātvataḥ satvasaṃpannaḥ sātvatānkīrtivarddhanaḥ || 29 ||

imāṃ visṛṣṭiṃ vijñāya jyāmaghasya mahātmanaḥ |
prajāvāneti sāyujyaṃ rājñaḥ somasya dhīmataḥ || 30 ||

sātvatānsatvasaṃpannā kausalyā suṣuve sutān |
teṣāṃ sargāśca catvāro vistareṇaiva tānśṛṇu || 31 ||

bhajamānasya sṛṃjayyāṃ bhājanāmā sutobhavat |
sṛṃjayasya sutāyāṃ tu bhājakāstu tatobhavan || 32 ||

tasya bhājasya bhārye dve suṣuvāte sutānbahūn |
nemiṃ cakṛkaṇaṃ caiva vṛṣṇiṃ parapuraṃjayaṃ || 33 ||

te bhājakāḥ smṛtā yasmādbhajamānādvi jajñire |
devāvṛdhaḥ pṛthurnāma madhūnāṃ mitravarddhanaḥ || 34 ||

aputrastvabhavadrājā cacāra paramaṃ tapaḥ |
putraḥ sarvaguṇopeto mama bhūyāditi spṛhan || 35 ||

saṃyojya kṛṣṇamevātha parṇāśāyā jalaṃ spṛśan |
sā toyasparśanāttasya sāṃnidhyaṃ nimnagā hyagāt || 36 ||

kalyāṇaṃ caratastasya śuśoca nimnagātataḥ |
ciṃtayātha parītātmā jagāmātha viniścayam || 37 ||

bhūtvā gacchāmyahaṃ nārī yasyāmevaṃ vidhaḥ sutaḥ |
jāyeta tasmādadyāhaṃ bhavāmyasya sutapradā || 38 ||

atha bhūtvā kumārī sā bibhratī paramaṃ vapuḥ |
jñāpayāmāsa rājānaṃ tāmiyeṣa nṛpastataḥ || 39 ||

athasānavamemāsisuṣuvesaritāṃvarā |
putraṃ sarvaguṇopetaṃ babhruṃ devāvṛdhātparam || 40 ||

atra vaṃśe purāṇajñā bruvaṃtīti pariśrutam |
guṇāndevāvṛdhasyātha kīrttayaṃto mahātmanaḥ || 41 ||

babhruḥ śreṣṭho manuṣyāṇāṃ devairdevāvṛdhaḥ samaḥ |
ṣaṣṭiḥ śataṃ ca putrāṇāṃ sahasrāṇi ca saptatiḥ || 42 ||

etemṛtatvaṃ saṃprāptā babhrordevāvṛdhādapi |
yajñadānatapodhīmānbrahmaṇyassudṛḍhavrataḥ || 43 ||

rūpavāṃśca mahātejā bhojotomṛtakāvatīm |
śarakāntasya duhitā suṣuve caturaḥ sutān || 44 ||

kukuraṃ bhajamānaṃ ca śyāmaṃ kaṃbalabarhiṣam |
kukurasyātmajo vṛṣṭirvṛṣṭestu tanayo dhṛtiḥ || 45 ||

kapotaromā tasyāpi tittiristasya cātmajaḥ |
tasyāsīdbahuputrastu vidvānputro nariḥ kila || 46 ||

khyāyate tasya nāmānyaccaṃdanodakaduṃdubhiḥ |
asyāsīdabhijitputrastato jātaḥ punarvasuḥ || 47 ||

aputrohyabhijitpūrvamṛṣibhiḥ prerito mudā |
aśvamedhaṃtuputrārthamājuhāvanarottamaḥ || 48 ||

tasya madhye vicarataḥ sabhāmadhyātsamutthitaḥ |
andhastu vidvāndharmajño yajñadātā punarvasuḥ || 49 ||

tasyāsītputramithunaṃ vasoścārijitaḥ kila |
āhukaścāhukī caiva khyātā matimatāṃ vara || 50 ||

imāṃścodāharaṃtyatra ślokāṃścātirasātmakān |
sopāsaṃgānukarṣāṇāṃ tanutrāṇāṃ varūthinām || 51 ||

rathānāṃ meghaghoṣāṇāṃ sahasrāṇi daśaiva tu |
nāsatyavādino bhojā nāyajñā nāsahasradāḥ || 52 ||

nāśucirnāpyavidvāṃso na bhojādadhikobhavat |
āhukāṃ tamanuprāpta ityeṣonvaya ucyate || 53 ||

āhukaścāpyavaṃtīṣu svasāraṃ cāhukīṃ dadau |
āhukasyaiva duhitā putrau dvau samasūyata || 54 ||

devakaṃ cograsenaṃ ca devagarbhasamāvubhau |
devakasya sutāścaiva jajñire tridaśopamāḥ || 55 ||

devavānupadevaśca sudevo devarakṣitaḥ |
teṣāṃ svasāraḥ saptaiva vasudevāya tā dadau || 56 ||

devakī śrutadevā ca yaśodā ca śrutiśravā |
śrīdevā copadevā ca surūpā ceti saptamī || 57 ||

navograsenasya sutāḥ kaṃsasteṣāṃ ca pūrvajaḥ |
nyagrodhastu sunāmā ca kaṃkaḥ śaṃkuḥ subhūśca yaḥ || 58 ||

anyastu rāṣṭrapālaśca baddhamuṣṭiḥ samuṣṭikaḥ |
teṣāṃ svasāraḥ paṃcāsankaṃsā kaṃsavatī tathā || 59 ||

surabhī rāṣṭrapālī ca kaṃkā ceti varāṃganāḥ |
ugrasenaḥ sahāpatyo vyākhyātaḥ kukurodbhavaḥ || 60 ||

bhajamānasya putrobhūdrathimukhyo vidūrathaḥ |
rājādhidevaḥ śūraśca vidūrathasutobhavat || 61 ||

rājādhidevasya sutau jajñāte vīrasaṃmatau |
kṣatravratetiniratau śoṇāśvaḥ śvetavāhanaḥ || 62 ||

śoṇāśvasya sutāḥ paṃca śūrā raṇaviśāradāḥ |
śamī ca rājaśarmā ca nimūrttaḥ śatrujicchuciḥ || 63 ||

śamīputraḥ pratikṣatraḥ pratikṣatrasya cātmajaḥ |
pratikṣatrasuto bhojo hṛdīkastasya cātmajaḥ |
hṛdīkasyābhavanputrā daśa bhīmaparākramāḥ || 64 ||

kṛtavarmāgrajasteṣāṃ śatadhanvā ca sattamaḥ |
devārhaśca subhānuśca bhīṣaṇaśca mahābalaḥ || 65 ||

ajātaśca vijātaśca karakaśca karaṃdhamaḥ |
devārhasya suto vidvānjajñe kaṃbalabarhiṣaḥ || 66 ||

asamaujāstatastasya samaujāśca sutāvubhau |
ajātaputrasya sutau prajāyete samaujasau || 67 ||

samaujaḥ putrā vikhyātāstrayaḥ paramadhārmikāḥ |
sudaṃśaśca suvaṃśaśca kṛṣṇa ityanunāmataḥ || 68 ||

aṃdhakānāmimaṃ vaṃśaṃ yaḥ kīrtayati nityaśaḥ |
ātmano vipulaṃ vaṃśaṃ prajāmāpnotyayaṃ tataḥ || 69 ||

gāṃdhārī caiva mādrī ca kroṣṭorbhārye babhūvatuḥ |
gāṃdhārī janayāmāsa sunitraṃ mitravatsalam || 70 ||

mādrī yudhājitaṃ putraṃ tato vai devamīḍhuṣaṃ |
anamitraṃ śiniṃ caiva paṃcātra kṛtalakṣaṇāḥ || 71 ||

anamitrasuto nighno nighnasyāpi ca dvau sutau |
prasenaśca mahāvīryaḥ śaktisenaśca tāvubhau || 72 ||

syamaṃtakaṃ prasenasya maṇiratnamanuttamaṃ |
pṛthivyāṃ maṇiratnānāṃ rājeti samudāhṛtam || 73 ||

hṛdi kṛtvā subahuśo maṇiṃ taṃ sa vyarājata |
maṇiratnaṃ yayācetha rājārthaṃ śauriruttamam || 74 ||

goviṃdaśca na taṃ lebhe śaktopi na jahāra saḥ |
kadācinmṛgayāṃ yātaḥ prasenastena bhūṣitaḥ || 75 ||

bile śabdaṃ sa śuśrāva kṛtaṃ sattvena kenacit |
tataḥ praviśya sa bilaṃ praseno hyṛkṣamāsadat || 76 ||

ṛkṣaḥ prasenaṃ ca tathā ṛkṣaṃ cāpi prasenajit |
āsādya yuyudhāte tau parasparajayecchayā || 77 ||

hatvā ṛkṣaḥ prasenaṃ ca tatastaṃ maṇimādadāt |
prasenaṃ tu hataṃ śrutvā goviṃdaḥ pariśaṃkitaḥ || 78 ||

satrājitrā tu tadbhrātrā yādavaiśca tathāparaiḥ |
goviṃdena hato nūnaṃ praseno maṇikāraṇāt || 79 ||

prasenastu gatoraṇyaṃ maṇiratnena bhūṣitaḥ |
taṃ dṛṣṭvā nijaghānātha na tyajantaṃ syamaṃtakam || 80 ||

jaghānaivāpradānena śatrubhūtaṃ ca keśavaḥ |
iti pravādassarvatra khyātassatrājitā kṛtaḥ || 81 ||

atha dīrgheṇa kālena mṛgayāṃ nirgataḥ punaḥ |
yadṛcchayā ca goviṃdo bilābhyāśamathāgamat || 82 ||

tataśśabdaṃ yathāpūrvaṃ sa cakre ṛkṣarāḍbalī |
śabdaṃ śrutvā tu goviṃdaḥ khaṅgapāṇiḥ praviśya ca || 83 ||

apaśyajjāṃbavaṃtaṃ ca ṛkṣarājaṃ mahābalaṃ |
tatastūrṇaṃ hṛṣīkeśastamṛkṣamatiraṃhasā || 84 ||

jāṃbavaṃtaṃ sa jagrāha krodhasaṃraktalocanaḥ |
dṛṣṭvā cainaṃ tathā viṣṇuṃ karmabhirvaiṣṇavīṃ tanuṃ || 85 ||

tuṣṭāva ṛkṣarājopi viṣṇusūktena satvaraṃ |
tatastu bhagavāṃstuṣṭo vareṇa samarocayat || 86 ||

jāmbavānuvāca |
iṣṭaṃ cakraprahāreṇa tvatto me maraṇaṃ śubham |
kanyā ceyaṃ mama sutā bharttāraṃ tvāmavāpnuyāt || 87 ||

yoyaṃ maṇiḥ prasenāttu hatvā caivāptavānaham |
sa tvayā gṛhyatāṃ nātha maṇireṣo'tra varttate || 88 ||

ityukto jāṃbavaṃtaṃ vai hatvā cakreṇa keśavaḥ |
kṛtakāryo mahābāhuḥ kanyāṃ caivādadau tadā || 89 ||

tataḥ satrājite caitanmaṇiratnaṃ sa vai dadau |
yallabdhamṛkṣarājācca sarvayādavasannidhau || 90 ||

tena mithyāpravādena saṃtaptoyaṃ janārdanaḥ |
tataste yādavāḥ sarve vāsudevamathābruvan || 91 ||

asmākaṃ manasi hyāsītprasenastu tvayā hataḥ |
ekaikasyāstu suṃdaryo daśa satrājitaḥ sutāḥ || 92 ||

satyotpannāssutāstasya śatamekaṃ ca viśrutāḥ |
vikhyātāśca mahāvīryā bhaṃgakāraśca pūrvajaḥ || 93 ||

satyā vratavatī svapnā bhaṃgakārasya pūrvajā |
suṣuvustāḥ kumārāṃśca śinīvālaḥ pratāpavān || 94 ||

abhaṃgo yuyudhānaśca śinistasyātmajobhavat |
tasmādyugaṃdharaḥ putrāśśataṃ tasya prakīrtitāḥ || 95 ||

anamitrāhvayo yo vai vikhyāto vṛṣṇivaṃśajaḥ |
anamitrātśinirjajñe kaniṣṭho vṛṣṇinaṃdanaḥ || 96 ||

anamitrācca saṃjajñe vṛṣṇivīro yudhājitaḥ |
anyau ca tanayau vīrā vṛṣabhaścitra eva ca || 97 ||

ṛṣabhaḥ kāśirājasya sutāṃ bhāryāmaniṃditāṃ |
jayaṃtaśca jayaṃtīṃ ca śubhāṃ bhāryāmaviṃdata || 98 ||

jayaṃtasya jayaṃtyāṃ vai putraḥ samabhavattataḥ |
sadā yajvātidhīraśca śrutavānatithipriyaḥ || 99 ||

akrūraḥ suṣuve tasmātsudakṣo bhūridakṣiṇaḥ |
ratnakanyā ca śaibyā ca akrūrastāmavāptavān || 100 ||

putrānutpādayāmāsa ekādaśamahābalān |
upalaṃbhaṃ sadālaṃbhamutkalaṃ cāryyaśaiśavaṃ || 101 ||

sudhīraṃ ca sadāyakṣaṃ śatrughnaṃ vārimejayaṃ |
dharmadṛṣṭiṃ ca dharmaṃ ca sṛṣṭimauliṃ tathaiva ca || 102 ||

sarve ca pratihartāro ratnānāṃ jajñire ca te |
akrūrācchūrasenāyāṃ sutau dvau kulanaṃdanau || 103 ||

devavānupadevaśca jajñāte devasaṃmatau |
aśvinyāṃ tricatuḥ putrāḥ pṛthurvipṛthureva ca || 104 ||

aśvagrīvo śvabāhuśca supārśvaka gaveṣaṇau |
riṣṭanemiḥ suvarcā ca sudharmā mṛdureva ca || 105 ||

abhūmirbahubhūmiśca śraviṣṭhā śravaṇe striyau |
imāṃ mithyābhiśaptiṃ yo veda kṛṣṇasya buddhimān || 106 ||

na sa mithyābhiśāpena abhigamyaśca kenacit |
ekṣvākī suṣuve putraṃ śūramadbhutamīḍhuṣam || 107 ||

mīḍhuṣā jajñire śūrā bhojāyāṃ puruṣā daśa |
vasudevo mahābāhuḥ pūrvamānakaduṃdubhiḥ || 108 ||

devabhāgastathā jajñe tathā devaśravāḥ punaḥ |
anāvṛṣṭiṃ kuniścaiva naṃdiścaiva sakṛdyaśāḥ || 109 ||

śyāmaḥ śamīkaḥ saptākhyaḥ paṃca cāsya varāṃganāḥ |
śrutakīrtiḥ pṛthā caiva śrutadevī śrutaśravāḥ || 110 ||

rājādhidevī ca tathā paṃcaitā vīramātaraḥ |
vṛddhasya śrutadevī tu kārūṣaṃ suṣuve nṛpam || 111 ||

kaikeyācchrutakīrtestu jajñe saṃtardano nṛpaḥ |
śrutaśravasi caidyasya sunīthaḥ samapadyata || 112 ||

rājādhidevyāḥ saṃbhūto dharmādbhayavivarjitaḥ |
śūraḥ sakhyena baddhosau kuṃtibhoje pṛthāṃ dadau || 113 ||

evaṃ kuṃtī samākhyā ca vasudevasvasā pṛthā |
kuṃtibhojodadāttāṃ tu pāṃḍorbhāryāmaniṃditām || 114 ||

pāṇḍvarthesūta devī sā devaputrānmahārathān |
dharmādyudhiṣṭhiro jajñe vātājjajñe vṛkodaraḥ || 115 ||

iṃdrāddhanaṃjayaścaiva śakratulyaparākramaḥ |
yo'sau tripuruṣājjātastribhiraṃśairmahārathaḥ || 116 ||

devakāryakaraścaiva sarvadānavasūdanaḥ |
avadhyāścāpi śakrasya dānavā yena ghātitāḥ || 117 ||

sthāpitassa tu śakreṇa labdhavarcāstriviṣṭape |
mādravatyāṃ tu janitāvaśvināviti naḥ śrutam || 118 ||

nakulaḥ sahadevaśca rūpasatvaguṇānvitau |
rohiṇī pauravī nāma bhāryā cānakaduṃdubheḥ || 119 ||

lebhe ceṣṭaṃ sutaṃ rāmaṃ sāraṇaṃ ca raṇapriyam |
durdharaṃ damanaṃ caiva piṃḍārakamahāhanuṃ || 120 ||

atha māyātvamāvāsyā devakī yā bhaviṣyati |
tasyāṃ jajñe mahābāhuḥ pūrvaṃ tu sa prajāpatiḥ || 121 ||

anujātābhavatkṛṣṇā subhadrā bhadrabhāṣiṇī |
vijayo rocamānastu vardhamānaśca devalaḥ || 122 ||

ete sarve mahātmāna upadevyāṃ prajajñire |
agāvahaṃ mahātmānaṃ bṛhaddevī vyajāyata || 123 ||

bṛhaddevyāṃ svayaṃ jajñe mandako nāma nāmataḥ |
saptamaṃ devakī putraṃ remaṃtaṃ saṣuve sutam || 124 ||

gaveṣaṇaṃ mahābhāgaṃ saṃgrāmeṣvaparājitam |
śrutadevyā vihāre tu vane vicaratā purā || 125 ||

vaiśyāyāṃ samadhācchauriḥ putraṃ kauśikamagrajam |
śrutaṃdharā tu rājñī tu sauragaṃdhaparigrahaḥ || 126 ||

putraṃ ca kapilaṃ caiva vasudevātmajo balī |
janānāṃ ca viṣādobhūtprathamaḥ sa dhanurddharaḥ || 127 ||

saubhadraścābhavaścaiva mahāsatvau babhūvatuḥ |
devabhāgasutaścāpi prastāvaḥ sa budhaḥ smṛtaḥ || 128 ||

paṇḍitaṃ prathamaṃ bāhu devaśravasamuttamam |
ikṣvākukulato yasya manasvinyā yaśasvinī || 129 ||

nivṛttaśatruḥ śatrughnaḥ śraddhā tasmādajāyata |
gaṃḍūṣāyāmapatyāni kṛṣṇastuṣṭaḥ śataṃ dadau || 130 ||

sa caṃdraṃ tu mahābhāgaṃ vīryavaṃtaṃ mahābalam |
raṃtipālaśca raṃtiśca naṃdanasya sutāvubhau || 131 ||

śamīkaputrāścatvāro vikrāṃtāḥ sumahābalāḥ |
virajaśca dhanuścaiva vyomastasya sa sṛṃjayaḥ || 132 ||

anapatyobhavadvyomaḥ sṛṃjayasya dhanaṃjayaḥ |
yo jāyamāno bhojatvaṃ rājarṣitvamavāptavān || 133 ||

kṛṣṇasya janmābhyudayaṃ yaḥ kīrtayati nityaśaḥ |
śṛṇoti vā naro nityaṃ sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate || 134 ||

atha devo mahādevaḥ pūrvaṃ kṛṣṇaḥ prajāpatiḥ |
vihārārthaṃ sa devosau mānuṣeṣvapyajāyata || 135 ||

devakyāṃ vasudevena tapasā puṣkarekṣaṇaḥ |
caturbāhustu saṃjāto divyarūpo janāśrayaḥ || 136 ||

śrīvatsalakṣaṇaṃ devaṃ dṛṣṭvā devaiḥ salakṣaṇam |
uvāca vasudevastaṃ rūpaṃ saṃhara vai prabho || 137 ||

bhītohaṃ deva kaṃsasya tatastvetadbravīmi te |
mama putrā hatāstena śreṣṭhāḥ ṣaḍbhīmavikramāḥ || 138 ||

vasudevavacaḥ śrutvā rūpaṃ saṃharadacyutaḥ |
anujñāpya tu taṃ śaurirnandagopagṛhenayat || 139 ||

datvā taṃ naṃdagopāya rakṣyatāmiti cābravīt |
atastusarvakalyāṇaṃ yādavānāṃ bhaviṣyati || 140 ||

ayaṃ tu garbho devakyā yāvatkaṃsaṃ haniṣyati |
tāvatpṛthivyāṃ bhavitā kṣemo bhārāvahaḥ param || 141 ||

ye vai duṣṭāstu rājānastāṃstu sarvānhaniṣyati |
kauravāṇāṃ raṇe bhūte sarvakṣatrasamāgame || 142 ||

sārathyamarjunasyāyaṃ svayaṃ devaḥ kariṣyati |
niḥkṣatriyāṃ dharāṃ kṛtvā bhokṣyate śeṣatāṃ gatām || 143 ||

sarvaṃ yadukulaṃ caiva devalokaṃ nayiṣyati |
bhīṣma uvāca |
ka eṣa vasudevastu devakī kā yaśasvinī || 144 ||

naṃdagopaśca kaścaiva yaśodā kā mahāvratā |
yā viṣṇuṃ poṣitavatī yāṃ sa mātetyabhāṣata || 145 ||

yā garbhaṃ janayāmāsa yā cainaṃ samavarddhayat |
pulastya uvāca |
puruṣaḥ kaśyapaścāsāvaditistatpriyā smṛtā || 146 ||

kaśyapo brahmaṇoṃśastu pṛthivyā aditistathā |
naṃdo droṇassamākhyāto yaśodātha dharābhavat || 147 ||

athakāmānmahābāhurdevakyāḥ samapūrayat |
ye tayā kāṃkṣitāḥ pūrvamajāttasmānmahātmanaḥ || 148 ||

aciraṃ sa mahādevaḥ praviṣṭo mānuṣīṃ tanuṃ |
mohayansarvabhūtāni yogādyogī samāyayau || 149 ||

naṣṭe dharme tathā yajñe viṣṇurvṛṣṇikule vibhuḥ |
kartuṃ dharmavyavasthānamasurāṇāṃ praṇāśanam || 150 ||

rukmiṇī satyabhāmā ca satyā nāgnijitī tathā |
sumitrā ca tathā śaibyā gāṃdhārī lakṣmaṇā tathā || 151 ||

subhīmā ca tathā mādrī kauśalyā vijayā tathā |
evamādīni devīnāṃ sahasrāṇi ca ṣoḍaśa || 152 ||

rukmiṇī janayāmāsa putrānśṛṇu viśāradān |
cārudeṣṇaṃ raṇeśūraṃ pradyumnañca mahābalam || 153 ||

sucāruṃ cārubhadrañca sadaśvaṃ hrasvameva ca |
saptamañcāruguptañca cārubhadrañca cārukaṃ || 154 ||

cāruhāsaṃ kaniṣṭhañca kanyāñcārumatīṃ tathā |
jajñire satyabhāmāyā bhānurbhīmarathaḥ kṣaṇaḥ || 155 ||

rohito dīptimāṃścaiva tāmrabaṃdho jalaṃdhamaḥ |
catasro jajñire teṣāṃ svasāraśca yavīyasīḥ || 156 ||

jāṃbavatyāḥ suto jajñe sāṃbaścaivātiśobhanaḥ |
sauraśāstrasya karttā vai pratimā maṃdirasya ca || 157 ||

mūlasthāne niveśaśca kṛtastena mahātmanā |
tuṣṭena devadevena kuṣṭharogo vināśitaḥ || 158 ||

sumitraṃ cārumitraṃ ca mitraviṃdā vyajāyata |
mitrabāhuḥ sunīthaśca nāgnajityāṃ babhūvatuḥ || 159 ||

evamādīni putrāṇāṃsahasrāṇi niśāmaya |
aśītiśca sahasrāṇāṃ vāsudevasutāstathā || 160 ||

pradyumnasya ca dāyādo vaidarbhyāṃ buddhisattamaḥ |
aniruddho raṇe yoddhā jajñesya mṛgaketanaḥ || 161 ||

kāmyā supārśvatanayā sāṃbāllebhe tarasvinam |
sattvaprakṛtayo devāḥ parāḥ paṃca prakīrtitāḥ || 162 ||

tisraḥ koṭyaḥ pravīrāṇāṃ yādavānāṃ mahātmanāṃ |
ṣaṣṭiḥ śatasahasrāṇi vīryavaṃto mahābalāḥ || 163 ||

devāṃśāḥ sarva eveha utpannāste mahaujasaḥ |
daivāsure hatā ye vā asurāstu mahābalāḥ || 164 ||

ihotpannā manuṣyeṣu bādhaṃte sarvamānavān |
teṣāmuddharaṇārthāya utpannā yādave kule || 165 ||

kulānāṃ śatamekaṃ ca yādavānāṃ mahātmanām |
viṣṇusteṣāṃ praṇetā ca prabhutve ca vyavasthitaḥ || 166 ||

nideśasthāyinastasya ṛddhyaṃte sarvayādavāḥ |
bhīṣma uvāca |
saptarṣayaḥ kuberaśca yakṣo maṇidharastathā || 167 ||

sātyakirnāradaścaiva śivo dhanvaṃtaristathā |
ādidevastathāviṣṇurebhistu saha daivataiḥ || 168 ||

kimarthaṃ sahasaṃbhūtāḥ surasambhūtayaḥ kṣitau |
bhaviṣyāḥ kati vā cāsya prādurbhāvā mahātmanaḥ || 169 ||

sarvakṣetreṣu sarveṣu kimarthamiha jāyate |
yadarthamiha saṃbhūto viṣṇurvṛṣṇyaṃdhake kule || 170 ||

punaḥpunarmanuṣyeṣu tanme tvaṃ brūhi pṛcchataḥ |
pulastya uvāca |
śṛṇu bhūpa pravakṣyāmi rahasyātirahasyakam |
yathā divyatanurviṣṇurmānuṣeṣviha jāyate || 171 ||

yugāṃte tu parāvṛtte kāle praśithile prabhuḥ |
devāsuramanuṣyeṣu jāyate harirīśvaraḥ || 172 ||

hiraṇyakaśipurdaityastrailokyasya praśāsitā |
balinādhiṣṭhite caiva punarlokatraye kramāt || 173 ||

sakhyamāsītparamakaṃ devānāmasuraiḥ saha |
yugākhyā daśa saṃpūrṇā āsīdavyākulaṃ jagat || 174 ||

nideśasthāyinaścāpi tayordevāsurā svayaṃ |
baddho balirvimardoyaṃ susaṃvṛttaḥ sudāruṇaḥ || 175 ||

devānāmasurāṇāṃ ca ghoraḥ kṣayakaro mahān |
kartuṃ dharmavyavasthāṃ ca jāyate mānuṣeṣviha || 176 ||

bhṛgoḥ śāpanimittaṃ tu devāsurakṛte tadā |
bhīṣma uvāca |
kathaṃ devāsurakṛte harirdehamavāptavān || 177 ||

daivāsuraṃ yathāvṛttaṃ tanme kathaya suvrata |
pulastya uvāca |
teṣāṃ jayanimittaṃ vai saṃgrāmā syuḥ sudāruṇāḥ || 178 ||

avatārā daśadvau ca śuddhā manvaṃtare smṛtāḥ |
nāmadheyaṃ samāsena śṛṇu teṣāṃ vivakṣitam || 179 ||

prathamo nārasiṃhastu dvitīyaścāpi vāmanaḥ |
tṛtīyastu varāhaśca caturtho'mṛtamaṃthanaḥ || 180 ||

saṃgrāmaḥ paṃcamaścaiva sughorastārakāmayaḥ |
ṣaṣṭho hyāḍībakākhyaśca saptamastraipurastathā || 181 ||

aṣṭamaścāṃdhakavadho navamo vṛtraghātanaḥ |
dhvajaśca daśamasteṣāṃ hālāhalastataḥ paraṃ || 182 ||

prathito dvādaśasteṣāṃ ghoraḥ kolāhalastathā |
hiraṇyakaśipurdaityo narasiṃhena sūditaḥ || 183 ||

vāmanena balirbaddhastrailokyākramaṇe purā |
hiraṇyākṣo hato dvaṃdve prativāde tu daivataiḥ || 184 ||

daṃṣṭrayā tu varāheṇa samudrastho dvidhā kṛtaḥ |
prahlādo nirjito yuddhe iṃdreṇāmṛtamaṃthane || 185 ||

virocanastu prāhlādirnityamindravadhodyataḥ |
iṃdreṇaiva ca vikramya nihatastārakāmaye || 186 ||

aśaknuvatsu deveṣu tripuraṃ soḍhumāsuram |
mohayitvā'mṛte pīte gorūpeṇāsurāriṇā || 187 ||

nāsanjīvayituṃ śakyā bhūyo bhūyomṛtāsurāḥ |
nihatā dānavāḥ sarve trailokye tryaṃbakeṇa tu || 188 ||

asurāśca piśācāśca dānavāścāṃdhake vadhe |
hatā devamanuṣyaiste pitṛbhiścaiva sarvaśaḥ || 189 ||

saṃpṛkto dānavairvṛtro ghore kolāhale hataḥ |
tadā viṣṇusahāyena maheṃdreṇa nipātitaḥ || 190 ||

hatastato maheṃdreṇa māyāchannastu yogavit |
vajreṇa kṣaṇamāviśya vipracittiḥ sahānugaḥ || 191 ||

daityāśca dānavāścaiva saṃyutāḥ kṛtsnaśastu te |
ete daivā'surāvṛttāḥ saṃgrāmādvā daśaiva tu || 192 ||

devāsurakṣayakarāḥ prajānāṃ ca hitāya vai |
hiraṇyakaśipū rājā varṣāṇāmarbudaṃ babhau || 193 ||

dvisaptatiṃ tathānyāni niyutānyadhikāni tu |
aśīti ca sahasrāṇi trailokyaiśvaryavānabhūt || 194 ||

paryāyeṇa tu rājābhūdbalirvarṣārbudaṃ punaḥ |
ṣaṣṭhiṃ caiva sahasrāṇi niyutāni ca viṃśatiṃ || 195 ||

balirājyādhikāre tu yāvatkālaśca kīrtitaḥ |
tāvatkālaṃ tu prahlādo nirvṛto hyasuraiḥ saha || 196 ||

jayārthamete vijñeyā asurāṇāṃ mahaujasaḥ |
trailokyamidamavyagraṃ maheṃdreṇānupālyate || 197 ||

asampannamidaṃ sarvaṃ yāvadvarṣāyutaṃ punaḥ |
paryāyeṇaiva samprāpte trailokyaṃ pākaśāsane || 198 ||

tato'surānparityajya yajño devānagacchata |
yajñe devānatha gate ditijāḥ kāvyamabruvan || 199 ||

daityā ūcuḥ |
hṛtaṃ maghavatā rājyaṃ tyaktvā yajñaḥ surāngataḥ |
sthātuṃ na śuknumo hyatra praviśāmo rasātalam || 200 ||

evamuktobravīdetānviṣaṇṇānsāṃtvayangirā |
mā bhaiṣṭa dhārayiṣyāmi tejasā svena vo'surāḥ || 201 ||

maṃtrāścauṣadhayaścaiva dharāyāṃ yattu vartate |
mayi tiṣṭhati tatsarvaṃ pādamātraṃ sureṣu vai || 202 ||

tatsarvaṃ ca pradāsyāmi yuṣmadarthe dhṛtaṃ mayā |
tato devāstutāndṛṣṭvā dhṛtānkāvyena dhīmatā || 203 ||

amaṃtrayaṃta devā vai saṃvignāstajjighṛkṣayā |
kāvyo hyeṣa idaṃ sarvaṃ vyāvartayati no balāt || 204 ||

sādhu gacchāmahe tūrṇaṃ yāvanna cyāvayeta vai |
prasahya jitvā śiṣṭāṃstu pātālaṃ prāpayāmahe || 205 ||

tato devāstu saṃrabdhā dānavānupasṛtya ha |
tataste vadhyamānāstaiḥ kāvyamevābhidudruvuḥ || 206 ||

tataḥ kāvyastu tāndṛṣṭvā tūrṇaṃ devairabhidrutān |
rakṣākāryeṇa saṃhṛtya devebhyastānsurārditān || 207 ||

kāvyaṃ dṛṣṭvā sthitaṃ devā nirviśaṃkāstu te jahuḥ |
tataḥ kāvyonuciṃtyātha brahmaṇo vacanaṃ hitam || 208 ||

tānuvāca tataḥ kāvyaḥ pūrvavṛttamanusmaran |
trailokyaṃ vo hṛtaṃ sarvaṃ vāmanena tribhiḥ kramaiḥ || 209 ||

balirbaddho hato jaṃbho nihataśca virocanaḥ |
mahāsurā dvādaśasu saṃgrāmeṣu surairhatāḥ || 210 ||

taistairupāyairbhūyiṣṭhā nihatāstu pradhānataḥ |
kecicchiṣṭāśca yūyaṃ vai yuddhaṃ nāstīti me matam || 211 ||

nītayo vo vidhātavyā upāse kālaparyayāt |
yāsyāmyahaṃ mahādevaṃ maṃtrārthaṃ vijayāvaham || 212 ||

apratīpāṃstato devānmaṃtrānprāpya maheśvarāt |
yotsyāmahe punardevaistataḥ prāpsyatha vai jayam || 213 ||

tataste kṛtasaṃvādā devānūcustadāsurāḥ |
nyastaśastrā vayaṃ sarve niḥssannāhā rathairvinā || 214 ||

vayaṃ tapaścariṣyāmaḥ saṃvṛtā valkalaistathā |
devāsteṣāṃ vacaḥ śrutvā satyābhivyāhṛtaṃ tataḥ || 215 ||

tatonyavartayansarve vijvarā muditāśca te |
nyastaśastreṣu daityeṣu vinivṛttāstadā surāḥ || 216 ||

tatastānabravītkāvya upādhvaṃ tapasi sthitāḥ |
nirutsiktāstapoyuktāḥ kālaṃ kāryārthasādhakam || 217 ||

piturāśramasaṃsthā vai māṃ pratīkṣatha dānavāḥ |
tānuddiśyāsurānkāvyo mahādevaṃ prapadyata || 218 ||

śukra uvāca |
maṃtrānicchāmyahaṃ deva yena santi bṛhaspatau |
parābhavāya devānāmasurāṇāṃ jayāya ca || 219 ||

evamuktobravīddevo vrataṃ tvaṃ cara bhārgava |
pūrṇaṃ varṣasahasraṃ tu kaṇadhūmamadhaḥ śirāḥ || 220 ||

yadi pāsyasi bhadraṃ te tato maṃtrānavāpsyasi |
tatheti samanujñāpya śukrastu bhṛgunaṃdanaḥ || 221 ||

pādau saṃspṛśya devasya bāḍhamityabravīdvacaḥ |
vrataṃ carāmyahaṃ deva tvayādiṣṭodya vai prabho || 222 ||

ādiṣṭo devadevena kṛtavānbhārgavo muniḥ |
tadā tasmingate śukre asurāṇāṃ hitāya vai || 223 ||

maṃtrārthe tanute kāvyo brahmacaryaṃ maheśvarāt |
tadbuddhvā nītipūrvaṃ vai rājanyāstu tadā sukhaṃ || 224 ||

asmiṃśchidre tadāmarṣāddevāstānabhidudruvuḥ |
daṃśitāḥ sāyudhāḥ sarve bṛhaspatipuraḥsarāḥ || 225 ||

dṛṣṭvā suragaṇā devānpragṛhītāyudhānpunaḥ |
utpetussahasā sarve saṃtrastāstānvacobruvat || 226 ||

daityā ūcuḥ |
nyastaśastrā vayaṃ devā ācārye vratamāsthite |
datvā bhavaṃtastvabhayaṃ saṃprāptā no jighāṃsayā || 227 ||

anamarṣā vayaṃ sarve tyaktaśastrāśca saṃsthitāḥ |
cīrakṛṣṇājinadharā niṣkriyā niṣparigrahāḥ || 228 ||

raṇe vijetuṃ devāṃśca na śakṣyāmaḥ kathaṃcana |
ayuddhena prapatsyāmaḥ śaraṇaṃ kāvyamātaram || 229 ||

jñāpayāmaḥ kṛcchramidaṃ yāvannābhyeti no guruḥ |
nivṛtte ca tathā śukre yotsyāmo daṃśitāyudhāḥ || 230 ||

evamuktvā ca tenyonyaṃ śaraṇaṃ kāvyamātaram |
prāpadyaṃta tato bhītāstebhyo'dādabhayaṃ tu sā || 231 ||

na bhetavyaṃ na bhetavyaṃ bhayaṃ tyajata dānavāḥ |
matsannidhau varttatāṃ vo na bhīrbhaviturmahati || 232 ||

tayābhirakṣitāṃstāṃśca dṛṣṭvā devāstadā'surān |
abhijagmuḥ prasahyaitānavicārya balābalam || 233 ||

tatastānbadhyamānāṃstu devairdṛṣṭvāsurāṃstadā |
devī kruddhābravīddevānnidrayā mohayāmyaham || 234 ||

saṃbhṛtya sarvasaṃbhārānnidrāṃ sā vyasṛjattadā |
tastaṃbha devī ca balādyogayuktā tapodhanā || 235 ||

tatastaṃ stabhitaṃ dṛṣṭvā indraṃ devāśca mūḍhavat |
prādravaṃta tato bhītā indraṃ dṛṣṭvā vaśīkṛtam || 236 ||

gateṣu surasaṃgheṣu viṣṇuriṃdramabhāṣata |
viṣṇuruvāca |
māṃ tvaṃ praviśa bhadraṃ te rakṣiṣye tvāṃ surottama || 237 ||

evamuktastato viṣṇuṃ praviveśa puraṃdaraḥ |
viṣṇusaṃrakṣitaṃ dṛṣṭvā devī kruddhā vaco'bravīt || 238 ||

eṣa tvāṃ viṣṇunā sārdhaṃ dahāmi maghavanbalāt |
miṣatāṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ dṛśyatāṃ me tapobalam || 239 ||

tayābhibhūtau tau devāviṃdraviṣṇū babhūvatuḥ |
kathaṃ mucyeya sahito viṣṇuriṃdramabhāṣata || 240 ||

iṃdrobravījjahi hyenāṃ yāvannau na dahetprabho |
viśeṣeṇābhibhūtosmi jahīmāṃ jahi mā ciram || 241 ||

tataḥ samīkṣya viṣṇustāṃstrīvadhe kṛcchramāsthitaḥ |
abhidhyāya tataḥ śakramāpannaṃ satvaraṃ prabhuḥ || 242 ||

tataḥ sa tvarayāyuktaḥ śīghrakārī bhayānvitaḥ |
jñātvā viṣṇustatastasyāḥ krūraṃ devyāścikīrṣitam || 243 ||

kruddhaśca cakramādāya śiraściccheda vai bhayāt |
taṃ dṛṣṭvā strīvadhaṃ ghoraṃ cukrodha bhṛgurīśvaraḥ || 244 ||

tato hi śapto bhṛguṇā viṣṇurbhāryāvadhe kṛte |
bhṛguruvāca |
yattvayā jānatā dharmamavadhyā strī niṣūditā || 245 ||

tasmāttvaṃ saptakṛtvo hi mānuṣeṣūpayāsyasi |
tatastenābhiśāpena naṣṭe dharme punaḥpunaḥ || 246 ||

lokasya ca hitārthāya jāyate mānuṣeṣviha |
atha vyāhṛtya viṣṇuṃ sa tadādāya śiraḥ svayam || 247 ||

samānīya tataḥ kāyaṃ pāṇau gṛhyedamabravīt |
bhṛguruvāca |
eṣā tvaṃ viṣṇunā devi hatā saṃjīvayāmyahaṃ || 248 ||

yadi kṛtsno mayā dharmo jñāyate caritopi vā |
tena satyena jīvasva yadi satyaṃ bravīmyaham || 249 ||

tatastāṃ prokṣya śītādbhirjīvajīveti sobravīt |
tatobhivyāhṛte tasmindevī saṃjīvitā tadā || 250 ||

tatastāṃ sarvabhūtāni dṛṣṭvā suptotthitāmiva |
sādhusādhviti dṛṣṭvaiva vacastāṃ sarvatobruvan || 251 ||

evaṃ pratyāhṛtā tena devī sā bhṛguṇā tadā |
miṣatāṃ daivatānāṃ hi tadadbhutamivābhavat || 252 ||

asaṃbhrāṃtena bhṛguṇā patnī saṃjīvitā punaḥ |
dṛṣṭvā ceṃdro nālabhata śarma kāvyabhayātpunaḥ || 253 ||

prajāgare tataśceṃdro jayaṃtīmidamabravīt |
saṃdhikāmobhyadhādvākyaṃ svāṃ kanyāṃ pākaśāsanaḥ || 254 ||

indra uvāca |
eṣa kāvyo hyaniṃdrāya vrataṃ carati dāruṇam |
tenāhaṃ vyākulaḥ putri kṛto matimatā dṛḍham || 255 ||

taistairmanonukūlaiśca upacārairataṃdritā |
ārādhaya tathā putri yathā tuṣyeta sa dvijaḥ || 256 ||

gaccha tvaṃ tasya dattāsi prayatnaṃ kuru matkṛte |
evamuktā jayaṃtī sā vacaḥ saṃgṛhya vai pituḥ || 257 ||

agacchadyatra ghoraṃ sa tapo hyārabhya tiṣṭhati |
taṃ dṛṣṭvā ca pibaṃtaṃ sā kaṇadhūmamadhomukham || 258 ||

yakṣeṇa pātyamānaṃ ca kuṃḍadhāreṇa pāvanam |
dṛṣṭvā taṃ yatamānaṃ tu devī kāvyamavasthitam || 259 ||

śatrūpaghāte śrāmyaṃntaṃ durbalasthitimāsthitam |
pitrā yathoktaṃ vākyaṃ sā kāvye kṛtavatī tadā || 260 ||

gīrbhiścaivānukūlābhiḥ stuvaṃtī valgubhāṣiṇī |
gātrasaṃvāhanaiḥ kāle sevamānā tvacaḥ sukhaiḥ || 261 ||

vratacaryānukūlābhirupāsya bahulāḥ samāḥ |
pūrṇe dhūmavrate tasminghore varṣasahasrake || 262 ||

vareṇa chaṃdayāmāsa śivaḥ prītobhavattadā |
maheśvara uvāca |
etadvrataṃ tvayaikena cīrṇaṃ nānyena kenacit || 263 ||

tasmādvai tapasā buddhyā śrutena ca balena ca |
tejasā ca surānsarvāṃstvamekobhibhaviṣyasi || 264 ||

yacca kiṃcinmayi brahmanvidyate bhṛgunaṃdana |
pratidāsyāmi tatsarvaṃ tvayā vācyaṃ na kasyacit || 265 ||

kiṃ bhāṣitena bahunā avadhyastvaṃ bhaviṣyasi |
tāndatvā tu varāṃstasmai bhārgavāya punaḥ punaḥ || 266 ||

prajeśatvaṃ dhaneśatvamavadhyatvaṃ ca vai dadau |
etānlabdhvā varānkāvyaḥ saṃprahṛṣṭatanūruhaḥ || 267 ||

evamābhāṣya deveśamīśvaraṃ nīlalohitam |
prajñānvitastatastasmai prāñjali praṇato 'bhavat || 268 ||

tataḥ soṃ'tarhite deve jayaṃtīmidamabravīt |
kasya tvaṃ subhage kā vā duḥkhite mayi duḥkhitā || 269 ||

mahatā tapasā yuktā kimarthaṃ māṃ jigīṣasi |
anayā saṃsthitā bhaktyā praśrayeṇa damena ca || 270 ||

snehena caiva suśroṇi prītosmi varavarṇini |
kimicchasi varārohe kaste kāmaḥ samudyataḥ || 271 ||

taṃ te saṃpādayāmyadya yadyapi syātsuduṣkaram |
evamuktābravīdenaṃ tapasā jñātumarhasi || 272 ||

cikīrṣitaṃ hi me brahmaṃstvaṃ vai vada yathātatham |
evamuktobravīdenaṃ dṛṣṭvā divyena cakṣuṣā || 273 ||

mayā saha tvaṃ suśroṇi śatavarṣāṇi bhāmini |
sarvabhūtairadṛśyāṃtaḥ saṃprayogamihecchasi || 274 ||

devi iṃdīvaraśyāme varārhe vāmalocane |
evaṃ vṛṇoṣi kāmāṃstvaṃ dade vai valgubhāṣite || 275 ||

evaṃ bhavatu gacchāva gṛhaṃ me mattakāśini |
tataḥ sa gṛhamāgamya jayaṃtyā saha cośanā || 276 ||

tayā sahāvasaddevyā śatavarṣāṇi bhārgavaḥ |
adṛśyaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ māyayā saṃśitavrataḥ || 277 ||

kṛtārthamāgataṃ jñātvā śukraṃ sarve ditessutāḥ |
abhijagmurgṛhaṃ tasya muditāste didṛkṣavaḥ || 278 ||

gatā yadā na paśyaṃti māyayā saṃvṛtaṃ gurum |
lakṣaṇaṃ tasya cābuddhvā nādyāgacchati no guruḥ || 279 ||

evaṃ te svāni dhiṣṇyāni gatāḥ sarve yathāgatāḥ |
tato devagaṇāssarve gatvāṃgirasamabruvan || 280 ||

dānavālaye tu bhagavāngatvā tatra ca tāṃ camūm |
mohayitvātmavaśagāṃ kṣiprameva tathā kuru || 281 ||

dhiṣaṇastānsurānāha evameva vrajāmyaham |
tena gatvā dānaveṃdraḥ prahlādo vai vaśīkṛtaḥ || 282 ||

śukro bhūtvā sthitastatra paurohityaṃ cakāra saḥ |
sthito varṣaśataṃ sāgramuśanā tāvadāgataḥ || 283 ||

danuputraistato dṛṣṭaḥ sabhāyāṃ tu bṛhaspatiḥ |
uśanā eka evātra dvitīyaḥ kimihāgataḥ || 284 ||

sumahatkautukaṃ cātra bhavitā vigraho dṛḍham |
kiṃ vadiṣyati lokoyaṃ dvāri yoyaṃ vyavasthitaḥ || 285 ||

sabhāyāmāsthito yoyaṃ guruḥ kiṃ no vadiṣyati |
evaṃ prajalpatāṃ teṣāṃ danūnāṃ kavirāgataḥ || 286 ||

svarūpadhāriṇaṃ tatra dṛṣṭvāsīnaṃ bṛhaspatim |
uvāca vacanaṃ kruddhaḥ kimarthaṃ tvamihāgataḥ || 287 ||

śiṣyānmohayase me tvaṃ yuktaṃ suragurostava |
mūḍhāste tvāṃ na jānaṃti tvanmāyāmohitā dhruvam || 288 ||

tanna yuktaṃ tava brahmanparaśiṣyapradharṣaṇam |
vraja tvaṃ devalokaṃ svaṃ tiṣṭha dharmamavāpsyasi || 289 ||

śiṣyo hi me kacaḥ pūrvaṃ hato dānavapuṃgavaiḥ |
vidyārthī tanayo brahmaṃstavāyogyā gatistviha || 290 ||

śrutvā tu tasya tadvākyaṃ smitaṃ kṛtvāvadadguruḥ |
saṃti corāḥ pṛthivyāṃ yeparadravyāpahāriṇaḥ || 291 ||

evaṃ vidhānadṛṣṭāśca rūpadehāpahāriṇaḥ |
vṛtraghātena ceṃdrasya brahmahahatyā purābhavat || 292 ||

lokāyatika śāstreṇa bhavatā sā tiraskṛtā |
jānāmi tvāmāṃgirasaṃ devācāryaṃ bṛhaspatim || 293 ||

madrūpadhāriṇaṃ prāptaṃ sarve paśyata dānavāḥ |
eṣa vo mohanāyālaṃ prāpto viṣṇuviceṣṭitaiḥ || 294 ||

tadenaṃ śṛṃkhalairbaddhvā kṣipeta lavaṇārṇave |
punarevābravīcchukraḥ purodhāyaṃ divaukasām || 295 ||

mohitānūnametena kṣayaṃ yāsyatha dānavāḥ |
bho ahaṃ dānaveṃdreha vaṃcito'smi durātmanā || 296 ||

kimarthaṃ bhavatā tyaktaḥ kṛtaścānyaḥ purohitaḥ |
devācāryaoṃgiraḥputraeṣaevabṛhaspatiḥ || 297 ||

vaṃcitosi na saṃdeho hitārthaṃ tu divaukasām |
tyajasvainaṃ mahābhāga śatrupakṣajayāvaham || 298 ||

anuśiṣyabhayādyātaḥ pūrvamevamahaṃ prabho |
jalamadhyesthitaḥ pīto mahādevena śaṃbhunā || 299 ||

udarasthasya me jātaṃ sāgraṃ varṣaśataṃ kila |
udarācchukrarūpeṇa śiśnenāhaṃ visarjitaḥ || 300 ||

varadaḥ prāha māṃ devaśśukreṣṭaṃ tvaṃ varaṃ vṛṇu |
mayāvṛto varaṃ rājandevadevaḥ pinākadhṛt || 301 ||

manasā ciṃtitā hyarthā mānase ye sthitā varāḥ |
bhavaṃtu mayi te sarve prasādāttava śaṃkara || 302 ||

evamastviti devena preṣito'smi tavāṃtikam |
tāvadatrābhavaccāyaṃ purodhāste bṛhaspatiḥ || 303 ||

dṛṣṭaḥ satyaṃ dānaveṃdra mayoktaṃ tvaṃ niśāmaya |
bṛhaspatistadā vākyaṃ prahlādaṃ pratyabhāṣata || 304 ||

nāhametaṃ prajānāmi devaṃ vā dānavaṃ naram |
madrūpadhāriṇaṃ rājanvaṃcanārthaṃ tavāgatam || 305 ||

tataste dānavāḥ sarve sādhusādhviti vādinaḥ |
purodhāḥ paurviko nostu yo vā ko vā bhavatviti || 306 ||

nānena kāryamasmākaṃ yā tu hyeṣa yathāgataḥ |
sakrodhamaśapatkāvyo dānaveṃdrānsamāgatān || 307 ||

tyakto yathāhaṃ yuṣmābhistathā sarvāṃścirādiva |
gataśrīkāngataprāṇānpaśyeyaṃ duḥkhajīvikān || 308 ||

sughorāmāpadaṃ prāptānacirādeva sarvaśaḥ |
evamuktvā gataḥ kāvyo yadṛcchātastapovanam || 309 ||

tasmingate tataḥ śukre sthitastatra bṛhaspatiḥ |
pālayandānavāṃstatra kiṃcitkālamatiṣṭhata || 310 ||

tato bahutithe kāle atikrāṃte nareśvara |
saṃbhūya dānavāḥ sarve paryapṛchaṃstadā gurum || 311 ||

saṃsāresminnasāre tu kiṃcijjñānaṃ prayaccha naḥ |
yena mokṣaṃ vrajāmaśca prasādāttava suvrata || 312 ||

tataḥ suraguruḥ prāha kāvyarūpī tadā guruḥ |
mamāpyeṣā matiḥ pūrvaṃ yā yuṣmābhirudāhṛtā || 313 ||

kṣaṇaṃ kurvaṃtu sahitāśśucībhūya samāhitāḥ |
jñānaṃ vakṣyāmi vo daityā ahaṃ vai mokṣadāyi yat || 314 ||

eṣā śrutirvaidikī yā ṛgyajuḥsāmasaṃjñitā |
vaiśvānaraprasādāttu duḥkhadā prāṇināmiha || 315 ||

yajñaśrāddhaṃ kṛtaṃ kṣudrairaihikasvārthatatparaiḥ |
ye tvamī vaiṣṇavā dharmā ye ca rudrakṛtāstathā || 316 ||

kudharmā dārasahitairhiṃsāprāyāḥ kṛtāhitaiḥ |
arddhanārīśvaro rudra kathaṃ mokṣaṃ gamiṣyati || 317 ||

vṛto bhūtagaṇairbhūribhūṣitaścāsthibhistathā |
na svargo naiva mokṣotra lokāḥ kliśyaṃti vai tathā || 318 ||

hiṃsāyāmāsthito viṣṇuḥ kathaṃ mokṣaṃ gamiṣyati |
rajoguṇātmako brahmā svāṃ sṛṣṭimupajīvati || 319 ||

devarṣayotha ye cānye vaidikaṃ pakṣamāśritāḥ |
hiṃsāprāyāḥ sadā krūrā māṃsādāḥ pāpakāriṇaḥ || 320 ||

surāstu madyapānena māṃsādā brāhmaṇāstvamī |
dharmeṇānena kaḥ svargaṃ kathaṃ mokṣaṃ gamiṣyati || 321 ||

yacca yajñādikaṃ karma smārtaṃ śrāddhādikaṃ tathā |
tatra naivāpavargosti yatraiṣā śrūyate śrutiḥ || 322 ||

yajñaṃ kṛtvā paśuṃ hatvā kṛtvā rudhirakardamam |
yadyevaṃ gamyate svargo narakaḥ kena gamyate || 323 ||

yadi bhuktamihānyena tṛptiranyasya jāyate |
dadyātpravasataḥ śrāddhaṃ na sa bhojanamāharet || 324 ||

ākāśagāmino viprāḥ patitā māṃsabhakṣaṇāt |
teṣāṃ na vidyate svargo mokṣo naiveha dānavāḥ || 325 ||

jātasya jīvitaṃ jaṃtoriṣṭaṃ sarvasya jāyate |
ātmamāṃsopamaṃ māṃsaṃ kathaṃ khādeta paṃḍitaḥ || 326 ||

yonijāstu kathaṃ yoniṃ sevaṃte jaṃtavastvamī |
maithunena kathaṃ svargaṃ yāsyaṃte dānaveśvara |
mṛdbhasmanā yatraśuddhistatra śuddhistu kā bhavet || 327 ||

viparītatamaṃ lokaṃ paśya dānava yādṛśam |
viṇmūtrasya kṛtotsarge śiśnāpāne tu śodhanam || 328 ||
bhukte vā bhojane rājankathaṃ nāpānaśiśnayoḥ || 329 ||

kriyate śodhanaṃ tadvadviparītā sthitistviyam |
yatra prakṣālanaṃ proktaṃ tatra tenaiva kurvate || 330 ||

tārāṃ bṛṃhaspaterbhāryāṃ hṛtvā somaḥ purā gataḥ |
tasyāṃ jāto budhaḥ putro gururjagrāha tāṃ punaḥ || 331 ||

gautamasya muneḥ patnīmahalyāṃ nāma nāmataḥ |
agṛhṇāttāṃ svayaṃ śakraḥ paśya dharmo yathāvidhaḥ || 332 ||

etadanyacca jagati dṛśyate pāpadāyakam |
evaṃvidho yatra dharmaḥ paramārtho matastu kaḥ || 333 ||

vadasva tvaṃ dānaveṃdra vada bhūyo vadāmi te |
gurostu gaditaṃ śrutvā paramārthānvitaṃ vacaḥ || 334 ||

jātakautūhalāstatra viviktāstu bhavārṇavāt |
dānavā ūcuḥ |
dīkṣayasva guro sarvānprapannānbhaktitaḥ sthitān || 335 ||

yena vai na punarmohaṃ vrajāmastava śāsanāt |
suviraktāḥ sma saṃsāre śokamohapradāyini || 336 ||

uddharasva guro sarvānkeśākarṣeṇa kūpataḥ |
kasya devasya śaraṇaṃ gacchāmo brāhmaṇottama || 337 ||

daivataṃ ca prapannānāṃ prakāśaya mahāmate |
smaraṇenopavāsena dhyānadhāraṇayā tathā || 338 ||

pūjopahāre ca kṛte apavargastu labhyate |
viraktāssma kuṭuṃbe tu bhūyo nātra yatāmahe || 339 ||

evaṃ caiva guruśchannastairukto danupuṃgavaiḥ |
ciṃtayāmāsa tatkāryaṃ kathametatkaromyaham || 340 ||

kathamete mayā pāpāḥ kartavyā narakaukasaḥ |
viḍaṃbanācchruterbāhyāstrailokye hāsyakāriṇaḥ || 341 ||

ityuktvā dhiṣaṇo rājaṃścintayāmāsa keśavam |
tasya tacciṃtitaṃ jñātvā māyāmohaṃ janārdanaḥ || 342 ||

samutpādya dadau tasya prāha cedaṃ bṛhaspatim |
māyāmohoyamakhilāṃstāndaityānmohayiṣyati || 343 ||

bhavatā sahitaḥ sarvānvedamārgabahiṣkṛtān |
evamādiśya bhagavānaṃtarddhānaṃ jagāma ha || 344 ||

tapasyabhiratānsotha māyāmoho gato'surān |
teṣāṃ samīpamāgatya bṛhaspatiruvāca ha || 345 ||

anugrahārthaṃ yuṣmākaṃ bhaktyā prītastvihāgataḥ |
yogī digambaro muṇḍo barhipatradharo hyayam || 346 ||

ityukte guruṇā paścānmāyāmohobravīdvacaḥ |
bho bho daityādhipatayaḥ prabrūta tapasi sthitāḥ || 347 ||

ehikārthaṃ tu pārakyaṃ tapasaḥ phalamicchatha |
dānavā ūcuḥ |
pārakyadharmalābhāya tapaścaryā hi no matā || 348 ||

asmābhiriyamārabdhā kiṃ vā tatra vivakṣitam |
digaṃbara uvāca |
kurudhvaṃ mama vākyāni yadi muktimabhīpsatha || 349 ||

ārhataṃ sarvametacca muktidvāramasaṃvṛtam |
dharmādvimukterarhoyaṃ naitasmādaparaḥ paraḥ || 350 ||

atraivāvasthitāḥ svargaṃ muktiṃ cāpi gamiṣyatha |
evaṃprakārairbahubhirmuktidarśanavarjitaiḥ || 351 ||

māyāmohena te daityāḥ vedamārgabahiṣkṛtāḥ |
dharmāyaitadadharmāya sadetadasadityapi || 352 ||

vimuktaye tvidaṃ naitadvimuktiṃ saṃprayacchati |
paramārthoyamatyarthaṃ paramārtho na cāpyayam || 353 ||

kāryametadakāryaṃ hi naitadetatsphuṭaṃ tvidam |
digvāsasāmayaṃ dharmo dharmoyaṃ bahuvāsasām || 354 ||

ityanekārthavādāṃstu māyāmohena te yataḥ |
uktāstato'khilā daityāḥ svadharmāṃstyājitā nṛpa || 355 ||

arhadhvaṃ māmakaṃ dharmaṃ māyāmohena te yataḥ |
uktāstamāśritā dharmamārhatāstena tebhavan || 356 ||

trayīmārgaṃ samutsṛjya māyāmohena tesurāḥ |
kāritāstanmayā hyāsaṃstathānye tatprabodhitāḥ || 357 ||

tairapyanye pare taiśca tairanyonyaistathāpare |
namo'rhate ceti sarve saṃgame sthiravādinaḥ || 358 ||

alpairahobhiḥ saṃtyaktā tairdaityaiḥ prāyaśastrayī |
punaśca raktāṃbaradhṛnmāyāmoho jitekṣaṇaḥ || 359 ||

sonyānapyasurāngatvā ūcenyanmadhurākṣaram |
svargārthaṃ yadi vo vāñchā nirvāṇārthāya vā punaḥ || 360 ||

tadalaṃ paśughātādi duṣṭadharmairnibodhata |
vijñānamayametadvai tvaśeṣamadhigacchata || 361 ||

budhyadhvaṃ me vacaḥ samyagbudhairevamihoditam |
jagadetadanādhāraṃ bhrāṃtijñānānutatparam || 362 ||

rāgādiduṣṭamatyarthaṃ bhrāmyate bhavasaṃkaṭe |
nānāprakāraṃ vacanaṃ sa teṣāṃ muktiyojitam || 363 ||

tathā tathāvadaddharmaṃ tatyajuste yathāyathā |
kecidviniṃdāṃ vedānāṃ devānāmapare nṛpa || 364 ||

yajñakarmakalāpasya tathā cānye dvijanmanām |
naitadyuktisahaṃ vākyaṃ hiṃsā dharmāya jāyate || 365 ||

havīṃṣyanaladagdhāni phalānyarhaṃti kovidāḥ |
nihatasya paśoryajñe svargaprāptiryadīṣyate || 366 ||

svapitā yajamānena kiṃ vā tatra na hanyate |
tṛptaye jāyate puṃso bhuktamanyena cedyadi || 367 ||

dadyācchrāddhaṃ pravasato na vaheyuḥ pravāsinaḥ |
yajñairanekairdevatvamavāpyeṃdreṇa bhujyate || 368 ||

śamyādi yadi cetkāṣṭhaṃ tadvaraṃ patrabhukpaśuḥ |
janā śraddheyamityetadavagamya tu tadvacaḥ || 369 ||

upekṣya śreyase vākyaṃ rocatāṃ yanmayeritam |
na hyāptavādā nabhaso nipataṃti mahāsurāḥ || 370 ||

yuktimadvacanaṃ grāhyaṃ mayānyaiśca bhavadvidhaiḥ |
dānavā ūcuḥ |
tatvavāde vayaṃ sarve prapannāstava bhaktitaḥ || 371 ||

kuruṣvānugrahaṃ cādya prasannosi yadi prabho |
saṃbhārānāharāmodya dīkṣāyogyāṃśca sarvaśaḥ || 372 ||

prasādāttava yenāśu mokṣo hastagato bhavet |
tatastānabravītsarvānmāyāmohosurāṃstadā || 373 ||

prapannaḥ śāsanaṃ hyeṣa madīyo gururagryadhīḥ |
dīkṣāṃ dāsyati yuṣmākaṃ nideśānmama sattamaḥ || 374 ||

etāndīkṣaya bho brahmanvacanānmama putrakān |
gate mohe dānavāste bhārgavaṃ vākyamabruvan || 375 ||

dehi dīkṣāṃ mahābhāga sarvasaṃsāramocanīm |
tathetyāhośanā daityāngacchāmo narmadāmanu || 376 ||

bhobhostyajata vāsāṃsi dīkṣāṃ kārayitāsmi vaḥ |
evaṃ te dānavā bhīṣma bhṛgurūpeṇa dhīmatā || 377 ||

āṃgirasena te tatra kṛtā digvāsasosurāḥ |
barhipicchadhvajaṃ teṣāṃ guṃjikā cārumālikāṃ || 378 ||

datvā cakāra teṣāṃ tu śiraso luṃcanaṃ tataḥ |
keśasyotpāṭanaṃ caiva paramaṃ dharmasādhanam || 379 ||

dhanānāmīśvaro devo dhanadaḥ keśaluṃcanāt |
siddhiṃ paramikāṃ prāptāḥ sadā veṣasya dhāraṇāt || 380 ||

nityatvaṃ labhyate hyevaṃ purā prāhārhataḥ svayam |
vālotpāṭena devatvaṃ mānuṣairlabhyate tviha || 381 ||

kiṃ na kurvīta tattasmānmahāpuṇyapradaṃ yataḥ |
manoratho hi devānāṃ loke vai mānuṣe kadā || 382 ||

asminsyādbhārate varṣe janmanaḥ śrāvake kule |
tapasā yuñjmahesmānvai keśotpāṭanapūrvakam || 383 ||

tīrthaṃkarāścaturviṃśattathā taistu puraskṛtāḥ |
chāyākṛtaṃ phaṇīṃdreṇa dhyānamārgapradarśakam || 384 ||

stuvantaṃ maṃtravādena svargo hastagatorhataṃ |
mokṣo vā bhavitā nūnaṃ vicāraḥ kotra kathyate || 385 ||

kadā syāmarṣayo bhūtvā sūryāgnisamatejasaḥ |
japtvā virāgiṇaścaivamanupaṃcāṃgakaṃ tathā || 386 ||

tathā tapasyatāṃ mṛtyuṃ gatānāṃ kālaparyayāt |
pāṣāṇena śirobhagnaṃ bhavate puṇyakarmaṇām || 387 ||

araṇye nirjane vāsaḥkadā vai bhavitā hi naḥ |
karṇajapyaṃ śrāvakāśca kariṣyaṃti samāhitāḥ || 388 ||

bhobho ṛṣe na gaṃtavyaṃ mokṣamārgī yato bhavān |
labdhāni yāni sthānāni bhūyovṛttikarāṇi ca || 389 ||

tyājyāni tena caitāni satyameva vaco hi naḥ |
asmadīyena tapasā niyamairvividhaistathā || 390 ||

vrajadhvaṃ cottamaṃ sthānaṃ mokṣamārgaṃ ca yaṃ budhāḥ |
viṃdaṃti bhaktibhāvena tapoyuktāstapasvinaḥ || 391 ||

akṣeṣu nigraho yatra dayābhūteṣu sarvadā |
tattapodharmamityuktaṃ sarvā cānyā viḍaṃbanā || 392 ||

jñātvaitadbhavatā sādhyaṃ gaṃtavyaṃ paramaṃ padam |
yāṃ vai tīrthaṃkarā yātā yāṃ gatiṃ yogino gatāḥ || 393 ||

evaṃ vai devatāḥ pūrvaṃ vidyādharamahoragāḥ |
manorathābhilāṣāṃste ciṃtayaṃto divāniśam || 394 ||

yadyeṣaṇā vai yuṣmākaṃ saṃsāraviratau kṛtā |
parityajadhvaṃ dārāṇi svargamārgārgalāni ca || 395 ||

yasyāṃ yonau pitā yātastāṃ yoniṃ sevase katham |
ātmamāṃsopamaṃ māṃsaṃ kathaṃ khādaṃti jaṃtavaḥ || 396 ||

tataste dānavā bhīṣmā ūcuḥ sarve guruṃ vacaḥ |
dīkṣasva no mahābhāga bhrūṇakānagrataḥ sthitān || 397 ||

tathā kṛtvā sa tānāha samayena purohitaḥ |
praṇāmo nānyadeveṣu kartavyo vaḥ kadācana || 398 ||

ekasthāne yadā bhaktaṃ bhoktavyaṃ karasaṃpuṭe |
tatrasthāne sthitaṃ toyaṃ keśakīṭavivarjitam || 399 ||

tulyaṃ priyāpriyaṃ kāryaṃ nānyadṛṣṭihataṃ kvacit |
bhoktavyametena vibho ācāreṇa tathā kuru || 400 ||

bhavadhvaṃ sahitā yūyaṃ te tathā mokṣabhāginaḥ |
evamuktvā sa niyamānkṛtvā tāndanupuṃgavān || 401 ||

jagāma dhiṣaṇo rājandevalokaṃ divaukasām |
ācacakṣe sa tatsarvaṃ dānavānāṃ ca kāritam || 402 ||

tataste tvasurā jagmurnarmadāmabhito vasan |
dṛṣṭvā tāndānavāṃstatra prahlādena vinā kṛtān || 403 ||

devarājastato hṛṣṭo namuciṃ prāha vai vacaḥ |
hiraṇyākṣaṃ yajñahanaṃ dharmaghnaṃ vedaniṃdakam || 404 ||

rākṣasaṃ krūrakarmāṇaṃ praghasaṃ vighasaṃ tathā |
muciṃ caiva tathā bāṇaṃ virocanamathāpi vā || 405 ||

mahiṣākṣaṃ bāṣkalaṃ ca pracaṃḍaṃ caṃḍakaṃ tathā |
rocamānaṃ tathātyugraṃ suṣeṇaṃ dānavottamam || 406 ||

etāndṛṣṭvā tathā cānyāndānaveṃdrānathābravīt |
indra uvāca |
dānaveṃdrāḥ purā jātāḥ kṛtaṃ rājyaṃ triviṣṭape || 407 ||

idānīṃ kathamevedaṃ vrataṃ vedavilopakam |
bhavadbhiḥ kartumārabdhaṃ nagnamuṃḍikamaṃḍalu || 408 ||

mayūradhvajadhāritvaṃ kathaṃ caiveha tiṣṭhatha |
dānavā ūcuḥ |
tyaktaḥ sarvāsurabhāva ṛṣidharme vayaṃ sthitāḥ || 409 ||

dharmavṛddhikaraṃ karma carāmaḥ sarvajaṃtuṣu |
trailokyarājyamakhilaṃ bhuṃkṣva śakra vrajasva ca || 410 ||

tatheti coktvā maghavā punaryātastriviṣṭapam |
evaṃ te mohitāḥ sarve bhīṣma devapurodhasā || 411 ||

narmadā saritaṃ prāpya sthitā dānavasattamāḥ |
jñātvā śukreṇa te sarve vṛttāṃtamanubodhitāḥ || 412 ||
tadā trailokyaharaṇe cakruḥ krūrāṃ punarmatim || 413 ||

bhīṣma uvāca |
kathaṃ tripuruṣājjāto hyarjunaḥ paravīrahā |
kathaṃ karṇastu kānīnaḥ sūtajaḥ parikīrtyate || 1 ||

varaṃ tayoḥ kathaṃ bhūtaṃ nisargādeva tadvada |
bṛhatkautūhalaṃ mahyaṃ tadbhavānvaktumarhati || 2 ||

pulastya uvāca |
chinne vaktre purā brahmā krodhena mahatā vṛtaḥ |
lalāṭe svedamutpannaṃ gṛhītvā tāḍayadbhuvi || 3 ||

svedataḥ kuṃḍalī jajñe sadhanuṣko maheṣudhiḥ |
sahasrakavacī vīraḥ kiṃkaromītyuvāca ha || 4 ||

tamuvāca viriṃcastu darśayanrudramojasā |
hanyatāmeṣa durbuddhirjāyate na yathā punaḥ || 5 ||

brahmaṇo vacanaṃ śrutvā dhanurudyamya pṛṣṭhataḥ |
saṃpratasthe maheśasya bāṇahastotiraudradṛk || 6 ||

dṛṣṭvā puruṣamatyugraṃ bhītastasya trilocanaḥ |
apakrāṃtastato vegādviṣṇorāśramamabhyagāt || 7 ||

trāhitrāhīti māṃ viṣṇo narādasmācca śatruhan |
brahmaṇā nirmitaḥ pāpo mleccharūpo bhayaṃkaraḥ || 8 ||

yathā hanyānna māṃ kruddhastathā kuru jagatpate |
huṃkāradhvaninā viṣṇurmohayitvā tu taṃ naram || 9 ||

adṛśyaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ yogātmā viśvadṛkprabhuḥ |
tatra prāptaṃ virūpākṣaṃ sāṃtvayāmāsa keśavaḥ || 10 ||

tatassa praṇato bhūmau dṛṣṭo devena viṣṇunā |
viṣṇuruvāca |
pautro hi me bhavānrudra kaṃ te kāmaṃ karomyaham || 11 ||

dṛṣṭvā nārāyaṇaṃ devaṃ bhikṣāṃ dehītyuvāca ha |
kapālaṃ darśayitvāgre prajvalaṃstejasotkaṭam || 12 ||

kapālapāṇiṃ saṃprekṣya rudraṃ viṣṇuracintayat |
konyo yogyo bhavedbhikṣurbhikṣādānasya sāṃpratam || 13 ||

yogyo'yamiti saṃkalpya dakṣiṇaṃ bhujamarpayat |
tadbibhedātitīkṣṇena śūlena śaśiśekharaḥ || 14 ||

prāvartata tato dhārā śoṇitasya vibhorbhujāt |
jāṃbūnadarasākārā vahnijvāleva nirmitā || 15 ||

nipapāta kapālāṃtaśśambhunā sā prabhikṣitā |
ṛjvī vegavatī tīvrā spṛśaṃtī tvāṃbaraṃ javāt || 16 ||

paṃcāśadyojanā dairghyādvistārāddaśayojanā |
divyavarṣasahasraṃ sā samuvāha harerbhujāt || 17 ||

iyaṃtaṃ kālamīśosau bhikṣāṃ jagrāha bhikṣukaḥ |
dattā nārāyaṇenātha kāpāle pātra uttame || 18 ||

tato nārāyaṇaḥ prāha śaṃbhuṃ paramidaṃ vacaḥ |
saṃpūrṇaṃ vā na vā pātraṃ tato vai paramīśvaraḥ || 19 ||

satoyāṃbudanirghoṣaṃ śrutvā vākyaṃ harerharaḥ |
śaśisūryāgninayanaḥ śaśiśekharaśobhitaḥ || 20 ||

kapāle dṛṣṭimāveśya tribhirnetrairjanārdanam |
aṃgulyā ghaṭayanprāha kapālaṃ paripūritam || 21 ||

śrutvā śivasya tāṃ vāṇīṃ viṣṇurdhārāṃ samāharat |
paśto'tha harerīśaḥ svāṃgulyā rudhiraṃ tadā || 22 ||

divyavarṣasahasraṃ ca dṛṣṭipātairmamaṃtha saḥ |
mathyamāne tato rakte kalilaṃ budbudaṃ kramāt || 23 ||

babhūva ca tataḥ paścātkirīṭī saśarāsanaḥ |
baddhatūṇīrayugalo vṛṣaskaṃdhoṅgulitravān || 24 ||

puruṣo vahnisaṃkāśaḥ kapāle saṃpradṛśyate |
taṃ dṛṣṭvā bhagavānviṣṇuḥ prāha rudramidaṃ vacaḥ || 25 ||

kapāle bhava ko vā'yaṃ prādurbhūto'bhavannaraḥ |
vacaḥ śrutvā harerīśastamuvāca vibho śṛṇu || 26 ||

naro nāmaiṣa puruṣaḥ paramāstravidāṃ varaḥ |
bhavatokto nara iti narastasmādbhaviṣyati || 27 ||

naranārāyaṇau cobhau yuge khyātau bhaviṣyataḥ |
saṃgrāme devakāryeṣu lokānāṃ paripālane || 28 ||

eṣa nārāyaṇasakho narastasmādbhaviṣyati |
athāsuravadhe sāhyaṃ tava kartā mahādyutiḥ || 29 ||

munirjñānaparīkṣāyāṃ jetā loke bhaviṣyati |
tejodhikamidaṃ divyaṃ brahmaṇaḥ paṃcamaṃ śiraḥ || 30 ||

tejaso brahmaṇo dīptādbhujasya tava śoṇitāt |
mama dṛṣṭi nipātācca trīṇi tejāṃsi yāni tu || 31 ||

tatsaṃyogasamutpannaḥ śatruṃ yuddhe vijeṣyati |
avadhyā ye bhaviṣyaṃti durjayā api cāpare || 32 ||

śakrasya cāmarāṇāṃ ca teṣāmeṣa bhayaṃkaraḥ |
evamuktvā sthitaḥ śaṃbhurvismitaśca haristadā || 33 ||

kapālasthaḥ sa tatraiva tuṣṭāva harakeśavau |
śirasyaṃjalimādhāya tadā vīra udāradhīḥ || 34 ||

kiṃkaromīti tau prāha ityuktvā praṇataḥ sthitaḥ |
tamuvāca haraḥ śrīmānbrahmaṇā svena tejasā || 35 ||

sṛṣṭo naro dhanuṣpāṇistvamenaṃ tu niṣūdaya |
itthamuktvāṃjalidharaṃ stuvaṃtaṃ śaṃkaro naram || 36 ||

tathaivāṃjalisaṃbaddhaṃ gṛhītvā ca karadvayam |
uddhṛtyātha kapālāttaṃ punarvacanamabravīt || 37 ||

sa eṣa puruṣo raudro yo mayā veditastava |
viṣṇuhuṃkāraracitamohanidrāṃ praveśitaḥ || 38 ||

vibodhayainaṃ tvaritamityuktvāntardadhe haraḥ |
nārāyaṇasya pratyakṣaṃ nareṇānena vai tadā || 39 ||

vāmapādahataḥ sopi samuttasthau mahābalaḥ |
tato yuddhaṃ samabhavatsvedaraktajayormahat || 40 ||

visphāritadhanuḥ śabdaṃ nāditāśeṣabhūtalam |
kavacaṃ svedajasyaikaṃ raktajena tvapākṛtam || 41 ||

evaṃ sametayoryuddhe divyaṃ varṣadvayaṃ tayoḥ |
yudhyatoḥ samatītaṃ ca svedaraktajayornṛpa || 42 ||

raktajaṃ dvibhujaṃ dṛṣṭvā svedajaṃ caiva saṃgatau |
vicintya vāsudevogādbrahmaṇaḥ sadanaṃ param || 43 ||

sasaṃbhramamuvācedaṃ brahmāṇaṃ madhusūdanaḥ |
raktajenādya bho brahmansvedajoyaṃ nipātitaḥ || 44 ||

śrutvaitadākulo brahmā babhāṣe madhusūdanam |
hare dyajanmani naro madīyo jīvatādayam || 45 ||

tathā tuṣṭo'bravīttaṃ ca viṣṇurevaṃ bhaviṣyati |
gatvā tayo raṇamapi nivāryā''ha ca tāvubhau || 46 ||

anyajanmani bhavitā kalidvāparayormithaḥ |
saṃdhau mahāraṇe jāte tatrāhaṃ yojayāmi vāṃ || 47 ||

viṣṇunā tu samāhūya graheśvarasureśvarau |
uktāvimau narau bhadrau pālanīyau mamājñayā || 48 ||

sahasrāṃśo svedajoyaṃ svakīyoṃ'śo dharātale |
dvāparāṃtevatāryoyaṃ devānāṃ kāryasiddhaye || 49 ||

yadūnāṃ tu kule bhāvī śūronāma mahābalaḥ |
tasya kanyā pṛthā nāma rūpeṇāpratimā bhuvi || 50 ||

utpatsyati mahābhāgā devānāṃ kāryasiddhaye |
durvāsāstu varaṃ tasyai maṃtragrāmaṃ pradāsyati || 51 ||

maṃtreṇānena yaṃ devaṃ bhaktyā āvāhayiṣyati |
devi tasya prasādāttu tava putro bhaviṣyati || 52 ||

sā ca tvāmudaye dṛṣṭvā sābhilāṣā rajasvalā |
ciṃtābhipannā tiṣṭhaṃtī bhajitavyā vibhāvaso || 53 ||

tasyā garbhe tvayaṃ bhāvī kānīnaḥ kuṃtinaṃdanaḥ |
bhaviṣyati suto devadevakāryārthasiddhaye || 54 ||

tatheti coktvā provāca tejorāśirdivākaraḥ |
putramutpādayiṣyāmi kānīnaṃ balagarvitam || 55 ||

yasya karṇeti vai nāma lokaḥ sarvo vadiṣyati |
matprasādādasya viṣṇo viprāṇāṃ bhāvitātmanaḥ || 56 ||

adeyaṃ nāsti vai loke vastu kiṃcicca keśava |
evaṃ prabhāvaṃ caivainaṃ janaye vacanāttava || 57 ||

evamuktvā sahasrāṃśurdevaṃ dānavaghātinam |
nārāyaṇaṃ mahātmānaṃ tatraivāṃtardadhe raviḥ || 58 ||

adarśanaṃ gate deve bhāskare vāritaskare |
vṛddhaśravasamapyevamuvāca prītamānasaḥ || 59 ||

sahasranetraraktottho naro'yaṃ madanugrahāt |
svāṃśabhūto dvāparāṃte yoktavyo bhūtale tvayā || 60 ||

yadā pāṃḍurmahābhāgaḥ pṛthāṃ bhāryāmavāpsyati |
mādrīṃ cāpi mahābhāga tadāraṇyaṃ gamiṣyati || 61 ||

tasyāpyaraṇyasaṃsthasya mṛgaḥ śāpaṃ pradāsyati |
tena cotpannavairāgyaḥ śataśṛgaṃ gamiṣyati || 62 ||

putrānabhīpsankṣetrotthānbhāryāṃ sa pravadiṣyati |
anīpsaṃtī tadā kuṃtī bharttāraṃ sā vadiṣyati || 63 ||

nāhaṃ martyasya vai rājanputrānicche kathaṃcana |
daivatebhyaḥ prasādācca putrānicche narādhipa || 64 ||

prārthayaṃtyai tvayā śakra kuṃtyai deyo narastataḥ |
vacasā ca madīyena evaṃ kuru śacīpate || 65 ||

athābravīttadā viṣṇuṃ deveśo duḥkhito vacaḥ |
asminmanvaṃtare'tīte caturviṃśatike yuge || 66 ||

avatīrya raghukule gṛhe daśarathasya ca |
rāvaṇasya vadhārthāya śāṃtyarthaṃ ca divaukasām || 67 ||

rāmarūpeṇa bhavatā sītārthamaṭatā vane |
matputro hiṃsito deva sūryaputrahitārthinā || 68 ||

vālināma plavaṃgeṃdraḥ sugrīvārthe tvayā yataḥ |
duḥkhenānena taptohaṃ gṛhṇāmi na sutaṃ naram || 69 ||

agṛhṇamānaṃ deveṃdraṃ kāraṇāṃtaravādinam |
hariḥ proce śunāsīraṃ bhuvo bhārāvatāraṇe || 70 ||

avatāraṃ kariṣyāmi martyaloke tvahaṃ prabho |
sūryaputrasya nāśārthaṃ jayārthamātmajasya te || 71 ||

sārathyaṃ ca kariṣyāmi nāśaṃ kurukulasya ca |
tato hṛṣṭobhavacchakro viṣṇuvākyena tena ha || 72 ||

pratigṛhya naraṃ hṛṣṭaḥ satyaṃ cāstu vacastava |
evamuktvā varaṃ devaḥ preṣayitvā'cyutaḥ svayam || 73 ||

gatvā tu puṃḍarīkākṣo brahmāṇaṃ prāha vai punaḥ |
tvayā sṛṣṭamidaṃ sarvaṃ trailokyaṃ sacarācaram || 74 ||

āvāṃ kāryasya karaṇe sahāyau ca tava prabho |
svayaṃ kṛtvā punarnāśaṃ kartuṃ deva na budhyase || 75 ||

kṛtaṃ jugupsitaṃ karma śaṃbhumetaṃ jighāṃsatā |
tvayā ca devadevasya sṛṣṭaḥ kopena vai pumān || 76 ||

śuddhyarthamasya pāpasya prāyaścittaṃ paraṃ kuru |
gṛhṇanvahnitrayaṃ deva agnihotramupāhara || 77 ||

puṇyatīrthe tathā deśe vane vāpi pitāmaha |
svapatnyā sahito yajñaṃ kuruṣvāsmatparigrahāt || 78 ||

sarve devāstathādityā rudrāścāpi jagatpate |
ādeśaṃ te kariṣyaṃti yatosmākaṃ bhavānprabhuḥ || 79 ||

ekohi gārhapatyognirdakṣiṇāgnirdvitīyakaḥ |
āhavanīyastṛtīyastu trikuṃḍeṣu prakalpaya || 80 ||

vartule tvarcayātmānammāmatho dhanurākṛtau |
catuḥkoṇe haraṃ devaṃ ṛgyajuḥsāmanāmabhiḥ || 81 ||

agnīnutpādya tapasā parāmṛddhimavāpya ca |
divyaṃ varṣasahasraṃ tu hutvāgnīnśamayiṣyasi || 82 ||

agnihotrātparaṃ nānyatpavitramiha paṭhyate |
sukṛtenāgnihotreṇa praśuddhyaṃti bhuvi dvijāḥ || 83 ||

paṃthāno devalokasya brāhmaṇairdaśitāstvamī |
ekogniḥ sarvadā dhāryo gṛhasthena dvijanmanā || 84 ||

vināgninā dvijeneha gārhasthyanna tu labhyate |
bhīṣma uvāca |
yo'sau kapālādutpanno naro nāma dhanurddharaḥ || 85 ||

kimeṣa mādhavājjāta utāho svena karmaṇā |
uta rudreṇa janito hyathavā buddhipūrvakam || 86 ||

brahmanhiraṇyagarbho'yamaṃḍajātaścaturmukhaḥ |
adbhutaṃ pañcamaṃ tasya vaktraṃ tatkathamutthitam || 87 ||

satve rajo na dṛśyeta na satvaṃ rajasi kvacit |
satvastho bhagavānbrahmā kathamudrekamādadhāt || 88 ||

mūḍhātmanā naro yena haṃtuṃ hi prahito haraṃ |
pulastya uvāca |
maheśvaraharī caito dvāveva satpathi sthitau || 89 ||

tayoraviditaṃ nāsti siddhāsiddhaṃ mahātmanoḥ |
brahmaṇaḥ paṃcamaṃ vaktramūrddhvamāsīnmahātmanaḥ || 90 ||

tato brahmābhavanmūḍho rajasā copabṛṃhitaḥ |
tato'yaṃ tejasā sṛṣṭimamanyata mayā kṛtā || 91 ||

matto'nyo nāsti vai devo yena sṛṣṭiḥ pravartitā |
saha devāḥ sagaṃdharvāḥ paśupakṣimṛgākulāḥ || 92 ||

evaṃ mūḍhaḥ sa paṃcāsyo viriṃcirabhavatpunaḥ |
prāgvaktraṃ mukhametasya ṛgvedasya pravartakam || 93 ||

dvitīyaṃ vadanaṃ tasya yajurvedapravartakam |
tṛtīyaṃ sāmavedasya atharvārthaṃ caturthakam || 94 ||

sāṃgopāṃgetihāsāṃśca sarahasyānsasaṃgrahān |
vedānadhīte vaktreṇa paṃcamenorddhvacakṣuṣā || 95 ||

tasyā'surasurāḥ sarve vaktrasyādbhutavarcasaḥ |
tejasā na prakāśaṃte dīpāḥ sūryodaye yathā || 96 ||

svapureṣvapi sodvegā hyavartaṃta vicetasaḥ |
na kaṃcidgaṇayeccānyaṃ tejasā kṣipate parān || 97 ||

nābhigaṃtu na ca draṣṭuṃ purastānnopasarpitum |
śekustrastāḥ surāssarve padmayoniṃ mahāprabhum || 98 ||

abhibhūtamivātmānaṃ manyamānā hatatviṣaḥ |
sarve te maṃtrayāmāsurdaivatā hitamātmanaḥ || 99 ||

gacchāmaḥ śaraṇaṃ śaṃbhuṃ nistejaso'sya tejasā |
devā ūcuḥ |
namastesarvasatveśa maheśvara namonamaḥ || 100 ||

jagadyone paraṃbrahma bhūtānāṃ tvaṃ sanātanaḥ |
pratiṣṭhā sarvajagatāṃ tvaṃ heturviṣṇunā saha || 101 ||

evaṃ saṃstūyamānosau devarṣipitṛdānavaiḥ |
aṃtarhita uvācedaṃ devāḥ prārthayatepsitam || 102 ||

devā ūcuḥ |
pratyakṣadarśanaṃ datvā dehi deva yathepsitam |
kṛtvā kāruṇyamasmākaṃ varaścāpi pradīyatām || 103 ||

yadasmākaṃ mahadvīryaṃ teja ojaḥ parākramaḥ |
tatsarvaṃ brahmaṇā grastaṃ paṃcamāsyasya tejasā || 104 ||

vineśuḥ sarvatejāṃsi tvatprasādātpunaḥ prabho |
jāyate tu yathāpūrvaṃ tathā kuru maheśvara || 105 ||

tataḥ prasannavadano devaiścāpi namaskṛtaḥ |
jagāma yatra brahmā'sau rajohaṃkāramūḍhadhīḥ || 106 ||

stuvaṃto devadeveśaṃ parivārya samāviśan |
brahmā tamāgataṃ rudraṃ na jajñe rajasāvṛtaḥ || 107 ||

sūryakoṭisahasrāṇāṃ tejasā raṃjayanjagat |
tadādṛśyata viśvātmā viśvasṛgviśvabhāvanaḥ || 108 ||

sapitāmahamāsīnaṃ sakalaṃ devamaṃḍalam |
abhigamya tato rudro brahmāṇaṃ parameṣṭhinam || 109 ||

ahotitejasā vaktramadhikaṃ deva rājate |
evamuktvāṭṭahāsaṃ tu mumoca śaśiśekharaḥ || 110 ||

vāmāṃguṣṭhanakhāgreṇa brahmaṇaḥ paṃcamaṃ śiraḥ |
cakarta kadalīgarbhaṃ naraḥ kararuhairiva || 111 ||

vicchinnaṃ tu śiraḥ paścādbhavahaste sthitaṃ tadā |
grahamaṃḍalamadhyastho dvitīya iva caṃdramāḥ || 112 ||

karotkṣiptakapālena nanarta ca maheśvaraḥ |
śikharasthena sūryeṇa kailāsa iva parvataḥ || 113 ||

chinne vaktre tato devā hṛṣṭāstaṃ vṛṣabhadhvajam |
tuṣṭuvurvividhaistotrairdevadevaṃ kapardinam || 114 ||

devā ūcuḥ |
namaḥ kapāline nityaṃ mahākālasya kāline |
aiśvaryajñānayuktāya sarvabhāgapradāyine || 115 ||

namo harṣavilāsāya sarvadevamayāya ca |
kalau saṃhārakartā tvaṃ mahākālaḥ smṛto hyasi || 116 ||

bhaktānāmārtināśastvaṃ duḥkhāṃtastena cocyase |
śaṃkaroṣyāśubhaktānāṃ tena tvaṃ śaṃkaraḥ smṛtaḥ || 117 ||

chinnaṃ brahmaśiro yasmāttvaṃ kapālaṃ bibharṣi ca |
tena deva kapālī tvaṃ stuto hyadya prasīda naḥ || 118 ||

evaṃ stutaḥ prasannātmā devānprasthāpya śaṃkaraḥ |
svāni dhiṣṇyāni bhagavāṃstatraivāsīnmudānvitaḥ || 119 ||

vijñāya brahmaṇo bhāvaṃ tato vīrasya janma ca |
śiro nīrasya vākyāttu lokānāṃ kopaśāṃtaye || 120 ||

śirasyaṃjalimādhāya tuṣṭāvātha praṇamya tam |
tejonidhi paraṃ brahma jñātumitthaṃ prajāpatim || 121 ||

niruktasūktarahasyairṛgyajuḥ sāmabhāṣitaiḥ |
rudra uvāca |
aprameya namastestu paramasya parātmane || 122 ||

adbhutānāṃ prasūtistvaṃ tejasāṃ nidhirakṣayaḥ |
vijayādviśvabhāvastvaṃ sṛṣṭikartā mahādyute || 123 ||

ūrddhvavaktra namastestu satvātmakadharātmaka |
jalaśāyinjalotpanna jalālaya namostu te || 124 ||

jalajotphullapatrākṣa jaya deva pitāmaha |
tvayā hyutpāditaḥ pūrvaṃ sṛṣṭyarthamahamīśvara || 125 ||

yajñāhutisadāhāra yajñāṃgeśa namo'stu te |
svarṇagarbha padmagarbha devagarbha prajāpate || 126 ||

tvaṃ yajñastvaṃ vaṣaṭkāraḥ svadhā tvaṃ padmasaṃbhava |
vacanena tu devānāṃ śiraśchinnaṃ mayā prabho || 127 ||

brahmahatyābhibhūtosmi māṃ tvaṃ pāhi jagatpate |
ityukto devadevena brahmā vacanamabravīt || 128 ||

brahmovāca |
sakhā nārāṇo devaḥ sa tvāṃ pūtaṃ kariṣyati |
kīrtanīyastvayā dhanyaḥ sa me pūjyaḥ svayaṃ vibhuḥ || 129 ||

anudhyāto'si vai nūnaṃ tena devena viṣṇunā |
yena te bhaktirutpannā stotuṃ māṃ matirutthitā || 130 ||

śiraśchedātkapālī tvaṃ somasiddhāṃtakārakaḥ |
koṭīḥ śataṃ ca viprāṇāmuddhartāsi mahādyute || 131 ||

brahmahatyāvrataṃ kuryā nānyatkiṃcana vidyate |
abhāṣyāḥ pāpinaḥ krūrā brahmaghnāḥ pāpakāriṇaḥ || 132 ||

vaitānikā vikarmasthā na te bhāṣyāḥ kathaṃcana |
taistu dṛṣṭaistathā kāryaṃ bhāskarasyāvalokanam || 133 ||

aṃgasparśe kṛte rudra sacailo jalamāviśet |
evaṃ śuddhimavāpnoti pūrvaṃ dṛṣṭāṃ manīṣibhiḥ || 134 ||

sa bhavānbrahmahantāsi śuddhyarthaṃ vratamācara |
cīrṇe vrate punarbhūyaḥ prāpsyasi tvaṃ varānbahūn || 135 ||

evamuktvā gato brahmā rudrastannābhijajñivān |
aciṃtayattadāviṣṇuṃ dhyānagatyā tataḥ svayaṃ || 136 ||

lakṣmīsahāyaṃ varadaṃ devadevaṃ sanātanam |
aṣṭāṃgapraṇipātena devadevastrilocanaḥ || 137 ||

tuṣṭāva praṇato bhūtvā śaṃkhacakragadādharam |
rudra uvāca |
paraṃ parāṇāmamṛtaṃ purāṇaṃ parātparaṃ viṣṇumanaṃtavīryaṃ || 138 ||

smarāmi nityaṃ puruṣaṃ vareṇyaṃ nārāyaṇaṃ niṣpratimaṃ purāṇam |
parātparaṃ pūrvajamugravegaṃ gaṃbhīragaṃbhīradhiyāṃ pradhānam || 139 ||

natosmi devaṃ harimīśitāraṃ parātparaṃ dhāmaparaṃ ca dhāma |
parāparaṃ tatparamaṃ ca dhāma parāpareśaṃ puruṣaṃ viśālam || 140 ||

nārāyaṇaṃ staumi viśuddhabhāvaṃ parāparaṃ sūkṣmamidaṃ sasarja |
sadāsthitatvātpuruṣapradhānaṃ śāṃtaṃ pradhānaṃ śaraṇaṃ mamāstu || 141 ||

nārāyaṇaṃ vītamalaṃ purāṇaṃ parātparaṃ viṣṇumapārapāram |
purātanaṃ nītimatāṃ pradhānaṃ dhṛtikṣamāśāṃtiparaṃ kṣitīśam || 142 ||

śubhaṃ sadā staumi mahānubhāvaṃ sahasramūrddhānamanekapādam |
anaṃtabāhuṃ śaśisūryanetraṃ kṣarākṣaraṃ kṣīrasamudranidram || 143 ||

nārāyaṇaṃ staumi paraṃ pareśaṃ parātparaṃ yattridaśairagamyam |
trisargasaṃsthaṃ trihutāśanetraṃ tritatvalakṣyaṃ trilayaṃ trinetram || 144 ||

namāmi nārāyaṇamaprameyaṃ kṛte sitaṃ dvāparataśca raktam |
kalau ca kṛṣṇaṃ tamatho namāmi sasarja yo vaktrata eva viprān || 145 ||

bhujāṃtarātkṣatramathoruyugmādviśaḥ padāgrācca tathaiva śūdrān |
namāmi taṃ viśvatanuṃ purāṇaṃ parātparaṃ pāragamaprameyam || 146 ||

sūkṣmamūrttiṃ mahāmūrttiṃ vidyāmūrttimamūrtikam |
kavacaṃ sarvadevānāṃ namasye vārijekṣaṇam || 147 ||

sahasraśīrṣaṃ deveśaṃ sahasrākṣaṃ mahābhujam |
jagatsaṃvyāpya tiṣṭhaṃtaṃ namasye parameśvaram || 148 ||

śaraṇyaṃ śaraṇaṃ devaṃ viṣṇuṃ jiṣṇuṃ sanātanam |
nīlameghapratīkāśaṃ namasye śārṅgapāṇinam || 149 ||

śuddhaṃ sarvagataṃ nityaṃ vyomarūpaṃ sanātanam |
bhāvābhāvavinirmuktaṃ namasye sarvagaṃ harim || 150 ||

na cātra kiṃcitpaśyāmi vyatiriktaṃ tavācyuta |
tvanmayaṃ ca prapaśyāmi sarvametaccarācaram || 151 ||

evaṃ tu vadatastasya rudrasya parameṣṭhinaḥ |
itīritestena sanātana svayaṃ parātparastasya babhūva darśane || 152 ||

rathāṃgapāṇirgaruḍāsano giriṃ vidīpayanbhāskaravatsamutthitaḥ |
varaṃ vṛṇīṣveti sanātanobravīdvarastavāhaṃ varadaḥ samāgataḥ || 153 ||

itīrite rudravaro jagāda mamātiśuddhirbhavitā sureśa |
na cāsya pāpasya haraṃ hi cānyatsaṃdṛśyategryaṃ ca ṛte bhavaṃ tam || 154 ||

brahmahatyābhibhūtasya tanurme kṛṣṇatāṃ gatā |
śavagaṃdhaśca me gātre lohasyābharaṇāni me || 155 ||

kathaṃ me na bhavedevametadrūpaṃ janārdanam |
kiṃ karomi mahādeva yena me pūrvikā tanūḥ || 156 ||

tvatprasādena bhavitā tanme kathaya cācyuta |
viṣṇuruvāca |
brahmavadhyā parā cogrā sarvakaṣṭapradā parā || 157 ||

manasāpi na kurvīta pāpasyāsya tu bhāvanām |
bhavatā devavākyena niṣṭhā caiṣā nibodhitā || 158 ||

idānīṃ tvaṃ mahābāho brahmaṇoktaṃ samācara |
bhasmasarvāṇi gātrāṇi trikālaṃ gharṣayestanau || 159 ||

śikhāyāṃ karṇayoścaiva kare cāsthīni dhāraya |
evaṃ ca kurvato rudra kaṣṭaṃ naiva bhaviṣyati || 160 ||

saṃdiśyaivaṃ sa bhagavāṃstatoṃ'tarddhānamīśvaraḥ |
lakṣmīsahāyo gatavānrudrastaṃ nābhijajñivān || 161 ||

kapālapāṇirdeveśaḥ paryaṭanvasudhāmimām |
himavaṃtaṃ samainākaṃ meruṇā ca sahaiva tu || 162 ||

kailāsaṃ sakalaṃ viṃdhyaṃ nīlaṃ caiva mahāgirim |
kāṃcīṃ kāśīṃ tāmraliptāṃ magadhāmāvilāṃ tathā || 163 ||

vatsagulmaṃ ca gokarṇaṃ tathā caivottarānkurūn |
bhadrāśvaṃ ketumālaṃ ca varṣaṃ hairaṇyakaṃ tathā || 164 ||

kāmarūpaṃ prabhāsaṃ ca maheṃdraṃ caiva parvatam |
brahmahatyābhibhūtosau bhramaṃstrāṇaṃ na viṃdati || 165 ||

trapānvitaḥ kapālaṃ tu paśyanhastagataṃ sadā |
karau vidhunvanbahuśo vikṣiptaśca muhurmuhuḥ || 166 ||

yadāsya dhunvato hastau kapālaṃ patate na tu |
tadāsya buddhirutpannā vrataṃ caitatkaromyaham || 167 ||

madīyenaiva mārgeṇa dvijā yāsyaṃti sarvataḥ |
dhyātvaivaṃ suciraṃ devo vasudhāṃ vicacāra ha || 168 ||

puṣkaraṃ tu samāsādya praviṣṭo'raṇyamuttamam |
nānādrumalatākīrṇaṃ nānāmṛgaravākulam || 169 ||

drumapuṣpabharāmoda vāsitaṃ yatsuvāyunā |
buddhipūrvamiva nyastaiḥ puṣpairbhūṣitabhūtalam || 170 ||

nānāgadhaṃrasairanyaiḥ pakvāpakvaiḥ phalaistathā |
viveśa taruvṛṃdena puṣpāmodābhinaṃditaḥ || 171 ||

atrārādhayato bhaktyā brahmā dāsyati me varam |
brahmaprasādātsaṃprāptaṃ pauṣkaraṃ jñānamīpsitam || 172 ||

pāpaghnaṃ duṣṭaśamanaṃ puṣṭiśrībalavarddhanam |
evaṃ vai dhyāyatastasya rudrasyāmitatejasaḥ || 173 ||

ājagāma tato brahmā bhaktiprīto'tha kaṃjajaḥ |
uvāca praṇataṃ rudramutthāpya ca punarguruḥ || 174 ||

divyavratopacāreṇa sohamārādhitastvayā |
bhavatā śraddhayātyarthaṃ mamadarśanakāṃkṣayā || 175 ||

vratasthā māṃ hi paśyaṃti manuṣyā devatāstathā |
tadicchayā prayacchāmi varaṃ yatpravaraṃ varam || 176 ||

sarvakāmaprasiddhyarthaṃ vrataṃ yasmānniṣevitam |
manovākkāyabhāvaiśca saṃtuṣṭenāṃtarātmanā || 177 ||

kaṃ dadāmi ca vai kāmaṃ vada bhoste yathepsitam |
rudra uvāca |
eṣa evādya bhagavansuparyāpto mahā varaḥ || 178 ||

yaddṛṣṭosi jagadvaṃdya jagatkartarnamostute |
mahatā yajñasādhyena bahukālārjitena ca || 179 ||

prāṇavyayakareṇa tvaṃ tapasā deva dṛśyate |
idaṃ kapālaṃ deveśa na karātpatitaṃ vibho || 180 ||

trapākarā ṛṣīṇāṃ ca caryaiṣā kutsitā vibho |
tvatprasādādvrataṃ cedaṃ kṛtaṃ kāpālikaṃ tu yat || 181 ||

siddhametatprapannasya mahāvratamihocyatām |
puṇyapradeśe yasmiṃstu kṣipāmīdaṃ vadasva me || 182 ||

pūto bhavāmi yenāhaṃ munīnāṃ bhāvitātmanām |
brahmovāca |
avimuktaṃ bhagavataḥ sthānamasti purātanam || 183 ||

kapālamocanaṃ tīrthaṃ tava tatra bhaviṣyati |
ahaṃ ca tvaṃ sthitastatra viṣṇuścāpi bhaviṣyati || 184 ||

darśane bhavatastatra mahāpātakinopi ye |
tepi bhogānsamaśnaṃti viśuddhā bhavane mama || 185 ||

varaṇāpi asīcāpi dve nadyau suravallabhe |
aṃtarāle tayoḥ kṣetre vadhyā na viśati kvacit || 186 ||

tīrthānāṃ pravaraṃ tīrthaṃ kṣetrāṇāṃ pravaraṃ tava |
ādehapatanādye tu kṣetraṃ sevaṃti mānavāḥ || 187 ||

te mṛtā haṃsayānena divaṃ yāṃtyakutobhayāḥ |
paṃcakrośapramāṇena kṣetraṃ dattaṃ mayā tava || 188 ||

kṣetramadhyādyadā gaṃgā gamiṣyati saritpatim |
tadā sā mahatī puṇyā purī rudra bhaviṣyati || 189 ||

puṇyā codaṅmukhī gaṃgā prācī cāpi sarasvatī |
udaṅmukhī yojane dve gacchate jāhnavī nadī || 190 ||

tatra vai vibudhāḥ sarve mayā saha savāsavāḥ |
āgatā vāsameṣyaṃti kapālaṃ tatra mocaya || 191 ||

tasmiṃstīrthe tu ye gatvā piṇḍadānena vai pitṝn |
śrāddhaistu prīṇayiṣyaṃti teṣāṃ loko'kṣayo divi || 192 ||

vārāṇasyāṃ mahātīrthe naraḥ snāto vimucyate |
saptajanmakṛtātpāpādgamanādeva mucyate || 193 ||

tattīrthaṃ sarvatīrthānāmuttamaṃ parikīrtitam |
tyajaṃti tatra ye prāṇānprāṇinaḥ praṇatāstava || 194 ||

rudratvaṃ te samāsādya modaṃte bhavatā saha |
tatrāpi hi tu yaddattaṃ dānaṃ rudra yatātmanā || 195 ||

syānmahacca phalaṃ tasya bhavitā bhāvitātmanaḥ |
svāṃgasphuṭita saṃskāraṃ tatra kurvaṃti ye narāḥ || 196 ||

te rudralokamāsādya modaṃte sukhinaḥ sadā |
tatra pūjā japo homaḥ kṛto bhavati dehināṃ || 197 ||

anaṃtaphaladaḥ svargo rudrabhaktiyutātmanaḥ |
tatra dīpapradāne tu jñānacakṣurbhavennaraḥ || 198 ||

avyaṃgaṃ taruṇaṃ saumyaṃ rūpavaṃtaṃ tu gosutam |
yoṅkayitvā mocayati sa yāti paramaṃ padam || 199 ||

pitṛbhiḥ sahito mokṣaṃ gacchate nātra saṃśayaḥ |
atha kiṃ bahunoktena yattatra kriyate naraiḥ || 200 ||

karmadharmaṃ samuddiśya tadanaṃtaphalaṃ bhavet |
svargāpavargayorhetustaddhi tīrthammataṃ bhuvi || 201 ||

snānājjapāttathā homādanaṃtaphalasādhanam |
gatvā vārāṇasītīrthaṃ bhaktyā rudraparāyaṇāḥ || 202 ||

ye tatra paṃcatāṃ prāptā bhaktāste nātra saṃśayaḥ |
vasavaḥ pitaro jñeyā rudrāścaiva pitāmahāḥ || 203 ||

prapitāmahāstathādityā ityeṣā vaidikī śrutiḥ |
trividhaḥ piṃḍadānāya vidhirukto mayānagha || 204 ||

mānuṣaiḥ piṃḍādānaṃ tu kāryamatrāgataissadā |
piṃḍadānaṃ ca tatraiva svaputraiḥ kāryamādarāt || 205 ||

suputrāste pitṝṇāṃ tu bhavaṃti sukhadāyakāḥ |
proktaṃ tīrthaṃ mayā tubhyaṃ darśanādapi muktidam || 206 ||

snātvā tu salile tatra mucyate janmabaṃdhanāt |
vimukto brahmahatyāyāstatra rudra yathāsukham || 207 ||

avimukte mayā datte tiṣṭha tvaṃ bhāryayā saha |
rudra uvāca |
pṛthivyāṃ yāni tīrthāni teṣvahaṃ viṣṇunā saha || 208 ||

tiṣṭhāmi bhavatoktena vara eṣa vṛto mayā |
ahaṃ devo mahādeva ārādhyo bhavatā sadā || 209 ||

varaṃ dāsyāmi te cāhaṃ saṃtuṣṭenāṃtarātmanā |
viṣṇoścāhaṃ pradāsyāmi varāṃśca manasīpsitān || 210 ||

surāṇāṃ caiva sarveṣāṃ munīnāṃ bhavitātmanām |
ahaṃ dātā ahaṃ yācyo nānyo bhāvyaḥ kathaṃcana || 211 ||

brahmovāca |
evaṃ kariṣyehaṃ rudra yatvayoktaṃ vacaḥ śubham |
nārāyaṇaśca te vākyaṃ kartā sarvaṃ na saṃśayaḥ || 212 ||

visṛjyaivaṃ tadā rudraṃ brahmā cāṃtaradhīyata |
vārāṇasyāṃ mahādevo gatvā tīrthaṃ nyaveśayat || 213 ||
iti śrīpādmapurāṇe prathame sṛṣṭikhaṃḍe rudrasya brahmavadhyānāśaścaturdaśo'dhyāyaḥ || 14 ||

bhīṣma uvāca |
kiṃ kṛtaṃ brahmaṇā brahmanpreṣya vārāṇasīpurīm |
janārdanena kiṃ karma śaṃkareṇa ca yanmune || 1 ||

kathaṃ yajñaḥ kṛtastena kasmiṃstīrthe vadasva me |
ke sadasyā ṛtvijaśca sarvāṃstānprabravīhi me || 2 ||

ke devāstarpitāstena etanme kautukaṃ mahat |
pulastya uvāca |
śrīnidhānaṃ puraṃ meroḥ śikhare ratnacitritam || 3 ||

anekāścaryanilayaṃbahupādapasaṃkulam |
vicitradhātubhiścitraṃ svacchasphaṭikanirmalam || 4 ||

latāvitānaśobhāḍhyaṃ śikhiśabdavināditam |
mṛgendraravavitrasta gajayūthasamākulam || 5 ||

nirjharāṃbuprapātottha śīkarāsāraśītalam |
vātāhatataruvrāta prasannāpānacitritam || 6 ||

mṛganābhivarāmoda vāsitāśeṣakānanam |
latāgṛharatiśrānta suptavidyādharādhvagam || 7 ||

pragītakinnaravrāta madhuradhvanināditam |
tasminnanekavinyāsa śobhitāśeṣabhūmikam || 8 ||

vairājaṃ nāma bhavanaṃ brahmaṇaḥ parameṣṭhinaḥ |
tatra divyāṃganodgīta madhuradhvani nāditā || 9 ||

pārijātatarūtpanna maṃjarīdāmamālinī |
ratnaraśmisamūhottha bahuvarṇavicitritā || 10 ||

vinyastastaṃbhakoṭistu nirmalādarśaśobhitā |
apsaronṛtyavinyāsa vilāsollāsalāsitā || 11 ||

bahvātodyasamutpannasamūhasvananāditā |
layatālayutāneka gītavāditra śobhitā || 12 ||

sabhā kāṃtimatī nāma devānāṃ śarmadāyikā |
ṛṣisaṃghasamāyuktā munivṛṃdaniṣevitā || 13 ||

dvijātisāmaśabdena nāditā''naṃdadāyinī |
tasyāṃ niviṣṭo deveśassaṃdhyāsaktaḥ pitāmahaḥ || 14 ||

dhyāyati sma paraṃ devaṃ yenedaṃ nirmitaṃ jagat |
dhyāyato buddhirutpannā kathaṃ yajñaṃ karomyaham || 15 ||

kasminsthāne mayā yajñaḥ kāryaḥ kutra dharātale |
kāśīprayāgastuṃgā ca naimiṣaṃ śṛṃkhalaṃ tathā || 16 ||

kāṃcī bhadrā devikā ca kurukṣetraṃ sarasvatī |
prabhāsādīni tīrthāni pṛthivyāmiha madhyataḥ || 17 ||

kṣetrāṇi puṇyatīrthāni saṃti yānīha sarvaśaḥ |
madādeśācca rudreṇa kṛtānyanyāni bhūtale || 18 ||

yathāhaṃ sarvadeveṣu ādidevo vyavasthitaḥ |
tathā caikaṃ paraṃ tīrthamādibhūtaṃ karomyaham || 19 ||

ahaṃ yatra samutpannaḥ padmaṃ tadviṣṇunābhijam |
puṣkaraṃ procyate tīrthamṛṣibhirvedapāṭhakaiḥ || 20 ||

evaṃ ciṃtayatastasya brahmaṇastu prajāpateḥ |
matireṣā samutpannā vrajāmyeṣa dharātale || 21 ||

prāksthānaṃ sa samāsādya praviṣṭastadvanottamam |
nānādrumalatākīrṇaṃ nānāpuṣpopaśobhitam || 22 ||

nānāpakṣiravākīrṇaṃ nānāmṛgagaṇākulam |
drumapuṣpabharāmodairvāsayadyatsurāsurān || 23 ||

buddhipūrvamiva nyastaiḥ puṣpairbhūṣitabhūtalam |
nānāgaṃdharasaiḥ pakvāpakvaiśca ṣaḍṛtūdbhavaiḥ || 24 ||

phalaiḥ suvarṇarūpāḍhyairghrāṇadṛṣṭimanoharaiḥ |
jīrṇaṃ patraṃ tṛṇaṃ yatra śuṣkakāṣṭhaphalāni ca || 25 ||

bahiḥ kṣipati jātāni mārutonugrahādiva |
nānāpuṣpasamūhānāṃ gaṃdhamādāya mārutaḥ || 26 ||

śītalo vāti khaṃ bhūmiṃ diśo yatrābhivāsayan |
haritasnigdha niśchidrairakīṭakavanotkaṭaiḥ || 27 ||

vṛkṣairanekasaṃjñairyadbhūṣitaṃ śikharānvitaiḥ |
arogairdarśanīyaiśca suvṛttaiḥ kaiścidujjvalaiḥ || 28 ||

kuṭuṃbamiva viprāṇāmṛtvigbhirbhāti sarvataḥ |
śobhaṃte dhātusaṃkāśairaṃkuraiḥ prāvṛtā drumāḥ || 29 ||

kulīnairiva niśchidraiḥ svaguṇaiḥ prāvṛtā narāḥ |
pavanāviddhaśikharaiḥ spṛśaṃtīva parasparam || 30 ||

ājighraṃtī vacā'nyonyaṃ puṣpaśākhāvataṃsakāḥ |
nāgavṛkṣāḥ kvacitpuṣpairdrumavānīrakesaraiḥ || 31 ||

nayanairiva śobhaṃte caṃcalaiḥ kṛṣṇatārakaiḥ |
puṣpasaṃpannaśikharāḥ karṇikāradrumāḥ kvacit || 32 ||

yugmayugmādvidhā ceha śobhanta iva daṃpatī |
supuṣpaprabhavāṭopaissiṃduvāra drupaṃktayaḥ || 33 ||

mūrtimatya ivābhāṃti pūjitā vanadevatāḥ |
kvacitkvacitkuṃdalatāḥ sapuṣpābharaṇojvalāḥ || 34 ||

dikṣu vṛkṣeṣu śobhaṃte bālacaṃdrā ivocchritāḥ |
sarjārjunāḥ kvacidbhānti vanoddeśeṣu puṣpitāḥ || 35 ||

dhautakauśeyavāsobhiḥ prāvṛtāḥ puruṣā iva |
atimuktakavallībhiḥ puṣpitābhistathā drumāḥ || 36 ||

upagūḍhā virājaṃte svanārībhiriva priyāḥ |
aparasparasaṃsaktaiḥ sālāśokāśca pallavaiḥ || 37 ||

hastairhastānspṛśaṃtīva suhṛdaścirasaṃgatāḥ |
phalapuṣpabharānamrāḥ panasāḥ saralārjunāḥ || 38 ||

anyonyamarcayaṃtīva puṣpaiścaiva phalaistathā |
mārutāvegasaṃśliṣṭaiḥ pādapāssālabāhubhiḥ || 39 ||

abhyāśamāgataṃ lokaṃ pratibhāvairivotthitāḥ |
puṣpāṇāmavarodhena suśobhārthaṃ niveśitāḥ || 40 ||

vasaṃtamahamāsādya puruṣānsparddhayaṃti hi |
puṣpaśobhābharanataiḥ śikharairvāyukaṃpitaiḥ || 41 ||

nṛtyaṃtīva narāḥ prītāḥ sragalaṃkṛtaśekharāḥ |
śṛṃgāgrapavanakṣiptāḥ puṣpāvaliyutā drumāḥ || 42 ||

savallīkāḥ pranṛtyaṃti mānavā iva sapriyāḥ |
svapuṣpanatavallībhiḥ pādapāḥ kvacidāvṛtāḥ || 43 ||

bhāṃti tārāgaṇaiścitraiḥ śaradīva nabhastalam |
drumāṇāmathavāgreṣu puṣpitā mālatī latāḥ || 44 ||

śekharāiva śobhaṃte racitā buddhipūrvakam |
haritāḥ kāṃcanacchāyāḥ phalitāḥ puṣpitā drumāḥ || 45 ||

sauhṛdaṃ darśayaṃtīva narāḥ sādhusamāgame |
puṣpakiṃjalkakapilā gatāḥ sarvadiśāsu ca || 46 ||

kadaṃbapuṣpasya jayaṃ ghoṣayaṃtīva ṣaṭpadāḥ |
kvacitpuṣpāsavakṣībāḥ saṃpataṃti tatastataḥ || 47 ||

puṃskokilagaṇāvṛkṣa gahaneṣviva sapriyāḥ |
śirīṣapuṣpasaṃkāśāḥ śukā mithunaśaḥ kvacit || 48 ||

kīrtayaṃti giraścitrāḥ pūjitā brāhmaṇā yathā |
sahacārisusaṃyuktā mayūrāścitrabarhiṇaḥ || 49 ||

vanāṃteṣvapi nṛtyaṃti śobhaṃta iva narttakāḥ |
kūjaṃtaḥpakṣisaṃghātā nānārutavirāviṇaḥ || 50 ||

kurvaṃti ramaṇīyaṃ vai ramaṇīyataraṃ vanam |
nānāmṛgagaṇākīrṇaṃ nityaṃ pramuditāṃḍajam || 51 ||

tadvanaṃ naṃdanasamaṃ manodṛṣṭivivarddhanam |
padmayonistu bhagavāṃstathā rūpaṃ vanottamam || 52 ||

dadarśādarśavaddṛṣṭyā saumyayāpā payanniva |
tā vṛkṣapaṃktayaḥ sarvā dṛṣṭvā devaṃ tathāgatam || 53 ||

nivedya brahmaṇe bhaktyā mumucuḥ puṣpasaṃpadaḥ |
puṣpapratigrahaṃ kṛtvā pādapānāṃ pitāmahaḥ || 54 ||

varaṃ vṛṇīdhvaṃ bhadraṃ vaḥ pādapānityuvāca saḥ |
evamuktā bhagavatā taravo niravagrahāḥ || 55 ||

ūcuḥ prāṃjalayaḥ sarve namaskṛtvā viriṃcanam |
varaṃ dadāsi ceddeva prapannajanavatsala || 56 ||

ihaiva bhagavannityaṃ vane saṃnihito bhava |
eṣa naḥ paramaḥ kāmaḥ pitāmaha namostu te || 57 ||

tvaṃ cedvasasi deveśa vanesminviśvabhāvana |
sarvātmanā prapannānāṃ vāṃchatāmuttamaṃ varam || 58 ||

varakoṭibhiranyābhiralaṃ no dīyatāṃ varam |
sannidhānena tīrthebhya idaṃ syātpravaraṃ mahat || 59 ||

brahmovāca |
uttamaṃ sarvakṣetrāṇāṃ puṇyametadbhaviṣyati |
nityaṃ puṣpaphalopetā nityasusthirayauvanāḥ || 60 ||

kāmagāḥ kāmarūpāśca kāmarūpaphalapradāḥ |
kāmasaṃdarśanāḥ puṃsāṃ tapaḥsiddhyujvalā nṛṇām || 61 ||

śriyā paramayā yuktā matprasādādbhaviṣyatha |
evaṃ sa varado brahmā anujagrāha pādapān || 62 ||

sthitvā varṣa sahasraṃ tu puṣkaraṃ prakṣipadbhuvi |
kṣitirnipatitā tena vyakaṃpata rasātalam || 63 ||

vivaśāstatyajurvelāṃ sāgarāḥ kṣubhitormayaḥ |
śakrāśani hatānīva vyāghra vyālā vṛtāni ca || 64 ||

śikharāṇyapyaśīryaṃta parvatānāṃ sahasraśaḥ |
devasiddhavimānāni gaṃdharvanagarāṇi ca || 65 ||

pracelurbabhramuḥ peturviviśuśca dharātalam |
kapotameghāḥ khātpetuḥ puṭasaṃghātadarśinaḥ || 66 ||

jyotirgaṇāṃśchādayaṃto babhūvustīvra bhāskarāḥ |
mahatā tasya śabdena mūkāṃdhabadhirīkṛtam || 67 ||

babhūva vyākulaṃ sarvaṃ trailokyaṃ sacarācaram |
surāsurāṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ śarīrāṇi manāṃsi ca || 68 ||

avaseduśca kimiti kimityetanna jajñire |
dhairyamālaṃbya sarve'tha brahmāṇaṃ cāpyalokayan || 69 ||

na ca te tamapaśyaṃta kutra brahmāgato hyabhūt |
kimarthaṃ kaṃpitā bhūmirnimittotpātadarśanam || 70 ||

tāvadviṣṇurgatastatra yatra devā vyavasthitāḥ |
praṇipatya idaṃ vākyamuktavaṃto divaukasaḥ || 71 ||

kimetadbhagavanbrūhi nimittotpātadarśanam |
trailokyaṃ kaṃpitaṃ yena saṃyuktaṃ kāladharmaṇā || 72 ||

jātakalpāvasānaṃ tu bhinnamaryādasāgaram |
catvāro diggajāḥ kiṃ tu babhūvuracalāścalāḥ || 73 ||

samāvṛtā dharā kasmātsaptasāgaravāriṇā |
utpattirnāsti śabdasya bhagavanniḥ prayojanā || 74 ||

yādṛśo vā smṛtaḥ śabdo na bhūto na bhaviṣyati |
trailokyamākulaṃ yena cakre raudreṇa codyatā || 75 ||

śubho'śubho vā śabdoreyaṃ trailokyasya divaukasām |
bhagavanyadi jānāsi kimetatkathayasva naḥ || 76 ||

evamukto'bravīdviṣṇuḥ parameṇānubhāvitaḥ |
mā bhaiṣṭa marutaḥ sarve śṛṇudhvaṃ cātra kāraṇam || 77 ||

niścayenānuvijñāya vakṣyāmyeṣa yathāvidham |
padmahasto hi bhagavānbrahmā lokapitāmahaḥ || 78 ||

bhūpradeśe puṇyarāśau yajñaṃ kartuṃ vyavasthitaḥ |
avarohe parvatānāṃ vane cātīvaśobhane || 79 ||

kamalaṃ tasya hastāttu patitaṃ dharaṇītale |
tasya śabdo mahāneṣa yena yūyaṃ prakaṃpitāḥ || 80 ||

tatrāsau taruvṛṃdena puṣpāmodābhinaṃditaḥ |
anugṛhyātha bhagavānvanaṃtatsamṛgāṃḍajam || 81 ||

jagato'nugrahārthāya vāsaṃ tatrānvarocayat |
puṣkaraṃ nāma tattīrthaṃ kṣetraṃ vṛṣabhameva ca || 82 ||

janitaṃ tadbhagavatā lokānāṃ hitakāriṇā |
brahmāṇaṃ tatra vai gatvā toṣayadhvaṃ mayā saha || 83 ||

ārādhyamāno bhagavānpradāsyati varānvarān |
ityuktvā bhagavānviṣṇuḥ saha tairdevadānavaiḥ || 84 ||

jagāma tadvanoddeśaṃ yatrāste sa tu kaṃjajaḥ |
prahṛṣṭāstuṣṭamanasaḥ kokilālāpalāpitāḥ || 85 ||

puṣpoccayojjvalaṃ śastaṃ viviśurbrahmaṇo vanam |
saṃprāptaṃ sarvadevaistu vanaṃ naṃdanasaṃmitam || 86 ||

padminīmṛgapuṣpāḍhyaṃ sudṛḍhaṃ śuśubhe tadā |
praviśyātha vanaṃ devāḥ sarvapuṣpopaśobhitam || 87 ||

iha devostīti devā babhramuśca didṛkṣavaḥ |
mṛgayaṃtastataste tu sarve devāḥ savāsavāḥ || 88 ||

adbhutasya vanasyāṃtaṃ na te dadṛśurāśugāḥ |
vicinvadbhistadā devaṃ daivairvāyurvilokitaḥ || 89 ||

sa tānuvāca brahmāṇaṃ na drakṣyatha tapo vinā |
tadā khinnā vicinvaṃtastasminparvatarodhasi || 90 ||

dakṣiṇe cottare caiva aṃtarāle punaḥ punaḥ |
vāyūktaṃ hṛdaye kṛtvā vāyustānabravītpunaḥ || 91 ||

trividho darśanopāyo viriṃcerasya sarvadā |
śraddhā jñānena tapasā yogena ca nigadyate || 92 ||

sakalaṃ niṣkalaṃ caiva devaṃ paśyaṃti yoginaḥ |
tapasvinastu sakalaṃ jñānino niṣkalaṃ param || 93 ||

samutpanne tu vijñāne maṃdaśraddho na paśyati |
bhaktyā paramayā kṣipraṃ brahma paśyaṃti yoginaḥ || 94 ||

draṣṭavyo nirvikāro'sau pradhānapuruṣeśvaraḥ |
karmaṇā manasā vācā nityayuktāḥ pitāmaham || 95 ||

tapaścarata bhadraṃ vo brahmārādhanatatparāḥ |
brāhmīṃ dīkṣāṃ prapannānāṃ bhaktānāṃ ca dvijanmanām || 96 ||

sarvakālaṃ sa jānāti dātavyaṃ darśanaṃ mayā |
vāyostu vacanaṃ śrutvā hitametadavetya ca || 97 ||

brahmecchāviṣṭamatayo vākpatiṃ ca tato'bruvan |
prajñānavibudhāsmākaṃ brāhmīṃ dīkṣāṃ vidhatsva naḥ || 98 ||

sa didīkṣayiṣuḥ kṣipramamarānbrahmadīkṣayā |
vedoktena vidhānena dīkṣayāmāsa tānguruḥ || 99 ||

vinītaveṣāḥ praṇatā aṃtevāsitvamāyayuḥ |
brahmaprasādaṃ saṃprāptāḥ pauṣkaraṃ jñānamīritam || 100 ||

yajñaṃ cakāra vidhinā dhiṣaṇodhvaryusattamaḥ |
padmaṃ kṛtvā mṛṇālāḍhyaṃ padmadīkṣāprayogataḥ || 101 ||

anujagrāha devāṃstānsurecchā prerito muniḥ |
tebhyo dadau vivekibhyaḥ sa vedoktāvadhānavit || 102 ||

dīkṣāṃ vai vismayaṃ tyaktvā bṛhaspatirudāradhīḥ |
ekamagniṃ ca saṃskṛtya mahātmā tridivaukasām || 103 ||

prādādāṃgirasastuṣṭo jāpyaṃ vedoditaṃ tu yat |
trisuparṇaṃ trimadhu ca pāvamānīṃ ca pāvanīm || 104 ||

sa hi jāpyādikaṃ sarvamaśikṣayadudāradhīḥ |
āpo hiṣṭheti yatsnānaṃ brāhmaṃ tatparipaṭhyate || 105 ||

pāpaghnaṃ duṣṭaśamanaṃ puṣṭiśrībalavarddhanam |
siddhidaṃ kīrtidaṃ caiva kalikalmaṣanāśanam || 106 ||

tasmātsarvaprayatnena brāhmasnānaṃ samācaret |
kurvaṃto maunino dāṃtā dīkṣitāḥ kṣapiteṃdriyāḥ || 107 ||

sarve kamaṃḍaluyutā muktakakṣākṣamālinaḥ |
daṃḍinaścīravastrāśca jaṭābhiratiśobhitāḥ || 108 ||

snānācārāsanaratāḥ prayatnadhyānadhāriṇaḥ |
mano brahmaṇi saṃyojya niyatāhārakāṃkṣiṇaḥ || 109 ||

atiṣṭhandarśanālāpasaṃgadhyānavivarjitāḥ |
evaṃ vratadharāḥ sarve trikālaṃ snānakāriṇaḥ || 110 ||

bhaktyā paramayā yuktā vidhinā parameṇa ca |
kālena mahatā dhyānāddevajñānamanogatāḥ || 111 ||

brahmadhyānāgninirdagdhā yadā śuddhaikamānasāḥ |
avirbabhūva bhagavānsarveṣāṃ dṛṣṭigocaraḥ || 112 ||

tejasāpyāyitāstasya babhūvurbhrāṃtacetasaḥ |
tatovalaṃbya te dhairyamiṣṭaṃ devaṃ yathāvidhi || 113 ||

ṣaḍaṃgavedayogena hṛṣṭacittāstu tatparāḥ |
śirogatairaṃjalibhiḥ śirobhiśca mahīṃ gatāḥ || 114 ||

tuṣṭuvuḥ sṛṣṭikarttāraṃ sthitikartāramīśvaram |
devā ūcuḥ |
brahmaṇe brahmadehāya brahmaṇyāyā'jitāya ca || 115 ||

namaskurmaḥ suniyatāḥ kratuvedapradāyine |
lokānukaṃpine deva sṛṣṭirūpāya vai namaḥ || 116 ||

bhaktānukaṃpinetyarthaṃ vedajāpyastutāya ca |
bahurūpasvarūpāya rūpāṇāṃ śatadhāriṇe || 117 ||

sāvitrīpataye deva gāyatrīpataye namaḥ |
padmāsanāya padmāya padmavaktrāya te namaḥ || 118 ||

varadāya varārhāya kūrmāya ca mṛgāya ca |
jaṭāmakuṭayuktāya sruvasrucanidhāriṇe || 119 ||

mṛgāṃkamṛgadharmāya dharmanetrāya te namaḥ |
viśvanāmne'tha viśvāya viśveśāya namonamaḥ || 120 ||

dharmanetratrāṇamasmādadhikaṃ kartumarhasi |
vāṅmanaḥkāyabhāvaistvāṃ prapannāssmaḥ pitāmaha || 121 ||

evaṃ stutastadā devairbrahmā brahmavidāṃ varaḥ |
pradāsyāmi smṛto bāḍhamamoghaṃ darśanaṃ hi vaḥ || 122 ||

bruvaṃtu vāṃchitaṃ putrāḥ pradāsyāmi varānvarān |
evamuktā bhagavatā devā vacanamabruvan || 123 ||

eṣa evādya bhagavansuparyāpto mahānvaraḥ |
janito naḥ suśabdoyaṃ kamalaṃ kṣipatā tvayā || 124 ||

kimarthaṃ kaṃpitā bhūmirlokāścākulitāḥ kṛtāḥ |
naitannirarthakaṃ deva ucyatāmatra kāraṇam || 125 ||

brahmovāca |
yuṣmaddhitārthametadvai padmaṃ vinihitaṃ mayā |
devatānāṃ ca rakṣārthaṃ śrūyatāmatra kāraṇam || 126 ||

asuro vajranābho'yaṃ bālajīvāpahārakaḥ |
avasthitastvavaṣṭabhya rasātalatalāśrayam || 127 ||

yuṣmadāgamanaṃ jñātvā tapasthānnihitāyudhān |
haṃtukāmo durācāraḥ seṃdrānapi divaukasaḥ || 128 ||

ghātaḥ kamalapātena mayā tasya vinirmitaḥ |
sa rājyaiśvaryadarpiṣṭastenāsau nihato mayā || 129 ||

loke'sminsamaye bhaktā brāhmaṇā vedapāragāḥ |
maiva te durgatiṃ yāṃtu labhaṃtāṃ sugatiṃ punaḥ || 130 ||

devānāṃ dānavānāṃ ca manuṣyoragarakṣasām |
bhūtagrāmasya sarvasya samosmi tridivaukasaḥ || 131 ||

yuṣmaddhitārthaṃ pāpo'sau mayā maṃtreṇa ghātitaḥ |
prāptaḥ puṇyakṛtānlokānkamalasyāsya darśanāt || 132 ||

yanmayā padmamuktaṃ tu tenedaṃ puṣkaraṃ bhuvi |
khyātaṃ bhaviṣyate tīrthaṃ pāvanaṃ puṇyadaṃ mahat || 133 ||

pṛthivyāṃ sarvajaṃtūnāṃ puṇyadaṃ paripaṭhyate |
kṛto hyanugraho devā bhaktānāṃ bhaktimicchatām || 134 ||

vanesminnityavāsena vṛkṣairabhyarthitena ca |
mahākālo vane'trāgādāgatasya mamānaghāḥ || 135 ||

tapasyatāṃ ca bhavatāṃ mahajjñānaṃ pradarśitam |
kurudhvaṃ hṛdaye devāḥ svārthaṃ caiva parārthakam || 136 ||

bhavadbhirdarśanīyaṃ tu nānārūpadharairbhuvi |
dviṣanvai jñāninaṃ vipraṃ pāpenaivārdito naraḥ || 137 ||

na vimucyeta pāpena janmakoṭiśatairapi |
vedāṃgapāragaṃ vipraṃ na hanyānna ca dūṣayet || 138 ||

ekasminnihate yasmātkoṭirbhavati ghātitā |
ekaṃ vedāṃtagaṃ vipraṃ bhojayecchraddhayānvitaḥ || 139 ||

tasya bhuktā bhavetkoṭirviprāṇāṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ |
yaḥ pātrapūraṇīṃ bhikṣāṃ yatīnāṃ tu prayacchati || 140 ||

vimuktaḥ sarvapāpebhyo nā'sau durgatimāpnuyāt |
yathāhaṃ sarvadevānāṃ jyeṣṭhaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ pitāmahaḥ || 141 ||

tathā jñānī sadā pūjyo nirmamo niḥ parigrahaḥ |
saṃsārabaṃdhamokṣārthaṃ brahmaguptamidaṃ vratam || 142 ||

mayā praṇītaṃ viprāṇāmapunarbhavakāraṇam |
agnihotramupādāya yastyajedajiteṃdriyaḥ || 143 ||

rauravaṃ sa prayātyāśu praṇīto yamakiṃkaraiḥ |
lokayātrāvitaṃḍaśca kṣudraṃ karma karoti yaḥ || 144 ||

sa rāgacittaḥ śṛṃgārī nārījana dhanapriyaḥ |
ekabhojī sumiṣṭāśī kṛṣivāṇijyasevakaḥ || 145 ||

avedo vedaniṃdī ca parabhāryāṃ ca sevate |
ityādidoṣaduṣṭo yastasya saṃbhāṣaṇādapi || 146 ||

naro narakagāmī syādyaśca sadvratadūṣakaḥ |
asaṃtuṣṭaṃ bhinnacittaṃ durmatiṃ pāpakāriṇam || 147 ||

na spṛśedaṃgasaṃgena spṛṣṭvā snānena śuddhyati |
evamuktvā sa bhagavānbrahmā tairamaraiḥ saha || 148 ||

kṣetraṃ niveśayāmāsa yathāvatkathayāmi te |
uttare caṃdranadyāstu prācī yāvatsarasvatī || 149 ||

pūrvaṃ tu naṃdanātkṛtsnaṃ yāvatkalpaṃ sapuṣkaram |
vedī hyeṣā kṛtā yajñe brahmaṇā lokakāriṇā || 150 ||

jyeṣṭhaṃ tu prathamaṃ jñeyaṃ tīrthaṃ trailokyapāvanam |
khyātaṃ tadbrahmadaivatyaṃ madhyamaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ tathā || 151 ||

kaniṣṭhaṃ rudradaivatyaṃ brahmapūrvamakārayat |
ādyametatparaṃ kṣetraṃ guhyaṃ vedeṣu paṭhyate || 152 ||

araṇyaṃ puṣkarākhyaṃ tu brahmā sannihitaḥ prabhuḥ |
anugraho bhūmibhāge kṛto vai brahmaṇā svayam || 153 ||

anugrahārthaṃ viprāṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ bhūmicāriṇām |
suvarṇavajraparyaṃtā vedikāṃkā mahī kṛtā || 154 ||

vicitrakuṭṭimāratnaiḥ kāritā sarvaśobhanā |
ramate tatra bhagavānbrahmā lokapitāmahaḥ || 155 ||

viṣṇurudrau tathā devau vasavoppaścināvapi |
marutaśca maheṃdreṇa ramaṃte ca divaukasaḥ || 156 ||

etatte tathyamākhyātaṃ lokānugrahakāraṇam |
saṃhitānukrameṇātra maṃtraiśca vidhipūrvakam || 157 ||

vedānpaṭhaṃti ye viprā guruśuśrūṣaṇe ratāḥ |
vasaṃti brahmasāmīpye sarve tenānubhāvitāḥ || 158 ||

bhīṣma uvāca |
bhagavankena vidhinā araṇye puṣkare naraiḥ |
brahmalokamabhīpsadbhirvastavyaṃ kṣetravāsibhiḥ || 159 ||

kiṃ manuṣyairutastrībhiruta varṇāśramānvitaiḥ |
vasadbhiḥ kimanuṣṭheyametatsarvaṃ bravīhi me || 160 ||

pulastya uvāca |
naraiḥ strībhiśca vastavyaṃ varṇāśramanivāsibhiḥ |
svadharmācāraniratairdaṃbhamohavivarjitaiḥ || 161 ||

karmaṇā manasā vācā brahmabhaktairjiteṃdriyaiḥ |
anasūyubhirakṣudraiḥ sarvabhūtahite rataiḥ || 162 ||

bhīṣma uvāca |
kiṃ kurvāṇo naraḥ karma brahmabhaktastvihocyate |
kīdṛśā brahmabhaktāśca smṛtā nṝṇāṃ vadasva me || 163 ||

pulastya uvāca |
trividhā bhaktiruddiṣṭā manovākkāyasaṃbhavā |
laukikī vaidikī cāpi bhavedādhyātmikī tathā || 164 ||

dhyānadhāraṇayā buddhyā vedārthasmaraṇe hi yat |
brahmaprītikarī caiṣā mānasī bhaktirucyate || 165 ||

maṃtravedanamaskārairagniśrāddhādiciṃtanaiḥ |
jāpyaiścāvaśyakaiścaiva vācikī bhaktiriṣyate || 166 ||

vratopavāsaniyataiściteṃdriyanirodhibhiḥ |
bhūṣaṇairhemaratnāḍhyaistathā cāṃdrāyaṇādibhiḥ || 167 ||

brahmakṛcchropavāsaiśca tathācānyaiḥ śubhavrataiḥ |
kāyikībhaktirākhyātā trividhā tu dvijanmanām || 168 ||

goghṛtakṣīradadhibhiḥ ratnadīpakuśodakaiḥ |
gaṃdhairmālyaiśca vividhairdhātubhiścopapāditaiḥ || 169 ||

ghṛtagugguludhūpaiśca kṛṣṇāgarusugaṃdhibhiḥ |
bhūṣaṇairhemaratnāḍhyaiścitrābhiḥ sragbhireva ca || 170 ||

nṛtyavāditragītaiśca sarvaratnopahārakaiḥ |
bhakṣyabhojyānnapānaiśca yā pūjā kriyate naraiḥ || 171 ||

pitāmahaṃ samuddiśya bhaktissā laukikī matā |
vedamaṃtrahaviryogairbhaktiryā vaidikī matā || 172 ||

darśe vā paurṇamāsyāṃ vā kartavyamagnihotrakam |
praśastaṃ dakṣiṇādānaṃ puroḍāśaṃ carukriyā || 173 ||

iṣṭirdhṛtiḥ somapānāṃ yajñīyaṃ karma sarvaśaḥ |
ṛgyajuḥsāmajāpyāni saṃhitādhyayanāni ca || 174 ||

kriyaṃte vidhimuddiśya sā bhaktirvaidikīṣyate |
agni bhūmyanilākāśāṃbuniśākarabhāskaram || 175 ||

samuddiśya kṛtaṃ karma tatsarvaṃ brahmadaivatam |
