ādhyātmikī tu dvividhā brahmabhaktiḥ sthitā nṛpa || 176 ||

saṃkhyākhyā yogajā cānyā vibhāgaṃ tatra me śṛṇu |
caturviṃśatitatvāni pradhānādīni saṃkhyayā || 177 ||

acetanāni bhogyāni puruṣaḥ paṃcaviṃśakaḥ |
cetanaḥ puruṣo bhoktā na kartā tasya karmaṇaḥ || 178 ||

ātmā nityo'vyayaścaiva adhiṣṭhātā prayojakaḥ |
avyaktaḥ puruṣo nityaḥ kāraṇaṃ ca pitāmahaḥ || 179 ||

tatvasargo bhāvasargo bhūtasargaśca tattvataḥ |
saṃkhyayā parisaṃkhyāya pradhānaṃ ca guṇātmakam || 180 ||

sādharmyamānamaiśvaryaṃ pradhānaṃ ca vidharmi ca |
kāraṇatvaṃ ca brahmatvaṃ kāmyatvamidamucyate || 181 ||

prayojyatvaṃ pradhānasya vaidharmyamidamucyate |
sarvatrakartṛsyadbrahmapuruṣasyāpyakartṛtā || 182 ||

cetanatvaṃ pradhāne ca sādharmyamidamucyate |
tatvāṃtaraṃ ca tatvānāṃ karmakāraṇameva ca || 183 ||

prayojanaṃ ca naiyojyamaiśvaryaṃ tatvasaṃkhyayā |
saṃkhyāstītyucyate prājñairviniścityārthaciṃtakaiḥ || 184 ||

iti tatvasya saṃbhāraṃ tatvasaṃkhyā ca tatvataḥ |
brahmatatvādhikaṃ cāpi śrutvā tatvaṃ vidurbudhāḥ || 185 ||

sāṃkhyakṛdbhaktireṣā ca sadbhirādhyātmikī kṛtā |
yogajāmapi bhaktānāṃ śṛṇu bhaktiṃ pitāmahe || 186 ||

prāṇāyāmaparo nityaṃ dhyānavānniyateṃdriyaḥ |
bhaikṣyabhakṣī vratī vāpi sarvapratyāhṛteṃdriyaḥ || 187 ||

dhāraṇaṃ hṛdaye kuryāddhyāyamānaḥ prajeśvaram |
hṛtpadmakarṇikāsīnaṃ raktavaktraṃ sulocanam || 188 ||

parito dyotitamukhaṃ brahmasūtrakaṭītaṭam |
caturvaktraṃ caturbāhuṃ varadābhayahastakam || 189 ||

yogajā mānasī siddhirbrahmabhaktiḥ parā smṛtā |
ya evaṃ bhaktimāndeve brahmabhaktaḥ sa ucyate || 190 ||

vṛttiṃ ca śṛṇu rājeṃdra yā smṛtā kṣetravāsinām |
svayaṃ devena viprāṇāṃ viṣṇvādīnāṃ samāgame || 191 ||

kathitā vistarātpūrvaṃ sarveṣāṃ tatra sannidhau |
nirmamā nirahaṃkārā niḥsaṃgā niṣparigrahāḥ || 192 ||

baṃdhuvarge ca niḥsnehāssamaloṣṭāśmakāṃcanāḥ |
bhūtānāṃ karmabhirnityairvividhairabhayapradāḥ || 193 ||

prāṇāyāmaparā nityaṃ paradhyānaparāyaṇāḥ |
yājinaḥ śucayo nityaṃ yatidharmaparāyaṇāḥ || 194 ||

sāṃkhyayogavidhijñāśca dharmajñāśchinnasaṃśayāḥ |
yajaṃte vidhinānena ye viprāḥ kṣetravāsinaḥ || 195 ||

araṇye pauṣkare teṣāṃ mṛtānāṃ satphalaṃ śṛṇu |
vrajaṃti te suduṣprāpaṃ brahmasāyujyamakṣayam || 196 ||

yatprāpya na punarjanma labhante mṛtyudāyakam |
punarāvartanaṃ hitvā brāhmīvidyāṃ samāsthitāḥ || 197 ||

punarāvṛttiranyeṣāṃ prapaṃcāśramavāsinām |
gārhasthyavidhimāśritya ṣaṭkarmanirataḥ sadā || 198 ||

juhoti vidhinā samyaṅmaṃtrairyajñe nimaṃtritaḥ |
adhikaṃ phalamāpnoti sarvaduḥkhavivarjitaḥ || 199 ||

sarvalokeṣu cāpyasya gatirna pratihanyate |
divyenaiśvaryayogena svārūḍhaḥ saparigrahaḥ || 200 ||

bālasūryaprakāśena vimānena suvarcasā |
vṛtaḥ strīṇāṃ sahasraistu svaṃcchadagamanālayaḥ || 201 ||

vicaratyanivāryeṇa sarvalokānyadṛcchayā |
spṛhaṇīyatamaḥ puṃsāṃ sarvadharmottamo dhanī || 202 ||

svargacyutaḥ prajāyeta kule mahati rūpavān |
dharmajño dharmabhaktaśca sarvavidyārthapāragaḥ || 203 ||

tathaiva brahmacaryeṇa guruśuśrūṣaṇena ca |
vedādhyayanasaṃyukto bhaikṣyavṛtirjitendriyaḥ || 204 ||

nityaṃ satyavrate yuktaḥ svadharmeṣvapramādavān |
sarvakāmasamṛddhena sarvakāmāvalaṃbinā || 205 ||

sūryeṇeva dvitīyena vimānenānivāritaḥ |
guhyakānāmabrahmākhya gaṇāḥ paramasaṃmatāḥ || 206 ||

aprameyabalaiśvaryā devadānavapūjitāḥ |
teṣāṃ sa samatā yāti tulyaiśvaryasamanvitaḥ || 207 ||

devadānavamartyeṣu bhavatyaniyatāyudhaḥ |
varṣakoṭisahasrāṇi varṣakoṭiśatāni ca || 208 ||

evamaiśvaryasaṃyukto viṣṇuloke mahīyate |
uṣitvā'sau vibhūtyaivaṃ yadā pracyavate punaḥ || 209 ||
viṣṇulokātsvakṛtyena svargasthāneṣu jāyate || 210 ||

puṣkarāraṇyamāsādya brahmacaryāśrame sthitaḥ |
abhyāsena tu vedānāṃ vasati mriyatepi vā || 211 ||

mṛto'sau yāti divyena vimānena svatejasā |
pūrṇacaṃdraprakāśena śaśivatpriyadarśanaḥ || 212 ||

rudralokaṃ samāsādya guhyakaiḥ saha modate |
aiśvaryaṃ mahadāpnoti sarvasya jagataḥ prabhuḥ || 213 ||

bhuktvā yugasahasrāṇi rudraloke mahīyate |
pracyutastu punastasmādrudralokātkrameṇa tu || 214 ||

nityaṃ pramuditastatra bhuktvā sukhamanāmayam |
dvijānāṃ sadane divye kule mahati jāyate || 215 ||

mānuṣeṣu sa dharmmātmā surūpo vākpatirbhavet |
spṛhaṇīyavapuḥ strīṇāmmahābhogapatirbalī || 216 ||

vānaprasthasamācārī grāmyauṣadhivivarjitaḥ |
sarvalokeṣu cāpyasya gatirna pratihanyate || 217 ||

śīrṇaparṇaphalāhāraḥ puṣpamūlāṃbubhojanaḥ |
kāpotenāśmakuṭṭena daṃtolūkhalikena ca || 218 ||

vṛtyupāyena jīveta cīravalkalavāsasā |
jaṭītriṣavaṇasnāyī tyaktadoṣastu daṃḍavān || 219 ||

kṛcchravrataparo yastu śvapaco yadi vā paraḥ |
jalaśāyī paṃcatapā varṣāsvabhrāvagāhakaḥ || 220 ||

kīṭakaṃṭakapāṣāṇabhūmyāṃ tu śayanaṃ tathā |
sthānavīrāsanarataḥ saṃvibhāgī dṛḍhavrataḥ || 221 ||

araṇyauṣadhibhoktā ca sarvabhūtābhayapradaḥ |
nityaṃ dharmārjanarato jitakrodho jiteṃdriyaḥ || 222 ||

brahmabhaktaḥ kṣetravāsī puṣkare vasate muniḥ |
sarvasaṃgaparityāgī svārāmo vigataspṛhaḥ || 223 ||

yaścātra vasate bhīṣma śṛṇu tasyāpi yā gatiḥ |
taruṇārkaprakāśena vedikāstaṃbhaśobhinā || 224 ||

brahmabhakto vimānena yāti kāmapracāriṇām |
virājamāno nabhasi dvitīya iva caṃdramāḥ || 225 ||

gītavāditranṛtyajñairgaṃdharvāpsarasāṃgaṇaiḥ |
apsarobhiḥ samāyukto varṣakoṭiśatānyasau || 226 ||

yasya kasyāpi devasya lokaṃ yātyanivāritaḥ |
brahmaṇo'nugraheṇaiva tatratatra virājate || 227 ||

brahmalokāccyutaścāpi viṣṇulokaṃ sa gacchati |
viṣṇulokātparibhraṣṭo rudralokaṃ sa gacchati || 228 ||

tasmādapi cyutaḥ sthānāddvīpeṣu sa hi jāyate |
svargeṣu ca tathānyeṣu bhogānbhuktvā yathepsitān || 229 ||

bhuktvaiśvaryaṃ tatasteṣu punarmartyeṣu jāyate |
rājā vā rājaputro vā jāyate dhanavānsukhī || 230 ||

surūpaḥ subhagaḥ kāṃtaḥ kīrtimānbhaktibhāvitaḥ |
brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyā vaiśyāḥ śūdrā vā kṣetravāsinaḥ || 231 ||

svadharmaniratā rājansuvṛttāścirajīvinaḥ |
sarvātmanā brahmabhaktā bhūtānugrahakāriṇaḥ || 232 ||

puṣkare tu mahākṣetre ye vasaṃti mumukṣavaḥ |
mṛtāste brahmabhavanaṃ vimānairyāṃti śobhanaiḥ || 233 ||

apsarogaṇasaṃghuṣṭaiḥ kāmagaiḥ kāmarūpibhiḥ |
athavā sarvadīptāgnau svaśarīraṃ juhoti yaḥ || 234 ||

brahmadhyāyī mahāsatvassa brahmabhavanaṃ vrajet |
brahmaloko'kṣayastasya śāśvato vibhavaiḥ saha || 235 ||

sarvalokottamo ramyo bhavatīṣṭārthasādhakaḥ |
puṣkare tu mahāpuṇye prāṇānye salile tyajan || 236 ||

teṣāmapyakṣayo bhīṣma brahmaloko mahātmanām |
sākṣātpaśyaṃti te devaṃ sarvaduḥkhavināśanam || 237 ||

sarvāmarayutaṃ devaṃ rudraviṣṇugaṇairyutam |
anāśake mṛtāśśūdrāḥ puṣkare tu vane narāḥ || 238 ||

haṃsayuktaistato yāṃti vimānairarkasaprabhaiḥ |
nānāratnasuvarṇāḍhyairdṛḍhairgaṃdhādhivāsitaiḥ || 239 ||

anaupamyaguṇairanyairapsarogītanāditaiḥ |
patākādhvajavinyastairnānāghaṇṭānināditaiḥ || 240 ||

bahvāścaryasamopetaiḥ krīḍāvijñānaśālibhiḥ |
suprabhairguṇasaṃpannairmayūravaravāhibhiḥ || 241 ||

brahmaloke narā dhīrā ramaṃte nāśake mṛtāḥ |
tatroṣitvā ciraṃ kālaṃ bhuktvā bhogānyathepsitān || 242 ||

dhanī vipnakule bhogī jāyate martyamāgataḥ |
kārīṣīṃ sādhayedyastu puṣkare tu vane naraḥ || 243 ||

sarvalokānparityajya brahmalokaṃ sa gacchati |
brahmaloke vasettāvadyāvatkalpakṣayo bhavet || 244 ||

naiva paśyati martyaṃ hi kliśyamānaṃ svakarmabhiḥ |
gatistasyā'pratihatā tiryagūrdhvamadhastathā || 245 ||

sa pūjyaḥ sarvalokeṣu yaśo vistārayanvaśī |
sadācāravidhiprajñaḥ sarvendriya manoharaḥ || 246 ||

nṛtyavāditragītajñaḥ subhagaḥ priyadarśanaḥ |
nityamamlānakusumo divyābharaṇabhūṣitaḥ || 247 ||

nīlotpaladalaśyāmo nīlakuṃcitamūrddhajaḥ |
ajaghanyāḥ sumadhyāśca sarvasaubhāgyapūritāḥ || 248 ||

sarvaiśvaryaguṇopetā yauvanenātigarvitāḥ |
striyaḥ sevaṃti tatrasthāḥ śayane ramayaṃti ca || 249 ||

vīṇāveṇuninādaiśca suptaḥ saṃpratibudhyate |
mahotsavasukhaṃ bhuṃkte duḥprāpyamakṛtātmabhiḥ || 250 ||

prasādāddevadevasya brahmaṇaḥ śubhakāriṇaḥ |
bhīṣma uvāca |
ācārāḥ paramā dharmāḥ kṣetradharmaparāyaṇāḥ || 251 ||

svadharmācāraniratā jitakrodhā jiteṃdriyāḥ |
brahmalokaṃ vrajaṃtīti naitaccitraṃ mataṃ mama || 252 ||

asaṃśayaṃ ca gacchaṃti lokānanyānapi dvijāḥ |
vinā padmopavāsena tathaiva niyamena ca || 253 ||

striyo mlechāśca śūdrāśca pakṣiṇaḥ paśavo mṛgāḥ |
mūkā jaḍāndhabadhirāstapo niyamavarjitāḥ || 254 ||

teṣāṃ vada gatiṃ vipra puṣkare ye tvavasthitāḥ |
pulastya uvāca |
striyo mlecchāśca śūdrāśca paśavaḥ pakṣiṇo mṛgāḥ || 255 ||

puṣkare tu mṛtā bhīṣma brahmalokaṃ vrajaṃti te |
śarīrairdivyarūpaistu vimānai ravisaprabhaiḥ || 256 ||

divyavyūhasamāyuktaiḥ suvarṇavaraketanaiḥ |
suvarṇavajrasopānamaṇistaṃbhavibhūṣitaiḥ || 257 ||

sarvakāmopabhogāḍhyaiḥ kāmagaiḥ kāmarūpibhiḥ |
nānārasāḍhyaṃ gacchaṃti strīsahasrasamākulāḥ || 258 ||

brahmalokaṃ mahātmāno lokānanyānyathepsitān |
brahmalokāccyutāścāpi kramāddvīpeṣu yāṃti te || 259 ||

kule mahati vistīrṇe dhanī bhavati sa dvijaḥ |
tiryagyoni gatā ye tu sarpakīṭapipīlikāḥ || 260 ||

sthalajā jalajāścaiva svedāṃḍodbhijjarāyujāḥ |
sakāmā vāpyakāmā vā puṣkare tu vane mṛtāḥ || 261 ||

sūryaprabhavimānasthā brahmalokaṃ prayāṃti te |
kalau yuge mahāghore prajāḥ pāpasamīritāḥ || 262 ||

nānyenāsminnupāyena dharmaḥ svargaśca labhyate |
vasaṃti puṣkare ye tu brahmārcanaratā narāḥ || 263 ||

kalau yuge kṛtārthāste kliśyaṃtyanye nirarthakāḥ |
rātrau karoti yatpāpaṃ naraḥ paṃcabhiriṃdriyaiḥ || 264 ||

karmaṇā manasā vācā kāmakrodhavaśānugāḥ |
prātaḥ sa jalamāsādya puṣkare tu pitāmaham || 265 ||

abhigamya śucirbhūttvā tasmātpāpātpramucyate |
udaye'rkasya cārabhya yāvaddarśanamūrdhvagam || 266 ||

mānasākhye prasaṃciṃtya brahmayoge haredagham |
dṛṣṭvā viriṃciṃ madhyāhne naraḥ pāpātpramucyate || 267 ||

madhyāhnāstamayāntaṃ yadiṃdriyaiḥ pāpamācaret |
pitāmahasya saṃdhyāyāṃ darśanādeva mucyate || 268 ||

śabdādīnviṣayānsarvānbhuṃjānopi sakāmataḥ |
yaḥ puṣkare brahmabhakto nivasettapasi sthitaḥ || 269 ||

puṣkarāraṇyamadhyastho miṣṭānnāsvādabhojanaḥ |
trikālamapi bhuṃjāno vāyubhakṣasamo mataḥ || 270 ||

vasaṃti puṣkare ye tu narāḥ sukṛtakarmiṇaḥ |
te labhaṃte mahābhogānkṣetrasyāsya prabhāvataḥ || 271 ||

yathā mahodadhestulyo na cānyo'sti jalāśayaḥ |
tathā vai puṣkarasyāpi samaṃ tīrthaṃ na vidyate || 272 ||

puṣkarāraṇyasadṛśaṃ tīrthaṃ nāstyadhikaṃ guṇaiḥ |
atha te'nyānpravakṣyāmi kṣetre ye'sminvyavasthitāḥ || 273 ||

viṣṇunā sahitāḥ sarva iṃdrādyāśca divaukasaḥ |
gajavaktraḥ kumāraśca revaṃtaḥ sadivākaraḥ || 274 ||

śivadūtī tathā devī kanyā kṣemaṃkarī sadā |
alaṃ tapobhirniyamaiḥ sukriyārcanakāriṇām || 275 ||

vratopavāsakarmāṇi kṛtvānyatra mahāṃtyapi |
jyeṣṭhe tu puṣkarāraṇye yastiṣṭhati nirudyamaḥ || 276 ||

labhate sarvakāmitvaṃ yo'traivāste dvijaḥ sadā |
pitāmahasamaṃ yāti sthānaṃ paramamavyayam || 277 ||

kṛte dvādaśabhirvarṣaistretāyāṃ hāyanena tu |
māsena dvāpare bhīṣma ahorātreṇa tatkalau || 278 ||

phalaṃ saṃprāpyate loke kṣetresmiṃstīrthavāsibhiḥ |
ityevaṃ devadevena puroktaṃ brahmaṇā mama || 279 ||

nātaḥ parataraṃ kiṃcitkṣetramastīha bhūtale |
tasmātsarvaprayatnenāraṇyametatsamāśrayet || 280 ||

gṛhastho brahmacārī ca vānaprastho'tha bhikṣukaḥ |
yathoktakāriṇaḥ sarve gacchaṃti paramāṃ gatim || 281 ||

ekasminnāśrame dharmaṃ yo'nutiṣṭhedyathāvidhi |
akāmadveṣasaṃyuktaḥ sa paratra mahīyate || 282 ||

catuṣpathāhi niḥśreṇī brahmaṇeha pratiṣṭhitā |
etāmāśritya niśreṇīṃ brahmaloke mahīyate || 283 ||

āyuṣo'pi caturbhāgaṃ brahmacāryanasūyakaḥ |
gurau vā guruputre vā vaseddharmārthakovidaḥ || 284 ||

karmātirekeṇa guroradhyetavyaṃ bubhūṣatā |
dakṣiṇānāṃ pradāpī syādāhūto gurumāśrayet || 285 ||

jaghanyaśāyī pūrvaṃ syādutthāyī guruveśmani |
yacca śiṣyeṇa karttavyaṃ kāryamāsevanādikam || 286 ||

kṛtamityeva tatsarvaṃ kṛtvā tiṣṭhettu pārśvataḥ |
kiṃkaraḥ sarvakārī ca sarvakarmasukovidaḥ || 287 ||

śucirdakṣo guṇopeto brūyādiṣṭamathottaram |
cakṣuṣā gurumavyagro nirīkṣeta jiteṃdriyaḥ || 288 ||

nā'bhuktavati cāśnīyādapītavati no pibet |
na tiṣṭhati tathāsīta na suptenaiva saṃviśet || 289 ||

uttānābhyāṃ ca pāṇibhyāṃ pādāvasya mṛdu spṛśet |
dakṣiṇaṃ dakṣiṇenaiva savyaṃ savyena pīḍayet || 290 ||

abhivādya guruṃ brūyādabhidhāṃ svāṃ bruvanniti |
idaṃ kariṣye bhagavannidaṃ cāpi mayā kṛtam || 291 ||

iti sarvaṃ ca vijñāpya nivedya gurave dhanam |
kuryātkṛtaṃ ca tatsarvamākhyeyaṃ gurave punaḥ || 292 ||

yāṃstu gaṃdhānrasānvāpi brahmacārī na sevate |
seveta tānsamāvṛtya iti dharmeṣu niścayaḥ || 293 ||

ye kecidvistareṇoktā niyamā brahmacāriṇaḥ |
tānsarvānanugṛhṇīyādbhaktaśśiṣyaśca vai guroḥ || 294 ||

sa eva gurave prītimupakṛtya yathābalam |
agrāmyeṣvāśrameṣveva śiṣyo varteta karmaṇā || 295 ||

vedavedau tathā vedānvedārthāṃśca tathā dvijaḥ |
bhikṣābhugapyadhaḥśāyī samadhītya gurormukhāt || 296 ||

vedavratopayogī ca caturthāṃśena yogataḥ |
gurave dakṣiṇāṃ datvā samāvartedyathāvidhi || 297 ||

dharmānvitairyuto dārairagnīnāvāhya pūjayet |
dvitīyamāyuṣo bhāgaṃ gṛhamedhī samācaret || 298 ||

gṛhasthavṛttayaḥ pūrvaṃ catasro munibhiḥ kṛtāḥ |
kusūladhānyā prathamā kuṃbhīdhānyā dvitīyakā || 299 ||

aśvastanī tṛtīyoktā kāpotyatha caturthikā |
tāsāṃ parāparā śreṣṭhā dharmato lokajittamā || 300 ||

ṣaṭkarmavarttakastvekastribhiranyaḥ prasarpate |
dvābhyāṃ caiva caturthastu dvijaḥ sa brahmaṇi sthitaḥ || 301 ||

gṛhamedhivratādanyanmahattīrthaṃ na cakṣate |
nātmārthe pācayedannaṃ na vṛthā ghātayetpaśum || 302 ||

prāṇī vā yadi vāprāṇī saṃskārādyajñamarhati |
na divā prasvapejjātu na pūrvāpararātrayoḥ || 303 ||

na bhuṃjītāṃtarākāle nānṛtaṃ tu vadediha |
na cāpyaśnanvasedvipro gṛhe kaścidapūjitaḥ || 304 ||

tathāsyātithayaḥ pūjyā havyakavyavahāḥ smṛtāḥ |
vedavidyāvratasnātā śrotriyā vedapāragāḥ || 305 ||

svakarmajīvinodāṃtāḥ kriyāvaṃtastapasvinaḥ |
teṣāṃ havyaṃ ca kavyaṃ cāpyarhaṇārthaṃ vidhīyate || 306 ||

naśvaraissaṃprayātasya svadharmāpagatasya ca |
apaviddhāgnihotrasya gurorvālīkakāriṇaḥ || 307 ||

asatyābhiniveśasya nādhikārosti karmaṇoḥ |
saṃvibhāgotra bhūtānāṃ sarveṣāmeva śiṣyate || 308 ||

tathaivāpacamānebhyaḥ pradeyaṃ gṛhamedhinā |
vighasāśī bhavennityaṃ nityaṃ cāmṛtabhojanaḥ || 309 ||

amṛtaṃ yajñaśeṣaṃ syādbhojanaṃ haviṣā samam |
saṃbhuktaśeṣaṃ yośnāti tamāhurvighasāśinam || 310 ||

svadāranirato dāṃto dakṣotyarthaṃ jiteṃdriyaḥ |
ṛtvikpurohitācāryamātulātithisaṃhataiḥ || 311 ||

vṛddhabālāturairvaidyairjñātisaṃbaṃdhi bāṃdhavaiḥ |
mātrā pitrā ca jāmātrā bhrātrā putreṇa bhāryayā || 312 ||

duhitrā dāsavargeṇa vivādaṃ na samācaret |
etānvimucya saṃvādānsarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate || 313 ||

etairjitaistu jayati sarvalokānna saṃśayaḥ |
ācāryo brahmalokeśaḥ prājāpatya prabhuḥ pitā || 314 ||

atithiḥ sarvalokeśa ṛtvigvedāśrayaḥ prabhuḥ |
jāmātāpsarasāṃloke jñātayo vaiśvadevikāḥ || 315 ||

saṃbaṃdhi bāṃdhavā dikṣu pṛthivyāṃ mātṛmātulau |
vṛddhabālāturāścaiva ākāśe prabhaviṣṇavaḥ || 316 ||

purodhā ṛṣilokeśaḥ saṃśritāssādhyalokapāḥ |
aśvilokapatirvaidyo bhrātā tu vasulokapaḥ || 317 ||

caṃdralokeśvarī bhāryā duhitāpsarasāṃ gṛhe |
bhrātā jyeṣṭhaḥ samaḥ pitrā bhāryā putra svakātanuḥ || 318 ||

kāyasthā dāsavargāśca duhitā kṛpaṇaṃ param |
tasmādetairadhikṣiptaḥ sahennityamasaṃjvaraḥ || 319 ||

gṛhadharmarato vidvāndharmaniṣṭho jitaklamaḥ |
nārabhedbahukāryāṇi dharmavānkiṃcidārabhet || 320 ||

gṛhasthavṛttayastisrastāsāṃ niśreyasaṃ paraṃ |
parasparaṃ tathaivāhuścāturāśramyameva ca || 321 ||

ye coktāni yamāsteṣāṃ sarvaṃ kāryaṃ bubhūṣuṇā |
kuṃbhadhānyairuṃcchaśilaiḥ kāpotīṃ vṛttimāśritaiḥ || 322 ||

yasmiṃścaite vasaṃtyarthāstadrāṣṭramabhivardhate |
pūrvāparāndaśaparānpunāti ca pitāmahān || 323 ||

gṛhasthavṛttimapyetāṃ vartayedyo gatavyathaḥ |
sa cakradharalokānāṃ samānāmprāpnuyādgatim || 324 ||

jiteṃdriyāṇāmathavā gatireṣā vidhīyate |
svargaloko gṛhasthānāṃ pratiṣṭhā niyatātmanāṃ || 325 ||

brahmaṇābhihatā śreṇī hyeṣā yasyāḥ pramucyate |
dvitīyāṃ kramaśaḥ prāpya svargaloke mahīyate || 326 ||

tṛtīyāmapi vakṣyāmi vānaprasthāśramaṃ śṛṇu |
gṛhasthastu yadā paśyedvalīpalitamātmanaḥ || 327 ||

apatyasyaiva cāpatyaṃ vanameva tadāśrayet |
gṛhasthavratakhinnānāṃ vānaprasthāśramaukasāṃ || 328 ||

śrūyatāṃ bhīṣma bhadraṃ te sarvalokāśrayātmanāṃ |
dīkṣāpūrvaṃ nivṛttānāṃ puṇyadeśanivāsināṃ || 329 ||

prajñābalayujāṃ puṃsāṃ satyaśaucakṣamāvatāṃ |
tṛtīyamāyuṣo bhāgaṃ vānaprasthāśrame vasan || 330 ||

tānevāgnīnparicaredyajamāno divaukasaḥ |
niyato niyatāhāro viṣṇubhaktiprasaktimān || 331 ||

tadāgnihotramātrāṇi yajñāṃgāni ca sarvaśaḥ |
akṛṣṭaṃ vai vrīhiyavaṃ nīvāraṃ vighasāni ca || 332 ||

grīṣme haviṣyaṃ prāyacchetsa māgheṣvapi paṃcasu |
vānaprasthāśramepyetāścatasro vṛttayaḥ smṛtāḥ || 333 ||

sadyaḥ prabhakṣakāḥ kecitkecinmāsikasaṃcayān |
vārṣikānsaṃcayānkecitkeciddvādaśavārṣikān || 334 ||

kurvantyatithipūjārthaṃ yajñatantrārthameva ca |
abhrāvakāśā varṣāsu hemaṃte jalasaṃśrayāḥ || 335 ||

grīṣme paṃcāgnitapasaḥ śaradyamṛtabhojanāḥ |
bhūmau viparivartaṃte tiṣṭhaṃti prapadairapi || 336 ||

sthānāsane ca vartante vasaneṣvapi saṃsthite |
daṃtolūkhalinaḥ kecidaśmakuṭṭāstathā pare || 337 ||

śuklapakṣe pibantyeke yavāgūṃ kvathitāṃ kvacit |
kṛṣṇapakṣe pibaṃtyeke bhuṃjate ca yathāgamam || 338 ||

mūlaireke phalaireke jalaireke dṛḍhavratāḥ |
varttayaṃti yathānyāyaṃ vaikhānasa dhṛtavratāḥ || 339 ||

etāścānyāśca vividhā dīkṣāsteṣāṃ manasvināṃ |
caturthaścaupaniṣado dharmaḥ sādhāraṇo mataḥ || 340 ||

vānaprastho gṛhasthaśca satatonyaḥ pravarttate |
tasminneva yuge tāta vipraiḥ sarvārthadarśibhiḥ || 341 ||

agastyaśca saptarṣayo madhucchaṃdo gaveṣaṇaḥ |
sāṃkṛtiḥ sadivo bhāṃḍiryavaprotho hyatharvaṇaḥ || 342 ||

ahovīryastathā kāmyaḥ sthāṇurmedhātithirbudhaḥ |
manovākaḥ śinīvākaḥ śūnyapālo kṛtavraṇaḥ || 343 ||

ete karmasu vidvāṃsastataḥ svargamupāgaman |
ete pratyakṣadharmāṇastathā yāyāvarāgaṇāḥ || 344 ||

ṛṣīṇāmugratapasāṃ dharmanaipuṇyadarśinām |
sureśvaraṃ samārādhya brāhmaṇā vanamāśritāḥ || 345 ||

apāsyoparatā māyāṃ brāhmaṇā vanamāśritāḥ |
anakṣatrāstathā dhṛṣyā dṛśyante proṣitā gaṇāḥ || 346 ||

jarayā tu paridyūnā vyādhinā paripīḍitāḥ |
caturthaṃ tvāśramaṃ śeṣaṃ vānaprasthāśramādyayuḥ || 347 ||

sadyaskārī sunirvāpya sarvavedasadakṣiṇām |
ātmayājī saumyamatirātmakrīḍātmasaṃśrayaḥ || 348 ||

ātmanyagniṃ samādhāya tyaktvāsarvaparigraham |
sadyaskaśca yajedyajñāniṣṭiṃ caiveha sarvadā || 349 ||

sadaiva yājināṃ yajñānātmanījyā pravarttate |
trīnevāgnīṃstyajetsamyagātmanyevātmanā kṣaṇāt || 350 ||

prāpnuyādyena vā yacca tatprāśnīyādakutsayan |
keśalomanakhānnyasyedvānaprasthāśrame rataḥ || 351 ||

āśramādāśramaṃ sadyaḥ pūto gacchati karmabhiḥ |
abhayaṃ sarvabhūtebhyo yo datvā pravrajeddvijaḥ || 352 ||

lokāstejomayāstasya pretya cānaṃtyamaśnute |
suśīlavṛtto vyapanītakalmaṣo na ceha nāmutra carantumīhate || 353 ||

aroṣamoho gatasaṃdhivigrahaḥ sa cedudāsīnavadātmaciṃtayā |
yameṣu caivānyagateṣu na vyathaḥ svaśāstraśūnyo hṛdinātmavibhramaḥ || 354 ||

bhavedyatheṣṭāgatirātmayājinī nissaṃśaye dharmapare jitendriye |
ataḥparaṃ śreṣṭhamatīvasadguṇairadhiṣṭhitaṃ trīnativartya cāśramān || 355 ||

caturthamuktaṃ paramāśramaṃ śṛṇu prakīrtyamānaṃ paramaṃ parāyaṇam |
prāpya saṃskārametābhyāmāśramābhyāṃ tataḥ param || 356 ||

yatkāryaṃ paramātmārthaṃ tattvamekamanāḥ śṛṇu |
kāṣāyaṃ dhārayitvā tu śreṇīsthāneṣu ca triṣu || 357 ||

yo vrajecca paraṃ sthānaṃ pārivrājyamanuttamam |
tadbhāvanena saṃnyasya vartanaṃ śrūyatāṃ tathā || 358 ||

eka eva careddharmaṃ sidhyarthamasahāyavān |
ekaścarati yaḥ paśyanna jahāti na hīyate || 359 ||

anagniraniketastu grāmaṃ bhikṣārthamāśrayet |
aśvastanavidhānaḥ syānmunirbhāvasamanvitaḥ || 360 ||

laghvāśī niyatāhāraḥ sakṛdannaṃ niṣevayet |
kapālaṃ vṛkṣamūlāni kucelamasahāyatā || 361 ||

upekṣā sarvabhūtānāmetāvadbhikṣu lakṣaṇam |
yasminvācaḥ praviśaṃti kūpe prāptā mṛtā iva || 362 ||

na vaktāraṃ punaryāṃti sa kaivalyāśrame vaset |
naiva paśyenna śṛṇuyādavācyaṃ jātu kasyacit || 363 ||

brāhmaṇānāṃ viśeṣeṇa naitadbhūyātkathaṃcana |
yadbrāhmaṇasyānukūlaṃ tadeva satataṃ vadet || 364 ||

tūṣṇīmāsīta niṃdāyāṃ kurvanbhaiṣajyamātmanaḥ |
yena pūrṇamivākāśaṃ bhavatyekena sarvadā || 365 ||
śūnyaṃ yena samākīrṇaṃ taṃ devā brāhmaṇaṃ viduḥ || 366 ||

yenakena cidāchinno yenakena cidāśitaḥ |
yatra kvacana śāyī ca taṃ devā brāhmaṇaṃ viduḥ || 367 ||

aheriva janādbhītaḥ suhṛdo narakādiva |
kṛpaṇādiva nārībhyastaṃ devā brāhmaṇaṃ viduḥ || 368 ||

na hṛṣyeta viṣīdeta mānito mānitastathā |
sarvabhūteṣvabhayadastaṃ devā brāhmaṇaṃ viduḥ || 369 ||

nābhinaṃdeta maraṇaṃ nābhinaṃdeta jīvitam |
kālameva nirīkṣeta nirdeśaṃ kṛṣako yathā || 370 ||

anabhyāhatacittaśca dāṃtaścāhatadhīstathā |
vimuktaḥ sarvapāpebhyo naro gacchettato divam || 371 ||

abhayaṃ sarvabhūtebhyo bhūtānāmabhayaṃ yataḥ |
tasya dehavimuktasya bhayaṃ nāsti kutaścana || 372 ||

yathā nāgapade'nyāni padāni padagāminām |
sarvāṇyevāvalīyaṃte tathā jñānāni cetasi || 373 ||

evaṃ sarvamahiṃsāyāṃ dharmo'rthaśca mahīyate |
mṛtaḥ sa nityaṃ bhavati yo hiṃsāṃ pratipadyate || 374 ||

ahiṃsakastataḥ samyagdhṛtimānniyateṃdriyaḥ |
śaraṇyassarvabhūtānāṃ gatimāpnotyanuttamām || 375 ||

evaṃ prajñānatṛptasya nirbhayasya manīṣiṇaḥ |
na mṛtyuradhikobhāvaḥ somṛtatvaṃ ca gacchati || 376 ||

vimuktaḥ sarvasaṃgebhyo munirākāśavatsthitaḥ |
viṣṇupriyakaraḥ śāṃtastaṃ devā brāhmaṇaṃ viduḥ || 377 ||

jīvitaṃ yasya dharmārthaṃ dharmoratyarthameva ca |
ahorātrādi puṇyārthaṃ taṃ devā brāhmaṇaṃ viduḥ || 378 ||

nivāritasamāraṃbhaṃ nirnamaskāramastutim |
akṣīṇaṃ kṣīṇakarmāṇaṃ taṃ devā brāhmaṇaṃ viduḥ || 379 ||

sarvāṇi bhūtāni sukhaṃ ramaṃte sarvāṇi duḥkhāni bhṛśaṃ bhavaṃti |
teṣāṃ bhavotpādanajātakhedaḥ kuryāttu karmāṇi ca śraddadhānaḥ || 380 ||

dānaṃ hi bhūtābhayadakṣiṇāyāḥ sarvāṇi dānānyadhitiṣṭhatīha |
tīkṣṇe tanuṃ yaḥ prathamaṃ juhoti sonaṃtamāpnotyabhayaṃ prajābhyaḥ || 381 ||

uttānamāsyena havirjuhoti anaṃtamāpnotyabhitaḥ pratiṣṭhām |
tasyāṃgasaṃgādabhiniṣkṛtaṃ ca vaiśvānaraṃ sarvamidaṃ prapede || 382 ||

prādeśamātraṃ hṛdabhisrutaṃ yattasminprāṇenātmayājī juhoti |
tasyāgnihotre hutamātmasaṃsthaṃ sarveṣu lokeṣu sadaiva teṣu || 383 ||

devaṃ vidhātuṃ trivṛtaṃ suvarṇaṃ ye vai vidustaṃ paramārthabhūtam |
te sarvabhūteṣu mahīyamānā devāḥ samarthā amṛtaṃ vrajaṃti || 384 ||

vedāṃśca vedyaṃ ca vidhiṃ ca kṛtsnamatho niruktaṃ paramārthatāṃ ca |
sarvaṃ śarīrātmani yaḥ praveda tasyābhisarve pracaraṃti nityam || 385 ||

bhūmāvasaktaṃ divi cāprameyaṃ hiraṇmayaṃ taṃ ca samaṃḍalāṃte |
pradakṣiṇaṃ dakṣiṇamaṃtarikṣe yo vedanāpyātmani dīptaraśmiḥ || 386 ||

āvartamānaṃ ca vivartamānaṃ ṣaṇnemi yaddvādaśāraṃ triparva |
yasyedamāsyaṃ paripāti viśvaṃ tatkālacakraṃ nihitaṃ guhāyām || 387 ||

yataḥ prasādaṃ jagataḥ śarīraṃ sarvāṃśca lokānadhigacchatīha |
tasminhi saṃtarpayatīha devānsa vai vimukto bhavatīha nityam || 388 ||

tejomayo nityamataḥ purāṇo loke bhavatyarthabhayādupaiti |
bhūtāni yasmānnabhayaṃ vrajaṃti bhūtebhyo yo no dvijate kadācit || 389 ||

agarhaṇīyo na ca garhatenyānsa vai vipraḥ pravaraṃ svātmanīkṣet |
vinītamohopyapanītakalmaṣo na ceha nāmutra ca yorthamṛcchati || 390 ||

aroṣamohaḥ samaloṣṭakāṃcanaḥ prahīṇaśoko gatasaṃdhivigrahaḥ |
apetaniṃdāstutirapriyāpriyaścarannudāsīnavadeva bhikṣuḥ || 391 ||

bhīṣma uvāca |
yadetatkathitaṃ brahmaṃstīrthamāhātmyamuttamam |
kamalasyābhipātena tīrthaṃ jātaṃ dharātale || 1 ||

tatrasthena bhagavatā viṣṇunā śaṃkareṇa ca |
yatkṛtaṃ muniśārdūla tatsarvaṃ parikīrttaya || 2 ||

kathaṃ yajño hi devena vibhunā tatra kāritaḥ |
ke sadasyā ṛtvijaśca brāhmaṇāḥ ke samāgatāḥ || 3 ||

ke bhāgāstasya yajñasya kiṃ dravyaṃ kā cadakṣiṇā |
kā vedī kiṃ pramāṇaṃ ca kṛtaṃ tatra viraṃcinā || 4 ||

yo yājyaḥ sarvadevānāṃ vedaiḥ sarvatra paṭhyate |
kaṃ ca kāmamabhidhyāyanvedhā yajñaṃ cakāra ha || 5 ||

yathāsau devadeveśo hyajaraścāmaraśca ha |
tathā caivākṣayaḥ svargastasya devasya dṛśyate || 6 ||

anyeṣāṃ caiva devānāṃ dattaḥ svargo mahātmanā |
agnihotrārthamutpannā vedā oṣadhayastathā || 7 ||

ye cānye paśavo bhūmau sarve te yajñakāraṇāt |
sṛṣṭā bhagavatānena ityeṣā vaidikī śrutiḥ || 8 ||

tadatra kautukaṃ mahyaṃ śrutvedaṃ tava bhāṣitam |
yaṃ kāmamadhikṛtyaikaṃ yatphalaṃ yāṃ ca bhāvanāṃ || 9 ||

kṛtaścānena vai yajñaḥ sarvaṃ śaṃsitumarhasi |
śatarūpā ca yā nārī sāvitrī sā tvihocyate || 10 ||

bhāryā sā brahmaṇaḥ proktāḥ ṛṣīṇāṃ jananī ca sā |
pulastyādyānmunīnsapta dakṣādyāṃstu prajāpatīn || 11 ||

svāyaṃbhuvādīṃśca manūnsāvitrī samajījanat |
dharmapatnīṃ tu tāṃ brahmā putriṇīṃ brahmaṇaḥ priyaḥ || 12 ||

pativratāṃ mahābhāgāṃ suvratāṃ cāruhāsinīṃ |
kathaṃ satīṃ parityajya bhāryāmanyāmaviṃdata || 13 ||

kiṃ nāmnī kiṃ samācārā kasya sā tanayā vibhoḥ |
kva sā dṛṣṭā hi devena kena cāsya pradarśitā || 14 ||

kiṃ rūpā sā tu deveśī dṛṣṭā cittavimohinī |
yāṃ tu dṛṣṭvā sa deveśaḥ kāmasya vaśameyivān || 15 ||

varṇato rūpataścaiva sāvitryāstvadhikā mune |
yā mohitavatī devaṃ sarvalokeśvaraṃ vibhum || 16 ||

yathā gṛhītavāndevo nārīṃ tāṃ lokasuṃdarīṃ |
yathā pravṛtto yajñosau tathā sarvaṃ prakīrtaya || 17 ||

tāṃ dṛṣṭvā brahmaṇaḥ pārśve sāvitrī kiṃ cakāra ha |
sāvitryāṃ tu tadā brahmā kāṃ tu vṛttimavarttata || 18 ||

sannidhau kāni vākyāni sāvitrī brahmaṇā tadā |
uktāpyuktavatī bhūyaḥ sarvaṃ śaṃsitumarhasi || 19 ||

kiṃ kṛtaṃ tatra yuṣmābhiḥ kopo vātha kṣamāpi vā |
yatkṛtaṃ tatra yaddṛṣṭaṃ yattavoktaṃ mayā tviha || 20 ||

vistareṇeha sarvāṇi karmāṇi parameṣṭhinaḥ |
śrotumicchāmyaśeṣeṇa vidheryajñavidhiṃ paraṃ || 21 ||

karmaṇāmānupūrvyaṃ ca prāraṃbho hotrameva ca |
hoturbhakṣo yathā'cāpi prathamā kasya kāritā || 22 ||

kathaṃ ca bhagavānviṣṇuḥ sāhāyyaṃ kena kīdṛśaṃ |
amarairvā kṛtaṃ yacca tadbhavānvaktumarhati || 23 ||

devalokaṃ parityajya kathaṃ martyamupāgataḥ |
gārhapatyaṃ ca vidhinā anvāhāryaṃ ca dakṣiṇam || 24 ||

agnimāhavanīyaṃ ca vedīṃ caiva tathā sruvam |
prokṣaṇīyaṃ srucaṃ caiva āvabhṛthyaṃ tathaiva ca || 25 ||

agnīṃstrīṃśca yathā cakre havyabhāgavahānhi vai |
havyādāṃśca surāṃścakre kavyādāṃśca pitṝnapi || 26 ||

bhāgārthaṃ yajñavidhinā ye yajñā yajñakarmaṇi |
yūpānsamitkuśaṃ somaṃ pavitraṃ paridhīnapi || 27 ||

yajñiyāni ca dravyāṇi yathā brahmā cakāra ha |
vibabhrāja purā yaśca pārameṣṭhyena karmaṇā || 28 ||

kṣaṇā nimeṣāḥ kāṣṭhāśca kalāstraikālyameva ca |
muhūrtāstithayo māsā dinaṃ saṃvatsarastathā || 29 ||

ṛtavaḥ kālayogāśca pramāṇaṃ trividhaṃ purā |
āyuḥ kṣetrāṇyapacayaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ rūpasauṣṭhavam || 30 ||

trayo varṇāstrayo lokāstraividyaṃ pāvakāstrayaḥ |
traikālyaṃ trīṇi karmāṇi trayo varṇāstrayo guṇāḥ || 31 ||

sṛṣṭā lokāḥ parāḥ sraṣṭrā ye cānyenalpacetasā |
yā gatirdharmayuktānāṃ yā gatiḥ pāpakarmaṇāṃ || 32 ||

cāturvarṇyasya prabhavaścāturvarṇyasya rakṣitā |
caturvidyasya yo vettā caturāśramasaṃśrayaḥ || 33 ||

yaḥ paraṃ śrūyate jyotiryaḥ paraṃ śrūyate tapaḥ |
yaḥ paraṃ parataḥ prāha paraṃ yaḥ paramātmavān || 34 ||

seturyo lokasetūnāṃ medhyo yo medhyakarmaṇām |
vedyo yo vedaviduṣāṃ yaḥ prabhuḥ prabhavātmanām || 35 ||

asubhūtaśca bhūtānāmagnibhūtognivarcasām |
manuṣyāṇāṃ manobhūtastapobhūtastapasvinām || 36 ||

vinayo nayavṛttīnāṃ tejastejasvināmapi |
ityetatsarvamakhilānsṛjanlokapitāmahaḥ || 37 ||

yajñādgatiṃ kāmanvaicchatkathaṃ yajñe matiḥ kṛtā |
eṣa me saṃśayo brahmanneṣa me saṃśayaḥ paraḥ || 38 ||

āścaryaḥ paramo brahmā devairdaityaiśca paṭhyate |
karmaṇāścaryabhūtopi tattvataḥ sa ihocyate || 39 ||

pulastya uvāca |
praśnabhāro mahāneṣa tvayokto brahmaṇaśca yaḥ |
yathāśakti tu vakṣyāmi śrūyatāṃ tatparaṃ yaśaḥ || 40 ||

sahasrāsyaṃ sahasrākṣaṃ sahasracaraṇaṃ ca yam |
sahasraśravaṇaṃ caiva sahasrakaramavyayam || 41 ||

sahasrajihvaṃ sāhasraṃ sahasraparamaṃ prabhuṃ |
sahasradaṃ sahasrādiṃ sahasrabhujamavyayam || 42 ||

havanaṃ savanaṃ caiva havyaṃ hotārameva ca |
pātrāṇi ca pavitrāṇi vedīṃ dīkṣāṃ caruṃ sruvam || 43 ||

sruksomamavabhṛccaiva prokṣaṇīṃ dakṣiṇā dhanam |
addhvaryuṃ sāmagaṃ vipraṃ sadasyānsadanaṃ sadaḥ || 44 ||

yūpaṃ samitkuśaṃ darvī camasolūkhalāni ca |
prāgvaṃśaṃ yajñabhūmiṃ ca hotāraṃ bandhanaṃ ca yat || 45 ||

hrasvānyatipramāṇāni pramāṇasthāvarāṇi ca |
prāyaścittāni vājāśca sthaṃḍilāni kuśāstathā || 46 ||

maṃtraṃ yajñaṃ ca havanaṃ vahnibhāgaṃ bhavaṃ ca yaṃ |
agrebhujaṃ homabhujaṃ śubhārciṣamudāyudhaṃ || 47 ||

āhurvedavido viprā yo yajñaḥ śāśvataḥ prabhuḥ |
yāṃ pṛcchasi mahārāja puṇyāṃ divyāmimāṃ kathāṃ || 48 ||

yadarthaṃ bhagavānbrahmā bhūmau yajñamathākarot |
hitārthaṃ suramartyānāṃ lokānāṃ prabhavāya ca || 49 ||

brahmātha kapilaścaiva parameṣṭhī tathaiva ca |
devāḥ saptarṣayaścaiva tryaṃbakaśca mahāyaśāḥ || 50 ||

sanatkumāraśca mahānubhāvo manurmahātmā bhagavānprajāpatiḥ |
purāṇadevotha tathā pracakre pradīptavaiśvānaratulyatejāḥ || 51 ||

purā kamalajātasya svapatastasya koṭare |
puṣkare yatra saṃbhūtā devā ṛṣigaṇāstathā || 52 ||

eṣa pauṣkarako nāma prādurbhāvo mahātmanaḥ |
purāṇaṃ kathyate yatra vedasmṛtisusaṃhitaṃ || 53 ||

varāhastu śrutimukhaḥ prādurbhūto viriṃcinaḥ |
sahāyārthaṃ suraśreṣṭho vārāhaṃ rūpamāsthitaḥ || 54 ||

vistīrṇaṃ puṣkare kṛtvā tīrthaṃ kokāmukhaṃ hi tat |
vedapādo yūpadaṃṣṭraḥ kratuhastaścitīmukhaḥ || 55 ||

agnijihvo darbharomā brahmaśīrṣo mahātapāḥ |
ahorātrekṣaṇo divyo vedāṃgaḥ śrutibhūṣaṇaḥ || 56 ||

ājyanāsaḥ sruvatuṃḍaḥ sāmaghoṣasvano mahān |
satyadharmamayaḥ śrīmānkarmavikramasatkṛtaḥ || 57 ||

prāyaścittanakho dhīraḥ paśujānurmakhākṛtiḥ |
udgātrāṃtro homaliṃgo phalabījamahauṣadhiḥ || 58 ||

vāyvaṃtarātmā maṃtrāsthirāpasphiksomaśoṇitaḥ |
vedaskaṃdho havirgaṃdho havyakavyātivegavān || 59 ||

prāgvaṃśakāyo dyutimānnānādīkṣābhirarcitaḥ |
dakṣiṇāhṛdayo yogī mahāsatramayo mahān || 60 ||

upākarmeṣṭiruciraḥ pravargyāvartabhūṣaṇaḥ |
chāyāpatnīsahāyo vai maṇiśṛṃgamivocchritaḥ || 61 ||

sarvalokahitātmā yo daṃṣṭrayābhyujjahāragām |
tataḥ svasthānamānīya pṛthivīṃ pṛthivīdharaḥ || 62 ||

tato jagāma nirvāṇaṃ pṛthivīdhāraṇāddhariḥ |
evamādivarāheṇa dhṛtvā brahmahitārthinā || 63 ||

uddhṛtā puṣkare pṛthvī sāgarāṃbugatā purā |
vṛtaḥ śamadamābhyāṃ yo divye kokāmukhe sthitaḥ || 64 ||

ādityairvasubhiḥ sādhyairmarudbhirdaivataiḥ saha |
rudrairviśvasahāyaiśca yakṣarākṣasakinnaraiḥ || 65 ||

digbhirvidigbhiḥ pṛthivī nadībhiḥ saha sāgaraiḥ |
carācaraguruḥ śrīmānbrahmā brahmavidāṃvaraḥ || 66 ||

uvāca vacanaṃ kokāmukhaṃ tīrthaṃ tvayā vibho |
pālanīyaṃ sadā gopyaṃ rakṣā kāryā makhe tviha || 67 ||

evaṃ kariṣye bhagavaṃstadā brahmāṇamuktavān |
uvāca taṃ punarbrahmā viṣṇuṃ devaṃ puraḥ sthitam || 68 ||

tvaṃ hi me paramo devastvaṃ hi me paramo guruḥ |
tvaṃ hi me paramaṃ dhāma śakrādīnāṃ surottama || 69 ||

utphullāmalapadmākṣa śatrupakṣa kṣayāvaha |
yathā yajñena me dhvaṃso dānavaiśca vidhīyate || 70 ||

tathā tvayā vidhātavyaṃ praṇatasya namostu te |
viṣṇuruvāca |
bhayaṃ tyajasva deveśa kṣayaṃ neṣyāmi dānavān || 71 ||

ye cānte vighnakartāro yātudhānāstathā'surāḥ |
ghātayiṣyāmyahaṃ sarvānsvasti tiṣṭha pitāmaha || 72 ||

evamuktvā sthitastatra sāhāyyena kṛtakṣaṇaḥ |
pravavuśca śivā vātāḥ prasannāśca diśo daśa || 73 ||

suprabhāṇi ca jyotīṃṣi caṃdraṃ cakruḥ pradakṣiṇam |
na vigrahaṃ grahāścakruḥ praseduścāpi siṃdhavaḥ || 74 ||

nīrajaskā bhūmirāsītsakalā hlādadāstvapaḥ |
jagmuḥ svamārgaṃ sarito nāpi cukṣubhurarṇavāḥ || 75 ||

āsanśubhānīṃdriyāṇi narāṇāmaṃtarātmanām |
maharṣayo vītaśokā vedānuccairavācayan || 76 ||

yajñe tasminhaviḥ pāke śivā āsaṃśca pāvakāḥ |
pravṛttadharmasadvṛttā lokā muditamānasāḥ || 77 ||

viṣṇoḥ satyapratijñasya śrutvārinidhanā giraḥ |
tato devāḥ samāyātā dānavā rākṣasaissaha || 78 ||

bhūtapretapiśācāśca sarve tatrāgatāḥ kramāt |
gaṃdharvāpsarasaścaiva nāgā vidyādharāgaṇāḥ || 79 ||

vānaspatyāścauṣadhayo yaccehedyacca nehati |
brahmādeśānmārutena ānītāḥ sarvato diśaḥ || 80 ||

yajñaparvatamāsādya dakṣiṇāmabhitodiśam |
surā uttarataḥ sarve maryādāparvate sthitāḥ || 81 ||

gaṃdharvāpsarasaścaiva munayo vedapāragāḥ |
paścimāṃ diśamāsthāya sthitāstatra mahākratau || 82 ||

sarve devanikāyāśca dānavāścāsurāgaṇāḥ |
amarṣaṃ pṛṣṭhataḥ kṛtvā suprītāste parasparam || 83 ||

ṛṣīnparyacaransarve śuśrūṣanbrāhmaṇāṃstathā |
ṛṣayo brahmarṣayaśca dvijā devarṣayastathā || 84 ||

rājarṣayo mukhyatamāssamāyātāḥ samaṃtataḥ |
katamaśca suropyatra kratau yājyo bhaviṣyati || 85 ||

paśavaḥ pakṣiṇaścaiva tatra yātā didṛkṣavaḥ |
brāhmaṇā bhoktukāmāśca sarve varṇānupūrvaśaḥ || 86 ||

svayaṃ ca varuṇo ratnaṃ dakṣaścānnaṃ svayaṃ dadau |
āgatyavaruṇolokātpakvaṃcānnaṃsvatopacat || 87 ||

vāyurbhakṣavikārāṃśca rasapācī divākaraḥ |
annapācanakṛtsomo matidātā bṛhaspatiḥ || 88 ||

dhanadānaṃ dhanādhyakṣo vastrāṇi vividhāni ca |
sarasvatī nadādhyakṣo gaṃgādevī sanarmadā || 89 ||

yāścānyāḥ saritaḥ puṇyāḥ kūpāścaiva jalāśayāḥ |
palvalāni taṭākāni kuṃḍāni vividhāni ca || 90 ||

prasravāṇi ca mukhyāni devakhātānyanekaśaḥ |
jalāśayāni sarvāṇi samudrāḥ saptasaṃkhyakāḥ || 91 ||

lavaṇekṣusurāsarpirdadhidugdhajalaiḥ samam |
saptalokāḥ sapātālāḥ saptadvīpāḥ sapattanāḥ || 92 ||

vṛkṣā vallyaḥ satṛṇāni śākāni ca phalāni ca |
pṛthivīvāyurākāśamāpojyotiśca paṃcamam || 93 ||

savigrahāṇi bhūtāni dharmaśāstrāṇi yāni ca |
vedabhāṣyāṇi sūtrāṇi brahmaṇā nirmitaṃ ca yat || 94 ||

amūrtaṃ mūrtamatyantaṃ mūrtadṛśyaṃ tathākhilam |
evaṃ kṛte tathāsmiṃstu yajñe paitāmahe tadā || 95 ||

devānāṃ saṃnidhau tatra ṛṣibhiśca samāgame |
brahmaṇo dakṣiṇe pārśve sthito viṣṇuḥ sanātanaḥ || 96 ||

vāmapārśve sthito rudraḥ pinākī varadaḥ prabhuḥ |
ṛtvijāṃ cāpi varaṇaṃ kṛtaṃ tatra mahātmanā || 97 ||

bhṛgurhotāvṛtastatra pulastyodhvaryyusattamaḥ |
tatrodgātā marīcistu brahmā vai nāradaḥ kṛtaḥ || 98 ||

sanatkumārādayo ye sadasyāstatra te bhavan |
prajāpatayo dakṣādyā varṇā brāhmaṇapūrvakāḥ || 99 ||

brahmaṇaśca samīpe tu kṛtā ṛtvigvikalpanā |
vastrairābharaṇairyuktāḥ kṛtā vaiśravaṇena te || 100 ||

aṃgulīyaiḥ sakaṭakairmakuṭairbhūṣitā dvijāḥ |
catvāro dvau daśānye ca ta ṣoḍaśartvijaḥ || 101 ||

brahmaṇā pūjitāḥ sarve praṇipātapuraḥsaram |
anugrāhyo bhavadbhistu sarvairasminkratāviha || 102 ||

patnī mamaiṣā sāvitrī yūyaṃ me śaraṇaṃdvijāḥ |
viśvakarmāṇamāhūya brahmaṇaḥ śīrṣamuṃḍanaṃ || 103 ||

yajñe tu vihitaṃ tasya kāritaṃ dvijasattamaiḥ |
ātaseyāni vastrāṇi daṃpatyarthe tathā dvijaiḥ || 104 ||

brahmaghoṣeṇa te viprā nādayānāstriviṣṭapam |
pālayaṃto jagaccedaṃ kṣatriyāḥ sāyudhāḥ sthitāḥ || 105 ||

bhakṣyaprakārānvividhinvaiśyāstatra pracakrire |
rasabāhulyayuktaṃ ca bhakṣyaṃ bhojyaṃ kṛtaṃ tataḥ || 106 ||

aśrutaṃ prāgadṛṣṭaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā tuṣṭaḥ prajāpatiḥ |
prāgvāṭeti dadau nāma vaiśyānāṃ sṛṣṭikṛdvibhuḥ || 107 ||

dvijānāṃ pādaśuśrūṣā śūdraiḥ kāryā sadā tviha |
pādaprakṣālanaṃ bhojyamucchiṣṭasya pramārjanaṃ || 108 ||

tepi cakrustadā tatra tebhyo bhūyaḥ pitāmahaḥ |
śūśrūṣārthaṃ mayā yūyaṃ turīye tu pade kṛtāḥ || 109 ||

dvijānāṃ kṣatrabandhūnāṃ bandhūnāṃ ca bhavadvidhaiḥ |
tribhyaśśuśrūṣaṇā kāryetyuktvā brahmā tathā'karot || 110 ||

dvārādhyakṣaṃ tathā śakraṃ varuṇaṃ rasadāyakam |
vittapradaṃ vaiśravaṇaṃ pavanaṃ gaṃdhadāyinam || 111 ||

udyotakāriṇaṃ sūryaṃ prabhutve mādhavaḥ sthitaḥ |
somaḥ somapradasteṣāṃ vāmapakṣa pathāśritaḥ || 112 ||

susatkṛtā ca patnī sā savitrī ca varāṃganā |
adhvaryuṇā samāhūtā ehi devi tvarānvitā || 113 ||

utthitāścāgnayaḥ sarve dīkṣākāla upāgataḥ |
vyagrā sā kāryakaraṇe strīsvabhāvena nāgatā || 114 ||

ihavai na kṛtaṃ kiṃciddvāre vai maṃḍanaṃ mayā |
bhittyāṃ vaicitrakarmāṇi svastikaṃ prāṃgaṇena tu || 115 ||

prakṣālanaṃ ca bhāṃḍānāṃ na kṛtaṃ kimapi tviha |
lakṣmīradyāpi nāyātā patnīnārāyaṇasya yā || 116 ||

agneḥ patnī tathā svāhā dhūmrorṇā tu yamasya tu |
vāruṇī vai tathā gaurī vāyorvai suprabhā tathā || 117 ||

ṛddhirvaiśravaṇī bhāryā śambhorgaurī jagatpriyā |
medhā śraddhā vibhūtiśca anasūyā dhṛtiḥ kṣamā || 119 ||

gaṃgā sarasvatī caiva nādyā yātāśca kanyakāḥ |
iṃdrāṇī caṃdrapatnī tu rohiṇī śaśinaḥ priyāḥ || 120 ||

aruṃdhatī vasiṣṭhasya saptarṣīṇāṃ ca yāḥ striyaḥ |
anasūyātripatnī ca tathānyāḥ pramadā iha || 121 ||

vadhvo duhitaraścaiva sakhyo bhaginikāstathā |
nādyāgatāstu tāḥ sarvā ahaṃ tāvatsthitā ciraṃ || 122 ||

nāhamekākinī yāsye yāvannāyāṃti tā striyaḥ |
brūhi gatvā viraṃciṃ tu tiṣṭha tāvanmuhūrtakam || 123 ||

sarvābhiḥ sahitā cāhamāgacchāmi tvarānvitā |
sarvaiḥ parivṛtaḥ śobhāṃ devaiḥ saha mahāmate || 124 ||

bhavānprāpnoti paramāṃ tathāhaṃ tu na saṃśayaḥ |
vadamānāṃ tathādhvaryustyaktvā brahmāṇamāgataḥ || 125 ||

sāvitrī vyākulā deva prasaktā gṛhakarmāṇi |
sakhyo nābhyāgatā yāvattāvannāgamanaṃ mama || 126 ||

evamuktosmi vai deva kālaścāpyativarttate |
yattedya rucitaṃ tāvattatkuruṣva pitāmaha || 127 ||

evamuktastadā brahmā kiṃcitkopasamanvitaḥ |
patnīṃ cānyāṃ madarthe vai śīghraṃ śakra ihānaya || 128 ||

yathā pravartate yajñaḥ kālahīno na jāyate |
tathā śīghraṃ vidhitsva tvaṃ nārīṃ kāṃcidupānaya || 129 ||

yāvadyajñasamāptirme varṇe tvāṃ mā kṛthā manaḥ |
bhūyopi tāṃ pramokṣyāmi samāptau tu kratoriha || 130 ||

evamuktastadā śakro gatvā sarvaṃ dharātalaṃ |
striyo dṛṣṭāśca yāstena sarvāḥ paraparigrahāḥ || 131 ||

ābhīrakanyā rūpāḍhyā sunāsā cārulocanā |
na devī na ca gaṃdharvī nāsurī na ca pannagī || 132 ||

na cāsti tādṛśī kanyā yādṛśī sā varāṃganā |
dadarśa tāṃ sucārvaṃgīṃ śriyaṃ devīmivāparām || 133 ||

saṃkṣipantīṃ manovṛtti vibhavaṃ rūpasaṃpadā |
yadyattu vastusauṃdaryādviśiṣṭaṃ labhyate kvacit || 134 ||

tattaccharīrasaṃlagnaṃ tanvaṃgyā dadṛśe varam |
tāṃ dṛṣṭvā ciṃtayāmāsa yadyeṣā kanyakā bhavet || 135 ||

tanmattaḥ kṛtapuṇyonyo na devo bhuvi vidyate |
yoṣidratnamidaṃ seyaṃ sadbhāgyāyāṃ pitāmahaḥ || 136 ||

sarāgo yadi vā syāttu saphalastveṣa me śramaḥ |
nīlābhra kanakāṃbhoja vidrumābhāṃ dadarśa tāṃ || 137 ||

tviṣaṃ saṃbibhratīmaṃgaiḥ keśagaṃḍe kṣaṇādharaiḥ |
manmathāśokavṛkṣasya prodbhinnāṃ kalikāmiva || 138 ||

pradagdhahṛcchayenaiva netravahniśikhotkaraiḥ |
dhātrā kathaṃ hi sā sṛṣṭā pratirūpamapaśyatā || 139 ||

kalpitā cetsvayaṃ budhyā naipuṇyasya gatiḥ parā |
uttuṃgāgrāvimau sṛṣṭau yanme saṃpaśyataḥ sukhaṃ || 140 ||

payodharau nāticitraṃ kasya saṃjāyate hṛdi |
rāgopahatadehoyamadharo yadyapi sphuṭam || 141 ||

tathāpi sevamānasya nirvāṇaṃ saṃprayacchati |
vahadbhirapi kauṭilyamalakaiḥ sukhamarpyate || 142 ||

doṣopi guṇavadbhāti bhūrisauṃdaryamāśritaḥ |
netrayorbhūṣitāvaṃtā vākarṇābhyāśamāgatau || 143 ||

kāraṇādbhāvacaitanyaṃ pravadaṃti hi tadvidaḥ |
karṇayorbhūṣaṇe netre netrayoḥ śravaṇāvimau || 144 ||

kuṃḍalāṃjanayoratra nāvakāśosti kaścana |
na tadyuktaṃ kaṭākṣāṇāṃ yaddvidhākaraṇaṃ hṛdi || 145 ||

tavasaṃbaṃdhinoye'tra kathaṃ te duḥkhabhāginaḥ |
sarvasuṃdaratāmeti vikāraḥ prākṛtairguṇaiḥ || 146 ||

vṛddhe kṣaṇaśatānāṃ tu dṛṣṭameṣā mayā dhanam |
dhātrā kauśalyasīmeyaṃ rūpotpattau sudarśitā || 147 ||

karotyeṣā mano nṝṇāṃ sasnehaṃ kṛtivibhramaiḥ |
evaṃ vimṛśatastasya tadrūpāpahṛtatviṣaḥ || 148 ||

niraṃtarodgataiśchannamabhavatpulakairvapuḥ |
tāṃ vīkṣya navahemābhāṃ padmapatrāyatekṣaṇām || 149 ||

devānāmatha yakṣāṇāṃ gaṃdharvoragarakṣasām |
nānā dṛṣṭā mayā nāryo nedṛśī rūpasaṃpadā || 150 ||

trailokyāṃtargataṃ yadyadvastutattatpradhānataḥ |
samādāya vidhātrāsyāḥ kṛtā rūpasya saṃsthitiḥ || 151 ||

iṃdra uvāca |
kāsi kasya kutaśca tvamāgatā subhru kathyatām |
ekākinī kimarthaṃ ca vīthīmadhyeṣu tiṣṭhasi || 152 ||

yānyetānyaṃgasaṃsthāni bhūṣaṇāni bibharṣi ca |
naitāni tava bhūṣāyai tvameteṣāṃ hi bhūṣaṇam || 153 ||

na devī na ca gaṃdharvī nāsurī na ca pannagī |
kinnarī dṛṣṭapūrvā vā yādṛśī tvaṃ sulocane || 154 ||

uktā mayāpi bahuśaḥ kasmāddatse hi nottaram |
trapānvitā tu sā kanyā śakraṃ provāca vepatī || 155 ||

gopakanyā tvahaṃ vīra vikrīṇāmīha gorasam |
navanītamidaṃ śuddhaṃ dadhi cedaṃ vimaṃḍakam || 156 ||

dadhnā caivātra takreṇa rasenāpi paraṃtapa |
arthī yenāsi tadbrūhi pragṛhṇīṣva yathepsitam || 157 ||

evamuktastadā śakro gṛhītvā tāṃ kare dṛḍham |
anayattāṃ viśālākṣīṃ yatra brahmā vyavasthitaḥ || 158 ||

nīyamānā tu sā tena krośaṃtī pitṛmātarau |
hā tāta mātarhā bhrātarnayatyeṣa naro balāt || 159 ||

yadi vāsti mayā kāryaṃ pitaraṃ me prayācaya |
sa dāsyati hi māṃ nūnaṃ bhavataḥ satyamucyate || 160 ||

kā hi nābhilaṣetkanyā bhartāṃraṃ bhaktivatsalam |
nādeyamapi te kiṃcitpiturme dharmavatsala || 161 ||

prasādaye taṃ śirasā māṃ sa tuṣṭaḥ pradāsyati |
pituścittamavijñāya yadyātmānaṃ dadāmi te || 162 ||

dharmo hi vipulo naśyettena tvāṃ na prasādaye |
bhaviṣyāmi vaśe tubhyaṃ yadi tātaḥ pradāsyati || 163 ||

itthamābhāṣyamāṇastu tadā śakro'nayacca tām |
brahmaṇaḥ purataḥ sthāpya prāhāsyārthe mayā'bale || 164 ||

ānītāsi viśālākṣi mā śuco varavarṇini |
gopakanyāmasau dṛṣṭvā gauravarṇāṃ mahādyutim || 165 ||

kamalāmeva tāṃ mene puṃḍarīkanibhekṣaṇām |
taptakāṃcanasadbhitti sadṛśā pīnavakṣasam || 166 ||

mattebhahastavṛttoruṃ raktottuṃga nakhatviṣaṃ |
taṃ dṛṣṭvā'manyatātmānaṃ sāpi manmanathacaram || 167 ||

tatprāptihetu ka dhiyā gatacitteva lakṣyate |
prabhutvamātmano dāne gopakanyāpyamanyata || 168 ||

yadyeṣa māṃ surūpatvādicchatyādātumāgrahāt |
nāsti sīmaṃtinī kācinmatto dhanyatarā bhuvi || 169 ||

anenāhaṃ samānītā yaccakṣurgocaraṃ gatā |
asya tyāge bhavenmṛtyuratyāge jīvitaṃ sukham || 170 ||

bhaveyamapamānācca dhigrūpā duḥkhadāyinī |
dṛśyate cakṣuṣānena yāpi yoṣitprasādataḥ || 171 ||

sāpi dhanyā na saṃdehaḥ kiṃ punaryāṃ pariṣvajet |
jagadrūpamaśeṣaṃ hi pṛthaksaṃcāramāśritam || 172 ||

lāvaṇyaṃ tadihaikasthaṃ darśitaṃ viśvayoninā |
asyopamā smaraḥ sādhvī manmathasya tviṣopamā || 173 ||

tiraskṛtastu śokoyaṃ pitā mātā na kāraṇam |
yadi māṃ naiṣa ādatte svalpaṃ mayi na bhāṣate || 174 ||

asyānusmaraṇānmṛtyuḥ prabhaviṣyati śokajaḥ |
anāgasi ca patnyāṃ tu kṣipraṃ yāteyamīdṛśī || 175 ||

kucayormaṇiśobhāyai śuddhāmbuja samadyutiḥ |
mukhamasya prapaśyaṃtyā mano me dhyānamāgatam || 176 ||

asyāṃgasparśasaṃyogānna cettvaṃ bahu manyase |
spṛśannaṭasi tarhi na tvaṃ śarīraṃ vitathaṃ param || 177 ||

athavāsya na doṣosti yadṛcchācārako hyasi |
muṣitaḥ smara nūnaṃ tvaṃ saṃrakṣa svāṃ priyāṃ ratim || 178 ||

tvattopi dṛśyate yena rūpeṇāyaṃ smarādhikaḥ |
mamānena manoratna sarvasvaṃ ca hṛtaṃ dṛḍham || 179 ||

śobhā yā dṛśyate vaktre sā kutaḥ śaśalakṣmaṇi |
nopamā sakalaṃ kasya niṣkalaṃkena śasyate || 180 ||

samānabhāvatāṃ yāti paṃkajaṃ nāsya netrayoḥ |
kopamā jalaśaṃkhena prāptā śravaṇaśaṃṅkhayoḥ || 181 ||

vidrumopyadharasyāsya labhate nopamāṃ dhruvam |
ātmasthamamṛtaṃ hyeṣa saṃsravaṃśceṣṭate dhruvam || 182 ||

yadi kiṃcicchubhaṃ karma janmāṃtaraśataiḥ kṛtam |
tatprasādātpunarbhartā bhavatveṣa mamepsitaḥ || 183 ||

evaṃ ciṃtāparādhīnā yāvatsā gopakanyakā |
tāvadbrahmā hariṃ prāha yajñārthaṃ satvaraṃ vacaḥ || 184 ||

devī caiṣā mahābhāgā gāyatrī nāmataḥ prabho |
evamukte tadā viṣṇurbrahmāṇaṃ proktavānidam || 185 ||

tadenāmudvahasvādya mayā dattāṃ jagatprabho |
gāṃdharveṇa vivāhena vikalpaṃ mā kṛthāściram || 186 ||

amuṃ gṛhāṇa devādya asyāḥ pāṇimanākulam |
gāṃdherveṇa vivāhena upayeme pitāmahaḥ || 187 ||

tāmavāpya tadā brahmā jagādāddhvaryusattamam |
kṛtā patnī mayā hyeṣā sadane me niveśaya || 188 ||

mṛgaśṛṃgadharā bālā kṣaumavastrāvaguṃṭhitā |
patnīśālāṃ tadā nītā ṛtvigbhirvedapāragaiḥ || 189 ||

auduṃberaṇa daṃḍena prāvṛto mṛgacarmaṇā |
mahādhvare tadā brahmā dhāmnā svenaiva śobhate || 190 ||

prārabdhaṃ ca tato hotraṃ brāhmaṇairvedapāragaiḥ |
bhṛguṇā sahitaiḥ karma vedoktaṃ taiḥ kṛtaṃ tadā |
tathā yugasahasraṃ tu sa yajñaḥ puṣkare'bhavat || 191 ||

bhīṣma uvāca |
tasminyajñe kimāścaryaṃ tadāsīddvijasattama |
kathaṃ rudraḥ sthitastatra viṣṇuścāpi surottamaḥ || 1 ||

gāyatryā kiṃ kṛtaṃ tatra patnītve sthitayā tayā |
ābhīraiḥ kiṃ suvṛttajñairjñātvā taiśca kṛtaṃ mune || 2 ||

etadvṛttaṃ samācakṣva yathāvṛttaṃ yathākṛtam |
ābhīrairbrahmaṇā cāpi mamaitatkautukaṃ mahat || 3 ||

pulastya uvāca |
tasminyajñe yadāścaryaṃ vṛttamāsīnnarādhipa |
kathayiṣyāmi tatsarvaṃ śṛṇuṣvaikamanā nṛpa || 4 ||

rudrastu mahadāścaryaṃ kṛtavānvai sado gataḥ |
niṃdyarūpadharo devastatrāyāddvijasannidhau || 5 ||

viṣṇunā na kṛtaṃ kiṃcitprādhānye sa yataḥ sthitaḥ |
nāśaṃ tu gopakanyāyā jñātvā gopakumārakāḥ || 6 ||

gopyaśca tāstathā sarvā āgatā brahmaṇoṃtikam |
dṛṣṭvā tāṃ mekhalābaddhāṃ yajñasīmavyasthitām || 7 ||

hā putrīti tadā mātā pitā hā putriketi ca |
svaseti bāndhavāḥ sarve sakhyaḥ sakhyena hā sakhi || 8 ||

kena tvamiha cānītā alaktāṃkā tu saṃdarī |
śāṭīṃ nivṛttāṃ kṛtvā tu kena yuktā ca kaṃbalī || 9 ||

kena ceyaṃ jaṭā putri raktasūtrāvakalpitā |
evaṃvidhāni vākyāni śrutvovāca svayaṃ hariḥ || 10 ||

iha cāsmābhirānītā patnyarthaṃ viniyojitā |
brahmaṇālaṃbitā bālā pralāpaṃ mā kṛthāstviha || 11 ||

puṇyā caiṣā subhāgyā ca sarveṣāṃ kulanaṃdinī |
puṇyā cenna bhavatyeṣā kathamāgacchate sadaḥ || 12 ||

evaṃ jñātvā mahābhāga na tvaṃ śocitumarhasi |
kanyaiṣā te mahābhāgā prāptā devaṃ viriṃcanam || 13 ||

yogino yogayuktā ye brāhmaṇā vedapāragāḥ |
na labhaṃte prārthayantastāṃ gatiṃ duhitā gatā || 14 ||

dharmavaṃtaṃ sadācāraṃ bhavaṃtaṃ dharmavatsalam |
mayā jñātvā tataḥ kanyā dattā caiṣā viraṃcaye || 15 ||

anayā tārito gaccha divyānlokānmahodayān |
yuṣmākaṃ ca kule cāpi devakāryārthasiddhaye || 16 ||

avatāraṃ kariṣyehaṃ sā krīḍā tu bhaviṣyati |
yadā naṃdaprabhṛtayo hyavatāraṃ dharātale || 17 ||

kariṣyaṃti tadā cāhaṃ vasiṣye teṣu madhyataḥ |
yuṣmākaṃ kanyakāḥ sarvā vasiṣyaṃti mayā saha || 18 ||

tatra doṣo na bhavitā na dveṣo na ca matsaraḥ |
kariṣyaṃti tadā gopā bhayaṃ ca na manuṣyakāḥ || 19 ||

na cāsyā bhavitā doṣaḥ karmaṇānena karhicit |
śrutvā vākyaṃ tadā viṣṇoḥ praṇipatya yayustadā || 20 ||

evameṣa varo deva yo datto bhavitā hi me |
avatāraḥ kulesmākaṃ kartavyo dharmasādhanaḥ || 21 ||

bhavato darśanādeva bhavāmaḥ svargavāsinaḥ |
śubhadā kanyakā caiṣā tāriṇī me kulaiḥ saha || 22 ||

evaṃ bhavatu deveśa varadānaṃ vibho tava |
anunītāstadā gopāḥ svayaṃ devena viṣṇunā || 23 ||

brahmaṇāpyevamevaṃ tu vāmahastena bhāṣitam |
trapānvitā darśane tu baṃdhūnāṃ varavarṇinī || 24 ||

kairahaṃ tu samākhyātā yenemaṃ deśamāgatāḥ |
dṛṣṭvā tu tāṃstataḥ prāha gāyatrī gopakanyakā || 25 ||

vāmahastena tānsarvānprāṇipātapuraḥsaram |
atra cāhaṃ sthitā mātarbrahmāṇaṃ samupāgatā || 26 ||

bhartā labdho mayā devaḥ sarvasyādyo jagatpatiḥ |
nāhaṃ śocyā bhavatyā tu na pitrā na ca bāṃdhavaiḥ || 27 ||

sakhīgaṇaśca me yātu bhaginyo dārakaiḥ saha |
sarveṣāṃ kuśalaṃ vācyaṃ sthitāsmi saha daivataiḥ || 28 ||

gateṣu teṣu sarveṣu gāyatrī sā sumadhyamā |
brahmaṇā sahitā reje yajñavāṭaṃ gatā satī || 29 ||

yācito brāhmaṇairbrahmā varānno dehi cepsitān |
yathepsitaṃ varaṃ teṣāṃ tadā brahmāpyayacchata || 30 ||

tayā devyā ca gāyatryā dattaṃ taccānumoditam |
sā tu yajñe sthitā sādhvī devatānāṃ samīpagā || 31 ||

divyaṃvarṣaśataṃ sāgraṃ sa yajño vavṛdhe tadā |
yajñavāṭaṃ kapardī tu bhikṣārthaṃ samupāgataḥ || 32 ||

bṛhatkapālaṃ saṃgṛhya paṃcamuṇḍairalaṃkṛtaḥ |
ṛtvigbhiśca sadasyaiśca dūrāttiṣṭhanjugupsitaḥ || 33 ||

kathaṃ tvamiha saṃprāpto niṃdito vedavādibhiḥ |
evaṃ protsāryamāṇopi niṃdyamānaḥ sa tairdvijaiḥ || 34 ||

uvāca tāndvijānsarvānsmitaṃ kṛtvā maheśvaraḥ |
atra paitāmahe yajñe sarveṣāṃ toṣadāyini || 35 ||

kaścidutsārya tenaiva ṛtemāṃ dvijasattamāḥ |
uktaḥ sa taiḥ kapardī tu bhuktvā cānnaṃ tato vraja || 36 ||

kapardinā ca te uktā bhuktvā yāsyāmi bho dvijāḥ |
evamuktvā niṣaṇṇaḥ sa kapālaṃ nyasya cāgrataḥ || 37 ||

teṣāṃ nirīkṣya tatkarma cakre kauṭilyamīśvaraḥ |
muktvā kapālaṃ bhūmau tu tāndvijānavalokayan || 38 ||

uvāca puṣkaraṃ yāmi snānārthaṃ dvijasattamāḥ |
tūrṇaṃ gaccheti tairuktaḥ sa gataḥ parameśvaraḥ || 39 ||

viyatsthitaḥ kautukena mohayitvā divaukasaḥ |
snānārthaṃ puṣkaraṃ yāte kapardini dvijātayaḥ || 40 ||

kathaṃ homotra kriyate kapāle sadasi sthite |
kapālāṃtānyaśaucāni purā prāha prajāpatiḥ || 41 ||

viprobhyadhātsadasyekaḥ kapālamutkṣipāmyahaṃ |
uddhṛtaṃ tu sadasyena prakṣiptaṃ pāṇinā svayam || 42 ||

tāvadanyatsthitaṃ tatra punareva samuddhṛtam |
evaṃ dvitīyaṃ tṛtīyaṃ viṃśatistriṃśadapyaho || 43 ||

paṃcāśacca śataṃ caiva sahasramayutaṃ tathā |
evaṃ nāṃtaḥ kapālānāṃ prāpyate dvijasattamaiḥ || 44 ||

natvā kapardinaṃ devaṃ śaraṇaṃ samupāgatāḥ |
puṣkarāraṇyamāsādya japyaiśca vaidikairbhṛśam || 45 ||

tuṣṭuvuḥ sahitāḥ sarve tāvattuṣṭo haraḥ svayam |
tataḥ sadarśanaṃ prādāddvijānāṃ bhaktitaḥ śivaḥ || 46 ||

uvāca tāṃstato devo bhaktinamrāndvijottamān |
puroḍāśasya niṣpattiḥ kapālaṃ na vinā bhavet || 47 ||

kurudhvaṃ vacanaṃ viprāḥ bhāgaḥ sviṣṭakṛto mama |
evaṃ kṛte kṛtaṃ sarvaṃ madīyaṃ śāsanaṃ bhavet || 48 ||

tathetyūcurdvijāśśaṃbhuṃ kurmo vai tava śāsanam |
kapālapāṇirāheśo bhagavaṃtaṃ pitāmaham || 49 ||

varaṃ varaya bho brahmanhṛdi yatte priyaṃ sthitam |
sarvaṃ tava pradāsyāmi adeyaṃ nāsti me prabho || 50 ||

brahmovāca |
na te varaṃ grahīṣyāmi dīkṣitohaṃ sadaḥ sthitaḥ |
sarvakāmapradaścāhaṃ yo māṃ prārthayate tviha || 51 ||

evaṃ vadaṃtaṃ varadaṃ kratau tasminpitāmaham |
tatheti coktvā rudraḥ sa varamasmādayācata || 52 ||

tato manvaṃtaretīte punareva prabhuḥ svayam |
brahmottaraṃ kṛtaṃ sthānaṃ svayaṃ devena śaṃbhunā || 53 ||

caturṣvapi hi vedeṣu pariniṣṭhāṃ gato hi yaḥ |
tasminkāle tadā devo nagarasyāvalokane || 54 ||

saṃbhāṣaṇe dvijānāṃ tu kautukena sado gataḥ |
tenaivonmattaveṣeṇa hutaśeṣe maheśvaraḥ || 55 ||

praviṣṭo brahmaṇaḥ sadma dṛṣṭo devairdvijottamaiḥ |
prahasaṃti ca kepyenaṃ kecinnirbhartsayaṃti ca || 56 ||

apare pāṃsubhiḥ siñcantyunmattaṃ taṃ tathā dvijāḥ |
loṣṭaiśca laguḍaiścānye śuṣmiṇo balagarvitāḥ || 57 ||

praharanti smopahāsaṃ kurvāṇā hastasaṃvidam |
tatonye vaṭavastatra jaṭāsvāgṛhya cāṃtikam || 58 ||

pṛcchaṃti vratacaryāṃ tāṃ kenaiṣā te nidarśitā |
atra vāmāstriyaḥ saṃti tāsāmarthe tvamāgataḥ || 59 ||

kenaiṣā darśitā caryā guruṇā pāpadarśinā |
yenaconmattavadvākyaṃ vadanmadhye pradhāvasi || 60 ||

śiśnaṃ me brahmaṇo rūpaṃ bhagaṃ cāpi janārdanaḥ |
upyamānamidaṃ bījaṃ lokaḥ kliśnāti cānyathā || 61 ||

mayāyaṃ janitaḥ putro janitonena cāpyaham |
mahādevakṛte sṛṣṭiḥ sṛṣṭā bhāryā himālaye || 62 ||

umādattā tu rudrasya kasya sā tanayā vada |
mūḍhā yūyaṃ na jānītha vadatāṃ bhagavāṃstu vaḥ || 63 ||

brahmaṇā na kṛtā caryā darśitā naiva viṣṇunā |
giriśenāpi devena brahmavadhyā kṛtena tu || 64 ||

kathaṃsvidgarhase devaṃ vadhyosmākaṃ tvamadya vai |
evaṃ tairhanyamānastu brāhmaṇaistatra śaṃkaraḥ || 65 ||

smitaṃ kṛtvābravītsarvānbrāhmaṇānnṛpasattama |
kiṃ māṃ na vittha bho viprā unmattaṃ naṣṭacetanam || 66 ||

yūyaṃ kāruṇikāḥ sarve mitrabhāve vyavasthitāḥ |
vadamānamidaṃ chadma brahmarūpadharaṃ haram || 67 ||

māyayā tasya devasya mohitāste dvijottamāḥ |
kapardinaṃ nijaghnuste pāṇipādaiśca muṣṭibhiḥ || 68 ||

daṃḍaiścāpi ca kīlaiśca unmattaveṣadhāriṇam |
pīḍyamānastatastaistu dvijaiḥ kopamathāgamat || 69 ||

tato devena te śaptā yūyaṃ vedavivarjitāḥ |
ūrdhvajaṭāḥ kratubhraṣṭāḥ paradāropasevinaḥ || 70 ||

veśyāyāṃ tu ratā dyūte pitṛmātṛvivarjitāḥ |
na putraḥ paitṛkaṃ vittaṃ vidyāṃ vāpi gamiṣyati || 71 ||

sarve ca mohitāḥ saṃtu sarveṃdriyavivarjitāḥ |
raudrīṃ bhikṣāṃ samaśnaṃtu parapiṃḍopajīvinaḥ || 72 ||

ātmānaṃ vartayaṃtaśca nirmamā dharmavarjitāḥ |
kṛpārpitā tu yairviprairunmatte mayi sāṃpratam || 73 ||

teṣāṃ dhanaṃ ca putrāśca dāsīdāsamajāvikam |
kulotpannāśca vai nāryo mayi tuṣṭe bhavanviha || 74 ||

evaṃ śāpaṃ varaṃ caiva datvāṃtarddhānamīśvaraḥ |
gato dvijāgate deve matvā taṃ śaṃkaraṃ prabhum || 75 ||

anviṣyaṃtopi yatnena na cāpaśyaṃta te yadā |
tadā niyamasaṃpannāḥ puṣkarāraṇyamāgatāḥ || 76 ||

snātvā jyeṣṭhasaro viprā jepuste śatarudriyam |
jāpyāvasāne devastānaśīraragirā'bravīt || 77 ||

anṛtaṃ na mayā proktaṃ svaireṣvapi kutaḥ punaḥ |
āgate nigrahe kṣemaṃ bhūyopi karavāṇyaham || 78 ||

śāṃtā dāṃtā dvijā ye tu bhaktimaṃto mayi sthirāḥ |
na teṣāṃ chidyate vedo na dhanaṃ nāpi saṃtatiḥ || 79 ||

agnihotraratā ye ca bhaktimaṃto janārdane |
pūjayaṃti ca brahmāṇaṃ tejorāśiṃ divākaram || 80 ||

nāśubhaṃ vidyate teṣāṃ yeṣāṃ sāmye sthitā matiḥ |
etāvaduktvā vacanaṃ tūṣṇīṃ bhūtastu so'bhavat || 81 ||

labdhvā varaṃ saprasādaṃ devadevānmaheśvarāt |
ājagmuḥ sahitāssarve yatra devaḥ pitāmahaḥ || 82 ||

viriñciṃ saṃhitājāpyaistoṣayaṃto'grataḥ sthitāḥ |
tuṣṭastānabravīdbrahmā mattopi vriyatāṃ varaḥ || 83 ||

brahmaṇastenavākyena hṛṣṭāḥ sarve dvijottamāḥ |
ko varo yācyatāṃ viprāḥ parituṣṭe pitāmahe || 84 ||

agnihotrāṇi vedāśca śāstrāṇi vividhāni ca |
sāṃtānikāśca ye lokā varadānādbhavaṃtu naḥ || 85 ||

evaṃ prajalpatāṃ tatra viprāṇāṃ kopamāviśat |
ke yūyaṃ ketra pravarā vayaṃ śreṣṭhāstathāpare || 86 ||

netineti tathā viprā dvijāṃstāṃstatra saṃsthitān |
brahmovācābhisaṃprekṣya brāhmaṇānkrodhapūritān || 87 ||

yasmādyūyaṃ tribhirbhāgaiḥ sabhāyāṃ bāhyataḥ sthitāḥ |
tasmādāmūliko gulmo hyeko bhavatu vo dvijāḥ || 88 ||

udāsīnāḥ sthitā ye tu udāsīnā bhavaṃtu te |
sāyudhābaddhanistriṃśā yoddhukāmā vyavasthitāḥ || 89 ||

kauśikīti gaṇo nāma tṛtīyo bhavatu dvijāḥ |
tridhābaddhamidaṃ sthānaṃ sarvaṃ yuṣmadbhaviṣyati || 90 ||

bāhyato lokaśabdena procyamānāḥ prajāstviha |
avijñeyamidaṃ sthānaṃ viṣṇuḥ pālayitā dhruvam || 91 ||

mayā dattaṃ cirasthāyi abhaṃgaṃ ca bhaviṣyati |
evamuktvā tadā brahmā samāptiṃ tāmavaikṣata || 92 ||

brāhmaṇāḥ sahitāste tu krodhāmarṣasamanvitāḥ |
atithiṃ bhojayānāśca vedābhyāsaratāstu te || 93 ||

etacca paramaṃ kṣetraṃ puṣkaraṃ brahmasaṃjñitam |
tatrasthā ye dvijāḥ śāṃtā vasaṃti kṣetravāsinaḥ || 94 ||

na teṣāṃ durlabhaṃ kiṃcidbrahmaloke bhaviṣyati |
kokāmukhe kurukṣetre naimiṣe ṛṣisaṃgame || 95 ||

vārāṇasyāṃ prabhāse ca tathā badarikāśrame |
gaṃgādvāre prayāge ca gaṃgāsāgarasaṃgame || 96 ||

rudrakoṭyāṃ virūpākṣe mitrasyāpi tathā vane |
tīrtheṣveteṣu sarveṣu siddhiryā dvādaśābdikā || 97 ||

prāpyate mānavairloke ṣaṇmāsādrājasattama |
puṣkare tu na saṃdeho brahmacaryamanā yadi || 98 ||

tīrthānāṃ paramaṃ tīrthaṃ kṣetrāṇāmapi cottamam |
sadā tu pūjitaṃ pūjyairbhaktiyuktaiḥ pitāmahe || 99 ||

ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi sāvitryā brahmaṇā saha |
vādo yathānubhūtastu parihāsakṛto mahān || 100 ||

sāvitrīgamane sarvā āgatā devayoṣitaḥ |
bhṛgoḥ khyātyāṃ samutpannā viṣṇupatnī yaśasvinī || 101 ||

āmantritā sadā lakṣmīstatrāyātā tvarānvitā |
madirā ca mahābhāgā yoganidrā vibhūtidā || 102 ||

śrīḥ kamalālayābhūtiḥ kīrtiḥ śraddhā manasvinī |
puṣṭituṣṭipradā yā tu devyā etāḥ samāgatāḥ || 103 ||

satī yā dakṣatanayā umeti pārvatī śubhā |
trailokyasuṃdarī devī strīṇāṃ saubhāgyadāyinī || 104 ||

jayā ca vijayā caiva madhucchaṃdāmarāvatī |
supriyā janakāṃtā ca sāvitryā maṃdire śubhe || 105 ||

gauryā saha samāyātāssuveṣā bharaṇānvitāḥ |
pulomaduhitā caiva śakrāṇī ca sahāpsarāḥ || 106 ||

svāhā cāpi svadhā''yātā dhūmorṇā ca varānanā |
yakṣī tu rākṣasī caiva gaurī caiva mahādhanā || 107 ||

manojavā vāyupatnī ṛddhiśca dhanadapriyā |
devakanyāstathā''yātā dānavyo danuvallabhāḥ || 108 ||

saptarṣīṇāṃ mahāpatnya ṛṣīṇāṃ ca varāṃganāḥ |
evaṃ bhaginyo duhitā vidyādharīgaṇāstathā || 109 ||

rākṣasyaḥ pitṛkanyāśca tathānyā lokamātaraḥ |
vadhūbhiḥ sasnuṣābhiśca sāvitrī gaṃtumicchati || 110 ||

adityādyāstathā sarvā dakṣakanyāssamāgatāḥ |
tābhiḥ parivṛtā sādhvī brahmāṇī kamalālayā || 111 ||

kācinmodakamādāya kācicchūrpaṃ varānanā |
phalapūritamādāya prayātā brahmaṇoṃtikam || 112 ||

āḍhakīḥ saha niṣpāvā gṛhītvānyāstathāparā |
dāḍimāni vicitrāṇi mātuliṃgāni śobhanā || 113 ||

karīrāṇi tathā cānyā gṛhītvā kamalāni ca |
kausuṃbhakaṃ jīrakaṃ ca kharjūramaparā tathā || 114 ||

uttamānyaparādāya nālikerāṇi sarvaśaḥ |
drākṣayāpūritaṃ kācitpātraṃ śṛṃgāṭakaṃ tathā || 115 ||

karpūrāṇi vicitrāṇi jaṃbūkāni śubhāni ca |
akṣoṭāmalakāngṛhya jaṃbīrāṇi tathāparā || 116 ||

bilvāni paripakvāni cipiṭāni varānanā |
kārpāsatūlikāścānyā vastraṃ kausuṃbhakaṃ tathā || 117 ||

evamādyāni cānyāni kṛtvā śūrpe varānanāḥ |
sāvitryā sahitāḥ sarvāḥ saṃprāptāḥ sahasā śubhāḥ || 118 ||

sāvitrīmāgatāṃ dṛṣṭvā bhītastatra puraṃdaraḥ |
adhomukhaḥ sthito brahmā kimeṣā māṃ vadiṣyati || 119 ||

trapānvitau viṣṇurudrau sarve cānye dvijātayaḥ |
sabhāsadastathā bhītāstathā cānye divaukasaḥ || 120 ||

putrāḥ pautrā bhāgineyā mātulā bhrātarastathā |
ṛbhavo nāma ye devā devānāmapi devatāḥ || 121 ||

vailakṣyevasthitāḥ sarve sāvitrī kiṃ vadiṣyati |
brahmapārśve sthitā tatra kiṃtu vai gopakanyakā || 122 ||

maunībhūtā tu śṛṇvānā sarveṣāṃ vadatāṃ giraḥ |
addhvaryuṇā samāhūtā nāgatā varavarṇinī || 123 ||

śakreṇānyāhṛtābhīrā dattā sā viṣṇunā svayam |
anumoditā ca rudreṇa pitrā'dattā svayaṃ tathā || 124 ||

kathaṃ sā bhavitā yajñe samāptiṃ vā vrajetkatham |
evaṃ ciṃtayatāṃ teṣāṃ praviṣṭā kamalālayā || 125 ||

vṛto brahmāsadasyaistu ṛtvigbhirdaivataistathā |
hūyaṃte cāgnayastatra brāhmaṇairvaidapāragaiḥ || 126 ||

patnīśālāsthitā gopī saiṇaśṛṃgā samekhalā |
kṣaumavastraparīdhānā dhyāyaṃtī paramaṃ padam || 127 ||

pativratā patiprāṇā prādhānye ca niveśitā |
rūpānvitā viśālākṣī tejasā bhāskaropamā || 128 ||

dyotayaṃtī sadastatra sūryasyeva yathā prabhā |
jvalamānaṃ tathā vahniṃ śrayaṃte ṛtvijastathā || 129 ||

paśūnāmiha gṛhṇānā bhāgaṃ svasva carormudā |
yajñabhāgārthino devā vilaṃbādbruvate tadā || 130 ||

kālahīnaṃ na kartavyaṃ kṛtaṃ na phaladaṃ yataḥ |
vedeṣvevamadhīkāro dṛṣṭaḥ sarvairmanīṣibhiḥ || 131 ||

prāvargye kriyamāṇe tu brāhmaṇairvedapāragaiḥ |
kṣīradvayena saṃyukta śṛtenādhvaryuṇā tathā || 132 ||

upahūtenāgate na cāhūteṣu dvijanmasu |
kriyamāṇe tathā bhakṣye dṛṣṭvā devī ruṣānvitā || 133 ||

uvāca devī brahmāṇaṃ sadomadhye tu mauninam |
kimetadyujyate deva kartumetadviceṣṭitam || 134 ||

māṃ parityajya yatkāmātkṛtavānasi kilbiṣam |
na tulyā pādarajasā mamaiṣā yā śiraḥ kṛtā || 135 ||

yadvadaṃti janāssarve saṃgatāḥ sadasi sthitāḥ |
ājñāmīśvarabhūtānāṃ tāṃ kuruṣva yadīcchasi || 136 ||

bhavatā rūpalobhena kṛtaṃ lokavigarhitam |
putreṣu na kṛtā lajjā pautreṣu ca na te prabho || 137 ||

kāmakārakṛtaṃ manya etatkarmavigarhitam |
pitāmahosi devānāmṛṣīṇāṃ prapitāmahaḥ || 138 ||

kathaṃ na te trapā jātā ātmanaḥ paśyatastanum |
lokamadhye kṛtaṃ hāsyamahaṃ cāpakṛtā prabho || 139 ||

yadyeṣa te sthiro bhāvastiṣṭha deva namostute |
ahaṃ kathaṃ sakhīnāṃ tu darśayiṣyāmi vai mukham || 140 ||

bhartrā me vidhṛtā patnī kathametadahaṃ vade |
brahmovāca |
ṛtvigbhistvaritaścāhaṃ dīkṣākālādanaṃtaram || 141 ||

patnīṃ vinā na homotra śīghraṃ patnīmihānaya |
śakreṇaiṣā samānītā datteyaṃ mama viṣṇunā || 142 ||

gṛhītā ca mayā subhru kṣamasvaitaṃ mayā kṛtam |
na cāparādhaṃ bhūyonyaṃ kariṣye tava suvrate || 143 ||

pādayoḥ patitastehaṃ kṣamasveha namostute |
pulastya uvāca |
evamuktā tadā kruddhā brahmāṇaṃ śaptumudyatā || 144 ||

yadi mesti tapastaptaṃ guravo yadi toṣitāḥ |
sarvabrahmasamūheṣu sthāneṣu vividheṣu ca || 145 ||

naiva te brāhmaṇāḥ pūjāṃ kariṣyaṃti kadācana |
ṝte tu kārtikīmekāṃ pūjāṃ sāṃvatsarīṃ tava || 146 ||

kariṣyaṃti dvijāḥ sarve martyā nānyatra bhūtale |
etadbrahmāṇamuktvāha śatakratumupasthitam || 147 ||

bhobhoḥ śakra tvayānītā ābhīrī brahmaṇoṃtikam |
yasmātte kṣudrakaṃ karma tasmātvaṃ lapsyase phalam || 148 ||

yadā saṃgrāmamadhye tvaṃ sthātā śakra bhaviṣyasi |
tadā tvaṃ śatrubhirbaddho nītaḥ paramikāṃ daśām || 149 ||

akiṃcano naṣṭasatvaḥ śatrūṇāṃ nagare sthitaḥ |
parābhavaṃ mahatprāpya na cirādeva mokṣyase || 150 ||

śakraṃ śaptvā tadā devī viṣṇuṃ vākyamathābravīt |
bhṛguvākyena te janma yadā martye bhaviṣyati || 151 ||

bhāryāviyogajaṃ duḥkhaṃ tadā tvaṃ tatra bhokṣyase |
hṛtā te śatruṇā patnī pare pāro mahodadheḥ || 152 ||

na ca tvaṃ jñāsyase nītāṃ śokopahatacetanaḥ |
bhrātrā saha paraṃ kaṣṭāmāpadaṃ prāpya duḥkhitaḥ || 153 ||

yadā yadukule jātaḥ kṛṣṇasaṃjño bhaviṣyasi |
paśūnāṃ dāsatāṃ prāpya cirakālaṃ bhramiṣyasi || 154 ||

tadāha rudraṃ kupitā yadā dāruvane sthitaḥ |
tadā ta ṝṣayaḥ kruddhāḥ śāpaṃ dāsyaṃti vai hara || 155 ||

bhobhoḥ kāpālika kṣudra strīrasmākaṃ jihīrṣasi |
tadetaddarpitaṃ tedya bhūmau ligaṃ patiṣyati || 156 ||

vihīnaḥ pauruṣeṇa tvaṃ muniśāpācca pīḍitaḥ |
gaṃgādvāre sthitā patnī sā tvāmāśvāsayiṣyati || 157 ||

agne tvaṃ sarvabhakṣosi pūrvaṃ putreṇa me kṛtaḥ |
bhṛguṇā dharmanityena kathaṃ dagdhaṃ dahāmyaham || 158 ||

jātavedassa rudrastvāṃ retasā plāvayiṣyati |
amedhyeṣu ca te jihvā adhikaṃ prajvaliṣyati || 159 ||

brāhmaṇānṛtvijaḥ sarvānsāvitrī vai śaśāpa ha |
pratigrahārthāgnihotro vṛthāṭavyāśrayāstathā || 160 ||

sadā tīrthāni kṣetrāṇi lobhādeva bhajiṣyatha |
parānneṣu sadā tṛptā atṛptāssvagṛheṣu ca || 161 ||

ayājyayājanaṃ kṛtvā kutsitasya pratigraham |
vṛthādhanārjanaṃ kṛtvā vyayaṃ caiva tathā vṛthā || 162 ||

pretānāṃ tena pretatvaṃ bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ |
evaṃ śakraṃ tathā viṣṇuṃ rudraṃ vai pāvakaṃ tathā || 163 ||

brahmāṇaṃ brāhmaṇāṃścaiva sarvāṃstānāśapadruṣā |
śāpaṃ datvā tathā teṣāṃ niṣkrāṃtā sadasastathā || 164 ||

jyeṣṭhaṃ puṣkaramāsādya tadā sā ca vyavasthitā |
lakṣmīṃ prāha satīṃ tāṃ ca śakrabhāryāṃ varānanām || 165 ||

yuvatīstāstathovāca nātra sthāsyāmi saṃsadi |
tatra cāhaṃ gamiṣyāmi yatra śroṣye na ca dhvanim || 166 ||

tatastāḥ pramadāḥ sarvāḥ prayātāḥ svaniketanam |
sāvitrī kupitā tāsāmapi śāpāya codyatā || 167 ||

yasmānmāṃ tu parityajya gatāstā devayoṣitaḥ |
tāsāmapi tathā śāpaṃ pradāsye kupitā bhṛśam || 168 ||

naikatravāso lakṣmyāstu bhaviṣyati kadācana |
kṣudrā sā calacittā ca mūrkheṣu ca vasiṣyati || 169 ||

mleccheṣu pārvatīyeṣu kutsite kutsite tathā |
mūrkheṣu cāvalipteṣu abhiśapte durātmani || 170 ||

evaṃvidhe nare syātte vasatiḥ śāpakāritā |
śāpaṃ datvā tatastasyā iṃdrāṇīmaśapattatadā || 171 ||

brahmahatyā gṛhīteṃdre patyau te duḥkhabhāgini |
nahuṣāpahṛte rājye dṛṣṭvā tvāṃ yācayiṣyati || 172 ||

ahamiṃdraḥ kathaṃ caiṣā nopasthāsyati bāliśā |
sarvāndevānhaniṣyāmi na lapsyehaṃ śacīṃ yadi || 173 ||

naṣṭā tvaṃ ca tadā trastā vākpaterduḥkhitā gṛhe |
vasiṣyase durācāre mama śāpena garvite || 174 ||

devabhāryāsu sarvāsu tadā śāpamayacchata |
na cāpatyakṛtāṃ prītimetāḥ sarvā labhiṣyatha || 175 ||

dahyamānā divārātrau vaṃdhyāśabdena dūṣitāḥ |
gauryyapyevaṃ tadā śaptā sāvitryā varavarṇinī || 176 ||

rudamānā tu sā dṛṣṭā viṣṇunā ca prasāditā |
mā rodīstvaṃ viśālākṣi ehyāgaccha sadā śubhe || 177 ||

praviśya ca sabhāṃ dehi mekhalāṃ kṣaumavāsasī |
gṛhāṇa dīkṣāṃ brahmāṇi pādau ca praṇamāmi te || 178 ||

evamuktā'bravīdenaṃ na karomi vacastava |
tatra cāhaṃ gamiṣyāmi yatra śroṣye na vai dhvanim || 179 ||

etāvaduktvā sāruhya tasmātsthānadgirau sthitā |
viṣṇustadagrataḥ sthitvā badhvā ca karasaṃpuṭaṃ || 180 ||

tuṣṭāva praṇato bhūtvā bhaktyā paramayā sthitaḥ |
viṣṇuruvāca |
sarvagā sarvabhūteṣu draṣṭavyā sarvatodbhutā || 181 ||

sadasaccaiva yatkiṃciddṛśyaṃ tanna vinā tvayā |
tathāpi yeṣu sthāneṣu draṣṭavyā siddhimīpsubhiḥ || 182 ||

smartavyā bhūmikāmairvā tatpravakṣyāmi tegrataḥ |
sāvitrī puṣkare nāma tīrthānāṃ pravare śubhe || 183 ||

vārāṇasyāṃ viśālākṣī naimiṣe liṃgadhāriṇī |
prayāge lalitādevī kāmukā gaṃdhamādane || 184 ||

mānase kumudā nāma viśvakāyā tathāṃbare |
gomaṃte gomatī nāma maṃdare kāmacāriṇī || 185 ||

madotkaṭā caitrarathe jayaṃtī hastināpure |
kānyakubje tathā gaurī raṃbhā malayaparvate || 186 ||

ekāmrake kīrtimatī viśvā viśveśvarī tathā |
karṇike puruhasteti kedāre mārgadāyikā || 187 ||

naṃdā himavataḥ pṛṣṭe gokarṇe bhadrakālikā |
sthāṇvīśvare bhavānī tu bilvake bilvapatrikā || 188 ||

śrīśaile mādhavīdevī bhadrā bhadreśvarī tathā |
jayā varāhaśaile tu kamalā kamalālaye || 189 ||

rudrakoṭyāṃ tu rudrāṇī kālī kālaṃjare tathā |
mahāliṃge tu kapilā karkoṭe maṃgaleśvarī || 190 ||

śāligrāme mahādevī śivaliṃge jalapriyā |
māyāpuryāṃ kumārī tu saṃtāne lalitā tathā || 191 ||

utpalākṣī sahasrākṣe hiraṇyākṣe mahotpalā |
gayāyāṃ maṃgalā nāma vimalā puruṣottame || 192 ||

vipāśāyāmamoghākṣī pāṭalā puṇyavarddhane |
nārāyaṇī supārśve tu trikūṭe bhadrasuṃdarī || 193 ||

vipule vipulā nāma kalyāṇī malayācale |
koṭavī koṭitīrthe tu sugaṃdhā mādhavīvane || 194 ||

kubjāmrake trisaṃdhyā tu gaṃgādvāre haripriyā |
śivakuṃḍe śivānaṃdā naṃdinī devikātaṭe || 195 ||

rukmiṇī dvāravatyāṃ tu rādhā vṛṃdāvane tathā |
devakī mathurāyāṃ tu pātāle parameśvarī || 196 ||

citrakūṭe tathā sītā viṃdhye viṃdhyanivāsinī |
sahyādrāvekavīrā tu hariścaṃdre tu caṃdrikā || 197 ||

ramaṇā rāmatīrthe tu yamunāyāṃ mṛgāvatī |
karavīre mahālakṣmī rumādevī vināyake || 198 ||

arogā vaidyanāthe tu mahākāle maheśvarī |
abhayā puṣpatīrthe tu amṛtā viṃdhyakaṃdare || 199 ||

māṃḍavye māṃḍavī devī svāhā māheśvare pure |
vegale tu pracaṃḍātha caṃḍikāmarakaṃṭake || 200 ||

someśvare varārohā prabhāse puṣkarāvatī |
devamātā sarasvatyāṃ pārāpāre taṭe sthitā || 201 ||

mahālaye mahāpadmā payoṣṇyāṃ piṃgaleśvarī |
siṃhikā kṛtaśauce tu kārtikeye tu śaṃkarī || 202 ||

utpalāvartake lolā subhadrā siṃdhusaṃgame |
umā siddhavane lakṣmīranaṃgā bharatāśrame || 203 ||

jālaṃdhare viśvamukhī tārā kiṣkiṃdhaparvate |
devadāruvane puṣṭirmedhā kāśmīramaṃḍale || 204 ||

bhīmā devī himādrau ca tuṣṭirvastreśvare tathā |
kapālamocane śraddhā mātā kāyāvarohaṇe || 205 ||

śaṃkhoddhāre dhvanirnāma dhṛtiḥ piṃḍārake tathā |
kālā tu caṃdrabhāgāyāmacchode siddhidāyinī || 206 ||

veṇāyāmamṛtā devī badaryāmūrvaśī tathā |
auṣadhī cottarakurau kuśadvīpe kuśodakā || 207 ||

manmathā hemakūṭe tu kumude satyavādinī |
aśvatthevaṃdanīyā tu nidhirvai śravaṇālaye || 208 ||

gāyatrī vedavadane pārvatī śivasannidhau |
devaloke tatheṃdrāṇī brahmāsye tu sarasvatī || 209 ||

sūryabiṃbe prabhānāma mātṝṇāṃ vaiṣṇavī tathā |
aruṃdhatī satīnāṃ tu rāmāsu ca tilottamā || 210 ||

citre brahmakalā nāma śaktiḥ sarvaśarīriṇāṃ |
etadbhaktyā mayā proktaṃ nāmāṣṭaśatamuttamaṃ || 211 ||

aṣṭottaraṃ ca tīrthānāṃ śatametadudāhṛtaṃ |
yo japecchruṇuyādvāpi sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate || 212 ||

yeṣu tīrtheṣu yaḥ kṛtvā snānaṃ paśyennarottamaḥ |
sarvapāpavinirmuktaḥ kalpaṃ brahmapure vaset || 213 ||

nāmāṣṭakaśataṃ yastu śrāvayedbrahmasannidhau |
paurṇamāsyāmamāyāṃ vā bahuputro bhavennaraḥ || 214 ||

godāne śrāddhadāne vā ahanyahani vā punaḥ |
devārcanavidhau śṛṇvanparaṃ brahmādhigacchati || 215 ||

evaṃ stuvaṃtaṃ sāvitrī viṣṇuṃ provāca suvratā |
samyakstutā tvayā putra tvamajayyo bhaviṣyasi || 216 ||

avatāre sadārastvaṃ pitṛmātṛṣu vallabhaḥ |
iha cāgatya yo māṃ tu stavenānena saṃstuyāt || 217 ||

sarvapāpavinirmuktaḥ paraṃ sthānaṃ gamiṣyati |
gaccha yajñaṃ viriñcasya samāptiṃ naya putraka || 218 ||

kurukṣetre prayāge ca bhaviṣye cānnadāyinī |
samīpagā sthitā bharttuḥ kariṣye tava bhāṣitam || 219 ||

evamukto gato viṣṇurbrahmaṇaḥ sada uttam |
gatāyāmatha sāvitryāṃ gāyatrī vākyamabravīt || 220 ||

śṛṇvaṃtu vākyamṛṣayo madīyaṃ bhartṛsannidhau |
yadidaṃ vacmyahaṃ tuṣṭā varadānāya codyatā || 221 ||

brahmāṇaṃ pūjayiṣyaṃti narā bhaktisamanvitāḥ |
teṣāṃ vastraṃ dhanaṃ dhānyaṃ dārāḥ saukhyaṃ dhanāni ca || 222 ||

avicchinnaṃ tathā saukhyaṃ gṛhe vai putrapautrakam |
bhuktvāsau suciraṃ kālamaṃte mokṣaṃ gamiṣyati || 223 ||

pulastya uvāca |
brahmāṇaṃ ca pratiṣṭhāpya sarvayatnairvidhānataḥ |
yatpuṇyaphalamāpnoti tadekāgramanāḥ śṛṇu || 224 ||

sarvayajña tapo dāna tīrtha vedeṣu yatphalam |
tatphalaṃ koṭiguṇitaṃ labhetaitatpratiṣṭhayā || 225 ||

paurṇamāsyupavāsaṃ tu kṛtvā bhaktyā narādhipa |
anena vidhinā yastu viriṃciṃ pūjayennaraḥ || 226 ||

pratipadi mahābāho sa yāti brahmaṇaḥ padam |
viriṃciṃ vāsudevaṃ tu ṛtvigbhiśca viśeṣataḥ || 227 ||

kārtike māsi devasya rathayātrā prakīrtitā |
yāṃ kṛtvā mānavā bhaktyā saṃyāṃti brahmalokatām || 228 ||

kārtike māsi rājeṃdra paurṇamāsyāṃ caturmukham |
mārgeṇa brahmaṇā sārddhaṃ sāvitryā ca paraṃtapa || 229 ||

bhrāmayennagaraṃ sarvaṃ nānāvādyasamanvitaḥ |
snapayedbhramayitvā tu salokaṃ nagaraṃ nṛpa || 230 ||

brāhmaṇānbhojayitvāgre śāṃḍileyaṃ prapūjya ca |
āropayedrathe devaṃ puṇyavāditraniḥsvanaiḥ || 231 ||

rathāgre śāṃḍilīputraṃ pūjayitvā vidhānataḥ |
brāhmaṇānvācayitvā tu kṛtvā puṇyāhamaṅgalam || 232 ||

devamāropayitvā ca rathe kuryātprajāgaraṃ |
nānāvidhaiḥ prekṣaṇikairbrahmaghauṣaiśca puṣkalaiḥ || 233 ||

kṛtvā prajāgaraṃ devaṃ prabhāte brāhmaṇānnṛpa |
bhojayitvā yathāśakti bhakṣyabhojyairanekaśaḥ || 234 ||

pūjayitvā janaṃ dhīra maṃtreṇa vidhivannṛpa |
ājyena tu mahābāho payasā pāyasena ca || 235 ||

brāhmaṇānvācayitvā tu svastyā tu vidhivannṛpa |
kṛtvā puṇyāhaśabdaṃ ca tadrathaṃ bhrāmayetpure || 236 ||

vipraiścaturvedavidbhirbhrāmayedbrahmaṇo ratham |
bahvṛcātharvaṇairvīrachaṃdogādhvaryubhistathā || 237 ||

bhrāmayeddevadevasya suraśreṣṭhasya taṃ rathaṃ |
pradakṣiṇaṃ puraṃ sarvaṃ mārgeṇa susamena tu || 238 ||

na voḍhavyo ratho vīra śūdreṇa hitamicchatā |
na cārohedrathaṃ prājño muktvaikaṃ bhojakaṃ nṛpaḥ || 239 ||

brahmaṇo dakṣiṇe pārśve gāyatrīṃ sthāpayennṛpa |
bhojakaṃ vāmapārśve tu purataḥ paṃṅkajaṃ nyeset || 240 ||

evaṃ tūryaninādaistu śaṃkhaśabdaiśca puṣkalaiḥ |
bhrāmayitvā rathaṃ vīra puraṃ sarvaṃ pradakṣiṇam || 241 ||

svasthāne sthāpayeddevaṃ datvā nīrājanaṃ budhaḥ |
ya evaṃ kurute yātrāṃ yo vā bhaktyāpi paśyati || 242 ||

rathaṃ vā karṣayedyastu sa gacchedbrahmaṇaḥ padaṃ |
kārtike māsyamāvāsyāṃ yaśca dīpapradīpanaṃ || 243 ||

śālāyāṃ brahmaṇaḥ kuryātsa gacchetparamaṃ padam |
gaṃdhapuṣpairnavairvastrairātmānaṃ pūjayettu yaḥ || 244 ||

tasyāṃ pratipadāyāṃ tu sa gacchedbrahmaṇaḥ padam |
mahāpuṇyātithiriyaṃ balirājyapravartinī || 245 ||

brahmaṇaḥ supriyā nityaṃ bāleyī parikīrtitā |
brahmāṇaṃ pūjayedyo'syāmātmānaṃ ca viśeṣataḥ || 246 ||

sa yāti paramaṃ sthānaṃ viṣṇoramitatejasaḥ |
caitre māsi mahābāho puṇyā pratipadāṃ varā || 247 ||

tasyāṃ yaḥ śvapacaṃ spṛṣṭvā snānaṃ kuryānnarottamaḥ |
na tasya duritaṃ kiṃcinnādhayo vyādhayo nṛpa || 248 ||

bhavaṃti kuruśārdūla tasmātsnānaṃ samācaret |
divyaṃ nīrājanaṃ taddhi sarvarogavināśanaṃ || 249 ||

gomahiṣyādi yatkiṃcittatsarvaṃ karṣayennṛpa |
tena vastrādibhiḥ sarvaistoraṇaṃ bāhyato nyaset || 250 ||

brāhmaṇānāṃ tathā bhojyaṃ kuryātkurukulodvaha |
tisro hyetāḥ purā proktāstithayaḥ kurunaṃdana || 251 ||

kārtikāśvayuje māsi caitremāsi tathā nṛpa |
snānaṃ dānaṃ śataguṇaṃ kārttike yā tithirnṛpa || 252 ||

balirājñastu śubhadā paśūnāṃ hitakāriṇī |
gāyatryuvāca |
yaduktaṃ tu tayā vākyaṃ sāvitryā kamalodbhavaṃ || 253 ||

na tu te brāhmaṇāḥ pūjāṃ kariṣyaṃti kadācana |
madīyaṃ tu vacaḥ śrutvā ye kariṣyaṃti cārcanaṃ || 254 ||

iha bhuktvā tu bhogāṃste paratra mokṣabhāginaḥ |
etāṃ jñātvā parāṃ dṛṣṭiṃ varaṃ tuṣṭaḥ prayacchati || 255 ||

śakrāhaṃ te varaṃ dāsye saṃgrāme śatrunigrahe |
tadā brahmā mocayitā gatvā śatruniketanam || 256 ||

svapuraṃ lapsyase naṣṭaṃ śatrunāśātparāṃ mudaṃ |
akaṃṭakaṃ mahadrājyaṃ trailokye te bhaviṣyati || 257 ||

martyaloke yadā viṣṇo avatāraṃ kariṣyasi |
bhrātrā saha paraṃ duḥkhaṃ svabhāryāharaṇādijaṃ || 258 ||

hatvā śatruṃ punarbhāryāṃ lapsyase surasannidhau |
gṛhītvā tāṃ punā rājyaṃ kṛtvā svargaṃ gamiṣyasi || 259 ||

ekādaśasahasrāṇi varṣāṇāṃ ca punardivaṃ |
khyātiste vipulā loke anurāgaṃ janaissaha || 260 ||

sāṃtānikā nāma teṣāṃ lokā sthāsyaṃti bhāvitāḥ |
tvayā te tāritā deva rāmarūpeṇa mānavāḥ || 261 ||

gāyatrī tu tadā rudraṃ varadā pratyabhāṣata |
patitepi ca te liṃge pūjāṃ kurvaṃti ye narāḥ || 262 ||

te pūtāḥ puṇyakarmāṇaḥ svargalokasya bhāginaḥ |
na tāṃ gatiṃ cāgnihotre na kratau hutapāvake || 263 ||

yāṃ gatiṃ manujā yāṃti tava liṃgasya pūjanāt |
gaṃgātīre sadā liṃgaṃ bilbapatreṇa ye tava || 264 ||

pūjayiṣyaṃti suprātā rudralokasya bhāginaḥ |
prāpyāpi śarvabhaktatvamagne tvaṃ bhava pāvanaḥ || 265 ||

tvayi prīte surāḥ sarve prītā vai nātra saṃśayaḥ |
tvanmukhena havirdevaiḥ prītāḥ prīte tvayi dhruvam || 266 ||

bhuṃjate nātra saṃdeho vedoktaṃ vacanaṃ yathā |
gāyatrī brāhmaṇāṃstāṃśca sarvāṃścaivābravīdidaṃ || 267 ||

yuṣmākaṃ prīṇanaṃ kṛtvā sarvatīrtheṣu mānavāḥ |
padaṃ sarve gamiṣyaṃti vairājākhyaṃ na saṃśayaḥ || 268 ||

annaprakārānvividhāndatvā dānānyanekaśaḥ |
śrāddheṣu prīṇanaṃ kṛtvā devadevā bhavaṃti te || 269 ||

ye ca vai brāhmaṇaśreṣṭhāsteṣāmāsye divaukasaḥ |
bhuṃjate ca haviḥ kṣipraṃ kavyaṃ caiva pitāmahāḥ || 270 ||

yūyaṃ hi dhāraṇe śaktāstrailokyasya na saṃśayaḥ |
prāṇāyāmena caikena sarve pūtā bhaviṣyatha || 271 ||

viśeṣātpuṣkare snātvā māṃ japtvā vedamātaraṃ |
pratigrahakṛtāndoṣānna prāpsyatha dvijotamāḥ || 272 ||

puṣkare cānnadānena prītāḥ syuḥ sarvadevatāḥ |
ekasminbhojite vipre koṭyāḥ phalamavāpsyate || 273 ||

brahmahatyādipāpāni duṣkṛtāni kṛtāni ca |
kariṣyaṃti narāssarve datvā yuṣmatkare dhanam || 274 ||

madīyena tu jāpyena pūjanīyastribhiḥ kṛtaiḥ |
brahmahatyāsamaṃ pāpaṃ tatkṣaṇādeva naśyati || 275 ||

daśabhirjanmabhirjātaṃ śatena ca purā kṛtaṃ |
triyugena sahasreṇa gāyatrī haṃti kilbiṣaṃ || 276 ||

evaṃ jñātvā sadā pūtā jāpye tu mama vai kṛte |
bhaviṣyadhvaṃ na saṃdeho nātra kāryā vicāraṇā || 277 ||

praṇavena trimātreṇa sārddhaṃ japtvā viśeṣataḥ |
pūtāḥ sarve na saṃdeho japtvā māṃ śirasā saha || 278 ||

aṣṭākṣarā sthitā cāhaṃ jagadvyāptaṃ mayā ttvidaṃ |
mātāhaṃ sarvavedānāṃ padaiḥ sarveralaṃkṛtā || 279 ||

japtvā māṃ bhaktitaḥ siddhiṃ yāsyaṃti dvijasattamāḥ |
prādhānyaṃ mama jāpyena sarveṣāṃ vo bhaviṣyati || 280 ||

gāyatrīsāramātropi varaṃ vipraḥ susaṃyataḥ |
nāyaṃtritaścaturvedī sarvāśī sarvavikrayī || 281 ||

yasmādvipreṣu sāvitryā śāpo dattaḥ sadasyatha |
atra dattaṃ hutaṃ cāpi sarvamakṣayakārakam || 282 ||

datto varo mayā tena yuṣmākaṃ dvijasattamāḥ |
agnihotraparā viprāstrikālaṃ homadāyinaḥ || 283 ||

svargaṃ te tu gamiṣyaṃti saikaviṃśatibhiḥ kulaiḥ |
evaṃ śakrasya viṣṇośca rudrasya pāvakasya ca || 284 ||

brahmaṇo brāhmaṇānāṃ ca gāyatrīvaramuttamam |
tasminvai puṣkare dattvā brahmaṇaḥ pārśvagā'bhavat || 285 ||

cāraṇaistu tadā''khyātaṃ lakṣmyā vai śāpakāraṇam |
yuvatīnāṃ ca sarvāsāṃ śāpānjñātvā pṛthakpṛthak || 286 ||

lakṣmyāścaiva varaṃ prādādgāyatrī brahmaṇaḥ priyā |
akutsitānsadā sarvānkurvantī dhanaśobhanā || 287 ||

śobhiṣyase na saṃdehaḥ sarvebhyaḥ prītidāyinī |
ye tvayā vīkṣitāḥ putri sarve te puṇyabhojanāḥ || 288 ||

parityaktāstvayā ye tu sarve te duḥkhabhāginaḥ |
teṣāṃ jātiḥ kulaṃ śīlaṃ dharmaścaiva varānane || 289 ||

sabhāyāṃ te ca śobhaṃte dṛśyaṃte caiva pārthivaiḥ |
arthitvaṃ caiva teṣāṃ tu kariṣyaṃti dvijottamāḥ || 290 ||

saujanyaṃ teṣu kurvaṃti tvaṃ no bhrātā pitā guruḥ |
bāṃdhavopi na saṃdeho na jīveyaṃ tvayā vinā || 291 ||

tvayi dṛṣṭe prasannā me dṛṣṭirbhavati śobhanā |
manaḥ prasīdatetyarthaṃ satyaṃ satyaṃ vadāmi te || 292 ||

evaṃvidhāni vākyāni tvaddṛṣṭyā ye nirīkṣitāḥ |
sajjanāste tu śroṣyaṃti janānāṃ prītidāyakāḥ || 293 ||

iṃdratvaṃ nahuṣaḥ prāpya dṛṣṭvā tvāṃ yācayiṣyati |
tvaddṛṣṭyā tu hataḥ pāpo hyagastyavacanāddhruvam || 294 ||

sarpatvaṃ samanuprāpya prārthayiṣyati taṃ tu saḥ |
darpeṇāhaṃ vinaṣṭosmi śaraṇaṃ me mune bhava || 295 ||

vākyena tena tasyāsau nṛpasya bhagavānṛṣiḥ |
kṛtvā manasi kāruṇyamidaṃ vākyaṃ vadiṣyati || 296 ||

utpatsyate kule rājā tvadīye kulanaṃdanaḥ |
sarparūpadharaṃ dṛṣṭvā sa te śāpaṃ hi bhetsyati || 297 ||

tadā tvaṃ sarpatāṃ tyaktvā punaḥ svargaṃ gamiṣyasi |
aśvamedhakṛtena tvaṃ bhartrā saha punardivam || 298 ||

prāpsyase varadānena madīyena sulocane |
pulastya uvāca |
devapatnyastadā sarvāstuṣṭayā paribhāṣitāḥ || 299 ||

apatyairapi hīnānāṃ naiva duḥkhaṃ bhaviṣyati |
gaurī caiva tu gāyatryā tadā sāpi vibodhitā || 300 ||

bṛṃhitā paritoṣeṇa varāndattvā manasvinī |
samāptiṃ tasya yajñasya kāṃkṣaṃtī brahmaṇaḥ priyā || 301 ||

varadāṃ tāṃ tathā dṛṣṭvā gāyatrīṃ vedamātaram |
praṇipatya tadā rudraḥ stutimetāṃ cakāra ha || 302 ||

rudra uvāca |
namostu te vedamātaraṣṭākṣaraviśodhite |
gāyatrī durgataraṇī vāṇī saptavidhā tathā || 303 ||

sarvāṇi stutiśāstrāṇi gāthāśca nikhilāstathā |
akṣarāṇi ca sarvāṇi lakṣaṇāni tathaiva ca || 304 ||

bhāṣyādi sarvaśāstrāṇi ye cānye niyamāstathā |
akṣarāṇi ca sarvāṇi tvaṃ tu devi namostute || 305 ||

śvetā tvaṃ śvetarūpāsi śaśāṃkena samānanā |
bibhratī vipulau bāhū kadalīgarbhakomalau || 306 ||

eṇaśṛṃgaṃ kare gṛhya paṃkajaṃ ca sunirmalam |
vasānā vasane kṣaume raktenottaravāsasā || 307 ||

śaśiraśmiprakāśena hāreṇorasi rājitā |
divyakuṃḍalapūrṇābhyāṃ karṇābhyāṃ suvibhūṣitā || 308 ||

caṃdrasāpatnyabhūtena mukhena tvaṃ virājase |
makuṭenātiśuddhena keśabaṃdhena śobhitā || 309 ||

bhujaṃgābhogasadṛśau bhujau te bhūṣaṇandivaḥ |
stanau te rucirau devi vartulau samacūcukau || 310 ||

jaghanenātiśubhreṇa trivalībhaṃgadarpitā |
sumadhyavarttinī nābhirgaṃbhīrā śubhadarśinī || 311 ||

vistīrṇajaghanā devī suśroṇī ca varānane |
sujātavṛttoruyugā sujānu caraṇā tathā || 312 ||

trailokyadhāriṇī sā tvaṃ bhuvi satyopayācanā |
bhaviṣyasi mahābhāge varadā varavarṇinī || 313 ||

puṣkare ca kṛtā yātrā dṛṣṭvā tvāṃ saṃbhaviṣyati |
jyeṣṭhe māse paurṇamāsyāmagryāṃ pūjāṃ ca lapsyase || 314 ||

ye ca vā tvatprabhāvajñāḥ pūjayiṣyaṃti mānavāḥ |
na teṣāṃ durlabhaṃ kiṃcitputrato dhanatopi vā || 315 ||

kāṃtāreṣu nimagnānāmaṭavyāṃ vā mahārṇave |
dasyubhirvāniruddhānāṃ tvaṃ gatiḥ paramā nṛṇām || 316 ||

tvaṃ siddhiḥ śrīrdhṛtiḥ kīrtirhrīrvidyā sannatirmatiḥ |
saṃdhyā rātriḥ prabhā nidrā kālarātristvameva ca || 317 ||

aṃbā ca kamalā māturbrahmāṇī brahmacāriṇī |
jananī sarvadevānāṃ gāyatrī paramāṃganā || 318 ||

jayā ca vijayā caiva puṣṭistvaṃ ca kṣamā dayā |
sāvitryavarajā cāsi sadā ceṣṭā pitāmahe || 319 ||

bahurūpā viśvarūpā sunetrā brahmacāriṇī |
surūpā tvaṃ viśālākṣī bhaktānāṃ parirakṣiṇī || 320 ||

nagareṣu ca puṇyeṣu āśrameṣu varānane |
vāsastava mahādevi vaneṣūpavaneṣu ca || 321 ||

brahmasthāneṣu sarveṣu brahmaṇo vāmataḥ sthitā |
dakṣiṇena tu sāvitrī madhye brahmā pitāmahaḥ || 322 ||

aṃtarvedī ca yajñānāmṛtvijāṃ cāpi dakṣiṇā |
siddhistvaṃ hi nṛpāṇāṃ ca velā sāgarajā matā || 323 ||

brahmacāriṇi yā dīkṣā śobhā ca paramā matā |
jyotiṣāṃ ca prabhā devī lakṣmīrnārāyaṇe sthitā || 324 ||

kṣamā siddhirmunīnāṃ ca nakṣatrāṇāṃ ca rohiṇī |
rājadvāreṣu tīrtheṣu nadīnāṃ saṃgameṣu ca || 325 ||

pūrṇimā pūrṇacaṃdre ca buddhirnītyāṃ kṣamā dhṛtiḥ |
umādevī ca nārīṇāṃ śrūyase varavarṇinī || 326 ||

iṃdrasya cārudṛṣṭistvaṃ sahasranayanopagā |
ṝṣīṇāṃ dharmabuddhistvaṃ devānāṃ ca parāyaṇā || 327 ||

karṣakāṇāṃ ca sītā tvaṃ bhūtānāṃ dharaṇī tathā |
strīṇāmavaidhavyakarī dhanadhānyapradā sadā || 328 ||

vyādhiṃ mṛtyuṃ bhayaṃ caiva pūjitā śamayiṣyasi |
tathā tu kārtike māsi paurṇamāsyāṃ supūjitā || 329 ||

sarvakāmapradā devī bhaviṣyasi śubhaprade |
yaścedaṃ paṭhate stotraṃ śṛṇuyādvāpyabhīkṣṇaśaḥ || 330 ||

sarvārthasiddhiṃ labhate naro nāstyatra saṃśayaḥ |
gāyatryuvāca |
bhaviṣyatyevamevaṃ tu yattvayā putra bhāṣitam || 331 ||

bhīṣmauvāca |
atyadbhutamidaṃ brahmanśrutavānasmi tattvataḥ |
abhiṣekaṃ tu gāyatryāḥ sadasyatra tathā kṛtam || 1 ||

virodhaṃ caiva sāvitryā śāpadānaṃ tathā kṛtam |
viṣṇunā ca yathā devī sarvasthāneṣu kīrtitā || 2 ||

gāyatrī cāpi rudreṇa stutā ca varavarṇinī |
taṃ śrutvā pratimātmānaṃ vistareṇa pitāmaham || 3 ||

prahṛṣṭāni ca romāṇi praśāṃtaṃ ca mano mama |
śrutvā me paramā prītiḥ kautūhalamathaiva hi || 4 ||

nārāyaṇastu bhagavānkṛtvā tāṃ paramāṃ ca vai |
brahmapatnyāḥ stutiṃ bhaktyā nyasyatāṃ parvatopari || 5 ||

uvāca vacanaṃ viṣṇustuṣṭipuṣṭipradāyakam |
śrīmati hrīmatī caiva yā ca devīśvarī tathā || 6 ||

etadeva śrutaṃ brahmaṃstava vaktrādviniḥsṛtam |
uttaraṃ tatra yadbhūtaṃ yacca tasminsthale kṛtam || 7 ||

ānupūrvyā ca tatsarvaṃ bhagavānvaktumarhati |
śrutena me dehaśuddhirbhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ || 8 ||

pulastya uvāca |
yajataḥ puṣkare tasya devasya parameṣṭhinaḥ |
śṛṇurājannidaṃ citraṃ pūrvameva yathākṛtam || 9 ||

ādau kṛtayuge tasminyajamāne pitāmahe |
marīciraṃgirāścaiva pulastyaḥ pulahaḥ kratuḥ || 10 ||

dakṣaḥ prajāpatiścaiva namaskāraṃ pracakrire |
vidyotamānāḥ puruṣāḥ sarvābharaṇabhūṣitāḥ || 11 ||

upanṛtyaṃti deveśaṃ viṣṇumapsarasāṃ gaṇāḥ |
tato gaṃdharvatūryaistu pratinaṃdya vihāyasi || 12 ||

bahubhiḥ saha gaṃdharvaiḥ pragāyati ca tuṃbaruḥ |
mahāśrutiścitrasena ūrṇāyuranaghastathā || 13 ||

gomāyussūryavarcāśca somavarcāśca kaurava |
yugapacca tṛṇāyuśca naṃdiścitrarathastathā || 14 ||

trayodaśaḥ śāliśirāḥ parjanyaśca caturdaśaḥ |
kaliḥ paṃcadaśaścātra tārakaścātra ṣoḍaśaḥ || 15 ||

hāhāhūhūśca gaṃdharvo haṃsaścaiva mahādyutiḥ |
ityete devagaṃdharvā upagāyaṃti te vibhum || 16 ||

tathaivāpsaraso divyā upanṛtyaṃti taṃ vibhuṃ |
dhātāryamā ca savitā varuṇoṃśo bhagastathā || 17 ||

iṃdro vivasvānpūṣā ca tvaṣṭā parjanya eva ca |
ityete dvādaśādityā jvalaṃto dīptatejasaḥ || 18 ||

cakrurasminsureśāśca namaskāraṃ pitāmahe |
mṛgavyādhaśca śarvaśca nirṛtiśca mahāyaśāḥ || 19 ||

ajaikapādahirbudhnyaḥ pinākī cāparājitaḥ |
bhavo viśveśvaraścaiva kapardī ca viśāṃpate || 20 ||

sthāṇurbhagaśca bhagavānrudrāstatrāvatasthire |
aśvinau vasavaścāṣṭau marutaśca mahābalāḥ || 21 ||

viśvedevāśca sādhyāśca tasmai prāṃjalayaḥ sthitāḥ |
śeṣādyāstu mahānāgā vāsukipramukhāhayaḥ || 22 ||

kāśyapaḥ kaṃbalaścāpi takṣakaśca mahābalaḥ |
ete nāgā mahātmānastasmai prāṃjalayaḥ sthitāḥ || 23 ||

tārkṣyaścāriṣṭanemiśca garuḍaśca mahābalaḥ |
vāruṇiścaivāruṇiśca vainateyā vyavasthitāḥ || 24 ||

nārāyaṇaśca bhagavānsvayamāgatya lokavān |
prāha lokaguruṃ śrīmānsahasarvairmaharṣibhiḥ || 25 ||

tvayā tatamidaṃ sarvaṃ tvayā sṛṣṭaṃ jagatpate |
tasmāllokeśvaraścāsi padmayone namostu te || 26 ||

yadatra te mayā kāryaṃ kartavyaṃ ca tadādiśa |
evaṃ provāca bhagavānsārdhaṃ devarṣibhiḥ prabhuḥ || 27 ||

namaskṛtya sureśāya brahmaṇe'vyaktajanmane |
sa ca tatrasthito brahmā tejasā bhāsayandiśaḥ || 28 ||

śrīvatsalomasaṃcchanno hemasūtreṇa rājatā |
surarṣipratimaḥ śrīmānsvayaṃbhūrbhūtabhāvanaḥ || 29 ||

śuciromā mahāvakṣāḥ sarvatejomayaḥ prabhuḥ |
yo gatiḥ puṇyaśīlānāmagatiḥ pāpakarmaṇāṃ || 30 ||

yogasiddhā mahātmāno yaṃ vidurlokamuttamaṃ |
yasyāṣṭaguṇamaiśvaryaṃ yamāhurdevasattamam || 31 ||

yaṃ prāpya śāśvataṃ viprā niyatā mokṣakāṃkṣiṇaḥ |
janmano maraṇāccaiva mucyaṃte yogabhāvitāḥ || 32 ||

yadetattapa ityāhuḥ sarvāśramanivāsinaḥ |
sevaṃsevaṃ yatāhārā duścaraṃ vratamāsthitāḥ || 33 ||

yonaṃta iti nāgeṣu procyate sarvayogibhiḥ |
sahasramūrddhā raktākṣaḥ śeṣādibhiranuttamaiḥ || 34 ||

yo yajña iti vipreṃdrairijyate svargalipsubhiḥ |
nānāsthānagatiḥ śrīmānekaḥ kaviranuttamaḥ || 35 ||

yaṃ devaṃ vetti vettāraṃ yajñabhāgapradāyinaṃ |
vṛṣāgnisūryacaṃdrākṣaṃ devamākāśavigrahaṃ || 36 ||

taṃ prapadyāmahe devaṃ bhagavanśaraṇārthinaḥ |
śaraṇyaṃ śaraṇaṃ devaṃ sarvadevabhavodbhavaṃ || 37 ||

ṛṣīṇāṃ caiva sraṣṭāraṃ lokānāṃ ca sureśvaraṃ |
priyārthaṃ caiva devānāṃ sarvasya jagataḥ sthitau || 38 ||

kavyaṃ pitṝṇāmucitaṃ surāṇāṃ havyamuttamaṃ |
yena pravartitaṃ sar taṃ natāsmassurottamaṃ || 39 ||

tretāgninā tu yajatā devena parameṣṭhinā |
yathāsṛṣṭiḥ kṛtā pūrvaṃ yajñasṛṣṭistathā punaḥ || 40 ||

tathā brahmāpyanaṃtena lokānāṃ sthitikāriṇā |
anvāsyamāno bhagavānvṛddhopyatha ca buddhimān || 41 ||

yajñavāṭamaciṃtyātmā gatastatra pitāmahaḥ |
dhanāḍhyairṛtvijaiḥ pūrṇaṃ sadasyaiḥ paripālitam || 42 ||

gṛhītacāpena tadā viṣṇunā prabhaviṣṇunā |
