pacanaṃ vaiśvadevārthe parārthe yacca jīvitam || 337 ||

etadbhavecca sarvasvaṃ dhātūnāmiva kāṃcanam |
sarvabhūtahitaṃ rājannadhītyāmṛtamaśnute || 338 ||

evaṃ vai dharmasarvasvamuktvā te tu śunaḥsakham |
tenaiva sahitāḥ sarve niviṣṭāssarasastaṭe || 339 ||

saropaśyansuvistīrṇaṃ padmotpalajalāvṛtam |
tatrāvatāraṃ kṛtvā te bisāni ca kalāpaśaḥ || 340 ||

tīre nikṣipya sarasaścakruḥ puṇyāṃ jalakriyām |
athottīrya jalāttasmātte sametya parasparam || 341 ||

bisānyetānyapaśyaṃta idaṃ vacanamabruvan |
ṛṣaya ūcuḥ |
kena kṣudhābhitaptānāmasmākaṃ pāpakarmaṇām || 342 ||

nṛśaṃsenāpanītāni bisānyāhārakāṃkṣiṇā |
te śaṃkamānāstvanyonyaṃ paryapṛcchandvijottamāḥ || 343 ||

cakruśca niścayaṃ sarve śapathaṃ prati pārthiva |
kaśyapa uvāca |
sarvatra sarvaṃ haratu nyāsalopaṃ karotu ca || 344 ||

kūṭasākṣitvamabhyetu bisastainyaṃ karoti yaḥ |
daṃbhena dharmaṃ caratu rājānaṃ copasevatām || 345 ||

madhumāṃsaṃ samaśnātu bisastainyaṃ karoti yaḥ |
anṛtaṃ bhāṣatu sadā viṣayāṃścopasevatu || 346 ||

dadātu kanyāṃ śulkena bisastainyaṃ karoti yaḥ |
vasiṣṭha uvāca |
anṛtau maithunaṃ yātu divāsvapnaṃ niṣevatu || 347 ||

anyonyātithitāmetu bisastainyaṃ karoti yaḥ |
ekakūpe vasedgrāme brāhmaṇo vṛṣalīpatiḥ || 348 ||

tasya sālokyatāṃ yātu bisastainyaṃ karoti yaḥ |
bharadvāja uvāca |
nṛśaṃsasso'stu sarveṣu samṛdhyā cāpyahaṃkṛtaḥ || 349 ||

matsarī piśunaścaiva bisastainyaṃ karoti yaḥ |
pratyākrośatvavākruṣṭastāḍayatvanyatāḍitaḥ || 350 ||

vikrīṇātu rasāṃścaiva bisastainyaṃ karoti yaḥ |
gautama uvāca |
atithiṃ tvāgataṃ prāpya pākabhedaṃ karotu saḥ || 351 ||

śūdrānnaṃ ca sadāśnātu bisastainyaṃ karoti yaḥ |
datvā dānaṃ kīrtayatu parabhāryāsu tuṣyatu || 352 ||

ekākīmiṣṭamaśnīyādbisastainyaṃ karoti yaḥ |
viśvāmitra uvāca |
nityakāmaparaḥ sostu divase caiva maithunī || 353 ||

nityaṃ tu pātakī caiva bisastainyaṃ karoti yaḥ |
parāpavādaṃ vadatu paradārāṃśca sevatu || 354 ||

paraniṃdārataścāstu bisastainyaṃ karoti yaḥ |
mātaraṃ pitaraṃ caiva sovamanyatu durmatiḥ || 355 ||

samātaryanyabuddhisyād bisastainyaṃ karoti yaḥ |
parapākaṃ sadāśnātu paranārīṃ ca sevatu || 356 ||

vedavikrayakṛccāstu bisastainyaṃ karoti yaḥ |
jamadagniruvāca |
parasya yātu preṣyatvaṃ sa tu janmani janmani || 357 ||

sarvadharmakriyāhīno bisastainyaṃ karoti yaḥ |
śunaḥsakha uvāca |
nyāyena vedānadhyetu gṛhasthostu priyātithiḥ || 358 ||

satyaṃ vadatu vājasraṃ bisastainyaṃ karoti yaḥ |
agniṃ juhotu vidhivadyajñaṃ yajatu nityaśaḥ || 359 ||

brahmaṇassadanaṃ yātu bisastainyaṃ karoti yaḥ |
ṛṣaya ūcuḥ |
iṣṭameva dvijātīnāṃ yadidaṃ śapathīkṛtaṃ || 360 ||

tvayā kṛtaṃ bisastainyaṃ sarveṣāṃ naḥ śunaḥsakha |
śunaḥsakha uvāca |
mayā hyaṃtarhitānyāsanbisānīmāni vo dvijāḥ || 361 ||

dharmaṃ ca śrotukāmena jānīdhvaṃ māṃ ca vāsavam |
alobhādakṣayālokā jitā vo munisattamāḥ || 362 ||

vimānamadhitiṣṭhadhvaṃ gacchāmastridaśālayam |
tato maharṣayaste tu vijñāyātha puraṃdaram || 363 ||

ūcuḥ puraṃdaraṃ cedaṃ vākyaṃ vākyaviśāradāḥ |
ihāgatya naro yastu madhyamaṃ puṣkaraṃ viśet || 364 ||

trirātropoṣito bhūtvā labhedāvaśyakaṃ phalam |
dvādaśavārṣikīdīkṣā smṛtā yātu vanaukasāṃ || 365 ||

tasyāḥ phalaṃ samagraṃ ca labhediha na saṃśayaḥ |
nāsau durgatimāpnoti svagaṇaiḥ saha modate || 366 ||

viriñcisthānamāsādya tiṣṭhedvai brahmaṇo dinam |
pulastya uvāca |
iṃdreṇa saha saṃprītāstadā jagmustriviṣṭapam || 367 ||

evaṃ vilobhyamānāste lobhairbahuvidhairiha |
naiva lobhaṃ tathā cakrustena jagmustriviṣṭapam || 368 ||

idaṃ yaḥ śṛṇuyānnityamṛṣīṇāṃ caritaṃ śubham |
vimuktaḥ sarvapāpebhyaḥ svargaloke mahīyate || 369 ||

bhīṣma uvāca |
atyāścaryavatī ramyā katheyaṃ pāpanāśinī |
vistareṇa ca me brūhi yāthātathyena pṛcchataḥ || 1 ||

māhātmyaṃ madhyamasyāpi ṛṣibhiḥ parikīrtitam |
phalaṃ cānnasya kathitaṃ māhātmyaṃ ca damasya tu || 2 ||

viṣṇunā ca padanyāsaḥ kṛto yatra mahāmune |
kanīyasastathotpattiryathābhūtā vadasva me || 3 ||

pulastya uvāca |
purā rathaṃtare kalpe rājāsītpuṣpavāhanaḥ |
nāmnā lokeṣu vikhyātastejasā sūryasannibhaḥ || 4 ||

tapasā tasya tuṣṭena caturvaktreṇa bhārata |
kamalaṃ kāṃcanaṃ dattaṃ yathākāmagamaṃ nṛpa || 5 ||

saptadvīpāni lokaṃ ca yatheṣṭaṃ vicaratsadā |
kalpādau tu samaṃ dvīpaṃ tasya puṣkaravāsinā || 6 ||

lokena pūjitaṃ tasmātpuṣkaradvīpamucyate |
tadeva brahmaṇā dattaṃ yānamasya tatoṃbujam || 7 ||

puṣpavāhana ityāhustasmāttaṃ devadānavāḥ |
naupamyamastīha jagattrayepi brahmāṃbujasthasya ca tasya rājñaḥ || 8 ||

taponubhāvādatha tasya rājñī nārī sahasrairabhivaṃdyamānā |
nāmnā ca lāvaṇyavatī babhūva yā pārvatīveṣṭatamā bhavasya || 9 ||

tasyātmajānāmayutaṃ babhūva dharmātmanāmagryadhanurdharāṇām |
tadātmajāṃstānabhivīkṣya rājā muhurmuhurvismayamāsasāda || 10 ||

sobhyāgataṃ pūjya munipravīraṃ pracetasaṃ vākyamidaṃ babhāṣe |
kasmādvibhūtiracalāmaramartyapūjā jātā kathaṃ kamalajā sadṛśī surājñī || 11 ||

bhāryā mayālpatapasā paritoṣitena dattaṃ mamāṃbujagṛhaṃ ca munīṃdra dhātrā |
yasminpraviṣṭamapi koṭiśataṃ nṛpāṇāṃ sāmātyakuṃjararathaughajanāvṛtānāṃ || 12 ||

nālakṣyate kvagatamambaragāmibhiśca tārāgaṇeṃduraviraśmibhirapyagamyam |
tasmātkimanyajananījaṭharodbhavena dharmādikaṃ kṛtamaśeṣajanātigaṃ yat || 13 ||

sarvairmayātha tanayairatha vānayāpi sadbhāryayā tadakhilaṃ kathaya pracetaḥ |
sopyabhyadhādatha bhavāṃtaritaṃ nirīkṣya pṛthvīpate śṛṇu tadadbhutahetuvṛttam || 14 ||

janmābhavattava tu lubdhakulepi ghoraṃ jātastvamapyanudinaṃ kila pāpakārī |
vapurapyabhūttava punaḥ puruṣāṃgasaṃdhidurgaṃdhisattvakunakhābharaṇaṃ samaṃtāt || 15 ||

na ca te suhṛnna sutabaṃdhujano na tādṛknaivasvasā na jananī ca tadābhiśastā |
atisaṃmatā paramabhīṣṭatamābhimukhī jātā mahī śatavayoṣidiyaṃ surūpā || 16 ||

abhūdanāvṛṣṭiratīva raudrā kadācanāhāranimittamasyāṃ |
kṣutpīḍitena bhavatā tu yadā na kiṃcidāsāditaṃ vanyaphalādi bhakṣyaṃ || 17 ||

athābhidṛṣṭaṃ mahadaṃbujāḍhyaṃ sarovaraṃ paṃkaparītarodhaḥ |
padmānyathādāya tato bahūni gataḥ puraṃ vaidiśa nāmadheyaṃ || 18 ||

tanmūlyalābhāya puraṃ samastaṃ bhrāṃtaṃ tvayāśeṣamahastadāsīt |
kretā na kaścitkamaleṣu jātaḥ klāṃtaḥ paraṃ kṣutparipīḍitaśca || 19 ||

upaviṣṭastvamekasminsabhāryo bhavanāṃgaṇe |
tato rātrau bhavāṃstatra aśrauṣīnmaṃgaladhvaniṃ || 20 ||

sabhāryastatra gatavānyatrāsau maṃgaladhvaniḥ |
tatra maṃḍalamadhyasthā viṣṇorarcāvilokitā || 21 ||

veśyānaṃgavatī nāma bibhratī dvādaśīvrataṃ |
samāpya māghamāsasya dvādaśyāṃ lavaṇācalaṃ || 22 ||

nyavedayattu gurave śayyāṃ copaskarānvitām |
alaṃkṛtya hṛṣīkeśaṃ sauvarṇaṃ samamādarāt || 23 ||

sā tu dṛṣṭā tatastābhyāmidaṃ ca pariciṃtitaṃ |
kimebhiḥ kamalaiḥ kāryaṃ varaṃ viṣṇuralaṃkṛtaḥ || 24 ||

iti bhaktistadā jātā daṃpatyostu nareśvara |
tatprasaṃgātsamabhyarcya keśavaṃ lavaṇācalaṃ || 25 ||

śayyā ca puṣpaprakaraiḥ pūjitābhūcca sarvaśaḥ |
athānaṃgavatī tuṣṭā tayordhānyaśatatrayam || 26 ||

dīyatāmādideśātha kaladhautapalatrayaṃ |
na gṛhītaṃ tatastābhyāṃ mahāsatvāvalaṃbanāt || 27 ||

anaṃgavatyā ca punastayorannaṃ caturvidhaṃ |
ānīya vyāhṛtaṃ cānnaṃ bhujyatāmiti bhūpate || 28 ||

tābhyāṃ ca tadapi tyaktaṃ bhokṣyāvaḥ śvo varānane |
prasaṃgādupavāso nau tavādyāstu śubhāvahaḥ || 29 ||

janmaprabhṛti pāpiṣṭhāvāvāṃ devi dṛḍhavrate |
tvatprasaṃgādbhavadgehe dharmaleśostu nāviha || 30 ||

iti jāgaraṇaṃ tābhyāṃ tatprasaṃgādanuṣṭhitaṃ |
prabhāte ca tayā dattā śayyā salavaṇācalā || 31 ||

grāmaśca gurave bhaktyā viprebhyo dvādaśaiva tu |
vastrālaṃkārasaṃyuktā gāvaśca kanakānvitāḥ || 32 ||

bhojanaṃ ca suhṛnmitradīnāṃdhakṛpaṇaiḥ saha |
tacca lubdhakadāṃpatyaṃ pūjayitvā visarjitam || 33 ||

sa bhavānlubdhako jātaḥ sapatnīko nṛpeśvaraḥ |
puṣkaraprakarāttasmātkeśavasya tu pūjanāt || 34 ||

vinaṣṭāśeṣapāpasya tava puṣkaramaṃdiraṃ |
tasya satyasya māhātmyādalobhatapasā nṛpa || 35 ||

prādātkāmagamaṃ yānaṃ lokanāthaścaturmukhaḥ |
saṃtuṣṭastava rājeṃdra puṣkaraṃ tvaṃ samāśraya || 36 ||

kalpaṃ satvaṃ samāsādya vibhūtidvādaśīvrataṃ |
kuru rājeṃdra nirvāṇamavaśyaṃ samavāpsyasi || 37 ||

etaduktvā tu sa munistatraivāṃtaradhīyata |
rājā yathoktaṃ ca punarakarotpuṣpavāhanaḥ || 38 ||

idamācarato rājannakhaṃḍavratatā bhavet |
yathākathaṃcitkālena dvādaśadvādaśīrnṛpa || 39 ||

kartavyā śaktito deva viprebhyo dakṣiṇā nṛpa |
jyeṣṭhe gāvaḥ pradātavyā madhyame bhūmiruttamā || 40 ||

kaniṣṭhe kāṃcanaṃ deyamityeṣā dakṣiṇā smṛtā |
prathamaṃ brahmadaivatyaṃ dvitīyaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ tathā || 41 ||

tṛtīyaṃ rudradaivatyaṃ trayo devāstriṣu sthitāḥ |
iti kaluṣavidāraṇaṃ janānāṃ paṭhati ca yastu śṛṇoti cāpi bhaktyā || 42 ||

matimapi ca sa yāti devaloke vasati ca romasamāni vatsarāṇi |
athātaḥ saṃpravakṣyāmi vratānāmuttamaṃ vrataṃ || 43 ||

kathitaṃ tena rudreṇa mahāpātakanāśanam |
naktamabdaṃ caritvā tu gavāsārdhaṃ kuṭuṃbine || 44 ||

haimaṃ cakraṃ triśūlaṃ ca dadyādviprāya vāsasī |
evaṃ yaḥ kurute puṇyaṃ śivaloke sa modate || 45 ||

etadeva vrataṃ nāma mahāpātakanāśanam |
yasvekabhaktena kṣipeddhenuṃ vṛṣasamanvitām || 46 ||

dhenuṃ tilamayīṃ dadyātsa padaṃ yāti śāṃkaram |
etadrudravrataṃ nāma bhayaśokavināśanam || 47 ||

yaśca nīlotpalaṃ haimaṃ śarkarāpātrasaṃyutam |
ekāṃtaritanaktāśī samāṃte vṛṣasaṃyutam || 48 ||

vaiṣṇavaṃ sa padaṃ yāti nīlavratamidaṃ smṛtam |
āṣāḍhādicaturmāsamabhyaṃgaṃ varjayennaraḥ || 49 ||

bhojanopaskaraṃ dadyātsa yāti bhavanaṃ hareḥ |
janaprītikaraṃ nṝṇāṃ prītivratamihocyate || 50 ||

varjayitvā madhau yastu dadhikṣīraghṛtaikṣavam |
dadyādvastrāṇi sūkṣmāṇi rasapātreṇa saṃyutam || 51 ||

saṃpūjya vipramithunaṃ gaurī me prīyatāmiti |
etadgaurīvrataṃ nāma bhavānīlokadāyakam || 52 ||

puṣyādau yastrayodaśyāṃ kṛtvā naktamatho punaḥ |
aśokaṃ kāṃcanaṃ dadyādikṣuyuktaṃ daśāṃgulam || 53 ||

viprāya vastrasaṃyuktaṃ pradyumnaḥ prīyatāmiti |
kalpaṃ viṣṇupure sthitvā viśokassyātpunarnṛpa || 54 ||

etatkāmavrataṃ nāma sadā śokavināśanam |
āṣāḍhādi vrate yastu varjayedyaḥ phalāśanam || 55 ||

cāturmāsye nivṛtte tu ghaṭaṃ sarpirguḍānvitam |
kārtikyāṃ tatpunarhaimaṃ brāhmaṇāya nivedayet || 56 ||

sa rudralokamāpnoti śivavratamidaṃ smṛtam |
varjayedyastu puṣpāṇi hemaṃte śiśirāvṛte || 57 ||

puṣpatrayaṃ ca phālgunyāṃ kṛtvā śaktyā ca kāṃcanam |
dadyāddvikālavelāyāṃ prīyetāṃ śivakeśavau || 58 ||

datvā paraṃ padaṃ yāti saumyavratamidaṃ smṛtam |
phālgunādi tṛtīyāyāṃ lavaṇaṃ yastu varjayet || 59 ||

samāṃte śayanaṃ dadyādgṛhaṃ copaskarānvitam |
saṃpūjya vipramithunaṃ bhavānī prīyatāmiti || 60 ||

gaurīloke vasetkalpaṃ saubhāgyavratamucyate |
saṃdhyāmaunaṃ naraḥ kṛtvā samāṃte ghṛtakuṃbhakam || 61 ||

vastrayugmaṃ tilānghaṃṭāṃ brāhmaṇāya nivedayet |
lokaṃ sārasvataṃ yāti punarāvṛttidurlabham || 62 ||

etatsārasvataṃ nāma rūpavidyāpradāyakam |
lakṣmīmabhyarcya paṃcamyāmupavāsī bhavennaraḥ || 63 ||

samāṃte hemakamalaṃ dadyāddhenusamanvitam |
sa vai viṣṇupadaṃ yāti lakṣmīḥ syājjanmajanmani || 64 ||

etallakṣmīvrataṃ nāma duḥkhaśokavināśanam |
kṛtvopalepanaṃ śaṃbhoragrataḥ keśavasya ca || 65 ||

yāvadabdaṃ punardeyā dhenurjalaghaṭastathā |
janmāyutaṃ sa rājā syāttataḥ śivapuraṃ vrajet || 66 ||

etadāyurvrataṃ nāma sarvakāmapradāyakam |
aśvatthaṃ bhāskaraṃ gaṃgāṃ praṇamyaikāgramānasaḥ || 67 ||

ekabhaktaṃ naraḥ kuryādabdamekaṃ vimatsaraḥ |
vratāṃte vipramithunaṃ pūjyaṃ dhenutrayānvitam || 68 ||

vṛkṣaṃ hiraṇmayaṃ dadyātsośvamedhaphalaṃ labhet |
etatkīrtivrataṃ nāma bhūtikīrtiphalapradam || 69 ||

ghṛtena snapanaṃ kṛtvā śaṃbhorvā keśavasya vā |
akṣatābhiḥ sapuṣpābhiḥ kṛtvā gomayamaṃḍalam || 70 ||

samāṃte hemakamalaṃ tiladhenusamanvitam |
śūlamaṣṭāṃgulaṃ dadyācchivaloke mahīyate || 71 ||

sāmagāyanakaṃ caiva sāmavratamihocyate |
navamyāmekabhaktaṃ tu kṛtvā kanyāśca śaktitaḥ || 72 ||

bhojayitvā samaṃ dadyāddhemakaṃcukavāsasī |
haimaṃ siṃhaṃ ca viprā yadadyācchivapadaṃ vrajet || 73 ||

janmārbudaṃ surūpaḥ syācchatrubhiścāparājitaḥ |
etadvīravrataṃ nāma narāṇāṃ ca sukhapradam || 74 ||

caitrādi caturomāsāñjalaṃ dadyāddayānvitaḥ |
vratāṃte maṇikaṃ dadyādannaṃ vastrasamanvitam || 75 ||

tilapātraṃ hiraṇyaṃ ca brahmaloke mahīyate |
kalpāṃte bhūtijananamānaṃdavratamucyate || 76 ||

paṃcāmṛtena snapanaṃ kṛtvā saṃvatsaraṃ vibhoḥ |
vatsarāṃte punardadyāddhenuṃ paṃcāmṛtānvitāṃ || 77 ||

viprāya dadyācchaṃkhaṃ ca sapadaṃ yāti śāṃkaram |
rājā bhavati kalpāṃte dhṛtivratamidaṃ smṛtam || 78 ||

varjayitvā pumānmāṃsaṃ vratāṃte goprado bhavet |
tadvaddhemamṛgaṃ dadyātsośvamedhaphalaṃ labhet || 79 ||

ahiṃsāvratamityuktaṃ kalpāṃte bhūpatirbhavet |
kalyamutthāya vai snānaṃ kṛtvā dāṃpatyamarcayet || 80 ||

bhojayitvā yathāśakti mālyavastravibhūṣaṇaiḥ |
sūryaloke vasetkalpaṃ sūryavratamidaṃ smṛtam || 81 ||

āṣāḍhādi caturmāsaṃ prātaḥsnāyī bhavennaraḥ |
viprāya bhojanaṃ datvā kārtikyāṃ goprado bhavet || 82 ||

sa vaiṣṇavapadaṃ yāti viṣṇuvratamidaṃ smṛtam |
ayanādayanaṃ yāvadvarjayetpuṣpasarpiṣī || 83 ||

tadaṃte puṣpamannāni ghṛtadhenvā sahaiva tu |
datvā śivapadaṃ yāti viprāya ghṛtapāyasam || 84 ||

etacchīlavrataṃ nāma śīlārogyaphalapradam |
yāvatsamaṃ bhavedyastu paṃcadaśyāṃ payovrataḥ || 85 ||

samāṃte śrāddhakṛddadyādgāśca paṃca payasvinīḥ |
vāsāṃsi ca piśaṃgāni jalakuṃbhayutāni ca || 86 ||
sa yāti vaiṣṇavaṃ lokaṃ pitṝṇāṃ tārayecchatam || 87 ||

kalpāṃte rājarājeṃdra pitṛvratamidaṃ smṛtam |
saṃdhyādīpa prado yastu ghṛtaistailaṃ vivarjayet || 88 ||

samāṃte dīpakaṃ dadyāccakraṃ śūlaṃ ca kāṃcanam |
vastrayugmaṃ ca viprāya sa tejasvī bhavennaraḥ || 89 ||

rudralokamavāpnoti dīptivratamidaṃ smṛtam |
kārtikādi tṛtīyāyāṃ prāśya gomūtra yāvakam || 90 ||

naktaṃ caredabdamekamabdānte goprado bhavet |
gaurīloke vasetkalpaṃ tato rājā bhavediha || 91 ||

etadrudravrataṃ nāma sadā kalyāṇakārakam |
varjayeccaturo māsānyastu gandhānulepanam || 92 ||

śuktigandhākṣatāndadyādviprāya sitavāsasī |
vāruṇaṃ padamāpnoti dṛḍhavratamidaṃ smṛtam || 93 ||

vaiśākhe puṣpalavaṇaṃ varjayedatha gopradaḥ |
bhūtvā viṣṇupade kalpaṃ sthitvā rājā bhavediha || 94 ||

etacchāntivrataṃ nāma kīrtikāmaphalapradam |
brahmāṇḍaṃ kāñcanaṃ kṛtvā tilarāśi samanvitam || 95 ||

ghṛtenānyaprado bhūtvā vahniṃ saṃtarpya sadvijam |
saṃpūjya vipradāṃpatyaṃ mālyavastravibhūṣaṇaiḥ || 96 ||

śaktitastripalādūrdhvaṃ viśvātmā prīyatāmiti |
puṇye'hni dadyādapare brahma yātyapunarbhavam || 97 ||

etadbrahmavrataṃ nāma nirvāṇaphaladaṃ nṛṇām |
yaścobhayamukhīṃ dadyātprabhūtasakalānvitām || 98 ||

dinaṃ payovrataṃ tiṣṭhetsa yāti paramaṃ padam |
etadvai suvrataṃ nāma punarāvṛttidurlabham || 99 ||

tryahaṃ payovrataḥ sthitvā kāñcanaṃ kalpapādapam |
palādūrdhvaṃ yathāśakti taṇḍulaprasthasaṃyutam || 100 ||

dattvā brahmapadaṃ yāti bhīmavratamidaṃ smṛtam |
māsopavāsī yo dadyāddhenuṃ viprāya śobhanām || 101 ||

sa vaiṣṇavapadaṃ yāti bhīmavratamidaṃ smṛtam |
dadyādviṃśatpalādūrdhvaṃ mahīṃ kṛtvā tu kāñcanīm || 102 ||

dinaṃ payovratastiṣṭhedrudraloke mahīyate |
dhanapradamidaṃ proktaṃ saptakalpaśatānugam || 103 ||

māghemāsyatha caitre vā guḍadhenuprado bhavet |
guḍavrataṃ tṛtīyāyāṃ gaurīloke mahīyate || 104 ||

mahāvratamidaṃ nāma paramānandakārakam |
pakṣopavāsī yo dadyādviprāya kapilādvayam || 105 ||

sa brahmalokamāpnoti devāsurasupūjitaḥ |
kalpānte sarvarājā syātprabhāvratamidaṃ smṛtam || 106 ||

vatsaraṃ tvekabhaktāśī sabhakṣyajalakuṃbhadaḥ |
śivaloke vasetkalpaṃ prāptivratamidaṃ smṛtam || 7 ||

naktāśī tvaṣṭamīṣu syādvatsarāṃte tu dhenudaḥ |
pauraṃdaraṃ puraṃ yāti sugativratamucyate || 8 ||

iṃdhanaṃ yo dadedvipre varṣādīṃścaturastvṛtūn |
ghṛtadhenupradoṃte ca sa paraṃ brahma gacchati || 109 ||

vaiśvānaravrataṃ nāma sarvapāpapraṇāśanam |
ekādaśyāṃ tu naktāśī yaścakraṃ vinivedayet || 110 ||

kṛtvā samāṃte sauvarṇaṃ viṣṇoḥ padamavāpnuyāt |
etatkṛṣṇavrataṃ nāma kalpāṃte rājyalābhakṛt || 111 ||

pāyasāśī samāṃte tu dadyādviprāya goyugam |
lakṣmīloke vasetkalpametaddevīvrataṃ smṛtaṃ || 112 ||

saptamyāṃ naktabhugdadyātsamāpte gāṃ payasvinīṃ |
sūryalokamavāpnoti bhānuvratamidaṃ smṛtam || 113 ||

caturthyāṃ naktabhugdadyāddhemaṃte goyugaṃ tathā |
etadvaināyakaṃ nāma śivalokaphalapradam || 114 ||

mahāphalāni yastyaktvā cāturmāsye dvijātaye |
haimāni kārtikedadyāddhomānte goyugaṃ tathā || 115 ||

etatsauravrataṃ nāma sūryalokaphalapradam |
dvādaśādvādaśīryastu samāpyopoṣaṇe nṛpa || 116 ||

govastrakāṃcanairviprānpūjayecchaktito naraḥ |
paraṃ padamavāpnoti viṣṇuvratamidaṃ smṛtam || 117 ||

caturdaśyāṃ tu naktāśī samānte goyugapradaḥ |
śaivaṃ padamavāpnoti traiyaṃbakamidaṃ smṛtam || 118 ||

saptarātroṣito dadyādghṛtakuṃbhaṃ dvijātaye |
varavratamidaṃ prāhurbrahmalokaphalapradam || 119 ||

asau kāśīṃ samāsādya dhenuṃ datte payasvinīm |
śakraloke vasetkalpamidaṃ maṃtravrataṃ smṛtam || 120 ||

mukhavāsaṃ parityajya samāṃte goprado bhavet |
vāruṇaṃ lokamāpnoti vāruṇavratamucyate || 121 ||

cāṃdrāyaṇaṃ ca yaḥ kuryāddhaimaṃ caṃdraṃ nivedayet |
caṃdravratamidaṃ proktaṃ caṃdralokaphalapradam || 122 ||

jyeṣṭhe paṃcatapā yoṃte hemadhenuprado divam |
yātyaṣṭamīcaturdaśyo rudravratamidaṃ smṛtam || 123 ||

sakṛdvidhānakaṃ kuryāttṛtīyāyāṃ śivālaye |
samāpte dhenudo yāti bhavānīvratamucyate || 124 ||

māghe niśyārdravāsāḥ syātsaptamyāṃ goprado bhavet |
divikalpaṃ vasitveha rājā syātpavanavratam || 125 ||

trirātropoṣito dadyātphālgunyāṃ bhavanaṃ śubham |
ādityalokamāpnoti dhāmavratamidaṃ smṛtam || 126 ||

trisaṃdhyaṃ pūjya dāṃpatyamupavāsī vibhūṣaṇaiḥ |
dadanmokṣamavāpnoti mokṣavratamidaṃ smṛtam || 127 ||

dattvāsitadvitīyāyāmiṃdau lavaṇabhājanam |
samāpte goprado yāti viprāya śivamaṃdiram || 128 ||

kāṃsyaṃ savastraṃ rājendra dakṣiṇāsahitaṃ tathā |
samāpte gāṃ ca yo dadyātsa yāti śivamaṃdiram || 129 ||

kalpāṃte rājarājassyātsomavratamidaṃ smṛtam |
pratipatsvekabhaktāśī samāpte ca phalapradaḥ || 130 ||

vaiśvānarapadaṃ yāti śikhivratamidaṃ smṛtam |
haimaṃ paladvayādūrddhvaṃ rathamaśvayugānvitam || 131 ||

dadyātkṛtopavāsaḥ sa divi kalpaśataṃ vaset |
tadaṃte rājarājassyādaśvavratamidaṃ smṛtam || 132 ||

tadvaddhemarathaṃ dadyātkaribhyāṃ saṃyutaṃ punaḥ |
satyaloke vasetkalpaṃ sahasramapi bhūmipaḥ || 133 ||

bhavedihāgato bhūmyāṃ karivratamidaṃ smṛtam |
daśamyāmekabhaktāśī samāpte daśadhenudaḥ || 134 ||

dīpaṃ ca kāṃcanaṃ dadyādbrahmāṇḍādhipatirbhavet |
etadviśvavrataṃ nāma mahāpātakanāśanam || 135 ||

kanyādānaṃ tu kārtikyāṃ puṣkare yaḥ kariṣyati |
ekaviṃśadguṇopeto brahmalokaṃ gamiṣyati || 136 ||

kanyādānātparaṃ dānaṃ naiva cāstyadhikaṃ kvacit |
puṣkare tu viśeṣeṇa kārtikyāṃ tu viśeṣataḥ || 137 ||

viprāya vidhivaddeyaṃ teṣāṃ lokokṣayo bhavet |
tilapiṣṭamayaṃ kṛtvā gajaṃ ratnasamanvitam || 138 ||

viprāya ye prayacchaṃti jalamadhye sthitā narāḥ |
teṣāṃ caivākṣayo loko bhavitā bhūtasaṃplavam || 139 ||

yaḥ paṭhecchṛṇuyādvāpi vrataṣaṣṭhimanuttamām |
manvaṃtaraśataṃ sopi gaṃdharvādhipatirbhavet || 140 ||

ṣaṣṭhivrataṃ bhārata puṇyametattavoditaṃ viśvajanīnamadya |
śrotuṃ yadīcchā tavarājarāja śṛṇu dvijāteḥ karaṇīyametat || 141 ||

nairmalyaṃ bhāvaśuddhiścavināsnānaṃ na vidyate |
tasmānmanoviśuddhyarthaṃ snānamādau vidhīyate || 142 ||

anuddhṛtairuddhṛtairvā jalaiḥ snānaṃ samācaret |
tīrthaṃ prakalpayedvidvānmūlamaṃtreṇa maṃtravit || 143 ||

namo nārāyaṇāyeti mūlamaṃtra udāhṛtaḥ |
sadarbhapāṇirvidhinā ācāṃtaḥ prayataḥ śuciḥ || 144 ||

caturhastasamāyuktaṃ caturaśraṃ samaṃtataḥ |
prakalpyāvāhayedgaṃgāmebhirmaṃtrairvicakṣaṇaḥ || 145 ||

viṣṇoḥ pādaprasūtāsi vaiṣṇavī viṣṇudevatā |
trāhi nastvenasastasmādājanmamaraṇāṃtikāt || 146 ||

tisraḥ koṭyordhakoṭī ca tīrthānāṃ vāyurabravīt |
divi bhuvyaṃtarikṣe ca tāni te saṃti jāhnavi || 147 ||

naṃdinītyeva te nāma deveṣu nalinīti ca |
dakṣā pṛthvī ca subhagā viśvakāyā śivāsitā || 148 ||

vidyādharī suprasannā tathā lokaprasādinī |
kṣemā ca jāhnavī caiva śāṃtā śāṃtipradāyinī || 149 ||

etāni puṇyanāmāni snānakāle prakīrttayet |
bhavetsannihitā tatra gaṃgā tripathagāminī || 150 ||

saptavārābhijaptena karasaṃpuṭayojitam |
mūrdhni kuryājjalaṃ bhūyastricatuḥpaṃcasaptadhā || 151 ||

snānaṃ kuryānmṛdātadvadāmaṃtrya tu vidhānataḥ |
aśvakrāṃte rathakrāṃte viṣṇukrāṃte vasuṃdhare || 152 ||

mṛttike hara me pāpaṃ yanmayā duṣkṛtaṃ kṛtam |
uddhṛtāsi varāheṇa kṛṣṇena śatabāhunā || 153 ||

namaste sarvalokānāṃ prabhavoraṇi suvrate |
evaṃ snātvā tataḥ paścādācamya tu vidhānataḥ || 154 ||

utthāya vāsasī śubhre śuddhe tu paridhāya vai |
tatastu tarpaṇaṃ kuryāttrailokyāpyāyanāya vai || 155 ||

brahmāṇaṃ tarpayetpūrvaṃ viṣṇuṃ rudraṃ prajāpatīn |
devāyakṣāstathā nāgā gaṃdharvāpsarasāṃ gaṇāḥ || 156 ||

krūrāssarpāḥ suparṇāśca taravo jaṃbhakādayaḥ |
vidyādharā jaladharāstathaivākāśagāminaḥ || 157 ||

nirādhārāśca ye jīvā pāpadharmaratāśca ye |
teṣāmāpyāyanāyaitaddīyate salilaṃ mayā || 158 ||

kṛtopavīto devebhyo nivītī ca bhavettataḥ |
manuṣyāṃstarpayedbhaktyā ṛṣiputrānṛṣīṃstathā || 159 ||

sanakaśca sanaṃdaśca tṛtīyaśca sanātanaḥ |
kapilaścāsuriścaiva voḍhuḥ paṃcaśikhastathā || 160 ||

sarve te tṛptimāyāṃtu maddattenāṃbunā sadā |
marīcimatryaṃgirasau pulastyaṃ pulahaṃ kratum || 161 ||

pracetasaṃ vasiṣṭhaṃ ca bhṛguṃ nāradameva ca |
devabrahmaṛṣīnsarvāṃstarpayetsākṣatodakaiḥ || 162 ||

apasavyaṃ tataḥ kṛtvā savyaṃ jānu ca bhūtale |
agniṣvāttāṃstathā saumyānhaviṣmaṃtastathoṣmapān || 163 ||

sukālino barhiṣadastathā caivājyapānpunaḥ |
saṃtarpayetpitṝnbhaktyā satilodakacaṃdanaiḥ || 164 ||

sadarbhapāṇirvidhinā pitṝṃnsvāṃstarpayetattaḥ |
pitrādīnnāmagotreṇa tathā mātāmahānapi || 165 ||

saṃtarpya vidhivadbhaktyā imaṃ maṃtramudīrayet |
yo bāṃdhavā bāṃdhavā ye yenyajanmani bāṃdhavāḥ || 166 ||

te tṛptimakhilāyāṃ tu yepyasmattoyakāṃkṣiṇaḥ |
ācamya vidhinā samyagālikhetpadmamagrataḥ || 167 ||

sākṣatādbhissapuṣpābhiḥ satilāruṇacaṃdanaiḥ |
arghyaṃ dadyātprayatnena sūryanāmānukīrtanaiḥ || 168 ||

namaste viśvarūpāya namaste viṣṇurūpiṇe |
sarvadevanamastestu prasīda mama bhāskara || 169 ||

divākara namastestu prabhākara namostu te |
evaṃ sūryaṃ namaskṛtya triḥ kṛtvā ca pradakṣiṇam || 170 ||

dvijaṃ gāṃ kāṃcanaṃ caiva dṛṣṭvā spṛṣṭvā gṛhaṃ vrajet |
svagehasthāṃ tataḥ puṇyāṃ pratimāṃ cāpi pūjayet || 171 ||

bhojanaṃ ca tataḥ paścāddvijapūrvaṃ ca kārayet |
anena vidhinā sarvaṝṣayaḥ siddhimāgatāḥ || 172 ||

pulastya uvāca |
āsītpurā bṛhatkalpe dharmamūrtirjanādhipaḥ |
suhṛcchakrasya nihatā yena daityāssahasraśaḥ || 1 ||

somasūryādayo yasya tejasā vigataprabhāḥ |
bhavaṃti śataśo yena dānavāśca parājitāḥ || 2 ||

yatheccharūpadhārī ca mānuṣopyaparājitaḥ |
tasya bhānumatī bhāryā satī trailokyasuṃdarī || 3 ||

lakṣmīsadṛśarūpeṇa nirjitāmarasuṃdarī |
rājñastasyāgramahiṣī prāṇebhyopi garīyasī || 4 ||

daśanārīsahasrāṇāṃ madhye śrīriva rājate |
nṛpakoṭisahasreṇa na kadācitsamucyate || 5 ||

kadācidāsthānagataḥ papraccha svapurohitam |
vismayenāvṛto natvā vasiṣṭhamṛṣisattamam || 6 ||

bhagavankena dharmeṇa mama lakṣmīranuttamā |
kasmācca vipulaṃ tejo maccharīre sadottamam || 7 ||

vasiṣṭha uvāca |
purā līlāvatī nāma veśyā śivaparāyaṇā |
tayā dattaścaturdaśyāṃ puṣkare lavaṇācalaḥ || 8 ||

hemavṛkṣāmaraiḥ sārddhaṃ yathāvadvidhipūrvakaṃ |
śūdraḥ suvarṇakāraśca karmakṛtso'bhavattadā || 9 ||

bhṛtyo līlāvatīgehe tena haimā vinirmitāḥ |
taravo hemapuṣpāśca śraddhāyuktena pārthiva || 10 ||

atirūpeṇa saṃpannā ghaṭitāste suśobhanāḥ |
dharmakāryamiti jñātvā na gṛhītaṃ ca vetanam || 11 ||

ujjvālitāśca te patnyā suvarṇamayapādapāḥ |
līlāvatīgṛhe cāpi paricaryā ca pārthiva || 12 ||

kṛtā tābhyāmaśāṭhyena dvijaśuśrūṣaṇādikā |
sā ca līlāvatī veśyā kālena mahatānagha || 13 ||

sarvapāpavinirmuktā jagāma śivamaṃdiram |
yo'sau suvarṇakāraśca daridropyatisattvavān || 14 ||

na mūlyamādādveśyātaḥ sa bhavāniha sāṃpratam |
saptadvīpapatirjātaḥ sūryāyutasamaprabhaḥ || 15 ||

yayā suvarṇakārasya taravo hemanirmitāḥ |
samyagujjvalitāḥ patnyā seyaṃ bhānumatī tava || 16 ||

tasmānnṛlokeṣvaparājitastvamārogyasaubhāgyayutā ca lakṣmīḥ |
tasmāttvamapyatra vidhānapūrvaṃ dhānyācalādīnnṛpate kuruṣva || 17 ||

pulastya uvāca |
tatheti saṃpūjya sudharmamūrtirvaco vasiṣṭhasya dadau ca sarvān |
dhānyācalādīnvidhināsmarārerlokaṃ gatosau surapūjyamānaḥ || 18 ||

paśyedyadīmānupanīyamānānspṛśenmanuṣyairiha dīyamānān |
śṛṇoti bhaktyātha matiṃ dadāti vikalmaṣaḥ sopi divaṃ prayāti || 19 ||

duḥsvapnapraśamamupaiti paṭhyamānaiḥ śaileṃdrairbhavabhayabhedanairmanuṣyaḥ |
yaḥ kuryātkimu nṛpapuṃgaveha samyakśāṃtātmā sakalagirīṃdrasaṃpradānam || 20 ||

bhīṣma uvāca |
kimabhīṣṭaviyogaśokasaṃdhānalamuddhartumupoṣaṇaṃ vrataṃ vā |
vibhavadhruvakāribhūtalesminbhavabhīterapi sūdanaṃ ca puṃsaḥ || 21 ||

pulastya uvāca |
paripṛṣṭamidaṃ jagatpriyaṃ te vibudhānāmapi durlabhaṃ mahattvāt |
tava bhaktimatastathāpi vakṣye vratamiṃdrāsuramānaveṣu guhyam || 22 ||

puṇyamāśvayuje māsi viśokadvādaśīvratam |
daśamyāṃ laghubhugvidvānprārabheta yamena tu || 23 ||

udaṅmukhaḥ prāṅmukho vā daṃtadhāvanapūrvakam |
ekādaśyāṃ nirāhāraḥ samyagabhyarcya keśavam || 24 ||

śriyaṃ cābhyarcya vidhivadbhokṣye'haṃ cāparehani |
evaṃ niyamakṛtsuptvā prātarutthāya mānavaḥ || 25 ||

snānaṃ sarvauṣadhaiḥ kuryātpaṃcagavyajalena tu |
śubhramālyāṃbaradharaḥpūjayecchrīśamutpalaiḥ || 26 ||

viśokāya namaḥ pādau jaṃghe ca varadāya vai |
śrīśāya jānunī tadvadūrū ca jalaśāyine || 27 ||

kaṃdarpāya namo guhyaṃ mādhavāya namaḥ kaṭiṃ |
dāmodarāyetyudaraṃ pārśve ca vipulāyavai || 28 ||

nābhiṃ ca padmanābhāya hṛdayaṃ manmathāya vai |
śrīdharāya vibhorvakṣaḥ karau madhubhide namaḥ || 29 ||

vaikuṇṭhāya namaḥ kaṃṭhamāsyaṃ padmamukhāyavai |
nāsāmaśokanidhaye vāsudevāya cākṣiṇī || 30 ||

lalāṭaṃ vāmanāyeti haraye ca punarbhruvau |
alakaṃ mādhavāyeti kirīṭaṃ viśvarūpiṇe || 31 ||

namaḥ sarvātmane tadvacchira ityabhipūjayet |
evaṃ saṃpūjya goviṃdaṃ dhūpamālyānulepanaiḥ || 32 ||

tatastu maṃḍalaṃ kṛtvā sthaṃḍilaṃ kārayenmṛdā |
caturaśraṃ samaṃtācca ratnimātramudakplavam || 33 ||

ślakṣṇaṃ hṛdyaṃ ca parito vapratrayasamāvṛtam |
triraṃgulocchritāvaprāstadvistāro dviraṃgulaḥ || 34 ||

sthaṃḍilasyopariṣṭāttu bhittiraṣṭāṃgulā bhavet |
nadī vālukayā sūrye lakṣmyāḥ pratikṛtiṃ nyaset || 35 ||

sthaṃḍile sūryamadhyastha lakṣmīmabhyarcayedbudhaḥ |
namo devyai namaḥ śāṃtyai namo lakṣmyai namaḥ śriye || 36 ||

namastuṣṭyai namaḥ puṣṭyai sṛṣṭyai dṛṣṭyai namo namaḥ |
viśokā duḥkhanāśā yaviśokā varadāstu te || 37 ||

viśokā mestu saṃpattyai viśokā sarvasiddhaye |
tataḥ śubhrāṃbaraiḥ sūryaṃ veṣṭya saṃpūjayetphalaiḥ || 38 ||

bhakṣyairnānāvidhaistadvatsuvarṇakamalena ca |
rājatīṣu ca pātrīṣu nyaseddarbhodakaṃ budhaḥ || 39 ||

tatastu nṛtyagītāni kārayetsakalāṃ niśām |
yāmatraye vyatīte tu tata utthāya mānavaḥ || 40 ||

abhigamya ca viprāṇāṃ mithunāni ca pūjayet |
śaktitastrīṇi caikaṃ vā vastramālyānulepanaiḥ || 41 ||

śayanasthāni pūjyāni namostu jalaśāyine |
tatastu gītavādyena rātryāṃ jāgaraṇe kṛte || 42 ||

prabhāte ca tataḥ snānaṃ kṛtvā dāṃpatyamarcayet |
bhojayecca yathāśakti vittaśāṭhyena varjitaḥ || 43 ||

bhaktyāśrutvāpurāṇānitaddinaṃcātivāhayet |
anena vidhinā sarvaṃ māsimāsi samācaret || 44 ||

vratāṃte śayanaṃ dadyādguḍadhenusamanvitaṃ |
sopadhānaṃ saviśrāmaṃ svāstarāvaraṇaṃ śubhaṃ || 45 ||

yathālakṣmīrnareśa tvāṃ na parityajya gacchati |
tathā surūpatārogyamaśokaṃ cāstu me sadā || 46 ||

yathā devena rahitā na lakṣmīrjāyate kvacit |
tathā viśokatā me'stu bhaktiragyrā ca keśave || 47 ||

maṃtreṇānena śayanaṃ guḍadhenusamanvitaṃ |
sūryaśca lakṣmyā sahito dātavyo bhūtimicchatā || 48 ||

utpalaṃ karavīraṃ vāpyamlānaṃ caiva kuṃkumaṃ |
ketakaṃ siṃdhuvāraṃ ca mallikāgaṃdhapāṭalā || 49 ||

kadaṃbaṃ kubjakaṃ jātī śastānyetāni sarvadā |
bhīṣma uvāca |
guḍadhenuvidhānaṃ ca samācakṣva munīśvara || 50 ||

kiṃ rūpā kena maṃtreṇa dātavyā tadihocyatāṃ |
pulastya uvāca |
guḍadhenuvidhānasya yadrūpamiha yatphalam || 51 ||

tadidānīṃ pravakṣyāmi sarvapāpavināśanam |
kṛṣṇājinaṃ caturhastaṃ prāggrīvaṃ vinyasedbhuvi || 52 ||

gomayenānuliptāyāṃ darbhānāstīrya sarvataḥ |
laghveṇakājinaṃ tadvatvatsaṃ ca parikalpayet || 53 ||

prāṅmukhīṃ kalpayeddhenuṃ mṛdā vā gāṃ savatsakāṃ |
uttamā guḍadhenuḥ syātsadā bhāracatuṣṭayaṃ || 54 ||

vatsaṃ bhāreṇa kurvīta bhārābhyāṃ madhyamā smṛtā |
arddhabhāreṇa vatsassyātkaniṣṭhā bhārakeṇa tu || 55 ||

caturthāṃśe navatsaḥ syādgṛhavittānusārataḥ |
dhenuvatsau kṛtau cobhau sitasūkṣmāṃbarāvṛtau || 56 ||

śuktikarṇāvikṣupādau śucimuktāphalekṣaṇau |
sitasūtrasirājālau sitakaṃbalakaṃbalau || 57 ||

tāmragaṃḍakapṛṣṭhau dvau sitacāmaralomakau |
vidrumabhrūyugāvetau navanītastanānvitau || 58 ||

kāñcanākṣiyugopetāvindranīlakanīnikau |
kṣaumapucchau kāṃsyadohau śubhrātikamanīyakau || 59 ||

suvarṇaśṛṃgābharaṇau rājatāḍhya khurau ca tau |
nānāphalasamāyuktau ghrāṇagaṃdhakaraṃḍakau || 60 ||

ityevaṃ racayitvā tu dhūpadīpaistathārcayet |
yā lakṣmīssarvabhūtānāṃ yā ca deveṣvavasthitā || 61 ||

dhenurūpeṇa sā devī mama pāpaṃ vyapohatu |
viṣṇorvakṣasi yā lakṣmīḥ svāhā yā ca vibhāvasau || 62 ||

caṃdrārkaśakraśaktiryā sā dhenurvaradāstu me |
svadhā tvaṃ pitṛmukhyānāṃ svāhā yajñabhujāṃ yataḥ || 63 ||

sarvapāpaharā dhenustasmādbhūtiṃ prayaccha me |
evamāmaṃtrya tāṃ dhenuṃ brāhmaṇāya nivedayet || 64 ||

vidhānametaddhenūnāṃ sarvāsāmapi paṭhyate |
yāstu pāpavināśinyaḥ paṭhyaṃte daśa dhenavaḥ || 65 ||

tāsāṃ svarūpaṃ vakṣyāmi nāmāni ca narādhipa |
prathamā guḍadhenuḥ syādghṛtadhenurathāparā || 66 ||

tiladhenustṛtīyā ca caturthī jalanāmikā |
kṣīradhenuḥ paṃcamī ca madhudhenustathāparā || 67 ||

saptamī śarkarādhenuraṣṭamī dadhikalpitā |
rasadhenuśca navamī daśamī syātsvarūpataḥ || 68 ||

kuṃbhāssyū rasadhenūnāmitarāsāṃ svarāśayaḥ |
suvarṇadhenuṃ cāpyatra kecidicchaṃti mānavāḥ || 69 ||

navanītena tailaiśca tathānyepi maharṣayaḥ |
etadevavidhānaṃ syātta evopaskarāssmṛtāḥ || 70 ||

maṃtrāvāhanasaṃyuktāḥ sadā parvaṇi parvaṇi |
yathā śrāddhaṃ pradātavyā bhuktimuktiphalapradāḥ || 71 ||

guḍadhenuprasaṃgena sarvāstava mayoditāḥ |
aśeṣayajñaphaladāḥ sarvapāpaharāḥ śubhāḥ || 72 ||

vratānāmuttamaṃ yasmādviśokadvādaśīvratam |
tadaṃgatvena caivātra guḍadhenuḥ praśasyate || 73 ||

ayane viṣuve puṇye vyatīpāte tathā punaḥ |
guḍadhenvādayo deyā uparāgādiparvasu || 74 ||

viśokadvādaśī caiṣā sarvapāpaharā śubhā |
yāmupoṣya naro yāti tadviṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padam || 75 ||

ihaloke sa saubhāgyamāyurārogyameva ca |
vaiṣṇavaṃ puramāpnoti maraṇe smaraṇaṃ hareḥ || 76 ||

navārbudasahasrāṇi daśa cāṣṭau ca dharmavit |
na śokaduḥkhadaurgatyaṃ tasya saṃjāyate nṛpa || 77 ||

nārī vā kurute yā tu viśokadvādaśīmimāṃ |
nṛtyagītaparā nityaṃ sāpi tatphalamāpnuyāt || 78 ||

yasmādagre harernṛtyamanantaṃ gītavādanam |
iti paṭhati ya itthaṃ yaḥ śṛṇotīha samyak |
madhumuranarakārerarcanaṃ vātha paśyet || 79 ||

matimapi ca janānāṃ yo dadātīndraloke |
sa vasati vibudhaughaiḥ pūjyate kalpamekam |
bhīṣma uvāca |
bhagavanśrotumicchāmi dānamāhātmyamuttamam || 80 ||

yadakṣayaṃ pare loke devarṣigaṇapūjitam |
pulastya uvāca |
meroḥ pradānaṃ vakṣyāmi daśadhā nṛpasattama || 81 ||

yatpradātānaṃtalokānprāpnoti surapūjitān |
purāṇeṣu ca vedeṣu yajñeṣvāyataneṣu ca || 82 ||

na tatphalamadhīteṣu kṛteṣviha yadaśnute |
tasmāddānaṃ pravakṣyāmi parvatānāmanukramāt || 83 ||

prathamo dhānyaśailaḥ syādidvatīyo lavaṇācalaḥ |
guḍācalastṛtīyastu caturtho hemaparvataḥ || 84 ||

paṃcamastilaśailassyātṣaṣṭaḥ kārppāsaparvataḥ |
saptamo ghṛtaśailaḥ syādratnaśailastathāṣṭamaḥ || 85 ||

rājato navamastadvaddaśamaḥ śarkarācalaḥ |
vakṣye vidhānameteṣāṃ yathāvadanupūrvaśaḥ || 86 ||

ayano vepuṇye vyatīpāte dinakṣaye |
śuklapakṣe tṛtīyāyāmuparāgeśa śikṣaye || 87 ||

vivāhotsavayajñeṣu dvādaśyāmathavā punaḥ |
śuklāyāṃ paṃcadaśyāṃ vā puṇyarkṣe vā vidhānataḥ || 88 ||

dhānyaśailādayo deyāḥ kārtikyāṃ jyeṣṭhapuṣkare |
tīrtheṣvāyatane vāpi goṣṭhe vā bhavanāṃgaṇe || 89 ||

maṃḍapaṃ kārayedbhaktyā caturaśramudaṅmukham |
prāgudakpravaṇaṃ puṇyaṃ prāṅmukhaṃ vā vidhānataḥ || 90 ||

gomayenānuliptāyāṃ bhūmāvāstīrya vai kuśān |
tanmadhye parvataṃ kuyādviṣkaṃbhaṃ parvatānvitam || 91 ||

dhānyadroṇasahasreṇa bhavedgiririhottamaḥ |
madhyamaḥ paṃcaśatakaiḥ kaniṣṭhaśca tribhiḥ śataiḥ || 92 ||

merurmahāvrīhimayastu madhye suvarṇavṛkṣatrayasaṃyutaḥ syāt |
mūrddhanyavasthānamathāṃbareṇa kāryaṃ tvanekaṃ ca punardvijāgryaiḥ || 93 ||

catvāri śṛṃgāṇi ca rājatāni nitaṃbabhāgā api rājatāssyuḥ |
pūrveṇa muktāphalavajrayukto yāmyena gomedakapadmarāgaiḥ || 94 ||

paścācca gārutmatanīlaratnaiḥ saumyena vaiḍūryakapuṣparāgaiḥ |
śrīkhaṃḍakhaṃḍairabhitaḥ pravālairlatānvito mauktikaprastarāḍhyaḥ || 95 ||

brahmātha viṣṇurbhagavānpurārirdivākaropyatra hiraṇmayaḥ syāt |
tathekṣuvaṃśāvṛtakaṃdarastu ghṛtodakaprasravaṇo diśāsu || 96 ||

śubhrāṃbarāṇyaṃbudharāvalisyātpūrveṇa pītāni ca dakṣiṇena |
vāsāṃsi paścādatha karburāṇi raktāni caivottarato ghanāni || 97 ||

raupyānmaheṃdrapramukhāṃstathā'ṣṭau saṃsthāpya lokādhipatīnkrameṇa |
nānāvanālī ca samaṃtataḥ syānmanoramammālyavilepanaṃ ca || 98 ||

vitānakaṃ copari paṃcavarṇamamlānapuṣpābharaṇaṃ sitaṃ ca |
itthaṃ niveśyāmaraśailamagryaṃ merostu viṣkaṃbhagirīnkrameṇa || 99 ||

turīyabhāgena caturdiśaṃ ca saṃsthāpayetpuṣpavilepanāḍhyam |
pūrveṇa maṃdaramanekaphalaiścayuktaṃ kāmena kāṃcanamayena virājamānam || 100 ||

yāmyena gaṃdhamadano viniveśanīyo godhūmasaṃcayamayaḥ kaladhautavāṃśca |
haimena yajñapatinā ghṛtamānasena vastreṇarājatavanaiśca sa saṃyutaḥ syāt || 101 ||

paścāttilācalamanekasugaṃdhapuṣpasauvarṇapippalahiraṇmayahaṃsayuktam |
ākārayedrajatapuṣpavanena tadvadvastrānvitaṃ dadhisitodasarastathāgre || 102 ||

saṃsthāpyataṃ vipulaśailamathottareṇa śailaṃ supārśvamapi māṣamayaṃ savastram |
puṣpaiśca hemavaṭapādapaśekharaṃ tamākārayetkanakaketuvirājamānam || 103 ||

mākṣīkabhadrasarasā ca vanena tadvadraupyeṇa bhāsuravitānayutaṃ vidhāya |
homaścaturbhiratha vedapurāṇavidbhirdāṃtairaniṃdyacaritākṛtibhirdvijeṃdraiḥ || 104 ||

pūrveṇa hastamitamatra vidhāya kuṃḍaṃ kāryastilairyavaghṛtena samitkuśaiśca |
rātrau ca jāgaramanuddhatagītarūpairāvāhanaṃ ca kathayāmi śiloccayānām || 105 ||

tvaṃ sarvadevagaṇadhāmanidhe viruddhamasmadgṛheṣvamaraparvata nāśayāśu |
kṣemaṃ vidhatsva kuru śāṃtimanuttamāṃ ca saṃpūjitaḥ paramabhaktimatā mayā hi || 106 ||

tvameva bhagavānīśo brahmā viṣṇurdivākaraḥ |
mūrtāmūrtamayaṃ bījamataḥ pāhi sanātana || 107 ||

yasmāttvaṃ lokapālānāṃ viśvamūrteśca maṃdiram |
rudrādityavasūnāṃ ca tasmācchāntiṃ prayaccha me || 108 ||

yasmādaśūnyamamarairnārībhiśca śirastava |
tasmānmāmuddharāmuṣmādduḥkhasaṃsārasāgarāt || 109 ||

evamabhyarcya taṃ meruṃ maṃdaraṃ cābhipūjayet |
yasmāccaitrarathena tvaṃ bhadrāśvena ca parvata || 110 ||

śobhase maṃdara kṣipramatastuṣṭikaro bhava |
yasmāccūḍāmaṇirjaṃbūdvīpe tvaṃ gaṃdhamādana || 111 ||

gaṃdharvagaṇaśobhāvāṃstataḥ kīrtirdṛḍhāstu me |
yasmāttvaṃ ketumālena vaibhrājena vanena ca || 112 ||

hiraṇmayāśmaśobhāvāṃstasmātpuṣṭirdhruvāstu me |
uttaraiḥ kurubhiryasmātsāvitreṇa vanena ca || 113 ||

supārśva rājase nityamataḥ śrīrakṣayāstu me |
evamāmaṃtrya tānsarvānprabhāte vimale punaḥ || 114 ||

snātvā tu gurave dadyānmadhyamaṃ parvatottamaṃ |
viṣkaṃbhaparvatāndadyādṛtvigbhyaḥ kramaśo nṛpa || 115 ||

gāvo deyāścaturviṃśadathavā daśa pārthiva |
śaktitaḥ saptacāṣṭau vā paṃca dadyādaśaktimān || 116 ||

ekāpi gurave deyā kapilātha payasvinī |
parvatānāmaśeṣāṇāmeṣa eva vidhiḥ smṛtaḥ || 117 ||

ta eva pūjane maṃtrāsta evopaskarāḥ smṛtāḥ |
grahāṇāṃ lokapālānāṃ brahmādīnāṃ ca sarvataḥ || 18 ||

svamaṃtreṇaiva sarveṣu homaḥ śaileṣu paṭhyate |
upavāsī bhavennityamaśaktau naktamiṣyate || 119 ||

vidhānaṃ sarvaśailānāṃ kramaśaḥ śṛṇu pārthiva |
dāneṣu caiva ye maṃtrāḥ parvateṣu yathā phalam || 120 ||

annaṃ brahma yataḥ proktamannaṃ prāṇāḥ prakīrtitāḥ |
annādbhavaṃti bhūtāni jagadannena vardhate || 121 ||

annameva yato lakṣmīrannameva janārdanaḥ |
dhānyaparvatarūpeṇa pāhi tasmānnagottama || 122 ||

anena vidhinā yastu dadyāddhānyamayaṃ girim |
manvaṃtaraśataṃ sāgraṃ devaloke mahīyate || 123 ||

apsarogaṇagaṃdharvairākīrṇena virājitaḥ |
vimānena divaḥ pṛṣṭhamāyāti nṛpasattama || 124 ||

karmakṣaye rājarājyamāpnotīha na saṃśayaḥ |
athātaḥ saṃpravakṣyāmi lavaṇācalamuttamam || 125 ||

yatpradānānnaro lokamāpnoti śivasaṃyutam |
uttamaḥ ṣoḍaśadroṇaiḥ kartavyo lavaṇācalaḥ || 126 ||

madhyamaśca tadardhena caturbhiradhamassmṛtaḥ |
vittahīno yathāśakti droṇādūrddhvaṃ ca kārayet || 127 ||

caturthāṃśena viṣkaṃbhaparvatānkārayetpṛthak |
vidhānaṃ pūrvavatkuryādbrahmādīnāṃ ca sarvadā || 128 ||

tadvaddhemamayaṃ sarvalokapālaniveśanam |
sarāṃsi vanavṛkṣādi tadvaccānyānniniveśayet || 129 ||

kuryājjāgaramatrāpi dānamaṃtrānnibodhata |
saubhāgyarasasaṃyukto yatoyaṃ lavaṇe rasaḥ || 130 ||

tadātmakatvena ca māṃ pāhyāpannaṃ nagottama |
yasmādanye rasāḥ sarve notkaṭā lavaṇaṃ vinā || 131 ||

priyaśca śivayornityaṃ tasmācchāṃtiprado bhava |
viṣṇudehasamudbhūto yasmādārogyavardhanaḥ || 132 ||

tasmātparvatarūpeṇa pāhi saṃsārasāgarāt |
anena vidhinā yastu dadyāllavaṇaparvatam || 133 ||

umāloke vasetkalpaṃ tato yāti parāṃ gatim |
ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi guḍaparvatamuttamam || 134 ||

yatpradānānnaraḥ svargaṃ prāpnoti surapūjitaḥ |
uttamo daśabhirbhārairmadhyamaḥ paṃcabhirmataḥ || 135 ||

tribhirbhāraiḥ kaniṣṭhaḥ syāttadardhenālpavittavān |
tadvadāmaṃtraṇaṃ pūjāṃ haimavṛkṣānsurārcanaṃ || 136 ||

viṣkaṃbhaparvatāṃstadvatsarāṃsi vanadevatāḥ |
homaṃ jāgaraṇaṃ tadvallokapālādhivāsanam || 137 ||

dhānyaparvatavatkuryādimaṃ maṃtramudīrayet |
yathā deveṣu viśvātmā pravaroyaṃ janārdanaḥ || 138 ||

sāmavedastu vedānāṃ mahādevastu yogināṃ |
praṇavaḥ sarvamaṃtrāṇāṃ nārīṇāṃ pārvatī yathā || 139 ||

tathā rasānāṃ pravaraḥ sadaivekṣuraso mataḥ |
mama tasmātparāṃ lakṣmīṃ dadātu guḍaparvataḥ || 140 ||

yasmātsaubhāgyadāyinyā dhāma tvaṃ guḍaparvata |
nirmitaścāsi pārvatyā tasmānmāṃ pāhi sarvadā || 141 ||

anena vidhinā yastu dadyādguḍamayaṃ girim |
saṃpūjyamāno gaṃdharvairgaurīloke mahīyate || 142 ||

punaḥ kalpaśatāṃte ca saptadvīpādhipo bhavet |
āyurārogyasaṃpannaḥ śatrubhiścāparājitaḥ || 143 ||

atha pāpaharaṃ vakṣye suvarṇācalamuttamam |
yasya pradānādbhavanaṃ vairiṃcaṃ yāṃti mānavāḥ || 144 ||

uttamaḥ palasāhasro madhyamaḥ paṃcabhiḥ śataiḥ |
tadardhenādhamastadvadalpavittopi mānavaḥ || 145 ||

dadyādekapalādūrddhvaṃ yathāśakti vimatsaraḥ |
dhānyaparvatavatsarvaṃ vidadhyādrājasattama || 146 ||

viṣkaṃbhaśailāṃstadvacca ṛtvigbhyaḥ pratipādayet |
namaste sarvabījāya brahmagarbhāya vai namaḥ || 147 ||

yasmādanaṃtaphaladastasmātpāhi śiloccaya |
yasmādagnerapatyaṃ tvaṃ yasmātputro jagatpateḥ || 148 ||

hemaparvatarūpeṇa tasmātpāhi nagottama |
anena vidhinā yastu dadyātkanakaparvatam || 149 ||

sa yāti paramaṃ brahma lokamānaṃdakārakam |
tatra kalpaśataṃ tiṣṭhettato yāti parāṃ gatim || 150 ||

athātaḥ saṃpravakṣyāmi tilaśailaṃ vidhānataḥ |
yatpradānānnaro yāti viṣṇulokamanuttamam || 151 ||

uttamo daśabhirdroṇairmadhyamaḥ paṃcabhiḥ smṛtaḥ |
tribhiḥ kaniṣṭho rājeṃdra tilaśailaḥ prakīrtitaḥ || 152 ||

pūrvavaccāparaṃ sarvaṃ viṣkaṃbhaparvatādikam |
dānamaṃtraṃ pravakṣyāmi yathā ca nṛpapuṃgava || 153 ||

yasmānmadhuvadhe viṣṇordehasvedasamudbhavāḥ |
tilāḥ kuśāśca māṣāśca tasmācchāṃtiprado bhava || 154 ||

havyakavyeṣu yasmācca tilā eva hi rakṣaṇam |
lakṣmīṃ ca kuru śaileṃdra tilācala namostu te || 155 ||

ityāmaṃtrya ca yo dadyāttilācalamanuttamam |
sa vaiṣṇavaṃ padaṃ yāti punarāvṛttidurlabham || 156 ||

kārpāsaparvataścaiva viṃśadbhārairihottamaḥ |
daśabhirmadhyamaḥ proktaḥ kaniṣṭhaḥ paṃcabhirmataḥ || 157 ||

bhāreṇālpadhano dadyādvittaśāṭhyavivarjitaḥ |
dhānyaparvatavatsarvamāsādyaṃ rājasattama || 158 ||

prabhātāyāṃ ca śarvaryāṃ dadyādidamudīrayet |
tvamevāvaraṇaṃ yasmāllokānāmiha sarvadā || 159 ||

kārpāsādre namastasmādaghaugha dhvaṃsano bhava |
iti kārpāsaśaileṃdraṃ yo dadyāccharvasaṃnidhau || 160 ||

rudraloke vasetkalpaṃ tato rājā bhavediha |
athātaḥ saṃpravakṣyāmi ghṛtācalamanuttamam || 161 ||

tejomayaṃ ghṛtaṃ puṇyaṃmahāpātakanāśanam |
viṃśatyā ghṛtakuṃbhānāmuttamaḥ syādghṛtācalaḥ || 162 ||

daśabhirmadhyamaḥ proktaḥ paṃcabhistvadhamaḥ smṛtaḥ |
alpavittopi kurvīta dvābhyāmiha vidhānataḥ || 163 ||

viṣkambhaparvatāṃstadvaccaturbhāgena kalpayet |
śālitaṃḍulapātrāṇi kuṃbhopari niveśayet || 164 ||

kārayetsaṃhatānuccānyathāśobhaṃ vidhānataḥ |
veṣṭayecchuklavāsobhirikṣudaṃḍaphalādikaiḥ || 165 ||

dhānyaparvatavatsaṃrvaṃ vidhānamiha paṭhyate |
adhivāsanapūrvaṃ hi tadvaddhomasurārcanam || 166 ||

prabhātāyāṃ ca śarvaryāṃ gurave vinivedayet |
viṣkaṃbhaparvatāṃstadvadṛtvigbhyaḥ śāṃtamānasaḥ || 167 ||

saṃyogādghṛtamutpannaṃ yasmādamṛtatejasi |
tasmādghṛtārcirviśvātmā prīyatāmatra śaṃkara || 168 ||

yasmāttejomayaṃ brahma ghṛte caiva vyavasthitam |
ghṛtaparvatarūpeṇa tasmānnaḥ pāhi bhūdhara || 169 ||

anena vidhinā dadyādghṛtācalamanuttamam |
mahāpātakayuktopi lokamāyāti śāṃbhavam || 170 ||

haṃsasārasayuktena kiṃkiṇījālamālinā |
vimānenāpsarobhiśca siddhavidyādharairvṛtaḥ || 171 ||

vicaretpitṛbhiḥ sārdhaṃ yāvadābhūtasaṃplavam |
athātaḥ saṃpravakṣyāmi ratnācalamanuttamam || 172 ||

muktāphalasahasreṇa parvatassyādanuttamaḥ |
madhyamaḥ paṃcaśatikastriśatenādhamaḥ smṛtaḥ || 173 ||

caturthāṃśena viṣkaṃbha parvatāḥ syuḥ samantataḥ |
pūrveṇa vajragomedairdakṣiṇeneṃdranīlakaiḥ || 174 ||

puṣyarāgairyutaḥ kāryo vidvadbhirgaṃdhamādanaḥ |
vaiḍūryavidrumaiḥ paścātsaṃmiśro vipulācalaḥ || 175 ||

padmarāgaiḥ sa sauvarṇairuttareṇāpi vinyaset |
dhānyaparvatavatsarvamatrāpi parikalpayet || 176 ||

tadvadāvāhanaṃ kṛtvā vṛkṣāndevāṃśca kāṃcanān |
pūjayetpuṣpagandhādyaiḥ prabhāte syādvisarjanam || 177 ||

pūrvavadguruṛtvigbhya imaṃ maṃtramudīrayet |
yathā devagaṇāḥ sarve sarvaratneṣvavasthitāḥ || 178 ||

tvaṃ ca ratnamayo nityamataḥ pāhi mahācala |
yasmādratnapradānena tuṣṭimeti janārdanaḥ || 179 ||

pūjāmaṃtraprasādena tasmānnaḥ pāhi parvata |
anena vidhinā yastu dadyādratnamayaṃ girim || 180 ||

sa yāti vaiṣṇavaṃ lokamamareśvarapūjitaḥ |
yāvatkalpaśataṃ sāgraṃ vasettatra narādhipa || 181 ||

rūpārogyaguṇopetaḥ saptadvīpādhipo bhavet |
brahmahatyādikaṃ kiṃcidatrāmutrāthavā kṛtam || 182 ||

tatsarvaṃ nāśamāyāti girirvajrāhato yathā |
athātaḥ saṃpravakṣyāmi raupyācalamanuttamam || 183 ||

yatpradānānnaro yāti somalokaṃ narottama |
daśabhiḥ palasāhasrairuttamo rajatācalaḥ || 184 ||

paṃcabhirmadhyamaḥ proktastadardhenādhamaḥ smṛtaḥ |
aśakto viṃśaterūrddhvaṃ kārayecchaktitaḥ sadā || 185 ||

viṣkaṃbhaparvatāṃstadvatturīyāṃśena kalpayet |
pūrvavadrājatānkuryānmaṃdarādīnvidhānataḥ || 186 ||

kaladhautamayāṃstadvallokeśānkārayedbudhaḥ |
brahmaviṣṇvarkavānkāryo nitaṃbotra hiraṇmayaḥ || 187 ||

rājataṃ syāttadanyeṣāṃ parvatāṃnā ca kāṃcanam |
śeṣaṃ ca pūrvavatkuryāddhomajāgaraṇādikam || 188 ||

dadyāttadvatprabhāte tu gurave raupyaparvatam |
viṣkaṃbhaśailānṛtvigbhyaḥ pūjya vastravibhūṣaṇaiḥ || 189 ||

imaṃ maṃtraṃ paṭhandadyāddarbhapāṇirvimatsaraḥ |
pitṝṇāṃ vallabhaṃ yasmādindorvā śaṃkarasya ca || 190 ||

rajataṃ pāhi tasmānnaḥ śokasaṃsārasāgarāt |
itthaṃ niveśya yo dadyādrajatācalamuttamam || 191 ||

gavāmayutasāhasraphalamāpnoti mānavaḥ |
somaloke sagaṃdharvaiḥ kinnarāpsarasāṃgaṇaiḥ || 192 ||

pūjyamāno vasedvidvānyāvadābhūtasaṃplavam |
athātaḥ saṃpravakṣyāmi śarkarācalamuttamam || 193 ||

yasya pradānādviṣṇvarkarudrāstuṣyaṃti sarvadā |
aṣṭabhiḥ śarkarābhārairuttamaḥ syānmahācalaḥ || 194 ||

caturbhirmadhyamaḥ prokto bhārābhyāmadhamaḥ smṛtaḥ |
bhāreṇa cārddhabhāreṇakuryādyaḥ svalpavittavān || 195 ||

viṣkaṃbhaparvatānkuryātturīyāṃśena mānavaḥ |
dhānyaparvatavatsarvaṃ haimāṃbarasusaṃyutam || 196 ||

meroruparitaḥ sthāpyaṃ haimaṃ tatra tarutrayam |
maṃdāraḥ pārijātaśca tṛtīyaḥ kalpapādapaḥ || 197 ||

etadvṛkṣatrayaṃ mūrdhni sarveṣvapi niveśayet |
haricaṃdanasaṃtānau pūrvapaścimabhāgayoḥ || 198 ||

niveśyau sarvaśaileṣu viśeṣāccharkarācale |
maṃdare kāmadevastu pratyagvaktraḥ sadā bhavet || 199 ||

gaṃdhamādanaśṛṃge tu dhanadaḥ syādudaṅmukhaḥ |
prāṅmukho vedamūrttistu haṃsaḥ syādvipulācale || 200 ||

haimī bhavetsupārśve tu surabhī dakṣiṇāmukhī |
dhānyaparvatavatsarvamāvāhanamakhādikam || 201 ||

kṛtvātha gurave dadyānmadhyamaṃ parvatottamam |
ṛtvigbhyaścaturaḥ śailānimānmaṃtrānudīrayet || 202 ||

saubhāgyāmṛtasāroyaṃ paramaḥ śarkarācalaḥ |
tasmādānaṃdakārī tvaṃ bhavaśaileṃdra sarvadā || 203 ||

amṛtaṃ pibatāṃ ye tu patitā bhuvi śīkarāḥ |
devānāṃ tatsamutthastvaṃ pāhi naḥ śarkarācala || 204 ||

manobhavadhanurmadhyādudbhūtā śarkarā punaḥ |
tanmayosi mahāśaila pāhi saṃsārasāgarāt || 205 ||

yo dadyāccharkarāśailamanena vidhinā naraḥ |
sarvapāpavinirmuktaḥ prayāti brahmamaṃdiram || 206 ||

caṃdrasūryapratīkāśamadhiruhyānujīvibhiḥ |
sahaiva yānamuttiṣṭhettato viṣṇuprabho divi || 207 ||

tataḥ kalpaśatāṃte tu saptadvīpādhipo bhavet |
āyurārogyasaṃpanno yāvajjanmāyutatrayam || 208 ||

bhojanaṃ śaktitaḥ kuryātsarvaśaileṣvamatsaraḥ |
svayaṃ cākṣāralavaṇamaśnīyāttadanujñayā || 209 ||

parvatopaskarānsarvānprāpayedbrāhmaṇālayam |
etatte sarvamākhyātaṃ śailadānamanuttamam || 210 ||

yadanyadrocate tubhyaṃ tanmāṃ pṛcchasva pārthiva |
bhīṣma uvāca |
bhagavanbhavasaṃsārasāgarottārakārakam || 211 ||

kiṃcidvrataṃ samācakṣva svargārogyaphalapradam |
pulastya uvāca |
sauradharmaṃ pravakṣyāmi nāmnā kalyāṇasaptamīm || 212 ||

viśokasaptamīṃ tadvattṛtīyāṃ phalasaptamīm |
śarkarāsaptamīṃ kuryāttathā kamalasaptamīm || 213 ||

maṃdārasaptamīṃ ṣaṣṭhīṃ saptamīṃ śubhasaptamīm |
sarvāḥ puṇyaphalāḥ proktāḥ sarvā devarṣipūjitāḥ || 214 ||

vidhānamāsāṃ vakṣyāmi yathāvadanupūrvaśaḥ |
yadā tu śuklasaptamyāmādityasya dinaṃ bhavet || 215 ||

sā tu kalyāṇinī nāma vijayā ca nigadyate |
prātargavyena payasā snānaṃ nadyāṃ samācaret || 216 ||

śuklāṃbaradharaḥ padmamakṣataiḥ parikalpayet |
prāṅmukhoṣṭadalaṃ madhye tadvadvṛttāṃ ca karṇikām || 217 ||

puṣpākṣatādbhirdeveśaṃ vinyasetsarvataḥ kramāt |
pūrveṇa tapanāyeti mārtaṃḍāyeti vai tataḥ || 218 ||

yāmye divākarāyeti vidhātra iti nairṛte |
paścime varuṇāyeti bhāskarāyeti cānile || 219 ||

saumye vikartanāyeti devāyetyaṣṭame dale |
ādāvaṃte ca madhye canamostu paramātmane || 220 ||

maṃtrairetaissamabhyarcya namaskārāṃta dāpitaiḥ |
śuklairvastraiḥ phalairbhakṣyairdhūpamālyānulepanaiḥ || 221 ||

sthaṃḍile pūjayedbhaktyā guḍena lavaṇena vai |
tato vyāhṛtimaṃtreṇa visṛjya dvijapuṃgavān || 222 ||

śaktitastarpayedbhaktyā guḍakṣīraghṛtādibhiḥ |
tilapātraṃ hiraṇyaṃ ca brāhmaṇāya nivedayet || 223 ||

evaṃ niyamakṛtsuptvā prātarutthāya mānavaḥ |
kṛtasnānajapo vipraiḥ sahaiva ghṛtapāyasam || 224 ||

bhuktvā ca vedaviduṣi vaiḍālavratavarjite |
ghṛtapātraṃ sakanakaṃ sodakuṃbhaṃ nivedayet || 225 ||

prīyatāmatra bhagavānparamātmā divākaraḥ |
anena vidhinā sarvaṃ māsimāsi samācaret || 226 ||

tatastrayodaśe māsi gāśca dadyāttrayodaśa |
vastrālaṃkārasaṃyuktāḥ svarṇaśṛṃgāḥ payasvinīḥ || 227 ||

ekāmapi pradadyācca vittahīno vimatsaraḥ |
na vittaśāṭhyaṃ kurvīta yato mohātpatatyadhaḥ || 228 ||

anena vidhinā yastu kuryātkalyāṇasaptamīṃ |
sarvapāpavinirmuktaḥ sūryaloke mahīyate || 229 ||

āyurārogyamaiśvaryamanaṃtamiha jāyate |
sarvapāpaharā ceyaṃ sarvadaivatapūjitā || 230 ||

sarvaduṣṭopaśamanī sadā kalyāṇasaptamī |
imāmanaṃtaphaladāṃ yastu kalyāṇasaptamīṃ || 231 ||

śṛṇoti yaḥ paṭhedvāpi sa ca pāpaiḥ pramucyate |
viśokasaptamīṃ tadvadvakṣyāmi nṛpasattama || 232 ||

yāmupoṣya naraḥ śokaṃ na kadācidihāśnute |
māghe kṛṣṇatilai snātaḥ paṃcamyāṃ śuklapakṣataḥ || 233 ||

kṛtāhāraḥ kṛsarayā daṃtadhāvanapūrvakam |
upavāsavrataṃ kṛtvā brahmacārī niśi svapet || 234 ||

tataḥ prabhāta utthāya kṛtasnānajapaḥ śuciḥ |
kṛtvā tu kāṃcanaṃ padmamarkāyeti prapūjayet || 235 ||

karavīreṇa raktena raktavastrayugena ca |
yathā viśokaṃ bhuvanaṃ tvayaivāditya sarvadā || 236 ||

tathā viśokatā me syāttvadbhaktiḥ pratijanma ca |
evaṃ sapūjya ṣaṣṭhyāṃ tu bhaktyā saṃpūjayeddvijān || 237 ||

svayaṃ saṃprāśya gomūtramutthāya kṛtanaityakaḥ |
saṃpūjya viprānyatnena guḍapātrasamanvitam || 238 ||

sadvastrayugmaṃ padmaṃ ca brāhmaṇāya nivedayet |
atailalavaṇaṃ bhuktvā saptamyāṃ maunasaṃyutaḥ || 239 ||

tataḥ purāṇaśravaṇaṃ karttavyaṃ bhūtimicchatā |
anena vidhinā sarvamubhayorapi pakṣayoḥ || 240 ||

kuryādyāvatpunarmāghaśuklapakṣasya saptamī |
vratāṃte kalaśaṃ dadyātsuvarṇakamalānvitam || 241 ||

śayyāṃ sopaskarāṃ dadyātkapilāṃ ca payasvinīṃ |
anena vidhinā yastu vittaśāṭhyena varjitaḥ || 242 ||

viśokasaptamīṃ kuryātsa yāti paramāṃ gatim |
yāvajjanmasahasrāṇāṃ sāgraṃ koṭiśataṃ bhavet || 243 ||

tāvanna śokamāpnoti rogadaurgatyavarjitaḥ |
yaṃ yaṃ kāmayate kāmaṃ taṃ taṃ prāpnoti puṣkalam || 244 ||

niṣkāmaṃ kurute yastu sa paraṃ brahma gacchati |
yaḥ paṭhecchṛṇuyādvāpi viśokākhyāṃ tu saptamīm || 245 ||

sopīṃdralokamāsādya na duḥkhī jāyate kvacit |
anyāmapi pravakṣyāmi nāmnā tu phalasaptamīm || 246 ||

yāmupoṣya naraḥ pāpairvimuktaḥ svargabhāgbhavet |
mārgaśīrṣe śubhe māsi paṃcamyāṃ niyatavrataḥ || 247 ||

ṣaṣṭhīmupoṣya kamalaṃ kārayitvā tu kāṃcanam |
śarkarāsaṃyutaṃ dadyādbrāhmaṇāya kuṭuṃbine || 248 ||

rūpaṃ ca kāṃcanaṃ kṛtvā phalasyaikasya dharmavit |
dadyāddvikālavelāyāṃ bhānurme prīyatāmiti || 249 ||

śaktyā tu viprānsaṃpūjya saptamyāṃ kṣīrabhojanam |
kṛtvā kuryātphalatyāgaṃ yāvatsyātkṛṣṇasaptamī || 250 ||

tāmupoṣyātha vidhivadanenaiva krameṇa tu |
tadvaddhemaphalaṃ datvā suvarṇakamalānvitam || 251 ||

śarkarāpātrasaṃyuktaṃ vastramālāsamanvitam |
saṃvatsaramanenaiva vidhinobhayasaptamīm || 252 ||

upoṣya dadyātkramaśaḥ sūryamaṃtramudīrayet |
bhānurarko ravirbrahmā sūryaḥ śukro hariḥ śivaḥ || 253 ||

śrīmānvibhāvasustvaṣṭā varuṇaḥ prīyatāmiti |
pratimāsaṃ ca saptamyāmekaikaṃ nāma kīrttayet || 254 ||

pratipakṣaṃ phalatyāgametatkurvansamācaret |
vratāṃte vipramithunaṃ pūjayedvastrabhūṣaṇaiḥ || 255 ||

śarkarākalaśaṃ dadyāddhemapadmaphalānvitam |
yathā na viphalaḥ kāmastvadbhaktānāṃ sadā bhavet || 256 ||

tathānaṃtaphalāvāptirastu me janmajanmani |
imāmanaṃtaphaladāṃ yaḥ kuryātphalasaptamīm || 257 ||

bhūtabhavyāṃśca puruṣāṃstārayedekaviṃśatim |
yaḥ śṛṇoti paṭhedvāpi sopi kalyāṇabhāgbhavet || 258 ||

sarvapāpaviśuddhātmā sūryaloke mahīyate |
surāpānādikaṃ kiṃñcidatrāmutra ca vā kṛtam || 259 ||

tatsarvaṃ nāśamāyāti yaḥ kuryātphalasaptamīm |
śarkarāsaptamīṃ vakṣye tadvatkalmaṣanāśinīm || 260 ||

āyurārogyamaiśvaryaṃ yayānaṃtaṃ prajāyate |
mādhavasya site pakṣe saptamyāṃ niyatavrataḥ || 261 ||

prātaḥ snātvā tilaiḥ śubhraiḥ śuddhamālyānulepanaḥ |
sthaṃḍile padmamālikhya kuṃkumena sakarṇikam || 262 ||

tasminnamaḥ savitreti gaṃdhapuṣpaṃ nivedayet |
sthāpayedudakuṃbhaṃ ca śarkarāpātrasaṃyutam || 263 ||

śuklavastrairalaṃkṛtya śuklamālyānulepanaiḥ |
svarṇapuṣpasamāyuktaṃ maṃtreṇānena pūjayet || 264 ||

viśvavedamayo yasmāttvaṃ vedeṣu ca paṭhyase |
tvamevāmṛtasarvasvamataḥ śāṃtiṃ prayaccha me || 265 ||

paṃcagavyaṃ tataḥ pītvā svapettatpārśvataḥ kṣitau |
saurasūktaṃ japannāste purāṇaśravaṇena ca || 266 ||

ahorātre gate paścādaṣṭamyāṃ kṛtanaityakaḥ |
tatsarvaṃ vedaviduṣe brāhmaṇāya nivedayet || 267 ||

bhojayecchaktito viprānśarkarāghṛtapāyasaiḥ |
bhuṃjītātailalavaṇaṃ svayamapyatha vāgyataḥ || 268 ||

anena vidhinā sarvaṃ māsimāsi samācaret |
saṃvatsarāṃte śayanaṃ śarkarākalaśānvitam || 269 ||

sarvopaskarasaṃyuktaṃ tathaikāṃgāṃ payasvinīm |
gṛhaṃ ca śaktimāndadyātsamastopaskarānvitam || 270 ||

sahasreṇātha niṣkāṇāṃ kṛtvā dadyācchatena vā |
daśabhirvā tribhirvāpi niṣkeṇaikena vā punaḥ || 271 ||

padmaṃ svaśaktito dadyātpūrvavanmaṃtrapāṭhanam |
vittaśāṭhyaṃ na kurvīta kurvandoṣānsamaśnute || 272 ||

amṛtaṃ pibato vaktrātsūryasyāmṛtabiṃdavaḥ |
samutpeturddharaṇyāṃ ye śālimudgekṣavastu te || 273 ||

śarkarāyārasastasmādikṣusāromṛtātmavān |
iṣṭāraverataḥ puṇyā śarkarā havyakavyayoḥ || 274 ||

śarkarāsaptamī ceyaṃ vājimedhaphalapradā |
sarvaduṣṭopaśamanī putrapautravivardhinī || 275 ||

yaḥ kuryātparayā bhaktyā sa paraṃ brahma gacchati |
kalpamekaṃ vasetsvarge tato yāti paraṃ padam || 276 ||

idamanagha śṛṇoti yaḥ smaredvā paripaṭhatīha sureśvarasya loke |
matimapi ca dadāti sopi devairamarapure paripūjyate munīndraiḥ || 277 ||

ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi tadvatkamalasaptamīm |
yasyāssaṃkīrttanādeva tuṣyatīha divākaraḥ || 278 ||

vasaṃtāmalasaptamyāṃ susnāto gaurasarṣapaiḥ |
tilapātre ca sauvarṇaṃ nidhāya kamalaṃ śubham || 279 ||

vastrayugmāvṛtaṃ kṛtvā gaṃdhapuṣpairathārcayet |
namaste padmahastāya namaste viśvadhāriṇe || 280 ||

divākara namastestu prabhākara namostute |
tato dvikālavelāyāmudakuṃbhasamanvitam || 281 ||

viprāya dadyātsaṃpūjya vastramālyavibhūṣaṇaiḥ |
śaktitaḥ kapilāṃ dadyādalaṃkṛtya vidhānataḥ || 282 ||

ahorātre gate paścādaṣṭamyāṃ bhojayeddvijān |
yathāśakti ca bhuṃjīta vimāṃsaṃ tailavarjitaṃ || 283 ||

anena vidhinā śuklasaptamyāṃ māsi māsi ca |
sarvaṃ samācaredbhaktyā vittaśāṭhyavivarjitaḥ || 284 ||
vratāṃte śayanaṃ dadyātsuvarṇakamalānvitam || 285 ||

gāśca pradadyācchaktyā tu suvarṇasya payasvinīḥ |
bhājanāsanadīpādīndadyādiṣṭānupaskarān || 286 ||

anena vidhinā yastu kuryātkamalasaptamīm |
lakṣmīmanaṃtāmabhyeti sūryaloke ca modate || 287 ||

kalpekalpe tato lokānsapta gatvā pṛthakpṛthak |
apsarobhiḥ parivṛtastato yāti parāṃ gatiṃ || 288 ||

paśyedimāṃ yaḥ śṛṇuyānmuhūrte paṭhecca bhaktyātha matiṃ dadāti |
sopyatra lakṣmīmamalāmavāpya gaṃdharvavidyādharalokameti || 289 ||

ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi sarvapāpapraṇāśinīm |
sarvakāmapradāṃ puṇyāṃ nāmnā maṃdārasaptamīṃ || 290 ||

māghasyāmalapakṣe tu paṃcamyāṃ laghubhuṅnaraḥ |
daṃtakāṣṭhaṃ tataḥ kṛtvā ṣaṣṭhīmupavasedbudhaḥ || 291 ||

viprānsaṃpūjayitvā tu maṃdāraṃ prārthayenniśi |
tataḥ prabhāta utthāya kṛtvā snānaṃ punardvijān || 292 ||

bhojayecchaktitaḥ kuryānmaṃdārakusumāṣṭakaṃ |
sauvarṇaṃ puruṣaṃ tadvatpadmahastaṃ suśobhanaṃ || 293 ||

padmaṃ kṛṣṇatilaiḥ kṛtvā tāmrapātreṣṭapatrakaṃ |
hemamaṃdārakusumairbhāskarāyeti pūrvataḥ || 294 ||

namaskāreṇa tadvacca sūryāyetyamale dale |
dakṣiṇe tadvadarkāya tathāryamṇe ca nairṛte || 295 ||

paścime vedadhāmne ca vāyavye caṃḍabhānave |
pūṣṇe cottarataḥ pūjya ānaṃdāyeti tatparam || 296 ||

karṇikāyāṃ ca puruṣaḥ sthāpyaḥ sarvātmanepi ca |
śuklavastraiḥ samāveṣṭya bhakṣyairmālyaphalādibhiḥ || 297 ||

evamabhyarcya tatsarvaṃ dadyādvedavide punaḥ |
bhuṃjītātailalavaṇaṃ vāgyataḥ prāṅmukho gṛhī || 298 ||

anena vidhinā sarvaṃ saptamyāṃ māsimāsi ca |
kuryātsaṃvatsaraṃ yāvadvittaśāṭhyavivarjitaḥ || 299 ||

etadeva vratāṃte tu nidhāya kalaśopari |
gobhirvibhavataḥ sārddhaṃ dātavyaṃ bhūtimicchatā || 300 ||

namo maṃdāranāthāya maṃdārabhavanāya ca |
tvaṃ rave tārayasvāsmānasmātsaṃsārasāgarāt || 301 ||

anena vidhinā yastu kuryānmaṃdārasaptamīm |
vipāpmā sa sukhī martyaḥ kalpaṃ ca divi modate || 302 ||

imāmaghaughapaṭalabhīṣaṇadhvāṃtadīpikāṃ |
gacchansaṃgṛhya saṃsāraśarvaryāṃ na skhalennaraḥ || 303 ||

maṃdārasaptamīmetāmīpsitārthaphalapradāṃ |
yaḥ paṭhecchṛṇuyādvāpi sopi pāpaiḥ pramucyate || 304 ||

athānyāmapi vakṣyāmi śobhanāṃ śubhasaptamīṃ |
yāmupoṣya naro rogaśokaughāttu pramucyate || 305 ||

puṇyamāśvayuje māsi kṛtasnānajapaḥ śuciḥ |
vācayitvā tato viprānārabhecchubhasaptamīṃ || 306 ||

kapilāṃ pūjayedbhaktyā gaṃdhamālyānulepanaiḥ |
namāmi sūryasaṃbhūtāmaśeṣabhuvanālayāṃ || 307 ||

tvāmahaṃ śubhakalyāṇi svaśarīraviśuddhaye |
atha kṛtvā tilaprasthaṃ tāmrapātreṇasaṃyutam || 308 ||

kāṃcanaṃ vṛṣabhaṃ tadvadvastramālyaguḍānvitaṃ |
sopadhānaṃ ca viśrāmabhājanāsanasaṃyutam || 309 ||

phalairnānāvidhairbhakṣyaiḥ ghṛtapāyasasaṃyutaiḥ |
dadyāddvikālavelāyāmaryamā prīyatāmiti || 310 ||

paṃcagavyaṃ ca saṃprāśya svapedbhūmāvasaṃstare |
tataḥ prabhāte saṃjāte bhaktyā saṃtarpayeddvijān || 311 ||

anena vidhinā dadyānmāsimāsi sadā naraḥ |
vāsasī vṛṣabhaṃ haimaṃ tadvadgāṃ kāṃcanodbhavām || 312 ||

saṃvatsarāṃte śayanamikṣudaṃḍaguḍānvitam |
tāmrapātre tilaprasthaṃ sauvarṇaṃ vṛṣabhaṃ tathā || 313 ||

dadyādvedavide sarvaṃ viśvātmā prīyatāmiti |
anena vidhinā vidvānkuryādyaḥ śubhasaptamīm || 314 ||

tasya śrīrvimalā kīrttirbhavejjanmani janmani |
apsarogaṇagaṃdharvaiḥ pūjyamānaḥ surālaye || 315 ||

vasedgaṇādhipo bhūtvā yāvadābhūtasaṃplavam |
kalpādāvavatīrṇaśca saptadvīpādhipo bhavet || 316 ||

bhrūṇahatyāsahasrasya brahmahatyāśatasya ca |
nāśāyālamiyaṃ puṇyā paṭhyate śubhasaptamī || 317 ||

imāṃ paṭhedyaḥ śṛṇuyānmuhūrtaṃ paśyetprasaṃgādapi dīyamānam |
sopyatra sarvāghavimuktadehaḥ prāpnoti vidyādharanāyakatvam || 318 ||

yāvatsamāssapta naraḥ karoti yaḥ saptamīṃ saptavidhānayuktām |
sa saptalokādhipatiḥ krameṇa bhūtvā padaṃ yāti paraṃ murāreḥ || 319 ||

bhīṣma uvāca |
bhūrlokotha bhuvarlokaḥ svarlokotha maharjanaḥ |
tapaḥ satyaṃ ca saptaite devalokāḥ prakīrttitāḥ || 1 ||

paryāyeṇa tu sarveṣāmādhipatyaṃ kathaṃ bhavet |
ihaloke śubhaṃ rūpamāyurārogyameva ca || 2 ||

lakṣmīśca vipulā brahmankathaṃ syātsurapūjita |
pulastya uvāca |
purā hutāśanaḥ sārddhaṃ mārutena mahītale || 3 ||

ādiṣṭaḥ puruhūtena vināśāya suradviṣām |
nirdagdheṣu tatastena dānaveṣu sahasraśaḥ || 4 ||

tārakaḥ kamalākṣaśca kāladaṃṣṭraḥ parāvasuḥ |
virocanastu saṃhrādaḥ prayātāste tadā vasan || 5 ||

aṃtaḥsamudramāviśya sanniveśamakurvata |
aśaktā iti tepyagnimārutābhyāmupekṣitāḥ || 6 ||

tataḥ prabhṛti vai devānmānuṣānsa bhujaṃgamān |
saṃpīḍya ca munīnsarvānpraviśaṃti punarjalam || 7 ||

evaṃ yugasahasrāṇi te vīrāḥ sapta paṃca ca |
jaladurgabalādrājanpīḍayaṃti jagattrayam || 8 ||

tataḥ punaratho vahnimārutāvamarādhipaḥ |
ādideśācirādaṃbu nidhireṣa viśoṣyatām || 9 ||

yasmādasmaddviṣāṃ caiṣa śaraṇaṃ varuṇālayaḥ |
tasmādbhavadbhyāmadyaiva śoṣameṣa praṇīyatām || 10 ||

tāvūcatustataḥ śakraṃ mayaśambarasūdanam |
adharma eṣa deveṃdra sāgarasya vināśanam || 11 ||

yasmājjīvanikāyasya mahataḥ saṃkṣayo bhavet |
tasmādupāyamanyaṃ tu samāśraya puraṃdara || 12 ||

yasya yojanamātrepi jīvakoṭi śatāni ca |
nivasaṃti suraśreṣṭha sa kathaṃ nāśamarhati || 13 ||

evamuktaḥ sureṃdrastu krodhasaṃraktalocanaḥ |
uvācedaṃ vaco roṣādamarāvagnimārutau || 14 ||

na dharmādharmasaṃyogaṃ prāpnuvaṃtyamarāḥ kvacit |
bhavaṃtau tu viśeṣeṇa mahātmānau ca tiṣṭhataḥ || 15 ||

mamājñā na kṛtā yasmānmārutena samaṃ tvayā |
muṃnivrataparo bhūtvā parigṛhya kalevaram || 16 ||

dharmārthaśāstrarahitāṃ yoniṃ prati vibhāvaso |
tasmādekena vapuṣā munirūpeṇa mānuṣe || 17 ||

mārutena samaṃ loke tava janma bhaviṣyati |
yadā tu mānuṣatvepi tvayā gaṃḍūṣaśoṣitaḥ || 18 ||

bhaviṣyatyudadhirvahne tadā devatvamāpsyasi |
itīṃdraśāpātpatitau tatkṣaṇāttau mahītale || 19 ||

avāptavaṃtau dehe ca kuṃbhājjanma tatobhavat |
mitrāvaruṇayorvīryādvasiṣṭhaścātmajobhavat || 20 ||

tatogastya ugratapā babhūva munisattamaḥ |
asmādbhrātuḥ sa vai bhrātā vasiṣṭhasyānujo muniḥ || 21 ||

bhīṣma uvāca |
kathaṃ ca mitrāvaruṇau pitarāvasya tau smṛtau |
janma kuṃbhādagastyasya yathābhūttadvadādhunā || 22 ||

pulastya uvāca |
purā purāṇapuruṣaḥ kadācidgaṃdhamādane |
bhūtvā dharmasuto viṣṇuścacāra vipulaṃ tapaḥ || 23 ||

tapasā cāsya bhītena vighnārthe preṣitāvubhau |
śakreṇa mādhavānaṃgāvapsarogaṇasaṃyutau || 24 ||

yadā ca gītavādyena bhāvahāvādinā hariḥ |
na kāmamādhavābhyāṃ ca mohaṃ netumaśakyata || 25 ||

tadā kāmamadhustrīṇāṃ viṣādamabhajadgaṇaḥ |
saṃkṣobhāyata tasteṣāmūrudeśānnarāgrajaḥ || 26 ||

nārīmutpādayāmāsa trailokyasyāpi mohinīm |
saṃmohitāstayā devāstau tu caiva surāvubhau || 27 ||

apsarāṇāṃ samakṣaṃ hi devānāmabravīddhariḥ |
urvaśīti ca nāmneyaṃ loke khyātiṃ gamiṣyati || 28 ||

tataḥ kāmayamānena mitreṇāhūyatorvaśī |
proktā māṃ ramayasveti bāḍhamityabravīcca sā || 29 ||

gacchaṃtī tu tataḥ sūryalokamiṃdīvarekṣaṇā |
varuṇena vṛtā paścādvacanaṃ tamabhāṣata || 30 ||

mitreṇāhaṃ vṛtā pūrvaṃ mama sūryaḥ patiḥ prabho |
uvāca varuṇaścittaṃ mayi saṃnyasya gamyatām || 31 ||

gatāyāṃ bāḍhamityuktvā mitraḥ śāpamadādatha |
adyaiva mānuṣe loke gaccha somasutātmajam || 32 ||

bhajasveti yato mithyā dharma eṣa tvayā kṛtaḥ |
jalakuṃbhe tato vīryaṃ mitreṇa varuṇena ca || 33 ||

prakṣiptamatha saṃjātau dvāveva munisattamau |
nimirnāma nṛpaḥ strībhiḥ purā dyūtamadīvyata || 34 ||

tadaṃtarebhyājagāma vasiṣṭho brahmasaṃbhavaḥ |
tasya pūjāmakurvāṇaṃ śaśāpa sa munirnṛpam || 35 ||

videhastvaṃ bhavasveti śaptastenāpyasau muniḥ |
anyonyaśāpādubhayorviśarīre tu tejasī || 36 ||

jagmatuśśāpanāśāya brahmāṇaṃ jagataḥ patim |
atha brahmasamādeśāllocaneṣvavasannimiḥ || 37 ||

nimeṣāḥ syuścalokānāṃ tadviśrāmāya pārthiva |
vasiṣṭhopyabhavattasmiñjalakuṃbhe ca pūrvavat || 38 ||

tato jātaścaturbāhuḥ sākṣasūtrakamaṃḍaluḥ |
agastya iti śāṃtātmā babhūva ṛṣisattamaḥ || 39 ||

malayasyaikadeśe tu vaikhānasa vidhānataḥ |
sabhāryaḥ saṃvṛto vipraistapaścakre suduṣkaram || 40 ||

tataḥ kālena mahatā tārakādinipīḍitam |
jagadvīkṣyasakopena pītavānvaruṇālayam || 41 ||

tatosya varadāssarve babhūvuḥ śaṃkarādayaḥ |
brahmāviṣṇuśca bhagavānvaradānāya jagmatuḥ || 42 ||

varaṃ vṛṇīśva bhadraṃ te yaścābhīṣṭotra vai mune |
agastya uvāca |
yāvadbrahmasahasrāṇāṃ paṃcaviṃśatikoṭayaḥ || 43 ||

vaimāniko bhaviṣyāmi dakṣiṇāṃbaravartmani |
madvimānodayātkuryādyaḥ kaścitpūjanaṃ mama || 44 ||

sa saptalokādhipatiḥ paryāyeṇa bhaviṣyati |
yastvāśramaṃ puṣkare tu mannāmnā parikīrtayet || 45 ||

sa caiva puṇyatāṃ yātu vara eṣa vṛto mayā |
śrāddhaṃ ye'tra kariṣyaṃti piṃḍapūrvaṃ tu bhaktitaḥ || 46 ||

teṣāṃ pitṛgaṇāssarve mayā saha divi sthitāḥ |
etatkālaṃ vasiṣyaṃti eṣa eva varo mama || 47 ||

evamastviti tepyuktvā jagmurdevā yathāgatam |
tasmādarghaḥ pradātavyo hyagastyāya sadā budhaiḥ || 48 ||

bhīṣma uvāca |
kathamarghapradānaṃ ca kartavyaṃ tasya vai muneḥ |
vidhānaṃ yadagastyasya pūjane tadvadasva me || 49 ||

pulastya uvāca |
pratyūṣa samaye vidvānkuryādasyodaye niśi |
snānaṃ śuklatilaistadvacchuklamālyāṃbaro gṛhī || 50 ||

sthāpayedavraṇaṃ kuṃbhaṃ mālyavastravibhūṣitam |
paṃcaratnasamāyuktaṃ ghṛtapātreṇasaṃyutam || 51 ||

aṃguṣṭhamātraṃ puruṣaṃ tathaiva suvarṇamadhyāyatabāhudaṃḍam |
caturbhujaṃ kuṃbhamukhe nidhāya dhānyāni saptācalasaṃyutāni || 52 ||

sakāṃsyapātrākṣataśuklayuktaṃ maṃtreṇa dadyāddvijapuṃgavāya |
utkṣipya kuṃbhoparidīrghabāhumananyacetā yamadiṅmukhastham || 53 ||

śvetāṃ ca dadyādyadiśaktirasti raupyaiḥ khurairhemamukhīṃ savatsāṃ |
dhenuṃ naraḥ kṣīravatīṃ praṇamya sragvastraghaṃṭābharāṇāṃ dvijāya || 54 ||

āsaptarātrādudaye nṛpāsya dātavyametatsakalaṃ nareṇa |
yāvatsamāssaptadaśātha vā syurathorddhvamapyatra vadaṃti kecit || 55 ||

kāśapuṣpapratīkāśa agnimārutasaṃbhava |
mitrāvaruṇayoḥ putra kuṃbhayone namostu te || 56 ||

pratyabdaṃ ca phalatyāgamevaṃ kurvannasīdati |
homaṃ kṛtvā tataḥ paścādvartayenmānavaḥ phalam || 57 ||

anenavidhinā yastu pumānarghaṃ nivedayet arghya |
imaṃ lokamavāpnoti rūpārogyaphalapradam || 58 ||

dvitīyena bhuvarlokaṃ svarlokaṃ ca tataḥ param |
saptaiva lokānāpnoti saptārghānyaḥ prayacchati || 59 ||

iti paṭhati śṛṇoti yo hi samyakcaritamagastyasamarcanaṃ ca paśyet |
matimapi ca dadāti sopi viṣṇorbhavanagataḥ paripūjyatemaraughaiḥ || 60 ||

bhīṣma uvāca |
saubhāgyārogyaphaladamamitrakṣayakārakam |
bhuktimuktipradaṃ yacca tanme brūhi mahāmate || 61 ||

pulastya uvāca |
yadumāyā purā deva uvācāṃdhakasūdanaḥ |
kathāsu saṃpravṛttāsu dharmyāsu lalitāsu ca || 62 ||

tadidānīṃ pravakṣyāmi bhuktimuktiphalapradam |
gauryuvāca |
dattaḥ śāpo hi sāvitryā mahyaṃ lakṣmyai sureśvara || 63 ||

yathā lakṣmīpradhānatvamahaṃ yāmi tathā vada |
śaṃkara uvāca |
śuṇuṣvāvahitā devi tathaivānyatsvayaṃkṛtam || 64 ||

narāṇāmatha nārīṇāmārādhanamanuttamam |
nabhasye vātha vaiśākhe puṇye mārgaśirasyatha || 65 ||

śuklapakṣe tṛtīyāyāṃ snātaḥ sa gaurasarṣapaiḥ |
gorocanaṃ sagomūtraṃ godugdhaṃ ca ghṛtaṃ tathā || 66 ||

dadhicaṃdanasaṃmiśraṃ lalāṭe tilakaṃ nyaset |
saubhāgyārogyakṛdyasmātsadā ca lalitāpriyam || 67 ||

pratipakṣaṃ tṛtīyāyāṃ pumānvāpi suvāsinī |
dhārayedraktavastrāṇi kusumāni sitāni ca || 68 ||

vidhavā śuklavastraṃ vai tvekameva hi dhārayet |
kumārī śukla sūkṣme ca paridadhyāttu vāsasī || 69 ||

devīṃ ca paṃcagavyena tataḥ kṣīreṇa kevalaṃ |
snāpayenmadhunā tadvatpuṣpagaṃdhodakena tu || 70 ||

pūjayecchuklapuṣpaistu phalairnānāvidhairapi |
dhānyalājādilavaṇaguḍakṣīraghṛtānvitaiḥ || 71 ||

śuklākṣatatilairarcā kāryā devi sadā tvayā |
pādayorarcanaṃ kuryātpratipakṣaṃ varānane || 72 ||

varadāyai namaḥ pādau tathā gulphau śriyai namaḥ |
aśokāyai namo jaṃghe pārvatyai jānunī tathā || 73 ||

ūrū māṃgalyakāriṇyai vāmadevyai tathā kaṭim |
padmodarāyai jaṭharaṃ namaḥ kaṃṭhe śriyai namaḥ || 74 ||

karau saubhāgyadāyinyai bāhū ca sumukhaśriyai |
mukhaṃ darpavināśinyai smaradāyai smitaṃ punaḥ || 75 ||

gauryai namastathānāsāmutpalāyai ca locane |
tuṣṭyai lalāṭamalakaṃ kātyāyanyai namaḥ śiraḥ || 76 ||

namo goryyai namaḥ puṣṭyai namaḥ kāṃtyai namaḥ śriyai |
raṃbhāyai lalitāyai ca vāmadevyai namo namaḥ || 77 ||

evaṃ saṃpūjya vidhivadagrataḥ padmamālikhet |
patraiḥ ṣoḍaśabhiryuktaṃ krameṇaiva sakarṇikam || 78 ||

pūrveṇa vinyasedgaurīmaparṇāṃ ca tataḥ param |
bhavānīṃ dakṣiṇe tadvadrudrāṇīṃ ca tataḥ param || 79 ||

vinyasetpaścime bhāge saumyāṃ madanavāsinīm |
vāyavye pāṭalāmugrāmuttareṇa tathā umām || 80 ||

sādhyāṃ pathyāṃ tathā saumyāṃ maṃgalāṃ kumadāṃ satīm |
bhadrāṃ ca madhye saṃsthāpya lalitāṃ karṇikopari || 81 ||

kusumairakṣatādbhirvā namaskāreṇa vinyaset |
gītamaṃgalaghoṣaṃ ca kārayitvā suvāsinīm || 82 ||

pūjayedraktavāsobhī raktamālyānulepanaiḥ |
siṃdūraṃ snānacūrṇaṃ ca tāsāṃ śirasi pātayet || 83 ||

siṃdūraṃ kuṃkumaṃ snānamatīveṣṭaṃ yatastataḥ |
tathopadeṣṭāramapi pūjayedyatnato gurum || 84 ||

na pūjyate gururyatra sarvāstatrāphalāḥ kriyāḥ |
japyaiśca pūjayedgaurīmutpalairasitaiḥ sadā || 85 ||

baṃdhujīvaiḥ priye pūjyā kārtike māsi yatnataḥ |
jātīpuṣpairmārgaśire pauṣe pītaiḥ kuraṃṭakaiḥ || 86 ||

kuṃdaiḥ kumudapuṣpaiśca devīṃ māghepi pūjayet |
siṃduvāreṇa jātyā vā phālgunepyarcayennaraḥ || 87 ||

caitre tu mallikāśokairvaiśākhe gaṃdhapāṭalaiḥ |
jyeṣṭhe kamalamaṃdārairāṣāḍhe ca jalāṃbujaiḥ || 88 ||

maṃdārairatha mālatyā śrāvaṇe pūjayetsadā |
gomūtraṃ gomayaṃ kṣīraṃ dadhisarpiḥ kuśodakam || 89 ||

bilvapatrārkakusumāṃbuja gośṛṃgavāri ca |
paṃcagavyaṃ ca bilvaṃ ca prāśayetkramaśaḥ sadā || 90 ||

etadbhādrapadādau tu prāśanaṃ samudāhṛtam |
pratipakṣaṃ ca mithunaṃ tṛtīyāyāṃ varānane || 91 ||

bhojayitvārcayedbhaktyā vastramālyānulepanaiḥ |
puṃsaḥ pītāṃbare dadyātstriyāḥ kauśeyavāsasī || 92 ||

niṣpāva jīralavaṇamikṣudaṃḍa guḍānvitam |
striyai dadyātphalaṃ puṃsaḥ suvarṇotpalasaṃyutam || 93 ||

yathā na devi devastvāṃ saṃparityajya gacchati |
tathā māmuddharāśeṣa duḥkhasaṃsārasāgarāt || 94 ||

kumudā vimalā naṃdā bhavānī vasudhā śivā |
lalitā kamalā gaurī satī rambhātha pārvatī || 95 ||

nabhasyādiṣu māseṣu prīyatāmityudīrayet |
vratāṃte śayanaṃ dadyātsuvarṇakamalānvitam || 96 ||

mithunāni caturviśaddvādaśātha samarcayet |
aṣṭāvaṣṭāthavā bhūyaścaturmāsetha vārcayet || 97 ||

pūrvaṃ datvātha gurave paścādanyānsamarcayet |
uktānantatṛtīyaiṣā sadānaṃtaphalapradā || 98 ||

sarvapāpaharā devī saubhāgyārogyavardhinī |
na cainaṃ vittaśāṭhyena kadācidapi laṃghayet || 99 ||

naro vā yadi vā nārī sopavāsavrataṃ caret |
garbhiṇī sūtikā naktaṃ kumārī vātha rogiṇī || 100 ||

yadā'śuddhā tadānyena kārayetprayatā svayam |
imāmanaṃtaphaladāṃ yastṛtīyāṃ samācaret || 101 ||

kalpakoṭiśataṃ sāgraṃ śivaloke mahīyate |
vittahīnopi kurvīta yāvadvarṣamupoṣaṇam || 102 ||

puṣpamaṃtravidhāne sopi tatphalamāpnuyāt |
nārī vā kurute yā tu ātmanaḥ śubhamicchatī || 103 ||

janmapauruṣamāpnoti gauryanugrahakāritam |
iti paṭhati śṛṇoti vā ya itthaṃ giritanayāvratamiṃdralokasaṃsthaḥ || 104 ||

matimapi ca dadāti yopi devairamaravadhūjanakinnaraiḥ sa pūjyaḥ |
anyāmapi pravakṣyāmi tṛtīyāṃ pāpanāśinīm || 105 ||

rasakalyāṇinīmetāṃ purākalpabhavā viduḥ |
māghemāsi tu saṃprāpya tṛtīyāṃ śuklapakṣataḥ || 106 ||

prātargaṃdhena payasā tilaiḥ snānaṃ samācaret |
snāpayenmadhunā devīṃ tathaivekṣurasena tu || 107 ||

gaṃdhodakena ca punaḥ pūjanaṃ kuṃkumena tu |
dakṣiṇāṃgāni saṃpūjya tato vāmāni pūjayet || 108 ||

lalitāyai padaṃ devyai vāmagulphau tatorcayet |
jaṃghe jānu tathā śāṃtyai tathaivoruṃ śriyai namaḥ || 109 ||

madālasāyai ca kaṭimamalāyai tathodaram |
stanau madanavāsinyai kumudāyai ca kaṃdharām || 110 ||

bhujaṃ bhujāgraṃ mādhavyai kamalāyai sukhasmite |
bhrūlalāṭaṃ ca rudrāṇyai śaṃkarāyai tathālakaṃ || 111 ||

madanāyai lalāṭaṃ tu mohanāyai punarbhruvau |
netre caṃdrārdhadhāriṇyai tuṣṭyai ca vadanaṃ punaḥ || 112 ||

utkaṃṭhinyai namaḥ kaṃṭhamamṛtāyai namastanum |
raṃbhāyai ca mahābāhū viśokāyai namaḥ karau || 113 ||

hṛdayaṃ manmathāhvāyai pāṭalāyai tathodaraṃ |
kaṭiṃ suratavāsinyai tathorū paṃkajaśriyai || 114 ||

jānujaṃghe namo gauryai gulphau śāṃtyai tathārcayet |
dharādharāyai pādau tu viśvakāyai namaḥ śiraḥ || 115 ||

namo bhavānyai kāminyai vāsudevyai jagacchriyai |
ānaṃdadāyai naṃdāyai subhadrāyai namonamaḥ || 116 ||

evaṃ saṃpūjya vidhivaddvijadāṃpatyamarcayet |
bhojayittvā tathānnena madhureṇa vimatsaraḥ || 117 ||

samodakaṃ vārikuṃbhaṃ śuklāṃbarayugadvayaṃ |
dattvā suvarṇakamalaṃ gaṃdhamālyairathārcayet || 118 ||

prīyatāmatra kumudā gṛhṇīyāllavaṇavratam |
anena vidhinā devīṃ māsimāsi sadārcayet || 119 ||

lavaṇaṃ varjayenmāghe phālgune ca guḍaṃ punaḥ |
navanītaṃ tathā caitre varjyaṃ madhu ca mādhave || 120 ||

pānīyaṃ jyeṣṭhamāse tu tathāṣāḍhe ca jīrakaṃ |
śrāvaṇe varjayetkṣīraṃ dadhi bhādrapade tathā || 121 ||

ghṛtamāśvayuje tadvadūrje varjyaṃ ca mākṣikaṃ |
dhānyākaṃ mārgaśīrṣe tu pauṣe varjyā ca śarkarā || 122 ||

vratāṃte karakaṃ pūrṇameteṣāṃ māsimāsi ca |
dadyādvikālavelāyāṃ bhakṣyapātreṇa saṃyutaṃ || 123 ||

laḍḍukāssevakāścaiva saṃyāvamatha pūrikā |
nārikā ghṛtapūrṇāśca piṣṭapūrṇā ca naṃdikī || 124 ||

kṣīraśākaṃ ca dadhyannaṃ piṃḍaśākaṃ tathaiva ca |
māghādau kramaśo dadyādetāni karakopari || 125 ||

kumudā mādhavī raṃbhā subhadrā ca śivā jayā |
lalitā kamalānaṃgā maṃgalā rati lālasā || 126 ||

kramānmāghādimāseṣu prīyatāmiti kīrtayet |
sarvatra paṃcagavyaṃ ca prāśanaṃ samudāhṛtaṃ || 127 ||

upavāsī bhavennityamaśaktau naktamiṣyate |
kuryādevamidaṃ nārī rasakalyāṇinī vrataṃ || 128 ||

punarmāghe ca saṃprāpte śarkarā kalaśopari |
kṛtvā tu kāṃcanīṃ gaurīṃ paṃcaratnasamanvitāṃ || 129 ||

svakīyāṃguṣṭhamātraṃ ca sākṣasūtrakamaṃḍaluṃ |
caturbhujāmiṃduyutāṃ sitanetrapaṭāvṛtāṃ || 130 ||

tadvadgomithunaṃ caiva suvarṇasya sitāṃbaraṃ |
savastraṃ bhājanaṃ dadyādbhavānī prīyatāmiti || 131 ||

anenavidhinā yastu rasakalyāṇinīvrataṃ |
kuryācca sarvapāpebhyastatkṣaṇādeva mucyate || 132 ||

bhavānāṃ ca sahasraṃ tu na duḥkhī jāyate kvacit |
agniṣṭomasahasreṇa yatphalaṃ tadavāpnuyāt || 133 ||

nārī vā kurute yā tu kumārī vā varānane |
vidhavā ca varākī vā sāpi tatphalabhāginī || 134 ||

saubhāgyārogyasaṃpannā gaurīloke mahīyate |
iti paṭhati ya itthaṃ yaḥ śṛṇoti prasaṃgāt |
sakalakaluṣamuktaḥ pārvatīlokameti || 135 ||

matimapi ca vidhatte yo narāṇāṃ priyārthaṃ |
vibudhapatijanānāṃ lokagaḥ syādamoghaḥ |
tathaivānyāṃ pravakṣyāmi tṛtīyāṃ pāpanāśinīm || 136 ||

nāmnā ca lokavikhyātāmagryānaṃdakarīmimāṃ |
yadā śuklatṛtīyāyāmaṣāḍharkṣaṃ bhavetkvacit || 137 ||

brahmarkṣaṃ vātha ca maghā hasto mūlamathāpi vā |
darbhagaṃdhodakaiḥ snānaṃ tadā samyaksamācaret || 138 ||

śuklamālyāṃbaradharaḥ śuklagaṃdhānulepanaḥ |
bhavānīmarcayedbhaktyā śuklapuṣpaiḥ sugaṃdhibhiḥ || 139 ||

mahādevaṃ ca sakalamupaviṣṭaṃ mahāsane |
vāsudevyai namaḥ pādau śaṃkarāyai namo hareḥ || 140 ||

jaṃgheśokavināśinyai mānadāyai namaḥ prabhoḥ |
raṃbhāyai pūjayedūrū śivāya ca pinākine || 141 ||

ānaṃdinyai kaṭiṃ devyāḥ śūlinaśśūlapāṇaye |
mādhavyai ca tathā nābhimatha śaṃbhorbhavāya vai || 142 ||

stanau cānaṃdakāriṇyai śaṃkarasyeṃdudhāriṇe |
utkaṃṭhinyai namaḥ kaṃṭhaṃ nīlakaṃṭhāya vai hareḥ || 143 ||

karāvutpaladhāriṇyai rudrāya jagataḥ prabho |
bāhū ca pariraṃbhiṇyai nṛtyaprītāya vai hareḥ || 144 ||

devyā mukhaṃ vilāsinyai vṛṣabhāya punarvibhoḥ |
smitaṃ ca smaraṇīyāyai viśvavaktrāya vai vibhoḥ || 145 ||

netre maṃdāravāsinyai viśvadhāmne triśūlinaḥ |
bhruvau nṛtyapriyāyai ca śaṃbhorvai pāśaśūline || 146 ||

devyā lalāṭamiṃdrāṇyai vṛṣavāhāya vai vibhoḥ |
svāhāyai makuṭaṃ devyā vibho gaṃgādharāya vai || 147 ||

viśvakāyau viśvabhujau viśvapādamukhau śivau |
prasannavaradau vaṃde pārvatīparameśvarau || 148 ||

evaṃ saṃpūjya vidhivadagrataḥ śivayoḥ punaḥ |
padmotpalāni rajasā nānāvarṇena kārayet || 149 ||

śaṃkhacakre sakaṭake svastikaṃ śubhakārakam |
yāvaṃtaḥ pāṃsavastatra rajasaḥ patitā bhuvi || 150 ||

tāvadvarṣasahasrāṇi śivaloke mahīyate |
catvāri ghṛtapātrāṇi sahiraṇyāni śaktitaḥ || 151 ||

datvā dvijāya karakamudakena samanvitam |
pratipakṣaṃ caturmāsaṃ yāvadetānnivedayet || 152 ||

tatastu caturo māsānpūrvavatkarakopari |
catvāri ghṛtapātrāṇi tilapātrāṇyaṃnaṃtaraṃ || 153 ||

gaṃdhodakaṃ puṣpavāri caṃdanaṃ kuṅkumodakaṃ |
apakvaṃ dadhidugdhaṃ ca gośṛṃgodakameva ca || 154 ||

abdodakaṃ tathā vārikuṣṭhacūrṇānvitaṃ punaḥ |
uśīrasalilaṃ caiva yavacūrṇodakaṃ punaḥ || 155 ||

tilodakaṃ ca saṃprāśyasvapenmārgaśirādiṣu |
māseṣu pakṣadvitayaṃ prāśanaṃ samudāhṛtam || 156 ||

sarvatraśuklapuṣpāṇipraśastānisadārcane |
dānakāle ca sarvatra maṃtrametamudīrayet || 157 ||

gaurī me prīyatāṃ nityamaghanāśāya maṃgalā |
saubhāgyāyāstu lalitā bhavānī sarvasiddhaye || 158 ||

saṃvatsarāṃte lavaṇaṃ guḍakuṃkumasaṃyutam |
caṃdanenayutaṃ kuṃbhaṃ sahasvarṇāṃbujena ca || 159 ||

umāyāḥ prītaye haimaṃ tadvidikṣuphalairyutam |
sāstarāvaraṇāṃ śayyāṃ saviśrāmāṃ nivedayet || 160 ||

sapatnīkāya viprāya gaurī me prīyatāmiti |
ātmānaṃdakarīṃ nāma prāpnuyātsaṃpadaṃ naraḥ || 161 ||

āyurānaṃdasaṃpanno na kvacicchokamāpnuyāt |
nārī vā kurute yā tu kumārī vidhavā tathā || 162 ||

sāpi tatphalamāpnoti devyanugrahalālitā |
pratipakṣamupoṣyaivaṃ maṃtrārcanavidhānataḥ || 163 ||

rudrāṇāṃ lokamāpnoti punarāvṛttidurlabham |
imāṃ yaḥ śṛṇuyānnityaṃ śrāvayedvāpi bhaktitaḥ || 164 ||

śakralokaṃ sa gatvā tu pūjyate kalpasaṃsthitaḥ |
śaṃkara uvāca |
evaṃvidhā bhavati cennārī vrataparāyaṇā || 165 ||

sāvitrī tu varākī sā tasyāḥ śāpastu kīdṛśaḥ |
na kācidgaṇanā cāsti yatastrailokyasuṃdarī || 166 ||

sā pūrvasyāpi vandyā ca lakṣmīrviṣṇupratigrahāt |
mayā pūrvaṃ tavārthāya dakṣayajñastu nāśitaḥ || 167 ||

lakṣmyarthaṃ viṣṇunā cāpi vāridhirmathitaḥ purā |
ājñākarau bhavatyośca mā kuruṣva bhayaṃ kvacit || 168 ||

sāvitryā mānanā kāryā kupitāyāḥ prasādanam |
mayā ca viṣṇunā caiva brahmaṇā mānamīpsunā || 169 ||

gamiṣye brahmasadanaṃ tvaṃ ca tiṣṭha varānane |
evamuktvā gato rudro gaurī tatra vyavasthitā || 170 ||

kṛtaṃ yugaṃ samagraṃ ca yajñe tasminhutāśanaḥ |
vahaṃstu havyaṃ devānāṃ prīṇayāno jagattrayam || 171 ||

bhojanaṃ dvijamukhyeṣu bhogānvidyādhare gaṇe |
kāmāvāptiṃ manuṣyeṣu sarvameva dadau prabhuḥ || 172 ||

rudreṇoktastadā viṣṇurdharmāṃste tvaṃ prakīrttaya |
gaurīdharmānsarasvatyā vrataṃ yatparikīrtitam || 173 ||

ityevamukte rudreṇa viṣṇuḥ provāca sādaram |
nāhaṃ dharmaṃ khyāpayiṣye svakīyaṃ śaṃkarādhunā || 174 ||

bhavānākhyātu māhātmyaṃ madīyaṃ surasattama |
tvayā vai kathitaṃ pūrvaṃ kṛte vai pāpasaṃkṣayaḥ || 175 ||

bhaviṣyati na saṃdeho bhavānpūto bhaviṣyati |
bhīṣma uvāca |
madhurā gīrbhavetkena vratena munisattama || 176 ||

tathaiva janasaubhāgyaṃ matirvidyāsu kauśalam |
abhedaścāpi dāṃpatye saṃgo baṃdhujanena ca || 177 ||

āyuśca vipulaṃ puṃsāṃ tanme kathaya sattama |
pulastya uvāca |
samyakpṛṣṭaṃ tvayā rājanśṛṇu sārasvataṃ vratam || 178 ||

yasya saṃkīrtanādeva devī tuṣyetsarasvatī |
yāvadbhaktaḥ stavaṃ kuryādetadvratamanuttamam || 179 ||

prāgvāsarādau saṃpūjya divyaṃ stavaṃ samārabhet |
athavā ravivāreṇa grahatārābalena ca || 180 ||

pāyasaṃ bhojayedviprānkuryādbrāhmaṇavācanam |
śuklavastrāṇi dattvā ca sahiraṇyāni śaktitaḥ || 181 ||

gāyatrīṃ pūjayedbhaktyā śuklamālyānulepanaiḥ |
yathā na devi bhagavānbrahmā lokapitāmahaḥ || 182 ||

tvāṃ parityajya tiṣṭhecca tathā bhava varapradā |
vedaśāstrāṇi dharmāṇi nṛtyagītādikaṃ ca yat || 183 ||

na vihīnaṃ tvayā devi tathā me saṃtu siddhayaḥ |
lakṣmīrmedhā dharā puṣṭirgaurī tuṣṭirjayā matiḥ || 184 ||

etābhiḥ pāhi cāṣṭābhimūrtibhirmāṃ sarasvati |
evaṃ saṃpūjya gāyatrīṃ vīṇākamaladhāriṇīm || 185 ||

śuklapuṣpākṣatairbhaktyā sakamaṃḍalu pustakām |
maunavratena bhuṃjīta sāyaṃprātaśca dharmavit || 186 ||

paṃcamyāṃ pratipakṣaṃ ca gāṃ ca viprāya śobhanām |
tathaiva taṃḍulaprasthaṃ ghṛtapātreṇa saṃyutam || 187 ||

kṣīraṃ dadyāddhiraṇyaṃ ca gāyatrī prīyatāmiti |
saṃdhyāyāṃ ca tathā maunametatkurvansamācaret || 188 ||

na rātryāṃ bhojanaṃ kuryādyāvanmāsāstrayodaśa |
samāpte tu vrate dadyādbhojanaṃ śuklataṃḍulaiḥ || 189 ||

divyāṃ vitānaṃ ghaṃṭāṃ ca sitanetrapaṭānvitām |
caṃdanaṃ vastrayugmaṃ ca dadhyannaṃ surasaṃ punaḥ || 190 ||

athopadeṣṭāramapi bhaktyā saṃpūjayedgurum |
vittaśāṭhyenarahito vastramālyānulepanaiḥ || 191 ||

anena vidhinā yastu kuryātsārasvataṃ vratam |
saubhāgyamatiyuktastu sūkṣmakaṃṭhaśca jāyate || 192 ||

sarasvatyāḥ prasādena brahmaloke mahīyate |
nārī vā kurute yā tu sāpi tatphalabhāginī || 193 ||

brahmaloke vasedrājanyāvatkalpāyuta trayam |
sārasvataṃ vrataṃ yastu śṛṇuyādapi vā paṭhet || 194 ||

bhīṣma uvāca |
vaiṣṇavā ye tu vai dharmā yānrudraḥ proktavāniha |
tānme kathaya vipreṃdra kīdṛśāste phalaṃ tu kim || 1 ||

pulastya uvāca |
purā rathaṃtare kalpe paripṛṣṭo mahātmanā |
maṃdarastho mahādevaḥ pinākī brahmaṇā svayam || 2 ||

kathamārogyamaiśvaryamanaṃtamamareśvara |
alpena tapasā deva bhavenmokṣaḥ sadā nṛṇāṃ || 3 ||

kiṃ tajjñānaṃ mahādeva tvatprasādādadhokṣaja |
alpakenāpi tapasā mahāphalamihocyate || 4 ||

iti pṛṣṭassa viśvātmā brahmaṇā lokabhāvanaḥ |
umāpatiruvācedaṃ manasaḥ prītikārakam || 5 ||

īśvara uvāca |
asmādrathaṃtarātkalpādbhūyo viṃśatimo yadā |
vārāho bhavitā kalpastadā manvaṃtare śubhe || 6 ||

vaivasvatākhye saṃprāpte saptame saptalokadhṛk |
dvāparākhyaṃ yugaṃ tasminsaptaviṃśatimaṃ yadā || 7 ||

tasyāṃ te tu mahātejā vāsudevo janārdanaḥ |
bhārāvataraṇārthāya tridhā viṣṇurbhaviṣyati || 8 ||

dvaipāyana ṛṣistatra rauhiṇeyotha keśavaḥ |
kaṃsāriḥ keśimathanaḥ keśavaḥ kleśanāśanaḥ || 9 ||

purīṃ dvāravatīṃ nāma sāṃprataṃ yā kuśasthalī |
divyānubhāvasaṃyuktāmadhivāsāya śārṅgiṇaḥ || 10 ||

tvaṣṭā tadājñayā brahmankariṣyati jagatpateḥ |
tasyāṃ kadācidāsīnaḥ sabhāyāṃ so'mitadyutiḥ || 11 ||

bhāryābhirvṛṣṇividvadbhibhūribhirbhūridakṣiṇaiḥ |
kurubhirdevagaṃdharvairanvitaḥ kaiṭabhārdanaḥ || 12 ||

pravṛttāsu purāṇāsu dharmasaṃbadhadhinīṣu ca |
kathāsu bhīmasenena paripṛṣṭaḥ pratāpavān || 13 ||

tvayā pṛṣṭasya dharmasya vakṣyatyasya ca bhedadṛk |
bhavitā sa tadā brahmankartā caiva vṛkodaraḥ || 14 ||

pravartako'sya dharmasya pāṃḍusūnurmahābalaḥ |
yasya tīkṣṇo vṛko nāma jaṭhare havyavāhanaḥ || 15 ||

saṃbhāṣyate sa dharmātmā tena cāsau vṛkodaraḥ |
atīva svādaśīlaśca nāgāyuta balo mahān || 16 ||

dhārmikasyāpyaśaktasya tīvrāgnitvādupoṣaṇe |
idaṃ vratamaśeṣāṇāṃ vratānāmadhikaṃ yataḥ || 17 ||

kathayiṣyati viśvātmā vāsudevo jagadguruḥ |
aśeṣayajñaphaladamaśeṣāghavināśanam || 18 ||

aśeṣaduṣṭaśamanamaśeṣasurapūjitam |
pavitrāṇāṃ pavitraṃ yanmagalānāṃ ca maṃgalam |
bhaviṣyaṃ ca bhaviṣyāṇāṃ purāṇānāṃ purātanam || 19 ||

vāsudeva uvāca |
yadyaṣṭamī caturddaśyordvādaśīṣu ca bhārata |
anyeṣvapi dinarkṣeṣu naśaktastvamupoṣitum || 20 ||

tatastvagryāmimāṃ bhīma tithiṃ pāpapraṇāśinīm |
upoṣya vidhinānena gaccha viṣṇoḥ paraṃ padaṃ || 21 ||

māghamāsasya daśamī yadā śuklā bhavettadā |
ghṛtenābhyaṃjanaṃ kṛtvā tilaiḥ snānaṃ samācaret || 22 ||

tathaiva viṣṇumabhyarcennamo nārāyaṇāya ca |
kṛṣṇāya pādau saṃpūjya śiraḥ kṛṣṇātmaneti ca || 23 ||

vaikuṃṭhāyeti vaikaṃṭhamuraḥ śrīvatsadhāriṇe |
śaṃkhine gadine caiva cakriṇe varadāya vai || 24 ||

sarvaṃ nārāyaṇantvevaṃ saṃpūjyāvāhanakramāt |
dāmodarāyetyudaraṃ kaṭiṃ paṃcajanāya vai || 25 ||

ūrūsaubhāgyanāthāya jānunī bhūtadhāriṇe |
namo nīlāya vai jaṃghe pādau viśvabhuje punaḥ || 26 ||

namo devyai namaḥ śāṃtyai namo lakṣmyai namaḥ śriyai |
namastuṣṭyai namaḥ puṣṭyai dhṛtyai vyuṣṭyai namo namaḥ || 27 ||

namo vihaṃganāthāya vāyuvegāya pakṣiṇe |
viṣapramathanāyeti garuḍaṃ cābhipūjayet || 28 ||

evaṃ saṃpūjya goviṃdamumāpativināyakau |
gaṃdhairmālyaistathā dhūpairbhakṣyairnānāvidhairapi || 29 ||

gavyena payasā siktāṃ kṛsarāmatha pāyasam |
sarpiṣā saha bhuktvā tu gatvā sthānāṃtaraṃ punaḥ || 30 ||

naiyagrodhaṃ daṃtakāṣṭhamathavā khādiraṃ budhaḥ |
gṛhītvā dhāvayeddaṃtānācāṃtaḥ prāgudaṅmukhaḥ || 31 ||

brūyātsāyaṃtanīṃ kṛtvā saṃdhyāmastamite ravau |
namo nārāyaṇāyeti tvāmahaṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ || 32 ||

ekādaśyāṃ nirāhāraḥ samabhyarcya ca keśavam |
tāṃ rātriṃ sakalāṃ sthitvā śeṣaparyaṃkaśāyinam || 33 ||

sarpiṣā viśvadahanaṃ hutvā brāhmaṇapuṃgavaiḥ |
sahaiva puṃḍarīkākṣaṃ dvādaśyāṃ kṣīrabhojanam || 34 ||

kariṣyāmi yathātmānaṃ nirvighnenāstu tacca me |
evamuktvā svapedbhūmāvitihāsakathāṃ punaḥ || 35 ||

śrutvā prabhāte saṃjāte nadīṃ gatvā viśāṃpate |
snānaṃ kṛtvā mudā tadvatpāṣaṇḍānabhivarjayet || 36 ||

upāsya sandhyāṃ vidhivatkṛtvā ca pitṛtarpaṇam |
praṇamya ca hṛṣīkeśaṃ śeṣaparyaṅkaśāyinam || 37 ||

gṛhasya purato bhaktyā maṇḍapaṃ kārayedbudhaḥ |
caturhastāṃ śubhāṃ kuryādvedīmariniṣūdana || 38 ||

caturhastapramāṇaṃ tu vinyasettatra toraṇam |
madhye ca kalaśaṃ tatra māṣamātreṇa saṃyutam || 39 ||

chidreṇa jalasaṃpūrṇamadhaḥ kṛṣṇājine sthitaḥ |
tasya dhārāṃ ca śirasā dhārayetsakalāṃ niśām || 40 ||

dhārābhirbhūribhirbhūri phalaṃ vedavido viduḥ |
yasmāttasmātkuruśreṣṭha kārayetprayato dvijaḥ || 41 ||

dakṣiṇe cārdhacaṃdraṃ tu paścime vartulaṃ tathā |
aśvatthapatrākāraṃ ca uttareṇa tu kārayet || 42 ||

madhye tu padmākāraṃ ca kārayedvaiṣṇavo dvijaḥ |
pūrvato vedikāṃ stho na stho na yāmye ca kalpayet || 43 ||

pānīyadhārāṃ śirasi dhārayedviṣṇutatparaḥ |
dvitīyā vedī devasya tatra padmaṃ sakarṇikam || 44 ||

tasya madhye sthitaṃ devaṃ kuryādvai puruṣottamam |
hastamātraṃ ca tatkuṃḍaṃ kṛtvā tatra trimekhalam || 45 ||

yonivaktraṃ tatastasminbrāhmaṇairyavasarpiṣī |
tilāṃśca viṣṇudevatyairmaṃtrairevānale hunet || 46 ||

kṛtvā tu vaiṣṇavaṃ samyagyāgaṃ tatra prakalpayet |
ājyadhārā madhyame tu kuṃḍe dadyāttu yatnataḥ || 47 ||

kṣīradhārāṃ devadeve vāridhārātmanopari |
niṣpāvārdhapramāṇāṃ vai dhārāmājyasya pātayet || 48 ||

svecchayā kṣīrajalayoravicchinnāṃ ca śarvarīṃ |
jalakuṃbhānmahāvīrya sthāpayitvā trayodaśa || 49 ||

bhakṣyairnānāvidhairyuktānsitavastrairalaṃkṛtān |
pratānauduṃbaraiḥ pātraiḥ paṃcaratnasamanvitaiḥ || 50 ||

caturbhirbahvṛcairhomaḥ kāryastatra udaṅmukhaiḥ |
rudrajāpyaścaturbhiśca yajurvedaparāyaṇaiḥ || 51 ||

vaiṣṇavāni ca sāmāni caturbhiḥ sāmavedibhiḥ |
evaṃ dvādaśa vai viprānvastramālyānulepanaiḥ || 52 ||

pūjayedaṃgulīyaiśca kaṭakairhemasūtrakaiḥ |
