vāsobhiḥ śayanīyaiśca vittaśāṭhyavivarjitaḥ || 53 ||

evaṃ kṣapātivāhyā vai gītamaṅgalaniḥsvanaiḥ |
upādhyāyasya ca punardviguṇaṃ sarvameva tu || 54 ||

tataḥ prabhāte vimale samutthāya trayodaśa |
gāvo deyāḥ kuruśreṣṭha sauvarṇaśṛṃgasaṃvṛtāḥ || 55 ||

payasvinyaḥ śīlavatyaḥ kāṃsyadohasamanvitāḥ |
raupyakhurāḥ savatsāśca caṃdanenābhibhūṣitāḥ || 56 ||

tāstu teṣāṃ tato datvā bhakṣyabhojyena tarpitān |
kṛtvā vai brāhmaṇānsarvānchatrairnānāvidhaistathā || 57 ||

bhuktvā cākṣāralavaṇamātmanā ca visarjayet |
anugamya padānyaṣṭau putrabhāryāsamanvitaḥ || 58 ||

prīyatāmatra deveśaḥ keśavaḥ kleśanāśanaḥ |
evaṃ gurvājñayā kuṃbhāngāścaiva śayanāni ca || 59 ||

vāsāṃsi caiva sarveṣāṃ gṛhāṇi prāpayedbudhaḥ |
abhāve bahuśayyānāmekāmapi susaṃskṛtām || 60 ||

śayyāṃ dadyādgṛhī bhīma sarvopaskarasaṃyutām |
itihāsapurāṇāni vācayitvā tu vāhayet || 61 ||

taddinaṃ kuruśārdūla ya icchedvipulāṃ śriyam |
tasmāttvaṃ sattvamālaṃbya bhīmasena vimatsaraḥ || 62 ||

kuru vratamidaṃ samyaksnehādguhyaṃ mayoditam |
tvayā kṛtamidaṃ vīra tvannāmnā ca bhaviṣyati || 63 ||

sā bhīmadvādaśī hyeṣā sarvapāpaharā śubhā |
yā tu kalyāṇinī nāma purā kalpeṣu paṭhyate || 64 ||

tvaṃ cādikartā bhava saukaresminkalpe mahāvīra varapradhāna |
yasyāḥ smṛteḥ kīrtanatopyaśeṣaṃ pāpaṃ praṇaṣṭaṃ tridaśādhipasya || 65 ||

dṛṣṭvā ca tāmapsarasāmabhīṣṭāṃ veśyākṛtāmanyabhavāṃtareṣu |
jātātha sā vaiśyakulodbhavāpi pulomakanyā puruhūtapatnī || 66 ||

tatrāpi tasyāḥ paricārikeyaṃ mama priyā saṃprati satyabhāmā |
kṛtaṃ purā maṃgalametadeva dvijātmajā vedavatī babhūva || 67 ||

asyāṃ ca kalyāṇatithau vivasvānsahasradhāreṇa sahasraraśmiḥ |
snātaḥ purā maṃḍalametya tadvattejomayaṃ kheṭapatirbabhūva || 68 ||

idamevakṛtaṃ maheṃdramukhyairbahubhirdevasurārikoṭibhiśca |
phalamasyeha na śakyate hi vaktuṃ yadi jihvāyutakoṭayo mukhe syuḥ || 69 ||

kalikaluṣavidāriṇīmanaṃtāmapi kathayiṣyati yādaveṃdrasūnuḥ |
atha narakagatānpitṝnathaiṣā hyalamuddhartumihaiva yaḥ karoti || 70 ||

idamanaghaśṛṇoti vakti bhaktyā paripaṭhatīha paropakārahetoḥ |
iha paṃkajanābhabhaktimānbhavedatha śakrasya sapūjyatāmupaiti || 71 ||

kalyāṇinī nāma purā visarge yā dvādaśī māghasitebhipūjyā |
sā pāṃḍuputreṇa kṛtā bhaviṣyatyaṃnatapuṇyānaghabhīmapūrvā || 72 ||

brahmovāca |
varṇāśramāṇāṃ prabhavaḥ purāṇeṣu mayā śrutaḥ |
sadācāraśca bhagavāndharmaśāstrāṃgavistaraiḥ || 73 ||

paṇyastrīṇāṃ samācāraṃ śrotumicchāmi tatvataḥ |
īśvara uvāca |
tasminneva pure brahmansahasrāṇi tu ṣoḍaśa || 74 ||

vāsudevasya nārīṇāṃ bhaviṣyaṃtyaṃbujodbhava |
tābhirvasaṃtasamaye kokilālikulākule || 75 ||

puṣpitopavane phullakalhārasarasastaṭe |
nirbharaṃ sahapatnībhiḥ praśastābhiralaṃkṛtaḥ || 76 ||

ramayiṣyati viśvātmā kṛṣṇo yadukulodvahaḥ |
kuraṃganayanaḥ śrīmānmālatīkṛtaśekharaḥ || 77 ||

gacchansamīpamārgeṇa sāṃbo jāṃbavatīsutaḥ |
sākṣātkaṃdarparūpeṇa sarvābharaṇabhūṣitaḥ || 78 ||

anaṃgaśarataptābhiḥ sābhilāṣamavekṣitaḥ |
prabuddho manmathastāsāṃ bhaviṣyati yadātmani || 79 ||

tadavekṣya jagannāthassarvajño dhyānacakṣuṣā |
svayaṃprabhurvakṣyati tā vo hariṣyaṃti dasyavaḥ || 80 ||

aparokṣaṃ yatastvevaṃ snigdhametadviciṃtitam |
tataḥ prasādito deva idaṃ vakṣyati śārṅgabhṛt || 81 ||

tābhiḥ śāpābhitaptābhirbhagavānbhūtabhāvanaḥ |
uttarāśritadāśānāmuddhartā brāhmaṇapriyaḥ || 82 ||

upadekṣyatyanaṃtātmā bhāvi kalyāṇakārakam |
bhavatīnāmṛṣirdālbhyo yadvrataṃ kathayiṣyati || 83 ||

ityuktvā tāḥ parityajya gatontardhānamīśvaraḥ |
tataḥ kālena mahatā bhārāvataraṇe kṛte || 84 ||

nivṛtte mausale tadvatkeśave divamāgate |
śūnye yadukule sarve corairapi jiterjune || 85 ||

hṛtāsu kṛṣṇapatnīṣu dāśabhogyāsu cārbude |
tiṣṭhaṃtīṣu ca daurgatyasaṃtaptāsu caturmukha || 86 ||

āgamiṣyati yogātmā dālbhyonāma mahātapāḥ |
tāstamarghyeṇa saṃpūjya praṇipatya punaḥpunaḥ || 87 ||

lālapyamānā bahuśo vāṣpaparyākulekṣaṇāḥ |
smaraṃtyo vividhānbhogāndivyamālyānulepanān || 88 ||

bharttāraṃ jagatāmīśamanaṃtamaparājitam |
divyānubhāvāṃ ca purīṃnānāratnagṛhāṇi ca || 89 ||

dvārakāvāsinaḥ sarvāndevarūpānkumārakān |
praśnametaṃ kariṣyaṃti munerabhimukhaṃsthitāḥ || 90 ||

dasyumirbhagavansarvāḥ paribhuktā vayaṃ balāt |
svadharmaścyāvitosmākamasminnaḥ śaraṇaṃ bhavān || 91 ||

ādiṣṭosi purā brahmankeśavena ca dhīmatā |
kasmādīśena saṃyogaṃ prāpya veśyātvamāgatāḥ || 92 ||

veśyānāmapi yo dharmastaṃ no brūhi tapodhana |
kathayiṣye vadattāsāṃ yaddālbhyaścaikitāyanaḥ || 93 ||

dālbhya uvāca |
jalakrīḍāvihāreṣu purā sarasi mānase |
bhavatīnāṃ sagarvāṇāṃ nāradobhyāśamāgataḥ || 94 ||

hutāśanasutāḥ sarvā bhavatyopsarasaḥ purā |
apraṇamyāvalepena paripṛṣṭaḥ sa yogavit || 95 ||

kathaṃ nārāyaṇosmākaṃ bharttā syādityupādiśa |
tasmādvarapradānaṃ ca śāpaścāyamabhūtpurā || 96 ||

śayyādvayapradānena madhumādhavamāsayoḥ |
suvarṇopaskarotsaṃgaṃ dvādaśyāṃ śuklapakṣataḥ || 97 ||

bhartā nārāyaṇo nūnaṃ bhaviṣyatyanyajanmani |
yadakṛtvā praṇāmaṃ me rūpasaubhāgyamatsarāt || 98 ||

paripṛṣṭosmi tenāśu viyogo vo bhaviṣyati |
corairapahṛtāḥ sarvā veśyātvaṃ samavāpsyatha || 99 ||

evaṃ nāradaśāpena keśavasya ca śāpataḥ |
veśyātvamāgatāḥ sarvā bhavatyaḥ kāmamohitāḥ || 100 ||

idānīmapi yadvakṣye tacchraṇudhvaṃ varāṃganāḥ |
purā daivāsure yuddhe hateṣu śataśaḥ suraiḥ || 101 ||

dānavāsuradaityeṣu rākṣaseṣu tatastataḥ |
teṣāṃ dārasahasrāṇi śataśotha sahasraśaḥ || 102 ||

pariṇītāni yāni syurbalādbhuktāni yāni vai |
tāni sarvāṇi deveśaḥ provāca vadatāṃ varaḥ || 103 ||

veśyādharmeṇa vartadhvamadhunā nṛpamaṃdire |
bhaktimatyo varārohāstathā devakuleṣu ca || 104 ||

rājataḥ svāminaścāpi jīvikāṃ ca pralapsyatha |
bhaviṣyati ca saubhāgyaṃ sarvāsāmapi śaktitaḥ || 105 ||

yaḥ kaścicchulkamādāya gṛhameṣyati vaḥ sadā |
niśchadmanaivopacaryaḥ prītibhāvairadāṃbhikaiḥ || 106 ||

devatānāṃ pitṝṇāṃ ca puṇyehni samupasthite |
gobhūhiraṇyadhānyāni pradeyāni ca śaktitaḥ || 107 ||

yadvrataṃ copadekṣyāmi tatkurudhvaṃ ca sarvaśaḥ |
saṃsārottāraṇāyālametadvedavido viduḥ || 108 ||

yadā sūryadine hastaḥ puṣyo vātha punarvasuḥ |
bhavetsarvauṣadhisnānaṃ samyaknārī samācaret || 109 ||

tadā paṃcaśarātmā tu harissannidhimeṣyati |
arcayetpuṃḍarīkākṣamanaṃgasyānukīrtanaiḥ || 110 ||

kāmāya pādau saṃpūjya jaṃghe vai mohakāriṇe |
meḍhraṃ kaṃdarpanidhaye kaṭiṃ prītimate namaḥ || 111 ||

nābhiṃ saukhyasamudrāya vāmanāya tathodaram |
hṛdayaṃ hṛdayeśāya stanāvāhlādakāriṇe || 112 ||

utkaṃṭhāyeti vai kaṃṭhamāsyamānaṃdakāriṇe |
vāmāṃsaṃ puṣpacāpāya puṣpabāṇāya dakṣiṇam || 113 ||

mānasāyeti vai māli vilolāyeti mūrddhajam |
sarvātmane śirastadvaddevadevasya pūjayet || 114 ||

namaḥ śivāya śāṃtāya pāśāṃkuśadharāya ca |
gadine pītavastrāya śaṃkhacakradharāya ca || 115 ||

namo nārāyaṇāyeti kāmadevātmane namaḥ |
namaḥ śāṃtyai namaḥ prītyai namāretyai namaḥ śriyai || 116 ||

namaḥ puṣṭyai namastuṣṭyai namaḥ sarvārthasaṃpade |
evaṃ saṃpūjya goviṃdamanaṃgātmakamīśvaram || 117 ||

gaṃdhamālyaistathā dhūpairnaivedyena ca bhāminī |
tata āhūya dharmajñaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vedapāragam || 118 ||

avyaṃgamatha saṃpūjya gaṃdhapuṣpārcanādibhiḥ |
śāleyataṃḍulaprasthaṃ ghṛtapātreṇa saṃyutam || 119 ||

tasmai viprāya vai dadyānmādhavaḥ prīyatāmiti |
yatheṣṭāhārasaṃbhuktamenaṃ dvijamanuttamam || 120 ||

ratyarthaṃ kāmadevoyamiti citte ca dhārayet |
yadyadicchati vipreṃdrastattatkuryādvilāsinī || 121 ||

sarvabhāvena cātmānamarpayetsmitabhāṣiṇī |
evamādityavāreṇa sarvametatsamācaret || 122 ||

taṃḍulaprasthadānaṃ ca yāvanmāsāstrayodaśa |
tatastrayodaśe māsi saṃprāpte cāsya bhāminī || 123 ||

viprasyopaskarairyuktāṃ śayyāṃ dadyādvicakṣaṇā |
sopadhānāṃ savinyāsāṃ svāstarāvaraṇāṃ śubhām || 124 ||

dīpikopānahacchatra pādukāsanasaṃyutām |
sapatnīkamalaṃkṛtya hemasūtrāṃgulīyakaiḥ || 125 ||

sūkṣmavastraiḥ sakaṭakairdhūpamālyānulepanaiḥ |
kāmadevaṃ sapatnīkaṃ guḍakuṃbhoparisthitam || 126 ||

tāmrapātrāsanagataṃ hemanetrapaṭāvṛtam |
sukāṃsyabhājanopetamikṣudaṃḍasamanvitam || 127 ||

dadyādanena maṃtreṇa tathaikāṃ gāṃ payasvinīm |
yathāṃtaraṃ na paśyāmi kāmakeśavayoḥ sadā || 128 ||

tathaiva sarvakāmāptirastu vipra sadā mama |
tathā ca kāṃcanaṃ devaṃ pratigṛhya dvijottamaḥ || 129 ||

kodātkāmodāditi vaidikaṃ maṃtramudīrayet |
tataḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya visṛjya dvijapuṃgavam || 130 ||

śayyāsanādikaṃ sarvaṃ brāhmaṇasya gṛhaṃ nayet |
tataḥ prabhṛti yo'nyopi ratyarthaṃ gehamāgataḥ || 131 ||

sammānya sūryavāreṇa sa saṃpūjyo bhavetsadā |
evaṃ trayodaśaṃ yāvanmāsamekaṃ dvijottamam || 132 ||

tarpayitvā yathākāmaṃ preṣayeccaiva maṃdiram |
tadanujñayā rūpavaṃtaṃ yāvadasyāgamo bhavet || 133 ||

ātmanopi yadā vighnaṃ garbhasūtakarājakam |
daivaṃ vā mānuṣaṃ vā syāduparāgeṇa vā tataḥ || 134 ||

sāvārā naṣṭapaṃcāśadyathāśakti samarpayet |
etaddhi kathitaṃ samyagbhavatīnāṃ viśeṣataḥ || 135 ||

svadharmoyaṃ yato bhāvyo veśyānāmiha sarvadā |
śayyayā tyajyate deva na kadācidyathā bhavān || 136 ||

śayyā mamāpyaśūnyeyaṃ tathāstu madhusūdana |
gītavāditranirghoṣaṃ devadevasya kārayet || 137 ||

etadvaḥ kathitaṃ sarvaṃ veśyādharmamaśeṣataḥ |
puruhūtena yatproktaṃ dānavīṣu purā mayā || 138 ||

tadidaṃ sāṃprataṃ sarvaṃ bhavatīṣvapi yujyate |
sarvapāpapraśamanamanaṃtaphaladāyakam || 139 ||

kalyāṇinīnāṃ kathitaṃ tadetadduścaraṃ vratam |
karoti yā'śeṣamudagrametatkalyāṇinī mādhavalokasaṃsthā || 140 ||

sā pūjitā devagaṇairaśeṣairānaṃdakṛtsthānamupaiti viṣṇoḥ |
tapodhanaḥ sopyabhidhāya caitadanaṃgadānavratamaṃganānām || 141 ||
svasthānameṣyaṃti samastamitthaṃ vrataṃ kariṣyaṃti ca devayone || 142 ||

brahmovāca |
bhagavanpuruṣasyeha striyāśca varadāyakam |
śokavyādhibhayaṃ duḥkhaṃ na bhavedyena tadvada || 1 ||

śaṃkara uvāca |
śrāvaṇasya dvitīyāyāṃ kṛṣṇāyāṃ madhusūdanaḥ |
kṣīrārṇave sapatnīkaḥ sadā vasati keśavaḥ || 2 ||

tasyāṃ saṃpūjya goviṃdaṃ sarvānkāmānavāpnuyāt |
gobhūhiraṇyadānādi saptakalpaśatānugam || 3 ||

āvāhanādikāṃ pūjāṃ pūrvavatparikalpayet |
aśūnyaśayanā nāma dvitīyāsau prakīrtitā || 4 ||

tasyāṃ saṃpūjayedviṣṇumebhirmaṃtrairvidhānataḥ |
śrīvatsadhārinśrīkāṃta śrīpate śrīdharāvyaya || 5 ||

gārhasthyaṃ mā praṇāśaṃ me yātu dharmārthakāmadaṃ |
agnayo mā praṇaśyaṃtu devatāḥ puruṣottama || 6 ||

pitaro mā praṇaśyaṃtu mama dāṃpatyabhedataḥ |
lakṣmyā viyujyate devo na kadācidyathā hariḥ || 7 ||

tathā kalatrasaṃbaṃdho deva mā me viyujyatāṃ |
lakṣmyā na śūnyaṃ varada yathā te śayanaṃ sadā || 8 ||

śayyā mamāpyaśūnyāstu tathaiva madhusūdana |
gītavāditranirghoṣāndevadevasya kārayet || 9 ||

ghaṃṭā bhavedaśaktasya sarvavādyamayo yataḥ |
evaṃ saṃpūjya goviṃdamaśnīyāttailavarjitam || 10 ||

naktamakṣāralavaṇaṃ yāvattu syāccatuṣṭayaṃ |
tataḥ prabhāte saṃjāte lakṣmīpatisamanvitām || 11 ||

dīpānnabhājanairyuktāṃ śayyāṃ dadyādvilakṣaṇām |
pādukopānahacchatra cāmarāsana saṃyutām || 12 ||

abhīṣṭopaskarairyuktāṃ śuklapuṣpāṃbarāvṛtām |
avyaṃgāya ca viprāya vaiṣṇavāya kuṭuṃbine || 13 ||

dātavyā vedaviduṣe na vaṃdhyāpataye kvacit |
tatropaveśya dāṃpatyamalaṃkṛtya vidhānataḥ || 14 ||

patnyāstu bhājanaṃ dadyādbhakṣyabhojyasamanvitam |
brāhmaṇasyāpi sauvarṇīmupaskarasamanvitām || 15 ||

pratimāṃ devadevasya sodakuṃbhāṃ nivedayet |
evaṃ yastu pumānkuryādaśūnyaśayanaṃ hareḥ || 16 ||

vittaśāṭhyena rahito nārāyaṇaparāyaṇaḥ |
na tasya patnyā virahaḥ kadācidapi jāyate || 17 ||

nārī vā vidhavā brahmanyāvaccaṃdrārkatārakaṃ |
na virūpau na śokārtau daṃpatī bhavataḥ kvacit || 18 ||

na putrapaśuratnāni kṣayaṃ yāṃti pitāmaha |
saptakalpasahasrāṇi saptakalpaśatāni ca || 19 ||

kurvannaśūnyaśayanaṃ viṣṇuloke mahīyate |
brahmovāca |
kathamārogyamaiśvaryaṃ matirdharmasthitissadā || 20 ||

avyaṃgātha pare bhaktirviṣṇau cāpi bhavetkatham |
īśvara uvāca |
sādhu brahmaṃstvayā pṛṣṭamidānīṃ kathayāmi te || 21 ||

virocanasya saṃvādaṃ bhārgavasya ca dhīmataḥ |
prahlādasya sutaṃ dṛṣṭvā dviraṣṭaparivatsaram || 22 ||

tasya rūpamidaṃ brahmansohasadbhṛgunaṃdanaḥ |
sādhusādhu mahābāho virocana śivaṃ tava || 23 ||

tattathā hasitaṃ tasya papraccha surasūdanaḥ |
brahmankimarthametatte hāsyaṃ vai māmakaṃ kṛtam || 24 ||

sādhusādhviti māmevamuktavāṃstvaṃ vadasva me |
tamevaṃ vādinaṃ yuktamuvāca vadatāṃ varaḥ || 25 ||

vismayādvratamāhātmyāddhāsyametatkṛtaṃ mayā |
purā dakṣavināśāya kupitasya triśūlinaḥ || 26 ||

apatadbhīmavaktrasya svedabiṃdurlalāṭajaḥ |
bhitvā sa saptapātālānadahatsaptasāgarān || 27 ||

anekavaktranayanojvalajjvalana bhīṣaṇaḥ |
vīrabhadra iti khyātaḥ karapādāyutairyutaḥ || 28 ||

kṛtvā sa yajñamathanaṃ punarbhūtasya saṃplavaḥ |
trijagaddahanādbhūyaḥ śivena vinivāritaḥ || 29 ||

kṛtaṃ tvayā vīrabhadra dakṣayajñavināśanaṃ |
idānīmalametena lokadāhena karmaṇā || 30 ||

śāṃtipradānātsarveṣāṃ grahaṇāṃ prathamo bhava |
prahṛṣṭābhijanāḥ pūjāṃ kariṣyaṃti kṛtātmanaḥ || 31 ||

aṃgāraka iti khyātiṃ gamiṣyasi dharātmaja |
devaloke dvitīyaṃ ca tava rūpaṃ bhaviṣyati || 32 ||

ye ca tvāṃ pūjayiṣyaṃti caturthyāṃ tu dine narāḥ |
rūpamārogyamaiśvaryaṃ teṣvanaṃtaṃ bhaviṣyati || 33 ||

evamuktastataḥ śāṃtimagamatkāmarūpadhṛt |
sa jātastatkṣaṇādrājangrahatvamagamatpunaḥ || 34 ||

sa kadācidbhavāṃstasya pūjārghādikamuttamaṃ |
dṛṣṭavānkriyamāṇaṃ ca śūdreṇa tvaṃ vyavasthitaḥ || 35 ||

tena tvaṃ rūpavānjāto suraḥ śatrukulāśaniḥ |
vividhā ca rucirjātā yasmāttava vidūragā || 36 ||

virocana iti prāhustasmāt tvāṃ devadānavāḥ |
śūdreṇa kriyamāṇasya vratasya tava darśanāt || 37 ||

īdṛśī rūpasaṃpattiriti vismitavānaham |
sādhusādhviti tenoktamaho māhātmyamuttamaṃ || 38 ||

paśyatopi bhavedrūpamaiśvaryaṃ kimu kurvataḥ |
yasmācca bhaktyā dharaṇīsutasya viniṃdyamānena gavādidānam || 39 ||

ālokitaṃ tena surārigarbhe saṃbhūtireṣā tava daitya jātā |
atha tadvacanaṃ śrutvā bhārgavasya mahātmanaḥ || 40 ||

prahlādanaṃdano vīraḥ punaḥ papraccha bhārgavam |
virocana uvāca |
bhagavaṃstadvrataṃ samyakśrotumicchāmi tatvataḥ || 41 ||

dīyamānaṃ tu yaddānaṃ mayā dṛṣṭaṃ bhavāṃtare |
māhātmyaṃ ca vidhiṃ tasya yathāvadvaktumarhasi || 42 ||

iti tadvacanaṃ śrutvā vipraḥ provāca sādaraṃ |
caturthyaṃgārakadine yadā bhavati dānava || 43 ||

mṛdāsnānaṃ tadā kuryātpadmarāgavibhūṣitaḥ |
agnirmūrddhādivo maṃtraṃ japetsnāta udaṅmukhaḥ || 44 ||

śūdrastūṣṇīṃ smaranbhaumamāstāṃ bhogavivarjitaḥ |
athāstamita āditye gomayenānulepayet || 45 ||

prāṃgaṇaṃ puṣpamālābhirakṣatādbhiḥ samaṃtataḥ |
tadabhyarcyālikhetpadmaṃ kuṃkumenāṣṭapatrakam || 46 ||

kuṃkumasyāpyabhāvena raktacaṃdanamiṣyate |
catvāraḥ karakāḥ kāryāḥ bhakṣyabhojyasamanvitāḥ || 47 ||

taṃḍulai raktaśāleyaiḥ padmarāgaiśca saṃyutāḥ |
catuḥkoṇeṣu tānkṛtvā phalāni vividhāni ca || 48 ||

gaṃdhamālyādikaṃ sarvaṃ tathaiva viniveśayet |
suvarṇaśṛṃgāṃ kapilāmathārcya raupyaiḥ khuraiḥ kāṃsyadohāṃ savastrām || 49 ||

dhuraṃdharaṃ raktakhuraṃ ca saumyaṃ dhānyāni saptāṃbarasaṃyutāni |
aṃguṣṭhamātraṃ puruṣaṃ tathaiva sauvarṇamapyāyatabāhudaṃḍam || 50 ||

caturbhujaṃ hemamayaṃ ca tāmrapātre guḍasyopari sarpiyuktam |
sāmasvarajñāya jiteṃdriyāya vāgrūpaśīlānvayasaṃyutāya || 51 ||

dātavyametatsakalaṃ dvijāya kuṭumbine naiva tu daṃbhayukte |
bhūmiputra mahābhāga svedodbhava pinākinaḥ || 52 ||

rūpārthī tvāṃ prapannohaṃ gṛhāṇārghyaṃ namo'stu te |
maṃtreṇānena datvārghyaṃ raktacaṃdanavāriṇā || 53 ||

tatorcayedvipravaraṃ raktamālyāṃbarādibhiḥ |
dadyāttenaiva maṃtreṇa bhaumaṃ gomithunānvitam || 54 ||

śayyāṃ ca śaktimāndadyātsarvopaskarasaṃyutām |
yadyadiṣṭatamaṃ loke yaccāsya dayitaṃ gṛhe || 55 ||

tattadguṇavate deyaṃ dattasyākṣayamicchatā |
tataḥ pradakṣiṇaṃ kṛtvā visṛjya dvijasattamam || 56 ||

naktaṃ kṣīrāśanaṃ kuryādevaṃ cāṃgārakāṣṭakam |
caturo vātha vātasya yatpuṇyaṃ tadvadāmi te || 57 ||

rūpasaubhāgyasaṃpannaḥ pumānjanmani janmani |
viṣṇau vātha śive bhaktaḥ saptadvīpādhipo bhavet || 58 ||

saptakalpasahasrāṇi rudraloke mahīyate |
tasmātvamapi daityeṃdra vratametatsamācara || 59 ||

ityevamukto bhugunaṃdanena cakāra sarvaṃ vratameva daityaḥ |
tvaṃ cāpi rājankuru sarvametadyatokṣayaṃ vedavido vadaṃti || 60 ||
śṛṇoti yaścainamananyacetāstasyāpi sarvaṃ bhagavānvidhatte || 61 ||

bhīṣma uvāca |
upavāseṣvaśaktasya tadeva phalamicchataḥ |
anabhyāsena rogādvā kimiṣṭaṃ vratamucyatām || 1 ||

pulastya uvāca |
upavāseṣvaśaktānāṃ naktaṃ bhojanamiṣyate |
yasminvrate tadapyatra śrūyatāṃ vai vrataṃ mahat || 2 ||

ādityaśayanaṃ nāma yathāvacchaṃkarārcanam |
yeṣu nakṣatrayogeṣu purāṇajñāḥ pracakṣate || 3 ||

yadā hastena saptamyāmādityasya dinaṃ bhavet |
sūryasya cāpi saṃkrāṃtistithissā sārvakāmikī || 4 ||

umāmaheśvarasyārcāmarcayetsūryanāmabhiḥ |
sūryārcāṃ śivaligaṃ ca ubhayaṃ pūjayedyataḥ || 5 ||

umāpate raveścāpi na bhedaḥ kvacidiṣyate |
yasmāttasmānnṛpaśreṣṭha gṛhe bhānuṃ samarcayet || 6 ||

hastena sūryāya namostupādāvarkāya citrāsu ca gulphadeśaṃ |
svātīṣu jaṃghe puruṣottamāya dhātre viśākhāsu ca jānudeśam || 7 ||

tathānurādhāsu namobhi pūjyamuruddvayaṃ caiva sahasrabhānoḥ |
jyeṣṭhāsvanaṃgāya namostu guhyamindrā yabhīmāya kaṭiṃ ca mūle || 8 ||

pūrvottarāṣāḍhayuge ca nābhiṃ tvaṣṭre namaḥ saptaturaṃgamāya |
tīkṣṇāṃśave śravaṇe cātha kukṣiṃ pṛṣṭhaṃ dhaniṣṭhāsu vikartanāya || 9 ||

vakṣasthalaṃ dhvāṃtavināśanāya jalādhiparkṣe pratipūjanīyam |
pūrvottarā bhādrapadadvaye ca bāhūttamaścaṃḍakarāya pūjyau || 10 ||

sāmnāmadhīśāya karadvayaṃ ca saṃpūjanīyaṃ nṛpa revatīṣu |
nakhāni pūjyāni tathāśvinīṣu namostu saptāśvadhuraṃdharāya || 11 ||

kaṭhoradhāmne bharaṇīṣu kaṃṭhaṃ divākarāyetyabhipūjanīyam |
grīvāgniparkṣe dharasaṃpuṭe tu saṃpūjayedbhārata rohiṇīṣu || 12 ||

mṛgercanīyā rasanā purāre raudre tu daṃtā haraye namaste |
namaḥ savitre iti śaṃkarasya nāsābhi pūjyā ca punarvasau ca || 13 ||

lalāṭamaṃbhoruhavallabhāya puṣyelakānvedaśarīradhāriṇe |
sārpe ca maulivibudhapriyāya maghāsu karṇāviti pūjanīyau || 14 ||

pūrvāsu gobrāhmaṇanaṃdanāya netrāṇi saṃpūjyatamāni śaṃbhoḥ |
athottarāphālguni bhe bhruvau ca viśveśvarāyeti ca pūjanīye || 15 ||

namostu pāśāṃkuśapadmaśūla kapālasarpendudhanurdharāya |
gayāsurānaṅgapurāṃdhakādi vināśamūlāya namaḥ śivāya || 16 ||

ityādikāṃgāni ca pūjayitvā viśveśvarāyeti śirobhipūjyam |
atrāpi bhoktavyamatailamannamamāṃsamakṣāramabhuktaśeṣam || 17 ||

ityevaṃ nṛpa naktāni kṛtvā dadyātpunarvasau |
śāleyataṃḍulaprasthamauduṃbaramatho ghṛtam || 18 ||

saṃsthāpya pātre viprāya sahiraṇyaṃ nivedayet |
saptame vastrayugmaṃ tu pāraṇe tvadhikaṃ bhavet || 19 ||

caturdaśe tu saṃprāpte pāraṇe bhāratādike |
brāhmaṇaṃ bhojayedbhaktyā guḍakṣīraghṛtādibhiḥ || 20 ||

kṛtvā ca kāṃcanaṃ padmamaṣṭapatraṃ sakarṇikam |
śuddhamaṣṭāṃgulaṃ tacca padmarāgadalānvitam || 21 ||

śayyāṃ sulakṣaṇāṃ kṛtvā viruddhagraṃthivarjitām |
sopadhānavitānāṃ ca svāstarāvaraṇāśrayām || 22 ||

pādukopānahacchatra cāmarāsanadarpaṇaiḥ |
bhūpaṇairapisaṃyuktāṃ phalavastrānulepanaiḥ || 23 ||

tasyāṃ vidhāya tatpadmamalaṃkṛtya guṇānvitām |
kapilāṃ vastrasaṃyuktāmatiśīlāṃ payasvinīm || 24 ||

raupyakhurāṃ hemaśṛṃgīṃ savatsāṃ kāṃsyadohanām |
dadyānmaṃtreṇa tāṃ dhenuṃ pūrvāhṇaṃ nātilaṃghayet || 25 ||

yathaivāditya śayanamaśūnyaṃ tava sarvadā |
kāṃtyā dhṛtyā śriyā puṣṭyā tathā me saṃtu vṛddhayaḥ || 26 ||

yathā na devāḥ śreyāṃsaṃ tvadanyamanaghaṃ viduḥ |
tathā māmuddharāśeṣa duḥkhasaṃsārasāgarāt || 27 ||

tataḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya praṇamya ca visarjayet |
śayyāṃ gavādi tatsarvaṃ dvijasya bhavanaṃ nayet || 28 ||

naitadviśīlāya na dāṃbhikāya prakāśanīyaṃ vratamiṃdumauleḥ |
govipradevarṣivikarmayogināṃ yaścāpi niṃdāmadhikāṃ vidhatte || 29 ||

bhaktāya dāṃtāya ca guhyametadākhyeyamānaṃdakaraṃ śivañca |
idaṃ mahāpātakināṃ narāṇāṃ aghakṣayaṃ vedavido vadaṃti || 30 ||

na baṃdhuputrairna dhanairviyuktaḥ patnībhirānaṃdakaraḥ surāṇāṃ |
nābhyeti rogaṃ na ca duḥkhamohaṃ yā cāpi nārī kurutetha bhaktyā || 31 ||

idaṃ vasiṣṭhena purārjunena kṛtaṃ kubereṇa puraṃdareṇa |
yatkīrtanādapyakhilāni nāśamāyāṃti pāpāni na saṃśayotra || 32 ||

iti paṭhati śṛṇoti vā ya itthaṃ raviśayanaṃ puruhūtavallabhaḥ syāt |
api narakagatānpitṝnaśeṣānapi divamānayatīha yaḥ karoti || 33 ||

aśvatthaṃ ca vaṭaṃ caivoduṃbaraṃ vṛkṣameva ca |
naṃdīśaṃ jaṃbuvṛkṣaṃ ca bilvaṃ prāhurmaharṣayaḥ || 34 ||

mārgaśīrṣādimāsābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ dvābhyāmatha kramāt |
ekaikaṃ daṃtadhavanaṃ vṛkṣeṣveteṣu kārayet || 35 ||

dadyātsamāpte dadhyannaṃ vitānadhvajacāmaram |
dvijānāmudakuṃbhāṃśca paṃcaratnasamanvitān || 36 ||
na vittaśāṭhyaṃ kurvīta kurvandoṣānavāpnuyāt || 37 ||

bhīṣma uvāca |
dīrghāyurārogyakulātivṛddhibhiryuktaḥ pumānrūpakulānvitaḥ syāt |
muhurmuhurjanmani yena samyakvrataṃ samācakṣva ca śītaraśmeḥ || 1 ||

pulastya uvāca |
tvayā pṛṣṭamidaṃ samyagakṣayasvargakārakam |
rahasyaṃ tu pravakṣyāmi yatpurāṇavido viduḥ || 2 ||

rohiṇīcaṃdraśayanaṃ nāmavratamihocyate |
tasminnārāyaṇasyārcāmarcayediṃdunāmabhiḥ || 3 ||

yadā somadine śuklā bhavetpaṃcadaśī kvacit |
athavā brahmanakṣatraṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ prajāyate || 4 ||

tadā snānaṃ naraḥ kuryātpaṃcagavyena sarṣapaiḥ |
āpyāyasveti ca japedvidvānaṣṭaśataṃ punaḥ || 5 ||

śūdropi parayā bhaktyā pāṣaṃḍālāpavarjitaḥ |
somāya śāṃtāya namostu pādāvanaṃtadhāmneti ca jānujaṃghe |
ūrudvayaṃ cāpi jalodarāya saṃpūjayenmeḍhramanaṃgadhāmne || 8 ||

namonamaḥ kāmasukhapradāya kaṭiḥ śaśāṃkasya sadārcanīyaḥ |
tathodaraṃ cāpyamṛtodarāya nābhiḥ śaśāṃkāya namobhipūjyā || 9 ||

namostu caṃdrāya mukhaṃ ca nityaṃ daṃtā dvijānāmadhipāya pūjyāḥ |
hāsyaṃ namaścaṃdramase'bhipūjyamoṣṭhau tu kaumodavanapriyāya || 10 ||

nāsā ca nāthāya varauṣadhīnāmānaṃdabījāya punarbhruvau ca |
netradvayaṃ padmanibhaṃ tatheṃdoriṃdīvaravyāsakarāya śaureḥ || 11 ||

namaḥ samastādhvarapūjitāya karṇadvayaṃ daityaniṣūdanāya |
lalāṭamiṃdorudadhipriyāya keśāḥ suṣumnādhipateḥ prapūjyāḥ || 12 ||

śiraḥ śaśāṃkāya namo murārerviśveśvarāyātha namaḥ kirīṭaṃ |
padmapriye rohiṇīnāma lakṣmi saubhāgyasaukhyāmṛtasāgarāya || 13 ||

daivīṃ ca saṃpūjya sugaṃdhipuṣpairnaivedyadhūpādibhiriṃdupatnīm |
suptvā tu bhūmau punarutthito yaḥ snātvā ca viprāya haviṣyabhuktaḥ || 14 ||

deyaḥ prabhāte sahiraṇya vārikuṃbho namaḥ pāpavināśanāya |
saṃprāśya gomūtramamāṃsamannamakṣāramaṣṭāvatha viṃśatiṃ ca || 15 ||

grāsāṃśca trīnsarpiyutānupoṣya bhuktvetihāsaṃ śṛṇuyānmuhūrtaṃ |
kadaṃbanīlotpalaketakāni jātiḥsarojaṃ śatapatrikā ca || 16 ||

amlānapuṣpāṇyatha siṃduvāraṃ puṣpaṃ punarbhāratamallikāyāḥ |
śuklaṃ ca puṣpaṃ karavīrapuṣpaṃ śrīcaṃpakaṃ caṃdramase pradeyam || 17 ||

śrāvaṇādiṣu māseṣu kramādetāni sarvadā |
yasminmāse vratādiḥ syāttatpuṣpairarcayeddharim || 18 ||

evaṃ saṃvatsaraṃ yāvadupoṣya vidhivannaraḥ |
vratāṃte śayanaṃ dadyācchayanopaskarānvitam || 19 ||

rohiṇīcaṃdramithunaṃ kārayitvā tu kāṃcanam |
caṃdraḥ ṣaḍaṃgulaḥ kāryo rohiṇī caturaṃgulā || 20 ||

muktāphalāṣṭakayutāṃ sitanetrasamanvitām |
kṣīrakuṃbhopari punaḥ kāṃsyapātrākṣatānvitām || 21 ||

dadyānmaṃtreṇa pūrvāhṇe śālīkṣuphalasaṃyutām |
śvetāmatha suvarṇāsyāṃ raupyakhurasamanvitām || 22 ||

savastrabhājanāṃ dhenuṃ tathā śaṃkhaṃ ca bhājanam |
bhūṣaṇairdvijadāmpatyamalaṃkṛtya guṇānvitaṃ || 23 ||

caṃdroyaṃ viprarūpeṇa sabhārya iti kalpayet |
yathā te rohiṇī kṛṣṇa śayanaṃ na tyajedapi || 24 ||

somarūpasya vaitadvanna me bhedo vibhūtibhiḥ |
yathā tvameva sarveṣāṃ paramānaṃdamuktidaḥ || 25 ||

bhuktirmuktistathā bhaktistvayi caṃdra dṛḍhāstu me |
iti saṃsārabhītasya muktikāmasya cānagha || 26 ||

rūpārogyāyuṣāmetadvidhāyakamanuttamam |
idameva pitṝṇāṃ ca sarvadā vallabhaṃ nṛpa || 27 ||

trailokyādhipatirbhūtvā saptakalpaśatatrayam |
caṃdralokamavāpnoti punarāvṛttidurlabham || 28 ||

nārī vā rohiṇīcaṃdraśayanaṃ yā samācaret |
sāpi tatphalamāpnoti punarāvṛttidurlabham || 29 ||

iti paṭhati śṛṇoti vā ya itthaṃ madhumathanārcanamiṃdukīrtanena |
matimapi ca dadāti sopi śaurerbhavanagataḥ paripūjyatemaraughaiḥ || 30 ||
iti śrīpādmapurāṇe prathame sṛṣṭikhaṃḍe rohiṇīcaṃdraśayanavrataṃ nāma ṣaḍviṃśo'dhyāyaḥ || 26 ||

bhīṣma uvāca |
taṭākārāmakūpeṣu vāpīṣu nalinīṣu ca |
vidhiṃ vadasva me brahmandevatāyataneṣu ca || 1 ||

ke tatra ṛtvijo viprā vedī vā kīdṛśī bhavet |
dakṣiṇābalayaḥ kālaḥ sthānamācārya eva ca || 2 ||

dravyāṇi kāni śastāni sarvamācakṣva suvrata |
pulastya uvāca |
śṛṇu rājanmahābāho taṭākādiṣu yo vidhiḥ || 3 ||

purāṇeṣvitihāsoyaṃ paṭhyate rājasattama |
prāpya pakṣaṃ śubhaṃ śuklaṃ saṃprāpte cottarāyaṇe || 4 ||

puṇyehni vipraiḥ kathite kṛtvā brāhmaṇavācanam |
aśubhairvarjite deśe taṭākasya samīpataḥ || 5 ||

caturhastāṃ samāṃ vedīṃ caturaśrāṃ caturmukhīm |
tathā ṣoḍaśahastaḥ syānmaṃḍapaśca caturmukhaḥ || 6 ||

vedyāstu parito gartāratnimātrāstrimekhalāḥ |
nava saptātha vā paṃca ṛjuvaktrā nṛpātmaja || 7 ||

vitastimātrā yoniḥ syātṣaṭsaptāṃguli vistṛtā |
gartāśca hastamātrāḥ syustriparvocchritamekhalāḥ || 8 ||

sarvatastu savarṇāḥ syuḥ patākādhvajasaṃyutāḥ |
aśvatthoduṃbaraplakṣavaṭaśākhākṛtāni tu || 9 ||

maṃḍapasya pratidiśaṃ dvārāṇyetāni kārayet |
śubhāstatrāṣṭahotāro dvārapālāstathāṣṭa vai || 10 ||

aṣṭau tu jāpakāḥ kāryā brāhmaṇā vedapāragāḥ |
sarvalakṣaṇasaṃpūrṇānmaṃtrajñānvijiteṃdriyān || 11 ||

kulaśīlasamāyuktānsthāpayedvai dvijottamān |
pratigarteṣu kalaśā yajñopakaraṇāni ca || 12 ||

vyajane cāsanaṃ śubhraṃ tāmrapātraṃ suvistaram |
tatastvanekavarṇāsyurbalayaḥ pratidaivatam || 13 ||

ācāryaḥ prakṣipedbhūmāvanumaṃtrya vicakṣaṇaḥ |
aratnimātro yūpaḥ syātkṣīravṛkṣavinirmitaḥ || 14 ||

yajamānapramāṇo vā saṃsthāpyo bhūtimicchatā |
hemālaṃkāriṇaḥ kāryāḥ paṃcaviṃśati ṛtvijaḥ || 15 ||

kuṃḍalāni ca haimāni keyūrakaṭakāni ca |
tathāṃgulipavitrāṇi vāsāṃsi vividhāni ca || 16 ||

dadyātsamāni sarveṣāmācārye dviguṇaṃ smṛtam |
dadyācchayanasaṃyuktamātmanaścāpi yatpriyam || 17 ||

sauvarṇau kūrmamakarau rājatau matsyaḍuṇḍubhau |
tāmrau kuṃbhīramaṃḍūkā vāyasaḥ śiṃśumārakaḥ || 18 ||

evamāsādya tatsarvamādāveva viśāṃpate |
śuklamālyāmbaradharaḥ śuklaṃgaṃdhānulepanaḥ || 19 ||

sarvauṣadhyudakaiḥ sarvaiḥ snāpito vedapāragaiḥ |
yajamānaḥ sapatnīkaḥ putrapautrasamanvitaḥ || 20 ||

paścimadvāramāsādya praviśedyāgamaṃḍapam |
tato maṃgalaśabdena bherīṇāṃ niḥsvanena ca || 21 ||

rajasā maṃḍalaṃ kuryātpaṃcavarṇena tattvavit |
ṣoḍaśāraṃ tataścakraṃ padmagarbhaṃ caturmukham || 22 ||

caturaśraṃ tu parito vṛttaṃ madhye suśobhanam |
vedyāścoparitaḥ kṛtvā grahānlokapatīṃstataḥ || 23 ||

saṃnyasenmaṃtrataḥ sarvānpratidikṣu vicakṣaṇaḥ |
kalaśaṃ sthāpayenmadhye vāruṇaṃ maṃtramāśritam || 24 ||

brahmāṇaṃ ca śivaṃ viṣṇuṃ tatraiva sthāpayedbudhaḥ |
vināyakaṃ ca vinyasya kamalāmaṃbikāṃ tathā || 25 ||

śāṃtyarthaṃ sarvalokānāṃ bhūtagrāmaṃ nyasettataḥ |
puṣpabhakṣyaphalairyuktamevaṃ kṛtvādhivāsanam || 26 ||

kuṃbhāṃśca ratnagarbhāṃstānvāsobhiḥ pariveṣṭayet |
puṣpagaṃdhairalaṃkṛtya dvārapālānsamaṃtataḥ || 27 ||

yajaddhvamiti tānbrūyādācāryamabhipūjayet |
bahvṛcau pūrvataḥ sthāpyau dakṣiṇena yajurvidau || 28 ||

sāmagau paścime sthāpyāvuttareṇa atharvaṇau |
udaṅmukho dakṣiṇato yajamāna upāviśet || 29 ||

yajadhvamiti tānbrūyādyājakānpunareva tān |
utkṛṣṭamaṃtrajāpyena tiṣṭhadhvamiti jāpakān || 30 ||

evamādiśya tānsarvānsaṃdhukṣyāgniṃ samaṃtravit |
juhuyādāhutīrmaṃtrairājyaṃ ca samidhastathā || 31 ||

ṛtvigbhiścaiva hotavyaṃ vāruṇaireva sarvataḥ |
grahebhyo vidhivaddhutvā tatheṃdrāyeśvarāya ca || 32 ||

marudbhyo lokapālebhyo vidhivadviśvakarmaṇe |
śāntisūktaṃ ca raudraṃ ca pāvamānaṃ ca maṃgalam || 33 ||

japecca pauruṣaṃ sūktaṃ pūrvato bahvṛcaḥ pṛthak |
śākraṃ raudraṃ ca saumyaṃ ca kauśmāṃḍaṃ jātavedasam || 34 ||

sauraṃ sūktaṃ japeyuste dakṣiṇena yajurvidaḥ |
vairājaṃ pauruṣaṃ sūktaṃ sauparṇaṃ rudrasaṃhitam || 35 ||

śaiśavaṃ paṃcanidhanaṃ gāyatraṃ jyeṣṭhasāma ca |
vāmadevyaṃ bṛhatsāma rauravaṃ ca rathaṃtaram || 36 ||

gavāṃ vrataṃ vikīrṇaṃ ca rakṣoghnaṃ ca yamaṃ tathā |
gāyeyuḥ sāmagā rājanpaścimadvāramāśritāḥ || 37 ||

ātharvaṇāścottarataḥ śāṃtikaṃ pauṣṭikaṃ tathā |
japeyurmanasā devamāśritā varuṇaṃ prabhum || 38 ||

pūrve dyurabhito rātrāvevaṃ kṛtvādhivāsanam |
gajāśvarathavalmīka saṃgamādvrajagokulāt || 39 ||

mṛdamādāya kuṃbheṣu prakṣipedoṣadhīstathā |
rocanāṃ ca sasiddhārthāṃ gaṃdhānguggulumeva ca || 40 ||

snāpanaṃ tasya karttavyaṃ paṃcagavyasamanvitaṃ |
pūrvaṃ karturmahāmaṃtrairevaṃ kṛtvā vidhānataḥ || 41 ||

ativāhya kṣapāmevaṃ vidhiyuktena karmaṇā |
tataḥ prabhāte vimale saṃjāte tu śataṃ gavāṃ || 42 ||

brāhmaṇebhyaḥ pradātavyamaṣṭaṣaṣṭyathavā punaḥ |
paṃcāśadvātha ṣaṭtriṃśatpaṃcaviṃśati vā punaḥ || 43 ||

tataścāvasaraprāpte śuddhe lagne suśobhane |
vedaśabdaiḥ sagaṃdharvairvādyaiśca vividhaiḥ punaḥ || 44 ||

kanakālaṃkṛtāṃ kṛtvā jale gāmavatārayet |
sāmagāya ca sā deyā brāhmaṇāya viśāṃpate || 45 ||

pātrīmādāya sauvarṇī paṃcaratnasamanvitām |
tato nikṣipya makarānmatsyādīṃścaiva sarvaśaḥ || 46 ||

dhṛtāṃ caturbhirvipraiśca vedavedāṃgapāragaiḥ |
mahānadījalopetāṃ dadhyakṣatavibhūṣitām || 47 ||

uttarābhimukhāṃ nyubjāṃ jalamadhye tu kārayet |
ātharvaṇena susnātāṃ punarmāyāṃ tathaiva ca || 48 ||

āpohiṣṭheti maṃtreṇa kṣiptvāgatya ca maṃḍapaṃ |
pūjayitvā sadasyānvai baliṃ dadyātsamaṃtataḥ || 49 ||

punardināni hotavyaṃ catvāri rājasattama |
caturthīkarma karttavyaṃ deyaṃ tatrāpi śaktitaḥ || 50 ||

kṛtvā tu yajñapātrāṇi yajñopakaraṇāni ca |
ṛtvigbhyastu samaṃ dadyānmaṃḍapaṃ vibhajetpunaḥ || 51 ||

hemapātrīṃ ca śayyāṃ ca viprāya ca nivedayet |
tataḥ sahasraṃ viprāṇāmathavā'ṣṭaśataṃ tathā || 52 ||

bhojanīyaṃ yathāśakti paṃcāśadvātha viṃśatiḥ |
evameṣa purāṇeṣu taṭākavidhirucyate || 53 ||

kūpavāpīṣu sarvāsu tathā puṣkariṇīṣu ca |
eṣa eva vidhirdṛṣṭaḥ pratiṣṭhāsu tathaiva ca || 54 ||

maṃtratastu viśeṣaḥ syātprāsādodyānabhūmiṣu |
ayaṃ tvaśaktāvardhena vidhirdṛṣṭaḥ svayaṃbhuvā || 55 ||

svalpeṣvekāgnivatkāryo vittaśāṭhyavivarjitaiḥ |
prāvṛṭkāle sthitaṃ toyamagniṣṭomasamaṃ smṛtam || 56 ||

śaratkālasthitaṃ yatsyāttaduktaphaladāyakam |
vājapeyātirātrābhyāṃ hemaṃte śiśire sthitam || 57 ||

aśvamedhasamaṃ prāhurvasaṃtasamaye sthitam |
grīṣmepi yatsthitaṃ toyaṃ rājasūyādviśiṣyate || 58 ||

etānmahārāja viśeṣadharmānkaroti corvyāmatiśuddhabuddhiḥ |
sa yāti brahmālayameva śuddhaḥ kalpānanekāndivi modate ca || 59 ||

anekalokānvicaransvarādīnbhuktvā parārdhadvayamaṅganābhiḥ |
sahaiva viṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padaṃ yatprāpnoti tadyogabalena bhūyaḥ || 60 ||
iti śrīpādmapurāṇe prathame sṛṣṭikhaṃḍe taṭākapratiṣṭhāvidhirnāma saptaviṃśo'dhyāyaḥ || 27 ||

bhīṣma uvāca |
pādapānāṃ vidhiṃ brahmanyathāvadvistarādvada |
vidhinā yena karttavyaṃ pādapāropaṇaṃ budhaiḥ || 1 ||

ye ca lokāḥ smṛtā yeṣāṃ tānidānīṃ vadasva me |
pulastya uvāca |
pādapānāṃ vidhiṃ vakṣye tathaivodyānabhūmiṣu || 2 ||

taṭākavidhivatsarvaṃ samāpya jagatīśvara |
ṛtviṅmaṃḍapasaṃbhāramācāryaṃ cāpi tadvidhaṃ || 3 ||

pūjayedbrāhmaṇāṃstadvaddhemavastrānulepanaiḥ |
sarvauṣadhyudakaiḥ siktāndadhyakṣatavibhūṣitān || 4 ||

vṛkṣānmālyairalaṃkṛtya vāsobhirabhiveṣṭayet |
sūcyā sauvarṇayā kāryaṃ sarveṣāṃ karṇavedhanaṃ || 5 ||

aṃjanaṃ cāpi dātavyaṃ tadvaddhemaśalākayā |
phalāni sapta cāṣṭau vā kāladhautāni kārayet || 6 ||

pratyekaṃ sarvavṛkṣāṇāṃ vedyāṃtānyadhivāsayet |
dhūpotra gugguluḥ śreṣṭhastāmrapātreṣvadhiṣṭhitān || 7 ||

saptadhānyasthitānkṛtvā vastragaṃdhānulepanaiḥ |
kuṃbhānsarveṣu vṛkṣeṣu sthāpayitvāvanīśvara || 8 ||

pūjayitvā dināṃte ca kṛtvā balinivedanam |
yathāvallokapālānāmiṃdrādīnāṃ vidhānataḥ || 9 ||

vanaspateradhivāsa evaṃ kāryo dvijātibhiḥ |
tataḥ śuklāṃbaradharānsauvarṇakṛtamekhalān || 10 ||

sakāṃsyadohāṃ sauvarṇaśṛṃgābhyāmatiśālinīṃ |
payasvinīṃ vṛkṣamadhyādutsṛjedgāmudaṅmukhīm || 11 ||

tatobhiṣekamaṃtreṇa vādyamaṃgalagītakaiḥ |
ṛgyajuḥsāmamaṃtraiśca vāruṇairabhitastadā || 12 ||

taireva kuṃbhaiḥ snapanaṃ kuryurbrāhmaṇapuṃgavāḥ |
snātaḥ śuklāṃbaradharo yajamānobhipūjayet || 13 ||

gobhirvibhavataḥ sarvānṛtvijaḥ sasamāhitān |
hemasūtraiḥ sakaṭakairaṃgulīyaiḥ pavitrakaiḥ || 14 ||

vāsobhiḥ śayanīyaiśca tathopaskarapādukaiḥ |
kṣīrābhiṣecanaṃ kuryādyāvaddinacatuṣṭayam || 15 ||

homaśca sarpiṣā kāryo yavaiḥ kṛṣṇatilairapi |
palāśasamidhaḥ śastāścaturthe'hni tathotsavaḥ || 16 ||

dakṣiṇā ca punastadvaddeyā tatrāpi śaktitaḥ |
yadyadiṣṭatamaṃ kicittattaddadyādamatsarī || 17 ||

ācārye dviguṇaṃ dattvā praṇipatya kṣamāpayet |
anena vidhinā yastu kuryādvṛkṣotsavaṃ budhaḥ || 18 ||

sarvānkāmānavāpnoti padaṃ cānantamaśnute |
yaścaivamapi rājendra vṛkṣaṃ saṃsthāpayedbudhaḥ || 19 ||

sopi svarge vasedrājanyāvadiṃdrāyutatrayam |
bhūtānbhavyāṃśca manujāṃstārayedromasaṃmitān || 20 ||

paramāṃ siddhimāpnoti punarāvṛttidurlabhām |
ya idaṃ śṛṇuyānnityaṃ śrāvayedvāpi mānavaḥ || 21 ||

sopi saṃpūjyate devairbrahmaloke mahīyate |
aputrasya ca putritvaṃ pādapā eva kurvate || 22 ||

tīrtheṣu piṃḍadānādīnropakāṇāṃ dadaṃti te |
yatnenāpi ca rājeṃdra aśvatthāropaṇaṃ kuru || 23 ||

sa te putrasahasrasya kṛtyamekaḥ kariṣyati |
dhanī cāśvatthavṛkṣeṇa aśokaḥ śokanāśanaḥ || 24 ||

plakṣo yajñapradaḥ proktaḥ kṣīrī cāyuḥpradaḥ smṛtaḥ |
jaṃbukī kanyakādātrī bhāryādā dāḍimī tathā || 25 ||

aśvattho roganāśāya palāśo brahmadastathā |
pretatvaṃ jāyate puṃso ropayedyo vibhītakam || 26 ||

aṃkole kulavṛddhistu khādireṇāpyarogitā |
niṃbaprarohakāṇāṃ tu nityaṃ tuṣyeddivākaraḥ || 27 ||

śrīvṛkṣe śaṃkaro devaḥ pāṭalāyāṃ tu pārvatī |
śiṃśapāyāmapsarasaḥ kuṃde gaṃdharvasattamāḥ || 28 ||

tiṃtiḍīke dāsavargā vaṃjule dasyavastathā |
puṇyapradaḥ śrīpradaśca caṃdanaḥ panasastathā || 29 ||

saubhāgyadaścaṃpakaśca karīraḥ pāradārikaḥ |
apatyanāśakastālo bakulaḥ kulavarddhanaḥ || 30 ||

bahubhāryā nārikelā drākṣā sarvāṃgasuṃdarī |
ratipradā tathā kolī ketakī śatrunāśinī || 31 ||

evamādi nagāścānye ye noktāstepi dāyakāḥ |
pratiṣṭhāṃ te gamiṣyaṃti yaistu vṛkṣāḥ praropitāḥ || 32 ||

ekonatriṃśo'dhyāyaḥ |
pulastyauvāca |
tathaivānyatpravakṣyāmi sarvakāmaphalapradam |
saubhāgyaśayanaṃnāma yatpurāṇavido viduḥ || 1 ||

purā dagdheṣu lokeṣu bhūrbhuvaḥ svarmahādiṣu |
saubhāgyaṃ sarvabhūtānāmekasthamabhavattadā || 2 ||

vaikuṃṭhaṃ sarvamāsādya viṣṇorvakṣasthale sthitam |
tataḥ kālena kiyatā punaḥ sargavidhau nṛpaḥ || 3 ||

ahaṃkāravṛteloke pradhānapuruṣānvite |
sparddhāyāṃ ca pravṛddhāyāṃ kamalāsanakṛṣṇayoḥ || 4 ||

piṃgākārā samudbhūtā vahnijvālātibhīṣaṇā |
tayābhitaptasya harervakṣasastadviniḥsṛtam || 5 ||

yadvakṣaḥsthalamāśritya viṣṇoḥ saubhāgyamāsthitam |
rasarūpaṃ na tadyāvadāpnoti vasudhātale || 6 ||

utkṣiptamaṃtarikṣāttu brahmaputreṇa dhīmatā |
dakṣeṇa pītamātraṃ tadrūpalāvaṇyakārakam || 7 ||

balaṃtejomahajjātaṃ dakṣasya parameṣṭhinaḥ |
śeṣaṃ yadapatadbhūmāvaṣṭadhā tadvyajāyata || 8 ||

tatastvoṣadhayo jātāḥ sapta saubhāgyadāyikāḥ |
ikṣavastarurājaśca niṣpavāvaśśālidhānyakam || 9 ||

vikāravacca gokṣīraṃ kusuṃbhaṃ kusumaṃ tathā |
lavaṇaṃ cāṣṭamaṃ tadvatsaubhāgyāṣṭakamucyate || 10 ||

pītaṃ yadbrahmaputreṇa yogajñānavidā purā |
duhitā sābhavattasmādyā satītyabhidhīyate || 11 ||

lokānatītya lālityāllalitā tena cocyate |
trailokyasuṃdarīṃ devīmupayeme pinākadhṛt || 12 ||

triviśvasaubhāgyamayīṃ bhuktimuktiphalapradām |
tāmārādhya pumānbhaktyā nārī vā kiṃ na viṃdati || 13 ||

bhīṣma uvāca |
kathamārādhanaṃ tasyā lalitāyā mune vada |
yadvidhānaṃ ca jagataḥ śāṃtaye tadvadasva me || 14 ||

pulastya uvāca |
vasaṃtamāsamāsādya tṛtīyāyāṃ janapriyaḥ |
śuklapakṣasya pūrvāhṇe tilaiḥ snānaṃ samācaret || 15 ||

tasminnahani sā devī kila viśvātmanā satī |
pāṇigrahaṇikairmaṃtrairudūḍhā varavarṇinī || 16 ||

tayā sahaiva viśveśaṃ tṛtīyāyāmathārcayet |
phalairnānāvidhairdīpairdhūpairnaivedyasaṃyutaiḥ || 17 ||

pratimāṃ paṃcagavyena tathā gaṃdhodakena ca |
snāpayitvārcayedgaurīmiṃduśekharasaṃyutām || 18 ||

namostu pāṭalāyai tu pādau devyāḥ śivasya ca |
śivāyeti ca saṃkīrtya jayāyai gulphayordvayoḥ || 19 ||

tryaṃbakāyeti rudrasya bhavānyai jaṃghayoryugam |
śiro rudreśvarāyeti vijayāyai ca jānunī || 20 ||

saṃkīrtya harikeśāya tathoruvarade namaḥ |
īśāyeti kaṭiṃ ratyai śaṃkarāyeti śaṃkaram || 21 ||

kukṣidvayaṃ ca koṭavyai śūlinaṃ śūlapāṇaye |
maṃgalāyai namastubhyamudaraṃ cābhibhūjayet || 22 ||

sarvātmane namo rudramīśānyai ca kucadvayam |
śivaṃ vedātmane tadvadrudrāṇyai kaṃṭhamarcayet || 23 ||

tripuraghnāya viśveśamanaṃtāyai karadvayam |
trilocanāyeti haraṃ bāhū kālānalapriye || 24 ||

saubhāgyabhavanāyeti bhūṣaṇāni sadārcayet |
svāhāsvadhāyai ca mukhamīśvarāyeti śūlinam || 25 ||

aśokavanavāsinyai pūjyāvoṣṭhau ca bhūtidau |
sthāṇave ca haraṃ tadvadāsyaṃ caṃdramukhapriye || 26 ||

namordhanārīśaharamasitāṃgīti nāsikām |
nama ugrāya lokeśaṃ laliteti punarbhruvau || 27 ||

śarvāya puraharttāraṃ vāsudevyai tathālakam |
namaḥ śrīkaṃṭhanāthāya śivakeśāṃstathārcayet || 28 ||

bhīmograbhīmarūpiṇyai śiraḥ sarvātmane namaḥ |
haramabhyarcya vidhivatsaubhāgyāṣṭakamagrataḥ || 29 ||

sthāpayetsnigdhaniṣpāvānkusuṃbhakṣīrajīrakam |
tarurājekṣulavaṇaṃ kustuṃburumathāṣṭamam || 30 ||

dadyātsaubhāgyakṛdyasmātsaubhāgyāṣṭakamityuta |
evaṃnivedya tatsarvamagrataḥ śivayoḥ punaḥ || 31 ||

caitre śṛṃgāṭakānprāśya svapedbhūmāvariṃdama |
punaḥ prabhāte ca tathā kṛtasnānajapaḥ śuciḥ || 32 ||

saṃpūjya dvijadāṃpatyaṃ mālyavastraṃ vibhūṣaṇaiḥ |
saubhāgyāṣṭakasaṃyukta sauvarṇaṃ pratimādvayam || 33 ||

prīyatāṃ metra lalitā brāhmaṇāya nivedayet |
evaṃ saṃvatsaraṃ yāvattṛtīyāyāṃ sadā nṛpa || 34 ||

prāśane dānamaṃtre ca viśeṣoyaṃ nibodha me |
gośṛṃgāṃbu madhau proktaṃ vaiśākhe gomayaṃ punaḥ || 35 ||

jyeṣṭhe maṃdārakusumaṃ bilvapatraṃ śucau smṛtam |
śrāvaṇe dadhisaṃprāśyaṃ nabhasye tu kuśodakam || 36 ||

kṣīraṃ cāśvayuje māsi kārttike pṛṣadājyakam |
mārgaśīrṣe tu gomūtraṃ pauṣe saṃprāśayedghṛtam || 37 ||

māghe kṛṣṇatilāṃstadvatpaṃcagavyaṃ ca phālgune |
lalitā vijayā bhadrā bhavānī kumudā śivā || 38 ||

vāsudevī tathā gaurī maṃgalā kamalā satī |
umā ca dānakāle tu prīyatāmiti kīrttayet || 39 ||

tasmiṃstu dvādaśe māsi dvādaśyāṃ kṛṣṇamarcayet |
tathā lakṣmīṃ ca tatraiva bhartrā sārdhamathārcayet || 40 ||

paurṇamāsyāmatastadvatsapatnīkaḥ pitāmahaḥ |
upāsanīyo viduṣā paratrā bhītimicchatā || 41 ||

saubhāgyāṣṭakaṃ tadvacca dātavyaṃ bhūtimicchatā |
mallikāśokakamalaṃ kadaṃbotpalacaṃpakam || 42 ||

kubjakaṃ karavīraṃ ca bāṇamamlānapaṃkajam |
siṃduvāraṃ ca sarveṣu māseṣu kusumaṃ smṛtam || 43 ||

japākusuṃbhakusumaṃ mālatī śatapatrikā |
yathālābhaṃ praśastāni karavīraṃ ca sarvadā || 44 ||

evaṃ saṃvatsaraṃ yāvadupoṣya vidhivannaraḥ |
strī ca naktaṃ kumārī ca śivamabhyarcya bhaktitaḥ || 45 ||

vratāṃte śayanaṃ dadyātsarvopaskarasaṃyutam |
umāmaheśvarau haimau vṛṣabhaṃ ca gavā saha || 46 ||

sthāpayitvā ca śayanaṃ brāhmaṇāya nivedayet |
dvādaśyāṃ vatsaraṃ tvekaṃ mahālakṣmyā ca keśavam || 47 ||

brahmāṇaṃ saha sāvitryā pūjayitvā narastviha |
sarvānkāmānavāpnoti manasā samabhīpsitān || 48 ||

anyānyapi yathāśakti mithunānyaṃbarādibhiḥ |
dhānyālaṅkāragodānairanyaiśca dhanasañcayaiḥ || 49 ||

vittaśāṭhayena rahitaḥ pūjayedgatavismayaḥ |
evaṃ karoti yaḥ samyaksaubhāgyaśayanavratam || 50 ||

sarvānkāmānavāpnoti padaṃ vā nityamaśnute |
phalasyaikasya ca tyāgametatkurvansamācaret || 51 ||

yaśaḥ kīrtimavāpnoti pratimāsaṃ narādhipa |
saubhāgyārogyarūpaiśca vastrālaṃkārabhūṣaṇaiḥ || 52 ||

na viyukto bhavedrājansaubhāgyaśayanapradaḥ |
yastu dvādaśavarṣāṇi saubhāgyaśayanavratam || 53 ||

karoti sapta cāṣṭau vā brahmaloke mahīyate |
pūjyamāno vasetsamyakyāvatkalpāyutaṃ naraḥ || 54 ||

viṣṇorlokamathāsādya śivalokagatastathā |
nārī vā kurute yā tu kumārī vā nareśvara || 55 ||

sāpi tatphalamāpnoti devyanugrahalālitā |
śṛṇuyādapi yaścaiva pradadyādathavā matim || 56 ||

sopi vidyādharo bhūtvā svargaloke ciraṃ vaset |
idamiha madanena pūrvasṛṣṭaṃ śatadhanuṣā ca kṛtaṃ nareṇa tadvat || 57 ||
kṛtamatha pavanena naṃdinā ca kimu jananāthamahādbhutaṃ na vā syāt || 58 ||
iti śrīpādmapurāṇe prathame sṛṣṭikhaṃḍe vratādhyāyonāma ekonatriṃśo'dhyāyaḥ || 29 ||

bhīṣma uvāca |
yajñapavartamāsādya viṣṇunā prabhaviṣṇunā |
padāni ceha dattāni kimarthaṃ padapaddhatiḥ || 1 ||

kṛtā vai devadevena tanme vada mahāmate |
katamo dānavastena viṣṇunā damitotra vai || 2 ||

kṛtvā vai padavinyāsaṃ tanme śaṃsa mahāmune |
svarloke vasatirviṣṇorvaikuṃṭhe'sya mahātmanaḥ || 3 ||

sa kathaṃ mānuṣe loke padanyāsaṃ cakāra ha |
devalokeṣu vai deva devāḥ seṃdrapurogamāḥ || 4 ||

tapasā mahatā brahmanbhaktā ye satataṃ prabhum |
śrīvarāhasya vasatirmaharlloke prakīrtitā || 5 ||

nṛsiṃhasya tathā proktā janaloke mahātmanaḥ |
trivikramasya vasatistapoloke prakīrtitā || 6 ||

lokānetānparityajya kathaṃ bhūmau padadvayam |
kṣetre paitāmahe cāsminpuṣkare yajñaparvate || 7 ||

padāni kṛtavānbrahmanvistarānmama kīrtaya |
śrutena sarvapāpasya nāśo vai bhavitā dhruvam || 8 ||

pulastya uvāca |
samyakpṛcchasi bhostvaṃ yatsaṃśṛṇu tvaṃ samāhitaḥ |
yathāpūrvaṃ padanyāsaḥ kṛto devena viṣṇunā || 9 ||

yajñaparvatamāsādya śilāparvatarodhasi |
purā kṛtayuge bhīṣma devakāryārthasiddhaye || 10 ||

viṣṇunā ca kṛtaṃ pūrvaṃ pṛthivyarthe paraṃtapa |
tridivaṃ sarvamānītaṃ dānavairbalavattaraiḥ || 11 ||

trailokyaṃ vaśamānīya jitvā devānsavāsavān |
dānavā yajñabhoktārastatrāsanbalavattarāḥ || 12 ||

kṛtā bāṣkalinā sarve dānavena balīyasā |
evaṃbhūte tadā loke trailokye sacarācare || 13 ||

paramārtiṃ yayau śakro nirāśo jīvite kṛtaḥ |
sa bāṣkalirdānaveṃdro'vadhyoyaṃ mama saṃyuge || 14 ||

brahmaṇo varadānena sarveṣāṃ tu divaukasām |
tadahaṃ brahmaṇo loke vṛtaḥ sarvairdivaukasaiḥ || 15 ||

vrajāmi śaraṇaṃ devaṃ gatiranyā na vidyate |
evaṃ viciṃtya deveṃdro vṛtaḥ sarvairdivaukasaiḥ || 16 ||

jagāma tvarito bhīṣma yatra devaḥ pitāmahaḥ |
brahmaṇaḥ sa padaṃ prāpya vṛtastaiśca divaukasaiḥ || 17 ||

abravījjagataḥ kāryaṃ prāptāmāpadamuttamām |
kiṃ na jānāsi vai deva yato no bhayamāgatam || 18 ||

daityairyadāhṛtaṃ sarvaṃ varadānācca te prabho |
kathitaṃ vai mayā sarvaṃ bāṣkaleśca durātmanaḥ || 19 ||

kriyatāṃ cāvilaṃbena pitā tvaṃ naḥ pitāmahaḥ |
tattvaṃ ciṃtaya deveśa śāṃtyarthaṃ jagatastviha || 20 ||

teṣāṃ ca paśyatāṃ kiṃcicchrautasmārtādikāḥ kriyāḥ |
na prāvartanta hānistu tairasmākaṃ dinedine || 21 ||

yathā hi prākṛtaḥ kaścitsvārthamuddiśya bhāṣate |
vijñāpyase tathāsmābhirnirastopakṛtaiḥ sadā || 22 ||

yadyenopakṛtaṃ yasya sahasraguṇitaṃ punaḥ |
yo na tasyopakārāya tatkaroti vṛthā matiḥ || 23 ||

tasyopakāradagdhasya nistrapasyāsataḥ punaḥ |
narakeṣvapi saṃvāsastasya duṣkṛtakāriṇaḥ || 24 ||

naitāvataiva sādhutvaṃ kṛte yātu pratikriyā |
svārthaikaniṣṭhabuddhīnāmetannāpi pravartate || 25 ||

yadyasya nābhavatsthānaṃ jagato hyatra duḥkhadaṃ |
śatadhā hṛdayaṃ dīrṇaṃ tanna tṛptimupāgatam || 26 ||

tatra vā yatra gaṃtāsmi nimagnānuddharasva naḥ |
upāyakathanenāsya yena tejaḥ pravartate || 27 ||

yathākhyātaṃ mayā dṛṣṭaṃ jagattatsthamavekṣya tām |
niḥsvādhyāyavaṣaṭkāraṃ nivṛttotsavamaṃgalam || 28 ||

tyaktādhyayanasaṃyogaṃ muktavārtā parigraham |
daṃḍanītyā parityaktaṃ śvāsamātrāvaśeṣitam || 29 ||

jagadārtimapi prāptaṃ punaḥ kaṣṭatarāṃ daśāṃ |
etāvatā hi kālena vayaṃ glānimupāgatāḥ || 30 ||

brahmovāca |
jānāmi bāṣkaliṃ taṃ tu varadānācca garvitam |
ajeyaṃ bhavatāṃ manye viṣṇusādhyo bhaviṣyati || 31 ||

nirudhya saṃsthito brahmā bhāvaṃ tatvamayaṃ tadā |
samādhisthasya tasyaiva dhyānamātrāccaturbhujaḥ || 32 ||

stokenaiva hi kālena ciṃtyamānaḥ svayaṃbhuvā |
ājagāma muhūrtena sarveṣāmeva paśyatām || 33 ||

viṣṇuruvāca |
bho bho brahmannivarttasva dhyānādasmānnivāritaḥ |
yadarthamiṣyate dhyānaṃ sohaṃ tvāṃ samupāgataḥ || 34 ||

brahmovāca |
mahāprasāda eṣo'tra svāmino hi pradarśanam |
kasyānyasya bhaveccaiṣā cintā yā jagataḥ prabho || 35 ||

mamaiva tāvadutpattirjagadarthe vinirmitā |
jagadetattvadarthīyaṃ tattvato nāsti vismayaḥ || 36 ||

bhavatā pālanaṃ kāryaṃ saṃharedrudra eva tu |
evaṃbhūte jagatyasminśakrasyāsya mahātmanaḥ || 37 ||

hṛtaṃ rājyaṃ bāṣkalinā trailokyaṃ sacarācaram |
bhṛtyasya kriyatāṃ sāhyaṃ maṃtradānena keśava || 38 ||

vāsudeva uvāca |
bhavato varadānena avadhyaḥ sa tu sāṃpratam |
buddhisādhyaḥ sa vai kāryo baṃdhanādiha dānavaḥ || 39 ||

vāmanohaṃ bhaviṣyāmi dānavānāṃ vināśakaḥ |
mayā saha vrajatveṣa bāṣkalestu niveśanam || 40 ||

tatra gatvā varaṃ tveṣa madarthe yācatāmimam |
vāmanasyāsya viprasya bhūme rājanpadatrayam || 41 ||

prayacchasva mahābhāga yācñaiṣā tu mayā kṛtā |
śakreṇokto dānaveṃdro dadyātsvamapi jīvitam || 42 ||

gṛhya pratigrahaṃ tasya dānavasya pitāmaha |
taṃ badhvā ca tato yatnātkṛtvā pātālavāsinam || 43 ||

saukaraṃ rūpamāsthāya vadhārthaṃ ca durātmanaḥ |
bhaviṣyāmi na saṃdeho vraja śakra tvarānvitaḥ || 44 ||

virarāma tamuktvaivamaṃtarddhānaṃ gataśca vai |
atha kālāṃtare viṣṇāvaditergarbhatāṃ gate || 45 ||

nimittānyatighorāṇi prādurbhūtānyanekaśaḥ |
samastajagadādhāre viṣṇau garbhatvamāgate || 46 ||

śobhanaṃ hi tadā jātaṃ nimittaṃ caivamūrjitam |
mālatīkusumānāṃ tu sugaṃdhaḥ surabhirvavau || 47 ||

atha vihitavidhānaṃ kālamāsādya devastridaśagaṇahitārthaṃ sarvabhūtānukaṃpī |
vimala virala keśaścaṃdraśaṃkhodayaśrīradititanayabhāvaṃ devadevaścakāra || 48 ||

avatarati ca viṣṇau siddhadevāsurāṇāmanimiṣanayanānāṃ viprasedurmukhāni |
ativiratarajobhirvāyubhiḥ saṃvahadbhirdinamapi ca tadāsījjanma viṣṇoḥ sugarbhe || 49 ||

aditirajanagarbhā sāpi devī prayāṃtī natajaghanabharārttā maṃdasaṃcāraramyā |
alasavadanakhedaṃ pāṃḍubhāvaṃ vahaṃtī gurutaramavagāḍhaṃ garbhamevodvahaṃtī || 50 ||

tataḥ praviṣṭe khalu garbhavāsaṃ nārāyaṇe bhūtabhaviṣyayogāt |
vināpadaṃ prāptamanorathāni bhūtāni sarvāṇi tadā babhūvuḥ || 51 ||

samīraṇo vāti ca maṃdamaṃdaṃ patatsu varṣeṣu nagodbhaveṣu |
viviktamārgeṣu digaṃtareṣu janeṣu vai satyamupāgateṣu || 52 ||

vimucyamāne gagane rajobhiḥ śanaiśśanairnaśyati cāṃdhakāre |
udarāṃtargate viṣṇau drohabuddhistadābhavat || 53 ||

tāṃ niśāmaya rājeṃdra devamāturyathākramam |
kimanukramaṇenaiva laṃghayāmi triviṣṭapam || 54 ||

bāṣkaliṃ dānaveṃdraṃ taṃ kuryāṃ pātālavāsinam |
śakrasya tu mayā dattaṃ dhanaṃ lāvaṇyameva ca || 55 ||

dānavānāṃ vināśāya ekaiva prabhavāmyaham |
kṣipāmi śarajālāni cakrayānānyanekaśaḥ || 56 ||

gadāvrātāṃśca vividhāndānavānāṃ vināśane |
vibudhāndevalokasthānadhobhūmestu dānavān || 57 ||

karomi kālayogena tattu kāryaṃ vratena me |
nissṛtā sahasā vāṇī vaktramevābhisaṃsthitā || 58 ||

yenedaṃ cintyate pūrvaṃ yanna dṛṣṭaṃ na ca śrutam |
baṃdhaṃ vai danumukhyasya kṛtaṃ kopena paśya me || 59 ||

kaśyapāya purā dattaṃ dhanaṃ lāvaṇyameva ca |
kimayaṃ vigatotsāho vāyavotha samākulāḥ || 60 ||

bhramatīva hi me dṛṣṭirmaitadrūpaṃ praciṃtitam |
āviṣṭā kimahaṃ vacmi kenāpyasadṛśaṃ vacaḥ || 61 ||

vikalpavaśamāpannā'bhīkṣṇaṃ hṛdimamarśa sā |
dadhāra divyaṃ varṣāṇāṃ sahasraṃ divyamīśvaram || 62 ||

tataḥ samabhavattasyāṃ vāmano bhūtavāmanaḥ |
jātena yena cakṣūṃṣi dānavānāṃ hṛtāni vai || 63 ||

jātamātre tatastasmindevadeve janārdane |
nadyaḥ svacchāṃbuvāhinyo vavau gaṃdhavaho'nilaḥ || 64 ||

kaśyapopi sukhaṃ lebhe tena putreṇa bhāsvatā |
sarveṣāṃ mānasotsāhastrailokyāṃtaravāsinām || 65 ||

saṃjātamātre tu tato janādhipajanārdane |
svargaloke duṃdubhayo vinedustaiśca tāḍitāḥ || 66 ||

atipraharṣāttu jagattrayasya mohaśca duḥkhāni ca nāśamīyuḥ |
jago ca gandharvagaṇotimātraṃ bhāvasvarairbhartṛvimiśritāśca || 67 ||

surāṅganāścāpi ca bhāvayuktā nṛtyaṃti tatrāpsarasāṃ samūhāḥ |
tathaiva vidyādharasiddhasaṃghā vimānayānairmuditā bhramaṃti || 68 ||

vadaṃti satyānṛtakāryanirṇayaṃ tathābhiraṃgaṃ pratidarśayaṃti |
gāyaṃti geyaṃ vinivṛttarāgā muhurmuhurduḥkhasukhaprabhūtāḥ || 69 ||

nṛtyaṃti vai svargagatāśca te tu dharmārjitaṃ svargamito vrajaṃti |
iti vigataviṣāde nirmale jīvaloke timiranikaramuktā nirvṛtiṃ prāptukāmāḥ || 70 ||

tatrocuḥ kecidurvyāṃ jayajaya bhagavansaṃprahṛṣṭāśca kecit |
tvevaṃ proktapraṇādairavirala manasaścānuvādaistathānyaiḥ |
dhyāyaṃtenye nigūḍhaṃ jananabhaya jarāmṛtyuvicchedaheto |
rityevaṃ kṛtsnamāsījjagadidamakhilaṃ sarvataḥ saṃpṛhṛṣṭam || 71 ||

paramāsādya yaṃ viṣṇuṃ brahmāha jagataḥ kṛte |
jātoyaṃ bhavatāmarthe vāmano yadapīśvaraḥ || 72 ||

eṣa brahmā ca viṣṇuśca eṣa eva maheśvaraḥ |
eṣa vedāśca yajñāśca svargaścaiṣa na saṃśayaḥ || 73 ||

viṣṇuvyāptamidaṃ sarvaṃ jagatsthāvarajaṃgamam |
ekaḥ sa tu pṛthktvena svayaṃbhūriti viśrutaḥ || 74 ||

yathārthavarṇake sthāne vicitraḥ sphāṭiko maṇiḥ |
tato guṇavaśāttasya svayaṃbhoranuvarttanam || 75 ||

yathā hi gārhapatyogniranyasaṃjñāṃ punarvrajet |
labheta saṃjñāṃ bhagavānbrāhmādiṣu tathā hyasau || 76 ||

sarvathā vāmano devo devakāryaṃ kariṣyati |
evaṃ ciṃtayatāṃ teṣāṃ bhāvitānāṃ divaukasām || 77 ||

jagāma śakrasahito bāṣkaleśca niveśanam |
dūrādeva ca tāṃ dṛṣṭvā purīṃ tasya samāvṛtām || 78 ||

pāṃḍuraiḥ khagamāgamyaiḥ sarvaratnopaśobhitaiḥ |
śobhitāṃ bhavanairmukhyaissuvibhaktamahāpathaiḥ || 79 ||

nityaprabhinnairmātaṃgairaṃjanācalasannibhaiḥ |
devanāgakulotpannaiḥ śatasaṃkhyairvirājitām || 80 ||

nirmāṃsagātraisturagairalpakarṇairmanojavaiḥ |
dīrghagrīvākṣikūṭaiśca manojñairupaśobhitām || 81 ||

padmagarbhasuvarṇābhāḥ pūrṇacaṃdranibhānanāḥ |
saṃllāpollāpakuśalāstatra veśyāḥ sahasraśaḥ || 82 ||

na tatpuṇyaṃ na sā vidyā na tacchilpaṃ na sā kalā |
bāṣkalerna pure'syātha nivāsaṃ pratigacchati || 83 ||

udyānaśatasaṃbādhaṃ samājotsavamālini |
anvite danumukhyaiśca sarvairaṃtakavarjitaiḥ || 84 ||

vīṇāveṇumṛdaṃgānāṃ śabdaiḥ sarvatra nādite |
sadā prahṛṣṭā danujā bahuratnopaśobhitāḥ || 85 ||

krīḍamānāḥ pradṛśyaṃte merāviva yathāmarāḥ |
brahmaghoṣo mahāṃstatra danuvṛddhairudīritaḥ || 86 ||

sājyadhūmena cāgnīnāṃ vāyunā naṣṭakilbiṣe |
sugaṃdhadhūpavikṣepa surabhīkṛtamārute || 87 ||

sugaṃdhidanujākīrṇe pure tasmiṃstu bāṣkali |
trailokyaṃ tu vaśe kṛtvā sukhenāste sa dānavaḥ || 88 ||

tatrasthaḥ pālayannāste trailokyaṃ sacarācaraṃ |
dharmajñaśca kṛtajñaśca satyavādī jiteṃdriyaḥ || 89 ||

sudarśaḥ pūrvadevānāṃ nayānayavicakṣaṇaḥ |
brahmaṇyaśca śaraṇyaśca dīnānāmanukaṃpakaḥ || 90 ||

vedamaṃtraprabhūtsāha sarvaśaktisamanvitaḥ |
ṣāḍguṇyaviṣayotsāhaḥ smitapūrvābhibhāṣitaḥ || 91 ||

vedavedāṃgatatvajño yajñayājī taporataḥ |
na ca duḥśīlanirataḥ sa sarvatrāvihiṃsakaḥ || 92 ||

mānyamānayitā śuddhaḥ sumukhaḥ pūjyapūjakaḥ |
sarvārthavidanādhṛṣyaḥ subhagaḥ priyadarśanaḥ || 93 ||

bahudhānyo bahudhano bahuyānaśca dānavaḥ |
trivargasādhako nityaṃ trailokye varapūruṣaḥ || 94 ||

svapurīnilayo nityaṃ devadānavadarpahā |
sa caivaṃ pālayāmāsa trailokye sakalāḥ prajāḥ || 95 ||

nādhamaḥ kaścidapyāste tasminrājani dānave |
dīno vā vyadhito vāpi alpāyurvātha duḥkhitaḥ || 96 ||

mūrkho vā maṃdarūpo vā durbhago vā nirākṛtaḥ |
evaṃ yutaṃ taṃ vimalairguṇaughairdṛṣṭvā ca matvā ca niviṣṭabuddhiṃ || 97 ||

prasādayandaityavaraṃ mahātmā puraṃdarastaṃ tu danupradhānaṃ |
tejoyuktaṃ dānavaṃ taṃ tapaṃtamiva bhāskaraṃ || 98 ||

trailokyadhāraṇe śaktaṃ vismitaḥ so'bhavattadā |
iṃdraṃ purāgataṃ dṛṣṭvā dānaveṃdrāya pārthiva || 99 ||

idamūcustadāgatvā dānavā yuddhadurmadāḥ |
āścaryamiti vai kṛtvā iṃdrobhyeti purīṃ tava || 100 ||

ekākī dvijamukhyena vāmanena saha prabho |
asmābhiryadanuṣṭheyaṃ sāṃprataṃ no vadasva rāṭ || 101 ||

dānavānabravītsarvānpure tiṣṭhata saṃkulaṃ |
praveśyatāṃ devarājaḥ pūjyaḥ sa tu mamādya vai || 102 ||

etasminneva kāle tu vāmanaḥ sa ca vāsavaḥ |
āgatau danunāthena premṇā caivāvalokitau || 103 ||

kṛtārthaṃ manyatātmānaṃ praṇipātapuraḥsaram |
uvāca vacanaṃ rājā dānavānāṃ dhuraṃdharaḥ || 104 ||

adya vai triṣu lokeṣu nāsti dhanyataro mayā |
yohaṃ śriyāvṛtaḥ śakraṃ paśyāmi gṛhamāgatam || 105 ||

arthitvakāmyayā yastu māmayaṃ yācayiṣyati |
gṛhāgatasya tasyāhaṃ dāsye prāṇānapi dhruvam || 106 ||

dārānputrāṃstathāgāraṃ trailokye kā kathā mama |
āgatya saṃmukhaṃ tasya aṃkamānīya sādaram || 107 ||

pariṣvajyābhinandyainaṃ gṛhaṃ prāveśayatsvakam |
tasya svāgatamarghyādyaiḥ kṛtvā pūjāṃ prayatnataḥ || 108 ||

adya me saphalaṃ janma pūrṇāḥ sarve manorathāḥ |
yastvāṃ paśyāmi śakrādya svayameva gṛhāgatam || 109 ||

khyāpyohaṃ danumukhyānāṃ devarāja tvayā kṛtaḥ |
āgacchatā mama gṛhaṃ puṇyatā tu parā hi me || 110 ||

agniṣṭomādibhiryajñaissamyagiṣṭaistu yatphalam |
tatphalaṃ samavāpyeta tvayi dṛṣṭe puraṃdara || 111 ||

yatphalaṃ bhūmidānena gavāṃ dānena ṛtvije |
mamādya tatphalaṃ bhūtamathavā rājasūyakam || 112 ||

nālpena tapasā labhyaṃ darśanaṃ tava vāsava |
evaṃ gehe mayā yatte priyaṃ kāryaṃ taducyatām || 113 ||

vikalpo'nyo na bhavatā hṛdi kāryaḥ kathaṃcana |
kṛtaṃ ca tadvijānīyā yadyadi syātsuduṣkaraṃ || 114 ||

puṇyohaṃ puṇyatāṃ prāpto darśanāttava śatruhan |
yatte deva varairvaṃdyau vaṃditau caraṇau mayā || 115 ||

kimāgamanakṛtyaṃ te vada sarvaṃ mayi prabho |
atyāścaryamidaṃ manye tavāgamana kāraṇaṃ || 116 ||

iṃdra uvāca |
jānehaṃ danumukhyānāṃ pradhānaṃ tvāṃ tu bāṣkale |
nātyāścaryamidaṃ bhāti tvayi dṛṣṭe'surottama || 117 ||

vimukhā nārthino yāṃti bhavato gṛhamāgatāḥ |
arthināṃ kalpavṛkṣosi dātā cānyo na vidyate || 118 ||

prabhāyāṃ sūryatulyosi gāṃbhīrye sāgaropamaḥ |
sahiṣṇutve dharā caiva śriyā nārāyaṇopamaḥ || 119 ||

brāhmaṇaḥ kaśyapakule jātoyaṃ vāmanaḥ śubhe |
prārthitohamanenaivaṃ bhūmerdehi padatrayaṃ || 120 ||

mamāgniśaraṇārthāya yatra kuryāṃ makhaṃ tvahaṃ |
tadasya kāraṇaṃ kṛtvā arthitaiṣā mama prabho || 121 ||

lokatrayaṃ me'pahṛtaṃ tvayā vikramya bāṣkale |
nirvṛttiko nirdhanosmi yadditse na tadasti me || 122 ||

bhavaṃtaṃ yācayiṣyāmi parārthenāpi cātmanā |
arthittvena mamāpyasya yadyogyaṃ tatsamācara || 123 ||

jātosi kāśyape ca tvaṃ vaṃśe vaṃśavivarddhanaḥ |
dityāstvaṃ garbhasaṃbhūtaḥ pitā trailokapūjitaḥ || 124 ||

evaṃbhūtamahaṃ jñātvā tena tvāṃ yācayāmyaham |
asyāgniśaraṇārthāya dīyatāṃ bhū padatrayam || 125 ||

atīva hrasvagātrasya vāmanasyāsya dānava |
bhūmibhāge ca pārakye dātuṃ na tvahamutsahe || 126 ||

etadeva mayā dattaṃ yadbhavānarthitosi me |
guravo yadi manyaṃte maṃtriṇo vā padatrayam || 127 ||

arthitvena madīyena svakule bāṃdhavepi ca |
gṛhāyāte mayi tathā yadyogyaṃ tatsamācara || 128 ||

yadi te rucitaṃ vīra dānaveṃdra mahādyute |
tadasmai dīyatāṃ śīghraṃ vāmanāya mahātmane || 129 ||

bāṣkaliruvāca |
deveṃdra svāgataṃ te'stu svasti prāpnuhi mā ciram |
tvaṃ samīkṣasvadhātmānaṃ sarveṣāṃ ca parāyaṇam || 130 ||

tvayi bhāraṃ samāveśya sukhamāste pitāmahaḥ |
dhyānadhāraṇayāyuktaściṃtayānaḥ paraṃ padam || 131 ||

saṃgrāmairbahubhiḥ khinno jagacciṃtāmapāsya tu |
kṣīrābdhidvīpamāśritya sukhaṃ svapiti keśavaḥ || 132 ||

anye ca dānavāḥ sarve balinaḥ sāyudhāstvayā |
asahāyenaiva śakra sarvepi vinipātitāḥ || 133 ||

ādityā dvādaśaiveha rudrāstvekādaśāpi vā |
aśvinau vasavaścaiva dharmaścaiva sanātanaḥ || 134 ||

tvadbāhubalamāśritya tridive makhabhāginaḥ |
tvayā kratuśatairiṣṭaṃ samāptavaradakṣiṇaiḥ || 135 ||

tvayā ca ghātito vṛtro namuciḥ pākaśāsana |
tvadājñākāriṇā pūrvaṃ viṣṇunā prabhaviṣṇunā || 136 ||

hiraṇyakaśiporbhrātā hiraṇyākṣopi ghātitaḥ |
hiraṇyakaśipuryotra jaṅghe cāropya ghātitaḥ || 137 ||

vajrapāṇinamāyāṃtamairāvaṇaśirogatam |
saṃgrāmabhūmau dṛṣṭvā tvāṃ sarve naśyaṃti dānavāḥ || 138 ||

ye tvayā vijitāḥ pūrvaṃ dānavā balavattarāḥ |
sahasrāṃśena tattulyo na bhavāmi kathaṃcana || 139 ||

evaṃvidho'si deveṃdra mama kā gaṇanā bhavet |
māṃ samuddhartukāmena tvayaivāgamanaṃ kṛtam || 140 ||

kariṣyāmi na saṃdeho dāsye prāṇānapi dhruvam |
kimarthaṃ devarājoktā bhūmireṣā tvayā hi me || 141 ||

ime dārāḥ sutā gāvo yaccānyadvidyate vasu |
trailokyarājyamakhilaṃ viprasyāsya pradīyatām || 142 ||

apakīrtirbhavenmahyaṃ pūrveṣāṃ ca na saṃśayaḥ |
gṛhāyātasya śakrasya dattaṃ bāṣkalinā na tu || 143 ||

anyopi yorthī me prāptaḥ same priyataraḥ sadā |
bhavānatra viśeṣeṇa vicāraṃ mā kṛthāḥ kvacit || 144 ||

bṛhattrapā me deveṃdra yadbhūmestu padatrayam |
brāhmaṇasya viśeṣeṇa prārthitaṃ tu tvayā vibho || 145 ||

dāsye grāmavarānasya bhavatastu triviṣṭapam |
aśvāngajānbhūmidhanaṃ striyaścodbhinnacūcukāḥ || 146 ||

yāsāṃ darśanamātreṇa vṛddhopi taruṇāyate |
tāḥ striyo vasudhāṃ caitāṃ vāmanasya pratigraham || 147 ||

pratidāsyāmi devendra prasādaḥ kriyatāṃ hi me |
etāvadukte vacane tadā bāṣkalinā nṛpa || 148 ||

purodhāstūśanā prāha dānaveṃdraṃ tadā vacaḥ |
bhavānrājā dānaveṃdra aiśvaryeṣṭavidhe sthitaḥ || 149 ||

yuktāyuktaṃ na jānāsi deyaṃ kasya mayā kvacit |
maṃtribhiḥ susamālocya yuktāyuktaṃ parīkṣya ca || 150 ||

prāptaṃ trailokyarājyatvaṃ jitvā devānsavāsavān |
vākyasyāsyāvasāneva bhavānprāpsyati baṃdhanaṃ || 151 ||

ya eṣa vāmano rājanviṣṇureva sanātanaḥ |
nāsya vai bhavatā deyaṃ pitā te ghātitaḥ svayaṃ || 152 ||

ayaṃ te pitṛhā prāpto mātṛhā baṃdhughātakaḥ |
vaṃśocchedakarastubhyaṃ bhūtaścaiva bhaviṣyati || 153 ||

na caiṣa dharmaṃ jānāti śakrādīnāṃ hite rataḥ |
māyāvinā dānavā ye māyayā yena nirjitāḥ || 154 ||

māyayā brāhmaṇaṃ rūpaṃ vāmanaṃ ca pradarśitam |
atra kiṃ bahunoktena nāsya deyaṃ tu kiṃcana || 155 ||

makṣikāpādamātraṃ tu bhūmirasya pratigrahaḥ |
vināśameṣyasi kṣipraṃ satyaṃsatyaṃ mayā śrutam || 156 ||

guruṇāpyevamuktastu bhūyo vākyamathābravīt |
dharmārthinā mayā sarvaṃ pratijñātaṃ guro tvidam || 157 ||

pratijñāpālanaṃ kāryaṃ satāṃ dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ |
yadyeṣa bhagavānviṣṇurnāsti dhanyataro mayā || 158 ||

gṛhya pratigrahaṃ matto yadi devānbubhūṣati |
bhūyopi dhanyatāṃ nīto devenānena vai guro || 159 ||

yaṃ yogino dhyānayuktā dhyāyamānā hi darśanam |
na labhaṃte tathā viprāssoyaṃ dṛṣṭo mayādya vai || 160 ||

dānāni ye prayacchaṃti sakuśodakapāṇinā |
prīyatāṃ bhagavānviṣṇuḥ paramātmā sanātanaḥ || 161 ||

evamukte tu vacane apavargasya bhāginaḥ |
yadatra kāryakaraṇe vikalpo me babhūva ha || 162 ||

upadiṣṭosmi bhavatā bālatve cāvadhāritam |
śatrāvapi gṛhāyāte māstvadeyaṃ tu kiṃcana || 163 ||

etadeva viciṃtyāhaṃ prāṇānapi svakānguro |
vāmanasya pradāsyāmi śakrasyāpi triviṣṭapam || 164 ||

apīḍākāri yaddānaṃ taddānamiha dīyate |
pīḍākāri ca yaddānaṃ taddānaṃ samalaṃ smṛtam || 165 ||

etacchrutvā gurustatra trapayādhomukhaḥ sthitaḥ |
bāṣkaliruvāca |
arthitā bhavato deva deyā sarvā dharā mayā || 166 ||

trapākaraṃ bhavenmahyaṃ yadasya bhūpadatrayam |
iṃdra uvāca |
satyametaddānavendra yaduktaṃ bhavatā hi me || 167 ||

bhūmeḥ padatrayārthitvaṃ dvijenānena me kṛtam |
etāvatā tvayaṃ cārthī mayāpyasya kṛte bhavān || 168 ||

danuputro yācitosi varametatpradīyatām |
bāṣkaliruvāca |
padatrayaṃ vāmanāya devarāja pratīccha me || 169 ||

tatra tvaṃ suciraṃ kālaṃ sukhī surapate vasa |
evamuktvā bāṣkalinā vāmanāya padatrayam || 170 ||

toyapūrvaṃ tadā dattaṃ prīyatāṃ me hariḥ svayam |
datte tu dānaveṃdreṇa tyaktvā rūpaṃ ca vāmanam || 171 ||

harirācakrame lokāndevānāṃ hitakāmyayā |
yajñaparvatamāsādya gatvā caiva udaṅmukhaḥ || 172 ||

devasya vāmacaraṇe niviṣṭo dānavālayaḥ |
tatra kramaṃ sa prathamaṃ dadau sūrye jagatpatiḥ || 173 ||

dvitīyaṃ ca dhruve devastṛtīyena ca pārthiva |
brahmāṃḍastāḍitastena devenādbhutakarmaṇā || 174 ||

aṃguṣṭhāgreṇa bhinneṃḍe jalaṃ bhūri viniḥsṛtam |
plāvayitvā brahmalokānsarvānlokānanukramāt || 175 ||

dhruvasthānaṃ sūryalokaṃ plāvya taṃ yajñaparvatam |
praviṣṭā puṣkaraṃ dhārā dhautvā viṣṇupadāni sā || 176 ||

padāni yāni jātāni vaiṣṇavāni dharātale |
tatrāśrame tu yo gatvā snānaṃ vāpyāṃ samācaret || 177 ||

aśvamedhaphalaṃ tasya darśanādeva jāyate |
ekaviṃśagaṇopeto vaikuṃṭhe vāsamāpnuyāt || 178 ||

bhuktvā tu vipulānbhogānkalpānāṃ tu śatatrayam |
tadaṃte jāyate rājā sārvabhaumaḥ kṣitāviha || 179 ||

toyadhārā tu sā bhīṣma aṃguṣṭhāgrādviniḥsṛtā |
nadī sā vaiṣṇavī proktā viṣṇupādasamudbhavā || 180 ||

anena kāraṇenābhūdgaṃgā viṣṇupadī nṛpa |
yayā sarvamidaṃ vyāptaṃ trailokyaṃ sacarācaram || 181 ||

aṃguṣṭhāgrakṣatādaṃḍādyatpraviṣṭaṃ jalaṃ śubham |
prāptaṃ devanadītvaṃ tu yātu viṣṇupadī nadī || 182 ||

devanadyā tayā vyāptaṃ brahmāṃḍaṃ sacarācaram |
vibhūtibhirmahābhāga sarvānugrahakāmyayā || 183 ||

sa bāṣkalirvāmanena uktaḥ pūraya me kramān |
adhomukhastadā jāta uttaraṃ nāsya viṃdati || 184 ||

maunībhūtaṃ tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā purodhā vākyamabravīt |
svābhāvikī dānaśaktirna tu sraṣṭuṃ vayaṃ kṣamāḥ || 185 ||

yāvatīyaṃ dharā deva sā dattānena te prabho |
ukto bāṣkalinā viṣṇuryāvanmātrā vasuṃdharā || 186 ||

yā sṛṣṭā bhavatā pūrvaṃ sā mayā na ca gopitā |
alpābhūmirbhavāndīrgho na tu sṛṣṭerahaṃ kṣamaḥ || 187 ||

icchāśaktiḥ prabhavati prabhoste deva sarvadā |
niruttarastadā viṣṇurmatvā taṃ satyavādinam || 188 ||

brūhi dānavamukhya tvaṃ kaṃ te kāmaṃ karomyaham |
mama hastagataṃ toyaṃ tvayā dattaṃ tu dānava || 189 ||

tena tvaṃ varayogyosi varāṇāṃ bhājanaṃ śubhaṃ |
dāsyehaṃ bhavataḥ kāmamarthīyena vṛṇuṣva ha || 190 ||

vijñapto hi tadā tena devadevo janārdanaḥ |
bhaktiṃ vṛṇomi deveśa tvaddhastānmaraṇaṃ hi me || 191 ||

vrajāmi śvetadvīpaṃ te durlabhaṃ tu tapasvinām |
āhaivamukte viṣṇustaṃ tiṣṭhasvaiva yugāṃtaram || 192 ||

vārāharūpī yadāhaṃ pravekṣyāmi dharātalam |
tadā haniṣyehaṃ tvāṃ tu madagre ca yadaiṣyasi || 193 ||

uktotha dānavastena apāsarppattadagrataḥ |
vāmanena samākrāṃtāḥ sarve lokāstadā nṛpa || 194 ||

asuraistaistadā tyaktaṃ devānāṃ satyabhāṣaṇam |
devo hṛtvā tu trailokyaṃ jagāmādarśanaṃ vibhuḥ || 195 ||

pātālanilayaścāpi sukhamāste sa bāṣkali |
śakropi pālayāmāsa vipaścidbhuvanatrayam || 196 ||

ayaṃ traivikramo nāma prādurbhāvo jagadguroḥ |
gaṃgāsaṃbhavasaṃyuktassarvakalmaṣanāśanaḥ || 197 ||

viṣṇoḥ padānāmeṣā te utpattiḥ kathitā nṛpa |
yāṃ śrutvā tu naro loke sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate || 198 ||

duḥsvapnaṃ durviciṃtyaṃ ca duḥṣkaraṃ duḥṣkṛtāni ca |
kṣipraṃ hi nāśamāyāṃti dṛṣṭe viṣṇupadatraye || 199 ||

yugānukramaśo dṛṣṭvā pāpino jaṃtavastathā |
sūkṣmatā darśitā bhīṣma viṣṇunā padadarśane || 200 ||

yastvārohati tasmiṃstu maunavānmānavo bhuvi |
kṛtvā tripuṣkarī yātrāmaśvamedhaphalaṃ vrajet || 201 ||
mucyate sarvapāpaiśca mṛto viṣṇupuraṃ vrajet || 202 ||

bhīṣma uvāca |
bhagavanmahadāścaryaṃ bāṣkalerbaṃdhanaṃ hi yat |
kṛtaṃ trivikramaṃ rūpaṃ yadā saṃyamito bali || 1 ||

etanmayā śrutaṃ pūrvaṃ kathyamānaṃ dvijottamaiḥ |
pātāle vasatedyāpi vairocanasuto bali || 2 ||

nāgatīrthaṃ yathābhūtaṃ piśācānāṃ tu saṃbhavam |
śivadūtī kathaṃ cātra keneyaṃ maṃgalīkṛtā || 3 ||

aṃtarikṣe puṣkaraṃ tu kena nītaṃ mahāmune |
etadācakṣva me sarvaṃ yathā bāṣkalibaṃdhanam || 4 ||

bhūmiprakramaṇaṃ pūrvaṃ kṛtaṃ devena viṣṇunā |
dvitīye kāraṇaṃ kiṃ ca yena devaścakāra ha || 5 ||

tattvatastvaṃ hi tatsarvaṃ yathābhūtaṃ tathā vada |
pāpakṣayakaraṃ hyetacchrotavyaṃ bhūtimicchatā || 6 ||

pulastya uvāca |
praśnabhārastvayā rājankautukādeva kīrtitaḥ |
kathayāmi hi tatsarvaṃ yathābhūtaṃ nṛpottama || 7 ||

viṣṇoḥ padānuṣaṃgeṇa baṃdhanaṃ bāṣkaleriha |
śrutaṃ tadbhavatā sarvaṃ mayā te parikīrtitaṃ || 8 ||

bhūyopi viṣṇunā bhīṣma prāpte vaivasvateṃtare |
trailokyaṃ balinākrāṃtaṃ viṣṇunā prabhaviṣṇunā || 9 ||

gatvā tvekākinā yajñe tathā saṃyamito bali |
bhūyopi devadevena bhūmeḥ prakramaṇaṃ kṛtam || 10 ||

prādurbhāvo vāmanasya tathābhūto narādhipa |
punastrivikramo bhūtvā vāmano bhūdavāmanaḥ || 11 ||

utpattireṣā te sarvā kathitā kurunaṃdana |
nāgānāṃ tu yathā tīrthaṃ tacchṛṇuṣva mahāvrata || 12 ||

anaṃto vāsukiścaiva takṣakaśca mahābalaḥ |
karkoṭakaśca nāgeṃdraḥ padmaścānyaḥ sarīsṛpaḥ || 13 ||

mahāpadmastathā śaṃkhaḥ kulikaścāparājitaḥ |
ete kaśyapadāyādā etairāpūritaṃ jagat || 14 ||

eteṣāṃ tu prasūtyā tu idamāpūritaṃ jagat |
kuṭilābhīmakarmāṇastīkṣṇāsyāśca viṣolbaṇāḥ || 15 ||

daṣṭvā maṃdāṃścamanujānkuryurbhasmakṣaṇāttu te |
taddarśanādbhavennāśo manuṣyāṇāṃ narādhipa || 16 ||

ahanyahani jāyeta kṣayaḥ paramadāruṇaḥ |
ātmanastu kṣayaṃ dṛṣṭvā prajāssarvāssamaṃtataḥ || 17 ||

jagmuḥ śaraṇyaṃ śaraṇaṃ brahmāṇaṃ parameśvaraṃ |
imamevārthamuddiśya prajāḥ sarvā mahīpate || 18 ||

ūcuḥ kamalajaṃ dṛṣṭvā purāṇaṃ brahmasaṃjñakam |
prajā ūcuḥ |
devadeveśa lokānāṃ prasūte parameśvara || 19 ||

trāhi nastīkṣṇadaṃṣṭrāṇāṃ bhujagānāṃ mahātmanām |
dinedine bhayaṃ deva paśyāmaḥ kṛpaṇā bhṛśam || 20 ||

manuṣyapaśupakṣyādi tatsarvaṃ bhasmasādbhavet |
tvayā sṛṣṭiḥ kṛtā deva kṣīyate tu bhujaṃgamaiḥ || 21 ||

etajjñātvā yaducitaṃ tatkuruṣva pitāmaha |
brahmovāca |
ahaṃ rakṣāṃ vidhāsyāmi bhavatīnāṃ na saṃśayaḥ || 22 ||

vrajadhvaṃ svaniketāni nīrujo gatasādhvasāḥ |
evamukte prajāḥ sarvā brahmaṇā'vyaktamūrtinā || 23 ||

ājagmuḥ paramaprītāḥ stutvā caiva svayaṃbhuvam |
prayātāsu prajāsvevaṃ tānāhūya bhujaṃgamān || 24 ||

śaśāpa paramakruddho vāsukipramukhāṃstadā |
brahmovāca |
ahanyahani bhūtāni bhakṣyaṃte vai durātmabhiḥ || 25 ||

naśyaṃti tūragairdaṣṭā manuṣyāḥ paśavastathā |
yasmānmatprabhavānnityaṃ kṣayaṃ nayatha mānuṣān || 26 ||

atonyasminbhave bhūyānmamakopātsudāruṇāt |
bhavatāṃ hi kṣayo ghoro bhāvi vaivasvateṃtare || 27 ||

tathānyaḥ somavaṃśīyo rājā vai janamejayaḥ |
dhakṣyate sarpasatreṇa pradīpte havyavāhane || 28 ||

mātṛṣvasuśca tanayāṃstārkṣyo vo bhakṣayiṣyati |
evaṃ vo bhavitā nāśaḥ sarveṣāṃ duṣṭacetasām || 29 ||

śaptvā kulasahasraṃ tu yāvadekaṃ kulaṃ sthitam |
evamukte tu vepaṃto brahmaṇā bhujagottamāḥ || 30 ||

nipatya pādayostasya idamūcurvacastadā |
bhagavankuṭilā jātirasmākaṃ bhūtabhāvana || 31 ||

viṣolbaṇatvaṃ krūratvaṃ daṃdaśūkatvameva ca |
saṃpāditaṃ tvayā deva idānīṃ śapase kathaṃ || 32 ||

brahmovāca |
yadi nāma mayā sṛṣṭā bhavaṃtaḥ kuṭilāśayāḥ |
tataḥ kiṃ bahunā nityaṃ bhakṣayadhvaṃ gatavyathāḥ || 33 ||

nāgā ūcuḥ |
maryādāṃ kuru deveśa sthānaṃ caiva pṛthakpṛthak |
manuṣyāṇāṃ tathāsmākaṃ samayaṃ deva kāraya || 34 ||

śāpo yo bhavatā datto manuṣyo janamejayaḥ |
nāśaṃ naḥ sarpasatreṇa ulbaṇaṃ ca kariṣyati || 35 ||

brahmovāca |
jaratkāruriti khyāto bhavitā brahmavittamaḥ |
jaratkanyā tasya deyā tasyāmutpatsyate sutaḥ || 36 ||

rakṣāṃ kartā sa vo vipro bhavatāṃ kulapāvanaḥ |
tathā karomi nāgānāṃ samayaṃ manujaiḥ saha || 37 ||

tadekamanasaḥ sarve śṛṇudhvaṃ mama śāsanam |
sutalaṃ vitalaṃ caiva tṛtīyaṃ ca talātalam || 38 ||

dattaṃ ca triprakāraṃ vo gṛhaṃ tatra gamiṣyatha |
tatra bhogānbahuvidhānbhuṃjānā mama śāsanāt || 39 ||

tiṣṭhadhvaṃ saptamaṃ yāvatkālaṃ taṃ tu punaḥpunaḥ |
tato vaivasvatasyādau kāśyapeyo bhaviṣyati || 40 ||

dāyādaḥ sarvadevānāṃ suparṇassarpabhakṣakaḥ |
tadā prasūtiḥ sarpāṇāṃ dagdhā vai citrabhānunā || 41 ||

bhavatāṃ caiva sarveṣāṃ bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ |
ye ye krūrā bhogino durvinītāsteṣāmaṃto bhāvitā nānyathaitat || 42 ||

kālavyāptaṃ bhakṣayadhvaṃ ca satvaṃ tathāpakāre cakṛte manuṣyam |
maṃtrauṣadhairgāruḍaiścaiva taṃtrairbaṃdhairjuṣṭā mānavā ye bhavaṃti || 43 ||

tebhyo bhītairvartitavyaṃ na cānyaccitte kāryaṃ cānyathā vo vināśaḥ |
itīrite brahmaṇā vai bhujaṃgā jagmuḥ sthānaṃ sutalākhyaṃ hi sarve || 44 ||

tasthurbhogānbhuṃjamānāśca sarve rasātale līlayā saṃsthitāste |
evaṃ śāpaṃ tute labdhvāprasādaṃ ca caturmukhāt || 45 ||

tasthuḥ pātālanilaye muditenāṃtarātmanā |
tataḥ kālāṃta rebhūte punarevaṃ vyaciṃtayan || 46 ||

bhavitā bharato rājā pāṃḍaveyo mahāyaśāḥ |
asmākaṃ tu kṣayakaro daivayogena kenacit || 47 ||

kathaṃ tribhuvane nāthaḥ sarveṣāṃ ca pitāmahaḥ |
sṛṣṭikartā jagadvaṃdyaḥ śāpamasmāsu dattavān || 48 ||

devaṃ viraṃcinaṃ tyaktvā gatiranyā na vidyate |
vairāje bhavanaśreṣṭhe tatra devaḥ sa tiṣṭhati || 49 ||

sa devaḥ puṣkarastho vai yajñaṃ yajati sāṃpratam |
gatvā prasādayāmastaṃ varaṃ tuṣṭaḥ pradāsyati || 50 ||

evaṃ viciṃtya te sarve nāgā gatvā ca puṣkaram |
yajñaparvatamāsādya śailabhittimupāśritāḥ || 51 ||

dṛṣṭvā nāgāṃstathā śrāntānvāridhārāśca śītalāḥ |
udaṅmukhā vai niṣkrāṃtāssarveṣāṃ tu sukhapradāḥ || 52 ||

nāgatīrthaṃ tato jātaṃ pṛthivyāṃ bharatarṣabha |
nāgakuṃḍaṃ ca vai kecitsaritaṃ cāpare'bruvan || 53 ||

puṇyaṃ tatsarvatīrthānāṃ sarpāṇāṃ viṣanāśanam |
majjanti tatra ye martyā adhiśrāvaṇa paṃcami || 54 ||

na teṣāṃ tu kule sarpāḥ pīḍāṃ kurvanti karhicit |
śrāddhaṃ pitṝṇāṃ ye tatra kariṣyaṃti narā bhuvi || 55 ||

brahmā teṣāṃ paraṃ sthānaṃ dāsyate nātra saṃśayaḥ |
nāgānāṃ tu bhayaṃ jñātvā brahmā lokapitāmahaḥ || 56 ||

pūrvoktaṃ tu punarvākyaṃ nāgānaśrāvayattadā |
paṃcamī sā tithirdhanyā sarvapāpaharā śubhā || 57 ||

yato'syāmeva sutithau nāgānāṃ kāryamuddhṛtam |
etasyāṃ sarvato yastu kaṭvamlaṃ parivarjayet || 58 ||

kṣīreṇa snāpayennāgāṃstasya te yāṃti mitratām |
bhīṣma uvāca |
śivadūtī yathā jātā yena caiva niveśitā || 59 ||

tanme sarvaṃ yathātattvaṃ bhavānśaṃsiturmahati |
pulastya uvāca |
śivā nīlagiriṃ prāptā tapase dhṛtamānasā || 60 ||

raudrī jaṭodbhavā śaktistasyāḥ śṛṇu nṛpa vratam |
tapaḥ kṛtvā ciraṃ kālaṃ grasiṣyāmyakhilaṃ jagat || 61 ||

evamuddiśya paṃcāgniṃ sādhayāmāsa bhāminī |
tasyāḥ kālāṃtare devyāstapaṃtyāstapa uttamam || 62 ||

rururnāmamahātejā brahmadattavaro'suraḥ |
samudramadhye ratnākhyaṃ puramasti mahādhanam || 63 ||

tatrātiṣṭhatsa daityeṃdrassarvadevabhayaṃkaraḥ |
aneka śatasāhasra koṭikoṭiśatottamaiḥ || 64 ||

asurairarcitaḥ śrīmāndvitīyo namuciryathā |
kālena mahatā so'tha lokapālapuraṃ yayau || 65 ||

jigīṣuḥ sainyasaṃvīto devairvairamarocayat |
uttiṣṭhatastasya mahāsurasya samudratoyaṃ vavṛdheti vegāt || 66 ||

aneka nāga graha mīnajuṣṭamāplāvayatparvatasānudeśān |
aṃtaḥsthitānekasurārisaṃghaṃ vicitravarmāyudhacitraśobham || 67 ||

bhīmaṃ balaṃ calitaṃ cāruyodhaṃ viniryayau siṃdhujalādviśālam |
tatra dvipā daityabhaṭhābhyupetāḥ sayānaghaṃṭāśca samṛddhiyuktāḥ || 68 ||

viniryayuḥ svākṛtibhirjhaṣāṇāṃ samatvamuccaiḥ khalu darśayaṃtaḥ |
aśvāstathā kāṃcanasūtranaddhā rohītamatsyā iva te jalāṃte || 69 ||

vyavasthitāstaiḥ samameva tūrṇaṃ viniryayurlakṣaśaḥ koṭiśaśca |
tathā ravisyaṃdanatulyavegāḥ sacakradaṃḍākṣataveṇuyuktāḥ || 70 ||

rathāśca yaṃtroparipīḍitāṃgāścalatpatākāḥ svanitaṃ vicakruḥ |
tathaiva yodhāḥ sthagitāstarībhistitīrṣavaste pravarāstrapāṇayaḥ || 71 ||

raṇeraṇe labdhajayāḥ prahāriṇo virejuruccairasurānugā bhṛśaṃ |
deveṣu vai raṇe teṣu vidruteṣu viśeṣataḥ || 72 ||

asurāssarvadevānāmanvadhāvaṃstatastataḥ |
tato devagaṇāḥ sarve dravaṃto bhayavihvalāḥ || 73 ||

nīlaṃ girivaraṃ jagmuryatra devī svayaṃ sthitā |
raudrī taponvitā dhanyā śāṃbhavī śaktiruttamā || 74 ||

saṃhārakāriṇī devī kālarātrīti yāṃ viduḥ |
sā tu dṛṣṭvā tadā devānbhayatrastānvicetasaḥ || 75 ||

papraccha vismayāddevī protphullāṃbujalocanā |
pṛṣṭhato vo na paśyāmi bhayaṃ kiṃcidupāgatam || 76 ||

kathaṃ tu vidrutā devāḥ sarve śakrapuraḥsarāḥ |
devā ūcuḥ |
ayamāyāti daityeṃdro rururbhīmaparākramaḥ || 77 ||

caturaṃgeṇa sainyena mahatā parivāritaḥ |
tasmāddīnā vayaṃ devīṃ bhavatīṃ śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ || 78 ||

devānāmiti vai śrutvā vākyamuccairjahāsa sā |
tasyāṃ hasaṃtyāṃ niścerurvarāṃgyo vadanāttataḥ || 79 ||

pāśāṃkuśadharāḥ sarvāḥ pīnonnatapayodharāḥ |
sarvāśśūladharā bhīmāḥ sarvā daṃṣṭrāṅkuśānanāḥ || 80 ||

ābaddhamakuṭāḥ sarvāḥ saṃdaṣṭadaśanacchadāḥ |
phūtkārarāvairaśivaistrāsayaṃtyaścarācaram || 81 ||

kāścicchuklāmbaradharāḥ kāściccitrāmbarāstathā |
sunīlavasanāḥ kāścidraktapānātilālasāḥ || 82 ||

nānārūpairmukhaistāstu nānāveṣavapurdharāḥ |
tābhirevaṃ vṛtā devī devānāmabhayaṃkarī || 83 ||

mā bhaiṣṭa devā bhadraṃ vo yāvadvadati dānavaḥ |
caturaṃgabalopeto rurustāvatsamāgataḥ || 84 ||

taṃ nīlaparvatavaraṃ devānāṃ mārgamārgaṇaḥ |
devānāmagrataḥ sainyaṃ dṛṣṭvā devī samākulam || 85 ||

tiṣṭhatiṣṭheti jalpaṃto daityāste samupāgatāḥ |
tataḥ pravavṛte yuddhaṃ tāsāṃ teṣāṃ mahābhayam || 86 ||

nārācairbhinnadehānāṃ daityānāṃ bhuvi sarpatāṃ |
roṣāddaṃḍaprabhagnānāṃ sarpāṇāmiva sarpatām || 87 ||

śaktinirbhinnahṛdayā gadāsaṃcūrṇitorasaḥ |
kuṭhārairbhinnaśiraso musalairbhinnamastakāḥ || 88 ||

viddhodarāstriśūlāgraiśchinnagrīvā varāsibhiḥ |
kṣatāśvarathamātaṃgapādātāḥ peturāhave || 89 ||

raṇabhūmiṃ samāsādya daityāḥ sarve ruruṃ vinā |
tato balaṃ hataṃ dṛṣṭvā rururmāyāṃ tadādade || 90 ||

tayā saṃmohitā devyo devāścāpi raṇājire |
tāmasyā māyayā devyā sarvamandhaṃtamobhavat || 91 ||

tato devī mahāśakyā taṃ daityaṃ samatāḍayat |
tayā tu tāḍitasyājau daityasya pragataṃ tamaḥ || 92 ||

māyāyāmatha naṣṭāyāṃ tāmasyāṃ dānavo ruruḥ |
pātālamāviśattūrṇaṃ tatrāpi parameśvarī || 93 ||

devībhiḥ sahitā kruddhā puratobhimukhī sthitā |
rurostu dānaveṃdrasya bhītasyāgre gatasya ca || 94 ||

nakhāgreṇa śiraśchitvā carma cādāya vegitā |
niṣpapātātha pātālātpuṣkaraṃ ca punargirim || 95 ||

kanyā sainyena mahatā bahurūpeṇa bhāsvatā |
devaistuvismitairdṛṣṭā carmamuṃḍadharā ruroḥ || 96 ||

svakīye tapasaḥ sthāne niviṣṭā parameśvarī |
tato devyo mahābhāgāḥ parivārya vyavasthitāḥ || 97 ||

yācayāmāsuravyagrāstāṃ tu devīṃ bubhukṣitāḥ |
bubhukṣitā vayaṃ devi dehi no bhojanaṃ varam || 98 ||

evamuktvā tato devī dadhyau tāsāṃ tu bhojanam |
nādhyagacchattadā tāsāṃ bhojanaṃ cintitammahat || 99 ||

tadā dadhyau mahādevaṃ rudraṃ paśupatiṃ vibhum |
sopi dhyānātsamuttasthau paramātmā trilocanaḥ || 100 ||

uvāca rudrastāṃ devīṃ kiṃ te kāryaṃ vivakṣitam |
brūhi devi mahāmāye yatte manasi vartate || 101 ||

śivadūtyuvāca |
chāgamadhye tu vai deva chāgarūpeṇa vartase |
etāstvāṃ bhakṣayiṣyanti bhakṣyamīpsitamādarāt || 102 ||

bhakṣārthamāsāṃ deveśa kiṃciddātumihārhasi |
śūlīkurvaṃti māmetā bhakṣārthinyo mahābalāḥ || 103 ||

anyathā māmapi balādbhakṣayeyurbubhukṣitāḥ |
evaṃ māṃ tu samālakṣya bhakṣyaṃ kalpaya satvaram || 104 ||

rudra uvāca |
śivadūti bravīmyekaṃ pravṛttaṃ yadyugāṃtare |
gaṃgādvāre dakṣayajño gaṇairvidhvaṃsito mama || 105 ||

tatra yajño mṛgo bhūtvā pradudrāva suvegavān |
mayā bāṇena nirviddho rudhireṇa prasecitaḥ || 106 ||

ajagaṃdhastadā bhūto nāma devaistu me kṛtam |
ajagaṃdhastvameveti dāsye cānyattu bhojanam || 107 ||

etāsāṃ śṛṇu me devi bhakṣyamekaṃ mayocitam |
kathyamānaṃ varārohe kālarātri mahāprabhe || 108 ||

yā strī sagarbhā deveśi anyastrīparidhānakam |
paridhatte spṛśedvāpi puruṣasya viśeṣataḥ || 109 ||

sabhāgostu varārohe kāsāṃcitpṛthivītale |
apyekavarṣaṃ bālaṃ tu gṛhītvā tatra vai balāt || 110 ||

bhuktvā tiṣṭhaṃtu suprītā api varṣaśatānbahūn |
anyāḥ sūtigṛhe cchidraṃ gṛhṇīyustu hyapūjitāḥ || 111 ||

nivasiṣyaṃti deveśi tathā vai jātahārikāḥ |
gṛhe kṣetre taṭāke ca vāpyudyāneṣu caiva hi || 112 ||

atyeṣu ca rudaṃtyo yā striyastiṣṭhaṃti nityaśaḥ |
tāsāṃ śarīragāścānyāḥ kāścittṛptimavāpnuyuḥ || 113 ||

śivadūtya uvāca |
kutsitaṃ bhavatā dattaṃ prajānāṃ paripīḍanam |
na ca tvaṃ budhyase dātuṃ śaṃkararasya viśeṣataḥ || 114 ||

trapākaraṃ yadbhavati prajānāṃ paripīḍakam |
na tu tadyujyate dātuṃ tāsāṃ bhakṣyaṃ tu śaṃkara || 115 ||

rudra uvāca |
avaṃtyāṃ tu yadā skaṃdo mayā pūrvaṃ tu bhadritaḥ |
cūḍākarmaṇi vṛtte tu kumārasya tadā śubhe || 116 ||

āgatya mātaro bhakṣyamapūrvaṃ tu pracakrire |
devalokāddevagaṇā mātṝṇāṃ bhoktumāgatāḥ || 117 ||

tāsāṃ gṛhe yadā pūrvaṃ brahmādyāssurasattamāḥ |
gaṃdharvāpsarasaścaiva yakṣāssarve ca guhyakāḥ || 118 ||

mervādayaḥ śikhariṇo gaṃgādyāḥ saritastathā |
sarve nāgā gajāssiddhāḥ pakṣiṇo'surasūdanāḥ || 119 ||

ḍākinyaḥ saha vetālairvṛtāḥ sarvairgrahaistadā |
kimuktenāmunā devi yatsṛṣṭaṃ brahmaṇā tviha || 120 ||

tatsarvaṃ bhojanaṃ dattaṃ svecchānnaṃ ca nabhogataṃ |
śivadūtyuvāca |
āsāṃ kṛtaṃ dehi bhojyaṃ durlabhaṃ yattriviṣṭape || 121 ||

snehāktaṃ saguḍaṃ hṛdyaṃ supakvaṃ parikalpitam |
kvacinnānyena yadbhuktamapūrvaṃ parameśvara || 122 ||

evamuktastadā sopi devadevo maheśvaraḥ |
bhakṣyārthaṃ tāstadā prāha pārvatyāścaiva sannidhau || 123 ||

mayā vai sādhitaṃ cānnaṃ prakārairbahubhiḥ kṛtaṃ |
tatsarvaṃ ca vyayaṃ yātaṃ na cānyadiha dṛśyate || 124 ||

bhavatīṣvāgatāsvadya kiṃ mayā deyamucyatām |
apūrvaṃ bhavatīnāṃ yanmayā deyaṃ viśeṣataḥ || 125 ||

asvāditaṃ na cānyena bhakṣyārthe ca dadāmyaham |
adhobhāge ca me nābhervartulau phalasannibhau || 126 ||

bhakṣayadhvaṃ hi sahitā laṃbau me vṛṣaṇāvimau |
anena cāpi bhojyena parā tṛptirbhaviṣyati || 127 ||

mahāprasādaṃ tā labdhvā devyassarvāstadā śivam |
praṇipatya sthitāśśarva idaṃ vacanamabravīt || 128 ||

kariṣyaṃti śubhācārānvinā hāsyena ye narāḥ |
teṣāṃ dhanaṃ paśuḥ putrā dārāścaiva gṛhādikam || 129 ||

bhaviṣyati mayā dattaṃ yaccānyanmanasi sthitam |
hāsyena dīrghadaśanā daridrāśca bhavaṃti te || 130 ||

tasmānna niṃdā hāsyaṃ ca kartavyaṃ hi vijānatā |
bhavatyo mātaraḥ khyātā hyasminloke bhaviṣyatha || 131 ||

upahāre narā ye tu kariṣyaṃti ca kaumudīm |
caṇakānpūrikāścaiva vṛṣaṇaiḥ saha pūpakān || 132 ||

baṃdhubhiḥ svajanaiścaiva teṣāṃ vaṃśo na chidyate |
aputro labhate putraṃ dhanārthī labhate dhanam || 133 ||

rūpavānsubhago bhogī sarvaśāstraviśāradaḥ |
haṃsayuktena yānena brahma loke mahīyate || 134 ||

śivadūti mayāpyevaṃ tāsāṃ dattaṃ ca bhakṣaṇam |
trapākaraṃ kiṃ bhavatyā uktohaṃ tanniśāmaya || 135 ||

jayasva devi cāmuṃḍe jaya bhūtāpahāriṇi |
jaya sarvagate devi kālarātri namostu te || 136 ||

viśvamūrtiyute śuddhe virūpākṣi trilocane |
bhīmarūpe śive vidye mahāmāye mahodare || 137 ||

manojaye manodurge bhīmākṣi kṣubhitakṣaye |
mahāmāri vicitrāṃgi gītanṛtyapriye śubhe || 138 ||

vikarāli mahākāli kālike pāpahāriṇi |
pāśahaste daṃḍahaste bhīmahaste bhayānake || 139 ||

cāmuṃḍe jvalamānāsye tīkṣṇadaṃṣṭre mahābale |
śivayānapriye devi pretāsanagate śive || 140 ||

bhīmākṣi bhīṣaṇe devi sarvabhūtabhayaṃkari |
karāli vikarāle ca mahākāli karālini || 141 ||

kālikarālavikrāṃte kālarātri namostu te |
sarvaśastrabhṛte devi namo devanamaskṛte || 142 ||

evaṃ stutā śivadūtī rudreṇa parameṣṭhinā |
tutoṣa paramā devī vākyaṃ caivamuvāca ha || 143 ||

varaṃ vṛṇīṣva deveśa yatte manasi vartate |
rudra uvāca |
stotreṇānena ye devi stoṣyaṃti ttvāṃ varānane || 144 ||

teṣāṃ tvaṃ varadā devi bhava sarvagatā satī |
imaṃ parvatamāruhya yaḥ pūjayati bhaktitaḥ || 145 ||

sa putrapautrapaśumānsamṛddhimupagacchatu |
yaścaivaṃ śṛṇuyādbhaktyā stavaṃ devi samudbhavaṃ || 146 ||

sarvapāpavinirmuktaḥ paraṃ nirvāṇamṛcchatu |
bhraṣṭarājyo yadā rājā navamyāṃ niyataḥ śuciḥ || 147 ||

aṣṭamyāṃ ca caturdaśyāṃ sopavāso narottama |
saṃvatsareṇa labhatāṃ rājyaṃ niṣkaṃṭakaṃ punaḥ || 148 ||

eṣā jñānānvitā śaktiḥ śivadūtīti cocyate |
ya evaṃ śṛṇuyānnityaṃ bhaktyā paramayā nṛpa || 149 ||

sarvapāpavinirmuktaḥ paraṃ nirvāṇamāpnuyāt |
yaścainaṃ paṭhate bhaktyā snātvā vai puṣkare jale || 150 ||

sarvametatphalaṃ prāpya brahmaloke mahīyate |
yatraitallikhitaṃ gehe sadā tiṣṭhati pārthiva || 151 ||

na tatrāgnibhayaṃ ghoraṃ sarvacorādisaṃbhavaṃ |
yaścedaṃ pūjayedbhaktyā pustakepi sthitaṃ budhāḥ || 152 ||

tena ceṣṭaṃ bhavetsarvaṃ trailokyaṃ sacarācaraṃ |
jāyaṃte bahavaḥ putrā dhanaṃ dhānyaṃ varastriyaḥ || 153 ||

ratnānyaśvā gajā bhṛtyāsteṣāmāśu bhavaṃti ca |
yatredaṃ likhyate gehe tatrāpyevaṃ dhruvaṃ bhavet || 154 ||
iti śrīpādmapurāṇe prathame sṛṣṭikhaṃḍe śivadūtīcaritaṃ nāma ekatriṃśo'dhyāyaḥ || 31 ||

bhīṣma uvāca |
kena karmavipākena pretatvaṃ jāyate punaḥ |
kena vātra pramucyeta tanme brūhi mahāmate || 1 ||

pulastya uvāca |
ahaṃ te kathayiṣyāmi sarvametadaśeṣataḥ |
yacchrutvā na punarmohaṃ yāsyate nṛpasattama || 2 ||

yena jāyeta pretatvaṃ yena cāsmātpramucyate |
prāpnoti narakaṃ ghoraṃ dustaraṃ tridaśairapi || 3 ||

satāṃ saṃbhāṣaṇe caiva puṇyatīrthānukīrttane |
mānavāstu pramucyaṃta āpannāḥ pretayoniṣu || 4 ||

śrūyate hi purā bhīṣma brāhmaṇaḥ saṃśitavrataḥ |
pṛthussarvatra vikhyātaḥ saṃtoṣe ca sadā sthitaḥ || 5 ||

svādhyāyayukto geheṣu nityayogaśca yogavit |
japayajñavidhānena yuktaṃ kālaṃ kṣipecca saḥ || 6 ||

yuktaḥ kṣamādayābhyāṃ ca kṣāṃtyāyuktaśca tattvavit |
ahiṃsāhitacittaśca mārddave ca tathāsthitaḥ || 7 ||

brahmacaryasamāyuktastapoyogasamanvitaḥ |
yuktaḥ sa pitṛkāryeṣu yukto vaidikakarmasu || 8 ||

paralokabhayeyukto yuktassatyavacaḥ prati |
yukto madhuravākyeṣu yuktaścātithipūjane || 9 ||

iṣṭāpūrtasamāyukto yukto dvaṃdvavivarjane |
svakarmavidhisaṃyukto yuktaḥ svādhyāyakarmasu || 10 ||

evaṃ karmāṇi kurvaṃtassaṃsāravijigīṣayā |
bahūnyabdānyatītāni brāhmaṇasya gṛhe sataḥ || 11 ||

tasya buddhiriyaṃ jātā tīrthābhigamanaṃ prati |
puṇyaistīrthajalairetatklinnaṃ kuryāṃ kalevaram || 12 ||

prayataḥ puṣkare snātvā bhāskarasyodayaṃ prati |
kṛtajapyanamaskāropyaddhvānaṃ pratyapadyata || 13 ||

agrataḥ paṃcapuruṣānapaśyatsoti bhīṣaṇān |
vane kaṃṭakavṛkṣāḍhye nirjane pakṣivarjite || 14 ||

tāndṛṣṭvā vikṛtākārānsughorānpāpadarśanān |
īṣatsaṃtrastahṛdayo vyatiṣṭhanniścalākṛtiḥ || 15 ||

avalaṃbya tato dhairyyaṃ bhayamutsṛjya dūrataḥ |
papraccha madhurābhāṣī ke yūyaṃ vikṛtāḥ kutaḥ || 16 ||

kiṃ vā caiva kṛtaṃ karma ye naprāptāśca vaikṛtam |
kathamevaṃvidhāḥ sarve prasthitāḥ kutra cādhvani || 17 ||

pretā ūcuḥ |
kṣutpipāsānvitā nityaṃ mahāduḥkhasamāvṛtāḥ |
hṛtaprajñā vayaṃ sarve naṣṭasañjñāvicetasaḥ || 18 ||

na jānīmo diśaṃ cāpi pradiśaṃ cāpi kāṃ ca na |
nāṃtarikṣaṃ mahīṃ cāpi na jānīmo divaṃ tathā || 19 ||

yadetadduḥkhamākhyātametadeva sukhaṃ bhavet |
prabhātamidamābhāti bhāskarodayadarśanāt || 20 ||

ahaṃ paryuṣito nāma sūcīmukhastathā'paraḥ |
śīghrago rohakaścaiva paṃcamo lekhakastathā || 21 ||

brāhmaṇa uvāca |
pretānāṃ karmajātānāṃ nāmnā vai saṃbhavaḥ kutaḥ |
kiṃ tatkāraṇamuddiśya yato yūyaṃ sanāmakāḥ || 22 ||

pretā ūcuḥ |
ahaṃ svādu sadā bhuṃje dadyāṃ paryuṣitaṃ dvije |
etatkāraṇamāsādya nāma paryuṣito mama || 23 ||

sūcitā bahavo'nena viprāścānnādyakāṃkṣiṇaḥ |
etatkāraṇamuddiśya sūcīmukhābhidho mataḥ || 24 ||

śīghraṃ gato'smi vipreṇa yācitaḥ kṣudhitena ca |
etatkāraṇamuddiśya śīghrago dvijasattama || 25 ||

gṛhopari sadā svādu bhuṃkte dvijabhayena hi |
udvignamānasastatra tenāsau rohakaḥ smṛtaḥ || 26 ||

maune cāpi sthito nityaṃ yācito vilikhanmahīm |
asmākamapi pāpiṣṭho lekhako nāma nāmataḥ || 27 ||

kṛcchreṇa lekhako yāti rohakastu avākśirāḥ |
śīghragaḥ paṃgutāṃ prāptaḥ sūcī sūcīmukho'bhavat || 28 ||

paryuṣito lambagrīvo laṃbodara udāhṛtaḥ |
bṛhadvṛṣaṇalaṃboṣṭhaḥ pāpādasmādajāyata || 29 ||

etatte sarvamākhyātamātmavṛttaṃ sahetukam |
pṛcchasva yadi te śraddhā pṛṣṭāśca kathayāmahe || 30 ||

brāhmaṇa uvāca |
ye jīvā bhuvi tiṣṭhaṃti sarvepyāhāramūlakāḥ |
yuṣmākamapi cāhāraṃ śrotumicchāmi tattvataḥ || 31 ||

pretā ūcuḥ |
śṛṇuṣvāhāramasmākaṃ sarvasatvavigarhitam |
yacchrutvā niṃdase vipra bhūyobhūyaśca nityaśaḥ || 32 ||

śleṣmamūtrapurīṣeṇa yoṣidaṅgamalena ca |
gṛhāṇi tyaktaśaucāni pretā bhuṃjaṃti tatra vai || 33 ||

strībhirdagdhāni kīrṇāni prakīrṇocchiṣṭakāni ca |
malenāpi jugupsyāni pretā bhuṃjaṃti tatra vai || 34 ||

cittalajjāvihīnāni homahīnāni yāni ca |
vrataiścaiva vihīnāni pretā bhuṃjaṃti tatra vai || 35 ||

guravo naiva pūjyaṃte strījitāni gṛhāṇi ca |
krodhalobhagṛhītāni pretā bhuṃjaṃti tatra vai || 36 ||

trapā me jāyate tāta kathyamāne svabhojane |
asmātparataraṃ cānyanna vaktumapi śakyate || 37 ||

nivṛttiṃ pretabhāvasya pṛcchāmastvāṃ dṛḍhavrata |
yathā na bhavati pretastanme vada tapodhana || 38 ||

brāhmaṇa uvāca |
ekarātra dvirātrādi kṛcchracāṃdrāyaṇadibhiḥ |
vratairanyaiḥ kṛtairnityaṃ na preto jāyate naraḥ || 39 ||

trīnagnīnpañca caikaṃ vā yo'hanyahani sevate |
sa vai bhūtadayāpanno na preto jāyate naraḥ || 40 ||

tulyo māne'pamāne ca tulyaḥ kāṃcanaloṣṭayoḥ |
tulyaḥ śatrau ca mitre ca na preto jāyate naraḥ || 41 ||

devatā'tithipūjāsu gurupūjāsu nityaśaḥ |
rato vai pitṛpūjāsu na preto jāyate naraḥ || 42 ||
