purā kṛtayuge rāma sarvatra brāhmaṇottaram || 44 ||

abrāhmaṇo na vai kaścittapastapati rāghava |
amṛtyavastadā sarve jāyaṃte cirajīvinaḥ || 45 ||

tretāyuge punaḥ prāpte brahmakṣatramanuttamam |
adharmo dvāpare teṣāṃ vaiśyānśūdrāṃstathāviśat || 46 ||

evaṃ niraṃtaraṃ juṣṭamudbhūtamanṛtaṃ punaḥ |
adharmasya trayaḥ pādā eko dharmasya cāgataḥ || 47 ||

tataḥ pūrve bhṛśaṃ trastā varṇā brāhmaṇapūrvakāḥ |
bhūyaḥ pādastu dharmasya dvitīyaḥ samapadyata || 48 ||

tasmindvāparasaṃjñe tu tapo vaiśyaṃ samāviśat |
yugatrayasya vaidharmyaṃ dharmasya pratitiṣṭhati || 49 ||

kalisaṃjñe tataḥ prāpte vartamāne yugeṃtime |
adharmaścānṛtaṃ caiva vavṛdhāte nararṣabha || 50 ||

bhavitā śūdrayonyāṃ tu tapaścaryā kalau yuge |
sa te viṣayaparyaṃte rājannugrataraṃ tapaḥ || 51 ||

śūdrastapati durbuddhistena bālavadhaḥ kṛtaḥ |
yasyādharmamakāryaṃ vā viṣaye pārthivasya hi || 52 ||

pure vā rājaśārdūla kurute durmatirnaraḥ |
kṣipraṃ sa narakaṃ yāti yāvadābhūtasaṃplavam || 53 ||

caturthaṃ tasya pāpasya bhāgamaśnāti pārthivaḥ |
sattvaṃ puruṣaśārdūla gacchasva viṣayaṃ svakam || 54 ||

duṣkṛtaṃ yatra paśyethāstatra yatnaṃ samācara |
evaṃ te dharmavṛddhiśca balasya vardhanaṃ tathā || 55 ||

bhaviṣyati naraśreṣṭha bālasyāsya ca jīvanam |
nāradenaivamuktastu sāścaryo raghunaṃdanaḥ || 56 ||

praharṣamatulaṃ lebhe lakṣmaṇaṃ cedamabravīt |
gaccha saumya dvijaśreṣṭhaṃ samāśvāsaya lakṣmaṇa || 57 ||

bālasya ca śarīraṃ tvaṃ tailadroṇyāṃ nidhāpaya |
gaṃdhaiśca paramodāraistailaiścaiva sugaṃdhibhiḥ || 58 ||

yathā na śīryate bālastathā saumya vidhīyatām |
yathā śarīraṃ guptaṃ syādbālasyākliṣṭakarmaṇaḥ || 59 ||

vipattiḥ paribhedo vā na bhavettattathā kuru |
tathā saṃdiśya saumitraṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ śubhalakṣaṇam || 60 ||

manasā puṣpakaṃ dadhyāvāgaccheti mahāyaśāḥ |
iṃgitaṃ tattu vijñāya kāmagaṃ hemabhūṣitam || 61 ||

ājagāma muhūrtāttu samīpaṃ rāghavasya hi |
sobravītprāñjalirvākyamahamasmi narādhipa || 62 ||

agre tava mahābāho kiṃkaraḥ samupasthitaḥ |
bhāṣitaṃ suciraṃ śrutvā puṣpakasya narādhipa || 63 ||

abhivādya maharṣīṃstānvimānaṃ sodhyarohata |
dhanurgṛhītvā tūṇau ca khaḍgaṃ cāpi mahāprabham || 64 ||

nikṣipya nagare vīrau saumitri bharatāvubhau |
prāyātpratīcīṃ tvarito vicinvansusamāhitaḥ || 65 ||

uttarāmagamatpaścāddiśaṃ himavadāśritām |
pūrvāmapi diśāṃ gatvā tathā'paśyannarādhipaḥ || 66 ||

sarvāṃ śuddhasamācārāmādarśamiva nirmalām |
tato diśaṃ samākrāmaddakṣiṇāṃ raghunaṃdanaḥ || 67 ||

śailasya uttare pārśve dadarśa sumahatsaraḥ |
tasminsarasi tapyaṃtaṃ tāpasaṃ sumahattapaḥ || 68 ||

dadarśa rāghavo bhīmaṃ laṃbamānamadhomukhaṃ |
tamupāgamya kākutsthastapyamānaṃ tu tāpasam || 69 ||

uvāca rāghavo vākyaṃ dhanyastvamamaraprabha |
kasyāṃ yonau tapovṛddhirvartate dṛḍhaniścaya || 70 ||

ahaṃ dāśarathī rāmaḥ pṛcchāmi tvāṃ kutūhalāt |
kortho vyavasitastubhyaṃ svargalokotha vetaraḥ || 71 ||

kimarthaṃ tapyase vā tvaṃ śrotumicchāmi tāpasa |
brāhmaṇo vāsi bhadraṃ te kṣatriyo vātha durjayaḥ || 72 ||

vaiśyastṛtīyavarṇo vā śūdro vā satyamucyatām |
tapaḥ satyātmakaṃ nityaṃ svargalokaparigrahe || 73 ||

sātvikaṃ rājasaṃ caiva tacca satyātmakaṃ tapaḥ |
jagadupakāraheturhi sṛṣṭaṃ tadvai viriṃcinā || 74 ||

raudraṃ kṣatriyatejojaṃ tattu rājasamucyate |
parasyotsādanārthāya taccāsuramudāhṛtam || 75 ||

aṃgāni nihnute yo vā asṛgdigdhāni bhāgaśaḥ |
paṃcāgniṃsādhayedvāpi siddhiṃ vā mṛtyumeva vā || 76 ||

āsuro hyeṣa te bhāvo na ca me tvaṃ dvijo mataḥ |
satyaṃ te vadataḥ siddhiranṛte nāsti jīvitam || 77 ||

tasya tadbhāṣitaṃ śrutvā rāmasyākliṣṭakarmaṇaḥ |
avākśirāstathā bhūto vākyametaduvāca ha || 78 ||

svāgataṃ te nṛpaśreṣṭha cirāddṛṣṭosi rāghava |
putrabhūtosmi te cāhaṃ pitṛbhūtosi menagha || 79 ||

athavā naitadevaṃ hi sarveṣāṃ nṛpatiḥ pitā |
satvamarcyo'si bho rājanvayaṃ te viṣaye tapaḥ || 80 ||

carāmastatrabhāgosti pūrvaṃ sṛṣṭaḥ svayaṃbhuvā |
na dhanyāḥ smo vayaṃ rāma dhanyastvamasi pārthiva || 81 ||

yasya te viṣaye hyevaṃ siddhimicchaṃti tāpasāḥ |
tapasā tvaṃ madīyena siddhimāpnuhi rāghava || 82 ||

yadetadbhavatā proktaṃ yonau kasyāṃ tu te tapaḥ |
śūdrayoniprasūtohaṃ tapa ugraṃ samāsthitaḥ || 83 ||

devatvaṃ prārthaye rāma svaśarīreṇa suvrata |
na mithyāhaṃ vade bhūpa devalokajigīṣayā || 84 ||

śūdraṃ māṃ viddhi kākutstha śaṃbūkaṃ nāma nāmataḥ |
bhāṣatastasya kākutsthaḥ khaḍgaṃ tu ruciraprabhaṃ || 85 ||

niṣkṛṣya kośādvimalaṃ śiraściccheda rāghavaḥ |
tasminśūdre hate devāḥ sendrāścāgnipurogamāḥ || 86 ||

sādhusādhviti kākutsthaṃ praśaśaṃsurmuhurmuhuḥ |
puṣpavṛṣṭiśca mahatī devānāṃ susugaṃdhinī || 87 ||

ākāśādvipramuktā tu rāghavaṃ sarvatokirat |
suprītāścābruvandevā rāmaṃ vākyavidāṃvaram || 88 ||

surakāryamidaṃ saumya kṛtaṃ te raghunaṃdana |
gṛhāṇa ca varaṃ rāma yamicchasi mahāvrata || 89 ||

tvatkṛtena hi śūdro'yaṃ saśarīro'bhyagāddivaṃ |
devānāṃ bhāṣitaṃ śrutvā rāghavaḥ susamāhitaḥ || 90 ||

uvāca prāñjalirvākyaṃ sahasrākṣaṃ puraṃdaram |
yadi devāḥ prasannā me varārho yadi vāpyaham || 91 ||

karmaṇā yadi me prītā dvijaputraḥ sa jīvatu |
varametaddhi bhavatāṃ kāṃkṣitaṃ paramaṃ hi me || 92 ||

mamāparādhādbālo'sau brāhmaṇasyaikaputrakaḥ |
aprāptakālaḥ kālena nīto vaivasvata kṣayam || 93 ||

taṃ jīvayata bhadraṃ vo nānṛtī syāmahaṃ guroḥ |
dvijasya saṃśruto hyartho jīvayiṣyāmi te sutam || 94 ||

madīyenāyuṣā bālaṃ pādenārddhena vā surāḥ |
jīvedayaṃ varo mahyaṃ varakoṭyadhiko vṛtaḥ || 95 ||

rāghavasya tu tadvākyaṃ śrutvā vibudhasattamāḥ |
pratyūcuste mahātmānaṃ prītāḥ prītisamanvitāḥ || 96 ||

nirvṛto bhava kākutstha brāhmaṇasyaikaputrakaḥ |
jīvitaṃ prāptavānbhūyaḥ sametaścāpi baṃdhubhiḥ || 97 ||

yasminmuhūrte kākutstha śūdroyaṃ vinipātitaḥ |
tasminmuhūrte sahasā jīvena samayujyata || 98 ||

svasti prāpnuhi bhadraṃ te sādhayāmaḥ paraṃtapaḥ |
agastyasyāśramapade draṣṭāraḥ sma mahāmunim || 99 ||

sa tatheti pratijñāya devānāṃ raghunaṃdanaḥ |
āruroha vimānaṃ taṃ puṣpakaṃ hemabhūṣitam || 100 ||

pulastya uvāca |
tato devāḥ prayātāste vimānairbahubhistadā |
rāmopyanujagāmāśu kuṃbhayonestapovanam || 1 ||

uktaṃ bhagavatā tena bhūyopyāgamanaṃ kriyāḥ |
pūrvameva sabhāyāṃ ca yo māṃ draṣṭuṃ samāgataḥ || 2 ||

tadahaṃ devatādeśāttatkāryārthe mahāmuniṃ |
paśyāmi taṃ muniṃ gatvā devadānavapūjitam || 3 ||

upadeśaṃ ca me tuṣṭaḥ svayaṃ dāsyati sattamaḥ |
duḥkhī yena punarmartye na bhavāmi kadācana || 4 ||

pitā daśaratho mahyaṃ kausalyā jananī tathā |
sūryavaṃśe samutpannastathāpyevaṃ suduḥkhitaḥ || 5 ||

rājyakāle vane vāso bhāryayā cānujena ca |
haraṇaṃ cāpi bhāryāyā rāvaṇena kṛtaṃ mama || 6 ||

asahāyena tu mayā tīrtvā sāgaramuttamam |
ruddhvā tu tāṃ purīṃ sarvāṃ kṛtvā tasya kulakṣayam || 7 ||

dṛṣṭā sītā mayā tyaktā devānāṃ tu purastadā |
śuddhāṃ tāṃ māṃ tathocuste mayā sītā tathā gṛham || 8 ||

samānītā prītimatā lokavākyādvisarjitā |
vane vasati sā devī pure cāhaṃ vasāmi vai || 9 ||

jātohamuttame vaṃśe uttamohaṃ dhanuṣmatām |
uttamaṃ duḥkhamāpanno hṛdayaṃ naiva bhidyate || 10 ||

vajrasārasya sāreṇa dhātrāhaṃ nirmito dhruvam |
idānīṃ brāhmaṇādeśādbhramāmi dharaṇītale || 11 ||

tapaḥ sthitastu śūdrosau mayā pāpo nipātitaḥ |
devavākyāttu me bhūyaḥ prāṇo me hṛdi saṃsthitaḥ || 12 ||

paśyāmi taṃ muniṃ vaṃdyaṃ jagatosya hite ratam |
dṛṣṭena me tathā duḥkhaṃ nāśameṣyati satvaram || 13 ||

udayena sahasrāṃśorhimaṃ yadvadvilīyate |
tadvanme duḥkhasaṃprāptiḥ sarvathā nāśameṣyati || 14 ||

dṛṣṭvā ca devānsaṃprāptānagastyo bhagavānṛṣiḥ |
arghyamādāya suprītaḥ sarvāṃstānabhyapūjayat || 15 ||

te tu gṛhya tataḥ pūjāṃ saṃbhāṣya ca mahāmuniṃ |
jagmustena tadā hṛṣṭā nākapṛṣṭhaṃ sahānugāḥ || 16 ||

gateṣu teṣu kākutsthaḥ puṣpakādavaruhya ca |
abhivādayituṃ prāptaḥ sogastyamṛṣimuttamam || 17 ||

rājovāca |
suto daśarathasyāhaṃ bhavaṃtamabhivāditum |
āgato vai muniśreṣṭha saumyenekṣasva cakṣuṣā || 18 ||

nirdhūtapāpastvāṃ dṛṣṭvā bhavāmīha na saṃśayaḥ |
etāvaduktvā sa munimabhivādya punaḥ punaḥ || 19 ||

kuśalaṃ bhṛtyavargasya mṛgāṇāṃ tanayasya ca |
bhagavaddarśanākāṃkṣī śūdraṃ hatvā tvihāgataḥ || 20 ||

agastya uvāca |
svāgataṃ te raghuśreṣṭha jagadvaṃdya sanātana |
darśanāttava kākutstha pūtohaṃ munibhiḥ saha || 21 ||

tvatkṛte raghuśārdūla gṛhāṇārghaṃ mahādyute |
svāgataṃ naraśārdūla diṣṭyā prāptosi śatruhan || 22 ||

tvaṃ hi nityaṃ bahumato guṇairbahubhiruttamaiḥ |
atastvaṃ pūjanīyo vai mama nityaṃ hṛdisthitaḥ || 23 ||

surā hi kathayaṃti tvāṃ śūdraghātinamāgataṃ |
brāhmaṇasya ca dharmeṇa tvayā vai jīvitaḥ sutaḥ || 24 ||

uṣyatāṃ ceha bhagavaḥ sakāśe mama rāghava |
prabhāte puṣpakeṇāsi gaṃtāyodhyāṃ mahāmate || 25 ||

idaṃ cābharaṇaṃ saumya sukṛtaṃ viśvakarmaṇā |
divyaṃ divyenavapuṣā dīpyamānaṃ svatejasā || 26 ||

pratigṛhṇīṣva rājendra matpriyaṃ kuru rāghava |
labdhasya hi punarddāne sumahatphalamucyate || 27 ||

tvaṃ hi śaktaḥ paritrātuṃ seṃdrānapi surottamān |
tasmātpradāsye vidhivatpratīcchasva nararṣabha || 28 ||

athovāca mahābāhurikṣvākūṇāṃ mahārathaḥ |
kṛtāṃjalirmuniśreṣṭhaṃ svaṃ ca dharmamanusmaran || 29 ||

pratigraho vai bhagavaṃstava me'tra vigarhitaḥ |
kṣatriyeṇa kathaṃ vipra pratigrāhyaṃ vijānatā || 30 ||

brāhmaṇena tu yaddattaṃ tanme tvaṃ vaktumarhasi |
saputro gṛhavānasmi samarthosmi mahāmune || 31 ||

āpadā cana cākrāṃtaḥ kathaṃ grāhyaḥ pratigrahaḥ |
bhāryā me suciraṃ naṣṭā na cānyā mama vidyate || 32 ||

kevalaṃ doṣabhāgī ca bhavāmīha na saṃśayaḥ |
kaṣṭāṃ caiva daśāṃ prāpya kṣatriyopi pratigrahī || 33 ||

kurvanna doṣamāpnoti manurevātra kāraṇam |
vṛddhau ca mātāpitarau sādhvī bhāryā śiśuḥ sutaḥ || 34 ||

apyakāryaśataṃ kṛtvā bhartavyā manurabravīt |
nāhaṃ pratīcche viprarṣe tvayā dattaṃ pratigrahaṃ || 35 ||
na ca me bhavatā kopaḥ kāryo vai surapūjita || 36 ||

agastya uvāca |
na ca pratigrahe doṣo gṛhīte pārthivairnṛpa |
bhavānvai tāraṇe śaktastrailokyasyāpi rāghava || 37 ||

tāraya brāhmaṇaṃ rāma viśeṣeṇa tapasvinaṃ |
tasmātpradāsye vidhivatpratīcchasva narāghipa || 38 ||

rāma uvāca |
kṣatriyeṇa kathaṃ vipra pratigrāhyaṃ vijānatā |
brāhmaṇena tu yaddattaṃ tanme tvaṃ vaktumarhasi || 39 ||

agastya uvāca |
āsītkṛtayuge rāma brahmapūte purātane |
apārthivāḥ prajāḥ sarvāḥ surāṇāṃ ca śatakratuḥ || 40 ||

tāḥ prajā devadeveśaṃ rājārthaṃ samupāgaman |
surāṇāṃ vidyate rājā devadevaḥ śatakratuḥ || 41 ||

śreyasesmāsu lokeśa pārthivaṃ kuru sāṃprataṃ |
yasminpūjāṃ prayuṃjānāḥ puruṣā bhuṃjate mahīm || 42 ||

tato brahmā suraśreṣṭho lokapālānsavāsavān |
samāhūyābravītsarvāṃstejobhāgo'tra yujyatām || 43 ||

tato dadurlokapālāścaturbhāgaṃ svatejasā |
akṣayaśca tato brahmā yato jāto'kṣayo nṛpaḥ || 44 ||

taṃ brahmā lokapālānāmaṃśaṃ puṃsāmayojayat |
tato nṛpastadā tāsāṃ prajānāṃ kṣemapaṃḍitaḥ || 45 ||

tatraiṃdreṇa tu bhāgena sarvānājñāpayennṛpaḥ |
vāruṇena ca bhāgena sarvānpuṣṇāti dehinaḥ || 46 ||

kaubereṇa tathāṃśena tvarthāndiśati pārthivaḥ |
yaśca yāmyo nṛpe bhāgastena śāsti ca vai prajāḥ || 47 ||

tatra caiṃdreṇa bhāgena narendrosi raghūttama |
pratigṛhṇīṣvābharaṇaṃ tāraṇārthe mama prabho || 48 ||

tato rāmaḥ prajagrāha munerhastānmahātmanaḥ |
divyamābharaṇaṃ citraṃ pradīptamiva bhāskaraṃ || 49 ||

pratigṛhya tatogastyādrāghavaḥ paravīrahā |
nirīkṣya suciraṃ kālaṃ vicārya ca punaḥ punaḥ || 50 ||

mauktikāni vicitrāṇi dhātrīphalasamāni ca |
jāṃbūnadanibaddhāni vajravidrumanīlakaiḥ || 51 ||

padmarāgaiḥ sagomedhairvaiḍūryaiḥ puṣparāgakaiḥ |
sunibaddhaṃ suvibhaktaṃ sukṛtaṃ viśvakarmaṇā || 52 ||

dṛṣṭvā prītisamāyukto bhūyaścedaṃ vyaciṃtayat |
nedṛśāni ca ratnāni mayā dṛṣṭāni kānicit || 53 ||

upaśobhāni baddhāni pṛthvīmūlyasamāni ca |
vibhīṣaṇasya laṃkāyāṃ na dṛṣṭāni mayā purā || 54 ||

iti saṃcitya manasā rāghavastamṛṣiṃ punaḥ |
āgamaṃ tasya divyasya praṣṭuṃ samupacakrame || 55 ||

atyadbhutamidaṃ brahmanna prāpyaṃ ca mahīkṣitām |
kathaṃ bhagavatā prāptaṃ kuto vā kena nirmitam || 56 ||

kutūhalavaśāccaiva pṛcchāmi tvāṃ mahāmate |
karatalesthite ratne karamadhyaṃ prakāśate || 57 ||

adhamaṃ tadvijānīyātsarvaśāstreṣu garhitam |
diśaḥ prakāśayedyattanmadhyamaṃ munisattama || 58 ||

ūrdhvagaṃ triśikhaṃ yatsyāduttamaṃ tadudāhṛtam |
etānyuttamajātīni ṛṣibhiḥ kīrtitāni tu || 59 ||

āścaryāṇāṃ bahūnāṃ hi divyānāṃ bhagavānnidhiḥ |
evaṃ vadati kākutsthe munirvākyamathābravīt || 60 ||

agastya uvāca |
śṛṇu rāma purāvṛttaṃ purā tretāyuge mahat |
dvāpare samanuprāpte vane yaddṛṣṭavānaham || 61 ||

āścaryaṃ sumahābāho nibodha raghunaṃdana |
purā tretāyuge hyāsīdaraṇyaṃ bahuvistaram || 62 ||

samaṃtādyojanaśataṃ mṛgavyāghravivarjitam |
tasminniṣpuruṣe'raṇye cikīrṣustapa uttamam || 63 ||

ahamākramituṃ saumya tadaraṇyamupāgataḥ |
tasyāraṇyasya madhyaṃ tu yuktaṃ mūlaphalaiḥ sadā || 64 ||

śākairbahuvidhākārairnānārūpaiḥ sukānanaiḥ |
tasyāraṇyasya madhye tu paṃcayojanamāyatam || 65 ||

haṃsakāraṃḍavākīrṇaṃ cakravākopaśobhitam |
tatrāścaryaṃ mayā dṛṣṭaṃ saraḥ paramaśobhitam || 66 ||

visārikacchapākīrṇaṃ bakapaṃktigaṇairyutam |
samīpe tasya sarasastapastaptuṃ gataḥ purā || 67 ||

deśaṃ puṇyamupetyaivaṃ sarvahiṃsāvivarjitam |
tatrāhamavasaṃ rātriṃ naidāghīṃ puruṣarṣabha || 68 ||

prabhāte purutthāya sarastadupacakrame |
athāpaśyaṃ śavamahamaspṛṣṭajarasaṃ kvacit || 69 ||

tiṣṭhaṃtaṃ parayā lakṣmyā saraso nātidūrataḥ |
tadarthaṃ ciṃtayānohaṃ muhūrtamiva rāghava || 70 ||

asya tīre na vai prāṇī ko vāpyeṣa surarṣabhaḥ |
munirvā pārthivo vāpi kva muniḥ pārthivopi vā || 71 ||

athavā pārthivasutastasyaivaṃ saṃbhavaḥ kṛtaḥ |
atītehani rātrau vā prātarvāpi mṛto yadi || 72 ||

avaśyaṃ tu mayā jñeyā sarasosya viniṣkriyā |
yāvadevaṃ sthitaścāhaṃ ciṃtayāno raghūttama || 73 ||

athāpaśyaṃ mūhūrtāttu divyamadbhutadarśanam |
vimānaṃ paramodāraṃ haṃsayuktaṃ manojavam || 74 ||

purastatra sahasraṃ tu vimānepsarasāṃ nṛpa |
gaṃdharvāścaiva tatsaṃkhyā ramayaṃti varaṃ naram || 75 ||

gāyaṃti divyageyāni vādayaṃti tathā pare |
athāpaśyaṃ naraṃ tasmādvimānādavarohitam || 76 ||

śavamāṃsaṃ bhakṣayantaṃ ca snātvā raghukulodvaha |
tato bhuktvā yathākāmaṃ sa māṃsaṃ bahupīvaram || 77 ||

avatīrya saraḥ śīghramāruroha divaṃ punaḥ |
tamahaṃ devasaṃkāśaṃ śriyā paramayānvitam || 78 ||

bho bho svarginmahābhāga pṛcchāmi tvāṃ kathaṃ tvidam |
jugupsitastavāhāro gatiśceyaṃ tavottamā || 79 ||

yadi guhyaṃ na caitatte kathaya tvadya me bhavān |
kāmataḥ śrotumicchāmi kimetatparamaṃ vacaḥ || 80 ||

ko bhavānvada saṃdehamāhāraśca vigarhitaḥ |
tvayedaṃ bhujyate saumya kimarthaṃ kva ca vartase || 81 ||

kasyāyamaiśvarobhāvaḥ śavatvena vinirmitaḥ |
āhāraṃ ca kathaṃ niṃdyaṃ śrotumicchāmi tattvataḥ || 82 ||

śrutvā ca bhāṣitaṃ tatra mama rāma satāṃ vara |
prāṃjaliḥ pratyuvācedaṃ sa svargī raghunaṃdana || 83 ||

śṛṇuṣvādya yathāvṛttaṃ mamedaṃ sukhaduḥkhajam |
kāmo hi duritakramyaḥ śṛṇu yatpṛcchase dvija || 84 ||

purā vaidarbhako rājā pitā me hi mahāyaśāḥ |
vāsudeva iti khyātastriṣu lokeṣu dhārmikaḥ || 85 ||

tasya putradvayaṃ brahmandvābhyāṃ strībhyāmajāyata |
ahaṃ śveta iti khyāto yavīyānsuratho'bhavat || 86 ||

pitaryuparate tasminpaurā māmabhyaṣecayan |
tatrāhaṃkārayanrājyaṃ dharme cāsaṃ samāhitaḥ || 87 ||

evaṃ varṣasahasrāṇi bahūni samupāvrajan |
mama rājyaṃ kārayataḥ paripālayataḥ prajāḥ || 88 ||

sohaṃ nimitte kasmiṃścidvairāgyeṇa dvijottama |
maraṇaṃ hṛdaye kṛtvā tapovanamupāgamam || 89 ||

sohaṃ vanamidaṃ ramyaṃ bhṛśaṃ pakṣivivarjitam |
praviṣṭastapa āsthātumasyaiva sarasoṃtike || 90 ||

rājye'bhiṣicya surathaṃ bhrātaraṃ taṃ narādhipam |
idaṃ saraḥ samāsādya tapastaptaṃ sudāruṇam || 91 ||

daśavarṣasahasrāṇi tapastaptvā mahāvane |
śubhaṃ tu bhavanaṃ prāpto brahmalokamanāmayam || 92 ||

svargasthamapi māṃ brahmankṣutpipāse dvijottama |
abādhetāṃ bhṛśaṃ cāhamabhavaṃ vyathiteṃdriyaḥ || 93 ||

tatastribhuvanaśreṣṭhamavocaṃ vai pitāmaham |
bhagavansvargaloko'yaṃ kṣutpipāsā vivarjitaḥ || 94 ||

kasyeyaṃ karmaṇaḥ paktiḥ kṣutpipāse yato hi me |
āhāraḥ kaśca me deva brūhi tvaṃ śrīpitāmaha || 95 ||

tataḥ pitāmahaḥ samyakciraṃ dhyātvā mahāmune |
māmuvāca tato vākyaṃ nāsti bhojyaṃ svadehajam || 96 ||

ṝte te svāni māṃsāni bhakṣaya tvaṃ tu hi nityaśaḥ |
svaśarīraṃ tvayā puṣṭaṃ kurvatā tapa uttamam || 97 ||

nādattaṃ jāyate tāta śveta paśya mahītale |
āgrahādbhikṣamāṇāya bhikṣāpi prāṇine purā || 98 ||

na hi dattā gṛhe bhrāṃtyā mohādatithaye tadā |
tena svargagatasyāpi kṣutpipāse tavādhunā || 99 ||

sa tvaṃ prapuṣṭamāhāraiḥ svaśarīramanuttamam |
bhakṣayasva ca rājeṃdra sā te tṛptirbhaviṣyati || 100 ||

evamuktastato devaṃ brahmāṇamahamuktavān |
bhakṣite ca svake dehe punaranyanna me vibho || 101 ||

kṣudhānivāraṇaṃ naiva dehasyāsya vinaudanaṃ |
khādāmi hyakṣayaṃ deva priyaṃ me na hi jāyate || 102 ||

tatobravītpunarbrahmā tava deho'kṣayaḥ kṛtaḥ |
dinedine te puṣṭātmā śavaḥ śveta bhaviṣyati || 103 ||

yāvadvarṣaśataṃ pūrṇaṃ svamāṃsaṃ khāda bho nṛpa |
yadāgacchati cāgastyaḥ śvetāraṇyaṃ mahātapāḥ || 104 ||

bhagavānatidurdharṣastadā kṛcchrādvimokṣyase |
sa hi tārayituṃ śaktaḥ seṃdrānapi surāsurān || 105 ||

āhāraṃ kutsitaṃ cemaṃ rājarṣe kiṃ punastava |
surakāryaṃ mahattena sukṛtaṃ tu mahātmanā || 106 ||

udadhiṃ nirjalaṃ kṛtvā dānavāśca nipātitāḥ |
viṃdhyaścādityavidveṣādvardhamāno nivāritaḥ || 107 ||

laṃbamānā mahī caiṣā gurutvenādhivāsitā |
dakṣiṇā digdivaṃ yātā trailākyaṃ viṣamasthitam || 108 ||

mayā gatvā suraiḥ sārddhaṃ preṣito dakṣiṇāṃ diśam |
samāṃ kuru mahābhāga gurutvena jagatsamam || 109 ||

evaṃ ca tena muninā sthitvā sarvā dharā samā |
kṛtā rājeṃdra muninā evamadyāpi dṛśyate || 110 ||

sohaṃ bhagavata śrutvā devadevasya bhāṣitam |
bhuṃje ca kutsitāhāraṃ svaśarīramanuttamam || 111 ||

pūrṇaṃ varṣaśataṃ cādya bhojanaṃ kutsitaṃ ca me |
kṣayaṃ nābhyeti tadvipra tṛptiścāpi mamottamā || 112 ||

taṃ muniṃ kṛcchrasantaptaściṃtayāmi divāniśam |
kadā vai darśanaṃ mahyaṃ sa munirdāsyate vane || 113 ||

evaṃ me ciṃtayānasya gataṃ varṣaśatantviha |
sogastyo hi gatirbrahmanmunirme bhavitā dhruvaṃ || 114 ||

na gatirbhavitā mahyaṃ kuṃbhayonimṛte dvijam |
śrutvetthaṃ bhāṣitaṃ rāma dṛṣṭvāhāraṃ ca kutsitam || 115 ||

kṛpayā parayā yuktastaṃ nṛpaṃ svargagāminam |
karomyahaṃ sudhābhojyaṃ nāśayāmi ca kutsitam || 116 ||

cintayannityavocaṃ tamagastyaḥ kiṃ kariṣyati |
ahametatkutsitaṃ te nāśayāmi mahāmate || 117 ||

īpsitaṃ prārthayasvāsmānmanaḥ prītikaraṃ param |
sa svargī māṃ tataḥ prāha kathaṃ brahmavaconyathā || 118 ||

kartuṃ mune mayā śakyaṃ na cānyastārayiṣyati |
ṝte vai kuṃbhayoniṃ taṃ maitrāvaruṇasaṃbhavam || 119 ||

apṛṣṭopi mayā brahmannevamūce pitāmahaḥ |
evaṃ bruvāṇaṃ taṃ śvetamuktavānahamasmi saḥ || 120 ||

āgatastava bhāgyena dṛṣṭohaṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ |
tataḥ svargī sa māṃ jñātvā daṃḍavatpatito bhuvi || 121 ||

tamutthāpya tato rāmābravaṃ kiṃ te karomyaham |
rājovāca |
āhārātkutsitādbrahmaṃstārayasvādya duṣkṛtāt || 122 ||

yena loko'kṣayaḥ svargo bhavitā tvatkṛtena me |
tataḥ pratigraho datto jagadvaṃdya nṛpeṇa hi || 123 ||
bhavānmāmanugṛhṇātu pratīcchasva pratigraham || 127 ||

kṛtā matistāraṇāya na lobhādraghunaṃdana |
gṛhīte bhūṣaṇe rāma mama hastagate tadā || 128 ||

mānuṣaḥ paurviko dehastadā naṣṭosya bhūpate |
praṇaṣṭe tu śarīre ca rājarṣiḥ parayā mudā || 129 ||

mayoktosau vimānena jagāma tridivaṃ punaḥ |
tena me śakratulyena dattamābharaṇaṃ śubhaṃ || 130 ||

tasminnimitte kākutstha dattamadbhutakarmaṇā |
śveto vaidarbhako rājā tadābhūdgatakalmaṣaḥ || 131 ||

pulastya uvāca |
tadadbhutatamaṃ vākyaṃ śrutvā ca raghunaṃdanaḥ |
gauravādvismayāccāpi bhūyaḥ praṣṭuṃ pracakrame || 1 ||

rāma uvāca |
bhagavaṃstadvanaṃ ghoraṃ yatrāsau taptavāṃstapaḥ |
śveto vaidarbhako rājā tadadbhutamabhūtkathaṃ || 2 ||

viṣamaṃ tadvanaṃ rājā śūnyaṃ mṛgavivarjitaṃ |
praviṣṭastapa āsthātuṃ kathaṃ vada mahāmune || 3 ||

samaṃtādyojanaśataṃ nirmanuṣyamabhūtkathaṃ |
bhavānkathaṃ praviṣṭastadyena kāryeṇa tadvada || 4 ||

agastya uvāca |
purā kṛtayuge rājā manurdaṃḍadharaḥ prabhuḥ |
tasya putrotha nāmnāsīdikṣvākuramitadyutiḥ || 5 ||

taṃ putraṃ pūrvajaṃ rājye nikṣipya bhuvisaṃmatam |
pṛthivyāṃ rājavaṃśānāṃ bhava rājetyuvāca ha || 6 ||

tatheti ca pratijñātaṃ pituḥ putreṇa rāghava |
tataḥparamasaṃhṛṣṭaḥ punastaṃ pratyabhāṣata || 7 ||

prītosmi paramodāra karmaṇā te na saṃśayaḥ |
daṃḍena ca prajā rakṣa na ca daṃḍamakāraṇam || 8 ||

aparādhiṣu yo daṃḍaḥ pātyate mānavairiha |
sa daṃḍo vidhivanmuktaḥ svargaṃ nayati pārthivam || 9 ||

tasmāddaṇḍe mahābāho yatnavānbhava putraka |
dharmaste paramo loke kṛta evaṃ bhaviṣyati || 10 ||

iti taṃ bahusaṃdiśya manuḥ putraṃ samādhinā |
jagāma tridivaṃ hṛṣṭo brahmalokamanuttamam || 11 ||

janayiṣye kathaṃ putrāniti ciṃtāparo'bhavat |
karmabhirbahubhistaistaissasutaissaṃyuto'bhavat || 12 ||

toṣayāmāsa putraissa pitṝndevasutopamaiḥ |
sarveṣāmuttamasteṣāṃ kanīyānraghunaṃdana || 13 ||

śūraśca kṛtavidyaśca guruśca janapūjayā |
nāma tasyātha daṃḍeti pitā cakre sa buddhimān || 14 ||

bhaviṣyaddaṇḍapatanaṃ śarīre tasya vīkṣya ca |
saṃpaśyamānastaṃ doṣaṃ ghoraṃ putrasya rāghava || 15 ||

sa viṃdhyanīlayormadhye rājyamasya dadau prabhuḥ |
sa daṃḍastatra rājābhūdramye parvatamūrddhani || 16 ||

puraṃ cāpratimaṃ tena niveśāya tathā kṛtam |
nāma tasya purasyātha madhumattamiti svayam || 17 ||

tathādeśena saṃpannaḥ śūro vāsamathākarot |
evaṃ rājā sa tadrājyaṃ cakāra sapurohitaḥ || 18 ||

prahṛṣṭa suprajākīrṇaṃ devarājo yathā divi |
tataḥ sa daṃḍaḥ kākutstha bahuvarṣagaṇāyutam || 19 ||

akārayattu dharmātmā rājyaṃ nihatakaṃṭakaṃ |
atha kāle tu kasmiṃścidrājā bhārgavamāśramam || 20 ||

ramaṇīyamupākrāmaccaitramāse manorame |
tatra bhārgavakanyāṃ tu rūpeṇāpratimāṃ bhuvi || 21 ||

vicaraṃtīṃ vanoddeśe daṃḍo'paśyadanuttamām |
uttuṃgapīvarīṃ śyāmāṃ caṃdrābhavadanāṃ śubhām || 22 ||

sunāsāṃ cārusarvāṃgīṃ pīnonnatapayodharām |
madhye kṣāmāṃ ca vistīrṇāṃ dṛṣṭvā tāṃ kurute mudam || 23 ||

ekavastrāṃ vane caikāṃ prathame yauvane sthitām |
sa tāṃ dṛṣṭvātvadharmeṇa anaṃgaśarapīḍitaḥ || 24 ||

abhigamya suviśrāṃtāṃ kanyāṃ vacanamabravīt |
kutastvamasi suśroṇi kasya cāsi suśobhane || 25 ||

pīḍatohamanaṃgena pṛcchāmi tvāṃ suśobhane |
tvayā me'pahṛtaṃ cittaṃ darśanādeva suṃdari || 26 ||

idaṃ te vadanaṃ ramyaṃ munīnāṃ cittahārakam |
yadyahaṃ na labhe bhoktuṃ mṛtaṃ māmavadhāraya || 27 ||

tvayā hṛtā mama prāṇā māṃ jīvaya sulocane |
dāsosmi te varārohe bhaktaṃ māṃ bhaja śobhane || 28 ||

tasyaivaṃ tu bruvāṇasya madonmattasya kāminaḥ |
bhārgavī pratyuvācedaṃ vacaḥ savinayaṃ nṛpam || 29 ||

bhārgavasya sutāṃ viddhi śukrasyākliṣṭakarmaṇaḥ |
arajāṃ nāma rājeṃdra jyeṣṭhāmāśramavāsinaḥ || 30 ||

śukraḥ pitā me rājeṃdra tvaṃ ca śiṣyo mahātmanaḥ |
dharmato bhaginī cāhaṃ bhavāmi nṛpanaṃdana || 31 ||

evaṃvidhaṃ vaco vaktuṃ na tvamarhasi pārthiva |
anyebhyopi suduṣṭebhyo rakṣyā cāhaṃ sadā tvayā || 32 ||

krodhano me pitā raudro bhasmatvaṃ tvāṃ samānayet |
athavā rājadharmeṇāsaṃbaṃdhaṃ kuruṣe balāt || 33 ||

pitaraṃ yācayasva tvaṃ dharmadṛṣṭena karmaṇā |
varayasva nṛpaśreṣṭha pitaraṃ me mahādyutim || 34 ||

anyathā vipulaṃ duḥkhaṃ tava ghoraṃ bhaveddhruvam |
kruddho hi me pitā sarvaṃ trailokyamabhinirdahet || 35 ||

tato'śubhaṃ mahāghoraṃ śrutvā daṃḍaḥ sudāruṇam |
pratyuvāca madonmattaḥ śirasābhinataḥ punaḥ || 36 ||

prasādaṃ kuru suśroṇi kāmonmattasya kāmini |
tvayā ruddhā mama prāṇā viśīryaṃti śubhānane || 37 ||

tvāṃ prāpya vairaṃ me'trāstu vadho vāpi mahattaraḥ |
bhaktaṃ bhajasva māṃ bhīru tvayi bhaktirhi me parā || 38 ||

evamuktvā tu tāṃ kanyāṃ balātsaṃgṛhya bāhunā |
anyena rājñā hastena vivastrā sā tathā kṛtā || 39 ||

aṃgamaṃge samāśleṣya mukhe caiva mukhaṃ kṛtam |
visphuraṃtīṃ yathākāmaṃ maithunāyopacakrame || 40 ||

tamanarthaṃ mahāghoraṃ daṃḍaḥ kṛtvā sudāruṇam |
nagaraṃ svaṃ jagāmāśu madonmatta iva dvipaḥ || 41 ||

bhārgavī rudatī dīnā āśramasyāvidūrataḥ |
pratyapālayadudvignā pitaraṃ devasammitam || 42 ||

sa muhūrtādupaspṛśya devarṣiramitadyutiḥ |
svamāśramaṃ śiṣyavṛtaṃ kṣudhārtaḥ sanyavartata || 43 ||

sopaśyadarajāṃ dīnāṃ rajasā samabhiplutām |
caṃdrasya ghanasaṃyuktāṃ jyotsnāmiva parājitām || 44 ||

tasya roṣaḥ samabhavatkṣudhārtasya mahātmanaḥ |
nirdahanniva lokāṃstrīṃstānśiṣyānsamuvāca ha || 45 ||

paśyadhvaṃ viparītasya daṃḍasyādīrghadarśinaḥ |
vipattiṃ ghorasaṃkāśāṃ dīptāmagniśikhāmiva || 46 ||

yannāśaṃ durgatiṃ prāptassānugaśca na saṃśayaḥ |
yastu dīptahutāśasya arciḥ saṃspṛṣṭavāniha || 47 ||

yasmātsa kṛtavānpāpamīdṛśaṃ ghorasaṃmitam |
tasmātprāpsyati durmedhāḥ pāṃsuvarṣamanuttamam || 48 ||

kurājā deśasaṃyuktaḥ sabhṛtyabalavāhanaḥ |
pāpakarmasamācāro vadhaṃ prāpsyati durmatiḥ || 49 ||

samaṃtādyojanaśataṃ viṣayaṃ cāsya durmateḥ |
dhunotu pāṃsuvarṣeṇa mahatā pākaśāsanaḥ || 50 ||

sarvasatvāni yānīha jaṃgamasthāvarāṇi vai |
sarveṣāṃ pāṃsuvarṣeṇa kṣayaḥ kṣipraṃ bhaviṣyati || 51 ||

daṃḍasya viṣayo yāvattāvatsavanamāśramam |
pāṃsuvarṣamivākasmātsaptarātraṃ bhaviṣyati || 52 ||

ityuktvā krodhasaṃtaptastamāśramanivāsinam |
janaṃ janapadasyāṃte sthīyatāmityuvāca ha || 53 ||

uktamātre uśanasā āśramāvasatho janaḥ |
kṣipraṃ tu viṣayāttasmātsthānaṃ cakre ca bāhyataḥ || 54 ||

taṃ tathoktvā munijanamarajāmidamabravīt |
āśrame tvaṃ sudurmedhe vasa ceha samāhitā || 55 ||

idaṃ yojanaparyaṃtamāśramaṃ ruciraprabham |
araje virajāstiṣṭha kālamatra samāśśatam || 56 ||

śrutvā niyogaṃ viprarṣerarajā bhārgavī tadā |
tatheti pitaraṃ prāha bhārgavaṃ bhṛśaduḥkhitā || 57 ||

ityuktvā bhārgavo vāsaṃ tasmādanyamupākramat |
saptāhe bhasmasādbhūtaṃ yathoktaṃ brahmavādinā || 58 ||

tasmāddaṃḍasya viṣayo viṃdhyaśailasya mānuṣa |
śapto hyuśanasā rāma tadābhūddharṣaṇe kṛte || 59 ||

tataḥprabhṛti kākutstha daṃḍakāraṇyamucyate |
etatte sarvamākhyātaṃ yanmāṃ pṛcchasi rāghava || 60 ||

saṃdhyāmupāsituṃ vīra samayo hyativartate |
ete maharṣayo rāma pūrṇakuṃbhāḥ samaṃtataḥ || 61 ||

kṛtodakā naravyāghra pūjayaṃti divākaram |
sarvairṝṣibhirabhyastaiḥ stotrairbrahmādibhiḥ kṛtaiḥ || 62 ||

ravirastaṃgato rāma gatvodakamupaspṛśa |
ṝṣervacanamādāya rāmaḥ saṃdhyāmupāsitum || 63 ||

upacakrāma tatpuṇyaṃ sasaroraghunaṃdanaḥ |
atha tasminvanoddeśe ramye pādapaśobhite || 64 ||

nadapuṇye girivare kokilāśatamaṃḍite |
nānāpakṣiravodyāne nānāmṛgasamākule || 65 ||

siṃhavyāghrasamākīrṇe nānādvijasamāvṛte |
gṛdhrolūkau pravasitau bahūnvarṣagaṇānapi || 66 ||

atholūkasya bhavanaṃ gṛdhraḥ pāpaviniścayaḥ |
mamedamiti kṛtvā'sau kalahaṃ tena cākarot || 67 ||

rājā sarvasya lokasya rāmo rājīvalocanaḥ |
taṃ prapadyāvahai śīghraṃ kasyaitadbhavanaṃ bhavet || 68 ||

gṛdhrolūkau prapadyetāṃ jātakopāvamarṣiṇau |
rāmaṃ prapadyatau śīghraṃ kalivyākulacetasau || 69 ||

tau parasparavidveṣau spṛśataścaraṇau tathā |
atha dṛṣṭvā rāghaveṃdraṃ gṛdhro vacanamabravīt || 70 ||

surāṇāmasurāṇāṃ ca tvaṃ pradhāno mato mama |
bṛhaspateśca śukrācca tvaṃ viśiṣṭo mahāmatiḥ || 71 ||

parāvarajño bhūtānāṃ martye śakra ivāparaḥ |
durnirīkṣo yathā sūryo himavāniva gaurave || 72 ||

sāgaraścāsi gāṃbhīrye lokapālo yamo hyasi |
kṣāṃtyā dharaṇyā tulyosi śīghratve hyanilopamaḥ || 73 ||

gurustvaṃ sarvasaṃpanno viṣṇurūposi rāghava |
amarṣī durjayo jetā sarvāstravidhipāragaḥ || 74 ||

śṛṇu tvaṃ mama deveśa vijñāpyaṃ narapuṃgava |
mamālayaṃ pūrvakṛtaṃ bāhuvīryeṇa vai prabho || 75 ||

ulūko harate rājaṃstvatsamīpe viśeṣataḥ |
īdṛśoyaṃ durācārastvadājñā laṃghako nṛpa || 76 ||

prāṇāṃtikena daṃḍena rāma śāsitumarhasi |
evamukte tu gṛdhreṇa ulūko vākyamabravīt || 77 ||

śṛṇu deva mama jñāpyamekacitto narādhipa |
somācchakrācca sūryācca dhanadācca yamāttathā || 78 ||

jāyate vai nṛpo rāma kiṃcidbhavati mānuṣaḥ |
tvaṃ tu sarvamayo devo nārāyaṇaparāyaṇaḥ || 79 ||

procyate somatā rājansamyakkārye vicārite |
samyagrakṣasi tāpebhyastamoghno hi yato bhavān || 80 ||

doṣe daṃḍātprajānāṃ tvaṃ yataḥ pāpabhayāpahaḥ |
dātā prahartā goptā ca teneṃdra iva no bhavān || 81 ||

adhṛṣyaḥ sarvabhūteṣu tejasā cānalo mataḥ |
abhīkṣṇaṃ tapase pāpāṃstena tvaṃ rāma bhāskaraḥ || 82 ||

sākṣādvitteśatulyastvamathavā dhanadādhikaḥ |
cittāyattā tu patnīśrīrnityaṃ te rājasattama || 83 ||

dhanadasya tu kośena dhanadastena vaibhavān |
samaḥ sarveṣu bhūteṣu sthāvareṣu careṣu ca || 84 ||

śatrau mitre ca te dṛṣṭiḥ samaṃtādyāti rāghava |
dharmeṇa śāsanaṃ nityaṃ vyavahāravidhikramaiḥ || 85 ||

yasya ruṣyasi vai rāma mṛtyustasyābhidhīyate |
gīyase tena vai rājanyama ityabhiviśrutaḥ || 86 ||

yaścāsau mānuṣo bhāvo bhavato nṛpasattama |
ānṛśaṃsyaparo rājā sarveṣu kṛpayānvitaḥ || 87 ||

durbalasya tvanāthasya rājā bhavati vai balam |
acakṣuṣo bhaveccakṣuramateṣu matirbhavet || 88 ||

asmākamapi nāthastvaṃ śrūyatāṃ mama dhārmika |
bhavatā tatra maṃtavyaṃ yathaite kila pakṣiṇaḥ || 89 ||

yosmannāthaḥ sa pakṣīṃdro bhavato viniyojyakaḥ |
asvāmyaṃ deva nāsmākaṃ sannidhau bhavataḥ prabho || 90 ||

bhavataiva kṛtaṃ pūrvaṃ bhūtagrāmaṃ caturvidham |
mamālayapraviṣṭastu gṛdhro māṃ bādhate nṛpa || 91 ||

bhavāndevamanuṣyeṣu śāstā vai narapuṃgava |
etacchrutvā tu vai rāmaḥ sacivānāhvayatsvayam || 92 ||

viṣṭirjayaṃto vijayaḥ siddhārtho rāṣṭravardhanaḥ |
aśoko dharmapālaśca sumaṃtraśca mahābalaḥ || 93 ||

ete rāmasya sacivā rājño daśarathasya ca |
nītiyuktā mahātmānaḥ sarvaśāstraviśāradāḥ || 94 ||

suśāṃtāśca kulīnāśca naye maṃtre ca kovidāḥ |
tānāhūya sa dharmātmā puṣpakādavaruhya ca || 95 ||

gṛdhrolūkau vivadaṃtau pṛcchati sma raghūttamaḥ |
kati varṣāṇi bho gṛdhra tavedaṃ nilayaṃ kṛtaṃ || 96 ||

etanme kautukaṃ brūhi yadi jānāsi tattvataḥ |
etacchrutvā vaco gṛdhro babhāṣe rāghavaṃ sthitaṃ || 97 ||

iyaṃ vasumatī rāma mānuṣairbahubāhubhiḥ |
ucchritairācitā sarvā tadāprabhṛti madgṛhaṃ || 98 ||

ulūkastvabravīdrāmaṃ pādapairupaśobhitā |
yadaiva pṛthivī rājaṃstadāprabhṛti me gṛhaṃ || 99 ||

etacchrutvā tu rāmo vai sabhāsada uvācaha |
na sā sabhā yatra na saṃti vṛddhā vṛddhā na te ye na vadaṃti dharmaṃ || 100 ||

nāsau dharmo yatra na cāsti satyaṃ na tatsatyaṃ yacchalamabhyupaiti |
ye tu sabhyāḥ sabhāṃ gatvā tūṣṇīṃ dhyāyaṃta āsate || 101 ||

yathāprāptaṃ na bruvate sarve te'nṛtavādinaḥ |
na vakti ca śrutaṃ yaśca kāmātkrodhāttathā bhayāt || 102 ||

sahasraṃ vāruṇāḥ pāśāḥ pratimuṃcaṃti taṃ naraṃ |
teṣāṃ saṃvatsare pūrṇe pāśa ekaḥ pramucyate || 103 ||

tasmātsatyaṃ tu vaktavyaṃ jānatā satyamaṃjasā |
etacchrutvā tu sacivā rāmamevābruvaṃstadā || 104 ||

ulūkaḥ śobhate rājanna tu gṛdhro mahāmate |
tvaṃ pramāṇaṃ mahārāja rājā hi paramā gatiḥ || 105 ||

rājamūlāḥ prajāḥ sarvā rājā dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ |
śāstā rājā nṛṇāṃ yeṣāṃ na te gacchaṃti durgatim || 106 ||

vaivasvatena muktāśca bhavaṃti puruṣottamāḥ |
sacivānāṃ vacaḥ śrutvā rāmo vacanamabravīt || 107 ||

śrūyatāmabhidhāsyāmi purāṇaṃ yadudāhṛtaṃ |
dyauḥ sacaṃdrārkanakṣatrā saparvatamahīdrumam || 108 ||

salilārṇavasaṃmagnaṃ trailokyaṃ sacarācaraṃ |
ekameva tadā hyāsītsarvamekamivāṃbaraṃ || 109 ||

punarbhūḥ saha lakṣmyā ca viṣṇorjaṭharamāviśat |
tāṃ nigṛhya mahātejāḥ praviśya salilārṇavaṃ || 110 ||

suṣvāpa hi kṛtātmā sa bahuvarṣaśatānyapi |
viṣṇau supte tato brahmā viveśa jaṭharaṃ tataḥ || 111 ||

bahusrotaṃ ca taṃ jñātvā mahāyogī samāviśat |
nābhyāṃ viṣṇoḥ samudbhūtaṃ padmaṃ hemavibhūṣitaṃ || 112 ||

sa tu nirgamya vai brahmā yogī bhūtvā mahāprabhuḥ |
sisṛkṣuḥ pṛthivīṃ vāyuṃ parvatāṃśca mahīruhān || 113 ||

tadaṃtarāḥ prajāḥ sarvā mānuṣāṃśca sarīsṛpān |
jarāyujāṇḍajānsarvānsasarja sa mahātapāḥ || 114 ||

tasya gātrasamutpannaḥ kaiṭabho madhunā saha |
dānavau tau mahāvīryau ghorau labdhavarau tadā || 115 ||

dṛṣṭvā prajāpatiṃ tatra krodhāviṣṭāvubhau nṛpa |
vegena mahatā bhoktuṃ svayaṃbhuvamadhāvatāṃ || 116 ||

dṛṣṭvā satvāni sarvāṇi nissaranti pṛthakpṛthak |
brahmaṇā saṃstuto viṣṇurhatvā tau madhukaiṭabhau || 117 ||

pṛthivīṃ vardhayāmāsa sthityarthaṃ medasā tayoḥ |
medogaṃdhā tu dharaṇī medinītyabhidhāṃ gatā || 118 ||

tasmādgṛdhrastvasatyo vai pāpakarmāparālayam |
svīyaṃ karoti pāpātmā daṇḍanīyo na saṃśayaḥ || 119 ||

tato'śarīriṇīvāṇī aṃtarikṣātprabhāṣate |
mā vadhī rāma gṛdhraṃ tvaṃ pūrvaṃdagdhaṃ tapobalāt || 120 ||

purā gautama dagdho'yaṃ prajānātho janeśvara |
brahmadattastu nāmaiṣa śūraḥ satyavrataḥ śuciḥ || 121 ||

gṛhamāgatya viprarṣerbhojanaṃ pratyayācata |
sāgraṃ varṣaśataṃ caiva bhuktavānnṛpasattama || 122 ||

brahmadattasya vai tasya pādyamarghyaṃ svayaṃ tataḥ |
ātmanaivākarotsamyagbhojanārthaṃ mahādyute || 123 ||

samāviśya gṛhaṃ tasya āhāre tu mahātmanaḥ |
nārīṃ pūrṇastanīṃ dṛṣṭvā hastenātha parāmṛśat || 124 ||

atha kruddhena muninā śāpo dattaḥ sudāruṇaḥ |
gṛdhratvaṃ gaccha vai mūḍha rājā munimathābravīt || 125 ||

kṛpāṃ kuru mahābhāga śāpoddhāro bhaviṣyati |
dayālustadvacaḥ śrutvā punarāha narādhipa || 126 ||

utpatsyate raghukule rāmo nāma mahāyaśāḥ |
ikṣvākūṇāṃ mahābhāgo rājā rājīvalocanaḥ || 127 ||

tena dṛṣṭo vipāpastvaṃ bhavitā narapuṃgava |
dṛṣṭo rāmeṇa tacchrutvā babhūva pṛthivīpatiḥ || 128 ||

gṛdhratvaṃ tyajya vai śīghraṃ divyagaṃdhānulepanaḥ |
puruṣo divyarūpo'sau babhāṣe taṃ narādhipaṃ || 129 ||

sādhu rāghava dharmajña tvatprasādādahaṃ vibho |
vimukto narakādghorādapāpastu tvayā kṛtaḥ || 130 ||

visarjitaṃ mayā gārdhyaṃ nararūpī mahīpatiḥ |
ulūkaṃ prāha dharmajña svagṛhaṃ viśa kauśika || 131 ||

ahaṃ saṃdhyāmupāsitvā gamiṣye yatra vai muniḥ |
athodakamupaspṛśya saṃdhyāmanvāsya paścimāṃ || 132 ||

āśramaṃ prāviśadrāmaḥ kuṃbhayonermahātmanaḥ |
tasyāgastyo bahuguṇaṃ phalamūlaṃ ca sādaraṃ || 133 ||

rasavaṃti ca śākāni bhojanārthamupāharat |
sabhuktavānnaravyāghrastadannamamṛtopamam || 134 ||

prītaśca parituṣṭaśca tāṃ rātriṃ samupāvasat |
prabhāte kālyamutthāya kṛtvāhnikamariṃdama || 135 ||

ṝṣiṃ samabhicakrāma gamanāya raghūttamaḥ |
abhivādyābravīdrāmo maharṣiṃ kuṃbhasaṃbhavam || 136 ||

āpṛcche sādhaye brahmannanujñātuṃ tvamarhasi |
dhanyosmyanugṛhītosmi darśanena mahāmune || 137 ||

diṣṭyā cāhaṃ bhaviṣyāmi pāvanātmā mahātmanaḥ |
evaṃ bruvati kākutsthe vākyamadbhutadarśanaṃ || 138 ||

uvāca paramaprīto bāṣpanetrastapodhanaḥ |
atyadbhutamidaṃ vākyaṃ tava rāma śubhākṣaraṃ || 139 ||

pāvanaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ tvayoktaṃ raghunaṃdana |
muhūrtamapi rāma tvāṃ maitreṇekṣaṃti ye narāḥ || 140 ||

pāvitāssarvasūktaiste kathyaṃte tridivaukasaḥ |
ye ca tvāṃ ghoracakṣurbhirīkṣaṃte prāṇino bhuvi || 141 ||

te hatā brahmadaṃḍena sadyo narakagāminaḥ |
īdṛśastvaṃ raghuśreṣṭha pāvanaḥ sarvadehināṃ || 142 ||

kathayaṃtaśca lokāstvāṃ siddhimeṣyaṃti rāghava |
gacchasvānāturo'vighnaṃ paṃthānamakutobhayaḥ || 143 ||

praśādhi rājyaṃ dharmeṇa gatistu jagatāṃ bhavān |
evamuktastu muninā prāñjali pragraho nṛpaḥ || 144 ||

abhivādayituṃ cakre so'gastyamṛṣisattamam |
abhivādya muniśreṣṭhaṃstāṃśca sarvāṃstapodhikān || 145 ||

athārohattadāvyagraḥ puṣpakaṃ hemabhūṣitam |
taṃ prayāṃtaṃ munigaṇā āśīrvādaissamaṃtataḥ || 146 ||

apūpujannareṃdraṃ taṃ sahasrākṣamivāmarāḥ |
tato'rdhadivase prāpte rāmaḥ sarvārthakovidaḥ || 147 ||

ayodhyāṃ prāpya kākutsthaḥ padbhyāṃ kakṣāmavātarat |
tato visṛjya ruciraṃ puṣpakaṃ kāmavāhitaṃ || 148 ||

kakṣāṃtarādviniṣkramya dvāsthānrājā'bravīdidaṃ |
lakṣmaṇaṃ bharataṃ caiva gacchadhvaṃ laghuvikramāḥ || 149 ||

mamāgamanamākhyāya samānayata mā ciram |
śrutvātha bhāṣitaṃ dvāsthā rāmasyākliṣṭakarmaṇaḥ || 150 ||

gatvā kumārāvāhūya rāghavāya nyavadeyan |
dvāsthaiḥ kumārāvānītau rāghavasya nideśataḥ || 151 ||

dṛṣṭvā tu rāghavaḥ prāptau priyau bharatalakṣmaṇau |
samāliṃgya tu rāmastau vākyaṃ cedamuvāca ha || 152 ||

kṛtaṃ mayā yathātathyaṃ dvijakāryamanuttamaṃ |
dharmahetumato bhūyaḥ kartumicchāmi rāghavau || 153 ||

bhavadbhyāmātmabhūtābhyāṃ rājasūyaṃ kratūttamaṃ |
sahito yaṣṭumicchāmi yatra dharmaśca śāśvataḥ || 154 ||

puṣkarasthena vai pūrvaṃ brahmaṇā lokakāriṇā |
śatatrayeṇa yajñānāmiṣṭaṃ ṣaṣṭyādhikena ca || 155 ||

iṣṭvā hi rājasūyena somo dharmeṇa dharmavit |
prāptaḥ sarveṣu lokeṣu kīrtisthānamanuttamam || 156 ||

iṣṭvā hi rājasūyena mitraḥ śatrunibarhaṇaḥ |
muhūrtena suśuddhena varuṇatvamupāgataḥ || 157 ||

tasmādbhavaṃtau saṃciṃtya kāryesminvadataṃ hi tat |
bharata uvāca |
tvaṃ dharmaḥ paramaḥ sādho tvayi sarvā vasuṃdharā || 158 ||

pratiṣṭhitā mahābāho yaśaścāmitavikrama |
mahīpālāśca sarve tvāṃ prajāpatimivāmarāḥ || 159 ||

nirīkṣaṃte mahātmāno lokanātha tathā vayaṃ |
prajāśca pitṛvadrājanpaśyaṃti tvāṃ mahāmate || 160 ||

pṛthivyāṃ gatibhūtosi prāṇināmiha rāghava |
satvamevaṃvidhaṃ yajñaṃ nāharttāsi paraṃtapa || 161 ||

pṛthivyāṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ vināśo dṛśyate yataḥ |
śrūyate rājaśārdūla somasya manujeśvara || 162 ||

jyotiṣāṃ sumahadyuddhaṃ saṃgrāme tārakāmaye |
tārā bṛhaspaterbhāryā hṛtā somenakāmataḥ || 163 ||

tatra yuddhaṃ mahadvṛttaṃ devadānavanāśanam |
varuṇasya kratau ghore saṃgrāme matsyakacchapāḥ || 164 ||

nivṛtte rājaśārdūla sarve naṣṭā jalecarāḥ |
hariścaṃdrasya yajñāṃte rājasūyasya rāghava || 165 ||

āḍībakaṃmahadyuddhaṃ sarvalokavināśanam |
pṛthivyāṃ yāni satvāni tiryagyonigatāni vai || 166 ||

divyānāṃ pārthivānāṃ ca rājasūye kṣayaḥ śrutaḥ |
sa tvaṃ puruṣaśārdūla buddhyā saṃciṃtya pārthiva || 167 ||

prāṇināṃ ca hitaṃ saumyaṃ pūrṇadharmaṃ samācara |
bharatasya vacaḥ śrutvā rāghavaḥ prāha sādaram || 168 ||

prītosmi tava dharmajña vākyenānena śatruhan |
nivartitā rājasūyānmatirme dharmavatsala || 169 ||

pūrṇaṃ dharmaṃ kariṣyāmi kānyakubje ca vāmanam |
sthāpayiṣyāmyahaṃ vīra sā me khyātirdivaṃ gatā || 170 ||
bhaviṣyati na saṃdeho yathā gaṃgā bhagīrathāt || 171 ||

bhīṣma uvāca |
kathaṃ rāmeṇa viprarṣe kānyakubje tu vāmanaḥ |
sthāpitaḥ kva ca labdhosau vistarānmama kīrtaya || 1 ||

tathā hi madhurā caiṣā yā vāṇī rāmakīrtane |
kīrtitā bhagavanmahyaṃ hṛtā karṇasukhāvaha || 2 ||

anurāgeṇa taṃ lokāḥ snehātpaśyaṃti rāghavam |
dharmajñaśca kṛtajñaśca buddhyā ca pariniṣṭhitaḥ || 3 ||

praśāsti pṛthivīṃ sarvāṃ dharmeṇa susamāhitaḥ |
tasminśāsati vai rājyaṃ sarvakāmaphalādrumāḥ || 4 ||

rasavaṃtaḥ prabhūtāśca vāsāṃsi vividhāni ca |
akṛṣṭapacyā pṛthivī niḥsapatnā mahātmanaḥ || 5 ||

devakāryaṃ kṛtaṃ tena rāvaṇo lokakaṃṭakaḥ |
saputromātyasahito līlayaiva nipātitaḥ || 6 ||

tasyabuddhissamutpannā pūrṇe dharme dvijottama |
tasyāhaṃ caritaṃ sarvaṃ śrotumicchāmi vai mune || 7 ||

pulastya uvāca |
kasyacittvatha kālasya rāmo dharmapathe sthitaḥ |
yaccakāra mahābāho śṛṇuṣvaikamanā nṛpa || 8 ||

sasmāra rākṣaseṃdraṃ taṃ kathaṃ rājā vibhīṣaṇaḥ |
laṃkāyāṃ saṃsthito rājyaṃ kariṣyati ca rākṣasaḥ || 9 ||

gīrvāṇeṣu prātikūlyaṃ vināśasya tu lakṣaṇam |
mayā tasya tu taddattaṃ rājyaṃ caṃdrārkakālikam || 10 ||

tasyāvināśataḥ kīrtiḥ sthirā me śāśvatī bhavet |
rāvaṇena tapastaptaṃ vināśāyātmanastviha || 11 ||

vidhvastaḥ sa ca pāpiṣṭho devakārye mayādhunā |
tadidānīṃ mayānveṣyaḥ svayaṃ gatvā vibhīṣaṇaḥ || 12 ||

saṃdeṣṭavyaṃ hitaṃ tasya yena tiṣṭhetsa śāśvatam |
evaṃ ciṃtayatastasya rāmasyāmitatejasaḥ || 13 ||

ājagāmātha bharato rāmaṃ dṛṣṭvābravīdidam |
kiṃ tvaṃ ciṃtayase deva na rahasyaṃ vadasva me || 14 ||

devakārye dharāyāṃ vā svakārye vā narottama |
evaṃ bruvaṃtaṃ bharataṃ dhyāyamānamavasthitam || 15 ||

abravīdrāghavo vākyaṃ rahasyaṃ tu na vai tava |
bhavānbahiścaraḥ prāṇo lakṣmaṇaśca mahāyaśāḥ || 16 ||

avedyaṃ bhavato nāsti mama satyaṃ vidhāraya |
eṣā me mahatī ciṃtā kathaṃ devairvibhīṣaṇaḥ || 17 ||

vartate yaddhitārthaṃ vai daśagrīvo nipātitaḥ |
gamiṣye tadahaṃ laṃkāṃ yatra cāsau vibhīṣaṇaḥ || 18 ||

taṃ ca dṛṣṭvā purīṃ tāṃ tu kāryamuktvā ca rākṣasam |
ālokya sarvavasudhāṃ sugrīvaṃ vānareśvaram || 19 ||

mahārājaṃ ca śatrughnaṃ bhātṛputrāṃśca sarvaśaḥ |
evaṃ vadati kākutsthe bharataḥ purataḥ sthitaḥ || 20 ||

uvāca rāghavaṃ vākyaṃ gamiṣye bhavatā saha |
evaṃ kuru mahābāho saumitririha tiṣṭhatu || 21 ||

ityuktvā bharataṃ rāmaḥ saumitraṃ cāha vai pure |
rakṣākāryā tvayā vīra yāvadāgamanaṃ hi nau || 22 ||

evaṃ lakṣmaṇamādiśya dhyātvā vai puṣpakaṃ nṛpa |
āruroha sa vai yānaṃ kausalyānaṃdavardhanaḥ || 23 ||

puṣpakaṃ tu tataḥ prāptaṃ gāṃdhāraviṣayo yataḥ |
bharatasya sutau dṛṣṭvā jagannītiṃ nirīkṣya ca || 24 ||

pūrvāṃ diśaṃ tato gatvā lakṣmaṇasya sutau yataḥ |
pureṣu teṣu ṣaḍrātramuṣitvā raghunaṃdanau || 25 ||

gatau tena vimānena dakṣiṇāmabhito diśam |
gaṃgāyāmunasaṃbhedaṃ prayāgamṛṣisevitam || 26 ||

abhivādya bharadvājamatrerāśramamīyatuḥ |
saṃbhāṣya ca munīṃstatra janasthānamupāgatau || 27 ||

rāma uvāca |
atra pūrvaṃ hṛtā sītā rāvaṇena durātmanā |
hatvā jaṭāyuṣaṃ gṛdhraṃ yosau pitṛsakho hi nau || 28 ||

atrāsmākaṃ mahadyuddhaṃ kabaṃdhena kubuddhinā |
hatena tena dagdhena sītāste rāvaṇālaye || 29 ||

ṝṣyamūke girivare sugrīvo nāma vānaraḥ |
sa te kariṣyate sāhyaṃ paṃpāṃ vraja sahānujaḥ || 30 ||

paṃpāsaraḥ samāsādya śabarīṃ gaccha tāpasīm |
ityukto duḥkhito vīra nirāśo jīvite sthitaḥ || 31 ||

iyaṃ sā nalinī vīra yasyāṃ vai lakṣmaṇovadat |
mā kṛthāḥ puruṣavyāghra śokaṃ śatruvināśana || 32 ||

ājñākāriṇi bhṛtye ca mayi prāpsyasi maithilīm |
atra me vārṣikā māsā gatā varṣaśatopamāḥ || 33 ||

atraiva nihato vālī sugrīvārthe paraṃtapa |
eṣā sā dṛśyate nūnaṃ kiṣkiṃdhā vālipālitā || 34 ||

yasyāṃ vai sa hi dharmātmā sugrīvo vānareśvaraḥ |
vānaraiḥ sahito vīra tāvadāste samāḥ śatam || 35 ||

vānaraissaha sugrīvo yāvadāste sabhāṃ gataḥ |
tāvattatrāgatau vīrau puryāṃ bharatarāghavau || 36 ||

dṛṣṭvā sa bhrātarau prāptau praṇipatyābravīdidam |
kva yuvāṃ prasthitau vīrau kāryaṃ kiṃ nu kariṣyathaḥ || 37 ||

viniveśyāsane tau ca dadāvarghye svayaṃ tadā |
evaṃ sabhāsthite tatra dharmiṣṭe raghunaṃdane || 38 ||

aṃgadotha hanūmāṃśca nalo nīlaśca pāṭalaḥ |
gajo gavākṣo gavayaḥ panasaśca mahāyaśāḥ || 39 ||

purodhaso maṃtriṇaśca daivajño dadhivakrakaḥ |
nīlaśśatabalirmaindo dvivido gaṃdhamādanaḥ || 40 ||

vīrabāhussubāhuśca vīraseno vināyakaḥ |
sūryābhaḥ kumudaścaiva suṣeṇo hariyūthapaḥ || 41 ||

ṝṣabho vinataścaiva gavākhyo bhīmavikramaḥ |
ṝkṣarājaśca dhūmraśca sahasainyairupāgatāḥ || 42 ||

aṃtaḥpurāṇi sarvāṇi rumā tārā tathaiva ca |
avarodhoṃgadasyāpi tathānyāḥ paricārikāḥ || 43 ||

praharṣamatulaṃ prāpya sādhusādhviti cābruvan |
vānarāśca mahātmānaḥ sugrīvasahitāstadā || 44 ||

vānaryaśca mahābhāgāstārādyāstatra rāghavam |
abhiprekṣyāśrukaṃṭhyaśca praṇipatyedamabruvan || 45 ||

kva sā devī tvayā deva yā vinirjityarāvaṇam |
śuddhiṃ kṛtvā hi te vahnau pituragra umāpateḥ || 46 ||

tvayānītā purīṃ rāma na tāṃ paśyāmi tegrataḥ |
na vinā tvaṃ tayā deva śobhase raghunaṃdana || 47 ||

tvayā vināpi sādhvī sā kva nu tiṣṭhati jānakī |
anyāṃ bhāryāṃ na te vedmi bhāryāhīno na śobhase || 48 ||

krauṃcayugmaṃ mitho yadvaccakravākayugaṃ yathā |
evaṃ vadaṃtīṃ tāṃ tārāṃ tārādhipasamānanām || 49 ||

prāha pravacasāṃ śreṣṭho rāmo rājīvalocanaḥ |
cārudaṃṣṭre viśālākṣi kālo hi duratikramaḥ || 50 ||

sarvaṃ kālakṛtaṃ viddhi jagadetaccarācaram |
visṛjyatāḥ striyaḥ sarvāḥ sugrīvobhimukhaḥ sthitaḥ || 51 ||

sugrīva uvāca |
bhavaṃtau yena kāryeṇa ihāyātau nareśvarau |
taccāpi kathyatāṃ śīghraṃ kṛtyakālo hi vartate || 52 ||

bruvāṇamevaṃ sugrīvaṃ bharato rāmacoditaḥ |
ācacakṣe ca gamanaṃ laṃkāyāṃ rāghavasya tu |
tau cābravīcca sugrīvo bhavadbhyāṃ sahitaḥ purīm || 53 ||

gamiṣye rākṣasaṃ deva draṣṭuṃ tatra vibhīṣaṇam |
sugrīveṇaivamukte tu gacchasvetyāha rāghavaḥ || 54 ||

sugrīvo rāghavau tau ca puṣpake tu sthitāstrayaḥ |
tāvatprāptaṃ vimānaṃ tu samudrasyottaraṃ taṭam || 55 ||

abravīdbharataṃ rāmo hyatra me rākṣaseśvaraḥ |
caturbhiḥ sacivaiḥ sārdhaṃ jīvitārthe vibhīṣaṇaḥ || 56 ||

prāptastato lakṣmaṇena laṃkārājyebhiṣecitaḥ |
atra cāhaṃ samudrasya parepāre sthitastryaham || 57 ||

darśanaṃ dāsyate me'sau jñātikāryaṃ bhaviṣyati |
tāvanna darśanaṃ mahyaṃ dattametena śatruhan || 58 ||

tataḥ kopaḥ sumadbhūtaścaturthehani rāghava |
dhanurāyamya vegena divyamastraṃ kare dhṛtam || 59 ||

dṛṣṭvā māṃ śaraṇānveṣī bhīto lakṣmaṇamāśritaḥ |
sugrīveṇānunīto'smi kṣamyatāṃ rāghava tvayā || 60 ||

tato mayotkṣiptaśaro marudeśe hyapākṛtaḥ |
tatassamudrarājena bhṛśaṃ vinayaśālinā || 61 ||

uktohaṃ setubaṃdhena laṃkāṃ tvaṃ vraja rāghava |
laṃghayitvā naravyāghra vāripūrṇaṃ mahodadhim || 62 ||

eṣa seturmayā baddhaḥ samudre varuṇālaye |
tribhirdinaiḥ samāptiṃ vai nīto vānarasattamaiḥ || 63 ||

prathame divase baddho yojanāni caturdaśa |
dvitīyehani ṣaṭtriṃśattṛtīyerdhaśataṃ tathā || 64 ||

iyaṃ sā dṛśyate laṃkā svarṇaprākāratoraṇā |
avarodho mahānatra kṛto vānarasattamaiḥ || 65 ||

atra yuddhaṃ mahadvṛttaṃ caitrāśuklacaturdaśi |
aṣṭacatvāriṃśaddinaṃ yatrāsau rāvaṇo hataḥ || 66 ||

atra prahasto nīlena hato rākṣasapuṃgavaḥ |
hanūmatā ca dhūmrākṣo hyatraiva vinipātitaḥ || 67 ||

mahodarātikāyau ca sugrīveṇa mahātmanā |
atraiva me kuṃbhakarṇo lakṣmaṇeneṃdrajittathā || 68 ||

mayā cātra daśagrīvo hato rākṣasapuṃgavaḥ |
atra saṃbhāṣituṃ prāpto brahmā lokapitāmahaḥ || 69 ||

pārvatyā sahito devaḥ śūlapāṇirvṛṣadhvajaḥ |
maheṃdrādyāḥ suragaṇāḥ sagaṃdharvāssa kiṃnarāḥ || 70 ||

pitā me ca samāyāto mahārājastriviṣṭapāt |
vṛtaścāpsarasāṃ saṃghairvidyādharagaṇaistathā || 71 ||

teṣāṃ samakṣaṃ sarveṣāṃ jānakī śuddhimicchatā |
uktā sītā havyavāhaṃ praviṣṭā śuddhimāgatā || 72 ||

laṃkādhipaiḥ surairdṛṣṭā gṛhītā pitṛśāsanāt |
athāpyuktotha rājñāhamayodhyāṃ gaccha putrakam || 73 ||

na me svargo bahumatastvayā hīnasya rāghava |
tāritohaṃ tvayā putra prāpto'smīndrasalokatām || 74 ||

lakṣmaṇaṃ cābravīdrājā putra puṇyaṃ tvayārjitam |
bhrātrāsamamatho divyāṃllokānprāpsyasi cottamān || 75 ||

āhūya jānakīṃ rājā vākyaṃ cedamuvāca ha |
na ca manyustvayā kāryo bhartāraṃ prati suvrate || 76 ||

khyātirbhaviṣyatyevāgryā bhartuste śubhalocane |
evaṃ vadati rāme tu puṣpake ca vyavasthite || 77 ||

tatra ye rākṣasavarāste gatvāśu vibhīṣaṇaṃ |
prāpto rāmaḥ sasugrīvaścārā itthaṃ tadā'vadan || 78 ||

vibhīṣaṇastu tacchrutvā rāmāgamanamaṃtike |
cārāṃstānpūjayāmāsa sarvakāmadhanādibhiḥ || 79 ||

alaṃkṛtya purīṃ tāṃ tu niṣkrāntaḥ sacivaiḥ saha |
dṛṣṭvā rāmaṃ vimānasthaṃ merāviva divākaraṃ || 80 ||

aṣṭāṃgapraṇipātena natvā rāghavamabravīt |
adya me saphalaṃ janma prāptāḥ sarve manorathāḥ || 81 ||

yaddṛṣṭau devacaraṇau jagadvaṃdyāvaniṃditau |
kṛtaḥ ślāghyosmyahaṃ deva śakrādīnāṃ divaukasāṃ || 82 ||

ātmānamadhikaṃ manye tridaśeśātpuraṃdarāt |
rāvaṇasya gṛhe dīpte sarvaratnopaśobhite || 83 ||

upaviṣṭe tu kākutsthe arghaṃ datvā vibhīṣaṇaḥ |
uvāca prāṃjalirbhūtvā sugrīvaṃ bharataṃ tathā || 84 ||

ihāgatasya rāmasya yaddāsye na tadasti me |
iyaṃ ca laṃkā rāmeṇa ripuṃ trailokyakaṃṭakam || 85 ||

hatvā tu pāpakarmāṇaṃ dattā pūrvaṃ purī mama |
iyaṃ purī ime dārā amī putrāstathā hyahaṃ || 86 ||

sarvametanmayā dattaṃ sarvamakṣayamastu te |
tataḥ prakṛtayaḥ sarvā laṃkāvāsijanāśca ye || 87 ||

ājagmū rāghavaṃ draṣṭuṃ kautūhalasamanvitāḥ |
ukto vibhīṣaṇastaistu rāmaṃ darśaya naḥ prabho || 88 ||

vibhīṣaṇena kathitā rāghavāya mahātmane |
teṣāmupāyanaṃ sarvaṃ bharato rāmacoditaḥ || 89 ||

jagrāha vānarendraśca dhanaratnaughasaṃcayaṃ |
evaṃ tatra tryahaṃ rāmo hyavasadrākṣasālaye || 90 ||

caturthehani saṃprāpte rāme cāpi sabhāsthite |
kekasī putramāhedaṃ rāmaṃ drakṣyāmi putraka || 91 ||

dṛṣṭe tasminmahatpuṇyaṃ prāpyate munisattamaiḥ |
viṣṇureṣa mahābhāgaścaturmūrtissanātanaḥ || 92 ||

sītā lakṣmīrmahābhāga na buddhā sāgrajena te |
pitrā te pūrvamākhyātaṃ devānāṃ divisaṃgame || 93 ||

kule raghūṇāṃ vai viṣṇuḥ putro daśarathasya tu |
bhaviṣyati vināśāya daśagrīvasya rakṣasaḥ || 94 ||

vibhīṣaṇa uvāca |
evaṃ kuruṣva vai mātargṛhāṇa navamaṃ varam |
pātraṃ caṃdanasaṃyuktaṃ dadhikṣaudrākṣataiḥ saha || 95 ||

dūrvayārghaṃ saha kuru rājaputrasya darśanam |
saramāmagrataḥ kṛtvā yāścānyā devakanyakāḥ || 96 ||

vrajasva rāghavābhyāśaṃ tasmādagre vrajāmyaham |
evamuktvā gataṃ rakṣo yatra rāmo vyavasthitaḥ || 97 ||

utsārya dānavānsarvānrāmaṃ draṣṭuṃ samāgatān |
sabhāṃ tāṃ vimalāṃ kṛtvā rāmaṃ svābhimukhe sthitam || 98 ||

vibhīṣaṇa uvāca |
vijñāpyaṃ śṛṇu me deva vadataśca viśāṃpate |
daśagrīvaṃ kuṃbhakarṇaṃ yā ca māṃ cāpyajījanat || 99 ||

iyaṃ sā devamātā naḥ pādau te draṣṭumicchati |
tasyāstu tvaṃ kṛpāṃ kṛtvā darśanaṃ dātu marhasi || 100 ||

rāma uvāca |
ahaṃ tasyāḥ samīpaṃ tu mātṛdarśanakāṃkṣayā |
gamiṣye rākṣaseṃdra tvaṃ śīghraṃ yāhi mamāgrataḥ || 101 ||

pratijñāya tu taṃ vākyamuttasthau ca varāsanāt |
mūrdhni cāṃjalimādhāya praṇāmamakarodvibhuḥ || 102 ||

abhivādayehaṃ bhavatīṃ mātā bhavasi dharmataḥ |
mahatā tapasā cāpi puṇyena vividhena ca || 103 ||

imau te caraṇau devi mānavo yadi paśyati |
pūrṇassyāttadahaṃ prīto dṛṣṭvemau putravatsale || 104 ||

kausalyā me yathā mātā bhavatī ca tathā mama |
kekasī cābravīdrāmaṃ ciraṃ jīva sukhī bhava || 105 ||

bhartrā me kathitaṃ vīra viṣṇurmānuṣarūpadhṛt |
avatīrṇo raghukule hitārthetra divaukasām || 106 ||

daśagrīva vināśāya bhūtiṃ dātuṃ vibhīṣaṇe |
vālino nidhanaṃ caiva setubaṃdhaṃ ca sāgare || 107 ||

putro daśarathasyaiva sarvaṃ sa ca kariṣyati |
idānīṃ tvaṃ mayā jñātaḥ smṛtvā tadbhartṛbhāṣitam || 108 ||

sītā lakṣmīrbhavānviṣṇurdevā vai vānarāstathā |
gṛhaṃ putra gamiṣyāmi sthirakīrtimavāpnuhi || 109 ||

saramovāca |
ihaiva vatsaraṃ pūrṇamaśokavanikāsthitā |
sevitā jānakī deva sukhaṃ tiṣṭhati te priyā || 110 ||

nityaṃ smarāmi vai pādau sītāyāstu paraṃtapa |
kadā drakṣyāmi tāṃ devīṃ ciṃtayānā tvaharniśam || 111 ||

kimarthaṃ devadevena nānītā jānakī tviha |
ekākī naiva śobhethā yoṣitā ca tayā vinā || 112 ||

samīpe śobhate sītā tvaṃ ca tasyāḥ paraṃtapa |
evaṃ bruvantyāṃ bharataḥ keyamityabravīdvacaḥ || 113 ||

tataśceṃgitavidrāmo bharataṃ prāha satvaram |
vibhīṣaṇasya bhāryā vai saramā nāma nāmataḥ || 114 ||

priyā sakhī mahābhāgā sītāyāssudṛḍhaṃ matā |
sarvaṃkālakṛtaṃ paśya na jāne kiṃ kariṣyati || 115 ||

gaccha tvaṃ subhage bhartṛgehaṃ pālaya śobhane |
māṃ tyaktvā hi gatā devī bhāgyahīnaṃ gatiryathā || 116 ||

tayā virahitaḥ subhru ratiṃ viṃde na karhicit |
śūnyā eva diśaḥ sarvāḥ paśyāmīha punarbhraman || 117 ||

visṛjyatāṃ ca saramāṃ sītāyāstu priyāṃ sakhīm |
gatāyāmatha kekasyāṃ rāmaḥ prāha vibhīṣaṇam || 118 ||

daivatebhyaḥ priyaṃ kāryaṃ nāparādhyāstvayā surāḥ |
ājñayā rājarājasya vartitavyaṃ tvayānagha || 119 ||

laṃkāyāṃ mānuṣo yo vai samāgacchetkathaṃcana |
rākṣasairna ca haṃtavyo draṣṭavyosau yathā tvaham || 120 ||

vibhīṣaṇa uvāca |
ājñayāhaṃ naravyāghra kariṣye sarvameva tu |
vibhīṣaṇe hi vadati vāyū rāmamuvāca ha || 121 ||

ihāstivaiṣṇavī mūrtiḥ pūrvaṃ baddho baliryayā |
tāṃ nayasva mahābhāga kānyakubje pratiṣṭhaya || 122 ||

viditvā tadabhiprāyaṃ vāyunā samudāhṛtam |
vibhīṣaṇastvalaṃkṛtya ratnaiḥ sarvaiśca vāmanam || 123 ||

ānīya cārpayadrāme vākyaṃ cedamuvāca ha |
yadā vai nirjitaḥ śakro meghanādena rāghava || 124 ||

tadā vai vāmanastveṣa ānīto jalajekṣaṇa |
nayasva tamimaṃ deva devadevaṃ pratiṣṭhaya || 125 ||

tatheti rāghavaḥ kṛtvā puṣpakaṃ ca samāruhat |
dhanaṃ ratnamasaṃkhyeyaṃ vāmanaṃ ca surottamam || 126 ||

gṛhya sugrīvabharatāvārūḍhau vāmanādanu |
vrajannevāṃbare rāmastiṣṭhetyāha vibhīṣaṇam || 127 ||

rāghavasya vacaḥ śrutvā bhūyopyāha sa rāghavam |
kariṣye sarvametaddhi yadājñaptaṃ vibho tvayā || 128 ||

setunānena rājeṃdra pṛthivyāṃ sarvamānavāḥ |
āgatya pratibādherannājñābhaṃgo bhavettava || 129 ||

kotra me niyamo deva kinnu kāryaṃ mayā vibho |
śrutvaitadrāghavo vākyaṃ rākṣasottamabhāṣitam || 130 ||

kārmukaṃ gṛhya hastena rāmaḥ setuṃ dvidhācchinat |
trirvibhajya ca vegena madhye vai daśayojanam || 131 ||

chitvā tu yojanaṃ caikamekaṃ khaṃḍatrayaṃ kṛtam |
velāvanaṃ samāsādya rāmaḥ pūjāṃ ramāpateḥ || 132 ||

kṛtvā rāmeśvaraṃ nāmnā devadevaṃ janārdanaṃ |
abhiṣicyātha saṃgṛhya vāmanaṃ raghunaṃdanaḥ || 133 ||

dakṣiṇādudadheścaiva nirjagāma tvarānvitaḥ |
aṃtarikṣādabhūdvāṇī meghagaṃbhīraniḥsvanā || 134 ||

rudra uvāca |
bho bho rāmāstu bhadraṃ te sthito'hamiha sāṃpratam |
yāvajjagadidaṃ rāma yāvadeṣā dharā sthitā || 135 ||

tāvadeva ca te setu tīrthaṃ sthāsyati rāghava |
śrutvaivaṃ devadevasya giraṃ tāmamṛtopamām || 136 ||

rāma uvāca |
namaste devadeveśa bhaktānāmabhayaṃkara |
gaurīkāṃta namastubhyaṃ dakṣayajñavināśana || 137 ||

namo bhavāya śarvāya rudrāya varadāya ca |
paśūnāṃpataye nityaṃ cogrāya ca kapardine || 138 ||

mahādevāya bhīmāya tryaṃbakāya diśāṃpate |
īśānāya bhagaghnāya namostvaṃdhakaghātine || 139 ||

nīlagrīvāya ghorāya vedhase vedhasā stuta |
kumāraśatrunighnāya kumārajananāya ca || 140 ||

vilohitāya dhūmrāya śivāya krathanāya ca |
namo nīlaśikhaṃḍāya śūline daityanāśine || 141 ||

ugrāya ca trinetrāya hiraṇyavasuretase |
aniṃdyāyāṃbikābhartre sarvadevastutāya ca || 142 ||

abhigamyāya kāmyāya sadyojātāya vai namaḥ |
vṛṣadhvajāya muṃḍāya jaṭine brahmacāriṇe || 143 ||

tapyamānāya tapyāya brahmaṇyāya jayāya ca |
viśvātmane viśvasṛje viśvamāvṛtya tiṣṭhate || 144 ||

namo namostu divyāya prapannārtiharāya ca |
bhaktānukaṃpine deva viśvatejo manogate || 145 ||

pulastya uvāca |
evaṃ saṃstūyamānastu devadevo haro nṛpa |
uvāca rāghavaṃ vākyaṃ bhaktinamraṃ purāsthitam || 146 ||

rudra uvāca |
bho bho rāghava bhadraṃ te brūhi yatte manogatam |
bhavānnārāyaṇo nūnaṃ gūḍho mānuṣayoniṣu || 147 ||

avatīrṇo devakāryaṃ kṛtaṃ taccānagha tvayā |
idānīṃ svaṃ vrajasthānaṃ kṛtakāryosi śatruhan || 148 ||

tvayā kṛtaṃ paraṃ tīrthaṃ setvākhyaṃ raghunaṃdana |
āgatya mānavā rājanpaśyeyuriha sāgare || 149 ||

mahāpātakayuktā ye teṣāṃ pāpaṃ vilīyate |
brahmavadhyādipāpāni yāni kaṣṭāni kānicit || 150 ||

darśanādeva naśyaṃti nātra kāryā vicāraṇā |
gaccha tvaṃ vāmanaṃ sthāpya gaṃgātīre raghūttama || 151 ||

pṛthivyāṃ sarvaśaḥ kṛtvā bhāgānaṣṭau paraṃtapa |
śvetadvīpaṃ svakaṃ sthānaṃ vraja deva namostu te || 152 ||

praṇipatya tato rāmastīrthaṃ prāptaśca puṣkaram |
vimānaṃ tu na yātyūrdhvaṃ veṣṭitaṃ tattu rāghavaḥ || 153 ||

kimidaṃ veṣṭitaṃ yānaṃ nirālaṃbe'mbare sthitam |
bhavitavyaṃ kāraṇena paśyetyāha sma vānaram || 154 ||

sugrīvo rāmavacanādavatīrya dharātale |
sa ca paśyati brahmāṇaṃ surasiddhasamanvitam || 155 ||

brahmarṣisaṅghasahitaṃ caturvedasamanvitam |
dṛṣṭvā''gatyābravīdrāmaṃ sarvalokapitāmahaḥ || 156 ||

sahito lokapālaiśca vasvādityamarudgaṇaiḥ |
taṃ devaṃ puṣpakaṃ naiva laṃghayeddhi pitāmaham || 157 ||

avatīrya tato rāmaḥ puṣpakāddhemabhūṣitāt |
natvā viriṃcanaṃ devaṃ gāyatryā saha saṃsthitam || 158 ||

aṣṭāṃgapraṇipātena paṃcāṃgāliṃgitāvaniḥ |
tuṣṭāva praṇato bhūtvā devadevaṃ viriṃcanam || 159 ||

rāma uvāca |
namāmi lokakartāraṃ prajāpatisurārcitam |
devanāthaṃ lokanāthaṃ prajānāthaṃ jagatpatim || 160 ||

namaste devadeveśa surāsuranamaskṛta |
bhūtabhavyabhavannātha haripiṃgalalocana || 161 ||

bālastvaṃ vṛddharūpī ca mṛgacarmāsanāṃbaraḥ |
tāraṇaścāsi devastvaṃ trailokyaprabhurīśvaraḥ || 162 ||

hiraṇyagarbhaḥ padmagarbhaḥ vedagarbhaḥ smṛtipradaḥ |
mahāsiddho mahāpadmī mahādaṃḍī ca mekhalī || 163 ||

kālaśca kālarūpī ca nīlagrīvo vidāṃvaraḥ |
vedakartārbhako nityaḥ paśūnāṃ patiravyayaḥ || 164 ||

darbhapāṇirhaṃsaketuḥ kartā hartā haro hariḥ |
jaṭī muṃḍī śikhī daṃḍī laguḍī ca mahāyaśāḥ || 165 ||

bhūteśvaraḥ surādhyakṣaḥ sarvātmā sarvabhāvanaḥ |
sarvagaḥ sarvahārī ca sraṣṭā ca gururavyayaḥ || 166 ||

kamaṃḍaludharo devaḥ sruksruvādidharastathā |
havanīyo'rcanīyaśca oṃkāro jyeṣṭhasāmagaḥ || 167 ||

mṛtyuścaivāmṛtaścaiva pāriyātraśca suvrataḥ |
brahmacārī vratadharo guhāvāsī supaṅkajaḥ || 168 ||

amaro darśanīyaśca bālasūryanibhastathā |
dakṣiṇe vāmataścāpi patnībhyāmupasevitaḥ || 169 ||

bhikṣuśca bhikṣurūpaśca trijaṭī labdhaniścayaḥ |
cittavṛttikaraḥ kāmo madhurmadhukarastathā || 170 ||

vānaprastho vanagata āśramī pūjitastathā |
jagaddhātā ca karttā ca puruṣaḥ śāśvato dhruvaḥ || 171 ||

dharmādhyakṣo virūpākṣastridharmo bhūtabhāvanaḥ |
trivedo bahurūpaśca sūryāyutasamaprabhaḥ || 172 ||

mohakovaṃdhakaścaivadānavānāṃviśeṣataḥ |
devadevaśca padmāṅkastrinetro'bjajaṭastathā || 173 ||

hariśmaśrurdhanurdhārī bhīmo dharmaparākramaḥ |
evaṃ stutastu rāmeṇa brahmā brahmavidāṃvaraḥ || 174 ||

uvāca praṇataṃ rāmaṃ kare gṛhya pitāmahaḥ |
viṣṇustvaṃ mānuṣe dehe'vatīrṇo vasudhātale || 175 ||

kṛtaṃ tadbhavatā sarvaṃ devakāryaṃ mahāvibho |
saṃsthāpya vāmanaṃ devaṃ jāhnavyā dakṣiṇe taṭe || 176 ||

ayodhyāṃ svapurīṃ gatvā suralokaṃ vrajasva ca |
visṛṣṭo brahmaṇā rāmaḥ praṇipatya pitāmahaṃ || 177 ||

ārūḍhaḥ puṣpakaṃ yānaṃ saṃprāpto madhurāṃ purīm |
samīkṣya putrasahitaṃ śatrughnaṃ śatrughātinaṃ || 178 ||

tutoṣa rāghavaḥ śrīmānbharataḥ sa harīśvaraḥ |
śatrughno bhrātarau prāptau śakropendrāvivāgatau || 179 ||

praṇipatya tato mūrdhnā paṃcāṃgāliṃgitāvaniḥ |
utthāpya cāṃkamāropya rāmo bhrātaramaṃjasā || 180 ||

bharataśca tataḥ paścātsugrīvastadanaṃtaraṃ |
upaviṣṭo'tha rāmāya so'rghamādāya satvaraṃ || 181 ||

rājyaṃ nivedayāmāsa cāṣṭāṃgaṃ rāghave tadā |
śrutvā prāptaṃ tato rāmaṃ sarvo vai māthuro janaḥ || 182 ||

varṇā brāhmaṇabhūyiṣṭhā draṣṭumenaṃ samāgatāḥ |
saṃbhāṣya prakṛtīḥ sarvā naigamānbrāhmaṇaiḥ saha || 183 ||

dināni paṃcoṣitvā'tra rāmo gaṃtuṃ mano dadhe |
śatrughnaśca tato rāme vājinotha gajāṃstathā || 184 ||

kṛtākṛtaṃ ca kanakaṃ tatropāyanamāharat |
rāmastvāha tataḥ prītaḥ sarvametanmayā tava || 185 ||

dattaṃ putrau te'bhiṣiñca rājānau māthure jane |
evamuktvā tato rāmaḥ prāpto madhyaṃdine ravau || 186 ||

mahodayaṃ samāsādya gaṃgātīre sa vāmanaṃ |
pratiṣṭhāpya dvijānāha bhāvinaḥ pārthivāṃstathā || 187 ||

mayā kṛto'yaṃ dharmasya seturbhūtivivardhanaḥ |
prāpte kāle pālanīyo na ca lopyaḥ kathaṃcana || 188 ||

prasāritakareṇaivaṃ prārthanaiṣā mayā kṛtā |
nṛpāḥ kṛte mayārthitve yatkṣemaṃ kriyatāmiha || 189 ||

nityaṃ dainaṃdinīpūjā kāryā sarvairataṃdritaiḥ |
grāmāndatvā dhanaṃ tacca laṃkāyā āhṛtaṃ ca yat || 190 ||

preṣayitvā ca kiṣkiṃdhāṃ sugrīvaṃ vānareśvaraṃ |
ayodhyāmāgato rāmaḥ puṣpakaṃ tamathābravīt || 191 ||

nāgaṃtavyaṃ tvayā bhūyastiṣṭha yatra dhaneśvaraḥ |
kṛtakṛtyastato rāmaḥ kartavyaṃ nāpyamanyata || 192 ||

pulastya uvāca |
evante bhīṣma rāmasya kathāyogena pārthiva |
utpattirvāmanasyoktā kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotumicchasi || 193 ||

kathayāmi tu tatsarvaṃ yatra kautūhalaṃ nṛpa |
sarvaṃ te kīrttayiṣyāmi yenārthī nṛpanaṃdana || 194 ||

bhīṣma uvāca |
kathitaṃ vāmanasyaiva māhātmyaṃ vistareṇa vai |
punastasyaiva māhātmyamanyadviṣṇorato vada || 1 ||

padmaṃ kathamabhūddeva nābhau yenābhavajjagat |
kathaṃ ca vaiṣṇavī sṛṣṭiḥ padmamadhye'bhavatpurā || 2 ||

kathaṃ pādme mahākalpe'bhavatpadmamayaṃ jagat |
jalārṇavagatasyeha nābhau jātaṃ jalānugaṃ || 3 ||

prabhāvaṃ padmanābhasya svapataḥ sāgarāṃbhasi |
puṣkare tu kathaṃ jātā devā ṝṣigaṇāḥ purā || 4 ||

etadākhyāhi nikhilaṃ yogaṃ yogavidāṃ pate |
kathaṃ nirmitavāṃstatra caitaṃ lokaṃ sanātanam || 5 ||

kathamekārṇave śūnye naṣṭe sthāvarajaṃgame |
bhūgolake pradagdhe tu praṇaṣṭoragarākṣase || 6 ||

naṣṭānalānilākāśe naṣṭadharme mahītale |
kevale gahvarībhūte mahābhūtaviparyaye || 7 ||

kiṃ nu viśvapatiḥ sākṣānmahātejā mahādyutiḥ |
āste yathādhyānaniṣṭho vidhimāsthāya yogavit || 8 ||

śṛṇvataḥ parayā bhaktyā brahmannetadaśeṣataḥ |
vaktumarhasi dharmajña yaśo nārāyaṇātmakam || 9 ||

śraddhinaḥ sūpaviṣṭasya bhagavanvaktumarhasi |
pulastya uvāca |
nārāyaṇasya yaśasaḥ śravaṇe yā tava spṛhā || 10 ||

sadvaṃśānvayapūtasya nyāyyaṃ kurukulodvaha |
śṛṇuṣvādipurāṇeṣu devebhyaśca yathā śruti || 11 ||

brāhmaṇānāṃ ca vadatāṃ śrutvā vai sumahātmanām |
yathā ca tapasā dṛṣṭvā bṛhaspati samadyutiḥ || 12 ||

parāśarasutaḥ śrīmāngururdvaipāyano'bravīt |
tatte'haṃ kathayiṣyāmi yathābhakti yathāśruti || 13 ||

yadvijñātaṃ mayā samyagṛṣimārgeṇa sattama |
kaḥ samutsahate jñātuṃ paraṃ nārāyaṇātmakam || 14 ||

viśvāvitāraṃ brahmāyaṃ na vedayati tatvataḥ |
tatkarmaviśvadevā na tadrahasyaṃ maharṣiṣu || 15 ||

sa ijyassarvayajñānāṃ sa tattvaṃ tattvadarśinām |
adhyātmamadhyātmavidāṃ narakaṃ ca vikarmiṇām || 16 ||

adhidaivaṃ ca taddaivamadhidaivatasaṃjñitam |
adhibhūtaṃ ca tadbhūtaṃ paraṃ ca paramārthinām || 17 ||

sa yajño vedanirdiṣṭastattapaḥ kavayo viduḥ |
yaḥ karttā kārako buddhiryataḥ kṣetrajña eva ca || 18 ||

praṇavaḥ puruṣaḥ śāstā ekaśceti vibhāvyate |
prāṇaḥ paṃcavidhaścaiva dhruvamakṣarameva ca || 19 ||

kālaḥ pākaśca yajñaśca yaṣṭā cādhītameva ca |
ucyate vividhairbhāvaiḥ sa evāyaṃ tu tatparam || 20 ||

sa eva bhagavānsarvaṃ karoti na karoti ca |
sosminkārayate sarvaṃ sthānināṃ ca kṛtiḥ kṛtā || 21 ||

yajāmahe tamevādyaṃ sa evotthānanirvṛtaḥ |
yo vaktā yacca vaktavyaṃ yaścāhaṃ tadbravīmi te || 22 ||

śrūyate yacca vai śrāvyaṃ yaccānyatparijalpitam |
yā kathāyāśca śrutayo yo dharmī dharmatatparaḥ || 23 ||

viśvaṃ viśvapatiryaśca sa tu nārāyaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ |
yatsatyaṃ yadanṛtamādimadhyabhūtaṃ yaccāṃtyaṃ niravadhikaṃ ca yadbhaviṣyam || 24 ||

yatkiṃciccaramacaraṃ yadasti cānyatsarvaṃ tatpuruṣavaraḥ pradhānabhūtaḥ |
catvāryyāhuḥ sahasrāṇi varṣāṇāṃ tatkṛtaṃ yugam || 25 ||

tasya tāvacchatī saṃdhyā dviguṇā kurunaṃdana |
yatra dharmaścatuṣpādastvadharmaḥ pādavigrahaḥ || 26 ||

svadharmaniratāḥ śāṃtā jāyaṃte yatra mānavāḥ |
viprā sthitā dharmaparā rājavṛttisthitā nṛpāḥ || 27 ||

kṛṣyāmabhiratā vaiśyāḥ śūdrā śuḥśrūṣavastathā |
tadā satyaṃ ca satvaṃ ca dharmaścaiva vivardhate || 28 ||

sadbhirācarito dharmo yena lokaḥ pravarttate |
etatkṛtayuge vṛttaṃ sarveṣāmeva pārthiva || 29 ||

prāṇināṃ dharmasaṃjñānāṃ narāṇāṃ nīcajanmanām |
trīṇivarṣasahasrāṇi tretāyugamihocyate || 30 ||

tasya tāvacchatī saṃdhyā dviguṇā parikīrtitā |
dvābhyāmadharmaḥ pādābhyāṃ tribhirdharmo vyavasthitaḥ || 31 ||

yatra satyaṃ ca satvaṃ ca kriyā dharmo vidhīyate |
tretāyāṃ vikṛtiṃ yāṃti varṇā lobhena saṃyutāḥ || 32 ||

cāturvarṇyasya vai kṛtyaṃ kṣāṃtirdaurbalyameva ca |
eṣā tretāyugagatirvicitrā devanirmitā || 33 ||

dvāparaṃ dvisahasraṃ tu varṣāṇāṃ kurunandana |
tasya tāvacchatī sandhyā dviguṇaṃ yugamucyate || 34 ||

tatrāpyatīvārthaparāḥ prāṇino rajasā hatāḥ |
śaṭhā naiṣkṛtikāḥ kṣudrā jāyante kurunandana || 35 ||

dvābhyāṃ dharmaḥ sthitaḥ padbhyāmadharmastribhirutthitaḥ |
viparyayaśatairdharmaḥ kṣayameti kalau yuge || 36 ||

brahmaṇyabhāvaścyavate tathāstikyaṃ vivarjyate |
vratopavāsāstyajyaṃte kalau vai yugaparyaye || 37 ||

tadā varṣasahasraṃ tu varṣāṇāṃ dve śate tathā |
yatrādharmaścatuṣpādo dharmaḥ pādaparigrahaḥ || 38 ||

kāminastāpasāḥ kṣudrā jāyaṃte yatra mānavāḥ |
na cāvasāyikaḥ kaścinna sādhurna ca satyavāk || 39 ||

nāstikā brāhmaṇā bhaktā jñāyaṃte tatra mānavāḥ |
ahaṃkāragṛhītāśca prakṣīṇasnehabaṃdhanāḥ || 40 ||

viprāḥ śūdrasamācārāssaṃti sarve kalau yuge |
āśramāṇāṃ viparyāsaḥ kalau saṃprati vartate || 41 ||

varṇānāṃ caiva saṃdeho yugāṃte kurunaṃdana |
eṣā dvādaśasāhasrī yugākhyā pūrvanirmitā || 42 ||

sahasrayugaparyaṃtaṃ tadaharbrāhmamucyate |
tato ha nigate tasminsarveṣāmeva jīvinām || 43 ||

śarīranirvṛtiṃ dṛṣṭvā kālaḥ saṃhārabuddhimān |
devatānāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ mahīpate || 44 ||

daityānāṃ dānavānāṃ ca yakṣarākṣasapakṣiṇām |
gaṃdharvāṇāmapsarasāṃ bhujaṃgānāṃ ca pārthiva || 45 ||

parvatānāṃ nadīnāṃ ca paśūnāṃ caiva sattama |
tiryagyonigatānāṃ ca krimīṇāṃ daṃśināṃ tathā || 46 ||

sarvabhūtapatiḥ paṃca bhūtvā bhūtāni bhūtakṛt |
jagatsaṃharaṇārthāya kurute vaiśasaṃ mahat || 47 ||

bhūtvā sūryaścakṣuṣī ādadāno bhūtvā vāyuḥ prāṇināṃ prāṇijātam |
bhūtvā vahnirnirdahansarvalokānbhūtvā megho bhūya ugro'bhyavarṣat || 48 ||

bhūtvā nārāyaṇo yogī sarvamūrti vibhāvasuḥ |
gabhastibhiḥ pradīptābhiḥ saṃśoṣayati sāgarān || 49 ||

tataḥ pītvārṇavānsarvānnadīkūpāṃśca sarvataḥ |
parvatānāṃ ca salilaṃ sarvamādāya yogavit || 50 ||

bhūtvā caiva sa hastārcirmahīṃ bhitvā rasātale |
ramate jalamādāya pibanrasamanuttamaṃ || 51 ||

mūrttāmūrtte tadanyacca yadasti prāṇiṣu dhruvaṃ |
tatsarvamaraviṃdākṣa ādatte puruṣottamaḥ || 52 ||

vāyuśca balavānbhūtvā vidhunvāno'khilaṃ jagat |
prāṇāpānaṃ samāsādya vāyunā kramate hariḥ || 53 ||

tato devagaṇānāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ caiva dehinām |
paṃceṃdriyaguṇāssarve bhūtānyeva ca yāni ca || 54 ||

ghreyaṃ ghrāṇaṃ śarīraṃ ca pṛthivīsaṃśritā guṇāḥ |
lokayātrā bhagavatā muhūrtena vināśitā || 55 ||

jihvārasaśca snehaśca saṃśritāḥ salile guṇāḥ |
rūpaṃ cakṣurvibhāgaśca netra jyotiḥ śritā guṇāḥ || 56 ||

sparśaḥ prāṇaśca ceṣṭā ca pavanaṃ saṃśritā guṇāḥ |
śabdaḥ śrotre ca śravaṇaṃ gaganaṃ saṃśritā guṇāḥ || 57 ||

mano buddhiśca cittaṃ ca kṣetrajñaṃ ceti saṃśritāḥ |
pareṇa parameṣṭhī ca hṛṣīkeśamupāśritāḥ || 58 ||

tato bhagavatastasya raśmibhiḥ parivāritāḥ |
vāyunā parinunnāśca bhūmiśākhāmupāśritāḥ || 59 ||

teṣāṃ saṃharaṇodbhūtaḥ pāvakaḥ śatadhā jvalan |
pradahannakhilaṃ viśvaṃ vṛttaḥ saṃvarttako'nalaḥ || 60 ||

saparvatadrumāngulmānlatāvallīstṛṇāni ca |
vimānāni ca divyāni purāṇi vividhāni ca || 61 ||

yāni cāśrayaṇīyāni sarvāṇyapyadahadbhṛśam |
bhasmīkṛtya tu tānsarvāṃllokānllokagurorguruḥ || 62 ||

sa bhūtiṃ dhārayāmāsa yugāṃte lokasaṃbhavām |
sahasravṛṣṭiḥ śatadhā bhūtvā kṛṣṇo mahāghanaḥ || 63 ||

divyatoyena haviṣā tarpayāmāsa medinīṃ |
tataḥ kṣīranikāśena svādunā paramāṃbhasā || 64 ||

śiśireṇa ca puṇyena mahīnirvāṇamāgamat |
tena toyena saṃpṛktā payassādharmyato dharā || 65 ||

ekārṇāvajalībhūtā sarvasatvavivarjitā |
mahāsatvānyapi vibhuṃ praviṣṭānyamitaujasaṃ || 66 ||

naṣṭārkapavanākāśe sūkṣme jagati saṃvṛte |
saṃśoṣamātmanā kṛtvā samudrāṇāṃ ca dehinaḥ || 67 ||

dagdhvā saṃkocya ca tathā svapityekaḥ sanātanaḥ |
paurāṇaṃ rūpamāsthāya svapityamitavikramaḥ || 68 ||

ekārṇavajaleyāyī yogī yogamupāsitaḥ |
anekāni sahasrāṇi yugānyekārṇavāṃbhasi || 69 ||

na caiva kaścidavyaktaṃ vyakto veditumarhati |
kaścaiṣa puruṣo nāma kiṃ yogaḥ kaśca yogavān || 70 ||

na pṛṣṭhe naivamabhito naiva pārśve na cāgrataḥ |
kaścidvijñāyate tasya dṛśyate devasattamaḥ || 71 ||

nabhaḥ kṣitiṃ pavanamapaḥ prakāśanaṃ prajāpatiṃ bhuvanadharaṃ sureśvaram |
pitāmahaṃ śrutinilayaṃ muniṃ prabhuṃ samāpayañchayanamarocayatprabhuḥ || 72 ||

evamekārṇavībhūte śete loke mahādyutiḥ |
pracchādya salilenorvīṃ haṃso nārāyaṇāya te || 73 ||

mahato rajaso madhye mahārṇavasamasya vai |
vārijākṣo mahābāhurakṣayaṃ brahma yadviduḥ || 74 ||

ātmarūpasarūpeṇa tamasā saṃvṛtaḥ prabhuḥ |
manaḥ sātvikamādāya yatra tatsatvamāhitaṃ || 75 ||

yathātathyaṃ paraṃ jñānaṃ bhūtāya brahmaṇe tataḥ |
rahasyaṃ ca tathoddiṣṭaṃ yathopaniṣadāṃ smṛtam || 76 ||

puruṣo yajña ityetatparamaṃ parikīrtitam |
yaścānyaḥ puruṣākhyaḥ syātsa eva puruṣottamaḥ || 77 ||

ye ca yajñakarā viprā ye ṝtvija iti smṛtāḥ |
asmādeva purā bhūtā vaktrebhyaḥ śrūyate tathā || 78 ||

brahmāṇaṃ prathamaṃ vaktrādudgātāraṃ ca sāmagaṃ |
hotāraṃ ca tathāddhvaryuṃ bāhubhyāmasṛjatprabhuḥ || 79 ||

brahmāṇaṃ brāhmāṇācchaṃsi stotārau caiva sarvaśaḥ |
meḍhrācca maitrāvaruṇaṃ pratiṣṭhātārameva ca || 80 ||

udarātpratihartāraṃ potāraṃ caiva pārthiva |
pāṇibhyāmatha cāgnīdhramunnetāraṃ ca yājuṣam || 81 ||

acchāvākamathorubhyāṃ subrahmaṇyaṃ ca sāmagam |
evamevaṃ sa bhagavānṣoḍaśaitānjagatpatiḥ || 82 ||

svayaṃbhūḥ sarvayajñānāmṛtvijo'sṛjaduttamān |
tadā caiṣa mahāyogī puruṣo yajñasaṃjñitaḥ || 83 ||

vedāścaiva tathā sarve sahāṃgopaniṣatkriyāḥ |
svapityekārṇave caiva yadāścaryamabhūtpurā || 84 ||

śrūyatāṃ tu tadā vipro mārkaṃḍeyaḥ kutūhalāt |
gīrṇo bhagavatā tena kukṣāvāsīnmahāmuniḥ || 85 ||

bahuvarṣasahasrāyustasyaiva varatejasaḥ |
aṭaṃstīrthaprasaṃgena pṛthivītīrthagocaraḥ || 86 ||

āśramāṇi ca puṇyāni devatāyatanāni ca |
deśādrāṣṭrāṇi citrāṇi purāṇi vividhāni ca || 87 ||

japahomaparāḥ śāṃtāstapobhiramalāḥ smṛtāḥ |
mārkaṃḍeyastatastasya śanairvaktrādvinirgataḥ || 88 ||

niṣkrāmantaṃ na cātmānaṃ jānīte devamāyayā |
niṣkramya tasya udarādekārṇavamatho jagat || 89 ||

sarvatastamasāchannaṃ mārkaṃḍeyonvavaikṣata |
tasyotpannaṃ bhayaṃ tīvraṃ vyatyayaṃ cātmajīvitam || 90 ||

devadarśanasaṃhṛṣṭo vismayaṃ paramaṃ gataḥ |
so'ciṃtayadamoghātmā mārkaṃḍeyotha śaṃkitaḥ || 91 ||

kiṃ nu syāccittasaṃmohaḥ kiṃ nu svapnonubhūyate |
vyaktamanyataro bhāva etayorbhavitā mama || 92 ||

na hi svapno hyayaṃ satyayuktaṃ yatsatyamarhati |
naṣṭacaṃdrārkapavano naṣṭaparvatabhūtalaḥ || 93 ||

katamaḥ syādayaṃ loka iti śokamupāgataḥ |
dadarśa cāpi puruṣaṃ svapaṃtaṃ parvatopamam || 94 ||

salile'dhamatho magnaṃ jīmūtamiva sāgare |
tapaṃtamiva tejobhirāmuktaśaśibhāskaram || 95 ||

gāṃbhīryātsāgaramiva bhāsamānammavaujasā |
devaṃ draṣṭumihāyātaḥ ko bhavāniti vismayāt || 96 ||

tathaiva ca muniḥ kukṣiṃ punareva praveśitaḥ |
saṃpraviṣṭaḥ punaḥ kukṣiṃ mārkaṃḍeyaḥ savismayam || 97 ||

tathaiva ca punarbhūyo vijānansvapnadarśanam |
sa tathaiva yathāpūrvaṃ pṛthivīmaṭate vanam || 98 ||

puṇyatīrthajalopetaṃ vividhānyāśramāṇi ca |
kratubhiryajamānāṃśca samāptagurudakṣiṇaiḥ || 99 ||

apaśyaddevakukṣisthānyajñasthānśataśo dvijān |
sadvṛttamāśritāḥ sarve varṇā brāhmaṇapūrvakāḥ || 100 ||

catvāra āśramāḥ samyagyathāpūrvaṃ vilokitā |
evaṃ varṣaśataṃ sāgraṃ mārkaṃḍeyena dhīmatā || 101 ||

caratā pṛthivī sarvā tatkukṣau hi samīkṣyate |
tataḥ kadācidatha vai punaḥ kukṣervinirgataḥ || 102 ||

suptaṃnyagrodhaśākhāyāṃbālamekaṃnirīkṣyaca |
tathaivaikārṇavajale nīhāreṇāvṛtāṃtare || 103 ||

avyaktakrīḍite loke sarvabhūtavivarjite |
sa munirvismayāviṣṭaḥ kautūhalasamanvitaḥ || 104 ||

bālamādityasaṃkāśaṃ na śaknotyabhivīkṣitum |
sopyaciṃtayadekāṃte sthitvā salilasannidhau || 105 ||

pūrvadṛṣṭamidaṃ mene śaṃkito devamāyayā |
agādhe salile śete mārkaṃḍeyaḥ savismayaḥ || 106 ||

pūrvavattamatho draṣṭumavrajattrastalocanaḥ |
sa tasmai bhagavānāha svāgato bāla bho iti || 107 ||

babhāṣe meghatulyena svareṇa puruṣottamaḥ |
mārkaṃḍeya na bhetavyamāgacchasva mamāṃtikam || 108 ||

mārkaṃḍeya uvāca |
ko nāmnā kīrtayati māṃ kurvanparibhavaṃ mama |
divyavarṣasahasrākhyaṃ dharṣayaṃścaiva me vayaḥ || 109 ||

na hyeṣa ca sadācāro deveṣvapi mamocitaḥ |
māṃ brahmāpi hi sasneho dīrghāyuriti bhāṣate || 110 ||

kastapoghoramāsādya mamādya tyaktajīvitaḥ |
mārkaṃḍeyeti māmuktvā mṛtyumīkṣitumarhasi || 111 ||

evaṃ prakṣubhitaḥ krodhānmārkaṃḍeyo mahāmuniḥ |
tadainaṃ bhagavānbhūyo babhāṣe madhusūdanaḥ || 112 ||

śrībhagavānuvāca |
ahaṃ te janako vatsa hṛṣīkeśaḥ pitā guruḥ |
āyuḥ pradātā paurāṇaḥ kiṃ māṃ tvaṃ nopasarpasi || 113 ||

māṃ putrakāmaḥ prathamaṃ tvatpitāṃgiraso muniḥ |
pūrvamārādhayāmāsa tapastīvraṃ samāśritaḥ || 114 ||

taṃ dṛṣṭvā ghoratapasaṃ tridaśottamatejasam |
dattavāṃstvāmahaṃ putraṃ maharṣimamitaujasam || 115 ||

kassamutsahate cānyo yogibhūtātmagātmakam |
draṣṭumekārṇavagataṃ krīḍaṃtaṃ yogamāyayā || 116 ||

tataḥ prahṛṣṭahṛdayo vismayotphullalocanaḥ |
mūrdhni baddhāṃjalipuṭo mārkaṃḍeyo māhātapāḥ || 117 ||

nāmagotre tu saṃprocya dīrghāyurlokapūjitaḥ |
tasmai bhagavate bhaktyā namaskāramathākarot || 118 ||

mārkaṃḍeya uvāca |
icchāmi tattvato jñātumimāṃ māyāṃ tavānagha |
yadekārṇavamadhyasthaḥ śeṣe tvaṃ bālarūpavān || 119 ||

kiṃ saṃjñaścaiva bhagavānloke vijñāyase prabho |
tarkayehaṃ mahātmānaṃ ko hyanyaḥ sthātumarhasi || 120 ||

śrībhagavānuvāca |
ahaṃ nārāyaṇo brahmansarvabhūtavināśanaḥ |
ahaṃ sahasraśīrṣāsyaḥ sahasrapadasaṃyutaḥ || 121 ||

ādityavarṇaḥ puruṣo mukhe brahmamayo hyaham |
ahamagnirhavyavahaḥ saptasaptibhiranvitaḥ || 122 ||

ahamiṃdrapadaḥ śakra ṝtūnāṃ parivatsaraḥ |
ahaṃ yogiṣu sāṃkhyākhyo yugāṃtāvarta eva ca || 123 ||

ahaṃ sarvāṇi satvāni daivatānyakhilāni ca |
bhujagānāmahaṃ śeṣastārkṣyo'haṃ sarvapakṣiṇām || 124 ||

kṛtāṃtaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ vijñeyaḥ kālasaṃjñitaḥ |
ahaṃ dharmastapaścāhaṃ sarvāśramanivāsinām || 125 ||

ahaṃ dayā parodharmaḥ kṣīrodohaṃ mahārṇavaḥ |
yatsatyaṃ tatparaṃ tveka ahameva prajāpatiḥ || 126 ||

ahaṃ sāṃkhyamahaṃ yogo hyahaṃ tatparamaṃ padam |
ahamijyā kriyā cāhamahaṃ vidyādhipaḥ smṛtaḥ || 127 ||

ahaṃ jyotirahaṃ vāyurahaṃ bhūmirahaṃ jalam |
ākāśohaṃ samudrāśca nakṣatrāṇi diśo daśa || 128 ||

ahaṃ varṣamahaṃ somaḥ parjanyohamahaṃ raviḥ |
ahaṃ purāṇaṃ paramaṃ tathaivāhaṃ parāyaṇam || 129 ||

bhaviṣye cāpi sarvatra bhaviṣyatsarvasaṃgrahaḥ |
yatkiṃcitpaśyase vipra yacchṛṇoṣi ca kiṃcana || 130 ||

yaccānubhavase loke tatsarvaṃ māmanusmara |
viśvaṃ sṛṣṭaṃ mayā pūrvaṃ sṛjedyāpi ca paśya mām || 131 ||

yuge yuge ca rakṣāmi mārkaṃḍeyākhilaṃ jagat |
tadetatkathitaṃ sarvaṃ mārkaṃḍeyāvadhāraya || 132 ||

śuśrūṣurapi dharmeṣu kukṣau carasukhaṃ mama |
mama brahmā śarīrastho devāśca ṝṣibhiḥ saha || 133 ||

vyaktamavyaktayogaṃ māmavagaccha muradviṣam |
ahamekākṣaro maṃtrastryakṣaraśca pitāmahaḥ || 134 ||

parastrivargaoṃkāraḥ paramātmapradarśanaḥ |
evamādipurāṇaṃ ca vadatemāṃ mahāmate || 135 ||

vaktraṃ yāto bhagavato mārkaṃḍeyo mahāmuniḥ |
tato bhagavataḥ kukṣiṃ praviṣṭo munisattamaḥ || 136 ||

tasyāsammukhamekānte śuśrūṣurhaṃsamavyayam |
yadakṣayaṃ vividhamupāśritaṃ tu tanmahārṇave vyapagatacaṃdrabhāskare || 137 ||

śanaiścaranprabhuratha haṃsasaṃjñitaḥ sṛjanjagadviharati kālaparyaye |
atha caivaṃ śucirbhūtvā varayāmāsa vai tapaḥ || 138 ||

chādayitvātmano dehaṃ payasāṃbujasaṃbhavaḥ |
tato mahātmātibalo martyalokavisarjane || 139 ||

mahatāṃ caiva bhūtānāṃ viśvo viśvamaciṃtayat |
tasya ciṃtayamānasya niyate saṃsthiterṇave || 140 ||

nirākāśe toyamaye sūkṣme jagati saṃkṣaye |
īśaḥ saṃkṣobhayāmāsa sorṇavaṃ salilaṃ gataḥ || 141 ||

athāṃtarādapāṃ sūkṣmamatha cchidramabhūtpurā |
śabdaṃ prati tato bhūto mārutaśchidrasaṃbhavaḥ || 142 ||

saṃlabdhvāṃtarasaṃkṣobhaṃ vyavardhata samīraṇaḥ |
nabhasvatā balavatā vegādvikṣobhitorṇavaḥ || 143 ||

tasyārṇavasya kṣubdhasya tasminnaṃbhasi mathyataḥ |
kṛṣṇavartmā samabhavatprabhurvaiśvānaro mahān || 144 ||

tataḥ saṃśoṣayāmāsa pāvakaḥ salilaṃ bahu |
samastajaladhiśchidramabhavadvisṛtaṃ nabhaḥ || 145 ||

ātmatejobhavāḥ puṇyā āpomṛtarasopamāḥ |
ākāśaṃ chidrasaṃbhūtaṃ vāyurākāśasaṃbhavaḥ || 146 ||

atha saṃgharṣasambhūtaṃ pāvakaṃ cāsya saṃbhavam |
dṛṣṭvā pitāmaho devo mahābhūtavibhāvanaḥ || 147 ||

dṛṣṭvā bhūtāni bhagavānlokasṛṣṭyarthamuttamam |
brahmaṇo janmasahitaṃ bahurūpo hyaciṃtayat || 148 ||

caturyugānāṃ saṃkhyātaṃ sahasraṃ yugaparyaye |
yatpṛthivyāṃ dvijeṃdrāṇāṃ tapasā bhāvitātmanām || 149 ||

bahujanmaviśuddhātmā brahmaṇo harirucyate |
jñānaṃ dṛṣṭvā tu viśvātmā yogināṃ yāti yogyatām || 150 ||

taṃ yogavaṃtaṃ vijñāya saṃpūrṇaiśvaryamuttamam |
pade brahmaṇi viśvasya nyayojayata yogavit || 151 ||

tatastasminmahātoye maheśo hariracyutaḥ |
jalakrīḍāṃ ca vidhivatsa cakre sarvalokakṛt || 152 ||

padmaṃ nābhyudbhavaṃ caikaṃ samutpāditavāṃstataḥ |
sahastravarṇaṃ virajaṃ bhāskarābhaṃ hiraṇmayam || 153 ||

hutāśanajvalitaśikhojjavalaprabhaṃ samutthitaṃ śaradamalārkatejasam |
virājate kamalamudāravarcasaṃ mahātmanastanuruha cāruśaivalam || 154 ||

pulastya uvāca |
atha yogavatāṃ śreṣṭhamasṛjadbhūrivarcasam |
sraṣṭāraṃ sarvalokānāṃ brahmāṇaṃ sarvatomukham || 1401 ||

tasminhiraṇmaye padme bahuyojanavistṛte |
sarvatejoguṇamaye pārthivairlakṣaṇairvṛte || 1402 ||

tacca padmaṃ purābhūtaṃ pṛthivīrūpamuttamam |
nārāyaṇasamudbhūtaṃ pravadaṃti maharṣayaḥ || 1403 ||

yatpadmaṃ sā rasādevī pṛthivī parikathyate |
ye padmakesarā mukhyāstāndivyānparvatānviduḥ || 1404 ||

himavaṃtaṃ ca nīlaṃ ca meruṃ niṣadhameva ca |
kailāsaṃ śṛṃgavaṃtaṃ ca tathādriṃ gaṃdhamādanam || 1405 ||

puṇyaṃ triśikharaṃ caiva kāṃtaṃ maṃdarameva ca |
udāraṃ piṃjaraṃ caiva viṃdhyamastaṃ ca parvatam || 1406 ||

eta eva gaṇānāṃ ca siddhānāṃ ca mahātmanām |
āśrayāḥ puṇyaśīlānāṃ sarvakāmaphalapradāḥ || 1407 ||

eteṣāmaṃtare dvīpo jaṃbūdvīpa iti smṛtaḥ |
jaṃbudvīpasya saṃsthānaṃ yājñīyā yatra ca kriyāḥ || 1408 ||

tebhyo yaddravate toyaṃ divyāmṛtarasopamam |
divyatīrthaśatādhārāḥ sarasyaḥ sarvataḥ smṛtāḥ || 1409 ||

yānyetānīhapadmasya kesarāṇi samaṃtataḥ |
asaṃkhyeyāḥ pṛthivyāṃ te vividhāścaiva parvatāḥ || 14010 ||

yāni parṇāni padmasya bhūripūrvāṇi pārthiva |
te durgamāḥ śailacitā mlecchadeśāḥ prakīrtitāḥ || 14011 ||

yānyadhobhāgapatrāṇi tā nivāsāstu bhāgaśaḥ |
daityānāmasurāṇāṃ ca pannagānāṃ ca pārthiva || 14012 ||

teṣāṃ madhyeṃtaraṃ yattu tadrasātalasaṃjñitam |
mahāpātakakarmāṇo majjaṃte yatra mānavāḥ || 14013 ||

caturdiśāsu saṃkhyātāścatvāraḥ salilākarāḥ |
evaṃ nārāyaṇasyārthe mahī puṣkara saṃbhavā || 14014 ||

prādurbhāvopyayaṃ tasmānnāmnā puṣkarasaṃjñitaḥ |
etasmātkāraṇādyajñe purāṇaiḥ paramarṣibhiḥ || 14015 ||

yajñiyairvedadṛṣṭāṃtairyajñairyūpacitiḥ kṛtā |
evaṃ bhagavatā tena viśvavyāpyadharācitā || 14016 ||

parvatānāṃ nadīnāṃ ca racanā caiva nirmitā |
viśvasya yaścāpratimaprabhāvaḥ prabhākarā bho varuṇomitadyutiḥ || 14017 ||

śanaiḥ svayaṃbhūrvyasṛjatsuṣuptaṃ jaganmayaḥ padmanidhiṃ mahārṇave |
vighnastapasi saṃbhūto madhurnāma mahāsuraḥ || 14018 ||

tenaiva ca sahodbhūto hyasuro nāma kaiṭabhaḥ |
tau rajastamasorbhūtau saṃbhūtau tāmasau gaṇau || 14019 ||

ekārṇavaṃ jagatsarvaṃ kṣobhayetāṃ mahābalau |
divyaraktāṃbaradharau śvetadīptogradaṃṣṭriṇau || 14020 ||

kirīṭamakuṭodagrau keyūravalayojjvalau |
mahāvivṛtatāmrākṣau pīnoraskau mahābhujau || 14021 ||

mahāgireḥ saṃhananau jaṃgamāviva parvatau |
navameghapratīkāśāvādityapratimānanau || 14022 ||

vipulābhogakeyūra karābhyāmatibhīṣaṇau |
pādasaṃcāravinyāsairvikṣipaṃtāvivārṇavam || 14023 ||

kaṃpayaṃtau harimiva śayānaṃ madhusūdanam |
tau tatra vicaraṃtau tu puṣkare viśvatomukhau || 14024 ||

yogināṃ śreṣṭhamatyaṃtaṃ dīptaṃ dadṛśatustadā |
nārāyaṇasamājñātaṃ sṛjaṃtamakhilāḥ prajāḥ || 14025 ||

daivatāni ca viśvāni mānasāṃśca sutānṛṣīn |
tatastāvūcatustatra brahmāṇamasurottamau || 14026 ||

duṣṭau yuyutsū saṃkruddhau krodhavyākulitekṣaṇau |
kastvaṃ puṣkaramadhyasthaḥ sitoṣṇīṣaścaturbhujaḥ || 14027 ||

āvāmagaṇayanmohādāsse tvaṃ vigataspṛhaḥ |
ehyāgacchāvayoryuddhaṃ dehi tvaṃ kamalodbhava || 14028 ||

āvābhyāṃ parameśābhyāmaśaktaḥ sthātumarṇave |
tatra kaśca bhavettubhyaṃ yena cātra niyojitaḥ || 14029 ||

kaḥ sraṣṭā kaśca te goptā kena nāmnābhidhīyate |
brahmovāca |
īśvaraḥ procyate loke viṣṇuścānaṃtaśaktidhṛt || 14030 ||

tatsakāśāttu jātaṃ māṃ sraṣṭāramavagacchatam |
madhukaiṭabhā ūcatuḥ |
nāvayoḥ paramaṃ loke kiṃcidasti mahāmune || 14031 ||

āvābhyāṃ cchādyate viśvaṃ tamasā rajasā ca vai |
rajastamomayāvāvāmṛṣīṇāmatilaṃghinau || 14032 ||

dharma śīlaṃ cchādayantau nāśakau sarvadehinām |
āvābhyāṃ yujyate loko dustarābhyāṃ yuge yuge || 14033 ||

āvāmarthaśca kāmaśca yajñassarvaparigrahaḥ |
sukhaṃ yatra mado yatra yatra śrīḥ kīrtireva ca || 14034 ||

yeṣāṃ yatkāṃkṣitaṃ kiṃcittattadāvāṃ viciṃtaya |
brahmovāca |
āvābhyāṃ saṃhatau dṛṣṭvā yuvāṃ pūrvaṃ parājitau || 14035 ||

taṃ samādhāya guṇinaṃ satvaṃ cāsmi samāśritaḥ |
yaḥ paro yogayuktātmā yokṣaraḥ satvameva ca || 14036 ||

rajasastamasaścaiva yaḥ sraṣṭā viśvasaṃbhavaḥ |
tato bhūtāni jāyaṃte sātvikānītarāṇi ca || 14037 ||

sa eva yuvayornāśaṃ vāsudevaḥ kariṣyati |
svapanneva tato devo bahuyojanavistṛtau || 14038 ||

bāhū nārāyaṇo brahma kṛtavānātmamāyayā |
kṛṣyamāṇau tatastasya bāhubhyāṃ bāhuśālinau || 14039 ||

ceratustau vigalitau śakunāviva pīvarau |
tatastāvāhaturgatvā vāsudevaṃ sanātanam || 14040 ||

padmanābhaṃ hṛṣīkeśaṃ praṇipatya natāvubhau |
jānīvastvāṃ viśvayoniṃ tvāmekaṃ puruṣottamam || 14041 ||

āvayoścaiva hetuṃ tvāṃ jānantau buddhikāraṇam |
amoghadarśanaṃ satyaṃ yatastvāṃ vidvaśāśvatam || 14042 ||

tatastvāmabhito deva kāṃkṣāvaḥ prasamīkṣitum |
amoghadarśanosi tvaṃ namaste samitiṃjaya || 14043 ||

śrībhagavānuvāca |
kimarthaṃ māmanubrūtha yuvāmasurasattamau |
gatāyuṣkau yuvāṃ bhūyastvaho jīvitumicchathaḥ || 14044 ||

madhukaiṭabhā ūcatuḥ |
yasminna kaścinmṛtavāndeva tasminvadhaṃ prabho |
icchāvaḥ putratāṃ caiva bhavataḥ sumahātapaḥ || 14045 ||

śrībhagavānuvāca |
yuvayorbāḍhametatsyādbhaviṣye kalisaṃbhave |
bhaviṣyatho na saṃdehaḥ satyametadbravīmi vām || 14046 ||

varaṃ pradāyātha mahāsurābhyāṃ sanātano viśvadharaḥ surottamaḥ |
rajastamojau tu tadāṃjanopamau mamarda tāvūrutale'maraprabhuḥ || 14047 ||

sthitvā tasmiṃstu kamale brahmā brahmavidāṃvaraḥ |
ūrdhvabāhurmahātejāstapoghoraṃ samāśritaḥ || 14048 ||

prajvalanniva tejobhirbhābhiḥ svābhistamonudaḥ |
babhāṣe sa tu dharmātmā sahasrāṃśurivāṃśubhiḥ || 14049 ||

athānyadrūpamāsthāya prabhurnarāyaṇovyayaḥ |
ājagāma mahātejā yogācāryo mahāyaśāḥ || 14050 ||

sāṃkhyācāryaśca matimānkapilo brahmaṇāṃ varaḥ |
ubhāvapi mahātmānau pūjitau tatra tatparau || 14051 ||

tau prāptāvūcatustatra brahmāṇamamitaujasam |
parāvaraviśeṣajñau pūjitau ca maharṣibhiḥ || 14052 ||

brahma saṃparivedyaṃ te viśāla jagadāsthitau |
grāmaṇīssarvabhūtānāṃ brahmā trailokyapūjitaḥ || 14053 ||

tayostadvacanaṃ śrutvā vibodhyagatayoḥ param |
trīnimānkṛtavānlokānyatheyaṃ brahmaṇaḥ śrutiḥ || 14054 ||

putraṃ svasaṃbhavaṃ caikaṃ samutpāditavānbhuvam |
tadāgre cāgatastasya brahmamānasasaṃbhavaḥ || 14055 ||

utpannamātro brahmāṇamuktavānmānasaḥ sutaḥ |
kiṃ kurmastava sāhāyyaṃ bravītu bhagavāniti || 14056 ||

brahmovāca |
yadeṣa kapilo nāma brahmanārāyaṇastathā |
vadato bhavatastvaṃ tu tatkuruṣva mahāmate || 14057 ||

brahmaṇā sa tathoktastau prāha bhūpa samutthitaḥ |
śuśrūṣurasmi yuvayoḥ kiṃ karomi kṛtāṃjali || 14058 ||

śrībhavagavānuvāca |
yatsatyamakṣaraṃ brahma aṣṭādaśavidhaṃ ca tat |
yatsatyamamṛtaṃ tattu paraṃ padamanusmara || 14059 ||

etadvaco niśamyaivaṃ sa yayau diśamuttarāṃ |
gatvā ca tatra sa brahma agamajjñānacakṣuṣā || 14060 ||

tato brahmā bhuvarnāma dvitīyamasṛjatprabhuḥ |
saṃkalpayitvā manasā tameva ca mahāmanāḥ || 14061 ||

tataḥ sopyabravīdvākyaṃ kiṃ karomi pitāmaha |
pitāmahasamā jñāto brahmāṇaṃ samupasthitaḥ || 14062 ||

brāhmaṇasyāmṛtarasonubhūtastena vai tataḥ |
prāptaḥ saparamaṃsthānaṃ sa tayoḥ pārśvamāgataḥ || 14063 ||

tasminnapi gate sotha tṛtīyamasṛjatprabhuḥ |
mokṣapravṛttikuśalaṃ suvarnāmayutaḥ prabhuḥ || 14064 ||

sopi taṃdharmamāsthāya tayorevāgamadgatiṃ |
evaṃ putrāstrayopyete gatāḥ śaṃbhormahātmanaḥ || 14065 ||

tāngṛhītvā sutāṃstasya tau gatāvūrjitāṃ gatiṃ |
nārāyaṇaśca bhagavānkapilaśca yatīśvaraḥ || 14066 ||

yaṃ kālaṃ te gatā brahma brahmā taṃ kālameva ca |
tapoghorataraṃ bhūyaḥ saṃśritaḥ paramaṃ padaṃ || 14067 ||

na ca śaktastato brahmā prabhurekastapaścaran |
śarīrārdhāttato bhāryāmutpādayati tacchubhām || 14068 ||

ātmanaḥ sadṛśānputrānasṛjadvai pitāmahaḥ |
viśve prajānāṃ patayo yebhyo lokā viniḥsṛtāḥ || 14069 ||

viśveśaṃ prathamaṃ tāvanmahātmā tapasātmajam |
sarvatrasaṃhataṃ puṇyaṃ nāmnā dharmaṃ sa sṛṣṭavān || 14070 ||

dakṣaṃ marīcimatriṃ ca pulastyaṃ pulahaṃ katum |
vasiṣṭhaṃ gautamaṃ caiva bhṛgumaṃgirasaṃ muniṃ || 14071 ||

atyadbhutāssvakṛtyena jñeyāste tu maharṣayaḥ |
trayodaśaguṇāraṃbhā ye vaṃśāstu maharṣiṇāṃ || 14072 ||

aditirditirdanuḥ kālā anāyuḥ siṃhikā khasā |
prācī krodhā ca surasā vinatā kadrureva ca || 14073 ||

dakṣasyāpatyametadvai kanyā dvādaśa pārthiva |
nakṣatrāṇi ca caṃdrasya viṃśatissapta corjitāḥ || 14074 ||

marīceḥ kaśyapaḥ putrastapasā nirmitaḥ kila |
tasmai dvādaśakanyāśca dakṣastāścānvamanyata || 14075 ||

nakṣatrāṇi ca somāya tathaivaṃ dattavānṛṣiḥ |
rohiṇyādīni sarvāṇi puṇyāni kurunaṃdana || 14076 ||

lakṣmīssarasvatī saṃdhyā viśveśā ca mahāyaśāḥ |
devī sarasvatī caiva brahmaṇā nirmitāḥ purā || 14077 ||
