etāḥ pañca variṣṭhā vai suraśreṣṭhāya pārthiva |
dattā dharmāya bhadraṃ te brahmaṇā dṛṣṭakarmaṇā || 14078 ||

yā rūpārdhavatī patnī brahmaṇaḥ kāmarūpiṇī |
surabhiḥ sahasā bhūtvā brahmāṇaṃ samupasthitā || 14079 ||

tatastāmagamadbrahmā maithune lokapūjitaḥ |
lokasarjanahetujño gavāmarthāya sattama || 14080 ||

jajñe caikādaśasutānvipulāndharmasaṃjñitān |
raktasaṃdhyābhrasaṃkāśānmahatastigmatejasaḥ || 14081 ||

te rudaṃto dravaṃtaśca gatavaṃtaḥ pitāmaham |
rodanāddravaṇāccaiva rudrā eveti te smṛtāḥ || 14082 ||

nirhṛtiścaiva saṃdhyaśca tṛtīyaścāpyayonijaḥ |
mṛgavyādhaḥ kapardī ca mahāviśveśvaraśca yaḥ || 14083 ||

ahirbudhnyaśca bhagavānkapālī caiva piṃgalaḥ |
senānīśca mahātejā rudrāścaikādaśa smṛtāḥ || 14084 ||

tasyāmeva surabhyāṃ ca gāvo jātāḥ surāśca ye |
ajaścaiva tu haṃsaśca tathaiva nṛpasattama || 14085 ||

oṣadhyaḥ pravarāyāśca surabhyāstāssamutthitāḥ |
dharmāllakṣmīstathākāmaṃ sādhyānsādhyā vyajāyata || 14086 ||

bhavaṃ ca prabhavaṃ caiva kṛśāśvaṃ suvahaṃ tathā |
aruṇaṃ varuṇaṃ caiva viśvāmitra cala dhruvau || 14087 ||

haviṣmaṃtaṃ tanūjaṃ ca vidhānābhimatāvapi |
vatsaraṃ caiva bhūtiṃ ca sarvāsuraniṣūdanam || 14088 ||

suparvāṇaṃ bṛhatkāṃtiṃ sādhyā lokanamaskṛtam |
vāsavānugatā devī janayāmāsa vai surān || 14089 ||

dharaṃ vai prathamaṃ devaṃ dvitīyaṃ dhruvamavyayam |
viśvāvasuṃ tṛtīyaṃ ca caturthaṃ somamīśvaraṃ || 14090 ||

tatonurūpamāyaṃ ca yamaṃ tasmādanaṃtaram |
saptamaṃ ca tathā vāyumaṣṭamaṃ nirhṛtiṃ tathā || 14091 ||

dharmasyāpatyametadvai surabhyāṃ tadajāyata |
viśvedevāśca viśvāyāṃ dharmājjātā iti smṛtāḥ || 14092 ||

dakṣaścaiva mahābāhuḥ puṣkarastama eva ca |
cākṣuṣaśca tatotriśca tathā bhadramahoragau || 14093 ||

viśvāṃtaka vasurbālo nikuṃbhaśca mahāyaśāḥ |
rurudaścātisiddhaujā bhāskara pramitadyutiḥ || 14094 ||

viśvāndevāndevamātā viśveṣāṃ janayatsutān |
marutvatī marutvato devānajanayatsutān || 14095 ||

agniścakṣū ravirjyotiḥ sāvitrī mitrameva ca |
amaraṃ śaravṛṣṭiṃ ca sukarṣaṃ ca mahattaram || 14096 ||

virājaṃ caiva rājaṃ ca viśvāyuṃ sumatiṃ tathā |
aśvagaṃ citraraśmiṃ ca tathā ca niṣadhaṃ nṛpaṃ || 14097 ||

bhūya evaṃ cātmavidhiṃ cāritraṃ pādamātragaṃ |
bṛhaṃtaṃ vai bṛhadrūpaṃ tathā caiva sanābhigaṃ || 14098 ||

marutvatī prajā jajñe jyeṣṭhāṃ taṃ marutāṃgaṇaṃ |
aditiḥ kaśyapājjajñe ādityāndvādaśaiva hi || 14099 ||

iṃdro viṣṇurbhagastvaṣṭā varuṇoṃśoryamāraviḥ |
pūṣā mitraśca varado dhātā parjanya eva hi || 140100 ||

ityete dvādaśādityā variṣṭāstridivaukasāṃ |
ādityasya sarasvatyāṃ jajñāte dvau sutau varau || 140101 ||

tapaḥśreṣṭhau guṇaśreṣṭhau tridivasyātisaṃmatau |
danustu dānavānjajñe ditirdaityānvyajāyata || 140102 ||

kālā tu kālakeyāṃstānasurānrākṣasāṃstathā |
anāyuṣāyāstanayā vyādhayaśca mahābalāḥ || 140103 ||

siṃhikā grahamātā ca gaṃdharvajananī muniḥ |
prācī tvapsarasāṃ mātā puṇyānāṃ bhāratetarā || 140104 ||

krodhā sāḥ sarvabhūtāni piśācā sā ca pārthiva |
jajñe yakṣagaṇāṃścaiva rākṣasāṃśca viśāṃpate || 140105 ||

catuṣpadāni satvāni etā gāścaiva saurabhī |
purāṇapuruṣaścaiva māyāṃ viṣṇurhariḥ prabhuḥ || 140106 ||

kathitastenupūrveṇa saṃstutaśca maharṣibhiḥ |
yaścedamagryaṃ śṛṇuyātpurāṇaṃ sadā naraḥ parvasu cetpaṭheta || 140107 ||
avāpyalokaṃ sa hi vītarāgaḥ paratra ca svargaphalāni bhuṃkte cakṣuṣā manasā vācā karmaṇā ca caturvidham || 140108 ||

prasādayati yaḥ kṛṣṇaṃ tasya kṛṣṇaḥ prasīdati |
rājyaṃ ca labhate rājā nirdhanaścottamaṃ dhanam || 140109 ||

kṣīṇāyurlabhate cāyuḥ putrakāmotha saṃtatim |
yajñārthinastathā kāmāṃstapāṃsi vividhāni ca || 140110 ||

yaṃ yaṃ kāmayate kāmaṃ taṃ taṃ lokeśvarāllabhet |
sarvaṃ vihāya ya imaṃ paṭhedvai pauṣkaraṃ hareḥ || 140111 ||

prādurbhāvaṃ naraśreṣṭha na tasya hyaśubhaṃ bhavet |
eṣa pauṣkarakonāma prādurbhāvo mahātmanaḥ || 140112 ||

kīrtitastu mahārāja vyāsaśrutinidarśanāt |
viṣṇutvaṃ śṛṇu me viṣṇorharitvaṃ ca kṛteyuge || 140113 ||

vaikuṃṭhatvaṃ ca deveṣu kṛṣṇatvaṃ mānuṣeṣu ca |
īśvarasya hitasyaiṣā karmaṇāṃ gahanā gatiḥ || 140114 ||

sāṃprataṃ bhūtabhavyaṃ ca śṛṇu rājanyathātathaṃ |
avyakto vyaktaliṃgastho ya eṣa bhagavānprabhuḥ || 140115 ||

nārāyaṇo hyanaṃtātmā prabhavāpyaya eva ca |
eṣa nārāyaṇo bhūtvā harirāsītsanātanaḥ || 140116 ||

brahmā vāyuśca somaśca dharmaḥ śakro bṛhaspatiḥ |
aditerapi putratvametyajaḥ kurunaṃdana || 140117 ||

eṣa viṣṇuriti khyāta indrasyāvarajo vibhuḥ |
prasādanaṃ tasyavibhoradityāḥ putrakāraṇam || 140118 ||

vadhārthaṃ suraśatrūṇāṃ daityadānavarakṣasām |
sasarjātha surānkalpe brahmāṇaṃ ca prajāpatīn || 140119 ||

asṛjanmānasāṃstatra brahmavaṃśānanuttamān |
tebhyobhavanmahātmabhyaḥ paraṃbrahma sanātanam || 140120 ||

etadāścaryabhūtasya viṣṇoḥ karmānukīrtitaṃ |
kīrttanīyasya lokeṣu kīrtyamānaṃ nibodha me || 140121 ||

vṛtte vṛtravadhe bhīṣma vartamāne kṛteyuge |
āsīttrailokyavikhyātaḥ saṃgrāmastārakāmayaḥ || 140122 ||

yatra te dānavā ghorāḥ sarve saṃgrāmadurjayāḥ |
ghnaṃti devāsurānsarvānsayakṣoragarākṣasān || 140123 ||

te vadhyamānā vimukhāśchinnapraharaṇā raṇe |
trātāraṃ manasā jagmurdevaṃ nārāyaṇaṃ prabhum || 140124 ||

etasminnaṃtare meghā nirvāṇāṃgāravarcasaḥ |
sārkacaṃdragrahagaṇaṃ cchādayaṃto nabhastalam || 140125 ||

caṃḍavidyudgaṇopetā ghoranirhrādakāriṇaḥ |
anyonyavegābhihatāḥ pravavuḥ saptamārutāḥ || 140126 ||

dīptatoyāḥ sanirghātaiḥ saha vajrānalānilaiḥ |
ravaissughorairutpātairdahyamānamivāmbaram || 140127 ||

peturulkāsahasrāṇi nipetuḥ khacarāṇyapi |
daivāni ca vimānāni prapataṃtyutpataṃti ca || 140128 ||

caturyugāṃtasamaye lokānāṃ yadbhayaṃ bhavet |
arūpavati rūpāṇi tasminnutpātalakṣaṇe || 140129 ||

tasmādduṣprathitaṃ sarvaṃ na prājñāyata kiṃcana |
timiraughaparikṣiptā na rejuśca diśo daśa || 140130 ||

viveśa rūpiṇī kālī kālameghāvaguṃṭhitā |
dyaurnabhātyabhibhūtārkā ghoreṇa tamasā vṛtā || 140131 ||

tāṃ ghanaughāṃ satimirāṃ dorbhyāmāchidya sa prabhuḥ |
vapuḥ svaṃ darśayāmāsa divyaṃ kṛṣṇavapurhariḥ || 140132 ||

balāhakāṃjananibhaṃ balāhakatanūruham |
tejasā vapuṣā caiva kṛṣṇaṃ kṛṣṇamivācalam || 140133 ||

dīptapītāṃbaradharaṃ taptakāṃcanabhūṣaṇam |
dhūmrāṃdhakāravapuṣaṃ yugāṃtāgnimivotthitam || 140134 ||

vṛttadviguṇapīnāṃ saṃkirīṭācchannamūrdhajam |
babhau cāmīkaraprakhyairāyudhairupaśobhitam || 140135 ||

caṃdrārkakiraṇodyotaṃ girikūṭamivocchritam |
naṃdakānaṃditakaraṃ kaustubhodbhāsitorasam || 140136 ||

śakticitraphalodagraṃ śaṃkhacakragadādharam |
viṣṇuśailaṃ kṣamāśīlaṃ śrīvatsaṃ śārṅgapāṇinam || 140137 ||

tridaśodāraphaladaṃ svargastrīcāruvallabham |
sarvalokamanaḥkāṃtaṃ sarvasatvamanoharam || 140138 ||

māyāviśālaviṭapaṃ toyadaughasamaprabham |
vidyāhaṃkāramānāḍhya mahābhūtaprarohaṇam || 140139 ||

viśeṣapatrairnicitaṃ grahanakṣatrapuṣpitam |
daityalokamahāskaṃdhaṃ martyalokaprakāśitam || 140140 ||

sāgarākāranirhrādaṃ rasātalagalāśrayam |
nāgeṃdrapāśairvitataṃ pakṣijaṃtusamanvitam || 140141 ||

śīlānāhāryagaṃdhāḍhyaṃ sarvalokamahādrumam |
avyaktānaṃdasalilaṃ vyaktāhaṃkāraphenilam || 140142 ||

mahābhūtakaraughaughaṃ grahanakṣatrabudbudam |
vimānavāhanairvyāptaṃ toyadāḍambarākulam || 140143 ||

jaṃtumatsyagaṇākīrṇaṃ śailaśaṃkhakulairyutam |
traiguṇyaviṣayāvartaṃ sarvalokatimiṃgilam || 140144 ||

vīravṛkṣalatāgulmaṃ bhujagotsṛṣṭaśaivalam |
dvādaśārkamahādvīpaṃ rudraikādaśapattanam || 140145 ||

vasvaṣṭaparvatopetaṃ trailokyāṃbho mahodadhim |
saṃdhyāsaṃdhyormisalilamāpūrṇānilaśobhitam || 140146 ||

daityayakṣagaṇagrāmaṃ rakṣogaṇajhaṣākulam |
pitāmahamahāvīryaṃ svargastrīratnasaṃkulam || 140147 ||

śrī kīrti kāṃtilakṣmībhirnadībhiśca samākulam |
kālayogamahāvarṣapralayotpattivegitam || 140148 ||

satsaṃyogamahāpāraṃ nārāyaṇamahārṇavam |
devātidevaṃ varadaṃ bhaktānāṃ bhaktavatsalam || 140149 ||

anugrahakaraṃ devaṃ praśāṃtikaraṇaṃ śubham |
haryaśvarathasaṃyukta suparṇadhvajaśobhite || 140150 ||

caṃdrārkacakraracita udārākṣavṛtāṃtare |
anaṃtaraśmisaṃyukte durdarśe merukūbare || 140151 ||

tārakācitrakusume grahanakṣatrabaṃdhure |
bhayeṣvabhayade vyomni devadaityāparājite || 140152 ||

haryaśvarathasaṃyuktamuktāśobhāsamanvitam |
dadṛśuste sthitaṃ devaṃ divyalokamaye rathe || 140153 ||

te kṛtāṃjalayaḥ sarve devā iṃdrapurogamāḥ |
jayaśabdaṃ puraskṛtya śaraṇyaṃ śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ || 140154 ||

eteṣāṃ ca giraḥ śrutvā sa viṣṇurdevadaivataḥ |
manaścakre vināśāya dānavānāṃ mahāmṛdhe || 140155 ||

ākāśe tu sthito viṣṇuruttamaṃ vapurāśritaḥ |
uvāca devatāḥ sarvāḥ sapratijñamidaṃ vacaḥ || 140156 ||

śāṃtiṃ vrajata bhadraṃ vo mā bhaiṣṭa marutāṃgaṇāḥ |
jitā me dānavāḥ sarve trailokyaṃ parigṛhyatām || 140157 ||

tatosya satyasaṃdhasya viṣṇorvākyena toṣitāḥ |
devāḥ prītiṃ parājagmuḥ prāśyāmṛtamivottamam || 140158 ||

tatastamaśca saṃhṛtya vineśuśca balāhakāḥ |
pravavuśca śivā vātāḥ prasannāśca diśo daśa || 140159 ||

śuddhaprāyāṇi jyotīṃṣi somaṃ cakruḥ pradakṣiṇam |
na vigrahaṃ grahāścakruḥ prasannāścāpi siṃdhavaḥ || 140160 ||

virajā abhavanmārgā lokāḥ svargādayastrayaḥ |
yathārthamūhussaritaścukṣubhe na tathārṇavaḥ || 140161 ||

āsanchubhānīndriyāṇi narāṇāmaṃtarātmasu |
maharṣayo vītaśokā vedānuccairadhīyata || 140162 ||

yajñeṣu ca haviḥ pākaṃ śivamāpa ca pāvakaḥ |
pravṛttadharmasaṃvṛttā lokā muditamānasāḥ || 140163 ||

viṣṇoḥ satyapratijñasya śrutvārinidhanā giraḥ |
tato bhayaṃ viṣṇumukhācchrutvā daiteyadānavāḥ || 140164 ||

udyogaṃ vipulaṃ cakruryuddhāya vijayāya ca |
mayastu kāṃcanamayaṃ trinalvāṃtaramavyayam || 140165 ||

catuścakraṃ suvipulaṃ sukalpitamahāyudham |
kiṃkiṇījālanirghoṣaṃ dvīpicarmapariṣkṛtam || 140166 ||

ruciraṃ raśmijālaiśca haimajālaiśca śobhitam |
īhāmṛgagaṇākīrṇaṃ pakṣisaṃghavirājitam || 140167 ||

divyāstraśastraruciraṃ payodharanināditam |
svakṣaṃ rathavarodāraṃ sūpasthaṃ gaganopamam || 140168 ||

gadāparighasaṃpūrṇaṃ mūrtimaṃtamivārṇavam |
hemakeyūravalayaṃ caṃdramaṃḍalakūbaram || 140169 ||

sapatākadhvajopetaṃ sādityamiva maṃdaram |
gajeṃdrābhogavapuṣaṃ kvacitkesaravarcasam || 140170 ||

yuktamṛkṣasahasreṇa sudhārāṃbudanāditam |
dīptamākāśagaṃ divyaṃ rathaṃ pararathārujam || 140171 ||

adhyatiṣṭhadraṇākāṃkṣī meruṃ dīptamivāṃśumān |
tārastu krośavistāramāyāme ca tathāvidham || 140172 ||

śailakūbarasaṃkāśaṃ nīlāṃjanacayopamam |
kālalohasya ratnānāṃ samūhābaddhakūbaram || 140173 ||

timirodgārakiraṇaṃ garjaṃtamiva toyadam |
lohajālena mahatā sagavākṣeṇa daṃśitam || 140174 ||

āyasaiḥ parighaiḥ pūrṇaṃ kṣepaṇīyaiśca mudgaraiḥ |
prāsaiḥ pāśaiśca vitatairasaṃyuktaiśca kaṇṭakaiḥ || 140175 ||

śobhitaṃ trāsanīyaiśca tomaraiḥ saparaśvadhaiḥ |
udyataṃ dviṣatāṃ hetordvitīyamiva maṃdaram || 140176 ||

yuktaṃ kharasahasreṇa so'dhyārohadrathottamam |
virocanastu saṃkruddho gadāpāṇiravasthitaḥ || 140177 ||

pramukhe tasya sainyasya dīptaśṛṃga ivācalaḥ |
yuktaṃ hayasahasreṇa hayagrīvastu dānavaḥ || 140178 ||

vyūhitaṃ dānavavyūhaṃ paricakrāma vīryavān |
vipracittisutaḥ śvetaḥ śvetakuṃḍalabhūṣaṇaḥ || 140179 ||

syaṃdanaṃ vāhayāmāsa parānīkasya mardanaḥ |
vyāyataṃ kiṣkusāhasraṃ dhanurvisphārayanmahat || 140180 ||

sa cāhavamukhe tasthau sapraroha ivācalaḥ |
kharastu viṣkirinkrodhānnetrābhyāṃ ropajaṃ jalam || 140181 ||

sphuraddaṃtauṣṭhanayanaḥ saṃgrāmaṃ sobhyakāṃkṣata |
tvaṣṭā tvaṣṭādaśahayaṃ yānamāsthāya dānavaḥ || 140182 ||

divyavyūhapratīkāśā yuddhāyābhimukhaḥ sthitaḥ |
ariṣṭo baliputraśca variṣṭho durdharāyudhaḥ || 140183 ||

yuddhāyābhimukhastasthau dharādharavikaṃpanaḥ |
kiśorastvatisaṃharṣātkiśora iva coditaḥ || 140184 ||

abhavaddaityamadhye sa grahamadhye yathā raviḥ |
laṃbastu navameghābhaḥ pralaṃbāṃbarabhūṣaṇaḥ || 140185 ||

daityavyūhagato bhāti sanīhāra ivāṃśumān |
vasuṃdharābhastadanu daśanauṣṭhekṣaṇāyudhaḥ || 140186 ||

hasaṃstiṣṭhati daityānāmmadhye krūra mahāgrahaḥ |
anye hayagatāstatra mattebheṃdragatāḥ pare || 140187 ||

siṃhavyāghragatāścānye varāharkṣeṣu cāpare |
kecitkharoṣṭrayātāraḥ kecittoyadavāhanāḥ || 140188 ||

pattayaścāpare daityā bhīṣaṇā vikṛtānanāḥ |
ekapādāstvapādāśca nanṛturyuddhakāṃkṣiṇaḥ || 140189 ||

āsphoṭayaṃto bahavaḥ svanaṃtaśca tathāpare |
dṛptaśārdūlanirghoṣā nedurdānavapuṅgavāḥ || 140190 ||

te gadāparighairghoraiḥ śilāmudgarapāṇayaḥ |
bāhubhiḥ parighākāraistarjayaṃti sma devatāḥ || 140191 ||

prāsaiḥ khaḍgaiśca pāśaiśca tomarāṃkuśapaṭṭiśaiḥ |
cikrīḍuste śataghnībhiḥ śatadhāraiśca mudgaraiḥ || 140192 ||

khaḍgaśailaiśca śailaiśca parighaiścodyatāyudhaiḥ |
yuktaṃ balāhakagaṇaiḥ sarvataḥ saṃvṛtaṃ nabhaḥ || 140193 ||

evaṃ taddānavaṃ sainyaṃ sarvasatvamadotkaṭam |
devatābhimukhaṃ tasthau meghānīkamivoditam || 140194 ||

reje ca taddaityasahasragāḍhaṃ vāyvagniśailāṃbudatoyakalpam |
balaṃ balaughākulamabhyudīrṇaṃ yuyutsayonmattamivā babhāse || 140195 ||

śrutaste daityasainyasya vistāraḥ kurunaṃdana |
surāṇāmapi sainyasya vistaraṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ śṛṇu || 140196 ||

pulastya uvāca |
ādityā vasavo rudrā aśvinau ca mahābalau |
sabalāḥ sānugāścaiva saṃnahyanta yathākramam || 1 ||

puruhūtaśca purato lokapālaḥ sahasradṛk |
grāmaṇīḥ sarvadevānāmāruroha varadvipam || 2 ||

savye cāsya rathaḥ pārśve pakṣipravaraketanaḥ |
surārucakracaraṇo haimacchatrapariṣkṛtaḥ || 3 ||

devagaṃdharvayakṣaughairanuyātaḥ sahasraśaḥ |
dīptimadbhiśca svargasthairbrahmarṣibhirabhiṣṭutaḥ || 4 ||

vajravisphāritodbhūtairvidyudiṃdrāyudhaprabhaiḥ |
yuktaṃ balāhakagaṇaiḥ parvatairiva kāmagaiḥ || 5 ||

yamārūḍhaḥ sa bhagavānparyeti sakalaṃ jagat |
havirdāneṣu gāyaṃti viprā makhamukhesthitāḥ || 6 ||

svargasaṃgrāmayāteṣu devatūryaninādiṣu |
seṃdraṃ tamupanṛtyaṃti śataśo hyapsarogaṇāḥ || 7 ||

ketunā nāgarājena rājamāno yathā raviḥ |
yukto hayasahasreṇa manomārutaraṃhasā || 8 ||

samyagrathavaro bhāti yukto mātalinā tadā |
kṛtsnaḥ parivṛto merurbhāskarasyeva tejasā || 9 ||

yamastu daṃḍamudyamya kālayuktaṃ ca mudgaraṃ |
tasthau suragaṇānīke daityānāṃ caiva darśayan || 10 ||

caturbhiḥ sāgarairyukto lelihānaiśca pannagaiḥ |
śaṃkhamuktāṃgadadharo bibhrattoyamayaṃ vapuḥ || 11 ||

kālapāśānsamāvidhya hayaiḥ śaśikaropamaiḥ |
vāyvīritajalākāraiḥ kurvanlīlāḥ sahasraśaḥ || 12 ||

pāṃḍuroddhūtavasanaḥ pravālarucirāṃgadaḥ |
maṇiśyāmottamavapurhārakeṇārcitodaraḥ || 13 ||

varuṇaḥ pāśadhṛṅmadhye devānīkasya tasthivān |
yuddhavelāmabhilaṣanbhinnavela ivārṇavaḥ || 14 ||

yakṣarākṣasasainyena guhyakānāṃ gaṇairapi |
yuktaśca śaṃkhapadmābhyāṃ nidhīnāmadhipaḥ prabhuḥ || 15 ||

rājarājeśvaraḥśrīmāngadāpāṇiradṛśyata |
vimānayodhī dhanado vimāne puṣpake sthitaḥ || 16 ||

sa rājarājaḥ śuśubhe yakṣeśo naravāhanaḥ |
pūrvapakṣe sahasrākṣaḥ pitṛrājaśca dakṣiṇe || 17 ||

varuṇaḥ paścime pakṣa uttare naravāhanaḥ |
catuḥpakṣāśca cattvāro lokapālā mahābalāḥ || 18 ||

ātmadikṣucaraṃtaścatasyadevabalasyate |
sūryaḥ saptāśvayuktena rathenānilagāminā || 19 ||

śriyā jājvalyamānena dīpyamānaiśca raśmibhiḥ |
udayāstamayau cakre meruparyantagāminā || 20 ||

tridiva dvāracakreṇa tapasā lokamavyayam |
sahasraraśmiyuktena bhrājamānena tejasā || 21 ||

cacāra madhye devānāṃ dvādaśātmā divākaraḥ |
somaḥ śvetahayo bhāti syaṃdane śītaraśmimān || 22 ||

himatoyaprapūrṇābhirbhābhirāhlādayañjagat |
tamṛkṣayogānugataṃ śiśirāṃśuṃ dvijeśvaram || 23 ||

śaśacchāyāṃkitatanuṃ naiśasya tamasaḥ kṣayam |
jyotiṣāmīśvaraṃ vyomni rasadaṃ prabhumavyayam || 24 ||

oṣadhīnāṃ pavitrāṇāṃ nidhānamamṛtasya ca |
jagataḥ paramaṃ bhāgaṃ saumyaṃ sarvamayaṃ rasam || 25 ||

dadṛśurdānavāḥ somaṃ himapraharaṇaṃ sthitam |
yaḥ prāṇaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ paṃcadhā bhidyate nṛṣu || 26 ||

saptaskaṃdhagato lokāṃstrīndadhāra cakāra ca |
yamāhuragnikarttāraṃ sarvaprabhavamīśvaram || 27 ||

saptasvaragatā yasya yonirgīrbhirudīryate |
yaṃ vadaṃti calaṃ bhūtaṃ yaṃ vadaṃtyaśarīriṇam || 28 ||

yamāhurākāśagamaṃ śīghragaṃ śabdayonijam |
sa vāyuḥ sarvabhūtāyuruddhataḥ svena tejasā || 29 ||

vavau pravyathayandaityānpratilomaṃ satoyadaḥ |
māruto devagaṃdharvairvidyādharagaṇaiḥ saha || 30 ||

cikrīḍa raśmibhiśśubhrairnirmuktairiva pannagaiḥ |
sṛjaṃtaḥ sarpapatayastīvraṃ roṣamayaṃ viṣam || 31 ||

śarabhūtā vilagnāśca cerurvyāttānanā divi |
parvatāśca śilāśṛṃgaiḥ śataśākhaiśca pādapaiḥ || 32 ||

upatasthuḥ suragaṇānprahartuṃ dānavaṃ balam |
yaḥ sa devo hṛṣīkeśaḥ padmanābhastrivikramaḥ || 33 ||

yugāṃte kṛṣṇavartmā ca viśvasya jagataḥ prabhuḥ |
sarvayoniḥ samadhuhā havyabhukkratusaṃsthitaḥ || 34 ||

bhūmyambuvyomabhūtātmā śyāmaḥ śāṃtikarorihā |
avighnamamarādīnāṃ cakre cakragadādharaḥ || 35 ||

savyenālabhya mahatīṃ sarvāyudhavināśinīṃ |
kareṇa kālīṃ vapuṣā śatrukālapradāṃ gadāṃ || 36 ||

śeṣairbhujaiḥ pradīptābhairbhujagāridhvajaḥ prabhuḥ |
dadhārāyudhajālāni śārṅgādīni mahābalaḥ || 37 ||

sa kaśyapasyātmabhavaṃ dvijaṃ bhujagabhojanam |
bhujageṃdreṇa vadane niviṣṭena virājitam || 38 ||

amṛtāraṃbhasaṃyuktaṃ maṃdarādrimivocchitam |
devāsuravimardeṣu bahuśo dṛṣṭavikramam || 39 ||

maheṃdreṇāmṛtasyārthe vajreṇa kṛtalakṣaṇam |
vicitrapatravasanaṃ dhātumaṃtamivācalam || 40 ||

sphītakrodhāvalaṃbena śītāṃśusamatejasā |
bhogibhogāvasaktena maṇiratnena bhāsvatā || 41 ||

pakṣābhyāṃ cārupatrābhyāmāvṛtaṃ divi līlayā |
yugāṃte seṃdracāpābhyāṃ toyadābhyāmivāṃbaram || 42 ||

nīlalohitapītābhiḥ patākābhiralaṃkṛtam |
aruṇāvarajaṃ śrīmānāruhya samare prabhuḥ || 43 ||

suvarṇavarṇavapuṣaṃ suparṇaṃ khecarottamam |
tamanvayuḥ suragaṇā munayaśca samāhitāḥ || 44 ||

gīrbhiḥ paramamaṃtrābhistuṣṭuvuśca gadādharam |
tadvaiśravaṇasaṃśliṣṭaṃ vaivasvatapuraḥsaram || 45 ||

vārirājaparikṣiptaṃ devarājavirājitam |
pavanābaddhanirghoṣaṃ saṃpradīpta hutāśanam || 46 ||

viṣṇorjiṣṇoḥ sahiṣṇośca bhrājiṣṇostejasāvṛtam |
balaṃ balavadudrikte yuddhāya samavartata || 47 ||

svastyastu devebhya iti bṛhaspatirabhāṣata |
svastyastu daityebhya iti uśanā vākyamādade || 48 ||

tābhyāṃ balābhyāṃ saṃjajñe tumulo vigrahastathā |
surāṇāmasurāṇāṃ ca parasparajayaiṣiṇām || 49 ||

dānavā daivataiḥ sārddhaṃ nānāpraharaṇodyamāḥ |
samīyuryudhyamānā vai parvatā iva parvataiḥ || 50 ||

tatsurāsurasaṃyuktaṃ yuddhamatyadbhutaṃ babhau |
dharmādharmasamāyuktaṃ darpeṇa vinayena ca || 51 ||

tato hayaiḥ prajavitairvāraṇaiśca pracoditaiḥ |
utpatadbhiśca gagane sāsihastaiḥ samaṃtataḥ || 52 ||

kṣipyamāṇaiśca musalaiḥ saṃpatadbhiśca sāyakaiḥ |
cāpairvisphāryamāṇaiśca pātyamānaiḥ sudāruṇaiḥ || 53 ||

tadyuddhamabhavadghoraṃ devadānavasaṃkulam |
jagatastrāsajananaṃ yugasaṃvartakopamam || 54 ||

svahastamuktaiḥ parighairmudgaraiścaiva parvataiḥ |
dānavāssamare jaghnurdevāniṃdrapurogamān || 55 ||

te vadhyamānā balibhirdānavairjitakāśibhiḥ |
viṣaṇṇavadanā devā jagmurārtiṃ parāṃ mṛdhe || 56 ||

te cāstraśūlamathitāḥ parighairbhinnamastakāḥ |
bhinnoraskā ditisutaiḥ sravadraktā raṇe bahu || 57 ||

sūditāḥ śarajālaiśca niryatnāśca śaraiḥ kṛtāḥ |
praviṣṭā dānavīṃ māyāṃ na śekuste viceṣṭitam || 58 ||

uttaṃbhitamivābhāti niṣprāṇa sadṛśākṛti |
balaṃ surāṇāmasurairniṣprayatnāyudhaṃ kṛtam || 59 ||

daityacāpacyutānghorāṃśchitvā vajreṇa tānśarān |
śakro daityabalaṃ ghoraṃ viveśa bahulocanaḥ || 60 ||

sa daityapramukhānsarvānhatvā daityabalaṃ mahat |
tāmasenāstrajālena tamobhūtamathākarot || 61 ||

te'nyonyaṃ nānvabudhyaṃta daityānāṃ vāhanāni ca |
ghoreṇa tamasāviṣṭāḥ puruhūtasya tejasā || 62 ||

māyāpāśairvimuktāstu yatnavaṃtaḥ surottamāḥ |
śirāṃsi daityasaṃghānāṃ tamobhūtānyapātayan || 63 ||

apadhvastā visaṃjñāśca tamasā nīlavarcasā |
petuste dānavāssadyaśchinnapakṣā ivādrayaḥ || 64 ||

tatrābhibhūtadaityaiṃdramaṃdhakāramivāṃtaraṃ |
dānavaṃ dehasadanaṃ tamobhūtamivābhavat || 65 ||

tathā'sṛjanmahāmāyāṃ mayastāṃ tāmasīṃ dahan |
yugāṃtodyotajananīṃ sṛṣṭā maurveṇa vahninā || 66 ||

sa dadāha ca tāṃ śākrīṃ māyā mayavikalpitā |
daityāścādityavapuṣā sadya uttasthurāhave || 67 ||

māyāṃ maurvīṃ samāsādya dahyamānā divaukasaḥ |
bhejire caṃdraviṣayaṃ śītāṃśusalilahradam || 68 ||

te dahyamānā aurveṇa vahninā naṣṭacetasaḥ |
śaśaṃsurvajriṇaṃ devāḥ saṃtaptāḥ śaraṇaiṣiṇaḥ || 69 ||

saṃtapte māyayā sainye hanyamāne ca dānavaiḥ |
codito devarājena varuṇo vākyamabravīt || 70 ||

purā brahmarṣijaḥ śakra tapastepe sudāruṇam |
urvaḥ sa pūrvaṃ tejasvī sadṛśo brahmaṇo guṇaiḥ || 71 ||

taṃ tapaṃtamivādityaṃ tapasā jagadavyayaṃ |
upatasthurmunigaṇā devā devarṣibhiḥ saha || 72 ||

hiraṇyakaśipuścaiva dānavo dānaveśvaraḥ |
ṝṣiṃ vijñāpayāmāsa purā paramatejasam || 73 ||

ūcurbrahmarṣayaste tu vacanaṃ dharmasaṃhitam |
ṝṣivaṃśeṣu bhagavaṃśchinnamūlamidaṃ kulaṃ || 74 ||

ekastvamanapatyaśca gotrā yā'nyo na vidyate |
kaumāraṃ vratamāsthāya kleśamevānuvartase || 75 ||

bahūni vipragotrāṇi munīnāṃ bhāvitātmanām |
ekadehāni tiṣṭhaṃti viviktāni vinā prajāḥ || 76 ||

evaṃbhūteṣu sarveṣu putrairme nāsti kāraṇam |
bhavāṃśca tāpasaśreṣṭhaḥ prajāpati samadyutiḥ || 77 ||

tatpravartasva vaṃśāya vardhayātmānamātmanā |
samādhatsvorjitaṃ tejo dvitīyāṃ kuru vai tanuṃ || 78 ||

sa evamukto munibhirmunirmanasi tāḍitaḥ |
jagarha tānṛṣigaṇānvacanaṃ cedamabravīt || 79 ||

yathā hi vihito dharmo munīnāṃ śāśvataḥ purā |
ārṣaṃ hi kevalaṃ karma vanyamūlaphalāśinaḥ || 80 ||

brahmayonau prasūtasya brāhmaṇasyātmavartinaḥ |
brahmacaryaṃ sucaritaṃ brahmāṇamapi cālayet || 81 ||

janānāṃ vṛttayastisro ye gṛhāśramavāsinaḥ |
asmākaṃ ca vane vṛttirvanāśramanivāsināṃ || 82 ||

abbhakṣā vāyubhakṣāśca daṃtolūkhalinastathā |
aśmakuṭṭādayo yatra paṃcāgnitapasaśca ye || 83 ||

ete tapasi tiṣṭhaṃto vratairapi suduścaraiḥ |
brahmacaryaṃ puraskṛtya prārthayaṃti parāṃ gatim || 84 ||

brahmacaryādbrahmaṇasya brāhmaṇatvaṃ vidhīyate |
evamāhuḥ pare loke brāhmacaryavido janāḥ || 85 ||

brahmacarye sthito dharmo brahmacarye sthitaṃ tapaḥ |
ye sthitā brahmacarye tu brāhmaṇā divi te sthitāḥ || 86 ||

nāsti yogaṃ vinā siddhirnāsti yogaṃ vinā yaśaḥ |
nāsti loke yaśomūlaṃ brahmacaryātparaṃtapaḥ || 87 ||

yo nigṛhyeṃdriyagrāmaṃ bhūtagrāmaṃ ca paṃcakam |
brahmacaryaṃ samādhatte kimataḥ paramaṃ tapaḥ || 88 ||

ayogakeśadharaṇamasaṃkalpa vrata kriyā |
abrahmacaryā caryā ca trayaṃ syāddaṃbhasaṃjñitaṃ || 89 ||

kva dārāḥ kva ca saṃyogaḥ kva ca bhāvaviparyayaḥ |
nanviyaṃ brahmaṇā sṛṣṭā manasā mānasī prajā || 90 ||

yadyasti tapaso vīryaṃ yuṣmākaṃ vijitātmanām |
sṛjadhvaṃ mānasānputrānprājāpatyena karmaṇā || 91 ||

manasā nirmitā yonirādhātavyā tapasvibhiḥ |
no dārayogaṃ bījaṃ ca vratamuktaṃ tapasvināṃ || 92 ||

yadidaṃ luptadharmākhyaṃ yuṣmābhiriha nirbhayaiḥ |
vyāhṛtaṃ sadbhiratyarthamasadbhiriva saṃmataṃ || 93 ||

vapurdīptāṃtarātmānameṣa kṛtvā manomayaṃ |
dārayogaṃ vinā srakṣye putramātmatanūruhaṃ || 94 ||

evamātmānamātmā me dvitīyaṃ janayiṣyati |
prājāpatyena vidhinā didhakṣaṃtamiva prajāḥ || 95 ||

varuṇa uvāca |
urvastu tapasāviṣṭo niveśyoruṃ hutāśane |
mamaṃthaikena darbheṇa putrasya prasavāraṇiṃ || 96 ||

tasyoruṃ sahasā bhitvā varo'sau hyagnirutthitaḥ |
jagato dahanākāṃkṣī putrognissamapadyata || 97 ||

urvasyoruṃ vinirbhidya aurvo nāmāṃtako'nalaḥ |
didhakṣuriva lokāṃstrīnjajñe paramakopanaḥ || 98 ||

utpadyamānaścovāca pitaraṃ dīnayā girā |
kṣudhā me bādhate tāta jagadbhakṣetyajasva māṃ || 99 ||

tridivārohibhirjvālairjṛmbhamāṇo diśo daśa |
nirdahansarvabhūtāni vavṛdhe soṃtakopamaḥ || 100 ||

etasminnaṃtare brahmā munimurvaṃ samāgataḥ |
uvāca vāryatāṃ putro jagatastvaṃ dayāṃ kuru || 101 ||

asyāpatpasyate vipra kariṣye sāhyamuttamaṃ |
tathyametadvacaḥ putra śṛṇu tvaṃ vadatāṃ vara || 102 ||

aurva uvāca |
dhanyosmyanugṛhītosmi yanme tvaṃ bhagavanśiśoḥ |
matimetāṃ dadāsīha paramātmanhitāya vai || 103 ||

prabhātakāle saṃprāpte kāṃkṣitavye samāgame |
bhagavaṃstarpitaḥ putraḥ kairhavyaiḥ prāpsyate sukham || 104 ||

kutra cāsya nivāsaḥ syādbhojanaṃ tu kimātmakam |
vidhāsyatīha bhagavānvīryatulyaṃ mahaujasaḥ || 105 ||

brahmovāca |
baḍavāmukhe ca vasatiḥ samudre vai bhaviṣyati |
mamayonirjalaṃ vipra taccāmeyaṃ vrajatvayaṃ || 106 ||

tatrā'yamāste niyataṃ pibanvārimayaṃ haviḥ |
tadvārivistaraṃ vipra visṛjāmyālayaṃ ca tam || 107 ||

tato yugāṃte bhūtānāmeṣa cāhaṃ ca putraka |
sahito vicariṣyāvo niṣpurāṇakarāviha || 108 ||

eṣogniraṃtakāle tu salilāśī mayā kṛtaḥ |
dahanaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ sadevāsurarakṣasām || 109 ||

evamastviti taṃ sogniḥ saṃvṛtajvālamaṃḍalaḥ |
praviveśārṇavamukhaṃ natvorvaṃ pitaraṃ prabhum || 110 ||

pratiyātastato brahmā te ca sarve maharṣayaḥ |
aurvasyāgneḥ prabhāvajñāḥ svāṃsvāṃ gatimupāgatāḥ || 111 ||

hiraṇyakaśipurdṛṣṭvā tadā tanmahadadbhutam |
urvaṃ praṇatasarvāṃgo vākyametaduvāca ha || 112 ||

bhagavannadbhutamidaṃ saṃvṛttaṃ lokasākṣikam |
tapasā te muniśreṣṭha parituṣṭaḥ pitāmahaḥ || 113 ||

ahaṃ tu tava putrasya tava caiva mahāvrata |
bhṛtya ityavagaṃtavyaḥ ślāghyastvamiha karmaṇā || 114 ||

tanmāṃ paśya samāpannaṃ tavaivārādhane ratam |
yadi sīdenmuniśreṣṭha tavai vasyātparājayaḥ || 115 ||

urva uvāca |
dhanyosmyanugṛhītosmi yasya te'haṃ gururmataḥ |
nāsti te tapasānena bhayaṃ caiveha suvrata || 116 ||

tāmeva māyāṃ gṛhṇīṣva mama putreṇa nirmitām |
niriṃdhināmagnimayīṃ duḥsparśāṃ pāvakairapi || 117 ||

eṣā te svasya vaṃśasya vaśagāri vinigrahe |
rakṣiṣyatyātmapakṣaṃ ca vipakṣaṃ ca pradhakṣyati || 118 ||

varuṇa uvāca |
eṣā durviṣahā māyā devairapi durāsadā |
aurveṇa nirmitā pūrvaṃ pāvakenorvasūnunā || 119 ||

tasmiṃstu vyathite daitye nirvīryaiṣā na saṃśayaḥ |
śāpo hyasyāḥ purā dattaḥ sṛṣṭā yenaiva tejasā || 120 ||

yadyeṣā pratihaṃtavyā kartavyo bhagavānsukhī |
dīyatāṃ me sakho śakra toyayonirniśākaraḥ || 121 ||

tenāhaṃ sahasaṃ gamya yādobhiśca samāvṛtaḥ |
māyāmetāṃ haniṣyāmi tvatprasādānna saṃśayaḥ || 122 ||

evamastvitisaṃhṛṣṭaḥ śakrastridaśavardhanaḥ |
saṃdideśāgrataḥ somaṃ yuddhāya śiśirāyudham || 123 ||

gaccha soma sahāyantvaṃ kuru pāśadharasya vai |
asurāṇāṃ vināśāya jayārthaṃ tridivaukasām || 124 ||

tvaṃ mataḥ prativīryaśca jyotiṣāmapi ceśvaraḥ |
tvanmayānsarvalokeṣu rasānvedavido viduḥ || 125 ||

tvayā samo na lokesminvidyate śiśirāyudhaḥ |
kṣayavṛddhītavāvyaktesāgarecaivacāṃbare || 126 ||

pravartayasyahorātrātkālaṃ saṃmohayanjagat |
lokacchāyāmayaṃ lakṣma tavāṃkaḥ śaśavigrahaḥ || 127 ||

na viduḥ soma te māyāṃ ye ca nakṣatrayonayaḥ |
tvamādityapathādūrdhvaṃ jyotiṣāṃ coparisthitaḥ || 128 ||

tamaḥ protsārya sahasā bhāsayasyakhilaṃ jagat |
śītabhānurhimatanurjyotiṣāmadhipaḥ śaśī || 129 ||

api tatkālayogātmā ijyo yajñaratho'vyayaḥ |
oṣadhīśaḥ kriyāyonirapāṃ yoniranuṣṇaguḥ || 130 ||

śītāṃśuramṛtādhāraścapalaḥ śvetavāhanaḥ |
tvaṃ kāṃtiḥ kāṃtavapuṣāṃ tvaṃ somaḥ somapāyinām || 131 ||

saumyastvaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ timiraghnastvamṛkṣarāṭ |
tadgaccha tvaṃ mahāsena varuṇena varūthinā || 132 ||

śamayasvāsurīṃ māyāṃ yayā dahyāmahe raṇe |
soma uvāca |
yanmāṃ vadasi yuddhārthaṃ devarājavaraprada || 133 ||

eṣa varṣāmi śiśiraṃ daityamāyāpakarṣaṇaṃ |
etānme śītanirdagdhānpaśyasva himaveṣṭitān || 134 ||

tathā himakarotsṛṣṭāḥ sapāśā himavṛṣṭayaḥ |
veṣṭayaṃti ca tāndaityānvāyurmeghagaṇāniva || 135 ||

tau pāśaśītāṃśudharau varuṇeṃdū mahābalau |
jaghnaturhimapātaiśca pāśapātaiśca dānavān || 136 ||

dvāvaṃbunāthau samare tau pāśahimayodhinau |
mṛdhe ceraturaṃbhobhiḥ kṣubdhāviva mahārṇavau || 137 ||

tābhyāmāpūritaṃ sarvaṃ taddānavabalaṃ mahat |
jagatsaṃvarttakāṃbhodaiḥ pravarṣairiva saṃvṛtaṃ || 138 ||

tāvudyatāvaṃbunāthau śaśāṃkavaruṇāvubhau |
śamayāmāsatustāṃ tu māyāṃ daityendranirmitāṃ || 139 ||

śītāṃśujālanirdagdhāḥ pāśaiścāskaṃditā raṇe |
na śekuścalituṃ daityā viśiraskā ivādrayaḥ || 140 ||

śītāṃśu nihatāste tu daityāssarve nipātitāḥ |
himaplāvita sarvāṃgānirūṣmāṇa ivāgnayaḥ || 141 ||

teṣāṃ tu divi daityānāṃ nipataṃti śubhāni vai |
vimānāni vicitrāṇi nipataṃtyutpataṃti ca || 142 ||

tānpāśahastagrathitānchāditānśītaraśmibhiḥ |
mayo dadarśa māyāvī dānavāndivi dānavaḥ || 143 ||

saśailajālāṃ vitatāṃ khaḍgapaṭṭasahāsinīm |
pādapotkarakūṭasthāṃ kaṃdarākīrṇakānanāṃ || 144 ||

siṃhavyāghragaṇākīrṇāṃ nadadbhirdevayūthapaiḥ |
īhāmṛgagaṇākīrṇāṃ pavanāghūrṇitaddrumām || 145 ||

nirmitāṃ svena putreṇa kūjaṃtīṃ divikāmagāṃ |
prathitāṃ pārvatīṃ māyāṃ sasṛje sa samaṃtataḥ || 146 ||

sāsiśabdaiśśilāvarṣaiḥ saṃpatadbhiśca pādapaiḥ |
jaghāna devasaṃghāṃste dānavānabhyajīvayat || 147 ||

naiśākarī vāruṇī ca māye aṃtarhite tadā |
abhavadghorasaṃcārā pṛthivī parvatairiva || 148 ||

na cāruddho drumagaṇairdevo dṛśyata kaścana |
tadapadhvastadhanuṣaṃ bhagnapraharaṇāvilam || 149 ||

niṣprayatnaṃ surānīkaṃ varjayitvā gadādharaṃ |
sa hi yuddhagataḥ śrīmānīśo na sma vyakaṃpata || 150 ||

sahiṣṇutvājjagatsvāmī na cukrodha gadādharaḥ |
kālajñaḥ kālameghābhaḥ samīkṣankālamāhave || 151 ||

devāsuravimardaṃ ca draṣṭukāmastadā hariḥ |
tato bhagavatādiṣṭau raṇe pāvakamārutau || 152 ||

coditau viṣṇuvākyena tato māyāṃ vyakarṣatāṃ |
tābhyāmudbhrāṃtavegābhyāṃ prabuddhābhyāṃ mahāhave || 153 ||

dagdhā sā pārvatī māyā bhasmībhūtā nanāśa ha |
sonilonalasaṃyuktassonalaścānilākulaḥ || 154 ||

daityasenāṃ dadahaturyugāṃteṣviva mūrcchitau |
vāyuḥ prajavitastatra paścādagniśca mārutāt || 155 ||

ceraturdānavānīke krīḍaṃtāvanalānilau |
bhasmībhūteṣu bhūteṣu prapatatsūtpatatsu ca || 156 ||

dānavānāṃ vimāneṣu nipatatsu samaṃtataḥ |
vātaskaṃdhāpaviddheṣu kṛtakarmaṇi pāvake || 157 ||

māyāvadhe pravṛtte tu stūyamāne gadādhare |
niṣprayatneṣu daityeṣu trailokye muktabaṃdhane || 158 ||

prahṛṣṭeṣu ca deveṣu sādhusādhviti jalpiṣu |
jaye daśaśatākṣasya daityānāṃ ca parājaye || 159 ||

dikṣu sarvāsu śuddhāsu pravṛtte dharmavistare |
apāvṛte caṃdrapathe svasthānasthe divākare || 160 ||

pravṛttistheṣu bhūteṣu nṛṣu cāritravatsu ca |
abhinnabaṃdhane mṛtyau hūyamāne hutāśane || 161 ||

yajñaśobhiṣu deveṣu svargamārgaṃ diśatsu ca |
lokapāleṣu sarveṣu dikṣu saṃdhānavartiṣu || 162 ||

bhāve tapasi siddhānāmabhāve pāpakarmaṇām |
devapakṣe pramudite daityapakṣe viṣīdati || 163 ||

tripādavigrahe dharme'dharme pādaparigrahe |
apāvṛtte mahādvāre vartamāne ca satpathe || 164 ||

lokeṣu dharmavṛtteṣu pravṛtteṣvāśrameṣu ca |
prajārakṣaṇayukteṣu rājamāneṣu rājasu || 165 ||

praśāṃteṣu ca lokeṣu śāṃte tamasi dānave |
agnimārutayostasminvṛtte saṃgrāmakarmaṇi || 166 ||

tanmayā vimalā lokāstābhyāṃ jayakṛtakriyāḥ |
tīvraṃ daityabhayaṃ śrutvā mārutāgnikṛtaṃ mahat || 167 ||

kālanemīti vikhyāto dānavaḥ pratyadṛśyata |
bhāskarākāramukuṭaḥ śiṃjitābharaṇāṃgadaḥ || 168 ||

maṃdarādripratīkāśo mahārajatasaṃvṛtaḥ |
śatapraharaṇodagraḥ śatabāhuḥ śatānanaḥ || 169 ||

śataśīrṣaḥ sthitaḥ śrīmānśataśṛṃga ivācalaḥ |
kakṣe mahati saṃvṛddho nidāgha iva pāvakaḥ || 170 ||

dhūmrakeśo hariśmaśrurdaṃturo vikaṭānanaḥ |
trailokyāṃtaravistāraṃ dhārayanvipulaṃ vapuḥ || 171 ||

bāhubhistulayanvyoma kṣipanpadbhyāṃ mahīdharān |
īrayanmukhaniḥśvāsairvṛṣṭikārānbalāhakān || 172 ||

tiryagāyataraktākṣaṃ maṃdarodagravarcasām |
didhakṣaṃtamivāyāṃtaṃ sarvāndevagaṇānmṛdhe || 173 ||

tarjayaṃtaṃ suragaṇāṃśchādayaṃtaṃ diśo daśa |
saṃvartakāle hṛṣitaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ mṛtyumivotthitam || 174 ||

sutalenocchrayavatā vipulāṃguliparvaṇā |
laṃbābharaṇapūrṇena kiṃciccalitakarmaṇā || 175 ||

ucchritenāgrahastena dakṣiṇena vapuṣmatā |
dānavāndevanihatānbruvantaṃ tiṣṭhateti ca || 176 ||

taṃ kālanemiṃ samare dviṣatāṃ kālaneminam |
vīkṣaṃte sma surāḥ sarve bhayavihvalalocanāḥ || 177 ||

taṃ vīkṣaṃte sma bhūtāni grasaṃtaṃ kālaneminam |
trivikramaṃ vikramaṃ taṃ nārāyaṇamivāparam || 178 ||

sobhyucchrayaṃ punaḥ prāpto mārutāghūrṇitāṃbaraḥ |
prakrāmadasuro yoddhuṃ trāsayansarvadevatāḥ || 179 ||

sameyivānsureṃdreṇa pariṣvakto bhramanraṇe |
kālanemirbabhau daityaḥ saviṣṇuriva maṃdaraḥ || 180 ||

atha vivyathire devāḥ sarve śakrapurogamāḥ |
kālaneminamāyāṃtaṃ dṛṣṭvā kālamivāparam || 181 ||

dānavānanupiprīṣuḥ kālanemirmahāsuraḥ |
vyavardhata mahātejāstapāṃte jalado yathā || 182 ||

taṃ trailokyāṃtaragataṃ dṛṣṭvā te dānaveśvarāḥ |
uttasthurapariśrāṃtāḥ pītvevāmṛtamuttamam || 183 ||

te vītabhayasaṃtrāsā mayatārapurogamāḥ |
tārakāmayasaṃgrāme satataṃ jitakāśinaḥ || 184 ||

rejurāyodhanagatā dānavā yuddhakāṃkṣiṇaḥ |
maṃtramabhyasatāṃ teṣāṃ vyūhaṃ ca paridhāvatām || 185 ||

prekṣatāṃ cābhavatprītirdānavaṃ kālaneminam |
ye tu tatra mayasyāsanmukhyā yuddhapurassarāḥ || 186 ||

te tu sarve bhayaṃ tyaktvā hṛṣṭā yoddhumupasthitāḥ |
mayastāro varāhaśca hayagrīvaśca dānavaḥ || 187 ||

vipracittisutaḥ śvetaḥ kharalaṃbāvubhāvapi |
ariṣṭo baliputraśca kiśorākhyastathaiva ca || 188 ||

surbhānuścāmaraprakhyaścakrayodhī mahāsuraḥ |
ete'stravedinaḥ sarve sarve tapasi susthitāḥ || 189 ||

dānavāḥ kṛtino jagmuḥ kālaneminamuddhatam |
te gadābhissugurvībhiścakrairathaparaśvadhaiḥ || 190 ||

kālakalpaiśca musalaiḥ kṣepaṇīyaiśca mudgaraiḥ |
aśmabhiścāstrasadṛśaistathā śailaiśca dāruṇaiḥ || 191 ||

paṭṭiśairbhiṃḍipālaiśca parighaiścottamāyasaiḥ |
ghātinībhiśca gurvībhiḥ śataghnībhistathaiva ca || 192 ||

yugairyaṃtraiśca nirmuktairlāṃgalairugratāḍitaiḥ |
dorbhirāyatamānaiśca pāśaiśca parighādibhiḥ || 193 ||

bhujaṃgavaktrairlelihānairvisarpadbhiśca sāyakaiḥ |
vajraiḥ praharaṇīyaiśca dīpyamānaiśca tomaraiḥ || 194 ||

vikośairasibhistīkṣṇaiḥ śūlaiśca śitanirmalaiḥ |
daityaiḥ saṃdīpyamānaiśca pragṛhītaśarāsanaiḥ || 195 ||

tataḥ puraskṛtya tadā kālaneminamāhave |
sā dīptaśastrapravarā daityānāṃ ruruce camūḥ || 196 ||

yairnimīlitasarvāṃgā vanālīvāṃbudāgame |
devatānāmapi camūrmumude śakrapālitā || 197 ||

upetā śiśiroṣṇābhyāṃ tejobhyāṃ caṃdrasūryayoḥ |
vāyuvegavatī saumyā tārāgaṇapatākinī || 198 ||

toyadā baddhavasanā grahanakṣatrahāsinī |
yameṃdradhanadairguptā varuṇena ca dhīmatā || 199 ||

sā pradīptāgnipavanā nārāyaṇaparāyaṇā |
sāsamudraughasadṛśī dīpyamānā mahācamūḥ || 200 ||

rarājāstravatī bhīmā yakṣagaṃdharvaśālinī |
tayoścamvostadānīṃ tu babhūva sa samāgamaḥ || 201 ||

dyāvāpṛthivyossaṃyogo yathā syādyugaparyaye |
tadyuddhamabhavadghoraṃ devadānavasaṃkulaṃ || 202 ||

kṣamāparākramaparaṃ sadarpavinayasyadaṃ |
niścakramurbalābhyāṃ tu bhīmābhyāṃ ca surā'surāḥ || 203 ||

pūrvāparābhyāṃ saṃrabdhāḥ sāgarābhyāmivāṃbudāḥ |
tābhyāṃ balābhyāṃ saṃhṛṣṭāśceruste devadānavāḥ || 204 ||

vanābhyāṃ pārvatīyābhyāṃ puṣpitābhyāṃ yathā nagāḥ |
samājaghnustathā bherīḥ śaṃkhāndadhmuranekaśaḥ || 205 ||

brahmāṃḍaṃ ca bhuvaṃ caiva diśaśca samapūrayan |
jyāghātatalanirghoṣa dhanuṣāṃ kūjitāni ca || 206 ||

duṃdubhīnāṃ ca nirhrādo daityamaṃtardadhuḥ svanam |
te'nyonyamabhisaṃpeturyātayaṃtaḥ parasparam || 207 ||

babhaṃjurbāhubhirbāhu yuddhamanye yuyutsavaḥ |
devānāmaśanīrghorāḥ parighāṃścottamāyudhān || 208 ||

nistriṃśānsasṛjuḥ saṃkhye gadāgurvīśca dānavāḥ |
gadānipātairbhagnāṃgā bāṇaiśca śakalīkṛtāḥ || 209 ||

paripeturbhṛśaṃ kecitpunaḥ kecittu jaghnire |
tato rathaiśca turagairvimānaiśca padātibhiḥ || 210 ||

samīyustetisaṃrabdhā roṣādanyonyamāhave |
saṃvarttamānāssamare saṃdaṣṭauṣṭapuṭānanāḥ || 211 ||

rathā rathairniyudhyaṃte pādātāśca padātibhiḥ |
teṣāṃ rathānāṃ tumulaḥ saśabdaḥ śabdavāhinām || 212 ||

nabho nidaddhvānayathā nabhasye jaladasvanaiḥ |
babhaṃjire rathānkecitkecitsaṃmṛditā rathaiḥ || 213 ||

saṃbādhamanye saṃprāptā na śekuścalituṃ rathāḥ |
anyonya madhye samare dorbhyāmutkṣipya daṃśitāḥ || 214 ||

saṃhrādamāṇāssabalā jaghnustatrāsi carmiṇaḥ |
astrairanye vinirbhinnā raktaṃ vemurhatāyudhi || 215 ||

kṣarajjalānāṃ sadṛśā jaladānāṃ samāgatāḥ |
anyonyabāṇavarṣeṇa yuddhadurdinamābabhau || 216 ||

etasminnaṃtare kruddhaḥ kālanemissa dānavaḥ |
avardhata samudraughaiḥ pūryamāṇa ivāṃbudaḥ || 217 ||

tasya vidyullatāpīḍāḥ pradīptāśanivarṣiṇaḥ |
gātrairnagagiriprakhyairvinipeturbalāhakāḥ || 218 ||

krodhānniśvasatastasya bhrūbhedasvedavarṣiṇaḥ |
sāgnisphuliṃgāḥ pratatā mukhānniścerurarciṣaḥ || 219 ||

tiryagūrdhvaṃ ca gagane vavṛdhustasya bāhavaḥ |
parvatādiva niṣkrāṃtāḥ paṃcāsyā iva pannagāḥ || 220 ||

so'strajālairbahuvidhairdhanurbhiḥ parighairapi |
divyamākāśamāvavre parvatairucchritairiva || 221 ||

sonilodbhūtavasanastasthau saṃgrāmalālasaḥ |
saṃdhyātapagrastaśilaḥ sākṣānmerurivācalaḥ || 222 ||

ūruvegapramathitaiḥ śṛṃgaśailāgrapādapaiḥ |
apātayaddevagaṇānvajreṇeva mahāgirīn || 223 ||

bāhubhiśca sanistriṃśaiśchinnabhinnaśiroruhāḥ |
na śekuścalituṃ devāḥ kālanemihatā yudhi || 224 ||

muṣṭibhirnihatāḥ kecitkecicca dvidalīkṛtāḥ |
yakṣagaṃdharvapatagāḥ samahoragakinnarāḥ || 225 ||

tena vitrāsitāḥ petuḥ samare kālaneminā |
na śekuryatnavaṃtopi yatnaṃ kartuṃ vicetasaḥ || 226 ||

tena śakraḥ sahasrākṣo'spaṃditaḥ śarabaṃdhanaiḥ |
niṣprayatnaḥ kṛtaḥ saṃkhye calituṃ na śaśāka ha || 227 ||

nirjalāṃbhodasadṛśo nirjalārṇavasaprabhaḥ |
nirvyāpāraḥ kṛtastena vipāśo varuṇo mṛdhe || 228 ||

raṇe vaiśravaṇastena parītaḥ kālarūpiṇā |
vilapanlokapāleśastyājito dhanadaḥ kriyāṃ || 229 ||

yamaḥ sarvaharastena mṛtyupraharaṇo raṇe |
yāmyāmavasthāṃ saṃtyajya bhītaḥ svāṃ diśamāviśat || 230 ||

salokapālānutsārya hṛtvā teṣāṃ ca karma tat |
dikṣu sarvāsu dehaṃ svaṃ caturdhā vidadhe tadā || 231 ||

sa nakṣatrapathaṃ gatvā divyaṃ svarbhānudarśitaṃ |
jahāra lakṣmīṃ somasya yaccāsya viṣayaṃ mahat || 232 ||

cālayāmāsa dīptāṃśuṃ dharmadvārā sabhāskaraṃ |
śāsanaṃ cāsya viṣayaṃ jahāra dinakarma ca || 233 ||

sogniṃ devamukhaṃ jitvā cakārātmamukhāśrayaṃ |
vāyuṃ ca tarasā jitvā cakārātmavaśānugaṃ || 234 ||

sa samudrātsamānīya samastāḥ sarito balāt |
cakārābhisukhāvīryā dehabhūtāśca siṃdhavaḥ || 235 ||

apaḥ svavaśagāḥ kṛtvā divijāyāśca bhūmijāḥ |
chādayāmāsa jagatīṃ suguptāṃ dharaṇīdharaiḥ || 236 ||

sa svayaṃbhūrivābhāti mahābhūtapatirmahān |
sarvalokamayo daityaḥ sarvalokabhayāvahaḥ || 237 ||

sa lokapālaikavapuścaṃdrasūryagrahātmavān |
pāvakānilasaṃbhūto rarāja yudhi dānavaḥ || 238 ||

pārameṣṭhye sthitaḥ sthāne lokānāṃ prabhavopame |
taṃ tuṣṭuvurdaityagaṇā devā iva pitāmahaṃ || 239 ||

paṃca taṃ nābhyavartaṃta viparītena karmaṇā |
vedo dharmaḥ kṣamā satyaṃ śrīśca nārāyaṇāśrayā || 240 ||

sa teṣāmanupasthānātsakrodho dānaveśvaraḥ |
vaiṣṇavaṃ padamanvicchansa gato devatāyataḥ || 241 ||

sa dadarśa suparṇasthaṃ śaṃkhacakragadādharaṃ |
dānavānāṃ vināśāya bhrāmayaṃtaṃ gadāṃ śubhāṃ || 242 ||

sajalāṃbhodasadṛśaṃ vidyutsadṛśavāsasaṃ |
ārūḍhaṃ svarṇapatrāḍhyaṃ khecaraṃ kāśyapaṃ khagaṃ || 243 ||

duṣṭadaityavināśāya dṛṣṭvā khasthamivasthitaṃ |
dānavo viṣṇumakṣobhyaṃ babhāṣe kṣubdhamānasaḥ || 244 ||

ayaṃ sa ripurasmākaṃ pūrveṣāṃ prāṇanāśanaḥ |
arṇavāvāsinaścaiva madhośca kaiṭabhasya ca || 245 ||

ayaṃ sa ripurasmākamasamaḥ kila kathyate |
anekasaṃyugenena dānavā bahavo hatāḥ || 246 ||

ayaṃ sa nirghṛṇo loke strībālanirapattrapaḥ |
yena dānavanārīṇāṃ sīmaṃtodvaraṇaṃ kṛtam || 247 ||

ayaṃ sa viṣṇurdevānāṃ vaikuṃṭhaśca divaukasām |
anaṃto bhogināṃ madhye svayaṃbhūśca svayaṃbhuvaḥ || 248 ||

ayaṃ sa nātho devānāmasmābhirviprakṛṣyate |
asya krodhaṃ samāsādya hiraṇyakaśipurhataḥ || 249 ||

asyacchāyāmupāśritya devā makhamukhe sthitāḥ |
ājyaṃ maharṣibhirdattamaśnuvaṃti tridhā hutam || 250 ||

ayaṃ sa nidhane hetuḥ sarveṣāmamaradviṣām |
asya cakrapraviṣṭāni kulānyasmākamāhave || 251 ||

ayaṃ sa kila yuddheṣu surārthe tyaktajīvitaḥ |
sa vibhustejasā yuktaṃ cakraṃ kṣipati śatruṣu || 252 ||

ayaṃ sa kālo daityānāṃ kālabhūte mayi sthite |
atikrāṃtasya kālasya phalaṃ prāpsyati keśavaḥ || 253 ||

diṣṭyedānīṃ samakṣaṃ me viṣṇureṣa samāgataḥ |
niṣpiṣṭo bahunā saṃkhye mayyeva praṇaśiṣyati || 254 ||

yāsyāmyapacitiṃ diṣṭyā pūrveṣāmadya saṃyuge |
imannārāyaṇaṃ hatvā dānavānāṃ bhayāvaham || 255 ||

kṣiprameva haniṣyāmi raṇe'maragaṇānaham |
jātyaṃtaragatopyeṣa bādhate dānavānmṛdhe || 256 ||

eṣo'naṃtaḥ purā bhūtvā padmanābha iti śrutaḥ |
jaghānaikārṇave ghore tāvubhau madhukaiṭabhau || 257 ||

dvidhābhūtaṃ vapuḥ kṛtvā siṃhasyārddhaṃ narasya ca |
pitaraṃ me jaghānaiko hiraṇyakaśipuṃ purā || 258 ||

śubhaṃ garbhamadhattainamaditirdevatāraṇiḥ |
trīnlokānājahāraikaḥ kramamāṇastribhiḥ kramaiḥ || 259 ||

bhūyastvidānīṃ saṃprāpte saṃgrāme tārakāmaye |
mayā saha samāgamya sa devo vinaśiṣyati || 260 ||

evamuktvā bahuvidhaṃ kṣipraṃ nārāyaṇaṃ raṇe |
vāgbhirapratirūpābhiryuddhamevābhyarocayat || 261 ||

kṣipyamāṇo'sureṃdreṇa na cukopa gadādharaḥ |
kṣamābalena mahatā sasmitaṃ cedamabravīt || 262 ||

alpaṃ darpabalaṃ daitya sthiramakrodhajaṃ balam |
hatastvaṃ darpajairdoṣairhitvā yo bhāṣase kṣamām || 263 ||

adhamastvaṃ mama mato dhigetattava vāgbalam |
ke tatra puruṣāḥ saṃti yatra garjaṃti yoṣitaḥ || 264 ||

ahaṃ tvāṃ daitya paśyāmi pūrveṣāṃ mārgagāminam |
prajāpatiṃ kṛtaṃ setuṃ tyaktvā kaḥ svastimānbhavet || 265 ||

adya tvāṃ nāśayiṣyāmi devavyāpāraghātakam |
sveṣu sveṣu ca sthāneṣu sthāpayiṣyāmi devatāḥ || 266 ||

evaṃ bruvati vākyaṃ tu mṛdhe śrīvatsadhāriṇi |
jahāsa dānavaḥ krodhāddhastāṃścakreṇa sāyudhān || 267 ||

sa bāhuśatamudyamya sarvāyudhagaṇānraṇe |
krodhādviguṇaraktākṣo viṣṇorvakṣasya pātayat || 268 ||

dānavāścāpi samare mayatārapurogamāḥ |
udyatāyudhanistriṃśā viṣṇumabhyadravanraṇe || 269 ||

sa tāḍyamāno'tibalairdaityaiḥ sarvāyudhodyataiḥ |
na cacāla tato yuddhe kaṃpyamāna ivācalaḥ || 270 ||

saṃyuktaśca suparṇena kālanemirmahāsuraḥ |
sarvaprāṇena mahatīṃ gadāmudyamya bāhubhiḥ || 271 ||

ghorāṃ jvalaṃtīṃ mumuce saṃrabdho garuḍopari |
karmaṇā tena daityasya viṣṇurvismayamāgamat || 272 ||

tadā tena suparṇasya pātitā mūrdhni sā gadā |
suparṇaṃ vyathitaṃ dṛṣṭvā kṣataṃ ca vapurātmanaḥ || 273 ||

krodhasaṃraktanayano vaikuṃṭhaścakramādade |
vyavarddhata ca vegena suparṇena samaṃ vibhuḥ || 274 ||

bhujāścāsya vyavardhaṃta vyāptavaṃto diśo daśa |
vidiśaścaiva khaṃ cāpi gāṃ caiva pratipūrayan || 275 ||

vavṛdhe sa punarlokānkrāṃtukāma ivaujasā |
taṃ jayāya sureṃdrāṇāṃ varddhamānaṃ nabhastale || 276 ||

ṝṣayaḥ saha gaṃdharvāstuṣṭuvurmadhusūdanam |
sadyāṃ kirīṭena likhanśirasā bhāsvareṇa ca || 277 ||

padbhyāmākramyavasudhāṃ diśaḥ pracchādya bāhubhiḥ |
sahasrakaratulyābhaṃ sahasrāramarikṣayam || 278 ||

dīptāgnisadṛśaṃ ghoraṃdarśanena sudarśanam |
suvarṇareṇuparyaṃtaṃ vajranābhaṃ bhayāvahaṃ || 279 ||

medosthimajjarudhiraiḥ siktaṃ dānavasaṃbhavaiḥ |
advitīyaṃ praharaṇaṃ kṣuraparyaṃtamaṃḍalam || 280 ||

sragdāmamālānicitaṃ kāmagaṃ kāmarūpiṇaṃ |
svayaṃ svayaṃbhuvā sṛṣṭaṃ bhayadaṃ sarvavidviṣām || 281 ||

dadhāra roṣeṇāviṣṭaṃ nityamāhavadarpitaṃ |
kṣepaṇādyasya muhyaṃti lokāḥ sasthāṇujaṃgamāḥ || 282 ||

kravyādāni ca bhūtāni tṛptiṃ yāṃti mahāmṛdhe |
tamapratimakarmāṇaṃ samānaṃ sūryavarcasā || 283 ||

cakramudyamya samare kopadīpto gadādharaḥ |
praṇaṣṭaṃ dānavaṃ tejaḥ kurvāṇaṃ svena tejasā || 284 ||

ciccheda bāhūṃstenaiva samare kālaneminaḥ |
tacca vaktraśataṃ ghoraṃ sāgnicūrṇāṭṭahāsi vai || 285 ||

tasya daityasya cakreṇa pramamātha balāddhariḥ |
sacchinnabāhurviśirānaprākaṃpata dānavaḥ || 286 ||

kabaṃdhāvasthitaḥ saṃkhye viśākhaiva pādapaḥ |
taṃvitatya mahāpakṣau vāyoḥ kṛtvā samaṃ javam || 287 ||

urasā tāḍayāmāsa garuḍaḥ kālaneminaṃ |
sa tasya dehobhimukho vibāhuḥ khātparibhraman || 288 ||

nipapāta divaṃ tyaktvā kṣobhayandharaṇītalam |
tasminnipatite daitye devāḥ sarṣigaṇāstathā || 289 ||

sādhusādhviti vaikuṃṭhaṃ sametāḥ pratyapūjayan |
apare ye tu daityā vai yuddhe dṛṣṭaparākramāḥ || 290 ||

te sarve bāhubhirvyāptā na śekuścalituṃ raṇe |
kāṃścitkeśeṣu jagrāha kāṃścitkaṃṭheṣvapīḍayat || 291 ||

cakarta kasyacidvaktraṃ madhye gṛhṇāttathāparam |
te gadācakranirdagdhā gatasatvā gatāsavaḥ || 292 ||

gaganādbhraṣṭasarvāṃgā nipeturdharaṇītale |
teṣu sarveṣu daityeṣu hateṣu puruṣottamaḥ || 293 ||

śakrapriyaṃ tataḥ kṛtvā kṛtakarmagadādharaḥ |
tasminvimarde saṃvṛtte saṃgrāme tārakāmaye || 294 ||

taṃ ca deśaṃ jagāmāśu brahmā lokapitāmahaḥ |
sarvairbrahmarṣibhiḥ sārddhaṃ gaṃdharvāpsarasāṃgaṇaiḥ || 295 ||

devadevaṃ hariṃ devaḥ pūjayanvākyamabravīt |
kṛtaṃ deva mahatkarma surāṇāṃ śalyamuddhṛtam || 296 ||

nidhanena ca daityānāṃ vayaṃ ca paritoṣitāḥ |
yo'yaṃ tvayā hato viṣṇo kālanemirmahāsuraḥ || 297 ||

tvāmetasya ṝte hyasminśāstā kaścinna vidyate |
eṣa devānparibhavanlokāṃśca sacarācarān || 298 ||

ṝṣīṇāṃ kadanaṃ kṛtvā māmapi pratigarjati |
tadanena tvadīyena parituṣṭosmi karmaṇā || 299 ||

yadayaṃ kālakalpaste kālanemirnipātitaḥ |
tadāgacchasva bhadraṃ te gacchāma divamuttamām || 300 ||

brahmarṣayastvāṃ tatrasthāḥ pratīkṣaṃte sado gatāḥ |
kaṃ cāhaṃ tava dāsyāmi varaṃ varabhṛtāṃ vara || 301 ||

svasthānastheṣu deveṣu teṣāṃ ca varado bhavān |
niryātametattrailokyaṃ sphītaṃ nihatakaṃṭakam || 302 ||

asminneva mṛdhe viṣṇo śakrāya sumahātmane |
evamukto bhagavatā brahmaṇā hariravyayaḥ || 303 ||

devānśakramukhānsarvānuvāca śubhayā girā |
viṣṇuruvāca |
śrūyatāṃ tridaśāssarve yāvaṃto'tra samāgatāḥ || 304 ||

suparṇasahitaistatra puraskṛtya puraṃdaraṃ |
asmābhiḥ samare sarvaiḥ kālanemimukhā hatāḥ || 305 ||

dānavā vikramopetāḥ śakrādapi mahattarāḥ |
asminmahati saṃgrāme dvāveva tu vinissṛtau || 306 ||

virocanastu daiteyaḥ svarbhānuśca mahābalaḥ |
svāṃ diśaṃ bhajatāṃ śakro diśaṃ varuṇa eva ca || 307 ||

yāmyāṃ yamaḥ pālayatāmuttarāṃ ca dhanādhipaḥ |
ṝkṣaiḥ saha sadā yogaṃ gacchatāṃ caṃdramāstathā || 308 ||

ayamṛtumukhaṃ sūryo bhajatāmayanaiḥ saha |
ājyabhāgāḥ pravartaṃtāṃ sadasyairabhipūjitāḥ || 309 ||

hūyaṃtāmagnayo viprairvedadṛṣṭena karmaṇā |
devāśca balihomena svādhyāyena maharṣayaḥ || 310 ||

śrāddhena pitaraścaiva tuṣṭiṃ yāṃtu yathāsukham |
vāyuścaratu mārgasthastridhā dīpyatu pāvakaḥ || 311 ||

trayovarṇāśca lokāṃstrīstaparpayaṃtvātmajairguṇaiḥ |
kratavaḥ saṃpravartaṃtāṃ dīkṣaṇīyairdvijātibhiḥ || 312 ||

dakṣiṇāścopapadyaṃtāṃ yājñikaiśca pṛthakpṛthak |
gāśca sūryo rasānsomo vāyuḥ prāṇāṃśca prāṇiṣu || 313 ||

tarpayantaḥ pravartaṃtāmete somyaiḥ svakarmabhiḥ |
yathāvadanupūrveṇa maheṃdramalayodbhavāḥ || 314 ||

trailokyamātaraḥ sarvāḥ samudraṃ yāṃtu siṃdhavaḥ |
daityebhyastyajyatāṃ bhīśca śāṃtiṃ vrajata devatāḥ || 315 ||

svasti vo'stu gamiṣyāmi brahmalokaṃ sanātanaṃ |
svagṛhe svargaloke vā saṃgrāme vā viśeṣataḥ || 316 ||

viśvastaiśca na gaṃtavyaṃ nityaṃ kṣudrā hi dānavāḥ |
chidreṣu praharaṃtyete na teṣāṃ saṃsthitirdhruvā || 317 ||

saumyānāṃ nijabhāvānāṃ bhavatāmārjave manaḥ |
evamuktvā suragaṇānviṣṇussatyaparākramaḥ || 318 ||

jagāma brahmaṇā sārddhaṃ brahmalokaṃ mahāyaśāḥ |
devānāṃ mahatīṃ prītimutpādya bhagavānprabhuḥ || 319 ||

etadāścaryamabhavatsaṃgrāme tārakāmaye |
dānavānāṃ ca viṣṇośca yanmāṃ tvaṃ paripṛcchasi || 320 ||

bhīṣma uvāca |
śrutaḥ padmodbhavo brahmanvistareṇa tvayeritaḥ |
samāsādbhavamāhātmyamutpattiṃ ca guhasya ca || 1 ||

śrotumicchāmi te brahmanyathābhūtaḥ kṛtaṃ ca yat |
tārakaśca kathaṃ bhūto dānavo balavattaraḥ || 2 ||

kārttikeyena sa brahmankathaṃ dhvasto mahāsuraḥ |
kathaṃ rudreṇa munayaḥ preṣitā maṃdaraṃ girim || 3 ||

kathaṃ labdhā umā tatra rudreṇa parameṣṭhinā |
etadākhyāhi me sarvaṃ yathābhūtaṃ mahāmune || 4 ||

pulastya uvāca |
kaśyapena purā proktā ditirdaityāraṇiḥ śubhā |
vajrasāramayaiścāṃgaiḥ putro devi bhaviṣyati || 5 ||

vajrāṃgo nāma putrastu bhavitā dharmavatsalaḥ |
sā ca labdhavarā devī suṣuve vajraduśchidam || 6 ||

sa jātamātra evābhūtsarvaśāstrārthapāragaḥ |
uvāca mātaraṃ bhaktyā mātaḥ kiṃ karavāṇyaham || 7 ||

tasyovāca tato hṛṣṭā ditirdaityādhipasya tu |
bahavo me hatāḥ putrāḥ sahasrākṣeṇa putraka || 8 ||

teṣāmapacitiṃ kartuṃ gaccha śakravadhāya tu |
bāḍhamityeva tāṃ coktvā jagāma tridivaṃ balāt || 9 ||

badhvā tataḥ sahasrākṣaṃ pāśenāmoghavarcasā |
māturaṃtikamāgacchadvyādhaḥ kṣudramṛgaṃ yathā || 10 ||

etasminnaṃtare brahmā kaśyapaśca mahātapāḥ |
āgatau tatra yatrāstāṃ mātāputrāvabhītakau || 11 ||

dṛṣṭvā tu tāvuvācedaṃ brahmā kaśyapa eva ca |
muṃcainaṃ putra deveṃdraṃ kimanena prayojanam || 12 ||

avamāno vadhaḥ proktaḥ putra saṃbhāvitasya tu |
asmadvākyena yo muktastvaddhastānmṛta eva saḥ || 13 ||

parasya gauravānmuktaḥ śatrūṇāṃ śatrurāhave |
sajīvanneva hi mṛto divase divase punaḥ || 14 ||

etacchrutvā tu vajrāṃgaḥ praṇato vākyamabravīt |
na me kṛtyamanenāsti māturājñā kṛtā hi me || 15 ||

tvaṃ surāsuranātho vai mānyaśca prapitāmahaḥ |
kariṣye tvadvaco deva eṣa muktaḥ śatakratuḥ || 16 ||

tapasemeratirdevanirvighnaṃtaccamebhavet |
tvatprasādena bhagavannityuktvā virarāma ha || 17 ||

tasmiṃstūṣṇīṃ sthite daitye provācedaṃ pitāmahaḥ |
brahmovāca |
tapastvaṃ kuru māpannaḥ sosmacchāsanasaṃsthitaḥ || 18 ||

anayā cittaśuddhyā hi paryāptaṃ janmanaḥ phalam |
ityuktvā padmajaḥ kanyāṃ sasarjāyatalocanām || 19 ||

tāmasmai pradadau devaḥ patnyarthe padmasaṃbhavaḥ |
varāṃgīti ca nāmāsyāḥ kṛtvā yātaḥ pitāpahaḥ || 20 ||

vajrāṃgopi tayā sārddhaṃ jagāma tapase vanam |
ūrddhvabāhussa daityeṃdro caradvarṣasahasrakam || 21 ||

kālaṃ kamalapatrākṣaḥ śuddhabuddhirmahātapāḥ |
tāvaccādhomukhaḥ kālaṃ tāvatpaṃcāgnimadhyagaḥ || 22 ||

nirāhāro ghoratapāstaporāśirajāyata |
tataḥ soṃtarjale cakre vāsaṃ varṣasahasrakam || 23 ||

jalāṃtaraṃ praviṣṭasya tasya patnī mahāvratā |
tasyaiva tīre sarasaḥ sthitā'sau maunamāśritā || 24 ||

nirāhāraṃ tapo ghoraṃ praviveśa mahādyutiḥ |
tasyāṃ tapasi vartaṃtyāmiṃdraścakre vibhīṣikām || 25 ||

gatvā tu markaṭākārastadāśramapadaṃ mahat |
brasīṃ cakarṣa balavāngaṃdhādyarcākaraṃḍakam || 26 ||

tatastu siṃharūpeṇa bhīṣayāmāsa bhāminīm |
tato bhujaṃgarūpeṇāpyadaśaccaraṇadvayam || 27 ||

tapobalavaśātsā tu navadhyatvaṃ jagāma ha |
bhīṣikābhiranekābhiḥ kleśayanpākaśāsanaḥ || 28 ||

virarāma yadā naiva vajrāṃgamahiṣī tadā |
śailasyaduṣṭatāṃ matvā śāpaṃ dātuṃ samudyatā || 29 ||

tāṃ śāpābhimukhīṃ dṛṣṭvā śailaḥ puruṣavigrahaḥ |
uvāca tāṃ varārohāṃ varāṃgīṃ bhītalocanaḥ || 30 ||

śaila uvāca |
nāhaṃ mahāvrate duṣṭaḥ sevyohaṃ sarvadehinām |
vipriyaṃ te karotyeṣa ruṣitaḥ pākaśāsanaḥ || 31 ||

etasminnaṃtare jātaḥ kālo varṣasahasrakaḥ |
tasminjñātvā tu bhagavānkāle kamalasaṃbhavaḥ || 32 ||

tuṣṭaḥ provāca vajrāṃgaṃ tadāgatya jalāśayam |
brahmovāca |
dadāmi sarvakāmaṃ ta uttiṣṭha ditinaṃdana || 33 ||

evamuktastadotthāya sa daityeṃdrastaponidhiḥ |
uvāca prāṃjalirvākyaṃ sarvalokapitāmaham || 34 ||

vajrāṃga uvāca |
āsuro māstu me bhāvaḥ saṃtu lokā mamākṣayāḥ |
tapasyabhiratirme'stu śarīrasyāsya vartanam || 35 ||

evamastviti taṃ devo jagāma svakamālayam |
vajrāṃgopi samāpte tu tapasi sthirasaṃyamaḥ || 36 ||

saṃgaṃtumicchansvāṃ bhāryāṃ na dadarśāśrame svake |
kṣudhāviṣṭaḥ sa śailasya gahanaṃ praviveśa ha || 37 ||

ādātuṃ phalamūlāni sa ca tasminvyalokayat |
rudantīṃ svāṃ priyāṃ dīnāṃ tarupracchāditānanām || 38 ||

tāṃ vilokya tato daityaḥ provāca parisāṃtvayan |
vajrāṃga uvāca |
kena te'pakṛtaṃ bhadre yamalokaṃ yiyāsunā || 39 ||

kaṃ vā kāmaṃ prayacchāmi śīghraṃ prabrūhi mānini |
varāṃgyuvāca |
trāsitāsmyapaviddhāsmi tāḍitā pīḍitāsmi ca || 40 ||

raudreṇa devarājena naṣṭanātheva bhūriśaḥ |
duḥkhasyāṃtamapaśyaṃtī prāṇāṃstyaktuṃ vyavasthitā || 41 ||

putraṃ me tārakaṃ dehi tasmādduḥkhamahārṇavāt |
evamuktastu daityeṃdraḥ kopavyākulalocanaḥ || 42 ||

śaktopi devarājasya pratikartuṃ mahāsuraḥ |
tapa eva punaścartuṃ vyavasyata mahābalaḥ || 43 ||

jñātvā tasya tu saṃkalpaṃ brahmā krūrataraṃ punaḥ |
ājagāma tvarāyukto yatrāsau ditinaṃdanaḥ || 44 ||

brahmovāca |
kimarthaṃ putra bhūyastvaṃ kartuṃ niyamamudyataḥ |
tadahaṃ te punardadmi kāṃkṣitaṃ putramojasā || 45 ||

vajrāṃga uvāca |
utthitena mayā dṛṣṭā samādhānāttvadājñayā |
trāsiteṃdreṇa māmāha sā varāṃgī sutārthinī || 46 ||

putraṃ me tārakaṃ dehi tuṣṭo me tvaṃ pitāmaha |
brahmovāca |
alaṃ te tapasā vīra mā kleśe dustare viśa || 47 ||

putrastu tārako nāma bhaviṣyati mahābalaḥ |
devasīmaṃtinīnāṃ tu dhammillaka vimokṣakaḥ || 48 ||

ityukto daityanāthastu praṇamya prapitāmaham |
gatvā tāṃ naṃdayāmāsa mahiṣīṃ karśitāṃtarām || 49 ||

tau daṃpatī kṛtārthau tu jagmatuḥ svāśramaṃ tadā |
āhitaṃ tu tadā garbhaṃ varāṃgī varavarṇinī || 50 ||

pūrṇaṃ varṣasahasraṃ tu dadhārodara eva hi |
tato varṣasahasrāṃte varāṃgī sā prasūyata || 51 ||

jāyamāne tu daitye tu tasminlokabhayaṃkare |
cacāla sarvā pṛthivī prodbhūtāśca mahārṇavāḥ || 52 ||

celurdharādharāścāpi vavurvātāśca bhīṣaṇāḥ |
jepurjapyaṃ munivarā nedurvyālamṛgā api || 53 ||

jahau kāṃtiścaṃdrasūryau nīhāracchāditā diśaḥ |
jāte mahāsure tasminsarve cāpi mahāsurāḥ || 54 ||

ājagmurharṣitāstatra tathā cāsurayoṣitaḥ |
jagurharṣasamāviṣṭā nanṛtuścāpsarogaṇāḥ || 55 ||

tato mahotsave jāte dānavānāṃ mahādyute |
viṣaṇṇamanaso devāḥ saheṃdrā abhavaṃstadā || 56 ||

varāṃgī tu sutaṃ dṛṣṭvā harṣeṇāpūritā tadā |
bahumene ca daityeṃdro vijātaṃ taṃ tadā tayā || 57 ||

jātamātrastu daityeṃdrastārakaścogravikramaḥ |
abhiṣikto surairmukhyaiḥ kujaṃbhamahiṣādibhiḥ || 58 ||

sarvāsuramahārājye pṛthivītulanakṣame |
sa tu prāptamahārājyastārako nṛpasattama || 59 ||

uvāca dānavaśreṣṭho yuktiyuktamidaṃ vacaḥ |
tāraka uvāca |
śṛṇudhvamasurāḥ sarve vākyaṃ mama mahābalāḥ || 60 ||

vaṃśakṣayakarā devāḥ sarveṣāmeva dānavāḥ |
asmākaṃ jātidharmeṇa virūḍhaṃ vairamakṣayam || 61 ||

vayaṃ tapaścariṣyāmaḥ surāṇāṃ nigrahāya tu |
svabāhubalamāśritya sarva eva na saṃśayaḥ || 62 ||

tacchrutvā saṃmataṃ kṛtvā pāriyātraṃ yayau giriṃ |
nirāhāraḥ paṃcatapāḥ patrabhugvāribhojanaḥ || 63 ||

śataṃśataṃ samānāṃ tu tapāṃsyetānyathākarot |
evaṃ tu karśite dehe taporāśitvamāgate || 64 ||

brahmāgatyāha daityeṃdraṃ varaṃ varaya suvrata |
sa vavre sarvabhūtebhyo na me mṛtyurbhavediti || 65 ||

tamuvāca tato brahmā dehināṃ maraṇaṃ dhruvam |
yatastatopi varaya mṛtyuṃ yasmānna śaṃkase || 66 ||

tataḥ saṃciṃtya daityeṃdraḥ śiśorvai saptavāsarāt |
vavre mahāsuro mṛtyuṃ mohito hyavalepataḥ || 67 ||

jagāmomityudāhṛtya brahmā daityo nijaṃ gṛham |
athāha maṃtriṇastūrṇaṃ balaṃ me saṃprayujyatām || 68 ||

yadi vo matpriyaṃ kāryaṃ nigrāhyāḥ surasattamāḥ |
nigṛhīteṣu me prītirjāyate cātulā'surāḥ || 69 ||

tārakasya vacaḥ śrutvā grasano nāma dānavaḥ |
senānīrdaityarājasya sajjaṃ cakre balaṃ ca tat || 70 ||

āhatya bherīṃ gaṃbhīrāṃ daityānāhūya satvaraḥ |
daśakoṭīśvarā daityā daityānāṃ caṃḍavikramāḥ || 71 ||

teṣāmagresaro jaṃbhaḥ kujaṃbhonaṃtaro'suraḥ |
mahiṣaḥ kuṃjaro meghaḥ kālanemirnimistathā || 72 ||

maṃthano jaṃbhakaḥ śumbho daityeṃdrā daśanāyakāḥ |
anye ca śataśastatra pṛthivītulanakṣamāḥ || 73 ||

garuḍānāṃ sahasreṇa cakrāṣṭakavibhūṣitaḥ |
sakūbaraparīvāraścaturyojanavistṛtaḥ || 74 ||

syaṃdanastārakasyāsītvyāghrasiṃhakharārvabhiḥ |
yuktā rathāstu grasana jaṃbhakau jaṃbhakuṃbhināṃ || 75 ||

meghasya dvīpibhiryuktaḥ kūṣmāṃḍaiḥ kālaneminaḥ |
parvatābhaścaturdaṃṣṭro nimeścaiva mahāgajaḥ || 76 ||

śatahastaturaṃgastho maṃthano nāma daityarāṭ |
jaṃbhakastūṣṭramārūḍho girīṃdrābhaṃ mahābalaḥ || 77 ||

śuṃbho meṣaṃ samārūḍho'nyepyevaṃ citravāhanāḥ |
pracaṃḍāścitravarmāṇaḥ kuṃḍaloṣṇīṣabhūṣitāḥ || 78 ||

tadbalaṃ daityasiṃhasya bhīmarūpaṃ vyajāyata |
pramattamattamātaṃgaturaṃgarathasaṃkulam || 79 ||

pratasthe'marayuddhāya bahupattipatākikam |
etasminnaṃtare vāyurdevadūto'surālaye || 80 ||

dṛṣṭvā taddānavabalaṃ jagāmeṃdrasya śaṃsituṃ |
sa gatvā tu sabhāṃ divyāṃ maheṃdrasya mahātmanaḥ || 81 ||

śaśaṃsa madhye devānāṃ tatkāryaṃ samupasthitam |
tacchrutvā devarājastu nimīlitavilocanaḥ || 82 ||

bṛhaspatimuvācedaṃ vākyaṃ kāle mahābhujaḥ |
iṃdra uvāca |
saṃprāpnoti vimardoyaṃ devānāṃ dānavaiḥ saha || 83 ||

kāryaṃ kimatra tadbrūhi nītyupāyopabṛṃhitam |
etacchrutvā tu vacanaṃ maheṃdrasya girāṃ patiḥ || 84 ||

ityuvāca mahābhāgo bṛhaspatirudāradhīḥ |
bṛhaspatiruvāca |
sāmapūrvā śrutā nītiścaturaṃgāpatākinī || 85 ||

jigīṣatāṃ suraśreṣṭha sthitireṣā sanātanī |
sāmabhedastathā dānaṃ daṃḍaścāṃgacatuṣṭayam || 86 ||

na sāṃtvagocare lubdhānabhedyāstvekadharmiṇaḥ |
na dānamattra saṃsiddhyai prasahyaivāpahāriṇām || 87 ||

ekobhyupāyo daṃḍo'tra bhavatāṃ yadi rocate |
evamuktaḥ sahasrākṣa evametaduvāca ha || 88 ||

karttavyatāṃ ca saṃciṃtya provācāmarasaṃsadi |
iṃdra uvāca |
avadhānena me vācaṃ śṛṇudhvaṃ nākavāsinaḥ || 89 ||

bhavaṃto yajñabhoktāro divyātmāno hi sānvayāḥ |
sve mahimni sthitā nityaṃ jagataḥ pālane ratāḥ || 90 ||

kriyatāṃ samarodyogaḥ sainyaṃ saṃyojyatāṃ mama |
āhriyaṃtāṃ ca śastrāṇi pūjyaṃtāṃ śastradevatāḥ || 91 ||

vāhanāni vimānāni yojayaddhvaṃ mameśvarāḥ |
yamaṃ senāpatiṃ kṛtvā śīghrameva divaukasaḥ || 92 ||

ityuktāssamanahyaṃta devānāṃ ye pradhānataḥ |
vājināmayutenājau hemaghaṃṭā pariṣkṛtam || 93 ||

nānāścaryaguṇopetaṃ saṃprāptaṃ devadānavaiḥ |
rathaṃ mātalinā yuktaṃ devarājasya durjayam || 94 ||

yamo mahiṣamāsthāya senāgre samavarttata |
caṃḍakiṃkaravṛṃdena sarvataḥ parivāritaḥ || 95 ||

kalpakālodgatajvālā pūritombaragocaraḥ |
hutāśanastvajārūḍhaḥ śaktihasto vyavasthitaḥ || 96 ||

pavano'ṅakuśahastaśca vistārita mahājavaḥ |
bhujageṃdrasamārūḍho jaleśo bhagavānsvayam || 97 ||

narayukte rathe devo rākṣaseśo viyaccaraḥ |
tīkṣṇakhaḍgayuto bhīmaḥ samare samavasthitaḥ || 98 ||

mahāsiṃharathe devo dhanādhyakṣo gadāyudhaḥ |
caṃdrādityāvaśvinau ca caturaṃgabalānvitāḥ || 99 ||

senānyo devarājasya durjayā bhuvanatraye |
koṭayastāstrayastriṃśaddevadevanikāyinām || 100 ||

himācalābhe sitacārucāmare suvarṇapadmāmalasuṃdarasraji |
kṛtābhirāmo jvalakuṃkumāṃkure kapolalīlālikadaṃbasaṃkule || 101 ||

sthitastadairāvaṇanāma kuṃjare mahāmanāścitravibhūṣaṇāṃbaraḥ |
viśālavajraḥ suvitānabhūṣitaḥ prakīrṇakeyūrabhujaṃgamaṃḍalaḥ || 102 ||

sahasradṛgvaṃditapādapallavastriviṣṭape śobhata pākaśāsanaḥ |
turaṃga mātaṃga kulaughasaṃkulā sitātapattraddhvajaśālinī ca || 103 ||

babhūva sā durjayapattisaṃtatā vibhāti nānāyudhayodhadustarā |
tatośvinau ca marutaḥ sasādhyāḥ sapuraṃdarāḥ || 104 ||

yakṣarākṣasagaṃdharvā divya nānāstrapāṇayaḥ |
jaghnurdaityeśvaraṃ sarve saṃbhūya tu mahābalāḥ || 105 ||

na caivāstrāṇyasajjaṃta gātre vajrācalopame |
atho rathādavaplutya tārako dānavādhipaḥ || 106 ||

jaghāna koṭiśo devānkarapārṣṇibhireva ca |
hataśeṣāṇi sainyāni devānāṃ vipra dudruvuḥ || 107 ||

diśo bhītāni saṃtyajya raṇopakaraṇāni ca |
dṛṣṭvā tānvidrutāndevāṃstārako vākyamabravīt || 108 ||

mā vadhiṣṭha surāndaityā vajrāṃgāya ca maṃdire |
śīghramānīya darśyaṃtāṃ baddhānpaśyatvayaṃ surān || 109 ||

lokapālāṃstato daityo baddhvā ceṃdramukhānraṇe |
sarudrānsudṛḍhaiḥ pāśaiḥ paśupālaḥ paśūniva || 110 ||

sa bhūyo rathamāsthāya jagāma svakamālayaṃ |
siddhagaṃdharvasaṃghuṣṭaṃ vipulācalamastakam || 111 ||

pulastya uvāca |
prādurāsītpratīhāraḥ śubhracīnāṃśukāṃbaraḥ |
sa jānubhyāṃ mahīṃ gatvā pihitāsyaśca pāṇinā || 1 ||

uvācānāvilaṃ vākyamalpākṣarapariṣkṛtam |
daityeṃdramarkavṛṃdābhaṃ bibhrataṃ bhāsvaraṃ vapuḥ || 2 ||

kālanemiḥ surānbaddhvā prādāya dvāri tiṣṭhati |
sa vijñāpayati stheyaṃ kva vaṃdini ca yaiḥ prabho || 3 ||

tanniśamyābravīddaityaḥ pratīhārasya bhāṣitam |
yatheṣṭhaṃ sthīyatāmebhirgṛhaṃ me bhuvanatrayaṃ || 4 ||

kevalaṃ vāsavaṃ tvekaṃ muṃḍayitvā vimucyatām |
sitavastraparicchannaṃ śunaḥpādena cihnitam || 5 ||

evaṃ kṛte tato devā dūyamānena cetasā |
jagmurjagadguruṃ draṣṭuṃ śaraṇaṃ kamalodbhavam || 6 ||

vinirviṇṇāstamāsādya śirobhirddharaṇīṃ gatāḥ |
tuṣṭuvuḥ suṣṭhu varṇāḍhyairvacobhiḥ kamalāsanam || 7 ||

devā ūcuḥ |
namastvoṃkārāṃkurādiprasūtyai viśvasthānānaṃtabhedasya pūrvam |
saṃbhūtasyānaṃtaraṃ satvamūle saṃhārecchoste namaḥ satvamūrtte || 8 ||

vyaktīnāṃ tvāmādibhūtaṃ mahimnā cāsmādasmānabhidhānādviciṃtya |
dyāvāpṛthvyorūrddhvalokāṃstathādhaścāṃḍādasmāttvaṃ vibhāgaṃ cakartha || 9 ||

vyaktaṃ meruryajjarāyustavābhūdevaṃ vidmastvatpraṇītovakāśaḥ |
vyaktaṃ devā jajñire yasya dehāddehasyāṃtaścāriṇo dehabhājaḥ || 10 ||

dyauste mūrddhā locane caṃdrasūryau vyālāḥ keśāḥ śrotraraṃdhre diśaste |
gātraṃ yajñaḥ siṃdhavaḥ saṃdhayo vai pādau bhūmistūdaraṃ te samudrāḥ || 11 ||

māyākāraḥ kāraṇaṃ tvaṃ prasiddho vedaiḥ śāṃto jyotirarkastvamuktaḥ |
vedārthena tvāṃ vivṛṇvaṃti buddhyā hṛtpadmāṃtaḥ saṃniviṣṭaṃ purāṇam || 12 ||

tvāṃ cātmānaṃ labdhayogā gṛṇaṃti sāṃkhyairyāḥ stāḥ saptasūkṣmāḥ praṇītāḥ |
tāsāṃ heturyāṣṭamī cāpi gītā tāsvaṃtastho jīvabhūtastvameva || 13 ||

dṛṣṭvā mūrttiṃ sthūlasūkṣmāṃcakāra ye vai bhāvāḥ kāraṇe keciduktāḥ |
saṃbhūtāste tvatta evādisarge bhūyastāstvāṃ vāsanāṃ tebhyupeyāḥ || 14 ||

tvatsaṃketastvaṃtarāyo nigūḍhaḥ kālo'meyo dhvastasaṃkhyāvikalpaḥ |
bhāvābhāvāvyaktisaṃhārahetuḥ so'naṃtastvaṃ tasya kartā nidhānam || 15 ||

sthūlassarvo'narthabhūtastatonyasso'rthassūkṣmo yo hi tebhyopigītaḥ |
sthūlā bhāvāścāvṛtā yaiśca teṣāṃ tebhyaḥ sthūlastvaṃ purāṇe praṇītaḥ || 16 ||

bhūtaṃbhūtaṃ bhūtimadbhūtabhāvaṃ bhāvebhāve bhāvitaṃ tvaṃ yunakṣi |
yuktaṃyuktaṃ vyaktibhāvānnirasya sthānesthāne vyaktivṛttiṃ karoṣi || 17 ||

itthaṃ devo vyaktibhājāṃ śaraṇyastrātā goptā bhāvito'naṃtamūrtiḥ |
viremuramarāstu tvā brahmāṇamiti kāraṇam || 18 ||

tasthurmanobhiriṣṭārthasaṃprāpti prārthanāstataḥ |
evaṃ stuto viriṃcistu prasādaṃ paramaṃ gataḥ || 19 ||

amarānvaradopyāha vāmahastena nirdiśan |
brahmovāca |
nārī vā bhartṛkā kasmāddhastasaṃtyaktabhūṣaṇā || 20 ||

na rājase kutaśśakrā mlānavaktrasaroruhaḥ |
hutāśanaviyuktopi dhūmena na virājase || 21 ||

tṛṇaughena praticchanno dagdhadāvaściroṣitaḥ |
yamāmayaśarīreṇa kliṣṭo nādya virājase || 22 ||

daṃḍenālaṃbaneneva kṛṣṭo yena padepade |
rajanīcaranātha tvaṃ kiṃ bhīta iva bhāṣase || 23 ||

rākṣaseṃndrakṛtādāne tvamarātikṣato yathā |
tanuste varuṇocchuṣkāparītasyeva vahninā || 24 ||

vimuktarudhiraṃ cātha padaṃ tvaṃ pravilokaya |
vāyo bhavānvicetaskaḥ khaḍgāgrairiva niṣkṛtaḥ || 25 ||

kiṃ tvaṃ natosi dhanada saṃtyajyeva kuberatāṃ |
rudrāstriśūlinaḥ saṃto'vidadhvaṃ bahuśūratāṃ || 26 ||

bhavatāṃ kena cākṣiptā tīvratā nastaducyatāṃ |
evamuktāḥ surāstena brahmaṇā brahmavartinā || 27 ||

vācāṃ pradhānabhūtatvātte mārutamacodayan |
atha śakramukhairdevaiḥ pavanaḥ praticoditaḥ || 28 ||

prāha devaṃ caturvaktraṃ bhavānvetti carācaraṃ |
purahūtamukhāḥ sabalā nimiṣā vijitāḥ prasabhaṃ kila daityaśataiḥ || 29 ||

kratavo vihitā bhavatā sthitaye jagatāṃ ca mahādbhutacitraguṇāḥ |
api yajñakṛtaḥ śrutakāmaphalā vihitā ṝṣayastata eva puraḥ || 30 ||

api nākamabhūtkila yajñabhujāṃ bhavato viniyogavaśātsatatam |
apahṛtyavimānagaṇaṃ sakṛto danujena mahākarabhūmisamaḥ || 31 ||

kṛtavānasi sarvaguṇātiśayaṃ yamaśeṣamahīdhararājatayā |
makhabhūṣitamaṃśumatāmavadhiṃ suradhāmagiriṃ gaganepi sadā || 32 ||

adhivāsavihāravidhānucito danujena pariṣkṛtaśṛṃgataṭaḥ |
pravilambitaratnaguhānivaho bahudaityasamāśrayatāṃ gamitaḥ || 33 ||

asurasya ca tasya bhayena gataṃ saviṣāda śarīranimittatayā |
upabhogyatayādhikṛtaṃ suciraṃ vimaladyutipūritadigvadanaṃ || 34 ||

bhavataiva vinirmitamādiyuge surahetisamūhavaraṃ kuliśaṃ |
ditijasya śarīramavāpyagataṃ śatadhā matibhedamivālpavidaḥ || 35 ||

bāṇaiśca yudhi viddhāṃgā dvāri dvāsthairnidarśitāḥ |
labdhapraveśāḥ kṛcchreṇa vayaṃ tasyāmaradviṣaḥ || 36 ||

sabhāyāmamarādeva prakṛṣyopaniveśitāḥ |
vetrahastairajalpaṃtastathopahasitāḥ paraiḥ || 37 ||

mahārthāḥ siddhasarvārthā bhavaṃtaḥ svalpabhāṣiṇaḥ |
śāstrayuktamatha brūta māmarā bahubhāṣiṇaḥ || 38 ||

sabheyaṃ daityasiṃhasya na śakrasya viśṛṃkhalā |
vadadbhiriti daityasya preṣyairvihasitā bahu || 39 ||

ṝtavo mūrtimaṃtaścāpyaharniśamupāsate |
kṛtāparādhaṃ satrāsaṃ na tyajaṃti kathaṃcana || 40 ||

taṃtrīlayanayopetaṃ siddhagaṃdharvakinnaraiḥ |
sarāgamupadhāviṣṭaṃ gīyate tasya veśmasu || 41 ||

kṛtākṛtopakaraṇairmitrādi gurulāghavaḥ |
śaraṇāgatasaṃtyāgī tyaktasatyapratiśrayaḥ || 42 ||

iti niśśeṣamathavā niśśeṣaṃ kena śakyate |
tasyāvinayamākhyātuṃ sraṣṭā tatra parāyaṇam || 43 ||

ityuktvā vyaramadvāyuḥ śanairdevaviceṣṭitaṃ |
surānuvāca bhagavāṃstataḥ smitamukhāṃbujaḥ || 44 ||

brahmovāca |
avadhyastārako daityaḥ sarvairapi surāsuraiḥ |
yasya vadhyassa nādyāpi jātastribhuvane pumān || 45 ||

mayā sa varadānena chaṃdayitvā nivāritaḥ |
tapasaḥ sāṃprataṃ rājā trailokyadahanātmakaḥ || 46 ||

sa tu vavre vadhaṃ daityaśśiśutaḥ saptavāsarāt |
sa tu saptadino bālaḥ śaṃkarādyo bhaviṣyati || 47 ||

tārakasya nihaṃtā sa bhāskarābho bhaviṣyati |
sāṃprataṃ cāpyapatnīkaḥ śaṃkaro bhagavānprabhuḥ || 48 ||

himācalasya duhitā yā ca devī bhaviṣyati |
tasyāḥ sakāśādyaḥ sūnuraraṇyāḥ pāvako yathā || 49 ||

janayiṣyati taṃ prāpya tārako na bhaviṣyati |
mayā'bhyupāyaḥ kathito yathaiṣa hi bhaviṣyati || 50 ||

śeṣaṃ cāpyasya vibhavaṃ vibhajadhvamanaṃtaraṃ |
stokakālaṃ pratīkṣadhvaṃ nirviśaṃkena cetasā || 51 ||

ityuktāstridaśāstena sākṣātkamalayoninā |
jagmuste praṇipatyeśaṃ yathāyogaṃ divaukasaḥ || 52 ||

tato yāteṣu deveṣu brahmā lokapitāmahaḥ |
niśāṃ sasmāra bhagavāṃstāṃ devīṃ pūrvasaṃbhavāṃ || 53 ||

tato bhagavatī rātrirupatasthe pitāmahaṃ |
tāṃ vivikte samālokya brahmovāca vibhāvarīm || 54 ||

brahmovāca |
vibhāvari mahatkāryaṃ devānāṃ samupasthitaṃ |
tatkartavyaṃ tvayā devi śṛṇu kāryasya niścayaṃ || 55 ||

tārakonāma daityeṃdraḥ suraśatruranirjitaḥ |
tasyā bhavāya bhagavānjanayiṣyati ceśvaraḥ || 56 ||

sutaṃ sa bhavitā tasya tārakasyāṃtakaḥ kila |
śaṃkarasyābhavatpatnī satī dakṣasutā tu yā || 57 ||

sā pituḥ kupitā devī kasmiṃścitkāraṇāṃtare |
bhavitrī himaśailasya duhitā lokabhāvinī || 58 ||

viraheṇa harastasyā matvā śūnyaṃ jagattrayaṃ |
sa tasya himaśailasya kaṃdare siddhasevite || 59 ||

pratīkṣamāṇastajjanma kiṃcitkālaṃ nivatsyati |
tayoḥ sutaptatapasorbhavitā yo mahānsutaḥ || 60 ||

bhaviṣyati sa daityasya tārakasya vināśakaḥ |
jātamātrā ca sā devī svalpasaṃjñeva bhāminī || 61 ||

virahotkaṃṭhitā gāḍhaṃ harasaṃgamalālasā |
tayoḥ sutaptatapasoḥ saṃyogaḥ syācchubhāvahaḥ || 62 ||

tatastābhyāṃ tu janitaḥ svalpo vākkalaho bhavet |
tatastu saṃśayo bhūyastārakasya ca dṛśyate || 63 ||

tayoḥ saṃyuktayostasmātsuratāsaktikāraṇe |
vighnaṃ tvayā vidhātavyaṃ yathā tābhyāṃ tathā śṛṇu || 64 ||

garbhasthamevatanmātuḥ svena rūpeṇa saṃjñayā |
tato vihasya śarvastāṃ viṣaṇṇo narmapūrvakaṃ || 65 ||

bhartsayiṣyati tāṃ devīṃ tataḥ sā kupitā satī |
prayāsyati tapaścartuṃ tataḥ sā tapasā yutā || 66 ||

janayiṣyati taṃ śarvādamitadyutimaṃḍalaṃ |
saṃbhaviṣyati haṃtāsau surārīṇāmasaṃśayam || 67 ||

tvayāpi dānavā devi haṃtavyā lokadurjayāḥ |
yāvatsureśvarī dehasaṃkrāṃtaguṇasaṃcayā || 68 ||

tatsaṃgamena tāvattvaṃ daityānhaṃtuṃ na śakyase |
evaṃ kṛte tapastaptvā tvayā sarvaṃ kariṣyati || 69 ||

samāptaniyamā devi yadā comā bhaviṣyati |
tadā svameva sā rūpaṃ śailajā pratipatsyate || 70 ||

tadā tvayāpi sahitā bhavānī sā bhaviṣyati |
rūpāṃśena tu saṃyuktā umāyāstvaṃ bhaviṣyasi || 71 ||

ekānaṃśeti lokastvāṃ varade pūjayiṣyati |
bhedairbahuvidhākāraiḥ sarvagāṃ kāmasādhinīm || 72 ||

oṃkāravaktrā gāyatrī tvamiti brahmavādibhiḥ |
ākrāṃtairūrjitākārā rājabhiśca mahābhujaiḥ || 73 ||

tvaṃ bhūriti viśāṃ mātā śūdraiśśaiveti pūjitā |
kṣāṃtirmunīnāmakṣobhyā dayā niyamināmapi || 74 ||

tvaṃ mahopāyasaṃdeho nītirnayavisarpiṇām |
paricittistvamarthānāṃ tvamīhā prāṇihṛcchayā || 75 ||

tvaṃ muktissarvabhūtānāṃ tvaṃ gatiḥ sarvadehinām |
ratistvaṃ ratacittānāṃ prītistvaṃ hṛdi dehinām || 76 ||

tvaṃ kīrtiḥ satyabhūtānāṃ tvaṃ śāṃtirduṣṭakarmaṇām |
tvaṃ bhrāṃtiḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ tvaṃ gatiḥ kratuyājinām || 77 ||

jaladhīnāṃ mahāvelā tvaṃ ca līlāvilāsinī |
priyakaṃṭhagrahānaṃdadāyinī tvaṃ vibhāvarī || 78 ||

ityanekavidhairdevī rūpairloke tvamarcitā |
ye tvāṃ stoṣyaṃti varade pūjayiṣyaṃti cāpi ye || 79 ||

te sarvakāmānāpsyaṃti niyatā nātra saṃśayaḥ |
ityuktā tu niśā devī tathetyuktvā kṛtāñjali || 80 ||

jagāma tvaritā tūrṇaṃ gṛhaṃ himagirermahat |
tatrāsīnāṃ mahāharmye ratnabhittisamāśrayām || 81 ||

dadarśa menāmāpāṇḍucchavivaktrasaroruhām |
kiṃcitkṣāmāṃ mukhodagrastanabhārāvanāmitām || 82 ||

mahauṣadhigaṇābaddha maṃtrarājaniṣevitām |
udūḍhakanakonnaddha jīvarakṣā manoramām || 83 ||

maṇidīpagaṇajyotirmahālokaprakāśite |
prakīrṇabahusiddhārthamanojñaparicārake || 84 ||

śuddhacīnāṃśukacchatra bhūśayyāstaraṇojjvale |
dhūpāmodamanoramye sajja sarvopayogike || 85 ||

tataḥ krameṇa divase gate dūraṃ vibhāvarī |
vijṛṃbhitasukhodarke tato menā mahāgṛhe || 86 ||

prasuptaprāyapuruṣe nidrābhūtopacārake |
sphuṭāloke śaśabhṛti bhrāntarātrivihaṃgame || 87 ||

rajanīcara saṃcārabhūtairāvṛta catvare |
gāḍhakaṃṭhagrahālagne śubhagoṣṭajane tataḥ || 88 ||

kiṃcidākulatāṃ prāpte menā netrāṃbujadvaye |
āviveśa mukhe rātriḥ sukhamadbhutasaṃgamā || 89 ||

unmādāya jaganmātuḥ krameṇa jaṭharāṃtare |
āviveśātulaṃ janma manyamānā kadā tu vai || 90 ||

araṃjayadgṛhaṃ devyā guhāraṇye vibhāvarī |
tato jagatyā nirvāṇaheturhimagiripriyā || 91 ||

brāhme muhūrte subhage prāsūyata guhāraṇiṃ |
tasyāṃ tu jāyamānāyāṃ jaṃtavaḥ sthāṇujaṃgamāḥ || 92 ||

abhavansukhinaḥ sarve sarvalokanivāsinaḥ |
nārakāṇāmapi tadā sukhaṃ svargasamaṃ mahat || 93 ||

abhavatkrūrasatvānāṃ cetaḥ śāṃtaṃ ca dehinām |
jyotiṣāmapi tejastu sutarāṃ cābhavattadā || 94 ||

vanāśritāścoṣadhayaḥ svādavaṃti phalāni ca |
gaṃdhavaṃti ca mālyāni vimalaṃ ca nabho'bhavat || 95 ||

mārutaśca sukhasparśo diśaśca sumanoharāḥ |
ṝtūdbhūtaphalāyoga paripākaguṇojjvalā || 96 ||

abhavatpṛthivī devī śālimālākulāpi ca |
tapāṃsi dīrghacīrṇāni munīnāṃ bhāvitātmanām || 97 ||

tasmingatāni sāphalyaṃ kāle nirmalacetasām |
vismṛtāni ca śāstrāṇi prādurbhāvaṃ prapedire || 98 ||

prabhāvastīrthamukhyānāṃ tadā puṇyatamastvabhūt |
aṃtarikṣe'marāścāsanvimāneṣu sahasraśaḥ || 99 ||

samaheṃdrajalādhīśa vāyu vahni purogamāḥ |
puṣpavṛṣṭiṃ pramumucustasmiṃstuhina bhūdhare || 100 ||

jagurgaṃdharvamukhyāśca nanṛtuścāpsarogaṇāḥ |
meruprabhṛtayaścāpi mūrtimaṃto mahācalāḥ || 101 ||

tasminmahotsave prāpte divyāḥ prasṛtapāṇayaḥ |
sāgarāssaritaścaiva samājagmuśca sarvaśaḥ || 102 ||

himaśailo'bhavalloke tadā sarvaiścarācaraiḥ |
saṃsevyaścādhigamyaśca sāśrayaścācalottamaḥ || 103 ||

anubhūyotsavaṃ devā jagmuḥ svānnilayāstadā |
devanāgeṃdragaṃdharvaśailalīlāvatī gaṇaiḥ || 104 ||

himaśailasutā devī tvahaṃpūrvikayā tataḥ |
krameṇa buddhimānītā vidyāñcānalasairbudhaiḥ || 105 ||

krameṇa rūpasaubhāgyaprabodhairbhuvanatraye |
saṃpūrṇalakṣaṇā jātā himālayasutā tathā || 106 ||

etasminnaṃtare śakro nāradaṃ devasaṃmatam |
devarṣimatha sasmāra kāryasādhanatatparaḥ || 107 ||

sa tu śakrasya vijñāya kāṃkṣitaṃ bhagavāṃstadā |
ājagāma mudā yukto maheṃdrasya niveśanam || 108 ||

taṃ tu dṛṣṭvā sahasrākṣaḥ samutthāya mahāsanāt |
yathārheṇa tu pādyena pūjayāmāsa vāsavaḥ || 109 ||

śakrapraṇihitāṃ pūjāṃ pratigṛhya yathāvidhi |
nāradaḥ kuśalaṃ devamapṛcchatpākaśāsanam || 110 ||

pṛṣṭe ca kuśale śakraḥ provāca vacanaṃ prabhuḥ |
iṃdra uvāca |
kuśalasyāṃkurastāvatsaṃvṛtto bhuvanatraye || 111 ||

tatphalodbhavasaṃpattau tvaṃ mayā vidito mune |
vetsyeva tatsamastaṃ tvaṃ tathāpi paricoditaḥ || 112 ||

nirvṛtiṃ paramāṃ yāti nivedyārthaṃ suhṛjjane |
tadyathāśailajā devī yogaṃ yāyātpinākinā || 113 ||

śīghraṃ tathodyamaḥ sarvairasmatpakṣairvidhīyatām |
avagamyārthamakhilaṃ tata āmaṃtrya nāradaḥ || 114 ||

śīghraṃ jagāma bhagavānhimaśailaniketanam |
tatra dvāre sa vipreṃdraścitravetralatākule || 115 ||

vaṃdito himaśailena nirgatena puro muniḥ |
saha praviśya bhavanaṃ bhuvo bhūṣaṇatāṃ gatam || 116 ||

nivedite svayaṃ haime himaśailena vistṛte |
mahāsane munivaro niṣasādātuladyutiḥ || 117 ||

yathārhamarghyaṃ pādyaṃ ca śailastasmai nyavedayet |
muniḥ sa pratijagrāha tamarghyaṃ vidhivattadā || 118 ||

gṛhītārghammuniśreṣṭhamapṛcchatślakṣṇayā girā |
kuśalaṃ tapasaḥ śailaḥ śanaiḥ phullānanāṃbujaḥ || 119 ||

munirapyadrirājānamapṛcchatkuśalaṃ tadā |
nārada uvāca |
aho dharmocitaste'sti saṃniveśo mahāgire || 120 ||

pṛthutvaṃ manasā tulyaṃ kaṃdarāṇāṃ tavānagha |
gurutvaṃ te guṇaughānāṃ sthāvarādatiricyate || 121 ||

prasannatā ca toyasya munibhyaścādhikā tava |
na lakṣayāmaḥ śailendra kutrāvinayitā sthitā || 122 ||

nānā tapobhirmunibhirjvalanārkasamaprabhaiḥ |
pāvanaiḥ pāvito nityaṃ tvaṃ kaṃdarasamāśrayaiḥ || 123 ||

avamatya vimānāni svargavāsavirāgiṇaḥ |
piturgṛhaivāsīnā devagaṃdharvakinnarāḥ || 124 ||

aho dhanyosi śailendra yasya te kaṃdaraṃ haraḥ |
adhyāste lokanātho hi rāmadhyānaparāyaṇaḥ || 125 ||

ityuktavati devarṣau nārade sādaraṃ girā |
himaśailasya mahiṣī menā munididṛkṣayā || 126 ||

anuyātā duhitrā tu svalpāliparicārikā |
lajjāpraṇayanamrāṅgī praviveśa niketanam || 127 ||

yatra sthito munivaraḥ śailena sahito vaśī |
taṃ dṛṣṭvā tejaso rāśiṃ muniṃ śailapriyā tadā || 128 ||

vavaṃde gūḍhavadanā pāṇipadmakṛtāñjali |
tāṃ vilokya mahābhāgāṃ devarṣiramitadyutiḥ || 129 ||

āśīrbhiramṛtodgārarūpābhistāṃ vyavarddhayat |
tato vismitacittā tu himavadgiriputrikā || 130 ||

ekṣiṣṭa nāradaṃ devī munimadbhutarūpiṇam |
ehi vatseti sāpyuktā ṝṣiṇā snigdhayā girā || 131 ||

kaṃṭhe gṛhītvā pitaramaṅke sā tu samāviśat |
uvāca mātā tāṃ devīmabhivaṃdaya putrike || 132 ||

bhagavaṃtaṃ tapodhanyaṃ patimāpsyasi saṃmatam |
ityuktā tu tato mātrā vastreṇa pihitānanā || 133 ||

kiṃcitkaṃpitamūrddhā tu vākyaṃ novāca kiṃcana |
tataḥ punaruvācedaṃ vākyaṃ mātā sutāṃ tadā || 134 ||

vatse vaṃdaya devarṣiṃ tato dāsyāmi te śubham |
ratnakrīḍanakaṃ ramyaṃ sthāpitaṃ yacciraṃ mayā || 135 ||

ityuktā sā tato vegādudgatya caraṇau tadā |
vavaṃde mūrdhni saṃdhāya pāṇipaṃkajakuḍmalam || 136 ||

kṛte tu vaṃdane tasyā mātā sakhimukhena tu |
codayāmāsa śanakaistasyāḥ saubhāgyadarśitām || 137 ||

śarīralakṣaṇānāṃ ca parijñānāya kautukāt |
strīsvabhāvātsvaduhituściṃtāṃ hṛdi samudvahan || 138 ||

jñātvā tadiṃgitaṃ śailo mahiṣyāhṛdayena tu |
anudīrṇākṛtirmene ramyametadupasthitam || 139 ||

coditaḥ śailamahiṣī sakhyā munivarastataḥ |
smitānano mahābhāgo vākyaṃ provāca nāradaḥ || 140 ||

na jāto'syāḥ patirbhadre lakṣaṇaiśca vivarjitaḥ |
uttānahastā satataṃ caraṇairvyabhicāribhiḥ || 141 ||

succhāyāsyā bhaviṣyeyaṃ kimanyadbahu bhāṣyate |
śrutvaitatsaṃbhramāviṣṭo dhvastadhairyo himācalaḥ || 142 ||

nāradaṃ pratyuvācātha sāśrukaṃṭho mahāgiriḥ |
himavānuvāca |
saṃsārasyātidoṣasya durvijñeyā gatiryataḥ || 143 ||

sṛṣṭyā cāvaśyabhāvinyā kenāpyatiśayātmanā |
kartrā praṇītā maryādā sthitā saṃsāriṇāmiyam || 144 ||

yo jāyate hi yadbījājjanituḥ sorthasādhakaḥ |
janitā cāpi jātasya na kaściditi ca sphuṭam || 145 ||

svakarmaṇaiva jāyaṃte vivadhā bhūtajātayaḥ |
aṃḍajohyaṃḍajājjātaḥ punarjāyeta mānavaḥ || 146 ||

mānuṣopi sarīsṛpyāṃ mānuṣatvena jāyate |
tatrāpi jātau śreṣṭhāyāṃ dharmasyotkarṣaṇena tu || 147 ||

aputrajanmanaḥ śeṣāḥ prāṇinaḥ samavasthitāḥ |
manujāstatra sutarāṃ nayena sahadharmiṇaḥ || 148 ||

krameṇāśramasaṃprāptirbrahmacārivratādanu |
tasya karturniyogena saṃsāro yena vardhitaḥ || 149 ||

saṃsārasya hi notpattiḥ sarve syuryadi nirgṛhāḥ |
kartrā tu śāstreṣu sadā sutalābhaḥ praśaṃsitaḥ || 150 ||

prāṇināṃ mohanārthāya narakatrāṇakāraṇāt |
striyā virahitā sṛṣṭirjaṃtūnāṃ nopapadyate || 151 ||

strījātistu prakṛtyaiva kṛpaṇā dainyabhāginī |
śāstrālocanasāmarthyāddūṣitaṃ tāsu kartṛṇā || 152 ||

tasyāṃ noparibhāvajñā bhavedeti ca vedhasā |
śāstreṣūktamasaṃdigdhaṃ bahuvāraṃ mahāphalaṃ || 153 ||

daśaputrasamā kanyā yāpi syācchīlavarjitā |
vākyametatphalabhraṣṭaṃ puṃsāṃ glānikaraṃ phalaṃ || 154 ||

kanyā hi kṛpaṇā śocyā piturduḥkhavivarddhinī |
yāpi syātpūrṇasarvārthā patiputrasamanvitā || 155 ||

kiṃ punardurbhagā hīnā patiputradhanādibhiḥ |
tvaṃ coktavānsutā yā me śarīre doṣasaṃgraham || 156 ||

aho muhyāmi śuṣyāmi glāmi sīdāmi nārada |
ayuktamapi vaktavyamaprāpyamapi sāṃpratam || 157 ||

anugrahāya me chindhi duḥkhaṃ kanyāśrayaṃ mune |
paricchinnepyasaṃdigdhe manaḥ paribhavāśrayāt || 158 ||

tṛṣṇā muṣṇāti niṣṇātaṃ phalalobhāśrayātpunaḥ |
strīṇāṃ hi paramaṃ janma kulānāmubhayātmanām || 159 ||

ihāmutra sukhāyoktaṃ satpatiprāptisaṃjñitam |
durlabhatvātsataḥ strīṇāṃ viguṇopi patiḥ kila || 160 ||

na prāpyate vinā puṇyaiḥ patirnāryāḥ kadācana |
yato nissādhano dharmaḥ pariṇāmotthitā ratiḥ || 161 ||

dhanaṃ jīvitaparyaṃtaṃ patyau nāryāḥ pratiṣṭhitam |
nirddhano durmukho mūrkhaḥ sarvalakṣaṇavarjitaḥ || 162 ||

daivataṃ paramaṃ nāryāḥ patiruktaḥ sadaiva hi |
tvayā devarṣiṇā proktaṃ na jāto'syāḥ patiḥ kila || 163 ||

etaddaurbhāgyamatulamasaṃkhyaṃ ca durudvaham |
carācare bhūtasarge ciṃtā sā vyāpinī mune || 164 ||

sa na jāta iti śrutvā mamedaṃ vyākulaṃ manaḥ |
manuṣyadevajātīnāṃ śubhāśubhanivedakam || 165 ||

lakṣaṇaṃ hastapādābhyāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ vihitaṃ kila |
seyamuttānahasteti tvayoktā munipuṃgava || 166 ||

uttānahastatā proktā yācatāmeva nityakā |
śubhodayānāṃ dhanyānāṃ na kadācitprayacchatām || 167 ||

succhāyayāsyāścaraṇau tvayoktau vyabhicāriṇau |
tatrāpi śreyasī hyāśā mune na pratibhāti naḥ || 168 ||

śarīralakṣaṇāścānye pṛthakphalanivedinaḥ |
ityuktvā virate śaile mahāduḥkhavicāriṇi || 169 ||

smitapūrvamuvācedaṃ nārado devapūjitaḥ |
nārada uvāca |
harṣasthāne ca mahati tvayā duḥkhaṃ nirucyate || 170 ||

aparicchinnavākyārtho mohaṃ yāsi mahāgire |
imāṃ śṛṇu giraṃ matto rahasyapariniṣṭhitām || 171 ||

samāhito mahāśaila mayoktasya vicāraṇām |
na jātosyāḥ patirdevyā yanmayoktaṃ himācala || 172 ||

sa na jāto mahādevo bhūtabhavyabhavodbhavaḥ |
śaraṇyaḥ śāśvataḥ śāstā śaṃkaraḥ parameśvaraḥ || 173 ||

brahmarudrendramunayo garbhajanmajarārditāḥ |
tasya te parameśasya sarve krīḍanakā gire || 174 ||

brahmāṃḍatastadicchātaḥ saṃbhūto bhuvanaprabhuḥ |
ātmano na vināśosti sthāvarāṃtepi bhūdhara || 175 ||

saṃsāre jāyamānasya mriyamāṇasya dehinaḥ |
naśyate deha evātra nātmano nāśa ucyate || 176 ||

brahmādisthāvarāṃto'yaṃ saṃsāro yaḥ prakīrtitaḥ |
sa janmamṛtyuduḥkhārto hyaniśaṃ parivartate || 177 ||

mahādevo'calaḥsthāṇurna jāto janako'jaraḥ |
bhaviṣyati patiḥ so'syā jagannātho nirāmayaḥ || 178 ||

yaduktaṃ ca mayā devī lakṣaṇairvarjitā tava |
śṛṇu tasyāpi vākyasya samyaktvena vicāraṇam || 179 ||

lakṣaṇaṃ daiviko hyaṃkaḥ śarīrāvayavāśrayaḥ |
sa cāyurdhanasaubhāgyapariṇāmaprakāśakaḥ || 180 ||

anaṃtasyāprameyasya saubhāgyasya tu bhūdhara |
naivāṃko lakṣaṇākāraḥ śarīre saṃvidhīyate || 181 ||

ato'syā lakṣaṇaṃ gātre śaila nāsti mahāmate |
yaccāhamuktavānasyā uttānakaratā sadā || 182 ||

uttāno varadaḥ pāṇireṣa devyāḥ sadaiva tu |
surāsuramunivrātavaradātrī bhaviṣyati || 183 ||

yacca proktaṃ mayā pādau succhāyau vyabhicāriṇau |
mattaḥ śṛṇu tvamasyāpi vyākhyoktiṃ śailasattama || 184 ||

caraṇau padmasaṃkāśau svacchāvasyā nakhojvalau |
surāsurāṇāṃ namatāṃ kirīṭamaṇikāṃtibhiḥ || 185 ||

vicitravarṇaiḥ paśyadbhiḥ succhāyau pratibiṃbitau |
eṣā bhāryā jagadbharturvṛṣāṃkasya mahīdhara || 186 ||

jananī sarvalokasya saṃbhūtābhūtabhāvinī |
śiveyaṃ pāvanāyaiva tvatkṣetre pāvanadyutiḥ || 187 ||

tadyathāśīghramevaiṣā yogaṃ yāyātpinākinaḥ |
tathā vidheyaṃ vidhivattvayā śaileṃdrasattama || 188 ||

astyatra hi mahatkāryaṃ devānāṃ himabhūdhara |
evaṃ śrutvā tu śaileṃdro nāradātsarvameva hi || 189 ||

svamātmānaṃ punarjātaṃ mene menāpatistadā |
uvāca cāpi saṃhṛṣṭo nāradaṃ tu himācalaḥ || 190 ||

dustarānnarakādghorāduddhṛtosmi tvayā vibho |
pātālādahamuddhṛtya saptalokādhipaḥ kṛtaḥ || 191 ||

himācalosmi vikhyātastvayā munivarādhunā |
himācalācchataguṇāṃ prāpitosmi samunnatiṃ || 192 ||

ānaṃdādeva cāhāri hṛdayaṃ me mahāmune |
nādhyavasyati kṛtyānāṃ vibhāgapravicāraṇam || 193 ||

bhavadvidhānāṃ niyatamamoghaṃ darśanaṃ mune |
bhavadbhireva hi proktaṃ nivāsāyātmarūpiṇām || 194 ||

munīnāṃ devatānāṃ ca svayaṃ kartāsmi kalmaṣam |
tathāpi vastunyekasminnājñā me saṃpradīyatām || 195 ||

ityuktavati śaileṃdre sa tadā harṣanirbharaḥ |
uvāca nārado vākyaṃ kṛtaṃ sarvamiti prabho || 196 ||

surakārye sa evārthastavāpi sumahattaraḥ |
ityuktvā nāradaḥ śīghraṃ jagāma tridivaṃ tataḥ || 197 ||

sa gatvā devabhavanaṃ maheṃdraṃ saṃdadarśa ha |
tatonurūpe sa munirupaviṣṭo mahāsane || 198 ||

pṛṣṭaḥ śakreṇa provāca girijāsaṃśrayāṃ kathām |
nārada uvāca |
yanmahyamuktaṃ kartavyaṃ tanmayā kṛtameva hi || 199 ||

kiṃtu paṃcaśarasyeṣu gocaratvamapekṣitam |
ityukto devarājastu muninā kāryadarśinā || 200 ||

cūtāṃkurāstraṃ sasmāra bhagavānpākaśāsanaḥ |
sasmṛtastu tadā kṣipraṃ sahasrākṣeṇa dhīmatā || 201 ||

upatasthe ratiyutaḥ savilāso jhaṣadhvajaḥ |
prādurbhūtaṃ ca taṃ dṛṣṭvā śakraḥ provāca manmatham || 202 ||

śakra uvāca |
upadeśena bahunā kiṃ tvāṃ prati ratipriya |
manobhavosi tena tvaṃ vetsi bhūtamanogatam || 203 ||

tadyathānukramaṃ tu tvaṃ kuru nākasadāṃ priyam |
śaṃkaraṃ yojaya kṣipraṃ giriputryā manobhava || 204 ||

saṃyukto madhunānena gaccha ratyā sahāyavān |
ityukto madanastena śakreṇa svārthasiddhaye || 205 ||

provāca paṃcabāṇotha vākyaṃ bhītaḥ śatakratum |
kāma uvāca |
anayā deva sāmagryā munidānavabhīmayā || 206 ||

duḥsādhyaśśaṃkaro devaḥ kiṃ na vetsi jagatprabho |
tasya devasya vettha tvaṃ kāraṇaṃ padamavyayam || 207 ||

prāyaḥ prasāde kopepi sarvaṃ hi mahatāṃ mahat |
sarvopabhogasāraṃ hi saudaryaṃ svargasaṃbhavam || 208 ||

viśeṣaṃ kāṃkṣatāṃ śakra sāmānyādbhraṃśanaṃ phalāt |
śrutvaitadvacanaṃ śakrastamuvācāmarairyutaḥ || 209 ||

śakra uvāca |
vayaṃ pramāṇaṃ te tatra ratikāṃta na saṃśayaḥ |
saṃdaṃśena vinā śaktirayaskārasya neṣyate || 210 ||

kasyacicca kvaciddṛṣṭaṃ sāmarthyaṃ na tu sarvataḥ |
ityuktaḥ prayayau kāmaḥ sakhāyaṃ madhumāśritaḥ || 211 ||

ratiyukto jagāmāśu prasthaṃ tuhinabhūbhṛtaḥ |
sa tu prāpyākarocciṃtāṃ kāryasyopāyapūrvikām || 212 ||

mahātmāno hi niṣkaṃpā manasteṣāṃ sudurjayam |
tadādāveva saṃkṣobhya netthaṃ tasya jayo bhavet || 213 ||

saṃsiddhiḥ prāyaśaścaiva pūrvaṃ saṃśodhya mānasam |
kathamevaṃvidhairbhāvairdveṣānugamanaṃ vinā || 214 ||

krodhaḥ krūratarātsaṃgādbhīṣaṇerṣyā mahāsakhī |
cāpalyānmūrdhni vidhvasta dhairyādhāramahābalā || 215 ||

tāmasya viniyokṣyāmi manaso vikṛtiṃ puraḥ |
pidhāya dhairyadvārāṇi saṃtoṣamapakṛṣya ca || 216 ||

avagaṃtuṃ hi māṃ tatra na kaścidiha paṃḍitaḥ |
vikalpamātrasaṃsthānaṃ virūpākṣamanobhavam || 217 ||

praviśyātha kriyāraṃbhī gaṃbhīrāvartadustaraḥ |
bhaviṣyāmi harasyāhaṃ tapaḥsthasya sthirātmanaḥ || 218 ||

iṃdriyagrāmamāvṛtya ramyasādhanasaṃvidhiḥ |
ciṃtayitveti madano bhūtabhartustadāśramam || 219 ||

jagāma jagatīsāraṃ saraladruma vedikam |
śāṃtasatvasamākīrṇamacalaṃ prāṇisaṃkulam || 220 ||

nānāpuṣpalatājālaṃ sānusaṃsthagaṇeśvaram |
nirvyagravṛṣabhodghuṣṭaṃ nīlaśādvalasānukam || 221 ||

tatrāpaśyattrinetrasya ramyaṃkaṃ ciddvitīyakam |
vīrakaṃ vīralokeśamīśānasadṛśadyutim || 222 ||

pakvaṃ kuṃkumakiṃjalkapuṃjapiṃgajaṭāsaṭam |
vetrapāṇitamavyagramugraṃ cābhadrabhūṣaṇam || 223 ||

tato nimīlitonnidra padmapatrāṃtalocanam |
prekṣamāṇamṛjusthānaṃ nāsāvaṃśāgragocaram || 224 ||

atīvaramyasiṃheṃdra carmalaṃbottarīyakam |
śravaṇāhiphaṇonmukta niśvāsānalapiṃgalaṃ || 225 ||

preṃkhatkapolaparyaṃta cuṃbilaṃbijaṭācayam |
kṛtavāsukiparyaṃta nābhimūlaniveśitam || 226 ||

brahmāṃjalisthanāsāgra nibaddhoragabhūṣaṇam |
dadarśa śaṃkaraṃ kāmaḥ kramaprāptāṃtikaḥ śanaiḥ || 227 ||

tato bhramarajhaṃkāramālaṃbya drumasānugam |
praviṣṭaḥ karṇaraṃdhreṇa bhavasya madano manaḥ || 228 ||

śaṃkarastamathākarṇya madhuraṃ madanāśrayam |
sasmāra dakṣatanayāṃ dayitāṃ raṃtumānasaḥ || 229 ||

tataḥ śivasya śanakaistirodhā yāti nirmalā |
samādhibhāvanā tasthau lakṣya pratyakṣarūpiṇī || 230 ||

tatastanmayatāṃ yātaḥ pratyūha pihitāśayaḥ |
viveśa vibudhādhīśo vikṛtiṃ madanātmikām || 231 ||

īṣatkrodhasamāviṣṭo dhairyamālaṃbya dhūrjaṭiḥ |
