nirasyamadanaṃsthitvāyogamāyāsamāvṛtaḥ || 232 ||

sa tayā māyayāviṣṭo jajvāla madanastataḥ |
icchāśarīro durjñeyo doṣāvāso mahāśayaḥ || 233 ||

hṛdayānnirgataḥ sotha vāsanāvyasanātmakaḥ |
bahisthalaṃ samāsādya upatasthe jhaṣadhvajaḥ || 234 ||

anuyāto hi sāhyena mitreṇa madhunā saha |
sahakāratarordṛṣṭvā maṃdamārutanirdhutaṃ || 235 ||

stabakaṃ madano ramyaṃ haravakṣasi satvaraṃ |
mumoca mohanaṃ nāma mārgaṇaṃ makaradhvajaḥ || 236 ||

sa tasya hṛdaye śuddhe nāmaśālī mahāśaraḥ |
papāta paruṣaḥ prāṃśuḥ puṣpabāṇo vimohanaḥ || 237 ||

tataḥ karaṇasaṃdohe viddhe tu hṛdaye bhavaḥ |
babhūva bhūtapo kaṃpya dhairyopi madanonmukhaḥ || 238 ||

tataḥ prabhutvādbhāvānāmāveśaṃ svamapaśyata |
vākyaṃ bahu babhāṣetha pratyūhaprasavātmakaṃ || 239 ||

tataḥ kopānalodbhūta ghora huṃkārabhīṣaṇe |
babhūva vadane netraṃ tṛtīyamanalākulaṃ || 240 ||

rudrasya raudravapuṣo jagatsaṃhārabhairavam |
tadaṃtikasthe madane vyasphārayata dhūrjaṭiḥ || 241 ||

tannetravisphuliṃgena krośatāṃ nākavāsinām |
gamito bhasmatāṃ tūrṇaṃ kaṃdarpaḥ kāmadarpakaḥ || 242 ||

sa tu taṃ bhasmasātkṛtvā haranetrodbhavonalaḥ |
vyajṛṃbhata jagaddagdhuṃ jñātvā huṃkāraghasmaraṃ || 243 ||

tato bhavo jagaddhetorvyabhajajjātavedasam |
sahakāre madhau candre sumanaḥ ssvapareṣvapi || 244 ||

bhṛṃgeṣu kokilāsye ca vibhāgena smarānalaṃ |
sa bāhyābhyaṃtare viddho harotha smaramārgaṇaiḥ || 245 ||

bhāgeṣveteṣu saṃviṣṭaṃ vīkṣatī bahunāśanaṃ |
vibhaktaṃ lokasaṃkṣobhakaraṃ durvārajṛṃbhitaṃ || 246 ||

tatprāptisnehasaṃpūrṇakāmena hṛdaye kila |
jvalannaharniśaṃ bhīmo duḥkhasya vaśago'bhavat || 247 ||

vilokya harahuṃkāra jvālābhasmīkṛtaṃ smaraṃ |
vilalāpa ratiḥ krūraṃ baṃdhunā madhunā saha || 248 ||

tato vilapya bahuśo madhunā parisāṃtvitā |
jagāma śaraṇaṃ devamiṃdumaulitrilocanaṃ || 249 ||

bhṛṃgānuyātāṃ saṃgṛhya puṣpitāṃ sahakārajāṃ |
latāṃ patradrumacchannāṃ jātāṃ parabhṛtāṃ sakhīṃ || 250 ||

nibadhya tu jaṭājūṭaṃ kuṭilairalakai ratiḥ |
udvartya gātraṃ śubhreṇa hṛdyena smarabhasmanā || 251 ||

jānubhyāmavaniṃ gatvā provācenduvibhūṣaṇam |
ratiruvāca |
namaḥ śivāyāstu manomayāya jaganmayāyādbhutavartmane namaḥ || 252 ||

namaḥ śivāyāstu surārcitāya tubhyaṃ sadā bhaktakṛpāparāya |
namo bhavāyāstu bhavodbhavāya namostu te dhvastamanobhavāya || 253 ||

namostu māyāmadanāśrayāya namo nisargāmalabhūṣitāya |
namostvameyāya guṇāyanāya namostu siddhāya purātanāya || 254 ||

namaḥ śaraṇyāya namo guṇāya namostu te bhīmagaṇānugāya |
namostu nānābhuvanarddhikartre namostu bhaktābhimatapradāya || 255 ||

namotha karmaprasave namaḥ sadā anaṃtarūpāya sadaiva tubhyam |
asahyakopāya sadaiva tubhyaṃ śaśāṃkacihnāya namostu tubhyam || 256 ||

asīmalīlāparamastutāya vṛṣeṃdrayānāya purāṃtakāya |
namaḥ prasiddhāya mahauṣadhāya namostu nānāvidharūpakāya || 257 ||

namostu kālāya namaḥ kalāya namostu te kālakalātigāya |
carācarācāryavicāryavaryamācāryamutprekṣitabhūtasargaṃ || 258 ||

tvāmiṃdumauliśaraṇaṃ prapannā priyāptayehaṃ sahasā maheśaṃ |
prayaccha me kāmayaśaḥ samṛddhiṃ patiṃ vinā taṃ bhagavanna jīve || 259 ||

priyaḥ priyāyāḥ puruṣeśa nityastato paraḥ ko bhuvaneṣvihāsti |
prabhuḥ prabhāvī prabhavaḥ priyāṇāṃ pravīṇaparyāya parāparaṃ tapaḥ || 260 ||

tvameva nātho bhuvanasya goptāṃ dayālurunmūlitabhaktabhītiḥ |
itthaṃ stutaḥ śaṃkaraiṃdramaulirvṛṣākapirmanmathakāṃtayā tu || 261 ||

tutoṣa doṣākarakhaṃḍadhārī uvāca caināṃ madhuraṃ nirīkṣya |
śaṃkara uvāca |
bhaviṣyati ca kāmoyaṃ kāle kāṃte cirādatha || 262 ||

anaṃga iti lokeṣu sa vikhyātiṃ gamiṣyati |
ityuktā śirasā vaṃdya girīśaṃ kāmavallabhā || 263 ||

jagāmopavanaṃ cānyadratistuhina parvate |
ruroda cāpi bahuśo dīnā ramye sthale sthale || 264 ||

maraṇavyavasāyāpi nivṛttā ca śivājñayā |
atha nāradavākyena codito himabhūdharaḥ || 265 ||

kṛtābharaṇasaṃskārāṃ kṛtakautukamaṃgalāṃ |
svargapuṣpakṛtāpīḍāṃ śubhracīnāṃśukāṃbarām || 266 ||

sakhībhyāṃ saṃyutāṃ śailo gṛhītvā svasutāṃ tataḥ |
jagāma subhage yoge tadā saṃpūrṇamānasaḥ || 267 ||

sakānanānyupākramya vanānyupavanāni ca |
dadarśa rudatīṃ nārīmapratarkyāṃ mahaujasam || 268 ||

na rūpeṇedṛśī loke ramyeṣu vanasānuṣu |
kautukena parāmṛṣṭastāṃ dṛṣṭvā rudatīṃ giriḥ || 269 ||

upasṛpya tatastasyā nikaṭaṃ sopyapṛcchata |
himavānuvāca |
kāsi kasyāsi kalyāṇi kimarthaṃ cāpi rodiṣi || 270 ||

naitadalpamahaṃ manye kāraṇaṃ lokasuṃdari |
sā tasya vacanaṃ śrutvā uvāca madhunā saha || 271 ||

rudaṃtī śokavacanaṃ śvasaṃtī dainyavardhanaṃ |
ratiruvāca |
kāmasya dayitāṃ bhāryāṃ ratiṃ māṃ viddhi suvrata || 272 ||

girāvasmiṃśca bhagavāngiriśastapasi sthitaḥ |
tena pratyūharuṣṭena krodhādvisphārya locanaṃ || 273 ||

vimucyāgniśikhājvālāṃ kāmo bhasmāvaśeṣitaḥ |
ahaṃ tu śaraṇaṃ yātā taṃ devaṃ bhayavihvalā || 274 ||

stutavatyatha saṃtuṣṭastato māṃ giriśo'bravīt |
tuṣṭohaṃ kāmadayite kāmotpattirbhaviṣyati || 275 ||

tvatstutiṃ cāpyadhīyāno naro bhaktyā madāśrayaḥ |
lapsyate kāṃkṣitaṃ kāmaṃ nivartamaraṇādapi || 276 ||

pratīkṣamāṇā tadvākyamāśāveśavaśādahaṃ |
śarīraṃ parirakṣiṣye kiṃcitkālaṃ mahādyute || 277 ||

ityuktastu tayā ratyā śailaḥ saṃbhramabhīṣaṇaḥ |
pāṇāvādāya tanayāṃ gaṃtumaicchatsvakaṃ puraṃ || 278 ||

bhāvino'vaśyabhāvitvādbhavitrī bhūtabhāvinī |
lajjamānā sakhimukhairuvāca pitaraṃ giriṃ || 279 ||

śailaputryuvāca |
durbhagena śarīreṇa kiṃ mamānena kāraṇaṃ |
kathaṃ ca tāṃ daśāṃ prāptaśśaṅkaro me patirbhavet || 280 ||

tapobhiḥ prāpyatebhīṣṭaṃ nāsādhyaṃ tu tapasyataḥ |
durbhagatvaṃ vṛthā loke vihite sati sādhane || 281 ||

tapasi bhraṣṭasaṃdehā tataḥ svārthajigīṣayā |
evaṃ tapaḥ kariṣyehaṃ yāmītyuktavatīṃ sutām || 282 ||

uvāca vācā śaileṃdro gadgadasvaravarṇayā |
himavānuvāca |
umeti cāpalaṃ putri na kṣamaṃ tāvakaṃ vapuḥ || 283 ||

soḍhuṃ kleśānurūpasya tapasaḥ saumyadarśane |
bhāvīnyapi ca kāryāṇi padārthāni sadaiva tu || 284 ||

bhāvinorthā bhavaṃtyeva bahavo'nicchatopi hi |
tasmānna tapasā testi bāle kiṃcitprayojanam || 285 ||

bhavanaṃ caiva gacchāmi ciṃtayiṣyāmi tatra vai |
ityuktā tu yadā naiva gṛhamanveti śailajā || 286 ||

tatodriściṃtayāviṣṭaḥ svasutāṃ praśaśaṃsa ca |
tatoṃtarikṣe divyā ca vāgabhūdbhuvanatraye || 287 ||

umeti cāpalaṃ putri tvayoktā tanayā yataḥ |
umeti nāma tenāsyā bhuvaneṣu bhaviṣyati || 288 ||

siddhirmūrtimatī tveṣā sādhayiṣyati ciṃtitam |
iti śrutvā tu vacanaṃ sa tadākāśamaṃḍale || 289 ||

anujñāya sutāṃ śailo jagāmāśu svamaṃdiram |
pulastya uvāca |
śailajāpi yayau śailamagamyamapi daivataiḥ || 290 ||

sakhībhyāmanuyātā tu niyatā nagarājajā |
śṛṃgaṃ himavataḥ puṇyaṃ nānādhātuvibhūṣitam || 291 ||

divyapuṣpalatākīrṇaṃ bhramarodghuṣṭapādapam |
divyaprasravaṇopetaṃ manorathaśatojjvalam || 292 ||

nānāpakṣisamāyuktaṃ cakravākopaśobhitam |
jalajasthalajaiḥ puṇyaiḥ praphullairupaśobhitam || 293 ||

citrakaṃdarasaṃguhyaṃ divyagehasamanvitam |
vihaṃgasaṃghasaṃghuṣṭaṃ kalpapādapasaṃkaṭam || 294 ||

tatrāpaśyanmahāśākhaṃ śākhinaṃ haritacchadam |
sarvartukusumopetaṃ cakravākopaśobhitam || 295 ||

nānāpuṣpaśatākīrṇaṃ nānāvidhaphalānvitam |
tyaktaṃ sūryasya rucibhirbhinnasaṃhatapallavam || 296 ||

tatrāṃbarāṇi saṃtyajya bhūṣaṇāni ca śailajā |
saṃvītā valkalairdivyairdarbhanirmitamekhalā || 297 ||

triḥsnātā pāṭalāhārā babhūva śaradāṃ śatam |
śatamekena jīrṇena parṇenāvarttayattadā || 298 ||

nirāhārā śataṃ sābhūtsamānāṃ tapaso nidhiḥ |
tata udvejitāḥ sarve prāṇinastapasogninā || 299 ||

tataḥ sasmāra bhagavānmunīnsapta śatakratuḥ |
te samāgamya muditāḥ sarve samuditāstathā || 300 ||

pūjitāste maheṃdreṇa papracchustatprayojanam |
kimarthaṃ hi suraśreṣṭha saṃsmṛtāstu vayaṃ tvayā || 301 ||

śakraḥ provāca śṛṇvaṃtu bhagavaṃtaḥ prayojanam |
himācale tapo ghoraṃ tapyate bhūdharātmajā || 302 ||

tasyābhimatayogena bhavaṃtaḥ kartumarhatha |
tapaḥ samāpanaṃ devyā jagadarthe tvarānvitāḥ || 303 ||

tathetyuktvā tataḥ śailaṃ siddhasaṃghātasevitam |
ūcurāgamya munayastāmatho madhurākṣaram || 304 ||

putri kaste vyavasitaḥ kāmaḥ kamalalocane |
tānuvāca tato devī sādaraṃ gauravānmunīn || 305 ||

devyuvāca |
tapasyaṃto mahābhāgāḥ prohya maunaṃ bhavādṛśāṃ |
vaṃdanāya niyuktā dhīryācayatyavikalpitam || 306 ||

suprasannamukhā yūyaṃ gṛhītvāsanamāditaḥ |
upaviṣṭāḥ śramaṃ muktvā tataḥ prakṣyatha māmanu || 307 ||

ityuktāste tataścakrustatrāsanaparigraham |
sā ca tānvidhivatpūrvaṃ pūjayitvā vidhānataḥ || 308 ||

uvācādityasaṃkāśānmunīnsaptaṝṣīnśanaiḥ |
tyaktvā vratātmakaṃ maunaṃ natvā ca vidhivanmunīn || 309 ||

bhagavaṃtopi maunāṃte tasyāḥ saptarṣayopyatha |
gauravādhāratāṃ prāptāṃ papracchustāṃ punastathā || 310 ||

sāpi gauravagarbheṇa manasā cāruhāsinī |
munīnsarvāṃstathālokya provāca prohya vāgyamam || 311 ||

bhagavaṃto vijānītha prāṇināṃ manasepsitam |
śarīrādibhiratyarthaṃ kadarthyaṃ te hi dehinaḥ || 312 ||

kecittu nipuṇāstatra ghaṭaṃte vividhodyamaiḥ |
upāyairdurlabhānbhāvānprāpnuvaṃti hyataṃdritāḥ || 313 ||

apare tu paricchidya nānākārānupakramān |
dehāṃtarārthaṃ sāraṃbhamāśrayaṃti hi tadvratam || 314 ||

mamatvākāśasaṃbhūtakusumasragvibhūṣitam |
viṃdhyaśṛṃgaṃ spraṣṭukāmo hastaḥ prasarate muhuḥ || 315 ||

ahaṃ kila bhavaṃ devaṃ patiṃ prāptuṃ samudyatā |
prakṛtyaiva durārādhyaṃ tapasyaṃtaṃ ca saṃprati || 316 ||

surāsurairanirṇītaṃ paramārthakriyāśrayaṃ |
sāṃprataṃ cāpi nirdagdho madano vītarāgiṇā || 317 ||

kathamārādhayedīśaṃ mādṛśī tādṛśaṃ śivam |
ityuktā munayaste tu sthiratāṃ manasastataḥ || 318 ||

jñātumasyā vacaḥ procuḥ prakramātprakṛtārthakam |
munaya ūcuḥ |
dvividhantu sukhaṃ tāvatputri loke vibhāvyate || 319 ||

śarīrasyāsya saṃyogaścetasaścāpi nirvṛtiḥ |
prakṛtyā tu sa digvāsā bhīmo bhasmāsthibhūṣaṇaḥ || 320 ||

kapālī bhikṣuko nagno virūpākṣo'sthirakriyaḥ |
pramattonmattakākāro bībhatso kṛtasaṃgrahaḥ || 321 ||

patyā na tena cāstyartho mūrtānarthena kāṃkṣitaḥ |
yadi svasya śarīrasya sukhamicchasi śāśvatam || 322 ||

tatkathaṃ te mahādevādbhūtabhājo jugupsitāt |
sravannaravasāsāsthikapālakṛtabhūṣaṇāt || 323 ||

śvasadugrabhujaṃgendrakṛtabhūṣaṇabhūṣitāt |
śmaśānavāsino raudrapramathānugatādapi || 324 ||

surendramakuṭavrātanighṛṣṭacaraṇo'rihā |
harirasti jagaddhātā śrīkānto'nantamūrtimān || 325 ||

japyo yajñabhujāmasti tathendraḥ pākaśāsanaḥ |
devatānāṃ nidhiścāsti jvalanassarvakāmadhuk || 326 ||

vāyurasti jagaddhātā yaḥ prāṇassarvadehinām |
tathā vaiśravaṇo rājā sarvārthamahimā prabhuḥ || 327 ||

ebhya ekatamaṃ kasmānna tvaṃ saṃprāptumicchasi |
utānyasmādiha prāpyaṃ sukhaṃ te manase hitam || 328 ||

evametattathā putri prabhāvo lokasampadām |
asmindehe pare vāpi kalyāṇaprāptaye tava || 329 ||

piturevāsti te sarvaṃ surebhyo yanniveditam |
varasya prāptaye kleśassa cāpyatrāphalastaruḥ || 330 ||

prāyeṇa prārthito hyarthassamartho hyatidurlabhaḥ |
svasthānaviniyogitvātputri tatrāpi labhyate || 331 ||

ityuktavatsu kupitā munivaryeṣu śailajā |
uvāca krodharaktākṣī visphuraddaśanacchadā || 332 ||

devyuvāca |
asadgrahasya kā nītirvyasanasya kva yaṃtraṇā |
viparītārthaboddhāraḥ satpathe kena yojitāḥ || 333 ||

evaṃ māṃ vittha duṣprajñāmasthānāsadgrahapriyām |
na māṃ prativicārosti yadahaṃkāramāninī || 334 ||

prajāpatisamāḥ sarve bhavaṃtaḥ sarvadarśinaḥ |
na nūnaṃ vittha taṃ devaṃ śāśvataṃ jagataḥ prabhum || 335 ||

ajamīśānamavyaktamameyamahimodayam |
āstāṃ tatkarmasadbhāvaṃ saṃbodhaṃ tāvadāvṛtam || 336 ||

vidustaṃ na hari brahmamukhā api sureśvarāḥ |
yattasyavibhavaṃ svotthaṃ bhuvaneṣu vijṛṃbhitam || 337 ||

prakaṭaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ tadapyatha na vittha kiṃ |
kasyaitadgaganaṃ mūrtiḥ kasyāgniḥ kasya mārutaḥ || 338 ||

kasya bhūḥ kasya varuṇaḥ kaścaṃdrārkavilocanaḥ |
kasyārcayaṃti lokeṣu liṃgaṃ bhaktyā surāsurāḥ || 339 ||

yacca brahmeśvarā devā viṣṇvindrādyā maharṣayaḥ |
prabhāvaṃ prabhavaṃ vāpi teṣāmapi na vittha kiṃ || 340 ||

aditeḥ kaśyapājjātā devā nārāyaṇādayaḥ |
marīceḥ kaśyapaḥ putro hyaditirdakṣaputrikā || 341 ||

marīciścāpi dakṣaśca putrau tau brahmaṇaḥ kila |
brahmā hiraṇmayādaṃḍādeva siddhavibhūtikaḥ || 342 ||

kasya prādurabhūddhyānātprākṛtaḥ prākṛtāṃśakaḥ |
atha nārāyaṇenaiva svakīyecchā samāśrayāt || 343 ||

tatpreritaḥ prayātveṣa janma nārāyaṇātmakam |
sāpi karmaṇa evoktā preraṇāvivaśātmanām || 344 ||

yathonmādādi duṣṭasya matireva hi sābhavet |
iṣṭāneva padārthānvai viparītānhi manyate || 345 ||

lokasya vyavahāreṣu dṛṣṭeṣu hasate sadā |
dharmādharmaphalaprāptau viṣṇumeva nibodhata || 346 ||

vidadhvamitthaṃ munayo'sakṛcca me giraṃ girīśaśrutibhūmisannidhau |
utkṛṣṭakedāra ivāvanītale subījamuṣṭiṃ suphalāya karṣakāḥ || 347 ||

te tāṃ śrutvā hi tāṃ ramyāṃ prakramātprakramakriyām |
vācaṃvācāṃ patiprakhyāḥ procuścasmitasuṃdarāḥ || 348 ||

munaya ūcuḥ |
jāte lokavidhāne tu satyaṃ tatkāryamuttamam |
prāyaḥ prāleyaśailasya śaṃkā tatkālarūpiṇaḥ || 349 ||

satyamutkaṃṭhitāḥ sarve ye ye kāryārthamudyatāḥ |
teṣāṃ tvaraṃte cetāṃsi kiṃtu nāmamahātmanām || 350 ||

lokayātrānugaṃtavyā viśeṣeṇa vivakṣitaiḥ |
yatastaddharmamedhaṃte tatprāmāṇyaṃ pare dhṛtāḥ || 351 ||

ityuktvā munayo jagmustvaritāstuhinācalam |
tatra te pūjitāstena himaśailena sādaram || 352 ||

ūcurmunivarāḥ prītāḥ svalpakaṃ tu tvarānvitāḥ |
munaya ūcuḥ |
devo duhitaraṃ sākṣātpinākī tava mārgate || 353 ||

tacchīghraṃ pāvayātmānamāhutyevānale hutam |
kāryaṃ hi tacca devānāṃ suciraṃ parivartate || 354 ||

jagaduddhāraṇāyaiṣa vidhātavyaḥ samudyamaḥ |
ityuktastu tadā śailo harṣāveśavaśānmunīn || 355 ||

asamarthobhavadvaktumuttaraṃ prārthayanniva |
tato menā munīnvaṃdya provāca snehaviklavā || 356 ||

duhitustānmunīṃścaiva vacanaṃ svayamarthavat |
menovāca |
yadarthaṃ duhiturjanma cecchaṃtyapi mahāphalaṃ || 357 ||

tadevopasthitaṃ sarvaṃ prakrameṇaiva sāṃpratam |
kulajanmavayorūpavibhutvaissahitopi yaḥ || 358 ||

varastasyāpi nāhūya sutā deyā hyayācataḥ |
digvāsā jaṭilaḥ śūlī dagdhakāmopi kāmadaḥ || 359 ||

sa tu matsutayā ghoraḥ kathaṃ nāma upāsyate |
munaya ūcuḥ |
aiśvaryamavagacchasva śaṃkarasya surāsurāḥ || 360 ||

ārādhyamānapādābja yugalāśca sunirvṛtāḥ |
yasyopayogi yadrūpaṃ tena tatprārthyate ciram || 361 ||

ghoraṃ tapasyate bālā tena rūpeṇa nirvṛtā |
yatsā vratāni divyāni nayiṣyati samāpanam || 362 ||

tadatrāvahitā tāvadasmāsveva bhaviṣyati |
ityuktvā giriṇā sārddhaṃ yayuryatrāsti śailajā || 363 ||

jitārkajvalanajvālā tapastejomayīhyumā |
proktā sā munibhiḥ snigdhaṃ māninyāha vacorthavat || 364 ||

nāhaṃ kṣudrātkilecchāmi ṝte śarvātpinākinaḥ |
sthitaṃ ca tāratamyena prāṇināṃ paramarddhidaṃ || 365 ||

dhīrataiśvaryakāryāṇi pramāṇamatulaṃ mahat |
yasmānna kiṃcidaparaṃ yacca yasmātpravartate || 366 ||

yasyaiśvaryamanādyaṃtaṃ tamahaṃ śaraṇaṃ gatā |
samaḥ savyavasāyaśca dīrgheṇa viparītakaḥ || 367 ||

evaṃ niśamya te vācaṃ devyā munivarāstadā |
ānaṃdāśruparītākṣāḥ sasvajustāṃ tapasvinīṃ || 368 ||

ūcuśca paramaprītāḥ śailajāṃ madhuraṃ vacaḥ |
ṝṣaya ūcuḥ |
atyadbhutamaho putri jñānamūrtirivāmalā || 369 ||

prasādayasi no bhāvaṃ bhavabhāvapratiśrayāt |
nanu vidmo vayaṃ tasya devasyaiśvaryamadbhutam || 370 ||

tvanniścayasya dṛḍhatāṃ vettuṃ vayamihāgatāḥ |
acirādeva tanvaṃgi kāmastveṣa bhaviṣyati || 371 ||

ādityassa prabho yāti ratnebhyaḥ kā dyutiḥ pṛthak |
ko'rtho varṇānsvakāṃstyaktvā tathā tvaṃ giriśaṃ vinā || 372 ||

yāmo nekābhyupāyena tamabhyarthayituṃ vayam |
asmākamapi caiṣorthaḥ sutarāṃ hṛdi vartate || 373 ||

atastvameva sā buddhiryato nītistvameva hi |
ato niḥsaṃśayaṃ kāryaṃ śaṃkaropi vidhāsyati || 374 ||

ityuktvā pūjitāssarve munayo girikanyayā |
prayayurgiriśaṃ draṣṭuṃ prasthaṃ himavato mahat || 375 ||

gaṃgāṃbhaḥ plāvitātmānaḥ piṃgābaddhajaṭāsaṭāḥ |
bhṛṃgānuyātapāṇistha maṃdārakusumasrajaḥ || 376 ||

saṃprāpya tu gireḥ prasthaṃ dadṛśuḥ śaṃkarāśramam |
praśāṃtāśeṣasatvaughaṃ paryastimitakānanam || 377 ||

niḥśabdakṣobhasalila prayātaṃ sarvato diśam |
tatrāpaśyaṃstatodvāri vīrakaṃ vetrapāṇinam || 378 ||

tamete munayaḥ pūjyā vinītāḥ kāryagauravāt |
ūcurmadhurabhāṣābhiste vācaṃ vāgmināṃ varāḥ || 379 ||

draṣṭuṃ vayamihāyātāḥ śaṃkaraṃ guṇanāyakaṃ |
trilocanaṃ vijānīhi surakāryapracoditāḥ || 380 ||

tvameva no gatistatra yathākālānatikramaḥ |
syātprārthanaiṣā prāyeṇa pratīhāramayī prabho || 381 ||

ityukto munibhiḥ sotha gauravāttānuvāca ha |
savanasyāparāṃ saṃdhyāṃ kartuṃ maṃdākinīṃ gataḥ || 382 ||

kṣaṇena bhāvitā viprāstato drakṣyatha śūlinam |
ityuktā munayastasthuryatnātkāryavicakṣaṇāḥ || 383 ||

gaṃbhīrāṃbudharaṃ prāvṛṭtṛṣitāścātakā yathā |
tathā kṣaṇena niṣpanna samācārakriyāvidhim || 384 ||

vīrāsanakṛtoddeśaṃ mṛgacarmaniyāmitam |
tato vinīto jānubhyāmavalaṃbya mahīṃ mudā || 385 ||

uvāca vīrako devaṃ praṇayaikasamāśrayam |
saṃprāptā munayaḥ sapta draṣṭuṃ tvāṃ dīptatejasaṃ || 386 ||

vibho samādiśa draṣṭuṃ tato dhyānamihārhasi |
ityukto dhūrjaṭistena vīrakeṇa mahātmanā || 387 ||

bhrūbhaṃgasaṃjñayā teṣāṃ praveśājñāṃ dadau tadā |
mūrddhakaṃpena tānsapta vīrakopi mahāmunīn || 388 ||

ājuhāva vidūrasthāndarśanāya pinākinaḥ |
tvarābaddhajaṭāste ca laṃbakṛṣṇānijāṃbarāḥ || 389 ||

viviśurvedikāṃ divyāṃ girīśasya vibhostataḥ |
baddhapāṇipuṭā kṣipta nākapuṣpottkarāstataḥ || 390 ||

pinākipādayugalaṃ vaṃdya nākanivāsinaḥ |
tataḥ snigdhekṣitāḥ saṃto munayaḥ śūlapāṇinā || 391 ||
girīśaṃ te tato dṛṣṭvā te samaṃ tuṣṭavurmudā || 392 ||

munaya ūcuḥ |
aho kṛtārthā vayameva sāṃprataṃ sureśvarairvaṃditapādapallavam |
vilokayāmo guṇagauravarddhibhiḥ samādiśeḥ kāryamaśeṣarakṣaṇam || 393 ||

tataḥ prahasya sarvajña uvāca munisattamān |
bhavatāṃ yaddhṛdigataṃ kāryaṃ tatkurutādhunā || 394 ||

ityuktā munayastūrṇaṃ yayuryatra ca śailajā |
babhāṣire vibhāgajñā girijāṃ girigahvare |
ramyaṃ priyamanohāri mārūpaṃ tapasādaha || 395 ||

prītaste śaṃkaraḥ pāṇimeṣa pratigrahīṣyati |
vayamarthitavaṃtaste pitaraṃ pūrvamāgatāḥ || 396 ||

pitrā saha gṛhaṃ gaccha vayaṃ yāmaḥ svamaṃdiraṃ |
ityuktā tapasaḥ satyaṃ phalamastīti ciṃtya sā || 397 ||

tvaramāṇā yayau veśma piturdivyaṃ suśobhitaṃ |
sā tatra rajanīṃ mene varṣāyutasamāṃ satī || 398 ||

haradarśanasaṃjāta samutkaṃṭhā himādrijā |
tato muhūrtte brāhme tu tasyāścakruḥ suhṛtkriyāṃ || 399 ||

nānāmaṃgalasaṃdohānyathāvatkramapūrvakam |
divyamaṃgalasaṃyogānmaṃdire bahumaṃgale || 400 ||

upāsata giriṃ mūrttā ṝtavaḥ sarvakāmikāḥ |
vāyavaḥ sukhadāścāsansaṃmārjanavidhau gireḥ || 401 ||

harmyeṣu śrīḥ svayaṃ devī kṛtanānā prasādhanā |
kāṃtiḥ sarveṣu bhāveṣu ṝddhiśca bharaṇākulā || 402 ||

ciṃtāmaṇiprabhṛtayo ratnāśśailaṃ samaṃtataḥ |
upatasthurlatāścāpi kalpakādyā mahādrumāḥ || 403 ||

oṣadhyo mūrtimatyaśca divyauṣadhisamanvitāḥ |
rasāśca dhātavaścaiva sarve śailasya kiṃkarāḥ || 404 ||

kiṃkarāstasya śailasya vyagrāścāśramavartinaḥ |
nadyaḥ samudrā nikhilāḥ sthāvaraṃ jaṃgamaṃ ca yat || 405 ||

te sarve himaśailasya mahimānamavarddhayan |
abhavanmunayo nāgā yakṣā gaṃdharvakinnarāḥ || 406 ||

śaṃkarasyāpi vibudhā gaṃdhamādanaparvate |
sajjamaṃḍanasaṃbhārāstasthurnirmala mūrttayaḥ || 407 ||

śarvasyātha jaṭājūṭe caṃdrakhaṃḍaṃ pitāmahaḥ |
babaṃdha praṇayodāra visphāritavilocanaḥ || 408 ||

kapālamālāṃ vipulāṃ cāmuṃḍā mūrdhni badhnatī |
uvāca giriśaṃ kālī putraṃ janaya śaṃkara || 409 ||

yo daityeṃdrakulaṃ hatvā māṃ raktaistarpayiṣyati |
śaurirvataṃsikāratnaṃ kaṃṭhābharaṇamujvalam || 410 ||

bhujaṃgābharaṇaṃ gṛhya sajjaśśaṃbhoḥ puro'bhavat |
śakro gajājinaṃ tasya vasābhyaktāgrapallavam || 411 ||

dadhre sarabhasaṃ svidyadvistīrṇa mukhapaṃkajam |
vāyavaśca vavustīkṣṇāstīkṣṇaṃ himagiriprabham || 412 ||

vṛṣaṃ vibhūṣayāmāsurharayānaṃ manojavam |
virejurnayanāntasthāḥ śaṃbhoḥ sūryānaleṃdavaḥ || 413 ||

svāṃ dyutiṃ lokanāthasya jagataḥ karmasākṣiṇaḥ |
citābhasmasamādhatta kapāle rajataprabham || 414 ||

manujāsthimayīṃ mālāṃ nibaṃbaṃdha ca pāṇinā |
pretādhipaḥ pure dūre sabhayaḥ samavartata || 415 ||

nānākāramahāratnabhūṣaṇaṃ dhanadāhṛtam |
vihāyodīptasarpeṃdra kaṭakena svapāṇinā || 416 ||

karṇottaṃsaṃ cakāreśo hyamalaṃ takṣakaṃ svayam |
niṣpannābharaṇaṃ caiva prasādhyeśaṃ prasādhanaiḥ || 417 ||

tatrāpyeṣā niyamato hyabhavanvyagramūrtayaḥ |
mumocābhinavānsarvaramyaśālirasauṣadhīn || 418 ||

vyagrā tu pṛthivī devī sarvabhāvātmanoramā |
gṛhītvā varuṇaḥ sākṣādratnāḍhyābharaṇāni ca || 419 ||

puṣpāṇi ca vicitrāṇi nānāratnamayāni tu |
tasthau sābharaṇo devaḥ sarvajñaḥ sarvadehinām || 420 ||

jvalanaścāpi divyāni haimānyābharaṇāni ca |
jātarūpapavitrāṇi prayataḥ samupasthitaḥ || 421 ||

vāyurvavau ca surabhiḥ sukhasaṃsparśano vibhum |
chatraṃ caṃdrakaroddāmaṃ hāsitaṃ ca śatakratuḥ || 422 ||

jagrāha muditaḥ śrīmānbāhubhirvajrabhūṣaṇaḥ |
jagurgaṃdharvamukhyāśca nanṛtuścāpsarogaṇāḥ || 423 ||

vādayaṃtotimadhuraṃ jagurgaṃdharvakinnarāḥ |
muhūrtādṛtavastatra jaguśca nanṛtuśca vai || 424 ||

capalāśca gaṇāstasthurloḍayaṃto himācalam |
upaviṣṭaḥ kramāddhātā viśvakṛdbhaganetrahā || 425 ||

cakāraudvāhikaṃ kṛtyaṃ patnyā saha yathoditam |
dattārghyo girirājena suravṛṃdairvinoditaḥ || 426 ||

avasattāṃ kṣapāṃ tatra patnyā saha purāṃtakaḥ |
tato gaṃdharvagītena nṛtyenāpsarasāmapi || 427 ||

stutibhirdevadaityānāṃ vibuddho vibudhādhipaḥ |
āmaṃtrya himaśaileṃdraṃ prabhāte jāyayā saha || 428 ||

jagāma maṃdaragiriṃ vāyuvegena śṛṃgiṇā |
tato gate bhagavati nīlalohite sahomayā ratimanubhūtabhūdharaḥ || 429 ||

sabāṃdhavo bhavati hi kasya no mano viśṛṃkhalaṃ jagati hi kanyakā pituḥ |
purodyāneṣu ramyeṣu vivikteṣu vaneṣu ca || 430 ||

suraktahṛdayo devyā vijahāra bhagākṣihā |
tato bahutithe kāle putranāmnā gireḥ sutā || 431 ||

sakhībhiḥ sahitā krīḍāṃ cakre kṛtrima putrakaiḥ |
kadācidgaṃdhatailena gātramabhyajya śailajā || 432 ||

cūrṇairudvartayāmāsa malenāpūritāṃ tanum |
tadudvarttanakaṃ gṛhya naraṃ cakre gajānanam || 433 ||

puruṣaṃ krīḍatī devī taccāpyakṣipadaṃbhasi |
jāhnavyā śivayā sakhyā tataḥ sobhūdbṛhattanuḥ || 434 ||

kāyenātiviśālena jagadāpūrayattadā |
putretyuvāca taṃ devī putretyūce ca jāhnavī || 435 ||

gāṃgeya iti devaistu pūjito'bhūdgajānanaḥ |
vināyakādhipatyaṃ ca dadāvasya pitāmahaḥ || 436 ||

punaḥ sā krīḍatī cakre taruṃ ca varavarṇinī |
manojñamaṃkuraṃ rūḍhamaśokasya śubhānanā || 437 ||

varddhayāmāsa taṃ cāpi kṛtasaṃskāramaṃgalam |
bṛhaspatimukhairviprairdivaspatipurohitaiḥ || 438 ||

tato devaiḥ samunibhiḥ proktā devī tvidaṃ vacaḥ |
adhunā darśite mārge maryādāṃ kartumarhasi || 439 ||

phalaṃ kiṃ bhavitā devi kalpitaistaruputrakaiḥ |
ityuktā harṣapūrṇāṃgī provācātiśubhāṃ giraṃ || 440 ||

ekaṃ nirudake grāme yaḥ kūpaṃ kārayedbudhaḥ |
biṃdaubiṃdau ca toyasya sa vasedvatsaraṃ divi || 441 ||

daśakūpasamāvāpī daśavāpīsamo hradaḥ |
daśahradasamā kanyā daśakanyāsamo drumaḥ || 442 ||

eṣā vai śubha maryādā niyatā lokabhāvinī |
ityuktāstu tato viprā bṛhaspatipurogamāḥ || 443 ||

jagmuḥ svamaṃdirāṇyeva bhavānīṃ vaṃdya mātaraṃ |
gateṣu teṣu devopi śaṃkaraḥ parvatātmajāṃ || 444 ||

pāṇinālambyamānena na svamāvāsamagacchata |
cittaprasādajananaṃ prāsādāṭṭālagopuraṃ || 445 ||

laṃbamauktikadāmānaṃ mālikākulavedikaṃ |
sunaddhakaladhautaṃ ca krīḍāgṛhamanogataṃ || 446 ||

prakīrṇakusumāmoda mattālikulakūjitam |
kinnarodgītasaṃgīta gṛhāṃtaritabhittikam || 447 ||

sugaṃdhidhūpasaṃghātaṃ manaḥprāpyamalakṣitaṃ |
krīḍāmayūranārībhirabhito rabhasārpitaṃ || 448 ||

haṃsasaṃghātasaṃdiṣṭa sphaṭikastabhaṃtoraṇaṃ |
anāvilamasaṃbhrāṃtyā bahuśaḥ kinnarākulaṃ || 449 ||

śukairyatrābhidṛśyaṃte padmarāgavinirmitāḥ |
bhittayo jātisaṃbhrāṃtyā pratibiṃbitamauktikāḥ || 450 ||

tatrākṣaiḥ priyayā devo vihartumupacakrame |
svacheṃdranīlabhūbhāge krīḍaṃtau yatra saṃsthitau || 451 ||

vapuḥ sahāyatāṃ prāptau vinodarasanirvṛtau |
evaṃ prakrīḍatostatra devīśaṃkarayostadā || 452 ||

prādurbhūto mahāśabdaḥ patitāṃbaragocaraḥ |
tacchrutvā kautukāddevī kimetaditi śaṃkaram || 453 ||

paryapṛcchatsuravaraṃ haraṃ vismitapūrvakaṃ |
uvāca devo naitatte dṛṣṭapūrvaṃ śucismite || 454 ||

ete gaṇeśāḥ krīḍaṃte śailesminmatpriyāḥ sadā |
tapasā brahmacaryeṇa nāmabhiḥ kṣetrasevanaiḥ || 455 ||

yairahaṃ toṣitaḥ pūrvaṃ ta ete manujottamāḥ |
matsamīpamanuprāptā mama hṛdyāḥ śubhānane || 456 ||

kāmarūpā mahotsāhā mahārūpaguṇānvitāḥ |
karmabhirvismayaṃ teṣāṃ prayāmi balaśālinām || 457 ||

sāmarasyāsya jagataḥ sṛṣṭisaṃharaṇakṣamāḥ |
brahmacandreṃdra gaṃdharvaissakinnaramahoragaiḥ || 458 ||

vivarjitopyahaṃ nityaṃ naibhirvirahito rame |
hṛdyā me cārusarvāṅgi ta ete krīḍitā girau || 459 ||

ityuktā tu tadā devī tyaktvā taṃ vismayākulā |
gavākṣāṃtaramāsādya prekṣate cakitānanā || 460 ||

yāvaṃtaste kṛśā dīrghā hrasvāḥ sthūlā mahodarāḥ |
vyāghrebhavadanāḥ kecitkecinmeṣājarūpiṇaḥ || 461 ||

anekaprāṇirūpāśca jvālāsyāḥ kṛṣṇapiṃgalāḥ |
saumyā bhīmāḥ smitamukhāḥ kṛṣṇapiṃgajaṭāssadā || 462 ||

nānāvihaṃgavadanā nānāvidhasurānanāḥ |
kauśeyacarmavasanā nagnāścānyo virūpiṇaḥ || 463 ||

gokarṇā gajakarṇāśca bahuvaktrekṣaṇodarāḥ |
bahupādā bahubhujā divyanānāstrapāṇayaḥ || 464 ||

anekakusumāpīḍā nānāvyākulabhīṣaṇāḥ |
kṛtanānāyudhadharā nānākavacabhūṣaṇāḥ || 465 ||

vicitravāhanārūḍhā divyarūpā viyaccarāḥ |
vīṇāvādyaravodghuṣṭā nānāsthānakanartakāḥ || 466 ||

gaṇeśāṃstāṃstathā dṛṣṭvā devī provāca śaṃkaram |
devyuvāca |
gaṇeśāḥ katisaṃkhyātāḥ kiṃnāmānaḥ kimātmakāḥ || 467 ||

ekaikaśo mama brūhi niṣṭhitā ye pṛthakpṛthak |
śaṃkara uvāca |
koṭikoṭiśca saṃkhyātā nānāvikhyātapauruṣāḥ || 468 ||

jagadāpūritaṃ sarvamebhirbhīmairmahābalaiḥ |
siddhakṣetreṣu rathyāsu jīrṇodyāneṣu veśmasu || 469 ||

dānavānāṃ śarīreṣu bāleṣūnmattakeṣu ca |
ete viśaṃti muditā nānāhāravihāriṇaḥ || 470 ||

ūṣmapāḥ phenapāścaiva dhūmapā madhupāyinaḥ |
medāhārārudhirapāssarvabhakṣā hyabhojanāḥ || 471 ||

devādāstāpasāhārā nānāvādyaratipriyāḥ |
na hi vaktumanaṃtatvācchakyante hi gaṇāḥ pṛthak || 472 ||

devyuvāca |
nāgatvaguttarāsaṃgaḥ śuddhāṃgo muṃjamekhalī |
manaḥśilena kalkena capalo raṃjitānanaḥ || 473 ||

bhṛṃgadaṣṭotpalānāṃ ca sragdāmā madhurākṛtiḥ |
pāṣāṇaśakalottāna kāṃsyatālapravartakaḥ || 474 ||

asau gaṇeśvaro deva kiṃnāmā kinnarānugaḥ |
ya eṣa gaṇagīteṣu dattakarṇo muhurmuhuḥ || 475 ||

śarva uvāca |
sa eṣa vīrako devi sadā me hṛdayapriyaḥ |
nānāścaryaguṇādhāro gaṇeśvara gaṇārcitaḥ || 476 ||

devyuvāca |
īdṛśasya sutasyāsti mamotkaṃṭhā purāṃtaka |
kadāhamīdṛśaṃ putraṃ drakṣyāmyānaṃdadāyakaṃ || 477 ||

śarva uvāca |
eṣa eva sutastestu nayanānaṃdakārakaḥ |
tvayā mātrā kṛtārtho hi vīrakopi sumadhyame || 478 ||

ityuktvā preṣayāmāsa vijayāṃ harṣaṇotsukāṃ |
vīrakānayanāyāśu duhitā bhūbhṛtaḥ sakhīṃ || 479 ||

sāvaruhya tvarāyuktā prāsādādaṃbaraspṛśaḥ |
gaṇapaṃ gaṇamadhyasthaṃ sūryakoṭipravartanam || 480 ||

vijayovāca |
ehi vīraka cāpalyāttvayā devī pratoṣitā |
tvāmāhvayati cetyuktastyaktvā pāṣāṇakhaṃḍakam || 481 ||

devyāḥ sapīpamāgacchadvijayānugataḥ śanaiḥ |
prāsādaśikharotphullaraktāṃbujanibha dyutiḥ || 482 ||

taṃ dṛṣṭvā prasthitānalpasvādukṣīrapayodharā |
girijovāca |
piba kṣīramidaṃ vatsa srutaṃ piba yathecchakam || 483 ||

uvāca devī sasnehaṃ girā madhuravarṇayā |
ehi sadyo hi jātosi me putrako devadevena dattodhunā vīraka || 484 ||

uktavatyaṃkaādhāya paryaṣvajattaṃ kapole cucuṃbāgarāṇnaṃdinī |
mūrdhnyupāghrāya saṃmārjya gātrāṇi cābhūṣayāmāsa divyaiḥ svayaṃbhūṣaṇaiḥ || 485 ||

kiṃkiṇīmekhalānūpuraiḥ sanmaṇiprotakeyūrahārairamūlyairguṇaiḥ |
komalaiḥ pallavaiścitritaścārubhirmaṃgalaiḥ kaṃkaṇairdivyamaṃtrodbhavaiḥ || 486 ||

tasya śuddhaistatobhūribhiścākaronmiśrasiddhārthakairaṅgarakṣāvidhiṃ |
evamādāya covāca kṛtvā srajaṃ mūrdhni gorocanāpatrabhaṃgojjvalaiḥ || 487 ||

vatsavatsādhunā krīḍa sārddhaṃ gaṇairapramatto vraja śvabhravarjaṃ śanaiḥ |
vyālamālākulāḥ śailasānudrumādaṃtibhirbhagnaśākhāḥ paraṃ bhaṃginaḥ || 488 ||

jāhnavīmaṃḍalakṣubdhatoyākulaṃ mā viśethā bahuvyāghrajuṣṭe vane |
vatsa saṃkhyeṣu durgeṣu yadvīraka putra bhāvāyatāṃ svacchacitto janaḥ || 489 ||

prārthitaṃ bhavyamāyātibhāvinyasau bhāvyatāṃ sopi nirvartyasarvairguṇaiḥ |
evamukto'nayā vīrako mātaraṃ sasmayannāha līlāvaśāviṣṭadhīḥ || 490 ||

eṣa mātrā svayaṃ me kṛtaḥ kaṃkaṇaḥ patrakaścitritaḥ pāṭalairbiṃdubhiḥ |
cārupuṣpairiyaṃ mālatībhiḥ kṛtāmālikā me śirasyāhitā komalā || 491 ||

toṣayāmīśvarīmityayaṃ satvaraṃ ciṃtayitvā vrajadbāhyataḥ krīḍanam |
svairgaṇaiḥ saṃyuto vīrako harṣito dakṣiṇātpaścimaṃ paścimāduttaram || 492 ||

uttarātpūrvamabhyetya sakhyāyutā prekṣate taṃ gavākṣāṃtarādvīrakaṃ |
śailaputrī bahiḥ krīḍitāraṃ jagatsnehataḥ putralubdhāyatassotra kaḥ || 493 ||

mohamāyāti yaḥ svalpavettā jaḍo māṃsaviṇmūtrasaṃghātadehodvahaḥ |
draṣṭumabhyaṃtaraṃ nākavāseśvareṣvindumaulipraviṣṭeṣu kakṣāṃtaram || 494 ||

vāhanānyevamārohamāṇāstato lokapālāstrapūgaṃ muhūrttāvadhi |
khaḍga eṣo vikhaḍgākaro nirmalaḥ kṛṃtakaḥ kasya kenāhṛto brūta naḥ || 495 ||

nobhaveddhastadaṃḍena kiṃ brūmahe bhīmamūrtyaṃ gaṇe nāsti kṛtyaṃ girau |
pāśa eṣosti tenātra ko badhyate mā vṛthā lokapālānugāstiṣṭhata || 496 ||

evamevaitadityabruvaṃste tadā vīkṣya devānugaṃ vīrakaṃ rakṣakaṃ |
prāha devī vane parvate nirjarādhyagniśālāmukhe bhūtale bhūtapāḥ || 497 ||

nirjharāṃbho nipāteṣu no majjatātpuṣpajālāvanaddheṣu dhāmasvapi |
proccanānādrikuṃjāvagāheṣvatho mārutāsphoṭasaṃrakṣaṇe kāmataḥ || 498 ||

kāṃcanottuṃga śṛṃgāvarohakṣitau haimareṇūtkarāsaṃgapiṃgadyutiḥ |
khecarāṇāṃ vane cāpi ramye babhau rūpasaṃpatprakārogaṇo vāsitum || 499 ||

maṃdarekaṃdare cāruvāpītaṭe kundamaṃdārapuṣpapravālāṃbuje |
siddhanārībhirāpītarūpāmṛtaṃ vistṛtairnetramātrairanunmeṣibhiḥ || 500 ||

vīrakaṃ śailaputrī nimeṣāṃtarādasmaratputragṛdhnurvinodārthinī |
sopi tādṛkkṣaṇāvāptapuṇyodayo yo hi janmāṃtare'syātmajatvaṃ tataḥ || 501 ||

krīḍatastasya tṛptiḥ kathaṃ jāyate yopi bhāvājyaga dvedhasā tejasā |
kalipataḥprekṣaṇaṃ divyagītakṣaṇaṃ nṛtyalolairgaṇaiśaiḥ pravṛtyakṣaṇaṃ || 502 ||

siṃhanādākule gaṃḍaśaile jvaladratnajāle bṛhatsālatālekṣaṇam |
phullanānā tamālālikālekṣaṇaṃ vṛkṣamūle vilolomarālekṣaṇam || 503 ||

svalpapaṃke jale paṃkajāṃkekṣaṇaṃ māturaṃke śubhe niṣkalaṃkekṣaṇam |
parikrīḍate bālalīlāvisārī gaṇeśādhipā devatānaṃdakārī || 504 ||

nikuṃjeṣu vidyādharodgītaśīlaḥ pinākīva līlāvilāsaiḥ salīlaḥ |
prakāśya bhuvanaṃ gobhistato dinakare gate || 505 ||

deśāṃtaraṃ tadā paścāddūrastho dharaṇīdharaḥ |
mitratvamasya sudṛḍhaṃ hṛdaye dyotayanniva || 506 ||

nityamārādhito vipraiḥ śrīmānvighanasaḥ sutaḥ |
nākarotsaviturmerurupakāraṃ patiṣyataḥ || 507 ||

janeṣveṣā vyavastheti śrūyate sravalito hyadhaḥ |
dinenānugato bhānuḥ svajanaṃ paripūrayan || 508 ||

saṃdhyābaddhāṃjalipuṭā munayobhimukhā ravim |
yāvadadyāsate śīghraṃ nivāryoṣṇābhibhāvitām || 509 ||

vyajṛṃbhatātha lokesminkramādvaibhāvaraṃ tamaḥ |
kuṭilasyeva hṛdaye kāluṣyaṃ dūṣayanmanaḥ || 510 ||

jvalatphaṇiphaṇāratnadīpodyotita bhittike |
śayane śaśasaṃghāta ratnavastrottaracchade || 511 ||

nānāratnadyutilasacchakracāpaviḍaṃbake |
ratnaiḥ kiṃkiṇijālena lasanmuktākalāpake || 512 ||

kamanīyacalallīlā vitānācchāditāṃbare |
maṃdare maṃndasaṃcāraṃ gate girisutāyutaḥ || 513 ||

tasthau girisutā bāhulatā militakaṃdharaḥ |
śaśimauliḥ sitajyotsnāsphārapūritagocaraḥ || 514 ||

girijāpyasitāpāṃgī nīlotpaladalacchaviḥ |
vibhāvaryā ca saṃpṛktā babhūvātīva gomayī || 515 ||
tāmuvāca tato devaḥ krīḍākelikalāyutām || 516 ||

śarva uvāca |
śarīre mama tanvaṃgi site bhāsyasitadyutiḥ |
bhujaṃgī vā sitā śubhre saṃśliṣṭā caṃdanetarau || 1 ||

caṃdrātapena saṃpṛktā rudhirāmbarasaṃvṛtā |
rajanī vā site pakṣe dṛṣṭidoṣaṃ dadāsi me || 2 ||

ityuktā girijā tena muktakaṃṭhā pinākinam |
uvāca koparaktākṣī bhrukuṭī vikṛtānanā || 3 ||

devyuvāca |
svakṛtena janaḥ sarvo jāḍyena paribhūyate |
avaśyamarthī prāpnoti khaṃḍanaṃ śaśimaṃḍana || 4 ||

tapobhirdīrghacaritairyā tvāṃ prārthitavatyahaṃ |
tasyā meni yatastveṣa hyavamānaḥ pade pade || 5 ||

naivāsmi kuṭilā śarva viṣamā na ca dhūrjaṭe |
saviṣastvaṃ jagatkhyāto vyaktadoṣākarāśrayaḥ || 6 ||

tvaṃ hi muṣṇāsi daśanānnetrahaṃtā bhagasya ca |
ādityastvāṃ vijānāti bhagavāndvādaśātmakaḥ || 7 ||

mūrdhni śūlaṃ janayasi svairdoṣairmāmadhikṣipan |
yastvaṃ māmātthakṛṣṇeti mahākālosi viśrutaḥ || 8 ||

yāsyāmyahaṃ parityaktumātmānaṃ tapasā girim |
jīvaṃtyā na mayā kṛtyaṃ dhūrtena paribhūtayā || 9 ||

kāpālikena kṣudreṇa śmaśāne nityavāsinā |
bhūtyā vilipta svāṃgena mātṛmadhyastha cāriṇā || 10 ||

niśamya tasyā vacanaṃ kopatīkṣṇākṣaraṃ haraḥ |
uvācāniṣṭasaṃbhrāṃtaḥ pracaleneṃdumaulinā || 11 ||

śarva uvāca |
agātmajāsi girije nāhaṃ niṃdāparastava |
cāṭūktibudhyā tu mayā kṛta unmādasaṃśrayaḥ || 12 ||

vikalpaḥ svasthacitte tu girije na mama kramāt |
yadyevaṃ kupitā bhīru tattavāhaṃ na vai punaḥ || 13 ||

narmavādī bhaviṣyāmi jahi kopaṃ śucismite |
śirasā praṇatenaiṣa racitaste mayāṃjali || 14 ||

ni hīno hyapamānena niṃdite naiti vikriyām |
asatāṃ tu satāṃ na syānmarmaspṛṣṭo naraḥ kila || 15 ||

anekaiścāṭubhirdevī devena pratibodhitā |
kopaṃ tīvraṃ na tatyāja satī marmaṇi ghaṭṭitā || 16 ||

avaṣṭabdhamathācchidya vāsaḥ śaṃkarapāṇinā |
viparyastālakāvegādgantumaicchacca śailajā || 17 ||

tasyā vrajaṃtyāḥ kopena punarāha purāṃtakaḥ |
satyaṃ sarvairavayavaistanoṣi sadṛśāṃ pituḥ || 18 ||

himācalasya śṛṃgasthameva jālākulaṃ manaḥ |
tathā duravagāhyebhyo gahano hi tavāśayaḥ || 19 ||

kāṭhinyamaśmasārebhyo vanebhyo bahulāṃ gatā |
kuṭilatvaṃ nimnagābhyo duḥsevyatvaṃ himādapi || 20 ||

saṃkrāṃtaṃ sarvamevaitattanvaṃgi himabhūdharāt |
ityuktā sā punaḥ prāha giriśaṃ śailakanyakā || 21 ||

kopakaṃpitamūrddhā sā prasphuraddaśanacchadā |
umovāca |
syātsarvaṃ doṣadānena niṃdāyāṃ guṇino balāt || 22 ||

tavāpi duṣṭasaṃparkātsaṃkrāṃtaṃ sarvameva hi |
vyālebhyonekajihvatvaṃ bhasmano'snehavṛttitā || 23 ||

hṛtkāluṣyaṃ śaśāṃkotthaṃ durbādhatvaṃ viṣādapi |
kiṃ cātra bahunoktena alaṃ vācāṃ śrameṇa te || 24 ||

śmaśānavāsānnirbhīstvaṃ nagnatvāttavanatrapā |
nirghṛṇatvaṃ kapālitvāddayā te vigatā ciram || 25 ||

ityuktvā maṃdirāttasmānnirjagāma himādrijā |
tasyāṃ vrajaṃtyāṃ deveśyāṃ gaṇaiḥ kilakilākṛtā || 26 ||

kva mātargacchasītyuktvā rudadbhirdhāvitaṃ punaḥ |
viṣṭabhya caraṇau devyā vīrako bāṣpagadgadaḥ || 27 ||

provāca mātaḥ kinnvetatkva yāsi kupitāturā |
ahaṃ tvāmanuyāsyāmi vrajaṃtīṃ snehavarjitām || 28 ||

nocetpatiṣye śikharādgirerasya tvayojjhitaḥ |
unnamyavadanaṃ devī dakṣiṇena tu pāṇinā || 29 ||

uvāca vīrakaṃ mātā tvaṃ śokaṃ putra mā kṛthāḥ |
śailāgrātpatituṃ naiva na ca gaṃtuṃ mayā saha || 30 ||

yuktaṃ te putra gacchāmi yena kāryeṇa tacchṛṇu |
kṛṣṇetyuktā hareṇāhaṃ staṃbhitāsmyavamānitā || 31 ||

sāhaṃ tapaḥ kariṣyāmi yena gaurītvamāpnuyām |
eṣa strīlaṃpaṭo devo yātāyāṃ mayyanaṃtaram || 32 ||

dvārarakṣā tvayā kāryā nityaṃ randhrānvavekṣaṇam |
yathā na kācitpraviśedyoṣittatra harāṃtikam || 33 ||

dṛṣṭvā parastriyaṃ cāpi vadethā mama putraka |
śīghrameva kariṣyāmi yathāyuktamanaṃtaram || 34 ||

evamastviti deveśīṃ vīrakovāca sāṃpratam |
māturājñāmṛtāhāra plāvitāṃgo gatajvaraḥ || 35 ||

jagāma rakṣāṃ sa draṣṭuṃ praṇipatya tu mātaram |
devī cāpaśyadāyāṃtīṃ sakhīṃ māturvibhūṣitām || 36 ||

kusumāmohinīṃ nāma tasya śailasya devatām |
sāpi dṛṣṭvā girisutāṃ snehaviklavamānasā || 37 ||

kva putri gacchasītyuccairāligyovāca devatā |
sā tasyāḥ sarvamācakhyau śaṃkarātkopakāraṇam || 38 ||

punaścovācagirijā devatāṃ mātṛsaṃmitām |
umovāca |
nityaṃ śailādhirājasya devatātvamaniṃdite || 39 ||

sarvataḥ sannidhānaṃ te manasātīva vatsalā |
atastu te pravakṣyāmi yadvidheyaṃ tvayāṃbike || 40 ||

anyastrīsaṃpraveśastu tvayā rakṣyaḥ prayatnataḥ |
sarahasye prayatnena niṣevyaḥ satataṃ girau || 41 ||

pinākinaḥ praviṣṭāyāṃ vaktavyaṃ me tvayānaghe |
tatohaṃ saṃvidhāsyāmi yatkṣamaṃ tadanaṃtaram || 42 ||

ityuktā tāṃ tathetyukttvā jagāma sā giriṃ śubhā |
umāpi piturudyānaṃ jagāmādrisutādbhutam || 43 ||

aṃtarikṣaṃ samāviśya meghamālāvilaprabham |
bhūṣaṇāni tato nyasya vṛkṣavalkaladhāriṇī || 44 ||

grīṣme paṃcāgnisaṃtaptā varṣāsu ca jaloṣitā |
vanyāhārā nirāhārā śuṣkasthaṃḍilaśāyinī || 45 ||

evaṃ sādhayatī tatra tapaḥ sā ca vyavasthitā |
jñātvā gatāṃ girisutāṃ daityastatrāṃtare balī || 46 ||

aṃdhakasya suto hṛṣṭaḥ piturvadhamanusmaran |
devānsarvānvijityājau bakabhrātā raṇotkaṭaḥ || 47 ||

āḍirnāmāṃtaraprekṣīsatataṃcaṃdramaulinaḥ |
ājagāmāmararipuḥ puraṃ tripuraghātinaḥ || 48 ||

sa tatrāgatya dadṛśe vīrakaṃ dvāryavasthitam |
viciṃtya sopi ca varaṃ dattaṃ kamalayoninā || 49 ||

hate kilāṃdhake daitye giriśenāsuradviṣā |
āḍiścakāra vipulaṃ tapaḥ paramadāruṇam || 50 ||

samāgatyābravīdbrahmā tapasā paritoṣitaḥ |
kimāḍe dānavaśreṣṭha tapasā prāptumicchasi || 51 ||

brahmāṇamāha daityastu nirmṛtyutvamahaṃ vṛṇe |
brahmovāca |
jātānāmiha saṃsāre vinā mṛtyuṃ na yujyate || 52 ||

yatastatopi daityeṃdra mṛtyuḥ prāpyaśśarīribhiḥ |
ityukto daityasiṃhastu provācāṃbujasaṃbhavam || 53 ||

rūpasyaparivarto me yadā syātpadmasaṃbhava |
tadā mṛtyurmama bhavedanyathā tvamarosmyaham || 54 ||

ityuktastu tadovāca tuṣṭaḥ kamalasaṃbhavaḥ |
yadā dvitīyo rūpasya vivarttaste bhaviṣyati || 55 ||

tadā te bhavitā mṛtyuranyathā na bhaviṣyati |
ityuktomaratāṃ mene daityasūnurmahābalaḥ || 56 ||

tasminkāle tvasaṃsmṛtya tadvadhopāyamātmanaḥ |
pratiharturdṛṣṭipathe vīrakasyābhavaṃstadā || 57 ||

bhujaṃgarūpī raṃdhreṇa praviveśa dṛśaḥpatham |
parihṛtya gaṇeśasya dānavo raudradurjayaḥ || 58 ||

alakṣito gaṇeśena praviśyātha parāṃ tanum |
bhujaṃgarūpaṃ saṃtyajya jagrāhātha mahāsuraḥ || 59 ||

umārūpaṃ ramayituṃ giriśaṃ mūḍhacetanaḥ |
kṛtvā māyāmayaṃ rūpamapratarkyaṃ manoharam || 60 ||

sarvairavayavaiḥ pūrṇaṃ sarvābhijñānabṛṃhitam |
kṛtvā bhagāṃtare daṃtaṃ daityo vajramayaṃ dṛḍham || 61 ||

tīkṣṇāgraṃ buddhimohena giriśaṃ haṃtumudyataḥ |
kṛtvomārūpasaṃsthānaṃ gato daityo harāṃtikam || 62 ||

pāpo ramyākṛtiścitra bhūṣaṇāṃbarasaṃyutaḥ |
taṃ dṛṣṭvā giriśastuṣṭastamāliṃgya mahāsuram || 63 ||

manyamāno girisutāṃ sarvairavayavāṃtaraiḥ |
apṛcchatsādhubhāvaṃ te giriputri na kṛtrimam || 64 ||

yā tvaṃ madāśayaṃ jñātvā prāpteha varavarṇinī |
tvayā virahitaṃ śūnyaṃ mama sthānaṃ jagattrayam || 65 ||

prāptā prasannavadane yuktamevaṃvidhaṃ tvayi |
ityukto dānaveṃdrastu taṃ babhāṣe smitaṃ śanaiḥ || 66 ||

sa cābudhyadabhijñānaiḥ prāha tripuraghātinam |
daitya uvāca |
yātāsmi tapasaḥ kāmādvaraṃ labdhuṃ himācalam || 67 ||

ratiśca tatra menābhūttataḥ prāptā tvadaṃtikam |
ityuktaḥ śaṃkaraḥ śaṃkāṃ citte prāpto vicārayan || 68 ||

hṛdayena samādhāya devaḥ prahasitānanaḥ |
kupitā kupitaṃ buddhvā prakṛtyā ca dṛḍhavratā || 69 ||

aprāptakāmā saṃprāptā kimetatsaṃvijānatī |
iti ciṃtya harastasyā abhijñānaṃ vicārayan || 70 ||

nāpaśyadvāmapārśve tu tadaṃkaṃ padmalakṣaṇam |
lomnāmāvartaracitaṃ tato devaḥ pinākadhṛk || 71 ||

buddhvā tāṃ dānavīṃ māyāmākāraṃ gūhayaṃstataḥ |
meḍhradaṃṣṭrāstramādāya dānavaṃ tamasādayat || 72 ||

na cābudhyata tadvṛttaṃ vīrako dvārarakṣakaḥ |
kusumāmodinaṃ dṛṣṭvā strīrūpaṃ dānaveśvaram || 73 ||

dūtena mārutenāśu bodhitā himaśailajā |
śrutvā vāyumukhāddevī krodharaktāvilekṣaṇā || 74 ||

apaśyadvīrakaṃ putraṃ hṛdayenaiva dūyatā |
devyuvāca |
mātaraṃ māṃ parityajya yasmāttvaṃ snehaviklavām || 75 ||

vihitāvasaraḥ strīṇāṃ śaṃkarasya rahovidhau |
tasmātte mānuṣe rūkṣā jaḍā hṛdayavarjitā || 76 ||

gaṇeśākārasadṛśī śilā mātā bhaviṣyati |
nimitta eṣa vikhyāto vīrakasya sutādarāt || 77 ||

saṃbhave prakrame caiva vicitrākhyā na saṃśayaḥ |
evamutsṛṣṭaśāpāyāṃ giriputryāmanaṃtaraṃ || 78 ||

nirjagāma mukhātkrodhaḥ siṃharūpī mahābalaḥ |
sa tu siṃhaḥ karālāsyaḥ saṭājaṭilakaṃdharaḥ || 79 ||

ūrdhvaprodbhūtalāṃgūlo daṃṣṭrotkaṭamukhāvaṭaḥ |
vyāditāsyo laṃbajihvaḥ kṣāmaḥ kukṣibalādiṣu || 80 ||

asyāsye vartituṃ devī vyavasthitavatī tadā |
jñātvā manogataṃ tasyā bhagavāṃścaturānanaḥ || 81 ||

ājagāmāśramapadaṃ saṃpadāmāśrayaṃ yataḥ |
āgamyovāca deveśo girijāṃ spaṣṭayā girā || 82 ||

brahmovāca |
kiṃ punaḥ prāptukāmāsi kimalabhyaṃ dadāmi te |
viramyatāmatikleśāttapasosmānmadājñayā || 83 ||

tacchrutvovācagirijā gurorgauravayaṃtritaṃ |
vākyaṃ vācāharodgīrṇavarṇanirgamavāṃchitaṃ || 84 ||

devyuvāca |
tapasā duṣkareṇāptaḥ patirvai śaṃkaro mayā |
samāṃ śyāmalavarṇeti bahuśaḥ proktavānrahaḥ || 85 ||

tasmādahaṃ kāṃcanābhavarṇā tannāmasaṃyutā |
bharturbhūtapateraṃgamekato nirviṣaṃ bhavet || 86 ||

tasyāstadbhāṣitaṃ śrutvā provāca jagadīśvaraḥ |
evaṃ bhava tvaṃ bhūyaśca bharturdehārddhacāriṇī || 87 ||

tatastatyājatāṃ kṛṣṇāṃ phullanīlotpalatvacaṃ |
tvakca sāpyabhavadbhīmā ghaṃṭāhastātrilocanā || 88 ||

nānābharaṇasaṃpūrṇā pītakauśeyadhāriṇī |
tāmabravīttato brahmā devīṃ nīlāṃbujatviṣaṃ || 89 ||

niśe bhūdharajā deha saṃparkā tvaṃ madājñayā |
saṃprāptā kṛtakṛtyatvamekānaṃśā puro hyasi || 90 ||

ya eṣa siṃhaḥ prodbhūto devyāḥ krodhādvarānane |
sa testu vāhanaṃ devi ketau cāstu mahābalaḥ || 91 ||

gaccha viṃdhyācalaṃ tatra surakāryaṃ kariṣyasi |
paṃcālo nāma yakṣoyaṃ yakṣalakṣapadānugaḥ || 92 ||

dattaste kiṃkaro devi mayā māyāśatairyutaḥ |
ityuktvā kauśikī devī viṃdhyaśailaṃ jagāma ha || 93 ||

umāpi prāptasaṃkalpā jagāma giriśāṃtikaṃ |
praviśaṃtīṃ tu tāṃ dvārādapahṛtya samāhitaḥ || 94 ||

rurodha vīrako devīṃ hemavetralatādharaḥ |
tāmuvāca ca kopena rūpe tu vyabhicāriṇīṃ || 95 ||

prayojanaṃ na tetrāsti gaccha yāvanna bhakṣyase |
devyārūpadharo daityo devaṃ vaṃcitumāgataḥ || 96 ||

praviṣṭo na ca dṛṣṭosau sa ca devena ghātitaḥ |
ghātite cāhamājñapto nīlakaṃṭhena kopinā || 97 ||

dvāre tvanavadhānaṃ te yasmātpaśyāmi vai tataḥ |
bhaviṣyasi na me dvāstho varṣapūgānanekaśaḥ || 98 ||

ataste nātra dāsyāmi praveśaṃ gamyatāṃ drutam |
ekāṃ muktvā girisutāṃ mātaraṃ snehavatsalām || 99 ||

praveśaṃ labhate nānyā nārī kamalalocane |
ityuktvā tu tadā devī ciṃtayāmāsa cetasā || 100 ||

nārī naiva sa daiteyo vāyurme yāmabhāṣata |
vṛthaiva vīrakaśśapto mayā krodhaparītayā || 101 ||

akāryaṃ kriyate mūḍhaiḥ prāyaḥ krodhasamanvitaiḥ |
krodhena naśyate kīrtiḥ krodho haṃti sthitāṃ śriyam || 102 ||

aparicchinnatatvārthā putraṃ śāpitavatyahaṃ |
viparītārthabuddhīnāṃ sulabho vipadāgamaḥ || 103 ||

saṃciṃtyaivamuvācedaṃ vīrakaṃ prati śailajā |
sajjalajjāvikāreṇa vadanenāmbujatviṣā || 104 ||

devyuvāca |
ahaṃ vīraka te mātā na testu manaso bhramaḥ |
śaṃkarasyāsmi dayitā sutā tuhinabhūbhṛtaḥ || 105 ||

mama gātracchavibhrāṃtyā mā śaṃkāṃ putra dhāraya |
tuṣṭena gauratā dattā mameyaṃ padmajanmanā || 106 ||

mayā śaptosyavidite vṛttāṃte daityanirmite |
jñātvā nārīpraveśaṃ tu śaṃkare rahasi sthite || 107 ||

nanivartayituṃ śakyaḥ śāpaḥ kiṃtu bravīmi te |
śīghrameṣyasi mānuṣyātsarvakāmasamanvitaḥ || 108 ||

śirasā tu tato vaṃdya mātaraṃ pūrṇamānasaḥ |
uvāca sādhvīṃ pūrṇendu dyutiṃ tuhinaśailajāṃ || 109 ||

vīraka uvāca |
natasurāsuramaulilasanmaṇipravarakāṃtikarālinakhāṅghrike |
nagasute śaraṇāgatavatsale navanamovanatārttivināśini || 110 ||

tapanamaṃḍalamaṃḍitakaṃdhare pṛthusuvarṇanagadyutihārike |
viṣamabhaṃgaviṣaṃgamabhīṣito girisute bhavatīmahamāśraye || 111 ||

jagatikāpraṇatābhimatā dadau jhaṭiti siddhimṛte bhavatīṃ yathā |
jagatikāṃ praṇamecchaśiśekharo bhuvanabhṛnmunayo bhavatīṃ yathā || 112 ||

vimalayogavinirmitadurjaye sutanutulyamaheśvaramaṃḍalī |
vidalitāṃdhakabāṃdhavasaṃhatiḥ suravaraiḥ prathamaṃ tvamabhiṣṭutā || 113 ||

sitasaṭāpaṭaloddhatakaṃdharābhavamahāmṛgarājarayasthitā |
vimalaśaktimukhānalapiṃgalā yatabhujaughanipiṣṭamahāsurā || 114 ||

nigaditā bhuvanairaticaṃḍikājananiśuṃbhaniśuṃbhaniṣūdinī |
praṇataciṃtitadā bhavadā navapraśamanaikaratistarasā bhuvi || 115 ||

viyativāyupathe jvalanākulevanitale tava devi ca yadvapuḥ |
tadajitepratime praṇamāmyahaṃ bhuvanabhāvinite bhavavallabhe || 116 ||

jaladhayo lalitoddhatavīcayo hutavaho dyutidagdhacarācaraḥ |
phaṇasahasrabhṛtaśca bhujaṃgamāstvamabhidhāsyasi māmabhayaṃkarā || 117 ||

bhagavati sthirabhaktajanāśraye pratigato bhavatīcaraṇāśrayaṃ |
karaṇajātamihāstu mamāśravaitavavilāsamukhānubhavāsyadam || 118 ||

suprasannā tato devī vīrakasyeti saṃstutā |
praviveśa śubhaṃbharturbhuvanaṃ bhūdharātmajā || 119 ||

dvāsthopi vīrako devānharadarśanakāṃkṣiṇaḥ |
vyasarjayatsvakāneva gṛhānādarapūrvakaṃ || 120 ||

nāstyatrāvasaro devā devyāḥ saha vṛṣākapiḥ |
nibhṛtaḥ krīḍatītyuktā yayuste ca yathāgataṃ || 121 ||

gate varṣasahasre tu devāstvaritamānasāḥ |
jvalanaṃ codayāmāsurjñātuṃ śaṃkaraceṣṭitaṃ || 122 ||

praviśya pakṣiraṃdhreṇa śukarūpī hutāśanaḥ |
dadarśa śayane sarvaṃ ratau girijayā saha || 123 ||

dadarśa taṃ ca deveśo hutāśaṃ śukarūpiṇaṃ |
tamuvāca mahādevaḥ kiṃcitkopasamanvitaḥ || 124 ||

śarva uvāca |
niṣiktamardhaṃ devyāṃ me vīryaṃ ca śukavigraha |
lajjayā viratiścāsya tvamardhaṃ piba pāvaka || 125 ||

yasmāttu tvatkṛte vighnaṃ tasmāttvayyupapadyate |
ityuktaḥ prāñjalirvahnirapibadvīryamāhitaṃ || 126 ||

tenāplutāstato devāstanmukhā ṛbhavo yataḥ |
vipāṭya jaṭharaṃ teṣāṃ vīryaṃ māheśvaraṃ tataḥ || 127 ||

niṣkrāṃtaṃ taptahemābhaṃ vitate śaṃkarāśrame |
tasminsaro mahajjātaṃ vimalaṃ bahuyojanaṃ || 128 ||

protphullahemakamalaṃ nānāvihaganāditam |
tacchrutvā tu saro devī jātaṃ hemamahāṃbujam || 129 ||

jagāma kautukāviṣṭā tatsaraḥ kanakāṃbujam |
tatra kṛtvā jalakrīḍāṃ tadabjakṛtaśekharā || 130 ||

upaviṣṭā tatastasya tīre devī sakhīvṛtā |
pātukāmā ca tattoyaṃ svādunirmalapaṃkajam || 131 ||

apaśyatkṛttikāstāssa ṣaḍarkadyutisannibhāḥ |
padmapatre tu tadvāri gṛhītvā prasthitā gṛham || 132 ||

harṣātsovāca pāsyāmi padmapatre sthitaṃ payaḥ |
tataḥstā ūcurakhilāḥ kṛttikā himaśailajām || 133 ||

kṛttikā ūcuḥ |
dāsyāmo dayite garbhe saṃbhūto yo bhaviṣyati |
sosmākamapi putraḥ syādasmattrātā ca vṛttimān || 134 ||

triṣu lokeṣu vikhyātaḥ sarveṣvapi śubhānane |
ityuktovāca girijā kathaṃ madgātrasaṃbhavaiḥ || 135 ||

sarvairavayavairyukto bhavatībhyaḥ suto bhavet |
tatastāṃ kṛttikā ūcurvidhāsyāmosya vai vayam || 136 ||

uttamānyuttamāṃgāni yadyevaṃ tu bhaviṣyati |
uktā vai śailajā prāha bhavatvevamaniṃditāḥ || 137 ||

tatastu harṣasaṃpūrṇā padmapatrasthitaṃ payaḥ |
tasyai dadustayā cāpi tatpītaṃ kramaśo jalam || 138 ||

pīte tu salile caiva tasminneva kṣaṇe varaḥ |
vipāṭya devyāśca tato dakṣiṇaṃ kukṣimudgataḥ || 139 ||

niścakrāmādbhuto bālo rogaśokavināśanaḥ |
prabhākarakaravrāta prakāraprakaraprabhuḥ || 140 ||

gṛhītanirmalodagra śaktiśūlāṃkuśonalaḥ |
dīpto mārayituṃ daityānutthitaḥ kanakacchaviḥ || 141 ||

etasmātkāraṇādeva kumāraścāpi sobhavat |
vāmaṃ vidārya niṣkrāṃtastato devyāḥ punaḥ śiśuḥ || 142 ||

skaṃdotha vadanādvahneḥ śubhrātṣaḍvadanorihā |
kṛttikāsalilādeva śākhābhiḥ saviśeṣataḥ || 143 ||

śākhāḥ śivāḥ samākhyātāḥ ṣaṭsuvaktreṣu vistṛtāḥ |
yatastato viśākhosau khyāto lokeṣu ṣaṇmukhaḥ || 144 ||

skaṃdo viśākhaḥ ṣaḍvaktraḥ kārtikeyaśca viśrutaḥ |
pakṣe caitrasya bahule paṃcadaśyāṃ mahābalau || 145 ||

saṃbhūtāvarkasadṛśau viśāle śarakānane |
site pakṣe tu paṃcamyāṃ tathaitau pāvakānalau || 146 ||

bālakābhyāṃ cakāraikaṃ saṃdhyāyāmeva bhūtaye |
tasyāmeva tataḥ ṣaṣṭhyāmabhiṣikto guhaḥ prabhuḥ || 147 ||

sarvairamarasaṃghātairbrahmopeṃdreṃdra bhāskaraiḥ |
gaṃdhamālyaiḥ śubhairdhūpaistathā krīḍanakairapi || 148 ||

chatraiścāmarajālaiśca bhūṣaṇaiśca vilepanaiḥ |
abhiṣikto vidhānena yathāvatṣaṇmukhaḥ prabhuḥ || 149 ||

sutāmasmai dadau śakro devaseneti viśrutām |
patnyarthaṃ devadeveśo dadau viṣṇurathāyudham || 150 ||

yakṣāṇāṃ daśalakṣāṇi dadāvasya dhanādhipaḥ |
dadau hutāśanastejo dadau vāyuśca vāhanam || 151 ||

dadau krīḍanakaṃ tvaṣṭā kukkuṭaṃ kāmarūpiṇam |
evaṃ surāstu te sarve parivāramanantakam || 152 ||

dadurmuditacetaskāḥ skaṃdāyādityavarcase |
jānubhyāmavanau sthitvā surasaṃghāstamastuvan || 153 ||

stotreṇānena varadaṃ ṣaṇmukhaṃ mukhyaśaḥ surāḥ |
devā ūcuḥ |
namaḥ kumārāya mahāprabhāya skaṃdāya cāskaṃditadānavāya || 154 ||

navārkabiṃbapratimaprabhāva namostu guhyāya guhāya tubhyam |
namostu te lokabhayāpahāya namostu te lokakṛpāparāya || 155 ||

namo viśālāmalalocanāya namo viśākhāya mahāvratāya |
namo namastestu raṇotkaṭāya namo mayūrojjvalavāhanāya || 156 ||

namostu keyūradharāya tubhyaṃ namo dhṛtodagrapatākine te |
namaḥ prabhāvapraṇatāya testu namo'stu ghaṃṭādharadhairyaśāline || 157 ||

kumāra uvāca |
kaṃ vaḥ kāmaṃ prayacchāmi bhavaṃto brūtanirvṛtāḥ |
yadyapya sādhyaṃ kṛtyaṃ no hṛdaye ciṃtitaṃ ciram || 158 ||

ityuktāstu surāstena procuḥ praṇatamaulayaḥ |
sarva eva mahātmānaṃ guhaṃ muditamānasāḥ || 159 ||

daityeṃdrastārako nāma sarvāmarakulāṃtakṛt |
balavāndurjayastīkṣṇo durācārotikopanaḥ || 160 ||

tameva jahi durdharṣaṃ daityaṃ sarvavināśanam |
upasthitaḥ kṛtyaśeṣo hyasmākaṃ ca bhayāvahaḥ || 161 ||

hiraṇyakaśipuścogro hyavadhyo devatāgaṇaiḥ |
yajñaghnaḥ pāpakarmā vai yena brahmāpi tāpitaḥ || 162 ||

etau harasva bhadraṃ te tāvakaṃ ca mahābalam |
evamuktastathetyuktvā sarvāmarapadānugaḥ || 163 ||

jagāma jagatāṃnāthastūyamānomareśvaraiḥ |
tārakasya vadhārthāya jagatāṃ kaṃṭakasya ca || 164 ||

tataśca preṣayāmāsa śakro gūḍhasamāśrayaḥ |
dūtaṃ dānavasiṃhasya paruṣākṣaravādinam || 165 ||

sa tu gatvābravīddaityamabhayo bhīmadarśanam |
dūta uvāca |
śakrastvāmāha deveśo daityaketuṃ divaspatiḥ || 166 ||

tārakāsura tacchaktyā ghaṭayasva yathecchayā |
yajjagajjvalanoddīptaṃ kilbiṣaṃ ca tvayā kṛtam || 167 ||

tasyāhaṃ sādakastedya rājāsmi bhuvanatraye |
śrutvaitadadbhutaṃ vākyaṃ kopasaṃraktalocanaḥ || 168 ||

uvāca dūtaṃ duṣṭātmā naṣṭaprāyavibhūtikaḥ |
tāraka uvāca |
dṛṣṭaṃ te pauruṣaṃ śakra śataśotha mahāraṇe || 169 ||

nistrapatvānna te śāṃtirvidyate śakra durmate |
evamukte gate dūte ciṃtayāmāsa dānavaḥ || 170 ||

nālabdhasaṃśrayaḥ śakro vaktumevamihārhati |
jātaḥ skaṃdodhunā śakrājjñāyate samupāśrayāt || 171 ||

nimittaughāṃstadā duṣṭānsopaśyannāśavedinaḥ |
pāṃsuvarṣamasṛkpātaṃ gaganādavanītale || 172 ||

vāmanetraprakaṃpaṃ ca vaktraśoṣaṃ manomayam |
svakānāṃ vaktrapadmānāṃ mlānatāṃ ca vyalokayat || 173 ||

duṣṭāṃśca prāṇino raudrānsopaśyadduṣṭavādinaḥ |
tadaciṃtyaiva ditijo nyastacittobhavatkṣaṇāt || 174 ||

yāvadgajaghaṭāghaṃṭā ghanatkāraravotkaṭām |
tadvatturaṃgasaṃghātaheṣotsāhavibhūṣitām || 175 ||

sainyaissenāntarodagra dhvajarājairvirājitām |
vimānaiścādbhutākāraiścalitāmalacāmaraiḥ || 176 ||

vibhūṣaṇapinaddhāṃ ca kinnarodgītanāditām |
nānā nākatarūtphulla kusumāpīḍadhāriṇīm || 177 ||

viśokāstraparisphāra carmanirmaladarśinīṃ |
vidyutpuṣṭadyutidharāṃ nānāvādyavināditām || 178 ||

senāṃ nākasadāṃ daityaḥ prāsādastho vyalokayat |
saciṃtayāmāsa tadā kiṃcidvibhrāṃtamānasaḥ || 179 ||

apūrvaḥ ko bhavedyoddhā yo mayā na vinirjitaḥ |
tataściṃtākulo daityaḥ śuśrāva kaṭukākṣaram |
siddhavaṃdibhirudghuṣṭamidaṃ hṛdayadāruṇam || 180 ||

jayātulaśaktidīdhitipaṃjarabhujadaṃḍapracaṃḍatara |
rabhasasuravadanakumudavikāsanavilāsanetra kumāravara || 181 ||
jaya ditijakulamahodadhi baḍavānala madhuramayūraratha suramakuṭa koṭi kuṃcita caraṇa nakhāṃkura mahāsena || 182 ||

jaya calitalalita cūḍākalāpanavavimalakamala |
daṃḍakāṃta daityeśavaṃśa duḥsaha dāvānala || 183 ||
jaya viśākhavibhojaya bālasaptavāsara bhuvanāliśokaśamana jaya sakalaloka ditisutadhuraṃdharanāśaka skaṃda || 184 ||

śrutvaitattārakaḥ sarvamudghuṣṭaṃ devavaṃdibhiḥ |
sasmāra brahmaṇo vākyaṃ vadhaṃ bālādupasthitaṃ || 185 ||

smṛtvā dharmaughavidhvaṃsī sadā vīrapadānugaḥ |
maṃdirānnirjagāmāśu śokagrastena cetasā || 186 ||

kālanemimukhā daityāḥ saṃtrastā bhrāṃtacetasaḥ |
sveṣvanīkeṣu ca tadā tvarā vismitacetasaḥ || 187 ||

hiraṇyakaśipuḥ prāha dānavānāṃ dhuraṃdharaḥ |
trapākaraṃ bhavenmahyaṃ bālasyāsya palāyanam || 188 ||

yadyahaṃ haṃtave yāmi sopi vai kamalāśritaḥ |
hatvāhaṃ bālakaṃ cainaṃ duḥsparśaḥ syāmakāraṇaṃ || 189 ||

yāta dhāvata gṛhṇīta yojayadhvaṃ varūthinīm |
kumāraṃ tārako dṛṣṭvā babhāṣe bhīṣaṇākṛtiḥ || 190 ||

kiṃ bāla yoddhukāmosi krīḍakaṃdukalīlayā |
yenātapo nisṛṣṭaste satsaṃgaravibhāṣaka || 191 ||

bālatvādatha te buddhirevaṃ svalpārthadarśinī |
kumāropi tamagrasthaṃ babhāṣe harṣavattamaṃ || 192 ||

śṛṇu tāraka śāstrārtha iha naiva nirūpyate |
śastrairarthā na dṛśyaṃte samare nirbharaṃ bhaye || 193 ||

śiśutvaṃ māvamaṃsthā me śiśuḥ kaṣṭo bhujaṃgamaḥ |
duṣprekṣo bhāskaro bālastathāhaṃ durjayaḥ śiśuḥ || 194 ||

alpākṣaro na maṃtraḥ kiṃ sasphuro daitya dṛśyate |
kumāre proktavatyevaṃ daityaścikṣepa mudgaraṃ || 195 ||

kumārastaṃ nirāsograṃ cakreṇāmoghavarcasā |
tataścikṣepa daityeṃdro bhiṃdipālamayomayaṃ || 196 ||

kareṇa taṃ ca jagrāha kārtikeyomarārihā |
gadāṃ mumoca daityāya samutthāya kharasvanām || 197 ||

tayā hatastato daityaścakampecalarāḍiva |
mene ca durjayaṃ daityastadābālaṃ suduḥsahaṃ || 198 ||

ciṃtayāmāsa buddhyā vai prāptaḥ kālo na saṃśayaḥ |
kaṃpitaṃ ca samālokya kālanemi purogamāḥ || 199 ||

sarve detyaiśvarā jaghnuḥ kumāraṃ raṇadāruṇaṃ |
sa taiḥ prahārairaspṛṣṭastathā klaiśairmahādyutiḥ || 200 ||

sa bālo balibhirvegairayudhyaddānavai raṇe |
raṇaśauṇḍāśca daityeṃdrā puḥnarjaghnuḥ śilīmukhaiḥ || 201 ||

kumāraṃ samare daityā balino devakaṃṭakāḥ |
kumārasya vyathā nābhūddaityāstranihatasya tu || 202 ||

prāṇāṃtakaraṇaṃ jātaṃ devānāṃ dānavā havaṃ |
devānnipīḍitāndṛṣṭvā kumāraḥ kopamāviśat || 203 ||

tatostrairdārayāmāsa dānāvānāmanīkinīm |
tairastrairniṣpratīkāraistāḍitāssurakaṃṭakāḥ || 204 ||

kālanemimukhāḥ sarve raṇe hyāsanparāṅmukhāḥ |
vidruteṣu ca daityeṣu prahateṣu samaṃtataḥ || 205 ||

kinnarodgāragītaiśca hāsyasanyastacetanaḥ |
jaghne kumāraṃ gadayā niṣṭaptakanakatviṣā || 206 ||

śarairmayūraṃ citraiśca cakāra vimukhaṃ raṇe |
dṛṣṭvā parāḍmukho devo muktaraktaṃ svavāhanam || 207 ||

jagrāha śaktiṃ vimalāṃ raṇe kanakabhūṣaṇām |
bāhunā hemakeyūra rucireṇa ṣaḍānanaḥ || 208 ||

tatobravīnmahāsenastārakaṃ dānavādhipam |
tiṣṭhatiṣṭha sudurbuddhe yamalokaṃ vilokaya || 209 ||

hato hyasi mayā śaktyā smara svaṃ daityaceṣṭitam |
ityuktvā tu tataḥ śaktiṃ mumoca ditijaṃ prati || 210 ||

sā kumārabhujotsṛṣṭā tatkeyūraravānugā |
bibheda daityahṛdayaṃ vajraśaileṃdrakarkaśam || 211 ||

gatāsuḥ sa papātorvyāṃ pralaye bhūdharo yathā |
vikīrṇamakuṭoṣṇīṣo visrastākhilabhūṣaṇaḥ || 212 ||

tasminvinihate daitye dānavānāṃ dhuraṃdhare |
nābhūtkaścittadā duḥkhī narakeṣvapi pāpakṛt || 213 ||

stuvaṃtaḥ ṣaṇmukhaṃ devāḥ prākrīḍannāgatasmitāḥ |
jagmuḥ svāneva bhuvanānnirasyāsaṃstathotsukāḥ || 214 ||

daduścāpi varaṃ sarve devāśca ṣaṇmukhaṃ prati |
tuṣṭāḥ saṃprāptasarvārthāssahasiddhaistapodhanaiḥ || 215 ||

devā ūcuḥ |
yaḥ paṭhetskaṃdasaṃbaṃdhāṃ kathāmetāṃ mahāmatiḥ |
śṛṇuyācchrāvayedvāpi sa bhavetkīrtimānnaraḥ || 216 ||

bahvāyuḥ subhagaḥ śrīmānkīrtimānśubhadarśanaḥ |
bhūtebhyo nirbhayaścāpi sarvaduḥkhavivarjitaḥ || 217 ||

saṃdhyāmupāsya yaḥ pūrvāṃ skaṃdasya caritaṃ paṭhet |
sa yuktaḥ kinnaraiḥ sarvairmahādhanapatirbhavet || 218 ||

bhīṣma uvāca |
idānīṃ śrotumicchāmi hiraṇyakaśiporvadham |
narasiṃhasya māhātmyaṃ tathā pāpavināśanam || 1 ||

pulastya uvāca |
purā kṛtayuge rājanhiraṇyakaśipuḥ prabhuḥ |
daityānāmādipuruṣaścakāra sumahattapaḥ || 2 ||

daśavarṣasahasrāṇi daśavarṣaśatāni ca |
jalavāsī samabhavatsnānamaunadhṛtavrataḥ || 3 ||

vṛtaḥ śamadamābhyāṃ ca brahmacaryeṇa caiva hi |
brahmā prīto'bhavattasya tapasā niyamena ca || 4 ||

tataḥ svayaṃbhūrbhagavānsvayamāgatya tatra hi |
vimānenārkavarṇena haṃsayuktena bhāsvatā || 5 ||

ādityairvasubhiḥ sādhyairmarudbhirdaivataissaha |
rudrairviśvasahāyaiśca yakṣarākṣasapannagaiḥ || 6 ||

digbhiścaiva vidigbhiśca nadībhiḥ sāgaraistathā |
nakṣatraiśca muhūrtaiśca khacaraiśca mahāgrahaiḥ || 7 ||

devairbrahmarṣibhiḥ sārddhaṃ siddhaiḥ saptarṣibhistathā |
rājarṣibhiḥ puṇyakṛdbhirgaṃdharvāpsarasāṃgaṇaiḥ || 8 ||

carācaraguruḥ śrīmānvṛtaḥ sarvairdivaukasaiḥ |
brahmā brahmavidāṃ śreṣṭho daityaṃ vacanamabravīt || 9 ||

prītosmi tava bhaktasya tapasā'nena suvrata |
varaṃ varaya bhadraṃ te yatheṣṭaṃ kāmamāpnuhi || 10 ||

hiraṇyakaśipuruvāca |
na devāsuragaṃdharvā na yakṣoragarākṣasāḥ |
na mānuṣāḥ piśācāśca hanyurmāṃ devasattama || 11 ||

ṛṣayo mānavāḥ śāpairna śapeyuḥ pitāmaha |
yadi me bhagavānprīto vara eṣa vṛto mayā || 12 ||

na śastreṇa na cāstreṇa giriṇā pādapena vā |
na śuṣkeṇa na cārdreṇa na syāccānyena me vadhaḥ || 13 ||

bhaveyamahamevārkaḥ somo vāyurhutāśanaḥ |
salilaṃ cāṃtarikṣaṃ ca nakṣatrāṇi diśo daśa || 14 ||

ahaṃ krodhaśca kāmaśca varuṇo vāsavo yamaḥ |
dhanadaśca dhanādhyakṣo yakṣaḥ kiṃpuruṣādhipaḥ || 15 ||

brahmovāca |
eṣa divyo varastāta mayā dattastavādbhutaḥ |
sarvakāmaprado vatsa prāpsyasi tvaṃ na saṃśayaḥ || 16 ||

evamuktvā sa bhagavānjagāmākāśameva hi |
vairājaṃ brahmasadanaṃ brahmarṣigaṇasevitam || 17 ||

tato devāśca gaṃdharvā ṛṣibhiḥ saha cāraṇāḥ |
varapradānaṃ śrutvaivaṃ pitāmahamupasthitāḥ || 18 ||

devā ūcuḥ |
varapradānādbhagavanvadhiṣyati sa no'suraḥ |
tatprasādaśca bhagavanvadhopyasya viciṃtyatām || 19 ||

bhagavānsarvabhūtānāmādikarttā svayaṃprabhuḥ |
sraṣṭā ca havyakavyānāmavyaktaprakṛtiḥ paraḥ || 20 ||

sarvalokahitaṃ vākyaṃ śrutvā devaḥ prajāpatiḥ |
āśvāsayāmāsa tadā suśītairvacanāṃbubhiḥ || 21 ||

avaśyaṃ tridaśānena prāptavyaṃ tapasaḥ phalaṃ |
tapaso'nte'sya bhagavānvadhaṃ viṣṇuḥ kariṣyati || 22 ||

tacchrutvā vibudhā vākyaṃ sarve paṃkajajānanāt |
svāni sthānāni divyāni viprajagmurmudānvitāḥ || 23 ||

labdhamātre vare sotha prajāssarvā abādhata |
hiraṇyakaśipurdaityo varadānena garvitaḥ || 24 ||

āśrameṣu mahābhāgānmunīnvai śaṃsitavratān |
satyadharmaparāndāntāndharṣayāmāsa dānavaḥ || 25 ||

devāṃstribhuvanasthāṃśca parājitya mahāsuraḥ |
trailokyaṃ vaśamānīya svarge vasati dānavaḥ || 26 ||

yadā varamadotsiktaścoditaḥ kāladharmiṇā |
yajñiyānakaroddaityānayajñīyāṃśca daivatān || 27 ||

tathā daityāśca sādhyāśca viśve ca vasavastathā |
rudrā devagaṇā yakṣā devadvijamaharṣayaḥ || 28 ||

śaraṇyaṃ śaraṇaṃ viṣṇumupatasthurmahābalam |
devadevaṃ yajñamayaṃ vāsudevaṃ sanātanam || 29 ||

devā ūcuḥ |
nārāyaṇa mahābhāga devāstvāṃ śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ |
trāyasva jahi daityeṃdraṃ hiraṇyakaśipuṃ prabho || 30 ||

tvaṃ hi naḥ paramodātā tvaṃ hi naḥ paramo guruḥ |
tvaṃ hi naḥ paramo devo brahmādīnāṃ surottamaḥ || 31 ||

viṣṇuruvāca |
bhayaṃ tyajaddhvamamarā abhayaṃ vo dadāmyaham |
tathaiva tridivaṃ devāḥ pratipadyata māciram || 32 ||

enaṃ hi sagaṇaṃ daityaṃ varadānena garvitam |
avadhyamamareṃdrāṇāṃ dānaveṃdraṃ nihanmyaham || 33 ||

evamuktvā tu bhagavānviśvapo viṣṇuravyayaḥ |
hiraṇyakaśipusthānaṃ jagāma harirīśvaraḥ || 34 ||

tejasā bhāskārākāraḥ śaśīkāṃtyeva cāparaḥ |
narasya kṛtvārdhatanuṃ siṃhasyārddhatanuṃ tathā || 35 ||

nārasiṃhena vapuṣā pāṇiṃ saṃgṛhya pāṇinā |
tato dadarśa vistīrṇāṃ divyāṃ ramyāṃ manoramām || 36 ||

sarvakāmayutāṃ śubhrāṃ hiraṇyakaśipoḥ sabhām |
vistīrṇāṃ yojanaśataṃ śatamadhyarddhamāyatām || 37 ||

vaihāyasīṃ kāmagamāṃ paṃcayojanamucchritām |
jarāśokakṣamāpetāṃ niṣprakampyāṃ śivāṃ sukhām || 38 ||

veśmāsanavatīṃ ramyāṃ jvalaṃtīmiva tejasā |
aṃtaḥsalilasaṃyuktāṃ vihitāṃ viśvakarmaṇā || 39 ||

divyavarṇamayairvṛkṣaiḥ phalapuṣpapradairyutām |
nīlapītāsitaśyāmaiḥ śvetairlohitakairapi || 40 ||

avadātaistathā gulmai raktamaṃjaridhāribhiḥ |
sitābhraghanasaṃkāśāṃ plavaṃtīṃ ca dadarśa saḥ || 41 ||

raśmimatī svabhāvena divyagaṃdhamanoramā |
susukhā na ca duḥkhā sā na śītā na ca gharmadā || 42 ||

na kṣutpipāse glāniṃ vā prāpyatāṃ prāpnuvaṃti te |
nānarūpairupakṛtā sucitraiśca subhāsvaraiḥ || 43 ||

aticaṃdrātisūryāti śikhikānti svayaṃprabhā |
dīpyate nākapṛṣṭhasthā bhāsayaṃtī vibhāsurā || 44 ||

sarve cakāśire tasyāṃ muditāścaiva mānuṣāḥ |
rasavacca prabhūtaṃ ca bhakṣyabhojyānnamuttamaṃ || 45 ||

puṇyagaṃdhāsrajaścāpi nityakālaphalā drumāḥ |
uṣṇe śītāni toyāni śīte coṣṇāni saṃti vai || 46 ||

puṣpitāgrānmahāśākhānpravālāṃkuradhāriṇaḥ |
latāvitānasaṃchannānkalpānaikṣiṣṭha sa prabhuḥ || 47 ||

gaṃdhavaṃti ca puṣpāṇi rasavaṃti phalāni ca |
tāni śītāni coṣṇāni tatratatra sarāṃsi ca || 48 ||

apaśyadbhūpatīrthāni sabhāyāṃ tasya sa prabhuḥ |
nalinaiḥ puṃḍarīkaiśca śatapatraiḥ sugaṃdhibhiḥ || 49 ||

raktaiḥ kuvalayaiścaiva kalhārairutpalaistathā |
nānāścaryasamopetaiḥ puṣpairanyaiśca supriyaiḥ || 50 ||

kāraṃḍavaiścakravākaiḥ sārasaiḥ kurarairapi |
vimalasphaṭikābhāni pāṃḍuracchadanairdvijaiḥ || 51 ||

bahuhaṃsopagītāni sārasānāṃ rutāni ca |
gaṃdhayuktā latāstatra puṣpamaṃjaridhāriṇīḥ || 52 ||

dṛṣṭavānbhagavānhṛṣṭaḥ khadirānvetasārjunān |
cūtānimbānāgavṛkṣāḥ kadaṃbā bakulā dhavāḥ || 53 ||

priyaṃgavaḥ pāṭalākhyāḥ śālmalyassa haridravāḥ |
śālāstālāstamālāśca caṃpakāśca manoramāḥ || 54 ||

tathaivānye vyarājaṃta sabhāyāṃ puṣpitā drumāḥ |
elāka kubhakaṃkola lavalī karṇapūrakāḥ || 55 ||

madhukāḥ kovidārāśca bahutālasamucchrayāḥ |
aṃjanāśokaparṇāsā bahavaścitrakā drumāḥ || 56 ||

varuṇāśca palāśāścā panasāssaha caṃdanaiḥ |
nīlāssumanasaścaiva nīpāścāśvatthatiṃdukāḥ || 57 ||

pārijātāśca taravo mallikā bhadradāravaḥ |
aṭarūṣāḥ pīlūkāśca tathā caivailavālukāḥ || 58 ||

maṃdārakāḥ kuravakā punnāgāḥ kuṭajāstathā |
raktāḥ kuravakāścaiva nīlāścāgarubhiḥ saha || 59 ||

kiṃśukāścaiva bhavyāśca dāḍimā bījapūrakāḥ |
kāleyakā dukūlāśca hiṃgavastailavarttikāḥ || 60 ||

kharjūrā nālikerāśca harītaka madhūkakāḥ |
saptaparṇāśca bilvāśca sayāvāśca śarāvatāḥ || 61 ||

asanāśca tamālāśca nānāgulmasamāvṛtāḥ |
latāśca vividhākārāḥ puṣpapatraphalopagāḥ || 62 ||

ete cānye ca bahavastatra kānanajā drumāḥ |
nānāpuṣpaphalopetā vyarājaṃta samaṃtataḥ || 63 ||

cakorāḥ śatapatrāśca mattakokilaśārikāḥ |
puṣpitānpuṣpitāgrāṃśca saṃpataṃti mahādrumān || 64 ||

raktapītāruṇāstatra pādapāgragatāḥ khagāḥ |
parasparamavaikṣaṃta prahṛṣṭā jīvajīvikāḥ || 65 ||

tasyāṃ sabhāyāṃ daityeṃdro hiraṇyakaśipustadā |
āsīna āsane citre daśanalve pramāṇataḥ || 66 ||

divākaranibhe divye divyāstaraṇasaṃstṛte |
hiraṇyakaśipurdaitya āste jvalitakuṃḍalaḥ || 67 ||

upacerurmahādaityā hiraṇyakaśipuṃ tadā |
divyatālāni gītāni jagurgaṃdharvasattamāḥ || 68 ||

viśvācī sahajanyā ca pramloceti ca pūjitā |
divyātha saurabheyī ca samīcī puṃjikasthalā || 69 ||

miśrakeśī ca raṃbhā ca citrabhā śrutivibhramā |
cārunetrā ghṛtācī ca menakā corvaśī tathā || 70 ||

etāssahasraśaścānyā nṛtyagītaviśāradāḥ |
upātiṣṭhaṃta rājānaṃ hiraṇyakaśipuṃ prabhum || 71 ||

upāsate diteḥ putrāḥ sarve labdhavarāstathā |
balirvirocanastatra narakaḥ pṛthivīsutaḥ || 72 ||

prahlādo vipracittiśca gaviṣṭhaśca mahāsuraḥ |
surahantā duḥkhakartā samanāssumatistathā || 73 ||

ghaṭodaro mahāpārśvaḥ krathanaḥ piṭharastathā |
viśvarūpasvarūpaśca viśvakāyo mahābalaḥ || 74 ||

daśagrīvaśca vālī ca meghavāsā mahāsuraḥ |
ghaṭābho viṭarūpaśca jvalanaśceṃdratāpanaḥ || 75 ||

daityadānavasaṃghāste sarve jvalitakuṃḍalāḥ |
sragviṇo varmiṇaḥ sarve sarve ca caritavratāḥ || 76 ||

sarve labdhavarāḥ śūrāssarve vihitamṛtyavaḥ |
ete cānye ca bahavo hiraṇyakaśipuṃ prabhum || 77 ||

upāsate mahātmānaṃ sarve divyaparicchadāḥ |
vimānairvividhākārairbhrājamānairivāgnibhiḥ || 78 ||

mahendravapuṣaḥ sarve vicitrāṃgadabāhavaḥ |
bhūṣitāṃgā diteḥ putrāstamupāsata sarvataḥ || 79 ||

aiśvaryaṃ daityasiṃhasya yathā tasya mahātmanaḥ |
na śrutaṃ naiva dṛṣṭaṃ ca kasyāpi bhuvanatraye || 80 ||

rajatakanakacitravedikāyāṃ parikṛtaratnavicitravīthikāyām |
sa dadarśa mṛgādhipaḥ sabhāyāṃ surucira jālagavākṣaśobhitāyām || 81 ||

kanakavalayahārabhūṣitāṃgaṃ dititanayaṃ sa mṛgādhipo dadarśa |
divasakarakaraprabhaṃ jvalaṃtaṃ ditijasahasraśatairniṣevyamāṇam || 82 ||

tato dṛṣṭvā mahābhāgaṃ kālacakramivāgatam |
nārasiṃhavapuśchannaṃ bhasmacchannamivānalam || 83 ||

hiraṇyakaśipoḥ putraḥ prahlādo nāma vīryavān |
divyena vapuṣā siṃhamapaśyaddevamāgatam || 84 ||

taṃ dṛṣṭvā rukmaśailābhamapūrvāṃ tanumāśritam |
vismitā dānavāḥ sarve hiraṇyakaśipuśca saḥ || 85 ||

prahlāda uvāca |
mahārāja mahābāho daityānāmādisaṃbhava |
na śrutaṃ naiva me dṛṣṭaṃ nārasiṃhamidaṃ vapuḥ || 86 ||

avyaktaṃ paramaṃ divyaṃ kimidaṃ rūpamāgatam |
daityāṃtakaraṇaṃ ghoraṃ śaṃsatīva mano mama || 87 ||

asya devāḥ śarīrasthāḥ sāgarāḥ saritastathā |
himavānpāriyātraśca ye cānye kulaparvatāḥ || 88 ||

caṃdramāssahanakṣatrairādityā raśmibhiḥ saha |
dhanado varuṇaścaiva yamaḥ śakraḥ śacīpatiḥ || 89 ||

maruto devagaṃdharvā ṛṣayaśca tapodhanāḥ |
nāgā yakṣāḥ piśācāśca rākṣasā bhīmavikramāḥ || 90 ||

brahmā devāḥ paśupatirlalāṭasthā bhramaṃti hi |
sthāvarāṇi ca sarvāṇi jaṃgamāni tathaiva ca || 91 ||

bhavāṃśca sahitosmābhiḥ sarvairdaityagaṇairvṛtaḥ |
vimānaśatasaṃkīrṇā sarvā yā bhavataḥ sabhā || 92 ||

sarvaṃ tribhuvanaṃ rājanlokadharmaśca śāśvataḥ |
dṛśyate narasiṃhesmiṃstathedaṃ nikhilaṃ jagat || 93 ||

prajāpatiścātra manurmahātmā grahāśca yogāśca mahī nabhaśca |
utpātakālaśca dhṛtirmatiśca ratiśca satyaṃ ca tapo damaśca || 94 ||

sanatkumāraśca mahānubhāvo viśve ca devā ṝṣayaśca sarve |
krodhaśca kāmaśca tathaiva harṣo darpaśca mohaḥ pitaraśca sarve || 95 ||

prahlādasya vacaḥ śrutvā hiraṇyakaśipuḥ prabhuḥ |
uvāca dānavānsarvāngaṇāṃśca sagaṇādhipaḥ || 96 ||

mṛgeṃdro gṛhyatāmeṣa apūrvāṃ tanumāsthitaḥ |
yadi vā saṃśayaḥ kaścidvadhyatāṃ vanagocaraḥ || 97 ||

te dānavagaṇāssarve mṛgeṃdraṃ bhīmavikramam |
parikṣipaṃto muditāstrāsayāmāsurojasā || 98 ||

siṃhanādaṃ vimucyātha narasiṃho mahābalaḥ |
babhaṃja tāṃ sabhāṃ sarvāṃ vyāditāsya ivāṃtakaḥ || 99 ||

sabhāyāṃ bhajyamānāyāṃ hiraṇyakaśipuḥ svayam |
cikṣepāstrāṇi siṃhasya roṣavyākulalocanaḥ || 100 ||

sarvāstrāṇāmatha śreṣṭhaṃ daṃḍamastraṃ sudāruṇam |
kālacakraṃ tathā ghoraṃ viṣṇucakraṃ tathāparaṃ || 101 ||

paitāmahaṃ mahātyugraṃ trailokyanirmitaṃ mahat |
vicitrāmaśaniṃ caiva śuṣkādraṃ cāśanidvayam || 102 ||

raudraṃ tathograśūlaṃ ca kaṃkālaṃ musalaṃ tathā |
astraṃ brahmaśiraścaiva brāhmamastraṃ tathaiva ca || 103 ||

nārāyaṇāstramaiṃdraṃ ca āgneyaṃ śaiśiraṃ tathā |
vāyavyaṃ mathanaṃ caiva kapālamatha kiṃkaram || 104 ||

tathā pratihatāṃ śaktiṃ krauṃcamastraṃ tathaiva ca |
mohanaṃ śoṣaṇaṃ caiva saṃtāpanavilāpane || 105 ||

kaṃpanaṃ śātanaṃ caiva mahāstraṃ caiva rodhanam |
kālamudgaramakṣobhyaṃ tāpanaṃ ca mahābalam || 106 ||

saṃvartanaṃ mohanaṃ ca tathā māyādharaṃ varam |
gāndharvamastraṃ dayitamasiratnaṃ ca naṃdakam || 107 ||

prasvāpanaṃ pramathanaṃ vāruṇaṃ cāstramuttamam |
astraṃ pāśupataṃ caiva yasyā pratihatā gatiḥ || 108 ||

etānyastrāṇi divyāni hiraṇyakaśipustadā |
asṛjannarasiṃhasya dīptasyāgnerivāhutim || 109 ||

astraiḥ prajvalitaiḥ siṃhamāvṛṇodasurottamaḥ |
vivasvāngharmasamaye himavaṃtamivāṃśubhiḥ || 110 ||

sa hyamarṣānilodbhūto daityānāṃ sainyasāgaraḥ |
kṣaṇenāplāvayatsarvaṃ mainākamiva sāgaraḥ || 111 ||

prāsaiḥ pāśaiśca khaḍgaiśca gadābhirmusalaistathā |
vajrairaśanibhiścaiva bahuśākhairmahādrumaiḥ || 112 ||

mudgaraiḥ kūṭapāśaiśca śilolūkhalaparvataiḥ |
śataghnībhiśca dīptābhirdaṃḍairapi sudāruṇaiḥ || 113 ||

te dānavāḥ pāśagṛhītahastā maheṃdratulyāśanitulya vegāḥ |
samaṃtatobhyudyatabāhukāyāḥ sthitāḥ saśīrṣā iva nāgapotāḥ || 114 ||

suvarṇamālākulabhūṣitāṃgāḥ sutīkṣṇadaṃṣṭrākulavaktragartāḥ |
sphuratprabhāste ca saśṛṃgadehāścīnāṃśukā bhāṃti yathaiva haṃsāḥ || 115 ||

sosṛjaddānavo māyāmagniṃ vāyuṃ samīritam |
tamiṃdrastoyadaiḥ sārdhaṃ sahasrākṣo mahādyutiḥ || 116 ||

mahatā toyavarṣeṇa śamayamāsa pāvakam |
tasyāṃ pratihatāyāṃ tu māyāyāṃ yudhi dānavaḥ || 117 ||

asṛjadghorasaṃkāśaṃ tamastīvraṃ samaṃtataḥ |
tamasā saṃvṛte loke daityeṣvāttāyudheṣu ca || 118 ||

svatejasā parivṛto divākara ivodgataḥ |
triśikhāṃ bhrukuṭīmasya dadṛśurdānavā raṇe || 119 ||

lalāṭasthāṃ trikūṭasthāṃ gaṃgāṃ tripathagāmiva |
tataḥ sarvāsu māyāsu hatāsu ditinaṃdanāḥ || 120 ||

hiraṇyakaśipuṃ daityā viṣaṇṇāśśaraṇaṃ yayuḥ |
tataḥ prajvalitaḥ krodhātpradahanniva tejasā || 121 ||

tasminkruddhe tu daityeṃdre tamobhūtamabhūjjagat |
āvahaḥ pravahaścaiva vivahotha samīraṇaḥ || 122 ||

parāvahassaṃvahaśca udvahaśca mahābalaḥ |
tathā parivahaḥ śrīmānutpātabhayaśaṃsinaḥ || 123 ||

ityevaṃ kṣubhitāḥ sapta maruto gaganecarāḥ |
ye grahāssarvalokasya kṣaye prādurbhavaṃti hi || 124 ||

te sarve gagane hṛṣṭāvyacaraṃśca yathāsukham |
ayogataścāpyacaradyogaṃ niśi niśācaraḥ || 125 ||

sagrahaḥ saha nakṣatraistārāpatirariṃdama |
vivarṇatāṃ ca bhagavāngato divi divākaraḥ || 126 ||

kṛṣṇaḥ kabaṃdhaśca tadā lakṣyate sumahāndivi |
asṛjaccāsitāṃ sūryo dhūmavattāṃ vibhāvasuḥ || 127 ||

gaganasthaśca bhagavānabhīkṣṇaṃ pariviṣyate |
saptadhūmanibhā ghorāḥ sūryādi visamutthitāḥ || 128 ||

somasya gaganasthasya grahāstiṣṭhaṃti śṛṃṅgagāḥ |
vāme ca dakṣiṇe caiva sthitau śukrabṛhaspatī || 129 ||

śanaiścaro lohitāṃgo lohitāṃgasamadyutiḥ |
samaṃ samadhirohaṃta sarve vai gaganecarāḥ || 130 ||

śṛṃgāṇi śanakairghorā yugāṃtā varttana grahāḥ |
caṃdramāśca sanakṣatro grahaiḥ saha tamonudaḥ || 131 ||

carācaravināśāya rohiṇīṃ nābhyanaṃdata |
gṛhīto rāhuṇā candra ulkābhirabhihanyate || 132 ||

ulkāḥ prajvalitāścaṃdre vyacaraṃta yathāsukham |
devānāmadhipo devaḥ sopyavarṣata śoṇitam || 133 ||

apatadgaganādulkā vidyudrūpā mahāsvanā |
akāle ca drumāssarve puṣpyaṃti ca phalaṃti ca || 134 ||

latāśca saphalāḥ sarvā yā āhurdaityanāśikāḥ |
phale phalānyajāyaṃta puṣpe puṣpaṃ tathaiva ca || 135 ||

unmīlaṃti nimīlaṃti hasaṃti prarudaṃti ca |
vikrośaṃti ca gaṃbhīraṃ dhūmāyaṃte jvalaṃti ca || 136 ||

pratimāssarvadevānāṃ kathayaṃtyo mahadbhayam |
āraṇyaiḥ saha saṃsṛṣṭā grāmyāśca mṛgapakṣiṇaḥ || 137 ||

cukruśurbhairavaṃ tatra mṛgayuddha upasthite |
nadyaśca pratikūlāni vahaṃti kaluṣodakāḥ || 138 ||

na prākāśaṃta ca diśo raktareṇusamākulāḥ |
vānaspatyā na pūjyaṃte pūjanārhāḥ kathaṃcana || 139 ||

vāyuvegena hanyaṃte bhajyaṃte praṇamaṃti ca |
tathā ca sarvabhūtānāṃ chāyā na parivarttate || 140 ||

apareṇa gate sūrye salokānāṃ yugakṣaye |
tadā hiraṇyakaśipordaityasyopariveśmanaḥ || 141 ||

bhāṃḍāgārāyudhāgāre niviṣṭamabhavanmadhu |
asurāṇāṃ vināśāya surāṇāṃ vijayāya ca || 142 ||

dṛśyaṃte vividhotpātā ghorāghoranidarśanāḥ |
ete cānye ca bahavo ghorarūpāḥ samutthitāḥ || 143 ||

daityeṃdrasya vināśāya dṛśyaṃte raṇaśaṃsinaḥ |
medinyāṃ kaṃpamānāyāṃ daityeṃdreṇa mahātmanaḥ || 144 ||

mahīdharā nāgagaṇā nipeturamitaujasaḥ |
viṣajvālākulairvaktrairvimuṃcaṃto hutāśanam || 145 ||

catuḥśīrṣāḥ paṃcaśīrṣāḥ saptaśīrṣāśca pannagāḥ |
vāsukistakṣakaścaiva karkoṭakadhanaṃjayau || 146 ||

elāmukhaḥ kāliyaśca mahāpadmaśca vīryavān |
sahasraśīrṣaśśuddhāṃgo hematāladhvajaḥ prabhuḥ || 147 ||

śeṣonaṃto mahānāgo hyaprakaṃpyaśca kaṃpitāḥ |
dīpyaṃteṃtarjalasthāni pṛthivīvivarāṇi vai || 148 ||

saptadaityeṃdrakopena kaṃpitāni samaṃtataḥ |
nānātejodharāścāpi pātālatalacāriṇaḥ || 149 ||

pātāle sahasā kṣubdhe duṣprakaṃpyāḥ prakaṃpitāḥ |
hiraṇyakaśipurdaityastadā saṃspṛṣṭavānmahīm || 150 ||

saṃdaṣṭauṣṭhapuṭaḥ kruddho varāha iva pūrvajaḥ |
gaṃgā bhāgīrathī caiva kauśikī sarayūrapi || 151 ||

yamunā cātha kāverī kṛṣṇaveṇī ca nimnagā |
tuṃgabhadrā mahāvegā nadī godāvarī tathā || 152 ||

carmaṇvatī ca siṃdhuśca tathā nadanadīpatiḥ |
melakaprabhavaścaiva śoṇo maṇinibhodakaḥ || 153 ||

narmadā ca śubhasrotāstathā vetravatī nadī |
gomatī gokulākīrṇā tathā pūrvā sarasvatī || 154 ||

mahākālamahīcaiva tamasā puṣpavāhinī |
jaṃbūdvīpaṃ ratnavacca sarvaratnopaśobhitam || 155 ||

suvarṇapuṭakaṃ caiva suvarṇākaramaṃḍitam |
mahānadaśca lauhityaśśailaḥ kāṃcanaśobhitaḥ || 156 ||

pattanaṃ kośakārāṇāṃ kaśaṃ ca rajatākaram |
magadhāśca mahāgrāmāḥ puṇḍrā ugrāstathaiva ca || 157 ||

srughnā mallā videhāśca mālavāḥ kāśi kosalāḥ |
bhavanaṃ vainateyasya daityeṃdreṇābhikaṃpitam || 158 ||

kailāsaśikharākāraṃ yatkṛtaṃ viśvakarmaṇā |
ratnatoyo mahābhīmo lauhityo nāma sāgaraḥ || 159 ||

udayaśca mahāśaila ucchritaḥ śatayojanam |
savarṇavedikaḥ śrīmānmeghapaṃktiniṣevitaḥ || 160 ||

bhrājamānorkasadṛśairjātarūpamayairdrumaiḥ |
sālaistālaistamālaiśca karṇikāraiśca puṣpitaiḥ || 161 ||

ayomukhaśca vikhyātaḥ sarvato dhātumaṃḍitaḥ |
tamālavanagaṃdhaśca parvato malayaḥ śubhaḥ || 162 ||

surāṣṭrāśca sabāhlīkāśśūdrābhīrāstathaiva ca |
bhojāḥ pāṃḍyāśca vaṃgāśca kaliṃgāstāmraliptakāḥ || 163 ||

tathaiva pauṃḍrāḥ śubhrāśca vāmacūḍāssakeralāḥ |
kṣobhitāstena daityena devāścāpsarasāṃ gaṇāḥ || 164 ||

agastyabhavanaṃ caiva yadagastyakṛtaṃ purā |
siddhacāraṇasaṃghaiśca viprakīrṇaṃ manoharam || 165 ||

vicitranānāvihagaṃ sapuṣpitamahādrumam |
jātarūpamayaiḥ śṛṃgairapsarogaṇasevitam || 166 ||

giriḥ puṣpitakaścaiva lakṣmīvānpriyadarśanaḥ |
utthitaḥ sāgaraṃ bhitvā viśrāmaścaṃdrasūryayoḥ || 167 ||

rarāja sa mahāśṛṃgairgaganaṃ vilikhanniva |
caṃdrasūryāṃśusaṃkāśaiḥ sāgarāṃbusamāvṛtaiḥ || 168 ||

vidyuttvānparvataḥ śrīmānāyataḥ śatayojanam |
vidyutāṃ yatra saṃpātā nipātyaṃte nagottame || 169 ||

ṛṣabhaḥ parvataścaiva śrīmānṛṣabhasaṃsthitaḥ |
kuṃjaraḥ parvataḥ śrīmānagastyasya gṛhaṃ śubham || 170 ||

vimalākhyā ca durddharṣā sarpāṇāṃ mālatī purī |
tathā bhogavatī cāpi daityeṃdreṇābhikaṃpitā || 171 ||

mahāsenagiriścaiva pāriyātraśca parvataḥ |
cakravāṃśca giriśreṣṭho vārāhaścaiva parvataḥ || 172 ||

prāgjyotiṣapuraṃ cāpi jātarūpamayaṃ śubham |
yasminnuvāsa duṣṭātmā narako nāma dānavaḥ || 173 ||

meghaśca parvataśreṣṭho meghagaṃbhīranissvanaḥ |
ṣaṣṭistatra sahasrāṇi parvatānāṃ viśāṃpate || 174 ||

taruṇādityasaṃkāśo meruścaiva mahāngiriḥ |
yakṣarākṣasagaṃdharvairnityaṃ sevitakaṃdaraḥ || 175 ||

hemagarbho mahāsenastathā meghasakho giriḥ |
kailāsaścaiva śaileṃdro dānaveṃdreṇa kaṃpitaḥ || 176 ||

hemapuṣkarasañchannaṃ tena vaikhānasaṃ saraḥ |
kaṃpitaṃ mānasaṃ caiva haṃsakāraṃḍavākulam || 177 ||

triśṛṃgaḥ parvataśreṣṭhaḥ kumārī ca saridvarā |
tuṣāracayasaṃcchanno maṃdaraścāpi parvataḥ || 178 ||

uśīrabījaśca girirbhadraprasthastathādrirāṭ |
prajāpatigiriścaiva tathā puṣkaraparvataḥ || 179 ||

devābhaḥ parvataścaiva tathā vai vālukāgiriḥ |
krauṃcaḥ saptarṣiśailaśca dhūmravarṇaśca parvataḥ || 180 ||

ete cānye ca girayo deśā janapadāstathā |
nadyaḥ sasāgarāḥ sarvāḥ dānavenābhikaṃpitāḥ || 181 ||

kapilaśca mahīputro vyāghravāṃśca prakaṃpitaḥ |
khecarāśca niśāputrāḥ pātālatalavāsinaḥ || 182 ||

gaṇastathāparo raudro meghanāmāṃkuśāyudhaḥ |
ūrddhvago bhīmavegaśca sarva etebhikaṃpitāḥ || 183 ||

gadī śūlī karālaśca hiraṇyakaśipustathā |
jīmūtaghananirghoṣo jīmūta iva vegavān || 184 ||

devārirditijo dṛpto nṛsiṃhaṃ samupādravat |
sa tu tena tatastīkṣṇairmṛgeṃdreṇa mahānakhaiḥ || 185 ||

tadoṃkārasahāyena vidārya nihato yudhi |
mahī ca kālaśca śaśīnabhaśca grahāssa sūryāśca diśaśca sarvāḥ || 186 ||

nadyaśca śailāśca mahārṇavāśca gatāḥ prasādaṃ ditiputranāśāt |
tataḥ pramuditā devā ṛṣayaśca tapodhanāḥ || 187 ||

tuṣṭuvurnāmabhirdivyairādidevaṃ sanātanam |
yattvayā vidhṛtaṃ deva nārasiṃhamidaṃ vapuḥ || 188 ||

etadevārcayiṣyaṃti parāparavido janāḥ |
brahmovāca |
bhavānbrahmā ca rudraśca maheṃdro devasattamaḥ || 189 ||

bhavānkarttā vikarttā ca lokānāṃ prabhavo'vyayaḥ |
parāṃ ca siddhiṃ ca paraṃ ca satvaṃ paraṃ rahasyaṃ paramaṃ haviśca || 190 ||

paraṃ ca dharmaṃ paramaṃ yaśaśca tvāmāhuragryaṃ paramaṃ purāṇam |
paraṃ ca satyaṃ paramaṃ tapaśca paraṃ pavitraṃ paramaṃ ca mārgaṃ || 191 ||

paraṃ ca yajñaṃ paramaṃ ca hotraṃ tvāmāhuragyraṃ paramaṃ purāṇam |
paraṃ śarīraṃ paramaṃ ca brahma paraṃ ca yogaṃ paramāṃ ca vāṇīm || 192 ||

paraṃ rahasyaṃ paramāṃ gatiṃ ca tvāmāhuragyraṃ paramaṃ purāṇam |
evamuktvā tu bhagavānsarvalokapitāmahaḥ || 193 ||

stutvā nārāyaṇaṃ devaṃ brahmalokaṃ gataḥ prabhuḥ |
tato nadatsu tūryeṣu nṛtyaṃtīṣvapsaraḥsu ca || 194 ||

kṣīrodasyottaraṃ kūlaṃ jagāma harirīśvaraḥ |
nārasiṃhaṃ vapurdevaḥ sthāpayitvā sudīptimān || 195 ||

paurāṇaṃ rūpamāsthāya prayayau garaḍadhvajaḥ |
aṣṭacakreṇa yānena bhūtiyuktena bhāsvatā || 196 ||
avyaktaprakṛtirdevaḥ svasthānaṃ gatavānprabhuḥ || 197 ||

śrī bhīṣma uvāca |
narasiṃhasya māhātmyaṃ vistareṇa tvayeritaṃ |
tathā bhavasya māhātmyaṃ bhairavasyābhidhīyatām || 1 ||

pulastya uvāca |
tasyāpi devadevasya śṛṇu tvaṃ karma cottamaṃ |
āsīddaityoṃdhako nāma bhinnāṃjanacayopamaḥ || 2 ||

tapasā mahatā yukto hyavadhyastridivaukasām |
sa kadācinmahādevaṃ pārvatyā sahitaṃ vibhuṃ || 3 ||

krīḍamānaṃ tadā dṛṣṭvā hartuṃ devīṃ pracakrame |
etāṃ devīṃ harāmyadya viyoge mṛtyumeṣyati || 4 ||

tataḥ sthirā bhavitrī me bhāryaiṣā lokasuṃdarī |
bibauṣṭhaṃ cāruvadanaṃ cārukāṃtataraṃ mukhaṃ || 5 ||

yadyeṣā na bhavedbhāryā jīvite kiṃ prayojanam |
etāṃ matimathāsthāya maṃtribhiḥ saha maṃtrya ca || 6 ||

cakre yogaṃ sasainyasya senāpatimabhāṣata |
ānayasva rathaṃ mahyaṃ jaitraṃ devanipātanam || 7 ||

jayiṣye tridaśānsarvānviṣṇurudrapurogamān |
hariṣye parvatasutāṃ tayā me'pahṛtaṃ manaḥ || 8 ||

maṃtriṇā tasya cākhyātaḥ kanakasya vadhassuraiḥ |
parabhāryānuraktasya kṛto devaiḥ savāsavaiḥ || 9 ||

tataḥ kopaparītātmā hanmi devānsaśaṃkarān |
taṃ hatvā dānavaṃ śakro bhayādaṃdhāsurasya ca || 10 ||

jagāma śaraṇānveṣī kailāsaṃ śaṃkarālayaṃ |
dṛṣṭvā praṇamya deveśaṃ caṃdrārddhakṛtaśekharaṃ || 11 ||

bhīto vijñāpayāmāsa dhṛtasāhasralocanaḥ |
abhayaṃ dehi me deva dānavādaṃdhakādahaṃ || 12 ||

bibhemi tasya putrodya mayā yudhi nipātitaḥ |
tadyāvanna sa jānāti hataṃ putraṃ mahāsuraḥ || 13 ||

tāvattatrastha evāśu hanyatāṃ madbhayāvahaḥ |
strīlaulyāddānavaḥ krūraḥ parabhāryāpahārakaḥ || 14 ||

sarvathā ghātanīyaste bhavatā surasattama |
śakrasyaivaṃ vacaḥ śrutvā śaraṇyaḥ śaṃkarastadā || 15 ||

dadāvabhayamevāsau mā bhairiti śatakratoḥ |
dattābhayotha kailāsādājagāma kuśasthalīm || 16 ||

vṛto bhūtagaṇairīśo vadhārthamaṃdhakasya tu |
kṛtvā rūpaṃ mahākāyaṃ viśvarūpaṃ subhairavaṃ || 17 ||

sarpairjvaladbhirdhāvadbhirbhīmaṃ bhīmabhujaṃgavat |
jaṭāsaṭābhirākāśaṃ phaṇiratnaśikhārciṣā || 18 ||

dahannatīvatejobhiḥ kālāgniriva saṃkṣaye |
mukhairdaṃṣṭrāṃkurāṃkaiśca dvitīyendukalojjvalaiḥ || 19 ||

pātālodararūpābhairbhairavārāvanādibhiḥ |
bhujairanekasāhasrairbahuśastrakṛtagrahaḥ || 20 ||

bahvābharaṇabhūṣāḍhyai raṇe ghoraninādibhiḥ |
siṃhacarmaparīdhānaṃ vyāghratvaguttarīyakaṃ || 21 ||

gajājinakṛtāṭopaṃ patadbhṛṃgaravākulaṃ |
īdṛgrūpaṃ vidhāyeśo danudaityabhayāvahaṃ || 22 ||

avātaranmahīṃ bhīmo danūnāṃ kṣayakārakaḥ |
aṃdhāsuropi danujaḥ putraṃ śrutvā hataṃ yudhi || 23 ||

krodhena tamasāviṣṭo raṇatūryāṇyacodayat |
saṃhatyāvahitaḥ prāpto yatra te tridaśāḥ sthitāḥ || 24 ||

mahatyā senayā sārddhaṃ rathavāraṇayuktayā |
te devā dānavānvīkṣya mahāhavakṛtādarān || 25 ||

vyapayātatanutrāṇāḥ śaṃbhuṃ śaraṇamanvayuḥ |
mā bhairiti ca tāndevo devānuktvā trilocanaḥ || 26 ||

gṛhītvā śūlamātiṣṭhaddaṃṣṭrāravadharo ruṣā |
aṃdhakenātha ruṣṭena śatakoṭiśarairgaṇāḥ || 27 ||

nihatāścāpi devānāṃ bahūnāmekatākṛtāṃ |
sasphuliṃgārciṣo vahnermuṃcamānaḥ pinākadhṛk || 28 ||

śaraiḥ samāvṛtaṃ cakre aṃdhakaṃ rathagaṃ tataḥ |
danunātho rathasthotha śithilaḥ śithilāyudhaḥ || 29 ||

nimaṃtrya dānavānsarvānsa yoddhumupacakrame |
bahudhā tadbalaṃ bhagnaṃ vividhāyudhayodhibhiḥ || 30 ||

yudhi vīrairhataṃ devaiḥ sthāṇunā sakhyamāśritaiḥ |
dānavaścāṃdhakaḥ sainyaṃ bhinnaṃ dṛṣṭvā kṛtaṃ suraiḥ || 31 ||

ātmānaṃ ca maheśena niruddhaṃ bāṇakoṭibhiḥ |
vihvalībhūtadehosau dhairyamālaṃbya kevalam || 32 ||

pinākaṃ caiva rudrasya gṛhya rudramatāḍayat |
pinākasyābhighātena rudro bhūmimathāgamat || 33 ||

bhūmau nipātite deve calitaṃ bhuvanatrayaṃ |
tatyajuḥ sāgarā velāṃ parvatāḥ śikharāṇi ca || 34 ||

nakṣatrāṇi viyogīni jagmurmuktānyanekaśaḥ |
patite bhuvi deveśe aṃdhako gadayā punaḥ || 35 ||

jaghāna ruṣito nāgaṃ hatvā taṃ pātayadbhuvi |
śivaṃ tyaktvā nāgarājaḥ prapalāyyānyato gataḥ || 36 ||

muhūrttāccetanāṃ labdhvā utthitaḥ parameśvaraḥ |
gṛhītvā paraśuṃ divyaṃ dānavaṃ naiva paśyati || 37 ||

kṛtvā tu tāmasīṃ māyāṃ māyāśataviśāradaḥ |
tayā vimohite deve kva nu vai dānavo gataḥ || 38 ||

śaṃbhorbhayamatho prāpya kiṃ nu pāpaḥ kariṣyati |
tamasā chāditā yāvaddevā vyākulatāṃ gatāḥ || 39 ||

saṃbhrāṃtamānasānīkāstadocuḥ kāryagauravāt |
etasminnaṃtare sūryastejorūpo vyavasthitaḥ || 40 ||

uttasthau nararūpeṇa kurvanvitimirā diśaḥ |
naṣṭe tamasi hṛṣṭāṅge khadyote prakaṭe sthite || 41 ||

devā mudamavāpuste spaṣṭānanavilocanāḥ |
uddīptāstu surāḥ sarve gaṇāḥ skaṃdapurogamāḥ || 42 ||

stuvaṃti vividhaistotraiḥ nararūpaṃ divākaram |
anaupamyaṃ jagadvyāpi brahmaviṣṇuśivātparam || 43 ||

snigdhavidrumasacchāyaṃ siṃdūrāruṇasaprabham |
prabhāsaṃtaṃ tadā dṛṣṭvā paṃcāṃgāliṃgitāvaniḥ || 44 ||

punaḥ praṇāmapravaṇaṃ praṇidhānapuraḥsaram |
ālokya snigdhayā dṛṣṭyā devadevaṃ trilocanaḥ || 45 ||

uvāca snigdhagaṃbhīra vācā devaṃ śanairharaḥ |
pūrayanniva tejobhirbhagavānbhuvanatrayam || 46 ||

daityamāyābhipannānāṃ darśanākulacetasām |
prāṇināmidamevaikamavisaṃvādi daivatam || 47 ||

ayameva ca saṃsārasāgarātsakalādapi |
sattvānuttārayandevaḥ karṇadhārāya te prabhuḥ || 48 ||

yajaṃto jaṃtavo bhaktyā yaṃ devaṃ vividhāḥ sadā |
niḥśreyasāya kalpaṃte taṃ nato bhāskaraṃ vibhum || 49 ||

yastūdayādriśikhare makuṭāyamānalīlāgabhastibhiralaṃ kusumaprakāśaiḥ |
vyāpya svadīdhitigaṇaiḥ pradiśo diśaśca dedīpyate sa savitā vibhavāya loke || 50 ||

brahmeṃdrarudramarudacyutavahnipātho nātha prayoganipuṇaiśca ṛṣīṃdrasaṃghaiḥ |
śreyorthibhiḥ pratidinaṃ divasāṃgarāgairdivyāṃgarāgaparilipta samastadaihaiḥ || 51 ||

pūjyaṃ vapustava sadā pralaye hi vedairgīrbhirvicitrapadamaṃḍalamaṃḍitābhiḥ |
ye tvāṃ stuvaṃti parasadmani sadmahīnā nityaṃ prasāritakarā bhuvi te bhavaṃti || 52 ||

ye dadrukuṣṭhapiṭikādibhirarditāṃgāḥ śīrṇatvacaḥ kunakhinaścyutakeśanāśāḥ |
deveśa tepi tavapādanatā bhavaṃti sadyo dviraṣṭaśaradākṛtayo manuṣyāḥ || 53 ||

sāmeti sāmagagaṇā hi makhārthakaṃ tvāmadhvaryavastvṛgiti bahvṛcamukhyapūgāḥ |
tvāmevamāryamiti kāryavidodhigaṃtuṃ nāgāśca veti pitaropyatha sarvagaṃdham || 54 ||

māyeti copaniṣadarkaṣaḍeva devā martyāstathā vayamiveha upāsate'mī |
gaṃdharvakinnaragaṇāḥ sahacāraṇaistu rūpaṃ tathā ca bhagavanpratipadyase tvam || 55 ||

yenārcayaṃti satataṃ bhavatorcyamarcisterciṣpratāpitadigaṃbaravittahīnāḥ |
kṣutkṣāmakaṃṭhajaṭharāghaṭakharpareṇa bhikṣāmaṭaṃti paraveśmasuterthahīnāḥ || 56 ||

utphullakokanadakośaviśālanetramīṣadvilāsalulitāñcitapiṃgatāram |
kāmaṃ praśastatarasuṃdarahāraramyamuttuṃgapīvarapayodharabhārakhinnaṃ || 57 ||

raṃbhopamoru pṛthupīnanitaṃbabiṃbānaddhakvaṇanmaṇiraṇadraśanākalāpaṃ |
bṛṃdaṃ lalāṭataṭakoṭipaṭāṃtalaṃbi hemāṃcalāṃcitamukhaṃ kulapālikānām || 58 ||

kāṃtaṃ gṛheṣu kalagadgadabhāṣitānāṃ jhaṃkāranūpuraraveṇavirāvitānām |
teṣāṃ kṛśānukaramindusamānakāṃtaṃ yairarcitosi bhagavanbhavamocanastvaṃ || 59 ||

brahmā tvameva harirasyanilo'nalosi rudroṃ'takosi varuṇo'syamarādhiposi |
somosi vāyurasi bhūrasi ceśvarosi yajñosi vittapatirasyaparājitosi || 60 ||

te saptasaptisuravāharaṇena muktā bhūmāvatheti tarasorutaraṃtarītāḥ |
vyomaitadaṃtarahitaṃ parito hi gatvā gacchaṃti na śramadaṃ himanāgapīme || 61 ||

dhyānaikayoganiratāśca samādhibhāvātdhyātvā padaṃ tava turīyamanaṃtamūrte |
muktāmayāstanubhṛto na bhiyābhiyuktāstadbrahmaśāśvatamaciṃtyamanādyanaṃtaṃ || 62 ||

janmādirogarahitaṃ paramaṃ purāṇamīśaṃ jarāmaraṇaśokabhayātiriktam |
sthūlānubhāvanagaṇāgaṇitaṃ viśuddhaṃ vedāṃtavādibhiralaṃ parimanyate yat || 63 ||

tvāmagnipuṃjavapuṣaṃ tapasāṃ nivāsaṃ yātā divaṃ sucirakālamupāsyabhaktāḥ |
