bhāno surāsurasamūhaśironighṛṣṭa pādāraviṃdayugalāmalacārumūrtte || 64 ||

bhūteśabhūtavaradā sakṛdavyayātmanvyomāṭṭahāsasavitarbhuvanaikadīpa |
ṛksāmamaṃtrayajuṣāmadhivāsa nāma sṛṣṭisthitipralayakāraṇalokapāla || 65 ||

dīnasya deva kṛpaṇasya bhavebhave me magnasya cārudavicāra manorathāni |
śaśvadyatīśvara śaśī karakaṃkaghorotpāto jarāmaraṇaśokarugāṃtarasya || 66 ||

yaḥ prātaḥ sāyamidaṃ madhyāhne vā paṭhecca dīptāṃśoḥ |
sālokyaṃ yāti raveḥ prāpnoti dharmārthakāmāṃśca || 67 ||

nityaṃ tasmācca sūryācca manasobhihitaṃ ca yat |
namaste devadeveśa bhaktānāmabhayaṃkara || 68 ||

subrahmaṇya namaste tu sarvadevanamaskṛta |
tigmāṃśo vai namastubhyaṃ jagataścakṣuṣe namaḥ || 69 ||

prabhākara namastestu bhāno jaya jagatpate |
anena danumukhyena pīḍitohaṃ jagatpate || 70 ||

kiṃ karomi kathaṃ cainaṃ ghātayāmi divākara |
sūrya uvāca |
jaya śūlena pāpiṣṭhaṃ māyāśataviśāradam || 71 ||

jayaṃ prāpnuhi deveśa hatvā śūlena cāṃdhakam |
gṛhya śūlaṃ tato dūramākṣipya hara tejasā || 72 ||

tatondhakastriśūlenātāḍayatpāpakarmakṛt |
tasminyuddhe tathā rudro hyandhakenābhipīḍitaḥ || 73 ||

mumoca bāṇamutyugraṃ nāmnā pāśupataṃ hi yat |
pinākamānamya dorbhyāṃ pinākī śaṃkaraḥ svayam || 74 ||

rudrabāṇavinirbhedādrudhirādandhakasya tu |
aṃdhakāśca samutpannāśśataśotha sahasraśaḥ || 75 ||

teṣāṃ vidāryamāṇānāṃ rudhirādapare punaḥ |
babhūvuraṃdhakā ghorā yairvyāptamakhilaṃ jagat || 76 ||

taṃ tu māyāvinaṃ dṛṣṭvā devadevastadāṃdhakam |
pānārthamaṃdhakasyāsraṃ sasṛje mātṛkāstadā || 77 ||

māheśvarīṃ tathā brāhmīṃ śaurīṃ vā bāḍavīṃ tathā |
sauparṇīmatha vāyavyāṃ śaṃkhinīṃ taittirīṃ tathā || 78 ||

saurīṃ saumyāṃ śivadūtīṃ cāmuṃḍāmatha vāruṇīṃ |
vārāhīṃ nārasiṃhīṃ ca vaiṣṇavīṃ ca vibhāvarīṃ || 79 ||

śatānaṃdāṃ bhagānaṃdāṃ picchilāṃ bhagamālinīṃ |
bālāmatibalāṃ raktāṃ surabhīṃ mukhamaṃḍitām || 80 ||

mātṛnaṃdāṃ sunaṃdāṃ ca biḍānīṃ śakunīṃ tathā |
revatīṃ ca mahāpuṇyāṃ tathaiva śikhipaṭṭikāṃ || 81 ||

śūlena ca tato daityaṃ bibheda tripurāṃtakaḥ |
nirgataṃ rudhiraṃ tasmātpapustā mātarastadā || 82 ||

nīrakto hi tadā daityaśśuṣkatāṃ prāpa bhūpate |
śūle protastadā daityo divyavarṣasahasrakam || 83 ||

mahābalena rudreṇa vidhṛtopi mṛto nahi |
stutastena tadā śaṃbhurbhaktyā daityena suvrata || 84 ||

namostu śaṃbho bhavanāśaheto namostu te deva varaprasīda |
tvaṃ bhū jalāgnīranabhorkasomayajvāṣṭamūrtirbhavabhāvanolam || 85 ||

tvāṃ vai bāṇo bahuvādyena toṣya prāptaścaiśyaṃ sve pure tatsvarakṣyam |
rakṣodhīśo bāhubhistolyaśailaṃ yuṣmatkrāṃtakliṣṭarūpo hyanauṣīt || 86 ||

prāptopyaiśyaṃ sarvarakṣogaṇānāṃ putraṃ cāpi prorjitaṃ śakrabaṃdham |
bhavabhayahara hara parama udāra mama sukhakaraṇa nikhila surasāra || 87 ||

jitamarudabhimatavitaraṇapāra tava padakamalamihāraṇasāra |
taveśa pādapaṃkajaṃ karoti yo naro hṛdi sadeśatasya vāṃchitaṃ dadāsi bhaktibhāvitaḥ || 88 ||

munīśvarāḥ purā haraṃ bhavaṃtamevamādarātprapūjya liṃgarūpiṇaṃ samāpitā manorathān |
bhavodbhavaikarūpiṇaṃ prapaṃcapaṃcakākṛtiṃ viciṃtyavṛkṣakoṭarastha eṣa jīvajīvanaṃ || 89 ||

bhavedbhavāṅghriciṃtanāptasarvakāmaīśvara tvadīya kiṃkarānvite pade pade samāgataḥ |
mūḍhohaṃ nābhijānāmi tvāṃ stotuṃ bhaktavatsala || 90 ||

sadīśvareṇa manasāpyanukaṃpyo raṇaṃ gataḥ |
iti stuto maheśastu bhaktyā daityena sādaraṃ || 91 ||

gaṇeśatāṃ dadau tasmai nāma bhṛṃgīriṭīti ca |
eṣa te mahimā bhūpa harasya bhavahāriṇaḥ || 92 ||

kathito vighnavighnākhyastatparāṇāṃ sukhāvahaḥ |
bhīṣma uvāca |
manuṣyasyāpi devatvaṃ sukhaṃ rājyaṃ dhanaṃ yaśaḥ || 93 ||

jayaṃ bhogyaṃ tathārogyamāyurvidyāṃ śriyaṃ sutaṃ |
baṃdhuvarga śivaṃ sarvaṃ brūhi me viprasattama || 94 ||

pulastya uvāca |
ebhirguṇairyutaḥ śrīmānsadaivabrāhmaṇo bhuvi |
trailokye tu sadā medhyo vipradevo yugeyuge || 95 ||

pūjayitvā dvijāndevāḥ svargaṃ bhuṃjaṃti cākṣayaṃ |
dharāmavaṃti rājāno lokāvittaṃ sukhaṃ śivaṃ || 96 ||

loke vipra samo nāsti devānāmapi daivataṃ |
sa ca dharmamayaḥ sākṣādbhuvi muktiprado bhṛśaṃ || 97 ||

lokānāṃ sa guruḥ pūjyastīrthabhūto'nagho janaḥ |
sarvadevālayaḥ satvo nirmito brahmaṇā purā || 98 ||

imamarthaṃ purā pṛṣṭo nāradena pitāmahaḥ |
kasmiṃstu pūjite brahmanprasādī mādhavo bhavet || 99 ||

brahmovāca |
yasya viprāḥ prasīdaṃti tasya viṣṇuḥ prasīdati |
tasmādbrāhmaṇa śuśrūṣuḥ paraṃ brahmādhigacchati || 100 ||

viṣṇurbrāhmaṇadeheṣu sadā vasati nānyathā |
tasmādbrāhmaṇapūjāyāṃ viṣṇustuṣyati tatkṣaṇāt || 101 ||

viprānyaḥ pūjayennityaṃ dānamānārcanādibhiḥ |
kṛtaṃ kratuśataṃ tena vidhyuktaṃ priyadakṣiṇam || 102 ||

brāhmaṇasya mukhaṃ kṣetramanūṣaramakaṇṭakam |
vāpayetsarvabījāni sā kṛṣissārvakālikī || 103 ||

abhigamya tu yaddattaṃ yacca dānaṃ manoramaṃ |
vidyate sāgarasyāṃto dānasyāṃto na vidyate || 104 ||

manasāpi na hiṃsaṃti bhūdevamātatāyinaṃ |
manonukūlatāṃ yāṃti devairapi ca durlabhāṃ || 105 ||

gṛhe yasyāgato vidvānnairāśyaṃ nopagacchati |
sarvapāpakṣayastasya cākṣayaṃ svargamaśnute || 106 ||

kāle deśe ca pātre ca vipre yaccārpayedvasu |
taddhanaṃ cākṣayaṃ viddhi janmajanmani tiṣṭhati || 107 ||

na ca dāridyatāmeti nāturo na ca kātaraḥ |
manonukūlāṃ pramadāmarcayitvā dvijānlabhet || 108 ||

kṛtvā sāhasakarmāṇi dadyādviprāya parvasu |
taddānaṃ suguṇaṃ proktamabhayaṃ lābha eva ca || 109 ||

viprapādatalodghṛṣṭi kṣatī bhavati yaḥ karaḥ |
sa karaḥ śrīkaro nāma anyaḥ karmakaraḥ karaḥ || 110 ||

viprapādarajaḥ pūtāḥ pūtāstajjalabindubhiḥ |
vipadbhiśca sadā pāpairmuktā yāṃti triviṣṭapam || 111 ||

viprapādarajaḥ pūtāḥ śucayo gṛha catvarāḥ |
puṇyakṣetrasamāste syuḥ praśastā yajñakarmasu || 112 ||

ādau brahmamukhādvipraḥ samudbhūtaḥ purānaghaḥ |
vedāstatraiva saṃjātāḥ sṛṣṭisaṃsthiti hetavaḥ || 113 ||

tasmādvipramukhe vedāścārpitāḥ puruṣeṇa hi |
pūjārthaṃ sarvalokānāṃ sarvayajñārthato dhruvam || 114 ||

pitṛyajñe vivāhe ca vahnikāryeṣu śāṃtiṣu |
praśastā brāhmaṇā nityaṃ sarva svastyayaneṣu ca || 115 ||

devā bhuṃjaṃti havyāni balipretādayo'surāḥ |
pitaraścaiva kavyāni viprasyaiva mukhādrdhuvam || 116 ||

devebhyaśca pitṛbhyaśca yo dadyādyajñakarmasu |
dānaṃ homaṃ baliṃ caiva vinā vipreṇa niṣphalam || 117 ||

bhuṃjaṃti cāsurāstatra pretā daityāśca rākṣasāḥ |
tasmādbrāhmaṇamāhūya teṣu karmāṇi kārayet || 118 ||

kāle deśe ca pātre ca lakṣakoṭiguṇaṃ bhavet |
śraddhayā ca dvijaṃ dṛṣṭvā prakuryādabhivādanam || 119 ||

dīrghāyustasya vākyena ciraṃjīvī bhavennaraḥ |
anabhivādanādvipra dveṣādaśraddhayāpi ca || 120 ||

āyuḥ kṣīṇaṃ bhavetpuṃsāṃ bhūtināśaśca durgatiḥ |
āyurvṛddhiryaśovṛddhirvṛddhirvidyā dhanasya ca || 121 ||

pūjayitvā dvijānśreṣṭho bhavennāstyatra saṃśayaḥ |
na viprapādodakakardamāni na vedaśāstrapratighoṣitāni || 122 ||

svāhā svadhā svastivivarjitāni śmaśānatulyāni gṛhāṇi tāni |
nārada uvāca |
kaśca pūjyatamo vipro hyapūjyo vātha ko bhavet || 123 ||

viprasya lakṣaṇaṃ brūhi yāthātathyaṃ gurorapi |
brahmovāca |
pūjyaḥ śrotriyako nityaṃ sadācārasamanvitaḥ || 124 ||

sadvṛttaḥ kaluṣairmuktastīrthabhūto jano'naghaḥ |
nārada uvāca |
jātaḥ kaḥ śrotriyastāta satkule vāpyasatkule || 125 ||

sadasatkarmakartā vā kaḥ pūjyo bhuvi bāḍavaḥ |
brahmovāca |
satśrotriyakule jāto hyakriyo naiva pūjitaḥ || 126 ||

asatkṣetrakule pūjyo vyāsa vaibhāṃḍakau yathā |
kṣatriyāṇāṃ kule jāto viśvāmitrosti matsamaḥ || 127 ||

veśyāputro vasiṣṭhaśca anye siddhā dvijādayaḥ |
tasmātsacchotriyādīnāṃ śṛṇu putraka lakṣaṇam || 128 ||

dharāyāṃ tīrthabhūtānāṃ sarvapāpaharāya ca |
janmanā brāhmaṇo jñeyaḥ saṃskārairdvija ucyate || 129 ||

vidyayā yāti vipratvaṃ tribhiḥ śrotriyalakṣaṇam |
vidyāpūto maṃtrapūto vedapūtastathaiva ca || 130 ||

tīrthasnānādibhirmedhyo vipraḥ pūjyatamaḥ smṛtaḥ |
nārāyaṇe sadā bhaktaḥ śuddhāṃtaḥkaraṇastathā || 131 ||

jiteṃdriyo jitakrodhassamaḥ sarvajaneṣu ca |
gurudevātitherbhaktaḥ pitroḥ śuśrūṣaṇe rataḥ || 132 ||

paradāre mano yasya kadācinnaiva modate |
purāṇakathako nityaṃ dharmākhyānasya saṃtatiḥ || 133 ||

asyaiva darśanānnityamaśvamedhādijaṃ phalam |
saṃlāpe gatimetyasya bhāgīrathyā plavasya ca || 134 ||

vrataiśca vividhaiḥ pūto nityasnānadvijārcanaiḥ |
mitrāmitre dayāluḥ syātsamaḥ sarvajaneṣu ca || 135 ||

parasvaṃ na haredyastu tṛṇamapyaṭavīgatam |
kāmakrodhādinirmukta iṃdriyairajitaḥ pumān || 136 ||

paradārānna gṛhṇāti manasāpi gṛhāgatān |
nārada uvāca |
gāyatryā lakṣaṇaṃ kiṃ vā pratyekākṣarajaṃ guṇam || 137 ||

kukṣicaraṇagotrāṇāṃ tasyā brūhi suniścayam |
brahmovāca |
chaṃdo gāyatrī gāyatryāḥ savitā devatā dhruvam || 138 ||

śuklavarṇātvagnimukhā viśvāmitra ṛṣistathā |
brahmaṇaśśiraārūḍhā śikhā viṣṇu hṛdi sthitā || 139 ||

upanayane niyogaḥ syātsāṃkhyāyana sagotrajā |
trailokyacaraṇā jñeyā pṛthivīkukṣi saṃsthitā || 140 ||

caturviṃśatisthāne ca pādādau mastakāṃtake |
caturviṃśatyakṣaraṃ nyasya brahmalokaṃ sa viṃdati || 141 ||

pratyarṇadevatāṃ jñātvā viṣṇusāyujyamāpnuyāt |
aparaṃ ca pravakṣyāmi gāyatryā lakṣaṇaṃ dhruvaṃ || 142 ||

saptapaṃca tathā brahma yajuraṣṭādaśākṣaram |
jvalanādihakārāṃtaṃ jale sthitvā śataṃ japet || 143 ||

upapātakakoṭyā tu tathātipātakairapi |
brahmahatyādibhiḥ pāpairmuktā yāṃti mamālayaṃ || 144 ||

oṃagnervākpuṃsi yajurvedena juṣṭātsomaṃ piba svāhā |
viṣṇumaṃtraṃ mahāmaṃtraṃ tathā māheśvarasya ca || 145 ||

devīsūryagaṇeśānāṃ tathā kratubhujāṃ suta |
yasya kasya kule jāto guṇavāneva tairguṇaiḥ || 146 ||

sākṣādbrahmamayo vipraḥ pūjanīyaḥ prayatnataḥ |
dānaṃ dadyācca vidhivatsadā parvaṇi parvaṇi || 147 ||

akṣayaṃ labhate dātā janmakoṭiśatānprati |
svādhyāyanirato vipro yaḥ paṭhetpāṭhayetparān || 148 ||

dharmaṃ ca śrāvayelloke sadācāraṃ śrutiṃ smṛtiṃ |
purāṇasaṃhitāṃ nūnaṃ tathaiva dharmasaṃhitāṃ || 149 ||

śrāvayitvā tu lokeṣu śrāvayitvā dvijātiṣu |
urvyāṃ viṣṇusamaḥ sopi pūjanīyo naraiḥ suraiḥ || 150 ||

yadbalaṃ cākṣayaṃ tasya tīrthabhūtānaghasya ca |
samānamarcanaṃ kṛtvā naro yātyacyutālayaṃ || 151 ||

kadācitkriyate pāpaṃ vipraḥ pāpairna lipyate |
cāṃḍālasya gṛhe niṣṭhau bhāskarajvalanau yathā || 152 ||

yājanādhyāpanādyaunāttathaivāsatpratigrahāt |
viprāṇāṃ na bhaveddoṣo jvalanārkasamā dvijāḥ || 153 ||

tānpratigrahajāndoṣānprāṇāyāma vyavasthitāḥ |
nāśayaṃtīha pāpāni vāyurmeghamivāṃbare || 154 ||

gāyatrīṃ yo japennityaṃ prāṇāyāmasamanvitāṃ |
pratyakṣarāmarairyuktāṃ svāṅge vinyasya tāmapi || 155 ||

sarvapāpādvinirmukto janmakoṭikṛtādapi |
brahmaṇaḥ padavīṃ prāpya sa gacchetprakṛteḥ param || 156 ||

prāṇāyāmayutāṃ tasmādgāyatrīṃ japa nārada |
nārada uvāca |
prāṇāyāmāḥ kathaṃ brahmanpratyekākṣaradevatāḥ || 157 ||

teṣāṃ nyāsaṃ tathāṃgeṣu vada tāta yathākramam |
brahmovāca |
gudadeśetvapānasyāddhṛdi prāṇosti dehinaḥ || 158 ||

tasmādgudaṃ samākuṃcya prāṇena saha yojayet |
pūrakeṇa tadā putra kṛtvā kuṃbhakamuttamaṃ || 159 ||

prāṇāyāmatrayaṃ kṛtvā gāyatrīṃ saṃjapedidvajaḥ |
anenaiva japedyastu mahāpātakasaṃcayaḥ || 160 ||

sakṛduccāritenaiva kṣayaṃ yātyupapātakaṃ |
prativarṇasvaraṃ jñātvā vinyasyedyaḥ kalevare || 161 ||

sa jano brahmatāmeti phalaṃ vaktuṃ na śaknumaḥ |
pratyakṣarasya yaddaivaṃ śṛṇu putra vadāmyahaṃ || 162 ||

yajjaptvā ca punarmātustanaṃ na pibati dvijaḥ |
āgneyaṃ prathamaṃ jñeyaṃ vāyavyaṃ tu dvitīyakam || 163 ||

tṛtīyaṃ sūryadaivatyaṃ caturthaṃ vaiyataṃ tathā |
paṃcamaṃ yamadaivatyaṃ vāruṇaṃ ṣaṣṭhamucyate || 164 ||

saptamaṃ bārhaspatyaṃ tu pārjanyaṃ cāṣṭamaṃ viduḥ |
aindraṃ ca navamaṃ jñeyaṃ gāṃdharvaṃ daśamaṃ tathā || 165 ||

pauṣṇamekādaśaṃ viddhi maitraṃ dvādaśakaṃ smṛtaṃ |
tvāṣṭraṃ trayodaśaṃ jñeyaṃ vāsavaṃ tu caturdaśaṃ || 166 ||

mārutaṃ paṃcadaśakaṃ saumyaṃ ṣoḍaśakaṃ smṛtaṃ |
āṃgirasaṃ saptadaśaṃ vaiśvadevamataḥ paraṃ || 167 ||

āśvinaṃ caikonaviṃśaṃ prājāpatyaṃ tu viṃśakaṃ |
sarvadevamayaṃ jñeyamekaviṃśakamakṣaraṃ || 168 ||

raudraṃ dvāviṃśakaṃ jñeyaṃ brāhmaṃ jñeyamataḥ paraṃ |
vaiṣṇavaṃ tu caturviṃśametā akṣaradevatāḥ || 169 ||

japakāle tu saṃciṃtya tāsu sāyujyatāṃ vrajet |
jñātvā tu devatāstasya vāṅmayaṃ viditaṃ bhavet || 170 ||

sarvapāpavinirmukto brahmaṇaḥ padavīṃ vrajet |
gāyatrīṃ vinyasetpūrvaṃ śarīre cātmano budhaḥ || 171 ||

caturviṃśati sthāneṣu āpādamastakeṣu ca |
tatkāraṃ vinyasedyogī padāṃguṣṭhe vicakṣaṇaḥ || 172 ||

sakāraṃ gulphadeśe tu vikāraṃ jaṃghayornyaset |
tukāraṃ jānumadhye ca vakāraṃ corudeśataḥ || 173 ||

rekāraṃ guhyadeśe tu ṇikāraṃ vṛṣaṇe nyaset |
yaṃkāraṃ kaṭideśe tu bhakāraṃ nābhimaṇḍale || 174 ||

gokāraṃ jaṭhare nyasya dekāraṃ stanayornyaset |
vakāraṃ hṛdaye nyasya syakāraṃ karadeśataḥ || 175 ||

dhīkāraṃ vadane nyasya makāraṃ tāluke nyaset |
hikāraṃ nāsikāgre ca dhikāraṃ cakṣuṣornyaset || 176 ||

yokāraṃ tu bhruvormadhye yokāraṃ ca lalāṭake |
naḥkāraṃ tu mukhe pūrve prakāraṃ dakṣiṇe mukhe || 177 ||

cokāraṃ paścime nyasya dakāraṃ cottare nyaset |
yātkāraṃ mūrdhni vinyasya sarvavyāpī vyavasthitaḥ || 178 ||

etānvinyasya dharmātmā brahmaviṣṇuśivātmakaḥ |
mahāyogī mahājñānī paraṃ nirvāṇakaṃ vrajet || 179 ||

saṃdhyākāle punarnyāsaṃ śṛṇu tvaṃ tadyathārthataḥ |
oṃbhūriti hṛdaye nyasya oṃbhuvaśśirasi nyaset || 180 ||

oṃsvaḥ śikhāyai tatsaviturvareṇyamiti kalevare |
oṃbhargo devasya dhīmahīti netrayoḥ || 181 ||

oṃdhiyo yo naḥ pracodayāditi karayornyaset |
oṃāpo jyotī rasomṛtaṃ brahma bhūrbhuvaḥsvarom |
ityudakasparśamātreṇa pāpātpūto vrajeddhariṃ || 182 ||

oṃbhūḥ oṃbhuvaḥ oṃsvaḥ oṃmahaḥ oṃjanaḥ oṃtapaḥ oṃsatyam |
oṃtatsaviturvareṇyaṃ bhargo devasya dhīmahi dhiyo yo naḥ pracodayāt |
oṃāpo jyotī rasomṛtaṃ brahma bhūrbhuvaḥsvarom |
iti savyāhṛti sapraṇavāṃ dvādaśa oṃkārāṃ saṃdhyākāle kuṃbhakena vāratrayaṃ japtvā |
sūryopasthāne sāvitrīṃ caturviṃśatyakṣarāṃ japtvā |
mahāvidyādhiko bhavati brahmatvaṃ labhate || 183 ||

ṣaṭkukṣilakṣaṇāṃ putra gāyatrīṃ śṛṇu yatnataḥ |
yāṃ jñātvā tu paraṃ brahmasthānaṃ gacchati vai dvijaḥ || 184 ||
oṃtatsaviturvareṇiyaṃ bhargo devasya dhīmahi dhiyo yo naḥ pracodayāt || 185 ||

atha gāyatrī paṃcaśīrṣalakṣaṇam |
oṃbhūḥ oṃbhuvaḥ oṃsvaḥ oṃmahaḥ oṃjanaḥ oṃtapaḥ oṃsatyam |
oṃtatsaviturvareṇyaṃ bhargo devasya dhīmahi dhiyo yo naḥ pracodayāt || 186 ||

savyāhṛtiṃ tu gāyatrīṃ punarnyāsaṃ tu kārayet |
sarvapāpavinirmukto viṣṇusāyujyatāṃ vrajet || 187 ||

oṃbhūḥ pādābhyām oṃbhuvaḥ jānubhyām oṃsvaḥ kaṭyām oṃmahaḥ nābhau oṃjanaḥ hṛdaye nyaset oṃtapaḥ karayoḥ oṃsatyaṃ lalāṭe |
oṃtatsaviturvareṇiyaṃ bhargo devasya dhīmahi dhiyo yo naḥ pracodayāt |
iti śikhāyām || 188 ||

evaṃ vipro na jānāti sa eva brāhmaṇādhamaḥ |
na tasya kṣīyate pāpmā bhavedbhūripratigrahaḥ || 189 ||

imāṃ yo vetti gāyatrīṃ sarvabījasamanvitām |
sa vetti caturo vedānyogajñānaṃ japatrayam || 190 ||

ya enāṃ naiva jānāti sa śūdrātparataḥ smṛtaḥ |
tasyāpūtasya viprasya na deyaṃ pitṛpārvaṇam || 191 ||

na snānaphaladaḥ kaścitsarvaṃ ca niṣphalaṃ bhavet |
vidyā vittaṃ tathā janma dvijatvaṃ kāraṇaṃ yataḥ || 192 ||

niṣphalaṃ sakalaṃ tasya medhyaṃ puṣpaṃ yathā'śucau |
caturvedāśca gāyatrī purā vai tulitā mayā || 193 ||

caturvedātparā gurvī gāyatrī mokṣadā smṛtā |
daśabhirjanmajanitaṃ śatena ca purā kṛtam || 194 ||

triyugaṃ tu sahasreṇa gāyatrī haṃti kilbiṣam |
gāyatrīmakṣamālāyāṃ sāyaṃ prātaśca yo japet || 195 ||

caturṇāmapi vedānāṃ phalaṃ prāpnotyasaṃśayam |
trisaṃdhyaṃ yo japennityaṃ gāyatrīṃ hāyanaṃ dvijaḥ || 196 ||

tasya pāpaṃ kṣayaṃ yāti janmakoṭisamudbhavam |
gāyatryuccāramātreṇa pāpakūṭātpunāti ca || 197 ||

svargāpavargamāpnoti japtvā nityaṃ dvijottamaḥ |
vāsudevasya maṃtrāṇi japedyastu dinedine || 198 ||

praṇamecca hareḥ pādau sa gacchedapavargitām |
vāsudevasya stotrāṇi mukhe cāpi kathottamā || 199 ||

paṃkasya lavamātraṃ tu tasya dehe na tiṣṭhati |
vedaśāstrāvagāhena trisrotaḥ snānajaṃ phalam || 200 ||

dharmapāṭhakṛtāṃ loke yajñakoṭiphalaṃ labhet |
evaṃ vipraguṇānvaktuṃ na śaknomi dvijottama || 201 ||

viśvarūpaśca ko dehī samūrto harireva ca |
yasya śāpādvināśaḥ syādāyurvidyā yaśo dhanam || 202 ||

varadānātsamāyāṃti sarvāḥ saṃpattayastathā |
viṣṇurbrahmaṇyatāmeti sadā vipra prasādataḥ || 203 ||

namo brahmaṇyadevāya gobrāhmaṇahitāya ca |
jagaddhitāya kṛṣṇāya goviṃdāya namo namaḥ || 204 ||

maṃtreṇaivaṃ hariṃ yastu pūjayetsatataṃ naraḥ |
prasādī ca haristasya viṣṇusāyujyatāṃ vrajet || 205 ||

ya idaṃ śṛṇuyātpuṇyamākhyānaṃ dharmavigraham |
tasya pāpaṃ kṣayaṃ yāti janmajanmakṛtaṃ ca yat || 206 ||

yaḥ paṭhetpāṭhayedvāpi upadeṣṭā janasya ca |
na tasya punarāvṛttiḥ svargamakṣayamaśnute || 207 ||

dhanaṃ dhānyaṃ labhedatra rājyabhogānarogitām |
satsutaṃ ca śubhāṃ kīrtiṃ devavadramate divi || 208 ||

nārada uvāca |
tava prasādato jñāto vipraḥ puṇyatamaśca yaḥ |
yathā jānāmi deveśa kriyayā brāhmaṇādhamam || 1 ||

brūhi śīghraṃ suraśreṣṭha yadi prītiṃ mayīcchasi |
brahmovāca |
snānairdaśavidhairmuktastathaiva tarpaṇādibhiḥ || 2 ||

saṃdhyāsaṃyamahīnaśca sa eva brāhmaṇādhamaḥ |
devapūjāvratairmukto vedavidyādibhistathā || 3 ||

satyaśaucādibhiścaiva yogajñānāgnitarpaṇaiḥ |
paṃcasnānānāni viprāṇāṃ kīrtitāni maharṣibhiḥ || 4 ||

āgneyaṃ vāruṇaṃ brāhmaṃ vāyavyaṃ divyameva ca |
āgneyaṃ bhasmanā snānamadbhirvāruṇamucyate || 5 ||

āpohiṣṭheti vai brāhmaṃ vāyavyaṃ gorajaḥ smṛtam |
adbhirātapavarṣābhirdivyaṃ snānamudāhṛtam || 6 ||

etaistu maṃtrataḥ snānāttīrthānāṃ phalamāpnuyāt |
tulasīpatrasaṃlagnaṃ sālagrāmaśilāṃbu ca || 7 ||

gavāṃ śṛṃgodakaṃ caiva viprapādodakaṃ ca yat |
gurūṇāmeva mukhyānāṃ pūtātpūtamiti smṛtiḥ || 8 ||

tyāga tīrthādibhiryajñairvratahomādibhistathā |
yatphalaṃ labhate dhīraḥ snānairetaistu tatphalam || 9 ||

tarpaṇaiśca vinirmuktaḥ pitṝṇāmeva nityaśaḥ |
pitṛhā narakaṃ yāti saṃdhyāhīnastu viprahā || 10 ||

maṃtravratavihīnaśca vedavidyāguṇairapi |
yajñadānādibhirmukto brāhmaṇaścādhamādhamaḥ || 11 ||

yajñārthakā devalakā nākṣatrā grāmayājakāḥ |
paradāraratā nityaṃ paṃcaite brāhmaṇādhamāḥ || 12 ||

maṃtrasaṃskārahīnāśca śucisaṃyamavarjitāḥ |
moghāśino durātmāno brāhmaṇāścādhamādhamāḥ || 13 ||

api steyaratā mūḍhāḥ sarvadharmavivarjitāḥ |
unmārgagāmino nityaṃ brāhmaṇāścādhamādhamāḥ || 14 ||

śrāddhādikarmarahitā gurusevāvivarjitāḥ |
amaṃtrā bhinnamaryādā ete sarvādhamādhamāḥ || 15 ||

asaṃbhāṣyā ime duṣṭāssarve nirayagāminaḥ |
amedhyāste durācārā apūjyāśca samaṃtataḥ || 16 ||

khaḍgopajīvikāḥ preṣyā govāhanaratā dvijāḥ |
kāruvṛtyupajīvāśca gaṇavārddhaṣikāśca ye || 17 ||

bālāpaṇyābhicārāśca aṃtyajāśrayamāśritāḥ |
kṛtaghnāśca gurughnāśca ete sarvādhamāḥ smṛtāḥ || 18 ||

ye caivānye hatācārāḥ pāṣaṃḍā dharmaniṃdakāḥ |
dūṣakādeva bhedānāmete brahmadviṣo dvijāḥ || 19 ||

tathāpi brāhmaṇaścaiva na haṃtavyaḥ kadācana |
enaṃ hatvā dvijaśreṣṭha brahmahā puruṣo bhavet || 20 ||

aṃtyajātiṣu mleccheṣu tathā cāṃḍālajātiṣu |
patito vānnayonibhyāṃ na haṃtavyaḥ kathaṃcana || 21 ||

sarvajātistriyaṃ gatvā sarvābhakṣyasya bhakṣaṇāt |
dvijatvaṃ na vinaśyeta puṇyādvipro bhavetpunaḥ || 22 ||

nārada uvāca |
īdṛśaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ kṛtvā paścātpuṇyaṃ samācaret |
kāṃ gatiṃ yātyasau vipraḥ sarvalokapitāmaha || 23 ||

brahmovāca |
kṛtvā sarvāṇi pāpāni paścādyastu jiteṃdriyaḥ |
mucyate sarvapāpebhyaḥ punarbrahmatvamarhati || 24 ||

śṛṇu putra kathāṃ ramyāṃ vicitrāṃ ca purātanīm |
kasyacidbrāhmaṇasyāpi yauvanāḍhyaḥ suto'bhavat || 25 ||

tato yauvanasaṃpattermohācca pūrvakarmaṇaḥ |
cāṃḍālīmagamatsadyastasyāḥ priyataro'bhavat || 26 ||

tasyāmutpāditāstena putrā duhitarastathā |
svakuṭuṃbaṃ parityajya gṛhe tasyāściraṃ sthitaḥ || 27 ||

anyā bhakṣyaṃ na cāśnāti ghṛṇayā ca surāṃ tyajet |
tamuvāca sadā sā ca bhakṣayānyatarāṃ surām || 28 ||

tāmuvāca tadā śaucaṃ gadituṃ nārhasi priye |
utkāro jāyate tasyāḥ śravaṇātsatataṃ mama || 29 ||

ekadā sa mṛgānveṣātśrāṃtaḥ supto gṛhe divā |
gṛhītvā sā surāṃ tasya hasitvā ca mukhe dadau || 30 ||

tato vipramukhādagniḥ prajajvāla samaṃtataḥ |
jvālā tu sakuṭubāṃtāmadahacca gṛhaṃ vasu || 31 ||

hāhā kṛtvā samutthāya vilalāpa tadā dvijaḥ |
vilāpāṃte ca jijñāsā samārabdhā ca tena hi || 32 ||

kutaścāgniḥ samudbhūto gṛhe dāhaḥ kathaṃ mama |
tataḥ khe tamuvācedaṃ tejaste brāhmaṇasya ca || 33 ||

kathite tadyathāvṛtte brāhmaṇo vismayaṃ gataḥ |
vimṛśyārthamuvācedaṃ punaḥ khe'sya hitaṃ vacaḥ || 34 ||

vipraṇaṣṭaṃ sutejaste tasmāddharmacaro bhava |
tato munivarāngatvā papracchātmahitaṃ dvijaḥ || 35 ||

tamūcurmunayaḥ sarve dānadharmaṃ samācara |
ṛṣaya ūcuḥ |
pūyaṃte sarvapāpebhyo brāhmaṇāni yamairvrataiḥ || 36 ||

niyamānśāstradṛṣṭāṃśca pūtatvārthamupācara |
cāṃdrāyaṇāṃśca kṛcchrāṃśca taptakṛcchrānpunaḥ punaḥ || 37 ||

prājāpatyāṃśca divyāṃśca doṣaśoṣāya satvaram |
gaccha tīrthāni pūtāni goviṃdārādhanaṃ kuru || 38 ||

kṣayameṣyaṃti pāpāni na cireṇa samaṃtataḥ |
puṇyatīrthaprabhāvācca goviṃdasya prabhāvataḥ || 39 ||

kṣayameṣyaṃti pāpāni brahmatvaṃ prāpsyate bhavān |
śṛṇu tāta yathāvṛttaṃ kathayāmaḥ purātanam || 40 ||

āhārārthī purā vatsa garuḍo vinatāsutaḥ |
pataṃgopi bahiḥ sākṣādaṃḍānnissṛtya śāvakaḥ || 41 ||

kṣudhārthī mātaraṃ prāha bhakṣyaṃ me dīyatāmiti |
tataḥ parvatasaṃkāśaṃ garuḍaṃ ca mahābalam || 42 ||

dṛṣṭvā mātā mahābhāgā tanayaṃ hṛṣṭamānasā |
kṣudhāṃ te bādhituṃ putra na śaknomi samaṃtataḥ || 43 ||

tava tātastapastepe lauhityasyottare taṭe |
kaśyapo nāma dharmātmā sākṣāllokapitāmahaḥ || 44 ||

tatra gacchasva pitaraṃ pṛccha kāmaṃ yathā tava |
asyopadeśatastāta kṣudhā te śamameṣyati || 45 ||

tato māturvacaḥ śrutvā vainateyo mahābalaḥ |
agamatpiturabhyāśaṃ samuhūrtānmanojavaḥ || 46 ||

dṛṣṭvā tātaṃ muniśreṣṭhaṃ jvalaṃtamiva pāvakam |
praṇamya śirasā vākyamuvāca pitaraṃ khagaḥ || 47 ||

bhakṣārthī samanuprāptaḥ sutohaṃ te mahātmanaḥ |
kṣudhayā pīḍito nātha bhakṣyaṃ me dīyatāṃ prabho || 48 ||

tato dhyānaṃ samālabhya jñātvā taṃ vinatāsutaṃ |
putrasnehādvacaścedaṃ provāca munisattamaḥ || 49 ||

anekaśatasāhasrā niṣādāḥ saritāṃpateḥ |
tīre tiṣṭhaṃti pāpiṣṭhāstānsaṃbhakṣya sukhī bhava || 50 ||

tīrthamutsādayaṃti sma tīrthakākā durāsadāḥ |
vinā vipraṃ niṣādeṣu bhakṣaya tvamalakṣitaṃ || 51 ||

ityuktaḥ prayayau pakṣī bhakṣayāmāsa tāṃstataḥ |
alakṣyabhāvo vipropi gilitastena pakṣiṇā || 52 ||

sa tasya galake gāḍhaṃ lālagīti dvijastadā |
vamituṃ gilituṃ cāpi na śaśāka dvijottamaḥ || 53 ||

gatvātha pitaraṃ prāha kimetaditi me pitaḥ |
lagnaṃ me galake satvaṃ pratikartuṃ na śaknuyāṃ || 54 ||

tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā kaśyapastamuvāca ha |
mayoktaṃ te purā vatsa brāhmaṇoyaṃ na budhyase || 55 ||

ityuktvā ca munirdhīmāndvijaṃ prāha sa dhārmikaḥ |
āgaccha tvaṃ mamāsannaṃ hitaṃ te pravadāmyahaṃ || 56 ||

tamuvāca tadā vipraḥ kaśyapaṃ munipuṃgavam |
mamaite suhṛdo nityaṃ sarve saṃbaṃdhinaḥ priyāḥ || 57 ||

śvaśurāḥ syālakāścāptāssabālāśca tathāpare |
etaiḥ saha prayāsyāmi nirayaṃ cāpi vā śivam || 58 ||

tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā vismitaḥ kaśyapo'bravīt |
dvijānāṃ ca kule jātaścāṃḍālaiḥ patito bhavān || 59 ||

puruṣāste pratiṣṭhaṃte ghore ca niraye dhruvam |
cirāya niṣkṛtisteṣāṃ naivāstīha kathaṃcana || 60 ||

sarvāṃścaiva durācārāṃścāṃḍālānpāpakāriṇaḥ |
doṣāṃstyaktvā naraḥ paścātsukhī bhavati nānyathā || 61 ||

ajñānādyadi vā mohātkṛtvā pāpaṃ sudāruṇaṃ |
tato dharmaṃ caredyastu sa gacchetparamāṃ gatiṃ || 62 ||

pāpakṛnna careddharmaṃ pāpe kuryānmatiṃ punaḥ |
śilānāvaṃ yathārūḍhaḥ sāgare saṃnimajjati || 63 ||

kṛtvā sarvāṇi pāpāni tathā durgatisaṃcayaṃ |
upaśāṃto bhavetpaścāttaṃ doṣaṃ śamayiṣyati || 64 ||

tamuvāca mahāprājñaṃ dvijaṃ munivarottamam |
yadimāṃ na jahātīha khagaḥ sarvāṃśca bāṃdhavān || 65 ||

tataḥ prāṇaṃ ca tyakṣyāmi khage marmāvaghātini |
nocettyajatu me baṃdhūnpratijñā me dṛḍhātmanaḥ || 66 ||

tatastārkṣyamuvācedaṃ muni rbrahmavadhe bhayāt |
udvamaitānsaviprāṃśca mlechānetānsamaṃtataḥ || 67 ||

vaneṣu parvatānteṣu dikṣu tānpatageśvara |
udvavāma tataḥ śīghraṃ doṣajñaḥ piturājñayā || 68 ||

tataḥ sarve'bhavanvyaktā akeśāḥ śmaśruvarjitāḥ |
yavanā bhojanaprītāḥ kiṃcicchmaśruyutāśca ye || 69 ||

agnau ca nagnakāḥ pāpā dakṣiṇasyāmavācakāḥ |
ghorāḥ prāṇivadhe prītā durātmāno gavāśinaḥ || 70 ||

nairṛte kuvadāḥ pāpā gobrāhmaṇavadhodyatāḥ |
kharparāḥ paścime pūrve nivasaṃti ca dāruṇāḥ || 71 ||

vāyavyāṃ ca turuṣkāśca śmaśrupūrṇā gavāśinaḥ |
aśvapṛṣṭhasamārūḍhāḥ prayuddheṣvanivartinaḥ || 72 ||

uttarasyāṃ ca girayo mlecchāḥ parvatavāsinaḥ |
sarvabhakṣā durācārāḥ vadhabaṃdharatāḥ kila || 73 ||

aiśānyāṃ nirayāssaṃti kartṝṇāṃ vṛkṣavāsinaḥ |
ete mlecchā sthitā dikṣu ghorāste śastrapāṇayaḥ || 74 ||

yeṣāṃ ca sparśamātreṇa sacelo jalamāviśet |
eteṣāṃ ca kalau deśepyakāle dharmavarjite || 75 ||

saṃsparśaṃ ca prakurvaṃti vittalobhātsamaṃtataḥ |
mlecchāṃstānmocayitvā tu kṣudhayā paripīḍitaḥ || 76 ||

punarāha dvijastāta kṣudhā me bādhatetarām |
avadadgaruḍaṃ tatra kaśyapaḥ kṛpayā drutam || 77 ||

tiṣṭhaṃtau vipulau tatra jighāṃsū gajakacchapau |
aprameyau mahāsatvau sāgarasyaikadeśataḥ || 78 ||

tāvapsu ca drutaṃ vatsa kṣudhāṃ te vārayiṣyataḥ |
sa piturvacanaṃ śrutvā tatra gatvābhipadya tau || 79 ||

nakhairbhitvā kūrmagajau mahāsatvau mahājavaḥ |
khamutpapāta tau dhṛtvā vidyudvego mahābalaḥ || 80 ||

ādhāratāṃ na gacchaṃti nagāśca maṃdarādayaḥ |
tato yojanalakṣe dve gatvā mārutaraṃhasā || 81 ||

mahatyāṃ jaṃbuśākhāyāṃ nipapāta mahābalaḥ |
bhagnā sā sahasā śākhā tāṃ pataṃtīṃ khageśvaraḥ || 82 ||

gobrāhmaṇavadhādbhīto dadhāra tarasā balī |
dhṛtvā tāṃ ruciraṃ vegāddravaṃtaṃ khe mahābalam || 83 ||

gatvā viṣṇuruvācedaṃ nararūpadharo hariḥ |
kastvaṃ bhramasi cākāśe kimarthaṃ patageśvara || 84 ||

vidhṛtya mahatīṃ śākhāṃ mahāṃtau gajakacchapau |
tamuvāca dvijastasminnararūpadharaṃ harim || 85 ||

garuḍohaṃ mahābāho khagarūpaḥ svakarmaṇā |
kaśyapasya munessūnurvinatāgarbhasaṃbhavaḥ || 86 ||

paśyaitau ca mahāsatvau bhakṣaṇārthaṃ mayā dhṛtau |
na dharā ca mamādhāro na vṛkṣā na ca parvatāḥ || 87 ||

anekayojanānyūrdhvaṃ dṛṣṭvā jaṃbūmahīruham |
apataṃtasya śākhāyāṃ sahemau paribhakṣituṃ || 88 ||

bhagnā sā sahasā śākhā tāṃ ca dhṛtvā bhramāmyaham |
koṭikoṭisahasrāṇāṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ gavāṃ vadhāt || 89 ||

bhayaṃ tatra viṣādo me sahasā prāviśadbudha |
kiṃ karomi kathaṃ yāmi ko me vegaṃ sahiṣyati || 90 ||

ityukte patagaśreṣṭhaṃ provācedaṃ haristadā |
asmadbāhuṃ samāruhya bhakṣemau gajakacchapau || 91 ||

garuḍa uvāca |
mamādhāraṃ na gacchaṃti sāgarāśca nagottamāḥ |
atha caivaṃ mahāsatvaṃ kathaṃ tvaṃ dhārayiṣyasi || 92 ||

ṛte nārāyaṇādanyaḥ ko māṃ dhārayituṃ kṣamaḥ |
trailokye kaḥ pumāṃstiṣṭhedyo vegaṃ me sahiṣyati || 93 ||

hariruvāca |
svakāryamuddharetprājñaḥ svakāryaṃ kuru sāṃpratam |
kṛtvā kāryaṃ khagaśreṣṭha vijānīṣe ca māṃ dhruvam || 94 ||

mahāsatvaṃ ca taṃ dṛṣṭvā vimṛśya manasā khagaḥ |
evamastviti coktvā sa papāta ha mahābhuje || 95 ||

na cacāla bhujastasya sannipāte khageśituḥ |
tatra sthitvā sa tāṃ śākhāṃ mumoca parvatālaye || 96 ||

śākhāpatanamātreṇa sacarācarakānanā |
cacāla vasudhā caiva sāgarāḥ pracakaṃpire || 97 ||

tataśca khāditau sattvau sahasā gajakacchapau |
tṛptiṃ na prāptavānsopi kṣudhā tasya na śāmyati || 98 ||

etajjñātvā tu goviṃdastamuvāca khageśvaram |
bhujasya mama māṃsaṃ tu bhakṣayitvā sukhī bhava || 99 ||

ityukte pracuraṃ māṃsaṃ bhujasya tasya tena hi |
khāditaṃ kṣudhayā putra vraṇaṃ tasya na vidyate || 100 ||

tamuvāca mahāprājñaścarācaraguruṃ harim |
kastvaṃ kiṃ vā priyaṃ tedya kariṣyāmi ca sāṃpratam || 101 ||

nārāyaṇa uvāca |
viddhi nārāyaṇaṃ māṃ hi tvatpriyārthaṃ samāgatam |
rūpaṃ svaṃ darśayāmāsa pratyayārthaṃ ca tasya vai || 102 ||

pītavastraṃ ghanaśyāmaṃ caturbhujamanoharam |
śaṃkhacakragadāpadmadharaṃ sarvasureśvaram || 103 ||

taṃ ca dṛṣṭvā garutmāṃśca praṇamya śirasā harim |
priyaṃ kiṃ te kariṣyāmi vada naḥ puruṣottama || 104 ||

tamabravīnmahātejā devadeveśvaro hariḥ |
bhava me vāhanaṃ śūra sakhe tvaṃ sārvakālikam || 105 ||

tamuvāca khagaśreṣṭho dhanyohaṃ vibudheśvara |
saphalaṃ janma me nātha tvāṃ ca dṛṣṭvādya me prabho || 106 ||

prārthayitvā ca pitarāvāgamiṣyāmi te'ntikam |
prīto viṣṇuruvācedaṃ bhava tvamajarāmaraḥ || 107 ||

avadhyaḥ sarvabhūtebhyaḥ karma tejaśca matsamam |
sarvatra te gatiścāstu nikhilaṃ tu sukhaṃ dhruvam || 108 ||

saṃmilatu drutaṃ sarvaṃ yatte manasi vartate |
yatheṣṭaṃ prītimāhāramakaṣṭena pralapsyase || 109 ||

vyasanānmātaraṃ sadyo mocayiṣyasi nānyathā |
evamuktvā hariḥ sadyastatraivāṃtaradhīyata || 110 ||

tārkṣyopi pitaraṃ gatvā kathayaccākhilaṃ tataḥ |
sa tacchrutvā prahṛṣṭātmā tanayaṃ punarabravīt || 111 ||

dhanyohaṃ ca khagaśreṣṭha dhanyā te jananī śivā |
dhanyaṃ kṣetraṃ kulaṃ caiva yasya putrastvamīdṛśaḥ || 112 ||

yasya putraḥ kule jāto vaiṣṇavaḥ puruṣottamaḥ |
kulakoṭiṃ samuddhṛtya viṣṇusāyujyatāṃ vrajet || 113 ||

viṣṇuṃ yaḥ pūjayennityaṃ viṣṇuṃ dhyāyeta gāyati |
japenmaṃtraṃ sadā viṣṇoḥ stotraṃ tasya paṭhiṣyati || 114 ||

prasādaṃ ca bhajennityamupavāsaṃ harerdine |
kṣayācca sarvapāpānāṃ mucyate nātra saṃśayaḥ || 115 ||

yasya tiṣṭhati goviṃdo mānase ca sadaiva hi |
sa eva ca labheddāsyaṃ sapuṇyaiḥ puruṣottamaḥ || 116 ||

janmakoṭisahasrebhyaḥ kṛtvā satkarmasaṃcayam |
kṣayācca sarvapāpānāṃ viṣṇoḥ kiṃkaratāṃ vrajet || 117 ||

dhanyosau mānavo loke viṣṇossādṛśyamāvrajet |
nityaḥ suravaraiḥ pūjyo lokanātho'cyuto'vyayaḥ || 118 ||

suprasanno bhavedyasya sa eva puruṣottamaḥ |
tapobhirbahubhirdharmairmakhairnānāvidhairapi || 119 ||

viṣṇurna labhyate devaistvayāsau vipra labhyate |
sapatnīvyasanāddhorānmātaraṃ te pramocaya || 120 ||

tato yāsyasi deveśaṃ kṛtvā mātuḥ pratikriyām |
gṛhītvā janakasyājñāṃ labdhvā viṣṇorvaraṃ mahat || 121 ||

aṃbāpārśvaṃ gato hṛṣṭastāṃ praṇamyāgrataḥ sthitaḥ |
vinatovāca |
abhavadbhojanaṃ te'dya putra dṛṣṭaḥ pitāpi ca || 122 ||

kimarthaṃ vā vilaṃbaste ciṃtayā vyathitā hyaham |
sa māturvacanaṃ śrutvā garuḍaḥ prahasanniva || 123 ||

kathayāmāsa vṛttāṃtaṃ sā śrutvā vismitā'bhavat |
kathaṃ ca duḥṣkaraṃ karma śiśubhāvāttvayā kṛtam || 124 ||

dhanyāhaṃ me kulaṃ dhanyaṃ yastvaṃ viṣṇusakho'bhavaḥ |
labdhvā varaṃ mahātmānaṃ dṛṣṭvā me hṛṣyate manaḥ || 125 ||

pauruṣeṇa tvayā vatsa uddhṛtaṃ me kuladvayam |
suparṇa uvāca |
mātaḥ kiṃ te kariṣyāmi priyameva taducyatām || 126 ||

kāryaṃ kṛtvātha yāsyāmi pārśvaṃ nārāyaṇasya ca |
etacchrutvā tu sā prāha garuḍaṃ vinatā satī || 127 ||

mahadduḥkhaṃ ca me cāsti kuru tāta pratikriyām |
bhaginī me sapatnī sā paṇitahaṃ tayā purā || 128 ||

tasyā dāsyamahaṃ prāptā kastārayati māmitaḥ |
kṛṣṇaṃ kṛtvā viṣairaśvaṃ tasyāḥ putrairmahoragaiḥ || 129 ||

uṣaḥkāle'vadatsā ca aśvoyaṃ kṛṣṇatāṃ vrajet |
tatohamavadaṃ tatra sadā cāyaṃ rucāsitaḥ || 130 ||

mithyā te vacanaṃ mātaḥ pratijñāṃ sā'karottadā |
tatohamabruvaṃ kadrūṃ śapathaṃ nāgamātaram || 131 ||

yadīmaṃ kṛṣṇatābhyeti hareraśvamahaṃ tadā |
kṛtā bhavāmi te dāsītyahametattadā'vadam || 132 ||

tatastasminhareraśve kṛte kṛṣṇe ca kṛtrimaiḥ |
tasyāḥ putraiśca dhūrtaiśca dāsītvamagamaṃ tadā || 133 ||

yasminkāle hyabhīṣṭañca tasyā dravyaṃ dadāmyaham |
tasminkāle hyadāsītvaṃ yāsyāmi kulanaṃdana || 134 ||

garuḍa uvāca |
pṛccha śīghraṃ ca mātastāṃ kariṣyāmi pratikriyām |
bhakṣayiṣyāmi tānnāgānpratijñāme yathārthataḥ || 135 ||

tataḥ kadrūmuvācedaṃ vinatā duḥkhitā satī |
abhīṣṭaṃ vada kalyāṇi yena mucyeya kṛcchrataḥ || 136 ||

abravītsā durācārā pīyūṣaṃ dīyatāmiti |
etacchrutvā tu vacanamabhavatsā ca niṣprabhā || 137 ||

tataḥ śanairupāgamya tanayaṃ prāha duḥkhitā |
amṛtaṃ prārthayatpāpā tāta kiṃ vā kariṣyasi || 138 ||

śrutvā vākyaṃ garutmāṃśca mahākrodhasamanvitaḥ |
amṛtaṃ cānayiṣyāmi mātarmā vimukhī bhava || 139 ||

evamuktvā tu tarasā sa gataḥ pituraṃtikam |
amṛtaṃ cānayiṣyāmi māturarthe'dhunā'nagha || 140 ||

sa tasya vacanaṃ śrutvā muniḥ prāha khageśvaram |
satyalokasya vai cordhve viśvakarmavinirmitā || 141 ||

purī cāsti sabhā ramyā devānāṃ hita hetave |
vahniprākāradurlabhyā durdharṣā cāsuraiḥ suraiḥ || 142 ||

rakṣārthaṃ nirmito devaḥ suraistatra mahābalaḥ |
yaṃ yaṃ paśyati vīraḥ sa sa eva bhasmatāṃ vrajet || 143 ||

suparṇa uvāca |
nārāyaṇādvaro labdho mayā ca munisattama |
bhayaṃ nāstīha me tāta surāsuragaṇādapi || 44 ||

emamuktvā garutmānsa uddhṛtya sāgarājjalam |
jagāmākāśamāviśya khagaścordhvaṃ manojavaḥ || 145 ||

pakṣavātena tasyaiva rajaḥ samudgataṃ bahu |
tasyāṃtikaṃ na ca tyaktamagamattasya tacca yaḥ || 146 ||

gatvā caṃcūjalenāpi vahniṃ nirvāpayadbalī |
rajobhiḥ paripūrṇākṣo na surastaṃ ca paśyati || 147 ||

jaghāna rakṣivargāṃstānamṛtaṃ cāharadbalī |
ānayaṃtaṃ ca pīyūṣaṃ khagaṃ gatvā śatakratuḥ || 148 ||

airāvataṃ samārūḍho vākyametaduvāca ha |
khagarūpadharaḥ kastvaṃ pīyūṣaṃ harase balāt || 149 ||

apriyaṃ sarvadevānāṃ kṛtvā jīve ratiḥ katham |
viśikhairagnisaṃkāśairnayāmi yamamaṃdiram || 150 ||

śrutvā vākyaṃ hareḥ kopāduvāca sa mahābalaḥ |
nayāmi tava pīyūṣaṃ darśayasva parākramam || 151 ||

etacchrutvā mahābāhurjaghāna viśikhaiḥ śitaiḥ |
yathāmerugireḥ śṛṃgaṃ toyavarṣeṇa toyadaḥ || 152 ||

nakhairaśanisaṃkāśairbibheda garuḍo gajam |
mātali ca rathaṃ cakraṃ tathā devānpurassarān || 153 ||

vyathitosau mahābāhurmātalirgajapuṃgavaḥ |
vimukhāḥ pakṣavātena sarve devagaṇāstadā || 154 ||

tatastu kopito jiṣṇurjaghānakuliśena tam |
kuliśasyāvapātena na ca kṣubdho mahākhagaḥ || 155 ||

svaṃ moghaṃ bhiduraṃ dṛṣṭvā harirbhīto'bhavattadā |
saṃnivṛtya tato yuddhāttatraivāṃtaradhīyata || 156 ||

sutarāmapigacchaṃtaṃ vegādbhūtalamāgataḥ |
abravītsa suraśreṣṭhaḥ sarvadevagaṇāgrataḥ || 157 ||

śakra uvāca |
yadi dāsyasi pīyūṣamidānīṃ nāgamātari |
bhujagāścāmarāḥ sarve kriyaṃte hi dhruvaṃ tayā || 158 ||

pratijñā te bhavennaṣṭā na phalaṃ jīvitasya te |
tasmādidaṃ hariṣyāmi saṃmatena tavānagha || 159 ||

garutmānuvāca |
yasminkāle hyadāsī sā mātā me duḥkhitā satī |
viditā sarvalokeṣu hare'mṛtaṃ hariṣyasi || 160 ||

evamuktvā mahāvīryo gatvovāca prasūṃ tadā |
ānītamamṛtaṃ mātastasyā eva pradīyatām || 161 ||

protphullahṛdayā sā ca dṛṣṭvā putraṃ sahāmṛtam |
tāmāhūyāmṛtaṃ datvā cādāsītāṃ tadā gatā || 162 ||

tṛṇakāṣṭhāni bhūtāni paśavaśca sarīsṛpāḥ |
dṛṣṭvā savismayāssarve devā maharṣayastadā || 163 ||

mocayitvā tu tāmaṃbāṃ garuḍaḥ suṣṭhutāṃ gataḥ |
etasminnaṃtare śakro jahāra sahasā sudhām || 164 ||

nidhāya garalaṃ tatra tayā cānupalakṣitaḥ |
prahṛṣṭahṛdayā kadrūḥ putrānāhūya saṃbhramāt || 165 ||

teṣāṃ mukhe dadau hṛṣṭā kṣveḍaṃ cāmṛtalakṣaṇam |
tānuvāca prasūḥ putrānyuṣmākaṃ ca kule sadā || 166 ||

mukhe tiṣṭhantvamī daivā biṃdavaścastanirvṛtāḥ |
maharṣayastato devāḥ siddhagaṃdharvamānuṣāḥ || 167 ||

ūcuḥssantu kule mātarasmākaṃ ca prasādataḥ |
nāgairvisarjitā devāḥ sasiddhā munayastathā || 168 ||

jagmuḥ svamālayaṃ hṛṣṭā nāgāḥ pramuditāḥ sthitāḥ |
etasminnaṃtare nāgāṃścakhāda garuḍo balāt || 169 ||

dikṣu palāyitāḥ śeṣāḥ parvateṣu vaneṣu ca |
sāgareṣu ca pātāle bileṣu tarukoṭare || 170 ||

nibhṛteṣu nikuñjeṣu sthitāḥ sarpāśca nirvṛtāḥ |
bhujagāstasya bhakṣyāśca sadaiva vidhinirmitāḥ || 171 ||

sa khādayitvā nāgāṃśca saṃbhāṣya pitarāvatha |
vibudhānpūjayitvā tu jagāma harimavyayam || 172 ||

yaḥ paṭhecchṛṇuyādvāpi suparṇacaritaṃ śubham |
sarvapāpavinirmuktaḥ suraloke mahīyate || 173 ||

brahmovāca |
ataḥ paraṃ tu viprarṣe cāṃḍālapatito dvijaḥ |
pralapya ca bahūnśokānjagāma kaśyapaṃ munim || 1 ||

gatvovāca muniśreṣṭha vadāsmākaṃ hitaṃ vacaḥ |
yathā pāpādvimucyehaṃ muniśreṣṭha tathā kuru || 2 ||

tamuvāca mahātejā īṣaddhāsyaḥ samaṃtataḥ |
kaśyapa uvāca |
saṃdarśanācca mlecchānāmupaśāṃtosi vai svayam || 3 ||

gāyatryāśca japairhomairvrataiścāṃdrāyaṇadibhiḥ |
smara nityaṃ hareḥ pādamupoṣya harivāsaram || 4 ||

aharniśaṃ harerdhyānaṃ praṇāmaṃ kuru taṃ prabhum |
tīrthasnānena maṃtreṇa paṃkasyāṃtaṃ gamiṣyasi || 5 ||

tataḥ pāpakṣayādeva brāhmaṇatvaṃ ca lapsyase |
vratairvṛṣādhikairmokṣaṃ nāśayankalmaṣaṃ dvija || 6 ||

munestasya vacaḥ śrutvā kṛtakṛtyo'bhavattadā |
puṇyaṃ sa vividhaṃ kṛtvāpunarbrahmatvamāptavān || 7 ||

tatastaptvā tapastīvraṃsvarlokaṃ ciramabhyagāt |
sadvṛttasyākhilaṃ pāpaṃ kṣayaṃ yāti dine dine || 8 ||

asadvṛttasya puṇyaṃ hi kṣayaṃ yātyaṃjanopamam |
anācārāddhato vipra ācārātsuratāṃ vrajet || 9 ||

tataḥ kaṃṭhagataiḥ prāṇairācāraṃ kurute dvijaḥ |
karmaṇā manasāṃgena sadācāraṃ sadā kuru || 10 ||

kaśyapasyopadeśena sa vinīto'bhavaddvijaḥ |
ācāraṃ tu punaḥ kṛtvā tapastaptatvā divaṃ gataḥ || 11 ||

anācārī hato vipraḥ svargalokeṣu garhitaḥ |
ācāraṃ tu punaḥ kṛtvā suraloke mahīyate || 12 ||

nārada uvāca |
prāpnuvaṃti gatiṃ lokāḥ pūjayitvā dvijottamān |
dvijānāṃ pīḍanaṃ kṛtvā gatiṃ gacchati kāṃ prabho || 13 ||

brahmovāca |
kṣudhā saṃtaptadehānāṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ mahātmanām |
nārcayecchaktito bhaktyā sa yāti narakaṃ naraḥ || 14 ||

paruṣeṇa krośayitvā krodhādyastu visarjayet |
sa yāti narakaṃ ghoraṃ mahārauravakṛcchrakam || 15 ||

sannivṛttastataḥ kīṭādyantyajātiṣu jāyate |
tato rogī daridrastu kṣudhayā paripīḍitaḥ || 16 ||

nāvamanyettato vipraṃ kṣudhayā gṛhamāgatam |
na dadāmīti yo brūyāddevāgnibrāhmaṇeṣu saḥ || 17 ||

tiryagyoniśataṃ gatvā cāṃḍālyamupagacchati |
pādamudyamya yo vipraṃ haṃti gāṃ pitarau gurum || 18 ||

raurave niyato vāsastasya nāstīha niṣkṛtiḥ |
yadi puṇyādbhavejjanma sa eva paṃgutāṃ vrajet || 19 ||

atidīno viṣādī ca duḥkhaśokābhipīḍitaḥ |
evaṃ janmatrayaṃ prāpya bhavettasya ca niṣkṛtiḥ || 20 ||

muṣṭicapeṭakīlaiśca hanyādvipraṃ tu yaḥ pumān |
tāpane raurave ghore kalpāṃtaṃ sopi tiṣṭhati || 21 ||

atha janma samāsādya kukkuraḥ krūracaṃḍakaḥ |
aṃtyajātiṣu jātopi daridraḥ kukṣiśūlavān || 22 ||

pādamudyacchate vā yastasya pāde śilīpadaḥ |
khaṃjo vā maṃdajaṃgho vā khaṇḍapādo bhavennaraḥ || 23 ||

pakṣavātena cāṃgāni prakaṃpaṃte sadaiva hi |
mātaraṃ pitaraṃ vipraṃ snātakaṃ ca tapasvinam || 24 ||

hatvā gurugaṇaṃ krodhātkuṃbhīpāke ciraṃ bhavet |
uṣitvā caiva jāyeta kīṭajātiṣu tatparam || 25 ||

viruddhaṃ paruṣaṃ vākyaṃ yo vadeddhi dvijātiṣu |
aṣṭau kuṣṭhāḥ prajāyaṃte tasya dehe dṛḍhaṃ suta || 26 ||

vicarcikātha dadrūśca maṃḍalaḥ śukti sidhmakau |
kālakuṣṭhastathā śuklastaruṇaścātidāruṇaḥ || 27 ||

tato bhiṣakprayoge ca pāpātpuṇyaṃ palāyate |
apuṇyājjalarekheva tenaiva nidhanaṃ vrajet || 28 ||

eṣāṃ madhye mahākuṣṭhāstraya eva prakīrtitāḥ |
kālakuṣṭhastathā śuklastaruṇaścātidāruṇaḥ || 29 ||

mahāpātakabhāvānāṃ jñānātsaṃsargatopi vā |
atipātakināmeva trayo dehe bhavaṃti vai || 30 ||

saṃsargātsahasaṃbaṃdhādrogaḥ saṃcarate nṛṇām |
dūrātparityajeddhīraḥ spṛṣṭvā snānaṃ samācaret || 31 ||

patitaṃ kuṣṭhasaṃyuktaṃ cāṃḍālaṃ ca gavāśinam |
śvānaṃ rajasvalāṃ bhillaṃ spṛṣṭvā snānaṃ samācaret || 32 ||

duritasyānurūpeṇa dehe kuṣṭhā vyavasthitāḥ |
ihaloke paratraivāpyatra nāsti tu saṃśayaḥ || 33 ||

nyāyenopārjitāṃ vṛttiṃ brahmasvaṃ harate tu yaḥ |
akṣayaṃ narakaṃ prāpya punarjanma na vidyate || 34 ||

piśuno yastu viprāṇāṃ raṃdhrānveṣaṇatatparaḥ |
taṃ dṛṣṭvāpyathavā spṛṣṭvā sacelo jalamāviśet || 35 ||

brahmasvaṃ praṇayādbhuktaṃ dahatyāsaptamaṃ kulam |
vikrameṇa tu bhuṃjāno daśapūrvāndaśāparān || 36 ||

na viṣaṃ viṣamityāhurbrahmasvaṃ viṣamucyate |
viṣamekākinaṃ haṃti brahmasvaṃ putrapautrakam || 37 ||

mohācca mātaraṃ gatvā brāhmaṇīṃ ca gurostriyam |
patitvā raurave ghore punarutpattidurlabhaḥ || 38 ||

pataṃti pitarastasya kuṃbhīpāketha tāpane |
avīcikālasūtre ca mahārauravaraurave || 39 ||

kadācidapi vā teṣāṃ niṣkṛtiṃ nānumenire |
prāṇaṃ hatvā dvijātīnāṃ svayaṃ yātyapunarbhavam || 40 ||

pataṃti puruṣāstasya raurave ca sahasraśaḥ |
nārada uvāca |
sarveṣāmeva viprāṇāṃ vadhe ca pātakaṃ samam || 41 ||

viṣamaṃ vā kutastiṣṭhettattvato vaktumarhasi |
brahmovāca |
hatvā vipraṃ dhruvaṃ putra pātakaṃ yadudāhṛtam || 42 ||

labhate brahmahā ghoraṃ vaktavyaṃ cāparaṃ śṛṇu |
lakṣakoṭisahasrāṇāṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ vadhaṃ bhajet || 43 ||

vedaśāstrayutaṃ hatvā śrotriyaṃ vijiteṃdriyam |
vipraṃ ca vaiṣṇavaṃ hatvā tasmāddaśaguṇottaram || 44 ||

svavaṃśānpātayitvā tu punarjanma na viṃdate |
trivedaṃ snātakaṃ hatvā vadhasyāṃtaṃ na vindate || 45 ||

śrotriyaṃ ca sadācāraṃ tīrthamaṃtraprapūtakam |
īdṛśaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ hantuḥ pāpasyāṃto na vidyate || 46 ||

apakāraṃ samuddiśya dvijaḥ prāṇānparityajet |
dṛśyate yena cānyena brahmahā sa bhavennaraḥ || 47 ||

vacobhiḥ paruṣairvṛttaiḥ pīḍitastāḍito dvijaḥ |
yamuddiśya tyajetprāṇāṃstamāhurbrahmaghātinam || 48 ||

ṛṣayo munayo devāḥ sarve brahmavidastathā |
deśānāṃ pārthivānāṃ ca sa ca vadhyo bhavediha || 49 ||

ato brahmavadhaṃ prāpya pitṛbhiḥ saha pacyate |
prāyopaveśakaṃ vipraṃ budhaḥ saṃmānayeddhruvam || 50 ||

doṣaiścāpi vinirmuktamuddiśya prāṇamutsṛjet |
sa pralipto vadhairghorairna tu yaṃ parikīrtayet || 51 ||

ātmaghātaṃ drumārohaṃ koṭarai rūpajīvinaṃ |
yaḥ kuryādātmanoghātaṃ svavaṃśe brahmahā bhavet || 52 ||

bhrūṇaṃ ca ghātayedyastu śiśuṃ vā āturaṃ gurum |
brahmahā svayameva syānna tu yaṃ parikīrtayet || 53 ||

mārayecca sagotraṃ vā brāhmaṇaṃ brāhmaṇādhamaḥ |
tasyaiva tadbhavetpāpaṃ na tu yaṃ parikīrttayet || 54 ||

pīḍayitvā dvijaṃ śūdraḥ svakāryaṃ cāpi sādhayet |
tatrāpāpe ca śūdrasya pātakaṃ nānyathā bhavet || 55 ||

tātkālika vadhaṃ hatvā haṃtāramātatāyinaṃ |
na ca haṃtā ca tatpāpairlipyate dvijasattama || 56 ||

ātatāyinamāyāṃtamapi vedāṃtagaṃ raṇe |
jighāṃsaṃtaṃ jighāṃsecca na tena brahmahā bhavet || 57 ||

agnido garadaścaiva dhanahārī ca suptaghaḥ |
kṣetradārāpahārī ca ṣaḍete hyātatāyinaḥ || 58 ||

khalo rājavadhodyogī pitṝṇāṃ ca vadhe rataḥ |
anuyāyī nṛpo rājñaścatvāraścātatāyinaḥ || 59 ||

tatkṣaṇānna mṛtaṃ vipraṃ punarhaṃtuṃ na yujyate |
purnahatvā vadhaṃ ghoraṃ jñānātprāpnoti niścitaṃ || 60 ||

loke viprasamo nāsti pūjanīyo jagadguruḥ |
hatvā taṃ yadbhavetpāpaṃ tatparaṃ ca na vidyate || 61 ||

devavatpūjanīyosau devāsuragaṇairnaraiḥ |
brāhmaṇasya samo nāsti triṣu lokeṣu niścitaṃ || 62 ||

nārada uvāca |
kāṃ vṛttiṃ samupāśritya jīvitavyaṃ dvijena hi |
apānena suraśreṣṭha tatvato vaktumarhasi || 63 ||

brahmovāca |
ayācitā ca yā bhikṣā praśastā sā prakīrtitā |
uñchavṛttistato bhadrā subhadrā sarvavṛttiṣu || 64 ||

yāmāśritya muniśreṣṭhā gacchaṃti brahmaṇaḥ padam |
dakṣiṇā yajñaśeṣāṇāṃ grāhyā yajñagatena hi || 65 ||

pāṭhanaṃ yājanaṃ kṛtvā grahītavyaṃ dhanaṃ dvijaiḥ |
pāṭhayitvā paṭhitvā ca kṛtvā svastyayanaṃ śubhaṃ || 66 ||

brāhmaṇānāmidaṃ jīvyaṃ śiṣṭā vṛttiḥ pratigrahaḥ |
śāstropajīvino dhanyā dhanyā vṛkṣopajīvinaḥ || 67 ||

dhanyā vṛkṣalatājīvyā vāṭīsasyopajīvinaḥ |
anna jaṃtu vadhe pāpaṃ tasya doṣopaśāṃtaye || 68 ||

navadhānyāni śastāni viprebhyaḥ saṃpradāpayet |
na cetprāṇivadhe hyatra kṣīyaṃte cāyuṣo dhruvaṃ || 69 ||

tasmāddadyātsubahūni pitṛdevadvijātiṣu |
abhāvātkṣattriyāvṛttirbrāhmaṇairūpajīvyate || 70 ||

nyāyayuddheṣu yoddhavyaṃ caredvīravrataṃ śubham |
sa tayā ca dvijo vṛtyā yaddhanaṃ labhate nṛpāt || 71 ||

pitṛyajñādidāneṣu medhyaṃ taddhanamucyate |
samabhyaseddhanurvidyāṃ vedayuktāṃ sadānaghaḥ || 72 ||

śaktikuṃtagadākhaḍga parighāṇāṃ samaṃtataḥ |
aśvārohaṃ gajārohamaiṃdrajālamamānakaṃ || 73 ||

rathabhūmigataṃ yuddhaṃ yuktaṃ sarvatra kārayet |
dvija deva dhruvāṇāṃ ca strīṇāṃ vṛttaṃ tapasvinām || 74 ||

sādhu sādhvī gurūṇāṃ ca nṛpāṇāṃ rakṣaṇāddhruvam |
yatpuṇyaṃ labhyate śūraiḥ kathaṃ tadbrahmavādibhiḥ || 75 ||

sarvapāpakṣayaṃ kṛtvā sokṣayaṃ svargamaśnute |
sammukhe nyāyayuddhe ca pataṃti brāhmaṇā raṇe || 76 ||

te vrajaṃti paraṃ sthānaṃ na gamyaṃ brahmavādināṃ |
dharmayuddhasya yadvṛttaṃ śṛṇu puṇyaṃ yathārthataḥ || 77 ||

saṃmukhena prayudhyaṃte na ca gacchaṃti kātaraṃ |
na bhagnaṃ pṛṣṭhato ghnaṃti niḥśastraṃ prapalāyitam || 78 ||

ayudhyamānaṃ bhīruṃ ca patitaṃ gatakalmaṣaṃ |
asacchūdraṃ stutiprītamāhave śaraṇāgatam || 79 ||

hatvā ca narakaṃ yāṃti durvṛttā jayakāṃkṣiṇaḥ |
eṣā ca kṣattriyā vṛttiḥ sadācāraistu gīyate || 80 ||

yāmāśritya divaṃ yāṃti sarvakṣatriyakuṃjarāḥ |
dharmayuddhe śubho mṛtyuḥ saṃmukhe kṣattriyasya ca || 81 ||

atra pūto bhavetsopi sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate |
sa tiṣṭhetsvargaloke ca prāsāde ratnabhūṣite || 82 ||

jāṃbūnadamayastaṃbhe ratnabhūṣitabhūtale |
iṣṭadravyaiḥ susaṃpūrṇe divyavastropaśobhite || 83 ||

purataḥ kalpavṛkṣāśca tiṣṭhaṃti sarvadāyinaḥ |
vāpīkūpataṭākādyairudyānairupaśobhite || 84 ||

yauvanāḍhyāśca sevaṃte taṃ devapurakanyakāḥ |
tasyāgrato mudā nityaṃ nṛtyaṃtyapsarasāṃ gaṇāḥ || 85 ||

gītaṃ gāyaṃti gaṃdharvā devāśca stutipāṭhakāḥ |
evaṃ krameṇa kalpāṃte sārvabhaumo bhavennṛpaḥ || 86 ||

sarvabhogaikakartā ca nīruṅmanmathavigrahaḥ |
tasya patnyaḥ prarūpāḍhyāḥ sadaiva yauvanānvitāḥ || 87 ||

dharmaśīlāḥ sutāḥ śubhrāḥ samṛddhāḥ pitṛsaṃmatāḥ |
evaṃ krameṇa bhuṃjaṃti saptajanmasu kṣatriyāḥ || 88 ||

anyāyena tu yoddhārastiṣṭhaṃti narake ciram |
evaṃ ca kṣatriyā vṛttirbrāhmaṇairupajīvyate || 89 ||

vaiśyaiḥ śūdraistathānyaiśca aṃtyajairmlecchajātibhiḥ |
ye ca yodhāḥ prayudhyaṃte nyāyayuddhena sarvadā || 90 ||

tepi yāṃti paraṃ sthānaṃ sarve varṇā dvijātayaḥ |
na śūro yo dvijo bhīrurastraśastravivarjitaḥ || 91 ||

vipattau vaiśyavṛtiṃ ca kārayeddvijasattamaḥ |
vaiśyavṛttiṃ vaṇigbhāvaṃ kṛṣiṃ caiva tathāparaiḥ || 92 ||

kārayetkṛṣivāṇijyaṃ viprakarma na ca tyajet |
vaṇigbhāvānmṛṣātyuktau durgatiṃ prāpnuyāddvijaḥ |
ārdradravyaṃ parityajya brāhmaṇo labhate śivam |
samutpādya tato vṛttiṃ dadyādviprāya sarvaśaḥ || 94 ||

pitṛyajñe tathā cāgnau juhuyādvidhivaddvijaḥ |
tule'satyaṃ na karttavyaṃ tulādharmapratiṣṭhitā || 95 ||

chalabhāvaṃ tule kṛtvā narakaṃ pratipadyate |
atulaṃ cāpi yaddravyaṃ tatra mithyā parityajet || 96 ||

evaṃ mithyā na karttavyā mṛṣā pāpaprasūtikā |
nāsti satyātparodharmo nānṛtātpātakaṃ param || 97 ||

ataḥ sarveṣu kāryeṣu satyameva viśiṣyate |
aśvamedhasahasraṃ tu satyaṃ ca tulayā dhṛtam || 98 ||

aśvamedhasahasrāddhi satyameva viśiṣyate |
yo vadetsarvakāryeṣu satyaṃ mithyā parityajet || 99 ||

sa nistarati durgāṇi svargamakṣayamaśnute |
vāṇijyaṃ kārayedvipro mithyā'vaśyaṃ parityajet || 100 ||

vṛddhiṃ ca nikṣipettīrthe svayaṃ śeṣaṃ tu bhojayet |
dehakleśāttatsahasraguṇaṃ bhavati sarvadā || 101 ||

arthārjanavidhau martyā viśaṃti viṣame jale |
kāṃtāramaṭavīṃ caiva śvāpadaiḥ sevitāṃ tathā || 102 ||

giriṃ giriguhāṃ durgāṃ mlecchānāṃ śastrapātinām |
gṛhaṃ pratibhayaṃ sthānaṃ dhanalobhātsamaṃtataḥ || 103 ||

sutadārānparityajya dūraṃ gacchaṃti lobhinaḥ |
skaṃdhe bhāraṃ vahaṃtyanye taryāṃ cakre nipātanaiḥ || 104 ||

kṣepaṇībhirmahāduḥkhaissadā prāṇavyayena ca |
arthasya saṃcayaḥ putra prāṇātpriyataro mahān || 105 ||

ebhirnyāyārjitaṃ vittaṃ vaṇigbhāvena yatnataḥ |
pitṛdevadvijātibhyo dattaṃ cākṣayamaśnute || 106 ||

etau doṣau mahāṃtau ca vāṇijye lābhakarmaṇi |
lobhānāmaparityāgo mṛṣā grāhyaśca vikrayaḥ || 107 ||

etau doṣo parityajya kuryādarthārjanaṃ budhaḥ |
akṣayaṃ labhate dānādvaṇigdoṣairna lipyate || 108 ||

puṇyakarmarato vipraḥ kṛṣiṃ hi parikārayet |
vāhayeddivasasyārdhaṃ balīvardacatuṣṭayam || 109 ||

abhāvāttritayaṃ caiva aviśrāmaṃ na kārayet |
cārayecca tṛṇe'cchinnai coravyāghravivarjite || 110 ||

dadyādghāsaṃ yatheṣṭaṃ ca nityamātarpayetsvayam |
goṣṭhaṃ ca kārayettasya kiṃcidvighnavivarjitam || 111 ||

sadā gomayamūtrābhyāṃ vighasaiśca vivarjitam |
na malaṃ nikṣipedgoṣṭhe sarvadevaniketane || 112 ||

ātmanaḥ śayanīyasya sadṛśaṃ kārayedbudhaḥ |
samaṃ nirvāpayedyatnācchītavātarajastathā || 113 ||

prāṇasya sadṛśaṃ paśyedgāṃ ca sāmānyavigraham |
asya dehe sukhaṃduḥkhaṃ tathā tasyaiva kalpate || 114 ||

anena vidhinā yastu kṛṣikarmāṇi kārayet |
sa ca govāhanairdoṣairna lipyeta dhanī bhavet || 115 ||

durbalaṃ pīḍayedyastu tathaiva gadasaṃyutam |
atibālātivṛddhaṃ ca sa gohatyāṃ samālabhet || 116 ||

viṣamaṃ vāhayedyastu durbalaṃ sabalaṃ tathā |
sa gohatyāsamaṃ pāpaṃ prāpnotīha na saṃśayaḥ || 117 ||

yo vāhayedvinā sasyaṃ khādaṃtaṃ gāṃ nivārayet |
mohāttṛṇaṃ jalaṃ vāpi sa gohatyāsamaṃ labhet || 118 ||

saṃkrāṃtyāṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ cāmāvāsyāyāṃ tathaiva ca |
halasya vāhanātpāpaṃ gavāmayutahatyayā || 119 ||

amūṣu pūjayedyastu sitaiścitrādibhirnaraḥ |
kajjalaiḥ kusumaistailaiḥ sokṣayaṃ svargamaśnute || 120 ||

ghāsamuṣṭiṃ paragave yo dadāti sadāhnikam |
sarvapāpakṣayasyasya svargaṃ cākṣayamaśnute || 121 ||

yathā viprastathā gauśca dvayoḥ pūjāphalaṃ samam |
vicāre brāhmaṇo mukhyo nṛṇāṃ gāvaḥ paśau tathā || 122 ||

nārada uvāca |
vipro brahmamukhe jātaḥ kathito me tvayānagha |
kathaṃ gobhiḥ samo nātha vismayo me vidhe dhruvam || 123 ||

brahmovāca |
śṛṇu cātra yathātathyaṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ gavāṃ yathā |
ekapiṃḍakriyaikyaṃ tu puruṣairnirmitaṃ purā || 124 ||

purā brahmamukhodbhūtaṃ kūṭaṃ tejomayaṃ mahat |
caturbhāgaprajātaṃ tadvedognirgaurdvijastathā || 125 ||

prāktejaḥ saṃbhavo vedo vahnireva tathaiva ca |
parato gaustathā vipro jātaścaiva pṛthakpṛthak || 126 ||

tatra sṛṣṭā mayā cādau vedāścatvāra ekaśaḥ |
sthityarthaṃ sarvalokānāṃ bhuvanānāṃ samaṃtataḥ || 127 ||

agnirhavyāni bhuṃjīta devahetostathā dvijaḥ |
ājyaṃ goprabhavaṃ viddhi tasmādete prasūtakāḥ || 128 ||

na saṃti yadi lokeṣu catvāromī mahattarāḥ |
tadākhilaṃ ca bhuvanaṃ naṣṭaṃ sthāvarajaṃgamam || 129 ||

ebhirdhṛtāḥ sadā lokāḥ pratiṣṭhaṃti svabhāvataḥ |
svabhāvo brahmarūposāvete brahmamayāḥ smṛtāḥ || 130 ||

tasmādgauḥ pūjanīyosau vipra devāsurairapi |
udāraḥ sarvakāryeṣu jātastathyo guṇākaraḥ || 131 ||

sarvadevamayaḥ sākṣātsarvasatvānukaṃpakaḥ |
asya kāryaṃ mayā sṛṣṭaṃ puraiva poṣaṇaṃ prati || 132 ||

ataeva mayā dattaṃ varaṃ cātisuśobhanam |
ekajanmani te mokṣastavāstviti viniścitam || 133 ||

atraiva ye mṛtā gāvastvāgacchaṃti mamālayam |
pāpasya kaṇamātraṃ tu teṣāṃ dehena tiṣṭhati || 134 ||

devī gaurdhenukā devāścādidevī triśaktikā |
prasādādyasya yajñānāṃ prabhavo hi viniścitaḥ || 135 ||

gavāṃ sarvapavitrāṇi punaṃti sakalaṃ jagat |
mūtraṃ gorgomayaṃ kṣīraṃ dadhisarpistathaiva ca || 136 ||

amīṣāṃ bhakṣaṇe pāpaṃ na tiṣṭhati kalevare |
tasmādghṛtaṃ dadhi kṣīraṃ nityaṃ khādaṃti dhārmikāḥ || 137 ||

viśiṣṭaṃ sarvadravyeṣu gavyamiṣṭaṃ paraṃ śubham |
yasyāsye bhojanaṃ nāsti tasya mūrtistu pūtikā || 138 ||

annādyaṃ paṃcarātreṇa saptarātreṇa vai payaḥ |
dadhi viṃśatirātreṇa ghṛtaṃ syānmāsamekakam || 139 ||

agavyairyastu bhuṃkte vai māsamekaṃ niraṃtaram |
bhojane tasya martyasya pretāḥ khādaṃti caiva hi || 140 ||

paramānnaṃ paraṃ śuddhaṃ svinnaṃ cātapataṇḍulaiḥ |
bhuktvā tu yatkṛtaṃ puṇyaṃ koṭikoṭiguṇaṃ bhavet || 141 ||

anyaccāpi ca yaddravyaṃ haviṣyaṃ śāstranirmitam |
tadbhuktavā yatkṛtaṃ karma sarvaṃ lakṣaguṇaṃ bhavet || 142 ||

nirāmiṣaṃ ca yatkiṃcittasmādyadyatphalaṃ labhet |
tasmādgauḥ sarvakāryeṣu śasta eko yugeyuge || 143 ||

sarvadā sarvakāmeṣu dharmakāmārthamokṣadaḥ |
nārada uvāca |
keṣu kiṃ vā prayogeṇa paraṃ puṇyaṃ prakīrtitaṃ || 144 ||

vada tatsarvalokeśa yathā jānāmi tatvataḥ |
brahmovāca |
sakṛtpradakṣiṇaṃ kṛtvā godhanaṃ cābhivaṃdayet || 145 ||

sarvapāpairvinirmuktaḥ svargaṃ cākṣayamaśnute |
surācāryo yathā vaṃdyaḥ pūjyosau mādhavo yathā || 146 ||

saptapradakṣiṇaṃ kṛtvā caiśvaryātpākaśāsanaḥ |
kalya utthāya gomadhye pātraṃ gṛhya sahodakam || 147 ||

niṣiṃcedyo gavāṃ śṛṃgaṃ mastakenaiva tajjalam |
pratīccheta nirāhārastasya puṇyaṃ nibodhata || 148 ||

śrūyaṃte yāni tīrthāni triṣu lokeṣu nārada |
siddhacāraṇayuktāni sevitāni maharṣibhiḥ || 149 ||

abhiṣekassamasteṣāṃ gavāṃ śṛṃgodakasya ca |
prātarutthāya yo martyaḥ spṛśedgāṃ ca ghṛtaṃ madhu || 150 ||

sarṣapāṃśca priyaṃgūṃśca kalmaṣātpratimucyate |
ghṛtakṣīrapradā gāvo ghṛtayonyo ghṛtodbhavāḥ || 151 ||

ghṛtanadyo ghṛtāvartāstā me saṃtu sadā gṛhe |
ghṛtaṃ me sarvagātreṣu ghṛtaṃ me manasi sthitam || 152 ||

gāvo mamāgrato nityaṃ gāvaḥ pṛṣṭhata eva ca |
gāvaśca sarvagātreṣu gavāṃmadhye vasāmyaham || 153 ||

ityācamya japenmaṃtraṃ sāyaṃprātaridaṃ śuciḥ |
sarvapāpakṣayastasya svarloke pūjito bhavet || 154 ||

yathā gauśca tathā vipro yathāviprastathā hariḥ |
hariryathā tathā gaṃgā etena hyavṛṣāḥ smṛtāḥ || 155 ||

gāvo baṃdhurmanuṣyāṇāṃ manuṣyā bāṃdhavā gavām |
gauśca yasmingṛhe nāsti tadbaṃdhurahitaṃ gṛham || 156 ||

gomukhe cāśritā vedāḥ saṣaḍaṃgapadakramāḥ |
śṛṃgayośca sthitau nityaṃ sahaiva harikeśavau || 157 ||

udare'vasthitaḥ skaṃdaḥ śīrṣe brahmā sthitaḥ sadā |
vṛṣaddhvajo lalāṭe ca śṛṃgāgra iṃdra eva ca || 158 ||

karṇayoraśvinau devau cakṣuṣośśaśibhāskarau |
daṃteṣu garuḍo devo jihvāyāṃ ca sarasvatī || 159 ||

apāne sarvatīrthāni prasrāve caiva jāhnavī |
ṛṣayo romakūpeṣu mukhataḥ pṛṣṭhato yamaḥ || 160 ||

dhanado varuṇaścaiva dakṣiṇaṃ pārśvamāśritau |
vāmapārśve sthitā yakṣāstejasvaṃto mahābalāḥ || 161 ||

mukhamadhye ca gaṃdharvā nāsāgre pannagāstathā |
khurāṇāṃ paścime pārśve'psarasaśca samāśritāḥ || 162 ||

gomaye vasate lakṣmīrgomūtre sarvamaṃgalā |
pādāgre khecarā vedyā haṃbhāśabde prajāpatiḥ || 163 ||

catvāraḥ sāgarāḥ pūrṇā dhenūnāṃ ca staneṣu vai |
gāṃ ca spṛśati yo nityaṃ snāto bhavati nityaśaḥ || 164 ||

ato martyaḥ prapuṣṭaistu sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate |
gavāṃ rajaḥ khuroddhūtaṃ śirasā yastu dhārayet || 165 ||

sa ca tīrthajale snātaḥ sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate |
nārada uvāca |
gavāṃ ca daśavarṇānāṃ kasya dāne ca kiṃphalam || 166 ||

brūhi tattvaṃ guruśreṣṭha parameṣṭhinpriyaṃ yadi |
brahmovāca |
śvetāṃ gāṃ brāhmaṇe datvā mānavaśceśvaro bhavet || 167 ||

prāsāde vasate nityaṃ bhogī ca sukhamedhate |
dhūmrā tu svargakāṃtāra saṃsāre pāpamokṣiṇī || 168 ||

akṣayaṃ kapilādānaṃ kṛṣṇāṃ datvā na sīdati |
pāṃḍurā durlabhā loke gaurī ca kulanaṃdinī || 169 ||

raktākṣī rūpakāmasya dhanakāmasya nīlikā |
ekāṃ ca kapilāṃ datvā sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate || 170 ||

yattu bālyakṛtaṃ pāpaṃ yauvane vārdhake kṛtam |
vācākṛtaṃ karmakṛtaṃ manasā yatpraciṃtitaṃ || 171 ||

agamyāgamanaṃ caiva mitradrohe ca pātakam |
mānakūṭaṃ tulākūṭaṃ kanyānṛtaṃ gavānṛtam || 172 ||

sarvaṃ ca nāśayetkṣipraṃ kapilāṃ yaḥ prayacchati |
daśayojanavistīrṇā mahāpārā mahānadī || 173 ||

nārā ca jalakāṃtāre prasṛte codakārṇave |
yāvadvatsasya dvau pādau mukhaṃ yāvanna jāyate || 174 ||

tāvadgauḥ pṛthivī jñeyā yāvadgarbhaṃ na muṃcati |
suvarṇaśṛṃgīṃ vastrāḍhyāṃ sarvālaṃkārabhūṣitām || 175 ||

tāmrapṛṣṭhīṃ raupyakhurāṃ tathā kāṃsyopadohanām |
śobhitāṃ gaṃdhapuṣpaiśca sarvālaṃkārabhūṣitāṃ || 176 ||

īdṛśīṃ kapilāṃ dadyāddvijātau vedapārage |
sarvapāpakṣayastasya viṣṇuloke'cyuto bhavet || 177 ||

tasyāṃ tu duhyamānāyāṃ bhūmau pataṃti biṃdavaḥ |
ārāmādi vijāyaṃte bahupuṣpaphalottamāḥ || 178 ||

yatra kāmaphalā vṛkṣā nadyaḥ pāyasakardamāḥ |
prāsādāścāpi sauvarṇāstatra gacchaṃti gopradāḥ || 179 ||

daśadhenūśca yo dadyādekaṃ caiva dhuraṃdharaṃ |
samānaṃ tu phalaṃ proktaṃ brahmaṇā samudāhṛtam || 180 ||

ekaṃ ca daśabhirdadyātsahasrāṇāṃ śataṃ phalam |
tasyānusārato vedyaṃ phalaṃ nārada yatnataḥ || 181 ||

pitṝnuddiśya yaḥ putro vṛṣaṃ ca mokṣayedbhuvi |
pitaro viṣṇulokeṣu mahīyaṃte yathepsitam || 182 ||

catasro vatsataryaśca ekasyaiva vṛṣasya ca |
mokṣyaṃte sarvataḥ putra vidhireṣa sanātanaḥ || 183 ||

yāvaṃti caiva romāṇi tasya tāsāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ |
tāvadvarṣasahasrāṇi svargaṃ bhujaṃti mānavāḥ || 184 ||

lāṃgūlena vṛṣo yacca jalaṃ cotkṣipati dhruvaṃ |
tattoyaṃ tu sahasrābdaṃ pitṝṇāmamṛtaṃ bhavet || 185 ||

khureṇa karṣayedbhūmiṃ tato loṣṭhaṃ ca kardamaḥ |
pitṛbhyaśca svadhā tatra lakṣakoṭiguṇaṃ bhavet || 186 ||

vidyamāne ca janake yadi mātā vinaśyati |
caṃdanenāṃkitā dhenustasyāḥ svargāya dīyate || 187 ||

dātā caiva pitṝṇāṃ ca ṛṇaṃ caiva pramuṃcati |
akṣayaṃ labhate svargaṃ pūjito maghavā yathā || 188 ||

sarvalakṣaṇasaṃyuktā taruṇā gauḥ payasvinī |
samāprasūtikā bhadrā sā ca gauḥ pṛthivī smṛtā || 189 ||

tasya dānena maṃtrasya pṛthvīdānasamaṃ phalaṃ |
śatakratusamo martyaḥ kulamuddharate śataṃ || 190 ||

gavāṃ ca haraṇaṃ kṛtvā mṛte gorathavatsake |
krimipūrṇe sa kūpe ca tiṣṭhedābhūtasaṃplavaṃ || 191 ||

gavāṃ caiva vadhaṃ kṛtvā pitṛbhiḥ saha pacyate |
raurave narake ghore tāvatkālaṃ pratikriyā || 192 ||

gopracāraprabhagnaśca ṣaṃḍavāhanabaṃdhanaḥ |
akṣayaṃ narakaṃ prāyānpunarjanmani janmani || 193 ||

sakṛcca śrāvayedyastu kathāṃ puṇyatamāmimāṃ |
sarvapāpakṣayastasya devaiśca saha modate || 194 ||

ya idaṃ śṛṇuyādvāpi paraṃ puṇyatamaṃ mahat |
saptajanmakṛtātpāpānmucyate tatkṣaṇena hi || 195 ||

nārada uvāca |
kenācāreṇa viprasya brahmatejo vivardhate |
kenācāreṇa tasyaiva brāhmaṃ tejo vinaśyati || 1 ||

brahmovāca |
śayanīyātsamutthāya rātryaṃśe dvijasattamaḥ |
devāṃścaiva smarennityaṃ tathā puṇyavato dhruvam || 2 ||

goviṃdaṃ mādhavaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ hariṃ dāmodaraṃ tathā |
nārāyaṇaṃ jagannāthaṃ vāsudevamajaṃ vibhum || 3 ||

sarasvatīṃ mahālakṣmīṃ sāvitrīṃ vedamātaram |
brahmāṇaṃ bhāskaraṃ candraṃ dikpālāṃśca grahāṃstathā || 4 ||

śaṅkaraṃ ca śivaṃ śaṃbhumīśvaraṃ ca maheśvaram |
gaṇeśaṃ ca tathā skandaṃ gaurīṃ bhāgīrathīṃ śivām || 5 ||

puṇyaśloko nalo rājā puṇyaśloko janārdanaḥ |
puṇyaślokā ca vaidehī puṇyaśloko yudhiṣṭhiraḥ || 6 ||

aśvatthāmā balirvyāso hanūmāṃśca vibhīṣaṇaḥ |
kṛpaḥ paraśurāmaśca saptaite cīrajīvinaḥ || 7 ||

etānyastu smarennityaṃ prātarutthāya mānavaḥ |
brahmahatyādibhiḥ pāpairmucyate nātra saṃśayaḥ || 8 ||

sakṛduccarite tāta sarvayajñaphalaṃ labhet |
gavāṃ śatasahasrāṇāṃ dānasya phalamaśnute || 9 ||

tataścāpi śucau deśe malamūtraṃ parityajet |
dakṣiṇābhimukho rātrau divā kuryādudaṅmukhaḥ || 10 ||

parato daṃtakāṣṭhaṃ ca tṛṇairuduṃbarādibhiḥ |
ataḥ paraṃ ca saṃdhyāyāṃ saṃyataśca dvijo bhavet || 11 ||

pūrvāhṇe raktavarṇāṃ tu madhyāhne śuklavarṇikām |
sāyaṃ sarasvatīṃ kṛṣṇāṃ dvijo dhyāyedyathāvidhi || 12 ||

tataḥ samācaretsnānaṃ yathājñānena yatnataḥ |
aṃgaṃ prakṣālayitvā tu mṛdbhiḥ saṃlepayettataḥ || 13 ||

śirodeśe lalāṭe ca nāsikāyāṃ hṛdi bhruvoḥ |
bāhvoḥ pārśve tathā nābhau jānvoraṅghridvaye tathā || 14 ||

ekā liṃge gude tisrastathā vāmakare daśa |
ubhayoḥ sapta dātavyā mṛdaḥ śuddhimabhīpsatā || 15 ||

aśvakrāṃte rathakrāṃte viṣṇukrāṃte vasuṃdhare |
mṛttike hara me pāpaṃ yanmayā pūrvasaṃcitam || 16 ||

anenaiva tu maṃtreṇa mṛttikāṃ yastanau kṣipet |
sarvapāpakṣayastasya śucirbhavati mānavaḥ || 17 ||

tatastu vedapūrveṇa snānaṃ kuryādvicakṣaṇaḥ |
nade nadyāṃ tathā kūpe puṣkariṇyāṃ taṭākake || 18 ||

jalarāśau ca vapre ca ghaṭasnānaṃ tathottaram |
kārayedvidhivanmartyaḥ sarvapāpakṣayāya ca || 19 ||

prātaḥsnānaṃ mahāpuṇyaṃ sarvapāpapraṇāśanam |
yaḥ kuryātsatataṃ vipro viṣṇuloke mahīyate || 20 ||

prātaḥ saṃdhyāsamīpe ca yāvaddaṃḍacatuṣṭayam |
tāvatpānīyamamṛtaṃ pitṝṇāmupatiṣṭhate || 21 ||

parato ghaṭikāyugmaṃ yāvadyāmaikamāhnikam |
madhutulyaṃ jalaṃ tasminpitṝṇāṃ prītivardhanam || 22 ||

tatastu sārddhayāmaikaṃ jalaṃ kṣīramayaṃ smṛtam |
kṣīramiśraṃ jalaṃ tāvadyāvaddaṇḍacatuṣṭayam || 23 ||

ataḥ paraṃ ca pānīyaṃ yāvaddhi praharatrayam |
tatparaṃ lohitaṃ proktaṃ yāvadastaṃgato raviḥ || 24 ||

caturthaprahare snāne rātrau vā tarpayetpitṝn |
tattoyaṃ rakṣasāmeva grahaṇena vinā smṛtam || 25 ||

pānīyaṃ sarvasirddhythaṃ puraiva nirmitaṃ mayā |
rakṣārthaṃ tasya toyasya yakṣāścaiva dhuraṃdharāḥ || 26 ||

na prāpnuvaṃti pitaro ye ca lokāṃtaraṃ gatāḥ |
duṣprāpyaṃ salilaṃ teṣāmṛte svānmartyavāsinaḥ || 27 ||

tasmācchiṣyaiśca putraiśca pautradauhitrakādibhiḥ |
baṃdhuvargaistathā cānyaistarpaṇīyaṃ pitṛvrataiḥ || 28 ||

nārada uvāca |
jalasya daivataṃ brūhi tarpaṇasya vidhiṃ mayi |
yathā jānāmi deveśa tatvato vaktumarhasi || 29 ||

brahmovāca |
jalasya devatā viṣṇuḥsa rvalokeṣu gīyate |
jalapūto bhavedyastu viṣṇustacchaṃkaro bhavet || 30 ||

jalaṃ gaṃḍūṣamātraṃ tu pītvā pūto bhavennaraḥ |
viśeṣātkuśasaṃsargātpīyūṣādadhikaṃ jalam || 31 ||

sarvadevālayo darbho mayāyaṃ nirmitaḥ purā |
kuśamūle bhavedbrahmā kuśamadhye tu keśavaḥ || 32 ||

kuśāgre śaṃkaraṃ viddhi kuśa ete pratiṣṭhitāḥ |
kuśahastaḥ sadā medhyaḥ stotraṃ maṃtraṃ paṭhedyadi || 33 ||

sarvaṃ śataguṇaṃ proktaṃ tīrthe sāhasramucyate |
kuśāḥ kāśāstathā dūrvā yavapatrāṇi vrīhayaḥ || 34 ||

balvajāḥ puṃḍarīkāśca kuśāssapta prakīrtitāḥ |
ānupūrvyeṇa medhyāḥ syuḥ kuśā loke pratiṣṭhitāḥ || 35 ||

vinā maṃtreṇa yatsnānaṃ sarvaṃ tanniṣphalaṃ bhavet |
amṛtātsvādutāmeti saṃsparśācca tilasya ca || 36 ||

tasmācca tarpayennityaṃ pitṝṃstilajalairbudhaḥ |
daśabhiśca tilaistāvatpitṝṇāṃ prītiruttamā || 37 ||

agnistaṃbhabhayāddevā na cecchantyativistaram |
snātvā yastarpayennityaṃ tilamiśrodakaiḥ pitṝn || 38 ||

nīlapaṃḍavimokṣeṇa tvamāvāsyā tilodakaiḥ |
varṣāsu dīpadānena pitṝṇāmanṛṇo bhavet || 39 ||

vatsaraikamamāyāṃ tu tarpayedyastilaiḥ pitṛn |
vināyakatvamāpnoti sarvadevaiḥ prapūjyate || 40 ||

yugādyāsu ca sarvāsu yastilaistarpayetpitṝn |
uktaṃ yadvāpyamāyāṃ tu tasmācchataguṇādhikam || 41 ||

ayane viṣuve caiva rākāmāyāṃ tathaiva ca |
tarpayitvā pitṛvyūhaṃ svargaloke mahīyate || 42 ||

tathā manvaṃtarākhyāyāmanyasyāṃ puṇyasaṃsthitau |
grahaṇe caṃdrasūryasya puṇyatīrthe gayādiṣu || 43 ||

tarpayitvā pitṝnyāti mādhavasya niketanam |
tasmātpuṇyāhakaṃ prāpya tarpayetpitṛsaṃcayam || 44 ||

tarpaṇaṃ devatānāṃ ca pūrvaṃ kṛtvā samāhitaḥ |
adhikārī bhavetpaścātpitṝṇāṃ tarpaṇe budhaḥ || 45 ||

śrāddhe bhojanakāle ca pāṇinaikena dāpayet |
ubhābhyāṃ tarpaṇe dadyādvidhireṣa sanātanaḥ || 46 ||

dakṣiṇābhimukho bhūtvā śucistu tarpayetpitṝn |
tṛpyatāmiti vākyena nāmagotreṇa vai punaḥ || 47 ||

akṛṣṇairyattilairmohāttarpayetpitṛsaṃcayam |
bhūmyāṃ dadāti yadapo dātā caiva jale sthitaḥ || 48 ||

vṛthā taddīyate dānaṃ nopatiṣṭhati kasyacit |
sthale sthitvā jale yastu prayacchedudakaṃ naraḥ || 49 ||

nopatiṣṭhetpitṝṇāṃ tu salilaṃ tannirarthakam |
ārdravāsā jale yastu kuryādudakatarpaṇam || 50 ||

pitarastasya tṛpyaṃti sahadevaissadānagha |
rajakaiḥ kṣālitaṃ vastramaśuddhaṃ kavayo viduḥ || 51 ||

hastaprakṣālane caiva punarvastraṃ tu śudhyati |
śuṣkavāsāḥ śucau deśe sthāne yattarpayetpitṝn || 52 ||

tato daśaguṇenaiva tuṣyaṃti pitaro dhruvam |
snānaṃ saṃdhyāṃ ca pāṣāṇe khaḍge vā tāmrabhājane || 53 ||

tarpaṇaṃ kurute yastu pratyekaṃ ca śatādhikam |
raupyāṃgulīyaṃ tarjanyāṃ dhṛtvā yattarpayetpitṝn || 54 ||

sarvaṃ ca śatasāhasraguṇaṃ bhavati nānyathā |
tathaivānāmikāyāṃ tu dhṛtvā svarṇāṃgulīṃ budhaḥ || 55 ||

tarpayetpitṛsaṃdohaṃ lakṣakoṭiguṇaṃ bhavet |
aṃguṣṭhadeśinī madhye savyahastasya khaḍgakam || 56 ||

dhṛtvānāmikayā ratnamaṃjalerakṣayaṃphalaṃ |
snānārthamabhigacchaṃtaṃ devāḥ pitṛgaṇaiḥ saha || 57 ||

vāyubhūtānugacchaṃti tṛṣārtāḥ salilārthinaḥ |
nirāśāste nivartaṃte vastraniṣpīḍanena ca || 58 ||

tasmānna pīḍayedvastramakṛtvā pitṛtarpaṇam |
tisraḥkoṭyo'rdhakoṭī ca yāni lomāni mānuṣe || 59 ||

sravaṃti sarvatīrthāni tasmānna paripīḍayet |
devāḥ pibaṃti śirasi śmaśrutaḥ pitarastathā || 60 ||

cakṣuṣorapi gaṃdharvā adhastātsarvajaṃtavaḥ |
devāḥ pitṛgaṇāḥ sarve gaṃdharvā jaṃtavastathā || 61 ||

snānamātreṇa tuṣyaṃti snānātpāpaṃ na vidyate |
nityasnānaṃ ca yaḥ kuryātsa naraḥ puruṣottamaḥ || 62 ||

sarvapāpairvinirmukto nākalokemahīyate |
snānaṃ tarpaṇaparyaṃtaṃ devā maharṣayo viduḥ || 63 ||

ataḥ paraṃ ca devānāṃ pūjanaṃ kārayedbudhaḥ |
gaṇeśaṃ pūjayedyastu vighnastasya na jāyate || 64 ||

ārogyārthaṃ ca sūryaṃ ca dharmamokṣāya mādhavam |
śivaṃ ca kṛtyakāmārthaṃ sarvakāmāya caṃḍikām || 65 ||

devāṃstu pūjayitvā tu vaiśvadevabaliṃ caret |
vahnikāryaṃ tataḥ kṛtvā yajñaṃ brāhmaṇatarpaṇam || 66 ||

devānāṃ sarvasatvānāṃ punastriviṣṭapaṃ vrajet |
gatāgataṃ sthiraṃ kṛtvā kāmānmokṣaṃ sukhaṃ divam || 67 ||

tasmātsarvaprayatnena nityaṃ karmāṇi kārayet |
nārada uvāca |
kimarthaṃ ca jalaṃ tāta devāḥ pitṛgaṇaiḥ saha || 68 ||

na prāpnuvaṃti sarvajña labhaṃte mānavā yathā |
brahmovāca |
purā sṛṣṭaṃ mayā toyaṃ sarvadevamayāmṛtam || 69 ||

tasyaiva rakṣaṇārthaṃ ca rakṣā yakṣā dhanurdharāḥ |
ghnaṃti te pitaraṃ devamasmadvākyānna mānuṣam || 70 ||

paśavaḥ pakṣiṇaḥ kīṭā martyaloke vyavasthitāḥ |
martyajātāśca devā ye tathaiva mānuṣā dhruvam || 71 ||

tarpayitvā guruṃ nityaṃ suraloke pratiṣṭhitāḥ |
asnāyī ca malaṃ bhuṃkte ajapī pūyaśoṇitam || 72 ||

akṛtvā tarpaṇaṃ nityaṃ pitṛhā copajāyate |
brahmahatyāsamaṃ pāpaṃ devānāmapyapūjane || 73 ||

sandhyākṛtyamakṛtvā ca sūryaṃ haṃti ca pāpakṛt |
nārada uvāca |
brāhmaṇasya sadācārakramaṃ brūhi ca karmaṇām || 74 ||

itareṣāṃ ca varṇānāṃ pravṛttamakhilaṃ vada |
brahmovāca |
ācārāllabhate cāyurācārāllabhate sukham || 75 ||

ācārātsvargaṃ mokṣaṃ ca ācāro haṃtyalakṣaṇam |
anācāro hi puruṣo loke bhavati niṃditaḥ || 76 ||

duḥkhabhāgī ca satataṃ vyādhitolpāyureva ca |
narake niyataṃ vāso hyanācārānnarasya ca || 77 ||

ācārācca paraṃ lokamācāraṃ śṛṇu tattvataḥ |
gomayena gṛhe nityaṃ prakuryādupalepanam || 78 ||

prakṣālayettataḥ pīṭhaṃ kāṣṭhaṃ pātraṃ śilātalam |
bhasmanā kāṃsyapātraṃ tu tāmramamlenaśuddhyati || 79 ||

śilāpātraṃ tu tailena phālaṃgo vālakena tu |
svarṇaraupyādipātraṃ tu jalamātreṇa śudhyati || 80 ||

agninā lohapātraṃ tu pākaprakṣālanena tu |
khananāddāhanāccaiva upalepana dhāvanāt || 81 ||

parjanyavarṣaṇāccaiva bhūramedhyā viśudhyati |
taijassānāṃ maṇīnāṃ ca sarvasyāśmamayasya ca || 82 ||

bhasmabhirmṛttikābhiśca śuddhiruktā mayā purā |
śayyā bhāryā śiśurvastramupavītaṃ kamaṃḍaluḥ || 83 ||

ātmanaḥ kathitāśśuddhā na pareṣāṃ kadācana |
na bhuṃjītaikavastreṇa na snāyādekavāsasā || 84 ||

na dhārayetparasyaivaṃ snānavastraṃ kadācana |
saṃskāraṃ keśadaṃtānāṃ prātareva samācaret || 85 ||

gurūṇāṃ ca namaskāraṃ nityameva samācaret |
hastapāde mukhe caiva paṃcārdro bhojanaṃ caret || 86 ||

paṃcārdrakastu bhuṃjānaḥ śataṃ varṣāṇi jīvati |
devatānāṃ gurorājñāṃ snātakācāryayorapi || 87 ||

nākrāmetkāmataśchāyāṃ viprasya dīkṣitasya ca |
gogaṇaṃ devataṃ vipraṃ ghṛtaṃ madhu catuṣpatham || 88 ||

pradakṣiṇaṃ prakurvīta prakhyātāṃśca vanaspatīn |
goviprāvagniviprau ca viprau dvau daṃpatī tathā || 89 ||

tayormadhye na gaccheta svargasthopi pateddhruvam |
ucchiṣṭo na spṛśedagniṃ brāhmaṇaṃ daivataṃ gurum || 90 ||

svaśīrṣaṃ puṣpavṛkṣaṃ ca yajñavṛkṣamadhārmikam |
trīṇi tejāṃsi nocchiṣṭa udīkṣeta kadācana || 91 ||

sūryācaṃdramasāvevaṃ nakṣatrāṇi ca sarvaśaḥ |
nekṣedvipraṃ guruṃ devaṃ rājānaṃ yatināṃ varam || 92 ||

yoginaṃ devakarmāṇaṃ dharmāṇāṃ kathakaṃ dvijam |
nadīnāṃ ca pratīre ca patyuśca saritāṃ tathā || 93 ||

yajñavṛkṣasya mūle ca udyāne puṣpavāṭake |
śarīrasya malatyāgaṃ na kuryājjīvane tathā || 94 ||

viprasyāyatane goṣṭhe ramye rājapatheṣu ca |
na kṣauraṃ kārayeddhīraḥ kujasyāhni kadācana || 95 ||

malaṃ na dhārayeddaṃte nakhaṃ na vadane kṣipet |
tailābhyaṃgaṃ na kurvīta vāsare ravibhaumayoḥ || 96 ||

svagātrāsanayorvādyaṃ gurorekāsanādanam |
na harecchrotriyasvaṃ ca devasyāpi gurorapi || 97 ||

rājñastapasvināṃ caiva paṃgoraṃdhasya yoṣitaḥ |
paṃthā deyo brāhmaṇāya gobhyo rājabhya eva ca || 98 ||

rogiṇe bhārataptāya gurviṇyai durbalāya ca |
vivādaṃ na ca kurvīta nṛpa vipra cikitsakaiḥ || 99 ||

brāhmaṇaṃ gurupatnīṃ ca dūrataḥ parivarjayet |
patitaṃ kuṣṭhasaṃyuktaṃ cāṃḍālaṃ ca gavāśinam || 100 ||

nirdhūtaṃ jñānahīnaṃ ca dūrataḥ parivarjayet |
striyaṃ duṣṭāṃ ca durvṛttāmapavāda pradāyinīm || 101 ||

kukarmakāriṇīṃ duṣṭāṃ sadaiva kalahapriyām |
pramattāmadhikāṃgīñca nirlajjāṃ bāhyacāriṇīm || 102 ||

vyayaśīlāmanācārāṃ dūrataḥ parivarjayet |
malināṃ nābhivaṃdeta gurupatnīṃ kadācana || 103 ||

na spṛśettāṃ ca medhāvī spṛṣṭvā snānena śuddhyati |
sa tayā saha keliṃ ca varjayecca sadaiva hi || 104 ||

śṛṇuyācca vaco nūnaṃ na paśyecca guroḥ striyam |
vadhūṃ putrasya bhrātuśca svaputrīṃ yuvatīṃ dhruvam || 105 ||

anyāṃ ca gurupatnīṃ ca nekṣetsparśaṃ na kārayet |
tābhiḥ saha kathālāpaṃ tathā bhrūbhaṃgadarśanam || 106 ||

kalahaṃ nistrapāṃ vāṇīṃ sadaiva parivarjayet |
na dadyācca sadā pādaṃ tuṣāṃgārāsthibhasmasu || 107 ||

kārpāsāsthiṣu nirmālye citikāṣṭhe citau gurau |
śuṣkaṃ mīnaṃ na bhakṣeta pūtigaṃdhimamedhyakam || 108 ||

vighasaṃ cānyaducchiṣṭaṃ pākārthaṃ ca parasya ca |
na sthātavyaṃ na gaṃtavyaṃ kṣaṇamapyasatā saha || 109 ||

na tiṣṭhecca kṣaṇaṃ dhīro dīpacchāye kalidrume |
aspṛśyaissaha cālāpaṃ patitaiḥ kupitaiḥ saha || 110 ||

na kuryātkṣaṇamātraṃ tu kṛtvā gacchecca rauravam |
kaniṣṭhaṃ nābhivaṃdeta pitṛvyaṃ mātulaṃ tathā || 111 ||

utthāya cāsanaṃ dadyātkṛtāṃjalyagrataḥ sthitaḥ |
tailābhyaktaṃ tathocchiṣṭamārdravastraṃ ca rogiṇam || 112 ||

pārāvāragatodvignaṃ vahaṃtaṃ nābhivādayet |
yajñasyāṃtargataṃ naṣṭaṃ krīḍaṃtaṃ strījanaiḥ saha || 113 ||

bālakrīḍāgataṃ cāpi puṣpayuktaṃ kuśairyutam |
śiraḥ prāvṛtya karṇau vā apsu muktaśikhopi vā || 114 ||

akṛtvā pādayoḥ pūjāṃ nācāmeddakṣiṇāmukhaḥ |
upavītavihīnaśca nagnako muktakacchakaḥ || 115 ||

ekavastrapidhānaśca ācāṃto naiva śudhyati |
madhyamābhirmukhaṃ pūrvaṃ tisṛbhiḥ samupaspṛśet || 116 ||

aṃguṣṭhadeśinībhyāṃ ca nāsāṃ ca tadanaṃtaram |
aṃguṣṭhānāmikābhyāṃ ca cakṣuṣī samupaspṛśet || 117 ||

kaniṣṭhāṃguṣṭhataśśrotre nābhimaṃguṣṭhakena tu |
talena hṛdayaṃ nyasya sarvābhirmastakopari || 118 ||

bāhūcāgreṇa saṃspṛśya tataḥ śuddho bhavennaraḥ |
anenācamanaṃ kṛtvā mānavaḥ prayato bhavet || 119 ||

sarvapāpairvinirmuktaḥ svargaṃ cākṣayamaśnute |
prāṇastripuṭaśṛṃgyā ca vyānopānaśca mudrayā || 120 ||

samānastu samastābhirudānastarjanīṃ vinā |
nāgaḥ kūrmaśca kṛkaro devadatto dhanaṃjayaḥ || 121 ||

upaprīṇaṃtu te prītā yebhyo bhūmau pradīyate |
śayanaṃ cārdrapādena śuṣkapādena bhojanam || 122 ||

nāṃdhakāre ca śayanaṃ bhojanaṃ naiva kārayet |
paścime dakṣiṇe caiva na kuryāddaṃtadhāvanam || 123 ||

uttare paścime caiva na svapeddhi kadācana |
svapnādāyuḥ kṣayaṃ yāti brahmahā puruṣo bhavet || 124 ||

na kurvīta tataḥ svapnaṃ śastaṃ ca pūrvadakṣiṇam |
āyuṣyaṃ prāṅmukho bhuṃkte'yaśasyaṃ dakṣiṇāmukhaḥ || 125 ||

śriyaṃ pratyaṅmukho bhuṃkte yaśo bhuṅkta udaṅmukhaḥ |
prācyāṃ naro labhedāyuryāmyāṃ pretatvamaśnute || 126 ||

vāruṇe ca bhavedrogī āyurvittaṃ tathottare |
devānāmekabhuktaṃ tu dvibhuktaṃ syānnarasya ca || 127 ||

tribhuktaṃ pretadaityasya caturthaṃ kauṇapasya tu |
nirāmiṣaṃ havirdevā matsyamāṃsādi mānuṣāḥ || 128 ||

pūtiparyuṣitaṃ duṣṭamanye bhuṃjaṃtyanāvṛtāḥ |
svargasthitānāmiha jīvaloke catvāri teṣāṃ hṛdaye ca saṃti || 129 ||

dānaṃ praśastaṃ madhurā ca vāṇī devārcanaṃ brāhmaṇatarpaṇaṃ ca |
kārpaṇyavṛttisvajaneṣu niṃdā kucelatā nīcajaneṣu bhaktiḥ || 130 ||

atīva roṣaḥ kaṭukā ca vāṇī narasya cihnaṃ narakāgatasya |
navanītopamā vāṇī karuṇā komalaṃ manaḥ || 131 ||

dharmabījaprasūtānāmetatpratyakṣa lakṣaṇam |
dayādaridrahṛdayaṃ vacaḥ krakaca karkaśam || 132 ||

pāpabījaprasūtānāmetatpratyakṣa lakṣaṇam |
śrāvayecchṛṇuyādvāpi sadācārādikaṃ naraḥ || 133 ||
ācārādeḥ phalaṃ labdhvā pāpātpūto'cyuto divi || 134 ||

bhīṣma uvāca |
yatpuṇyamadhikaṃ loke sarvadā sarvasaṃmatam |
tadvadasvecchayā vipra yatkṛtaṃ pūrvapūrvakaiḥ || 1 ||

pulastya uvāca |
ekadā tu dvijāḥ sarve vyāsaśiṣyāssahādarāt |
vyāsaṃ praṇamya papracchu dharmaṃ māṃ ca yathā bhavān || 2 ||

dvijā ūcuḥ |
puṇyātpuṇyatamaṃ loke sarvadharmeṣu cottamam |
kiṃ kṛtvā mānavā svargaṃ bhuṃjate cākṣayaṃ vada || 3 ||

labhyaṃ cākaṣṭakaṃ śuddhaṃ varṇānāṃ martyavāsinām |
gurūṇāṃ ca laghūnāṃ ca sādhyamekaṃ kratuṃ vada || 4 ||

yadyatkṛtvā ca devānāṃ pūjyo nāke bhavennaraḥ |
tattadvada ca no brahmanprasādī bhava dharmataḥ || 5 ||

vyāsa uvāca |
paṃcākhyānaṃ vadiṣyāmi śṛṇudhvaṃ tatra pūrvataḥ |
paṃcānāmekakaṃ kṛtvā viṃdenmokṣaṃ divaṃ yaśaḥ || 6 ||

pitrorarcā'tha patyuśca sāmyaṃ sarvajaneṣu ca |
mitrādroho viṣṇubhaktirete paṃca mahāmakhāḥ || 7 ||

prākpitrorarcayā viprā yaddharmaṃ sādhayennaraḥ |
na tatkratuśataireva tīrthayātrādibhirbhuvi || 8 ||

pitā dharmaḥ pitā svargaḥ pitā hi paramaṃ tapaḥ |
pitari prītimāpanne prīyaṃte sarvadevatāḥ || 9 ||

pitaro yasya tṛpyaṃti sevayā ca guṇena ca |
tasya bhāgīrathī snānamahanyahani vartate || 10 ||

sarvatīrthamayī mātā sarvadevamayaḥ pitā |
mātaraṃ pitaraṃ caiva yastu kuryātpradakṣiṇam || 11 ||

pradakṣiṇīkṛtā tena saptadvīpā vasuṃdharā |
jānunī ca karau yasya pitroḥ praṇamataḥ śiraḥ || 12 ||

nipataṃti pṛthivyāṃ ca sokṣayaṃ labhate divaṃ |
tayoścaraṇayoryāvadrajaścihnāni mastake || 13 ||

pratīke ca vilagnāni tāvatpūtaḥ sutastayoḥ |
pādāraviṃdasalilaṃ yaḥ pitroḥ pibate sutaḥ || 14 ||

tasya pāpakṣayaṃ yāti janmakoṭiśatārjitaṃ |
dhanyosau mānavo loke pūtosau sarvakalmaṣāt || 15 ||

vināyakatvamāpnoti janmanaikena mānavaḥ |
pitarau laṃghayedyastu vacobhiḥ puruṣādhamaḥ || 16 ||

niraye ca vasettāvadyāvadābhūtasaṃplavaṃ |
pitroranarcanaṃ kṛtvā bhuṃkte yastu sutādhamaḥ || 17 ||

krimikūpetha narake kalpāṃtamupatiṣṭhati |
rogiṇaṃ cāpi vṛddhaṃ ca pitaraṃ vṛttikarśitam || 18 ||

vikalaṃ netrakarṇābhyāṃ tyaktvā gacchecca rauravam |
aṃtyajātiṣu mleccheṣu cāṃḍāleṣvapi jāyate || 19 ||

pitrorapoṣaṇaṃ kṛtvā sarvapuṇyakṣayo bhavet |
nārādhya pitarau putrastīrthadevānbhajannapi || 20 ||

tayorna phalamāpnoti kīṭavadramate mahīm |
kathayāmi purāvṛttaṃ viprāḥ śṛṇuta yatnataḥ || 21 ||

yaṃ śrutvā na punarmohaṃ prayāsyatha punarbhuvi |
purāsīcca dvijaḥ kaścinnarottama iti smṛtaḥ || 22 ||

svapitarāvanādṛtya gatosau tīrthasevayā |
tataḥ sarvāṇi tīrthāni gacchato brāhmaṇasya ca || 23 ||

ākāśe snānacelāni praśuṣyaṃti dine dine |
ahaṃkāro'viśattasya mānase brāhmaṇasya ca || 24 ||

matsamo nāsti vai kaścitpuṇyakarmā mahāyaśāḥ |
ityukte cānane tasya ahadacca bakastadā || 25 ||

krodhāccaiveritastasya sa śaśāpa dvijo bakam |
papāta ca bakaḥ pṛthvyāṃ sa bhasmībhūtavigrahaḥ || 26 ||

bhīrdvijeṃdraṃ mahāmohaḥ prāviśaccāṃtakarmaṇi |
tataḥ pāpācca viprasya celaṃ khaṃ ca na gacchati || 27 ||

viṣādamagamatsadyastataḥ khaṃ tamuvāca ha |
gaccha bāḍava cāṃḍālaṃ mūkaṃ paramadhārmikam || 28 ||

tatra dharmaṃ ca jānīṣe kṣemaṃ te tadvaco bhavet |
khācca tadvacanaṃ śrutvā gatosau mūkamaṃdiram || 29 ||

śuśrūṣaṃtaṃ ca pitarau sarvāraṃbhāndadarśa saḥ |
dadataṃ śītakāle ca samyaguṣṇaṃ jalaṃ tayoḥ || 30 ||

tailatāpanatāṃbūlaṃ tathā tūlavatīṃ paṭīm |
nityāśanaṃ ca miṣṭānnaṃ dugdhakhaṃḍaṃ tathaiva ca || 31 ||

dāpayaṃtaṃ vasaṃte ca madhumālāṃ sugaṃdhikāṃ |
anyāni yāni bhogyāni kṛtyāni vividhāni ca || 32 ||

uṣṇe cāvījayatsopi nityaṃ ca pitarāvapi |
tatastayoḥ pracaryāṃ ca kṛtvā bhuṃktetha sarvadā || 33 ||

śramasya vāraṇaṃ kuryātsaṃtāpasya tathaiva ca |
ebhiḥ puṇyaiḥ sthito viṣṇustasya gehodare ciram || 34 ||

aṃtarikṣe ca krīḍaṃtamādhārastaṃbhavarjite |
tasyāpi bhavane nityaṃ sthitaṃ tribhuvaneśvaraṃ || 35 ||

viprarūpadharaṃ kāṃtaṃ nānyairbhūtaṃ ca satparam |
tejomayaṃ mahāsatvaṃ śobhayaṃtaṃ ca maṃdiraṃ || 36 ||

dṛṣṭvā vismayamāpanno vipraḥ provāca mūkakam |
vipra uvāca |
āsannaṃ ca mamāgaccha tvayaivecchāmi śāśvataṃ || 37 ||

hitaṃ me sarvalokānāṃ tatvato vaktumarhasi |
mūka uvāca |
pitrorarcāṃ karomyadya kathamāyāmi teṃtikaṃ || 38 ||

arcayitvā tu pitarau kṛtyaṃ te karavāṇi vai |
tiṣṭha me dvāradeśe ca ātithyaṃ te karomyaham || 39 ||

ityukte caiva cāṃḍāle cukopa brāhmaṇastadā |
brāhmaṇaṃ māṃ parityajya kiṃ kāryamadhikaṃ tava || 40 ||

mūka uvāca |
kiṃ kupyasi vṛthā vipra na bakohaṃ tavādhunā |
kopassiddhyati te tāvadbakenānyatra kiṃcana || 41 ||

gagane snānaśāṭī te na śuṣyati na tiṣṭhati |
vacanaṃ khāttataḥ śrutvā madgṛhaṃ cāgato bhavān || 42 ||

tiṣṭha tiṣṭha vadiṣyāmi nocedgaccha pativratāṃ |
tāṃ ca dṛṣṭvā dvijaśreṣṭha dayitaṃ te phaliṣyati || 43 ||

tatastasyagṛhādviṣṇurdvijarūpadharo vibhuḥ |
vinissṛtya dvijaṃ prāha gehaṃ tasyāḥ prayāmyahaṃ || 44 ||

sa vimṛśya dvijaśreṣṭhastena sārdhaṃ cacāla ha |
gacchaṃtaṃ tamuvācedaṃ hariṃ vipreti vismitaḥ || 45 ||

kirthaṃ ca tvayā vipra cāṃḍālasya gṛhodare |
sadā saṃsthīyate tāta yoṣājanavṛte mudā || 46 ||

hariruvāca |
idānīṃ mānasaṃ śuddhaṃ na bhūtaṃ bhavato dhruvam |
pativratādikaṃ dṛṣṭvā paścājjñāsyasi māṃ kila || 47 ||

vipra uvāca |
pativratā ca kā tāta kiṃ vā tasyāśśrutaṃ mahat |
yenāhaṃ tatra gacchāmi kāraṇaṃ vada me dvija || 48 ||

hariruvāca |
nadīnāṃ jāhnavī śreṣṭhā pramadānāṃ pativratā |
manuṣyāṇāṃ prajāpālo devānāṃ ca janārdanaḥ || 49 ||

pativratā ca yā nāri patyurnityaṃ hite ratā |
kuladvayasya puruṣānuddharetsā śataṃ śataṃ || 50 ||

svargaṃ bhunakti tāvacca yāvadābhūtasaṃplavaṃ |
svargādbhraṣṭo bhavedvāsyāḥ sārvabhaumo nṛpaḥ patiḥ || 51 ||

asyaiva mahiṣī bhūtvā sukhaṃ viṃdedanaṃtaraṃ |
punaḥ punaḥ svargarājyaṃ tasya tasyā na saṃśayaḥ || 52 ||

evaṃ janmaśataṃ prāpya aṃte mokṣo bhaveddhruvam |
vipra uvāca |
pativratā bhavetkāvā tasyāḥ kiṃ vā ca lakṣaṇaṃ || 53 ||

brūhi me dvijaśārdūla yathā jānāmi tattvataḥ |
hariruvāca |
putrācchataguṇaṃ snehādrājānaṃ ca bhayādatha || 54 ||

ārādhayetpatiṃ śauriṃ yā paśyetsā pativratā |
kārye dāsī ratau veśyā bhojane jananīsamā || 55 ||

vipatsu maṃtriṇī bhartuḥ sā ca bhāryā pativratā |
bharturājñāṃ na laṃghedyā mano vākkāyakarmabhiḥ || 56 ||

bhukte patyau sadā cātti sā ca bhāryā pativratā |
yasyāṃ yasyāṃtu śayyāyāṃ patiḥ svapiti yatnataḥ || 57 ||

tatra tatra ca sābharturarcāṃ karoti nityaśaḥ |
naiva matsaramāyāti na kārpaṇyaṃ na māninī || 58 ||

māne'māne samānaṃ ca yā paśyetsā pativratā |
suveṣaṃ yā naraṃ dṛṣṭvā bhrātaraṃ pitaraṃ sutaṃ || 59 ||

manyate ca paraṃ sādhvī sā ca bhāryā pativratā |
tāṃ gaccha dvijaśārdūla vadakāmaṃ yathā tava || 60 ||

tasya patnyo'ṣṭa tiṣṭhaṃti tanmadhye varavarṇinī |
rūpayauvanasaṃpannā dayāyuktā yaśasvinī || 61 ||

śubhā nāmeti vikhyātā gatvā tāṃ pṛccha te hitaṃ |
evamuktvā tu bhagavāṃstatraivāṃtaradhīyata || 62 ||

tasyaivādṛśyatāṃ dṛṣṭvā vismitobhūddvijastadā |
sa ca sādhvīgṛhaṃ gatvā papracchātha pativratāṃ || 63 ||

atithervacanaṃśrutvāgṛhānniḥsṛtyasaṃbhramāt |
dṛṣṭvā dvijaṃ satī tatra dvāradeśe sthitābhavat || 64 ||

tāṃ ca dṛṣṭvā dvijaśreṣṭha uvāca vacanaṃ mudā |
priyaṃ mamahitaṃ brūhi yathādṛṣṭaṃ tvameva hi || 65 ||

pativratovāca |
sāṃprataṃ patyurarcāsti na cāsmākaṃ svataṃtratā |
paścātkāryaṃ kariṣyāmi gṛhāṇātithyamadya vai || 66 ||

vipra uvāca |
mama dehe kṣudhā nāsti pipāsādya na ca śramaḥ |
abhīṣṭaṃ vada kalyāṇi nocecchāpaṃ dadāmi te || 67 ||

tamuvāca tadā sāpi na bakohaṃ dvijottama |
gaccha dharmatulādhāraṃ pṛccha taṃ te hitaṃ dvija || 68 ||

ityuktvā sā mahābhāgā prayayau ca gṛhodaram |
tatrāpaśyaddvijo vipraṃ yathā cāṃḍālaveśmani || 69 ||

vimṛśya vismayāpannastena sārdhaṃ yayau dvijaḥ |
tiṣṭhaṃtaṃ ca dvijaṃ taṃ ca sopaśyaddhṛṣṭamānasam || 70 ||

sa covāca mudā vipraṃ dṛṣṭvā taṃ tāṃ satīṃ ca saḥ |
deśāṃtare ca yadvṛttaṃ tayā ca kathitaṃ kila || 71 ||

kathaṃ jānāti madvṛttaṃ cāṃḍālopi pativratā |
ato me vismayastāta kimāścaryaṃ paraṃ mahat || 72 ||

hariuvāca |
jñāyate kāraṇaṃ tāta sarveṣāṃ bhūtabhāvanaiḥ |
atipuṇyātsadācārādyatastvaṃ vismayaṃ gataḥ || 73 ||

kimuktaśca tayā tvaṃ ca vada tatsāṃprataṃ mune |
vipra uvāca |
praṣṭuṃ dharmatulādhāraṃ sā ca māṃ samupādiśat || 74 ||

hariruvāca |
āgaccha muniśārdūla ahaṃ gacchāmi taṃ prati |
gacchaṃtaṃ ca hariṃ prāha tulādhāraḥ kva tiṣṭhati || 75 ||

hariruvāca |
janānāṃ nikaro yatra bahudravyasuvikraye |
vikrīṇāti ca krīṇāti tulādhārastatastataḥ || 76 ||

jano yavānrasaṃ snehaṃ kūṭamannasya saṃcayaṃ |
sarvaṃ tasya mukhādeva gṛhṇāti ca dadātyapi || 77 ||

satyaṃ tyaktvānṛtaṃ kiṃcitprāṇāṃte samupasthite |
noktaṃ naravaraśreṣṭhastenadharmatulādharaḥ || 78 ||

ityukte tu tamadrākṣīdvikrīṇaṃtaṃ rasānbahūn |
malapaṃkadharaṃ martyaṃ daṃtakuḍmalapaṃkilam || 79 ||

tatra vastudhanotthāṃ ca bhāṣaṃtaṃ vividhāṃ giram |
vṛtaṃ bahuvidhairmartyaiḥ strībhiḥ puṃbhiśca sarvataḥ || 80 ||

kathaṃ kathamiti prāha sa taṃ madhurayā girā |
dharmasya me samuddeśaṃ vada prāptoṃ'tikaṃ hi te || 81 ||

tulādhāra uvāca |
yāvajjanāḥ pratiṣṭhaṃti mamaiva sannidhau dvija |
tāvanme svasthatā nāsti yāvacca rātriyāmakaḥ || 82 ||

taccopadeśamādāya gaccha dharmākaraṃ prati |
bakasya maraṇe doṣaṃ khe ca vastrāviśoṣaṇam || 83 ||

sarvaṃ tatra ca jānīṣe sajjanādrohakaṃ vraja |
tatra tasyopadeśena tava kāmaḥ phaliṣyati || 84 ||

ityuktvā tulādhāraḥ karoti krayavikrayau |
tathā tāta gamiṣyāmi sajjanādrohakaṃ prati || 85 ||

tulādhārasamuddeśānna jānāmi tadālayam |
hariruvāca |
ehyāgaccha gamiṣyāmi tvayā sārddhaṃ ca tadgṛham || 86 ||

atha vartmani gacchaṃtamuvāca brāhmaṇo hariṃ |
vipra uvāca |
tulādhāre ca na snānaṃ na devapitṛtarpaṇam || 87 ||

maladigdhaṃ ca gātraṃ tu sarvaṃ celamalakṣaṇam |
kathaṃ jānāti madvṛttaṃ deśāṃtarasamudbhavam || 88 ||

ato me vismayastāta sarvaṃ tvaṃ vada kāraṇam |
hariruvāca |
satyena samabhāvena jitaṃ tena jagattrayam || 89 ||

tenātṛpyaṃta pitaro devā munigaṇaiḥ saha |
bhūtabhavya pravṛttaṃ ca tena jānāti dhārmikaḥ || 90 ||

nāsti satyātparo dharmo nānṛtātpātakaṃ param |
viśeṣe samabhāvasya puruṣasyānaghasya ca || 91 ||

arau mitrepyudāsīne mano yasya samaṃ vrajet |
sarvapāpakṣayastasya viṣṇusāyujyatāṃ vrajet || 92 ||

evaṃ yo vartate nityaṃ kulakoṭiṃ samuddharet |
satyaṃ damaḥ śamaścaiva dhairyaṃ sthairyamalobhatā || 93 ||

anāścaryamanālasyaṃ tasminsarvaṃ pratiṣṭhitam |
tena vai devalokasya naralokasya sarvaśaḥ || 94 ||

vṛttaṃ jānāti dharmajñastasyadehe sthito hariḥ |
loke tasya samo nāsti samaḥ satyārjaveṣu ca || 95 ||

sa ca dharmamayaḥ sākṣāttenaiva dhāritaṃ jagat |
dvija uvāca |
jñātaṃ me tvatprasādācca tulādhārasya kāraṇam || 96 ||

adrohakasya yadvṛttaṃ tadbrūhi tvaṃ yadīcchasi |
hariruvāca |
puraiva rājaputrasya kulastrīnavayauvanā || 97 ||

patnīva kāmadevasya śacīva vāsavasya ca |
tasya prāṇasamā bhāryā sundarī nāma sundarī || 98 ||

akasmātpārthivasyaiva kārye gantuṃ samudyataḥ |
manasālocitaṃ tena prāṇebhyopi garīyasīm || 99 ||

kasminsthāne sthāpayāmi yato rakṣā bhaveddhruvam |
ityālocyaiva sahasā tvāgatosya gṛhaṃ prati || 100 ||

uktaṃ ca tādṛśaṃ vākyaṃ śrutvā sa vismayaṃgataḥ |
na tātaste na ca bhrātā na cāhaṃ tava bāndhavaḥ || 101 ||

pitṛmātṛkulasyaiva tasyā na hi suhṛjjanaḥ |
kathaṃ ca madgṛhe tāta sthityā svastho bhaviṣyasi || 102 ||

etasminnantare tena coktaṃ vākyaṃ yathocitam |
loke tvatsadṛśo nāsti dharmajño vijitendriyaḥ || 103 ||

sa cāha taṃ ca sarvajñaṃ vaktuṃ nārhasi dūṣaṇam |
trailokyamohinīṃ bhāryāṃ kaḥ pumānrakṣituṃ kṣamaḥ || 104 ||

rājaputra uvāca |
dharaṇyāṃ parivijñāya tvāgatohaṃ tavāntikam |
eṣā tiṣṭhatu te'gāre vrajāmi nijamandiram || 105 ||

ityukte sa punaḥ prāha nagare'sminpraśobhane |
bahukāmuka saṃpūrṇe kathaṃ rakṣā bhavetstriyāḥ || 106 ||

sa covāca punastaṃ ca kuru rakṣāṃ vrajāmyaham |
gṛhasthassaṅkaṭādāha dharmasya rājaputrakam || 107 ||

karomyanucitaṃ kāryaṃ svadāsyamucitaṃ hitam |
sadā caivedṛśī bhāryā sthātavyā madgṛhe pitaḥ || 108 ||

arakṣārakṣaṇe deva vadābhīṣṭaṃ kuru priyam |
mama talpe mayā sārdhaṃ śayānaṃ bhāryayā saha || 109 ||

manyase daivataṃ svaṃ cettiṣṭhennocettu gacchatu |
kṣaṇaṃ vimṛśya taṃ prāha rājaputraḥ punastadā || 110 ||

bāḍhametadvacastāta yathābhīṣṭaṃ tathā kuru |
tato bhāryāṃ jagādātha asya vākyācchivāśivam || 111 ||

kartavyaṃ ca na te doṣa ājñayā mama suṃdari |
etaduktvā gataḥ sopi bhūpateḥ śāsanātpituḥ || 112 ||

anaṃtaraṃ kṣapāyāṃ ca yaduktaṃ ca tathākṛtam |
yoṣitormadhyagaḥ sopi nityaṃ svapiti dhārmikaḥ || 113 ||

dharmānna calate sopi svabhāryāparabhāryayoḥ |
saṃsparśātsvastriyaścāsya kāmābhilaṣitaṃ manaḥ || 114 ||

tasyāḥ saṃsargataścaiva duhitaiva pramanyate |
stanau tasyāstu pṛṣṭhe ca lagantau ca punaḥpunaḥ || 115 ||

bālakasyeva putrasya stanau mātuḥ samanyate |
tasyā aṃgāni cāṃgeṣu lagaṃti ca punaḥpunaḥ || 116 ||

tato mātussutasyeva somanyata dine dine |
tasya yoṣāsusaṃsargo nivṛttastvabhavattataḥ || 117 ||
