evaṃ saṃvatsarasyārddhe tatpatiścāgataḥ puraṃ |
apṛcchattaṃ ca lokeṣu tasyā vṛttamathoditam || 118 ||

kecidbhadraṃ bodhayanto yuvānopi suvismitāḥ |
kecidāhustvayā dattā tayā sārddhaṃ svapityasau || 119 ||

strīpuṃsorekasaṃsargātśāṃtatā tu kathaṃ bhavet |
tasyāṃ yasyābhilāṣosti na pṛṣṭassa vadedyuvā || 120 ||

lokānāṃ kuśrutirvārtā tena puṇyabalācchrutā |
janāpavādamokṣārthaṃ buddhistasyābhavacchubhā || 121 ||

dārūṇi svayamāhṛtyājijvalatsa mahānalam |
etasminnaṃtare tāta rājaputraḥ pratāpavān || 122 ||

āgamattadgṛhaṃ sadyaḥ sopaśyattaṃ ca yoṣitam |
protphullavadanāṃ nārīṃ praviṣādagataṃ naraṃ || 123 ||

anayormānasaṃ jñātvā rājaputrovadadvacaḥ |
kiṃ na saṃbhāṣase māṃ ca mitrakaṃ ciramāgatam || 124 ||

abravītsopi dharmātmā rājaputramanaṣṭadhīḥ |
yatkṛtaṃ duṣkaraṃ karma mayā tvaddhitakāraṇāt || 125 ||

sarvaṃ vyarthamahaṃ manye janānāṃ ca pravādataḥ |
adya vahnimahaṃ yāsye prapaśyaṃtu narāssurāḥ || 126 ||

ityuktvā sa mahābhāgaḥ praviveśa hutāśanam |
viśatastasya vahnau na kusumaṃ cikurālaye || 127 ||

nāṃgamasyānalodhākṣīnna ca vastraṃ na kuṃtalam |
khe ca devā mudā sarvesādhusādhviti cābruvan || 128 ||

apatanpuṣpavarṣāṇi tasya mūrdhni samaṃtataḥ |
yairyaiśca duṣkṛtaṃ vākyaṃ gaditaṃ tāvubhau prati || 129 ||

teṣāṃ mukhe prajāyaṃte kuṣṭhāni vividhāni ca |
tatrāgatya ca devāśca vahnerākṛṣyataṃ mudā || 130 ||

apūjayansupuṣpaiśca munayo vismayaṃ gatāḥ |
sarvairmunivarairevaṃ manuṣyairvividhaistadā || 131 ||

arcyate tu mahātejāḥ sa ca sarvānapūjayat |
sajjanādrohakaṃ nāma kṛtaṃ devāsurairnṛbhiḥ || 132 ||

tasya pādarajaḥ pūtā sasyapūrṇā dharābhavat |
surāścāhuśca taṃ tatra bhāryā te saṃpragṛhyatām || 133 ||

etasya sadṛśo loke na bhūto na bhaviṣyati |
nāstīti sāṃprataṃ pṛthvyāṃ kāmalobhājitaḥ pumān || 134 ||

devāsuramanuṣyāṇāṃ rakṣasāṃ mṛgapakṣiṇām |
kīṭādīnāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ kāma eṣa sudurjayaḥ || 135 ||

kāmāllobhāttathākrodhānnityaṃ sattveṣu jāyate |
saṃsārabaṃdhakaḥ kāmo hyakāmo na kvacidbhavet || 136 ||

anenaiva jitaṃ sarvaṃ bhuvanāni caturdaśa |
amuṣya hṛdaye nityaṃ vāsudevo mudāsthitaḥ || 137 ||

evaṃ spṛṣṭvātha dṛṣṭvā taṃ manuṣyāḥ sarvakalmaṣāt |
pūyaṃte hyanaghāścaiva labhaṃte cākṣayāṃ divam || 138 ||

evamuktvā gatā devā vimānaiśca divaṃ mudā |
manuṣyāḥ prayayustuṣṭā daṃpatī svagṛhaṃ tathā || 139 ||

divyaṃ cakṣustadā tasya cāsīddevānsa paśyati |
trailokyasya ca vārttāṃ ca jānāti līlayā bhṛśam || 140 ||

tatastasya ca vīthyāṃ ca dṛṣṭastena sahaiva saḥ |
sa papraccha mudā taṃ ca dharmoddeśaṃ hitaṃ vada || 141 ||

sajjanādroha uvāca |
gaccha bāḍava dharmajña vaiṣṇavaṃ puruṣottamam |
taṃ ca dṛṣṭvā tvabhīṣṭaṃ te sāṃprataṃ ca phaliṣyati || 142 ||

bakasya nidhanaṃ yadvā vastrasyāśoṣaṇaṃ tathā |
jānīṣe cāparo yaśca kāmaste'sti hṛdisthitaḥ || 143 ||

etacchrutvā tu vacanamāgato vaiṣṇavaṃ prati |
viṣṇurūpadvijenaiva sārddhaṃ tena mudā yayau || 144 ||

apaśyatpuruṣaṃ śuddhaṃ jvalaṃtaṃ ca puraḥsthitam |
sarvalakṣaṇasaṃpūrṇaṃ dīpyamānaṃ svatejasā || 145 ||

abravītsa ca dharmātmā dhyānasthaṃ ca hareḥ priyam |
vadano yadyadvṛttaṃ vai dūrāttvāṃ cāgato hyaham || 146 ||

vaiṣṇava uvāca |
prasannaste suraśreṣṭho dānavārīśvaraḥ sadā |
dṛṣṭvā tvāṃ ca mano'smākaṃ hṛṣyatīvādhunā dvija || 147 ||

kalyāṇaṃ cātulaṃ tedya phaliṣyati manorathaḥ |
suravartmani te nityaṃ celaṃ śuṣyati nānyathā || 148 ||

dṛṣṭvā devaṃ suraśreṣṭhaṃ mama gehe hariṃ sthitam |
ityukte vaiṣṇavenātha sa tu taṃ punabravīt || 149 ||

kvāsau viṣṇuḥ sthito nityaṃ darśayādya prasādataḥ |
vaiṣṇava uvāca |
asmindevagṛhe ramye praviśya parameśvaram || 150 ||

taṃ dṛṣṭvā kilbiṣāddhorānmucyase janmabaṃdhānat |
tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā praviśya sadanaṃ prati || 151 ||

apaśyattaṃ dvijaṃ viṣṇuṃ tiṣṭhaṃtaṃ padmatalpake |
śirasaiva pravaṃdyātha jagrāha caraṇau mudā || 152 ||

prasādī bhava deveśa na jñātastvaṃ purā mayā |
ihāmutra ca deveśa tavāhaṃ kiṃkaraḥ prabho || 153 ||

anugrahaśca me dṛṣṭo bhavato madhusūdana |
rūpaṃ te draṣṭumicchāmi yadi cāsti kṛpā mayi || 154 ||

viṣṇuruvāca |
asti me tvayi bhūdeva priyatvaṃ ca sadaiva hi |
snehātpuṇyavatāmeva darśanaṃ kāritaṃ mayā || 155 ||

darśanātsparśanāddhyānātkīrtanādbhāṣaṇāttathā |
sakṛtpuṇyavatāmeva svargaṃ cākṣayamaśnute || 156 ||

nityameva tu saṃsargātsarvapāpakṣayo bhavet |
bhuktvā sukhamanaṃta ca maddehe pravilīyate || 157 ||

snātvā ca puṇyatīrtheṣu dṛṣṭvā māṃ caiva sarvataḥ |
dṛṣṭvā puṇyavatāṃ deśānmama dehe vilīyate || 158 ||

kathayitvā kathāṃ puṇyāṃ lokānāmagrataḥ sadā |
sa caiva naraśārdūla maddehe pravilīyate || 159 ||

upoṣya vāsaresmākaṃ śrutvā maccaritaṃ dhruvam |
rātrau jāgaraṇaṃ kṛtvā maddehe pravilīyate || 160 ||

atyaṃtaghoṣaṇo nṛtyagītavādyādikaissadā |
nāmasmarandvijaśreṣṭha maddehe pravilīyate || 161 ||

madbhaktastīrthabhūtaśca tvameva bakamāraṇāt |
yatpāpaṃ tasya mokṣāya sakhe sthitvā uvāca ha || 162 ||

gaccha mūkaṃ mahātmānaṃ tīrthaṃ puṇyavatāṃ varam |
mūkasya darśanāttāta sarve dṛṣṭā mahājanāḥ || 163 ||

teṣāṃ ca darśanādeva tathā saṃbhāṣaṇānmama |
mamasaṃparkabhāvācca madgṛhaṃ cāgato bhavān || 164 ||

janmakoṭisahasrebhyo yasya pāpakṣayo bhavet |
sa māṃ paśyati dharmajño yathā tena prasannatā || 165 ||

mamaivānugrahādvatsaahaṃdṛṣṭastvayānagha |
tasmādvaraṃ gṛhāṇa tvaṃ yatte manasi vartate || 166 ||

vipra uvāca |
asmākaṃ sarvathā nātha mānasaṃ tvayi tiṣṭhatu |
tvadṛte sarvalokeśa kadācinna tu rocatām || 167 ||

mādhava uvāca |
yasmādetādṛśī buddhiḥ sphurate te sadānagha |
tasmānmatsadṛśānbhogānmadgehe saṃpralapsyase || 168 ||

kiṃtu te pitarau pūjāmāpnuto na tvayānagha |
pūjayitvā tu pitarau paścādyāsyasi mattanum || 169 ||

tayorniśśvāsavātena manyunā ca bhṛśaṃ punaḥ |
tapaḥ kṣarati te nityaṃ tasmātpūjaya tau dvija || 170 ||

manyurnipatate yasminputre pitrośca nityaśaḥ |
tannirayaṃ nābādhehaṃ na dhātā na ca śaṃkaraḥ || 171 ||

tasmāttvaṃ pitarau gaccha kuru pūjāṃ prayatnataḥ |
tatastvaṃ hitayoreva prasādānmatpadaṃ vraja || 172 ||

ityukte tu dvijaśreṣṭhaḥ punarāha jagadgurum |
prasanno yadi me nātha rūpaṃ svaṃ darśayācyuta || 173 ||

tato dvijapraṇayataḥ prasannahṛdayo vaśī |
rūpaṃ svaṃ darśayāmāsa brahmaṇyo brahmakarmaṇe || 174 ||

śaṃkhacakragadāpadmadhāraṇaṃ puruṣottamam |
kāraṇaṃ sarvalokasya tejasā pūrayajjagat || 175 ||

praṇamya daṃḍavadvipra uvāca punaracyutam |
adya me saphalaṃ janma adya me cakṣuṣī śive || 176 ||

adya me ca karau ślāghyau dhanyohaṃ jagadīśvara |
adya me puruṣā yāṃti brahmalokaṃ sanātanam || 177 ||

naṃdaṃti bāṃdhavā medya tvatprasādājjanārdana |
idānīṃ ca prasiddhā me sarve caiva manorathāḥ || 178 ||

kiṃtu me vismayo nātha mūkādi jñānino bhṛśam |
kathaṃ jānaṃti madvṛttaṃ deśāṃtaramupasthitam || 179 ||

tasya gehodarākāśe sthito viprotiśobhanaḥ |
tathā pativratā gehe tulādhāraśirasyapi || 180 ||

tathā mitrādrohakasya tvaṃ ca vaiṣṇavamaṃdire |
anugrahācca me vipra tattvato vaktumarhasi || 181 ||

śrībhagavānuvāca |
pitrorbhaktaḥ sadā mūkaḥ pativratā śubhā ca sā |
satyavādī tulādhāraḥ samaḥ sarvajaneṣu ca || 182 ||

lobhakāmajidadroho madbhakto vaiṣṇavaḥ smṛtaḥ |
saṃprītohaṃ guṇaireṣāṃ tiṣṭhāmyāvasathe mudā || 183 ||

bhāratīkamalābhyāṃ ca sahito dvijasattama |
vipra uvāca |
mahāpātakisaṃsargānnarāścaivātipātakāḥ || 184 ||

iti jalpaṃti dharmajñāḥ smṛtiśāstreṣu sarvadā |
purāṇāgamavedeṣu kathaṃ tvaṃ tiṣṭhase gṛhe || 185 ||

śrībhagavānuvāca |
kalyāṇānāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ karttā mūko jagattraye |
vṛttastho yopi cāṇḍālastaṃ devā brāhmaṇaṃ viduḥ || 186 ||

mūkasya sadṛśo nāsti lokeṣu puṇyakarmataḥ |
pitrorbhaktipare nityaṃ jitaṃ tena jagattrayam || 187 ||

tayorbhaktyā tvahaṃ tuṣṭaḥ sarvadevagaṇaiḥ saha |
tiṣṭhāmi dvijarūpeṇa tasya gehodare ca khe || 188 ||

tathā pativratā gehe tulādhārasya maṃdire |
adrohakasya bhavane vaiṣṇavasya ca veśmani || 189 ||

sadā tiṣṭhāmi dharmajña muhūrtaṃ na tyajāmyaham |
tena paśyaṃti māṃ nityaṃ ye tvanye pāpakṛjjanāḥ || 190 ||

puṇyatvācca tvayā dṛṣṭo mamānugrahakāraṇāt |
pitrorbhaktiparaḥ śuddhaścāṃḍālo devatāṃ gataḥ || 191 ||

tasmāttena saha prītyā tiṣṭhāmi tasya maṃdire |
punaḥ punaḥ kathālāpaṃ karomi dvijanaṃdana || 912 ||

tasya vai mānase nityaṃ varte'hatabhāvanaḥ |
sa tajjānāti tvadvṛttaṃ tathā pativratādayaḥ || 193 ||

teṣāṃ vṛttaṃ vadiṣyāmi śṛṇu tvaṃ cānupūrvaśaḥ |
yacchrutvā sarvathā martyo mucyate janmabaṃdhanāt || 194 ||

piturmātuḥ paraṃ tīrthaṃ devadeveṣu naiva hi |
pitrorarcā kṛtā yena sa eva puruṣottamaḥ || 195 ||

pitrorājñā ca devasya gurorājñā samaṃ phalaṃ |
ārādhanāddivo rājyaṃ bādhayā rauravaṃ vrajet || 196 ||

sa cāsmākaṃ hṛdistho'pi tasyāhaṃ hṛdaye sthitaḥ |
āvayoraṃtaraṃ nāsti paratreha ca matsamaḥ || 197 ||

madagre matpure ramye sarvaiśca bāṃdhavaiḥ saha |
sabhuṃjītākṣayaṃ bhogamaṃte mayi ca līyate || 198 ||

ataeva hi mūkosau vārttāṃ trailokyasaṃbhavām |
jānāti naraśārdūla eṣa te vismayaḥ kutaḥ || 199 ||

dvija uvāca |
mohādajñānato vāpi na kṛtvā piturarcanaṃ |
jñātvā vā kiṃ ca kartavyaṃ sadasajjagadīśvara || 200 ||

śrībhagavānuvāca |
dinaikaṃ māsapakṣau vā pakṣārdhaṃ vātha vatsaraṃ |
pitrorbhaktiḥ kṛtā yena sa ca gacchenmamālayaṃ || 201 ||

kārayitvā manaḥ kaṣṭamavaśyaṃ narakaṃ vrajet |
na kṛtā vākṛtā vā syātpitrorarcā paraṃ purā || 202 ||

vṛṣotsargaṃ naraḥ kṛtvā pitṛbhakti phalaṃ labhet |
annaṃ vastraṃ tathā gavyaṃ sāmiṣaṃ ca nirāmiṣam || 203 ||

sarvaṃ lakṣaguṇaṃ proktaṃ jñātibhyo yatpradīyate |
sarvasvena kṛtaṃ śrāddhaṃ yena putreṇa dhīmatā || 204 ||

jātismaratvaṃ prāpnoti pitṛbhaktiphalaṃ labhet |
śrāddhātparo mahāyajñastrailokye tu na vidyate || 205 ||

atra yaddīyate kiṃcitsarvaṃ cākṣayamaśnute |
anyasmiṃścāyutaṃ viddhi jñātibhyo lakṣamucyate || 206 ||

piṇḍe koṭiguṇaṃ proktaṃ dvijāyānantamucyate |
gaṃgājale gayāyāṃ ca prayāge puṣkare tathā || 207 ||

vārāṇasyāṃ siddhakuṃḍe gaṃgāsāgara saṃgame |
annapiṃḍaṃ pradadyādyastasya muktirbhaveddhruvam || 208 ||

pitaraścākṣayaṃ svargaṃ labhaṃte janmanaḥ phalam |
bhāgīrathyāṃ viśeṣeṇa yastu dadyāttilodakam || 209 ||

muktimārgaṃ sa cāpnoti piṃḍadāne tu kiṃ punaḥ |
nadītīreṣu sāhasraṃ nade tvayutamiṣyate || 210 ||

sāmānyaphalasaṃsargācchrāddhaṃ śataguṇaṃ bhavet |
amāyāṃ ca yugādyāyāṃ grahaṇe sūryacaṃdrayoḥ || 211 ||

pārvaṇaṃ kurute yastu sokṣayaṃ lokamaśnute |
pitarastasya tuṣyaṃti sarve samāyutaṃ prati || 212 ||

āśiṣaṃ dayitaṃ datvā bhogyaṃ cānaṃtamātmaje |
tataḥ parvaṇi putraiśca karttavyaṃ pārvaṇaṃ mudā || 213 ||

pitroryajñamimaṃ kṛtvā mucyate janmabaṃdhanāt |
ahanyahani yacchrāddhaṃ nityaśrāddhamiti smṛtam || 214 ||

śraddhayā kārayedyastu so'kṣayaṃ lokamaśnute |
tathaivāparapakṣe ca kāmyaśrāddhaṃ vidhānataḥ || 215 ||

kṛtvā kāmaṃ sa cāpnoti yadvā manasi vartate |
āṣāḍhīmavadhiṃ kṛtvā yastu pakṣastu paṃcamaḥ || 216 ||

tatra śrāddhaṃ prakurvīta kanyāṃ gacchatu vā na vā |
kanyāṃ gate savitari yānyahāni tu ṣoḍaśa || 217 ||

kratubhistāni tulyāni samāpta varadakṣiṇaiḥ |
kāmyaśrāddhaṃ mahāpuṇyamidaṃ tasyāgataṃ śivam || 218 ||

abhāvātkṛṣṇapakṣādau tulāyāṃ kartumarhati |
amāvṛścikamāyāti nairāśyaṃ pitaro gatāḥ || 219 ||

punaḥsvabhavanaṃ yāṃti śāpaṃ datvā sudāruṇam |
pitṛśāpena putrasya naṣṭaṃ sarvamiti smṛtam || 220 ||

dhanaṃ putrā yaśaḥ kāmyamabhīṣṭamāyureva ca |
sarvāṇyetāni labhyaṃte janmajanmasu mānavaiḥ || 221 ||

pitṝṇāṃ ca vareṇaiva tasmānmainaṃ parityajet |
vivāhavratayajñādau kṛtvā nāṃdīmukhaṃ dvijaḥ || 222 ||

akṣayaṃ labhate puṇyaṃ gotraṃ tasya pravarddhate |
etadviparyayo yasya sa yāti narakaṃ naraḥ || 223 ||

kulakṣayo bhavettasya sa jīvo duḥkhito bhavet |
tatastu pūjayedagre gaṇeśaṃ śaṃbhunaṃdanam || 224 ||

paraṃ ṣoḍaśamātṝśca tatpaścātpitṛsaṃcayam |
nāṃdīmukheṣu sarveṣu prapitāmahapūrvakam || 225 ||

nāṃdīmukhe dvijānsarvānsthāpayetprāṅmukhānsudhīḥ |
uccārayennamovākyaṃ svadhā cānyatra yojayet || 226 ||

grahaṇe caṃdrasūryasya datvā piṃḍodakaṃ naraḥ |
akṣayaṃ labhate svargaṃ pitṝṇāṃ puṣṭivarddhanam || 227 ||

tatra snānaṃ na kuryādyaḥ śaktyā piṃḍodakaṃ naraḥ |
na dadāti pitṝṇāṃ tu cāṃḍālatvaṃ sa gacchati || 228 ||

sarvaṃ bhūmisamaṃ dānaṃ sarve vyāsasamā dvijāḥ |
sarvaṃ gaṃgāsamaṃ toyaṃ rāhugraste niśākare || 229 ||

iṃdorlakṣaguṇaṃ proktaṃ daśalakṣaṃ tu bhāskare |
gaṃgātoye tu saṃprāpta iṃdoḥ koṭī raverdaśa || 230 ||

gavāṃ śatasahasrasya samyagdattasya yatphalam |
tatphalaṃ jāhnavīsnāne rāhugraste niśākare || 231 ||

caṃdrasūryagrahe caiva avagāhati jāhnavīṃ |
sa snātassarvatīrtheṣu kimarthamaṭate mahīm || 232 ||

sūryagrahaḥ sūryavāre some somagrahastathā |
cūḍāmaṇiriti khyātastatrānaṃtaphalaṃ smṛtam || 233 ||

samupoṣya tayoḥ pūrve puṇyatīrthe tu yaḥ pumān |
datvā piṃḍodakaṃ dānaṃ satyaloke pratiṣṭhitaḥ || 234 ||

dvija uvāca |
pitureva mahāyajñaḥ śrāddhaṃ ca bhavateritaṃ |
tātā paścimakālādau kiṃ karttavyaṃ sutena hi || 235 ||

kiṃ kṛtvā ca paraṃ śreyo janmajanmasu labhyate |
putreṇa dhīmatā deva yatnato vaktumarhasi || 236 ||

śrībhagavānuvāca |
pūrve vayasi saṃprāpte pitā putra iti smṛtaḥ |
uttare ca sutastātaḥ pālanānna tu pūjanāt || 237 ||

devavatpūjayettātaṃ snehaṃ kuryācca putravat |
na laṃghayedvacastasya manasāpi kadācana || 238 ||

āturasya pituḥ putro yastu kuryātpratikriyāṃ |
sokṣayaṃ labhate svargaṃ sadā devaiḥ prapūjyate || 239 ||

mumūrṣorapitā tasya paśyato mṛtyulakṣaṇam |
kṛtvā ca yajanaṃ putro devānāṃ tulyatāṃ vrajet || 240 ||

vidhinānaśane naiva pituḥ svargaṃ dadāti yaḥ |
putrasya tasya dhīrasya śṛṇu vakṣyāmi yadguṇam || 241 ||

aśvamedhasahasrāṇi rājasūyaśatāni ca |
bhavedanaśane puṇyaṃ tīrthakoṭiguṇaṃ tayoḥ || 242 ||

bhāgīrathyā jale caiva yo mṛtaḥ puruṣottamaḥ |
payodhararasaṃ māturna pibenmuktatāṃ vrajet || 243 ||

vārāṇasyāṃ tyajedyastu prāṇāṃścaiva yadṛcchayā |
abhīṣṭaṃ ca phalaṃ bhuktvā maddehe pravilīyate || 244 ||

yā gatiryogayuktānāṃ munīnāmūrddhvaretasāṃ |
sā gatistyajataḥ prāṇānbrahmaputreṣu saptasu || 245 ||

lohitasya viśeṣeṇa tīrottarasamāśritaḥ |
vidhinā yastyajetprāṇānsa ca matsamatāṃ vrajet || 246 ||

tasyaiva corvaśīkeśe puṇyatīrthe dvijottama |
mṛtotpannaḥ samāpnoti sarvaṃ doṣairna lipyate || 247 ||

gṛhasyābhyaṃtare yasya prāṇatyāgo bhaveddhruvam |
yāvadgraṃthirgṛhe tiṣṭhettāvadbaṃdho bhave tanau || 248 ||

hāyanehāyane cāpi ekaikaṃ parihīyate |
paśyatāṃ putrabaṃdhūnāṃ vaṃdhane nāsti niṣkṛtiḥ || 249 ||

parvate kānane durge sthāne vā jalavarjite |
mṛto durgatimāpnoti kīṭādau jāyate punaḥ || 250 ||

saṃskāraśca bhavedyasya mṛtasya paravāsare |
ṣaṣṭirvarṣasahasrāṇi kuṃbhīpāke pratiṣṭhati || 251 ||

aspṛśyasparśanādeva ucchiṣṭaḥ patito mṛtaḥ |
suciraṃ narake sthitvā mlecchajātiṣu jāyate || 252 ||

tathaiva bahukīṭeṣu jāyate sattvajātiṣu |
tasmānna cirakāleṣu jānīyātpuṇyapātakam || 253 ||

puṇyātpuṇyaprayogaiśca sarveṣāṃ martyavāsinām |
maraṇe yā gatiḥ puṃsāṃ gatirbhavati tādṛśī || 254 ||

puṇyatīrthe mṛto yastu viṣṇornāmāni ciṃtayan |
pāpātpūto vrajetsvargaṃ sarvadoṣairna lipyate || 255 ||

piturmṛtasya dehaṃ tu vahedyastu suto balī |
padepadeśvamedhasya phalaṃ prāpnotyasaṃśayam || 256 ||

prākcitau ca piturdehe mukhāgniṃ kārayetsutaḥ |
vidhinā maṃtrapūtena paścāddehaṃ dahetpunaḥ || 257 ||

lobhamohasamāyuktaṃ pāpapuṇyasamāvṛtam |
daheyaṃ sarvagātrāṇi divyānlokānsa gacchatu || 258 ||

dagdhvā ca laṃghayetputropyasthisaṃcayanaṃ prati |
daśāhe samanuprāpte cārdravastraṃ parityajet || 259 ||

chitvā ca lohitaṃ celaṃ vahnau cātha jale kṣipet |
tataścaikādaśāhe ca śrāddhaṃ kuryādvicakṣaṇaḥ || 260 ||

pretasya dehapuṣṭyarthaṃ brāhmaṇaikaṃ tu bhojayet |
dānaṃ dadyācca vidhivadvastraṃ pīṭhaṃ ca pādukām || 261 ||

sarvopakaraṇaistulyaṃ dharādigajavājikam |
kṛṣṇāṃ gāṃ ca pradadyāttu sarvapāpavimuktaye || 262 ||

caturthāhe tripakṣe ca ṣaṇmāse cābdike tathā |
dvādaśa pratimāsyāni śrāddhānye tāni ṣoḍaśa || 263 ||

yasyaitāni na saṃtīha yathāśakti ca śraddhayā |
piśācatvaṃ sthiraṃ tasya dattaiḥ śrāddhaśatairapi || 264 ||

abdamaṃbughaṭaṃ dadyādannaṃ cāmiṣasaṃyutaṃ |
nityānityamabhāvācca kṣapanmāsaṃ kṣamāpayet || 265 ||

sapiṃḍīkaraṇaśrāddhaṃ gate saṃvatsare budhaḥ |
pārvaṇasya vidhānena kārayeddvijasattamaḥ || 266 ||

piturabdamaśaucaṃ syānmātuḥ ṣaṇmāsameva ca |
trimāsaṃ tu striyaścaiva tadarddhaṃ bhrātṛputrayoḥ || 267 ||

sapiṃḍānāmaśaucaṃ syādyāvadgehe sa tiṣṭhati |
putrasya yanniṣiddhaṃ tu śṛṇu tāta vadāmyaham || 268 ||

brahmacārī sadācārī na gacchecca striyaṃ kvacit |
saptaghaṭyāḥ paraṃ caiva navaghaṭyāśca pūrvataḥ || 269 ||

sa kālaḥ kutapo jñeyaḥ pitṝṇāṃ dattamakṣayam |
śrāddhe trīṇi pavitrāṇi dauhitraṃ kutapastilāḥ || 270 ||

trīṇi cātra praśaṃsaṃti satyamakrodhamatvarām |
sāyaṃ saṃdhyāṃ parānnaṃ ca punarbhojanamaithunam || 271 ||

dānaṃ pratigrahaṃ caiva śrāddhaṃ kṛtvā vivarjayet |
akartavyaśataṃ kṛtvā śrāddhaṃ kuryādvicakṣaṇaḥ || 272 ||

tacca kartavyatāmeti svayamuktaṃ viriṃcinā |
śṛṇu putra purāvṛttaṃ bahūnāṃ ca vadāmyaham || 273 ||

gurorgohananaṃ kṛtvā daduḥ śrāddhaṃ yayurdivam |
teṣāṃ ca kīrttanādeva śrāddhaṃ bhavati cākṣayam || 274 ||

vasiṣṭhasya muneḥ śiṣyā brāhmaṇāssapta suvratāḥ |
pitṛśrāddhe samāyāte homadhenuṃ guroḥ priyām || 275 ||

prārthayitvā gṛhaṃ nītvā saptabhirbhrātṛbhirmudā |
gavyārthaṃ pitṛyajñe tāṃ dhenuṃ hatvā vimṛśya ca || 276 ||

dadurmāṃsaṃ ca vipre ca śeṣaṃ viprāṃstvabhojayan |
samāpya pitṛkarmāṇi vatsaṃ saṃgṛhyate dvijāḥ || 277 ||

gurau samarpayāmāsurdhenurvyāghreṇa bhakṣitā |
tatastaporbalādeva jñātvā teṣāṃ ca kāraṇam || 278 ||

sa śaśāpa tataḥ śiṣyāṃścāḍālāśca bhaviṣyatha |
vepamānāstato viprāḥ kṛtāṃjalipuṭāḥ sthitāḥ || 279 ||

dhenormāṃsaṃpradātāraḥ pitṛkṛtye sadānagha |
akartavyasahasrāṇi mahāṃti pātakāni ca || 280 ||

kurvaṃtaḥ pitṛkāryeṣu pāpātpūtā divaṃ gatāḥ |
śrutaṃ bahuvidhaṃ nātha mukhātte ca purātanam || 281 ||

kṣaṃtumarhasi dharmajña śāpasyāṃto vidhīyatām |
vasiṣṭha uvāca |
śāpo votha yathā pāpmā na tu dharmavicāraṇāt || 282 ||

cāṃḍālādau samutpannāḥ purāvṛttaṃ smariṣyatha |
na ca vo jñānalopaśca smṛtiśāstramanaṣṭakam || 283 ||

pāpayoniṃ samuttīrya paścānmokṣaṃ gamiṣyatha |
tataḥ prāṇānparityajya guruśāpāttu te dvijāḥ || 284 ||

jātāścāṃḍālayonau tu sarve jñānasamanvitāḥ |
stanyaṃ taistu na pītaṃ vai smaradbhiḥ pūrvajanma tat || 285 ||

mṛtā jātā mṛgāḥ sarve cakravākāḥ punarvane |
haṃsāstu mānase tīrthe śuklā jātāḥ punardvijāḥ || 286 ||

mumūrṣavo mahābhāgā mṛtāste khedakāraṇāt |
tasminkāle mahārājo dharmaketuriti smṛtaḥ || 287 ||

yayau snātuṃ tatastīrthaṃ sadāraḥ saparicchadaḥ |
tato haṃsāstrayo mohādrājyaṃ bhogyaṃ tu yoṣitaḥ || 288 ||

bhakṣyāṇi ciṃtayaṃtaśca lokāṃtaramayustadā |
jñātvā vedaṃ ca vedāṃgaṃ mokṣaṃ yāsyāmahe vayam || 289 ||

ciṃtayaṃto gatā anye tato lokāṃtaraṃ prati |
atha trayo nṛpā jātāścatvāro viprasattamāḥ || 290 ||

kurukṣetre tato vedānvedāṃgāni samaṃtataḥ |
tapobalādvidaṃti sma vārtāṃ cāmutra ceha ca || 291 ||

trayo rājakule jātā rājāno madamohitāḥ |
jñānalopātparaṃ lokaṃ na jānaṃti hitāhitam || 292 ||

te ca viprāśca saṃdehādāhūya ceṭakaṃ svakam |
rājño gaccha svakārpaṇyātpatraṃ dehi ca saṃbhramāt || 293 ||

sapta vyādhā daśārṇeṣu mṛgāḥ kālaṃjare girau |
cakravākāḥ śaradvīpe haṃsāḥ sarasi mānase || 294 ||

tepi jātāḥ kurukṣetre brāhmaṇā vedapāragāḥ |
prasthitā dūtamadhvānaṃ yūyaṃ kimavasīdatha || 295 ||

gṛhītvā ceṭako lekhaṃ rājñastu samadarśayat |
dṛṣṭvā lekhaṃ tu rājāno rājyaṃ tyaktvā yayurdvijān || 296 ||

śrutvā vākyaṃ tatasteṣāṃ gatāste ca tapodhanāḥ |
acireṇaiva kālena mokṣaṃ yātāśca taissaha || 297 ||

ya idaṃ śṛṇuyācchrāddhe saptavyādhādikaṃ dvija |
akṣayaṃ cānnapānaṃ ca pitṝṇāmupatiṣṭhati || 298 ||

dvija uvāca |
vittahīnasya viprasya pitṛkāryaṃ kathaṃ bhavet |
tapasvino vanasthasya gṛhasthasya ca keśava || 299 ||

bhagavānuvāca |
tṛṇakāṣṭhārjanaṃ kṛtvā prārthayitvā varāṭakam |
karoti pitṛkāryāṇi tato lakṣaguṇaṃ bhavet || 300 ||

akartavyaṃ śataṃ kṛtvā pitṛśrāddhaṃ karoti yaḥ |
sarvapāpakṣayastasya svargaṃ yāti ca mānavaḥ || 301 ||

sarvābhāve pitṛtithau gobhyo ghāsaṃ dadāti yaḥ |
phalaṃ ca piṃḍadānasya saṃprāpnotyadhikaṃ naraḥ || 302 ||

purā vairāṭaviṣaye rurodātīva dīnakaḥ |
pitṛtithau svayaṃ prāpte sarvābhāvācca roditi || 303 ||

ruditvā suciraṃ sopi papraccha kovidaṃ dvijaṃ |
brahmanpitṛtithāvadya kiṃsvitkṛtvā hitaṃ bhavet || 304 ||

varāṭakaśca me nāsti dhanaṃ brahmavidāṃvara |
upadeśaṃ ca me dehi yena dharme sthito hyaham || 305 ||

dvija uvāca |
gaccha śīghraṃ vane tāta muhūrte kutape'dhunā |
ghāsaṃ pitaramuddiśya gave dehīti satvaram || 306 ||

tatastasyopadeśena gṛhītvā ghāsapūlakam |
gave datvā yathāhṛṣṭaḥ puṣṭyarthaṃ pitureva ca || 307 ||

etatpuṇyaprasādena gatosau suramaṃdiram |
svargaṃ ca suciraṃ bhuktvā utpanno dhanināṃ kule || 308 ||

dhanavānsa purā puṇyātpitṛyajñasya kāraṇāt |
sa dadāti pituḥ piṃḍaṃ sarvasvena dhanena ca || 309 ||

tatraikajanmanobhyāsādgatosau viṣṇumaṃdiram |
bhuktvānantasukhaṃ tatra sārvabhaumobhavannṛpaḥ || 310 ||

pitṛyajñātparo yasmāddharmo nāsti kathaṃcana |
tasmātsarvaprayatnena śaktyā kuryādamatsaraḥ || 311 ||

yaḥ paṭheddharmasaṃtānaṃ janānāmagrato naraḥ |
viṣṇupadyā jale snānaṃ prati loke ca labhyate || 312 ||

janmajanmakṛto yena mahāpātakasaṃcayaḥ |
tatsarvaṃ pralayaṃ yāti sakṛduccarite śrute || 313 ||

narottama uvāca |
tridaśānāṃ ca devānāmanyeṣāṃ jagadīśvaraḥ |
prabhuḥ kartā ca harttā ca goptā bharttā pitā prasūḥ || 1 ||

asmākaṃ vākśramo viṣṇoḥ kathanenaiva yujyate |
kiṃtu kautūhalaṃ me'sti pipāsā vā kṣudhāpi vā || 2 ||

kṛtaṃ pṛcchati yenaiva vaktavyaṃ tatpriyeṇa hi |
atītaṃ caiva jānāti kathaṃ nātha pativratā || 3 ||

kiṃ vā tasyāṃ prabhāvaṃ ca vaktumarhasyaśeṣataḥ |
bhagavānuvāca |
kathitaṃ me purā vatsa punaḥ kautūhalaṃ dvija || 4 ||

kathayiṣyāmi tatsarvaṃ yatte manasi vartate |
pativratā patiprāṇā sadā patyurhite ratā || 5 ||

devānāmapi sā''rādhyā munīnāṃ brahmavādināṃ |
dhavasyaikasya yā nārī loke pūjyatamā smṛtā || 6 ||

tasyā saṃmānane gurvī nibhṛtā na bhaviṣyati |
madhyadeśe purā tāta nagarī cātiśobhanā || 7 ||

tasyāṃ ca brahmajātīyā sevyā nāmnī pativratā |
tasyā dhavo'bhavatkuṣṭhī pūrvakarmavirodhataḥ || 8 ||

galadvraṇāsya patyuśca nityaṃ caryāparāyaṇā |
yadyanmanorathaṃ tasya śaktyā sā kurute bhṛśam || 9 ||

arcayeddevavannityaṃ snehaṃ kuryādamatsarā |
kadācitpathi gacchaṃtīṃ veśyāṃ paramasuṃdarīm || 10 ||

dṛṣṭvā'tīvābhavanmohānmanmathāviṣṭacetanaḥ |
niśśvasya sutarāṃ dīrghaṃ tatastu vimanā'bhavat || 11 ||

śrutvā gṛhādviniḥsṛtya sādhvī papraccha taṃ patiṃ |
unmanāstvaṃ kathaṃ nātha niḥśvāsaste kathaṃ vibho || 12 ||

brūhi me yacca kartavyamakartavyaṃ ca yatpriyam |
dayitaṃ te kariṣyāmi tvameko me guruḥ priyaḥ || 13 ||

abhīṣṭaṃ vada me nātha yathāśakti karomyaham |
ityukte tāmuvācedaṃ vṛthā kiṃ bhāṣase priye || 14 ||

na śaktā tvaṃ na caivāhaṃ moghaṃ vaktuṃ na yujyate |
praṣṭuṃ nādhikaroṣīti yathā dīrghataroḥ phalam || 15 ||

bhūmau sthitvā tu kharvātmā samuddhartuṃ pravāṃchati |
tathā me ramaṇī lobhānmohādyadabhivāṃchitam || 16 ||

daṃpatyorapi duḥsādhyamapayānaṃ vadāmyaham |
pativratovāca |
jñātvā tu tvanmanovṛttaṃ śaktāhaṃ kāryasādhane || 17 ||

ādeśaṃ kuru me nātha kartavyaṃ yena kenacit |
yadi te durlabhaṃ kāryaṃ kartuṃ śaknomi yatnataḥ || 18 ||

tadā me tvatikalyāṇaṃ phaliṣyati pare tviha |
ityukte paramaḥ prītaḥ sthito vacanamabravīt || 19 ||

pāpābhyāsācca pāpmānaṃ pṛcchatīti viniścayaḥ |
pathyasminsaṃpragacchaṃtīṃ veśyāṃ paramasuṃdarīm || 20 ||

sarvataścānavadyāṃgīṃ dṛṣṭvā me dahyate manaḥ |
yadi tāṃ tvatprasādācca prāpnomi navayauvanāṃ || 21 ||

tadā me saphalaṃ janma kuru sādhvi hitaṃ mama |
yadi māṃ kuṣṭhinaṃ dīnaṃ pūtigaṃdhaṃ navavraṇam || 22 ||

na gacchati varārohā tadā me nidhanaṃ hitam |
śrutvā teneritaṃ vākyaṃ sādhvī vacanamabravīt || 23 ||

yathāśakti kariṣyāmi sthirī bhava prabho'dhunā |
manasātha samālocya kṣapāṃte hyuṣasi drutam || 24 ||

gomayaṃ saha śodhanyā gṛhītvā sā yayau mudā |
saṃprāpya gaṇikāgehaṃ śodhayitvā ca catvaram || 25 ||

pratolīṃ vīthikāṃ caiva gomayaṃ pradadau mudā |
sā tūrṇamāgatā gehe janasyālokane bhayāt || 26 ||

evaṃ krameṇa sā sādhvī carati sma dinatrayam |
atha sā vāramukhyā ca ceṭikāśceṭakānapi || 27 ||

apṛcchatkasya karmāṇi śobhanāni ca catvare |
mayā noktepyuṣaḥ kāle kasya matpriyakāraṇāt || 28 ||

rucyakarmaṇi dīpyaṃte rathyā cattvara vīthikāḥ |
paraspareṇa saṃciṃtya vāramukhyāṃ ca te'bruvan || 29 ||

asmābhirna kṛtaṃ bhadre karma caitatpramārjanam |
atha sā vismayaṃ gatvā saṃciṃtya rajanīkṣaye || 30 ||

tayā ca dṛśyate sā ca tathaiva punarāgatā |
dṛṣṭvā tāṃ mahatīṃ sādhvīṃ brāhmaṇīṃ ca pativratām || 31 ||

dadhāra caraṇe tasyā hā kṣamasveti bhāṣiṇī |
āyurdehaṃ ca saṃpattiryaśorthaḥ kīrtireva ca || 32 ||

etāsāṃ me vināśāya sphurasīva pativrate |
yadyatprārthayase sādhvi nityaṃ dāsyāmi taddṛḍham || 33 ||

suvarṇaṃ maṇiratnaṃ vā celaṃ vā yanmanorathaṃ |
tāmuvāca tataḥ sādhvī na me cārthe prayojanam || 34 ||

asti kāryaṃ ca te kiñcidvadāmi kuruṣe yadi |
tadā me hṛdi saṃtoṣaḥ kṛtaṃ sarvaṃ tvayā'dhunā || 35 ||

gaṇikovāca |
satyaṃ satyaṃ kariṣyāmi drutaṃ vada pativrate |
kuru me rakṣaṇaṃ mātardrutaṃ kṛtyaṃ ca me vada || 36 ||

trapayā nikṛtaṃ vācyaṃ tasyāmuktaṃ varaṃ priyam |
kṣaṇaṃ vimṛśya sā veśyā kṛtvā kṣāṃtimuvāca ca || 37 ||

kuṣṭhinaḥ pūtigaṃdhasya saṃparke duḥkhitā bhṛśam |
dinaikaṃ ca kariṣyāmi yadyāgacchati madgṛham || 38 ||

pativratovāca |
āgamiṣyāmi te gehamadya rātrau ca suṃdari |
bhuktabhogyaṃ patiṃ hṛṣṭaṃ punarneṣyāmi madgṛham || 39 ||

gaṇikovāca |
gaccha śīghraṃ mahābhāge svagṛhaṃ ca pativrate |
patiste cārddharātre sa āgacchatu ca madgṛham || 40 ||

bahavo me priyāssaṃti rājānastatsamāśca ye |
ekaiko madgṛhe nityaṃ tiṣṭhatīha niraṃtaram || 41 ||

adyāhaṃ me gṛhaṃ śūnyaṃ kariṣyāmi ca tvadbhayāt |
sa cāgacchatu te bharttā sa cāsmānprāpya gacchatu || 42 ||

etacchrutvā tu sā sādhvī gatāsau svagṛhe tathā |
patyau nivedayāmāsa kṛtyaṃ te phalitaṃ prabho || 43 ||

adya rātrau ca tadgehaṃ gaṃtuṃ khyātiṃ karoti sā |
prabhūtāḥ patayastasyāstava kālo na vidyate || 44 ||

vipra uvāca |
kathaṃ yāsyāmi tadgehaṃ mayā gaṃtuṃ na śakyate |
etajjñātvā kutaḥ kṣāṃtiḥ kṛtaṃ kāryaṃ kathaṃ bhavet || 45 ||

pativratovāca |
svapṛṣṭhasthamahaṃ kṛtvā neṣyāmi tadgṛhaṃ prati |
siddhe hyarthe nayiṣyāmi punaste naiva vartmanā || 46 ||

dvija uvāca |
kalyāṇi tvatkṛtenaiva sarvaṃ me kṛtyameṣyati |
idānīṃ yatkṛtaṃ karma strījanairapi duḥsaham || 47 ||

tasmiṃśca nagare ramye nityaṃ ca dhanino gṛhe |
paureśca pracuraṃ vittaṃ hṛtaṃ rājñā śrutaṃ tadā || 48 ||

śrutvā sarvānniśācārānāhūya nṛpatī ruṣā |
jīvituṃ yadi vo vāṃchā coraṃ māmadya dāsyatha || 49 ||

gṛhītvā tu nṛpasyājñāṃ yattairjighṛkṣayākulaiḥ |
cāraiścoro gṛhītastairbalāccaiva nṛpājñayā || 50 ||

nagaropāṃtadeśe ca vṛkṣamūle ghane vane |
samādhisthomahātejāmāṃḍavyomunipuṃgavaḥ || 51 ||

vyātiṣṭhadvahnisaṃkāśo yogināṃ pravaro muniḥ |
aṃtarnāḍīgato vāyuḥ kiṃcinna pratibhāti ca || 52 ||

taṃ brahmatulyaṃ tiṣṭhantaṃ dṛṣṭvā duṣṭā mahāmunim |
coroyamadbhutākāro dhūrtastiṣṭhati kānane || 53 ||

evamuktvā tu taṃ pāpā babandhurmunisattamam |
noktāśca nekṣitāstena puruṣā atidāruṇāḥ || 54 ||

tato rājā uvācedaṃ saṃprāptastaskaro mayā |
upāṃte ca pathidvāre kurudhvaṃ ghoradaṇḍanam || 55 ||

māṃḍavyaśca munistatra pathiśūle ca kīlitaḥ |
pāyudeśe ca tairdattaṃ śūlaṃ yāvacca mastakam || 56 ||

vyathāṃ sa ca na jānāti śūle viddhatanuryamāt |
anyairapi kṛto daṇḍaḥ kṛtastaistu manohitaḥ || 57 ||

etasminnaṃtare rātrāvaṃdhakāre ghanonnate |
svapatiṃ pṛṣṭhataḥ kṛtvā prayayau sā pativratā || 58 ||

māṃḍavyasya tanau saṅgātkuṣṭhino gaṃdha āgataḥ |
bhagnaḥ samādhistasyaivaṃ kuṣṭhisaṃsargato dhruvam || 59 ||

māṃḍavya uvāca |
evaṃ yenādhunā kṛcchraṃ kāritaṃ gātravedanam |
sa eva bhasmatāṃ yātu prodite ca virocane || 60 ||

māṃḍavyenaivamuktassa papāta dharaṇītale |
tataḥ pativratā cāha bradhno nodayatu dhruvaṃ || 61 ||

dinatrayaṃ gṛhaṃ nītvā śāpādveśmagatā tataḥ |
śayanīye sthitaṃ ramye dhṛtvā'tiṣṭhatpativratā || 62 ||

śaptvā taṃ ca muniśreṣṭho gato deśamabhīṣṭakam |
sūro nodayate loke yāvaccaiva dinatrayam || 63 ||

nikhilaṃ vyathitaṃ dṛṣṭvā trailokyaṃ sacarācaram |
śatakratuṃ puraskṛtya gatā devāḥ pitāmaham || 64 ||

vṛttaṃ nyavedayansarvaṃ padmayonau divaukasaḥ |
kāraṇaṃ ca na jānīmastvaṃ tu yogyaṃ vidhehi naḥ || 65 ||

brahmovāca |
pativratāyā yadvṛttaṃ māṃḍavyasya muneśca yat |
yathā nodayate bradhno dhātā deveṣvavedayat || 66 ||

tato devā vimānaiśca puraskṛtya prajāpatim |
gatāstadaṃtikaṃ vipra tūrṇaṃ sarve ca bhūtalam || 67 ||

teṣāṃ śriyā vimānānāṃ munīnāṃ kiraṇaistathā |
śatasūryamivābhāti nānyatra ca gṛhodare || 68 ||

hā hatāsmi kathaṃ sūro madgṛhe samupasthitaḥ |
adṛśyaṃta tayā devā vimānairhaṃsasannibhaiḥ || 69 ||

etasminnaṃtare brahmā tāmuvāca pativratām |
akhilānāṃ ca devānāṃ dvijānāṃ ca gavāṃ tathā || 70 ||

yathaiva nidhanaṃ teṣāṃ kathaṃ te parirocate |
mātaḥ krodhaṃ tyajasvādya sūryasyodayanaṃ prati || 71 ||

pativratovāca |
sarvalokānatikramya patireko gururmama |
asya mṛtyurmuneśśāpādudite ca virocane || 72 ||

tenaiva kāraṇenaiṣa mayā śapto divākaraḥ |
na kopānna ca mohācca lobhātkāmānna matsarāt || 73 ||

brahmovāca |
ekasya nidhanenaiva trailokyasya hitaṃ bhavet |
tataste cādhikaṃ puṇyaṃ mātarevaṃ bhaviṣyati || 74 ||

sā covāca vidhiṃ tatra devānāmagrataḥ satī |
patiṃ tyaktvā ca me satyaṃ śivaṃ me nānurocate || 75 ||

brahmovāca |
udite ca khage saumye patyau te bhasmatāṃ gate |
svasthebhūte ca trailokye kariṣyāmi hitaṃ tava || 76 ||

bhasmanaḥ puruṣo bhāvyaḥ kāmadevasamaprabhaḥ |
guṇaiḥ sarvairyuto bhartā rativattvaṃ ca sarvadā || 77 ||

yathāpūjyo harirdaivairyathā lakṣmīśca pūjitā |
tathaiva daṃpatī svarge tasmānmadvacanaṃ kuru || 78 ||

pativratovāca |
patyurme nidhane brahmanvidhavā lokaniṃditā |
kāṃstu lokāngamiṣyāmi bhagnā cārāmalīmasā || 79 ||

brahmovāca |
ataste nāsti doṣo vai na mṛtaste dhavo'dhunā |
asmākaṃ vacanenaiva kuṣṭhī manmathatāṃ vrajet || 80 ||

vadatyevaṃvidhau sā ca vimṛśya kṣaṇameva ca |
bāḍhamuktavatī sā ca tatassūryodayo'bhavat || 81 ||

abhavadbhasmarūpo'sau muniśāpaprapīḍitaḥ |
bhasmano madhyato jāto dvijo manmathapīḍitaḥ || 82 ||

dṛṣṭvā vismayapamāpannāḥ sarve te puravāsinaḥ |
muditā devasaṃghāśca janaḥ svasthataro'bhavat || 83 ||

vimānenārkavarṇena svarlokādāgatena ca |
patinā saha sā sādhvī suraiḥ sārddhaṃ gatā divam || 84 ||

evaṃ pativratā yasmācchubhā caiva tu matsamā |
tena vṛttaṃ ca jānāti bhūtaṃ bhavyaṃ pravartanam || 85 ||

ya idaṃ śrāvayelloke puṇyākhyānamanuttamam |
tasya pāpaṃ kṣayaṃ yāti janmajanmakṛtaṃ ca yat || 86 ||

akṣayaṃ labhate svargaṃ vibudhaiḥ saṃprayujyate |
brāhmaṇo labhate vedaṃ janmajanmasu bāḍava || 87 ||

sakṛcchṛṇoti yaḥ pūto duṣkṛtaughādvimucyate |
surālayamavāpnoti svargādbhraṣṭo dhanī bhavet || 88 ||

dvija uvāca |
māṃḍavyasya munerviṣṇośśūlāghātaḥ kathaṃ tanau |
patyau pativratāyāśca kathaṃ kuṣṭhaṃ kalevare || 1 ||

hariruvāca |
śiśubhāvācca māṃḍavyo jhillikāyāmabhānataḥ |
vastideśe tṛṇaṃ datvā mohātsa ca mumoca tām || 2 ||

tenāpavādadoṣeṇa dharmasyājñātureva ca |
ahorātraṃ vyathā kṛcchrā bhuktā tena dvijanmanā || 3 ||

kiṃtu samādhinā tena na jñātaṃ śūlasaṃbhavam |
kṛcchraṃ ca muninā kṛtsnaṃ yogābhyāsādbhṛśādapi || 4 ||

kuṣṭhino brahmaṇo ghātādajiteṃdriyakāraṇāt |
pūtigaṃdhaṃ tanau kuṣṭhaṃ saṃjātaṃ dvijasattama || 5 ||

purā viprāya tenaiva dattaṃ gaurīcatuṣṭayam |
kanyakātritayaṃ vipra tena tasya pativratā || 6 ||

asyāstu kāraṇādeva sa ca matsamatāṃ vrajet |
atra te vismayaḥ kutra vedakarmapurātanam || 7 ||

dvija uvāca |
kṛtyā nārī na yasyaiva tasya svargo bhaveddhruvam |
yathaitaccaritaṃ nātha sarveṣāṃ śivamiṣyate || 8 ||

hariruvāca |
saṃti kṛtyāḥ striyaḥ kāścitpuṃsaḥ sarvasvadasya ca |
tatrāpyarakṣaṇīyāṃ ca manasāpi na dhārayet || 9 ||

na strīṇāmapriyaḥ kaścitpriyo vāpi na vidyate |
gāvastṛṇamivāraṇye prārthayaṃti navaṃnavam || 10 ||

pumāṃsaṃ vittahīnaṃ ca virūpaṃ guṇavarjitam |
akulīnaṃ ca bhṛtyaṃ ca kāminī bhajate dhruvam || 11 ||

bhartāraṃ ca guṇopetaṃ kulīnaṃ ca mahādhanam |
suṃdaraṃ ratidakṣaṃ ca tyaktvā nīcaṃ bhajedvadhūḥ || 12 ||

umānāradasaṃvādamākhyānaṃ viddhi bhūsura |
yena vidyāstriyāśceṣṭā vividhāḥ kṛtsnaśo dvija || 13 ||

svabhāvānnārado vipra viśvajijñāsako muniḥ |
svāṃte vimṛśyātha gataḥ kailāsaṃ girimuttamam || 14 ||

vṛṣaketusadākhyāna sapratiṣṭhe hime girau |
praṇipatya mahātmā vai papraccha pārvatīṃ muniḥ || 15 ||

devi sīmaṃtinīnāṃtu duśceṣṭāṃ jñātumutsahe |
kautukena tvayā caryā vadhūnāṃ saṃprayujyate || 16 ||

sarvāsāmapi nārīṇāṃ svāntaṃ jānāsi tattvataḥ |
tanmāṃ kathaya sarveṣu vinītamajñamatra ca || 17 ||

devyuvāca |
yuvatīnāṃ sadā cittaṃ puṃsu tiṣṭhatyasaṃśayam |
asminyonau susaṃyogye saṃgate vāpyasaṃgate || 18 ||

suveṣaṃ puruṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhrātaraṃ yadi vā sutam |
yoniḥ klidyati nārīṇāṃ satyaṃ satyaṃ hi nārada || 19 ||

sthānaṃ nāsti kṣaṇaṃ nāsti nāsti prārthayitā naraḥ |
tena nārada nārīṇāṃ satītvamupajāyate || 20 ||

ghṛtakuṃbhasamā nārī taptāṃgārasamaḥ pumān |
tasmādghṛtaṃ ca vahniṃ ca naikasthāne ca dhārayet || 21 ||

yathaivamattamātaṃgaṃ sṛṇimudgarayogataḥ |
svavaśaṃ kurute yaṃtā tathā strīṇāṃ prarakṣakaḥ || 22 ||

pitā rakṣati kaumāre bhartā rakṣati yauvane |
putrāśca sthāvire bhāve na strī svātaṃtryamarhati || 23 ||

tataḥ svātaṃtryabhāvācca svecchayā ca varāṃganā |
puruṣeṇārthitā dhīrā preraṇādicarī bhavet || 24 ||

arakṣaṇādyathā pākaḥ śvakākavaśago bhavet |
tathaiva yuvatī nārī svacchaṃdādduṣṭatāṃ vrajet || 25 ||

punareva kulaṃ duṣṭaṃ tasyāssaṃsargato bhavet |
parabījena yo jātaḥ sa ca syādvarṇasaṃkaraḥ || 26 ||

jārajaḥ saṃkaraḥ pāpo narake niyataṃ vaset |
kīṭajātau gatā jātāḥ punaḥ sarve mahītale || 27 ||

tato mlecchamupānītaṃ kulaṃ syāddvijanaṃdana |
kulakṣayo bhavedyasmāttasmādduṣṭāṃ na dhārayet || 28 ||

jñātvaiva yoṣitāṃ doṣaṃ kṣamate yo narādhamaḥ |
sa tiṣṭhenniraye ghore raurave pitṛbhiḥ saha || 29 ||

kācitpātayate nārī kāciduddharate kulam |
tasmātsarvaprayatnena kulajāmudvahedbudhaḥ || 30 ||

kuladvayaṃ samā nārī samayitvā tu tiṣṭhati |
sādhvī tārayate vaṃśānduṣṭā pātayati dhruvam || 31 ||

dāreṣvadhīnaṃ svargaṃ ca kulaṃ paṃkaṃ yaśo'yaśaḥ |
putraṃ duhitaraṃ mitraṃ saṃsāre kathayaṃti ca || 32 ||

tasmādekāṃ dvitīyāṃ vā vāmāmudvāhayedbudhaḥ |
saṃtānārthāttu kāmācca bahudoṣāśritā ca sā || 33 ||

rajasvalāṃ ca vanitāṃ nāvagacchati yaḥ patiḥ |
brahmahā bhrūṇahā sopi durgatiṃ cādhigacchati || 34 ||

yo mohāddurbhagāṃ kṛtvā sādhvīṃ tyajati pāpakṛt |
tasyā vadhena yatpāpaṃ tadbhuktvā narakaṃ vrajet || 35 ||

vanitāharaṇaṃ kṛtvā cāṃḍalakulatāṃ vrajet |
tathaiva vanitāhānātpatito jāyate naraḥ || 36 ||

rāmāṃ vinyasya skaṃdhe ca ciraṃ yamapure vaset |
malamūtraṃ śirodeśe nityaṃ tasya ca saṃpatet || 37 ||

evaṃ varṣasahasrāṇi bhāraṃ vahati durmatiḥ |
punaryāvanti lomāni tāvatsa rauravaṃ vrajet || 38 ||

punaḥ kīṭeṣu saṃtīrṇastadā mānuṣatāṃ vrajet |
tataśca kalahaṃ śokaṃ prāpnoti pūrvakalmaṣāt || 39 ||

evaṃ janmatrayaṃ prāpya mucyate pātakānnaraḥ |
tatkālaṃ narakaṃ bhuktvā sā tu kākī tu vañcakī || 40 ||

ucchiṣṭanarakaṃ bhuktvā mānuṣe vidhavā bhavet |
yaḥ punaścāṃtyajāṃ gacchenmlechāṃ vā pulkasāṃ naraḥ || 41 ||

dvitricaturguṇaṃ bhuktvā tatra saṃcīrṇavaṃcakaḥ |
mātaraṃ gurubhāryāṃ ca brāhmaṇīṃ mahiṣīṃ tathā || 42 ||

anyāṃ vā prabhupatnīṃ ca gatvā yātyapunarbhavaṃ |
bhaginīṃ tatputrabhāryāṃ tathā duhitaraṃ snuṣām || 43 ||

pitṛvyāṃ mātulānīṃ tu tathaiva ca pitṛṣvasām |
mātṛṣvasrādikāmanyāṃ gatvā nāsti ca niṣkṛtiḥ || 44 ||

brahmahā sa bhavedaṃdho vacasā jaḍatāṃ vrajet |
karṇayorbadhiro jātaścyavate nāsti niṣkṛtiḥ || 45 ||

uktvā aślīlamatyarthamakhilaṃ strīkṛtena hi |
dvija uvāca |
evaṃ duṣkṛtamāsādya kathaṃ mokṣo bhavetpunaḥ || 46 ||

tatsamācakṣva bhagavanśrotumicchāmi tattvataḥ |
śrībhagavānuvāca |
tāsāṃ ca gamanaṃ kṛtvā taptāṃ lohasya puttaladyaṃ || 47 ||

samāliṃgya tyajetprāṇaṃ śucirlokāṃtaraṃ vrajet |
yo vai gṛhāśramaṃ tyaktvā maccitto jāyate naraḥ || 48 ||

nityaṃ smarati goviṃdaṃ sarvapāpakṣayo bhavet |
brahmahatyāyutaṃ tena kṛtaṃ gurvaṃganāgamāt || 49 ||

śataṃ śatasahasraṃ ca paiṣṭīmadyasya bhakṣaṇāt |
svarṇāderharaṇaṃ kṛtvā teṣāṃ saṃsargakaṃ ciraṃ || 50 ||

etānyanyāni pāpāni mahānti pātakāni ca |
agniṃ prāpya yathā tūlaṃ tṛṇaṃ śuṣkaṃ praṇaśyati || 51 ||

tasmānmannāmagoviṃdaṃ smṛtvā pūto bhavennaraḥ |
yo vā gṛhāśrame tiṣṭhennityaṃ goviṃdaghoṣaṇam || 52 ||

kṛtvā ca pūjayitvā ca sa pāpātsantaro bhavet |
bhāgīrathī taṭe ramye khagasya grahaṇe śive || 53 ||

gavāṃ koṭipradānena yatphalaṃ labhate naraḥ |
tatphalaṃ samavāpnoti sahasraṃ cādhikaṃ ca yat || 54 ||

goviṃdakīrtane tāta matpure cākṣayaṃ vaset |
kāmātsa bhavane sthitvā sārvabhaumo bhavennṛpaḥ || 55 ||

purāṇematkathāṃ śrutvā matsādṛśyaṃ labhennaraḥ |
kathayitvā purāṇaṃ ca viṣṇusāyujyatāṃ vrajet || 56 ||

tasmānnityaṃ ca śrotavyaṃ purāṇaṃ dharmasaṃcayaṃ |
śrāvitavyaṃ prayatnena loke viṣṇutanuṃ vrajet || 57 ||

anyadvā strīkṛte doṣe yathāyogaṃ bhaveddhruvaṃ |
niśāmaya pravakṣyāmi tatvato dvijanaṃdana || 58 ||

sarvabījasya dānena sāṃbukuṃbhaṃ mahāphalam |
dadyādviprāya puṇyāhe sadyaḥpūto bhavetkṣaṇāt || 59 ||

sarvaṃ dhānyādikaṃ bījaṃ kāle dadyāddvijātaye |
sarvapāpakṣayaṃ kṛtvā akṣayaṃ svargamaśnute || 60 ||

guṇaṃ vakṣyāmi viprarṣe satīnāṃ yādṛśaṃ dṛḍham |
śuddhavaṃśo bhavettasyā nityaṃ lakṣmīḥ pravartate || 61 ||

ubhayorvaṃśayoḥ svargo bharturātmana eva ca |
pativratāguṇo vipra vismṛtaḥ pṛcchatastava || 62 ||

punarvakṣyāmi yoṣāṇāṃ sarvalokahitaṃ śubham |
uṣitvā pūrvakālaṃ ca puṇyāpuṇyena yoṣitaḥ || 63 ||

paścātpativratāyāśca tāśca gacchaṃti madgatim |
ṣaṇmāsaṃ vātha varṣaṃ vā adhikaṃ ca praśasyate || 64 ||

pativratā bhavedyā ca yāvatpūtā vrajeddivam |
surāpaṃ viprahaṃtāraṃ sarvapāpayutaṃ patim || 65 ||

paṃkātpūtaṃ nayetsvargaṃ bharttāṃraṃ yānugacchati |
kaṃdarpasadṛśo bhartā sā ratīva manoramā || 66 ||

jiṣṇorevaciraṃ loke bhuṃkte'naṃtamayaṃ sukham |
pativratā balādyā ca vidūre svāmipātane || 67 ||

cihnaṃ labdhvāmṛtā vahnau pāpāduddharate patiṃ |
pativratā ca yā nārī deśāṃtaramṛte patau || 68 ||

sā bhartuścihnamādāya vahnau suptvā divaṃ vrajet |
yā strī brāhmaṇajātīyā mṛtaṃ patimanuvrajet || 69 ||

sā svargamātmaghātena nātmānaṃ na patiṃ nayet |
na mriyeta samaṃ gatvā brāhmaṇī brahmaśāsanāt || 70 ||

pravrajyāgatimāpnoti maraṇādātmaghātinī |
narottama uvāca |
sarvāsāmapi jātīnāṃ brāhmaṇaḥ śasya iṣyate || 71 ||

puṇyaṃ ca dvijamukhyena atra kiṃvā viparyayaḥ |
śrībhagavānuvāca |
brāhmaṇyāssāhasaṃ karma naiva yuktaṃ kadācana || 72 ||

niḥśeṣesyā vadhaṃ kṛtvā sa naro brahmahā bhavet |
tasmādbrāhmaṇajātīyā viprayā ca vrataṃ caret || 73 ||

pravakṣyāmi yathātathyaṃ śṛṇu vipra yathārthataḥ |
āpaṇāṃtaramāmiṣyaṃ bhakṣayenna kadācana || 74 ||

aśvamedhasahasrāṇāṃ hāyane phalamāpnuyāt |
arhaṇaṃ ceṣṭadevasya harervratamanuttamam || 75 ||

svāminopi jalaṃ piṃḍaṃ saṃpradadyādamatsarāt |
yugakoṭisahasrāṇi yugakoṭiśatāni ca || 76 ||

patinā saha sā sādhvī viṣṇuloke yutā bhavet |
tato mahāvrataṃ prāpya niraye brāhmaṇī vadhūḥ || 77 ||

uddharedubhayorvaṃśāñchataśotha sahasraśaḥ |
ato baṃdhujanaireva putrairbhrātrādibhirbudhaiḥ || 78 ||

viniyamya sadā tasyā vratalopaṃ na kārayet |
hareścedvāsaraṃ prāpya vidhavā na vrataṃ caret || 79 ||

punarvaidhavyatāmeti janmajanmani durbhagā |
bhojanātmatsyamāṃsasya vratānāṃ viprayogataḥ || 80 ||

ciraṃ nirayamāsādya śunī bhavati niścitam |
duṣṭāyā maithunaṃ gacchedvidhavākulanāśinī || 81 ||

narakānanubhūyātha gṛdhriṇī daśajanmasu |
dvijanmapheravā bhūtvā tato mānuṣatāṃ vrajet || 82 ||

tathaiva bālavaidhavyā dāsītvamupagacchati |
dvija uvāca |
kanyādānaphalaṃ brūhi vada dāsyāḥ phalaṃ ca yat || 83 ||

vidhānaṃ ca yathoktaṃ ca yadi menugrahaḥ prabho |
śrībhagavānuvāca |
rūpāḍhye guṇasaṃpanne kulīne yauvanānvite || 84 ||

samṛddhe vittasaṃpūrṇe kanyādānaphalaṃ śṛṇu |
sarvābharaṇasaṃyuktāṃ kanyakāṃ yo dadāti ca || 85 ||

tena dattā dharā sarvā saśailavanakānanā |
arddhābharaṇadānena phalaṃ dāturbhaveddhruvam || 86 ||

anābharaṇakanyāyāḥ pādaikasya phalaṃ bhavet |
yaḥ punaḥ śulkamaśnāti sa yāti narake naraḥ || 87 ||

vikrīya cātmajāṃ mūḍho narakānna nivarttate |
lobhādasadṛśe puṃsi kanyāṃ yastu prayacchati || 88 ||

rauravaṃ narakaṃ prāpya cāṃḍālatvaṃ ca gacchati |
ataeva hi śulkaṃ ca jāmāturna kadācana || 89 ||

gṛhṇāti manasā prājño yaddattaṃ tasya cākṣayam |
bhūmiṃ gāṃ ca hiraṇyaṃ ca dhanaṃ vastraṃ ca dhānyakam || 90 ||

jāmāturyautakaṃ datvā sarvaṃ bhavati cākṣayam |
vivāhasamaye vatsa sagotra paragotrajaiḥ || 91 ||

yautakaṃ dīyate kiṃcittatsarvaṃ cākṣayaṃ bhavet |
dātā na smarate dānaṃ pratigrāhī na yācate || 92 ||

ubhau tau narakaṃ yātaśchinnarajjurghaṭo yathā |
avaśyaṃ yautakaṃ dānaṃ dātavyaṃ sātvikena hi || 93 ||

adatvā narakaṃ prāpya dāsītvamupagacchati |
atyāsannetidūrasthe cātyāḍhye cāti durgate || 94 ||

kulahīne ca mūrkhe ca ṣaṭsu kanyā na dīyate |
ativṛddhe cātidīne rogiṣṭhe deśavāsini || 95 ||

atikruddhepyasantuṣṭe ṣaṭsu kanyā na dīyate |
etebhyaḥ kanyakāṃ datvā narakaṃ cādhigacchati || 96 ||

lobhātsaṃmānalābhācca kanyakā parivartanāt |
munīnāṃ preyasīṃ nārīṃ yuvatīṃ rūpaśālinīm || 97 ||

sālaṃkārāṃ saśayyāṃ ca datvā'naṃtaphalaṃ labhet |
anayośca phalaṃ tubhyaṃ yuvatī kanyayorapi || 98 ||

ekā varāya dātavyā aparā brāhmaṇāya tu |
krītā devā yadātavyā dhīreṇākaṣṭakarmaṇā || 99 ||

kalpakālaṃ bhavetsvargaṃ nṛpo vā kau mahādhanī |
pratijanma labhetaiṣa supatnīṃ varavarṇinīm || 100 ||

ya idaṃ śṛṇuyānnityaṃ puṇyākhyānamanuttamam |
sarvapāpakṣayastasya sarvaśāstrārthapāragaḥ || 101 ||

labheta so'kṣayaṃ svargaṃ nārīṇāṃ vallabho bhavet |
kṣatriyo vijayī cātha lokanātho bhaveddhruvam || 102 ||

śrutaṃ harati pāpāni janmajanmakṛtāni ca |
saubhāgyaṃ labhate loke tathaiva ca varāṃganā || 103 ||

iti śrīpādmapurāṇe prathame sṛṣṭikhaṃḍe paṃcākhyāne strīṇāmākhyānaṃnāma |
dvipaṃcāśattamo'dhyāyaḥ || 52 ||

dvija uvāca |
tulādhārasya caritaṃ prabhāvamatulaṃ prabho |
vaktumarhasyaśeṣeṇa yadi mayyastyanugrahaḥ || 1 ||

śrībhagavānuvāca |
satyabhāvādalobhācca dadyādyo vai tvamatsarāt |
nityaṃ yajñaśataṃ tasya suniṣpannaṃ sudakṣiṇam || 2 ||

satyenodayate sūro vāti vātastathaiva ca |
na laṃghayetsamudrastu velāṃ kūrmo dharāṃ tathā || 3 ||

satyena lokāstiṣṭhaṃti sarve ca vasudhādharāḥ |
satyādbhraṣṭotha yaḥ satvopyadhovāsī bhaveddhruvam || 4 ||

satyavāciratothastu satyakāryarataḥ sadā |
saśarīreṇa svarlokamāgatyācyutatāṃ vrajet || 5 ||

satyena munayaḥ sarve māṃ ca gatvā sthiraṃ gatāḥ |
satyādyudhiṣṭhiro rājā saśarīro divaṃ gataḥ || 6 ||

sarvaśatrugaṇaṃ jitvā loko dharmeṇa pālitaḥ |
akarocca makhaṃ śuddhaṃ rājasūyaṃ sudurlabham || 7 ||

caturaśītisahasrāṇi brāhmaṇānāṃ ca nityaśaḥ |
bhojayedrukmapātreṣu rājopakaraṇeṣu ca || 8 ||

bhojayitvopakaraṇāṃstebhyo datvā visarjayet |
yadabhīṣṭaṃ dvijātīnāmatonyaddāpayeddhanam || 9 ||

adaridraṃ tato jñātvā dvijavyūhaṃ parityajet |
tathaiva snātakānāṃ tu sahasrāṇi tu ṣoḍaśa |
nityaṃ saṃbhojayedrājā satyenaiva vimatsaraḥ || 10 ||

atiṣṭhaṃta gṛhe pūrvaṃ ciraṃ tasya jigīṣayā |
jitaṃ tena jagatsarvaṃ prāṇānugrahakāraṇāt || 11 ||

satyena cāsuro rājā baliriṃdro bhaviṣyati |
pātālasthasya tasyaiva bhūyastiṣṭhāmi veśmani || 12 ||

niraṃtaraṃ ca tiṣṭhāmi svāṃte puṇyaikakarmaṇaḥ |
yadvā purā mayā baddho daityayonervimokṣaṇāt || 13 ||

talaṃ caivāmaratvaṃ hi śakratvaṃ pradadāmyaham |
hariścaṃdro nṛpassatyātsavāhanaparicchadaḥ || 14 ||

svaśarīreṇa śuddhena satyaloke pratiṣṭhitaḥ |
rājāno bahavaścānye ye ca siddhā maharṣayaḥ || 15 ||

jñānino yatayaścaiva sarve satye'cyutā'bhavan |
tasmātsatyarato loke saṃsāroddharaṇakṣamaḥ || 16 ||

tulādhāro mahātmā vai satyavākye pratiṣṭhitaḥ |
loke tatsadṛśo nāsti satyavākyasya kāraṇāt || 17 ||

aśvamedhasahasreṇa satyaṃ tu tulayā dhṛtam |
aśvamedhasahasrāddhi satyameva viśiṣyate || 18 ||

sarvaṃ satyādbhavetsādhyaṃ satyo hi duratikramaḥ |
satyavākyena sā dhenurbahulā svargagāminī || 19 ||

sarvaṃ rāṣṭraṃ samādhāya punarāvṛttidurlabhā |
tathāyaṃ sarvadā sākṣī mṛṣā nāsti kadācana || 20 ||

bahvarghamalpamarghaṃ ca krayavikrayaṇe sudhīḥ |
satyavākyaṃ praśastaṃ ca viśeṣātsākṣiṇo bhavet || 21 ||

sākṣiṇaḥ satyamuktvā ca akṣayaṃ svargamāyayuḥ |
vāvadūkaḥ sabhāṃ prāpya satyaṃ vadati vākpatiḥ || 22 ||

sa yāti brahmaṇo gehaṃ yajñairanyaiśca durlabham |
sabhāyāṃ yo vadetsatyamaśvamedhaphalaṃ labhet || 23 ||

lobhāddveṣānmṛṣoktvā ca rauravaṃ narakaṃ vrajet |
sarvasākṣī tulādhāro janānāṃ śūra eva ca || 24 ||

viśeṣāllobhasaṃtyāgānnāke nirjaratāṃ vrajet |
kaścicchūdro mahābhāgo na lobhe vartate kvacit || 25 ||

vṛttiśśākena duḥkhena tathā śiloṃchato bhṛśam |
jarjaraṃ vastrayugmaṃ ca karau pātre ca sarvadā || 26 ||

sadāpi lābhaviraho na parasvaṃ gṛhītavān |
tasya jijñāsayaivāhaṃ gṛhītvā vastrayugmakam || 27 ||

avakoṭe nadītīre sthitassaṃsthāpya sādaram |
sa dṛṣṭvā vastrayugmaṃ tanna lobhe kurate manaḥ || 28 ||

itarasya parijñāya tatkṣāṃtyā svagṛhaṃ yayau |
tato viciṃtayitvā tu hṛdā svalpamiti dvija || 29 ||

uduṃbaraṃ hemagarbhaṃ mayā tatraiva pātitam |
kiṃkare ca nadītīre vikoṇe janavarjite || 30 ||

tasya yātasya deśe tu dṛṣṭaṃ tena tadadbhutam |
alaṃ vidhānametattu kṛtrimaṃ copalakṣyate || 31 ||

grahaṇe vādhunā cāsya alobhaṃ naṣṭameva me |
asyaiva rakṣaṇe kaṣṭamahaṃkārapadaṃ tvidam || 32 ||

yato lobhastato lābho lābhāllobhaḥ pravartate |
lobhagrastasya puṃsaśca śāśvato nirayo bhavet || 33 ||

yadi no viguṇaṃ vittaṃ yadā veśmani tiṣṭhati |
tadā me dāraputrāṇāmunmādo hyupapadyate || 34 ||

unmādātkāmasaṃjāta vikārānmativibhramaḥ |
bhramānmohopyahaṃkāraḥ krodhalobhāvataḥ paraṃ || 35 ||

eṣāṃ pracurabhāvācca tapaḥ kṣayaṃ gamiṣyati |
kṣīṇe tapasi vartaṃte paṃkāścittapramohakāḥ || 36 ||

taiśca śṛṃkhalayogaiśca baddho naivoddhṛtiṃ vrajet |
etadvimṛśya śūdro'sau parityajya gṛhaṃ gataḥ || 37 ||

svasthā devā mudā tatra sādhusādhviti cābruvan |
nirgraṃthirūpamādāya tasyāṃtika gṛhaṃ tathā || 38 ||

gatvāhaṃ daivasaṃvādamavadaṃ bhūtavartanam |
tatobhyāsaprasaṃgācca janānāṃ ca pariplavāt || 39 ||

tasya yoṣā tadāgatya papraccha daivakāraṇam |
tatohamavadaṃ tasya yadvā cetogataṃ drutam || 40 ||

nibhṛtotha ninādasya kāraṇaṃ kathitaṃ mayā |
hṛdgataṃ patinā tedya vidhinā dattamajñavat || 41 ||

parityaktaṃ mahābhāge punarnāstīha te vasu |
yāvajjīvati daurvidhyaṃ tasya bhoktā na saṃśayaḥ || 42 ||

gaccha mātargṛhaṃ śūnyamalabdhaṃ tatprapṛcchatam |
śrutvā tadvai śivaṃ sā ca vacanaṃ patyuraṃtike || 43 ||

gatvā provāca durvṛttaṃ tacchrutvā vismayaṃ gataḥ |
sa viciṃtya tayā sārdhamāgatosau mamāṃtikam || 44 ||

nibhṛtaṃ māmuvācedaṃ kṣapaṇatvaṃ ca kīrtaya |
kṣapaṇaka uvāca |
cākṣuṣaṃ cirasaṃśuddhaṃ helayā tṛṇavatkatham || 45 ||

tvayā tyaktaṃ yatastāta nāsti bhāgyamakaṃṭakam |
aiśvaryamatulaṃ śauryaṃ śīryate bhāvukaṃ punaḥ || 46 ||

svabaṃdhūnāṃ mahadduḥkhamājanmamaraṇāṃtikam |
drakṣyase cātmanā nityaṃ mṛtānāṃ yā gatirdhruvam || 47 ||

tasmāttadgṛhyatāṃ tūrṇaṃ bhuṃkṣva bhogyamakaṃṭakam |
aiśvaryamatulaṃ śauryaṃ lokānāṃ vismayaṃ varam || 48 ||

śūdra uvāca |
na me vitte spṛhā cāsti dhanaṃ saṃsāra vāgurā |
tadvidhau patito martyo na punarmokṣakaṃ vrajet || 49 ||

śṛṇu vittasya yaddoṣamihaloke paratra ca |
bhayaṃ corācca jñātibhyo rājabhyastatkarādapi || 50 ||

sarve jighāṃsavo martyāḥ paśumatsyaviviṣkirāḥ |
tathā dhanavatāṃ nityaṃ kathamarthāssukhāvahāḥ || 51 ||

prāṇasyāṃtakaro hyarthassādhako duritasya ca |
kālādīnāṃ priyaṃ gehaṃ nidānaṃ durgateḥ param || 52 ||

kṣapaṇaka uvāca |
yasyārthāstasya mitrāṇi yasyārthāstasya bāṃdhavāḥ |
kulaṃ śīlaṃ ca pāṃḍityaṃ rūpaṃ bhogyaṃ yaśaḥ sukham || 53 ||

dhanena tu vihīnasya putradārojjhitasya ca |
kathaṃ mitraṃ kathaṃ dharmaṃ dīnānāṃ janmanaḥ kathaṃ || 54 ||

satvādikratukāryaṃ ca puṣkariṇyupakārakaṃ |
dānaṃ nākasya sopānaṃ niḥsvasya ca na siddhyati || 55 ||

vratakāryasya rakṣā ca dharmādiśravaṇaṃ bhṛśam |
pitṛyajñāditīrthaṃ ca nirvittasya na siddhyati || 56 ||

tathā rogapratīkāraḥ pathyamauṣadhasaṃcayaṃ |
rakṣaṇaṃ vigrahaścaiva śatrūṇāṃ vijayo dhruvam || 57 ||

strīṇāṃ ca janmanā vārtā vasuyogena labhyate |
bhūtabhavyapravṛttānāṃ sukṛtaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ ca yat || 58 ||

tasmādbahudhanaṃ yasya tasya bhogyaṃ yadṛcchayā |
svargaṃ vitaraṇādeva lapsyase hyacirāditaḥ || 59 ||

śūdra uvāca |
akāmācca vrataṃ sarvamakrodhāttīrthasevanam |
dayā japyasamā śuddhaṃ saṃtoṣo dhanameva ca || 60 ||

ahiṃsā paramā siddhiḥ śiloṃchavṛttiruttamā |
śākāhāraḥ sudhātulya upavāsaḥ paraṃtapa || 61 ||

saṃtoṣo me mahābhogyaṃ mahādānaṃ varāṭakam |
mātṛvatparadārāśca paradravyāṇi loṣṭhavat || 62 ||

paradārā bhujaṃgābhāḥ sarvayajña idaṃ mama |
tasmādenaṃ na gṛhṇāmi satyaṃ satyaṃ guṇākara || 63 ||

prakṣālanāddhi paṃkasya dūrādasparśanaṃ varaṃ |
ityukte tu naraśreṣṭha puṣpavarṣaṃ papāta ha || 64 ||

mūrdhrideśe tanau tasya sarvadeveritaṃ dvija |
devaduṃdubhayo nedurnṛtyaṃtyapsarasāṃ gaṇāḥ || 65 ||

jagurgaṃdharvapatayo vimānaṃ cāpataddivaḥ |
ūcurdevagaṇāstatra vimānamidamāruha || 66 ||

satyalokaṃ samāsādya bhuṃkṣva bhogyaṃ maheṃdravat |
saṃkhyā tenāpi varteta bhogyakālasya dhārmika || 67 ||

ityukteṣu ca deveṣu śūdro vacanamabravīt |
kathaṃ nirgraṃthakasyāsya jñānaṃ ceṣṭāsya bhāṣaṇam || 68 ||

kiṃ vā hariharau brahmā kiṃ vā śakro bṛhaspatiḥ |
kiṃ vā macchalanādeva sākṣāddharma ihāgataḥ || 69 ||

ityukte kṣapaṇaścāsau smito vacanamabravīt |
vijñātuṃ caiva vo dharmamahaṃ viṣṇurihāgataḥ || 70 ||

vimānena divaṃ gaccha sakuṭuṃbo mahāmune |
matprasādācca yuṣmākaṃ sadaiva navayauvanam || 71 ||

bhaviṣyati mahāprājña bhāgyānaṃtyaṃ pralapsyatha |
divyābharaṇasaṃyuktā divyavastropaśobhitāḥ || 72 ||

gatāste sahasā nākaṃ sarvairbaṃdhujanairvṛtāḥ |
evaṃ dvijavaraśreṣṭha lobhatyāgādyayurdivam || 73 ||

tulādhārastathādhīmānsatyadharma pratiṣṭhitaḥ |
ye na jānāti tadvṛttaṃ deśāṃtarasamudbhavam || 74 ||

tulādhārasamo nāsti suraloke pratiṣṭhitaḥ |
tasmāttvamapi bhūdeva samaṃ gatvā divaṃ vraja || 75 ||

ya idaṃ śṛṇuyānmartyaḥ sarvadharmapratiṣṭhitaḥ |
janmajanmārjitaṃ pāpaṃ tatkṣaṇāttasya naśyati || 76 ||

sakṛtpaṭhanamātreṇa sarvayajñaphalaṃ labhet |
lokānāṃ purato vipra devānāmarcyatāṃ vrajet || 77 ||
iti śrīpādmapurāṇe prathame sṛṣṭikhaṃḍe śūdrasyālobhākhyānaṃ nāma tripaṃcāśattamo'dhyāyaḥ || 53 ||

śrībhagavānuvāca |
adrohakasya cākhyāto mahimā lokaduḥsahaḥ |
ekatalpagatāṃ vāmāṃ kṣāṃtvā sarvajito'bhavat || 1 ||

jñānināmapiduḥsādhyaṃ munīnāṃ brahmacāriṇāṃ |
surāsuramanuṣyāṇāṃ viṣamaṃ tatsamaṃ gataḥ || 2 ||

svabhāvādviṣamaṃ kāmaṃ jetuṃ kaḥ puruṣaḥ kṣamaḥ |
adrohakamṛte vipra sa eva bhavajitpumān || 3 ||

ahalyāharaṇādeva sureśasya bhagāṃkatā |
punardevyāḥ prasādācca sahasrākṣeti viśrutaḥ || 4 ||

viditaṃ sarvaloke ca trailokye sacarācare |
dvija uvāca |
kathaṃ ca devadevasya ahalyāharaṇaṃ prabho || 5 ||

bhagāṃkatvaṃ ca saṃprāpa sahasrākṣaḥ surādhipaḥ |
na gāṃ kopi bhagāṃkatvaṃ saṃprāptassurarāṭkatham || 6 ||

duḥśrutaṃ suravaikalyaṃ śrotumicchāmi tatvataḥ |
śrībhagavānuvāca |
purā svāṃtodbhavāṃ kanyāṃ lokeśaśca mahāmanāḥ || 7 ||

gautamāya dadau dhātā lokapālāgrato mudā |
tatastu lokapālānāṃ manmathāviṣṭacetasām || 8 ||

śacīpatestu saṃmoho hṛdi śalya iva sthitaḥ |
lokapālānatikramya suveṣā varavarṇinī || 9 ||

dvijāya ratnabhūtaiṣā dattā kiṃvā karomyaham |
iti saṃciṃtya tasyāstu vartamāne ca yauvane || 10 ||

punaśca māyayā dṛṣṭaṃ rūpaṃ tasyāssuśobhanam |
punaścintayamāno'sau gautamādhyāsanaṃ gataḥ || 11 ||

paścāttu tasya gamanādyadvṛttaṃ tacchṛṇuṣva me |
ekadā gautamaḥ snātuṃ gato'sau puṣkaraṃ prati || 12 ||

sādhvī ca gṛhaśauce ca gṛhavastuni tatparā |
pravṛttā devavāstūnāṃ balikartuṃ ca tatparā || 13 ||

iṃdhanaṃ vahnikāryaṃ ca nityakarmānusaṃcayam |
etasminnaṃtare śakro munestasya mahātmanaḥ || 14 ||

rūpamāsthāya gātreṇa praviveśoṭajaṃ mudā |
pativratā patiṃ dṛṣṭvā śraddhayā parayā satī || 15 ||

devasthāne ca vastūnāṃ saṃcayaṃ kartumudyatā |
tatastāmabravīdārto muniveṣadharo hariḥ || 16 ||

pradyumnavaśago vāme dehi me cuṃbanādikam |
etasminnaṃtare sā ca trapāyuktā'bravīdvacaḥ || 17 ||

devakāryādikaṃ tyaktvā vaktuṃ nārhasi me prabho |
sarvaṃ jānāsi dharmajña puṇyānāṃ niścayaṃ mune || 18 ||

ayamartho hi velāyāmadhunaiva na yujyate |
tatastāṃ cārusarvāṃgīṃ dṛṣṭvā manmathapīḍitaḥ || 19 ||

alaṃ priyena vaktavyaṃ hṛcchayo me prajāyate |
kartavyaṃ cāpyakartavyaṃ patyurvacanasaṃmatam || 20 ||

karoti satataṃ yā ca sā ca nārī pativratā |
laṃghayedyā ca tasyājñāṃ surate ca viśeṣataḥ || 21 ||

puṇyaṃ tasyā bhavennaṣṭaṃ durgatiṃ cādhigacchati |
sābravīddevavastūni saṃti devārthato mune || 22 ||

nityakarmāṇi cānyāni kiṃ vā teṣu viparyayaḥ |
sa covāca satīṃ tatra dehyāligādikaṃ mama || 23 ||

manasā bhayamutsṛjya mayā dattāni tāni ca |
ityuktvā tāṃ pariṣvajya kṛtastena manorathaḥ || 24 ||

etasminnaṃtare vipra munerhṛdyā sakalmaṣam |
tato dhyānaṃ samārabhyājānādvṛttaṃ śacīpateḥ || 25 ||

tūrṇameva dvāradeśe gatvā ca samupasthitaḥ |
śakro muniṃ tu saṃlakṣya cautudehaṃ viveśa ha || 26 ||

gacchataḥ pṛṣadaṃśasya paddhatau pracacāla ha |
munistatrāvadattaṃ vai kastvaṃ mārjārarūpadhṛt || 27 ||

bhayāttasya muneragre śakraḥ prāṃjalirāśritaḥ |
maghavaṃtaṃ puro dṛṣṭvā cukopa munipuṃgavaḥ || 28 ||

yattvayā cedṛśaṃ karma bhagārthaṃ chalasāhasam |
kṛtaṃ tasmāttavāṃgeṣu sahasrabhagamuttamam || 29 ||

bhavatviha tu pāpiṣṭha liṃgaṃ te nipatiṣyati |
gaccha me purato mūḍha surasthānaṃ divaukasaḥ || 30 ||

paśyaṃti muniśārdūlā narāḥ siddhāssahoragāḥ |
evamuktvā muniśreṣṭho rudaṃtīṃ tāṃ pativratām || 31 ||

papraccha kimidānīṃ te karma dāruṇamāgatam |
ityuktā vepamānā sā bhītā patimuvāca ha || 32 ||

ajñānādyatkṛtaṃ karma kṣaṃtumarhasi vai prabho |
muniruvāca |
pareṇābhigatāsi tvamamedhyā pāpacāriṇī || 33 ||

asthicarmasamāviṣṭā nirmāṃsā nakhavarjitā |
ciraṃ sthāsyasi caikāpi tvāṃ paśyaṃtu janāḥ striyaḥ || 34 ||

duḥkhitā tamuvācedaṃ śāpasyāṃto vidhīyatām |
ityukte karuṇāviṣṭo manyunāpi pariplutaḥ || 35 ||

jagāda gautamo vākyaṃ rāmo dāśarathiryadā |
vanamabhyāgato viṣṇuḥ sītālakṣmaṇasaṃyutaḥ || 36 ||

dṛṣṭvā tvāṃ duḥkhitāṃ śuṣkāṃ nirdehāṃ pathisaṃsthitāṃ |
gadiṣyati ca vai rāmo vasiṣṭhasyāgrato hasan || 37 ||

kimiyaṃ śuṣkarūpā ca pratimāsthimayī śavā |
na dṛṣṭaṃ me purā brahmanrūpaṃ lokaviparyayam || 38 ||

tato rāmaṃ mahābhāgaṃ viṣṇuṃ mānuṣavigraham |
yadvṛttamāsītpūrvaṃ tadvasiṣṭhaḥ kathayiṣyati || 39 ||

vasiṣṭhavacanaṃ śrutvā rāmo vakṣyati dharmavit |
asyā doṣo na caivāsti doṣoyaṃ pākaśāsane || 40 ||

evamukte tu rāmeṇa tyaktvā rūpaṃ jugupsitaṃ |
divyaṃ rūpaṃ samāsthāya madgṛhaṃ cāgamiṣyasi || 41 ||

śaptvā tu gautamastāṃ hi tapastaptuṃ gato vanam |
tatotyaṃtaṃ śuṣkarūpā tathaiva pathi saṃsthitā || 42 ||

rāmasya vacanādeva gautamaṃ punarāgatā |
gautamopi tayā sārddhamadyaivaṃ divi tiṣṭhati || 43 ||

iṃdropi trapayāyuktaḥ sthitaścāṃtarjale ciram |
sthitvā cāṃtarjale devīmastaudiṃdrākṣisaṃjñitām || 44 ||

suprasannā tato devī stotreṇa paritoṣitā |
gatvovāca tataḥ sā ca varosmatto vigṛhyatām || 45 ||

tato devīmuvācedaṃ śakraḥ parapuraṃjayaḥ |
tvatprasādācca me devi vairūpyaṃ muniśāpajam || 46 ||

saṃtyajya devarājyaṃ ca labdhvāhaṃ tu purā yathā |
tamuvāca tato devī pāpaṃ taṃ muniśāpajam || 4 ||
kiṃtu buddhiṃ sṛjāmyadya yena lokairna lakṣyate || 48 ||

yonimadhyagataṃ dṛṣṭi sahasraṃ te bhaviṣyati |
sahasrākṣa iti khyātassurarājyaṃ kariṣyasi || 49 ||

meṣāṃḍaṃ tava śiśnaṃ ca bhaviṣyati ca madvarāt |
ityuktvā sā jaganmātā tatraivāṃtaradhīyata || 50 ||

śakro devavaraiḥ pūjyo hyadyāpi divi vartate |
iṃdrasyaitādṛśī kāmādavasthā dvijasattama || 51 ||
iti śrīpādmapurāṇe prathame sṛṣṭikhaṃḍe ahalyāharaṇaṃnāma catuṣpaṃcāśattamo'dhyāyaḥ || 54 ||

śrībhagavānuvāca |
aparaṃ ca pravakṣyāmi kāmenādhiṣṭhitasya ca |
purā bhāgīrathī tīre dvijaḥ paramahaṃsakaḥ || 1 ||

upadeṣṭā sahasrāṇāṃ dvijānāṃ śāṃtidaḥ paraḥ |
ekadaṃḍadharaḥ sākṣātkūrmavaddharaṇī sthitaḥ || 2 ||

ekākinaḥ satastasya devāgāre viniṣkṛte |
patyurgṛhātparaṃ gehaṃ gaṃtuṃ sāyaṃ samudyatā || 3 ||

akasmādyuvatī nārī militā rūpadhāriṇī |
dṛṣṭvā tāṃ bhagavānvipro manmathasya bhayārditaḥ || 4 ||

agārajaṭhare kṛtvā sa caināṃ prākṣipatkṣapām |
argalaṃ sā dṛḍhaṃ kṛtvā devāgāre suśobhane || 5 ||

kadācidapi taṃ dvārādāgaṃtuṃ na dadāti ha |
evaṃbhūtaḥ samādhisthaḥ kṣapāṃ kṣiptvā vilapya saḥ || 6 ||

ciṃtayaṃstāṃ varārohāṃ dvāri kiṃ vā kṛtaṃ mama |
evaṃ saṃciṃtyatāmāha dvāraṃ dehīha naḥ priye || 7 ||

patiśca vaśagaḥ kāṃte dayitaste bhaviṣyati |
tatastaṃ prāha sā vipraṃ vṛddhaṃ kāmapralālasam || 8 ||

ananvitā giraḥstāta vaktuṃ tvaṃ nārhasi prabho |
athāsau bhagavānprāha pracuraṃ cāsti me vasu || 9 ||

tava dāsyāmi kalyāṇi prasphoṭaya kapāṭikām |
vipramāha punaḥ sā ca tvaṃ vai me dharmataḥ pitā || 10 ||

mā gaccha putrikāṃ māṃ ca parayoṣāṃ ca dhārmika |
manasā sa samālocya suṣireṇa pathā gṛhān || 11 ||

bāhunoddhāṭyate naiva gaṃtuṃ caiva samudyataḥ |
gacchataścārddhamarara uttamāṃgaṃ susaṃkaṭe || 12 ||

praviṣṭaṃ na punaścaiti paṃcatvamagamattadā |
uṣaḥkāle samāyātā rakṣiṇo ye ca kiṃkarāḥ || 13 ||

adbhutaṃ taṃ śavaṃ dṛṣṭvā tāmucuste ca vismitāḥ |
kathaṃ ca nidhanaṃ tvasya saṃbhūtaṃ brūhi suṃdari || 14 ||

kathayitvā tu tadvṛttamabhīṣṭaṃ deśamāgatā |
evaṃ kāmasya mahimā durnivāro janeṣu ca || 15 ||

sarveṣāmapi jaṃtūnāṃ surāsuranṛṇāṃ bhavet |
dṛṣṭvā'moghāṃ varārohāṃ sarvalokapitāmahaḥ || 16 ||

cyutabījobhavattatra lauhityasaṃbhavasmṛtaḥ |
punāti sakalānlokānsarvatīrthamayo hi saḥ || 17 ||

yamāśritya naro yāti brahmalokamanāmayam |
dvija uvāca |
kathaṃ ca brahmaṇo moho hyamoghā kā varāṃganā || 18 ||

udbhavaṃ tīrtharājasya śrotumicchāmi tattvataḥ |
śrībhagavānuvāca |
munirdevaiḥ samārādhyaḥ padmayonisamaprabhaḥ || 19 ||

śaṃtanuśceti vikhyātaḥ patnī tasya pativratā |
amogheti samākhyātā rūpayauvanaśālinī || 20 ||

asyāśca patimanveṣṭuṃ yāto brahmā ca tadgṛham |
tasminkāle muniśreṣṭhaḥ puṣpādyarthaṃ vanaṃ gataḥ || 21 ||

sā taṃ dṛṣṭvā suraśreṣṭhamarghyapādyādikaṃ dadau |
dūrebhivādanaṃ kṛtvā sā gṛhaṃ praviveśa ha || 22 ||

tāṃ ca dṛṣṭvā navadyāṃgīṃ dhātā kāmavaśaṃ gataḥ |
sraṣṭātmānaṃ samādhāyāciṃtayattāṃ purogatām || 23 ||

bījaṃ papāta khaṭvāyāṃ brahmaṇaḥ paramātmanaḥ |
tato brahmā gatastrastastvarayā paripīḍitaḥ || 24 ||

athāyāto munirgehaṃ śukraṃ pīṭhe dadarśa ha |
tamapṛcchadvarārohāṃ kaścāpyatrāgataḥ pumān || 25 ||

tamuvāca tato'moghā brahmā hyatrāgataḥ pate |
tvāmevānveṣituṃ nātha mayā dattotra pīṭhakaḥ || 26 ||

śukrasya kāraṇaṃ cātra tapasā jñātumarhasi |
tato dhyānātparijñātaṃ tenaiva ca dvijanmanā || 27 ||

brahmaretaḥ paraṃ sādhvī pālayasva mamājñayā |
utpadyate sutaste tu sarvalokaikapāvanaḥ || 28 ||

āvayoḥ sarvakalyāṇaṃ phaliṣyati manogatam |
tataḥ pativratā tasya ājñāmāgṛhya saṃbhavāt || 29 ||

papau reto mahābhāgā brahmaṇaḥ paramātmanaḥ |
āvarta iva saṃjajñe raudragarbha iti sphuran || 30 ||

prasoḍhuṃ naiva śaktā sā śaṃtanuṃ cābravīttataḥ |
garbhaṃ dhārayituṃ nātha na śaknomyadhunā prabho || 31 ||

kiṃ kariṣyāmi dharmajña prāṇo me saṃcalatyapi |
ājñāpaya mahābhāga garbhaṃ tyakṣyāmi yatra ca || 32 ||

patyurājñāṃ samādāya mukto garbho yugaṃdhare |
payastejomayaṃ śuddhaṃ sarvadharmapratiṣṭhitam || 33 ||

tanmadhye puruṣaḥ śuddhaḥ kirīṭī nīlavāsasā |
ratnadāmnā ca viddhāṃgo duḥprekṣyo jyotiṣāṃ gaṇaḥ || 34 ||

tato devagaṇāḥ svargātpuṣpavarṣamavākiran |
prasūtaḥ sarvatīrtheṣu tīrtharāja iti smṛtaḥ || 35 ||

tato rāma iti khyātaḥ prajātohaṃ bhṛgoḥ kule |
kṣatriyānpitṛhaṃtṝṃstu sasainyabalavāhanān || 36 ||

hatvā yuddhagatānbhītānpaṃkaiḥ sarvairyuto hyaham |
brahmahatyāsamaṃ ghoraṃ madgehe samupasthitam || 37 ||

paṃkayuktaṃ kuṭhāraṃ me kṣālitaṃ naiva śuddhyati |
tataḥ khe cābhavadvāṇī rāma madvacanaṃ kuru || 38 ||

yatra tīrthe kuṭhāraṃ te nirmalaṃ ca bhavediha |
tatra te sarvapāpānāṃ jātānāṃ ca kṣayo bhavet || 39 ||

janānāṃ tatra sarveṣāṃ hitārthaṃ tiṣṭha mānada |
capalaṃ gaccha tīrthāni sarvāṇi sumahāṃti ca || 40 ||

teṣāṃ madhye mahātīrthe parśuḥ śuddho bhavedyadi |
taṃ ca jānīhi tīrtheṣu muktidaṃ parikīrtitam || 41 ||

tacchrutvā jāmadagnyastu tīrthāni prayayau tadā |
gaṃgāṃ sarasvatīṃ śubhrāṃ kāverīṃ sarayūṃ tathā || 42 ||

godāvarīṃ ca yamunāṃ kadrūṃ ca vasudāṃ tathā |
anyāṃ ca puṇyadāṃ ramyāṃ gaurīṃ pūrvāṃ sthitāṃ śubhām || 43 ||

gacchatastasya dhīrasya sadāgatisamasya ca |
kṣālitaḥ sarvatīrtheṣu na punarnirmalo'bhavat || 44 ||

tato giriguhāṃ durgāṃ mahāraṇyaṃ ca parvatam |
girikūṭaṃ ca durlabhyaṃ yayau tīrthamasau hariḥ || 45 ||

na ca nirmalatāmeti kuṭhārastasya tena ca |
viṣādamagamattatra rāmaḥ parapuraṃjayaḥ || 46 ||

hāheti vividhaṃ kṛtvā copaviśya dharātale |
praciṃtāmagamadvīrastamuvāca punastathā || 47 ||

pūrvasyāṃ diśi deveśa tīrthaṃ cāsti guhodare |
tacchrutvā naraśārdūlo gatvā kuṃḍaṃ dadarśa saḥ || 48 ||

pradakṣiṇaṃ jalāvartaṃ śubhraṃ pāpaharaṃ śubham |
tajjalasparśamātreṇa kuṭhāraḥ śuddhatāṃ gataḥ || 49 ||

tato rāmobhiṣekaṃ tu kṛtavānpramudānvitaḥ |
śuddhātmanastvapāpasya buddhirjātā prapāvinī || 50 ||

sa rāmaḥ suciraṃ sthitvā tīrtharājaṃ prasādya tam |
tatastato'calātprāpya puraṃ vegasamanvitaḥ || 51 ||

khyātaṃ kṛtvā tataścorvyāṃ gatosau lavaṇārṇavam |
ayaṃ tīrthavaraḥ sākṣātpitāmahakṛto bhuvi || 52 ||

sukhadaḥ sarvataḥ śuddho muktimārgapradaḥ kila |
evaṃ kāmaprabhāvaṃ ca viddhi durvāraduḥsaham || 53 ||

kāmājjātaṃ vṛṣaṃ pāpaṃ puṇyaṃ puṇyaprayogataḥ |
sa jātaścaiva lauhityo viraṃceścaiva caurasaḥ || 54 ||

śaṃtano kṣetra saṃjātastvamoghāgarbhasaṃbhavaḥ |
viriñcinā jitaḥ kāmaḥ śāṃtanorapyamatsarāt || 55 ||

tasyāḥ pativratātvācca tīrthāttīrthavaro hi saḥ |
evaṃ yastu paṭhennityaṃ puṇyākhyānamidaṃ śivam || 56 ||
śṛṇuyādvā mudā pṛthvyāṃ muktimārgaṃ sa gacchati || 57 ||
iti śrīpādmapurāṇe prathame sṛṣṭikhaṃḍe paṃcākhyāne lauhityotpattirnāma paṃcapaṃcāśattamo'dhyāyaḥ || 55 ||

śrībhagavānuvāca |
purā śarvaḥ striyo dṛṣṭvā yuvatī rūpaśālinīḥ |
gaṃdharvakinnarāṇāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca sarvataḥ || 1 ||

maṃtreṇa tāḥ samākṛṣya tvatidūre vihāyasi |
tapovyājaparo devastāsu saṃgatamānasaḥ || 2 ||

atiramyāṃ kuṭīṃ kṛtvā tābhiḥ saha maheśvaraḥ |
krīḍāṃ cakāra sahasā manobhava parābhavaḥ || 3 ||

etasminnaṃtare gauryāścittamudbhrāṃtatāṃ gatam |
apaśyaddhyānayogena krīḍaṃtaṃ jagadīśvaram || 4 ||

strībhiraṃtargataṃ jñātvā roṣasya vaśagābhavat |
tataḥ kṣemaṃkarī rūpā bhūtvā ca praviveśa sā || 5 ||

vyomaikāṃtetidūre ca kāmadeva samaprabham |
vāmātimadhyagaṃ śubhraṃ puruṣaṃ puruṣottamam || 6 ||

strībhiḥ saha samāligya prakrīḍaṃtaṃ muhurmuhuḥ |
cuṃbaṃtaṃ nirbharaṃ devaṃ haraṃ rāgaprapīḍitam || 7 ||

vṛttaṃ kṣemaṃkarī dṛṣṭvā nipapātāgratastadā |
tāsāṃ keśeṣu cākṛṣya cakāra caraṇāhatim || 8 ||

trapayā pīḍitaśśarvaḥ parāṅmukhamavasthitaḥ |
keśeṣvākṛṣya roṣāttāḥ pātayāmāsa bhūtale || 9 ||

striyaḥ sarvādharāṃ prāpya sahasā vikṛtānanāḥ |
umāśāpapradagdhāṃgā mlecchānāṃ vaśamāgatāḥ || 10 ||

tāścāṃḍālastriyaḥ khyātā adhavā dhavasaṃyutāḥ |
adyāpyumākṛtaṃ śāpaṃ sarvāstāśca samaśnuyuḥ || 11 ||

athomā śatadhā rūpaṃ kṛtveśaṃ saṃgatā tadā |
evaṃ prabhāvaṃ jānīhi kāmasya satataṃ dvija || 12 ||

tataścirāttayā sārddhaṃ gataḥ kailāsamaṃdiraṃ |
ataḥ kṣemaṃkarīṃ dṛṣṭvā yebhinaṃdaṃti mānavāḥ || 13 ||

teṣāṃ vittarddhi vibhavā bhavaṃtīha paratra ca |
kuṃkumāraktasarvāṃgi kuṃdendudhavalānane || 14 ||

sarvamaṃgalade devi kṣemaṃkari namostu te |
yoginīsāmyaṃ tenaiva saṃmukhā vimukhāpi vā || 15 ||

dṛṣṭvā tāṃ nābhivaṃdedyastasya yuddhe parājayaḥ |
rājagṛheṣu vidyāyāṃ namaskārājjayo bhavet || 16 ||

evaṃ kāmasya māhātmyaṃ bhavo mohavaśaṃ gataḥ |
ayaṃ devāsurāṇāṃ ca kṣamayā prabhutāṃ gataḥ || 17 ||

asyaiva sadṛśo loke na bhūto na bhaviṣyati |
rāmāmaṅkasthitāṃ ramyāṃ kṣamātalpagatena ca || 18 ||

tyaktvaiva sādhitā lokāssurāsurasudurlabhāḥ |
evaṃ vaiṣṇavamukhyaśca surāsuragaṇārcitaḥ || 19 ||

yo no dadāti bhuktyagryaṃ śeṣaṃ ca svayamaśnute |
evamabhyāsadhairyeṇa dīrghakāle sukhaṃgate || 20 ||

prāksaṃgamātsvabhāryāṃ ca dṛṣṭvā māṃ pradadau mudā |
dvādaśābdaṃ prasaṃkalpya prāgbhogo mayi veśitaḥ || 21 ||

tena tasya gṛhe nityaṃ tiṣṭhāmi gṛharakṣaṇāt |
tathā dhātrīphalasyāpi sadā svara samīhate || 22 ||

tasmādukto mayānyeṣāṃ vaiṣṇavānāṃ ca vaiṣṇavaḥ |
purā ye vipra me bhaktāssurā matpathagāminaḥ || 23 ||

taireva na kṛtaṃ yacca tadanena kṛtaṃ param |
tasmādvaiṣṇavasarvasvaṃ nāma ramyaṃ mayā kṛtam || 24 ||

asya veśmani tiṣṭhāmi muhūrtaṃ na calāmyaham |
ato ye caivamadbhaktāsteṣvahaṃ sulabho dvija || 25 ||

asmākaṃ padavīṃ tebhyo hyadya dadmi svakāraṇam |
āvayorviprasaujanyaṃ svapnabhojyādikaṃ samam || 26 ||

sāyujyaṃ ca sakhitvaṃ ca paśya bhūdevanāṃtaram |
tato mūkādayaḥ sarve svāgatā harimīśvaram || 27 ||

gaṃtukāmā divaṃ puṇyāssadārāḥ saparicchadāḥ |
ye ca teṣāṃ gṛhābhyāśepyātmano gṛhagodhikāḥ || 28 ||

nānā kīṭādayo ye ca teṣāmanuyayuḥ surāḥ |
vyāsa uvāca |
etasminnaṃtare devāḥ siddhāśca paramarṣayaḥ || 29 ||

pracakruḥ puṣpavarṣāṇi sādhusādhvityanādayan |
devaduṃdubhayo nedurvimāneṣu vaneṣu ca || 30 ||

samāruhya rathaṃ svaṃ svaṃ harivīthīpuraṃ yayuḥ |
tadadbhutaṃ samālokya vipro'vocajjanārdanam || 31 ||

upadeśaṃ ca deveśa brūhi me madhusūdana |
śrībhagavānuvāca |
gaccha svapitarau tāta śokaviklavamānasau || 32 ||

samārādhya prayatnena madgṛhaṃ prāpsyase'cirāt |
pitṛmātṛsamā devā na tiṣṭhaṃti surālaye || 33 ||

yābhyāṃ sugarhitaṃ dehaṃ śiśutve pālitaṃ sadā |
ajñānadoṣasahitaṃ prapuṣṭaṃ cāpi vardhitam || 34 ||

yābhyāṃ tayossamaṃ nāsti trailokye sacarācare |
tato devagaṇāssarve paṃcabhistairmudānvitāḥ || 35 ||

mādhavaṃ saṃstuvaṃtaśca gatāste harimaṃdiram |
khacitāṃ ca purīṃ ramyāṃ viśvakarmavinirmitām || 36 ||

ratnāḍhyāmiṣṭasaṃpūrṇāṃ kalpavṛkṣādibhiryutām |
śātakumbhamayairgehaissarvaratnaissakarburām || 37 ||

vajravaiḍūryasopānāṃ svarṇadītoyasaṃyutām |
gītavādyādisaṃpūrṇāṃ sarvadurgasamākulām || 38 ||

kokilālāpabahulāṃ siddhagaṃdharvasevitām |
rūpāḍhyaiḥ sujanaiḥ pūrṇāṃ prayāṃtīmiva khe purīm || 39 ||

tataḥ sthitvā'cyutāḥ sarve sarvalokordhvato bhṛśam |
dvijopi pitarau gatvā samārādhya prayatnataḥ || 40 ||

acireṇaiva kālena sakuṭuṃbo hariṃ yayau |
paṃcākhyānamidaṃ puṇyaṃ mayā te samudāhṛtam || 41 ||

yaḥ paṭhecchṛṇuyādvāpi tasya nāstīha durgatiḥ |
brahmahatyādibhiḥ pāpairna lipyeta kadācana || 42 ||

gavāṃ koṭipradānena yatphalaṃ labhate naraḥ |
tatphalaṃ samavāpnoti paṃcākhyānāvagāhanāt || 43 ||

snānena puṣkare nityaṃ bhāgīrathyāṃ ca sarvadā |
yatphalaṃ tadavāpnoti sakṛcchravaṇagocarāt || 44 ||

duḥsvapnaṃ nāśayetkṣipraṃ tathārogyaṃ prayacchati |
lakṣmyārogyakaraṃ caiva tasmācchrotavyameva hi || 45 ||
iti śrīpādmapurāṇe prathame sṛṣṭikhaṃḍe paṃcākhyānaṃnāma ṣaṭpaṃcāśattamo'dhyāyaḥ || 56 ||

dvijā ūcuḥ |
kīrtirdharmotha lokeṣu sarvāṇi pravarāṇi ca |
vada no muniśārdūla yadi no'sti tvanugrahaḥ || 1 ||

vyāsa uvāca |
yasya khāte vane gāvastṛpyaṃti māsameva ca |
yadvā saptadinātpūtaḥ sarvadevaiḥ sa pūjitaḥ || 2 ||

puṣkariṇyā viśeṣeṇa pūtā yā yajñakarmaṇā |
yatphalaṃ jaladānena sarvamatrāsyi tacchṛṇu || 3 ||

hāyane hāyane caiva kalpaṃ kalpaṃ vidhīyate |
dānātsvargamavāpnoti toyadaḥ sarvado bhuvi || 4 ||

meghe varṣati khāte ca jāyaṃte ye tu śīkarāḥ |
tāvadvarṣasahasrāṇi divamaśnāti mānavaḥ || 5 ||

toyairannādipākaiśca prasanno mānavo bhavet |
prāṇānāṃ ca vinānnaiśca dhāraṇannaiva jāyate || 6 ||

pitṝṇāṃ tarpaṇaṃ śaucaṃ rūpaṃ vai gaṃdhyanāśanam |
bījaṃ tvihārjitaṃ sarvaṃ sarvaṃ toye pratiṣṭhitam || 7 ||

vastrasya dhāvanaṃ rucyaṃ bhājanānāṃ tathaiva ca |
tenaiva sarvakāryaṃ ca pānīyaṃ medhyameva ca || 8 ||

tasmātsarvaprayatnena vāpīkūpataṭākakam |
kārayecca balaiḥ sarvaistathā sarvadhanena ca || 9 ||

tato vinirjale deśo yo dadāti jalāśayam |
vāsare vāsare tasya kalpaṃ svargaṃ vinirdiśet || 10 ||

triviṣṭapāccyuto vipro vedaśāstrārthapāragaḥ |
lokabaṃdhuḥ sa dharmātmā tapastaptvā divaṃ vrajet || 11 ||

evaṃ janmāṣṭakaṃ prāpya ekasyākṣayamiṣyate |
kṣattriyāṇāṃ kule jātaḥ sārvabhaumo bhavennṛpaḥ || 12 ||

viśo'kṣayaṃ dhanaṃ vidyājjanmajanmasu yatpriyam |
śūdrādayontyajāścānye labhaṃte svargatiṃ muhuḥ || 13 ||

caturhastapramāṇaṃ tu kūpaṃ khanati yaḥ pumān |
paropakārakaṃ nityaṃ kalpaṃ svargaṃ tu hāyane || 14 ||

dviguṇe dviguṇaṃ vidyācchataṃ caiva caturguṇe |
viṃśatkiṣkupramāṇāṃ tu dadyātpuṣkariṇīṃ tu yaḥ || 15 ||

viṣṇordhāma labhetsopi divyabhogaṃ tathaiva ca |
anaṃtaraṃ nṛpo jāto dhanī vāgīśvaro bhavet || 16 ||

evaṃ dvistriścaturvāpi guṇato bhogyamiṣyate |
vistīrṇe pracuraṃ viddhi sahasreṇācyuto divaḥ || 17 ||

sahasrāddviguṇenaiva surapūjyo bhavennaraḥ |
jaṃtavastatra ye saṃti yāvaṃto jīvanaṃ yayuḥ || 18 ||

tatsaṃkhyākā janāstasya kiṃkarāḥ pṛṣṭalagnakāḥ |
bhavaṃti satataṃ gehe pure janapadeṣu ca || 19 ||

vihāya pitaraṃ bhogyā dhane kṣīṇe yathā vanam |
pakṣiṇassūkaraścaiva mahiṣī kariṇī tathā || 20 ||

upadeṣṭā ca karttā ca ṣaḍete svargagāminaḥ |
divyaṃ ca pakṣiṇāṃ caiva śataṃ svargaṃ vinirdiśet || 21 ||

kroḍo varṣasahasraṃ tu mahiṣyayutahāyanam |
devarūpaṃ samāsthāya kariṇyā lakṣamucyate || 22 ||

koṭyekamupadeṣṭuśca karturakṣayameva ca |
purā dhanisutenaiva kṛtaḥ khyāto jalāśayaḥ || 23 ||

ayutadhanavyayenaiva prāṇenaiva balena ca |
sarvasatvopakārāya śivaśraddhāyutena ca || 24 ||

kālena kiyatā cāpi kṣīṇavitto'bhavatkila |
kaścidarthī dhanī tasya mūlyadānāya codyataḥ || 25 ||

vimṛśya dhaninā coktaṃ vyāhāraṃ śṛṇutādhunā |
dīnārasyāyutaṃ vā te dāsyāmyasyāśca kāraṇāt || 26 ||

labdhaṃ te puṣkariṇyāśca puṇyaṃ lābhātpramanyase |
śaktyā datvātha mūlyaṃ tāṃ svīyāṃ kartuṃ vyavasthitaḥ || 27 ||

evamukte sa taṃ prāha vāsarepyayutaṃ punaḥ |
phalaṃ bhavati vai nityaṃ puṇyaṃ puṇyavido viduḥ || 28 ||

etasminnirjale deśe śivaṃ khātaṃ kṛtaṃ ca me |
snānapānādikaṃ karma sarve kurvaṃtyabhīṣṭataḥ || 29 ||

tasmānmepyayutārthasya naityakaṃ phalamiṣyate |
tatastasyābhavaddhāsyaṃ tathaiva ca sabhāsadām || 30 ||

hriyā ca pīḍitaḥ sopi vākyametaduvāca ha |
satyametadvacosmākaṃ parīkṣāṃ kuru dharmataḥ || 31 ||

matsarātsa tu taṃ prāha śṛṇu me vacanaṃ pitaḥ |
dīnārāyuta me tatte datvā cānīya prastaram || 32 ||

pātayiṣyāmi te khāte yathāyogaṃ pramajjatu |
unmajjati ca yatkāle prastaraḥ saṃtaratyapi || 33 ||

kṣayaṃ yāsyati no vittaṃ nocenme dharmato hi sā |
bāḍhamuktvāyutaṃ tasya gṛhītvā svagṛhaṃ gataḥ || 34 ||

sākṣiṇāmagratastena prastaraḥ pātitastathā |
puṣkariṇyāṃ mahatyāṃ ca dṛṣṭaṃ narasurāsuraiḥ || 35 ||

tato dharmatulāyāṃ tu tulitaṃ dharmasākṣiṇā |
dīnārāyutadānasya puṣkariṇyā jalasya tu || 36 ||

na samaṃ tu dinaikaṃ tu jalasya dharmato bhṛśam |
dhanino mānasaṃ duḥkhaṃ moghārthaṃ ca pare'hani || 37 ||

śiloccayo'bhavattīrṇo dvīpavacca jalopari |
tataḥ kolāhalaḥ śabdo janānāṃ samupasthitaḥ || 38 ||

tacchrutvādbhutavākyaṃ ca mudā tau cāgatau tataḥ |
dṛṣṭvā śailaṃ tathābhūtaṃ kṛtaṃ tenāyutaṃ tathā || 39 ||

tataḥ khātādhipenaiva śailaṃ dūre nipātitam |
puṇyaṃ khātasya cotkhāte praluptasya sutena hi || 40 ||

sopi nākaṃ samāruhya janmajanmasu nirvṛtaḥ |
gotramātṛgaṇānāṃ ca nṛpāṇāṃ suhṛdāṃ tathā || 41 ||

sakhīnāṃ copakartṝṇāṃ khātaṃ khātvā'kṣayaṃ phalam |
tapasvināmanāthānāṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ viśeṣataḥ || 42 ||

khātaṃ tu janayitvā tu svargaṃ cākṣayamaśnute |
tasmātkhātādikaṃ viprāḥ śaktito yaḥ kariṣyati || 43 ||

sarvapāpakṣayātpuṇyaṃ mokṣaṃ yāyānna saṃśayaḥ |
ya idaṃ śrāvayelloke dharmākhyānaṃ mahotkaṭam || 44 ||

sarvakhātapradānasya phalamaśnāti dhārmikaḥ |
grahaṇe bhāskarasyaiva bhāgīrathyāṃ taṭe vare || 45 ||

gavāṃ koṭipradānasya phalaṃ śrutvā labhennaraḥ |
na ca dāridratāmeti na śokaṃ vyādhisaṃcayam || 46 ||

asaṃmānaṃ mahadduḥkhamubhayornādhigacchati |
iti śrīpādmapurāṇe prathame sṛṣṭikhaṃḍe khātādikīrtanaṃnāma saptapaṃcāśattamo'dhyāyaḥ || 57 ||

vyāsa uvāca |
śākhināmeva sarveṣāṃ phalaṃ vakṣyāmi yādṛśam |
tacchṛṇudhvaṃ mahābhāgā ropaṇe ca pṛthakpṛthak || 1 ||

yastu ropayate tīre puṇyavṛkṣānsamaṃtataḥ |
tasya puṇyaphalaṃ jñātuṃ kathituṃ naiva śakyate || 2 ||

anyatra ropaṇaṃ kṛtvā śākhināṃ yatphalaṃ labhet |
tato jalasamīpe tu lakṣakoṭiguṇaṃ bhavet || 3 ||

svayaṃ puṣkariṇī tīre tvanaṃtaṃ phalamaśnute |
tasmācchataguṇaṃ brūmaḥ śākhināṃ puṇyakāriṇām || 4 ||

aśvattharopaṇaṃ kṛtvā jalāśayasamīpataḥ |
yatphalaṃ labhate martyo na tatkratuśatairapi || 5 ||

pataṃti yāni patrāṇi jale parvaṇi parvaṇi |
tāni piṃḍasamānīha pitṝṇāmakṣayaṃ yayuḥ || 6 ||

khādaṃti patagāstatra phalāni kāmato dhruvam |
brahmabhakṣyasamaṃ tasya puṇyaṃ bhavati cākṣayam || 7 ||

aśvatthenaiva bhakṣyeṇa ropaṇenaiva yatphalam |
tadvai kratuśatairnaiva putraireva śatairapi || 8 ||

uṣṇecchāyāṃ pragṛhṇaṃti gāvo devadvijātayaḥ |
kartuḥ pitṛgaṇānāṃ ca svargo bhavati cākṣayaḥ || 9 ||

kartuṃ svasthasya vai vighnamakṣayatvānna śakyate |
tasmātsarvaprayatnena ropayedvṛkṣamādhavam || 10 ||

ekaṃ vṛkṣaṃ samāropya naraḥ svargānna hīyate |
tasmādeva mahāvṛkṣaṃ ropayadhvaṃ dvijottamāḥ || 11 ||

jalānāṃ nikaṭe ramye rasānāṃ krayavikraye |
mārge jalāśaye vṛkṣānropayedyo mahāśayaḥ || 12 ||

aśvatthādīnsamāropya svargaṃ yāti manoramam |
arcayitvā tu yatpuṇyaṃ pravakṣyāmi dvijātayaḥ || 13 ||

snātvāśvatthaṃ spṛśedyastu sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate |
asnāto yaḥ spṛśenmartyo labhate snānajaṃ phalam || 14 ||

dṛṣṭvā ca nāśayetpāpaṃ spṛṣṭvā lakṣmīṃ prapadyate |
pradakṣiṇe bhavedāyuḥ sadāśvattha namostu te || 15 ||

caladdalāya vṛkṣāya sadā viṣṇusthitāya ca |
bodhisatvāya yogyāya sadāśvattha namostu te || 16 ||

aśvatthāya tu havyaṃ tu payo naivedyameva ca |
puṣpaṃ dhūpaṃ dīpakaṃ ca datvā svargānna hīyate || 17 ||

saputraṃ cākṣayaṃ viddhi dhanavṛddhiyaśaskaram |
vijayaṃ mānadaṃ bhadramaśvatthasya prapūjanam || 18 ||

yajjaptaṃ ca hutaṃ stotraṃ yantramaṃtrādikaṃ ca yat |
sarvaṃ koṭiguṇaṃ proktaṃ mūle caladalasya ca || 19 ||

yasya mūle sthito viṣṇurmadhye tiṣṭhati śaṃkaraḥ |
agrabhāge sthito brahmā kastaṃ jagati nārcayet || 20 ||

somavāre tvamāyāṃ ca snānaṃ yanmauninā kṛtam |
dānasya gosahasrasya phalaṃ cāśvatthavaṃdane || 21 ||

saptapradakṣiṇenaiva gavāmayutajaṃ phalam |
pracurāllakṣakoṭiśca tasmātkāryā hi sā sadā || 22 ||

yatkiṃciddīyate tatra phalamūlajalādikam |
sarvaṃ taccākṣayaphalaṃ janmajanmasu jāyate || 23 ||

ahośvatthasamo nāsti vṛkṣarūpī harirbhuvi |
yathā pūjyo dvijo loke yathā gāvo yathāmarāḥ || 24 ||

tathāśvatthavṛkṣarūpī devaḥ pūjyatamaḥ smṛtaḥ |
ropaṇe rakṣaṇe sparśe pūjākarmaṇi vai sadā || 25 ||

dadāti vittaṃ putrāṃśca svargaṃ mokṣaṃ punaḥ kramāt |
kiṃcicchedaṃ tu yaḥ kuryādaśvatthasya tanau naraḥ || 26 ||

kalpaikaṃ nirayaṃ bhuktvā cāṃḍālādau prajāyate |
mūlacchedena tasyaiva sa ca yātyapunarbhavam || 27 ||

puruṣāstasya tiṣṭhaṃti raurave ghoradarśane |
aśvatthasyaikavṛkṣasya ropaṇe yatphalaṃ bhavet || 28 ||

tathaiva caṃpakerke ca trayāṇāṃ ropaṇepi ca |
aṣṭau bilvasya vṛkṣāśca nyagrodhāścaiva sapta ca || 29 ||

niṃbasya daśavṛkṣāśca phalaṃ caiṣāṃ samaṃ bhavet |
ekaikasya phalaṃ coktaṃ vṛkṣāṇāṃ ropaṇe dvijāḥ || 30 ||

evaṃ budhvā tu dharmātmā yaḥ kuryātkṛtrimaṃ vanam |
kalpakoṭisahasrāṇi kalpakoṭiśatāni ca || 31 ||

nākameti sa cūtasya samāropya sahasrakam |
tato dvitriguṇenaiva nyūne vā pracurepi vā || 32 ||

bhuṃkte bhuktvā punaḥ kuryānnṛpo vātha sadīśvaraḥ |
svargaṃ bhogyaṃ tato rājyaṃ kalyāṇaṃ maṃgalaṃ śubham || 33 ||

ārogyaṃ śauryasaṃpannamārāmādeva jāyate |
phalāni yasya khādaṃti jaṃtavotha sahasraśaḥ || 34 ||

āśritā vihagāḥ kīṭāḥ patagāḥ śalabhādayaḥ |
chāyāśritāśca ye satvāstatsaṃkhyātāḥ pṛthagjanāḥ || 35 ||

tasya kiṃkaratāṃ yāṃti śataśo devatārcitāḥ |
ye ca vṛkṣā mahāsatvāssarve te devarūpiṇaḥ || 36 ||

tadarcā pitṛvatkāryā śuśrūṣāṃ jalapiṃḍakam |
martyaloke ca te putrāstasya janmani janmani || 37 ||

surūpāḥ suvinītāśca sadāpuṇyakriyā śubhāḥ |
evaṃ gaṇeśatāṃ yāṃti jaṃtavaścūtalagnakāḥ || 38 ||

dhātrī harītakī cānye kaṭutiktāmlasaṃbhavāḥ |
sarve cārāmataḥ śuddhāḥ phaladāḥ śivadāḥ sadā || 39 ||

prāsādā yatra sauvarṇāḥ sarvaratnavibhūṣitāḥ |
sarvābharaṇasaṃyuktā vimānāścānilopamāḥ || 40 ||

śātakuṃbhamayā vṛkṣāḥ sadaiva sarvadāyinaḥ |
sarvartusukhadāḥ saumyakanyakā apsarassamāḥ || 41 ||

gītanṛtyaparādhīrāstatra tiṣṭhaṃti vṛkṣadāḥ |
puṣkariṇyo viśeṣeṇa khātānyanyāni yāni ca || 42 ||

śuddhopalāṃtaracitā nadyaḥ pāyasakarddamāḥ |
punardugdhasaphenāśca annādiṣaḍrasānvitāḥ || 43 ||

martyaloke yathā bhogyaṃ punaḥ svarge punarbhuvi |
punareva tadabhyāsātkhātamārāmakaṃ punaḥ || 44 ||

yathā puṇyādikaṃ kṛtvā svargamartyādhipaḥ pumān |
aśaktastu prapāṃ kṛtvā puṣkariṇyāḥ phalaṃ labhet || 45 ||

prapāyā lakṣaṇaṃ cātra sarvapāpaharaṃ paraṃ |
sarvabhogapradaṃ śuddhaṃ svargāpavargadaṃ sthiraṃ || 46 ||

lakṣaṇaṃ ca pravakṣyāmi prapāyāḥ kīrtivardhanam |
nirjale'dhvani pṛkte ca sthāne kṛtvā ca maṃḍapam || 47 ||

bahupānthe samāyāte grīṣmavarṣāśaratsvapi |
agarukādi saugaṃdhyaṃ jalaṃ pūgaṃ sacaṃdrakam || 48 ||

āsanaṃ caiva tāṃbūlaṃ datvā svargānna hīyate |
evaṃ varṣatrayeṇaiva puṣkariṇyāḥ phalaṃ labhet || 49 ||

svargāccaivācyuto martyo devairapi prapūjyate |
māsamekaṃ tu yo dadyātprapāṃ grīṣmetha nirjale || 50 ||

kalpaikaṃ tu vasetsvarge svargādbhraṣṭo mahīyate |
prapādāstatra tiṣṭhaṃti yatra puṣkariṇīpradāḥ || 51 ||

noceddharmaghaṭo deyaḥ puṇyaḥ pāpakṣayāya ca |
eṣa dharmaghaṭo jñeyo brahmaviṣṇuśivātmakaḥ || 52 ||

tavaprasādātsaphalāḥ mama saṃtu manorathāḥ |
svarṇamāṣaṃ caturbhāgaṃ dakṣiṇārthaṃ ghaṭasya ca || 53 ||

evaṃ varṣatrayeṇaiva prapādānaphalaṃ labhet |
yaḥ paṭhecchrāvayedvāpi puṣkariṇyādijaṃ phalam || 54 ||

sākṣātpāpādbhavenmuktastatprasādāttu sadgatiḥ |
janeṣu śrāvayedyastu puṇyākhyānamidaṃ śubham || 55 ||
kalpakoṭisahasrāṇi suraloke sa tiṣṭhati || 56 ||

iti śrīpādmapurāṇe prathame sṛṣṭikhaṃḍe puṣkariṇyādidharmakīrtanaṃnāmāṣṭapaṃcāśattamo |
'dhyāyaḥ || 58 ||

vyāsa uvāca |
ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi kīrttidharmaṃ paraṃ śubham |
setubaṃdhaphalaṃ puṇyaṃ brahmaṇā bhāṣitaṃ yathā || 1 ||

kāṃtāre dustare paṃke puruśaṃkusamākulaṃ |
āliṃ kṛtvā bhavetpūto devatvaṃ yāti mānavaḥ || 2 ||

vitastau tu labhetsvargaṃ divyaṃ varṣaśataṃ samam |
evaṃ saṃkhyāvidhānena naraḥ svargānna hīyate || 3 ||

kadācitpaṃkayogācca svargādbhuvi vijāyate |
tadā bhaṭṭārakaḥ śrīmānrogaśokavivarjitaḥ || 4 ||

paṃkādau saṃkramāṃścaiva kṛtvā svargānna hīyate |
sarvapāpaṃ kṣayaṃ tasya saṃprayāti dinedine || 5 ||

tathālisaṃkramāṇāṃ ca phalaṃ tulyaṃ prakīrtitam |
dhanaprāṇāvyayenaiva dhīmatā kriyate sadā || 6 ||

śrūyatāṃ yatpurāvṛttamākhyānaṃ vṛddhasaṃmataṃ |
kaściccoro mahābhīṣme steyakarmaṇi codyataḥ || 7 ||

kāṃtāre gośiraḥ sthāpya krāṃtvā steyaṃ gato hyasau |
dhanāpaharaṇaṃ kṛtvā gṛhasthasya ca tena hi || 8 ||

gataḥ svamaṃdiraṃ tatra janā gacchaṃti vartmani |
sarveṣāmekapādasya sukhaṃ bhavati niścitaṃ || 9 ||

ekapāde hrade durge tārakaṃ gośiraḥ param |
cāṃdrāyaṇaṃ ca tattasya kāṃtāre saṃsthitaṃ śiraḥ || 10 ||

tataścorasya nidhane citraguptapraṇītake |
dharmasya phalamātraṃ tu etasya ca na vidyate || 11 ||

na daivaṃ paitṛkaṃ kāryaṃ tīrthaṃ snānaṃ dvijārcanaṃ |
dānaṃ gurujane mānaṃ jñānaṃ parahitaṃ śubham || 12 ||

manasā na kṛtaṃ tena kriyayā ca kathaṃ punaḥ |
kṛtaṃ sāhasikaṃ steyaṃ paradārābhimarśanam || 13 ||

bhūtamithyāpavādaṃ ca sādhuniṃdā paraṃ tathā |
evaṃ śatasahasraṃ tu tathā goharaṇaṃ kṛtam || 14 ||

tatrāha dharmarājastu kālānalasamaprabhaḥ |
nayatainaṃ phalaṃ śūrā durgatiṃ cāpunarbhavam || 15 ||

etasminnaṃtare'vocaccitraguptonukaṃpakaḥ |
astyasya gośiraḥ puṇyaṃ kicinnātha kṣamādhunā || 16 ||

nṛpo dvādaśavārṣikyaṃ labhetpuṇyodayaṃ kṣitau |
tathāha dharmarājastaṃ gaccha martyaṃ durātmaka || 17 ||

akaṃṭakaṃ ca rājyaṃ ca bhuṃkṣva dvādaśavatsaram |
yaddhṛtaṃ gośiro mārge muktastasyaiva kāraṇāt || 18 ||

punaratra samāgamya saṃgaṃtā cāpunarbhavam |
tataḥ kṛtāṃjalirdevamuvāca duḥkhapīḍitaḥ || 19 ||

dharmarājānukaṃpā ca mayyevaṃ pāpakāriṇi |
kuru nātha tvanāthe ca jānāmi prītipūrvakam || 20 ||

dharmarājastu taṃ cāha bāḍhamevamito vraja |
smariṣyasi svavṛttāṃtaṃ matprasādātsuduḥkhitaḥ || 21 ||

etasminnaṃtare caiva mocitaḥ kiṃkareṇa hi |
tasya janmābhavatkau ca durvidhe cātivāṇike || 22 ||

ājanmavividhaṃ duḥkhaṃ bhuktaṃ pūrvavikarmataḥ |
bhuktvā kleśaṃ mahāṃtaṃ ca ekaviṃśatihāyanam || 23 ||

tasminrāṣṭre mṛto bhūpaḥ svakarmaparipīḍitaḥ |
etasminnaṃtare'mātyaiḥ samālokya sumaṃtribhiḥ || 24 ||

aneka parimarśaistu pṛthivyāṃ bhramaṇaṃ kṛtam |
tamāvṛṇvaṃśca te sadyaḥ sarveṣāṃ purato dṛḍham || 25 ||

tato rājyābhiṣekaśca kṛtastaistu vimatsaraiḥ |
sa ca rājyaṃ ca saṃśritya dharmarājavareṇa ca || 26 ||

akarodālikaṃ karma śilābaddhaṃ ca mṛṇmayam |
saṃkramaṃ jaladurge ca taraṇiṃ ca tathāpare || 27 ||

vāpīkūpataṭākāni prapārāma mahīruhaṃ |
kṛtavānvividhaṃ yajñaṃ dānapuṇyamataḥ param || 28 ||

smaraṃśca pūrvakarmmāṇi sarvapāpakṣayāya vai |
kṛtaṃ bahuvidhaṃ dharmaṃ vratāni vividhāni ca || 29 ||

surāṇāṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ ca gurūṇāṃ caiva tarpaṇāt |
pāpātpūto yayau gehaṃ dharmarājasya dhīmataḥ || 30 ||

sayānasthaṃ tato dṛṣṭvā krodharaktekṣaṇo'bhavat |
sa ca taṃ prāṃjaliṃ prāha bho dharma kuru tāraṇam || 31 ||

citragupto'bravīdvākyaṃ dharmarājasamīpataḥ |
karmaṇā manasā pūto viṣṇulokaṃ sa gacchatu || 32 ||

sa tacchrutvā punaścāha tasya vijñāya kāraṇam |
smitaḥ prītyā prasannātmā gaccha gacchācyutālayam || 33 ||

vimānaṃ suralokācca svāgataṃ varṇakarburam |
samāruhya gataḥ svargaṃ punarāvṛttidurlabham || 34 ||

tasmātkiṣkupramāṇaṃ hi dattaṃ yenālikaṃ purā |
sa tu rājyānvayaṃ svargaṃ mahāṃtaṃ cānugacchati || 35 ||

tathaiva gopracāraṃ tu datvā svargānna hīyate |
yā gatirgopradasyaiva dhruvaṃ tasya bhaviṣyati || 36 ||

vyāmaikaṃ gopracāraṃ tu muktaṃ yena sudhīmatā |
tasya svargaṃ bhavediṣṭaṃ kimanyaiḥ purubhāṣitaiḥ || 37 ||

gopracāraṃ yathāśakti yo vai tyajati hetunā |
dinedine brahmabhojyaṃ puṇyaṃ tasya śatādhikam || 38 ||

tasmādgavāṃ pracāraṃ tu muktvā svargānna hīyate |
yaśchinatti drumaṃ puṇyaṃ gopracāraṃ chinatyapi || 39 ||

tasyaikaviṃśapuruṣāḥ pacyaṃte rauraveṣu ca |
gocāraghnaṃ grāmagopaḥ śakto jñātvā tu daṇḍayet || 40 ||

chettāraṃ dharmavṛkṣāṇāṃ viśeṣādgopracāragham |
tasya daṃḍe sukhaṃ tasya tasmāttaṃ daṃḍayettu saḥ || 41 ||

prāsādaṃ kurute yastu viṣṇuliṃgasya mānavaḥ |
trikāṃḍaṃ paṃcakāḍaṃ ca suśobhaṃ sughaṭānvitam || 42 ||

ito'dhikaṃ tu yo dadyānmṛnmayaṃ vā dṛṣanmayam |
vasuvṛttisupūrṇaṃ ca suramyaṃ divyabhūtalam || 43 ||

pratiṣṭhākarmasaṃpannaṃ kiṅkarādibhirāvṛtam |
suliṃgamiṣṭadevasya viṣṇoreva viśeṣataḥ || 44 ||

kṛtvā ca viṣṇusāyujyaṃ samāpnoti narottamaḥ |
tathaiva pratimāṃ kṛtvā hareranyatarasya ca || 45 ||

kṛtvā devakulaṃ ramyaṃ yatphalaṃ labhate naraḥ |
na tanmakhasahasraistu dānairbhuvi vratādibhiḥ || 46 ||

kalpakoṭisahasrāṇi kalpakoṭiśatāni ca |
prāsāde ratnasaṃyukte saṃpūrṇadravyasaṃkule || 47 ||

sa vasetkāmage yāne sarvalokamanohare |
svargāccyuto bhavedrājā sārvabhaumo guṇairvaśī || 48 ||

śivaliṃge tu prāsādaṃ kārayitvā svaśaktitaḥ |
