yaduktaṃ viṣṇuliṃge tu tajjñeyaṃ śivaveśmani || 49 ||

bhuṃkte bhogaṃ mahābhāgo manaḥśarmakaraṃ param |
rāmābhirāmasaṃpūrṇaṃ sarvataḥ sukhadaṃ divi || 50 ||

urvyāmakṣayabhogyāni nṛpo vātha mahādhanī |
harasya pratimāṃ yaśca kṛtvā devagṛhe naraḥ || 51 ||

suliṃgāṃ vā surūpāṃ vā kalpakoṭiṃ vaseddivi |
svargādbhraṣṭo bhavedrājā dhanī pūjyatamopi vā || 52 ||

devīliṃgeṣu sarveṣu kṛtvā devagṛhaṃ naraḥ |
suratvaṃ prāpnuyālloke devyāssarvasukhodbhave || 53 ||

bhṛśamacyutatāmeti sukhameti nirāmayam |
ratnasaṃsṛṣṭaprāsāde maṇikarburabhūtale || 54 ||

rāmāyutaprasaṃbhogye devīsaṃsṛṣṭanirbhaye |
nṛtyagītapare ramye sarveṃdriyamanorame || 55 ||

ratnamarddalatālāḍhye sarvadā strījanerite |
nirmale sukhade ramye ratnānāṃ suśubhe gṛhe || 56 ||

tathaiva pratimāyāśca devyāḥ prāsādamuttamam |
niyutaṃ kalpakoṭīnāṃ svarlokameti mānavaḥ || 57 ||

svargādbhraṣṭo bhavedbhūpo devībhaktiparāyaṇaḥ |
evaṃ ca janmasāhasraṃ smara eva bhavedbhuvi || 58 ||

prāsādaṃ gāṇapatyaṃ ca devyā vā prītimānnaraḥ |
kṛtvā suragaṇānāṃ ca pūjito divi jāyate || 59 ||

tathaiva rājatāmeti bhogyāndevīpure tathā |
avighnaṃ sarvakāryeṣu sadaiva gaṇapo yathā || 60 ||

ājñānaskhalitā tasya surāsuranareṣu ca |
tathaiva sauraprāsāde phalameti narottamaḥ || 61 ||

arogī suprasannātmā kāmadevasamaprabhaḥ |
varadaḥ sarvalokeṣu yathā bradhnastathā hi saḥ || 62 ||

surasya pratimāyāṃ ca gṛhaṃ kṛtvā śilāmayam |
kalpakoṭiśataṃ bhuktvā svargamurvīśvaro bhavet || 63 ||

viṣṇvādi sarvadevānāmarcanaṃ yatpṛthakpṛthak |
pratyekaṃ saṃpravakṣyāmi narāṇāṃ hita hetave || 64 ||

ghṛtapradīpaṃ yo dadyātmāsamekamaharniśam |
divyaṃ varṣāyutaṃ svarge pūjito devasattamaiḥ || 65 ||

ghṛtasnānaṃ tathā liṃge yaḥ kuryādbhuvi mānavaḥ |
kalpakoṭisahasrāṇi māsaike labhate naraḥ || 66 ||

tilatailapradīpasya tathānyasyārddhakaṃ phalam |
māsaikaṃ jaladānasya phaleneśvaratāṃ vrajet || 67 ||

dhūpadānena gaṃdharvaṃ caṃdane dviguṇaṃ bhavet |
mṛgamadāgarusatvasya dāne bahuphalaṃ bhavet || 68 ||

mālāpuṣpapradānena naraḥ syāttridaśeśvaraḥ |
śīte tūlapaṭīṃ datvā sarvaduḥkhātpramucyate || 69 ||

janmajanmasu labhyeta uṣṇe ca śītalāṃ paṭīm |
datvā ca naivasīdeta śaktyā vastraṃ dadāti yaḥ || 70 ||

caturhastapramāṇaṃ ca varṣmaveṣṭaṃ suśobhanam |
pidhānaṃ caraṇānāṃ ca datvā svargānna hīyate || 71 ||

śaktyā svarṇapradānena svarge pūjyo bhavennaraḥ |
daśayojanavistīrṇe maṃḍape rūpabhāgbhavet || 72 ||

suvarṇaṃ ratnasaṃyuktaṃ dattvā daśaguṇaṃ labhet |
vajravaiḍūryagārutma māṇikyādīnanarghataḥ || 73 ||

datvā liṃge vidhānācca brāhmaṇe vā yaśasvini |
śatayojanavistīrṇamaṃḍaledhipatirbhavet || 74 ||

tathaiva bhuvi jātopi sarvalokapraraṃjanaḥ |
surabhidravyadānena vāvadūkaśca suṃdaraḥ || 75 ||

raktāmṛtasukaṃṭhaśca pūgadānānnaro bhavet |
varadāsīpradānena naraḥ kalpaṃ vaseddivi || 76 ||

varadāsī pradānena urvyāṃ jāto dhaneśvaraḥ |
tathaiva bhṛtyadānena bahubhṛtyo bhaveddivi || 77 ||

dharāyāmakṣayāṛddhirjanmajanmasu jāyate |
sarvatūryapradānena guṇavānlokasaṃmataḥ || 78 ||

nṛtyagītādiśāstreṇa gaṃdharvāṇāṃ patirbhavet |
dāsīdāsayutaḥ svarge dhanaiḥ strībhirvarairyutaḥ || 79 ||

tathaiva gopradānena tāvatkālaṃ vaseddivi |
liṃge dugdhapradānācca naraḥ kalpaṃ vaseddivi || 80 ||

dadhnā snānena dviguṇaṃ ghṛtena tu śatādhikam |
annaṃ ṣaḍrasasaṃyuktaṃ datvā kṣitipatirbhavet || 81 ||

tathaiva pāyasaṃ datvā munīnāṃ pravaro bhuvi |
haviṣyānnaṃ mudā datvā vedaśāstrārthapāragaḥ || 82 ||

nirāmiṣapradānācca brahmacārī vratī bhavet |
madhudānācca saubhāgyaṃ guḍena lavaṇena ca || 83 ||

śarkarādibhirlāvaṇyaṃ sarvalokeṣu gīyate |
devānāṃ śaṃbhuliṃgānāmarcāṃ kṛtvā vidhānataḥ || 84 ||

anukrameṇa svargādau lokānāṃ sa patirbhavet |
lokānāṃ ca hitārthāya devāstiṣṭhaṃti saṃmukhāḥ || 85 ||

sakṛtpradakṣiṇāṃ kṛtvā śaṃbhuliṃgeṣu paṃḍitaḥ |
divyaṃ varṣaśataṃ pūrṇaṃ svargameti narottamaḥ || 86 ||

evameva krameṇaiva namaskāraiḥ svayaṃbhuvaḥ |
lokavaṃdyo vrajetsvargaṃ tasmānnityaṃ samācaret || 87 ||

liṃgarūpasya devasya yo dhanaṃ harate naraḥ |
sa ca rauravamāsādya haraṇātkīṭatāṃ vrajet || 88 ||

dātuḥ pūjāṃ ca liṃgārthe hareścāpyādadāti yaḥ |
kulakoṭisahasreṇa narakānna nivartate || 89 ||

jalapuṣpādidīpārthe vasu cānyadgṛhītavān |
paścānna dīyate lobhādakṣayaṃ narakaṃ vrajet || 90 ||

dāsīṃ hṛtvā tu liṃgasya narakānna nivartate |
kāmārto mātaraṃ gacchenna gacchecchivaceṭikām || 91 ||

śivadāsīṃ tato gatvā śivasva haraṇe tathā |
bhakṣaṇādannapānānānnaro durgatimāpnuyāt || 92 ||

ato devalavipro yo narakānna nivartate |
tasmādveśyājanānāṃ ca dauṣṭyameva hitaṃ bhavet || 93 ||

atastu gaṇikāṃ spṛṣṭvā naraḥ snānādviśudhyati |
malināṃ durgatiṃ yāti bahupūruṣasaṃśrayāt || 94 ||

veśyā tapasvinī yā ca devārcanaratā sadā |
pativrataparā śuddhā svargaṃ cākṣayamaśnute || 95 ||

gaṇikāṃ mātṛvadyastu sadāsannāṃ prapaśyati |
devavatsuralokeṣu nikhilaṃ bhogamaśnute || 96 ||

surāsuranarāṇāṃ ca vaṃdanīyo yathā hariḥ |
tathārhoyaṃ sarvaloke sarvabhūtaikapāvanaḥ || 97 ||

devadāsaḥ sadā yastu devakṛtyeṣu lolupaḥ |
sa ca gacchati lokeśo devaloke mahīyate || 98 ||

eteṣāmeva liṃgāni kārayitvā ca maṃḍapam |
śaktyā yaṃ labhate nākaṃ kālasya niścayaṃ śṛṇu || 99 ||

hāyanaikaṃ tṛṇenaiva śarakāṃḍena tacchatam |
ayutaṃ tvanyakāṣṭhena lakṣaṃ khādiradāruṇā || 100 ||

koṭikoṭi ca pāṣāṇaiḥ sudṛḍhairyatnasaṃyutaiḥ |
tasmātsarvaprayatnena maṃḍapaṃ kārayedbudhaḥ || 101 ||

yāvatkālaṃ vasetsvarge naro maṃḍapakārakaḥ |
tāvatkālaṃ ca haraṇe naro durgatimāpnuyāt || 102 ||

janānāṃ nicaye ramye vastūnāṃ krayavikraye |
āśraye cādhvagānāṃ ca nadīnada samāgame || 103 ||

devānāṃ maṃḍapaṃ kṛtvā yatphalaṃ labhate naraḥ |
tatphalaṃ samavāpnoti dviguṇaṃ vipramaṃdire || 104 ||

anāthasya ca dīnasya śrotriyasya viśeṣataḥ |
kārayitvā gṛhaṃ ramyaṃ naraḥ svargānna hīyate || 105 ||

ya idaṃ śṛṇuyānnityaṃ puṇyākhyānamanuttamam |
akṣayaṃ labhate svargaṃ prāsādādeḥ phalaṃ labhet || 106 ||

dhanināṃ ceśvarāṇāṃ ca tathā puṇyavatāṃ punaḥ |
pāṭhayitvā paṭhitvā tu naraḥ svargānna hīyate || 107 ||

devānāṃ dāsadāsīnāṃ sadā devālayeṣu ca |
paṭhedyastu sadā vipro mokṣamārgaṃ sa gacchati || 108 ||

nṛpāṇāmīśvarāṇāṃ ca dhanināṃ guṇināṃ puraḥ |
paṭhitvā mokṣamāpnoti śravaṇāttatphalaṃ labhet || 109 ||

dvijā ūcuḥ |
sāmānyekaḥ paraḥ puṇyo martyaloke dvijottama |
sulabho martyapūjyastu munīnāṃ ca tapasvinām || 110 ||

cāturvarṇyāśramāṇāṃ ca pāpapuṇyavatāṃ nṛṇām |
guṇāguṇavatāṃ caiva varṇāvarṇavatāṃ tathā || 111 ||

vyāsa uvāca |
sarveṣāmeva bhūtānāṃ rudrākṣeṇa yuto varaḥ |
darśanādyasya lokānāṃ pāparāśiḥ pralīyate || 112 ||

sparśanāddivamaśnāti dhārāṇādraudratāṃ vrajet |
śirasyurasi bāhau ca rudrākṣaṃ dhārayettu yaḥ || 113 ||

sa ceśānasamo loke makhe sarvatra gocaraḥ |
yatra tiṣṭhatyasau viprassa deśaḥ puṇyavānbhavet || 114 ||

taṃ dṛṣṭvāpyathavā spṛṣṭvā naraḥ pūyeta kalmaṣāt |
yajjapyaṃ tarpaṇaṃ dānaṃ snānamarcā pradakṣiṇam || 115 ||

yatkiṃcitkurute puṇyaṃ nikhilaṃ tadanaṃtakam |
tīrthānāṃ ca mahattīrthaṃ rudrākṣasya phalaṃ dvijāḥ || 116 ||

asyaiva dhāraṇāddehī pāpātpūto'ti puṇyabhāk |
gṛhītvā cākṣamālāṃ ca brahmagraṃthiyutāṃ śivām || 117 ||

yajjaptaṃ ca kṛtaṃ dānaṃ stotraṃ maṃtraṃ surārcanam |
sarvaṃ cākṣayatāmeti pāpaṃ ca kṣayamāvrajet || 118 ||

mālāyā lakṣaṇaṃ brūmaḥ śrūyatāṃ dvijasattamāḥ |
tasyāstu lakṣaṇaṃ jñātvā śaivamārgaṃ pralapsyatha || 119 ||

niryonikīṭaviddhaṃ ca bhagnaligaṃ yathākramam |
anyonyaṃ bījalagnaṃ ca mālāyāṃ parivarjayet || 120 ||

svayaṃ ca grathitā yā ca ślathānyonya prasajjitā |
śūdrādigrathitā'śuddhā dūrāttāṃ parivarjayet || 121 ||

madhyamālagnakaṃ bījaṃ japtavyaṃ ca yathākramam |
hastasaṃbhramaṇenaiva mervāmarśaṃ punaḥ punaḥ || 122 ||

saṃkhyātaṃ yajjapenmaṃtramasaṃkhyātaṃ ca niṣphalam |
sarveṣāmeva devānāṃ japenmaṃtraṃ svamālayā || 123 ||

prayataḥ sakale tīrthe koṭikoṭiguṇaṃ bhavet |
śuddhāyāmeva bhūmyāṃ tu medhyake vṛkṣamūlake || 124 ||

goṣṭhe catuṣpathāgāre viṣṇormaṃtraṃ śivasya ca |
gaṇapateśca sūrasya liṃgenaṃtaphalaṃ labhet || 125 ||

śūnyāgāre śavasyāgre śmaśāne ca catuṣpathe |
devīmaṃtraṃ japedyastu sadyassidhyati sādhakaḥ || 126 ||

yāvaccāvaidikaṃ maṃtraṃ paurāṇaṃ cāgamodbhavam |
sarvaṃ rudrākṣamālāyāmīpsiteṣṭārthadāyakam || 127 ||

rudrākṣasravajaṃ śuddhaṃ jalaṃ śirasi dhārayet |
sarvasmātkalmaṣātpūtaḥ puṇyaṃ bhavati cākṣayam || 128 ||

rudrākṣasya ca pratyekaṃ bījaṃ pratyeka nirjaraṃ |
dhārayedyastanau martyaḥ surāṇāṃ sattamo bhavet || 129 ||

dvijā ūcuḥ |
rudrākṣastu kuto jātaḥ kuto vā medhyatāṃ gataḥ |
kimarthaṃ sthāvaro bhūmau kenaiva ca pracāritaḥ || 130 ||

vyāsa uvāca |
purā kṛtayuge viprāstripuro nāma dānavaḥ |
surāṇāṃ ca vadhaṃ kṛtvā aṃtarikṣapure hi saḥ || 131 ||

praṇāśe sarvalokānāṃ sthiro brahmavareṇa ca |
śuśrāva śaṃkaro bhīmaṃ devairīśo niveditam || 132 ||

tato'jagavamāsajya bāṇamaṃtakasannibham |
dhṛtvā taṃ ca jaghānātha dṛṣṭaṃ divyena cakṣuṣā || 133 ||

sa papāta mahīpṛṣṭhe maholkeva cyuto divaḥ |
ghaṭanavyākulādrudrātpatitāḥ svedabiṃdavaḥ || 134 ||

tatrāśrubiṃduto jāto mahārudrākṣakaḥ kṣitau |
asyaiva ca phalaṃ jīvā na jānaṃtyatiguhyataḥ || 135 ||

tataḥ kailāsaśikhare devadevaṃ maheśvaram |
praṇamya śirasā bhūmau skaṃdo vacanamabravīt || 136 ||

rudrākṣasya phalaṃ nātha jñātumicchāmi tattvataḥ |
japyetha dhāraṇe caiva darśane sparśanepi vā || 137 ||

īśvara uvāca |
lakṣaṃ tu darśanātpuṇyaṃ koṭirvai sparśanena ca |
daśakoṭiphalaṃ puṇyaṃ dhāraṇāllabhate naraḥ || 138 ||

lakṣakoṭisahasrāṇi lakṣakoṭiśatāni ca |
japtvāsya labhate puṇyaṃ nātra kāryā vicāraṇā || 139 ||

ucchiṣṭo vā vikarmastho yukto vā sarvapātakaiḥ |
mucyate sarvapāpebhyo rudrākṣadhāraṇena vai || 140 ||

kaṃṭhe rudrākṣamādāya śvāpado mriyate yadi |
sopi rudratvamāpnoti kiṃ punarmānuṣādayaḥ || 141 ||

dhyānadhāraṇahīnopi rudrākṣaṃ yadi dhārayet |
sarvapāpavinirmuktaḥ sa yāti paramāṃ gatim || 142 ||

kārtikeya uvāca |
ekavaktraṃ dvitricatuḥpaṃcaṣaḍvaktrameva ca |
saptāṣṭanavavaktraṃ ca daśaikādaśavaktrakam || 143 ||

rudrākṣaṃ dvādaśāsyaṃ ca trayodaśamukhaṃ tathā |
caturdaśāsyasaṃyuktaṃ svayamuktaṃ ca śaṃkaram || 144 ||

teṣāṃ ca tanmukhānāṃ ca devatāḥ kāśca tadvada |
guṇo vā kīdṛśasteṣāṃ doṣo vā jagadīśvara || 145 ||

yadi menugrahovāsti kathayasva yathārthataḥ |
īśvara uvāca |
ekavaktraḥ śivaḥ sākṣādbrahmahatyāṃ vyapohati || 146 ||

tasmāttu dhārayeddehe sarvapāpakṣayāya ca |
śivalokaṃ sa gacchecca śivena saha modate || 147 ||

mahatāpuṇyayogena harānugrahakāraṇāt |
ekavaktraṃ labhenmartyo kailāsaṃ ca ṣaḍānana || 148 ||

devadevo dvivaktraṃ ca yastu dhārayate naraḥ |
sarvapāpakṣayaṃ yāti yadguhyaṃgovadhādikam || 149 ||

svargaṃ cākṣayamāpnoti dvivaktradhāraṇāttataḥ |
trivaktramanalassākṣādyasyadehe pratiṣṭhati || 150 ||

tasya janmārjitaṃ pāpaṃ dahatyagniriveṃdhanam |
strīhatyā brahmahatyābhyāṃ bahūnāṃ caiva hatyayā || 151 ||

yatpāpaṃ labhate martyaḥ sarvaṃ naśyati tatkṣaṇāt |
yatphalaṃ vahnipūjāyāmagnikārye ghṛtāhutau || 152 ||

tatphalaṃ labhate dhīraḥ svargaṃ cānaṃtamaśnute |
trivaktraṃ dhārayedyastu sa ca brahmasamo bhuvi || 153 ||

nicitaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ sarvaṃ dahejjanmani janmani |
na codare bhavedrogo na caivāpaṭutāṃ vrajet || 154 ||

parājayaṃ na labhate nāgninā dahyate gṛham |
etānyanyāni sarvāṇi vajrādeśca nivāraṇam || 155 ||

nāśubhaṃ vidyate kiṃcittrivaktrasya tu dhāraṇāt |
caturvaktraḥ svayaṃ brahmā yasya dehe pratiṣṭhati || 156 ||

sa bhavetsarvaśāstrajño dvijo vedavidāṃ varaḥ |
sarvadharmārthatattvajñaḥ smārtaḥ paurāṇiko bhavet || 157 ||

yatpāpaṃ narahatyāyāṃ bahusattveṣu veśmasu |
tatsarvaṃ dahate śīghraṃ caturvaktrasya dhāraṇāt || 158 ||

maheśastuṣyate nityaṃ bhūtānāmadhipo bhavet |
sadyojātastatheśānastatpuruṣo'ghora eva ca || 159 ||

vāmadeva ime devā vaktraiḥ paṃcabhirāśritāḥ |
ataḥ sarvatra bhūyiṣṭhāḥ paṃcavaktro dharātale || 160 ||

rudrasyātmajarūpoyaṃ tasmāttaṃ dhārayedbudhaḥ |
kalpakoṭisahasrāṇi kalpakoṭiśatāni ca || 161 ||

tāvatkālaṃ śivasyāgre pūjanīyaḥ surāsuraiḥ |
sārvabhaumo bhavedbhūmau śarvatejāḥ śivālaye || 162 ||

tasmātsarvaprayatnena paṃcavaktraṃ tu dhārayet |
ṣaḍvaktraṃ kārtikeyaṃ tu dhārayandakṣiṇe bhuje || 163 ||

brahmahatyādibhiḥ pāpairmucyate nātra saṃśayaḥ |
skaṃdasya sadṛśaḥ śūraḥ kalpāṃte samupasthite || 164 ||

nātra parājayaṃ caiti guṇānāmākaro bhuvi |
kumāratvamavāpnoti yathā gaurīśanaṃdanaḥ || 165 ||

brāhmaṇo bhūpapūjyaśca kṣatriyo labhate jayam |
vaiśyāḥ śūdrādayo varṇāḥ sadaiśvaryaprapūritāḥ |
tasyaiva varadā gaurī māteva sulabhā bhavet || 166 ||

tato bhujabalādeva viśvatejā bhavennaraḥ |
vāgmī dhīrassabhāyāṃ ca nṛpaveśmani saṃsadi || 167 ||
na ca kātaratāmeti naiva bhaṃgo bhaveddhruvam || 168 ||

etānyanyāni sarvāṇi ṣaḍvaktrasyaiva dhāraṇāt |
saptavaktro mahāsenastvanaṃto nāma nāgarāṭ || 169 ||

asya pratyeka vaktre tu pratināgā vyavasthitāḥ |
anaṃtaḥ karkaṭaścaiva puṃḍarīkotha takṣakaḥ || 170 ||

viṣolbaṇaśca kārīṣaḥ śaṃkhacūḍaśca saptamaḥ |
ete nāgā mahāvīryāḥ saptavaktre vyavasthitāḥ || 171 ||

asya dhāraṇamātre tu viṣaṃ na kramate tanau |
haraśca paramaprīto bhavennāgeśvare yathā || 172 ||

prītyāsyā sarvapāpāni kṣayaṃ yāṃti dinedine |
brahmahatyā surāpānaṃ steyādi gurutalpajam || 173 ||

yatpāpaṃ labhate martyaḥ sarvaṃ naśyati tatkṣaṇāt |
devasya sadṛśaṃ bhojyaṃ trailokye niścitaṃ labhet || 174 ||

aṣṭavaktro mahāsenaḥ sākṣāddevo vināyakaḥ |
asyaiva dhāraṇādeva yatpuṇyaṃ tacchṛṇuṣva me || 175 ||

janmajanma na mūrkhaḥ syānnāturo na ca naṣṭadhīḥ |
avighnaṃ sarvakāryeṣu tasyaiva satataṃ bhavet || 176 ||

naipuṇyaṃ lipikāryeṣu mahākāryeṣu kauśalam |
sarvāraṃbhādikāryeṣu kṣamaṃtasya dine dine || 177 ||

ardhakūṭaṃ tulākūṭaṃ sarvakūṭaṃ tathaiva ca |
śiśnodarakareṇaiva saṃspṛśedvā gurustriyam || 178 ||

evamādīni sarvāṇi haṃti pāpāni sarvathā |
akṣayaṃ tridivaṃ bhuktvā mukto yāti parāṃ gatim || 179 ||

guṇānyetāni sarvāṇi aṣṭavaktrasya dhāraṇāt |
navāsyaṃ bhairavaṃ proktaṃ dhārayedyastu bāhutaḥ || 180 ||

kapilaṃ muktidaṃ dhṛtvā mamatulya balo bhavet |
lakṣakoṭisahasrāṇi brahmahatyāḥ karoti yaḥ || 181 ||

tāḥ sarvā dahate śīghraṃ navavaktrasya dhāraṇāt |
suraloke sadā devaiḥ pūjito maghavānyathā || 182 ||

haravadvaraveśmastho gaṇeśo nātra saṃśayaḥ |
pannagāśca vinaśyaṃti daśavaktrasya dhāraṇāt || 183 ||

vaktre caikādaśe vatsa rudrāścaikādaśa smṛtāḥ |
śikhāyāṃ dhārayennityaṃ tasya puṇyaphalaṃ śṛṇu || 184 ||

aśvamedhasahasrāṇi yajñakoṭiśatāni ca |
gavāṃ śatasahasrasya samyagdattasya yatphalam || 185 ||

tatphalaṃ śīghramāpnoti vaktraikādaśa dhāraṇāt |
harasya sadṛśo loke punarjanma na vidyate || 186 ||

rudrākṣaṃ dvādaśāsyaṃ yaḥ kaṃṭhadeśe tu dhārayet |
ādityastuṣyate nityaṃ dvādaśāsye vyavasthitaḥ || 187 ||

gomedhaṃ naramedhaṃ ca kṛtvā yatphalamaśnute |
tatphalaṃ śīghramāpnoti vajrādeśca nivāraṇam || 188 ||

naiva vahnerbhayaṃ caiva na ca vyādhiḥ pravartate |
arthalābhaṃ sukhaṃ bhuṃkta īśvaro na daridratā || 189 ||

hastyaśvanaramārjāra mūṣakāñchaśakāṃstathā |
vyāladaṃṣṭri sṛgālādīnhatvā vyāghātayatyapi || 190 ||

mucyate nātra saṃdeho vaktradvādaśa dhāraṇāt |
vaktra trayodaśo rudro rudrākṣaḥ prāpyate yadi || 191 ||

śaṃtamaḥ sa tu vijñeyaḥ sarvakāmaphalapradaḥ |
sudhārasāyanaṃ caiva dhātuvādaśca pādukā || 192 ||

sidhyaṃti tasya vai sarve bhāgyayuktasya ṣaṇmukha |
mātṛpitṛ svasṛ bhrātṛ gurūnvātha nihatya ca || 193 ||

mucyate sarvapāpebhyo trayodaśāsya dhāraṇāt |
akṣayaṃ labhate svargaṃ yathā devo maheśvaraḥ || 194 ||

caturdaśamukhaṃ vatsa rudrākṣaṃ yadi dhārayet |
satataṃ mūrdhni bāhau vā śaktipiṃḍaṃ śivasya ca || 195 ||

kiṃ punarbahunoktena varṇitena punaḥ punaḥ |
pūjyate satataṃ devaiḥ prāpyate puṇyagauravāt || 196 ||

kārtikeya uvāca |
bhagavanśrotumicchāmi vaktre vaktre yathāvidhi |
nyasanaṃ kena maṃtreṇa dhāraṇaṃ vā kathaṃ vada || 197 ||

īśvara uvāca |
śṛṇu ṣaṇmukha tattvena vaktre vaktre yathāvidhi |
amaṃtroccāraṇādeva guṇā hyete prakīrtitāḥ || 198 ||

yaḥ punarmaṃtrasaṃyuktaṃ dhārayedbhuvi mānavaḥ |
guṇāstasya mahattvaṃ ca kathituṃ naiva śakyate || 199 ||

idānīṃ maṃtrā diśyaṃte oṃ rudra ekavaktrasya |
oṃ khaṃ dvivaktrasya oṃ vuṃ trivaktrasya |
oṃ hrīṃ caturvaktrasya oṃ hrāṃ paṃcavaktrasya |
oṃ hrūṃ ṣaḍvaktrasya oṃ hraḥ saptavaktrasya |
oṃ kaṃ aṣṭavaktrasya oṃ jūṃ navavaktrasya |
oṃ kṣaṃ daśavaktrasya oṃ śrīṃ ekādaśavaktrasya |
oṃ hrīṃ dvādaśavaktrasya oṃ kṣauṃ trayodaśavaktrasya |
oṃ nrāṃ caturdaśavaktrasya |
evaṃ maṃtrā yathākramaṃ nyastavyāḥ |
śirasyurasi mālāṃ ca gṛhītvā yo vrajennaraḥ |
padepadeśvamedhasya phalamāpnoti nānyathā || 200 ||

sarveṣāmapi vaktrāṇāṃ dhāraṇe matsamo bhavet |
tasmātsarvaprayatnena rudrākṣaṃ putra dhāraya || 201 ||

dhārayitvā tu rudrākṣaṃ mriyate yaḥ kṣitau naraḥ |
sa yāti matpuraṃ ramyaṃ sarvadevaiḥ prapūjitaḥ || 202 ||

marudeśe purā vatsa vāṇijyāya kila sthale |
gacchanvaṇiksutastāta tarau pretā prapīḍitaḥ || 203 ||

narīnartitataḥ pretā dvijena paramaikṣi ca |
kā tvaṃ nṛtyasi dīnāsi saṃvṛtā jīrṇavāsasā || 204 ||

atha sā ca dvijaṃ prāha devadūtānmayā śrutam |
asya cāru narasyaiva vajrapātena sāṃpratam || 205 ||

niścitaṃ nidhanaṃ vipra madbharttā tu bhaviṣyati |
etasminnaṃtare nākādvajraṃ tasyaśiropari || 206 ||

apatatsa papātorvyāṃ rudrākṣasyārdhakhaṃḍake |
tato mama purātputra vimānaṃ cāpataddrutam || 207 ||

samāruhya tataḥ śrīmāṃstatra tiṣṭhati saṃciram |
mamāṃśakaṃ samāsādya īśvaraḥ kau dhanī bhavet || 208 ||

evaṃ rudrākṣakhaṃḍe ca mṛtasya sugatiḥ suta |
jñānena dhāriṇaḥ puṃsaḥ phalaṃ vaktuṃ na śaknumaḥ || 209 ||

sa śaivo vā bhavecchākto gāṇapatyotha saurakaḥ |
yo dadhāti mṛto mālāmekaṃ rudrākṣakaṃ tu vā || 210 ||

yaḥ paṭhetpāṭhayedvāpi śrāvayecchṛṇutepi vā |
sarvapāpātpramuktātmā sukhaṃ svargaṃ labhetkramāt || 211 ||

skaṃdauvāca |
aparasyāpi pṛcchāmi phalasya pūtatāṃ taroḥ |
sarvalokahitārthāya vada no jagadīśvara || 1 ||

īśvara uvāca |
dhātrīphalaṃ paraṃ pūtaṃ sarvalokeṣu viśrutam |
yasya ropānnaro nārī mucyate janmabaṃdhanāt || 2 ||

pāvanaṃ vāsudevasya phalaṃ prītikaraṃ śubham |
asya bhakṣaṇamātreṇa mucyate sarvakalmaṣāt || 3 ||

bhakṣaṇe ca bhavedāyuḥ pāne vai dharmasaṃcayaḥ |
alakṣmīnāśanaṃ snāne sarvaiśvaryamavāpnuyāt || 4 ||

yasmingṛhe mahāsena dhātrī tiṣṭhati sarvadā |
tasmingṛhe na gacchaṃti pretā daiteya rākṣasāḥ || 5 ||

na gaṃgā na gayā caiva na kāśī na ca puṣkaram |
ekaiva hi nṛṇāṃ dhātrī saṃprāpte harivāsare || 6 ||

ekādaśyāṃ pakṣayuge dhātrīsnānaṃ karoti yaḥ |
sarvapāpakṣayaṃ yāṃti viṣṇuloke mahīyate || 7 ||

dhātrīphalaṃ sadā sevyaṃ bhakṣaṇe snāna eva ca |
niyataṃ pāraṇe viṣṇoḥ snānamātre harerdine || 8 ||

saṃyate pāraṇe caiva dhātryekasparśane naraḥ |
bhuktvā tu laṃghayedyastu ekādaśyāṃ sitāsite || 9 ||

ekenaivopavāsena kṛtena tu ṣaḍānana |
saptajanmakṛtātpāpānmucyate nātra saṃśayaḥ || 10 ||

akṣayaṃ labhate svargaṃ viṣṇusāyujyamāvrajet |
tasmātsarvaprayatnena dhātrīvrataṃ samācara || 11 ||

dhātrīdraveṇa satataṃ yasya keśāḥ suraṃjitāḥ |
na pibetsa punarmātuḥ stanaṃ kaścitṣaḍānana || 12 ||

dhātrīdarśanasaṃsparśānnāmna uccāraṇepi vā |
varadaḥ saṃmukho viṣṇuḥ saṃtuṣṭo bhavati priyaḥ || 13 ||

dhātrīphalaṃ ca yatrāste tatra tiṣṭhati keśavaḥ |
tatra brahmā sthirā padmā tasmāttāṃ tu gṛhe nyaset || 14 ||

alakṣmīrnaśyate tatra yatra dhātrī pratiṣṭhati |
saṃtuṣṭāssarvadevāśca na tyajaṃti kṣaṇaṃ mudā || 15 ||

dhātrīphalena naivedyaṃ yo dadāti mahādhanam |
tasya tuṣṭo bhavedviṣṇurnānyaiḥ kratuśatairapi || 16 ||

snātvā dhātrīdraveṇaiva pūjayedyastu mādhavam |
sobhīṣṭaphalamāpnoti yadvā manasi vartate || 17 ||

tathaiva lakṣaṇaṃ smṛtvā pūjayitvā phalena tu |
suvarṇaśatasāhasraṃ phalameti narottamaḥ || 18 ||

yā gatirjñānināṃ skaṃda munīnāṃ yogasevinām |
gatiṃ tāṃ samavāpnoti dhātrīsevā rato naraḥ || 19 ||

tīrthasevābhigamane vrataiśca vividhaistathā |
sā gatirlabhyate puṃsāṃ dhātrīphalasusevayā || 20 ||

prītiśca sarvadevānāṃ devīnāṃ no gaṇasya ca |
saṃmukhā varadā snāne dhātrīphalaniṣevaṇe || 21 ||

grahā duṣṭāśca ye kecidugrāśca daityarākṣasāḥ |
sarve na duṣṭatāṃ yāṃtidhātrīphala susevanāt || 22 ||

sarvayajñeṣu kāryeṣu śastaṃ cāmalakīphalam |
sarvadevasya pūjāyāṃ varjayitvā raviṃ suta || 23 ||

tasmādravidine tāta saptamyāṃ ca viśeṣataḥ |
dhātrīphalāni satataṃ dūrataḥ parivarjayet || 24 ||

yastu snāti tathāśnāti dhātrīṃ ca ravivāsare |
āyurvittaṃ kalatraṃ ca sarvaṃ tasya vinaśyati || 25 ||

saṃkrāntau ca bhṛgorvāre ṣaṣṭhyāṃ pratipidi dhruvam |
navamyāṃ cāpyamāyāṃ ca dhātrīṃ dūrātparityajet || 26 ||

nāsikākarṇatuṃḍeṣu mṛtasya cikureṣu vā |
tiṣṭheddhātrīphalaṃ yasya sa yāti viṣṇumaṃdiram || 27 ||

dhātrīsaṃparkamātreṇa mṛto yātyacyutālayam |
sarvapāpakṣayastasya svargaṃ yāti rathena tu || 28 ||

dhātrīdravaṃ naro liptvā yastu snānaṃ samācaret |
padepadeśvamedhasya phalaṃ prāpnoti dhārmikaḥ || 29 ||

asya darśanamātreṇa ye vai pāpiṣṭhajaṃtavaḥ |
sarve te prapalāyaṃte grahā duṣṭāśca dāruṇāḥ || 30 ||

puraikaḥ pulkasaḥ skaṃda mṛgayārthaṃ vanaṃ gataḥ |
mṛgapakṣigaṇānhatvā tṛṣayā paripīḍitaḥ || 31 ||

kṣudhayāmalakīvṛkṣaṃ puraḥ pīnaphalānvitam |
dṛṣṭvā saṃruhya sahasā cakhāda phalamuttamam || 32 ||

tato daivātsavṛkṣāgrānnipapāta mahītale |
vedanāgāḍhasaṃviddhaḥ paṃcatvamagamattadā || 33 ||

tataḥ pretagaṇāḥ sarve rakṣobhūtagaṇāstathā |
tanuṃ voḍhuṃ mudā sarve ye vai śamanasevakāḥ || 34 ||

na śaknuvaṃti cāṃḍālaṃ mṛtaṃ draṣṭuṃ mahābalāḥ |
anyonyaṃ vigrahasteṣāṃ mamāyamiti bhāṣatām || 35 ||

grahītuṃ cāpi netuṃ ca na śaktāste parasparam |
tataste tu samālokya gatā munigaṇānprati || 36 ||

pretā ūcuḥ |
kimarthaṃ munayo dhīrāścāṃḍālaṃ pāpakāriṇam |
prekṣituṃ na vayaṃ śaktā na cāpi yamasevakāḥ || 37 ||

mriyaṃte pātitā ye ca sthirairyuddhaparāṅmukhāḥ |
sāhasaiḥ pātitā bhītā vajrāgnikāṣṭhapīḍitāḥ || 38 ||

siṃhavyāghrahatā martyā vyāghrairvā jalajaṃtubhiḥ |
jalasthalasthitāḥ pretāḥ vṛkṣaparvatapātitāḥ || 39 ||

paśupakṣihatā ye ca kārāgāre gare mṛtāḥ |
ātmaghātamṛtā ye ca śrāddhādikarmavarjitāḥ || 40 ||

gūḍhakarmamṛtā dhūrtā guruvipranṛpadviṣaḥ |
pāṣaṃḍāḥ kaulikāḥ krūrā garadāḥ kūṭasākṣiṇaḥ || 41 ||

āśaucānnasya bhoktāraḥ pretabhogyā na saṃśayaḥ |
mamāyamiti bhāṣaṃto netuṃ taṃ ca na śaknumaḥ || 42 ||

āditya iva duṣprekṣyaḥ kiṃvā kasya prabhāvataḥ |
munaya ūcuḥ |
anena bhakṣitaṃ pretāḥ pakvaṃ cāmalakīphalam || 43 ||

tatsaṃgaṃ yāṃti tasyaiva phalāni pracurāṇi ca |
tenaiva kāraṇenāyaṃ duṣprekṣyo bhavatāṃ dhruvam || 44 ||

vṛkṣāgrapatitasyātha prāṇaḥ snehānna ca tyajet |
nāyaṃ cāreṇa sūryasya na cānye pāpakāriṇaḥ || 45 ||

dhātrībhakṣaṇamātreṇa pāpātpūto vrajeddivam |
pretā ūcuḥ |
pṛcchāmo vo hyavijñānānna vayaṃ niṃdakāḥ kvacit || 46 ||

viṣṇulokādvimānaṃ tu yāvannaivātra gacchati |
ucyatāṃ muniśārdūlā vo drutaṃ manasi sthitam || 47 ||

yāvaddvijā na ghoṣaṃti vedamaṃtrādikalpitam |
ghoṣyaṃte yatra vedāśca maṃtrāṇi vividhāni ca || 48 ||

purāṇasmṛtayo yatra kṣaṇaṃ sthātuṃ na śaknumaḥ |
yajñahomajapasthānadevatārcanakarmaṇām || 49 ||

purato vai na tiṣṭhāmastasmādvṛttaṃ samucyatām |
kiṃ vai kṛtvā pretayoniṃ labhaṃte hi narā dvijāḥ || 50 ||

śrotumicchāmahe samyakkathaṃ vai vikṛtaṃ vapuḥ |
dvijā ūcuḥ |
śītavātātapakleśaiḥ kṣutpipāsāviśeṣakaiḥ || 51 ||

anyairapi ca duḥkhairye pīḍitāḥ kūṭasākṣiṇaḥ |
vadhabaṃdhapramītāśca pretāste nirayaṃ gatāḥ || 52 ||

chidrānveṣaparā ye ca dvijānāṃ karmaghātinaḥ |
tathaiva ca gurūṇāṃ ca te pretāścāpunarbhavāḥ || 53 ||

dīyamāne dvijāgrye tu dātāraṃ pratividhyati |
ciraṃ pretatvamāśritya narakānna nivartate || 54 ||

parasya vā'tmano vā gāṃ kṛtvā pīḍanavāhane |
na pālayaṃti ye mūḍhāste pretāḥ karmajā bhuvi || 55 ||

hīnapratijñāścāsatyāstathā bhagnavratā narāḥ |
nalinīdalabhuktāśca te pretāḥ karmajā bhuvi || 56 ||

vikrīṇanti sutāṃ śuddhāṃ striyaṃ sādhvīmakaṃṭakām |
pitṛvyamātulādeśca te pretāḥ karmajā bhuvi || 57 ||

ete cānye ca bahavaḥ pretā jātāḥ svakarmabhiḥ |
pretā ūcuḥ |
na bhavaṃti kathaṃ pretāḥ karmaṇā kena vā dvijāḥ || 58 ||

hitāya vadanastūrṇaṃ sarvalokahitaṃ param |
dvijā ūcuḥ |
yena caiva kṛtaṃ snānaṃ jale tīrthasya dhīmatā || 59 ||

namaskṛtaṃ paraṃ ligaṃ na preto jāyate naraḥ |
ekādaśyāmupoṣyaiva dvādaśyāṃ ca viśeṣataḥ || 60 ||

pūjayitvā hariṃ martyāḥ pretatvaṃ na vrajaṃti vai |
vedākṣaraprasūtaiśca stotramaṃtrādibhistathā || 61 ||

devānāṃ pūjane raktā na vai pretā bhavaṃti te |
śrutvā paurāṇikaṃ vākyaṃ divyaṃ ca dharmasaṃhitam || 62 ||

pāṭhayitvā paṭhitvā ca piśācatvaṃ na gacchati |
vrataiśca vividhaiḥ pūtāḥ padmākṣadhāraṇaistathā || 63 ||

japtvā padmākṣamālāyāṃ pretatvaṃ naiva gacchati |
dhātrīphaladravaiḥ snātvā nityaṃ tadbhakṣaṇe ratāḥ || 64 ||

tena viṣṇuṃ susaṃpūjya na gachaṃti piśācatām |
pretā ūcuḥ |
satāṃ saṃdarśanātpuṇyamiti paurāṇikā viduḥ || 65 ||

tasmādvo darśanaṃ jātaṃ hitaṃ naḥ kartumarhatha |
pretabhāvādyathāmuktiḥ sarveṣāṃ no bhaviṣyati || 66 ||

vratopadeśakaṃ dhīrā yuṣmākaṃ śaraṇāgatāḥ |
tato dayālavaḥ sarve tānūcurdvijasattamāḥ || 67 ||

dhātrīṇāṃ bhakṣaṇaṃ śīghraṃ kurvatāṃ muktihetave |
pretā ūcuḥ |
dhātrīṇāṃ darśane viprā vayaṃ sthātuṃ na śaknumaḥ || 68 ||

kathaṃ teṣāṃ phalānāṃ ca śaktā vai bhakṣaṇedhunā |
dvijā ūcuḥ |
asmākaṃ vacanenātra dhātrīṇāṃ bhakṣaṇaṃ śivam || 69 ||

phaliṣyati paraṃ lokaṃ tasmādgaṃtuṃ samarhatha |
atha tebhyo varaṃ labdhvā dhātrīvṛkṣaṃ piśācakaiḥ || 70 ||

samāruhya phalaṃ prāpya bhakṣitaṃ līlayā tadā |
tato devālayāttūrṇaṃ rathaṃ pīnasuśobhanam || 71 ||

āgataṃ taṃ samāruhya sacāṃḍālapiśācakāḥ |
gatāste tridivaṃ putra vratairyajñaiḥ sudurlabham || 72 ||

skaṃda uvāca |
dhātrībhakṣaṇamātreṇa puṇyaṃ labdhvā divaṃ gatāḥ |
tadbhakṣiṇaḥ kathaṃ svargaṃ na gacchaṃti narādayaḥ || 73 ||

īśvara uvāca |
pūrvaṃ te jñānalopācca na jānaṃti hitāhitam |
ucchiṣṭaṃ śvabhirutspṛṣṭaṃ śleṣmamūtraṃ śakṛttu vā || 74 ||

matvā ca mohitāḥ śreṣṭhaṃ pretādaṃti sadaiva hi |
śakṛcchaucajalaṃ vāṃtaṃ balisūkarakukkuṭaiḥ || 75 ||

mṛtake sūtake japyaṃ na tyaktaṃ yena kenacit |
tasyānnaṃ ca jalaṃ pretāḥ khādaṃti tu sadaiva hi || 76 ||

durdāṃtā gṛhiṇī yasya śucisaṃyamavarjitā |
guruniḥsāritā duṣṭā saṃti pretāśca tatra vai || 77 ||

apuṅgavāḥ kulairjātyā balotsāhavivarjitāḥ |
badhirāśca kṛśā dīnāḥ piśācāḥ karmajātayaḥ || 78 ||

kṣaṇaṃ ca maṃgalaṃ nāsti duḥkhairdehayutā bhṛśam |
tenaiva vikṛtākārāḥ sarvabhogavivarjitāḥ || 79 ||

nagnakā rogasaṃtaptā mṛtā rūkṣā malīmasāḥ |
ete cānye ca duḥkhārtāḥ sadaiva pretajātayaḥ || 80 ||

tena karmavipākena jāyaṃte kāmamīdṛśāḥ |
pitṛmātṛgurūṇāṃ ca devaniṃdāparāśca ye || 81 ||

pāṣaṃḍāḥ kaulikāḥ pāpāste pretāḥ karmajā bhuvi |
galapāśairjalaiḥ śastrairgaralairātmaghātakāḥ || 82 ||

ihaloke ca te pretāścāṃḍālādiṣu saṃbhavāḥ |
aṃtyajāḥ patitāścaiva pāparogamṛtāśca ye || 83 ||

aṃtyajairghātitā yuddhe te pretā niścitā bhuvi |
mahāpātakasaṃyuktā vivāhe ca bahiṣkṛtāḥ || 84 ||

śauryātsāhasikā ye ca te pretāḥ karmajā bhuvi |
rājadrohakarā ye ca pitṝṇāṃ drohaciṃtakāḥ || 85 ||

dhyānādhyayanahīnāśca vratairdevārcanādibhiḥ |
amaṃtrāḥ snānahīnāśca gurustrīgamane ratāḥ || 86 ||

tathaiva cāṃtyajastrīṣu durgatāsu ca saṃgatāḥ |
mṛtāḥ krūropavāsena mlecchadeśasthitā mṛtāḥ || 87 ||

mlecchabhāṣāyutāśuddhāstathāmlecchopajīvinaḥ |
anuvartaṃti ye mlecchānstrīdhanairupajīvakāḥ || 88 ||

striyo yaiśca na rakṣyaṃte te pretā nātra saṃśayaḥ |
kṣudhāsaṃtaptadehaṃ tu śrāṃtaṃ vipraṃ gṛhāgatam || 89 ||

guṇapuṇyātithiṃ tyaktvā piśācatvaṃ vrajaṃti te |
vikrīṇaṃti ca vai gāśca mleccheṣu ca gavāśiṣu || 90 ||

pretaloke sukhaṃ sthitvā te ca yāṃtyapunarbhavam |
aśaucābhyaṃtare ye ca jātāśca paśavo mṛtāḥ || 91 ||

ciraṃ pretāḥ piśācāśca mṛtā jātāḥ punaḥ punaḥ |
jātakarmamukhaiścaiva saṃskārairye vivirjitāḥ || 92 ||

ekaikasmiśca saṃskāre pretatvaṃ parihīyate |
snānasaṃdhyāsurārcābhirvedayajñavratākṣaraiḥ || 93 ||

ājanmavarjitāḥ pāpāste pretāścāpunarbhavāḥ |
bhojanocchiṣṭapātrāṇi yāni dehamalāni ca || 94 ||

nipātayaṃti ye tīrthe te pretā nātra saṃśayaḥ |
dānamānārcanairnaiva yairviprā bhuvi tarpitāḥ || 95 ||

pitaro guravaścaiva pretāste karmajā bhṛśam |
patiṃ tyaktvā ca yā nāryo vasaṃti cetarairjanaiḥ || 96 ||

pretaloke ciraṃ sthitvā jāyaṃte cāṃtyayoniṣu |
patiṃ ca vaṃcayitvā yā viṣayeṃdriyamohitāḥ || 97 ||

miṣṭaṃ cādaṃti yāḥ pāpāstāstu pretāściraṃ bhuvi |
viṇmūtrabhakṣakā ye ca brahmasva bhakṣaṇe ratāḥ || 98 ||

abhakṣyabhakṣakāścānye te pretāścāpunarbhavāḥ |
balādye paravastūni gṛhṇaṃti na dadatyapi || 99 ||

atithīnavamanyaṃte pretā nirayamāsthitāḥ |
tasmādāmalakīṃ bhuktvā snātvā tasya draveṇa ca || 100 ||

sarvapāpādvinirmukto viṣṇuloke mahīyate |
tasmātsarvaprayatnena sevayāmalakīṃ śivām || 101 ||

ya idaṃ śṛṇuyānnityaṃ puṇyākhyānamidaṃ śubham |
sarvapāpa prapūtātmā viṣṇuloke mahīyate || 102 ||

śrāvayetsatataṃ loke vaiṣṇaveṣu viśeṣataḥ |
sa yāti viṣṇusāyujyamiti paurāṇikā viduḥ || 103 ||

skaṃda uvāca |
mahīruha phalaṃ jñātaṃ prapūtaṃ dvividhaṃ prabho |
idānīṃ śrotumicchāmi patraṃ puṣpaṃ sumokṣadam || 104 ||

īśvara uvāca |
sarvebhyaḥ patrapuṣpebhyaḥ sattamā tulasī śivā |
sarvakāmapradā śuddhā vaiṣṇavī viṣṇusupriyā || 105 ||

bhuktimuktipradā mukhyā sarvalokaparā śubhā |
yāmāśritya gatāḥ svargamakṣayaṃ munisattamāḥ || 106 ||

hitārthaṃ sarvalokānāṃ viṣṇunāropitā purā |
tulasīpatrapuṣpaṃ ca sarvadharmapratiṣṭhitam || 107 ||

yathā viṣṇoḥ priyālakṣmīryathāhaṃ priya eva ca |
tatheyaṃ tulasīdevī caturtho nopapadyate || 108 ||

tulasīpatramekaṃ tu śatahemaphalapradam |
nānyaiḥ puṣpaistathāpatrairnānyairgaṃdhānulepanaiḥ || 109 ||

tuṣyate daityahā viṣṇustulasyāśca dalairvinā |
anena pūjito yena harirnityaṃ parāśayā || 110 ||

tena dattaṃ hutaṃ jñātaṃ kṛtaṃ yajñavratādikam |
janmajanmani bhāsitvaṃ sukhaṃ bhāgyaṃ yaśaḥ śriyaṃ || 111 ||

kulaṃ śīlaṃ kalatraṃ ca putraṃ duhitaraṃ tathā |
dhanaṃ rājyamarogatvaṃ jñānaṃ vijñānameva ca || 112 ||

vedavedāṃgaśāstraṃ ca purāṇāgamasaṃhitāḥ |
sarvaṃ karagataṃ manye tulasyābhyarcane hareḥ || 113 ||

yathā gaṃgā pavitrāṃgī suraloke vimokṣadā |
yathā bhāgīrathī puṇyā tathaivaṃ tulasī śivā || 114 ||

kiṃ ca gaṃgājale naiva kiṃca puṣkarasevayā |
tulasīdalamiśreṇa jalenaiva pramodyate || 115 ||

mādhavaḥ saṃmukho yasya janmajanmasudhīmataḥ |
tasya śraddhā bhavechrutvā tulasyā harimarcitum || 116 ||

yo maṃjarīdalaireva tulasyā viṣṇumarcayet |
tasya puṇyaphalaṃ skanda kathituṃ naiva śakyate || 117 ||

tatra keśavasānnidhyaṃ yatrāsti tulasīvanam |
tatra brahmā ca kamalā sarvadevagaṇaiḥ saha || 118 ||

tasmāttāṃ saṃnikṛṣṭe tu sadā devīṃ prapūjayet |
stotramaṃtrādikaṃ yadvā sarvamānaṃtyamaśnute || 119 ||

ye ca pretāśca kūśmāṃḍāḥ piśācā brahmarākṣasāḥ |
bhūtadaityādayastatra palāyaṃte sadaiva hi || 120 ||

alakṣmīrnāśinī ghūrṇā yā ḍākinyādi mātaraḥ |
sarvāḥ saṃkocitāṃ yāṃti dṛṣṭvā tu tulasīdalaṃ || 121 ||

brahmahatyādayaḥ pāpavyādhayaḥ pāpasaṃbhavāḥ |
kumaṃtriṇā kṛtā ye ca sarve naśyaṃti tatra vai || 122 ||

bhūtale vāpi taṃ yena haryarthaṃ tulasīvanam |
kṛtaṃ kratuśataṃ tena vidhivatpriyadakṣiṇam || 123 ||

hariliṃgeṣu cānyeṣu sālagrāmaśilāsu ca |
tulasīgrahaṇaṃ kṛtvā viṣṇoḥ sāyujyamāvrajet || 124 ||

naṃdaṃti puruṣāstasya mādhavārthe kṣitau tu yaḥ |
tulasīṃ ropayeddhīraḥ sa yāti mādhavālayam || 125 ||

pūjayitvā hariṃ devaṃ nirmālyaṃ tulasīdalam |
dhārayedyaḥ svaśīrṣe tu pāpātpūto divaṃ vrajet || 126 ||

pūjane kīrttane dhyāne ropaṇe dhāraṇe kalau |
tulasī dahate pāpaṃ rsvargaṃ mokṣaṃ dadāti ca || 127 ||
upadeśaṃ diśedasyāḥ svayamācarate punaḥ || 128 ||

sa yāti paramaṃ sthānaṃ mādhavasya niketanam |
hareḥ priyakaraṃ yacca tanme priyataraṃ bhavet || 129 ||

sarveṣāmapi devānāṃ devīnāṃ ca samaṃtataḥ |
śrāddheṣu yajñakāryeṣu parṇamekaṃ ṣaḍānana || 130 ||

tasmātsarvaprayatnena tulasīsevanaṃ kuru |
tulasī sevitā yena tena sarvaṃ tu sevitam || 131 ||

guruṃ vipraṃ devatīrthaṃ tasmātsevaya ṣaṇmukha |
śikhāyāṃ tulasīṃ kṛtvā yastu prāṇānparityajet || 132 ||

duṣkṛtaughādvinirmuktaḥ svargameti nirāmayam |
rājasūyādibhiryajñairvrataiśca vividhairyamaiḥ || 133 ||

yā gatiḥ prāpyate dhīraiḥ tulasīsevināṃ bhavet |
tulasīdalena caikena pūjayitvā hariṃ naraḥ || 134 ||

vaiṣṇavatvamavāpnoti kimanyaiḥ śāstravistaraiḥ |
na pibetsa payo mātustulasyāḥ koṭisaṃkhyakaiḥ || 135 ||

arcitaḥ keśavo yena śākhāmṛdulapallavaiḥ |
bhāvayetpuruṣānmartyaḥ śataśotha sahasraśaḥ || 136 ||

pūjayitvā hariṃ nityaṃ komalaistulasīdalaiḥ |
pradhānato guṇāstāta tulasyā gaditā mayā || 137 ||

nikhilaṃ purukālena guṇaṃ vaktuṃ na śaknumaḥ |
yastvidaṃ śṛṇuyānnityamākhyānaṃ puṇyasaṃcayam || 138 ||

pūrvajanmakṛtātpāpānmucyate janmabaṃdhanāt |
sakṛtpaṭhanamātreṇa vahniṣṭomaphalaṃ labhet || 139 ||

na tasya vyādhayaḥ putra mūrkhatvaṃ na kadācana |
sarvadā jayamāpnoti na gacchetsa parājayaṃ || 140 ||

lekhastiṣṭhedgṛhe yasya tasya lakṣmīḥ pravartate |
na cādhayo na ca pretā na śoko nāvamānanā || 141 ||
na tiṣṭhaṃti kṣaṇaṃ tatra yatreyaṃ vartate lipiḥ || 142 ||
iti śrīpādmapurāṇe prathame sṛṣṭikhaṃḍe tulasīmāhātmyaṃ nāma ṣaṣṭitamo'dhyāyaḥ || 60 ||

|
dvijāūcuḥ |
tulasīpuṣpamāhātmyaṃ śrutaṃ tvatto hareḥ śubham |
tasyā stotraṃ kṛtaṃ puṇyaṃ śrotumicchāmahe vayam || 1 ||

vyāsa uvāca |
purā skaṃdapurāṇe ca yanmayā kīrtitaṃ dvijāḥ |
kathayāmi purāṇaṃ ca purato mokṣahetave || 2 ||

śatānaṃda muneḥ śiṣyāḥ sarve te saṃśitavratāḥ |
praṇipatya guruṃ viprāḥ papracchuḥ puṇyato hitam || 3 ||

pūrvaṃ brahmamukhānnātha yacchrutaṃ tulasīstavam |
tadvayaṃ śrotumicchāmastvatto brahmavidāṃvara || 4 ||

śatānaṃda uvāca |
nāmoccāre kṛte tasyāḥ prīṇātyasuradarpahā |
pāpāni vilayaṃ yāṃti puṇyaṃ bhavati cākṣayam || 5 ||

sā kathaṃ tulasī lokaiḥ pūjyate vaṃdyate nahi |
darśanādeva yasyāstu dānaṃ koṭigavāṃ bhavet || 6 ||

dhanyāste mānavā loke yadgṛhe vidyate kalau |
sālagrāmaśilārthaṃ tu tulasī pratyahaṃ kṣitau || 7 ||

tulasīṃ ye vicinvaṃti dhanyāste karapallavāḥ |
keśavārthaṃ kalau ye ca ropayaṃtīha bhūtale || 8 ||

kiṃ kariṣyati saṃruṣṭo yamopi saha kiṃkaraiḥ |
tulasīdalena deveśaḥ pūjito yena duḥkhahā || 9 ||

tīrthayātrādigamanaiḥ phalaiḥ sidhyati kinnaraḥ |
snāne dāne tathā dhyāne prāśane keśavārcane || 10 ||

tulasī dahate pāpaṃ kīrtane ropaṇe kalau |
tulasyamṛtajanmāsi sadā tvaṃ keśavapriye || 11 ||

keśavārthaṃ cinomi tvāṃ varadā bhava śobhane |
tvadaṃgasaṃbhavairnityaṃ pūjayāmi yathāharim || 12 ||

tathā kuru pavitrāṃgi kalau malavināśini |
maṃtreṇānena yaḥ kuryādvicitya tulasīdalam || 13 ||

pūjanaṃ vāsudevasya lakṣakoṭiguṇaṃ bhavet |
prabhāvaṃ tava deveśi gāyaṃti surasattamāḥ || 14 ||

munayaḥ siddhagaṃdharvāḥ pātāle nāgarāṭsvayam |
na te prabhāvaṃ jānaṃti devatāḥ keśavādṛte || 15 ||

guṇānāṃ parimāṇaṃ tu kalpakoṭiśatairapi |
kṛṣṇānaṃdātsamudbhūtā kṣīrodamathanodyame || 16 ||

uttamāṃge purā yena tulasī viṣṇunā dhṛtā |
prāpyaitāni tvayā devi viṣṇoraṃgāni sarvaśaḥ || 17 ||

pavitratā tvayā prāptā tulasīṃ tvāṃ namāmyaham |
tvadaṃgasaṃbhavaiḥ patraiḥ pūjayāmi yathā harim || 18 ||

tathā kuruṣva me'vighnaṃ yato yāmi parāṃ gatim |
ropitā gomatītīre svayaṃ kṛṣṇena pālitā || 19 ||

jagaddhitāya tulasī gopīnāṃ hitahetave |
vṛṃdāvane vicaratā sevitā viṣṇunā svayam || 20 ||

gokulasya vivṛddhyarthaṃ kaṃsasya nidhanāya ca |
vasiṣṭhavacanātpūrvaṃ rāmeṇa sarayūtaṭe || 21 ||

rākṣasānāṃ vadhārthāya ropitā tvaṃ jagatpriye |
ropitā tapaso vṛddhyai tulasīṃ tvāṃ namāmyaham || 22 ||

viyoge vāsudevasya dhyātvā tvāṃ janakātmajā |
aśokavanamadhye tu priyeṇa saha saṃgatā || 23 ||

śaṅkarārthaṃ purā devi pārvatyā tvaṃ himālaye |
ropitā tapaso vṛddhyai tulasīṃ tvāṃ namāmyaham || 24 ||

sarvābhirdevapatnībhiḥ kinnaraiścāpi naṃdane |
duḥsvapnanāśanārthāya sevitā tvaṃ namostu te || 25 ||

dharmāraṇye gayāyāṃ ca sevitā pitṛbhiḥ svayam |
sevitā tulasī puṇyā ātmano hitamicchatā || 26 ||

ropitā rāmacaṃdreṇa sevitā lakṣmaṇena ca |
pālitā sītayā bhaktyā tulasī daṃḍake vane || 27 ||

trailokyavyāpinī gaṃgā yathā śāstreṣu gīyate |
tathaiva tulasī devī dṛśyate sacarācare || 28 ||

ṛśyamūke ca vasatā kapirājena sevitā |
tulasī vālināśāya tārāsaṃgama hetave || 29 ||

praṇamya tulasīdevīṃ sāgarotkramaṇaṃ kṛtam |
kṛtakāryaḥ prahṛṣṭaśca hanūmānpunarāgataḥ || 30 ||

tulasīgrahaṇaṃ kṛtvā vimukto yāti pātakaiḥ |
athavā muniśārdūla brahmahatyāṃ vyapohati || 31 ||

tulasīpatragalitaṃ yastoyaṃ śirasā vahet |
gaṃgāsnānamavāpnoti daśadhenuphalapradam || 32 ||

prasīda devi deveśi prasīda harivallabhe |
kṣīrodamathanodbhūte tulasi tvāṃ namāmyaham || 33 ||

dvādaśyāṃ jāgare rātrau yaḥ paṭhettulasīstavam |
dvātriṃśadaparādhāṃśca kṣamate tasya keśavaḥ || 34 ||

yatpāpaṃ yauvane bālye kaumāre vārddhake kṛtam |
tatsarvaṃ vilayaṃ yāti tulasīstava pāṭhataḥ || 35 ||

prītimāyāti deveśastuṣṭo lakṣmīṃ prayacchati |
kurute śatrunāśaṃ ca sukhaṃ vidyāṃ prayacchati || 36 ||

tulasīnāmamātreṇa devā yacchaṃti vāṃchitam |
garhyāṇamapi deveśo muktiṃ yacchati dehinām || 37 ||

tulasī stavasaṃtuṣṭā sukhaṃ vṛddhiṃ dadāti ca |
udgataṃ helayā viddhi pāpaṃ yamapathe sthitam || 38 ||

yasmingṛhe ca likhito vidyate tulasīstavaḥ |
nāśubhaṃ vidyate tasya śubhamāpnoti niścitam || 39 ||

sarvaṃ ca maṃgalaṃ tasya nāsti kiṃcidamaṃgalam |
subhikṣaṃ sarvadā tasya dhanaṃ dhānyaṃ ca puṣkalam || 40 ||

niścalā keśave bhaktirna viyogaśca vaiṣṇavaiḥ |
jīvati vyādhinirmukto nādharme jāyate matiḥ || 41 ||

dvādaśyāṃ jāgare rātrau yaḥ paṭhettulasīstavam |
tīrthakoṭisahasraistu yatphalaṃ lakṣakoṭibhiḥ || 42 ||
tatphalaṃ samavāpnoti paṭhitvā tulasīstavam || 43 ||
iti śrīpādmapurāṇe prathame sṛṣṭikhaṃḍe tulasīstavamāhātmyaṃ nāmaikaṣaṣṭitamo'dhyāyaḥ || 61 ||

|
dvijāūcuḥ |
majjanādakhilaṃ pāpaṃ kṣayaṃ yāṃti suniścitam |
mahāpātakamanyacca tadādeśaṃ vadasva naḥ || 1 ||

pāpātpūto'kṣayaṃ nākamaśnute divi śakravat |
surayonerna hāniḥ syādupadeśaṃ vadasva naḥ || 2 ||

atra bhogyaṃ paraṃ sarvaṃ mṛte svarge surottamaḥ |
kalipāpahatānāṃ ca svargasopānamucyate || 3 ||

vyāsa uvāca |
gatiṃ ciṃtayatāṃ viprāstūrṇaṃ sāmānyajanmanām |
strīpuṃsāmīkṣaṇādyasmādgaṃgā pāpaṃ vyapohati || 4 ||

gaṃgeti smaraṇādeva kṣayaṃ yāti ca pātakam |
kīrtanādatipāpāni darśanādgurukalmaṣam || 5 ||

snānātpānācca jāhnavyāṃ pitṝṇāṃ tarpaṇāttathā |
mahāpātakavṛṃdāni kṣayaṃ yāṃti dinedine || 6 ||

agninā dahyate tūlaṃ tṛṇaṃ śuṣkaṃ kṣaṇādyathā |
tathā gaṃgājalasparśātpuṃsāṃ pāpaṃ dahetkṣaṇāt || 7 ||

saṃprāpnotyakṣayaṃ svargaṃ gaṃgāsnānena keśavam |
yaśo rājyaṃ labhetpuṇyeṃ svargamaṃte parāṃ gatim || 8 ||

pitṝnuddiśya gaṃgāyāṃ yastu piṃḍaṃ prayacchati |
vidhinā vākyapūrveṇa tasya puṇyaphalaṃ śṛṇu || 9 ||

annaikena tu sāhasraṃ varṣaṃ pūjyaḥ surālaye |
tilena dviguṇaṃ viddhi tathā medhyaphalena ca || 10 ||

gavyena vidhinā viprāḥ svargasyāṃto na vidyate |
evaṃ piṃḍapradānena nityaṃ kratuśataṃ bhavet || 11 ||

pitaro nirayasthā ye dhanyāste martyavāsinaḥ |
dhanaputrayutārogyaṃ sukhasaṃmānapūjitāḥ || 12 ||

rasātalagatā ye ca ye ca kīṭā mahītale |
sthāvare pakṣisaṃghādau te martyā dhanino nṛpāḥ || 13 ||

tattatputraiśca pautraiśca gotrairdauhitrakaistathā |
jāmātṛbhāgineyaiśca suhṛnmitraiḥ priyāpriyaiḥ || 14 ||

pradīyate jalaṃ piṃḍaṃ yathopakaraṇānvitam |
gaṃgātoyeṣu tīreṣu teṣāṃ svargo'kṣayo bhavet || 15 ||

piṃḍādūrdhvaṃ sthitā ye ca pitaro mātṛgotrajāḥ |
bhavaṃti sukhinaḥ sarve martyāśśatasahasraśaḥ || 16 ||

svarge tasya sthitāḥ satvā adhaḥsthā madhyavāsinaḥ |
nityaṃ vāṃñchaṃti sadgaṃgāṃ gacchaṃtu suranimnagām || 17 ||

eko gacchati gaṃgāṃ yaḥ pūyaṃte tasya pūruṣāḥ |
etadeva mahāpuṇyaṃ tarate tārayatyapi || 18 ||

gaṃgā kṛtsnaguṇaṃ vaktuṃ na śaktaścaturānanaḥ |
ataḥ kiṃcidvadāmyatra bhāgīrathyā dvijā guṇam || 19 ||

munayaḥ siddhagaṃdharvā ye cānye surasattamāḥ |
gaṃgātīre tapastaptvā svargaloke'cyutābhavan || 20 ||

divyena vapuṣā sarve kāmagena rathena ca |
adyāpi na nivartaṃte ratnapūrṇakṣayeṣu vai || 21 ||

prāsādā yatra sauvarṇāssarvalokordhvagāśśivāḥ |
iṣṭadravyaiḥ susaṃpūrṇāḥ striyo yatra manoramāḥ || 22 ||

pārijātaḥ samāḥ puṣpavṛkṣāḥ kalpadrumopamāḥ |
gaṃgātīre tapastaptvā tatraiśvaryaṃ labhaṃti hi || 23 ||

tapobhirbahubhiryajñairvratairnānāvidhaistathā |
purudānairgatiryā ca gaṃgāṃ saṃsevatāṃ ca sā || 24 ||

jārajaṃ patitaṃ duṣṭamaṃtyajaṃ gurughātinam |
sarvadroheṇa saṃyuktaṃ sarvapātakasaṃyutam || 25 ||

tyajaṃti pitaraṃ putrāḥ priyaṃ patnyaḥ suhṛdgaṇāḥ |
anye ca bāṃdhavāḥ sarve gaṃgā tu na parityajet || 26 ||

yathā mātā svayaṃ janmamalaśaucaṃ ca kārayet |
kroḍīkṛtya tathā teṣāṃ gaṃgā prakṣālayenmalam || 27 ||

bhavaṃti te suvikhyātā bhogyālaṃkārapūjitāḥ |
darśane kriyate gaṃgā sakṛdbhaktyā naraistu yaiḥ || 28 ||

teṣāṃ kulānāṃ lakṣaṃ tu bhavāttārayate śivā |
smṛtārti hartrī yairdhyātā saṃstutā sādhumoditā || 29 ||

gaṃgā tārayate nṝṇāmubhau vaṃśau bhavārṇavāt |
saṃkrāṃtiṣu vyatīpāte grahaṇe caṃdrasūryayoḥ || 30 ||

puṇye snātvā tu gaṃgāyāṃ kulakoṭiṃ samuddharet |
śuklapakṣe divāmartyā gaṃgāyāmuttarāyaṇe || 31 ||

dhanyā dehaṃ vimuṃcaṃti hṛdisthe ca janārdane |
anena vidhinā yastu bhāgīrathyā jale śubhe || 32 ||

prāṇāṃstyaktvā vrajetsvargaṃ punarāvṛttivarjitam |
yo gaṃgānugato nityaṃ sarvadevānugo hi saḥ || 33 ||

sarvadevamayo viṣṇurgaṃgā viṣṇumayī yataḥ |
gaṃgāyāṃ piṃḍadānena pitṝṇāṃ vai tilodakaiḥ || 34 ||

narakasthā divaṃ yāṃti svargasthā mokṣamāpnuyuḥ |
paradāraparadravya bādhā drohaparasya ca || 35 ||

gatirmanuṣyamātrasya gaṃgaiva paramā gatiḥ |
vedaśāstravihīnasya guruniṃdāparasya ca || 36 ||

samayācārahīnasya nāsti gaṃgāsamā gatiḥ |
kiṃ yajñairbahuvittāḍhyaiḥ kiṃ tapobhiḥ suduṣkaraiḥ || 37 ||

svargamokṣapradā gaṃgā sukhasaubhāgyapūjitā |
niyamaiḥ paramairnityaṃ kiṃ yogaiścittarodhakaiḥ || 38 ||

bhuktimuktipradā gaṃgā sukhamokṣāgrataḥ sthitā |
anekajanmasaṃghāta pāpaṃ puṃsāṃ vinaśyati || 39 ||

snānamātreṇa gaṃgāyāṃ sadyaḥ syātpuṇyabhāṅnaraḥ |
prabhāse gosahasrasya rāhugraste divākare || 40 ||

labhate yatphalaṃ dāne gaṃgāsnānāddinedine |
dṛṣṭvā tu harate pāpaṃ spṛṣṭvā tu labhate divam || 41 ||

prasaṃgādapi sā gaṃgā mokṣadā tvavagāhitā |
sarvendriyāṇāṃ cāpalyaṃ vāsanāśaktisaṃbhavam || 42 ||

nirghṛṇatvaṃ tato gaṃgā darśanātpravinaśyati |
paradravyābhikāṃkṣitvaṃ paradārābhilāṣitā || 43 ||

paradharme ruciścaiva darśanādeva naśyati |
yadṛcchālābha saṃtoṣassvadharmeṣu pravartate || 44 ||

sarvabhūtasamatvaṃ ca gaṅgāyāṃ majjanādbhavet |
yastu gaṃgāṃ samāśritya sukhaṃ tiṣṭhati mānavaḥ || 45 ||

jīvanmuktassa eveha sarveṣāmuttamottamaḥ |
gaṃgāṃ saṃśritya yastiṣṭhettasya kāryaṃ na vidyate || 46 ||

kṛtakṛtyassa vai mukto jīvanmuktaśca mānavaḥ |
yajño dānaṃ tapo japyaṃ śrāddhaṃ ca surapūjanam || 47 ||

gaṃgāyāṃ tu kṛtaṃ nityaṃ koṭikoṭi guṇaṃ bhavet |
anyasthāne kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ gaṃgātīre vinaśyati || 48 ||

gaṃgātīre kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ gaṃgāsnānena naśyati |
ātmano janmanakṣatre jāhnavīsaṃgate dine || 49 ||

naraḥ snātvā tu gaṃgāyāṃ svakulaṃ ca samuddharet |
ādareṇa yathā stauti dhanavaṃtaṃ sadā naraḥ || 50 ||

sakṛdgaṃgāṃ tathā stutvā bhavetsvargasya bhājanam |
aśraddhayāpi gaṃgāyāṃ yosau nāmānukīrtanaṃ || 51 ||

karoti puṇyavāhinyāssa vai svargasya bhājanam |
kṣitau bhāvayato martyānnāgāṃstārayatepyadhaḥ || 52 ||

divi tārayate devāngaṃgā tripathagā smṛtā |
jñānatojñānato vāpi kāmato'kāmatopi vā || 53 ||

gaṃgāyāṃ ca mṛto martyaḥ svargaṃ mokṣaṃ ca viṃdati |
yā gatiryogayuktasya satvasthasya manīṣiṇaḥ || 54 ||

sā gatistyajataḥ prāṇāngaṃgāyāṃ tu śarīriṇaḥ |
cāṃdrāyaṇasahasrāṇi yaścaretkāyaśodhanam || 55 ||

pānaṃ kuryādyathecchaṃ ca gaṃgāṃbhaḥ sa viśiṣyate |
tāvatprabhāvastīrthānāṃ devānāṃ tu viśeṣataḥ || 56 ||

tāvatprabhāvo vedānāṃ yāvannāpnoti jāhnavīm |
tisraḥ koṭyordhakoṭī ca tīrthānāṃ vāyurabravīt || 57 ||

divibhuvyantarikṣe ca tāni te santi jāhnavi |
viṣṇupādābjasaṃbhūte gaṃge tripathagāmini || 58 ||

dharmadraveti vikhyāte pāpaṃ me hara jāhnavi |
viṣṇupādaprasūtāsi vaiṣṇavī viṣṇupūjitā || 59 ||

trāhi māmenasastasmādājanmamaraṇāṃtikāt |
śraddhayā dharmasaṃpūrṇe śrīmatā rajasā ca te || 60 ||

amṛtena mahādevi bhāgīrathi punīhi māṃ |
tribhiḥ ślokavarairebhiryaḥ snāyājjāhnavī jale || 61 ||

janmakoṭikṛtātpāpānmucyate nātra saṃśayaḥ |
mūlamaṃtraṃ pravakṣyāmi jāhnavyā harabhāṣitam || 62 ||

sakṛjjapānnaraḥ pūto viṣṇudehe pratiṣṭhati |
maṃtraścāyaṃ |
oṃnamo gaṃgāyai viśvarūpiṇyai nārāyaṇyai namonamaḥ || 63 ||

jāhnavītīrasaṃbhūtāṃ mṛdaṃ mūrdhnā bibharti yaḥ |
sarvapāpavinirmukto gaṃgāsnānaṃ vinā naraḥ || 64 ||

gaṃgājalorminirdhūta pavanaṃ spṛśate yadi |
sa pūtaḥ kalmaṣādghorātsvargaṃ cākṣayamaśnute || 65 ||

yāvadasthi manuṣyasya gaṃgātoye pratiṣṭhati |
tāvadvarṣasahasrāṇi svargaloke mahīyate || 66 ||

pitrorbaṃdhujanānāṃ ca anāthānāṃ gurorapi |
gaṃgāyāmasthipātena naraḥ svargānna hīyate || 67 ||

gaṃgāṃ prativahedyastu pitṝṇāmasthikhaṃḍakam |
padepadeśvamedhasya phalaṃ prāpnoti mānavaḥ || 68 ||

dhanyā jānapadā ye ca paśavaḥ pakṣikīṭakāḥ |
sthāvarā jaṃgamāścānye gaṃgātīrasamāśritāḥ || 69 ||

krośāṃtara mṛtā ye ca jāhnavyā dvijasattamāḥ |
mānavā devatāssaṃti itare mānavā bhuvi || 70 ||

gaṃgāsnānāya saṃgacchanpathi saṃmriyate yadi |
sa ca svargamavāpnoti gaṃgāsnānaphalaṃ labhet || 71 ||

gaṃgājale prayāsyaṃti te jīvāḥ pathi ye mṛtāḥ |
kīṭāḥ paṃtaṃgāśśalabhāḥ pādāghātena gacchatāṃ || 72 ||

ye vadaṃti samuddeśaṃ gaṃgāṃ prati janaṃ dvijāḥ |
te ca yāṃti paraṃ puṇyaṃ gaṃgāsnānaphalaṃ narāḥ || 73 ||

jāhnavīṃ ye ca niṃdaṃti pāṣaṇḍairhatacetasaḥ |
te yāṃti narakaṃ ghoraṃ punarāvṛttidurlabham || 74 ||

dusthovāpi smarannityaṃ gaṃgeti parikīrtayan |
paṭhansvargamavāpnoti kimanyairbahubhāṣitaiḥ || 75 ||

gaṃgāgaṃgeti yo brūyādyojanānāṃ śatairapi |
mucyate sarvapāpebhyo viṣṇulokaṃ sa gacchati || 76 ||

aṃdhāśca paṃgavaste ca vṛthābhava samudbhavāḥ |
garbhapātādvipadyaṃte ye gaṃgāṃ na gatā narāḥ || 77 ||

na kīrtayaṃti ye gaṃgāṃ jaḍatulyā narādhamāḥ |
parānnopadiśaṃti sma vātūlāścittavibhramāḥ || 78 ||

na paṭhaṃti janā ye ca teṣāṃ śāstraṃ viniṣphalam |
gaṃgāpuṇyaphalaṃ viprāḥ kudhiyaḥ patitādhamāḥ || 79 ||

pāṭhayaṃti janā ye ca śraddhayā nipaṭhaṃti ca |
gacchaṃti te divaṃ dhīrāstārayaṃti pitṝngurūn || 80 ||

pātheyakaṃ gacchatāṃ yo vasu śaktyā prayacchati |
bhāgīrathyā labhetsnānaṃ yaḥ parānnena gacchati || 81 ||

kartuḥ snānaphalaṃ vidyāddviguṇaṃ prerakasya ca |
icchayānicchayā cāpi preraṇenānyasevayā || 82 ||

jāhnavīṃ yo gataḥ puṇyāṃ sa gacchennirjarālayam |
dvijā ūcuḥ |
gaṃgāyāḥ kīrtanaṃ vyāsa śrutaṃ tvatto vinirmalam || 83 ||

gaṃgā kasmātkimākārā kutaḥ sā hyatipāvanī |
vyāsa uvāca |
śṛṇudhvaṃ kathayāmyadya kathāṃ puṇyāṃ purātanīṃ || 84 ||

yāṃ śrutvā mokṣamārgaṃ ca prāpnoti narasattamaḥ |
brahmalokaṃ purā gatvā nārado munipuṃgavaḥ || 85 ||

natvā vidhiṃ ca papraccha pūtaṃ trailokyapāvanam |
kiṃ sṛṣṭaṃ ca tvayā tāta saṃmataṃ śaṃbhukṛṣṇayoḥ || 86 ||

sarvalokahitārthāya bhuvaḥsthāne samīhitam |
devī vā devatā kā vā sarvāsāmuttamottamā || 87 ||

yāṃ samāsādya devāśca daityamānuṣapannagāḥ |
aṃḍajāḥ svedajā vṛkṣā ye cānya udbhijjādayaḥ || 88 ||

sarve yāṃti śivaṃ brahmansamagraṃ vibhavaṃ dhruvam |
brahmovāca |
sṛjatā ca purā proktā māyā prakṛtirūpiṇī || 89 ||

ādyā bhava svalokānāṃ tvatto bhavaṃ sṛjāmyaham |
etacchrutvā parā sā ca saptadhā cābhavattadā || 90 ||

gāyatrīvākca svarlakṣmīssarvasasya vasupradā |
jñānavidyā umādevī śaktibījā tapasvinī || 91 ||

varṇikā dharmadravā ca etāssapta prakīrtitāḥ |
gāyatrīprabhavā vedā vedātsarvaṃ sthitaṃ jagat || 92 ||

svasti svāhā svadhā dīkṣā etā gāyatrijā smṛtāḥ |
uccārayetsadā yajñe gāyatrīṃ mātṛkādibhiḥ || 93 ||

kratau devāḥ svadhāṃ prāpya bhaveyurajarāmarāḥ |
tatassudhārasaṃ devā mumucurdharaṇītale || 94 ||

atha sasyavatī pṛthvī oṣadhīnāṃ parā śubhā |
phalamūlairasairbhakṣyairjanāḥ susthatarābhavan || 95 ||

bhāratī sarvalokānāṃ cānane mānase sthitā |
tathaiva sarvaśāstreṣu dharmoddeśaṃ karoti sā || 96 ||

vijñānaṃ kalahaṃ śokaṃ mohāmohaṃ śivāśivam |
tayā vinā jagatsarvaṃ yātyatattvamiti smṛtam || 97 ||

kamalāsaṃbhavaścaiva vastrabhūṣaṇasaṃcayaḥ |
sukhaṃ rājyaṃ triloke tu tataḥ sā harivallabhā || 98 ||

umayā hetunā śaṃbhorjñānaṃ lokeṣu saṃtatam |
jñānamātā ca sā jñeyā śaṃbhorardhāṅgavāsinī || 99 ||

varṇikāśaktiratyugrā sarvalokapramohinī |
sarvalokeṣu lokānāṃ sthitisaṃhārakāriṇī || 100 ||

devyā ca nihatau pūrvamasurau madhukaiṭabhau |
ruruścāpi hato ghoraḥ sarvalokapariśrutaḥ || 101 ||

sarvadevaikajetāraṃ sā jaghne mahiṣāsuram |
nihatā līlayā devyā ye'surā daityapuṃgavāḥ || 102 ||

evaṃ balāni daityānāṃ nihatya sarvadā tayā |
pālitaṃ moditaṃ caiva kṛtsnametajjagattrayam || 103 ||

dharmadravasvarūpā ca sarvadharmapratiṣṭhitā |
mahatīṃ tāṃ samālokya mayā kamaṃḍalau dhṛtā || 104 ||

viṣṇupādābjasambhūtā śaṃbhunā śirasā dhṛtā |
asmābhiśca tribhiryuktā brahmaviṣṇumaheśvaraiḥ || 105 ||

dharmadravā parikhyātā jalarūpā kamaṃḍalau |
baliyajñeṣu saṃbhūtā viṣṇunā prabhaviṣṇunā || 106 ||

chadmanā chalitaḥ pūrvaṃ balirbalavatāṃ varaḥ |
tataḥ pādadvayenaiva krāṃtaṃ sarvaṃ mahītalam || 107 ||

nabhaḥ pādaśca brahmāṇḍaṃ bhitvā mama puraḥ sthitaḥ |
mayā saṃpūjitaḥ pādaḥ kamaṇḍalujalena vai || 108 ||

prakṣālyaivārcitātpādāddhemakūṭe'patajjalam |
tatkūṭācchaṃkaraṃ prāpya bhramate sā jaṭāsthitā || 109 ||

tato bhagīrathenaiva samārādhya śivaṃ bhuvi |
ānīyārādhito nityaṃ tapasā gajapuṃgavaḥ || 110 ||

tena bhitvā nagaṃ vīryāttribhirdaṃtaiḥ kṛtaṃ bilam |
tatastribilagā yasmāttrisrotā lokaviśrutā || 111 ||

haribrahmaharayogātpūtā lokasya pāvanī |
samāsādya ca tāṃ devīṃ sarvadharmaphalaṃ labhet || 112 ||

pāṭhayajñaparaiḥ sarvairmaṃtra homa surārcanaiḥ |
sā gatirna bhavejjaṃtorgaṃgā saṃsevayā ca yā || 113 ||

dharmasya sādhanopāyo hyataḥ paro na vidyate |
trailokyapuṇyasaṃyogāttasmāttāṃ vraja nārada || 114 ||

gaṃgātoyāsthisaṃyogātsutāste sagarasya ca |
svargatāḥ pitṛbhiścaiva svapūrvāparajaiḥ saha || 115 ||

tato brahmamukhācchrutvā nārado munipuṃgavaḥ |
gaṃgādvāre tapaḥ kṛtvā brahmaṇā sadṛśobhavat || 116 ||

sarvatra sulabhā gaṃgā triṣusthāneṣu durlabhā |
gaṃgādvāre prayāge ca gaṃgāsāgarasaṃgame || 117 ||

trirātreṇaikarātreṇa naro yāti parāṃ gatim |
tasmātsarvaprayatnena sadyo muktiṃ viciṃtayet || 118 ||

tato gacchata dharmajñāḥ śivāṃ bhāgīrathīmiha |
acireṇaiva kālena svargaṃ mokṣaṃ pragacchatha || 119 ||

viśeṣātkalikāle ca gaṃgā mokṣapradā nṛṇāṃ |
kṛcchrācca kṣīṇasatvānāmanaṃtaḥ puṇyasaṃbhavaḥ || 120 ||

tataste brāhmaṇā hṛṣṭāḥ śrutvā vyāsādgiraṃ śubhām |
gaṃgāyāṃ tu tapastaptvā mokṣamārgaṃ yayustadā || 121 ||

ya idaṃ śṛṇuyānmartyaḥ puṇyākhyānamanuttamam |
sarvaṃ tarati duḥkhaugha gaṃgāsnānaphalaṃ labhet || 122 ||

sakṛduccārite caiva sarvayajñaphalaṃ labhet |
dānaṃ japyaṃ tathā dhyānaṃ stotraṃ maṃtraṃ surārcanam || 123 ||

tatraiva kārayedyastu sa cānaṃtaphalaṃ labhet |
tasmāttatraiva karttavyaṃ japahomādikaṃ naraiḥ || 124 ||
anaṃtaṃ ca phalaṃ proktaṃ janmajanmasu labhyate || 125 ||

iti śrīpādmapurāṇe prathame sṛṣṭikhaṃḍe gaṃgāmāhātmyaṃnāma |
dviṣaṣṭitamo'dhyāyaḥ || 62 ||

pulastya uvāca |
etasminnaṃtare pūrvaṃ vyāsaśiṣyo mahāmuniḥ |
namaskṛtya guruṃ bhīṣma saṃjayaḥ paripṛcchati || 1 ||

devānāṃ pūjanopāyaṃ kramaṃ brūhi suniścitam |
agre pūjyatamaḥ kosau ko madhyo nityapūjane || 2 ||

aṃte ca pūjā kasyaiva kasya ko vā prabhāvakaḥ |
kiṃvā kaṃ ca phalaṃ brahmanpūjayitvā labhennaraḥ || 3 ||

vyāsa uvāca |
gaṇeśaṃ pūjayedagre tvavighnārthaṃ pare tviha |
vināyakatvamāpnoti yathā gaurīsuto hi saḥ || 4 ||

pārvatyajanayatpūrvaṃ sutau maheśvarādimau |
sarvalokadharau śūrau devau skaṃdagaṇādhipau || 5 ||

tau ca dṛṣṭvā nagasutā sidhyarthaṃ paryabhāṣata |
idaṃ tu modakaṃ putrau devairdattaṃ mudānvitaiḥ || 6 ||

mahābuddhīti vikhyātaṃ sudhayā parinirmitam |
guṇaṃ cāsya pravakṣyāmi śṛṇutaṃ tu samāhitau || 7 ||

asyaivāghrāṇamātreṇa amaratvaṃ labheddhruvam |
sarvaśāstrārthatattvajñaḥ sarvaśastrāstrakovidaḥ || 8 ||

nipuṇaḥ sarvataṃtreṣu lekhakaścitrakṛtsudhīḥ |
jñānavijñānatattvajñaḥ sarvajño nātra saṃśayaḥ || 9 ||

putrau dharmādadhikatāṃ prāpya siddhiśataṃ vrajet |
yastasya vai pradāsyāmi pituste saṃmataṃ tvidam || 10 ||

śrutvā mātṛmukhādevaṃ vacaḥ paramakovidaḥ |
skaṃdastīrthaṃ yayau sadyaḥ sarvaṃ tribhuvanasthitaṃ || 11 ||

barhiṇaṃ svaṃ samāruhya tvabhiṣekaḥ kṛtaḥ kṣaṇāt |
pitarau pradakṣiṇaṃ kṛtvā laṃbodaradharassudhīḥ || 12 ||

tata eva mudāyuktaḥ pitrorevāgrata sthitaḥ |
purataśca tathā skaṃdo me dehīti bruvansthitaḥ || 13 ||

tatastu tau samīkṣyātha pārvatī vismitābravīt |
sarvatīrthābhiṣekaistu sarvadevairna taistathā || 14 ||

sarvayajñavratairmaṃtrairyogairanyairyamaistathā |
pitrorarcākṛtaḥ kopi kalāṃ nārhati ṣoḍaśīm || 15 ||

tasmātsutaśatādeṣo'dhikaḥ śataguṇairapi |
ato dadāmi herambe modakaṃ devanirmitam || 16 ||

asyaiva kāraṇādasya agre pūjā makheṣu ca |
vedaśāstrastavādau ca nityaṃ pūjāvidhāsu ca || 17 ||

pārvatyā saha bhūteśo dadau tasmai varaṃ mahat |
asyaiva pūjanādagre devāstuṣṭā bhavaṃtu ca || 18 ||

sarvāsāmapi devīnāṃ pitṝṇāṃ ca samaṃtataḥ |
tapo bhavatu nityaṃ ca pūjite'gre gaṇeśvare || 19 ||

tataḥ sarveṣu yajñeṣu pūjayedgaṇapaṃ dvijaḥ |
koṭikoṭiguṇaṃ teṣu devadevī vaco yathā || 20 ||

datvā sarvaguṇaṃ puṇyaṃ devadevyā tathā mudā |
kṛtaṃ gaṇādhipatyaṃ ca sarvadevāgratastadā || 21 ||

tasmātprājyeṣu yajñeṣu stotreṣu nityapūjane |
gaṇeśaṃ pūjayitvā tu sarvasiddhiṃ labhennaraḥ || 22 ||

evaṃ jñātvā tu devaistu dayitaprāpti kāmyayā |
pūjitaścāthasarvaistu svargamokṣārthato dhruvam || 23 ||

naktāhāraścaturthyāṃ tu pūjayitvā gaṇādhipaṃ |
liṃge vā pratimā citre devaḥ pūjyo bhavedyadi || 24 ||

gaṇādhipa namastubhyaṃ sarvavighnapraśāṃtida |
umānaṃdaprada prājña trāhi māṃ bhavasāgarāt || 25 ||

harānaṃdakaradhyāna jñānavijñānada prabho |
vighnarāja namastubhyaṃ prasanno bhava sarvadā || 26 ||

kṛtopavāso gaṇapaṃ pūjayedyo naro mudā |
sarvapāpavinirmuktaḥ suraloke mahīyate || 27 ||

stotraṃ tasya pravakṣyāmi nāmadvādaśakaṃ śubhaṃ |
oṃnamo gaṇapataye maṃtra eṣa udāhṛtaḥ || 28 ||

gaṇapatirvighnarājo laṃbatuṃḍo gajānanaḥ |
dvaimāturaśca heramba ekadaṃto gaṇādhipaḥ || 29 ||

vināyakaścārukarṇaḥ paśupālo bhavātmajaḥ |
dvādaśaitāni nāmāni prātarutthāya yaḥ paṭhet || 30 ||

viśvaṃ tasya bhavedvaśyaṃ na ca vighnaṃ bhavetkvacit |
mahāpretāśśamaṃ yāṃti pīḍyate vyādhibhirna ca |
sarvapāpādvinirmukto hyakṣayaṃ svargamaśnute || 31 ||

iti śrīpādmapurāṇe prathame sṛṣṭikhaṃḍe gaṇapatistotraṃ nāma |
triṣaṣṭitamo'dhyāyaḥ || 63 ||

vyāsa uvāca |
punaranyatpravakṣyāmi stotraṃ gaṇādhipasya ca |
sarvasiddhikaraṃ pūtaṃ sarvābhīṣṭaphalapradaṃ || 1 ||

ekadaṃtaṃ mahākāyaṃ taptakāṃcanasannibham |
laṃbodaraṃ viśālākṣaṃ vaṃdehaṃ gaṇanāyakaṃ || 2 ||

muṃjakṛṣṇājinadharaṃ nāgayajñopavītakam |
bāleṃdukalikāmauliṃ vaṃdehaṃ gaṇanāyakaṃ || 3 ||

sarvavighnaharaṃ devaṃ sarvavighnavivarjitam |
mūṣakottamamāruhya devāsuramahāhave || 4 ||

yoddhukāmaṃ mahābāhuṃ vaṃdehaṃ gaṇanāyakam |
aṃbikāhṛdayānaṃdaṃ mātṛkāpariveṣṭitam || 5 ||

bhaktipriyaṃ madonmattaṃ vaṃdehaṃ gaṇanāyakam |
citraratnavicitrāṃgaṃ citramālāvibhūṣaṇam || 6 ||

kāmarūpadharaṃ devaṃ vaṃdehaṃ gaṇanāyakam |
gajavaktraṃ suraśreṣṭhaṃ cārukarṇavibhūṣitam || 7 ||

pāśāṃkuśadharaṃ devaṃ vaṃdehaṃ gaṇanāyakam |
yakṣakinnaragaṃdharvaiḥ siddhavidyādharaissadā || 8 ||

stūyamānaṃ mahādehaṃ vaṃdehaṃ gaṇanāyakam |
gaṇāṣṭakamidaṃ puṇyaṃ bhaktito yaḥ paṭhennaraḥ || 9 ||

sarvasiddhimavāpnoti rudraloke mahīyate |
na niḥsvatāṃ tathābhyeti saptajanmasu mānavaḥ || 10 ||

ya idaṃ paṭhate nityaṃ mahārājo bhavennaraḥ |
vaśyaṃ karoti trailokyaṃ paṭhanācchravaṇādapi |
stotraṃ paraṃ mahāpuṇyaṃ gaṇapasya mahātmanaḥ || 11 ||

iti śrīpādmapurāṇe prathame sṛṣṭikhaṃḍe gaṇapatistotraṃ nāma |
catuṣṣaṣṭitamo'dhyāyaḥ || 64 ||

vyāsa uvāca |
nāṃdīmukheṣu sarveṣu pūjayedyo gaṇādhipam |
tasya sarvo bhavedvaśyaḥ puṇyaṃ bhavati cākṣayam || 1 ||

gaṇānāṃ tveti maṃtreṇa sarvayajñaghaṭeṣu ca |
sarvasiddhimavāpnoti svargaṃ mokṣaṃ labhennaraḥ || 2 ||

mṛṇmaye pratimāyāṃ ca citre cātha dṛṣaṇmaye |
dvāradāruṇi pātre ca heraṃbaṃ lekhayedbudhaḥ || 3 ||

anyasminnapi deśe tu satataṃ dṛṣṭigocare |
sthāpayitvā tu heraṃbaṃ śaktyā yaḥ pūjayedbudhaḥ || 4 ||

tasya kāryāṇi siddhyaṃti dayitāni samaṃtataḥ |
na vighnaṃ jāyate kiṃcittrailokyaṃ vaśamānayet || 5 ||

vidyārthī labhate vidyāṃ vedaśāstrasamudbhavām |
anyāṃ ca śilpividyāṃ ca vijayāṃ svargadāyinīm || 6 ||

dhanārthī vipulaṃ vittaṃ kanyāṃ sādhvīṃ manoramām |
aiśvaryaṃ dharmasādhyaṃ ca tanayaṃ kulamokṣadam || 7 ||

na rogaiḥ pīḍyate kaścinna grahaiḥ pretayonibhiḥ |
śṛṃgibhirnāpi rakṣobhirvidyudbhirvanataskaraiḥ || 8 ||

na rājā kupyati gṛhe na ca mārī pravartate |
na daurbhikṣyaṃ na daurbalyaṃ pūjayitvā vināyakam || 9 ||

abhipretārthasiddhyarthaṃ pūjito yaḥ surairapi |
sarvavighnachide tasmai gaṇādhipataye namaḥ || 10 ||

maṃtraścāyaṃ oṃ namo gaṇapataye |
nārāyaṇapriyaiḥ puṣpairanyaiścāpi sugaṃdhibhiḥ |
modakaiḥ phalamūlaiśca dravyaiḥ kālodbhavaistathā || 11 ||

dadhidugdhaiḥ priyairvādyairapi dhūpasugaṃdhibhiḥ |
pūjayedgaṇapaṃ yastu sarvasiddhimavāpnuyāt || 12 ||

viśeṣāttasya liṃge tu yo dadāti vasupriyam |
pūjopakaraṇaṃ vastraṃ sarvaṃ lakṣaguṇaṃ bhavet || 13 ||

deśe ca bhārate varṣe vanitā pūrvasannidhau |
lauhityadakṣiṇe tīre liṃgarūpo vināyakaḥ || 14 ||

haragaurīsamādeśāddevānāṃ saṃmatena ca |
sthito lokapraśāṃtyarthaṃ sarvavighnavināśanāt || 15 ||

pūjayitvā tu taṃ devaṃ śaktito dravyasaṃcayaiḥ |
vināyakatvamāpnoti vedaśāstrārthapāragaḥ || 16 ||

sakṛtpradakṣiṇaṃ kṛtvā dṛṣṭvā spṛṣṭvā tu mānavaḥ |
akṣayaṃ labhate svargaṃ sadā devaiḥ prapūjyate || 17 ||

saṃsargiṇāṃ ca mlechānāṃ gatyarthaṃ sutapasvinām |
putrārthaṃ sarvalokānāṃ tatra śaṃbhurvināyakaḥ || 18 ||

kṛtvābhiṣekaṃ lauhitye spṛśedyastu gaṇādhipam |
saptajanmakṛtātpāpānmucyate nātra saṃśayaḥ || 19 ||

na vaidhavyaṃ na kārpaṇyaṃ na śokaṃ na tu matsaram |
vināyakaṃ samāsādya janmajanmani saṃlabhet || 20 ||

punaḥ siddhiḥ punarbhogyaṃ punaḥ kīrtiḥ punarbalam |
pūjayitvā tu gaṇapaṃ narasya nātra saṃśayaḥ || 21 ||

asya pūjāmakṛtvā ca sarvābhīṣṭaṃ vinaśyati |
tatra devāśca suprītā brahmaviṣṇuharādayaḥ || 22 ||

maghono gaṇapasyātha pūjāvirahitasya ca |
athāsurairmahāvīryairhiraṇyākṣamukhai raṇe || 23 ||

maghavā tu jito vīryāddhiraṇyākṣeṇa vai tadā |
tatassurāśca nirvīryā yāvadvarṣaśataṃ purā || 24 ||

daivāsure mahāyuddhe surāṇāṃ ca parājayaḥ |
tato devādhideve tu śive devairniveditam || 25 ||

bhagavannasurairno hi jitaṃ rājyaṃ gatā makhāḥ |
etasminnaṃtare śaṃbhurdevānvacanamabravīt || 26 ||

heraṃbāya varo datta umayā prītayā mayā |
pūjayā te parā siddhirdevādīnāṃ bhavatviti || 27 ||

avajānāti yo mohātpuruṣastu mahotsave |
na bhavettasya siddhiśca raṇe cāpi parājayaḥ || 28 ||

mahāmakhena yuṣmābhiḥ pūjā gaṇapateḥ kṛtā |
helayā na kṛtā mohāttasmātprāptaḥ parājayaḥ || 29 ||

śīghraṃ gacchata vai puṇyāṃ gaṇapasya mahātmanaḥ |
pūjāṃ kuruta dharmajñā jayastūrṇaṃ bhaviṣyati || 30 ||

tato haramukhācchrutvā vacaḥ kṣemaparaṃ hitam |
prahṛṣṭā vibudhāssarve gaṇapasya puraḥ sthitāḥ || 31 ||

devā ūcuḥ |
gaṇādhipa namastubhyaṃ sarvadevaikapālaka |
svargabhogaprada prītyā heraṃba tvāṃ natāḥ sma ha || 32 ||

jayadaṃ sarvayuddheṣu siddhidaṃ sarvakarmasu |
mahāmāyaṃ mahākāyaṃ heraṃba tvāṃ natāḥ sma ha || 33 ||

ekadaṃtaṃ mahāprājñaṃ laṃbatuṃḍaṃ vināyakam |
devaṃ maharṣidevānāṃmiṃdrasya ca natāḥ sma ha || 34 ||

yatte purārcanaṃ yajñe na kṛtaṃ tatkṣamasva naḥ |
surāṇāṃ ca giraḥ śrutvā gaṇapo vākyamabravīt || 35 ||

yuṣmābhirvriyatāṃ devā varo matto hi vāṃcchitaḥ |
tataḥ śakrādayaḥ sarve bṛhaspatipurogamāḥ || 36 ||

ūcurgaṇapatiṃ devā jayosmākaṃ bhavatviti |
devānāṃ vacanaṃ śrutvā gaṇeśo vākyamabravīt || 37 ||

bāḍhameva suraśreṣṭhā jayo vo bhavatu drutam |
tato devagaṇāssarve harṣanirbharamānasāḥ || 38 ||

gaṇeśaṃ pūjayāmāsurgaṃdhasāraistu maṇḍanaiḥ |
divyadhūpaiḥ suvastraiśca kusumairnandanodbhavaiḥ || 39 ||

pārijātādibhiḥ puṣpairanyairdevamanoharaiḥ |
pūjito gaṇapo devairuvāca surasattamān || 40 ||

gacchadhvaṃ vibudhā devaṃ viṣṇumadbhutasāhasam |
sa vidhāsyati vaḥ kāmaṃ vāṃcchitaṃ ca tataḥ surāḥ || 41 ||

svaṃsvaṃ rathaṃ samāruhya gatāste harimavyayam |
pītāṃbaraṃ namaskṛtya ūcurdevagaṇā mudā || 42 ||

harātmajaṃ tu saṃprāpya pūjayitvā gaṇādhipam |
āgatāstvatsakāśaṃ vai mahātmannadya keśava || 43 ||

etacchrutvā tu devānāṃ vacanaṃ hariravyayaḥ |
yathātathyamuvācedaṃ haniṣye daityapuṃgavān || 44 ||

śrutvā vāgamṛtaṃ devā nārāyaṇamukhāccyutam |
hṛṣṭāśca sumudāviṣṭā dravyairiṣṭaiḥ samarcayan || 45 ||

punarviṣṇuruvācedaṃ devāniṃdrapurogamān |
svaṃsvaṃ balaṃ samāhṛtya sajjī bhavata vijvarāḥ || 46 ||

hariṣye tāndurācārānbalaṃ caiva samaṃtataḥ |
astravṛṃdaṃ tu saṃgṛhya yūyaṃ tiṣṭhata nirbhayāḥ || 47 ||

mādhavasya vacaḥ śrutvā pragatāḥ surapuṃgavāḥ |
vimānāni samāruhya sarve divyāstradhāriṇaḥ || 48 ||

devānāṃ harṣavākyāni daityacāraiḥ śrutāni vai |
rājānaṃ kathayāmāsurhiraṇyākṣaṃ mahābalam || 49 ||

śrutvā daityapatistatra cukopāti mahābalaḥ |
sacivāṃstu samāhūya kruddho vacanamabravīt || 50 ||

adhuneṃdrādidevāśca nikhilāḥ krūrabuddhayaḥ |
mādhavaṃ ca parīpsantaḥ śaṃbhau sarvaṃ nyavedayan || 51 ||

kathaṃ jayaṃ ca lapsyāmo daityavṛṃdetidāruṇe |
tripurāriruvācedaṃ gaṇeśaṃ yajatāmarāḥ || 52 ||

pūjayitvā tu taṃ devaṃ jeṣyathāsuradānavān |
tato devagaṇairhṛṣṭaiḥ pūjito gaṇanāyakaḥ || 53 ||

gaṇādhipena tuṣṭena krūro datto varo mahān |
jeṣyathādyāsurānsarvāṃstato devā mudānvitāḥ || 54 ||

hariṃ nivedayāmāsurasmadvadhaparīpsavaḥ |
harerbāḍhamupaśrutya rathinaḥ śastrapāṇayaḥ || 55 ||

yuddhārthamadhitiṣṭhaṃti nirjarāstvabhayāmayi |
yasya yā śaktirastīha devāñjetuṃ vadatvalam || 56 ||

tato rājñovacaḥ śrutvā madhurvacanamabravīt |
jeṣyāmi ca hariṃ rājansahāyaṃ me niyojaya || 57 ||

jite nārāyaṇe devāḥ sabhayāstridaśā dhruvam |
tasmānnārāyaṇo'smākaṃ bhāgaḥ sarvapuraṃjayaḥ || 58 ||

tato dhuṃdhuśca suṃdaśca kālakeyo mahābalaḥ |
sahāyaśca madhostasya jeṣyāmo mādhavaṃ nṛpa || 59 ||

sarvadaityabale mukhyāścatvāro dṛḍhavikramāḥ |
kālamṛtyusamā vīrāḥ sarvāstravidhipāragāḥ || 60 ||

balastatrābravīdvākyaṃ yasminjaya upasthitaḥ |
taṃ ca jeṣyāmi jiṣṇuṃ ca pratijñā me dṛḍhā nṛpa || 61 ||

namuciśca muciścaiva bhrātarau baladarpitau |
ūcatustau nṛpaṃ hyāvāṃ jeṣyāvo vai balādbalau || 62 ||

jambhaścaivābravīdvākyamiṃdramiṃdrapurogamān |
jeṣyāmi nātra saṃdeho daityā bhavata vijvarāḥ || 63 ||

tripuraścābravīdvākyaṃ jeṣyāmi ca vināyakam |
tāvadūce'tha senānīrmayo devāṃtako balī || 64 ||

kuberaṃ pratirakṣobhiḥ sarvāṃścaiva hiraṇyakān |
etasminnaṃtare tatra nārado munisattamaḥ || 65 ||

gatvovāca hiraṇyākṣaṃ jiṣṇudūtohamāgataḥ |
rājyaṃ tyaja svavācā naḥ prāṇeṣu yadi te hitam || 66 ||

na cedyudhyasva māmadya na vā gaccha rasātalam |
tataḥ kopāduvācedaṃ nāradaṃ munisattamam || 67 ||

ahiṃsyastvaṃ brāhmāṇādya gaccha tūrṇaṃ mamāgrataḥ |
devānāṃ ca vipattiṃ ca kadanaṃ nidhanaṃ puraḥ || 68 ||

paśya vipra kṣaṇenāṃtaṃ prāptaṃ hariharādikam |
evamuktvā sa daityeṃdro balādhyakṣamuvāca ha || 69 ||

sajjīkṛtya balaṃ sarvānrathāṃścānayata drutam |
daityarājavacaḥ śrutvā balādhyakṣaḥ samaṃtataḥ || 70 ||

balānyāhūya sahasā saṃtrastāstūrṇamāgatāḥ |
koṭikoṭisahasrāṇi akṣauhiṇyo balāni ca || 71 ||

ekaikasya ca vīrasya vāhanāni mahāṃti ca |
syaṃdanāni vicitrāṇi gajoṣṭrāśvakharānapi || 72 ||

siṃhavyāghralulāyāṃśca samāruhya yayustadā |
vādyaiḥ sarvaiśca bhūyiṣṭhaiḥ siṃhanādairbhayānakaiḥ || 73 ||

diśastu pūrayāmāsussindhuvelācalā dharāḥ |
sarvalokāśca vitresuḥ samudrāśca cakaṃpire || 74 ||

devaduṃdubhayo neduḥ sarvadevaiḥ samīritāḥ |
vādyaiśca vividhairanyairvāyupūrṇairghanasvanaiḥ || 75 ||

sarvalokābhayatrastā ye ca trailokyavāsinaḥ |
bhraṣṭakāmāgatākāśaṃ ghoraṃ tīvraṃ mahāhavam || 76 ||

parighaiḥ pāśaśūlaiśca khaḍgayaṣṭiparaśvadhaiḥ |
śaraiśca niśitairghorairjaghnuranyonyamāhave || 77 ||

śastrāstrairbahudhāmuktairdiśaḥ sarvā niraṃtaram |
vigṛheṣu dharaṇyāṃ ca parvateṣu jaleṣu ca || 78 ||

devasthāne tathākāśe parvatāgreṣu sānuṣu |
gahvareṣu mahāraṇye tayoryuddhamavartata || 79 ||

puṣkalādi ghanānāṃ ca varṣadhārā jalaṃ yathā |
pataṃtyastrāṇi sainyeṣu śataśotha sahasraśaḥ || 80 ||

kecitpetuḥ pṛthivyāṃ tu śaraiḥ saṃbhinnavigrahāḥ |
śaktibhirmusalaiścānye chatraśūlaparaśvadhaiḥ || 81 ||

patitāḥ saṃmukhe śūrā yuddheṣu nyāyavartinaḥ |
gacchaṃti surasadmāni svāmyarthe ye tvabhīravaḥ || 82 ||

ye cānye kātarāḥ pāpā haṃtāro vimukhānraṇe |
anyāyairye ca yoddhāraste yānti yamamaṃdiraṃ || 83 ||

tridivasthā gajārohāḥ saindhavasthāstathāparān |
rathasthāṃśca rathārohāḥ padagāṃśca padātayaḥ || 84 ||

parasparaṃ vinighnaṃti śūrā yuddhābhikāṃkṣiṇaḥ |
muditāḥ satvasaṃpannā dharmiṣṭhā balasaṃvṛtāḥ || 85 ||

keṣāṃcidvāhavaśchinnā musalairbhinnamastakāḥ |
keśāśśirāṃsi vastrāṇi nipeturdharaṇītale || 86 ||

madhyacchinnāstathā bhinnāḥ petururvyāṃ mahābalāḥ |
khaḍgapātaistathā cograiśchrinnabhinnāḥ paraśvadhaiḥ || 87 ||

gāmeva patitā dhīrā divyālaṃkārabhūṣitāḥ |
pradīptobhūddharādeśo vīrairnāgairhayai rathaiḥ || 88 ||

vividhābharaṇairnaṣṭaiḥ patākābhiśca ketubhiḥ |
tato vasuṃdharā sarvā saśailavanakānanā || 89 ||

rudhiraughaplutā tatra vibudhāsurayoryudhi |
kravyādairbahubhistatra khādito dravyasaṃcayaḥ || 90 ||

lohitaṃ pracuraṃ pītaṃ rakṣobhiśca vṛkādibhiḥ |
anyairmahāgaṇaireva kṣatajaṃ pavanānvitam || 91 ||

khāditaṃ prītimadbhiśca pherugṛdhragaṇairmudā |
etasminnaṃtare sūriḥ surapūjyo bṛhaspatiḥ || 92 ||

mṛtasaṃjīvanīvidyāṃ surāṇāṃ saṃjajāpa ha |
viśalyakaraṇīṃ divyāṃ brahmavidyāṃ mahābalāṃ || 93 ||

tato dhanvaṃtarirvidvānsuravaidyo manojavaḥ |
auṣadhaistatprayogaiśca raṇe paryaṭate mudā || 94 ||

tatra devāśca jīvaṃti ye mṛtāśca mahāhave |
avraṇā balasaṃpannāḥ prayudhyaṃti bhṛśaṃ punaḥ || 95 ||

evaṃ śatasahasraṃ tu gaṇaṃ daityasya coddhatam |
patitaṃ puṇyayogācca śarairnirbhinnakaṃdharam || 96 ||

tatastu jayaśabdena naṃdaṃti siddhacāraṇāḥ |
ṛṣayaḥ khecarāścānye ye caivāpsarasāṃ gaṇāḥ || 97 ||

gītiṃ gāyaṃti gaṃdharvāḥ śaśaṃsuḥ paramarṣayaḥ |
atha kruddho mahātejā daityamukhyo mahābalaḥ || 98 ||

kālakeya iti khyātaḥ senānīrdaityapasya ca |
syandanastho mahāvīryo dhanurādāya tatra ca || 99 ||

jaghāna surasaṃghāṃstānnartayāmāsa bhūtale |
niraṃtaraśaraugheṇa cchāditaṃ gaganaṃ tadā || 100 ||

nipataṃti śarāḥ sainye koṭikoṭi sahasraśaḥ |
nipataṃti tato devāḥ saṃyugeṣvanivartinaḥ || 101 ||

rudhirodgāriṇassarve siddhagaṃdharvakinnarāḥ |
viśikhaiḥ pīḍitā devā nipeturdharaṇītale || 102 ||

keciccharaśatairbhinnāssahasrairayutaistathā |
petururvyāṃ mahāvīryā ye raṇe surapuṃgavāḥ || 103 ||

vyathitāścābhavansarve syaṃdanasthā divaukasaḥ |
śaraiḥ pravyathitāste tu sthātuṃ śaktā na saṃmukhe || 104 ||

tenāvagāhitaṃ sainyaṃ gajeneva sarovanam |
śaraistasyārditā devā vajrānalasamaprabhaiḥ || 105 ||

na śekuḥ samare sthātuṃ maghavaṃtaṃ yayustadā |
citraratha iti khyāto devaśśastrabhṛtāṃ varaḥ || 106 ||

yayau syaṃdanamāruhya yuddhaṃ prati dhanurdharaḥ |
abravīdvacanaṃ sopi senānyaṃ tu mahāsuram || 107 ||

yathā haṃsi mahāśūra surasenāṃ mudānvitaḥ |
sa tvaṃ praśaṃsanīyaśca śūrosi surasaṃmataḥ || 108 ||

hiraṇyākṣapriyaṃ karma kṛtaṃ yuddhe tvayādhunā |
idānīṃ mama bāṇaiśca gacchasva yamamaṃdiram || 109 ||

tataśca kālakeyastu smito vacanamabravīt |
puraiva vijito deva gaṇaḥ sarvaḥ pralīlayā || 110 ||

idānīṃ tu sthitaṃ yuddhe balaṃ sarvaṃ tu helayā |
yadi te nidhane prītirastīha surapuṃgava || 111 ||

ebhistvāṃ niśitairbāṇairnayāmi yamamaṃdiram |
ityuktvā paramakruddho bāṇamaṃtakasannibham || 112 ||

jaghāna samare vīrastribhiściccheda soṃbare |
punarbāṇāṃśca samare yojayitvā drutaṃ ruṣā || 113 ||

jaghāna pracurāndaityāṃstāṃścakartta sa lāghavāt |
tatonyonyaṃ śaraistīkṣṇaiḥ kālānalasamaprabhaiḥ || 114 ||

yuddhe dhanuṣmatāṃ śreṣṭhaściccheda bhuvi vegataḥ |
tadyuddhamabhavaddevadaityayordharmato bhṛśam || 115 ||

draṣṭukāmāgatāḥ pārśvamṛṣi devāḥ suroragāḥ |
evaṃ śatasahasrāṇi bāṇānāṃ vidhṛtāni ca || 116 ||

anyonyaṃ samare vīrau vijayāya virejatuḥ |
atha kruddho mahātejā gaṃdharvāṇāṃ patistadā || 117 ||

tribhirbibheda bāṇaiśca lalāṭe hṛdi paṃcabhiḥ |
saptabhirjaṭhare nābhau bastau tasya sa paṃcabhiḥ || 118 ||

śaraiḥ saṃpātito daityo mugdhaḥ kaśmalatāṃ gataḥ |
śithilīkṛtacāpaśca lebhe saṃjñāṃ cirādbalī || 119 ||

madhusaṃjñaṃ tribhirbāṇaissa bibheda surottamam |
cakartta dhanurastraiśca daityarājasya paśyataḥ || 120 ||

tato bāṇasahasraistu kālāṃtakasamaprabhaiḥ |
bibheda daityasiṃhaṃ tu surāṇāmuttamo balī || 121 ||

hatacetāḥ sa daityeṃdro bahuśoṇitasaṃsravaḥ |
vihvalo bahubāṇārtaḥ śūlaṃ jagrāha dānavaḥ || 122 ||

śūlahastasya tasyaiva caturbhisturagānśaraiḥ |
hatvā ca pātayāmāsa tribhiryaṃtārameva ca || 123 ||

jaghāna śūlamurvīṣṭhastato gaṃdharvasattamam |
vicakartta tribhirbāṇaiḥ śūlaṃ citraratho balī || 124 ||

śūlaṃ ca naṣṭakaṃ dṛṣṭvā hatabhogamivoragam |
gṛhītvā mudgaraṃ ghoraṃ pradudrāva suraṃ balī || 125 ||

sa mudgaraṃ samāyātaṃ daityasenādhipaṃ tadā |
vicakartta śiro dehādardhacaṃdreṇa saṃbhramāt || 126 ||

sa papāta mahīpṛṣṭhe saṃcacāla vasuṃdharā |
tato daityagaṇāḥ sarve vimukhā vipradudruvuḥ || 127 ||

iti śrīpādmapurāṇe prathame sṛṣṭikhaṃḍe kālakeyavadhonāma |
paṃcaṣaṣṭitamo'dhyāyaḥ || 65 ||

vyāsa uvāca |
bhrātaraṃ nihataṃ dṛṣṭvā kāleyo nāma dānavaḥ |
citrarathaṃ pradudrāva dhṛtvā bāṇaṃ sakārmukam || 1 ||

dṛṣṭvāsuraṃ vidhāvaṃtaṃ kālamṛtyusamaprabham |
arautsīttaṃ mahāvīryo jayaṃtaḥ pākaśāsaniḥ || 2 ||

abravīcca mahātejā daiteyaṃ surasattamaḥ |
tathyaṃ dharmābhisaṃyuktaṃ lokadvayahitaṃ dhruvam || 3 ||

śastrābhighātaduḥkhārtaṃ kaśmalaṃ cānyasaṃyutam |
prabhagnaṃ ca nirastaṃ ca yo haṃti sa ca bāliśaḥ || 4 ||

suciraṃ rauravaṃ bhuktvā tasya dāso bhavecciram |
tasmānmāmuṃ prayudhyasva yuddhadharmasthito bhava || 5 ||

jayaṃtamabravīdvākyaṃ kāleyaḥ krodhamūrcchitaḥ |
nihatya bhrātṛhaṃtāramatha tvāṃhanmi sāṃpratam || 6 ||

tatastaṃ cāsuraśreṣṭhaṃ kālānalasamaprabham |
jayaṃto niśitairbāṇairjaghāna surasattamaḥ || 7 ||

nicakartta śarānsopi tribhirvivyādha cāsuraḥ |
yathāvṛṣṭigaṇaṃ prāpya nadī gairikavāhinī || 8 ||

tathā tau ca mahāvīryau na kṣīṇau na ca kātarau |
na śarma parilebhāte parasparajayaiṣiṇau || 9 ||

atha tasya ca daityasya dhanuściccheda ceṣuṇā |
yaṃtāraṃ paṃcabhirbāṇaiḥ pātayāmāsa bhūtale || 10 ||

aṣṭābhirniśitairbāṇaiścaturośvānapātayāt |
śaktiṃ saṃgṛhya bhūmiṣṭhaḥ kumāraṃ ca jaghāna ha || 11 ||

gadayā pīḍitaṃ sāśvaṃ savarūthaṃ sakūbaram |
pātayitvā dharaṇyāṃ ca siṃhanādaṃ nanāda ha || 12 ||

lāghavātsa dharāṃ gatvā gadāpāṇirupasthitaḥ |
vajrapātādyathā śabdo lokānāṃ duḥsaho bhavet || 13 ||

tathā tayorgadāpāte śabdaḥ syāttu muhurmuhuḥ |
evaṃ tayorgadāyuddhaṃ yāvadabdacatuṣṭayam || 14 ||

prabhagne te gade khasthau khaḍgacarmadharāvubhau |
tadā padātinoryuddhamadbhutaṃ lomaharṣaṇaṃ || 15 ||

dṛṣṭvā ca vismayaṃ jagmurdevāsuramahoragāḥ |
khaḍgapātairmuhūrtāṃte tayośchinne tu varmaṇī || 16 ||

abhavatkhaḍgayuddhaṃ ca tayoryuddhātiśīlinoḥ |
dadhāra cikure tasya jayaṃto bhīmavikramaḥ || 17 ||

śiraśchitvāsya khaḍgena pātayāmāsa bhūtale |
tatastu jayaśabdena devāḥ sarve nanaṃdire || 18 ||
prabhagnā daityasaṃghāśca diśaḥ sarvāḥ pradudruvuḥ || 19 ||
iti śrīpādmapurāṇe prathame sṛṣṭikhaṃḍe kāleyavadhonāma ṣaṭṣaṣṭitamo'dhyāyaḥ || 66 ||

vyāsa uvāca |
etacchrutvā tu daityeṃdro hiraṇyākṣo mahābalaḥ |
saroṣaścātitāmrākṣo hyasurānādideśa ha || 1 ||

svayaṃ gacchāmi yuddhāya devānāṃ vijighāṃsayā |
nāgacchaṃti na yuddhyaṃte tena mārgādviśantvitaḥ || 2 ||

etacchrutvā tu vacanaṃ śeṣā daityagaṇādhipāḥ |
yuddhāya prayayuḥ sarve śūlapāśātipaṃḍitāḥ || 3 ||

adhikaṃ pūrvasainyāśca tathā śataguṇairapi |
niraṃtaraṃ tathākāśaṃ prayayuryuddhakāṃkṣiṇaḥ || 4 ||

tato rudrāssa sādhyāśca viśve ca vasavastathā |
skaṃdaśca gaṇapaścaiva viṣṇujiṣṇupurogamāḥ || 5 ||

sarve yoddhuṃ gatāste ca hṛṣṭā raṇasamutsukāḥ |
etasminnaṃtare yuddhaṃ devadānavayorapi || 6 ||

na bhūtaṃ na śrutaṃ pūrvaṃ sarvalokabhayaṃkaram |
śastrāstraibarhudhā yuktaṃ śiśireṇeva kānanam || 7 ||

dharāṃ svargauka ākāśaṃ saṃrudhya yuddhamābabhau |
anyonyaṃ jaghnurākāśe tathānyonyaṃ mahītale || 8 ||

śaktibhirmusalairbhallairbahubhiḥ śaravṛṣṭibhiḥ |
dāruṇaiḥ khaḍgapātaiśca tathā cakraparaḥśvadhaiḥ || 9 ||

anyāyudhaiśca vividhairnirjaghnuste parasparam |
abhavanghorarūpāṇi dharākāśe vyayāni ca || 10 ||

śastraiḥ śarairasṛkpātaiḥ kaṃkavāyasajaṃbukaiḥ |
yathā musaladhārābhirghanā varṣaṃti lohitam || 11 ||

tathaiva kṣatajaiḥ srastaiḥ svāṅgācca devadānavāḥ |
kecitpataṃti muhyaṃti skhalaṃti ca hasaṃti ca || 12 ||

muṃcaṃti cārtanādāṃśca siṃhanādaṃ muhurmuhuḥ |
keṣāṃcidbāhavaśchinnāśchinnapādāstathāpare || 13 ||

chinnapārśvodarāḥ kecinnipetuḥ śataśo bhuvi |
koṭikoṭisahasrāṇi gajavājyasurāṇi ca || 14 ||

apatandharaṇīpṛṣṭhe raktaughe bahudhā bhuvi |
tatastu dharaṇīpṛṣṭhe tvabhavallohitārṇavaḥ || 15 ||

viparītāstato nadyaḥ sadyastatra visusruvuḥ |
tṛṇakāṣṭhaparāstatra śaktayo dārusaṃcayāḥ || 16 ||

mudgarā musalāḥ śūlā makarādyā bhavaṃti ca |
jayaṃtikā dhvajā mīnāḥ kamaṭhāścarmakāyakāḥ || 17 ||

śarādibhirmahoṣṭraiśca niruddhāḥ pracuraistathā |
keśacāmaraśaivālāḥ saṃpūrṇāstāstataḥstataḥ || 18 ||

patadbhiśca tathānyaiśca vividhaiḥ kṣatajārṇavaḥ |
tadā vasuṃdharā sarvā saśailavanakānanā || 19 ||

rudhiraughā mahāghorā sarvalokabhayaṃkarā |
skaṃdasya śaktipātena gatā daityā yamakṣayam || 20 ||

parśunā parameṇaiva agnināgniśikhaiḥ śaraiḥ |
varuṇasya ca pāśena baddhā magnā yamakṣaye || 21 ||

yeṣāṃ putraiśca pautraiśca purogaiḥ sacivaistathā |
nipātitāśca daiteyāḥ śaraśaktyṛṣṭivṛṣṭibhiḥ || 22 ||

grahaiśca śvasanaireva yakṣagaṃdharvakinnaraiḥ |
mahatyā gadayā caiva kubereṇa ca dhīmatā || 23 ||

ghanānāṃ nikarairvajraistuṣārairvidhuneritaiḥ |
pannagānāṃ viṣairghorairdaityāḥ peturdharātale || 24 ||

anyaiśca vividhairdevaiḥ koṭikoṭisahasraśaḥ |
pātitāḥ prayayussarve dharaṇyāṃ tu gatāsavaḥ || 25 ||

dehāṃstyaktvā divaṃ yāṃti kecicca yamamaṃdiram |
kecidgacchaṃti pātālaṃ puṇyāpuṇyaprayogataḥ || 26 ||

etasminnaṃtare vedāñjajalpuḥ paramarṣayaḥ |
svastyastu brāhmaṇebhyaśca gobhyaḥ strībhyastapasviṣu || 27 ||

prayudhyamāneṣvanyeṣu sāṃprataṃ sarvajaṃtuṣu |
vibudhairarditā daityāḥ śeṣāḥ parvatamāśritāḥ || 28 ||

prajagmuśca diśaḥ sarvāḥ kātarā raṇabhīravaḥ |
daityavyūhe prabhagne ca balo nāma mahābalaḥ || 29 ||

ardayāmāsa devāṃśca saṃyamyāgnisamaiḥ śaraiḥ |
tasya bāṇārditā devā bahavo baladarpitāḥ || 30 ||

patitā dharaṇīpṛṣṭhe kecidbhagnā raṇājire |
dṛṣṭvā tasya mahatkarma dāruṇaṃ lokabhīṣaṇam || 31 ||

śaśaṃsurṛṣayo devāstatra śiṣṭāḥ pracukruśuḥ |
atha kruddho mahātejāśśatakraturariṃdamaḥ || 32 ||

jaghāna śarasaṃdohairbalaṃ balavatāṃ varam |
sopi kruddho balo yuddhe tathā śakraṃ sasaṃbhramaḥ || 33 ||

rudhireṇāvasiktāṃgau prasṛtena mahābalau |
tau yathā mādhave māsi puṣpitau kiṃśukadrumau || 34 ||

cakrāṇi ca sahasrāṇi śūlāni musalāni ca |
nicakhāna raṇe śakre capale cāsurottamaḥ || 35 ||

tāni cakrāṇi śūlāni nicakartta śarottamaiḥ |
surarāṭsahasā bhrāṃto līlayā samare balī || 36 ||

sa ca daityo mahātejāḥ śaktyā caiva puraṃdaram |
nijaghāna tadā tūrṇaṃ gajasthaṃ ca stanāṃtare || 37 ||

tayā vinihataḥ śakraḥ pracacāla gajopari |
labdhasaṃjño balaṃ jiṣṇurbibheda danujaṃ kṣaṇāt || 38 ||

rathasaṃsthasya hastau ca dhanuściccheda ceṣuṇā |
carmatīkṣṇaṃ dhvajaṃ tasya śareṇaikena vīrahā || 39 ||

caturbhirniśitairbāṇairvivyādha caturo hayān |
śareṇaikena sūtasya śiraściccheda tatkṣaṇāt || 40 ||

chinnadhanvā hataratho hatāśvo hatasārathiḥ |
nipatya mūrcchitaḥ pṛthvyāṃ muhūrtānmṛtyumāpa saḥ || 41 ||

atha kruddho mahādaityo namuciḥ suradarpahā |
gadāmādāya sahasā sa jaghāna mahāgajam || 42 ||

yathā merugireḥ śṛṃge vajrapāto bhaveddhruvam |
tathaiva ca mahāśabdo hyabhavallomaharṣaṇaḥ || 43 ||

prahāreṇārditaḥ padmī saṃcacāla sa vihvalaḥ |
rudhireṇāvasiktāṃgo vimukho vedanāturaḥ || 44 ||

śatakratuṃ vidhāvaṃti śataśotha sahasraśaḥ |
ardhacaṃdraikṣuḥrapraiśca ciccheda pākaśāsanaḥ || 45 ||

jaṃtubhistasya māyābhirarditāssurapuṃgavāḥ |
bhūmau nipatitāḥ kecitkecitsuptā rathopari || 46 ||

dṛṣṭvā tasya mahatkarma mādhavo viśikhāṃstathā |
jaṃtubhūtānsa cakreṇa ciccheda dehalagnakān || 47 ||

tato jiṣṇustribhirbāṇaiḥ pātayāmāsa bhūtale |
pṛthivyāṃ patito daityo mūrcchitaskhalitaḥ punaḥ || 48 ||

dadhāra mudgaraṃ ghoraṃ śakraṃ haṃtuṃ samudyataḥ |
tato jaghāna maghavā kuliśena mahāsuram || 49 ||

sa papāta mahīpṛṣṭhe kṣatavakṣā mahābalaḥ |
sādhusādhviti devāśca siddhāścaiva maharṣayaḥ || 50 ||

apūjayaṃstadā śakraṃ bahubhiḥ puṣpavṛṣṭibhiḥ |
tato daityagaṇāḥ sarve bhītāstatra pradudruvuḥ |
gītaṃ gāyaṃti gaṃdharvā nanṛtuścāpsarogaṇāḥ || 51 ||
iti śrīpādmapurāṇe prathame sṛṣṭikhaṃḍe balanamucivadhonāma saptaṣaṣṭitamo'dhyāyaḥ || 67 ||

vyāsa uvāca |
balaṃ ca nihataṃ dṛṣṭvā namuciṃ ca svakāgrajam |
mucistatrābravīdvākyaṃ jyeṣṭho me sūditastvayā || 1 ||

parokṣeṇādhunā tvāṃ ca śarairneṣyāmi bhāskarim |
tamabravīnmahātejāḥ śakraḥ sarvasurārcitaḥ || 2 ||

bhrātuste dharmapaṃthānamidānīṃ lapsyase dhruvam |
vahneruṣṇamavijñāya pramohācchalabhā yathā || 3 ||

sahasā praviśaṃtyagniṃ tathā māṃ yoddhumicchasi |
evaṃ bruvāṇamindraṃ ca jaghāna viśikhaistribhiḥ || 4 ||

sa ciccheda tribhirbāṇaiḥ śakraḥ parapuraṃjayaḥ |
tato jaghāna daśabhiriṃdramairāvaṇaṃ tribhiḥ || 5 ||

saptabhirmātaliṃ chitvā nādairuccairnanāda ha |
śakraṃ prati punardaityo bhrāmayāmāsa saṃbhramāt || 6 ||

āyasīṃ tāṃ gadāṃ kopānmahābalaparākramaḥ |
tatastu lāghavācchakro jaghāna kuliśena hi || 7 ||

bhidurasyāvapātena gatāsurnipapāta ha |
danujasya prapātena saṃcacāla vasuṃdharā || 8 ||
devāḥ pracakrurnṛtyāni dānavā vipradudruvuḥ || 9 ||
iti śrīpādmapurāṇe prathame sṛṣṭikhaṃḍe mucivadhonāmāṣṭaṣaṣṭitamo'dhyāyaḥ || 68 ||

vyāsa uvāca |
tāreyo balasaṃpannaḥ śakratulyaparākramaḥ |
jaghāna viśikhaisskandaṃ pitṛghātinamāhave || 1 ||

tatasskando mahābāhurharitulyaparākramaḥ |
vicakarta śarāṃstāṃstānnirbibheda śarottamaiḥ || 2 ||

sa daityassahasā skaṃdaṃ chādayāmāsa mārgaṇaiḥ |
asaṃbhrāntaḥ praciccheda viśākho viśikhaistadā || 3 ||

tāreyogniśaraiḥ skaṃdaṃ jaghāna raṇamūrdhani |
viśikhaṃ bhiduraprakhyaṃ cakhāna haranaṃdane || 4 ||

vaiśvānareṇa senānīstatra saṃparyavārayat |
raudramastraṃ punardaityaḥ preṣayāmāsa taṃ prati || 5 ||

tannirastaṃ kṛtaṃ tena bāṇenāsphālitena ca |
aghoraṃ prākṣipaddaityo ghorarūpaṃ sudāruṇaṃ || 6 ||

bhūdharā viṭapāssiṃhāstathā sarpādayaḥ śarāḥ |
dhāvaṃti pārvatīputraṃ koṭikoṭisahasraśaḥ || 7 ||

chitvā tāṃstuśarānskaṃdo bibheda daityapuṃgavaṃ |
āpādaṃ śīrṣaparyaṃtaṃ śarairagnyarkasannibhaiḥ || 8 ||

svarṇapuṃkhāḥ śarā lagnā dehe daityapaterbhṛśaṃ |
rejuste svarṇaśakalā yathā kṛṣṇaśiloccaye || 9 ||

tasya dehāttataścaiva bahu susrāva śoṇitaṃ |
yathā ca mādhave māsi purupuṣpaśśamī taruḥ || 10 ||

syaṃdanādhaścarāśvāśca śiśyire bhūmilagnakāḥ |
atha kruddho mahādaityaḥ śūlaṃ bhīmaṃ ca dāruṇaṃ || 11 ||

dhṛtvā taṃ praticikṣepa kālamṛtyusamaprabhaṃ |
pārvatīnaṃdanenāpi śūlaṃ pāśupatena ha || 12 ||

kṣiptaṃ tena kṛtaṃ dagdhaṃ muhūrtena raṇājire |
punaḥ śaktiṃ mumocātha brahmadattāntu dānavaḥ || 13 ||

śūlaṃ pratijaghānātha śatakūṭasamaprabham |
tato'stre vajrasaṃkāśe jaghaṭāte viyatyapi || 14 ||

tayossavīryayorastre dharaṇyāṃ praṇipetatuḥ |
tato daityapatiḥ skaṃdaṃ śarairagniśikhopamaiḥ || 15 ||

ardayāmāsa sahasā ghanadhāreva parvataṃ |
tāṃstu cchitvā mahābāhuḥ senānīścāpamasya vai || 16 ||

vicakartārdhacaṃdreṇa tathā yaṃtuḥ śiromahat |
tathāśvānbahubhirbāṇaiḥ pātayāmāsa bhūtale || 17 ||

gṛhītvā musalaṃ vegātsa dudrāva sthale guhaṃ |
jaghāna tena daityendraḥ śikhinaṃ śikhivāhanaṃ || 18 ||

tato mohaṃ gato barhī pracakaṃpe muhurmuhuḥ |
tataḥ skaṃdaḥ punastaṃ ca jaghānāsurapuṃgavaṃ || 19 ||

pracicchedāsinā vegānmusalaṃ cātidāruṇaṃ |
tāreyaḥ śaktimādāya jaghāna krauṃcadāraṇam || 20 ||

sopi śaktiṃ mumocātha amoghāṃ duṣṭaghātinīm |
tataḥ saṃdahya sā śaktirviśvapralayakāriṇī || 21 ||

yamadaṃḍasamānaṃ ca bhitvā punarguhaṃ gatā |
sa gatāsuḥ papātorvyāṃ cālayaṃśca vasuṃdharāṃ || 22 ||
puṣpadhūpādibhiḥ skaṃdaḥ sarvadevaiḥ prapūjitaḥ || 23 ||
iti śrīpādmapurāṇe prathame sṛṣṭikhaṃḍe tāreyavadhonāmaikonasaptatitamo'dhyāyaḥ || 69 ||

vyāsa uvāca |
tato devāṃtako daityo vyanadatsamaraṃ prati |
raṇaṃ cakāra dharmeṇa saṃdaṣṭauṣṭhapuṭo balī || 1 ||

sa gatvā cābravīdvākyaṃ sarvalokavigarhitaṃ |
na jānāsi mahaddharmaṃ duṣṭa mohādyathākramam || 2 ||

pāpapuṇyaprayogeṇa nigrahānugrahe prabhuḥ |
ahaṃ ca nirmito dhātrā karomi tava śāsanam || 3 ||

na jānāsi yato dharmaṃ kālamṛtyu puraḥsaraḥ |
na rogo na jarā kālo na mṛtyurna ca kiṃkaraḥ || 4 ||

dharmātpracalitaḥ karmī kaṣṭaṃ yāti divāniśam |
uktaṃ vasuṃ mahāvīryaṃ yamaṃ dharmaikasākṣikam || 5 ||

sa jaghāna tribhirbāṇaiḥ kālamṛtyusamaprabhaiḥ |
praciccheda sa dharmātmā te tvanyairviśikhaistribhiḥ || 6 ||

tatastūccaiḥ śaraiḥ prājyairyugāṃtānalasaprabhaiḥ |
nijaghāna yamaṃ saṃkhye sa ciccheda śaraiḥ śarān || 7 ||

etasminnaṃtare kruddhau parasparajayaiṣiṇau |
jaghnatuḥ samarenyonyaṃ mahābalaparākramau || 8 ||

ahorātraṃ tayoryuddhamavarttata sudāruṇam |
etasminnantare kruddhaḥ śaktyā praśamanaṃ ruṣā || 9 ||

bibheda daityaśārdūlo hyahaṃkārayuto balī |
tāmevātha ruṣā dharmo gṛhītvā śaktikāṃ drutaṃ || 10 ||

nijaghāna tayaivāmuṃstanayoraṃtare bhṛśam |
sa vihvalita sarvāṃgo mukhādāgataśoṇitaḥ || 11 ||

tataḥ kruddho mahātejā dhṛtvā daṃḍaṃ sudāruṇam |
amoghaṃ pātayāmāsa tasya daityasya vigrahe || 12 ||

sāśvaṃ rathaṃ tathā sūtaṃ yoddhāraṃ śastrasaṃcayam |
cakāra bhasmasāttaṃ ca śamanaḥ krodhamūrcchitaḥ || 13 ||

patite ca tathā daitye durdharṣo nāma dānavaḥ |
śamanaṃ śūlahastastu pradudrāva jighāṃsayā || 14 ||

śūlahastaṃ samāyāṃtaṃ baḍavānalasannibham |
āsasāda raṇe mṛtyuḥ śaktihastotinirbhayaḥ || 15 ||

sa ca dṛṣṭvā'suro mṛtyuṃ śūlenaiva jaghāna ha |
śaktiṃ caiva tato mṛtyuḥ pracikṣepa raṇājire || 16 ||

saṃdahya sahasā śūlaṃ vahnikūṭasamaprabham |
daityasya hṛdayaṃ bhitvā gatā sā ca dharātalam || 17 ||

sarathaḥ sa papātorvyāṃ śaktijarjaravigrahaḥ |
athānyo durmukho mṛtyuṃ kṛṣṭacāpo mahābalaḥ || 18 ||

khaḍgacarmadharaḥ kālo ratha eva gatobhavat |
dṛṣṭvā taṃ viśikhaiḥ prājyairjaghāna sa yamaṃ raṇe || 19 ||

sa cāplatya rathāddevo hyasinā ca sakuṃḍalam |
śiraściccheda sahasā pātayitvā ca bhūtale || 20 ||
hataśeṣaṃ balaṃ sarvaṃ pradudrāva diśo daśa || 21 ||
iti śrīpādmapurāṇe prathame sṛṣṭikhaṃḍe devāṃtakardurdharṣadurmukhavadhonāma saptatimo'dhyāyaḥ || 70 ||

vyāsa uvāca |
athānyo namuciḥ kruddhaḥ syaṃdanastho divaukasaḥ |
viśikhairardayāmasa ghorairāśīviṣopamaiḥ || 1 ||

tatastu saṃyuge devāḥ siddhakinnarapannagāḥ |
na śaknuvaṃti bāṇānāṃ vegaṃ soḍhuṃ samaṃtataḥ || 2 ||

rathamuccaiśśravośvena yuktaṃ mātalineritam |
puruhūtaḥ samāsthāya prāgamattaṃ mahābalam || 3 ||

dṛṣṭvā śakraṃ mahāvīryaṃ namucirdaityapuṃgavaḥ |
abravīdvāsavaṃ saṃkhye vacanaṃ sānugaṃ tadā || 4 ||

prākṛtaṃ nirjaraṃ hatvā na yaśosti na ca priyam |
