na lābhakṛtakaṃ vāpi na jayastu puraṣṭuta || 5 ||

tasmātvayi hatetraiva sarvaṃ bhavati śāśvatam |
devarājyaṃ pralapsyāmi sukhaṃ bhogyaṃ surālaye || 6 ||

tamabravīnmahātejāḥ śakraḥ parapuraṃjayaḥ |
śūratā vākyamātreṇa sarvatra sulabhā bhavet || 7 ||

mahāparākramaṃ yadvā asti te dānavādhama |
darśayasvāhave vīryaṃ puraṃ neṣyāmi bhāskareḥ || 8 ||

etacchrutvā mahātejāścukopa daityapuṃgavaḥ |
paṃcabhirniśitairbāṇairjaghāna surasattamam || 9 ||

tāṃstu ciccheda maghavā kṣurapraiḥ paṃcabhirdrutam |
jagmatustau mahāvīryau samare viṣayaiṣiṇau || 10 ||

anyonyaṃ sahasā vegāccharaiścicchidatuḥ śarān |
bibhidātetha gātrāṇi viśikhairbhiduropamaiḥ || 11 ||

atyapūrvaṃ kṛtaṃ karma tābhyāmeva raṇe bhṛśam |
lāghavaṃ śarasaṃdhāna grahamokṣaṃ sudurlabham || 12 ||

dṛṣṭvā tu vismayaṃ jagmurdevāsuragaṇāstadā |
etasminnaṃtare daityo māyāssaṃpramumoca ha || 13 ||

viśikhāḥ śataśastatra viniścerussamaṃtataḥ |
śakraḥ kopātpunaḥ śīghraṃ dhanurudyamya vīryavān || 14 ||

jaghāna viśikhairugraiḥ sarvagātreṣu saṃjvalan |
tato mārgaṇasāhasrairaṣṭabhistvadhikaṃ tathā || 15 ||

bibhidāte tatonyonyaṃ cicchidāte parasparam |
śarairniraṃtarākāśaṃ dadṛśustatra saṃyuge || 16 ||

nipataṃti dharāpṛṣṭhe khaḍgapātaiḥ sahasraśaḥ |
evaṃ sudīrghakāle tu gate tasminmahāhave || 17 ||

māyāstraṃ darśayāmāsa krūrakṛnnamucistadā |
tāmasaṃ triṣulokeṣu kṛtaṃ syāttu niraṃtaram || 18 ||

parasparaṃ na paśyaṃti devāsuragaṇā bhṛśam |
sūryacaṃdragrahāṇāṃ ca vahnīnāṃ ca divaukasām || 19 ||

tasmiṃstamasi duṣpāre gabhastirnaiva dṛśyate |
daityasya ca tatastūrṇaṃ śarairagniśikhopamaiḥ || 20 ||

vibhagnāḥ sarvadevāśca śakraścaraṇasaṃmukhe |
śarairvibhinnadehāstu nipeturdharaṇītale || 21 ||

prabhagnāścāpare śūrāssaṃyāṃti ca diśo daśa |
kūṭaṃ tasya parijñāya sarvadevārcito hariḥ || 22 ||

saumyamastraṃ mumocātha divi sūryaśataprabham |
vilaṃbitaṃ samālokya śaktyā ca bahughaṃṭayā || 23 ||

jaghānorasi daityasya sa papāta vyathānvitaḥ |
cirātsaṃlabhya saṃjñāṃ ca daiteyaḥ krodhamūrcchitaḥ || 24 ||

gatvā vegātsuraśreṣṭhamairāvataṃ dadhāra ha |
trāsayāmāsa sutarāmiṃdrasya dviradaṃ ruṣā || 25 ||

dhṛtvā sa tu gajaṃ seṃdraṃ mumoca dharaṇītale |
tato bhūmigataḥ śakraḥ kaśmalaṃ ca kṣaṇaṃ gataḥ || 26 ||

avaplutya sa daityeṃdro gajadaṃtāṃtarasthitaḥ |
śakraṃ grahītukāmasya vadhārthaṃ yūthapasya saḥ || 27 ||

asinā'suramukhyasya śiraśchitvā nyapātayat |
sarve prajahṛṣurdevā gaṃdharvā lalitaṃ jaguḥ |
muditāste ca munayaḥ stuvaṃti surasattamam || 28 ||
iti śrīpādmapurāṇe prathame sṛṣṭikhaṃḍe dvitīya namucivadhonāmaikasaptatitamo'dhyāyaḥ || 71 ||

vyāsa uvāca |
divyaṃ rathaṃ samāsthāya dhanurhasto balairyutaḥ |
gatvā ca mādhavaṃ saṃkhye devāsuragaṇāgrataḥ || 1 ||

krodhena mahatāviṣṭo madhurnirjaramardanaḥ |
abravītparuṣaṃ vākyamavyayaṃ harimīśvaram || 2 ||

nārāyaṇa na jānāsi yuddhadharmamitaḥ katham |
anyāyāddurvadhopāyaṃ kṛtvā naṣṭo na śocasi || 3 ||

anena paṃkayogena vyavahārā kṛtasya ca |
suratvaṃ copanaṣṭaṃ syādanyasṛṣṭiṃ karomyaham || 4 ||

tvāmeva nihaniṣyāmi saha devagaṇairiha |
ityuktvā dhanurādāya jaghāna viśikhairvibhum || 5 ||

mādhavastānbibhedātha śarairvajrasamaprabhaiḥ |
bahubhissarvagātreṣu jaghāna ca madhuṃ tataḥ || 6 ||

māyayā chāditaḥ sobhūddaityastaṃ surasattamāḥ |
ye vai śūrāśca rudrādyāstridaśāssattvadhāriṇaḥ || 7 ||

devyo nānāvidhāścāpi sāyudhā vāhanānvitāḥ |
senānyo gaṇapā devā lokeśa haraviṣṇavaḥ || 8 ||

anye grahādayo devāḥ sarve yudhyanti saṃgatāḥ |
vinaṣṭāśca tadā devā madhorvai māyayā dhruvam || 9 ||

saṃmukhe vimukhe caiva śaraśaktyṛṣṭivṛṣṭibhiḥ |
pataṃti sahasā devā bhūmau śastrābhipīḍitāḥ || 10 ||

etasminnaṃtare viṣṇurgṛhītvā ca sudarśanam |
asurānmāyayā devānjaghāna raṇamūrdhani || 11 ||

atha teṣāṃ śirāṃsyeṣa chitvā caiva sahasraśaḥ |
pātayāmāsa deveśo daityānāṃ ca surātmanām || 12 ||

evamanyānvibhurdaityāndrāvayāmāsa saṃgarāt |
taṃ dṛṣṭvā munayo devāḥ sarve vismayamāyayuḥ || 13 ||

karṇe karṇe prajalpaṃte devā munigaṇāstathā |
sadā devaikagoptā ca hariravyaya īśvaraḥ || 14 ||

sarvasākṣī tvayaṃ devo daityajiṣṇuryuge yuge |
kathaṃ haṃti surānsarvānkalpāṃta iha jāyate || 15 ||

etasminnaṃtare dūre madhurmāyāṃ prayojitā |
hararūpadharo bhūtvā abravīddharimavyayam || 16 ||

daityānāmagrataḥ pāpa raṇe devānsamaṃtataḥ |
hatvā kiṃ te śivaṃ cādya dharmakīrti yaśo guṇāḥ || 17 ||

mahatonmattabhāvena na jānāsi parānsvakān |
atastvāṃ niśitairbāṇairnayāmi yamasādanam || 18 ||

evamuktvā śarairugrairjaghāna keśavaṃ raṇe |
nicakarta śarāṃstāṃstu mādhavo vākyamabravīt || 19 ||

jānāmi tvāṃ raṇe daityaṃ hararūpadharaṃ priyam |
śūraṃ śūravikarmāṇaṃ madhuṃ māyāniyojitam || 20 ||

mithyālokaṃ pradāsyāmi pātayitvā raṇājire |
etasminnaṃtare tīkṣṇaiḥ śarairvivyādha saṃyuge || 21 ||

jaṭilaṃ vṛṣaketuṃ ca vṛṣabhasthaṃ maheśvaram |
tayoryuddhamatīvāsīddevadānavayostadā || 22 ||

parasparaṃ bhiṃdatośca prāptānprāptānśarānśaraiḥ |
kṣurapreṇa dhanustasya ciccheda hariravyayaḥ || 23 ||

tataśca pātayāmāsa ghoṭakaṃ vṛṣarūpiṇam |
sa daityaśśūlahastotha pradudrāva jagatpatim || 24 ||

bhrāmayitvā tataḥ śūlaṃ jaghāna parameśvaram |
tribhiściccheda bāṇaiśca śūlaṃ kālānalaprabham || 25 ||

tataḥ krūro mahābāhurmadhurmāyātimāyikaḥ |
devīrūpaṃ samāsthāya siṃhasthaḥ prayayau hariḥ || 26 ||

śarairbahuvidhairviṣṇuṃ jaghānaivābravīdvacaḥ |
svāmī tu me suraśreṣṭha tvayaiva pātito yudhi || 27 ||

ahaṃ tvāṃ ca haniṣyāmi sutau skaṃdavināyakau |
uktavaṃtaṃ ca daiteyaṃ jaghāna bahumārgaṇaiḥ || 28 ||

sa papāta mahīpṛṣṭhe gatāsurlohitodgiraḥ |
pitarau nihatau dṛṣṭvā māyābaddho mahābalaḥ || 29 ||

skaṃdaḥ śaktiṃ samādāya prāyādyodhayituṃ harim |
tato dhātā'bravīdvākyaṃ skaṃdaṃ mohaprapīḍitam || 30 ||

paśya te pitarau dūre paśyaṃtau yuddhamīdṛśam |
aṃtarikṣe bhramaṃtau ca saṃsthitau lokasākṣiṇau || 31 ||

etacchrutvā tato dṛṣṭvā tatraivāṃtaradhīyata |
tato dhuṃdhuśca suṃdhuśca bhrātarāvatidarpitau || 32 ||

vadhaṃ prati hareryuddhe petaturgaruḍopari |
khaḍgahastaṃ ca dhuṃdhuṃ ca sagadaṃ suṃdhumeva ca || 33 ||

ciccheda naṃdakenaikaṃ gadayā sādayatparam |
petatustau dharāpṛṣṭhe pravīrau kṣatavikṣatau || 34 ||

madhustadāgatastūrṇamaṃtardhānaṃ tamovṛtaḥ |
pātayāmāsa viṣṇau ca māyayā śataparvatān || 35 ||

tatastānparvatāṃśchitvā tamaso'ntargato yudhi |
krodhātsudarśanenaiva śiraśchitvā nipātitaḥ || 36 ||

tato brahmādibhirdevaiśśaṃbhunā tridaśairapi |
madhusūdana itikhyātirviṣṇorlokeṣu kāritā || 37 ||
iti śrīpādmapurāṇe prathame sṛṣṭikhaṃḍe madhuvadhonāmadvisaptatitamo'dhyāyaḥ || 72 ||

vyāsa uvāca |
tato vṛtro mahātejā daityānāṃ pravaro yudhi |
diggajāḍhyaṃ gajārūḍhaḥ prādravadbalasūdanam || 1 ||

āgacchaṃtaṃ tato vṛtraṃ śaraiḥ kālānalaprabhaiḥ |
vivyādha sarvagātreṣu dviradastho mahāhave || 2 ||

tato vṛtrastu śīrṣaṃ ca jiṣṇoreva patatriṇā |
vivyādha sahasā tena sa cacāla mahābalaḥ || 3 ||

ātmānaṃ ca samāśvāsya dhanurudyamya vīryavān |
vavarṣa śaravarṣeṇa tasya daityasya vigrahe || 4 ||

śarāṃśchitvā bibhedāśu śarairāśīviṣopamaiḥ |
śatakratuṃ mahāvīryaḥ sarvadevādhipaṃ yudhi || 5 ||

tataḥ śarasahasraistu daityaṃ vivyādha devarāṭ |
parasparaṃ śarā yāṃti yathā saptāśva raśmayaḥ || 6 ||

evaṃ śarasahasraistu bibhidāte parasparam |
manojavasamāḥ śīghrā gāḍhāḥ śikhariṇo yathā || 7 ||

baḍavānalasaṃsparśāḥ khagā vajrārabhedakāḥ |
tayordhanuṣmatoryuddhe śarāstulyaguṇānvitāḥ || 8 ||

evaṃ krameṇa yuddhe ca ahorātramavartata |
maheṃdro dviradaṃ tasya śūlenaiva jaghāna ha || 9 ||

sa nipatya mahīpṛṣṭhe lāghavātsvarathaṃ yayau |
rathasthastasya devasya śaktyā cairāvaṇaṃ dṛḍham || 10 ||

bibheda lāghavenāśu vajreṇeva mahāgiriṃ |
śuśubhe kaṃpamānastu seṃdraḥ sa ca mahāgajaḥ || 11 ||

tataḥ śaktiṃ samādāya āvidhya maghavā'suram |
bibhedorasi daityasya sa papāta rathopari || 12 ||

kṣaṇātsaṃjñāṃ samālaṃbya sa vinadya patattriṇā |
bibheda samare śakraṃ sa tataḥ kaśmalaṃ gataḥ || 13 ||

iṃdraḥ saṃjñāṃ punaḥ prāpya jaghāna viśikhaiḥ śitaiḥ |
śatakoṭisamairbāṇairardito vyathayānvitaḥ || 14 ||

tato vṛtro mahāśūlaṃ prākṣipannirjareśvare |
śāṃbhavāstreṇa deveśo vaiṣṇavāstraṃ mumoca ha || 15 ||

ubhayoraṃbare cāstre vahnikūṭasamaprabhe |
anyonyaṃ jaghnatustatra sphuligāni vimuṃcatī || 16 ||

sparśane ca sphuliṃgānāmubhayoḥ senayorbhaṭāḥ |
na śaktāḥ saṃmukhe sthātuṃ śalabhā jvalane yathā || 17 ||

dagdhāḥ petuḥ pṛthivyāṃ ca diśassarvāḥ pradudruvuḥ |
devadānavayorvīrāḥ śūnyastatrābhavadraṇaḥ || 18 ||

astraṃ nirastakaṃ dṛṣṭvā sa daityaḥ krodhamūrcchitaḥ |
māyayā śailasaṃdohamastraṃ śakre mumoca ha || 19 ||

bāṇaughaiḥ śailasaṃghātaṃ praciccheda raṇe hariḥ |
aghoraṃ prāsṛjaddaityaḥ puruhūte mahābale || 20 ||

koṭikoṭisahasrāṇi jaṃtūnāṃ pravarāṇi ca |
siṃhaśārdūlabhallūka vṛka vyāghra mahāgajāḥ || 21 ||

daṃdaśūkādayaḥ satvāḥ pradhāvaṃti sureśvaraṃ |
kṣuraprairardhacaṃdraiśca bhallaiḥ śilīmukhaistathā || 22 ||

asaṃprāptānpraciccheda maghavā paravīrahā |
tato vṛtro mahābāhurdhanurudyamya vīryavān || 23 ||

bibheda śarasāhasrairvajrakalpaiḥ śatakratuṃ |
chitvā kṣurapraiśśakraśca dhanustasya cakarta ca || 24 ||

sūtaṃ cāśvānpṛthivyāṃ ca pātayāmāsa tatkṣaṇāt |
sakaṃṭakāṃgadāṃ bhīmāṃ saṃpūjyāsurasattamaḥ || 25 ||

jaghāna padminaḥ śīrṣe mohāddaṃtī kṣitiṃ yayau |
sagadaḥ sarvadeveśo dharaṇīṃ samupasthitaḥ || 26 ||

tatastayorgadāyuddhamavartata muhurmuhuḥ |
tayoḥ praharatoḥ śabdo gadāpātodbhavo dhruvaṃ || 27 ||

āvartaṃ parivartaṃ ca cakratustau punaḥ punaḥ |
adha ūrdhvaṃ prahāraṃ ca pārśvayoratibhīṣaṇaṃ || 28 ||

babhūvaivaṃ tayoryuddhaṃ lokālokabhayaṃkaraṃ |
dṛṣṭvā devagaṇāḥ siddhā dānavā vismayaṃ gatāḥ || 29 ||

yuddhyamānau tu tau vīrau mṛtyusaṃśayamāgatau |
devadānavavīrāśca draṣṭuṃ naiva tadīśire || 30 ||

īśabrahmādayaḥ khe tu sthitā draṣṭuṃ tadadbhutaṃ |
tayorhuṃkāraśabdena gadāpātasvanena ca || 31 ||

ūrdhvordhvamagamacchabdo hyaśaneścopajāyate |
bhagne gade dvayoreva karaḥ saṃpuṭitastayoḥ || 32 ||

evaṃ caivārdhayāmena tayorastre nipetatuḥ |
etasmiṃnnantare vīrau khaḍgacarmadharau tadā || 33 ||

pratiyoddhuṃ mahāghoramāhave saṃpraceratuḥ |
nistriṃśau vidyudulkābhau tayorgātre ca carmaṇī || 34 ||

dṛśyete sarvalokaiśca lāghavaṃ vismayaṃ gataiḥ |
cicchidāte tayoreva carmaṇī bahuvarṇake || 35 ||

bhīṣmakaṃ balayuddhaṃ ca tayorevaṃ pravartate |
maṃḍalaṃ cakradhanvaṃ ca lāghavaṃ ca pariplutaṃ || 36 ||

vṛtravāsavayoryuddhaṃ vṛtravāsavayoriva |
keśānvṛtrasya utplutya saṃpradhṛtyāsinā drutaṃ || 37 ||

śiraściccheda sahasā maghavā raṇamūrdhani |
jayaśabdastatastvāsīddevānāṃ ca samaṃtataḥ || 38 ||

protphullahṛdayā devā maghavaṃtamapūjayan |
devaduṃdubhayo nedurnanṛtuścāpsarogaṇāḥ || 39 ||

gītaṃ gāyaṃti gaṃdharvā munayaḥ stutipāṭhakāḥ |
bhītāḥ palāyitāḥ sarve daityāstyaktāyudhā diśaḥ || 40 ||
iti śrīpādmapurāṇe prathame sṛṣṭikhaṃḍe vṛtrāsuravadhonāma trisaptatitamo'dhyāyaḥ || 73 ||

vyāsa uvāca |
caturbhisturagairjuṣṭaṃ rathaṃ sūryasamaprabhaṃ |
traipuriḥ saṃrurohāthābravīdvākyaṃ gaṇādhipaṃ || 1 ||

pitā me nihataḥ pitrā tava yasmādgaṇādhipa |
tasmāttvāmadya viśikhairnayāmi yamasādanaṃ || 2 ||

tatastamabravīddevo gaṇeśastripurātmajaṃ |
tava tātena duṣṭena surāṇāmahitaṃ purā || 3 ||

kṛtaṃ karmamahatpāpaṃ śrutaṃ no janakena hi |
pāpakarmarataṃ duṣṭaṃ jñātvā jñānabalena ca || 4 ||

avadhīttaṃ śaraikena pitaraṃ te balena ca |
paṃkātpratārito mohātpreṣito yamamaṃdiraṃ || 5 ||

tvāṃ cāhaṃ tatpathaṃ daitya preṣayāmi kṣaṇādiha |
uktavaṃtaṃ mahāprājñaṃ surāṇāṃ ca gaṇādhipaṃ || 6 ||

vivyādha daśabhistīkṣṇaiḥ kālānalasamaprabhaiḥ |
tataḥ śarasahasraistu daityaṃ vivyādha sāhasāt || 7 ||

yamadaṃḍasamairbāṇaiḥ kṣurapraiśca śilīmukhaiḥ |
kaṃkapatrairmahātīkṣṇairvajrānalasamaprabhaiḥ || 8 ||

vicakarta śarāṃścāsya laṃbodaraḥ surārcitaḥ |
punarvivyādha viśikhaiḥ sahasābhi duropamaiḥ || 9 ||

śarairarditasarvāṃgo mūrcchitastvapatadbhuvi |
tato bhadraśca saubhadro bhīṣaṇo nirjarāṃtakaḥ || 10 ||

svāṃ svāṃ gadāṃ samādāya dudruvustaṃ vināyakam |
yugapatte gadāpātairnijaghnurgaṇanāyakam || 11 ||

lāghavāttu vṛthā kṛtvā gadāsteṣāṃ mahābalaḥ |
bhadrakasya tu śīrṣe cāhanatparaśunā tadā || 12 ||

saubhadrasyottamāṃgaṃ ca asināgre nipātitam |
bhīṣaṇasya kuṭhāreṇa khaḍgena nirjarāṃtakam || 13 ||

pātayitvā ca herambo mahāgirisamāṃstadā |
caturo gaṇamukhyāṃśca anyāṃścāpātayaddviṣaḥ || 14 ||

tataḥ saṃjñāṃ samālabhya traipuriścāsurottamaḥ |
samāruhya rathaṃ svaṃ ca jaghāna surasattamam || 15 ||

viśikhairardhacaṃdraiśca kṣuraprairbhallakaistathā |
tāṃstu ciccheda dharmātmā punarvivyādha taṃ śaraiḥ || 16 ||

caturbhiḥ saiṃdhavāṃścaiva śaraikena ca sārathim |
śaraiḥ saṃpātayāmāsa dharaṇyāṃ gaṇanāyakān || 17 ||

lāghavāttu rathaṃ cānyaṃ gatvā tripuranaṃdanaḥ |
viśikhairvajrasaṃkāśaiḥ saṃbibheda gaṇādhipam || 18 ||

rudhireṇāvasiktāṃgo ruṣā ghora yamaprabhaḥ |
lalāṭe ca tribhirbāṇaissaptabhiśca stanāṃtare || 19 ||

caturbhirnābhideśe ca paṃcabhirmuṣṭimastake |
saṃbibheda mahākrodho balinaṃ śaṃbhunaṃdanaḥ || 20 ||

śarairarditasarvāṃgaḥ sa daityo raṇamūrdhani |
kaśmalaṃ paramaṃ gatvā saṃpapāta rathopari || 21 ||

tataḥ sūtena dhīreṇa apanīto raṇājirāt |
vimukhaṃ nāhanacchūro vināyakaḥ surārcitaḥ || 22 ||

cirātsaṃjñāṃ samālabhya yaṃtāraṃ cābravīdvacaḥ |
gaccha sūta raṇe bhīruṃ vināyakaṃ harātmajam || 23 ||

tato yaṃtābravīdvākyaṃ satyaṃ pathyaṃ ca komalam |
harātmajaśarānsoḍhuṃ kassamartho raṇājire || 24 ||

tasmānmohagatastvaṃ ca mayānītaḥ prabhāsuta |
etajjñātvā tvidānīṃ bho yadyuktaṃ tadvidhīyatām || 25 ||

etasminnaṃtare rājñā preritaḥ kavisattamaḥ |
auṣadhādiprayogeṇa gajaḥ saṃjñāmabodhayat || 26 ||

akārayacchataguṇa prāṇaṃ ca jayamādiśat |
prāgjalaṃ maṃtritaṃ datvā rurodhāsyāṅgakavraṇān || 27 ||

sa gajo daśanaireva sphoṭayāmāsa vai girim |
evaṃ śatasahasrāṇi sainyāni sainyapālakān || 28 ||

pātayāmāsa samitau gajaḥ paramadurjayaḥ |
sa daityastasya pṛṣṭhasthaḥ śaraiḥ kālānalaprabhaiḥ || 29 ||

hatvā tvapātayaccorvyāṃ mukhyamukhyānsurādhipān |
śaraistasya tadā devā yamadaṃḍasamaprabhaiḥ || 30 ||

nipataṃti mahāvīryā rudhiraughapariplutāḥ |
yasminyasmiṃśca mārge tu sa daityaḥ sagajo gataḥ || 31 ||

tatra tatra cakārāśu bhīṣaṇaṃ saṃcitaṃ śaraiḥ |
gajena pātitāḥ kecidgajāroheṇa cāpare || 32 ||

vegena bhramaṇenaiva surāḥ kecitpratāpitāḥ |
evaṃ suragaṇādhyakṣāḥ śastrāstrairvividhaiśca tam || 33 ||

sagajaṃ yuddhanirbhītā nijaghnurbahubhiḥ śaraiḥ |
tathāpi tadgajaṃ yoddhuṃ na śaktāste mahābalāḥ || 34 ||

kṣipraṃ tāṃstu gajo daṃtaistraipuro'pātayaccharaiḥ |
na gatā ye dharaṇyāṃ ca devā jarjaravigrahāḥ || 35 ||

śaraṇyaṃ gaṇapaṃ jagmurbhītāste vedanāturāḥ |
devānāṃ kadanaṃ dṛṣṭvā gaṇādhīśaḥ pratāpavān || 36 ||

sa gajaṃ tāḍayāmāsa vajrānalasamaiḥ śaraiḥ |
sa gajo vegasaṃruddhaḥ śareṇa ca samutthitaḥ || 37 ||

athotau dvau śaraireva bibhidāte parasparam |
ubhau tau nardamānau ca anyonyaṃ jayamaicchatām || 38 ||

śoṇitairliptasarvāṃgau vīramukhyau surāsurau |
athākhuṃ sa gajo matto bibheda daśanaiḥ svakaiḥ || 39 ||

ākhunābhidruto nāgo ghorayuddhaṃ tayoḥ param |
adhordhvaṃ saṃvibhāge ca caturbhiryuddhamadbhutam || 40 ||

saśabdaṃ tumulaṃ yuddhaṃ sarvalokabhayaṃkaram |
daśanairdaśanaireva śaraireva śarottamaiḥ || 41 ||

tadghoramabhavadyuddhaṃ devadānavasaṃgare |
ākhuko bhedayāṃcakre mahānāṃgaṃ mahābalam || 42 ||

parśunā pṛṣṭhavaṃśāgre sthitvā tenāhanatpunaḥ |
daityasya daśanadvāre hṛdiskaṃdhetha lāghavāt || 43 ||

sagajaḥ sa papātorvyāṃ gatāsurlohitaṃ vaman |
śaśaṃsurmunayo devāssādhusādhviti cābruvat || 44 ||

atrānyestrairamoghaiśca daityānājaghnurāhave |
yāvattu senayornaiva jayayuddhaṃ samāpayet || 45 ||
iti śrīpādmapurāṇe prathame sṛṣṭikhaṃḍe traipurivimardonāma catussaptatitamo'dhyāyaḥ || 74 ||

vyāsa uvāca |
śrutvā maheśvarādvākyaṃ devāḥ śakrapurogamāḥ |
dudruvurdaityasaṃghāṃstānsarve sarvānsamaṃtataḥ || 1 ||

ājagāma mahābāhuḥ kuṃbho nāma mahāsuraḥ |
nairṛto yakṣarājānaṃ gadayā cāhanadbhṛśam || 2 ||

guhyakeśo gadāpātairjaghāna bhṛśamuttamam |
tatonyonyaṃ gadāyuddhamabhavadbhīṣaṇaṃ tayoḥ || 3 ||

cakrabaṃdhaṃ mahābaṃdhaṃ purovadhyanibaṃdhanam |
prācuraṃ bhīṣaṇaṃ yānaṃ sphoṭatailābhivāstikam || 4 ||

tena kṛtvā mahāyuddhamavasāne dhaneśvaraḥ |
pātayāmāsa taṃ sphoṭaṃ tasya kuṃbhasya corasi || 5 ||

bhagnadaṃṣṭrastataḥ kuṃbho nipapāta mahītale |
syaṃdanastho mahāvīryo jaṃbho harihayaṃ tadā || 6 ||

jaghānaśarasaṃghaiśca tathaivairāvaṇaṃ bhṛśam |
vāsavo bhidureṇaiva saṃbibhedāsurottamam || 7 ||

sa papāta dharāpṛṣṭhe gatāsurlohitokṣitaḥ |
tathāraṇyaṃ sughoraṃ ca aghoraṃ ghorameva ca || 8 ||

caturo gaṇamukhyāṃśca śaktyā bibheda saṃyuge |
senānyaścaiva pratyekaṃ pātayāmāsa lāghavāt || 9 ||

saurabhaṃ śarasaṃghaiśca jayaṃto vaśamānayat |
śaktihastaṃ ca saṃhrādaṃ yamadaṃḍaṃ narāṃtakam || 10 ||

hatvā ca pātayāmāsa sa bhasmīkṛtavigrahaḥ |
kālaśca khaḍgapātena pātayāmāsa bābhravam || 11 ||

śaktyā mṛtyurbibhedāśvaṃ tathā nirghṛṇakaṃ raṇe |
agninā dahyamānāśca saptaite ca mahābalāḥ || 12 ||

bhadrabāhurmahābāhuḥ sugaṃdho gaṃdha eva ca |
bhauriko valliko bhīma ete senāgragāminaḥ || 13 ||

raṇe saṃdagdhadehāśca petururvyāṃ gatāsavaḥ |
pāśabaddhā mahāvīryā varuṇasya mahātmanaḥ || 14 ||

petururvyāṃ mahāsatvāḥ śūrāḥ śūrabhayānakāḥ |
śūrasya raśmijālena nihatāḥ pañcadānavāḥ || 15 ||

turutuṃburudurmedhassādhakā sādhakābhidhāḥ |
krūra krauṃca raṇeśāna modasaṃmoda ṣaṇmukhāḥ || 16 ||

śarairnipātitā daityāḥ saṃyuge mātariśvanā |
nairṛto gadayā bhīmaṃ pātayāmāsa bhūtale || 17 ||

śūlapātaiśca rudrāṇāṃ śataśo daityadānavāḥ |
nipetuḥ saṃyuge bhītāḥ saṃmukhā raṇapaṃḍitāḥ || 18 ||

vasūnāṃ śarapātaiśca śūrāṇāṃ raśmimālinām |
meghānāṃ karakābhiśca vajrapātaissudāruṇaiḥ || 19 ||

nipātitā raṇe daityāḥ śataśo balaśālinaḥ |
kuberasya gadāpātairnipataṃti sahasraśaḥ || 20 ||

śakrasya bhidureṇaiva bheditā daityapuṃgavāḥ |
asaṃkhyātāḥ pataṃtyurvyāṃ skaṃdaśaktyā tathā hatāḥ || 21 ||

gaṇeśaparśupātena pataṃti mukhyamukhyakāḥ |
vaikuṃṭhakaramuktena cakreṇa tīvrakarmaṇā || 22 ||

daityānāṃ pravarāṇāṃ ca śirāṃsi nipataṃti kau |
śamano yamadaṃḍena koṭikoṭisahasraśaḥ || 23 ||

apātayattadā bhūmyāṃ kālaḥ khaḍgena dānavān |
mṛtyuśśaktyā tathā daityānpāśī pāśena cāparān || 24 ||

pātena takṣakādīnāṃ sudhāṃśoḥ śiśireṇa ca |
aśvārohī kharomanyohanipāśastathā gajān || 25 ||

parigheṇa gajaṃ kuṃbhe daityānāṃ nāśayattataḥ |
evamaśvāngajāṃścaiva lāghavātsa nyapātayat || 26 ||

evaṃ siddhaiśca gaṃdharvairapsarobhirmahābalaiḥ |
anyābhirdevatābhiśca samātṛgaṇanāyakaiḥ || 27 ||

nipātitā mahoghorā ye te pralayadānavāḥ |
śaraiśca khaḍgapātaiśca śūlaśaktiparaśvadhaiḥ || 28 ||

yaṣṭiparighakuṃtaiśca pātayaṃtyasurānsurāḥ |
evaṃ saṃkṣīyamāṇeṣu daityarāṭsamapadyata || 29 ||

ādityarathasaṃkāśaṃ ratharatnavibhūṣitam |
śātakuṃbhamayaṃ divyaṃ ghaṃṭācāmarabhūṣitam || 30 ||

patākādhvajasaṃpūrṇaṃ ramyaṃ śakrarathopamam |
samāruhya mahāvīro hiraṇyākṣo'surādhipaḥ || 31 ||

jaghāna śarajālaiśca durnivāryaḥ surāsuraiḥ |
sasainyāni gajānvīro rathāṃśca saha saiṃdhavān || 32 ||

pātayāmāsa bhūmau ca śataśotha sahasraśaḥ |
evaṃ caransa vṛṃdeṣu nikhileṣu divaukasām || 33 ||

pātayāmāsa daityeṃdraḥ śaraughānmṛtyusannibhān |
krameṇa samare cātha devasainyānyamaṃthata || 34 ||

yathā puṣkariṇīvṛṃde gajaḥ kaṃjavanaṃ śitaiḥ |
śarapātairatho vegātsiṃhanādaiḥ punaḥ punaḥ || 35 ||

dharaṇyāṃ patitā vegāttadā daityeśvarasya ca |
daśabhiśca sutīkṣṇāgrairjayaṃtaṃ sa jaghāna ha || 36 ||

remaṃtaṃ paṃcabhirbāṇaiḥ śakraṃ paṃcadaśena tu |
citrarathaṃ viṃśatibhiḥpaṃcaviṃśatibhirguham || 37 ||

heraṃbaṃ triśareṇaiva catvāriṃśaccharairyamam |
tathaiva kālaṃ mṛtyuṃ ca pāṇinā dviguṇena ca || 38 ||

guhyakeśaṃ jagatprāṇaṃ daśabhirdaśabhiḥ śaraiḥ |
ṣaḍibhaśca saptabhiścaiva rudrānsarvānpṛthakpṛthak || 39 ||

vasūnsarvāṃśca saśaraiḥ siddhagaṃdharvapannagān |
daśāṣṭadaśabhiḥ ṣaḍibharyuddhe devānbhinattyasau || 40 ||

ojaughādativīryāttu śīghralāghavardaśanān |
āpatprāptāḥ surā bhītyā pratikartuṃ na ceśvarāḥ || 41 ||

maheśaśūlasaṃkāśaiḥ śarairmarmavibhedibhiḥ |
tāḍitā nirjarā yuddhe mūrcchitā dharaṇīṃ yayuḥ || 42 ||

tasyaiva saṃmukhe sthātuṃ na śekuḥ pravarāssurāḥ |
tato devā vinirdhūtāstridiveśena saṃyutāḥ || 43 ||

śaraṇyaṃ te hariṃ tatra śaraṇaṃ tāḍitā yayuḥ |
etasminnaṃtare viṣṇuḥ prāha jiṣṇuṃ khageśvaram || 44 ||

adhunā gaccha daityasya saṃmukhaṃ raṇamūrdhani |
nāśāya satatastūrṇaṃ gatastasyāṃtikaṃ javāt || 45 ||

sarathaṃ mārgaṇairbhitvā viṣṇumārodhayajjavam |
rathasya saṃmukhe daitya uvāca viṣṇumavyayam || 46 ||

anya sṛṣṭiṃ karomyadya hatvā tvāṃ ca sanirjjaram |
tato viṣṇuruvācedaṃ garjaṃtaṃ daityapuṃgavam || 47 ||

śaktastvaṃ sparddhane pāpa yadi yuddhe sthiro bhava |
tataḥ śaraśataireva jaghāna viṣṇumavyayam || 48 ||

asaṃbhrāṃtaḥ sa ciccheda yamadaṃḍanibhānśarān |
punaḥ śarasahasrāṇi prerayāmāsa taṃ raṇe || 49 ||

tāṃśca chitvā śaraiḥ śauristaṃ ca vivyādha mārgaṇaiḥ |
pragauravādahāryābhaiḥ saṃsparśādbāḍavānalaiḥ || 50 ||

śaraiśca bhedakaistīkṣṇaiḥ khagamaiśca manojavaiḥ |
lāghavātkeśavāstrasya tūlaśuṣkatṛṇopamaiḥ || 51 ||

haimaiḥ śarasahasraistu tāḍito daityapuṃgavaḥ |
bādhayābhyarditaḥ kruddho dhṛtvā śikhariṇaṃ raṇe || 52 ||

jaghāna mādhavaṃ vegāddhiraṇyākṣo mahābalaḥ |
taṃ ca saṃcūrṇayāmāsa gadayā līlayā hariḥ || 53 ||

evaṃ parvatasāhasraṃ pātitaṃ tu krameṇa hi |
tathaiva lāghavāccūrṇaṃ hariṇā dānavāriṇā || 54 ||

punarbāhusahasrāṇi kṛtvāsau dānavottamaḥ |
śaraiḥ śaktibhiratyugraiḥ śūlaiḥ paraśukādibhiḥ || 55 ||

vavarṣa bahubhirviṣṇuṃ krodhāviṣṭena cetasā |
tāṃstu tenaiva prahitāṃściccheda surasattamaḥ || 56 ||

śarairdīptairmahāghorairasurāṇāṃ bhayaṃkaraiḥ |
vivyādha sarvagātreṣu śaṃbhuśūlopamaiśśaraiḥ || 57 ||

dānavādhipatiḥ saṃkhye hyavyayo harirīśvaraḥ |
sa ca kaśmalatāṃ gatvā sarvaśaktimanuttamām || 58 ||

kālajihvopamāṃ ghorāmaṣṭaghaṃṭāsamanvitām |
harerurasi pīne ca vidrutyā pātayaddrutam || 59 ||

śuśubhe sa suraśreṣṭhastaḍittvatsāndrameghavat |
tataśca cukruśurdaityā jayeti sādhuvādinaḥ || 60 ||

tataścakraṃ daityasainye dānavārirvyasarjayat |
teṣāṃ śirāṃsi saṃcchidya mādhavaṃ punarāgamat || 61 ||

sa daityaṃ śaktipātena pātayāmāsa vai raṇe |
cirātsaṃjñāṃ samālaṃbya vahnibāṇena keśavam || 62 ||

nijaghāna raṇe kruddho hariḥ kauberamākṣipat |
tato mumoca māyāstraṃ cāsuraṃ cātidāruṇam || 63 ||

siṃhavyāghralulāyāṃśca tadvaddvipa sarīsṛpān |
jaghāna samare viṣṇuṃ hiraṇyākṣaḥ pratāpavān || 64 ||

tato māyāstrasaṃbhūtānśastrāstraughānraṇe hariḥ |
praciccheda śaraireva śūlenaivamatāḍayat || 65 ||

sa vihvalita sarvāṃgastatkṣaṇaṃ lohitokṣitaḥ |
vicakarṣa haranviṣṇurasṛgviplutavigrahaḥ || 66 ||

tacchūlaṃ ca tribhirbāṇaiḥ pravivyādha surādhipaḥ |
varūthaṃ sadhvajaṃ ketuṃ rathaṃ caivātapatrakam || 67 ||

yaṃtāraṃ ca praciccheda daśabhiśca hariḥ śaraiḥ |
pātite ca rathe daityaḥ saṃplutyātha rathaṃ param || 68 ||

āruroha sa daityeṃdraḥ saṃmukhaṃ cākarodbalī |
tato yuddhaṃ mahāghoramabhavallomaharṣaṇam || 69 ||

hiraṇyākṣasya ca harerlokavismāpanaṃ mahat |
astrayuddhaṃ tathānyonyaṃ kṛtapratikṛtaṃ ca tat || 70 ||

tato niyuddhe satataṃ divyavarṣaśataṃ gatam |
tato daityo mahāsatvo vavṛdhe vāmano yathā || 71 ||

mukhena jagrāha ruṣā trailokyaṃ sacarācaram |
bhūmaṃḍalaṃ samuddhṛtya viveśa ca rasātalam || 72 ||

śeṣāśca viviśurdaityāstamanu prītisaṃyutāḥ |
tato viṣṇurmahātejā jñātvā daityabalaṃ mahat || 73 ||

dadhāra rūpaṃ vārāhaṃ daityarājajighāṃsayā |
dhṛtvā kroḍatanuṃ viṣṇurviveśa tamanudrutam || 74 ||

tatra gatvā rasāmūle rasātalagatāṃ mahīm |
dṛṣṭvā svadaṃṣṭrayordadhre lokādhārāṃ vasuṃdharām || 75 ||

tāṃ dhṛtvā gacchatastasya viṣṇoramitatejasaḥ |
samājagāma daityeṃdro dhṛṣṭaṃ vāgbhistudannanu || 76 ||

māyākroḍatanurviṣṇurdurvacāṃsi sahanruṣā |
jalopari dadhāremāṃ dharāṃ bhūdhara eva ca || 77 ||

tasyāṃ nyasya svasatvaṃ ca sa cakāra tadācalām |
tataḥ paścātsa saṃlagno daityarāṭsamupasthitaḥ || 78 ||

krodhena mahatāviṣṭo jaghāna gadayā harim |
māyayā sūkaro viṣṇustāṃ gadāṃ samavaṃcayat || 79 ||

yogayukto yathā mṛtyuṃ kaumodakyāhanacca tam |
tataḥ punā ruṣāviṣṭo hiraṇyākṣo mahābalaḥ || 80 ||

muṣṭinā prāharaddevaṃ dakṣiṇe tu bhuje prabhoḥ |
evaṃ yuddhaṃ mahāghoraṃ savyāsavyaṃ gatāgatam || 81 ||

paribhramaṇavikṣepaṃ kṛtānukaraṇaṃ tathā |
tato brahmādayo devā yuddhaṃ paśyaṃti khe sthitāḥ || 82 ||

svasti prajābhyo devebhya ṛṣibhyaśceti cābruvan |
ūcuśca devadeveśaṃ viṣṇuṃ vārāharūpiṇam || 83 ||

mā krīḍa bālavaddeva jahyamuṃ devakaṃṭakam |
tato viṣṇurmahātejā māyāvārāharūpadhṛt || 84 ||

brahmādyanumatiṃ prāpya cakraṃ prākṣipadulbaṇam |
sahasrasūryasaṃkāśaṃ sahasrāraṃ mahāprabham || 85 ||

daityāṃtakaraṇaṃ raudraṃ pralayāgnisamaprabham |
taccakraṃ viṣṇunā muktaṃ hiraṇyākṣaṃ mahābalam || 86 ||

cakāra bhasmasātsadyo brahmādīnāṃ ca paśyatām |
daityāṃtakaraṇaṃ raudraṃ cakraṃ cāgamadacyutam || 87 ||

tato brahmādayo devāḥ śakramukhyāśca lokapāḥ |
dṛṣṭvā ca vijayaṃ viṣṇoḥ stuvaṃti sma samāgatāḥ || 88 ||

devā ūcuḥ |
natāḥ sma viṣṇuṃ jagadādibhūtaṃ surāsureṃdraṃ jagatāṃ prapālakam |
yannābhipadmātkila padmayonirbabhūva taṃ vai śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ smaḥ || 89 ||

namonamo matsyavapurddharāya namostu te kacchaparūpadhāriṇe |
namaḥ prakurmaśca nṛsiṃharūpiṇe tathā punarvāmanarūpiṇe namaḥ || 90 ||

namostu te kṣatravināśanāya rāmāya rāmāya daśāsyanāśine |
pralaṃbahaṃtre śitivāsase namo namostu buddhāya ca daityamohine || 91 ||

mlecchāṃtakāyāpi ca kalkināmne namaḥ punaḥ kroḍavapurdharāya |
jagaddhitārthaṃ ca yugeyuge bhavānbibharti rūpaṃ tvasurābhavāya || 92 ||

niṣūdito'yaṃ hyadhunā kila tvayā daityo hiraṇyākṣa iti pragalbhaḥ |
yaśceṃdramukhyānkilalokapālānsaṃhelayā caiva tiraścakāra || 93 ||

sa vai tvayā devahitārthameva nipātito devavara prasīda |
tvamasya viśvasya visargakartā brāhmeṇa rūpeṇa ca devadeva || 94 ||

pātā tvamevāsya yugeyuge ca rūpāṇi dhatse sumanoharāṇi |
tvameva kālāgniharaśca bhūtvā viśvaṃ kṣayaṃ neṣyasi cāṃtakāle || 95 ||

ato bhavāneva ca viśvakāraṇaṃ na te paraṃ jīvamajīvamīśa |
yatkiṃca bhūtaṃ ca bhaviṣyarūpaṃ pravarttamānaṃ ca tathaiva rūpam || 96 ||

sarvaṃ tvamevāsi carācarākhyaṃ na bhāti viśvaṃ tvadṛte ca kiṃcit |
astīti nāstīti ca bhedaniṣṭhaṃ tvayyeva bhātaṃ sadasatsvarūpam || 97 ||

tato bhavaṃtaṃ katamopi deva na jñātumarhatyavipakvabuddhiḥ |
ṛte bhavatpādaparāyaṇaṃ janaṃ tenāgatā smaśśaraṇaṃ śaraṇyam || 98 ||

vyāsa uvāca |
tato viṣṇuḥ prasannātmā uvāca tridivaukasaḥ |
tuṣṭosmi devā bhadraṃ vo yuṣmatstotreṇa sāṃpratam || 99 ||

ya idaṃ prapaṭhedbhaktyā vijayastotramādarāt |
na tasya durlabhaṃ devāstriṣulokeṣu kiṃcana || 100 ||

gavāṃ śatasahasrasya samyagdattasya yatphalam |
tatphalaṃ samavāpnoti kīrtanācchravaṇānnaraḥ || 101 ||

sarvakāmapradaṃ nityaṃ devadevasya kīrtanam |
ataḥ paraṃ mahājñānaṃ na bhūtaṃ na bhaviṣyati || 102 ||
iti śrīpādmapurāṇe prathame sṛṣṭikhaṃḍe devāsurasaṃgrāmasamāptau vijayastotraṃnāma paṃcasaptatitamo'dhyāyaḥ || 75 ||

saṃjaya uvāca |
ye'surāśca mṛtā yuddhe saṃmukhe vimukhe'pi vā |
gatiṃ teṣāmahaṃ brahmanśrotumicchāmi tattvataḥ || 1 ||

asaṃkhyātā ime daityāstrailokye sacarācare |
adyāpyāsangatāḥ kutra etanme śaṃsa bho guro || 2 ||

vyāsa uvāca |
ye mṛtāssaṃmukhe śūrā daityānāṃ pravarā raṇe |
svayaṃ prāpya ca devatvaṃ bhogyamaśnaṃti śāśvatam || 3 ||

prāsādā yatra sauvarṇā nānāratnāvibhūṣitāḥ |
sarvakāmapradā vṛkṣāḥ svarṇadītoya saṃyutāḥ || 4 ||

padmotpalasukalhārairgaṃdhāḍhyairanyapuṣpakaiḥ |
dadhidugdhājyakhaṃḍaiśca yutā puṣkariṇī śubhā || 5 ||

atīvarūpasaṃpannāḥ sadaiva navayauvanāḥ |
tatra rājyaṃ prakurvaṃti tathaiva vasudhātale || 6 ||

evaṃ janmāṣṭakaṃ prāpya dhanino'dhyakṣamaṃtriṇaḥ |
ardhasaṃmukhagātreṇa divamaśnaṃti śāśvatam || 7 ||

vimukhāḥ kātarā bhītā ye ca māyāvino raṇe |
te yāṃti nirayaṃ ghoraṃ ye ca devadvijadviṣaḥ || 8 ||

patitaṃ mūrcchitaṃ bhagnamanyayoddhāramāhave |
haṃtāro nirayaṃ yāṃti te ca mlecchāḥ kuvācakāḥ || 9 ||

paranyāsāpahartāro vimukhāssaṃti tattvataḥ |
rātrau vā vipine naṣṭe corāssāhasakāriṇaḥ || 10 ||

sarvabhakṣaratā mūḍhā mlecchā gobrahmaghātakāḥ |
kuvācakāḥ pare mlecchā ete ye kūṭayonayaḥ || 11 ||

teṣāṃ paiśācikī bhāṣā lokācāro na vidyate |
nāsti śaucaṃ tapo jñānaṃ na devapitṛtarpaṇam || 12 ||

dānaśrāddhādikaṃ yajñe surāṇāṃ ca prapūjanam |
pitṝṇāṃ ca na śuśrūṣā dvijadevatapasvinām || 13 ||

jñānalopādatasteṣāṃ malaśaucaṃ na vidyate |
mātaraṃ bhaginīṃ cānyāṃ gṛhiṇīṃ kāmayaṃti ca || 14 ||

sarvo viparyayo lokātsadācāro malīmasaḥ |
tārkṣyasyodvavanānāṃ ca anyeṣāṃ gotravāsinām || 15 ||

kulajātāssadā daityā yeṣāṃ puṇyamakāraṇam |
durgatiṃ ca mṛtā yāṃti dvijastrīśiśughātinaḥ || 16 ||

gavāśino durātmāno hyabhakṣyabhakṣaṇe ratāḥ |
kīṭayoniṃ vrajaṃtyete taravaśca pipīlikāḥ || 17 ||

na maṃtreṣu na deveṣu kalpaṃte te suradviṣaḥ |
agrajaḥ sahajasteṣāṃ sadṛṅno grāmyavṛttayaḥ || 18 ||

lomakeśapraṇetāraḥ kravyabhakṣaratā bhuvi |
sāhasaṃ ca vrataṃ dānaṃ snānaṃ yajñādikaṃ ca yat || 19 ||

matsyamāṃsādiṣu prītā mṛṣāvacanabhāṣiṇaḥ |
sadākāmāssadā lobhāssadā krodhamadānvitāḥ || 20 ||

vadhabaṃdharatodvegā dyūtasaṃgītasaṃpriyāḥ |
kubhṛtyāḥ kujanaprītāḥ pūtigaṃdharatā narāḥ || 21 ||

na deveṣu na vijñeṣu na dharmaśravaṇeṣu ca |
stotramaṃtrādike puṇye yathākāryeṣvaniścayāḥ || 22 ||

bahurogādhiroṣāśca bahurūpaparicchadāḥ |
narajātiṣu daityānāṃ cihnānyetāni bhūtale || 23 ||

na jānaṃti paraṃ lokaṃ na guruṃ svaṃ na cāparaṃ |
garbhapūraṇamicchaṃti nātithiṃ na gurūndvijān || 24 ||

na devaṃ na sutaṃ gotraṃ na mitraṃ na ca bāndhavaṃ |
svapne dānaṃ na jānaṃti bhakṣaṇānna paricchadaṃ || 25 ||

gopāyaṃti dhanaṃ yasmātte yakṣā nararūpiṇaḥ |
prāṇāṃtepi dhanaṃ kicinna diśaṃti ca rājani || 26 ||

te yakṣā durgatisthāśca parārthe bhāravāhakāḥ |
pretānāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ yadvā sarvalokavigarhitaṃ || 27 ||

strīṇāṃ ca puruṣāṇāṃ ca śṛṇuṣvaikamanā mama |
malapaṃkadharā nityaṃ satyaśaucavivarjitāḥ || 28 ||

daṃtakuṃtalavastrāṇāṃ vapuṣo malasaṃcayāḥ |
gṛhapīṭhādipātrāṇāṃ sakṛcchaucaṃ na rocate || 29 ||

na paśyaṃti sukhaṃ strīṇāṃ viśaṃti kānane drutaṃ |
vighasocchiṣṭapūtīnāṃ bhakṣaṇebhiratā bhuvi || 30 ||

annapānaṃ ca śayanamandhakāreṣu rocate |
kadācitsvasthatā nāsti kvacidvā śucitātanau || 31 ||

lakṣaṇaṃ naralokeṣu pretānāmīdṛśaṃ kila |
hitāhitaṃ na jānaṃti mitrāmitraṃ guṇāguṇam || 32 ||

pāpapuṇyādikaṃ sthānaṃ snānaṃ devadvijārcanaṃ |
arimitramudāsīnaṃ na viṃdaṃti svabhāvataḥ || 33 ||

martyasthāḥ paśavaste ca jñāyaṃte buddhisaṃmataiḥ |
buddhyā nānātvabhāvāśca bhramaṃti ca mṛṣā bhuvi || 34 ||

yakṣarūpā narāste ca sarvakarmabahiṣkṛtāḥ |
eṣāṃ bhedaṃ pravakṣyāmi lakṣaṇaṃ dharaṇītale || 35 ||

vijātā martyalokeṣu pāpasyaivānurūpataḥ |
malīmasa bhuviprasthaṃ nāgaraṃ chadmarūpiṇaṃ || 36 ||

vighasādiprabhoktāraṃ kākamāhurmanīṣiṇaḥ |
abhakṣye nirataḥ pāpaḥ kukuraḥ pūtisaṃpriyaḥ || 37 ||

pravṛttassarvagṛhyeṣu bhakṣyābhakṣyasajīvanaḥ |
bhūmyāṃ paśvādiyonīnāṃ kuleṣu prāptasaṃbhavāḥ || 38 ||

śuno vigṛhya hastena mlecchānāṃ bhakṣaṇapriyāḥ |
viśeṣātsūkarāṇāṃ ca tathā ca raṇayodhināṃ || 39 ||

poṣaṇe bhakṣaṇe prītāḥ pūtigarhyeṣvasādhuṣu |
parvatekaraṇādvahneḥ kāṣṭhasaṃcayasaṃgrahe || 40 ||

vijñeyāste sadā mlecchāḥ kṣatriyāṇāṃ bhayākulāḥ |
lokānāṃ naṣṭadharme ca sadā śaucavivarjite || 41 ||

kulīnānāṃ tadā mlecchā bhaviṣyaṃti ca dasyavaḥ |
teṣāṃ saṃsargatonye ca saṃbaṃdhādannabhojanāt || 42 ||

maithunāttasya yoṣāsu tadbhāvaṃ tu vrajaṃti te |
tasminkāle janāssarve duḥkharogapratāpitāḥ || 43 ||

durbhikṣānna parāmūḍhāḥ sadā rājaprapīḍitāḥ |
tatrāsatyeratā martyāḥ sarvaśaucavivarjitāḥ || 44 ||

na śrūyaṃte janaireva purāṇāgamasaṃhitāḥ |
madyamāṃsapriyāḥ pāpāssarvabhakṣāssudāruṇāḥ || 45 ||

dāruṇācāraniratā nityaṃ chalaparāyaṇāḥ |
na puṣṇaṃti sutāstātaṃ prasuvaṃ ca gurūnapi || 46 ||

na śuśrūṣaṃti vai bhṛtyāḥ svāminaṃ guṇaśālinam |
bhartāraṃ na striyaḥ kāścicchvaśurau ca svamātaraḥ || 47 ||

nityakaṣṭā narāstatra kalahaśca gṛhe gṛhe |
nṛpā mlecchāḥ surāpāśca tathā maṃtripurohitāḥ || 48 ||

manuṣyaiśca balisteṣāṃ matsyairmāṃsairnirāmiṣaḥ |
pāṣaṃḍāyāsayogebhyaḥ pradhānā guṇavārtayoḥ || 49 ||

dhanikaiḥ kokilairmaṃdairvyāptaṃ taistu mahītalam |
tatonyonyaṃ priyā mūḍhā vane vā nagareṣu ca || 50 ||

bhakṣyābhakṣyaṃ samaśnaṃti matsyamāṃsādikaṃ narāḥ |
vane dvijātayaścānye bhuṃjate cānupāpakam || 51 ||

bhaktimaṃtaṃ paśuṃ cānyatsarve yāṃtyapunarbhavam |
pātayaṃti pitṝnpāpāḥ sarve te pūrvadevakāḥ || 52 ||

piśācā rākṣasā ye ca murtyakā guhyakā dhruvam |
ete cāvinayaprītā na devā na ca mānuṣāḥ || 53 ||

saṃjaya uvāca |
kathaṃ ca martyabhāveṣu lakṣaṃjānaṃtitāttvikāḥ |
etaṃ me saṃśayaṃ nātha dūrīkuru tatastataḥ || 54 ||

vyāsa uvāca |
kṛtapāpānurūpāstu dvijātiṣvanyajātiṣu |
asurā rākṣasāḥ pretāḥ svabhāvaṃ na tyajaṃti te || 55 ||

jātā ye cāsurā martye sadāte kalahotsukāḥ |
kuhakāḥ kaccarāḥ krūrāḥ vijñeyā rākṣasābhuvi || 56 ||

janodvignādikaṃ dānaṃ tathā devārcanaṃ bhuvi |
ugrabhāvāddhanaṃ labdhvā rājyaṃ bhuñjaṃti śāśvatam || 57 ||

jayaṃ śauryādikaṃ puṇyaṃ punaḥpāpakṣayaṃ vrajet |
evamurvyāṃ tathā nāke nāgaloke yamālaye || 58 ||

ugreṇa tapasā kaścitsuratvaṃ labhate divi |
vāsudevaṃ samārādhya prahlādaḥ surapūjitaḥ || 59 ||

haraṃ tathāndhako daityaḥ stutvā tatsabhyako'bhavat |
tasyaiva gaṇamukhyatvaṃ lebhe bhṛṃgī mahābalaḥ || 60 ||

ete cānye ca bahavo baliriṃdro bhaviṣyati |
gacchaṃti sadgatiṃ tāta ihāmutra ca sarvadā || 61 ||

keciddaityakule jātāḥ pṛthivyāṃ surasattamāḥ |
bhāvayaṃti pitṝnsarvānśataśotha sahasraśaḥ || 62 ||

ekenāpi suputreṇa kulatrāṇaṃ ca dhīmatā |
ekopi vaiṣṇavaḥ putraḥ kulakoṭiṃ samuddharet || 63 ||

jiteṃdriyopi dharmātmā dvijadevārcane rataḥ |
kṣaye dharme kalau śeṣe pure janapadeṣu ca || 64 ||

eko rakṣati dharmātmā pure grāmaṃ janaṃ kulam |
vijñātṛmeduraṃ cāsīdbrāhmaṇānāṃ puraṃ mahat || 65 ||

tatra sarve dvijāḥ śaśvatsaṃdhyopāsanatatparāḥ |
vedapāṭharatā dhīrā devātithidvijārcakāḥ || 66 ||

yajñavratāgnikarmāṇaḥ ṣaṭkarmapariniścayāḥ |
atikṛcchre ca teṣāṃ vai na pāpe vartate manaḥ || 67 ||

kurvaṃti satataṃ vīrā vrataṃ yajñaṃ sanātanam |
kadāciddaivayogācca gṛhasthaśca sa kovidaḥ || 68 ||

vahnau juhoti viprarṣi rājyaṃ maṃtreṇa maṃtravit |
tasminkāle ca tasyaiva mūtrakṛcchraṃ sudāruṇam || 69 ||

tatprojjhituṃ gataḥ sopi rakṣārthaṃ sthāpya ceṭikām |
tasyāstvanavadhānena śunā cājyaṃ ca bhakṣitam || 70 ||

bhiyā tayā tataḥ pātraṃ svīyamūtreṇa saṃbhṛtam |
asaṃlakṣyā juhodagnau sa viprastvarayā tataḥ || 71 ||

āścaryaṃ ca tato vahnau lakṣitaṃ tena tatkṣaṇāt |
kūṭaṃ hemamayaṃ sākṣātsvarṇaṃ jāṃbūnadaprabhaṃ || 72 ||

gṛhītvā tanmudā vipraḥ pāpayogaṃ cakāra ha |
papraccha vismayāddāsīṃ kathametadvada priye || 73 ||

mudā tatra yathāvṛttaṃ kathitaṃ tu tayā dvija |
tato nityaṃ yathākālaṃ tacca tasya pravartate || 74 ||

samṛddhiradbhutā gehe lokavismayakāriṇī |
tataḥ parasparācchrutvā sarvaireva ca tatpure || 75 ||

kṛtaṃ karma durācāraṃ śrutvā lobhādasādhubhiḥ |
gurulobhācca sumahatsvāṃte paṃkaṃ viśatyapi || 76 ||

paṃkādeva bhayānmohānmatibhraṃśo'bhavattataḥ |
atha kilbiṣakūṭena dagdhameva puraṃ ca tat || 77 ||

striyo duṣṭā janā duṣṭāḥ sarve pāpabalāttadā |
vṛddho jñātā dvijastatra tatkārye na matiṃ dadhau || 78 ||

tasya bhāryā tadā sādhvī puruduḥkhena saṃyutā |
bhartāraṃ kṛcchrasantaptā purakāryaṃ jagāda sā || 79 ||

brāhmaṇyuvāca |
kaṣṭaṃ me vartate nātha dṛṣṭvā tvāṃ duḥkhasaṃyutam |
grāmācāramimaṃ yadvāpya'paraṃ kartumarhasi || 80 ||

tatastatra sa doṣajñaḥ smitvā vacanamabravīt |
yastu jīvati pāpena tyaktvā dharmaṃ paraṃ hitam || 81 ||

sa vaidheyo mahābhāge pragacchatyapunarbhavam |
ete viprā durācārāḥ sadārāssaparicchadāḥ || 82 ||

atipātakayogācca mahāpātakasaṃmatāḥ |
saha pāpena mahatā prayāsyaṃti rasātalam || 83 ||

aṃte'punarbhavaṃ prāpyāparādhāṃto na vidyate |
ahamekotra tiṣṭhāmi svapuṇyaparirakṣaṇāt || 84 ||

tatassā tamuvācedaṃ lokahāsyavacastava |
vaktumarhasi naścāgre na puro'nyasya kasyacit || 85 ||

dvija uvāca |
yadi yāsyāmi cānyatra ito'haṃ tatkṣaṇātpriye |
savittaiḥ svajanaireva purīyāsyatyathogatim || 86 ||

ityuktvā paramaprītaḥ saṃgṛhya ca dhanaṃ svakam |
kṣipraṃ sa ca tayā sārdhaṃ yayau sīmāṃtaraṃ dvijaḥ || 87 ||

sthitvā'paśyatpurī tāvatsthirā tiṣṭhati pūrvavat |
sā cāha taṃ patiṃ sādhvī purī ceyaṃ na naśyati || 88 ||

vimṛśyatāmuvācedaṃ vipravaryassuvismitaḥ |
kiṃ nu tiṣṭhati tatraiva dravyamasmadgṛhādbahiḥ || 89 ||

vicārya sā dhavaṃ prāha mayā bhrāṃtyā upānahau |
nānīte tiṣṭhatastatra dhārayiṣyāmi kiṃ nu vai || 90 ||

evamuktvā patiṃ sādhvī gṛhītvā te upāgatā |
patyurabhyāśato dṛṣṭaṃ puraṃ nirvyathanaṃ gatam || 91 ||

tato viprādayo varṇāḥ kaccarāḥ puravāsinaḥ |
tiṣṭhaṃti narake ghore duḥkhitāścāpunarbhave || 92 ||

kṛcchādyamapuraṃ yāṃti nāsti teṣāṃ ca niṣkṛtiḥ |
pūtigaṃdhaṃ tato medhyaṃ varjanīyaṃ prakīrtitam || 93 ||

pūrvavadbhakṣaṇe prīto hyadyapāpaṃ karoti ca |
steyaśīlo niśācārī budhairjñeyassa vaṃcakaḥ || 94 ||

abudhaḥ sarvakāryeṣu ajñātaḥ sarvakarmasu |
samayācārahīnastu paśureva sa bāliśaḥ || 95 ||

evamuṣṭrādayassaṃti bhakṣādi nakulādayaḥ |
hiṃsro jñātijanodvegarite yuddhe ca kātaraḥ || 96 ||

vighasādipriyo nityaṃ naraḥ śvā kīrtito budhaiḥ |
cauryakarmarato nityaṃ bahumitrapravaṃcakaḥ || 97 ||

mithune kalaho nityaṃ martyastu parikīrtitaḥ |
prakṛtyā capalo nityaṃ sadā bhojanacaṃcalaḥ || 98 ||

plavagaḥ kānanaprīto naraḥ śākhāmṛgo bhuvi |
sūcako bhāṣayā budhyā svajane'nyajaneṣu ca || 99 ||

udvegajanakatvācca sa pumānuragaḥ smṛtaḥ |
balavānkrāṃtaśīlaśca satataṃ cānapatrapaḥ || 100 ||

pūtimāṃsapriyo bhogī nṛsiṃhassamudāhṛtaḥ |
tatsvanādeva sīdaṃti bhītā anye vṛkādayaḥ || 101 ||

dviradādi narā ye ca jñāyaṃte dūradarśinaḥ |
evamādi krameṇaiva vijānīyānnareṣu ca || 102 ||

surāṇāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ brūmo nararūpaṃ vyavasthitam |
dvijadevātithīnāṃ ca gurusādhutapasvinām || 103 ||

pūjātaporatonityaṃ dharmaśāstreṣu nītiṣu |
kṣamāśīlo jitakrodhaḥ satyavādī jiteṃdriṃyaḥ || 104 ||

dayālurdayito loke rūpavānmadhurasvaraḥ |
vāgīśaḥ sarvakāryeṣu guṇī dakṣo mahābalaḥ || 105 ||

sākṣaraścāpi vidvāṃśca gītanṛtyārthatattvavit |
ātmavidyādikāryeṣu sarvataṃtrīsvareṣu ca || 106 ||

haviṣyeṣu ca sarveṣu gavyeṣu ca nirāmiṣe |
sadyogāsvādadravye ca pratyagre cātiśobhane || 107 ||

gaṃdhamālyeṣu vastreṣu śāstreṣvābharaṇeṣu ca |
saṃprītaścātithau dāne pārvaṇādiṣu karmasu || 108 ||

snānadānādibhiḥ kārye vratairyajñaiḥ surārcanaiḥ |
kālo gacchati pāṭhaiśca na klībaṃ vāsaraṃ bhavet || 109 ||

ayameva manuṣyāṇāṃ sadācāro niraṃtaram |
devavanmānavācāro gīyate munisattamaiḥ || 110 ||

kiṃtu sattvādhiko devo manuṣyo bhīta eva ca |
gaṃbhīraḥ sarvadā devaḥ sadaiva mānavo mṛduḥ || 111 ||

dvayostutyā ca saṃprītirna daityādau bhavetkila |
prītibhāvaṃ paraṃ saukhyaṃ sauhṛdaṃ sukṛtaṃ śubham || 112 ||

daivamānuṣayoreva daityarākṣasayostathā |
pretādīnāṃ ca preteṣu paśau prītiḥ paśorapi || 113 ||

kākādayaḥ svajātau ca tathānye ca svajātiṣu |
prītā bhavaṃti cāprītā vidyā teṣāṃ ca lakṣaṇam || 114 ||

evaṃ puṇyaviśeṣeṇa saviśeṣā sujātiṣu |
priyāpriyaṃ vijānīyātpuṇyāpuṇyaṃ guṇāguṇam || 115 ||

daṃpatyorna sukhaṃ kiṃcijjātibhedānnṛṇāṃ bhuvi |
svajātiṣu bhavetprītirmukto vā nirayepi vā || 116 ||

atipuṇyāllabhedāyuḥ śobhanāḥ puṇyakāriṇaḥ |
pāpātmāno labhaṃte'ntaṃ ye ca daityādayo narāḥ || 117 ||

kṛte jātāḥ surā bhūmau na daityāścānyajātayaḥ |
tretāyāmekapādaṃ ca dvipadaṃ dvāpare yuge || 118 ||

saṃdhyāyāṃ ca kalereva sarvapādaṃ ca saṃkulam |
devādīnāṃ bhavejjātaṃ bhārataṃ yatpravartitam || 119 ||

ye te duryodhanasyaiva yodhāḥ sainyādayastathā |
te ca daityādayaḥ sarve ye ca karṇādayo bhuvi || 120 ||

gāṃgeyo vasumukhyaśca droṇo devamuniḥ prabhuḥ |
aśvatthāmā haraḥ sākṣāddharirnaṃdakulodbhavaḥ || 121 ||

paṃceṃdrāḥ pāṃḍavā jātā viduro dharma eva ca |
gāṃdhārī draupadī kuṃtī caitā devyo dharātale || 122 ||

devadaityāḥ kalermadhye daityāśśeṣe ca mānavāḥ |
utpatsyaṃte sadā pretāḥ kravyādāḥ paśupakṣiṇaḥ || 123 ||

teṣāṃ ca kulaṭā dāsī nityakaṣṭā yavīyasī |
nityaṃ dvaṃdveṣu saṃprītyā teṣāmācārabhāṣiṇī || 124 ||

kilbiṣeṣu ca sarveṣu kalahe'nyāyakarmaṇi |
ratā daityādayo ye te sarve nirayagāminaḥ || 125 ||

vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca |
daityādīnāṃ mṛṣābhāvātsuratvaṃ na surālayam |
kathaṃ bhogyaṃ kathaṃ saukhyamārogyaṃ balasaṃcayam || 126 ||

rājyamāyustathā kīrtirabhīṣṭaṃ dayitaṃ balam |
nītividyādikaṃ bhāvyaṃ janmavṛddhaṃ sanātanam || 127 ||

dānādhyayanakarmāṇi yajñādi ca kathaṃ prabho |
etadāptāya śiṣyāya mahyaṃ bho vaktumarhasi || 128 ||

vyāsa uvāca |
daityānāṃ sāhasādeva tapo bhavati niścitam |
vrataṃ yajñādikaṃ caiva saṃprītiḥ svajanasya ca || 129 ||

yo dāṃto viguṇairmukto nītiśāsrārthatattvagaḥ |
etaiśca vividhaiḥ pūtaḥ sa bhavetsuralakṣaṇaḥ || 130 ||

purāṇāgamakarmāṇi nākeṣvatra ca vai dvija |
svayamācarate puṇyaṃ sa dharoddharaṇakṣamaḥ || 131 ||

viśeṣādvaiṣṇavaṃ dṛṣṭvā prīyate pūjayecca yaḥ |
vimuktassarvapāpebhyassa dharoddharaṇakṣamaḥ || 132 ||

ṣaṭkarmanirato viprassarvayajñaratassadā |
dharmākhyānapriyo nityaṃ sa dharoddharaṇakṣamaḥ || 133 ||

viśvāsaghātino ye ca kṛtaghnā vratalopinaḥ |
dvijadeveṣu vidviṣṭāḥ śātayaṃti dharāṃ narāḥ || 134 ||

ye ca madyaratāḥ pāpā dyūtakarmaratāstathā |
pāṣaṃḍapatitālāpāḥ śātayaṃti dharāṃ narāḥ || 135 ||

sukarmarahitā ye ca nityodvegāśca nirbhayāḥ |
smṛtiśāstrārthakodvignāśśātayaṃti dharāṃ narāḥ || 136 ||

nijavṛttiṃ parityajya kurvaṃti cādhamāṃ ca ye |
guruniṃdāratā dveṣācchātayaṃti dharāṃ narāḥ || 137 ||

dātāraṃ ye rodhayaṃti pātake prerayaṃti ca |
dīnānāthānpīḍayaṃti śātayaṃti dharāṃ narāḥ || 138 ||

ete cānye ca bahavaḥ pāpakarmakṛto narāḥ |
puruṣānpātayitvā tu śātayaṃti dharāṃ narāḥ || 139 ||

ya idaṃ śṛṇuyādramyaṃ guhyādguhyaṃ paraṃ hitam |
na tasya durgatirduḥkhaṃ daurbhāgyaṃ dīnatā bhuvi || 140 ||

na daityādau bhavejjanma svarloke śāśvataṃ sukham |
nākāle maraṇaṃ tasya na ca pāpaiḥ pralipyate || 141 ||

iha sarvajanādhyakṣastridive tridiveśvaraḥ |
kalpaṃkalpaṃ divaṃ bhuktvā mokṣamārgaṃ vrajatyasau || 142 ||
iti śrīpādmapurāṇe prathame sṛṣṭikhaṃḍe puṇyavyaktirnāma ṣaṭsaptatitamo'dhyāyaḥ || 76 ||

vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca |
prabhavatyayamākāśe nityaṃ dvijavara prabho |
ko'yaṃ ko vā prabhāvosya kutra jāto ghṛṇīśvaraḥ || 1 ||

kiṃ karoti hi kāryaṃ vai yato raśmimayo bhṛśam |
devairmunivaraissiddhaiścāraṇairdaityarākṣasaiḥ || 2 ||

nikhilairmānuṣaiḥ pūjyaḥ sadaiva brāhmaṇādibhiḥ |
vyāsa uvāca |
paramaṃ brahmaṇastejo brahmadehādvinissṛtam || 3 ||

sākṣādbrahmamayaṃ viddhi dharmakāmārthamokṣadam |
mayūkhairnirmalaiḥ kūṭamaticaṃḍaṃ suduḥsaham || 4 ||

dṛṣṭvā pradudruvurlokāḥ karaiścaṃḍaiḥ prapīḍitāḥ |
tataśca sāgarāḥ sarve varanadyo nadādayaḥ || 5 ||

śuṣyaṃti jaṃtavastatra mriyaṃte cāturā janāḥ |
atha śakrādayo devā brahmāṇaṃ samupāgatāḥ || 6 ||

imamarthaṃ tadā procurdevāṃśca vidhirabravīt |
ādirbrahmatanordevāḥ sattvago janakaḥ prabhuḥ || 7 ||

ayaṃ rajomayaḥ sākṣātsudhāṃśustanumadhyagaḥ |
etābhyāṃ pālitā lokāstrailokye sacarācarāḥ || 8 ||

divyopapādakā devā ye vātraiva jarāyujāḥ |
aṃḍajāḥ svedajāścaiva ye vātraivodbhijjādayaḥ || 9 ||

sūryasyāsya prabhāvaṃ tu vaktumeva na śaknumaḥ |
anena rakṣitā lokā janitāḥ pālitā dhruvam || 10 ||

asyaiva sadṛśo nāsti sarveṣāṃ parirakṣaṇāt |
yaṃ ca dṛṣṭvāpyuṣaḥkāle pāparāśiḥ pralīyate || 11 ||

tamārādhya janā mokṣaṃ sādhayaṃti dvijātayaḥ |
saṃdhyopāsanakāle tu viprā brahmavidaḥ kila || 12 ||

udbāhavo bhavaṃtyeva te ca devaprapūjitāḥ |
asyaiva maṃḍalasthāṃ ca devīṃ saṃdhyāsvarūpiṇīṃ || 13 ||

samupāsya dvijāssarve labhaṃte svargamokṣakau |
dharāyāṃ patitocchiṣṭāḥ pūtāste cāsya raśmibhiḥ || 14 ||

saṃdhyopāsanamātreṇa kalmaṣātpūtatāṃ vrajet |
dṛṣṭvā cāṃḍālakaṃ goghnaṃ patitaṃ kuṣṭhasaṃgatam || 15 ||

mahāpātakasaṃkīrṇamupapātakasaṃvṛtam |
paśyaṃti ye narāssūraṃ te pūtā gurukilbiṣāt || 16 ||

asyopāsanamātreṇa sarvarogātpramucyate |
nāṃdhatvaṃ na ca dāridryaṃ duḥkhaṃ na ca śocyatām || 17 ||

labhate ca ihāmutra samupāsya virocanam |
adṛṣṭā naiva lokaiśca devā hariharādayaḥ || 18 ||

dhyānarūpapragamyāste dṛṣṭo devo hyayaṃ smṛtaḥ |
devā ūcuḥ |
astu prasādanārādhyaścāstūpāsanapūjanam || 19 ||

asyaiva darśanaṃ brahmanpralayānalasaṃmitam |
sarve narādayassatvā mṛtāvasthāṃ gatā bhuvi || 20 ||

asya tejaḥprabhāveṇa praṇaṣṭāssāgarādayaḥ |
na samarthā vayaṃ soḍhuṃ kathamanye pṛthagjanāḥ || 21 ||

tasmāttavaprasādācca pūjayāmo yathā ravim |
yajaṃti ca narā bhaktyā tadupāyo vidhīyatām || 22 ||

devānāṃ vacanaṃ śrutvā gato brahmakhageśvaram |
gatvā stotuṃ samārebhe sarvalokahitāya vai || 23 ||

devatvaṃ sarvalokasya cakṣurbhūto nirāmayaḥ |
brahmarūpadharaḥ sākṣādduṣprekṣyaḥ pralayānalaḥ || 24 ||

sarvadevasthitastvaṃ hi sadā vāyusakhastanau |
annādipācanaṃ tvatto jīvanaṃ ca bhaveddhruvam || 25 ||

utpattipralayau deva tvameko bhuvaneśvaraḥ |
tvadṛte sarvalokānāṃ dinaikaṃ nāsti jīvanam || 26 ||

prabhustvaṃ sarvalokānāṃ trātā goptā pitā prasūḥ |
carācarāṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ tvatprasādāddhṛtaṃ jagat || 27 ||

deveṣu tvatsamo nāsti bhagavaṃstvakhileṣu ca |
sarvatra te'sti sadbhāvastvayaiva dhāritaṃ jagat || 28 ||

rūpagaṃdhādikārī tvaṃ rasānāṃ svādutā tvayā |
evaṃ viśveśvaraḥ sūro nikhilasthitikārakaḥ || 29 ||

tīrthānāṃ puṇyakṣetrāṇāṃ makhānāṃ jagataḥ prabho |
tvamekaḥ prayato hetussarvasākṣī guṇākaraḥ || 30 ||

sarvajñaḥ sarvakartā ca hartā pātā sadotsukaḥ |
dhvāṃtapaṃkāmayaghnaśca dāridryaduḥkhanāśanaḥ || 31 ||

pretyeha ca paro baṃdhuḥ sarvajñaḥ sarvalocanaḥ |
tvadṛte sarvalokānāmupakārī na vidyate || 32 ||

āditya uvāca |
pitāmaha mahāprājña viśveṃdra viśvabhāvaka |
brūhi śīghraṃ paraṃ yatte kariṣyāmi mataṃ vidhe || 33 ||

brahmovāca |
mayūkhastvaticaṃḍaśca lokānāmatiduḥsahaḥ |
yathaiva mṛdutāmeti tathā kuru sureśvara || 34 ||

āditya uvāca |
kiraṇāḥ koṭikoṭirme lokanāśakarāḥ parāḥ |
na cābhīṣṭakarā loke prayogācchindhi tānprabho || 35 ||

tato viriṃcinā tūrṇaṃ ravivākyavaśāddhruvaṃ |
āhūya viśvakarmāṇaṃ kṛtvā vajramayīṃ bhrami || 36 ||

ciccheda ca raverbhānūnpralayānalasannibhān |
taireva racitaṃ tatra viṣṇoścakraṃ sudarśanam || 37 ||

amoghaṃ yamadaṃḍaṃ ca śūlaṃ paśupatestathā |
kālasya ca paraḥ khaḍgaśśaktirgurupramodinī || 38 ||

caṃḍikāyāḥ paraṃ śastraṃ vicitraṃ śūlakaṃ tathā |
cakre brahmājñayā śīghraṃ tenaiva viśvakarmaṇā || 39 ||

sahasrakiraṇaṃ śiṣṭamanyaccaiva praśātitam |
ajanopāyabhāvena punaśca kaśyapānmune || 40 ||

aditergarbhasaṃjāta āditya iti vai smṛtaḥ |
ayaṃ carati viśvāṃte meruśṛṃgaṃ bhramatyapi || 41 ||

sadordhvaṃ dinarātraṃ ca dharaṇyā lakṣayojane |
grahāścaṃdrādayastatra caraṃti vidhinoditāḥ || 42 ||

sūraḥ saṃcarate māsāndvādaśadvādaśātmakaḥ |
saṃkramādasya saṃkrāṃtiḥ sarvaireva pratīyate || 43 ||

tāsu yadvā phalaṃ brūmo lokānāṃ nikhilaṃ mune |
dhanurmithunamīneṣu kanyāyāṃ ṣaḍaśītayaḥ || 44 ||

vṛṣavṛścikakuṃbheṣu siṃhe viṣṇupadī smṛtā |
tarpaṇaṃ cākṣayaṃ viddhi dānaṃ devārcanaṃ tathā || 45 ||

ṣaḍaśītisahasrāṇi ṣaḍaśītau phalaṃ bhavet |
viṣṇupadyāṃ tu lakṣaṃ tu ayane koṭikoṭakaṃ || 46 ||

viṣṇupadyāṃ tu yaddānamakṣayaṃ parikīrtitaṃ |
dāturvadāmi sānnidhyaṃ sadā janmanijanmani || 47 ||

śīte tūlapaṭīdānānna duḥkhaṃ jāyate tanau |
tulādāne talpadāne dvayorevākṣayaṃ phalaṃ || 48 ||

sarvopakaraṇāṃ śayyāṃ yo dadāti vimatsaraḥ |
varṇamukhyāya viprāya sa rājapadavīṃ labhet || 49 ||

tathaivāgniṃ jalaṃ datvā nadītīre pathiprage |
datvā ca tailatāṃbūlamūrvyā adhipatirbhavet || 50 ||

satyabhāvāddvijaṃ natvā dhanī cākṣayatāṃ vrajet |
māghe māsyasite pakṣe paṃcadaśyāmaharmukhe || 51 ||

pitṝṃstilajalaireva tarpayitvākṣayo divi |
sulakṣaṇāṃ ca gāṃ datvā hemaśṛṃgāṃ maṇiprabhām || 52 ||

raupyakhurapradeśāṃ ca tathā kāṃsyasudohanām |
etāṃ datvā dvijāgryāya sārvabhaumo bhavennṛpaḥ || 53 ||

datvānnābharaṇaṃ rājā maṃḍaleśo dhanīśvaraḥ |
tiladhenuṃ tu yo dadyātsarvopaskaraṇānvitām || 54 ||

saptajanmārjitātpāpānmukto nāke'kṣayo bhavet |
bhojyānnaṃ brāhmaṇe datvā akṣayaṃ svargamaśnute || 55 ||

dhānyaṃ vastraṃ tathā bhṛtyaṃ gṛhapīṭhādikaṃ ca yat |
yo dadāti dvijāgryāya taṃ ca lakṣmīrna muṃcati || 56 ||

yatkiṃciddīyate dānaṃ svalpaṃ vā yadi vā bahu |
akṣayaṃ paralokeṣu yugādyāsu tathaiva ca || 57 ||

yadvā devārcanaṃ stotraṃ dharmākhyānapratiśravaḥ |
punāti sarvapāpebhyo divi pūjyo bhavatyasau || 58 ||

tṛtīyā māghamāsasya sitā manvaṃtarā smṛtā |
tasyāṃ yaddīyate dānaṃ sarvamakṣayamucyate || 59 ||

dhanaṃ bhogyaṃ tathā rājyaṃ nākaṃ kalpāṃtarasthitam |
tasmāddānaṃ satāṃ pūjā pretyānaṃtaphalapradā || 60 ||

manvaṃtarā tu māghe syātsaptamī yā śitītarā |
tithiḥ puṇyatamā proktā purāṇairabhirakṣitā || 61 ||

māghamāse site pakṣe saptamī koṭibhāskarā |
tāmupoṣya naraḥ puṇyāṃ mucyate nātra saṃśayaḥ || 62 ||

sūryagrahaṇatulyā hi śuklā māghasya saptamī |
aruṇodayavelāyāṃ tasyāṃ snānaṃ mahāphalam || 63 ||

yacca tatra kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ mayā saptasu janmasu |
tanme rogaṃ ca śokaṃ ca bhāskarī haṃtu saptamī || 64 ||

jananī sarvabhūtānāṃ saptamī saptasaptike |
saptamyāmudite devi namaste ravimaṃḍale || 65 ||

arkapatraṃ yavāḥ puṣpaṃ sugaṃdhaṃ badarīphalam |
tatpatre tāmrapātre vā yuktamānīya taṇḍulam || 66 ||

yajñasūtraṃ sasiṃdūraṃ datvā cārghaṃ suśobhanam |
sarvapāpaṃ kṣayaṃ yāti saptajanmakṛtaṃ ca yat || 67 ||

narakaiḥ pīḍyate tāvadrogaiḥ pāpaiśca duḥkhadaiḥ |
haviṣyaṃ bhojayedannaṃ śuddhamātapataṃḍulaiḥ || 68 ||

varjayecca śilāghṛṣṭaṃ śṛṃgaberaṃ tu śākakam |
koradūṣakapatraṃ ca raṃbhācchāgīghṛtaṃ tathā || 69 ||

keśakīṭādikaṃ varjyamuṣṇodasnānameva ca |
alpabījādikaṃ sarvaṃ vrate sūrasya varjayet || 70 ||

anyacca nācarettatra dharmaciṃtāṃ vinā vratī |
sauravrataṃ mahāpuṇyaṃ purāṇairabhinaṃditam || 71 ||

varṣakoṭisahasrāṇi varṣakoṭiśatāni ca |
ādityasya samaṃ bhogyaṃ labhate divi śāśvatam || 72 ||

evaṃ svargakṣayādeva rājā bhūmau mahādhanī |
martyaloke purābhyāsātkaroti bhāskaravratam || 73 ||

tathā svayaṃ sukhaṃ bhogyaṃ labhate divi śāśvatam |
ārogyaṃ saṃpadaṃ janmī bhāskarasya prasādataḥ || 74 ||

ravivāre bhavedyā ca saptamī māghaśuklake |
mahājayeti vikhyātā anyatra vijayā smṛtā || 75 ||

vijayā koṭilakṣaṃ syādanaṃtaṃ syānmahājayā |
tatraikena vratenaiva mucyate janmabaṃdhanāt || 76 ||

aśvaratnaṃ suvarṇaṃ ca raktavastraṃ ca dhānyakam |
dadāti bhāskara prītyā svarga martyapatiḥ kramāt || 77 ||

eṣāṃ bhedaṃ pravakṣyami śṛṇu vipra yathārthavat |
uttamābharaṇairyuktaṃ sadvāhaṃ yo dadāti ha || 78 ||

samudraissaptabhirjuṣṭāṃ bhūmimetyārivarjitām |
labhedbhavāṃtare martyamekenaikādhipo bhavet || 79 ||

aśvahīnaṃ ca patrāṃgaṃ vṛṣabhairvāpyalaṃkṛtam |
hemamāṣaṃ dvimāṣaṃ vā dakṣiṇā vihitā budhaiḥ || 80 ||

ratnabhāṃḍaṃ mahārthaṃ ca haimaireva kṛtaṃ ca yat |
svarṇaṃ vā kevalaṃ datvā triviṣṭapadhaneśvaraḥ || 81 ||

raktavastraṃ ca dhānyaṃ ca śaktito yaḥ prayacchati |
svargorvyorīśatāmeti na taṃ lakṣmīrvimuṃcati || 82 ||

arogī suprasannātmā dasyujetā pratāpavān |
yāvatprabhāsate bhānustāvatpūjyatamo hi saḥ || 83 ||

māghādau dvādaśīṃmāyāṃ saptamīṃ kārayetsa tu |
ihābhīṣṭaphalaṃ bhuktvā suraiścaiva prapūjyate || 84 ||

arkāṅgasaptamī vrataṃ kṛtvā ca vidhivadbudhaḥ |
pāpātpūta ihābhīṣṭaṃ saṃprāpya muktimāpnuyāt || 85 ||

lakṣaṇaṃ ca pravakṣyāmi māsi māsi ca yo vidhiḥ |
vratasyāsya prasādācca surāṇāmarcito divi || 86 ||

śuklapakṣe ravidine pravṛtte cottarāyaṇe |
puṃnāmadheyanakṣatre gṛhṇīyātsaptamīvratam || 87 ||

hasto maitraṃ tathā puṣyaḥ śravo mṛga punarvasu |
puṃnāmadheya nakṣatrāṇyetānyāhurmanīṣiṇaḥ || 88 ||

paṃcamyāmekabhaktaṃ tu ṣaṣṭhyāṃ naktaṃ prakīrtitam |
saptamyāmupavāsaṃ ca aṣṭamyāṃ pāraṇaṃ bhavet || 89 ||

arkāgraṃ śucigomayaṃ sumaricaṃ toyaṃ phalaṃ cāśnute |
mūlaṃ naktamupoṣaṇaṃ ca vidhivatkṛtvaikabhaktaṃ tathā |
kṣīraṃ vāpyaśanaṃ ghṛtāktamiti ca proktāḥ krameṇāmunā |
kṛtvā vāsarasaptamīṃ dinakṛtaḥ prāpnotyabhīṣṭaṃ phalaṃ || 90 ||

arkāgraṃ grāmātpūrvottaradiggatārkaviṭapasya śākhāgrasthitaṃ |
viśiṣṭaṃ sūkṣmapatradvayaṃ satoyaṃ dantairaspṛṣṭaṃ pātavyaṃ |
śucigomayaṃ bhūmāvapatitaṃ madyāṅguṣṭhābhyāṃ palamātraṃ dantairaspṛṣṭaṃ satoyaṃ pātavyam |
sumaricamavraṇamapurātanaṃ sthūlamavaśuṣkamekaṃ dantairaspṛṣṭaṃ satoyaṃ pātavyam |
toyaṃ brahmapitraṅgulīmūlaprasaraṃ pātavyamphalaṃ kharjūranārikelānāmanyatamaṃ daṃtairaspṛṣṭaṃ pātavyaṃ ghṛtāktamiti cāhāraṃ mayūraḍiṃbhaparimāṇaṃ |
ghṛtamapi tatparimāṇam || 91 ||

ātmano dviguṇāṃ chāyāṃ yadā kurvīta bhāskaraḥ |
tadā naktaṃ vijānīyānna naktaṃ niśibhojanaṃ || 92 ||

prathamaṃ pūjayeddevaṃ phalapuṣpādimaṃtrakaiḥ |
annadānaṃ tataḥ kuryādvidhyuktaparimāṇakaṃ || 93 ||

tato dhyānam |
sarvalakṣaṇasaṃpūrṇaṃ sarvābharaṇabhūṣitaṃ |
dvibhujaṃ raktavarṇaṃ ca raktapaṃkajadhṛtkaraṃ || 94 ||

tejobiṃbaṃ bahujalamadhyasthaṃ saparicchadaṃ |
padmāsanagataṃ devaṃ raktagaṃdhānulepanaṃ || 95 ||

ādityaṃ ciṃtayeddevaṃ pūjākāle viśeṣataḥ |
atha maṃtraścāyaṃ |
bhāskarāya vidmahe sahasraraśmaye dhīmahi tannaḥ sūryaḥ pracodayāt || 96 ||

japya eṣa paraḥ proktaḥsaptamyāṃ vijayāvahaḥ |
karavīraiḥ karaṃjaiśca raktakuṃkumasannibhaiḥ || 97 ||

paścācca pāraṇā kāryā tathāṣṭamyāṃ viśeṣataḥ |
aṣṭamyāmeva kartavyaṃ navamyāṃ naiva pāraṇaṃ || 98 ||

vrate phalaṃ na cāpnoti navamyāṃ pāraṇe kṛte |
pāraṇaṃ tvaparāhṇe tu kaṭutiktāmlavarjitaṃ || 99 ||

taṃḍulaṃ śodhayedyatnāttṛṇabījādikaṃ tyajet |
mudga māṣa tilādīni ghṛtaṃ ca parivarjayet || 100 ||

brāhmaṇānbhojayedbhaktyā śaktaḥ kṣīrādihavyakaiḥ |
yathāśaktyannapānaiśca vyaṃjanaiśca nirāmiṣaiḥ || 101 ||

viprāya dakṣiṇāṃ dadyādvibhajya cānurūpataḥ |
imāmanaṃtaphaladāṃ yaḥ kuryātsaptamīṃ naraḥ || 102 ||

sarvapāpapraśamanīṃ dhanaputravivardhanīm |
māsi māsi dvijaśreṣṭha vrataṃ kṛtvārkatuṣṭaye || 103 ||

yaḥ kuryātpāraṇaṃ bhaktyā sūryalokaṃ sa gacchati |
kalpakoṭiṃ vasetsvarge tato yāti parāṃ gatiṃ || 104 ||

idameva paraṃ guhyaṃ bhāṣitaṃ śaṃbhunā purā |
śravaṇātsatataṃ tasya vratasya paripālanāt |
śrāvayedvāpi lokasya phalaṃ tulyaṃ prakīrtitaṃ || 105 ||

iti śrīpādmapurāṇe prathame sṛṣṭikhaṃḍe arkāṅgasaptamīvrataṃnāma |
saptasaptatitamo'dhyāyaḥ || 77 ||

vaiśampāyana uvāca |
bhagavaṃstvatprasādācca śrutaṃ me pāvanaṃ vrataṃ |
aparaṃ śrotumicchāmi bradhnasya ca priyaṃ ca yat || 1 ||

vyāsa uvāca |
kailāsaśikhare ramye sukhāsīnaṃ maheśvaraṃ |
praṇamya śirasā bhūmau skaṃdo vacanamabravīt || 2 ||

arkāṅgākhyavidhistvatto mayaivaṃ vistarācchrutaḥ |
vārāderyatphalaṃ nātha śrotumicchāmi tattvataḥ || 3 ||

īśvara uvāca |
raktapuṣpai ravervāre tvarghyaṃ dadyādvratī naraḥ |
naktāhāraṃ haviṣyānnaṃ kṛtvā svargānna hīyate || 4 ||

saptamyāśca sadācāraṃ sarvamevārkavāsare |
kurvataḥ prītimāpnoti sagaṇaḥ parameśvaraḥ || 5 ||

śūrasya sadṛśaṃ yāti tithivārasya pālanāt |
ekena gāṇapatyasya yāvatsūro nabhastale || 6 ||

sarvakāmapradaṃ puṇyamaiśvaryaṃ roganāśanam |
svargadaṃ mokṣadaṃ puṇyaṃ ravervāre vrataṃ hitam || 7 ||

ravivāreṇa saṃkrāṃtyā saptamyā taddine śive |
vratapūjādikaṃ cāpyaṃ sarvaṃ cākṣayatāṃ vrajet || 8 ||

ādityavāsare śubhre grahādhipaprapūjanam |
prāṇādahatavaktreṇa niḥsārya maṃḍale nyaset || 9 ||

dvibhujaṃ raktapadmasthaṃ sugalaṃ raktavāsasaṃ |
sarvaraktābharaṇaṃ dhyātvā hastābhyāṃ puṣpaṃ vidhṛtasaṃghrāyaiśānyāṃ kṣipet || 10 ||

ādityāya vidmahe bhāskarāya dhīmahi |
tanno bhānuḥ pracodayāt || 11 ||

tato gurūpadiṣṭena vidhinā ca vilepanam |
vilepanāṃte saddhūpaṃ dhūpāṃte ca pradīpakam || 12 ||

pradīpāṃte ca naivedyaṃ tato vāri nivedayet |
tato japyaṃ stutiṃ mudrāṃ namaskāraṃ tu kārayet || 13 ||

aṃjali prathamā mudrā dvitīyā dhenukā smṛtā |
evaṃ yaḥ pūjayedarkaṃ ravisāyujyamāvrajet || 14 ||

mama brahmavadhaṃ ghoraṃ kapālaṃ karalagnakam |
ravestasyaprasādāttu muktaṃ vārāṇasītaṭe || 15 ||

raveḥ parataraṃ daivaṃ trailokye tu na vidyate |
yasya prasādato ghorānmuktohaṃ gurukilbiṣāt || 16 ||

skaṃda uvāca |
śrutvā tvatto giraṃ nātha vismayo me'bhavatprabho |
tvadanyosti na ko devaḥ kathaṃ brahmavadhaṃ tvayi || 17 ||

tvaṃ ca jñānīśvaro yogī loke bhoktā'kṣaro'vyayaḥ |
devānāṃ gururekastvaṃ vyāptarūpī maheśvaraḥ || 18 ||

sarvajño varado nityaṃ sarveṣāṃ prāṇināṃ prabhuḥ |
duṣkṛtaṃ te kuto nātha tathā krodho viśeṣataḥ || 19 ||

śiva uvāca |
lokānāṃ ca hitārthāya pṛthagbhūtā yuge yuge |
sarvaṃ kurmo vayaṃ putra brahmaviṣṇumaheśvarāḥ || 20 ||

nāsmākaṃ baṃdhamokṣau ca nākāryaṃ kāryameva vā |
tathā lokasya rakṣārthaṃ carāmo vidhipūrvakam || 21 ||

sarvaṃ ca paramaṃ caiva sarvavighnavināśanam |
sarvarogapraśamanaṃ sarvārthapratisādhakam || 22 ||

ekosau bahudhā bhūtvā kālabhedādaniṃditaḥ |
māse māse tu tapati eko dvādaśatāṃ vrajet || 23 ||

mitro mārgaśire māsi pauṣe viṣṇuḥ sanātanaḥ |
varuṇo māghamāse tu sūryo vai phālgune tathā || 24 ||

caitre māsi tapedbhānurvaiśākhe tāpanaḥ smṛtaḥ |
jyeṣṭhamāse tapediṃdra āṣāḍhe tapate raviḥ || 25 ||

gabhastiḥ śrāvaṇe māsi yamo bhādrapade tathā |
hiraṇyaretāśvayuji kārtike tu divākaraḥ || 26 ||

ityete dvādaśādityā māsi māsi prakīrtitāḥ |
ururūpā mahātejā yugāṃtānalavarcasaḥ || 27 ||

ya idaṃ paṭhate nityaṃ tasya pāpaṃ na vidyate |
na rogo na ca dāridryaṃ nāvamāno bhavetkvacit || 28 ||

akṣayaṃ labhate svargaṃ sukhaṃ rājyaṃ yaśaḥ kramāt |
mahāmaṃtraṃ pravakṣyāmi sarvaprītikaraṃ param || 29 ||

ūṃ namaḥ sahasrabāhave ādityāya namonamaḥ |
namaste padmahastāya varuṇāya namonamaḥ || 30 ||

namastimiranāśāya śrīsūryāya namonamaḥ |
namaḥ sahasrajihvāya bhānave ca namonamaḥ || 31 ||

tvaṃ ca brahmā tvaṃ ca viṣṇū rudrastvaṃ ca namonamaḥ |
tvamagniḥ sarvabhūteṣu vāyustvaṃ ca namonamaḥ || 32 ||

sarvagaḥ sarvabhūteṣu nahi kiṃcittvayā vinā |
carācare jagatyasminsarvadehe vyavasthitaḥ || 33 ||

iti japtvā labhetkāmaṃ svargabhogyādikaṃ kramāt |
ādityo bhāskaraḥ sūryo arko bhānurdivākaraḥ || 34 ||

suvarṇaretā mitraśca pūṣā tvaṣṭā ca te daśa |
svayaṃbhūstimirāśaśca dvādaśaḥ parikīrtitaḥ || 35 ||

nāmānyetāni sūryasya śuciryastu paṭhennaraḥ |
sarvapāpācca rogācca mukto yāti parāṃ gatim || 36 ||

punaranyatpravakṣyāmi bhāskarasya mahātmanaḥ |
raktākhyāye raktanibhāssiṃdūrāruṇavigrahāḥ || 37 ||

yāni nāmāni mukhyāni tacchṛṇuṣva ṣaḍānana |
tapanastāpanaścaiva karttā harttā graheśvaraḥ || 38 ||

lokasākṣī trilokeṣu vyomādhipo divākaraḥ |
agnigarbho mahāvipraḥ svargaḥ saptāśvavāhanaḥ || 39 ||

padmahastastamobhedī ṛgvedo yajussāmagaḥ |
kālapriyaṃ puṃḍarīkaṃ mūlasthānaṃ ca bhāvitam || 40 ||

yaḥ smarecca sadā bhaktyā tasya rogabhayaṃ kutaḥ |
śṛṇu kārtika yatnena sarvapāpaharaṃ śubham || 41 ||

na saṃdeho manākkārya ādityasya mahāmate |
ūṃ iṃdrāya namaḥ ūṃ viṣṇave namaḥ || 42 ||

eṣa japyaśca homaśca saṃdhyopāsanameva ca |
sarvaśāṃtikaraścaiva sarvavighnavināśanaḥ || 43 ||

nāśayetsarvarogāṃśca lūtāvisphoṭakādikān |
kāmalādikarogāṃśca ye rogāścaiva dāruṇāḥ || 44 ||

ekāhikaṃ tryahikaṃ ca jvaraṃ cāturthikaṃ tathā |
kuṣṭhaṃ rogaṃ kṣayaṃ rogaṃ kukṣirogaṃ jvaraṃ tathā || 45 ||

aśmarīmūtraṃkṛcchrāṃśca nānārogāmayāṃstathā |
ye vātaprabhavā rogā ye rogā garbhasaṃbhavāḥ || 46 ||

mardayanto mahārogā marditā vedanātmakāḥ |
vilayaṃ yāṃti te sarva ādityoccāraṇena tu || 47 ||

rakṣa māṃ devadeveśa graharogabhayeṣu ca |
praśamaṃ yāṃti te sarve kīrtite tu divākare || 48 ||

mūlamaṃtraṃ pravakṣyāmi sarvakāmārthasādhakam |
bhuktimuktipradaṃ nityaṃ bhāskarasya mahātmanaḥ || 49 ||

maṃtraścāyaṃ oṃ hrāṃ hrīṃ saḥ sūryāya namaḥ |
anena maṃtreṇa sadā sarvasiddhirbhaveddhruvaṃ || 50 ||

vyādhayo vai na bādhaṃte na cāniṣṭaṃ bhayaṃ bhavet |
sūryāvartodakaṃ yastu gṛhītvā tu krameṇa tu || 51 ||

tasya prāśanamātreṇa naro rogātpramucyate |
na dātavyaṃ na khyātavyaṃ japtavyaṃ ca prayatnataḥ || 52 ||

abhakteṣvanapatyeṣu pāṣaṇḍalaukikeṣu ca |
kaṭutailasamāyuktaṃ nasye pāne ca dāpayet || 53 ||

sūryāvartajalaṃ putra sarvarogādvimucyate |
mūlamaṃtrastu japtavyaḥ saṃdhyāyāṃ homakarmasu || 54 ||

japyamāne tu naśyaṃti rogāḥ krūragrahāstathā |
kimanyairbahubhiḥ śāstrairmaṃtrairvā bahuvistaraiḥ || 55 ||

sarvaśāṃtiriyaṃ vatsa sarvārthapratisādhikā |
nāstikāya na dātavyā devabrāhmaṇaniṃdake || 56 ||

gurubhaktāya dātavyā nānyebhyopi kadācana |
prātarutthāya yo nityaṃ kīrtayiṣyati mānavaḥ || 57 ||

goghnaḥ kṛtaghnakaścaiva mucyate sarvapātakaiḥ |
śarīrārogyakṛccaiva dhanavṛddhiyaśaskaraḥ || 58 ||

jāyate nātra saṃdeho yasya tuṣyeddivākaraḥ |
ekakālaṃ dvikālaṃ vā trikālaṃ nityameva ca || 59 ||

yaḥ paṭhedravisānnidhye so'bhīṣṭaṃ phalamāpnuyāt |
putrārthī labhate putraṃ kanyārthī kanyakāṃ labhet || 60 ||

vidyārthī labhate vidyāṃ dhanārthī labhate dhanaṃ |
śṛṇuyātsaṃyuto bhaktyā śuddhācārasamanvitaḥ || 61 ||

sarvapāpavinirmuktassūryalokaṃ vrajatyapi |
bhāskarasya vrate yacca vratācāramakheṣu ca || 62 ||

puṇyasthāneṣu tīrtheṣu paṭhetkoṭiguṇaṃ bhavet |
grahe bhojyeṣu pūjāyāṃ brahmabhojye dvijāgrataḥ || 63 ||

ya idaṃ paṭhate viprastasyānaṃtaphalaṃ bhavet |
tapasvināṃ ca viprāṇāṃ devānāmagrataḥ sudhīḥ || 64 ||
yaḥ paṭhetpāṭhayedvāpi suraloke mahīyate || 65 ||
iti śrīpādmapurāṇe prathame sṛṣṭikhaṃḍe sūryaśāṃtirnāmāṣṭasaptatitamo'dhyāyaḥ || 78 ||

vyāsa uvāca |
madhyadeśe svarāṭ samrāṭ bhadreśvara iti śrutaḥ |
tapobhirbahubhiḥ pūto vratairnānāvidhairapi || 1 ||

devāṃstu pūjayennityaṃ subhāvena sadā khalu |
tasya savye'bhavatkuṣṭhaṃ kare śvetamajāyata || 2 ||

tato bhiṣakprayogācca lakṣaṇaṃ dṛśyate purā |
āhūya dvijamukhyāṃśca maṃtriṇaḥ sobravīdvacaḥ || 3 ||

rājovāca |
kilbiṣaṃ me kare viprā duḥsahaṃ lokagarhitaṃ |
tasmātpuṇyaṃ mahākṣetraṃ yatra tyakṣyāmi vigrahaṃ || 4 ||

ājñāpayata dharmajñāḥ paralokahitāya vai |
vaṃśahīnasya me vīrāḥ pretyāmutra hitaṃ ca yat || 5 ||

tadbrūta suprasannā ma uddiṣṭaṃ yatkaromyahaṃ |
dvijā ūcuḥ |
parityakte tvayā rāṣṭre dharmaśīlena dhīmatā || 6 ||

naṣṭaṃ jagadidaṃ rājaṃstasmānno vaktumarhasi |
ayamasya pratīkāro hyasmābhiravagamyate || 7 ||

sūraṃ maṃtrairmahādevaṃ yatnādārādhaya prabho |
rājovāca |
kenopāyena vipreṃdrāstoṣayiṣyāmi bhāskaraṃ || 8 ||

amedhyenātha kuṣṭhena lokānāṃ garhitena ca |
adṛśyaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ garhitosmi dvijātayaḥ || 9 ||

kiṃ kariṣyāmi rājyaṃ ca kiṃ syādārādhanena tu |
dvijā ūcuḥ |
atra sthitvā svarājye tu samupāsya virocanaṃ || 10 ||

pramucya kilviṣādghorātsvargaṃ mokṣaṃ ca lapsyase |
etacchrutvā tu rājeṃdraḥ praṇipatya dvijottamān || 11 ||

ākārṣīttasya sūryasya paramārādhanaṃ ca yat |
nityapūjāṃ tathā maṃtrairupahārairvilepanaiḥ || 12 ||

phalairnānāvidhairarghairakṣatātapa taṃḍulaiḥ |
japāpuṣpārkaparṇaiśca karavīrakaraṃjakaiḥ || 13 ||

raktakuṃkumasindūraistathā vāsaṃtikādibhiḥ |
sugaṃdhakadalīpatraistatphalaiḥ sumanoharaiḥ || 14 ||

arghyamauduṃbare kṛtvā sadā sūryāya pārthivaḥ |
ādityasaṃmukho datte sadā maṃtripurohitaiḥ || 15 ||

mahiṣībhistathā cārgho bhoginībhiḥ samaṃtataḥ |
sarvairaṃtaḥpurasthaiśca sapatnīkaiśca rakṣibhiḥ || 16 ||

ceṭavargaistathānyaiśca dīyate'rgho dinedine |
arkaśāṃtibhiratyugraiḥ stotramaṃtrādibhiḥ paraiḥ || 17 ||

mūlamaṃtrānyamaṃtraiśca yajaṃti sma divākaraṃ |
tathārkāṃgavrataṃ cānyatkṛtaṃ taiḥ susamāhitaiḥ || 18 ||

kramātsamāṃsamāsādya rogasyāṃtaṃ gato nṛpaḥ |
bādhite cāmaye ghore sa rājā nikhilaṃ jagat || 19 ||

niyamya kārayāmāsa kalye ca yājanavratam |
evameva japāpuṣpaṃ sugaṃdhaṃ kadalīphalam || 20 ||

bāṇairjāyābhirālabhyamarkaparṇānyapuṣpakaṃ |
evameva mahāpuṇyaṃ kṛtvā sarvajanapriyaṃ || 21 ||

haviṣyānno nirāhāro jano yajati bhāskaram |
evameva tribhirvargairarcitastairvibhākaraḥ || 22 ||

saṃtuṣṭo bhūpamāgamya kṛpayā cābravīdvacaḥ |
varaṃ varaya cābhīṣṭaṃ yaste manasi vartate || 23 ||

sarveṣāṃ vo hitārthāya sānugaḥ puravāsinām |
rājovāca |
yadīcchasi varaṃ dātuṃ sarvalocanamatpriyam || 24 ||

sarveṣāṃ naḥ paraṃ svargaṃ tvatsakāśe bhavatviti |
sūrya uvāca |
amātyāste dvijā viprāḥ sadārāssaparicchadāḥ || 25 ||

navīnayauvanāḥ śuddhā yāvadābhūtasaṃplavam |
tiṣṭhaṃtu matpure ramye sarvabhogairnirāmayāḥ || 26 ||

suradrumaiḥ susaṃpūrṇaiḥ prāsādairdrumakalpakaiḥ |
pramadābhirmahābhāga nṛtyagītādibhiḥ paraiḥ || 27 ||

paṃcakalpāṃtare rājā manvādau tvaṃ bhaviṣyasi |
amī te manujā bhūpa purasthāśca purodhasaḥ || 28 ||

tathā janapadasthāśca vidvāṃso dhanino narāḥ |
tatra matto varaṃ labdhvā sukhaṃ svargamavāpsyatha || 29 ||

evamuktvā jagaccakṣustatraivāṃtaradhīyata |
tato bhadreśvaro rājā sapuro divi modate || 30 ||

tatra kīṭādayo ye ca te pītāḥ sasutādayaḥ |
svarge devadrume bhogyaṃ kurvaṃti mahadadbhutam || 31 ||

evameva nṛpā viprā munayaśśaṃsitavratāḥ |
ye ca kṣatrādayo varṇāssūra svargaṃ yayurdrutam || 32 ||

kaiścidabhyarthitaṃ vittaṃ putradārāstathāparaiḥ |
sukhaṃ svargaṃ tathārogyaṃ bhāskarasya prasādataḥ || 33 ||

puṇyakūṭamidaṃ bhadraṃ yaḥ paṭhenmānavaḥ śuciḥ |
sarvapāpakṣayastasya rudravatpūjito bhuvi || 34 ||

sarvasākṣī bhavetsvarge varado bhāskarapriyaḥ |
śṛṇoti saṃyato martyaḥ sobhīṣṭaṃ phalamāpnuyāt || 35 ||

pāragaḥ sarvapāpānāṃ bhāskarasyaiva saṃsadi |
vāvadūko bhavennityaṃ śravaṇātpuṇyavāndhanī || 36 ||

idaṃ guhyātiguhyaṃ ca bhāskareṇa pracāritaṃ |
idaṃ yamāya kathitaṃ kṣitau vyāsena kīrtitam || 37 ||
iti śrīpādmapurāṇe prathame sṛṣṭikhaṃḍe bhadreśvarākhyānaṃ nāmaikonāśītitamo'dhyāyaḥ || 79 ||

vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca |
śruto graheśvarasyaiṣa prabhāvastvatprasādataḥ |
ravyādīnāṃ grahāṇāṃ ca sādhanaṃ no vada dvija || 1 ||

ke te ravyādayasteṣāṃ kathaṃ toṣaḥ kathaṃ priyam |
kāle deśe tu saṃprāpte darśanaṃ tacchivāśivam || 2 ||

vyāsa uvāca |
grahādayo ye loke tu bhuṃjaṃti puṇyapātakam |
śivāśivaṃ ca kurvaṃti viśvakarmakṣayāya vai || 3 ||

sūraḥ kāloṃtako jñeyo janeṣu ca graheṣu ca |
tigmasaumyācca yogātsa nigrahānugrahe prabhuḥ || 4 ||

grahabhāvācca tasyaiva saṃtoṣaṃ nigadāmyaham |
udumbarapalāśābhyāṃ pallavābhyāṃ juhoti yaḥ || 5 ||

ākṛṣṇeneti maṃtreṇa mūlakenātha śāṃtaye |
juhuyādājyayuktābhyāmabhīṣṭaphalahetave || 6 ||

śāṃtaye sarvarogāṇāṃ vadhabaṃdhavimocane |
ekaikena tu maṃtreṇa hotavyaṃ ca śataṃśatam || 7 ||

śitaṃ cacchāgalaṃ dadyātsūrāyādityavāsare |
bhojayedbrāhmaṇānśaktyā havyakavyairmanoharaiḥ || 8 ||

saptamyāṃ ca site pakṣe paṃcadaśyāṃ tathaiva ca |
rogādvimucyate rogī na rogātkṛcchrameṣyati || 9 ||

paramaṃ cāmaraṃ satvamābrahmastaṃbamātrake |
brahmāṃḍe cāṇumātre ca sūraḥ saṃbhāvayiṣyate || 10 ||

saṃhārāṃtaṃ kramātsarvamutpattisthitikāraṇāt |
prāṇasarge janānāṃ sa pātā viśvacarastanau || 11 ||

mṛtyukāle tanormadhyātprāṇena saha gacchati |
śīrṣāntasthaḥ sadā caṃdro dviraṣṭakalayā yutaḥ || 12 ||

aharniśaṃ sudhāvṛṣṭiṃ dehe varṣatyadhomukhaḥ |
jaṃtavastena jīvaṃti mahāsatvānumātrakāḥ || 13 ||

urvyāṃ sasyāni puṣṇāti tathā sthāvarajaṃgamān |
etābhyāṃ puṣpavadbhyāṃ ca dhāritaṃ janitaṃ jagat || 14 ||

tayorārādhanātpuṣṭiḥ sadā puṇyāparārdhikā |
sādhayetsarvakāryāṇi sādhakaḥ sarvadā śuciḥ || 15 ||

na pūjayati yo mohātsudhāṃśuṃ mānavādhamaḥ |
āyustasya kṣayaṃ yāti narakaṃ cādhigacchati || 16 ||

niṣkalaṃka kalādhāra gaṃgādhara śiromaṇe |
dvitīyāyāṃ jagannātha tubhyaṃ caṃdra namostu te || 17 ||

tithimanyāmanuprāpya namaskāraṃ vidhorapi |
prakaroti naro yastu sobhīṣṭaṃ phalamāpnuyāt || 18 ||

atrinetrodbhava śrīmankṣīroda mathanodbhava |
maheśamukaṭāvāsa tubhyaṃ caṃdra namostute || 19 ||

divyarūpa namastubhyaṃ sudhākara jagatpate |
śuklapakṣe tathā kṛṣṇe triyāmāyāṃ vidurbudhāḥ || 20 ||

ūṃ hrāṃ hrīṃ somāya namaḥ iti japyamaṃtraḥ |
prabhāte japanīyaḥ |
evaṃ yaḥ pūjayetsomaṃ śrāvayecca śṛṇoti vā |
sa pīyūṣasamo loke bhavejjanmani janmani || 21 ||

evaṃ sahasranāmnā yaḥ stauti pūjayate bhuvi |
so'kṣayaṃ labhate svargaṃ punarāvṛttidurlabham || 22 ||

iti somapūjā |
pittale bhājane kāṃsye dadhipūrṇe ghṛte śive |
nyūno'dhikastu vibhavācchrutvā karmavimatsaraḥ || 23 ||

svarṇe vā rājate vāre saumye kṛṣṇabhave budham |
saṃsthāpya sarvasaṃsthāne dadyādbahusutāya ca || 24 ||

paraṃ bhavati saubhāgyaṃ pīyūṣādadhikaṃ bhṛśam |
strīṇāṃ ca puruṣāṇāṃ ca na daurbhāgyaṃ kadācana || 25 ||

rūpasaubhāgyakāmohaṃ dadhipūrṇaṃ ca bhājanam |
dadāmi kāṃsyapātrasthaṃ dehi saubhāgyarūpakam || 26 ||

dvijāya vākyapūrveṇa dadyādvimatsaro naraḥ |
śaktito dakṣiṇā deyā tathā vastrādikaṃ navam || 27 ||

bhojyānnaṃ sarvasampūrṇaṃ tāṃbūlaṃ sumanoharam |
puṣpamālādikaṃ dadyādrūpasaubhāgyahetave || 28 ||

evaṃ yaḥ kurute dānaṃ somoddiṣṭaṃ dvijātaye |
svarloke naraloke vā rūpasaubhāgyabhugbhavet || 29 ||

iti śrīpādmapurāṇe prathame sṛṣṭikhaṃḍe somārcanaṃ |
nāmāśītitamo'dhyāyaḥ || 80 ||

vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca |
udbhavaṃ lohitāṃgasya saṃtoṣaṃ tu janeṣu ca |
prabhāvaṃ vaibhavaṃ tejaḥ śrotumicchāmi tattvataḥ || 1 ||

vyāsa uvāca |
harāṃśasaṃbhavo devaḥ kujātaḥ pṛthivīsutaḥ |
sattvasthassatvasaṃpūrṇaśśūraḥ śaktidharo bhuvi || 2 ||

tīkṣṇaḥ krūragraho devo lohitāṃgaḥ pratāpavān |
kumāro rūpasaṃpanno vidyutpātamayaḥ prabhuḥ || 3 ||

anena bharjitā daityāḥ kravyādāya suradviṣaḥ |
daśāyogācca manujā udbhijjāḥ paśupakṣiṇaḥ || 4 ||

vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca |
śaṃbhoreṣa kathaṃ jātaḥ kathaṃ jāto mahīsutaḥ |
graho devaḥ kathaṃ krūra etadicchāmi veditum || 5 ||

kathamasya bhavettuṣṭiḥ sarvalokeṣu sarvadā |
guro mayyāptabhāve tu vada nissaṃśayaṃ mukhāt || 6 ||

vyāsa uvāca |
hiraṇyākṣakule dhīmānasurāṇāṃ ca pārthivaḥ |
aṃdhaketi samākhyāto daityaḥ sarvasurāṃtakṛt || 7 ||

jāto viṣṇuvarādeva jāto viṣṇuparākramaḥ |
tenaiva nirjitā devāssendrāḥ kratubhujaḥ kramāt || 8 ||

tato devā vidhiṃ gatvā vacanaṃ cedamabruvan |
andhakenaiva cāsmākaṃ hṛtaṃ rājyaṃ sukhaṃ makhaḥ || 9 ||

tasmāttasya vadhopāya ucyatāṃ tadvidhīyatām |
atha dhātā'bravīdvākyaṃ devānasya ca naidhanam || 10 ||

nāsti viṣṇuvarādeva pīyūṣasya ca bhakṣaṇāt |
kiṃtu tasyāsuratvasya yathā paribhavo dhruvam || 11 ||

kurve lokahitārthāya śraddhāṃ kāmasamanvitām |
vicikitsā tu tatraiva sarvāstrīratigacchati || 12 ||

tyaktvaikāṃ pārvatīṃ durgāṃ na tasya mānasaṃ sthiram |
tataḥ kruddho jagatsvāmī taṃ ca vairūpyatāṃ nayet || 13 ||

tato'suratvaṃ saṃtyajya gaṇastasya bhaviṣyati |
evamuktvā prajādhyakṣaḥ śraddhāṃ kāmasamanvitām || 14 ||

vicikitsāṃ svamāyāṃ ca preṣayāmāsa taṃ prati |
tato viceṣṭitaḥ kāmādyoṣānveṣaṇatatparaḥ || 15 ||

svadārānparayoṣāṃ ca nāpaśyadvicikitsayā |
tato māyāprayuktosau trailokyaṃ vicacāra ha || 16 ||

dṛṣṭaṃ ca himavatpṛṣṭhe strīratnaṃ cātiśobhanaṃ |
dṛṣṭvā ca pārvatīṃ daityaḥ kāmasya vaśago'bhavat || 17 ||

jñānalopāttato durgāṃ grahītuṃ tāṃ sa cecchati |
umā ca koṭavīrūpaṃ kṛtvā dehasya cātmanaḥ || 18 ||

īśvarasyāṃtikasthā ca grahītuṃ tāṃ sasāra saḥ |
tataḥ kāmavicetāśca unmattīkṛtacetanaḥ || 19 ||

na jahāti śivāṃ dhātrīṃ pārvatīṃ daityapuṃgavaḥ |
tato dhyānātsamāgamya militaḥ pārvatīṃ dhavaḥ || 20 ||

dṛṣṭvā taṃ ca sa daityendraḥ pragatastu svamālayam |
sajjīkṛtya svayodhāṃśca śaṃbhuṃ jetuṃ samutsukaḥ || 21 ||

gaurīmeva samānetuṃ kāmamohādacetanaḥ |
etacchrutvā tu tridaśā gatvā taṃ naṃdineritāḥ || 22 ||

akurvaṃśca mahadyuddhaṃ ghoraṃ lokabhayaṃkaram |
daityānraṇe mṛtāṃstatra daityācāryo hyajīvayat || 23 ||

etadvṛttaṃ tu kailāse sarve caiva nyavedayan |
krodhācchaṃbhustadā vākyaṃ naṃdinaṃ nijagāda ha || 24 ||

gaccha daityālayaṃ vīra drutameva mamājñayā |
paśyatāṃ sarvadaityānāṃ daityeṃdrasya ca saṃsadi || 25 ||

gṛhītvā cikure'tyarthaṃ bhārgavaṃ taṃ durātmakam |
labdhvā cāsmatsakāśaṃ vai vihvalaṃ cānaya kṣaṇāt || 26 ||

tato naṃdīśvaraḥ śrīmānpārvatīpatineritaḥ |
kāvyaṃ taṃ kuṃtale dhṛtvā daityānāṃ purato balāt || 27 ||

ānayaṃtaṃ ca taṃ daityā jaghnuḥ praharaṇaiḥ śaraiḥ |
na śekuste rujāṃ kartuṃ naṃdino balaśālinaḥ || 28 ||

devānāmagrato naṃdī gṛhītvā taṃ ca kuṃtale |
harasya purato hṛṣṭaḥ saha tena samāyayau || 29 ||

gṛhītvā bhārgavaṃ śaṃbhurasurāṇāṃ guruṃ ruṣā |
agiladraudramūrto'sau kālāṃtakasamaḥ prabhuḥ || 30 ||

tato daityapatiḥ kruddhaḥ sarvasainyavṛto balī |
dudrāva śaṃkaraṃ tatra ghoraiḥ praharaṇādibhiḥ || 31 ||

tridaśāśca tathā kruddhāstato vidyādharādayaḥ |
prayayuḥ samaraṃ tatra daityānāṃ ca bhṛśaṃ ruṣā || 32 ||

etasminnaṃtare ghoraṃ yuddhaṃ bhīṣmaṃ samutthitam |
devadānavayorevaṃ sarvalokabhayaṃkaram || 33 ||

tataḥ pratyayitāstraiśca devā nighnaṃti dānavān |
danujā nirjarāṃstatra vinighnaṃti mahāhave || 34 ||

śātakuṃbhamayāṅgaiste śarairvajrasamānakaiḥ |
bibhidū ratnapuṃkhaiśca parasparajayaiṣiṇaḥ || 35 ||

dīpayaṃti bhṛśaṃ kāṃtaistadgātrāṇi nabhāṃsi ca |
vīryavaṃto mahādaityā na moghairastrasaṃcayaiḥ || 36 ||

hatvā ca pātayāmāsuḥ kāśyapāḥ surasattamāḥ |
jagadvyāptaṃ mahāsainyaṃ balāyudhasusaṃvṛtam || 37 ||

nītaṃ kṣayaṃ suraiḥ sarvaiḥ śastraiḥ pratyayitaiḥ kṣaṇāt |
svayaṃ ca yudhyamānena mahādevena yatnataḥ || 38 ||

śūloddhṛtopi suciramavinaṣṭo'tha namradhīḥ |
andhako gaṇatāṃ nītvā kṛto bhṛṃgīriṭirdvija || 39 ||

tato devānsamābhāṣya śukramudgīrṇavānśivaḥ |
bhūmau nipatito garbhastato bhauma iti smṛtaḥ || 40 ||

śukraśśivaṃ samābhāṣya gato daityānmudānvitaḥ |
evaṃ bhaumassamutpanno harāṃśo bhūsamudbhavaḥ || 41 ||

tasya pūjā caturthyāṃ tu bhaumavāre ca suvrataiḥ |
daśādyariṣṭe ca tathā gocare'niṣṭarāśige || 42 ||

trikoṇe maṃḍale caiva raktapuṣpānulepanaiḥ |
evaṃ vai pūjito bhaumaḥ prayacchati matiṃ dhanam || 43 ||

putrānsukhaṃyaśaścaivakiṃbhūyaḥśrotumicchasi |
vyāsa uvāca |
etadvaḥ kathitaṃ śiṣyā dharmākhyānaṃ śubhāvaham || 44 ||

yacchrutvā na punarbhūyo jāyate mriyatepi vā |
dvijātīnāṃ puṇyadaṃ ca saṃsevyaṃ ca śubhepsubhiḥ || 45 ||

yathāsukhaṃ ca gacchadhvaṃ kṛtakṛtyā mamājñayā |
brahmovāca |
evaṃ viśrāvya bhagavānvyāsaḥ satyavatīsutaḥ || 46 ||

nirṇīya dharmaṃ vividhaṃ śamyāprāsamagātsuta |
tvamapi śraddhayā vatsa jñātvā tattvaṃ yathāsukham || 47 ||

viharasva yathākālaṃ gāyamāno hariṃ mudā |
lokāndharmaṃ copadiśanprīṇayanjagatāṃ gurum || 48 ||

pulastya uvāca |
ityuktaḥ prayayau bhūpa nārado gaṃdhamādanam |
nārāyaṇaṃ munivaraṃ draṣṭuṃ badarikāśrame || 49 ||
iti śrīpādmapurāṇe prathame sṛṣṭikhaṃḍe bhaumotpattipūjanaṃ nāmaikāśītitamo'dhyāyaḥ || 81 ||

bhīṣma uvāca |
śrutaṃ sūryasya caṃdrasya bhaumasyāpi prapūjanaṃ |
budhasya somasūnośca pūjanaṃ kathayādhunā || 1 ||

pulastya uvāca |
tārāgarbhasamudbhūto budhaścaṃdrakumārakaḥ |
saumyaḥ krūro graho jñeyaḥ śubhāśubhaprado nṛṇāṃ || 2 ||

śarākāraṃ maṃḍalaṃ tu budhasya parikīrtitaṃ |
harinmaṇisamairvarṇaiścūrṇaiḥ kuryāttu maṃḍalaṃ || 3 ||

pūjayettatra gaṃdhādyaiḥ puṣpairdhūpaissuśobhanaiḥ |
dānaṃ ca vidhivatkuryāddaśāriṣṭe ca gocare || 4 ||

karpūrāścaiva mudgāśca haridvastraṃ harinmaṇiḥ |
suvarṇaṃ ca yathāśakti dadyādbodhanatuṣṭaye || 5 ||

somaputra mahāprājña vedavedāṃgapāraga |
namaste grahamadhyastha prasanno bhava me sadā || 6 ||

iti stutvā mahārāja budhaṃ bhaktyā samāhitaḥ |
prāpnuyānnikhilānkāmānsomasūnuprasādataḥ || 7 ||

gurośca pūjanaṃ proktaṃ paṭṭasākāramaṃḍale |
pītavarṇaiḥ suniṣpannaiścūrṇairājansuśobhanaiḥ || 8 ||

pītairgaṃdhayutaiḥ puṣpairvastrairhemnā ca pūjayet |
daśāgocarayordauṣṭye dānaṃ dadyācca śaktitaḥ || 9 ||

caṇakadvidalaṃ caiva pītavastraṃ suvarṇakaṃ |
puṣyarāgaṃ tu viprāya dadyāccāriṣṭaśāṃtaye || 10 ||

bṛhaspate surācārya sarvaśāstraviśārada |
dānenānena saṃtuṣṭo bhava saumyo mamādhunā || 11 ||

evaṃ kṛte tu rājeṃdra svānukūlo bhavedguruḥ |
sarvānkāmānavāpnoti naro gurusamarcanāt || 12 ||

bhārgavasyāpi vakṣyāmi pūjanaṃ nṛpatedhunā |
yatkṛtvā sarvakāmāptiḥ samyakpuṃsāṃ prajāyate || 13 ||

paṃcakoṇaṃ samuddiṣṭaṃ maṃḍalaṃ bhārgavasya tu |
cūrṇakaiḥ śvetavarṇaiśca vidhinā sudhiyā kṛtaṃ || 14 ||

śvetagaṃdhaiśca puṣpaiśca vastraiścāpi sitaistathā |
pūjayedbhārgavaṃ bhaktyā naraḥ śraddhāsamanvitaḥ || 15 ||

raupyaṃ ca dakṣiṇādānaṃ yathāśakti prakīrtitaṃ |
daśādyariṣṭe cotpanne sitamaśvaṃ pradāpayet || 16 ||

taṃḍulāḥ śvetavastraṃ ca raupyaṃ caṃdanameva ca |
karpūraṃ ca sugaṃdhāḍhyaṃ deyaṃ dānaṃ dvijātaye || 17 ||

bhṛguputra mahābhāga dānavānāṃ purohita |
dānenānena saṃtuṣṭo bhava sarvāsurārcita || 18 ||

iti maṃtraṃ samuccārya dadyāddānaṃ yathoditaṃ |
tasya tuṣṭo bhavatyāśu bhārgavaḥ kurunaṃdana || 19 ||

śanaiścarasya pūjārthaṃ maṃḍalaṃ ca narākṛti |
kṛtvā cūrṇaiḥ kṛṣṇavarṇaiḥ pūjayettatra bhaktitaḥ || 20 ||

kṛṣṇairgandhaiśca puṣpaiśca vastraiścāpi tathāvidhaiḥ |
lohaṃ ca dakṣiṇādānaṃ piṇyākaṃ ca tilasya ca || 21 ||

dānaṃ śanaiścarāriṣṭe kṛṣṇāṃ gāṃ kṛṣṇavastrakaṃ |
suvarṇaṃ ca yathāśakti dadyānnīlamaṇiṃ tathā || 22 ||

sūryasūno mahābhāga chāyāputra mahābala |
adhodṛṣṭe bhava śane prasanno'smātpradānataḥ || 23 ||

evaṃ stutvā śaniṃ bhaktyā yaśca dadyāddvijātaye |
svānukūlo bhavettasya śaniḥ pāpe ca gocare || 24 ||

rāhorvarṇādikaṃ sarvaṃ śanivanmaṃḍalaṃ tathā |
sūryākāraṃ samuddiṣṭaṃ tatra pūjārkasūnuvat || 25 ||

gomedaṃ sarṣapāścaiva tilā māṣāśca kṛṣṇakāḥ |
mahiṣī ca tathā cchāgo dānaṃ rāhoḥ prakīrtitam || 26 ||

siṃhikāsuta daityeṃdra rāho caṃdrārkamardana |
bhava tuṣṭo mahābhāga dānenānena suvrata || 27 ||

ketormaṃḍalakaṃ kuryāddhvajākṛtisuśobhanam |
śanivatsakalaṃ jñeyaṃ pūjāvarṇādikaṃ nṛpa || 28 ||

saptadhānyaṃ samuddiṣṭaṃ sasvarṇaṃ ketudānakam |
evaṃ kṛte svānukūlau bhavetāṃ ca nṛṇāṃ nṛpa || 29 ||

pradadyātāṃ dhanaṃ putrānsukhaṃ saubhāgyameva ca |
ākṛṣṇeti ravermaṃtra imaṃ devāstathā vidhoḥ || 30 ||

agnirmūrdheti bhaumasya maṃtro japyerhaṇe tathā |
udbudhyasvetīṃdusūnorbṛhaspate gurostathā || 31 ||

annātparīti śukrasya śannodevīrayaṃ śaneḥ |
kayā na iti rāhośca ketoḥ ketumiti smṛtaḥ || 32 ||

ete maṃtrāssamuddiṣṭā grahaṇāṃ pūjane jape |
evaṃ kṛte nṛpaśreṣṭhānukūlā akhilā grahāḥ || 33 ||

bhavaṃti puṃsāṃ satataṃ yacchaṃti ca susaṃpadaḥ |
etanmahārāja mayā samastaṃ tubhyaṃ samuddiṣṭamihakrameṇa || 34 ||

śrutvā naraḥ sarvaśrutārthasārametīśvarasyaiva ca sannidhānam |
idaṃ pavitraṃ yaśaso nidhānamidaṃ pitṝṇāmativallabhaṃ syāt || 35 ||

idaṃ ca deveṣvamṛtāya kalpate puṇyāvahaṃ pātakināṃ ca puṃsām |
iti paṭhati yaśasyaṃ yaḥ śṛṇotīha bhaktyā madhumuranakārerarcanaṃ vātha paśyet || 36 ||

matimapi ca janānāṃ yo dadātīṃdraloke vidhiśivavibudhendraiḥ pūjyate kalpamekam |
ya idaṃ śṛṇuyānnityamṛṣīṇāṃ caritaṃ śubham || 37 ||

vimuktassarvapāpebhyaḥ svargaloke mahīyate |
tapaḥ kṛte praśaṃsaṃti tretāyāṃ jñānameva ca || 38 ||

dvāpare yajñamityāhurdānamekaṃ kalau yuge |
sarveṣāmeva dānānāmidamevaikamuttamam || 39 ||

abhayaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ nāsti dānamataḥ param |
dānaṃ pradhānaṃ śūdrasya tvityāha bhagavānprabhuḥ || 40 ||

dānena sarvakāmāptistasya saṃjāyate tapaḥ |
puṇyaṃ pavitramāyuṣyaṃ sarvapāpavināśanam || 41 ||

purāṇametatkathitaṃ tīrthaśrāddhānuvarṇanam |
śṛṇoti yaḥ paṭhedvāpi śrīmānsaṃjāyate naraḥ || 42 ||

sarvapāpavinirmuktaḥ salakṣmīkaṃ hariṃ labhet |
idaṃ mahārāja agādi tubhyaṃ puṇyaṃ mahāpātakanāśanaṃ ca || 43 ||

brahmārkarudraiśca supūjitaṃ ca śrotavyametatpravadaṃti tajjñāḥ |
sṛṣṭikhaṃḍamidaṃ rājanmayā tubhyaṃ prakīrtitam || 44 ||

purāṇasyādibhūtaṃ ca navadhā sṛṣṭi pauṣkaram |
dvijebhyaḥ śrāvayedvidvānyaśca vai śṛṇuyātpaṭhet |
kalpakoṭiśataṃ sāgraṃ brahmaloke sa modate || 45 ||
iti śrīpādmapurāṇe sṛṣṭikhaṃḍe purāṇāvatāre grahārcanavarṇanaṃnāma dvyaśītitamo'dhyāyaḥ || 82 ||
